sa brahmā tāvatīṃ dīrghāṃ niśāṃ nidrām anubhūya pratibudhyate 
tataḥ punar jagat sṛjati 
svāpo brahmaṇa uktarūpaḥ 
na hy asau prākṛtapuruṣavat svapiti nityaṃ pratibodhāt 
tatra sargakramam āha manaḥ sadasadātmakam iti 
nanu ca apa eva sasarjādau ity uktam 
kecid āhur dvividhaḥ pralayaḥ mahāpralayo 'vāntarapralayaś ca 
avāntarapralaye 'yaṃ kramaḥ 
manaś cātra na tatvāntargatam tasya pūrvam utpannatvāt 
kiṃ tarhi prajāpatiḥ prabuddhaḥ manaḥsargāya sṛjati niyuṅkte ity arthaḥ 
dvitīye tu mahāpralayapakṣe manaḥkāraṇatvān mahat tattvam eva manas tataś ca prāguktakramahāniḥ 
purāṇe hi
mano mahān matir buddhir mahattvaṃ ca kīrtyate 
paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā mahataḥ parikīrtitāḥ  iti 
manaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ vikurute codyamānaṃ sisṛkṣayā 
ākāśaṃ jāyate tasmāt tasya śabdaṃ guṇaṃ viduḥ 
uktāpy eṣā tattvasya sṛṣṭiḥ 
yo viśeṣo noktas tatpratipādanāya punar ucyate 
vikurute viśeṣataḥ karoti brahmaṇā codyamānam 
tasmāc coditād ākāśaṃ jāyate 
tasyākāśasya śabdākhyo guṇo bhavati 
guṇa āśrita ucyate ākāśaṃ tasyāśrayaḥ 
na hy ākāśaṃ vinā śabdasya saṃbhavaḥ 
ākāśāt tu vikurvāṇāt sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ 
balavāñ jāyate vāyuḥ sa vai sparśaguṇo mataḥ 
bhūtād bhūtāntarasyotpattir neṣyate 
mahataḥ sarvabhūtānām utpattyabhyupagamāt tenaivaṃ vyākhyāyate 
ākāśād anantaraṃ mahato vikurvāṇāt sparśamātrabhāvaṃ gatād vāyur jāyate 
sarvagandhāñ chucīn aśucīṃś ca vahati 
atha ca śuciḥ pavitraḥ 
balavān 
yāvatī kācid vikṛtiś ceṣṭārūpā sā vāyukarma kampākṣepordhvādhastiryaggamanādilakṣaṇā 
yatkiṃcic calitaṃ spanditaṃ tat sarvaṃ vāyvāyattam ity etat pradarśayituṃ balavān ity uktam 
uttaratrāpi yāḥ pañcamyas tā na janyarthāpekṣāḥ 
kiṃ tarhi vāyoḥ parato 'nantaram ity evaṃ yojanīyāḥ 
vayor api vikurvāṇād virociṣṇu tamonudam 
jyotir utpadyate bhāsvat tadrūpaguṇam ucyate 
virociṣṇu bhāsvad iti samānārthena śabdadvayena svaparaprakāśatā pratipādyate 
svayaṃ dīptimat paraṃ ca bhāsayati 
jyotiṣaś ca vikurvāṇād āpo rasaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 
adbhyo gandhaguṇā bhūmir ity eṣā sṛṣṭir āditaḥ 
raso madhurādiḥ salilaguṇaḥ gandhaḥ surabhir asurabhiś ca 
sa bhūmer guṇaḥ 
tathā ca vaiśeṣikāḥ kṣitāv eva gandhaḥ iti 
ete sāṃsiddhikā ekaikasya guṇāḥ saṃsargāt tu saṃkīryanate 
tad uktam yo yo yāvatithaḥ iti 
etac ca guṇānukathanam adhyātmacintāyāṃ upayujyate 
uktaṃ hi purāṇakāreṇa
daśa manvantarāṇīha tiṣṭhantīndriyacintakāḥ 
bhautikās tu śataṃ pūrṇaṃ sahasraṃ tv abhimāninaḥ 
ahaṃkāracintakāḥ
mahātmakāḥ sahasrāṇi daśa tiṣṭhanti vijvarāḥ 
pūrṇaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhanty avyaktacintakāḥ 
puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya parisaṃkhyā na vidyate 
yat prāg dvādaśasāhasram uditaṃ daivikaṃ yugam 
tad ekasaptatiguṇaṃ manvantaram ihocyate 
ekasaptatir daivikāni yugāni manvantaraṃ nāma kālaḥ 
manvatarāṇy asaṃkhyāni sargaḥ saṃhāra eva ca 
krīḍann ivaitat kurute parameṣṭhī punaḥ punaḥ 
naiṣā saṃkhyā vidyata ity asaṃkhyāni 
nanu caturdaśa manvantarāṇīti saṃkhyā śrūyate jyotiḥśāstrādau 
ucyate 
āvṛttyā hy asaṃkhyāni 
yathā dvādaśamāsāḥ 
sargasaṃhāryor apy āvṛttir anuparataiva 
krīḍann ivaitat kuruta iti 
sukharthitayā krīḍā 
tasya cāptakāmatvād ānandaikarūpatvāc ca na krīḍāprayuktau sargasaṃhārau 
ata iva śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 
atra parihāraḥ sa prāg ukta eva 
līlayāpi kautukenāpi loke rājādīnāṃ pravṛttir dṛśyata iti brahmavidaḥ 
catuṣpāt sakalo dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiva kṛte yuge 
nādharmeṇāgamaḥ kaścin manuṣyān upavartate 
catvāraḥ pādā yasya catuṣpād dharmaḥ 
yāgādeś ca dharmatvāt tasya cānuṣṭheyasvabhāvatvād vigrahābhāvān na pādaśabdaḥ śarīrāvayavavacanaḥ kiṃ tarhi aṃśamātravacanaḥ 
na hi dharmasya śarīram asti puruṣavidhaṃ paśupakṣyādividhaṃ vā 
tena svāṃśaiś caturbhir upetaś catuṣpād ucyate 
tena yo 'yaṃ dharmaḥ catuṣpāt sakalaḥ kṛtayuga āsīt 
yāgasya tāvat prayogāvasthasya catvāro hotṛkāḥ hotā brahmā udgātā adhvaryur iti 
catvāro varṇāḥ kartāra āśramā vā 
sarvathā yāvān vede dharma uktaḥ sa sarvas tasmin kāle 'ṃśato 'pi na hīnaḥ aviguṇaḥ sarvo 'nuṣṭhīyate 
bāhulyena catuḥsaṃkhyā 
evaṃ dānādiṣv api yojyam dātā dravyaṃ pātraṃ bhāvatuṣṭiḥ 
atha vā yāgadānatapāṃsi jñānaṃ ca 
tathā vakṣyati tapaḥ param iti 
atha vā dharmapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ dharmaḥ 
tasya ca catvāraḥ pādāḥ catvāri padajātāni 
nāmākhyāte copasarganipātāś ca 
tathā cāha
catvāri vākparimitā padāni tāni vidur brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ 
manasa īṣiṇaḥ samarthā vidvāṃso dhārmikāḥ 
adyatve tu
guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti
na hi prakāśante 
turīyaṃ vācaṃ manuṣyā vadanti 
caturthaṃ bhāgaṃ vaidikā manuṣyā vadanti 
etad uktaṃ bhavati ādau na vedavākyaṃ kiṃcid antaritam na ca kācid vedaśākhā 
adyatve tu bahvantaritam 
satyaṃ caivaṃ sakalam ity anuṣaṅgaḥ 
saty api satyasya vihitatvād dharmatve prādhānyārthaṃ pṛthag upadeśaḥ hetvarthe vā 
sakalasya dharmānuṣṭhānasya satyaṃ hetuḥ 
ye tv anṛtinas te lokāvarjanārthaṃ kiṃcid anutiṣṭhanti anyat tyajanti 
nādharmeṇa niṣiddhena mārgeṇa kaścid āgamo vidyā vārtho vānuṣṭhātur upavartate āgacchati yugasvābhāvyāt 
na manuṣyā adharmeṇa vidyām āgamayanti nāpi dhanam arjayanti 
vidyādhane dharmānuṣṭhānakāraṇe tatpariśuddhiḥ sakaladharmasadbhāvasya hetutvenānenocyate 
itareṣv āgamād dharmaḥ pādaśas tv avaropitaḥ 
caurikānṛtamāyābhir dharmaś cāpaiti pādaśaḥ 
kṛtayugād anyeṣu yugeṣv āgamad vedākhyād dharmaḥ pādaśaḥ yuge yuge pādenāvaropito vyapanītaḥ 
antarhitā vedaśākhāḥ puruṣāṇāṃ grahaṇāvadhāraṇaśaktivaikalyāt 
yo 'py adyatve dharmo jyotiṣṭomādiḥ pracarati so 'pi cauryādibhiḥ pādaśo hīyate 
ṛtvijāṃ yajamānānāṃ dātṝṇāṃ saṃpradānānāṃ caitair doṣair yuktatvān na yathāvidhi dharmo niṣpadyate 
phalam ato yathoktaṃ na prāpyate 
tena dharmāpāyahetūnāṃ caurikādīnāṃ na yugair yathāsaṃkhyaṃ saṃbandhaḥ sarveṣām adyopalambhāt 
arogāḥ sarvasiddhārthāś caturvarṣaśatāyuṣaḥ 
kṛte tretādiṣu hy eṣāṃ vayo hrasati pādaśaḥ 
adharmasya rogakāraṇasyābhāvād arogāḥ 
rogo vyādhiḥ 
sarva eva catvāro varṇāḥ siddhābhipretārthāḥ 
arthaḥ prayojanam 
atha vā sarve 'rthāḥ siddhāḥ yeṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇām 
pratibandhakābhāvād avyākṣepeṇāśeṣaphalasiddhiḥ 
caturvarṣaśatāyuṣa iti 
nanu sa ha ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśatam ajīvat iti paramam āyurvede śrūyate 
ata evāhuḥ varṣaśataśabdo 'tra vayo'vasthāpratipādakaḥ catvāri vayāṃsi jīvantīti na purāyuṣaḥ pramīyaṇte nāprāpya caturthaṃ vayo mriyante 
ata eva dvitīye ślokārdhe vayo hrasatīty āha 
pūrvatra vayaso vṛddhāv uktāyām uttaratra tasyaivaṃ hrāsābhidhānopapattiḥ 
pādaśa iti 
na cātra caturtho bhagaḥ pādaḥ kiṃ tarhi bhāgamātram 
aṃśata āyuḥ kṣīyate ity arthaḥ 
tathā ca kecid bālā mriyante kecit taruṇāḥ kecit prāptajarasaḥ 
paripūrṇam āyur durlabham 
vedoktam āyur martyānām āśiṣaś caiva karmaṇām 
phalanty anuyugaṃ loke prabhāvaś ca śarīriṇām 
kecid āhuḥ vaidikaiḥ karmabhiḥ sahasrasaṃvatsarādibhir apekṣitam āyur vedoktam 
tad anuyugaṃ phalati yugānurūpeṇa saṃpadyate na sarveṣu yugeṣu 
nādya kaścit sahasrasaṃvatsarajīvī 
yaḥ sarvaś ciraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśatam 
tad apare nādriyante 
yato dīrghasattreṣu saṃvatsaraśabde divaseṣu vyavasthāpite vidheyāntaravirodhād vākyabhedāpatteḥ 
eṣa hi tatra granthaḥ pañcapañcāśatas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ ityādi 
tatra trīṇya ahāni gavāṃayanaprakṛtitvāt prāptāni 
viśiṣṭā tu saṃkhyā pañcapañcāśata ity aprāptatvād vidheyā 
yady aparā saṃvatsaratā pratīyeta vākyaṃ bhidyeta 
tatrāvaśyam anyatarasyānuvāda āśrayitavyaḥ 
saṃvatsaraśabdaḥ saurasāvanādimān abhedena ṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatrayātmano 'haḥsaṃghātād anyatrāpi dṛṣṭaprayoga eveti 
tasyaiva lakṣaṇayā divaseṣv anuvādo yukta iti 
anye tu mantrārthavādeṣu śatam in nu śarado 'nti devāḥ śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ iti śataśabdaś ca bahunāmasu paṭhitaḥ bahutvaṃ cānavasthitam 
yugānurūpeṇa dīrghajīvino 'lpāyuṣaś ca bhavanti 
yathāśrutavyākhyāne tu kalau sarve śatāyuṣaś ca bhavanti 
atha vā āyuḥkāmasya yāni karmāṇi na ca tatra pramāṇaṃ śrutam tatrānuyugaṃ parimāṇaṃ vedyam 
āśiṣaḥ 
anyā api phalaviṣayā vedaśāsanāḥ 
kāmyānāṃ karmaṇām 
āyuṣaḥ kāmyatve 'pi prādhānyāt pṛthagupadeśaḥ 
tathā hy āha āyur vai paramaḥ kāmaḥ 
prabhāvaḥ alaukikī śaktiḥ aṇimādiguṇayogaḥ abhiśāpḥ varadānam 
anuyugaṃ phalantīti sarvatra yojyam 
anye kṛtayuge dharmās tretāyāṃ dvāpare pare 
anye kaliyuge nṝṇāṃ yugahrāsānurūpataḥ 
uktasya kālabhedena padārthasvabhāvabedasyopasaṃhāraḥ 
dharmaśabdo na yāgādivacana eva kiṃ tarhi padārthaguṇamātre vartate 
anye padārthānāṃ dharmāḥ pratiyugaṃ bhavanti yathā prāk darśitam 
yathā vasante 'nyaḥ padārthānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyo grīṣme 'nya eva varṣāsu evaṃ yugeṣv api 
anyatvaṃ cātra na kāraṇānāṃ dṛṣṭakāryatyāgena kāryāntarajanakatvam apy tv aparipūrṇasya kāryasyotpatteḥ śakter apacayāt 
tad āha yugahrāsānurūpata iti 
hrāso nyūnatā 
tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ jñanam ucyate 
dvāpare yajñam evāhur dānam ekaṃ kalau yuge 
ayam anyo yugasvabhāvabhedaḥ kathyate 
tapaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ vede yugabhedena vidhānābhāvāt sarvadā sarvāṇy anuṣṭheyāni 
ayaṃ tv anuvādo yathā kathaṃcid vyākhyeyaḥ 
itihāseṣu hy evaṃ varṇyate 
tapaḥ pradhānaṃ tac ca mahāphalam 
dīrghāyuṣo rogavarjitās tapasi samarthā bhavanti 
anenābhiprāyeṇocyate 
jñānam adhyātmaviṣayam 
śarīrakleśād antarniyamo nātiduṣkaraḥ 
yāge tu na mahākleśa iti dvāpare yajñaḥ pradhānam 
dāne tu na śarīrakleśaḥ nāntaḥsaṃyamaḥ na cātīva vidvatopayujyata iti susaṃpādatā 
sarvasyāsya tu sargasya guptyarthaṃ sa mahādyutiḥ 
mukhabāhūrupajjānāṃ pṛthak karmāṇy akalpayat 
uktaḥ kālavibhāgaḥ 
brāhmaṇādīnāṃ guṇā idānīṃ kathyante 
tatrāyam upakramaḥ 
sarvasya sargasya sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ guptyarthaṃ rakṣārthaṃ mahātejāḥ prajāpatiḥ mukhādijātānāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthāni karmāṇy akalpayad vyavasthāpitavān 
tānīdānīṃ karmāṇy ucyante 
adhyāpanam adhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ yājanaṃ tathā 
dānaṃ pratigrahaṃ caiva brāhmaṇānām akalpayat 
prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānam ijyādhyayanam eva ca 
viṣayeṣv aprasaktiś ca kṣatriyasya samāsataḥ 
viṣayā abhilāṣajanakā gītaśabdādayo bhāvā ucyante 
tatrāprasaṅgaḥ punaḥ punar asevanam 
paśūnāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānam ijyādhyayanam eva ca 
vaṇikpathaṃ kusīdaṃ ca vaiśyasya kṛṣim eva ca 
vanikpathaḥ vaṇikkarmaṇā sthalapathavāripathādinā dhanārjanam 
upayujyamānadeśāntarīyadravyasaṃnidhāpanaṃ yasya rājño viṣaye vasati 
kusīdaṃ vṛddhyā dhanaprayogaḥ 
ekam eva tu śūdrasya prabhuḥ karma samādiśat 
eteṣām eva varṇānāṃ śuśrūṣām anasūyayā 
prabhuḥ prajāpatir ekaṃ karma śūdrasyādiṣṭavān 
eteṣāṃ brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ suśrūṣā tvayā kartavyā 
anasūyayā anindayā 
cittenāpi tad upari viṣādo na kartavyaḥ 
śuśrūṣā paricaryā tadupayogikarmakaraṇaṃ śarīrasaṃvāhanādi taccittānupālanam 
etad dṛṣṭārthaṃ śūdrasya 
avidhāyakatvāc caikameveti na dānādayo niṣidhyante 
vidhir eṣāṃ karmaṇām uttaratra bhaviṣyati 
ataḥ svarūpaṃ vibhāgena yāgādīnāṃ tatraiva darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
ūrdhvaṃ nābher medhyataraḥ puruṣaḥ parikīrtitaḥ 
tasmān medhyatamaṃ tv asya mukham uktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā 
ā pādāntān medhyaḥ puruṣaḥ 
tasya nābher ūrdhvam atiśayena medhyam 
tato 'pi mukham 
etac ca svayam eva jagatkāraṇapuruṣeṇoktam 
tataḥ kim 
ata āha 
uttamāṅgodbhavāj jyaiṣṭhyād brahmaṇaś caiva dhāraṇāt 
sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ 
uttamāṅgaṃ mūrdhā 
tata udbhavaḥ utpattir brāhmaṇasya 
jyeṣṭhaś cāsāv anyebhyo varṇebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭaḥ 
brahmaṇo vedasya dhāraṇāt 
tasya hi saviśeṣaṃ tad vihitam 
ataḥ sarvasya jagato 'smād dhetutrayād brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ prabhur iva 
prabhur vinayenopasarpaṇīyaḥ tadājñāyāṃ ca dharme sthātavyam 
dharmataḥ prabhuḥ dharme prabhur ity arthaḥ 
ādyāditvāt tasiḥ 
taṃ hi svayaṃbhūḥ svād āsyāt tapas taptvādito 'sṛjat 
havyakavyābhivāhyāya sarvasyāsya ca guptaye 
pūrvasyaiva hetutrayasya viśeṣārtham idam 
anyasyāpi puruṣasyottamāṅgaṃ pradhānam 
taṃ punar brāhmaṇaṃ svayaṃbhūḥ svād āsyān mukhād asṛjat 
tapaś ca kṛtvaiṣottamāṅgād utpattiḥ 
jyaiṣṭhyam āha āditaḥ 
yad devān uddiśya kriyate tad dhavyam pitṝn uddiśya tat kavyam 
tayor abhivahanāya devān pitṝṃś ca prati prāpaṇāya 
abhivāhyāyeti bhāve kṛtyaḥ kathaṃcid draṣṭavyaḥ sakarmatvād vahateḥ 
tena ca karmaṇā sarvasya trailokyasya guptiḥ paripālanaṃ bhavati 
itaḥpradānaṃ devā upajīvanti 
te ca śītoṣṇavarṣair oṣadhīḥ pacanti pācayanti 
ataḥ parasparopakārād guptiḥ 
yasyāsyena sadāśnanti havyāni tridivaukasaḥ 
kavyāni caiva pitaraḥ kiṃ bhūtam adhikaṃ tataḥ 
havyādivahanaṃ pūrvoktaṃ darśayati 
tridivam oko gṛhaṃ yeṣāṃ ta evam ucyante svargavāsino devāḥ 
brāhmaṇena bhuktam annaṃ devā upatiṣṭhanti 
śrāddhe pitryasya karmaṇo 'ṅgabhūtaṃ viśvedaivān uddiśya brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ vihitam 
tadapekṣyaitad uktam 
kiṃ bhūtam anyad adhikaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tatas tasmād iti svayaṃ vismaryate 
devāḥ pitaraś cottamasthānā madhyamasthānāś cāpratyakṣāḥ na teṣāṃ bhojanopāyo 'nyo 'sty anyato brāhmaṇabhojanāt 
ato mahān brāhmaṇaḥ 
bhūtānāṃ prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prāṇināṃ bhuddhijīvinaḥ 
buddhimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 
pṛthivyāṃ ye bhāvāḥ sthāvarā vṛkṣādayo jaṅgamāḥ kṛmikīṭādayas te bhūtaśabdenocyante 
teṣāṃ ye prāṇina āhāravihārādiceṣṭāsamarthās te śreṣṭhāḥ 
te hi paṭutaraṃ sukham anubhavanti 
teṣāṃ ye buddhyā jīvanti hitāhite vicinvanti śvaśṛgālādayaḥ te hi gharmeṇopataptāḥ chāyām upasarpanti śītenārditā ātapam nirāhāraṃ sthānaṃ tyajanti 
teṣām adhikatarā manuṣyāḥ teṣāṃ ca brāhmaṇāḥ 
te hi loke pūjyatamāḥ na ca sarveṇa paribhūyante 
jātimātrāśrayaṃ hi tadvadhe mahat prāyaścittam 
brāhmaṇeṣu ca vidvāṃso vidvatsu kṛtabuddhayaḥ 
kṛtabuddhiṣu kartāraḥ kartṛṣu brahmavedinaḥ 
viduṣāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ mahāphaleṣu yāgādiṣv adhikārāt 
teṣām api kṛtabuddhayaḥ 
pariniṣṭhitavedatattvārthā na bauddhādibhiḥ kaluṣīkriyante 
teṣām api kartāraḥ karmaṇām anuṣṭhātāraḥ 
te hi vihitakaraṇāt pratiṣiddhāsevanāc ca nopahanyante 
teṣām api brahmavedinaḥ brahmasvarūpatvāt 
tatra hy akṣayyānandaḥ 
vidvattādiguṇasaṃbandhino brāhmaṇasya viśeṣe darśite jātimātraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kaścid avamanyeta 
tannivṛttyartham idam ucyate 
utpattir eva viprasya mūrtir dharmasya śāśvatī 
sa hi dharmārtham utpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate 
utpattir eva guṇān apahāya janmaiva brāhmaṇasya jātir eva śāśvatī dharmasya mūrtiḥ śarīram 
dharmārtham utpanno dvitīyena janmanopanayanena saṃskṛtaḥ 
sā hi tasya dharmārthotpattir brahmatvāya kalpate saṃpadyate 
dharmaśarīram ujjhitvā parānandabhāg bhavatīti stutiḥ 
brāhmaṇo jāyamāno hi pṛthivyām adhijāyate 
īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmakośasya guptaye 
sarvalokasyopari bhavati 
śraiṣṭhyam uparibhāvenāha 
īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānām iti prabhutvam 
dharmākhyasya kośasya guptaye jāyate 
dravyasaṃcayaḥ kośaḥ 
upamānād dharmasaṃcaya ucyate kośa iti 
sarvaṃ svaṃ brāhmaṇasyedaṃ yat kiṃcij jagatīgatam 
śraiṣṭhyenābhijanenedaṃ sarvaṃ vai brāhmaṇo 'rhati 
asaṃtuṣṭasya pratigrahādiṣu punaḥ pravṛttau duṣkṛtitām āśaṅkya samādhatte 
sarvam idaṃ trailokyāntarvarti dhanaṃ brāhmaṇasya svaṃ 
nātra pratigraho vidyate 
prabhutvenāsau gṛhṇāti na pratigrahītṛtayeti 
praśaṃsaiṣā na vidhiḥ 
ata evārhatiśabdaḥ 
abhijanaḥ abhijātatāviśiṣṭatvam 
svam eva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca 
ānṛśaṃsyād brāhmaṇasya bhuñjate hītare janāḥ 
yat paragṛha ātithyādirūpeṇa bhuṅkte tad ātmīyam eva 
naivaṃ mantavyaṃ parapākeneti 
svaṃ vaste 
yācitvāyācitvā vā vastraṃ labhate nāsau tasya lābhāya api tu svakasyācchādane viniyogaḥ 
tiṣṭhatu tāvad ātmopayogi yad gṛhṇāti tatra prabhūtam yad anyebhyo dadāti parakīyam tad api tasya nānucitam 
ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kāruṇyam 
tadīyayā mahāsattvatayā pṛthivyāṃ rājānaḥ svāni dhanāny upayuñjate 
anyathā yady asāv icchet aham etad ādāya svakārye viniyuñjīya iti tadā sarve nirdhanāḥ nirupayogāḥ syuḥ 
tasya karmavivekārthaṃ śeṣāṇām anupūrvaśaḥ 
svāyaṃbhuvo manur dhīmān idaṃ śāstram akalpayat 
sarvasyāḥ brāhmaṇastuteḥ phalapradarśanārthaṃ śloko 'yam 
evaṃvidham idaṃ mahārthaṃ śāstraṃ yat tasya svamahimnātyantikena mahattamasya brāhmaṇasya karmavivekārthaṃ imāni karmāṇi kartavyāni imāni varjyāṇi eṣa vivekas tadartham 
śeṣāṇāṃ ca kṣatriyādīnām anupūrvaśaḥ prādhānyād brāhmaṇasyānuṣaṅgāt kṣatriyādīnām idaṃ śāstram akalpayat kṛtavān 
viduṣā brāhmaṇenedam adhyetavyaṃ prayatnataḥ 
śiṣyebhyaś ca pravaktavyaṃ samyaṅ nānyena kenacit 
adhyetavyaṃ pravaktavyam ity arhe kṛtyo na vidhau 
dvitīyād adhyāyāt prabhṛti śāstraṃ pravartiṣyate 
ayaṃ hy adhyāyo 'rthavāda eva 
nātra kaścid dvidhir asti 
tena yathā rājabhojanāḥ śālayaḥ iti śalistutir na rājño 'nyasyeti tadbhojananiṣedhaḥ evam atrāpi nānyena kenacid iti nāyaṃ niṣedhaḥ kevalaṃ śāstrastutiḥ 
sarvasmiñ jagati śreṣṭho brāhmaṇaḥ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ śāstram idam atas tādṛśasya viduṣo brāhmaṇasyādhyayanapravacanārhaṃ na sāmānyena śakyate adhyetuṃ pravaktuṃ vā 
ata evāha prayatnata iti 
yāvan na mahān prayatna āsthito yāvan na śāstrāntarais tarkavyākaraṇamīmāṃsādibhiḥ saṃskṛta ātmā tāvad etat pravaktuṃ na śakyate 
ata evādhyayanena śravaṇaṃ lakṣyate 
tatra hi vidvattopayoginī na saṃpāṭhe 
vidhau hy adhyayane vidvattādṛṣṭayaiva syān na ca vidhau śravaṇam adhyayanena lakṣyate iti yuktaṃ vaktum 
na vidheye lakṣaṇārthatā yuktā 
arthavāde tu pramāṇāntarānusāreṇa guṇavādo na doṣāya 
tasmāt traivarṇikādhikāraṃ śāstram 
etac ca parastād viśeṣato vakṣyate 
idaṃ śāstram adhīyāno brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ 
manovāgdehajair nityaṃ karmadoṣair na lipyate 
evaṃ saṃbandhidvāreṇa brāhmaṇārthatayā śāstraṃ stutvādhunā sākṣāt stauti 
idaṃ śāstraṃ jānānaḥ śaṃsitavrato bhavatīti paripūrṇayamaniyamānuṣṭhāyī bhavati 
śāstrād ananuṣṭhāne pratyavāyaṃ jñātvā tadbhayād anutiṣṭhati sarvān yamaniyamān yathāśāstraṃ sarvam anutiṣṭhati 
anutiṣṭhan vihitātikramapratiṣiddhakarmajanitair doṣair na lipyate na saṃbadhyate 
punāti paṅktiṃ vaṃśyāṃś ca sapta sapta parāvarān 
pṛthivīm api caivemāṃ kṛtsnām eko 'pi so 'rhati 
paṅktipāvano bhavati 
viśiṣṭānupūrvīkaḥ saṃghātaḥ paṅktir ucyate 
tāṃ punāti nirmalīkaroti 
sarve duṣṭās tatsaṃnidhānād aduṣṭāḥ saṃpadyante 
vaṃśyān svakulasaṃbhūtān sapta parāṇ uparitanān pitrādīn āgāmino 'varāñ janiṣyamāṇān 
samudraparyantāṃ pṛthivīṃ pratigrahītum arhanti 
dharmajñatā hi pratigrahādhikāre hetuḥ 
itaś ca sarve dharmā jñāyante 
idaṃ svastyayanaṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ buddhivivardhanam 
idaṃ yaśasyam satatam idaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param 
svastyabhipretasyārthasyāvināśaḥ 
ayanaṃ prāpaṇam 
svasti prāpyate yena tat svastyayanam 
śreṣṭham anyebhyo japahomādibhyaḥ 
na hi śāstram antareṇa teṣām anuṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati atas tadanuṣṭhānahetutvāc chreṣṭam etat 
atha vā dharmajñānārthavākyāny eva śreyasyāny anuṣṭḥānaṃ tu kleśakaram ata ucyate śreṣṭham iti 
idaṃ buddhivivardhanam 
śāstre hy āsevyamāne tadarthasya prakāśanād granthipramokṣād buddhivivṛddhiḥ prasiddhaiva 
idaṃ yaśasyam dharmajñaḥ saṃśayānaiḥ pṛcchyamānaḥ khyātiṃ labhate 
yaśaso nimittaṃ yaśasyaṃ 
vidvattaudāryādiguṇavattayā prasiddhir yaśaḥ 
niḥśreyasaṃ duḥkhānanuviddhāyāḥ prīteḥ svargāpavargalakṣaṇāyās tatprāptihetukarmajñānahetutvān niḥśreyasaṃ paraṃ śreṣṭham 
asmin dharma 'khilenokto guṇadoṣau ca karmaṇām 
caturṇām api varṇānām ācāraś caiva śāsvataḥ 
idānīṃ svaśāstrasya svaviṣaye sākalyena vṛtter anyanirapekṣatām āha 
kaścid yo nāma dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ śāstre 'smin kārtsnyenābhihitaḥ 
na tasmād dharmajñānāya śāstrāntarāpekṣā kartavyety atiśayoktiḥ stutiḥ 
asmiñ chastre dharmaḥ smārto 'khilena niḥśeṣeṇoktaḥ 
guṇadoṣau ca karmaṇām 
iṣṭāniṣṭe phale guṇadoṣau karmaṇāṃ yāgādibrahmahatyādīnām 
evaṃ hi sākalyaṃ bhavati yat karmasvarūpam itikartavyatāphalaviśeṣaḥ kartṛviśeṣasaṃbandho nityakāmyatāvivekaḥ 
etat sarvaṃ guṇadoṣapadena pratijñātam 
dharma ity ukte karmagrahaṇaṃ vṛttapūraṇārtham 
caturṇām api varṇānām 
etad api sākalyārtham 
yo nāma kaścid dharme 'dhikṛtas tasya sarvasyeto dharmalābhaḥ 
ācāraś caiva śāśvataḥ 
ācārapramāṇako dharma ācāra ity uktaḥ 
dvitīye cainaṃ vivekṣyāmaḥ 
śāśvato vṛddhaparaṃparayā nedānīṃtanaiḥ pravartitaḥ 
ācāraḥ paramo dharmaḥ śrutyuktaḥ smārta eva ca 
tasmād asmin sadāyukto nityaṃ syād ātmavān dvijaḥ 
paramaḥ prakṛṣṭo dharma ācāras tathā śrutau vede ya uktaḥ 
smārtaḥ smṛtiṣūktaḥ 
tasmād ācāradharme nityaṃ yuktaḥ syān nityam anutiṣṭhed ātmavān ātmano hitam icchan 
sarvasyātmāsty ato matupā taddhitaparatvam ucyate 
ācārād vicyuto vipro na vedaphalam aśnute 
ācāreṇa tu saṃyuktaḥ saṃpūrṇaphalabhāg bhavet 
prakārāntareṇeyam ācārastutiḥ 
ācārāt pracyuta ācārahīno na vedaphalaṃ prāpnoti 
vedavihitakarmānuṣṭhānaphalaṃ vedaphalam ity uktam 
samagrāny avikalāni vaidikāni karmāṇy anutiṣṭhan yady ācārabhraṣṭo na tataḥ putrakāmādiphalam aśnuta iti nindā 
eṣa evārtho viparyayeṇocyate ācāreṇa tu saṃyuktaḥ sakalaṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti kāmyānām 
atra yad vadanti saṃpūrṇavacanād ācārahīnasyāpy asti kāmyebhyaḥ phalasaṃbandhaḥ na kṛtsnaphalalābhaḥ iti tan na kiṃcit arthavādatvād asya 
evam ācārato dṛṣṭvā dharmasya munayo gatim 
sarvasya tapaso mūlam ācāraṃ jagṛhuḥ param 
yāvat kiṃcit tapaḥ prāṇāyāmamaunayamaniyamakṛcchracāndrāyaṇānaśanādi tasya sarvasya phalaprasave mūlam ācāraḥ atas tam eva munayas tapaḥphalārthino mūlatvena kāraṇatayā jagṛhuḥ gṛhītavantaḥ 
ācārād dṛṣṭvā dharmasya munayo gatiṃ prāptim 
atikleśakaraṃ tapas tathāpy ācārahīnasya na phalatīti śrutiḥ 
jagataś ca samutpattiṃ saṃskāravidhim eva ca 
vratacaryopacāraṃ ca snānasya ca paraṃ vidhim 
uktā dharmā atra viśiṣyante 
śrotṛpravṛttyarthaṃ cānantaphalatā dharmasyoktā etadantās tu ityādinā 
tatrātīndriyo 'yam ananto duṣpāra iti manvānā avasīdeyur ata utsāhajananārthaṃ śāstrārthasaṃkalanātmikām anukramaṇīṃ paṭhati 
etāvanty atra vastūni nātibahūni śakyante śraddadhānaiḥ puruṣair jñātum iti 
saṃkṣepopadiṣṭamārga ākramyamāṇo na duḥsaho bhavatīti 
jagataś ca samutpattim iti kālaparimāṇaṃ tattvabhāvabhedo brāhmaṇastutir ityādi sarvaṃ jagadutpattāv antarbhūtam 
etac cārthavādatayoktaṃ na prameyatayā 
saṃskāravidhiṃ vratacaryopacāraṃ ca 
garbhādhānādayaḥ saṃskārāḥ 
teṣāṃ vidhiḥ kartavyatā 
brahmacāriṇo vratacaryāyā upacāro 'nuṣṭhānam itikartavyatā vā 
etad dvitīyādhyāyaprameyārthaḥ 
snānaṃ gurukulān nivartamānasya saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ 
dārādhigamanaṃ caiva vivāhānāṃ ca lakṣaṇam 
mahāyajñavidhānaṃ ca śrāddhakalpaṃ ca śāśvatam 
dārāṇām adhigamanaṃ bhāryāsaṃgrahaḥ 
vivāhānāṃ brāhmādīnāṃ tatprāptyupāyānāṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpādhigamane hetum 
mahāyajñāḥ pañca vaiśvadevādayaḥ 
śrāddhasya pitṛyajñasya kalpo vidhir itikartavyatā 
paragrahaṇaṃ śāśavatagrahaṇaṃ ca vṛttapūraṇārtham 
eṣa tṛtīyādhyāyārthaḥ 
vṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva snātakasya vratāni ca 
bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ śuddhim eva ca 
strīdharmayogaṃ tāpasyaṃ mokṣaṃ saṃnyāsam eva ca 
rājñaś ca dharmam akhilaṃ kāryāṇāṃ ca vinirṇayam 
sākṣipraśnavidhānaṃ ca dharmaṃ strīpuṃsayor api 
vibhāgadharmaṃ dyūtaṃ ca kaṇṭakānāṃ ca śodhanam 
vaiśyaśūdropacāraṃ ca saṃkīrṇānāṃ ca saṃbhavam 
āpaddharmaṃ ca varṇānāṃ prāyaścittividhiṃ tathā 
vṛttīnāṃ jīvanopāyānāṃ dharnārjanātmakānāṃ bhṛtyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam 
snātakasya samāptavedādhyayanasya gurukulān nivṛttasya vratāni nekṣetodyantam ādityam ityādīni 
eṣa catuthārthaḥ 
bhakṣyābhkṣyaṃ pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ abhakṣyaṃ palāṇḍvādi 
śaucaṃ kālakṛtaṃ janmādāv udakādinā ca dravyaśuddhiḥ 
strīdharmayogaḥ saṃbandho bālayuvetyādi 
etat pāñcamikam 
tāpasāya hitaṃ tāpasyaṃ 
tapaḥpradhānas tāpaso vānaprasthas tasya dharmas tāpasyam 
mokṣaḥ parivrājakadharmaḥ 
saṃnyāsaś ca tadviśeṣa eva 
sa ca tatraiva darśayiṣyate 
ṣaṣṭhādhyāyas tv etat 
rājñaḥ pṛthivīpālanādhikṛtasya prāptaiśvaryasya dharmo 'khilo dṛṣṭārtho 'dṛṣṭārthaś ca 
eṣa saptamādhyāyagocaraḥ 
kāryāṇām ṛṇādīnāṃ vinirṇayo vicārya saṃśayacchedenāvadhāraṇam anuṣṭheyaniścayaḥ 
sākṣiṇāṃ ca praśne yo vidhiḥ 
prādhānyāt pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ 
āṣṭamiko 'yam arthaḥ 
dharmaḥ strīpuṃsayor ity ekadeśe sthitayoḥ pravāsaviyukayoś ca parasparaṃ vṛttiḥ 
rikthavibhāgadharmaḥ 
dyūtam 
tadviṣayo vidhiḥ dyūtaśabdenoktaḥ 
kaṇṭakādīnāṃ corāṭavikādīnāṃ śodhanaṃ rāṣṭrān nirasanopāyaḥ 
yady api vibhāgādir aṣṭādaśapadāntargatatvāt kāryāṇāṃ cety anenaivopādānād ṛṇādānādivan na pṛthaṅ nirdeśyaḥ 
adhyāyabhedāt tu pṛthaṅ nirdeśaḥ 
vaiśyaśūdrayor upacāraḥ svadharmānuṣṭhānam 
etan navame 
saṃkīrṇānāṃ kṣattṛvaidehakādīnāṃ saṃbhavam utpattim 
āpaddharmaṃ ca svavṛttyājīvatāṃ prāṇātyaye yo dharmaḥ 
etad daśame 
prāyaścittavidhir ekādaśe   
saṃsāragamanaṃ caiva trividhaṃ karmasaṃbhavam 
niḥśreyasaṃ karmaṇāṃ ca guṇadoṣaparīkṣaṇam 
saṃsāragamanaṃ 
dharmeṇa dharmī lakṣyate 
saṃsārī puruṣa ātmā tasya gamanaṃ dehād dehāntaraprāptiḥ 
atha vā saṃsāraviṣayāḥ pṛthivyādayo lokā ucyante 
tatra gamanaṃ pūrvavat 
trividham uttamādhamamadhyamaṃ karmasaṃbhavaṃ śubhāśubhakarmanimittam 
niḥśreyasaṃ na kevalaṃ karmanimittā gataya uktāḥ 
yāvad yataḥ param anyac chreyo nāsti tadupāyo 'py adhyātmajñānam uktam 
karmaṇāṃ ca vihitapratiṣiddhānāṃ guṇadoṣaprīkṣā 
deśadharmāñ jātidharmān kuladharmāṃś ca śāsvatān 
pāṣaṇḍagaṇadharmāṃś ca śāstre 'sminn uktavān manuḥ 
tad eva sākalyābhidhānaṃ draḍhayati 
pratiniyate deśe 'nuṣṭhīyamānā na sarvasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ te daśadharmāḥ 
brāhmaṇādijātyāśrayā jātidharmāḥ 
kuladharmāḥ prakhyātavaṃśapravartitā iti 
pāṣaṇḍaṃ pratiṣiddhavratacaryā bāhyasmṛtisamāśrayās tatra ye dharmāḥ 
pāṣaṇḍino vikarmasthān iti 
gaṇaḥ saṃghāto vaṇikkārukuśīlavādīnām 
tān sarvadharmān bhagavān manur asmiñ chāstre uktavān 
yathedam uktavāñ chāstraṃ purā pṛṣṭo manur mayā 
tathedaṃ yūyam apy adya matsakāśān nibodhata 
avadhānārthaḥ pratibodhaḥ 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ
prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
iti śrībhaṭṭamedhātithiviracite manubhāṣye
prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
atha dvitīyādhyāyaḥ
vidvadbhiḥ sevitaḥ sadbhir nityam adveṣarāgibhiḥ 
hṛdayenābhyanjñāto yo dharmas taṃ nibodhata 
prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ śāstrapratipādyārthatattvadarśanārtho 'nukrāntaḥ 
jagatsṛṣṭyādivarṇanaṃ ca taccheṣam eva vyākhyātam 
idānīṃ śāstram ārabhate 
tatra pratijñāto 'rtho jagatsargādivarṇanena vyavāyād vismṛta ity anusaṃdhānārthaṃ punaḥ śiṣyān prati bodhayati 
yo dharmo bhavatāṃ śuśrūṣitas tam idānīṃ mayocyamānaṃ nibodhata avahitā bhūtvā śṛṇuta 
prathame 'dhyāye pañcaṣāḥ ślokāḥ prayojanādipratipādanārthāḥ 
pariśiṣṭam arthavādarūpam 
tac cen nātisamyag avadhāritaṃ na dharmaparijñāne mahatī kṣatiḥ 
iha tu sākṣād dharma upadiśyate 
tato 'vadhānavadbhir avadhāraṇīyo 'yam artha iti punar upanyāsaphalam 
dharmaśabda uktārtho 'ṣṭakādyanuṣṭhānavacanaḥ 
bāhyadarśaninas tu bhasmakapālādidhāraṇam api dharmaṃ manyante 
tannivṛttyarthaṃ vidvadbhir ityādīni viśeṣaṇapadāni 
vidvāṃsaḥ śāstrasaṃskṛtamatayaḥ pramāṇaprameyasvarūpavijñānakuśalāḥ 
te ca vedārthavido vidvāṃsaḥ nānye 
yato vedād anyatra dharmaṃ prati ye gṛhītaprāmāṇyās te viparītapramāṇaprameyagrahaṇād avidvāṃsa eva 
etac ca mīmāṃsātas tattvato niścīyate 
santaḥ sādhavaḥ pramāṇaparicchinnārthānuṣṭhāyino hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthāya yatnavantaḥ 
hitāhitaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ prasiddham 
adṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇam 
tadanuṣṭhānabāhyā asanta ucyante 
ata ubhayam atropāttaṃ jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ ca 
vidyamānatāvacanaḥ sacchabdo na saṃbhavati ānarthakyāt 
yad dhi yena sevyate tat tena vidyamānenaiva 
sevā anuṣṭhānaśīlatā 
bhūtapratyayenānādikālapravṛttatām āha 
nāyam aṣṭakādidharmo 'dyatve kenacit pravartita itaradharmavat 
etad eva nityaśabdena darśayati 
yāvatsaṃsāram eṣa dharmaḥ 
bāhyadharmās tu sarve mūrkhaduḥśīlapuruṣapravartitāḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ labdhāvasarā api punar antardhīyante 
na hi vyāmoho yugasahasrānuvartī bhavati 
samyagjñānam avidyayā saṃcchannam api tatkṣaye nirmalatām evaiti 
na hi tasya nirmalatayā chedaḥ saṃbhavati 
adveṣarāgibhiḥ 
idaṃ bāhyadharmānuṣṭhāne dvitīyaṃ kāraṇam 
vyāmohaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ 
anena lobhādaya ucyante rāgadveṣagrahaṇasya pradarśanārthatvāt 
lobhena mantratantrādiṣu pravartayanti 
atha vā rāgadveṣayor lobho 'ntarbhūtaḥ 
ātmani ye bhogopāyās teṣu raktāḥ upāyāntareṇa jīvituṃ asamarthā liṅgadhāraṇādinā jīvanti 
tad uktam bhasmakapālādidhāraṇam nagnatā kāṣāye ca vāsasī buddhipauruṣahīnānāṃ jīvikā iti 
dveṣo viparītānuṣṭhānakāraṇam 
dveṣapradhānā hi nātīva tattvāvadhāraṇe samarthā bhavanti ato 'dharmam eva dharmatvenādhyavasyantīti 
atha vobhāv api rāgadveṣau tattvāvadhāraṇe pratibandhakau 
satyām api kasyāṃcic chāstravedanamātrāyāṃ labdhe 'pi vidvadvyapadeśe rāgadveṣavattayā viparītānuṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati 
jānānā api yathāvac chāstraṃ kasyacid dveṣyasyopaghātāya priyasya copakarāya kauṭasākṣyādyadharmaṃ sevante 
teṣāṃ vedamūlam evānuṣṭhānam ity aśakyaniścayam kāraṇāntarasya rāgadveṣalakṣaṇasya saṃbhavāt 
atas tatpratiṣedhaḥ 
atra codyate 
sadbhir iti sacchabdaḥ sādhutāvacano varṇitaḥ 
kīdṛśī ca sādhutā tasya yadi rāgadveṣābhyām adharme pravṛttiḥ saṃbhāvyate 
tasmād adveṣarāgibhir iti na vaktavyam 
evaṃ tarhi hetutvenocyate 
yato rāgādivarjitā ataḥ santo bhavanti 
rāgadveṣapradhānatvābhāvaś cātra pratipādyate 
na sarveṇa sarvaṃ tadabhāvayogyāvasthāgatasya hetor niranvayam ucchidyate 
tathā ca śrutiḥ na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayor apahatir asti iti 
rāgaḥ viṣayopabhogagṛdhnutā 
tatpratiṣedhavyāpāro dveṣaḥ 
lobho mātsaryam asādhāraṇyena spṛhā parasya caitan mā bhūd vibhavakhyātyādi 
cittadharmā ete 
atha vā cetanāvastu strīsutasuhṛdbāndhavādiṣu sneho rāgaḥ lobho 'cetaneṣv api dhanādiṣu spṛhā 
hṛdayena 
hṛdayaśabdena cittam ācaṣṭe 
anujñānaṃ ca hṛdayasya prasādaḥ 
eṣā hi sthitiḥ 
antarhṛdayavartīni buddhyāditattvāni 
yady api bāhyahiṃsābhakṣyabhakṣaṇādiṣu mūḍhā dharmabuddhyā pravartante tathāpi hṛdayākrośanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavati 
vaidike tv anuṣṭhāne parituṣyati manaḥ 
tad asya sarvasyāyam arthaḥ 
na mayā tādṛśo dharma ucyate yatraite doṣāḥ santi 
kiṃ tu ya evaṃvidhair mahātmabhir anuṣṭhīyate svayaṃ ca yatra cittaṃ pravartayati vā 
ata ādarātiśaya ucyamāneṣu dharmeṣu yuktaḥ 
atha vā hṛdayaṃ vedaḥ 
sa hy adhīto bhāvanārūpeṇa hṛdayasthito hṛdayam 
tataś ca tritayam atropāttam 
yadi tāvad avicāryaiva svāgrahāt kācit pravṛttiḥ kasyacit tathāpy atraiva yuktā 
etat hṛdayenābhyanujñāta ity anenocyate 
athāpy ayaṃ nyāyaḥ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ iti tad apy atraivāsti 
vidvāṃso hy atra niṣkāmāḥ pravṛttapūrvā anindyāś ca loke 
athāprāmāṇikī pravṛttiḥ sāpi vedaprāmāṇyāt siddhaiveti 
sarvaprakāraṃ pravṛttyābhimukhyam anena janyate 
anye tv etaṃ ślokaṃ sāmānyena dharmalakṣaṇārthaṃ vyācakṣate 
evaṃvidhair yaḥ sevyate sa dharmo 'vagantavyaḥ 
pratyakṣavedavihitasya smārtasya vācārataḥ prāptasya sarvasyaitallakṣaṇaṃ vidyate 
atra tu ya etaiḥ sevyate taṃ dharmaṃ nibodhateti pāṭho yuktaḥ 
kāmātmatā na praśastā na caivehāsty akāmatā 
kāmyo hi vedādhigamaḥ karmayogaś ca vaidikaḥ 
phalābhilāṣaḥ karmapravṛtter hetur yasya sa kāmātmā tadbhāvaḥ kāmātmatā 
tatpradhānatā ātmaśabdena pratipādyate 
sā na praśastā ninditā 
ataś ca nindayā pratiṣedhānumāne na kartavyā iti pratīyate 
arthāt sauryādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ niṣedho 'yam 
atha vā kiṃ viśeṣeṇa brūmaḥ sauryādīnām iti 
sarvam eva kriyānuṣṭhānaṃ phalasiddhartham na svarūpaniṣpattaye 
na ca kācana niṣphalā kriyā 
yad api na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām iti bhasmani hutam viṣayāntare deśarājavārtādyanveṣaṇam tatrāpi kriyāphalaṃ vidyate 
kiṃ tu pradhānaphalaṃ svargagrāmādi puruṣasya yad dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayor upayujyate tadabhāvād vṛthā ceṣṭety ucyate 
athocyate 
bhavatu kriyā phalavatī 
tadviṣaye 'bhilāṣo na kartavyaḥ vastusvābhāvyāt phalaṃ bhaviṣyati 
atrāpi sauryādīnām aphalatvam 
kāmyamānaṃ phalaṃ jñātam 
nānicchos tad bhaviṣyatīti 
na ca laukikī pravṛttir dṛśyate phalābhisaṃdhinirapekṣā 
na cātra viśeṣaḥ śrutau vaidikeṣu karmasu phalaṃ nābhisaṃdheyam iti 
tatra phalavatsu śruteṣu kāmanāniṣedhād apravṛttau śrutivirodhaḥ 
nityeṣu tu prāptir eva nāsti 
viśeṣānupādānāc ca laukikavyāpāranivṛttau dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ 
tad idam āpatitam na kiṃcit kenacit kartavyam sarvais tūṣṇīṃbhūtaiḥ sthātavyam 
ucyate 
yat tāvad uktaṃ kāmyeṣu sauryādiṣu niṣedhaprasaṅga iti tatra vakṣyati
yathāsaṃkalpitāṃś ceha sarvān kāmān samaśnute 
iti 
niṣedhe hi kutaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kutaś ca kāmāvāptiḥ 
yad api viśeṣānupādānāl laukike 'pi prasakta iti tatropātta eva viśeṣaḥ yo dharmas taṃ nibodhata iti dharmasya prakṛtatvāt 
yad apy uktaṃ nityeṣu phalāśravaṇāt phalābhisaṃdheḥ prāptir eva nāsti kiṃ niṣedheneti tatrāpy ucyate phalābhāvāt kaścit samyak śāstrārtham ajānāno na pravarteta sauryādiṣu ca śrutaphaleṣu phalābhisaṃdhipūrvikāṃ pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā sāmānyato dṛṣṭena yat kartavyaṃ tat phalahetoḥ kriyate ity aśrutam api phalam abhisaṃdadhīta tannivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate 
yady apy ayaṃ nyāyaḥ yat phalavac chrutaṃ tat tathaiva kartavyam yad api niṣphalam eva kartavyatayā śāstreṇa yāvajjīvādipadair vinaiva viśvajinnyāyena phalakalpanayāvagamitaṃ tasyānyathānuṣṭhāne prasaṅga eva nāsti tathāpi ya etaṃ nyāyaṃ pratipattum asamarthaḥ sa vacanena pratipādyate 
nyāyataḥ pratipattau hi gauravam vacanāt tu laghīyasī sukhapratipattir iti suhṛd bhūtvā pramāṇasiddham artham upadiśati sma 
kāmaśabdo 'yaṃ yady api hṛcchayavacano dṛṣṭas tathāpi tasyehāsaṃbhavāt kāma icchā abhilāṣa ity anarthāntaram 
tatra vakṣyamāṇaparyālocanayā phalābhilāṣeṇa na sarvatra pravartitavyam ity ayam arthaḥ sthāsyati 
paras tu kāmātmatām icchāmātrasaṃbandhamātraṃ padārthaṃ manvānaś codayati na caivehāsty akāmateti 
na ceha loke kācid akāminaḥ pravṛttir astīty arthaḥ 
āstāṃ tāvat kṛṣivāṇijyādi vyutpannabuddhinā kriyamāṇam yaḥ svayaṃ vedādhigamaḥ vedādhyayanaṃ bālaḥ kāryate pitrādinā tāḍyamānaḥ so 'pi na kāmam antareṇopapadyate 
adhyayanaṃ hi śabdoccāraṇarūpam 
na coccāraṇam icchayā vinā nirghātadhvanivad uttiṣṭhati 
icchati cet kim iti tāḍyata iti 
saiva tathecchopajanyate 
abhimate tu viṣaye svayam upajāyata ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ 
yaś cāyaṃ vaidiko vedavihitaḥ karmayogo darśapūrṇamāsādi karmānuṣṭhāne nityatvenāvagataḥ so 'pi na prāpnoti 
na hy anicchato devatoddeśena svadravyatyāgopapattiḥ 
tasmāt kāmātmatāniṣedhe sarvaśrautasmārtakarmaniṣedhaḥ prasakta iti 
saṃkalpamūlaḥ kāmo vai yajñāḥ saṃkalpasaṃbhavāḥ
vratāni yamadharmāś ca sarve saṃkalpajāḥ smṛtāḥ 
tataś ca yad uktaṃ yāgasya kāmena vinā na svarūpaniṣpattir iti tad anena vispaṣṭaṃ kṛtvā kathayati 
saṃkalpo yāgādīnāṃ mūlaṃ kāmasya ca 
yāgādīṃś cikīrṣann avaśayaṃ saṃkalpaṃ karoti 
saṃkalpe ca kriyamāṇe tatkāraṇena kāmena saṃnidhātavyam aniṣṭenāpi 
yathā pākārthino jvalanaṃ kurvatas tatsamānakāraṇo dhūmo 'py aniṣṭo jāyate 
tatra na śakyaṃ yajñādayaḥ kariṣyante kāmaś ca na bhaviṣyatīti 
atha ko 'yaṃ saṃkalpo nāma yaḥ sarvakriyāmūlam 
ucyate 
yac cetaḥsaṃdarśanaṃ nāma yadanantaraṃ prārthanādhyavasāyau krameṇa bhavataḥ 
ete hi mānasā vyāpārāḥ sarvakriyāpravṛttiṣu mūlatāṃ pratipadyante 
na hi bhautikā vyāpārās tam antareṇa saṃbhavanti 
tathā hi prathamaṃ padārthasvarūpanirūpaṇam ayaṃ padārtha imām arthakriyāṃ sādhayati iti yaj jñānaṃ sa iha saṃkalpo 'bhipretaḥ 
anantaraṃ prārthanā bhavati icchā 
saiva kāmaḥ 
katham aham idam anena sādhayāmi iti icchāyāṃ satyām adhyavasyati karomi iti niścinoti so 'dhyavasāyaḥ 
tataḥ sādhanopādāne bāhyavyāpāraviṣaye pravartate 
tathā hi bubhukṣita ādau bhujikriyāṃ paśyati tata icchati bhuñjīya iti tato 'dhyavasyati vyāpārāntarebhyo vinivṛttya bhojanaṃ karomi iti tataḥ karmakāraṇasthānādhikāriṇa āha sajjīkuruta rasavatīm saṃcārayata iti 
nanv evaṃ sati na yajñādayaḥ saṃkalpamātrād bhavanti api tu saṃkalpaprārthanādhyavasāyebhyaḥ 
tatra kim ucyate yajñāḥ saṃkalpasaṃbhavāḥ iti 
saṃkalpasyādyakāraṇatvād adoṣaḥ 
ata evottaratra nākāmasya kriyā kācid dṛśyate iti vakṣyati 
vratāni 
mānaso 'dhyavasāyo vratam idaṃ mayā yāvajjīvaṃ kartavyam iti yad vihitam 
yathā snātakavratāni 
yamadharmāḥ pratiṣedharūpāḥ ahiṃsādayaḥ 
kartavyeṣu pravṛttiḥ niṣiddhebhyo nivṛttiḥ nāntareṇa saṃkalpam asti 
akāmasya kriyā kācid dṛśyate neha karhicit 
yad yad dhi kurute kiṃcit tat tat kāmasya ceṣṭitam 
pūrveṇa śāstrīye pravṛttinivṛttī saṃkalpādhīne vyākhyāte 
anena laukikeṣu karmasu tadadhīnatocyata iti viśeṣaḥ 
neha loke karhicit kadācid api jāgradavasthāyāṃ kriyā kācid anuṣṭheyatvenānicchataḥ saṃbhavati 
yat kiṃcil laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vā kurute karma vihitaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ kāmasya ceṣṭitam 
hetutvāc ceṣṭitaṃ kāmasyaivety uktam 
tad idam atisaṃkaṭam kāmātmatā na praśastā na cānayā vinā kiṃcid anuṣṭhānam asti 
atra pratividhatte 
teṣu samyag vartamāno gacchaty amaralokatām 
yathāsaṃkalpitāṃś ceha sarvān kāmān samaśnute 
teṣu kāmeṣu samyag vartitavyam 
kā punaḥ samyagvṛttiḥ 
yad yathāśrutaṃ tat tathaivānuṣṭheyam 
nityeṣu phalaṃ nābhisaṃdheyam aśrutatvāt 
kāmyeṣu tv aniṣedhaḥ teṣāṃ tathāśrutatvāt 
phalasādhanatayaiva tāni vidhito 'vagamyante 
phalānicchos tadanuṣṭhānam aśrutakaraṇaṃ syāt 
nityeṣu phalābhisaṃdhir vyāmoha eva 
na hy abhisaṃdhimātrāt pramāṇato 'navagate phalasādhanatve phalam utpadyate 
evaṃ kurvan gacchati prāpnoty amaralokatām 
amarāḥ devāḥ teṣāṃ lokaḥ svargaḥ 
tannivāsāt amareṣu lokaśabdaḥ sthānasthāninor abhedāt mañcāḥ krośanti itivat 
tenāyaṃ samāsaḥ amarāś ca te lokāś ca amaralokāḥ tadbhāvaḥ amaralokatā 
devajanatvaṃ prāpnoti devatvaṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ 
vṛttānurodhād evam uktam 
atha vā amarāṃl lokayati paśyaty amaralokaḥ 
karmany aṇ 
tadantād bhavapratyayaḥ 
devadarśī saṃpadyate 
anenāpi prakāreṇa svargaprāptir evoktā bhavati 
atha vā amara iva lokyate loke 
arthavādaś cāyam 
nātra svargaḥ phalatvena vidhīyate nityānāṃ phalābhāvāt kāmyānāṃ ca nānāphalaśravaṇāt 
tena svargaprāptyā śāstrānuṣṭhānasaṃpattir evocyate lakṣaṇayā 
yad arthaṃ karmaṇām anuṣṭhānaṃ tat saṃpadyata ity arthaḥ 
tatra nityānāṃ pratyavāyānutpattir vidhyarthasaṃpattir vā prayojanam 
kāmyeṣu tu yathāsaṃkalpitān yathāśrutaṃ saṃkalpitān 
prayogakāle yasya karmaṇo yat phalaṃ śrutaṃ tat saṃkalpya abhisaṃdhāya manasā kāmayitvā idam aham ataḥ phalaṃ prāpnuyām iti tataḥ sarvān kāmān kāmyān arthān samaśnute prāpnoti 
ataḥ parihṛtā saṃkaṭāpattiḥ yato na sarvaviṣayaḥ kāmo niṣidhyate 
kiṃ tarhi nityeṣu phalābhilāṣalakṣaṇaḥ 
sādhanasaṃpattis tu kāmyaiva 
brahmavādinas tu sauryādīnāṃ niṣedharthaṃ kāmātmateti manyante 
phalārthitayā kriyamāṇā bandhātmakā bhavanti niṣkāmas tu brahmārpaṇanyāyena kurvan mucyate 
tad uktaṃ bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena mā karmaphalahetur bhūḥ 
tathā
sādhanānām akṛtsnatvān maurkhyāt karmakṛtas tathā 
phalasya cābhisaṃdhānād apavitro vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ  iti 
bahavaś cātra vyākhyāvikalpāḥ asāratvāt tu na pradarśitāḥ 
vedo 'khilo dharmamūlaṃ smṛtiśīle ca tadvidām 
ācāraś caiva sādhūnām ātmanas tuṣṭir eva ca 
ko 'syābhisaṃbandhaḥ 
yāvatā dharmo 'tra vaktavyatayā pratijñātaḥ 
sa ca vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇaḥ 
tatra na vedasya dharmamūlatā vidheyā vedo dharmamūlatvena jñātavyo dharmaprāmāṇya āśrayaṇīyaḥ iti antareṇaivopadeśaṃ tatsiddheḥ 
na hi manvādyupadeśasamadhigamyaṃ vedasya dharmamūlatvam api tu abādhitaviṣayapratītijanakatvena apauruṣeyatayā ca puruṣasaṃsargadoṣair api mithyābhidhānāśaṅkābhāvāt svataś ca śabdasyāduṣṭatvāt pratyakṣavat svataḥprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ 
athocyate nyāyataḥ siddhaṃ vedasya prāmāṇyam anūdya manvādismṛtīnāṃ tanmūlatā vacanena jñāpyata iti 
tad api na 
tatrāpi pūrvajñānasāpekṣatvāt smaraṇasya bhrāntivipralambhādīnāṃ mahājanaparigrahādinā nirastatvāt atīndriyārthadarśanasyāśakyabhāvāc ca puruṣasya ca svānubhavasiddher vedārthasmaraṇasya vedamūlataivāvaiṣyate 
na hi vedavidāṃ kāryārthaviṣayaṃ smaraṇaṃ saṃbhavati 
vedasya ca mūlatvena mūlāntarakalpanāyā anavasaraḥ 
nāpy etad yujyate vaktum smṛtiśīle ca tadvidām ity etad apy anūdyate bāhyasmṛtīnām aprāmāṇyāya yatas tāsāṃ nyāyata eva siddham aprāmāṇyam 
na hi śākyabhojakakṣapaṇakādīnāṃ vedasaṃyogasaṃbhavaḥ yena tanmūlatayā svaviṣaye pramāṇaṃ syuḥ svayam anabhyupagamāt taiś ca vedasyāprāmāṇyābhidhānāt pratyakṣavedaviruddhārthopadeśāc ca 
tatrāsaṃbhavas tāsu smṛtiṣu vedādhyayananiṣedhāt 
sati hi vedādhyetṛtve buddhādīnāṃ tanmūlatā syān na veti jāyate vicāraṇā 
yatra tu tatsaṃbandho dūrāpetas tatra kā tanmūlatāśaṅkā 
svayaṃ ca mūlāntaraṃ paraṃparāyātam abhyupagacchanti paśyāmy ahaṃ bhikṣukānāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā sugatiṃ durgatiṃ ca 
evaṃ sarva eva bāhyā bhojakapāñcarātrikanirgranthānārthavādapāśupataprabhṛtayaḥ svasiddhāntānāṃ praṇetṝn puruṣātiśayān devatāviśeṣāṃś ca pratyakṣatadarthadarśino 'bhyupayanti na vedamūlam api dharmam abhimanyante 
pratyakṣeṇa ca vedena viruddhās tatrārthā upadiśyante 
tathā hi hiṃsā ced dharma ucyate saṃsāramocakādibhiḥ sā cātra pratyakṣataḥ pratiṣiddhā 
tathānyatra tīrthasnānam adharmo 'bhyupeyate iha tu ahar ahaḥ snāyat tīrthāni seveta iti ca vidhiḥ 
tathāgniṣṭomīyavadhaḥ kvacit pāpahetur iṣyate sa ca jyotiṣṭomavidhinā viruddhaḥ 
tathānye sarvān eva yāgahomān ātmārthān saṃmanyante devatābhedavidhibhir nānādaivatyās te 'vagamitāḥ 
ato virodhaḥ 
ye 'py āhuḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇavad uditānuditahomakālavat pratyakṣaśrutivirodhadarśanāt syāt saṃbhavaḥ śākhāntarasyocchinnasyānucchinnasya vā tadviruddhārthavidhiparasya 
anantā hi vedaśākhāḥ 
tāḥ katham ekasya pratyakṣāḥ 
utsādaś ca saṃbhavatīti 
tatra syāt tādṛśī vedaśākhā yasyām ayaṃ narāsthipātrabhojananagnacaryādir upadiṣṭo bhavet 
ucyate 
na vayaṃ brūmaḥ vede viruddhārthopadeśāsaṃbhava iti 
kiṃ tu samakakṣatvāt tayor vikalpitaprayogayor avyāghātaḥ 
iha tu kalpyo vedaḥ 
na ca pratyakṣavirodhikalpanāyā avasaraḥ 
na ca saṃbhavamātreṇa tāvatā niścayaḥ 
niścitas tu tadviruddhapratyakṣavidhiḥ aniścitena na vā niścitaṃ bādhyate 
śākhotsādapakṣaṃ cātraiva śloke parastāt prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ 
sarvatra ca pratyakṣaśrutibhir manvādismṛtināṃ vyatiṣaṅgaḥ kvacin mantreṇa kvacid devatayā kvacid dravyavidhibhiḥ 
na ca bāhyāsu tatsaṃbhavatīti tāsām aprāmāṇyam 
evam ācārasyāpi vedavidbhir adṛṣṭārthatayācaryamāṇasya smṛtivad eva prāmāṇyam mūlasaṃbhavāt 
asādhvācārasyāpi dṛṣṭakāraṇādisaṃbhavād aviduṣāṃ ca bhrāntyādisaṃbhavād aprāmāṇyam 
evam ātmanas tuṣṭer api 
yadi ca vedasmṛtyācārāṇāṃ manvādyupadeśasamadhigamyaṃ prāmāṇyam manvādīnāṃ katham 
tatrāpy upadeśāntarāt smārtaṃ ca manur abravīt ityādeḥ 
tatra katham 
tasmād idaṃ pramāṇam idam apramāṇam iti yuktita etad avaseyam nopadeśataḥ 
tathā cāyam anarthakaḥ ślokaḥ 
etatsamānarūpā uttare 'pi 
atrocyate 
iha ye dharmasūtrakārā avyutpannapuruṣavyutpādanārthaṃ padārthasaṃpādanaparatayā granthasaṃdarbhān ārabhante tatra yathaivāṣṭakādīnāṃ vedāt svayaṃ kartavyatām avagamya parāvabodhanārtham upanibandhaḥ evaṃ pramāṇāntarasiddhasya vedaprāmāṇyādeḥ 
santi kecit pratipattāro ye nyāyatas tattvavivecanāsamarthāḥ ūhāpohādirūpabuddhyabhāvāt 
tān prati nyāyasiddho 'py arthaḥ suhṛdupadeśavad upadiśyate 
tatra yan nyāyataḥ siddhaṃ vedasya dharmamūlatvaṃ tad evānenānūdyate vedo dharmamūlam 
dharmasya mūlatvena vedo vicārya yuktyā siddhaḥ nātrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkā kartavyā 
bhavanti ca loke pramāṇāntarasiddhānām arthānām upadeṣṭāraḥ na tvayājīrṇe bhoktavyam ajīrṇaprabhavā hi rogāḥ 
na caitad vaktavyam ye nyāyato vedasya dharmamūlatvaṃ na śaknuvanti pratipattum te vacanād api na pratyeṣyanti 
yato dṛśyate ya āptatvena prasiddhās tadīyaṃ vacanam avicāryaiva kecana pramāṇayanti 
tad evaṃ sarvam idaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nyāyamūlam na vedamūlam 
anyatrāpi vyavahārasmṛtyādau yatra nyāyamūlatā tatra yathāvasaraṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
aṣṭakādīnāṃ yathā vedamūlatā tathātraiva nirdiśyate 
vedaśabdena ṛgyajuḥsāmāni brāhmaṇasahitāny ucyante 
tāni cādhyetṝṇāṃ vākyāntarebhyaḥ prasiddhabhedāni 
upadeśaparaṃparāsaṃskṛtā adhyetāraḥ śrutvaiva vedo 'yam iti pratipadyante yathā brāhmaṇo 'yam iti 
tatra vākyasamūhe 'pi agnim īḷe agnir vai devānām avamaḥ ityādādau saṃ sam id yuvase atha mahāvratam ityante vedaśabdaḥ prayujyate tadavayavabhūteṣu kevaleṣu vākyeṣv api 
na ca grāmādiśabdavad gauṇamukhyatā vidyate 
tatra samudāyeṣu hi vṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣv api vartanta ity eṣa nyāyaḥ 
grāmaśabdo hi prasiddhabhūyiṣṭaprayogaḥ samudāya eva grāmo dagdhaḥ ityādipadasaṃbandhāt tadavayave vartate 
katipayaśālādāhe 'pi laukikā grāmo dagdhaḥ iti prayuñjate 
atha vā tatrāpi samudāyavacana eva 
dāhas tv ekadeśavartī samudāyasaṃbandhitayā vyapadiśyate 
avayavadvāraka eva samudāyasya kriyāsaṃbandhaḥ 
eṣa eva samudāyasya kriyāsaṃbandho yo 'vayavānām 
na hy avayavān parihāpya samudāyo draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ vā śakyate 
vyutpādyate ca vedaśabdaḥ 
vidanty ananyapramāṇavedyaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam artham asmād iti vedaḥ 
tac ca vedanam ekaikasmād vākyād bhavati na yāvān ṛgvedādiśabdavācyo 'dhyāyānuvākasmūhaḥ 
evaṃ ca udāharaṇe jihvācchedaḥ ity ekavākyaviṣayo 'py ayaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ iti kṛtsnagrahaṇaṃ sakalavedavākyādhyayanaprāptyartham 
anyathā katicidvākyāny adhītya kṛtī syāt na punaḥ kṛtsnaṃ vedam iti 
atraitan nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ 
sa ca vedo bahudhā bhinnaḥ 
sahasravartmā sāmavedaḥ sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyādibhedena ekaśatam adhvaryūṇāṃ kāṭhakavājasaneyakādibhedena ekaviṃśati bāhvṛcyā āśvalāyanaitareyādibhedena navadhā ātharvaṇaṃ maudakapaippalādakādibhedena 
nanu naiva kecid ātharvaṇaṃ vedaṃ manyante yataḥ trayī vidyā ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi iti vedair aśūnyas tribhir eti sūryaḥ tathā traivedikaṃ vrataṃ caret ityādau na kvacid ātharvaṇanāmāpy asti 
pratiṣedhaś ca śrūyate tasmād ātharvaṇena na śaṃset iti 
atas trayībāhyān ātharvaṇikān pāṣaṇḍinaḥ pratijānate 
tad ayuktam avibhāgena śiṣṭānāṃ vedavyavahārāt 
śrutīr atharvāṅgirasīḥ ity atrāpi vyavahāraḥ 
śrutir veda ity eko 'rthaḥ 
na ca vedaśabdavācyatāgnihotrādivākyānām api dharmaprāmāṇye kāraṇam itihāsāyurvedayor api vedavyavahāradarśanāt itihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedam iti 
kiṃ tarhi apauruṣeyatve saty anuṣṭheyārthāvabodhakatvād viparyayābhāvāc ca 
tac cātharvavede 'pi sarvam asti jyotiṣṭomādikarmaṇāṃ yajurvedādiṣv iva tatrāpy upadeśāt 
abhicāramūlakakarmaṇāṃ bāhulyena tatropadeśād avedatvam iti vibhramaḥ keṣāṃcit 
abhicārā hi paraprāṇaviyogaphalatvāt pratiṣiddhāḥ 
ātharvaṇikaiś ca ta eva prādhānyenānuṣṭhīyante rājapurohitaiḥ atas te nindyante 
yat tu vedair aśūnyaḥ ityādāv atharvavedasyānirdeśa iti arthavādā ete 
kiṃ tatra nirdeśenānirdeśena vā 
mantrabhedābhiprāyaṃ vaitad vacanam trayo vedāḥ trayī vidyā ityādi 
na hi caturthaṃ mantrajātam asti ṛgyajuḥsāmavyatirekeṇa praiṣanivinnigadendragāthādīnām atraivāntarbhāvāt 
atharvavede carca eva mantratvena samāmnātāḥ 
ata ṛgveda evāyaṃ mantrābhiprāyeṇa 
yas tu pratiṣedhaḥ sa viparītasādhanaḥ prāptau satyāṃ pratiṣedhopapatteḥ 
ayaṃ vāsyārthaḥ atharvavedādhītair mantrais traivedikaṃ karma na miśrayet 
vācaḥstome sarvā ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi sarvāṇi sāmāni viniyuktāni tatrātharvavedādhītānāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
sa vedo viśiṣṭaḥ śabdarāśir apauruṣeyo mantrabrāhmaṇākhyo 'nekaśākhābhedabhinnaḥ dharmasya mūlaṃ prāmāṇaṃ parijñāne hetuḥ 
kāraṇaṃ mūlam 
tac ca vedasmṛtyor dharmaṃ prati jñāpakatayaiva na nirvartakatayā na ca sthitihetutayā vṛkṣasyeva 
dharmaśabdaś ca prāg vyākhyātaḥ 
yat puruṣasya kartavyaṃ pratyakṣādyavagamyavilakṣaṇena svabhāvena śreyaḥsādhanam 
kṛṣisevādi bhavati puruṣasya kartavyam tasya ca tatsādhanatvasvabhāvo 'nvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate 
yādṛśena vyāpāreṇa kṛṣyāder vrīhyādisiddhiḥ sāpi pratyakṣādyavagamyaiva 
yāgādes tu sādhanatvaṃ yena ca rūpeṇāpūrvotpattivyavadhānādinā tan na pratyakṣādyavagamyam 
śreyaś cābhilaṣitasvargagrāmādiphalaprāptiḥ sāmānyataḥ sukhaśabdavācyā vyādhinirdhanatvāsaukhyanarakādiphalaprāptiḥ sāmānyato duḥkhaśabdavācyā tatparihāraś ca 
anye tu paramānandādirūpaṃ śreyaḥ 
ayaṃ dharmo brāhmaṇavākyebhyo 'vagamyate liṅādiyuktebhyaḥ 
kvacic ca mantrebhyo 'pi vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate ity evamādibhyaḥ 
tatra kāmapadayuktāni vākyāni phalārtham anuṣṭhānam avagamayanti sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāmaḥ vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrahiṇīṃ nirvaped grāmakāmaḥ iti 
tāni phalam anicchatā na kriyante 
anyāni yāvajjīvādipadair nityatayā samarpitāni tāni na phalahetor anuṣṭhīyante phalasyāśrutatvāt 
na ca viśvajitā yajeta ityādivad aśrutaphalatve 'pi phalakalpanā yato yāvajjīvādipadair vinaiva phalena kartavyatayāvagamyante 
tatrākaraṇe śāstrārthātikramadoṣaḥ 
tatra tatparihārārthaṃ tāni kriyante 
pratiṣedhānām api brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ surā na peyā ity eṣaiva vārtā 
na hi phalārthaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjanam api tu pratyavāyaparihārārtham 
akhilaḥ kṛtsnaḥ 
na kiṃcit padaṃ varṇo mātrā vā yan na dharmāya 
atra codayanti 
nanu ca vidhyarthavādamantranāmadheyātmako vedaḥ dharmaś ca kartavyatāsvabhāvaḥ ity uktam 
tatra yuktaṃ yad vidhivākyāni dharma pramāṇaṃ syuḥ 
tebhyo hi yāgādiviṣayā kartavyatā pratīyate 
agnihotraṃ juhoti dadhnā juhoti yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti svargakāmo juhoti iti 
atra hy agnihotrākhyaṃ karma kartavyatayā pratīyate 
dadhnā iti tatraiva dravyam 
yad agnaye ca iti devatā 
svargakāmaḥ ity adhikāraḥ 
yat tu agnir vai sarvā devatā agnir eva daivyo hotā sa devān āhvayati ca juhoti ca ityādayaḥ tathā prajāpatir vapām ātmana udakkhidat ityādaya na taiḥ kiṃcit kartavyam upadiśyate 
kevalaṃ purāvṛttam anyad vāsāṃpratikaṃ bhūtam anuvadanti 
prajāpatinā purā ātmano vapotkhātā 
utkhidatu kim asmākam etena 
tathāgner api sarvadevatātmatvaṃ nāgneyakarmaṇy upayujyate agniśabdenoddeśārthanivṛtteḥ 
anyadevatve 'nyatvād agner uddeśa eva nāsti 
āvāhanasyāpi vacanāntareṇa agnim agna āvahe ityādinā vihitatvāt sa devān āhvayati ca juhoti ca ityādir anarthakaḥ 
mantrā api na mṛtyur āsīd amṛtaṃ na tarhi sudevo adya pated anāvṛt ityādayo bhāvavṛttaparidevanādirūpārthābhidhāyinaḥ kaṃ dharmaṃ pramimate 
tasmin kāle na mṛtyur jāto nāpy amṛtaṃ jīvitam 
prāk sṛṣṭer bhūtānām anutpannatvān na kasyacij jīvitam āsīn nāpi mṛtyuḥ pralaye sarveṣāṃ mṛtatvāt 
bhavatu vā mṛtyur mā vā na kiṃcid etena kartayvam upadiṣṭaṃ bhavati 
evaṃ sudevo 'sau mahāpuṇyo devatulyo manuṣyo yo 'dya prapatec chvabra ātmānaṃ kṣiped anāvṛd āvṛttiḥ pratyujjīvanaṃ yasmāt prapātān na bhavati 
urvaśyā vipralabdhaḥ purūravāḥ paridevyāṃ cakre 
tathā nāmadheyam 
udbhidā yajeta balabhidā yajeta ityādi na kasyacid arthasya kriyāyā dravyasya vā vidhāyakam ākhyātena kriyāyā vidhānād adravyavacanatvāc ca balabhidādeḥ 
somasya cāvyaktacodanatvena prakṛtitaḥ prāptatvān na kleśena dravyavacanatā kalpyate 
tasmān nāmnā na dharma upadiśyate 
ataḥ katham ucyate kṛtsno vedo dharmamūlam iti 
ucyate 
anayaivāśaṅkayākhilagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam yataḥ sarveṣām eteṣāṃ dharmapratipādanaparatvam 
tathā hi arthavādā naiva vidhāyakebhyo vākyebhyaḥ pṛthagarthāḥ yena dharmaṃ na pramimīran 
vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatve vidhiparatvāvagamāt tatparatve ca siddhāyām ekavākyatāyāṃ yathā tadarthānuguṇyaṃ pratipadyante tathā vyākhyeyāḥ 
ataḥ prajāpater vapotkhādanavacanaṃ na svārthaniṣṭham 
kiṃ tarhi vidhiśeṣam 
na ca vidheyaṃ dravyaguṇādi arthavādebhyaḥ pratīyata iti prakārāntareṇa vidheyārthastāvakatvena taccheṣatāṃ pratipadyante 
tad api tatra pratīyata eva 
itthaṃ nāma paśuyāgaḥ kartavyo yad asatsu paśuṣu gatyantrābhāvāt prajāpatinātmaiva puśutvena kalpito vapā cotkhinnā 
yatas tatsahitāny eva vidhāyakāni yatrārthavādāḥ santi 
yady api tair vināpi bhavati vidhyarthāvagatiḥ vidhyuddeśād eva vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate iti tathāpi na teṣām ānarthakyam 
teṣu hi satsu na kevalād avagatiḥ 
na ca kenacit kṛto vedaḥ yenocyate yathānyatra na santi tathātrāpi mā bhūvan 
satsv arthavādeṣv asmābhir gatir vaktavyā 
sā coktā 
na cayam alaukiko 'rthaḥ 
loke 'pi hi stutipadāni dṛśyante vidhiśeṣabhūtāny eva 
yathā bhṛtidāne pravṛttasya svāminaḥ kaścid bhṛtakaḥ prītyācaṣṭe sādhur devadatto nityasaṃnihitaḥ paricaryābhūmijñas tatparaś ca iti 
ato vidheyārthastutidvāreṇārthavādā vidhāyakā eva 
tathā kvacid arthavādād eva vidheyaviśeṣāvagatiḥ 
yathā aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti 
atra hy añjanasādhanaṃ sarpistailādi yatkiṃcid vidhināpekṣitam 
tejo vai ghṛtam ity arthavāde ghṛtastutyā ghṛtam adhyavasīyate 
evam pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā rātrīr upayanti iti rātriṣv arthavādād adhikārāvagamaḥ 
tasmād arthavādā api dharmamūlam 
mantrās tu kecid vidhāyakā eva 
yathā vasantāya kapiñjalān iti 
ādhāre devatāvidhir māntravarṇika eva 
na hi tatra devatā karmotpattivākye śrutā nāpi vākyāntareṇa vihitā 
mantras tu vihito niyuktaḥ ita indraḥ ityādiḥ 
ato 'smān mantravarṇād devatāpratipattiḥ 
sahasraśaś ca māntravārṇikā devatāvidhayaḥ santi 
ye 'py anye kriyamāṇānuvādinas te 'pi smṛtilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam eva buddhaṃ kurvantīti bhavati dharmamūlam anuṣṭheyārthaprakāśanena 
nāma tv ākhyātārthād abhinnārtham ākhyātārthavat suprasiddhadharmamūlabhāvam 
guṇavidhayaś ca prāyaśo nāmāśrayā eva 
śaradi vājapeyena yajeta svārājyakāmo vājapeyena iti 
tasmāt siddhaṃ kṛtsnasya vedasya dharmamūlatvam 
anye tu śeynādivākyānāṃ dharmotpattimattvābhāvam āśaṅkamānāḥ niṣedhānāṃ ca na laśunaṃ bhakṣayet ityādīnām akhilagrahaṇaṃ manyante 
abhicārā hi śyenādayo māraṇātmāno hiṃsārūpāḥ 
krūratvāc ca hiṃsāyā abhicārāṇāṃ ca pratiṣedhād adharmatvam 
ato na kṛtsno vedo darmamūlam 
kartavyaś ca dharma uktaḥ 
brahmahatyādiś ca na kartavyaḥ 
ataḥ kathaṃ tadvākyāni dharmamūlaṃ syuḥ 
kiṃ ca ye 'pi paśuyāgā agnīṣomīyādayas te 'pi hiṃsāsādhakatvād dūrāpetadharmabhāvāḥ 
hiṃsā hi pāpam iti sarvapravādeṣv abhyupagamaḥ 
uktaṃ ca yatra prāṇivadho dharma adharmas tatra kīdṛśaḥ 
kathaṃ punar iyam āśaṅkāpanudyate 
akhilagrahaṇāt 
na hy asyānyat prayojanam asti 
hetur nokta iti cet āgamagrantho 'yaṃ siddham artham āha 
hetvarthino mīmāṃsāto vinīyante 
asmābhir uktaṃ ya āgamamātreṇa pratiyanti tān praty etad ucyate 
vivaraṇakārās tu yuktileśamātraṃ darśayanti 
yad uktam syenādayaḥ pratiṣiddhatvād adharma iti tat satyam 
tathāpi pratiṣiddheṣv api teṣu yo 'tyantapravṛddhadveṣaḥ na hiṃsyād bhūtāni ity atikrāntaniṣedhādhikāras tasya te śatruvadhalakṣaṇāṃ prītim anuṣṭhīyamānāṃ nirvartayantīty etāvatāṃśena vedasya dharmamūlatvaṃ śyenādivākyeṣv api na vihanyate 
niṣedheṣv api yo rāgataḥ pravṛtto hanane sa niṣedhe niyujyate 
etad eva niṣedhasyānuṣṭhānaṃ yanniṣidhyamānasyānanuṣṭhānam 
agnīṣomīyādau tu naiva hiṃsāpratiṣedho 'sti dveṣalakṣaṇāyā laukikyā hiṃsāyā niṣedhena niṣiddhatvāt 
śāstrīyā tu vidhilakṣaṇā na niṣedhena viṣayīkriyate laukikyāṃ caritārthatvān niṣedhasya 
na ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭena hiṃsātvāl laukikahiṃsāvad vaidikyāḥ pāpahetutvam āpādayituṃ śakyate 
yato na hiṃsātvaṃ pāpahetutve kāraṇam api tu pratiṣedhena viṣayīkaraṇam 
na cātra pratiṣedho 'stīty uktam 
kaiścit tu mūlaśabdaḥ kāraṇaparyāyo vyākhyāyate dharmasya vedo mūlaṃ pratiṣṭhākāraṇaṃ sākṣāt praṇāḍyā ca 
svādhyāyam adhīyīta ṛgvedaṃ dhārayan vipraḥ ityādicodanāsu sākṣāt agnihotrādikarmasvarūpajñāpakatayā praṇāḍyā 
smṛtiśīle ca tadvidām 
anubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ smṛtir ucyate 
tacchabdena vedaḥ pratyavamṛśyate 
taṃ vidanti tadvidaḥ 
vedārthavidām idaṃ kartavyam idaṃ na kartavyam iti yat smaraṇaṃ tad api pramāṇam 
nanu ca smṛtir na pramāṇam ity āhuḥ 
sā hi pūrvapramāṇāvagataprameyānuvādinī nādhikam arthaṃ paricchinattīti vadanti 
satyam 
ye smaranti teṣām ādyam eva tatra śabdādi pramāṇam nātmīyā smṛtiḥ 
asmākaṃ tu manvādismṛtir eva pramāṇam 
na hi vayaṃ tām antareṇānyato 'ṣṭakādikartavyatām avagacchāmaḥ 
tac ca manvādīnām īdṛśaṃ smaraṇaṃ tatkṛtebhyo vākyebhyaḥ smṛtiparaṃparāyātebhyo 'vasīyate 
tasmāc ca smaraṇād anubhūto 'yam arthaḥ pramāṇena manvadibhir iti niścinumo yata ete smaranti 
na hy ananubhūtasya smaraṇopapattiḥ 
nanu kalpayitvā grantham upanibadhnīyur ananubhūyaiva kenacit pramāṇena yathotpādya vastu kathānakaṃ kecana kavayaḥ kathayeyuḥ 
atrocyate 
bhaved evaṃ yady atra kartavyatopadeśo na syāt 
kartavyatopadeśo hy anuṣṭhānārthaḥ 
na ca kecit svecchayā kalpite buddhipūrvavyavahāriṇo 'nuṣṭhātum arhanti 
bhrāntyāpy anuṣṭhānasiddhir iti cet syād apy ekasya bhrāntiḥ sarvasya jagato bhrāntir yāvat saṃsārabhāvinī cety alaukikī kalpanā 
na ca saṃbhavati manvādīnāṃ vedamūlatve bhrāntyāder avasaraḥ 
ata eva pratyakṣato manvādayo dharmān dadṛśur iti nābhyupagamyate 
indriyair arthānāṃ saṃnikarṣe yaj jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam 
na ca dharmasyendriyaiḥ saṃnikarṣaḥ saṃbhavati tasya kartavyatāsvabhāvatvāt 
asiddhaṃ ca kartavyam 
siddhavastuviṣayaś ca saṃnikarṣaḥ 
anumānādīni tadātve yady apy asantam artham avagamayanti pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcāreṇa hi bhaviṣyantīṃ vṛṣṭim anumimate tathāpi na tebhyaḥ kartavyatāvagatiḥ 
tasmāt kartavyatāsmaraṇasyānurūpakāraṇakalpanāyāṃ veda evopadiśyate 
sa ca vedo 'numīyamāno manvādibhir upalabdhaḥ 
idānīm utsannā sā śākhā yasyām amī smārtā dharmā āsan 
tathā kim ekā śākhā atha bahvyaḥ 
tāsu ca kaścid aṣṭakādiḥ kasyāṃcid ity etad anumānaṃ pravartate 
atha adyatve paṭhyanta eva tāḥ śākhāḥ 
kiṃ tu viprakīrṇās te dharmāḥ 
kasyāṃcic chākhāyām aṣṭakādīnāṃ karmaṇām utpattiḥ kasyāṃcid dravyaṃ kvacid devatā kvacin mantra ity evaṃ viprakīrṇānāṃ manvādayo 'ṅgopasaṃhāraṃ sukhāvabodhārthaṃ cakruḥ 
atha mantrārthavādaliṅgamātraprabhavā ete dharmāḥ 
atha ayam anādir anuṣṭheyo 'rtho 'vicchinnapāraṃparyasaṃpradāyāyāto vedavan nityaḥ 
uta asmadādīnām iva manvādīnām api parapratyayānuṣṭhāno nityānumeyaśrutikaḥ 
ity evamādi bahuvikalpaṃ vicārayanti vivaraṇakārāḥ 
etāvāṃs tu nirṇayaḥ 
vaidikam etad anuṣṭhānam smārtānāṃ vaidikair vidhibhir vyatiṣaṅgāvagamāt anuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ ca tad dṛṣṭvānuṣṭhānāt 
vyatiṣaṅgaś ca darśitaḥ 
kvacid vaidikam aṅgaṃ pradhānaṃ smārtam kvacid etad eva viparītam kvacid utpattiḥ kvacid adhikāraḥ kvacid arthavāda iti 
evaṃ sarva eva smārtā vaidikair vyatiṣaktāḥ 
nipuṇataś caitan nirṇītam asmābhiḥ smṛtiviveke
smārtavaidikayor nityaṃ vyatiṣaṅgāt parasparam 
kartṛtaḥ karmato vāpi viyujyete na jātu tau 
pratyakṣaśrutinirdiṣṭaṃ ye 'nutiṣṭhanti kecana 
ta eva yadi kurvanti tathā syād vedamūlatā 
prāmāṇyakāraṇaṃ mukhyaṃ vedavidbhiḥ parigrahaḥ 
tad uktaṃ kartṛsāmānyād anumānaṃ śrutīḥ prati 
viśeṣanirdhāraṇe tu na kiṃcit pramāṇam na ca prayojanam 
utsādo 'pi saṃbhāvyate 
dṛśyante hi praviralādhyetṛkā adyatve 'pi śākhāḥ 
tābhyaḥ saṃbhāvyabhāvyutsādābhyo vidhimātram arthavādavirahitam uddhṛtyopanibaddhaṃ smṛtikārair iti kaiścid abhyupagamyate 
brāhmaṇoktā vidhayas teṣām utsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogād anumīyante ity āpastambaḥ 
atra tu yaivaṃ mahāprayojanā śākhā yasyāṃ sarve smārtā gārhyāś ca sarvavarṇāśramadharmā āmnātāḥ tasyā upekṣaṇam asaṃbhāvyam sarvādhyetṝṇāṃ cotsada ityādi bahvadṛṣṭaṃ prakalpyam 
viprakīrṇānāṃ tv arthavādagahanānāṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthatayā ca durvijñānānāṃ prayogonnayanam abhiyuktānāṃ nyāyato niścitārthānāṃ ghaṭate 
asmiṃs tu pakṣe virodhadvayasyāpi pratyakṣaśrautatvād vikalpe na smṛter bādhaḥ 
sa ca viśiṣṭānāṃ nābhipretaḥ 
smṛtikārāś ca bādham anumeyaśrutimūlatvaṃ ca pratipannāḥ 
evam apy āha gautamaḥ aikāśramyaṃ tv ācāryāḥ pratyakṣavidhānād gārhastyasya iti 
yadi hi manvādīnaṃ pratyakṣās tāh śākhā abhavan keyaṃ vācoyuktir garhasthyasya pratyakṣavidhānāt iti 
nanu sarva evāśramāḥ pratyakṣavidhānāḥ 
svamatam eva caitad gautamenācāryāpadeśenopadiṣṭam tasyāśramavikalpam ityādy upakramyānenopasaṃhṛtatvāt
mantrārthavādapramāṇabhāvo 'py aviruddhaḥ 
yady apy arthavādā vidhyuddeśastutiparā na svārthasya vidhāyakāḥ tathāpi keṣāṃcid anyaparataiva nopapadyate yāvat svārthaviṣayo vidhir nāvagamitaḥ 
yathā steno hiraṇyasya surāṃ pibaṃś ca ityādeḥ pañcāgnividhiśeṣataivam etāvataiva nopapadyate yāvad dhiraṇyasteyādeḥ pratiṣedho nāvagamitaḥ 
ya etāṃ vidyāṃ adhīte sa hiraṇyasteyādy apy ācaraṃs taiś ca saṃvasan na patati anyathā tu patatīty avagatir aviruddhā 
atha vidhyuddeśo vidheḥ pratipādakaḥ nārthavādaḥ iti kenaiṣā paribhāṣā kṛtā 
ete patanti catvāraḥ ity atrāpy ākhyātaśravaṇam asti 
liṅādayo na santīti cet pratitiṣṭhanti iti rātriṣv api naiva liṅśrutir asti 
atha tatrādhikārākāṃkṣāyām ekavākyatāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcamalakārādikalpanayā vidhyavasāyaḥ evam atrāpi bhaviṣyati 
bahavaś ca dravyadevatāvidhayo 'rthavādāvagamyāḥ santi 
tatra yasya vidheḥ śeṣā arthavādās tadvidhinaiva dravyadevatāder apekṣitatvād viśeṣasamarpaṇamātre vyāpārāntargataviśeṣāvagatir arthavādādhīnā na doṣāya 
iha tu tadasaṃbaddhasya vidhyantarasyeṣyamāṇatvād vākyabhedāpattir ataś ca na prakṛtiśeṣatā 
tadabhāve ca tanmūlā pratiṣedhāvagatir na syāt 
ataś ca aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti tejo vai ghṛtam ity anena vaiṣamyam ity āhuḥ 
tad asat 
saty apy arthāntaratve tadekavākyatāmūlatvād asyāvagater nāsti vākyabhedābhicodyāpattiḥ 
mantrāḥ prayogaprakāśatvena rūpād evāvagatās tasya prayogasyānyato 'siddheḥ prakāśakatvanirvahaṇāya prakāśyam kalpayanti 
na vāsator utpattyadhikārayoḥ prakāśanam aṣṭakāyāḥ saṃbhavatīty utpattyadhikāraviniyogaprayogabodhakā mantrāḥ 
evaṃ māntravarṇikāś ca vidhayo 'py upagamyante 
yathāghāre devatāvidhiḥ 
catuṣpād dhi dharmo 'bhyupagataḥ 
tatrālpatarāṃśaḥ śrutaḥ sakaletarāṃśabodhahetus tathāvidha eva vidhau saṃbandhagrahaṇād iti 
sarvathā tāvat saṃbhavati vedasaṃyogaḥ 
manur bahubhir bahuśākhādhyāyibhiḥ śiṣyair anyaiś ca śrotriyaiḥ saṃgatas tebhyaḥ śākhāḥ śrutvā granthaṃ cakāra 
tāś ca mūlatvena pradarśya granthaṃ pramāṇīkṛtavān 
evam anye tatpratyayād anuṣṭhānam ādṛtavanto na mūlopalambhe yatnaṃ kurvanti 
asmākaṃ caitad anumānam 
ato virodhe saty api tulye śrautatve bādhopapattiḥ 
pratyakṣayā śrutyā prayogasaṃpattau śrutyantaraṃ praty ākāṅkṣaiva nāsti 
yathā sāmidhenīṣu sāptadaśyapāñcadaśyayoḥ pāñcadaśyena prakṛtir avaruddhā sāptadaśyaṃ pratyakṣaśrutam api nākāṅkṣati 
ābhidhāniko hy arthaḥ saṃnikṛṣyate abhihitārthākāṅkṣāvagamyaṃ pratyayaṃ viprakarṣād durbalaṃ bādhate 
na caitāvatāprāmāṇyāpattiḥ 
yathā prākṛtāny aṅgāni vikṛtiṣu codakaprāptāni vaikṛtikair viruddhyamānāni bādhyante tadvad eva draṣṭavyam 
yatra saṃpradāyāvicchedas tatra ca paraṃparāpattiḥ 
na hi tatra kasyacit pramāṇaṃ pravṛttam 
nityānumeyapakṣo 'pi saṃpradāyapakṣān nātīva bhidyate 
manvādismaraṇasya vayaṃ mūlaṃ parīkṣituṃ pravṛttāḥ 
yadi ca teṣām apy asāv anumeyo vedo vayam iva na te smartāraḥ 
na ca yaḥ padārtho na kasyacit pratyakṣas tasyānumeyatā saṃbhavati anvayāsaṃbhavāt 
kriyādiṣu sāmānyato 'sty eva saṃbandhadarśanam 
yadi vārthāpattyavaseyāḥ kriyādayo na cehānyathānupapattir asti 
tasmād asti manvādīnām asminn arthe vedasaṃbandhaḥ na punar ayam eva prakāra iti nirdhārayituṃ śakyam 
draḍhīyasī kartavyatāvagatir vedavidāṃ vedamūlaiva yuktā kalpayituṃ na bhrāntyādimūlety avagatyanurūpakāraṇakalpanā kṛtā bhavati 
tatrotsādaviprakīrṇe mantrārthavāde pratyakṣavedānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ saṃbhavāt kalpyatvam upaśete 
pratyakṣo 'pi vidhiḥ kvacin mūlatvena dṛśyate na malavadvāsasā saha saṃvaset iti 
sa cādhyayane copanayane ca paṭhyate 
tad etal leśato 'smābhir uktam 
vistaras tu smṛtivivakāj jñātavyaḥ 
śākhāḥ kāścit samutsannāḥ pakṣo naiṣa mato mama 
pakṣe 'smin na pramāṇaṃ hi bahvadṛṣṭaṃ prasajyate 
upapannataraḥ pakṣo vikṣiptānāṃ tatas tataḥ 
utpattyādisamāhāraḥ prāyaśo dṛśyate hy adaḥ 
anekaśiṣyopādhyāyaiḥ śrotriyair ādṛto 'paraiḥ 
śakto racayituṃ śrutvā śākhāṃ tāṃ tāṃ kutaścana 
upapannas tadānīṃ ca dṛṣṭamūlaiḥ parigrahaḥ 
niścayo 'smākam apy adya yathā saṃbhavataḥ sthitaḥ 
prayogadyotakā mantrā dyotanaṃ tasya nāmataḥ 
narte 'dhikārotpattibhyāṃ prayogasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ 
viśiṣṭadevatālābha ādhāre māntravarṇikaḥ 
prakāśakatvān mantrasya tannirvahaṇahetukaḥ 
yā siddharūpa ekasmin rūpāntaragatir bhavet 
na sā svarūpanāśāya viśvajity adhikāravat 
pratipanne vidhau yuktaṃ tatsaṃbandhārthakalpanam 
gatir mantrārthavādebhyo na dṛṣṭā ced vidheḥ kvacit 
liṅādigamyaṃ bhagavān vidhiṃ smarati pāṇiniḥ 
na śaktās te vidhiṃ vaktuṃ siddhavastvabhidhāyinaḥ 
vyākhyeyo guṇavādena yo 'rthavādād atatparāt 
artho 'dhigantum iṣyeta kathaṃ syāt tasya satyatā 
bhindyād vākyaṃ na pratiṣṭhā sākāṅkṣā rātrayo yataḥ 
viśeṣe tadgate yuktā vākyaśeṣāvagamyatā 
steyādīnāṃ niṣedhe 'pi vidhyantaragatir dhruvā 
tataś ca vākyabhedaḥ syān nopanyāsas tataḥ samaḥ 
vācaḥstome prayujyante sarve mantravidhiśruteḥ 
nāṣṭakādau viśeṣo 'sti hetur mantrasya bodhane 
vinā sāmānyasaṃbandhāl liṅgaṃ ca viniyojakam 
na ca nāsty asya saṃbandho vinā prakaraṇādibhiḥ 
parihāraṃ bruvanty atra kecit tanmūlavādinaḥ 
ratriṣu pratitiṣṭhantīty asatsv eva liṅādiṣu 
pañcamena lakāreṇa tadarthagatir iṣyate 
patanti na mlechitavā ityādiṣu tathā bhavet 
ṛcāṃ vidhir vācaḥstome sarvadāśatayīr iti 
daśamyo maṇḍale 'bhyastā varjitāḥ paṭhitā bahiḥ 
sāmānyasaṃbandhakārī samākhyaiveti gīyate 
samākhyā gṛhyamantrāṇāṃ tena tenāsti karmaṇām 
pañcāgnividyāśeṣatvaṃ hiraṇyastenanindayā 
steno hiraṇyavākyasya na vinā tanniṣedhataḥ 
śeṣatvāvagamo 'rthāt tu tadakartavyatā tu yā 
draḍhimne śeṣatāyāḥ sā na punas tadvirodhinī 
nityānumeyapakṣo yo vāpy āgamaparaṃparā 
tayor andhapravāhatvaṃ na bhedaḥ kaścid īkṣyate 
evaṃ ca sati yā gautamena pratyakṣavidhānatā gārhasthyasyoktā sā śabdasyāvyavahitavyāpārābhiprāyeṇa 
śravaṇāntaraṃ yo 'rthaḥ pratīyate sa pratyakṣaḥ 
yas tu pratīte 'rthe tatsāmarthyaparyālocanayā gamyaḥ sa vilambitatvāt pratipatter na pratyakṣa iti sarvam upapannam 
smṛtiśīle ca tadvidām 
smṛtiś ca śīlaṃ ca smṛtiśīle 
śīlaṃ rāgadveṣaprahāṇam āhuḥ 
tac ca dharmamūlaṃ vedasmṛtivan na jñāpakatayā kiṃ tu nirvartakatvena 
rāgadveṣaprahāṇād dhi dharmo nirvartate 
nanu ca śreyaḥsādhanaṃ dharmaḥ ity uktam 
rāgadveṣaprahāṇam eva ca tatsvabhāvam 
tatrāsati vyatireke kim ucyate rāgādiprahāṇād dharmo nirvartata iti 
uktam asmābhiḥ dharmaśabdo 'yaṃ smṛtikāraiḥ kadācid vidhiniṣedhaviṣayabhūtāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ prayujyate kadācit tadanuṣṭhānajanya āphalapradānāvasthāyini kasmiṃścid arthe 
tasya ca sadbhāve śabda eva pramāṇam 
yadi hi yāgas tathāvidhaṃ vastv anutpādya vinaśyet tadā kālāntare kutaḥ phalotpattiḥ 
tad etad vastu dharmaśabdenātrābhipretam 
tasya śīlaṃ mūlam iti na kiṃcid anupapannam 
tadabhiprāyā eva vyavahārāḥ 
eka eva suhṛd dharmo nidhane 'py anuyāti yaḥ 
iti 
kriyāyā anuṣṭhānasamanantaram eva nāśāt kutaḥ kālāntarānvayaḥ 
atra codyate 
nanu sarva eva śrutismṛtivihito 'rtho dharmasya mūlam 
śīlasyāpi tatrāntarbhāvād bhedenopādānam anarthakam 
vidhāyiṣyate ca 
indriyāṇāṃ jaye yogaṃ samatiṣṭhed divāniśam 
yasmiñ jite jitāv etau bhavataḥ pañcakau gaṇau 
iti 
ayam eva manaso jayo yo rāgadveṣayoḥ parityāga iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
kecid āhuḥ ādarārthaḥ pṛthag upadeśaḥ 
etad dhi sarvakarmaṇām anuṣṭhāna upayujyate svapradhānaṃ ca agnihotrādikarmavat 
sarvavarṇadharmaś cāyaṃ sarvāśramadharmaś ca 
ataḥ sāmānyadharmalakṣaṇāvasare 'sminn ucyate 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ 
samādhiḥ śīlam ucyate 
tathā hi śila samādhau iti dhatuṣu paṭhyate 
samādhānaṃ ca mānaso dharmaḥ 
yac cetaso 'nyaviṣayavyākṣepaparihāreṇa śāstrārthanirūpaṇapravaṇatā tac chīlam ucyate 
dvandvaś cāyam itaretarayoge 
tena parasparasāpekṣayoḥ smṛtiśīlayoḥ dharmaṃ prati prāmāṇyam evābhipretam na pūrvavan nirvartakatvam 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
samādhānavatī yā smṛtiḥ sā pramāṇam na smṛtimātram 
tena saty api vedārthavittve yad atatparāṇāṃ smaraṇaṃ na tad dharmamūlam bhrāntyādisaṃbhavāc chāstrārthāvadhānaśūnyānām 
caśabda iha paṭhyate 
sa tadvidām ity asmād anantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ 
vṛttānurodhāt tv evaṃ paṭhitaḥ 
samuccayārthaś cāsau pūrvaprakṛtasya ca samuccetavyasyābhāvāt tṛtīye pāde yat sādhūnām ity uktaṃ tat samuccinoti 
atas trīṇi viśeṣaṇāny atrāśrīyante 
viduṣām upādhyāyād āgamitavidyānām tathā tadabhyāsaparāṇām anuṣṭhānaparāṇāṃ ca smṛtiḥ pramāṇam 
etat sarvaṃ manvādīnām āsīd iti smaryate 
nānyathā tatkṛteṣu grantheṣu śiṣṭānāṃ parigrahopapattiḥ 
yady evaṃ spaṣṭam eva vaktavyam manvādivākyāni dharmamūlam iti 
kim etena lakṣaṇena 
satyam 
yaḥ kathaṃcit tatprāmāṇye vipratipādyeta taṃ prati nyāyaśāstraprasiddhaṃ prāmānyahetukathanam etat 
adyatve 'pi yasyaitaddhetusadbhāvaḥ so 'pi manvādivad grāhyavākyaḥ syāt 
tathā ca viduṣāṃ prāyaścittādyupadeśe 
tathābhūtā eva pariṣattvena pramāṇībhavanti
eko 'pi vedavid dharmaṃ yo vyavasyed dvijottamaḥ 
iti 
ata eva smartṛparigaṇanā manur viṣṇur yamo 'ṅgirāḥ iti nirmūlā 
tathā hi paiṭhīnasibaudhāyanapracetaḥprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭair evaṃrūpāḥ smaryante na ca parigaṇanāyām antarbhāvitāḥ 
sarvathā yam avigānena śiṣṭāḥ smaranti vadanti vā evaṃvidhair guṇair yuktam tena caitatpraṇītam iti tasya vākyaṃ saty api pauruṣeyatve dharme pramāṇaṃ syāt 
iti smṛtiśīle ca tadvidām ity asyārthaḥ 
adyatve ya evaṃvidhair guṇair yukta īdṛśenaiva ca hetunā grantham upanibadhnīyāt sa uttareṣāṃ manvādivat pramāṇibhavet 
idānīṃtanānāṃ tu yad eva tatra tasya bodhakāraṇaṃ tad eva teṣām astīti na tadvākyād avagatiḥ 
idānīṃtano hi yāvan mūlaṃ na darśayati tāvan na vidvāṃsas tadvākyaṃ pramāṇayanti 
darśite tu mūle pramāṇīkṛte granthe kālāntare yadi kathaṃcid aṣṭakādimūlatulyatā syāt tadā teṣāṃ śiṣṭaparigrahāny athānupapattyā tanmūlānumānaṃ yuktam 
ācāraś caiva sādhūnām 
caśabdena vedavidām iti saṃbadhyate 
padadvayena śiṣṭatvaṃ lakṣyate 
śiṣṭānāṃ ya ācāraḥ so 'pi dharme mūlam 
ācāro vyavahāraḥ anuṣṭhānam 
yatra śrutismṛtivākyāni na santi śiṣṭāś ca dharmabuddhyānutiṣṭhanti tad api vaidikam eva pūrvavat pratipattavyam 
yathā vivāhādau kaṅkaṇabandhanādi māṅgalikatvena yat kriyate yā ca kanyāyās tadahar vivāhayiṣyamāṇāyāḥ prakhyātavṛkṣayakṣacatuṣpathādipūjā deśabhedena tathā cūḍāsaṃkhyā deśabhedaś ca yā cātithyādīnām gurvādīnāṃ cānuvṛttiḥ priyahitavacanābhivādanābhyutthānādirūpā tathā pṛśnisūktaṃ tṛṇapāṇayo 'dhīyate aśvamedhaṃ aśvasya ghāsam arpayantaḥ 
īdṛśa ācāraḥ 
eṣo 'pi hi svabhāvabhedena puruṣāṇāṃ manaḥsvāsthyadauḥsthyādibhedenānekarūpaḥ prativiśeṣam ānantyād aśakyo granthenopanibaddhum 
yad eva bahuśaḥ priym asyety upalakṣitam tad evāvasarāntare viparītaṃ saṃpadyate 
tathā paryupāsanaṃ gṛhasthenātitheḥ kriyamāṇaṃ kasyacit prītikaraṃ mamāyaṃ bhṛtyavat tiṣṭhati anyas tv anyathā niryantraṇayā na labhyata āsitum asmin saṃnihite iti paryupāsanayaiva virajyati 
na tatra sāmānyataḥ śakyaṃ vedānumānam na viśeṣataḥ 
aṣṭakādīnāṃ tu niyataikarūpasamastaprayogasmaraṇam ity eṣa smṛtyācārāṇāṃ bhedaḥ 
ātmanas tuṣṭir eva ca 
dharmamūlam ity anuṣajyate vedavidāṃ sādhūnām iti ca 
asyāś ca dharmamūlatvaṃ prāmāṇyenaivety āhuḥ 
yatra hy evaṃvidhānām anuṣṭheye 'rthe manaḥ prasīdati dveṣo na bhavati sa dharmaḥ 
nanu ca yasya pratiṣiddha evārthe manaḥ prasīdet sa dharmaḥ prāpnoti 
vihite ca kiṃkathikā syāt sa na dharma iti 
evam etat 
īdṛśānāṃ mahātmanāṃ matimatāṃ mahāprabhāvo manaḥprasādaḥ yenādharmo 'pi dharmatām eti dharmaś cādharmatām na rāgadveṣādidoṣavatām 
yathā rumāyāṃ yatkiṃcid dravyaṃ praviśati tat sarvaṃ lavaṇasāt saṃpadyate evaṃ vedavidā sahasotpannena manaḥparitoṣeṇa sarvaṃ nirmalīkriyate 
ato yathā pratiṣiddhām api grahaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśini vidhinānuṣṭhīyamānaṃ na doṣāya 
na cātra grahaṇavad vikalpaḥ 
pratiṣedhā hy ātmatuṣṭivyatirekeṇānyatra viṣaye vyavasthāpyante 
atha vā naiva teṣām adharme ātmā parituṣyati 
yathā viṣaghnīm evauṣadhīṃ nakulo daśati nānyām 
ata ucyate nakulo yāṃ yāṃ daśati sā sā viṣaghnī iti 
iha bhavantaś cāhuḥ 
ye vaikalpikāḥ padārthās teṣu yasmin pakṣe manaḥ prasīdati sa pakṣa āśrayitavyaḥ 
vakṣyati ca dravyaśuddhau prāyaścitteṣu ca
tasmiṃs tāvat tapaḥ kuryād yāvat tuṣṭikaraṃ bhavet 
atha vā yo 'śraddadhāno nāstikatayā tasyānadhikāram āha 
nāstikasya hi na vaidikaṃ karma kurvato 'py ātmā tuṣyati 
atas tena kriyamāṇam api karma niṣphalam eva 
atha vā sarvakarmaviṣayo bhāvaprasāda upadiśyate 
anuṣṭhānakāle krodhamohaśokādi tyaktvā pramuditena bhāvyam 
ataś ca śīlavad asyāḥ sarvaśeṣatayā dharmamūlatvābhidhānam 
yaḥ kaścit kasyacid dharmo manunā parikīrtitaḥ 
sa sarvo 'bhihito vede sarvajñānamayo hi saḥ 
yad uktaṃ vedavitsaṃbandhena smṛteḥ prāmāṇyam tad anena prakaṭayati 
yaḥ kaścid dharmo varṇadharma āśramadharmaḥ saṃskāradharmaḥ sāmānyarūpo viśeṣarūpaś ca kasyacid brāhmaṇāder varṇasya manunā parikīrtitaḥ 
sa sarvo 'pi vede 'bhihitaḥ pratipāditaḥ 
yathā caitat tathā pūrvaśloka uktam 
sarvajñānamayo hi saḥ 
sarveṣāṃ jñānānām adṛṣṭaviṣayāṇāṃ hetur nimittaṃ vedaḥ 
sarvair jñānair nirmita iveti jñāne tadvikāratvam adhyāropya mayaṭ kṛtaḥ 
yo hi yadvikāraḥ sa tanmayas tatsvabhāva ity ucyate 
vedaś ca jñānahetutvāt tanmaya iti 
satkāryadarśane kāraṇaṃ kāryasvabhāvam iti 
atha vā sarvajñānād dhetoḥ āgataḥ hetum anuṣyebhyaḥ iti mayaṭ kriyate 
sarvaṃ tu samavekṣyedaṃ nikhilaṃ jñānacakṣuṣā 
śrutiprāmāṇyato vidvān svadharme niviśeta vai 
sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ kṛtakākṛtakam śāstragocaraṃ pratyakṣādigocaram apratyakṣādigocaram samavekṣyaitaj jñānacakṣuṣā tarkavyākaraṇaniruktamīmāṃsādividyāsthānaśravaṇacintanātmakena 
cakṣur iva cakṣuḥ śāstrābhyāsaḥ jñānasya kāraṇatvasāmānyāt 
yathā cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ jñāyate evaṃ śāstreṇa dharma iti sāmānyam 
samavekṣya samyag vicārapūrvakaṃ nirūpya śrutiprāmānyato vedaprāmāṇyena dharme niviśeta dharmam anutiṣṭhet 
sarveṣu hi śāstreṣu samyagjñāteṣu vedapraṃāṇyam evāvatiṣṭhate nājñāteṣu 
tathā hi tāni śāstrāṇi nipuṇatvena cintayan na teṣāṃ prāmāṇye samyag yuktir asti vede tv astīti niścinoti 
sarvagrahaṇaṃ jñeyaviśeṣaṇam 
nikhilaśabdaś ca samavekṣyeti kriyāviśeṣaṇam 
nikhilaṃ samavekṣya niḥśeṣeṇa pūrvapakṣeṇa śāstrāntarāṇāṃ prāmāṇye vedasya vāprāmāṇye yāvantyaḥ kāścana yuktayaḥ pratibhāsante tāḥ sarvāḥ pradarśya siddhāntasiddhair hetubhir yathālakṣaṇalakṣitair nirākṛtya svapakṣasādhane copanyaste vedaprāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhata iti nikhilaśabdena pradarśyate 
tena tau nikhilasarvaśabdau paryāyāv api bhinnaviṣayatvān na punaruktau 
svagrahaṇam anuvādaḥ 
yo hy anyasya dharmaḥ so 'nyasyādharma eva 
śrutismṛtyuditaṃ dharmam anutiṣṭhan hi mānavaḥ 
iha kīrtim avāpnoti pretya cānuttamaṃ sukham 
yo nāstikatayā vaidikāni niṣphalāni karmāṇīti vyāmuhya na tadanuṣṭhāne pravarteta tasya pravṛttyarthaṃ suhṛd bhūtvā dṛṣṭaphalapradarśanaṃ karoti 
tiṣṭhatu tāvad anyat phalam 
śrutau smṛtiṣu ca yad uditam uktaṃ dharmākhyaṃ karma tad anutiṣṭhann iha aśmiṃl loke yāvaj jīvati tāvat kīrtiṃ praśasyatāṃ pūjyatāṃ saubhāgyaṃ labhate 
nyāyye pathi sthito mahāpuṇyo 'yam iti sarveṇa pūjyate 
priyaś ca sarvasya bhavati 
pretya dehāntare yasmād anyad uttamaṃ nāsti tat sukhaṃ prāpnoti 
prāyeṇa svargakāmasyādhikāraḥ niratiśayā ca prītiḥ svargaḥ tata ucyate anuttamam iti 
tasmān nāsti kasyāpi dṛṣṭaphalārthino 'traiva pravṛttiḥ prayuktety evaṃparam etat 
śrutis tu vedo vijñeyo dharmaśāstraṃ tu vai smṛtiḥ 
te sarvārtheṣv amīmāṃsye tābhyāṃ dharmo hi nirbabhau 
kim idaṃ śabdārthasaṃbandhasmaraṇam abhidhānakośaśāstram ātmabhūḥ parameṣṭhī ityādivat na dharmaśāstram yenedam ucyate śrutis tu vedo vijñeyo dharmaśāstraṃ tu vai smṛtih iti 
ucyate 
iha sadācāro na śrutiḥ na smṛtiḥ nibandhābhāvāt 
nibaddhākṣarā hi smṛtayaḥ prasiddhāḥ 
atas tasya smṛtitvam upapādayati 
yat kāryaṃ dharmaṃ śāsty arthaṃ tad dharmaśāstram 
yatra dharmaḥ śiṣyate kartavyatayā pratīyate sā smṛtiḥ 
nibandhānibandhāv aprayojakau 
śiṣṭasamācārād api dharmasya kartavyatāvagatiḥ 
so 'pi smṛtir eva 
tataś ca yatra kasmaicit kāryāya smṛter upādānaṃ tatra sadācāro 'pi grahītavyaḥ 
dharmaśāstraṃ cet smṛtir vedo 'pi sarvamukhyaṃ dharmaśāsanam iti tasyāpi smṛtitvaprasaṅgaḥ 
tannivṛttyartham āha śrutis tu vedo vijñeyaḥ 
yatra śrūyate dharmānuśāsanaśabdaḥ sā śrutiḥ 
yatra ca smaryate sā smṛtiḥ 
tac ca samācāre 'py astīty ataḥ so 'pi smṛtir eva 
na hi tatrāpy asmṛtavaidike śabde prāmāṇyam 
atha vā śrutigrahaṇaṃ smṛter vedatulyatvārtham 
kiṃ punaḥ śrutismṛtayoḥ samānaṃ kāryaṃ yat samācāre 'py anyena prāpyate 
ucyate 
te sarvārtheṣv amīmāṃsye 
te śrutismṛtī 
sarveṣv artheṣv atyantāsaṃbhāvyeṣv api dṛṣṭaviṣayaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ yathā tasmād eva hiṃsālakṣaṇāt padārthāt kvacid abhyudayaḥ kvacit pratyavāyaḥ surāpānān narakaḥ somapānāt pāpaśuddhiḥ ityādau pakṣapratipakṣagamanena vicāro na kartavyaḥ 
āśaṅkāpakṣāntarasaṃbhāvanaṃ mīmāṃsanam 
yathā hiṃsā cet pāpahetuḥ svarūpāviśeṣād vaidiky api tathā bhavitum arhati atha vaidiky abhyudayahetuḥ laukiky api tathā syāt tadrūpasamānatvāt 
yasya yad rūpaṃ vedād avagataṃ tasya tad viparītarūpasaṃbhāvanam asattarkāśrayair asamyagghetubhir yad vicāraṇaṃ tat siddhāntābhiniveśaḥ sa iha pratiṣidhyate 
na punar ayam artho vedasyādyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ uta svid yaḥ siddhānta ity eṣā mīmāṃsā niṣidhyate 
yato vakṣyati
yas tarkeṇānusaṃdhatte sa dharmaṃ veda netara 
iti 
kiṃ punar ayam adṛṣṭārtho mīmāṃsanapratiṣedhaḥ 
neti brūmaḥ 
tābhyāṃ dharmo hi nirbabhau 
anena tārkikapramāṇānāṃ vedārthaviparītasādhanānām ābhāsatām āha 
īdṛśā hi teṣāṃ hetavaḥ vaidikī hiṃsā pāpahetuḥ hiṃsātvāt laukikahiṃsāvat 
tatra hiṃsāyāṃ pāpahetutvaṃ na kutaścid anyataḥ pramāṇāt siddham antareṇāgamam 
evaṃ cen nāsti hiṃsāyāḥ pāpasādhanasiddhau hetuḥ yāvad āgamaḥ prāmāṇyena nābhyupagataḥ 
abhyupagate cāgamaprāmāṇye tadviruddho hetur na yujyate aprāmāṇyāpatter āgamasya 
tataś cetaretaravyāghātaḥ 
pūrvaṃ prāmāṇyena parigrahaḥ paścād aprāmāṇyam iti 
so 'yaṃ svavacanaviruddhaḥ pakṣaḥ 
nainaṃ tārkikā anymanyante mama mātā vandhyā itivat āgamaviruddhaś ca 
athocyate 
naivāgamaḥ pramāṇam 
kathaṃ tadvirodhodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam anṛtavyāghātapunaruktadoṣebhyaḥ 
kārīryādikarmaṇāṃ tatsamanantaraṃ phalārthitayānuṣṭhīyamānānāṃ na niyamato 'nuṣṭhānasamanantaraṃ phalaprāptiḥ 
kālāntare bhaviṣyatīti cet uktam atra 
kṛtā śaradi kārīrī bhṛśaṃ śuṣyatsu śāliṣu 
vasante jāyate vṛṣṭis tasyā gomarakaḥ phalam  iti 
yāny apy anyatrabhāviphalāni jyotiṣṭomādīni tatrāpi niranvayavināśāt karmaṇo varṣaśate phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti niḥsaṃdigdhavaitālikavyavahāropamam etat 
tasmād anṛtam 
vyāghātaḥ udite hotavyam anudite juhvato doṣaḥ prātaḥ prātar anṛtaṃ te vadanti purodayāj juhvati ye 'gnihotram 
tathānudite hotavyam yathā atithaye pradrutāya dadyāt tādṛg etad yaj juhuyāt ity ekatroditahomo vidhīyate 'nuditahomanindayā tad eva viparītam anyat 
tatra kaḥ pakṣa āśrīyatām ity anadhyavasāyaḥ 
yad evāgnihotrādy ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ vidyate tad eva śākhāntare 'pi 
sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karmety abhyupagamaḥ 
tataś ca punaruktam 
tatrānṛtam eva tan na bhavatīty etenaiva pādena pratipādyate 
yato vedād dharma eva kartavyatāmātraṃ yāgādiviṣayaṃ nirbabhau vibhāti gamyate na punaḥ kālaviśeṣaḥ phalasyotpattau adhikāravākyeṣu kālaviśeṣāśravaṇāt 
vidhito hi phalaṃ bhavatīty etāvad gamyate 
kālāvacchedo na vidhiḥ 
dhātvarthasaṃbandhino hi kālavibhāgā bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ 
na caitad dhātvarthaphalaṃ kiṃ tu vaidham 
dhatvarthaphalaṃ hi tadānīm eva nirvartate devatoddeśena dravyatyāgo havirvikārādi 
yadi kaścit kasyacid ājñākaro bhavati tena preṣyate gaccha yāhi grāmam iti 
sa ājñāsaṃpādane pravṛttaḥ kadācit prārambha eva vetanaphalaṃ labhate kadācin madhye kadācit kṛta ājñāviṣaye samantaram anyedur vā kālāntare 'tha vā 
evam etac chāstraphalam aniyatakālam 
divyavṛṣṭyādes tu svābhāvyena pratyāsattimātraṃ gamyate na tu tadahar evotpattiḥ 
pratibandhakāni ca yathā phalasyaivaṃvidhasya loke bhavanti tathā vede 'pi purākṛtaṃ duṣkṛtādi 
tathā ca veda evaitad darśayati yadi na varṣet tathaiva vaset iti 
sarvasvāre tu vivadante naitat kratuphalam 
aṅgam etat smaraṇam 
kratuphalaṃ yaḥ kāmayetānāmayaḥ svargalokam iyām iti 
yac coktaṃ hiṃsāyāṃ lokavedayor na viśeṣa iti tatra śāstrāvagamyo hi tasyā ayaṃ svabhāvaḥ na pratyakṣādigocaraḥ 
tatra ca bhedaḥ 
rāgalakṣaṇā laukikī hiṃsā vidhilakṣaṇālaukikī hiṃsā 
vidhilakṣaṇā tv agnīṣomīyasyeti mahān bhedaḥ 
tasmān na kiṃcid vede 'nṛtam 
vyāghātaṃ parastāt parihariṣyati ślokenaiva 
yo 'vamanyeta te mūle hetuśāstrāśrayād dvijaḥ 
sa sādhubhir bahiṣkāryo nāstiko vedanindakaḥ 
asaty aprāmāṇyahetau vedasya yo dvijo hetuśāstrāśrayāt hetuśāstraṃ nāstikatarkaśāstraṃ bauddhcārvākādiśāstram yatra vedo 'dharmāyeti punaḥ punar udghuṣyate tādṛśaṃ tarkam āśritya yo 'vajñāṃ kuryāt śrutau smṛtau ca kenacid akāryān nivartyeta maivaṃ kārṣīḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ vedena iti tam anādṛtya cikīrṣet kiṃ nāma yadi vede smṛtiṣu vā pratiṣiddham na hi kiṃcit tayoḥ samyak prāmāṇyam asti iti kathayet manasā vā vicintayet 
tarkaśāstreṣu nibaddhādaro yadi dṛśyeta sa sādhubhiḥ śiṣṭair bahiḥkāryaḥ tiraskāryas tattatkāryebhyo yājanādhyāpanātithisatkārādibhyaḥ 
kriyāviśeṣasyānirdeśād vidvadarhebhya iti gamyate 
yato 'vidān samyagasaṃskṛtātmā tārkikagandhitayaivaṃ vyavaharati 
āsu ca kriyāsu vidān adhikriyate 
ata eva pūrvaśloke vicāra īdṛśaḥ pratiṣidhyate yatas tadavajñānaparatayā kriyate na tu yatas tadarthaviśeṣajijñāsayā 
evamartham eva hetum āha nāstiko vedanindakaḥ 
ataś ca pūrvapakṣe yo vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ brūyān nāsau nāstikaḥ syāt 
siddhāntadārḍhyārtham eva pūrvapakṣe hetukathanam 
vedanindaka iti smṛtigrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam 
tulyatvenobhayoḥ prakṛtatvād anyataranirdeśenaiva siddham ubhasyāpi grahaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ 
yas tv etam artham aviditvā vedaśabdasya vivakṣitārthatvam eva matvā smṛtinindakasya na bahiṣkāraḥ anena vedanindakasyaiva vihita iti pratipadyeta taṃ pratyāha 
vedaḥ smṛtiḥ sadācāraḥ svasya ca priyam ātmanaḥ 
etac caturvidhaṃ prāhuḥ sākṣād dharmasya lakṣaṇam 
nātra kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
vedanindāpratiṣedhena smṛtisadācārātmatuṣṭīnām api nindakasya bahiṣkāro 'nena vihitaḥ 
teṣām api vedamūladharmābhidhānam 
ataḥ smṛtyādinindako vedanindaka eva 
nanu ślokadvayena nārthaḥ 
evaṃ vaktavyam
śrutyādīn ātmatuṣṭyantān hetuśāstrāśrayād dvijaḥ 
yo nindet sa bahiṣkāryaḥ sādhubhir nāstikatvataḥ 
ucyate 
nācāryā granthagauravaṃ manyante 
buddhigauravaṃ yatnena pariharanti 
tasmin hi sati asamyagavabodho dharmasya 
sa ca puruṣārthaṃ vihanti 
bhedanirdeśe 'pi hi codayeyuḥ vedagrahaṇam eva kartavyam sarvasya dharmasya vaidikatvāt 
tasmād vispaṣṭārthaṃ bhedenobhayanirdeśaḥ saṃkṣiptarucīnāṃ pūrvaślokaḥ anyeṣāṃ ślokadvayam 
svasya ca priyam ātmanaḥ ity anena prāg uktā ātmatuṣṭir evoktā 
svagrahaṇaṃ vṛttapūraṇārtham 
etat sākṣād dharmasya lakṣaṇam nimittaṃ jñāpakam na punaḥ pratyakṣam 
yathā nairuktam sākṣātkṛtadharmāṇaḥ iti 
vidhāśabdaḥ prakāravacanaḥ 
ekam eva dharme pramāṇaṃ vedākhyam 
tasya tv ete bhedāḥ smṛtyādayaḥ 
anye tūpasaṃhārārtham imaṃ ślokaṃ vyācakṣate samāptaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaprakaraṇam iti 
punaḥpāṭhaḥ samāptiṃ sūcayati yathā dvirabhyāso vedāṅgeṣu saṃsthājapenopatiṣṭhanta upatiṣṭhanta iti 
tathā ca piṇḍīkṛta iva prāgukto 'rtho hṛdi vartate 
yathā naiyāyikāḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥiti pratijñāya sādhanopanyāsaṃ kṛtvā nigamayanti tasmād anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
prāyeṇa caiṣā granthākārāṇāṃ rītiḥ 
tathā mahābhāṣyakāro 'pi kvacit sūtraṃ vārtikaṃ vā paṭhitvā vyākhyāya punaḥ paṭhati 
arthakāmeṣv asaktānāṃ dharmajñānaṃ vidhīyate 
dharmaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ śrutiḥ 
gobhūmihiraṇyādidhanam arthaḥ 
tatra saktis tātparyeṇa tadarjanarakṣaṇārthaṃ kṛṣisevādivyāpārakaraṇam 
kāmaḥ strīsaṃbhogaḥ 
tatra saktiḥ nityaṃ tadāsevanaṃ tadaṅgānāṃ ca gītavāditrādīnām 
tadvarjitānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ dharmajñānaṃ dharmāvabodho vidhīyate viśeṣeṇa dhīyate vyavasthitaṃ bhavati 
dhīṅ ādhāne ity asyaitad rūpam 
kim arthaṃ punas tatra saktānāṃ na bhavati dharmajñānam yāvatā te 'pi yathākṣaṇaṃ tadavirodhiny avasare bhojanādāv itihāsaśravaṇād anyopadeśāt samācārād vā śaknuvanti jñātum 
ity ata āha dharmaṃ jijñāsamānānām iti 
mukhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharme vedaḥ sa ca tair na śakyo jñātum 
atyantadurvijñāno hy asau nigamaniruktavyākaraṇatarkapurāṇamīmāṃsāśāstraśravaṇam apekṣate svārthabodhe 
na ceyān grantharāśiḥ sarvavyāpāraparityāgena vinā śakya āsādayitum 
samācāretihāsādeḥ katipaye dharmā avagamyante na vedādivat samastāṅgayukto jyotiṣṭomādiprayogaḥ 
ata uktam pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ śrutiḥ 
na tu samācārādeḥ prāmāṇyāpakarṣaḥ 
tad uktam
yo 'her iva dhanād bhīto miṣṭānnāc ca viṣād iva 
rākṣasībhya iva strībhyaḥ sa vidyām adhigacchati
