apare tv arthakāmā dṛṣṭaphalaiṣiṇa ucyante 
tatra saktānāṃ pūjākhyātyādikāmānāṃ dṛṣṭaphalārthitayā lokapaktimātraprayojanānāṃ na dharmajñānaṃ dharmānuṣṭhānaṃ vidhīyate upadiśyate 
jñāyate 'sminn iti jñānam anuṣṭhānam ity ucyate 
anuṣṭhīyamāno hi dharmo vyaktataro bhavati śāstrāvagamakālato 'pi 
ato 'nuṣṭhānaṃ dharmajñānam ucyate 
ata etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yady api dharmānuṣṭhānāl lokapaktyādi dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam upalabhyate tathāpi na tatsiddhiparatayā tatra pravartitavyam kiṃ tarhi śāstreṇa tac coditam iti kṛtvā 
tathā ca pravṛttau yadi dṛṣṭam api bhavati bhavatu na vicāryate 
tathā ca śrutiḥ svādhyāyasya dṛṣṭaṃ phalam anuvadati yaśo lokapaktiḥ iti lokaḥ pacyamānaś caturbhir enaṃ bhunakti arcayā dānenājyeyatayā cāvadhyatayā ityādi 
ślokaś cātra bhavati 
yathekṣuhetor iha secitaṃ payas tṛṇāni vallīr api ca prasiñcati 
tathā naro dharmapathena saṃcaran yaśaś ca kāmāṃś ca vasūni cāśnute 
nanu ca yasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'vagataḥ so 'nyoddeśenāpy anuṣṭhīyamāno na svabhāvac cyavate karoty eva tatkāryam 
yathā viṣaṃ auṣadhoddeśenāpi pītaṃ hanty eva 
ato dṛṣṭārthatayāpy anuṣṭhīyamānāni karmāṇi śāstrīyāṇy adṛṣṭārthāny api bhaviṣyanti 
ko bhavato matsaro lokāvarjanahetutayā na pravartitavyam iti yenāttha 
ata āha 
dharmaṃ jijñāsamānānām 
vedo dharme pramāṇam 
tena caitad uktam dṛṣṭaphalakāmārthānāṃ nādṛṣṭaṃ bhavati 
na kevalam adṛṣṭaṃ na bhavati yāvat pratiṣiddhasevanād adharmo 'pi bhavati 
śrutidvaidhaṃ tu yatra syāt tatra dharmāv ubhau smṛtau 
ubhāv api hi tau dharmau samyag uktau manīṣibhiḥ 
prāg ukto vyāghātaḥ parihriyate 
yatra śrutyor dvaidham viruddhābhidhānam yaṃ dharmo 'yam iti kācic chrutir āha tam evādharmam ity anyā 
tatra ubhāv api tau dharmāv anuṣṭheyau vikalpena 
tulyabale hi te śrutī 
tatreyaṃ pramāṇam iyaṃ nety aśakyo vivekaḥ 
ata ekārthatulyabalavirodhe vikalpaḥ ity ubhāv api tau dharmāv ity uktam 
tatra samuccayaḥ prāpnoti 
evam ubhau dharmau bhavataḥ 
anyathā ekaḥ syāt 
neti brūmaḥ 
paryāyeṇāpi prayoge nobhayaśabdasya pravṛttivirodhaḥ 
na hy ayaṃ sāpekṣyadvayaviṣaya eva 
nyāyyaś ca vikalpaḥ 
yathāgnihotrākhyam ekaṃ karma tasya kālatrayam upadiṣṭaṃ 
tatra karma pradhānam kālo guṇaḥ 
na caikasmin prayoge kālatrayasaṃbhavaḥ 
na ca kālānurodhena proyogāvṛttir yuktā 
nāṅgānurodhena pradhānam āvartanīyam 
tasmān nyāyyo 'yam tulyabalavirodhe vikalpaḥ iti vacanāt 
ubhāv api hi tau dharmau nanu ca ko bhedas tatra dharmāv ity asmād etasya 
na kaścit 
pūrveṇa svamatam upanyastam uttareṇānyair api manīṣibhir etad evoktam iti svamatam ācāryāntaramatasaṃvādena draḍhayati 
udite 'nudite caiva samayādhyuṣite tathā 
sarvathā vartate yajña itīyaṃ vaidikī srutiḥ 
udāharaṇam idaṃ samanantarapradarśite virodhe 
ya ete trayaḥ kālā itaretaranindayā homasya vihitāḥ tatrāyam arthaḥ śrutivākyānām sarvathā vartate yajñaḥ 
sarvaprakāro homaḥ pravartate pravartanīya ity arthaḥ 
yā uditahomanindā sā na tatpratiṣedhārthā kiṃ tarhy anuditahomavidhyarthā 
evam itaratrāpi 
tenāyam artha ukto bhavati 
sarvathā kartavya eteṣāṃ kālānām anyatamasmin kāle 
tatra yasmin kṛtas tatra saṃpūrṇaḥ śāstrārtho bhavati 
itīyaṃ vaidikī śrutir evaṃparā 
asminn arthe 'syās tātparyam na punar nindyamānapratiṣedhe 
yajñaḥ homaḥ atrāgnihotrākhyo 'bhipretaḥ yāgahomayor yato nātyantaṃ bhedaḥ 
devatām uddiśya dravyasya svatvatyāgaḥ nedaṃ mama devatāyā idam iti yāgaḥ 
etac ca svarūpaṃ home 'py asti 
ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ dravyasya home prakṣepaḥ adhikaḥ āropaṇaviśeṣo 'gnyādau 
ato yajñaśabdenātra homasyābhidhānam 
home hy ete kālāḥ śrutāv āmnātāḥ na yāgamātre 
uditādiśabdaiś ca udite hotavyam ityādikā śrutir ekadeśena lakṣyate 
yeyam udite hotavyam nodite hotavyam iti śrutiḥ saivaṃparety evaṃ yojanā 
samayādhyuṣitaśabdena samudāyenaivoṣasaḥ kāla ucyate 
anye tu padadvayam etad ity āhuḥ 
samayaśabdaḥ samīpavacanaḥ samīpinam apekṣate 
uditānuditayoḥ saṃnidhānāt tatsamīpī saṃdhyākālaḥ 
adhyuṣitaṃ rātrer vivāsakālaḥ 
vyuṣṭāyāṃ rātrāv ity arthaḥ 
kāsucic chrutiṣv evaṃ paṭhitam kāsucid evam iti śrutivākyānukaraṇam eṣā smṛtiḥ tatra kiṃ padadvayam etad utaikam iti tata eva nirṇayaḥ 
ato vikalpenaikaṃ homākhyaṃ karma prati kālatrayavidhānān nāsti virodhaḥ 
siddharūpe hi vastunītaretaraviruddharūpasamāveśāsaṃbhavāt syād virodhaḥ na sādhye 
sādhyaṃ hy anenāpi sidhyaty anenāpity avagamyate 
tatra kuto virodhaḥ 
eṣa eva ca smṛtīnāṃ viruddhānāṃ vikalpo nyāyyaḥ 
niṣekādiśmaśānānto mantrair yasyodito vidhiḥ 
tasya śāstre 'dhikāro 'smiñ jñeyo nānyasya kasyacit 
viduṣā brāhmaṇenedam adhyetavyam iti paṭhanti 
sa cārthavādaḥ 
tatra tavyapratyayadarśanāt kasyacid vidhibhrāntiḥ syāt 
tathā ca sati kṣatriyavaiśyayor adhyayanaṃ nivartata ity etadāśaṅkānivṛttyartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ prāptiṃ darśayati 
tathā yathākāmī śūdro 'py apratiṣedhād adhyetuṃ pravarteta tannivṛtyartham apīty evam idaṃ ślokaṃ pūrve vyācakṣare 
śāstraśabdo 'yaṃ mānavagranthavacanaḥ 
adhikāro mayaitad anuṣṭheyam ity avagamaḥ 
na ca śabdarāśeḥ siddhasvabhāvasyānuṣṭheyatvāvagatiḥ saṃbhavati 
na hi dravyam anāśritya kriyāviśeṣaṃ sādhyatayāvagamyate 
ataḥ śāstraviṣayāyāṃ kasyāṃcit kriyāyām adhikāra ity avagamyate 
tatra kṛbhvastayas tāvan na viṣayatayā pratīyante 
bhvastyor bhavatyarthatvāt 
bhvastisaṃbandhe hy ayam arthaḥ pratīyate śāstrasya yad bhavanaṃ yā ca sattā tām anutiṣṭhet iti 
na cānyadīyāyāṃ sattāyām anyasyānuṣṭhātṛtvasaṃbhavaḥ 
karotyarthe 'pi na saṃbhavati padānāṃ nityatvād vākyānāṃ cānyena kṛtatvāt 
ataḥ śāstrasahacāriṇy adhyayanakriyā pratīyate 
ato 'yam artha ukto bhavati 
śāstrādhyayane tasyādhikāraḥ 
yathaivādhyayane tathaiva tadarthaśravaṇe 'pi 
nanu ādimattvān mānavasya granthasya kathaṃ tadviṣayo vidhir anādivedamūla iti śakyate vaktum 
ucyate 
yāni kānicana śāstrapratipādakāni vākyāni na tāni śūdreṇādhyeyānīti śakyate sāmānyato 'numānam 
yāni vedavākyāni yāni tadarthavyākhyānavākyāni vyākhyātṝṇāṃ tatpratirūpakāṇi tāny api pravāhanityatayā nityāny eva 
anuṣṭhānaṃ tu śāstraviṣayaḥ 
tatra cāturvarṇasyādhikāraḥ 
nanu evaṃ saty anupāttakartṛviśeṣeṣu sāmānyadharmeṣu śūdrasyādhikāraprasaṅgaḥ 
yathā ca na bhavati tathā ca tatra tatra kathayiṣyāmaḥ 
nanu katham adhyayanāvabodhādhikāraniṣedhe karmādhikāraḥ 
na hy aviditakarmarūpasya tadanuṣṭhānasaṃbhavaḥ na cādhyayanam antareṇa tadarthāvabodhasaṃbhavaḥ na cāvaidyo 'dhikriyate 
satyam 
paropadeśād api yāvat tāvat siddhyati parijñānam 
yaṃ brāhmaṇam āśritaḥ śūdro yo vārthataḥ pravṛttaḥ sa enaṃ śikṣayiṣyatīdaṃ kṛtvedaṃ kurv iti 
ato na karmānuṣṭhānaprayukte śūdrasyādhyayanavedane strīvat parapratyayād apy anuṣṭhānasiddheḥ 
yathā strīṇāṃ bhartṛvidyaiva prasaṅgād upakaroti na karmaśrutayo vidyāṃ prayuñjate 
teṣām eva svapratyayo 'nuṣṭhānahetur yeṣāṃ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ iti vidhir asti puṃsām 
sa ca puṃsāṃ traivarṇikānām 
teṣām api nārthajñānaprayukte 'dhyayanavedane api tu vidhidvayaprayukte ācāryakaraṇavidhinā svādhyāyādhyayanavidhinā ca 
niṣeko garbhādhānam sa ādir yasya saṃskārakalāpasya sa niṣekādiḥ 
garbhādhānaṃ ca vivāhād anantaraṃ prathamopagame viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu iti mantravat keṣāṃcid vihitam 
pareṣām ā garbhagrahaṇāt pratyṛtu 
śmaśānam anto 'syeti śmaśānāntaḥ 
śmaśānaśabdena mṛtaśrīrāṇi yatra nidhīyante tat sthānam ucyate 
tac ca sāhacaryāt pretasaṃskāraṃ parācīm iṣṭiṃ lakṣayati 
sā hi mantravatī na sthānam 
anena ca dvijātayo lakṣyante 
teṣāṃ hi mantravantaḥ saṃskārāḥ 
dvijātīnām iti noktam 
vicitrā ślokānāṃ kṛtiḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyāsya manoḥ 
mantrair udita ukto vidhir iti nāyaṃ saṃbandhaḥ 
na hi mantrā vidhiṃ vadanti 
kiṃ tarhi prayogāvasthasya vidheyasya smārakāḥ na vidhāyakāḥ 
tasmād evaṃ vyākhyeyam 
mantrair yuktaḥ samantrako yeṣām ayam vidhir iti 
nānyasya kasyacid ity anuvādaḥ dvijātīnāṃ niyatatvāt 
atha vā kaścin manyeta dvijātīnām ayaṃ vihito 'vaśyakartavyaḥ 
śūdrāṇāṃ tv aśiṣṭo 'pratiṣiddha iti 
tadāśaṅkānivṛttyartham idam uktam 
sarasvatīdṛṣadvatyor devanadyor yad antaram 
taṃ devanirmitaṃ deśaṃ brahmāvartaṃ pracakṣate 
uktāni dharme pramāṇāni 
virodhe ca vikalpo 'bhihitaḥ 
adhikāriṇaś ca sāmānyenoktāḥ 
idānīṃ yeṣu yogyatayā dharmo 'nuṣṭeyatām āpadyate te deśā varṇyante 
sarasvatī nāma nadī 
aparā dṛṣadvatī 
tayor nadyor yad antaraṃ madhyaṃ taṃ deśaṃ brahmāvarta ity anayā saṃjñayā pracakṣate vyavaharanti śiṣṭāḥ 
devagrahaṇam avadhyavadhimatoḥ stutyartham 
devaiḥ sa nirmito 'taḥ sarvebhyo deśebhyaḥ pāvanatara iti 
tasmin deśe ya ācāraḥ pāraṃparyakramāgataḥ 
varṇānāṃ sāntarālānāṃ sa sadācara ucyate 
athāsmin deśe ya ācāras tasya prāmāṇye kiṃ vidvattā śiṣṭatā copādhir aṅgīkriyate 
athāviduṣām aśiṣṭānāṃ ca deśopādhir eva pramāṇam 
kiṃ cātaḥ 
yadi nāpekṣyate yat tad uktam ācāraś caiva sādhūnām iti viśeṣaṇadvayam anarthakam 
na tv asādhvācārasya dharmamūlatopapadyate vedasaṃyogāsaṃbhavāt 
athāpekṣyate deśaviśeṣasaṃbandhānupakāraḥ 
na hi deśāntare 'pi śiṣṭasamācārasyāprāmāṇyaṃ śakyate vaktum 
ucyate 
prāyikam etad abhidhānam 
prāyovṛttyāsamin deśe śiṣṭānāṃ saṃbhava ity uktam tasmin deśe ya ācāraḥ sa sadācāra iti 
anye tu deśāntare mātuladuhituḥ pariṇayanād deśācāraniṣedhārtham idam ity āhuḥ 
tad ayuktam 
aviśeṣeṇaivoktam
tad deśakulajātīnām aviruddhaṃ prakalpayet 
sa ca viruddhaḥ ūrdhvaṃ saptamāt pitṛbandhubhyaḥ mātṛbandhubhyaś ca pañcamāt ity etena 
asminn api deśe 'nupanītena saha bhojanādir ācāro naiva dharmatveneṣyate 
na ca smṛtiviruddhasyācārasya prāmāṇyasaṃbhavaḥ śrutiviprakarṣāt 
ācārāt smṛtir anumātavyā smṛteḥ śrutiḥ 
smṛtis tv avyavahitām eva śrutim anumāpayati 
kiṃ ca kāraṇagrahāc caivamāder ācārasya 
rūpavatīṃ mātulakanyāṃ kāmayamānā rājabhayād ūḍhavantaḥ kanyāgamanaṃ daṇḍo mā bhūd iti 
anye tv avidvāṃsaḥ yenāsya pitaro yātāḥ ity asya yathāśrutam arthaṃ gṛhītvā dharmo 'yam iti pratipannāḥ 
api ca etās tisras tu bhāryārthe nopayaccheta iti prāyaścittaṃ śrutam api bhrāntihetuḥ ābhyas tisṛbhyo 'nyā na pratiṣiddhā iti 
yathā cāsya nāyam arthas tathā vakṣyāmaḥ 
na ca dṛṣṭakāraṇayoḥ smṛtyācārayoḥ prāmāṇyam 
uktaṃ bhaṭṭapādaiḥ
viruddhā ca vigītā ca dṛṣṭārthā dṛṣṭakāraṇā 
smṛtir na śrutimūlā syād yā caiṣā saṃbhavaśrutiḥ 
tasmāt etān dvijātayo deśān saṃśrayeran ity etadvidhiśeṣā deśapraśaṃsārthavādā ete 
paraṃparaiva pāraṃparyam 
anyasmād anyam upasaṃkrāmati tasmād anyam tato 'py anyam ity evaṃrūpaḥ pravāhaḥ paraṃparā 
kramaḥ tadavicchedaḥ tata āgataḥ saṃprāptaḥ 
saṃkīrṇayonayaḥ antarālāḥ 
tatsahitānāṃ varṇānām 
kurukṣetraṃ ca matsyāś ca pañcālāḥ śūrasenakāḥ 
eṣa brahmarṣideśo vai brahmāvartād anantaraḥ
deśanāmadheyāny etāni 
kurukṣetraṃ samantapañcakaṃ prasiddham 
kuravas tatra kṣayaṃ gatāḥ 
kuru vā sukṛtaṃ kṣipram atra trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ity vyutpattiḥ 
matsyādayaḥ śabdā bahuvacanāntā eva deśavacanāḥ 
brahmarṣideśa iti samudāyasaṃjñā 
devanirmito deśo brahmāvartaḥ 
devebhyaḥ kiṃcin nyūnā brahmarṣaya ity ato 'yaṃ deśo brahmarṣisaṃbandhād brahmāvartān nyūnaḥ 
tathā cāha brahmāvartād anantraḥ īṣadbhinnaḥ 
nañ īṣadarthaḥ 
yathā anuṣṇāṃ yavāgūṃ pibed āmayāvī itīṣaduṣṇām upadiśanti 
antaraśabdo bhedavacanaḥ nārīpuruṣatoyānām anataraṃ mahad antaram iti yathā 
etaddeśaprasūtasya sakāśād agrajanmanaḥ 
svaṃ svaṃ caritraṃ śikṣeran pṛthivyāṃ sarvamānavāḥ 
eteṣu deśeṣu kurukṣetrādiṣu prasūtasya agrajanmanaḥ brāhmaṇasya sakāśāt svaṃ svaṃ caritram ācāraṃ śikṣeran jijñāseran 
tasmin deśe ity anenaitad vyākhyātam 
himavadvindhyayor madhyaṃ yat prāg vinaśanād api 
pratyag eva prayāgāc ca madhyadeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ 
uttarasyāṃ diśi himavān parvataḥ dakṣiṇasyāṃ vindhyaḥ 
vinaśanaṃ sarasvatyā antardhānadeśaḥ 
prayāgaḥ gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃgamaḥ 
etān deśān avadhīkṛtya madhyaṃ madhyadeśanāmānaṃ deśaṃ vidyāt 
nātyutkṛṣṭo nātinikṛṣṭa ity ato 'yaṃ madhyadeśaḥ na tu pṛthivīmadhyabhavatvāt 
ā samudrāt tu vai pūrvād ā samudāc ca paścimāt 
tayor evāntaraṃ giryor āryāvartaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
ā pūrvasamudrād ā paścimasamudrād yo 'ntarālavartī deśaaḥ tathā tayor eva pūrvaślokopadiṣṭayor giryoḥ parvatayor himavadvindhyayor yad antaraṃ madhyaṃ sa āryāvarto deśo budhaiḥ śiṣṭair ucyate 
āryā vartante tatra punaḥ punar udbhavant 
ākramyākramyāpi na ciraṃ tatra mlecchāḥ sthātāro bhavanti 
āṅ atra maryādāyām nābhividhau 
tena samudradvīpāni nāryāvartaḥ 
ete catasṛṣu dikṣu deśāvadhaya upāttāḥ 
prācyāṃ pūrvasamudraḥ pratīcyāṃ paścimaḥ udagdakṣiṇayor himavadvindhyau 
etau hy avadhitvenopāttau na tayor āryāvartatvam asti 
atas tatra nivāsābhāve prāpta idam āha 
kṛṣṇasāras tu carati mṛgo yatra svabhāvataḥ 
sa jñeyo yajñiyo deśo mlecchadeśas tv ataḥ paraḥ 
kṛṣṇaśvetaḥ kṛṣṇapīto vā kṛṣṇasāraṅgo mṛgo yatra carati nivasati 
saṃbhava utpattir yatra deśe tasya svbhāvataḥ na punar deśāntarāt prāśastyopāyanādinā nimittenānītasya kiyantam api kālaṃ nivāsaḥ 
sa deśo yajñiyo yāgārho boddhavyaḥ 
ataḥ kṛṣṇamṛgacaraṇāt paro 'nyo mlecchadeśaḥ 
mlecchāḥ prasiddhāḥ 
cāturvarṇyajātyapetāḥ pratilomajātīyā anadhikṛtā medāndhraśabarapulindādayaḥ 
na cānena yāgādhikaraṇatāsya deśasya vidhīyate same yajeta itivat caratīti vartamānanirdeśāt 
na hi yatraiva carituṃ pravṛttas tadaiva tatra yāgaḥ śakyaḥ kartum 
yāgasya hi deśo 'dhikaraṇam tatsādhanakartrādikārakāśritadravādidhāraṇadvāreṇa 
na ca dvayor mūrttayor ekakāle ekadeśe sthanasaṃbhavaḥ 
na ca kālāntaralakṣaṇā nyāyyā vidhau lakṣaṇāyā anyāyyatvāt 
yathokaṃ śūrpādhikaraṇe etad dhi kriyata ity ucyate iti 
nanu ca nābhivyāpaka evādheyaḥ yena kṛtsnādhārābhivyāptyaivādhikaraṇārthanirvṛttiḥ syāt tileṣu tailam itivat 
kiṃ tarhi ekadeśasaṃbandhināpy ādheyena bhavati kṛtsnasyādhārabhāvaḥ prāsāda āste rathaṃ adhitiṣṭhati iti 
evam hi grāmanagarasamudāyasya nadīparvatāntādyavadhikasya deśasya prakṛtatvād ekadeśe 'pi parvatāraṇyādau caran sarvam ādhārīkaroti 
tenāyam adoṣaḥ mūrtayor naikadeśaḥ saṃbhavati 
ucyate 
naivātra yaṣṭavyam iti vidhir asti 
jānāteḥ paro vidhāyakaḥ śrutaḥ na yajeḥ 
yāgasya tatrārhatā śrutā yāgārho 'sau deśa iti 
sā ca yāgārhatāsaty api vidhau ghaṭate 
eteṣu deśeṣu yāgāṅgāni darbhapalāśakhadirādīni prāyeṇa ca bhavanti 
adhikāriṇaś ca traivarṇikā traividyāś ca teṣv eva deśeṣu dṛśyante 
ata etadavalambano yāgārhatānuvādaḥ 
kṛtyo 'pi jñeyaḥ ity adhyāropitavidhyarthaḥ jartilayavāgvā juhuyād itivad vidhivan nigadārthavāda eva 
yac coktam mlecchadeśas tv ataḥ paraḥ ity eṣo 'pi prāyiko 'nuvāda eva 
prāyeṇa hy eṣu deśeṣu mlecchā bhavanti 
na tv anena deśasaṃbandhena mlecchā lakṣyante svatas teṣāṃ prasiddher brāhmaṇādijātivat 
athārthadvāreṇāyaṃ śabdaḥ pravṛtto mlecchānāṃ deśa iti 
tatra yadi kathaṃcid brahmāvartādideśam api mlecchā ākrameyuḥ tatraivāvasthānaṃ kuryuḥ bhaved evāsau mlecchadeśaḥ 
tathā yadi kaścit kṣatriyādijātīyo rājā sādhvācaraṇo mlecchān parājayet cāturvarṇyaṃ vāsayet mlecchāṃś cāryāvarta iva cāṇḍālān vyavasthāpayet so 'pi syād yajñiyaḥ 
yato na bhūmiḥ svato duṣṭā saṃsargād dhi sā duṣyaty amedhyopahateva 
ata uktadeśavyatirekeṇāpi sati sāmagrye traivarṇikenākṛṣṇamṛgacaraṇe 'pi deśe yaṣṭavyam eva 
tasmād anuvādo 'yam sa jñeyo yajñiyo deśo mlecchadeśas tv ataḥ paraḥ ity uttaravidhiśeṣaḥ 
etān dvijātayo deśān saṃśrayeran prayatnataḥ 
śūdras tu yasmiṃs tasmin vā nivased vṛttikarśitaḥ 
yadarthaṃ deśasaṃjñābhedakathanaṃ tam idānīṃ vidhim āha 
etān brahmāvartādīn deśān dvijātayo deśāntare 'pi jātāḥ saṃśrayeran 
janmadeśaṃ tyaktvā brahmāvartādideśasaṃśrayaṇaṃ prayatnena kartavyam 
atra kecid āhur adṛṣṭārtha evāyam etaddeśasaṃśrayaṇavidhiḥ 
saty api deśāntare 'dhikārasaṃbhave eteṣu deśeṣu nivāsaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tatra kalpyādhikāratve yadi vā gaṅgāditīrthasnānavad etaddeśanivāsavidhiḥ pāvanatvena kalpyate 
yathaiva kāścid āpaḥ pavitratarā evaṃ bhūmibhāgā api kecid eva pavitrāḥ yathoktaṃ purāṇe 
yadi vā saṃśrayaṇād eva svatantrāt svargo viśvajidvat 
tatraitau dvāv api pakṣāv aprāptau 
yady aprāptaḥ saṃśrayo vidhīyate kalpyetāpy adhikāraḥ 
tatra cintyate 
kataraḥ pakṣo yukta iti 
sa tu nityakāmyānām uktayā rītyā etaddeśa evānuṣṭhānasaṃbhavād adhikṛtānāṃ prāpta eva 
na hy etaddeśavyatirekeṇa kṛtsnadharmānuṣṭhānasaṃbhavaḥ 
tathā hi himavati tāvat kāśmīrādau śītenārditā na bahiḥ saṃdhyopāsane 'dhikriyante na ca yathāvidhi svādhyāyasaṃbhavaḥ prāg vodag vā grāmād upaniṣkramya iti 
na hi hemantaśiśirayor ahar ahar nadīsnānādisaṃbhavaḥ 
idam eva ca dvijātaya iti vacanaliṅgam 
na kaścid eva deśo 'sati mlecchasaṃbandhe svata eva mlecchadeśaḥ 
anyathā taddeśasaṃbandhān mlecchatve kathaṃ dvijātitvam 
athocyate 
na gamanamātrān mlecchatā api tu nivāsāt 
sa cānena pratiṣidhyate 
tac ca na 
saṃśrayo 'tra śrūyate 
sa ca deśāntare bhavatas tattyāgenānyadeśasaṃbandhaḥ 
na saṃśritasyaiva saṃśrayaṇam 
anyathā evam evāvakṣyat etān deśāṃs tyaktvā nānyatra nivaset 
atha siddhe saṃśrayaṇe tadvacanam anyanivṛttiyartham iti parisaṃkhyā tathā syāt 
tasyāś ca trayo doṣāḥ 
atha śrutārthahānir lakṣyate etān deśān na jahyāt iti 
na śrutārthasaṃbhave lakṣaṇā yuktā 
ata eva na bhūtapūrvagatiḥ 
tasmāl liṅgam idaṃ na deśasaṃbandhena puruṣā mlecchāḥ kiṃ tarhi puruṣasaṃbandhena mlecchadeśatā 
śūdrasya dvijātiśuśrūṣāyā vihitatvāt taddeśanivāse sarvadā prāpte tatrājīvato deśāntaranivāso 'bhyanujñāyate 
yadā bahukuṭumbatayā śuśrūṣāśaktyā vā yaṃ dvijātim āśritaḥ sa enaṃ bibhṛyāt tadā deśāntare saṃbhavati dhanārjane nivaset 
tatrāpi na mlecchabhūyiṣṭhe kiṃ tarhi yājñiye mlecchāvṛte yānāsanāśanādikriyānimittasya saṃsargasyāparihāryatvāt tadbhāvāpattiprasaṅgāt 
vṛttikarśito vṛttyabhāvapīḍitaḥ 
vṛttir ātmakuṭumbasthitisamarthaṃ dhanam 
tadabhāve yat karśanaṃ tatsaṃbandhitayocyate yathā varṣākṛte subhikṣadurbhikṣe varṣābhāvakṛtaṃ durbhikṣaṃ varṣākṛtatvena vyapadiśyate 
yasmiṃs tasminn iti aniyamam āha 
eṣā dharmasya vo yoniḥ samāsena prakīrtitā 
saṃbhavaś cāsya sarvasya varṇadharmān nibodhata 
atikrāntasya sarvasya granthārthasya piṇḍārthakathanam avismaraṇārtham 
yoniḥ kāraṇam 
samāsena saṃkṣepeṇa 
saṃbhavaś ceti prathamādhyāyārthāvamarśaḥ 
asya sarvasyeti 
jagannirmāṇaṃ buddhyā pratyakṣīkṛtya nirdiśati 
varṇānuṣṭheyā dharmā varṇadharmāḥ 
tān nibodhata 
vistareṇeti viśeṣaḥ 
iha pañcaprakāro dharma iti smṛtivivaraṇakārāḥ prapañcayanti varṇadharma āśramadharmo varṇāśramadharmo naimittiko guṇadharmaś ceti 
tatra yo jātimātram apekṣya pravṛtto na vayovibhāgāśramādikam āśrayati sa varṇadharmaḥ 
yathā brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ brāhmaṇena surā na peyā iti 
jātimātrasyāntyād ucchvāsād eṣa dharmaḥ 
āśramadharmo yatra jātir nāpekṣyate kevalā tadāśramapratipattir āśrīyate 
yathā brahmacāriṇo 'gnīndhanabhikṣācaraṇe 
varṇāśramadharma ubhyāpekṣaḥ 
yathā maurvī jyā kṣatriyasya ityādiḥ 
nāśramāntare na ca jātyantarasya dhāraṇam asyā udāharaṇam 
prathamopādānaṃ tūpanayanadharmo nāśramadharmaḥ 
upanayanaṃ cāśramārthaṃ nāśramadharmaḥ 
naimittiko dravaśuddhyādiḥ 
guṇam āśrito guṇadharmaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ parihāryaś ca ityādiḥ 
bāhuśrutyena guṇenaite dharmāḥ 
evam abhiṣiktasya kṣatriyasya ye dharmāḥ 
tad etad varṇagrahaṇena sarvaṃ gṛhītam iti darśitam 
avāntarabhedas tu tata evāvatiṣṭhate 
puruṣatvamātrāśritā avarṇadharmā api santi 
te 'pi bhedena vācyāḥ syuḥ 
evam anyo 'pi bhedo 'bhyūhyaḥ 
varṇagrahaṇaṃ cātra pradarśanārtham nāntaraprabhavavyudāsārtham 
pūrvaṃ pratijñātatvāt tadanuvādinī hy eṣā pratijñā 
vaidikaiḥ karmabhiḥ puṇyair niṣekādir dvijanmanām 
kāryaḥ śarīrasaṃskāraḥ pāvanaḥ pretya ceha ca 
mantraprayogā vaidikakarmāṇi 
vedā mantrā ihābhipretāḥ 
teṣāṃ yāny uccāraṇāni tāni tatra bhavāni 
ato 'dhyātmāditvāṭh ṭhak 
vedamūlatvād vopacarito vaidikaśabdaḥ 
karmaśabdena ca itikartavyatārūpaṃ karma gṛhyate 
tataś ca karmabhir niṣekādiḥ saṃskāraḥ kārya iti sādhyasādhanabhedopapattiḥ 
pradhānaṃ niṣeko mantroccāraṇam itikartavyatā 
niṣeko yonau śukranikṣepaḥ 
sa ādir yasya saṃskārakalāpasya vakṣyamāṇasyopanayanaparyantasya 
ekavacanaṃ śarīrasaṃskāra iti samudāyāpekṣam 
saṃskāraśabdena ca saguṇaśarīranirvartakam ucyate 
tatra niṣeko nirvartako 'nyāni viśeṣajanakāni 
etad evāha pāvana iti 
pāvayati aśuddhatām apakarṣatīti pāvanaḥ 
pretya ceha ceti 
saṃskṛtasya sarvatrātra dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphaleṣu karmasu kārīrījyotiṣṭomādiṣv adhikārād ubhayalokopakārakatvam āha 
puṇyaiḥ śubhair maṅgalair iti yāvat 
saubhāgyam āvahanti daubhāgyaṃ cāpanudantīti puṇyapāvanaśabdayor arthabhedaḥ 
dvijamanām iti śūdraparyudāsārtham 
saṃskāryanirdeśaś cāyam 
lakṣaṇayā ca traivarṇikāḥ pratīyante 
na hi tadānīṃ dvijanmāno bhavanti 
gārbhair homair jātakarmacauḍamauñjīnibandhanaiḥ 
baijikaṃ gārbhikaṃ caino dvijānām apamṛjyate 
uktaṃ saṃskāraprayojanaṃ pāvanaḥ śarīrasaṃskāraḥ puṇyaś ca 
tatra pāvanatvam ucyate duṣṭasya doṣāpakarṣaṇam 
kutaḥ punaḥ śarīrasya duṣṭatety āśaṅkāyām āha 
baijikaṃ gārbhikaṃ caina iti 
bīje bhavaṃ bījanimittaṃ vā baijikam 
evaṃ gārbhikam 
enaḥ pāpam adṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam 
tasya bījagarbhayor nimittabhāvād śucitvamātram ihocyate 
śukraśoṇite puruṣasya bījam 
te ca svabhāvād aśucinī 
garbhādhāny api doṣasaṃkrāntyā duṣṭaiva 
atas tannimittam aśucitvaṃ puruṣasya saṃskārair apamṛjyate 'panudyate 
tān idānīṃ kāṃścin nāmadheyena kāṃścit saṃskāryaviśeṣopalakṣitān kṛtvā nirdiśati 
gārbhair homaiḥ 
garbhe saṃbhhute nāryāḥ kriyante 
garbhaṃ vā grahītum garbhaprayojanakatvād gārbhāḥ 
nārī tatra dvāramātram 
prayojakas tu garbha eva 
atas tatprayuktatvāc ca tadarthā homāḥ puṃsavanasīmantonnayanagarbhādhānāni 
homaśabda upalakṣaṇārthaḥ karmamātrasya 
na hi garbhādhānaṃ homaḥ 
eteṣāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ darvyadevatādirūpaṃ gṛhyasmṛtibhyo 'vasātavyam 
yathaiva gārbhair homair evaṃ jātakarmākhyena saṃskāreṇa 
evaṃ cauḍena 
cūḍārthaḥ cauḍaḥ 
mauñjīnibandhanam upanayanam 
tatra hi muñjavikāro mekhalā badhyate 
atas tenopanayanakarmopalakṣyate 
bandhanam eva nibandhanam 
niḥ vṛttapūraṇaḥ 
jātakarmādīni saṃskāranāmadheyāni kṛtadvandvāni karaṇavibhaktyā enopamārjanasya nirdiśyante 
saṃskāraś ca sarvaḥ saṃskārye kāryāntaraśeṣabhūte kṛtārthe kariṣyamāṇārthe vā kaṃcid dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā viśeṣam ādadhāti 
vrīhīn avahanti iti vrīhibhir yajeta iti yāgaṃ nirvartayiṣyatāṃ tuṣakaṇavipramokṣo dṛṣṭo viśeṣa ādadhāti 
śiraso 'vatārya srajaṃ śucau deśe nidadhāti iti upabhuktāyā ākīrṇākārāyāḥ pratipattiniyamād adṛṣṭaḥ srajo viśeṣaḥ 
tatreme saṃskārāḥ śrīraśuddhyarthāḥ śrutāḥ 
na ca gandhādhyapakarṣaṇaṃ mṛdvārisaṃbandhād iva śarīre dṛśyate 
teneyaṃ janmādikālaśuddhivad adṛṣṭaviśeṣā śuddhir veditavyā 
etayā ca śuddhyā pūtaḥ śrautasmārteṣu karmasv adhikriyate 
yathā mantrapūtam ājyaṃ home 
laukike tu kārye dravyaśuddhyaiva śuddhir yathājyasya bhojanādau 
spṛṣyatā hi kumārasya adbhir gātrāṇi śuddhyanti ity etāvataiva bhavati 
tathā cāha na tadupasparśanād aśaucam iti 
kathaṃ punaḥ karmārthatvam eteṣām 
yuktam utpavanasyājyadvārakaṃ prakaraṇena viniyogāt 
amī tu bāhyā na kasyacit karmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe śrutāḥ 
ataḥ puruṣadvārikā karmārthatā durbhaṇā 
na cāsati kāryopayoge svarūpataḥ saṃskāra eva nirvartyaḥ 
tathā sati saṃskārtaiva hīyeta pradhānakarmatā syāt 
ataś ca kāryaḥ śarīrasaṃskāra iti kumāre jāte purānyair ālambhāt iti ca dvitīyā śrutir bādhyeta śatrūñ juhoti itivad viniyogabhaṅgaḥ syāt 
tatra cādhikārakalpanetyādibahvasamañjasaṃ prāpnoti 
ucyate 
na vayaṃ śrutyādiprāmāṇyāpekṣaṃ tādarthyam aṅgalakṣaṇaṃ brūmaḥ api tūpakārakatvam 
tac cānaṅgatve 'py upapadyate 
yathādhānavidhiḥ svādhyāyādhyayanavidhiś ca 
na hy atra śrutyādayaḥ santi 
yadāhavanīye juhotītyāhavanīyādayo viniyuktāḥ 
alaukikatvāc ca tatsvarūpasyādhānavidhinaiva siddhiḥ vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhīta iti 
ata āhavanīyādinirvṛttidvāreṇādhānaṃ kratuṣūpayujyate 
na cāṅgam 
adhyayanavidhir apy arthāvabodhadvāreṇa kratūpakārakaḥ 
evam amī saṃskārāḥ 
etatsaṃkṛtasyādhyayanavidhiḥ niṣpāditādhyayanavidhyarthasya vivāhaḥ kṛtavivāhasyādhānam āhitāgner adhikāra ity asti saṃskārakāryopayogitā bāhyapuruṣasaṃskārāṇām 
niṣekagrahāc ca sarvatrāpi pitur adhikāraḥ 
tathā ca jātakarmaṇi mantraḥ ātmā vai putranāmāsi iti 
tasya hy apatyotpādanam apatyānuśāsanaṃ ca vihitam 
ṛṇāni trīṇy apākṛtya iti 
tasmād anuśiṣṭaṃ putraṃ lokyam āhuḥ iti 
anuśāsanaṃ ca svādhikārapratipādanam tac ca vedādhyāpanenārthāvabodhaparyantena bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ 
ata evobhayopakārakāḥ saṃskārāḥ apatyotpattividhau pitur māṇavakasya ca saṃskṛtasādhyāsu kriyāsu 
tasmāt pitur adhikāras tadabhāve tatsthānāpannasya 
tathā cāha asaṃskṛtās tu saṃskāryā bhrātṛbhiḥ pūrvasaṃskṛtaiḥ iti 
yeṣu karmasu māṇavakasya saṃskārā upakārakās tān idānīm udāharaṇamātreṇa darśayati 
svādhyāyena vratair homais traividyenejyayā sutaiḥ 
mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ 
adhyayanakriyā svādhyāyaśabdenātrābhipretā 
tasyā eṣa viṣayanirdeśas traividyeneti 
vyavadhāne 'py arthalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho yasya yenārthasaṃbandhaḥ iti nyāyena 
ata eva sāmānādhikaraṇye 'pi śruter viṣayaviṣayibhāvo vibhaktivipariṇāmena trayāṇāṃ vedānām adhyayanenety arthaḥ 
traya eva vedāḥ traividyaṃ 
cāturvarṇyādivad rūpasiddhiḥ 
atha vā svādhyāyena iti vedādhyayanam traividyena iti tadarthāvabodhaḥ 
vrataiḥ sāvitrādibhir brahmacārikartṛkaiḥ 
homair vratādeśanakāle ye kriyante 
yadi vā sāyaṃprataḥ samidbhir agīndhanaṃ brahmacāriṇo homaśabdenāgnyādhārasaṃbandhasāmānyād ucyate 
atha kiṃ samidādhānaṃ na homo yenaivam ucyate saṃbandhasāmānyād iti 
na bhavatīti bruvanti adanīyadravyasādhyatvād yāgahomayoḥ 
kathaṃ tarhi
sāyaṃ prātaś ca juhuyāt tābhir agnim atandritaḥ 
ity uktam 
lakṣaṇayā samidādhānaṃ homaśabdenocyate 
yathaiva hūyamānaṃ dravyam agnau prakṣipyate evaṃ samindhanārthāḥ samidho 'pi 
ata etena sāmānyena samindanam eva homa ity ucyate 
utpattivākye hi samidham ādadhyāt iti śrutam 
juhuyāt tābhir agnim ity agnim ity anuvādo 'yam anyārtha iti parastād vakṣyāmaḥ 
na cānuvāde lakṣaṇādoṣaḥ 
idaṃ tu yuktaṃ yan medhyamātradravyasādhyau yāgahomau 
tathā ca sati bahvyaś codanā yathārthā bhavanti 
yathā sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharati iti 
tatra hi prastaraṃ dravyam āhur haratiṃ ca yajatiṃ 
atha vacanād asau tādṛśa eva yāgaḥ 
darbhāś cāpy adanīyāḥ keṣāṃcit 
kathaṃ śākalahome 
tatrāpi hi śakalāny abhyādadhāti ity utpattir iti ced grahayajñe kā gatiḥ 
grahebhya ekaikasyai samidho juhuyād arkādīnām 
ato yatra juhuyād iti devatāsaṃbandhaś ca kāṣṭhāder api śruta utpattivākye so 'pi homa eva 
ijyayā devarṣitarpaṇena 
eṣa tāvad upanītasya brahmacarye kiryākalāpaḥ 
idānīṃ gṛhasthadharmāḥ 
sutair apatyotpattividhinā 
mahāyajñaiḥ pañcabhir brahmayajñādibhiḥ 
yajñaiḥ śrautair jyotiṣṭomādibhiḥ 
nanu yady eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kiṃcit prayojanaṃ syāt tadā tadadhikārayogyatotpattyarthā bāhyāḥ saṃskārā arthavantaḥ syuḥ 
ata āha brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ 
brahma paramātmā kāraṇapuruṣaḥ tasyeyaṃ saṃbandhinī tanuḥ śarīram etaiḥ śrautasmārtaiḥ sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ kriyate 
brahmasaṃbandhitā ca tadbhāvāpattilakṣaṇā 
sa hi paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ 
saṃbandhāntarāṇi sarvasya kasyacit kāraṇatvena siddhatvān nābhilaṣitavyāni 
tato mokṣaprāptir uktā bhavati 
brāhmīty anena tanuśabdena ca tadadhiṣṭhātā puruṣo lakṣyate 
tasya hy ete śarīradvārakāḥ saṃskārāḥ 
tasyaiva ca mokṣaprāptiḥ śarīrasya pañcatāpatteḥ 
anye tv āhur brahmattvaprāptau yogyā kriyate 
na hi karmabhir eva kevalair brahmatvaprāptiḥ prajñānakarmasamuccayāt kila mokṣaḥ 
etais tu saṃskṛta ātmopāsanāsv adhikriyate 
tathā ca śrutiḥ ya etad akṣaraṃ gārgy aviditvā yajate juhoti tapas tapyate adhīte dadāty antavad evāsya tad bhavati iti 
nanu ca naiteṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ brahmaprāptiḥ phalaṃ śrutam 
tathā hi nityāni tāvad aśrutaphalāny eva 
kalpanāyāṃ ca pauruṣeyatvam 
yāvajjīvādipadaiś ca nityatāyā avagamitatvād viśvajinnyāyo 'pi nāsti 
athāsmād eva vacanād etatpalatvam iti yad ucyeta mokṣārthinaḥ tadādhikāraḥ syāt tathā ca nityatvahānis tataś ca śrutivirodhaḥ 
niṣphalaṃ na kāścid anutiṣṭhati tatrānarthakyam iti cet kāmam anānuṣṭhānam 
pramāṇasya prameyāvagatir arthaḥ 
sā cet kṛtā jātam arthavattvam 
asti cātra kartavyatāvagatiḥ 
satyāṃ ca tasyām akaraṇe śāstrārthātikramas tataś ca pratyavāyaḥ 
īdṛśa evarthe liṅādīnāṃ vṛddhavyavahāre vyutpattiḥ 
yo hi bhṛtyādiḥ kartavyaṃ na karoti kasyacid ājñātuḥ sa vetanārthī vetanaṃ na labhate yadi vā prayavāyena yojyate 
tatra phalasyāśrutatvān na phalānutpattiḥ pratyavāyaḥ api tu duḥkhena yojanaṃ nityeṣu 
evaṃ sarvapuruṣādhikāro nityaḥ samarthito bhavati 
tasmān na nityānāṃ kiṃcit phalam 
kāmyānāṃ tv anyad eva phalam na mokṣaḥ śrutatvāt 
tatra katham etat sarvakarmānuṣṭhānasādhyaḥ paraḥ puruṣārtha iti 
ata eva kaiścid arthavādo 'yam iti vyākhyāyate 
saṃskāravidhiḥ stutyarthaḥ 
atra ca brāhmīyam iti yatkiṃcid ālambanam āśritya guṇavādena nīyate 
brahma vedas taduccāraṇārthā tatkarmādhikāriṇī ca 
yat tarhi gautamenoktam catvāriṃśat saṃskārāḥ iti tat katham 
tatra hi somasaṃsthāpi saṃskāratvenoktā 
na ca pradhānakarmaṇāṃ saṃskāratvopapattiḥ 
nāpy etad arthavādatayā śakyaṃ vyākhyātum aviśeṣatvāt 
tatrāpy ātmaguṇaśeṣasaṃskāratvādhyāropeṇa stutiḥ 
evam ihāpi saṃskāraiḥ saṃskārān samānīkṛtya tulyaphalatādhyāropeṇa saṃskārāṇām avaśyakartavyatām ācaṣṭe 
tathā ca saṃskāraprakaraṇān notkṛṣyate 
stutiḥ kriyate iti ca vartamānāpadeśaḥ 
na vidhivibhaktiḥ 
tatra kuto brahmaprāpteḥ phalatvāvagamaḥ 
na cātra karmāṇi vidhīyante yenādhikārākāṅkṣyāyāṃ saty api vartamānanirdeśe rātrisatre pratiṣṭhāvat phalanirdeśaḥ syāt 
tasmāt saṃskārastutyartham eva sarvam etad ucyate 
ye 'pi vibhāgena varṇayanti nityānāṃ brahmaprāptiphalaṃ kāmyānāṃ tu yathāśrutam eva tad apy apramāṇam sarvasyāsyārthavādatvāt 
antareṇa ca phalaṃ nityeṣv anuṣṭhānasiddheḥ pratipāditatvāt 
tad uktam kāmātmatā na praśastā iti 
prāṅ nābhivardhanāt puṃso jātakarma vidhīyate 
mantravat prāśanaṃ cāsya hiraṇyamadhusarpiṣām 
vardhanaṃ chedanam 
jātakarmeti karmanāmadheyam etat 
rūpaṃ cāsya gṛhyasmṛtibhyo jñātavyam 
kasya punaḥ karmaṇo jātakarmeti nāma 
tadartham uktaṃ prāśanaṃ hiraṇyamadhusarpiṣām 
asya iti dārakaṃ vyapadiśanti karma vā asya jātakarmaṇa idaṃ pradhānaṃ yan mantravat prāśanam iti 
samantrakaṃ mantreṇa kartavyam ity arthaḥ 
mantrasya cehānuktatvāt smṛtīnāṃ caikārthyād yad anyatroktaṃ tad atrāpi pratīyate 
tena gṛhyasmṛtiṣu ye mantrā upāttās tair mantravad iti draṣṭavyam 
yadi gṛhyasmṛtayo 'pekṣante dravyanirdeśo 'pi na kartavyaḥ 
evaṃ hi tatra paṭhyate sarpirmadhunī hiraṇyanikāṣaṃ hiraṇyena prāśayet pra te dadāmi madhuno ghṛtasya iti 
kiṃ ca bahvyo gṛhyasmṛtayaḥ bhinnāś ca pratigṛhyamantrāḥ anyāpi bhinnetikartavyatā tatra kāśrīyatām iti na vidmaḥ 
atha caraṇasamākhyā niyāmikā bhaviṣyati vyarthas tarhi jātakarmādyupadeśas tata eva siddheḥ 
kaṭhānāṃ gṛhyaṃ bahvṛcāṃ āśvalāyanānāṃ ca gṛhyam iti yad yena samākhyāyate sa tad uktam anuṣṭhāsyatīti 
ucyate 
dravyādinirdeśena suspaṣṭaṃ karmaikatvam iti pratīyate 
tathā hi pratyabijñāsiddhiḥ 
tad dravyam evedaṃ tannāmadheyakaṃ cedaṃ karmātas tad evedam iti bhūyasā dṛṣṭaṃ tadguṇayogena pratyabhijñāyate 
sati caikatve yad aṅgajātaṃ kvacin noktaṃ tad aviruddham anyata ānetavyam 
yathā sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karma evaṃ sarvasmṛtipratyayam api 
yat tu bahutvād gṛhyasmṛtīnāṃ kāśrīyatām ity anadhyavasāyaḥ 
sarvāsāṃ prāmāṇyāviśeṣād ekārthānāṃ ca vikalpaḥ bhinnārthānāṃ samuccayaḥ 
caraṇasamākhyā tu naiva niyāmikā 
yato na samākhyayā puruṣasya niyataḥ saṃbandhaḥ gotrapravaravat 
yaiva śākhā yenādhītā sa eva tathā samākhyāyate kaṭho bahvṛcaḥ iti 
na cādhyayane niyamo 'sty aneneyaṃ śakhādhyetavyeti 
anekaśākhādhyayanam apy asti vedān adhītya iti 
tatra trivedādhyāyinaḥ sarve vyapadeśāḥ pravartante 
ke 'py ūcuḥ kauthumāḥ kaṭhā bahvṛca iti tatrāvaśyaṃ vikalpa āstheyaḥ 
ekaśākhādhyāyinas tu yad gṛhyaṃ yayā śākhayā samākhyāyate taduktam eva tasya yuktaṃ kartum 
eṣa hi taduktam eva śaknoti kartuṃ tacchākāmantrā eva tenādhītāḥ śaknoti tān prayoktum 
tam eva vā vṛtaṃ veda 
vedane ca karmānuṣṭhānārthaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ yena tāvato mantrān karmopayogino 'dhyeṣyata iti 
ucyate 
svādhyāyavidhivaśena vedādhyayanam 
anadhītavedasya nādhikāraḥ 
na ca karmaprayuktam adhyayanam 
ata iyaṃ samākhyā mantraviśeṣaviniyoganimittaiva kaṭhānāṃ gṛhyam vājasaneyināṃ gṛhyam iti 
yasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ ye mantrā adhītās te yatra bāhulyena viniyuktās tadgṛhyaṃ tathā samākhyāyate 
pramāṇaṃ gṛhyasmṛtiḥ 
sā kaṭhānām iyam iti vyapadiśyamānā bahvṛcānām api svārthāvagamanaṃ karoty eva 
kartavyatā vedasya svārthe smṛtīnāṃ ca 
avagatāyāṃ ca kartavyatāyāṃ kartṛviśeṣāśravaṇe svādhikāro na syād yathā ca tanūnapāti prayāje vasiṣṭhānām niṣedhād vā patitam 
na ceha dvayam apy asti 
na ca śakyaṃ kalpayituṃ na hi kaṭhānāṃ bāhvṛcyaṃ na pramāṇam bahvṛcānāṃ vā kāṭhakam yato ya eva katḥaḥ sa evākatho 'sati tacchākādhyayane 
gotraṃ tu niyatam ity asamānaḥ 
eṣa evārthaḥ svasūtraṃ yaḥ parityajya parasūtreṇa vartate iti 
tad eva sa yad adhīte tadarthaḥ śakyo 'nuṣṭhātum 
tena yaḥ svādhītāṃ śākhām atikramya pitrādyadhītaśākhayā karmāṇi kuryāt tadgṛhyaṃ ca samāśrayet tasya śākhātyāgadoṣaḥ 
pitrādīnāṃ vā śākhātyāgaḥ yair māṇavakaḥ kramādhītāṃ śākhāṃ nādhyāpitaḥ 
mānavakasyātra doṣo nāsti 
yadā mṛtapitṛko jābālavad ayaṃ bālaḥ svayam ācāryam āśrayet tadā yenāsya pitaro yātāḥ ity anena śāstreṇa saivādhyatuṃ yuktā syāt 
athātmaśākhādhyayanaṃ na saṃbhavati tadā svaśākhātyāgaḥ 
ataḥ sthitam idam 
sarvaṃ sarvāsu smṛtiṣu jātakarmādy upadiśyate 
tatra bhinnārtham aṅgajātaṃ smuccīyate viruddhaṃ vikalpyate samānārthaṃ ca ca 
puṃsa iti strīnapuṃsakavyāvṛttyartham 
anye tv avivakṣitaṃ pumarthaṃ manyante dvijanmanām iti sāmānyena traivarṇikānāṃ saṃskāryatvena prakṛtatvāt 
saṃskāryaś ca pradhānam uddeśo na ca pradhāne liṅgasaṃkhyādiviśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣyate 
grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi iti saty apy ekavacane sarve grahāḥ saṃmṛjyante 
jvaritaṃ jvaram uktaṃ ca dinānte bhojayen naram 
iti nāryā api jvaritāyā eṣa eva bhojanakālaḥ 
tathā ca prāptapratiṣedhaḥ 
strīṇāṃ amantrikā tu kāryeyaṃ strīṇām āvṛt iti 
napuṃsakānāṃ ca pāṇigrahaṇadarśanaṃ yady arthitā tu dāraiḥ syāt klībādīnām iti 
tatrocyate 
nāyaṃ puṃśabdo manuṣyajātivacano naraśabdavad yena vibhaktivācyaṃ liṅgaṃ na vivakṣyeta 
eṣa hi sarvatra sthāvaramūrtāmūrtagataṃ liṅgaviśeṣaṃ prasavarūpam ācaṣṭe 
prātipadikārtho hy atra liṅgam 
vibhaktivācyasya hy arthasya vivakṣāvivakṣe yujyete 
yato na vibhakter vacanam evaikaṃ prayojanam karmādyarthāntarābhidhānenāpy arthavattvāt 
iha tv avivakṣāyām ānarthakyam eva prāpnoti puṃśpadasya 
yathā tatraiva grahaprātipadikārtho vivakṣyate vākyānarthakyaparihārāya 
athocyeta na pratyayārthamātrasya vivakṣā 
kṛtsno 'pi padārtha uddiśyamānaviśeṣaṇaṃ na vivakṣyate 
yathā yasyobhayaṃ haviḥ iti saty apy ubhayapadaśravaṇe dadhipayasor anyatarāvṛttāv api tad eva prāyaścittaṃ 
na vivakṣita ubhayaśabdaḥ 
atra kecit parihāram āhuḥ 
naitat tena samānam 
na hi havirarthaḥ pañcaśarāvaḥ 
havirvināśe hi naimittiko 'dhikāraḥ 
iha tu māṇavakārthā eva saṃskārāḥ 
eṣa tv aproyojako viśeṣaḥ 
vākyabhedabhayād viśeṣaṇavivakṣā neṣyate 
tādarthye 'pi vākyabhedo naivāpaiti 
tasmād ayaṃ parihāraḥ 
etad evotpattivākyaṃ jātakarmaṇaḥ 
vaidikaiḥ karmabhiḥ ity etad upakramam 
tatra pumān eva saṃskāryatayā nirdiṣṭaḥ 
tadavivakṣāyāṃ vākyānarthakyam yathā tatraiva haviḥpadaṃ vivakṣyate 
yady evaṃ śūdrasyāpi prāptiṃ jativiśeṣānirdeśāt 
na prāpsyati mantrasādhyatvāt 
atha vā dvijanmanām iti vākyaśeṣako bhaviṣyati 
na ca tadānīṃ vidheyārthaviṣayatvena nirdiṣṭo yena tata eva saṃskāryāvagatau puṃsa ity etad ubhayapadavad avivakṣitam āśaṅkyeta 
strīṇāṃ tv aprāpte 'pi vidhānam upapadyate 
klībasyāpi dāradarśanam 
vātaretā yaḥ kḷiba ubhayavyañjano 'pravṛttendriyo vā 
bahuprakāravyāvṛttikaraṃ jātakarmādisaṃskārakāle 'paricchedyatvāc chakyapratīkāratvāc ca 
na ca yo na niyato dharmaḥ so 'dhikāraṃ vyāvartayati yathādravyatvam na hy adravyatvaṃ niyataṃ jātivat 
ya evādravyaḥ so 'pi dravyavān bhavati 
ciram adhano bhūtvā bhavaty ahnā mahādhanaḥ 
īdṛśasyaiva ṣaṇḍhasya vadhe palālabhārakaśuddhiḥ 
sa hy asaṃskṛto 'nupanītaḥ śāntyai na kasyacit tiṣṭhati 
ataḥ sthitaṃ puṃśām evaite saṃskārā ebhir vidhīyante 
vidhyantareṇa strīṇām amantrakāḥ 
napuṃsakasya naiva santīti 
nāmadheyaṃ daśamyāṃ tu dvādaśyāṃ vāsya kārayet 
puṇye tithau muhūrte vā nakṣatre vā guṇānvite 
daśamyāṃ tithau dvādaśyāṃ vasya dārakasya nāmadheyaṃ kurvīta 
ṇijartho na vivakṣitaḥ 
tathā ca gṛhyam daśamyām utthāpya pitā nāma karoti iti 
nāmaiva nāmadheyam 
yena śabdena kāryeṣv āhūyate tan nāma 
prāṅ nābhivardhanāt iti jātakarmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāj janmanaḥ prabhṛti daśamīdvādaśyau gṛhyete na candratithī 
iha kecid daśamīgrahaṇam āśaucanivṛttir ity upalakṣaṇārthaṃ varṇayanti 
atītāyām iti cādhyāhāraḥ daśamyām atītāyāṃ brāhmaṇasya dvādaśyāṃ kṣatriyasya pañcadaśyāṃ vaiśyasyeti 
tad ayuktaṃ 
lakṣaṇāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāj jātakarmavad āśauce 'pi kariṣyate 
yadi tu brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ vihitaṃ kvacit tadā yuktā lakṣaṇā 
yadi daśamīdvādaśyau vakṣyamāṇaguṇayukte bhavataḥ tadā tayoḥ kartavyam 
atha na tadānyasminn api puṇye 'hani 
puṇyāny ahāni dvitīyāpañcamyādīni 
puṇyaṃ praśastam navamīcaturdaśyādayo riktās tithayaḥ apuṇyāḥ 
muhūrto lagnaṃ kumbhādi 
tasmin puṇye pāpagrahair anadhiṣṭhite gurubhyāṃ ca dṛśyamāne 
lagnaśuddhir jyotiṣād avagamyate 
nakṣatre ca guṇayukte 
nakṣatraṃ śraviṣṭhādi tad yasminn ahani guṇayuktaṃ bhavati 
nakṣatraguṇāś ca krūragrahapāpagrahaviṣṭivyatīpātavivarjitam 
vāśabdaḥ samuccaye 
tena praśastāyāṃ tithau nakṣatre ca śuddhe lagna ity upadiṣṭaṃ bhavati 
samuccayaś ca jyotiṣāvagamyaḥ 
ayaṃ ca paramārthaḥ 
daśamīdvādhaśamībhyām arvāṅ na kartavyam 
uttarakālaṃ ca yad ahar nakṣatraṃ lagnaṃ pariśuddhaṃ tad ahar eva kartavyam 
idānīṃ yādṛśaṃ nāma kartavyaṃ tan niyamayati svarūpato 'rthataś ca 
maṅgalyaṃ brāhmaṇasya syāt kṣatriyasya balānvitam 
vaiśyasya dhanasaṃyuktaṃ śūdrasya tu jugupsitam 
tatra svarūpam avadhārayiṣyann āha 
maṅgalāya hitaṃ tatra vā sādhu māṅgalyam iti vyutpattiḥ 
abhimatasyārthasya cirajīvitvabahudhanāder dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasukhaphalasya siddhiḥ maṅgalam 
tadabhidhānam eva śabdasya hitatvaṃ sādhutvaṃ ceti taddhitasiddhiḥ 
sādhutvaṃ nābhipretārthasiddhipratipādanam eva vivakṣitam 
kiṃ tarhi ya āśāsyate tadvacanenaiva siddhiḥ 
samāsād āyuḥsiddhiḥ dhanasiddhiḥ putralābha ityādeḥ pratīyate 
taddhitād vā hitanimittaprayojanārthīyāt 
tatra gṛhye taddhitāntaṃ pratiṣiddham kṛtaṃ kuryān na taddhitam iti 
samāse 'pi padadvayaikārthībhāvas tatra bahvakṣaraprayogaprasaṅgāḥ 
yato vakṣyati śarmavad brāhmaṇasya ity upapadaniyamam 
tatra caturakṣare tryakṣare vā nāmni śarmaśabde copapade pañcākṣaraṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṃ nāma bhavati 
tac ca pratiṣiddham dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā kuryāt iti 
tena yad yat kiṃcit prāyeṇa sarvasyābhilaṣaṇīyam agarhitaṃ putrapaśugrāmakanyādhanādi tadvacanāḥ śabdā nāmadheyatvena viniyoktvyāḥ śarmāntāḥ 
tena gośarmā dhanaśarmā hiraṇyaśarmā kalyāṇaśarmā maṅgalyaśarmetyādiśabdaparigrahaḥ siddho bhavati 
atha vā maṅgalaṃ dharmas tatsādhanaṃ maṅgalyaṃ nāma 
katamat punar dharmasādhanaṃ nāma 
ya ete devatāśabdāḥ indro 'gnir vāyuḥ 
tathā ṛṣiśabdāḥ 
vasiṣṭho viśvāmitro medhātithiḥ 
teṣām api dharmasādhanam asti 
ṛṣīṃs tarpayet puṇyakṛto manasā dhyāyed iti 
devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca dvijānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām 
prātaḥ prabuddhaḥ śrīkāmo naro nāmāni kīrtayet  iti 
maṅgalyagrahaṇāc ca yad apraśastaṃ yamo mṛtyur ityādi tan nirasyate yac cānarthakaṃ ḍitthādi yadṛcchānimittam 
kṣatriyasya balānvitam 
balasaṃyuktaṃ balavāci 
anvayaḥ saṃbandhah 
śabdasyārthena saṃbandhaḥ pratipādakabhāva eva 
sāmarthyaṃ balaṃ tad yena yena pratipādyate tādṛśaṃ nāma kṣatriyasya kartavyam 
śatruṃtapaḥ duryodhanaḥ prajāpāla ityādi 
yena vibhāgena ca nāmanirdeśo jāticihnam 
evaṃ vaiśyasya dhanasaṃyuktam 
na cātra paryāyā eva gṛhyante dhanaṃ vittaṃ svāpateyam iti 
kiṃ tarhi yena prakāreṇa pratipattiḥ 
yadi vā dhanādiśabdaprayogād arthasaṃbandhād vā dhanakarmā mahādhanaḥ gomān dhānyagraha iti 
evaṃ sarvatra draṣṭavyam 
tathā cānvitādiśabdaprayogo balānvitaṃ dhanasaṃyuktam iti 
itarathā evam evāvakṣyad balanāmāni kuryāt iti 
svalpatvād balādyarthavācinām ānantyāc ca puruṣavyaktīnāṃ duravadhāne bhede vyavahāroccheda eva syāt 
śūdrasya jugupsitam 
kṛpaṇako dīnaḥ śabaraka ityādi 
śarmavad brāhmaṇasya syād rājño rakṣāsamanvitam 
vaiśyasya puṣṭisaṃyuktaṃ śūdrasya preṣyasaṃyutam 
atra svarūpagrahaṇaṃ pāṭhānukramaś cādau maṅgalyam ante śarmaśabdaḥ 
tathā codāhṛtam 
kṣatriyādināmnāṃ tu naitat saṃbhavati rakṣāśabdasya strīliṅgasya śravaṇāt puṃsāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteḥ 
tasmād ekopakramatvāt samācārāc ca sarvatrārthagrahaṇaṃ 
vākyabhedāc ca samuccayaḥ 
yan maṅgalyaṃ tac charmārthavat 
śarma śaraṇam āśrayaḥ sukhaṃ ca 
arthagrahaṇāt svāmidattabhabhūtyādiśabdaparigrahaḥ 
indrasvāmīndrāśrayaḥ indradattaḥ 
tadāśrayatā pratīyate 
evaṃ sarvatronneyam 
atha ko 'yaṃ hetur vākyabhedāt samuccaya iti 
vrīhibhir yajeta yavair yajeta iti kiṃ na samuccaya iti 
ucyate 
liṅgadarśanamātram etat pauruṣeyatvāt granthasya 
vikalpe 'bhiprete maṅgalyaṃ śarmavad veti lāghavād avakṣyat 
vākyabhede hi dvirākhyātoccāraṇam 
tad guru bhavati 
rakṣā paripālanam puṣṭir vṛddhir guptiś ca 
govṛddho dhanagupta iti 
preṣyo dāsaḥ 
brāhmaṇadāso devadāso brāhmaṇāśrito devatāśrita iti 
strīṇāṃ sukhodyam akrūraṃ vispaṣṭārthaṃ manoharam 
maṅgalyaṃ dīrghavarṇāntam āśīrvādābhidhānavat 
puṃsa ity adhikṛtatvāt strīṇām aprāptau niyamyate 
sukhenodyate sukhodyam 
strībālair api yat sukhenoccārayituṃ śakyate tat strīṇāṃ nāma kartavyam 
bāhulyena strīṇāṃ strībhir bālaiś ca vyavahāras teṣāṃ ca svakaraṇasauṣṭavābhāvān na sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ śabdam uccārayituṃ śaktir asti 
ato viśeṣeṇopadiśyate 
na tu puṃsām asukhodyam abhyanujñāyate 
udāharaṇaṃ maṅgaladevī cārudatī suvanadetyādi 
pratyudāharaṇaṃ śarmiṣṭhā suśliṣṭāṅgīti 
akrūram akrūrārthavāci 
krūrārthavāci krūrārthaṃ ḍākinī paruṣeti 
vispaṣṭārthaṃ yasyārtho vyākhyānagamyo na bhavati śruta eva viduṣām aviduṣāṃ vārthapratītiṃ karoti 
avispaṣṭārthaṃ yathā kāmanidhā kārīṣagandhyeti 
kāmasya nidheva nidhā tayā kāmas tatraiva tiṣṭhatīti 
evaṃ yāvan na vyākhyātaṃ tāvan nāvagamyate 
evaṃ kārīṣagandher duhitā kārīṣagandhyeti vyākhyānam apakṣyate 
manoharaṃ cittāhlādakaram āśreyasī 
viparītaṃ tu kālākṣī 
śarmavatī rudravatīti maṅgalyam 
viparītam abhāgā madabhāgeti 
dīrgho varṇo 'nte yasya 
viparītam śarat 
āśiṣaṃ vadatīty āśīrvādam 
abhidhānaṃ śabdaḥ 
tayor viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ 
tad yasminn asti vidyate tad āśīrvādābhidhānavat saputrā bahuputrā kulavāhiketi 
ete hy arthā āśīrviṣayā 
vaparītā apraśastā alakṣaṇeti 
atha maṅgalyasyāśīrvādasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ 
na kaścit 
vṛttapūrṇārthaṃ tu bhedenopādānam 
caturthe māsi kartavyaṃ śiśor niṣkramaṇaṃ gṛhāt 
ṣaṣṭhe 'nnaprāśanaṃ māsi yad veṣṭaṃ maṅgalaṃ kule 
janmacaturthamāse gṛhād bahir niṣkramaṇam ādityadarśanaṃ śiśor bālasya kartavyam 
trīn māsān garbhagṛha eva vāsayet 
śiśugrahaṇaṃ śūdrasyāpi prāptyartham 
evaṃ ṣaṣṭhe māśy apy annaprāśanam 
pañcamāsān kṣīrāhāra eva 
yad vā kule dārakasya sreyasyaṃ maṅgalyaṃ pūtanā śakunikaikavṛkṣopahārādi prasiddham 
kālaviśeṣe vā tat kartavyam 
ayaṃ ca saṃskāraśeṣaḥ 
tena nāmadheyam uktalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāpi yathākuladharmaṃ labhyate 
indrasvāmī indraśarmā indrabhūmiḥ indraghoṣa indrarāta indraviṣṇuḥ indradeva indrajyotiḥ indrayaśā ityādi kulabhedenopapannaṃ bhavati 
cūḍākarma dvijātīnāṃ sarveṣām eva dharmataḥ 
prathame 'bde tṛtīye vā kartavyaṃ śruticodanāt 
cūḍā śikhā 
tadarthaṃ karma cūḍākarma 
keṣucin mūrddhadeśeṣu keśānāṃ sthāpanāṃ racanāviśeṣaś caitac cūḍākarmocyate 
prathamavarṣe tṛtīye vā 
grahasausthityā vikalpaḥ 
śrutinodanād ity anuvādas tanmūlatayaiva prāmāṇyasyoktatvāt 
atha vā śrutiśabdena na vidhāyakāny eva vākyāny ucyante 
kiṃ tarhi mantrāḥ 
te ca cūḍākarma yāñ janāḥ itivad adṛṣṭaṃ prakāśayanti yat kṣureṇa mārjayeta ityādi tena samantrakam etat karmety uktaṃ bhavati 
viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ gārhyo vidhir aṅgīkriyate 
ataḥ śūdrasya nāyaṃ saṃskāraḥ dvijātigrahaṇāc ca 
aniyatakālaṃ tu keśavapanaṃ śūdrasyārthaprāptaṃ na nivāryate 
garbhāṣṭame 'bde kurvīta brāhmaṇasyaupanāyanam 
garbhād ekādaśe rājño garbhāt tu dvādaśe viśaḥ 
garbhasthasya yaḥ saṃvatsaras tata ārabhyate yo 'ṣṭamo 'bdaḥ 
garbhaśabdena sāhacaryāt saṃvatsaro lakṣyate 
na hi mukhyayā vṛttyā garbhasya saṃvatsaro 'ṣṭama iti vyapadeśaṃ labhate 
tasminn aupanāyanaṃ brāhmaṇasya kurvīta 
upanayanam evaupanāyanaṃ svārthiko 'ṇ 
anyeṣām api dṛśyate ity uttarpadasya dīrghaḥ 
chāndasatvād vobhayapadavṛddhiḥ 
upanayanam iti hi eṣa saṃskāro vedavidāṃ gṛhyasmṛtiṣu prasiddho māujñībandhanāparaparyāyaḥ 
upanīyate samīpaṃ prāpyate yenācāryasya svādhyāyādhyayanārthaṃ kuḍyaṃ kaṭaṃ vā kartuṃ tad upanayanam 
viśiṣṭasya saṃskārakarmaṇo nāmadheyam etat 
garbhād ekādaśe rājñaḥ 
garbhāt prabhṛti garbhād vā paro ya ekādaśo 'bdas tatra kṣatriyasya kartavyam 
rājaśabdo 'yaṃ kṣatriyajātivacano nābhiṣekādiguṇayogam apekṣate grantheṣu tathā prayogadarśanāt brāhmaṇādijātiśabdasāhacaryāc ca 
guṇavidhiṣu ca kṣatriyaśabdadarśanāt kṣatriyasya tu maurvī iti 
yas tu rājaśabdasya kṣatriyād anyatra janapadeśvare vaiśyādau prayogaḥ sa gauṇa iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
mukhye cāsati gauṇasya grahaṇam 
tathā ca gṛhyakāraḥ aṣṭame varṣe brāhmaṇam upanayed ekādaśe kṣatriyaṃ dvādaśe vaiśyam iti 
bhagavāṃś ca pāṇiniḥ evam eva pratipanno rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti rājyaśabdasya rājaśabdaṃ prati prakṛtitvaṃ bruvann eva janapadaiśvaryeṇa rājaśabdārthaprasiddhim āha 
evaṃ garbhāt tu dvādaśe 'bde viśaḥ vaiśyasya 
brahmavarcasakāmasya kāryaṃ viprasya pañcame 
rājño balārthinaḥ ṣaṣṭhe vaiśyasyehārthino 'ṣṭame 
pitṛdharmeṇāpatyaṃ vyādiśati brahmavarcasī me putraḥ syāt iti pitṛkāmanayā putro vyapadiṣṭas tatkāmasyeti 
putrasya bālatvān naivaṃvidhā kāmanā saṃbhavati 
nanu caivam anyakṛtāt karmaṇa anyasya phale 'bhyupagamyamāne 'kṛtābhyāgamadoṣāpattiḥ 
akāmyamānaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavaty etad apy utkrāntaśabdapramāṇanyāyamaryādayocyate 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
syenavad etad bhaviṣyati 
śyenam abhicaran karoty abhicaryamāṇaś ca mriyate 
athocyate kāmina evaitat phalam 
śatrumaraṇaṃ hi yajamānaḥ kāmayate 
tad eva prāpnotīti nākartṛgāmitā phalasya 
atrāpi viśiṣṭaputravattālakṣaṇam upanetur eva phalam 
yathā putrasyārogyeṇa pituḥ prītiḥ evaṃ brahmavarcasenāpy ato 'dhikṛtasya kartuś ca tatphalam anvayānusārī hi śāstrārthāvasāyaḥ 
iha ca putrasya phalakāmenaivaṃ kartavyam ity anvayaḥ pratīyate 
na ca yathāśrutānvayatyāge kiṃcana pramāṇam asti 
etena pitur aurdhavdehikaḥ putrakṛta upakāro vyākhyātaḥ 
tatrāpi hi putraḥ kartā pitṛtṛptiś ca phalam 
tathā ca liṅgaṃ atmā vai putranāmāsi iti 
pitraiva hi tāvac chrāddham ātmasaṃpradānakaṃ vastutaḥ kṛtam eva yenāpatyotpādanam evamartham eva kṛtam 
yathā sarvasvāre mṛtasyārbhakāvamānāt ye parāñcaḥ padārthās teṣv api yajamānasyaiva kartṛtvam 
brāhmaṇāh saṃsthāpayata yajñam it praiṣeṇa dakṣiṇābhir varaṇena vā prayogasamāptāv ṛtvijāṃ viniyoktṛtvāt evam ihāpi tādarthyena putrasyotpādanāt yac chrāddhādikaṃ pitrarthaṃ kriyate pitraiva tatkṛtaṃ bhavati 
adhyayanavijñānasaṃpannaṃ brahmavarcasam 
balaṃ sāmarthyam ābhyantaraṃ brāhmaṃ ca 
utsāhaśaktir mahāprāṇatā cety etad ābhyantaram bāhyaṃ ca hastyaśvarathapadātikośasaṃpat 
tad uktam svāṅgābhyuccayaṃ sāṃyaugikānāṃ cārthānām iti 
īhā ceṣṭā 
bahunā dhanena kṛṣivāṇijyādivyavahāraḥ 
sarvatra garbhādisaṃkhyā ca varṣāṇām garbhād iti hy anuvartate 
ā ṣḍaśād brāhmaṇasya sāvitrī nātivartate 
ā dvāviṃśāt kṣatrabandhor ā caturviṃśater viśaḥ 
evaṃ tāvan mukhyakāmyāv upanayanakālāv uktau 
idānīṃ pitur abhāve vyādhyādinā vā kathaṃcid anupanīte māṇavake kālātipattāv anupaneyatā prāptā saty api kālasyāṅgatve tadabhāve 'dhikāranivṛtteḥ yathā sāyaṃprātaḥkālātipattāv agnihotrasyākaraṇe 
ato vihitakālavyatirekeṇa pratiprasavārtham idam ārabhyate 
yāvat ṣḍaśaṃ varṣaṃ garbhād ārabhya tāvad brāhmaṇasyopanayanarhatā na nivartate 
sāvitrīśabdena tadanuvacanasādhanam upanayanākhyaṃ karma lakṣyate 
nātivartate nātikrāntakālaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ 
evam ā dvāviṃśāt kṣatrabandhoḥ kṣatriyajātīyasyety arthaḥ 
bandhuśabdo 'yaṃ kvacit kutsāyāṃ pravartate 
yat svaṃ kathaṃ vetsa brahmabandha iti 
jñātivacanaḥ yathā
grāmatā janatā caiva bandhutā ca sahāyatā 
mahendrasyāpy agamyāsau bhūmibhāgabhujāṃ kutaḥ 
dravyavacano jātyantāccha bandhuni iti 
tatra pūrvayor arthayor asaṃbhavāt tṛtīyo 'rtho gṛhyate 
dvāviṃśateḥ pūraṇo dvāviṃśo 'bdaḥ taddhitārthaḥ 
ā caturviṃśater viśaḥ 
prāpto 'py atra pūraṇapratyayo vṛttānurodhān na kṛtaḥ pratīyate tu tadarthaḥ 
na hi sumudāyaviṣayāyāś caturviṃśatisaṃkhyāyā avadhitvena saṃbhavaḥ 
tadavayavas tu caturviṃśo bhavati saṃvatsaro 'vadhiḥ 
āṅam abhividhau vyācakṣate 
liṅgadarśanaṃ codāharanti 
gāyatryā brāhmaṇam upanayīta triṣṭubhā rājanyam jagatyā vaiśyam iti 
eteṣāṃ ca chaṃdasām iyatā kālena dvau pādau pūryete 
tāvantaṃ kālaṃ balavanti na tyajanti svāśrayabhūtān varṇān 
tṛtīye tu pāde 'pakrānte gatarasāny ativayāṃsi nyūnasāmarthyāni bhavanti samāptim upayānti 
yathā pañcaśatā sthaviro manuṣyaḥ iti 
ataś ca naitena vayam upāsitānīti tyajanti taṃ varṇam 
tato na gāyatro brāhmaṇo na traiṣṭubho rājanyo na jāgato vaiśyaḥ iti 
savitā devatā yasyā ṛcaḥ sā savitrīḥ sā ca gāyatrī draṣṭavyā pradarśitā gṛhyāc ca 
evaṃ kṣatriyasya triṣṭup sāvitrī ākṛṣṇena iti 
vaiśyasya jagatī viśvā rūpāṇi iti 
ata ūrdhvaṃ trayo 'py ete yathākālaṃ asaṃskṛtāḥ 
sāvitrīpatitā vrātyā bhavanty āryavigharhitāḥ 
asmāt kālād ūrdhvaṃ pareṇa trayo 'py ete varṇāḥ brāhmaṇādayo yathākālaṃ yasyopanayanakālaḥ tatrānukalpike 'py asaṃskṛtā akṛtopanayanāḥ sāvitrīpatitā upanayanabhraṣṭā bhavanti 
vrātyāś ca saṃjñayā 
āryaiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ vigarhitāḥ ninditāḥ 
vrātyasaṃjñāvyavahāraprasiddhyartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
anupaneyatvaṃ tu pūrveṇaiva siddham 
uktam āryair ninditaḥ iti 
kā punar eṣāṃ nindety āha 
naitair apūtair vidhivad āpady api hi karhicit 
brāḥmān yaunāṃś ca saṃbandhān nācared brāhmaṇaiḥ saha 
etair vrātyair apūtair akṛtaprāyaścittair vidhivad yādṛśo vidhiḥ prāyaścitte śāstreṇopadiṣṭaḥ tāṃś cārayitvā trīn kṛcchān ity āpady api hi karhicit kasyāṃcid apy āpadi na saṃbandhān ācaret kuryāt taiḥ saha 
kiṃ sarvasaṃbandhaniṣedhaḥ 
nety āha brāhmān yaunāṃś ca 
brahma vedaḥ 
tannimittāḥ saṃbandhā yājanādhyāpanapratigrahāḥ 
na te yājyāḥ na yājakāḥ kartavyāḥ 
evaṃ nādhyāpyā naitebhyo 'dhyetavyam 
vedārthaṃ viduṣaḥ pratigrahādhikārād eṣo 'pi brāhmasaṃbandho bhavati 
yaunaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kanyāyā dānādāne 
brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham 
asmāc ca doṣadarśanād vrātyatāparihārārthe pitur abhāve 'pi vyutpannabuddhinā māṇavakenāpy ātmanātmopanāyayitavya iti pratīyate 
kāmyo hy ayam ācāryasya vidhiḥ 
tatrācāryatvam akāmayamāno yadi kaścin na parvartate tadā māṇavakena prārthayitavyo dakṣiṇādinā 
tathā ca śrutiḥ satyakāmo jābālaḥ hāridrumataṃ gautamam iyāya brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vakṣyāmi iti svayam ācāryam abhyarthitavān upanayanārtham 
kārṣṇarauravabāstāni carmāṇi brahmacāriṇaḥ 
vasīrann ānupūrvyeṇa śāṇakṣaumāvikāni ca 
kṛṣṇaśabdo yady api kṛṣṇaguṇayuktavastumātre vartate kṛṣṇā gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kambalaḥ iti tathāpīha smṛtyantarād rauravasāhacaryāc ca mṛga eva pratīyate 
rurur mṛgajātiviśeṣaḥ 
bastaḥ chāgaḥ 
sarvatra vikāre 'vayave vā taddhitaḥ 
kṛṣṇājinaṃ brāhmaṇo rurucarma kṣatriyo vaiśyaś chāgacarma vasīrann ācchādayeyuḥ 
śaṇakṣumorṇās tatra kṛtāni ca vastrāṇi 
caśabdaḥ samuccaye 
tatrānuttarīyāṇi śāṇādīni 
carmāṇy uttarīyāny aucityāt kaupīnācchādanāni ca vastrāṇy 
ānupūrvyeṇa naikaikasya sarvair abhisaṃbandho nāpi vyutkrameṇa 
prathamasya brahmacāriṇaḥ prathamena carmaṇā vastreṇa ca saṃbandho dvitīyasya dvitīyasthānasthena 
tathā ca darśitam 
nanu cāntareṇāpi vacanaṃ lokata evaitat siddham cūrṇitākṣiptadagdhānāṃ vajrānilahutāśanaiḥ iti yathākramaṃ saṃbandhapratipattiḥ cūrṇitā vajreṇākṣiptāḥ anilena dagdhā agnineti 
ucyate 
bhaved etad evaṃ yadi bhedena nirdeśaḥ syāt samasaṃkhyātvaṃ ca 
iha tu brahmacāriṇa ity ekaśabdopādānān na kramo 'vagamyate 
trayaś ca brahmacāriṇaḥ 
ṣaḍ anudeśinaḥ trīṇi carmāṇi trīṇi vastrāṇi 
ānupūrvyagrahaṇe tu sati vākyāntaropāttaḥ krama āśrīyate 
tathā ca carmabhiḥ saṃbadhya punar brahmacāripadam āvartya vāsobhiḥ saṃbadhyate 
tataḥ saṃkhyāsāmyasiddhiḥ 
īdṛśa eva viṣaye bhagavatā pāṇininā yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām iti 
mauñjī trivṛt samā śalkṣṇā kāryā viprasya mekhalā 
kṣatriyasya tu maurvī jyā vaiśyasya śaṇatāntavī 
muñjas tṛṇajātis tadvikāro mauñjī 
sā brāhmaṇasya mekhalā raśanā kartavyā madhyabandhanī 
trivṛt triguṇā 
samā na kvacit sūkṣmā na kvacit sūkṣmatarā 
kiṃ tarhi sarvata eva samā 
ślakṣṇā tanutvaguṇayuktā parighṛṣṭā ca 
kṣatriyasya punar jyā dhanurguṇaḥ 
sā kadācic carmamayī bhavati kadācit tṛṇamayī bhaṅgomādirajjur vā 
tadartham āha maurvīti 
tayā dhanuṣo 'vatāritayā śroṇībandhaḥ kartavyaḥ 
yady api trivṛttādir guṇo mekhalāmātrāśrito mauñjyā eva tathāpi jyāyāḥ svarūpanāśaprasaṅgān na bhavati 
śaṇatantuvikāraḥ śaṇatāntavī 
chāndasatvād uttarapadavṛddhiḥ 
atha vā kevalāt tantuśabdāt taddhite kṛte tadantasya śaṇaiḥ saṃbandhaḥ śaṇānāṃ tāntavīti 
prakṛter vikāraḥ śaṇatāntavī prakṛtisaṃbandhitayā vyapadiśyate 
gavyaṃ ghṛtam devadattasya pautraḥ iti 
tantuḥ sūtraṃ śaṇamauñjīvat kartavyā 
gṛhyakārair vaiśyamekhalāyāḥ trivṛttādidharmaḥ suspaṣṭa evoktaḥ 
muñjālābhe tu kartavyāḥ kuśāśmantakabalvajaiḥ 
trivṛttā granthinaikena tribhiḥ pañcabhir eva vā 
ādiśabdalopam atra smaranti 
muñjādyalābha iti 
kartavyā iti ca bahuvacanam upapannataram 
bhinnajātisaṃbandhitayā suvyakto mekhalābhedaḥ 
ekajātisaṃbandhitve tu kevalavyaktibhedālambanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ syāt 
viprasyeti ca prakṛtasya bahuvacanena pariṇāmaḥ kartavyaḥ 
vikalpaś caikaviṣayatve syāt 
na ca saṃbhavatyāṃ gatau vikalpo yuktaḥ 
tena muñjābhāve kauśī 
jyāyā abhāve 'śmantakena 
śāṇānāṃ balvajaiḥ tṛṇauṣadhivacanāt kuśādayaḥ 
pratinidhiniyamaś cāyam 
kuśādyabhāve 'py anyan muñjādisadṛśam upādeyam 
trivṛttā granthinaikena 
nāyaṃ granthisaṃkhyābhedo varṇabhedena 
api tu pratyekaṃ vikalpaḥ 
kuśādimekhalāsv apy ayaṃ granthibhedo dharmabhedaś codyamānaḥ smṛtyantarasamācārasyānityatve 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ 
kārpāsam upavītaṃ syād viprasyordhvavṛtaṃ trivṛt 
śaṇasūtramayaṃ rājño vaiśyasyāvikasautrikam 
upavītaśabdena vāso vinyāsaviśeṣa ucyate 
vakṣyati uddhṛte dakṣiṇe pāṇau iti 
tac ca dharmamātram 
tasya na kārpāsatā saṃbhavaty ato dharmeṇa dharmī lakṣyate yasyāsau vinyāsas tat kārpāsam ucyate 
arśa āditvād vā matvarthīyo 'kāraḥ kartavyaḥ upavītavad upavītam iti 
ūrdhvavṛttam ūrdhvāṃ diśaṃ diśaṃ prativartyate veṣṭyate 
trivṛt triguṇam 
kartanikābhyo labdhasūtrabhāvasya triguṇīkṛtasyedam ūrdhvanivartanaṃ vidhīyate 
saṃhatya tantutrayam ūrdhvaveṣṭanena rajjvākāraṃ kṛtvā tenopavītaṃ kuryāt 
sā ca rajjur ekaiva dhārayitavyā tisraḥ pañca sapta vā 
yajñasaṃbandhād dhi tad yajñopavītākhyāṃ labhate 
yajñārtho 'yam udyate iti bhaktyopacaryate 
tatreṣṭipaśusomānāṃ yajñarūpatayaikatvād ekatantukaṃ kriyate 
agnitrayasādhyatvād ahīnaikāhasatrabhedād vā tritantukam 
somasaṃsthānāṃ saptasaṅkhyatvāt sapta vā tantavaḥ 
trīṇi savanāni trisaṃdhyena iti pañca 
sūtrābhāve paṭādināpi kartavyam 
smṛtyantara evam uktam 
aviḥ meṣas tasya sūtraṃ tena kṛtaṃ āvikasūtrikam 
adhyātmāditvāṭ ṭhañ kartavyaḥ 
avikasūtrikam iti vā paṭhitavyam 
tatra ca matvarthīyena ṭhanā rūpasiddhiḥ 
brāhmaṇo bailvapālāśau kṣatriyo vāṭakhādirau 
pailavaudumbarau vaiśyo daṇḍān arhanti dharmataḥ 
saty api dvandvanirdeśe guṇavidhiṣv ekatvaśravaṇāt keśāntakaḥ iti pratigṛhyepsitaṃ daṇḍam iti ca vikalpitam ekadaṇḍadhāraṃ pratīyate 
bailvaḥ pālāśo brāhmaṇasya daṇḍaḥ iti gṛhye 
gautamīye caikadaṇḍagrahaṇam evoktam 
iha kevalā daṇḍasattā śrūyate daṇḍān arhanti 
daṇḍā ete brahmacāriṇāṃ yojyāḥ 
kasyāṃ kriyāyām ity etad atra coktam uttaratra bhaviṣyati pratigṛhyepsitam iti 
tasmiṃś ca grahaṇe daṇḍasyopāyatvād vivakṣitam ekatvam ata iha dvivacananirdeśaḥ 
devaś ced varṣed bahavaḥ kṛṣiṃ kuryur iti yathā prāptānuvādaḥ 
bilvapalāśavaṭakhadirapīlūdumbarā vṛkṣajātiviśeṣanāmadheyāni 
bilvasya vikāro 'vayavo vā bailvaḥ 
evaṃ sarvatra 
pradarśanārthāś caite 
yajñiyā vā sarveṣām iti vacanāt 
etān daṇḍān vakṣyamāṇe kārye arhanti 
dharmataḥ śāstrataḥ 
keśāntiko brāhmaṇasya daṇḍaḥ kāryaḥ pramāṇataḥ 
lalāṭasaṃmito rājñaḥ syāt tu nāsāntiko viśaḥ 
ākāraviśeṣavacano daṇḍaśabdaḥ 
dīrghaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ saṃmitāyāmaṃ daṇḍa ity ucyate 
kiyat tasya dairghyam ity apekṣāyām āha 
keśāntaṃ gacchati prāpnoti keśāntago mūrddhapramāṇaḥ 
pādāgrād ārabhya mūrddhāvadhiḥ keśāntagaḥ 
keśā vānto 'syeti keśāntakaḥ 
samāsāntaḥ kakāraḥ 
pramāṇataḥ pramāṇenānena yukto daṇḍaḥ kāryaḥ kārayitavyaḥ brāhmaṇasyācāryeṇa 
lalāṭasaṃmitaḥ lalāṭāntam itaḥ lalāṭantapramāṇaḥ 
lalāṭamātre caturaṅgulena mīyamānasya daṇḍaśabdavācyatvābhāvād evaṃ vyākhyāyate pādāgrād ārabhya yāval lalāṭāntaṃ prāptaḥ 
evaṃ viśo vaiśyasya nāsāntaga iti 
ṛjavas te tu sarve syur avraṇāḥ saumyadarśanāḥ 
anudvegakarā nṝṇāṃ satvaco 'nagnidūṣitāḥ 
ṛjavaḥ avakrāḥ 
sarve ity anuvādaḥ prakṛtatvāviśeṣāt 
avraṇā acchidrāḥ 
saumyaṃ priyakaraṃ darśanam eṣāṃ te saumyadarśanāḥ varṇapariśuddhāḥ akaṇṭakitāś ca 
anudvegakarāḥ 
naitaiḥ kaścid udvejayitavyaḥ svā vā manuṣyo vā 
nṛṇām iti pradarśanārtham 
satvaca ataṣṭāḥ 
anagnidūṣitāḥ vaidyutena dāvotthena vāspṛṣṭāḥ 
pratigṛhyepsitaṃ daṇḍam upasthāya ca bhāskaram 
pradakṣiṇaṃ parītyāgniṃ cared bhaikṣaṃ yathāvidhi 
prāvṛteṣu carmasu mekhalābandhanaṃ kartavyam 
ābadhya mekhalām upanayanaṃ kartavyam 
kṛte copavīte daṇḍagrahaṇam 
daṇḍaṃ gṛhītvā bhāskara āditya upastheyaḥ 
abhimukhaṃ sthitvādityadaivatair mantrair upasthānam ādityasya kartavyam 
gṛhyān mantrāvagamaḥ 
anyā cetikartavyatā tata eva 
yat sarvasādhāraṇaṃ tad ihocyate 
pradakṣiṇaṃ parītya sarvato gatvāgnim 
caret kuryāt 
bhaikṣam 
bhikṣāṇām samūho bhaikṣam 
tac cared yāceta 
yathāvidhīti vakṣyamāṇavidhyanuvādaḥ 
bhikṣāśabdena svalpaparimāṇaṃ bhaktādy ucyate 
bhavatpūrvaṃ cared bhaikṣam upanīto dvijottamaḥ 
bhavanmadhyaṃ tu rājanyo vaiśyas tu bhavaduttaram 
bhikṣāprārthanāvākyam atra bhaikṣaśabdenocyate 
tasya hi bhavacchabdapūrvatā saṃbhavati na bhaktāder arthasya 
strīṇāṃ ca prathamaṃ bhikṣyamāṇatayopadeśāt prārthanāyāṃ ca prārthyamānasya saṃbodhyatvāt saṃbuddhivibhaktyantaḥ strīliṅgo bhavacchabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ 
krama eva cātrādṛṣṭārtho niyamyate 
yathārthaṃ tu śabdaproyogo bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehi iti 
kutaḥ punaḥ saṃskṛtaśabdārthalābhaḥ yāvatā striyaḥ saṃbodhyante 
tāś ca saṃskṛtaṃ nāvabuddhyante 
nityam upanayanam 
tasya ca śabdoccāraṇam aṅgatvenoktam iti 
anityāś cāpabhraṃśāḥ 
na tair nityasya saṃyoga upapadyate 
tathaiva ca śiṣṭā asādhūn upaśrutyaikadeśasādṛśyena sādhūn saṃsmṛtyārthaṃ pratiyanty asādhur anumānena vācaka iti darśanena gāśabdo hi sādṛśyād gośabdam anumāpayati 
tato 'rthapratipatteḥ evaṃ striyaḥ sādṛśyāt sādhubhyaḥ asādhūn utpannasaṃbandhāt smṛtvā tebhyo 'rthaṃ pratyeṣyanti 
svalpākṣaraṃ caitat padatrayaṃ sarvatra prasiddhaṃ strībhir api sujñānam 
evaṃ bhavanmadhyaṃ kṣatriyaḥ bhikṣāṃ bhavati dehi iti 
tathā vaiśyo bhavacchabda uttaram asyeti bhavaduttaraṃ vākyaṃ samāsārthaḥ 
upanīta iti bhūtapratyayanirdeśād ānvahike 'pi vṛttyarthe bhaikṣyacaraṇe 'yam eva vidhir iti darśayati 
eṣa prokto hi dvijātīnām aupanāyanikaḥ ity atropanayanaprakaraṇam upasaṃharann upanayanāṅgasyāpi bhaikṣyasyāyam eva vidhir ity āha 
anyathākaraṇād upanayanāṅgam evaitat syād yadi vā bhūtapratyayasāmarthyāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vṛttyartha eva bhaikṣye 
upanīyamānasya tadaṅgaṃ yadbhaikṣaṃ yac cāhar ahar vṛttyarthaṃ tatra sarvatrāyaṃ dharmaḥ 
mātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vā mātur vā bhaginīṃ nijām 
bhikṣeta bhikṣāṃ prathamaṃ yā cainaṃ nāvamānayet 
mātrādayaḥ śabdāḥ prasiddhārthāḥ 
nijā sodaryā 
yā cainaṃ na vimānayet 
vimānanā avajñānam na dīyata iti pratyākhyānam 
tathā ca gṛhyam apratyākhyāyinam agre bhikṣetāpratyākhyāyinīṃ vā iti 
tad eva hi mukhyaṃ prāthamyaṃ yad upanīyamānasya 
ahar ahas tu na vimānanābhayam āśrayaṇīyam 
samāhṛtya tu tad bhakṣaṃ yāvad artham amāyayā 
nivedya gurave 'śnīyād ācamya prāṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ 
samāhṛtyeti śabdo bahvībhya āharaṇaṃ darśayati 
naikasyāḥ sakāśāt bahvyo grahītavyāḥ 
tad iti yasyānantaraṃ śabdasaṃnidhir vṛttyarthasya na prākaraṇikasyopanayanāṅgasya 
tasya hi gṛhyakāraiḥ anupravacanīyaṃ śrapayet iti vihitam na bhojanam 
tiṣṭhed ahaḥśeṣam iti ca kṛtaprātarāśasya copanayanam 
ato nopanayanāṅgaṃ bhaikṣabhojanam 
yāvadarthaṃ yāvatā baikṣyeṇa tṛptākhyaprayojananirvṛttiḥ 
na bahu bhikṣitavyam 
amāyayā niveda gurave na kadannena saṃskṛtam annaṃ pracchādya kadannaṃ guroḥ prakāśayet 
kadannaṃ kila eṣa na grahīṣyatīty anayā buddhyā 
nivedanam idaṃ prāptam iti prakaṭīkaraṇam 
agṛhīte guruṇā anujñāto aśnīyāt 
kathaṃ punar nivedanam adṛṣṭasaṃskārārtham eva na bhavati itihāsaprāmāṇyāt 
tathā ca bhagavān vyāsaḥ tritakūpākhyāne guruṇā gṛhītam iti darśitavān 
anujñāto bhuñjīta iti yat kvacic chrūyate 
ācamya prāṅmukhaḥ 
ācamane prāṅmukhateyam ānantaryād iti kecit 
tad ayuktam 
prāgudaṅmukhaḥ ity ācamane diṅniyamo bhaviṣyati 
tasmād bhojanenaiva saṃbandhaḥ 
śuciḥ 
cāṇḍālādidarśanam aśuci deśākramaniṣṭhīvanādi kṛtācamanasya bhojanakāle 'nena niṣidhyate 
āyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṅkte yaśasyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ 
śriyaṃ pratyaṅmukho bhuṅkte ṛtaṃ bhuṅkte hy udaṅmukhaḥ 
niṣkāmasya prāṅmukhasya bhojanaṃ vihitaṃ nityatayā 
idānīṃ kāmyā vidhaya ucyante 
āyuṣe hitaṃ āyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṅkta iti 
yadi tadbhojanād āyuḥ prāpyate tata āyuṣyaṃ tad bhavati tenāyam arthaḥ saṃpadyate āyuṣkāmaḥ prāṅmukho bhuñjīta 
adhikāradvayaṃ prācyām nityaṃ kāmyaṃ ca 
āyuṣkāmaḥ phalam abhisaṃdadhīta 
itaras tu na tatheti 
yathā nityam agnihotram svargakāmasya cāsakṛtprayogāt tantreṇa phalakāmasya nityo 'py adhikāro nirvartate 
evaṃ yaśaḥkāmo dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ 
ime kāmyā eva vidhayaḥ 
śriyam icchan 
śriyan kyajantācchatā kṛtaḥ 
śriyai hitaṃ vā śriyam iti makārāntaḥ pāṭhaḥ āyuṣyādivat 
prāṇyaṅgatvāt svārthe bhujir vartate 
tathā ṛtaṃ bhuṅkta iti 
śriyaṃ bhojanāt prāpnotīti 
tathā ca dvitīyāntaḥ pāṭhaḥ śriyam iti 
tādarthye vā caturthī śriyai pratyag iti 
ṛtaṃ satyaṃ yajñaś ca tatphalaṃ vā svargaḥ 
svargakāma udaṅmukho bhuñjīta 
antareṇāpi vidhipratyayam aprāptatvād vidhyarthāvagatiḥ pañcamalakārādikalpanayā 
evam etad digvibhāgena bhojanaṃ phalaviśeṣārtham 
vidigbhojanaṃ tv arthaprāptaṃ nityena prāṅmukhatāniyamenāpodyate 
ayaṃ ca kāmyo vidhir na brahmacāriṇa eva bhaikṣyabhojanaviṣayaḥ api tu gṛhasthādīnām api bhojanamātrāśritaḥ 
tathā cāśnīyād iti prakṛte bhuṅkta ity ākhyātāntaranirdeśo liṅgam 
itarathāśnīyād iti yato niḥsaṃdigdhā prakṛtaviṣayatā pratīyate tad eva niradaikṣyat 
bhuṅkta iti tu nirdeśe kiṃ prakṛta evārthaḥ śabdāntareṇa nirdiṣṭaḥ uta śabdārthatayā bhojanamātram iti saṃdehe ākhyātāvṛttāv arthāntarāvagatir na prakṛtapratyabhijñānam eva 
yat tu vidhipratyayābhāvād arthavāda evāyaṃ pūrvaśeṣa iti coktaḥ parihāraḥ vacanāni tv apūrvatvād iti 
na ca pūrvaikavākyatāhetur vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādir asti 
yady apy uttareṣāṃ caitad avarodhīty anenātideśena brahmacāridharmo 'pi puruṣamātraviṣayaḥ syāt phalaṃ tu na syāt 
guṇakāmanāyāṃ hi nātideśāt pravṛttim anumanyante 
godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya iti vikṛteṣu neṣyate kaiścit 
upaspṛśya dvijo nityam annam adyāt samāhitaḥ 
bhuktvā copaspṛśet samyag adbhiḥ khāni ca saṃspṛśet 
ācamanopaspṛśatiśabdau samānārthau śuddhyarthasaṃskāraviśeṣavacanau śiṣṭavyavahārād avagamyete 
yady upaspṛśatir arthāntare paṭhitaś camur apy adanamātre tathāpi viśeṣa eva sopasargayoḥ prayogadarśanāt tadarthataiva pratīyate 
spṛśeḥ sāmānyaviṣayatve 'pi prayogo niyāmakaḥ 
gaḍir vadanaikadeśe paṭhyate 
sa ca kapola eva gaṇḍa iti prayujyate naikadeśāntare 
puṣyasiddhyau nakṣatramātre paṭhyete viśeṣe ca vartete 
dhāyyāśabdaḥ sāmidhenīmātre paṭhyate āvāpikīṣu ca vartate 
ato 'pa evācamyety arthaḥ 
sa evopaspṛśyety asyāpi 
sa ca parastād vidhāyiṣyate 
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ cānayor dṛśyate nityakālam upaspṛśed ity abhidhāya trir ācāmed ity āha 
ataḥ samārārthaḥ 
ukte 'py ācamyeti bhojanārthatayācamane punarvacanam ānantaryārtham anantaram eva bhuñjīta na vyāpārāntareṇa vyavadadhīta 
tathā ca bhagavān vyāsaḥ
pañcārdrā bhuñjate nityaṃ teṣu vatsyāmy ahaṃ hare 
śrīḥ kilaivam āha 
dvau hastau dvau ca pādāv āsyaṃ ca eṣā pañcārdratā 
sā copasparśanāntaraṃ bhuñjānasya bhavati na vilambamānasya 
ihāpi vakṣyaty ārdrapādas tu bhuñjīta iti snātakavrateṣu 
tasyāpaunaruktyaṃ ca vakṣyāmaḥ 
nityagrahaṇaṃ prakaraṇād brahmacārībhojanadharmo mā vijñāyi bhojanamātradharmo yathā syād upadeśata eva 
atra dvijagrahaṇaṃ bhoktṛmātradharmārthaṃ cāhuḥ nityagrahaṇaṃ cānuvādam 
na te samyaṅ manyante 
yadi dvijaśabdaḥ prakṛte brahmacāriṇi na samāviśet tadā syād api 
yadā tu tasyāpy etad abhidhānaṃ tadā nāntareṇa nityagrahaṇaṃ prakaraṇabādhopalabhyate 
samāhitaḥ 
bhujyamānaṃ dravyaṃ svātmaśaktiṃ cāvekṣamāṇaḥ 
anyacetaskasya hi guruviruddhavidāhivarjanaṃ sātmyabhojanaṃ ca na syāt 
bhuktvā copaspṛśet 
snehādilepāpanayanaṃ dravyaśuddhāv uktam 
kṛte tasmin bhuktavata idam ācamanaṃ vidhīyate 
atra kecin manyante śuddhyartham ekam ācamanam suptvā kṣutvā ca bhuktvā ca iti anenādṛṣṭārthaṃ dvitīyaṃ kartavyam 
evaṃ ca paṭhyate ācāntaḥ punar ācāmet iti 
etat pañcame sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ 
samyag iti vaidhatām ācamanapadārthasyānuvadati 
yādṛśo vidhir uktas taṃ sarvam anutiṣṭhet 
adbhiḥ khāni ca saṃspṛśet 
khāni chidrāṇi śīrṣaṇyāni 
nanu caitad uktam eva khāni caiva spṛśed adbhiḥ iti 
ātmaśirasor vyāvṛttyartham iti kecit 
yadā śuciḥ sann abhojanārthatayaivācāmati 
yeṣāṃ ca bhojanottarakālam ekaṃ śuddhyartham ācamanam aparam adṛṣṭārthaṃ tatrādṛṣṭārtha ātmaśirasī na spṛśyete śuddhyarthaṃ tu tādṛśam utpannam 
tasya saṃpūrṇāṅgasya prayogo vakṣyate śaucepsuḥ sarvadācāmet iti 
yad vā vidhipratyabhijñānārthaṃ śāstrīyam etad ācamanaṃ na laukikam iti 
jñātāṅgaviśeṣasaṃbandhasya tadaṅginirdeśe tad evedam iti pratyabhijñānasiddhiḥ 
ataś ca yatrācāmed iti śrutaṃ tatra na yasya kasyacid dravyasya bhakṣaṇamātraṃ pratīyate kiṃ tarhi śāstrīyasya saṃskārasya saparikarasyeti yad uktaṃ tad darśitaṃ bhavati 
pūjayed aśanaṃ nityam adyāc caitad akutsayan 
dṛṣṭvā hṛṣyet pasīdec ca pratinandec ca sarvaśaḥ 
aśyata ity aśanaṃ bhaktasaktvapūpādy ucyate 
tad aśanārtham ānītaṃ devatārūpeṇa paśyet eṣā vai paramā devatā yad annam 
tasya sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ sraṣṭṛtvena sthitihetutayā ca yaddarśanaṃ sāsya pūjā 
atha vā prāṇārthatvena bhāvanaṃ dhyāyan yajan mama yad arthatvaṃ saṃpūjayati māṃ sadā iti 
namaskārādinā vā praṇamya grahaṇaṃ pūjā 
adyāc caitad akutsayan 
kadannatayā duḥsaṃskāropagrahaṇena vā kutsāhetusaṃbhave nānnaṃ kutsayet 
kim idam aśyate arucikaraṃ dhātuvaiṣamyajanakam ity evamādinābhidhānena nākṣipet 
yadi tu tadrūpaṃ bhavati tadā nādyān na kutsayann adyāt 
dṛṣṭvaiva hṛṣyet 
putrastryādisaṃdarśanena cirapravāsapratyagata iv tuṣyeta prīyeta 
prasīdec ca 
nimittāntarajam api kāluṣyam annadarśanena hitvā manaḥprasādam āśrayet 
pratinandec ca 
samṛddhyā śaṃsanaṃ pratinandanam 
nityayuktā etena syāma ity ādaropadarśanam abhinandanam 
sarvaśaḥ sarvadā 
anyatarasyām iti vyavasthitavibhāṣāvijñānāt saptamyarthe śam kartavyaḥ 
sarvadeti vā paṭhitavyam 
pūjitaṃ hy aśanaṃ nityaṃ balam ūrjaṃ ca yacchati 
apūjitaṃ tu tad bhuktam ubhayaṃ nāśayed idam 
pūrvavidhiśeṣo 'yam arthavādaḥ na tu phalavidhiḥ 
phalavidhau hi kāmyo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ syād ūrjakāmasya balakāmasya ca 
tataś ca nityaśabdo nopapadyeta pūjitaṃ hy aśanaṃ nityam iti 
ato 'yaṃ yāvajjīvikaḥ prāṅmukhatā niyamaḥ 
apūjitaṃ bhuktaṃ hy ubhayaṃ nāśayed balam ūrjaṃ ca 
balaṃ sāmarthyam anāyāsena bhārodyamanādiśaktatā 
kṛśasyāpy ūrjaṃ mahāprāṇatā 
aṅgopacayaḥ mahākāyo mahābalaś ca bhavati 
nocchiṣṭaṃ kasyacid dadyān nādyād etat tathāntarā 
na caivātyaśanaṃ kuryān na cocchiṣṭaḥ kvacid vrajet 
pātrīstham annam āsyasparśadūṣitam ucchiṣṭam ucyate 
tan na kasyacid dadyād anenaiva siddhe snātakavrateṣu yaḥ śūdraviṣayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sa tatraiva nirūpayiṣyate 
caturthyāṃ prāptāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī saṃbandhamātraniṣedhārthā 
ye 'pi dattam idam asmabhyam iti na vidus teṣām api bhojanāya na prakalpyaṃ śvabiḍālādīnām 
na hy atra dadātyarthaḥ paripūrṇaḥ svatvanivṛttimātraṃ dātuḥ parasya svatvāpattir nāsti 
antarāśabdo madhyavacanaḥ 
dvau bhojanakālau sāyaṃ prātaś ca 
tato 'nyasmin kāle na bhuñjīta 
atha vā vyavadhāne antarāśabdaḥ 
tyaktabhojanavyāpāraḥ kriyāntareṇa vyavadhāya punas tad eva prākpātragṛhītaṃ na bhuñjīta 
smṛtyantare tu viśeṣaḥ paṭhyate utthānācamanavyāpetam iti 
kecit tu vicchedam antaram ācakṣate 
savyena pāṇinā pātram anvālabhya dakṣiṇenāvadāya prāṇāyāsye juhoti iti śrūyate 
tatra yaḥ savyena pātrasyānugrahas tadanantaram 
na caivātyaśanam atimātram aśanaṃ kuryāt 
etac cānārogyakāraṇaṃ guruviruddhādīnāṃ pradarśanārtham 
hetūpadeśān mātrāśitāyāś cāyurvedād atimātratā boddhavyā 
yāvad aśitam annam udarapūraṃ na karoti samyag jīryati tāvad aśitavyam 
trayaḥ kukṣer bhāgāḥ adhyardham annasya bhāgārdhaṃ pānasya bhāgo doṣasaṃcārāya 
anyathānārogyam 
na cocchitṣṭaḥ kvacid vrajet 
ataś cocchiṣṭam apanīya śucitvam āpādite tasminn eva deśa ācāntavyam 
anārogyam anāyuṣyam asvargyaṃ cātibhojanam 
apuṇyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet 
dṛṣṭamūlatām atyaśanapratiṣedhasyācaṣṭe 
anārogyaṃ vyādhyutpattir jvarodarādipīḍā 
viṣūcikādinā jīvitanāśa anāyuṣyam 
sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti śarīraparirakṣādivyatikramād asvargyam 
narakaprāptiḥ svargābhāvena pratipadyate 
apuṇyaṃ daurbhāgyakaram 
lokavidviṣṭaṃ bahubhojitayā nindyate 
tasmāt kāraṇād atyaśanaṃ parivarjayet na kuryāt 
brāhmeṇa vipras tīrthena nityakālam upaspṛśet 
kāyatraidaśikābhyāṃ vā na pitryeṇa kadācana 
tīrthaśabdena pavitram udakādhikaraṇam ucyate 
tāraṇāya pāpapramocanāya ca tiṣṭhatīti tīrtham 
kvacit tu taranty aneneti tīrtham udakāvataraṇamārgaḥ 
iha tūdakādhārakaratalaikadeśa ucyate 
stutyā vā tīrthaśabdaprayogaḥ 
na hi tatra nityasthā āpaḥ 
tena upaspṛśed ācāmet 
brāhmeṇety etad api stutyartham eva 
brahmā devatāsyeti 
na hi tīrthasya devatā bhavaty ayāgarūpatvād amantratvāc ca 
yāgarūpatāṃ ca kenacid dharmeṇa śuddhihetutvādinādhyāropya devatātaddhitaḥ 
nityakālaṃ śaucārthe karmāṅge ca 
kaḥ prajāpatiḥ sa devatāsyeti kāyam 
evaṃ tridaśā devatā asyeti traidaśikam 
tridaśaśabdād devatāṇikṛte svārthe kaḥ 
devatātvaṃ ca pūrvavat 
ebhis tīrthair upaspṛśet 
vipragrahaṇam avivakṣitam 
yataḥ kṣatriyādīnaṃ viśeṣaṃ vakṣyati 
na cāsatyāṃ sāmānyataḥ prāptau viśeṣavidhānam upapadyate kaṇṭhagābhis tu bhūmipaḥ ityādi 
na pitryeṇa pitṛdaivatyena kadācid api 
sphoṭapiṭakādinā brāhmāditīrtheṣv ayogyatām āyāteṣv api 
nanu cāvidhānād eva pitryasyāprāptiḥ 
asty atrāśaṅkā 
pitṛtīrthajñāpanārthaṃ tāvat pitryaṃ tayor adha ity avaśyaṃ vaktavyam 
na ca tasyeha kāryaṃ nirdiśyate 
kāryākāṅkṣāyāṃ prakṛtatvāt tena kāryeṇa saṃbandha āśaṅkyeta 
adya punaḥ pratiṣedhe sati pitryam iti samākhyayaiva kāryāvagatiḥ udakatarpaṇādi pitṛkarma etena tīrthena kartavyam 
evaṃ stutir anvayinī bhavati 
śrutinoditatvāc ca brāhmādīnāṃ tadabhāve prāptāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaṃ yuktam asyābhidhānam 
aṅguṣṭhamūlasya tale brāhmaṃ tīrthaṃ pracakṣate 
kāyam aṅgulimūle 'gre daivaṃ pitryaṃ tayor adhaḥ 
aṅguṣṭhasya mūlam adhobhāgaḥ 
tasya talapradeśo brāhmaṃ tīrtham 
hastābhyantaraṃ talam āha 
mahārekhāntam abhimukham ātmano brāhmaṃ hastamadhye 
aṅgulīnāṃ mūle daṇḍarekhāyā ūrdhvaṃ kāyam 
agre aṅgulīnāṃ daivam 
upasarjanībhūto 'pi mūle aṅguliśabdaḥ sāpekṣatvād agraśabdasya saṃbadhyate 
pitryaṃ tayor adhaḥ 
atrāpi guṇībhūtasyāṅgulīśabdasyāṅguṣṭasya ca saṃbandhaḥ 
pradeśinī cātrāṅgulir vivakṣitā 
tayor adha antaraṃ pitryam 
smṛtyantaraśiṣṭaprasiddhisāmarthyād evaṃ vyākhyāyate yathāśrutānvayāsaṃbhavāt 
yathā ca śaṅkhaḥ aṅguṣṭhasyādharataḥ prāg agrāyāś ca rekhāyā brāhmaṃ tīrtham pradeśinyaṅguṣṭhayor antarā pitryam kaniṣṭhātalayoḥ pūrveṇā parvaṇ kāyam agram aṅgulīnāṃ daivikam iti 
trir ācāmed apaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāt tato mukham 
khāni caiva spṛśed adbhir ātmānaṃ śira eva ca 
anyatamena tīrthena trir apa udakam ācāmed āsyena jaṭharaṃ praveśayet 
tata udakabhakṣaṇāntaraṃ dvir abhyāsena mukham oṣṭhadvayaṃ parimṛjyāt 
oṣṭhaśliṣṭānām udakāvayavānāṃ sodakena hastenāpanayanaṃ pramārjanam atra 
kutaḥ punar hasteneti 
samācārāt tīrthādhikārād vā 
tīrthenaivādbhir iti cottaratra śrutam atrāpy apakṛṣyate 
dṛṣṭarthatvāc ca pramārjanasya mukhaśabda ekadeśe yathokte vartate 
khāni chidrāṇi copaspṛśed adbhir hastagṛhītābhiḥ sparśanam evopasparśanam 
mukhasya ca prakṛtatvān mukhyānām eva khānām eṣa sparśanavidhiḥ 
gautamaś cāha khāni copaspṛśec chīrṣaṇyāni 
ātmānam iti hṛdayaṃ nābhiṃ vā nirdiśati 
upaniṣatsu hi antarhṛdayam ātmānaṃ paśyet iti kathyate 
ato hṛdayasyāyaṃ sparśaḥ kṣetrajñasyātmano vibhoḥ 
amūrtasya na sparśasaṃbhavaḥ 
nābhim ālabheta iti kvacit smaryate tena nābhiṃ manyāmahe 
śiraḥ prasiddham 
smṛtīnāṃ caikārthyāt ā maṇibandhāt pāṇī prakṣālya ity evamādi labhyate 
tathā aśabdakaraṇaṃ vāṅniyamaḥ pādābhyukṣaṇam 
mahābhārate prakṣālanam api pādayor darśitam 
anuṣṇābhir aphenābhir adbhis tīrthena dharmavit 
śaucepsuḥ sarvadācāmed ekānte prāgudaṅmukhaḥ 
uṣṇaśabdaḥ kvāthopalakṣaṇārthaḥ 
tathā hi paṭḥyate aśṛtābhir adbhiḥ iti 
evaṃ ca grīṣmoṣmataptāḥ svabhāvoṣṇāś ca na pratiṣidhyante 
phenagrahaṇaṃ budbudānām api pradarśanārtham 
paṭhitaṃ ca hīnābhiḥ phenabudbudaiḥ iti 
tīrthena dharmavid iti vṛttapūraṇam eva 
śaucam āptum icchuḥ śaucepsuḥ 
śuddhikāma ity arthaḥ 
nānyathā śuddho bhavati 
sarvadā 
na prakaraṇād bhojana eva 
kiṃ tarhi na retoviṇmūtrādiśuddhiṣv api 
apāṃ bhakṣaṇe karmatvāt tṛtīyānirdeśaḥ na bhakṣamāṇānām evāyaṃ dharmaḥ api tu kāraṇabhūtānām api pādābhyukṣaṇādau 
vayaṃ tu brūmo bhakṣaṇe 'pi karaṇam evāpo na hi tāsām ācamanaṃ saṃskāraḥ 
ekānte śucau deśe 
ekānto hi janair anākīrṇaḥ prāyeṇa śucir bhavati 
pragudaṅmukhaḥ 
mukhaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate 
prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā evaṃ hi gautamena paṭhitam 
vigrahaś caivaṃ kartavyaḥ prāgudaṅmukham asyeti 
nāyaṃ dvaṃdvagarbho bahuvrīhiḥ api tu bahuvrīhir eva 
dvaṃdvagarbhatāyāṃ samāhāre samāsāntenākāreṇa bhavitavyam 
itaretarayogo 'pi naiva 
na hi yugapad ubhayadiṅmukhatā saṃbhavati 
tatra kaścid ācamanabhāgaḥ prāṅmukhena kartavyaḥ kaścid udaṅmukhenety āpatati na caikadeśa ācamanam 
na ca digartha upādeyo yena parasparāpekṣe saṃbadhyeyātām 
nāpi dakṣiṇapūrvādivat prāgudakśabdo 'parājitāyā diśo vācakatven prasiddho yena diksamāsabahuvrīhir jñāyate 
tasmān nāyaṃ vṛttyantaragarbho bahuvrīhiḥ 
ato vikalpaḥ 
udāhṛtaṃ ca smṛtyantare prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā śaucam ārabheta iti 
yathā bṛhadrathantarasāma ṣaḍahe iti keṣucid ahaḥsu bṛhat keṣucid rathantaram na tv ekasminn ahani samastobhayasāmatvam 
uktam ācamanaṃ tīrthenāpāṃ bhakṣaṇam 
parimāṇaṃ tu noktam 
atas tad avadhāraṇārtham āha 
hṛdgābhiḥ pūyate vipraḥ kaṇṭhagābhis tu bhūmipaḥ 
vaiśyo 'dbhiḥ prāśitābhis tu śūdraḥ spṛṣṭābhir antataḥ 
hṛdayaṃ gacchanti prāpnuvanti hṛdgāḥ 
anyeṣv api dṛśyate iti gabher ḍaḥ 
hṛdayasya hṛd iti yogavibhāgād dhṛdādeśaḥ 
pūyate pavitratāṃ prāpnoty aśucitvaṃ vyāvartate 
āpa īṣadūnaculukamātrapramāṇaḥ kaṇṭhagābhis tābhiḥ kaṇṭhamātravyāpinībhiḥ bhūmipaḥ kṣatriyaḥ 
bhūmer ādhipatyaṃ kṣatriyasya vihitam 
tena prasiddhena karmaṇā kṣatriyajātir lakṣyate 
ādhipatyavivakṣāyāṃ rājadharmeṣv evāvakṣyat 
vaiśyaḥ prāśitābhir antarāsyapraveśitābhiḥ 
kaṇṭham aprāptā api śuddhihetavo vaiśyasya 
śūdraḥ spṛṣṭābhir antata anteneti 
ādyāditvāt tṛtīyārthe tasiḥ 
antaśabdo 'yaṃ samīpavacano 'sti 
udakāntaṃ gata udakasamīpam iti gamyate 
asty avayavavacanaḥ 
vastrānto vasanānta ity ubhayatrāpi vartamānaḥ saṃbandhyantaram apekṣyate kasya samīpaṃ kasya vāvayava iti 
tatreha yena sthānena varṇāntarāṇām ācamanaṃ vihitam tīrthair jihvoṣṭhena ca tadanteneti pratīyate 
samīpavacanas tu na saṃbhāvyaḥ vidhīyamānasyācamanasya tatsādhyatvāsaṃbhavāt 
sparśe 'pi prāśanam asti 
jihvauṣṭhena hi spṛśyamānasya rasāsvādanam avaśyaṃbhāvi 
tatra vaiśyaparimāṇāt kiṃcinnyūnatātra vivakṣitā 
jihvāmūlaṃ yāvad vaiśyasya jihvāgraṃ śūdrasya 
dravatvād udakasyāparihāryo 'vadhyatikramaḥ avaśyaprāptau tv aśuddhiḥ 
sarvaś cāyaṃ tīrthavibhāgo dakṣiṇahastasyopasparśane hastasyaucityād dakṣiṇācāratāyāś ca puruṣadharmatayā vihitatvāt 
evamartham eva cāsminn avadhāv idam ucyate 
uddhṛte dakṣiṇe pāṇāv upavīty ucyate dvijaḥ 
savye prācīna āvītī nivītī kaṇṭhasajjane 
nanu ca lokataḥ siddhāḥ padārthā dharmaśāstre 'py āśrīyante 
na padārthasaṃvijñānārthāni manvādivākyāni vyākaraṇābhidhānakāṇḍasmṛtivat 
uktam asmābhir yo nātiprasiddho 'rthas taṃ cel lakṣayanti kim upālambham arhanti 
asti cātra kiṃcit prayojanam anyad api 
ācamanakramam ucyamānam upasaṃvyānādikam ācamanāṅgaṃ yathā vijñāyate 
yady apy upavītadhāraṇaṃ vratārthatayā puruṣārthatayā vā sarvadā prāptaṃ tathāpi tena vinācamanaṃ kṛtam apy aparipūrṇam eva syāt 
asaty asmin vacane vrate vaiguṇyaṃ puruṣadoṣaś ca syāt 
atha punar antareṇopavītam ācamanaṃ kṛtam apy akṛtasamam doṣaś ca syād apy aśucinā kṛtam apāṃ bhakṣaṇam iti 
kathaṃ punaḥ kevalasyopavītasyaivācamanāṅgatā yāvatānyad apy atra nirdiṣṭaṃ prācīnāvīti ca 
ucyate 
prācīnāvītaṃ svaśabdenaiva pitrye karmaṇi vihitam tatrārthavattāyām upayātāyāṃ nākṛtārthenopavītena vikalpitum arhati 
nivītam apy abhicāre 'rthavat 
yady apy atra nivītasya viniyogo nāsti tathāpi smṛtīnāṃ caikārthyād anyatra yo viniyogas tenehāpy arthavattā bhavaty eva 
pāṇigrahaṇaṃ bāhūpalakṣaṇārtham uddhṛtabāhur yato loka upavītīty ucyate 
sārvakālikaṃ copavītaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
na ca kevalapāṇāv uddhṛta upavītī 
savye uddhṛte prācīnāvītī 
samāsapadān nāmadheyam 
asamāsas tu vṛttānurodhitayā 
kaṇṭhasajjane 
kaṇṭhe sajjanaṃ saṅgaḥ sthāpanam 
yadā vastrasya sūtrasya vānyataro 'pi bāhur uddhriyate tadā nivītī bhavati 
mekhalām ajinaṃ daṇḍam upavītaṃ kamaṇḍalum 
apsu prāsya vinaṣṭāni gṛhṇītānyāni mantravat 
vinaṣṭānām apsu prāsanam anyeṣāṃ ca grahaṇam atra vidhīyate 
prāsanagrahaṇayoḥ paurvāparyaṃ yathāśrutam eva 
asmāc ca punar upādānān naiṣām upanayanāṅgataiva 
tadaṅgatve hi tatprayogāpavargitaiva syāt 
kiṃ tarhi yāvad brahmacaryaṃ dhāraṇam 
atha kim upanayanakāla eva prāk karmaniṣpatteḥ daivān mānuṣād vā pratibalād vinaṣṭānāṃ pratipattir na saṃbhavati 
prayogasamāptyarthaṃ ca punarupādānam yathā kapālasya yenaivam ucyata asmāt punarupādānād dhāraṇam anumīyate 
ucyate 
grahaṇaṃ tāvad daṇḍasya coditam mekhalāyā bandhanam 
tatra sūtrasya vinyāsas tāvad upanayanāṅgatvenāvaśyaṃ kartavyam 
kṛte tasmin kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ 
uttarakālaṃ kiṃ tair naṣṭair anaṣṭair vā 
aṅganāśe ca pratipattiviśeṣaḥ karmopakārako bhavati 
na ca teṣāṃ kiṃcana kāryam āmnātaṃ yena tatsiddhyarthaṃ viśiṣṭe kāle vācanikam upādānam 
akṛtatvāc ca kāryasya tatprayuktaṃ punarupādānam arthasiddham ucyate 
tasmāt pratipattividhānād upādānavacanāc ca dhāraṇam aṅgam na ca prayogāpavargi 
yataḥ kamaṇḍalunopanayanottarakālānuvartinā tulyavan nirdeśāt teṣām apy uttaratrānuvṛttiḥ pratīyate 
sā ca vratāṅgam 
ata ubhayārthā mekhalādayaḥ prakaraṇād upanayanārthāḥ nivṛtte copanayane darśanād yāvad brahmacaryabhāvinaḥ 
kamaṇḍaluś codakārthaḥ kartavyo 'smād eva pratipattividhānāt 
anyathā yadā kamaṇḍalus tadeyaṃ pratipattir iti pākṣikatvaṃ syāt 
tatra daṇḍadhāraṇaṃ pratigṛhya daṇḍaṃ bhikṣāṃ cared iti kramād bhaikṣyacaryāṅgatvam eva prāptaṃ samācārād abhaikṣe 'rthe 'pi bhramaṇe bhavaty eva 
na tu sarvadaiva karataladhṛtadaṇḍasya sthānāsanaśayanabhojanādīni 
tathā ca svādhyāye brahmāñjaliṃ vakṣyati 
mantravad ity upanayanavidhinā grahaṇam anuvadati 
tatra ca mekhalāyā mantraḥ na daṇḍasya 
keśāntaḥ ṣoḍaśe varṣe brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate 
rājanyabandhor dvāviṃśe vaiśyasya dvyadhike tataḥ 
keśānto nāma saṃskaraḥ 
sa garbhaṣoḍaśe varṣe brāhmaṇasya kartavyaḥ 
tasya ca svarūpaparijñāne gṛhyam eva śaraṇam 
dve varṣe 'dhike yasya dvāviṃśasya tasmin dvyadhike dvāviṃśe 
atha vā kālamātram anyapadārthaḥ 
tato dvāviṃśād varṣād dvyadhike kāle 
vaiśyasyeti 
dviśabdasya ca varṣāṇy eva saṃkhyeyāni prakṛtāni hi tāni 
amantrikā tu karyeyaṃ strīṇām āvṛd aśeṣataḥ 
saṃskārārthaṃ śarīrasya yathākālaṃ yathākramam 
iyam āvṛd aśeṣataḥ strīṇām amantrikā kāryā 
jātakarmaṇa ārabhya iyaṃ saṃskārāṇām āvṛt paripāṭhī 
setikartavyatākaḥ saṃskārakalāpa iti yāvat 
saṃskārārthaṃ śuddhyarthaṃ śarīrasya puṃsām iva strīṇām api prayojanam āha 
yathākālam 
yasmin kāle yaḥ saṃskāra uktas taṃ kālam anatikramya 
padārthānativṛttau yathāsādṛśye avyayībhāvaḥ 
evaṃ krame 'pi draṣṭavyam 
mantramātrarahitāyā āvṛto vihitatvād ayathākālakramaprāptir eva nāstīty ato niṣedho nityānuvādo vṛttapūraṇārthaḥ 
etāvad vivakṣitaṃ strīṇāṃ caite amantrakā iti 
pūrveṇāvṛdvacanena jātakarmādivad upanayane 'py amantrake prāpte tannivṛttyartyam ārabhyate 
vaivāhiko vidhiḥ strīṇāṃ saṃskāro vaidikaḥ smṛtaḥ 
patisevā gurau vāso gṛhārtho 'gniparikriyā 
vedagrahaṇārtho vaidikaḥ saṃskāra upanayanākhyo yaḥ sa strīṇāṃ vaivāhiko vidhiḥ 
vivāhe bhavo vivāhaviṣayo vivāhasādhyaḥ 
ato vivāhasyopanayanasthāne vihitatvāt tadāpattivacanaṃ vivāhasya 
tasya ca nivṛttir yadi vivāhas tatkāryakaraḥ 
hanta prāptaṃ vedādhyayanam prāptā ca vratacaryā upanayanaṃ nāma mā bhūt 
etad ubhayam api nivartayati patisevā gurau vāsaḥ 
patiṃ yat sevata upacaraty ārādhayati sa evāsyā gurau vasatiḥ 
gurau vasatyādhyayanaṃ kartavyaṃ na cāsyā gurau vāso 'sty ataḥ kuto 'dhyayanam 
gṛhārtho gṛhakṛtyāni randhanapāriṇahyapratyavekṣaṇādīni yāni navame vakṣyate 
arthasya saṃgrahe cainām ityādi 
sāyaṃprātar brahmacāriṇo yat samidādhānaṃ tad evāsyā gṛhakṛtyam 
agnikriyayā ca yāvān yamaniyamasamūho brahmacāriṇaḥ sa sarva upalakṣyate 
evaṃ caitad uktaṃ vivāhasyopanayanāpattya 
yathaiva puruṣasyāyopanayanāt prabhṛti śrautāḥ smārtā ācāraprāptāś ca vidhayo bhavanti prāktanaṃ kāmacāravādabhakṣatvam evaṃ strīṇāṃ prāg vivāhāt kāmacāraḥ parasmāt śrautasmārteṣv adhikāraḥ 
evaṃ vā padayojanā 
vivāha eva strīṇāṃ vaidikaḥ saṃskāra upanayanam 
anupanayane 'pi vivāhe bhaktyopanayanatvam ucyate 
kiṃ tad upanayanena vivāhasya sāmyaṃ yenāsya tadvyapadeśa ata āha patisevetyādi 
prakaraṇopasaṃhāraḥ 
eṣa prokto dvijātīnām aupanāyaniko vidhiḥ 
utpattivyañjakaḥ puṇyaḥ karmayogaṃ nibodhata 
etāvad upanayanaprakaraṇam 
atra yad uktaṃ tat sarvam upanayanārtham 
nanu keśānto 'py evaṃ prāpnoti 
na anirvṛtte upanayane svakāle tasya vidhānāt 
prakaraṇe 'pi paṭhitasya vākyād anyārthatā bhavati 
tathā ca keśāntaḥ samāvṛttasyāpi kaiścid iṣyate 
upanayane bhava aupanāyanikaḥ 
uttarapadasya dīrghatvam pūrvavat 
utpattiḥ mātāpitroḥ sakāśāj janma 
tāṃ vyanakti prakāśayati saguṇatāṃ karotīty utpattivyañjakaḥ 
jāto 'py ajātasamo 'nupanīto 'dhikārābhāvāt 
ato 'yaṃ vidhir utpattivyañjakaḥ 
puṇya ity uktārthaḥ 
upanītasya yena karmaṇā yogaḥ saṃbandho 'dhikāraḥ yat tenopanītena kartavyam tad idānīṃ vakṣayāṇaṃ nibodhata 
upanīya guruḥ śiṣyaṃ śikṣayec chaucam āditaḥ 
ācāram agnikāryaṃ ca saṃdhyopāsanam eva ca 
śikṣayed vyutpādayec chaucam āditaḥ 
ādita iti vacanenācārādibhyaḥ prāg upadeśaḥ śaucasya neṣyate 
kiṃ tarhi aniyatakramakāḥ parasparam ete
