kevalam upanayanānantaraṃ vratādeśanaṃ vakṣyati 
ādiṣṭavedavratasya ca vedādhyayanam 
ato 'gnīndhanasaṃdhyopāsanayoḥ samantrakatvād akṛte vratādeśe mantroccāraṇam aprāptaṃ vidhīyate 
śaucaṃ cāniyatakālam tad avaśyaṃ tadahar evopadeṣṭavyam 
evam ācāro 'pi 
ata idam ādita iti vacanam ādarārthaṃ na prathamopadeśyatāṃ śaucasya vidhatte 
śaucam ekā liṅge ityādyācamanāntam 
ācāro gurvādīnāṃ pratyutthānāsanadānābhivādanādiḥ 
agnikāryam agnyādhānakāryaṃ samitsamindhanam 
saṃdhyāyām ādityasyopāsanaṃ tatsvarūpabhāvanaṃ saṃdhyāyā upāsanam 
evaṃ vā pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām ityādi 
eṣa vratadharmaḥ 
adhyayanadharmān idānīm āha 
adhyeṣyamāṇas tv ācānto yathāśāstram udaṅmukhaḥ 
brahmāñjalikṛto 'dhyāpyo laghuvāsā jitendriyaḥ 
pratyāsanne bhaviṣyati ḷḍayaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ 
adhyayane pravartamānaḥ adhyayanam ārabhamāṇaḥ adhyetum icchann iti yāvat 
udaṅmukho 'dhyāpyaḥ 
gautamīye tu prāṅmukho vā śiṣyaḥ pratyaṅmukha ācāryaḥ iti 
ācānto yathāśāstram iti 
prāguktam ācamanavidhiṃ smārayati 
brahmāñjaliḥ kṛto yeneti 
āhitāgnyāder ākṛtigaṇatvān niṣṭhāntasya paranipātaḥ 
brahmāñjalikṛd iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
laghuvāsā dhautavāsāḥ 
prakṣālanena laghunī vāsasī bhavataḥ 
ato laghutvena vāsasaḥ śuddhir lakṣyate 
atha vāyaṃ romādisthūlavasanaḥ cittavyākṣepe tāḍyamāno na prahāraṃ vedayet tataś ca na yuktaḥ paṭhet 
apanīyamāne tu vāsasi guroḥ khedaḥ syāt 
nirāvaraṇe ca kāye rajjvādinā tāḍyamāno mahatīṃ bālo vedanām anubhavet 
ato dṛṣṭārthaṃ laghuvāsastvam 
jitāni niyamitānīndriyāṇy ubhayāny api yena sa jitendriyaḥ 
na itas tato vīkṣeta yat kiṃcin na śṛṇuyāt adhyayane 'vahito bhavet ity uktaṃ bhavati 
brahmārambhe 'vasāne ca pādau grāhyau guroḥ sadā 
saṃhatya hastāv adhyeyaṃ sa hi brahmāñjaliḥ smṛtaḥ 
brahmaśabdo 'yam anekārtho 'py adhyayanādhikārād atra vedavacanaḥ pratīyate 
tasyārambhe 
nimittasaptamy eṣā 
adhyayanādhikārād eva ca tadviṣayādhyayanakriyā tasyāyam ārambhaḥ prathamāvṛttiḥ puruṣasya 
tatredaṃ pādagrahaṇam 
vedasya tu yāny ādyakṣarāṇi agnim īḷe iṣe tvā agna āyāhi iti na so 'trārambha ucyate 
na hi tasya nimittabhāvaḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ nityatvāt 
kādācitkaṃ hi nimittaṃ bhavati 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati vedādhyayanam āripsamāno guroḥ pādasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kuryāt kṛtvā tataḥ svādhyāyākṣarāny uccārayet na punaḥ pravṛttādhyayanakriyaḥ pādau gṛhṇīyāt 
nanu cādyakriyākṣaṇa ārambhaḥ sa ca nimittam 
vidyamānasya ca nimittatvaṃ yuktaṃ jīvanasyeva 
atra gehadāhādyatītam api nimittaṃ tatra tathaiva śravaṇam 
tasmāt sahaprayoga evādhyayanapādopasaṃgrahaṇayor yuktaḥ 
ucyate 
adhyāpanādhyavasāya ārambha ucyate nādyaḥ kriyākṣaṇaḥ 
yadaiva gurur adhīṣyety āha tadaivādhyavasyati mānavakaḥ 
atas tadanantaraṃ pādopagrahaḥ 
upakārapravṛttasya guroś cittaprasādanam etat 
yathā loke kaścid upakārapravṛttaṃ sabhājayati vācā nanu tvayā vayam asmāt pāpān mocitāḥ iti 
anakṣarā ceyam adhyeṣaṇā upasanno 'smy adhyayanāya iti 
na hi gurur uparodhyo 'dhyāpayeti 
kevalam upasadanam asya kartavyaṃ saṃbodhārtham avasaro 'dhyayanasyeti 
ataḥ kṛtopasadanasya vedākṣaroccaraṇam 
api ca saṃhatya hastāv adhetavyam ity ucyate 
tatrādhīyānaḥ pādopasaṃgrahaṇavidhim atikrameta 
avasānaṃ samāptir adhyayanād uparamaḥ 
yady api brahmaśabda ārambhe guṇabhūtas tathāpy avasānasya sāpekṣatvāt saṃnihitatvād brahmapadenaiva saṃbandhaḥ pratīyate anyasyāśrutatvāt 
sadāgrahaṇam anvahaṃ bhāviprayogārambhāvasānayor eṣa vidhir yathā syād itarathā ya eva vratādeśānantaro mukhyaprārambhaḥ tatraiva syāt 
athānvārambhaṇīyā darśapūrṇamāsārambhe coditā ya evādhānānantarabhāvī darśapūrṇamāsaprayogārambhaḥ tatraiva bhavati na māsikaprayogārambhe 
prātar ārabhya yāvad āhnikaṃ na nivṛttaṃ prapāṭhakadvayamātraparimāṇam tāvad ekaiva sādhyayanakriyeti 
antarā kathaṃcid vicchede 'pi punaḥ pravṛttau nārambhaśabdavācyatāstīti na punaḥ pādopasadanaṃ kriyate 
smṛtyantare ca paṭhyate pādopagrahaṇaṃ guroḥ prātar anvaham iti 
saṃhatya saṃlagnau saṃśliṣṭau parasparaṃ kṛtvā adhyeyam 
kacchapa iti yaḥ saṃniveśo hastayoḥ prasiddhas tathā kartavyaḥ 
sa hi brahmāñjaliḥ 
padārthakathanam etat 
vyatyastapāṇinā kāryam upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ guroḥ 
savyena savyaḥ spraṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena ca dakṣiṇaḥ 
yad upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ pūrvaśloke guror uktaṃ tad vyatyastapāṇinā kāryam 
kīdṛśaḥ punaḥ pāṇyor vyatyāsaḥ kartavya ity ata āha 
savyena hastena savyaḥ pādaḥ spraṣṭavyaḥ sparśaḥ kartavyaḥ na tu ciraṃ nipīḍyāsitavyam 
eṣa ca vyatyāso yugapad itaretaradiksaṃcāreṇa hastayor bhavati 
agrataḥ sthitena saṃmukhena guror upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kartavyam 
tatra vāmo dakṣiṇamārgaṃ nīyate dakṣiṇo vāmam ity evaṃ savyena savyaḥ spṛṣṭo bhavati dakṣiṇena ca dakṣiṇa ity eṣa pāṇivyatyāsaḥ 
anye tu vinyastapāṇinā iti paṭhanti 
sparśād eva ca vinyāse siddhe nāgnitaptāyaḥpiṇḍasparśanavad dāhabhayād aṅgulyagramātreṇa sparśanaṃ na kartavyam api tu hastau vinyasitavyau nidhātavyau 
pīḍanaṃ tu pīḍākaraṃ niṣiddham iti varṇayanti 
adhyeṣyamāṇaṃ tu gurur nityakālam atandritaḥ 
adhīṣva bho iti brūyād virāmo 'stv iti cāramet 
adhyeṣyamāṇam ityādīni prāgvyākhyātāni padāni 
guror ayaṃ niyogaḥ 
guror yadā māṇavako 'dhyāpayitum abhilaṣitas tadā adhīṣva bho ity āmantrayitavyaḥ 
anāmantritena na guruḥ khedayitavyaḥ upadiśānuvākam iti 
uktaṃ ca 
āhūtaś cāpy adhīyīta iti 
virāmo 'stv ity etaṃ śabdaṃ samuccāryāramet nivarteta 
kaḥ 
gurur eva prathamāntanirdeśāt 
atha vā guruṇotsṛṣṭo nivarteta na svecchayā 
evaṃ caitad vyākhyāyate yadā gurur virāmo 'stv iti brūyāt tadā viramed brahmacārī 
anye tv adhyetṛmātrasya śiṣyāṇām upādhyāyasya ca uparamaṇakāle dharmam imam icchanti 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram svādhyāyam adhītya viramaṇakāle pradeśinyā pṛthivīm ālabhya svastīti yajuḥṣu brūyāt vispaṣṭam iti sāmasu virāmaḥ paramāsv ṛkṣu āramas tv atharvasu 
atandrita analasaḥ 
tandrālasyam 
tadyogāt puruṣas tandrita ity ucyate 
tyaktvālasyam atandritaḥ 
anuvādaś cāyam 
nātra tandrā śramaḥ 
na tv iyam āśaṅkā kartavyā ya atandritas tasyāyaṃ vidhiḥ ālasyavatas tv anyaḥ 
brahmaṇaḥ praṇavaṃ kuryād ādāv ante ca sarvadā 
sravaty anoṃkṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ parastāc ca viśīryati 
atrāpi pūrvoktena nyāyena brahmaṇa ādāv ante ca praṇavaṃ kuryāt 
brahmaviṣayāyā adhyayanakriyāyā iti draṣṭavyam 
praṇavaśabda oṃkāravacanaḥ 
tathā ca vakṣyati sravaty anoṃkṛtam iti 
sarvadāgrahaṇam adhyayanavidhimātradharmo yathā syād itarathā prakaraṇād grahaṇārtha eva brahmacāriṇaḥ syāt 
asmiṃs tu sati yo 'py avismaraṇārtho yac ca ahar ahaḥ svādhyāyam adhīyīta iti gṛhasthādīnām tatra sarvatra siddhaṃ bhavati 
saṃdhyājapādau tu svaśabdena vidhāsyati etad akṣaram etāṃ ca iti 
na cāyaṃ vedadharmo yena yatra kutracid vaidikavākyoccāraṇam ārabheta tatra prāpnuyāt 
ato homamantrajapaśāstrānuvacanayājyādīnām ārambhe nāsti praṇavaḥ anyatrāpy udāharaṇārthe vaidikavākyavyāhāre 
tasmāt sthitaṃ prākaraṇikasvādhyāyādhyayanavidhidharmārthaṃ sarvadāgrahaṇam 
praṇavaprayogasyānvāhikārambhārthatā tu nityakālagrahaṇānuvṛttyaiva siddhā 
asyārthavādaḥ sravaty anoṃkṛtam 
pūrvaṃ prārambhe anoṃkṛtaṃ brahma sravati 
omā kṛtaṃ oṃśabdena saṃskṛtam 
sādhanaṃ kṛteti samāsaḥ 
atha vā oṃkṛta uccārito yasmin brahmaṇi tad oṃkṛtaṃ sukhāditvāt paranipātaḥ 
parastāc ca samāptau 
cakāreṇānoṃkṛtam iti saṃbadhyate 
sravati viśīryati ity ubhābhyām api naiṣphalyam adhyayanasya pratipādyate 
adhītaṃ brahma yasmin karmaṇi viniyujyeta tan niṣphalaṃ bhavatīti nindārthavādaś ca 
pākārthaṃ niṣiktasyāprāptapākakṣīrāder avacchidrite bhājane ya itas tato vikṣepaḥ prakṣaraṇaṃ tat sravatīty ucyate 
labdhapākasya piṇḍībhūtasya bhogyatāṃ prāptasya yo vināśaḥ sa viśaraṇam 
prākkūlān paryupāsīnaḥ pavitraiś caiva pāvitaḥ 
prāṇāyāmais tribhiḥ pūtas tata oṃkāram arhati 
kūlaśabdo darbhāgravacanaḥ 
tān paryupāsīnaḥ teṣu prāgagreṣu darbheṣūpaviṣṭa ity arthaḥ 
adhiśīṅsthāsām sthā ā āsām ity āṅā praśleṣāt karmatvam 
pari upa ā āsīna iti ihāpy āṅā śliṣṭanirdiṣṭo draṣṭavyaḥ 
paryupaśabdāv anarthakau 
pavitrair darbhair eva pāvitaḥ śucitvam āpāditaḥ 
aghamarṣaṇādis tu mantro neha pavitraśabdenocyate brahmacāriṇas tadānīm anadhītatvāt teṣām 
na ca darbhāḥ svasattāmātreṇa kāṃcit kriyām akurvataḥ pāvane karaṇaṃ bhavantīti 
avāntaravyāpārāpekṣayā smṛtyantare prāṇopasparśanaṃ pratīyate 
āha ca gautamaḥ prāṇopasparśanaṃ darbhaiḥ 
prākkūleṣv āsanaṃ ca 
prāṇāyāmais tribhiḥ pūtaḥ 
mukhanāsikāsaṃcārī vāyuḥ prāṇas tasyāyāmo nirodhaḥ śarīre dhāraṇaṃmbahir niṣkramaṇaniṣedhaḥ tasya smṛtyantare dharaṇakālasya mānaṃ samāmnātam 
mantrānusmaraṇaṃ ca 
pratipraṇavasaṃyuktāṃ gāyatrīṃ śirasā saha 
trir japed āyataprāṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa ucyate 
vasiṣṭhena bhagavatā mahāvyāhṛtayo 'py uktāḥ 
mantrāvasāna eva nirodhāvadhir anyasyānāmnātatvāt sarvasmṛtīnāṃ cāsati virodha ekārthatvād ihāpy evam evānuṣṭhānam 
nanu evam itaretarāśrayaḥ syād akṛteṣu prāṇāyāmeṣu oṃkāro na kartavyaḥ na coṃkāreṇa vinā prāṇāyāmo nivartate 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
trir japet iti prāṇāyāmeṣu mānasavyāpāreṇoṃkārasya smaraṇam ucyate 
na hi niruddhaprāṇasya śabdoccaraṇaṃ saṃbhavati 
yady api japaḥ kaścid vāgvyāpārasādhyo bhavati 
svādhyāyādhyayane tu punar uccāraṇaṃ vivakṣitam 
adhyayanakriyāyā evaṃrūpatvāc chabdakriyāyāṃ hy ayaṃ dhātuḥ śrotragrāhyaś ca śabdo na kevalena manasā gṛhyate 
na cāyam oṃkāradharmo yenānyatrāpi tasminn uccāryamāṇe 'pi prasajyeta 
uktaṃ ca svādhyāyārambhe kartavyaḥ iti 
oṃkāradharmatve hi laukikeṣu vākyeṣv om iti brūma ityādiṣu prasajyeta 
gautamena tu paṭhitam prāṇāyāmās trayaḥ pañcadaśa mātrāḥ iti 
mātrāśabdena cāvikṛtasya svarasyākārāder yāvān kālaḥ sa ucyate 
tatra virodhāt smṛtyantaroktaḥ kālo nāsti na ca mantrasmaraṇaṃ tatrānoṃkārā api prāṇāyāmāḥ santīti netaretarāśrayadoṣāpattiḥ 
tata oṃkāram arhati kartum iti śeṣaḥ 
yadāyaṃ samudāya eva rūḍhirūpeṇa praṇavavacanaḥ 
yadā tu karaṇaṃ kāraḥ 
om ity etasya kāra uccāraṇam oṃkāras tadā nāsti padāntarāpekṣā 
praṇavaśabdena kartavyatām uktvātroṃkāram ity anuvadaty ata etāv ekārthau 
tathā ca darśitam 
akāraṃ cāpy ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca prajāpatiḥ 
vedatrayān niraduhad bhūr bhuvaḥ svar itīti ca 
pūrvasya vidher arthavādaḥ 
akṣaratrayasamāhārarūpa oṃkāras tatraikaikasya vyutpattim āha 
vedatrayāt tribhyo vedebhyaḥ niraduhad uddhṛtavān yathā dadhno ghṛtam uddhriyate 
na kevalam akṣaratrayaṃ yāvad idam aparaṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti 
tribhya eva tu vedebhyaḥ pādaṃ pādam adūduhat 
tad ity ṛco 'syāḥ sāvitryāḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ 
ayaṃ tat savitur vareṇyam ity etasyāḥ gāyatryāḥ utpattyarthvādo vidhānārthaḥ 
pūrvaśloke cārthavādād eva vyāhṛtīnām api vidhānam 
kramas tu pāṭhāvagamyaḥ 
vakṣyati ca
etad akṣaram etāṃ ca japan vyāhṛtipūrvikām 
iti 
adūduhad uddhṛtavān iti 
yady api tad ity etat pratīkena tat savitur vṛṇīmahe iti vā śakyate sakṣayitum na tu sā tripadeti 
tripadaiva grāhyā 
tripadā caiva sāvitrīti 
kaśyapādayo 'pi prajāpatayaḥ santi 
ato viśinaṣṭi parameṣṭhīti hiraṇyagarbhaḥ 
sa hi parame sthāne 'nāvṛttilakṣaṇe sthitaḥ 
ādarātiśayārthaṃ caitat sāvitryāḥ 
sākṣāt kileyaṃ sarvamukhyena prajāpatinā vedebhyaḥ samuddhṛteti 
etad akṣaram etāṃ ca japan vyāhṛtipūrvikām 
saṃdhyayor vedavid vipro vedapuṇyena yujyate 
saty api svādhyāyavidhiprakaraṇa ekavākyāt saṃdhyājapavidhir ayam 
tatra gāyatryā anuvādaḥ praṇavavyāhṛtīnām aprāptavidhiḥ 
atra kaścid āha 
nāyaṃ saṃdhyāvidhir aprakaraṇāt 
vidhir hi bhavan brahmacāriṇaḥ syāt tasya prakṛtatvāt 
na ca tasya saṃbhavati 
iha hi vedavid ity ucyate 
na ca tasya prathamopanītasya vedavittvam asti 
api ca phalam atra śrūyate vedapuṇyena yujyate 
nityasya saṃdhyopāsanavidhiḥ na phalārthaḥ 
na caitad vidmaḥ kim idaṃ vedapuṇyaṃ nāma phalaṃ yena yogo 'yaṃ japa ucyate 
yadi tāvad vedādhyayanatvād yat puṇyam abhipretaṃ tadavāptir vedapuṇyena yogo 'bhipretas tatra yaḥ tāvad ayaṃ prakṛtaḥ svādhyāyavidhis tasya nārthāvabodhād ṛte kiṃcit palam asty aśrutatvād dṛṣṭatvāc cārthāvabodhasya kalpanāpi nāsti 
yaś ca gṛhasthādīnāṃ vidhiḥ ahar ahaḥ svādhyāyam adhīyīta iti so 'pi nitya eva 
yat tatra phalaśravaṇaṃ payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ madhu iti so 'rthavāda eva 
tasmān nāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
vidhau hi sarvam etad vivakṣitavyam 
yadā tv ayam arthavādas tadā japan iti prakṛtam adhyayanam ucyate vedapuṇyena ity etad api yathākathaṃcin nīyate 
atrocyate 
vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyata ity uktam eva 
yata eva vedavitpadaṃ saṃdhyāpadaṃ ca na prakṛtaviṣayatayānveti tata evānyatrāyam vidhiḥ 
saṃdhyayor etat trayaṃ japed ity etāvān vidhiḥ 
vedavitpadam anuvadiṣyate 
gṛhasthādīnāṃ vedavittvasya saṃbhavāt brahmacāriṇo vedavittvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cet kiṃ tadīyena saṃbhavena 
yathā prāptānuvāde hi sarvāśramiṇām adhikāraḥ 
kartṛviśeṣaṇe hi vedavitpade brahmacāriṇo nādhikāraḥ syāt 
kathaṃ punar asyānuvādaḥ 
vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt 
vidhau saṃdhyāvidhau prāpte praṇavavyāhṛtayas tāvad aprāptās tatra vidhātavyāḥ 
tatra yady aparaṃ vedavid iti vidhīyate tadā vākyabhedaḥ syāt 
prāpte hi karmaṇi nānekārthavidhānaṃ saṃbhavati 
praṇavavyāhṛtīnāṃ tu nānuvādaḥ saṃbhavati 
tenāyam atra vākyārthaḥ 
saṃdhyayor yat sāvitrīṃ japed ity uktaṃ tatrāyam aparo guṇaḥ praṇavavyāhṛtipūrvikāṃ tām japet 
vipragrahaṇaṃ ca tadā pradarśanārtham eva 
yad apy uktam phalam atra śrūyate nityaś cāyaṃ vidhiḥ saṃdhyāyāḥ 
ko nāmāyaṃ virodhaḥ 
nitya eva tasmin guṇe kāmo bhaviṣyati 
praṇavavyāhṛtiguṇakāt tasmād idaṃ phalam iti 
yathā godohanapraṇayanakād agnihotrāt paśavaḥ phalam godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet iti vākyasāmarthyena 
adhyetuś caitad uktam na tv ayaṃ kāmyo vidhiḥ 
smṛtyantare hi nitya evāyaṃ vidhiḥ spaṣṭa evoktaḥ
gāyatrīṃ śirasā sārdhaṃ japed vyāhṛtipūrvikām 
iti 
phalānām avagamo bhavataivoktaḥ 
ayaṃ hy artho vedapuṇyeneti 
vede yat saṃdhyopāsanāt puṇyam uktaṃ tena trikam etaj japan yujyate na kevalaṃ gāyatrīm 
puṇyaṃ ca dharmaḥ vedamūlatvāt smṛtīnāṃ smṛtyuktam api vedapuṇyatayā vyapadiśyate vedasya puṇyaṃ vedapuṇyam 
kiṃ ca vedasya puṇyam 
yat tena pratipādyate 
paṭhyamānad vedād yaj jāyate tad api śakyate tasyeti vaktum kiṃ tv asādhāraṇatvāt pratipādyam eva yuktaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ notpādyam 
yāgādayo dharmam utpādayanti pratipādakas tu veda eva 
ye 'py antyasya pādasya sāmarthyam āhuḥ yad uktaṃ nityasvādyāyaḥ iti tatra saṃdhyāyāṃ trikajapād eva kṛtārthā bhavantīti 
tad apy asat 
evaṃ sati tena vidhinā vikalpeta 
tatra ca pākṣiko nityasvādhyayatāyā bādhaḥ syāt 
na cābādhe saṃbhavati bādho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ 
etad akṣaram ity oṃkārasya pratinirdeśaḥ 
nanu ca naitad ekam akṣaram 
dve vā trīṇi vā 
ucyate 
akṣaraśabdena kevalaṃ svara ucyate vyañjanasaṃyogaś ca 
tatreha yādṛśaḥ prakṛtaḥ tādṛśasyābhidhānam 
etāṃ ca tat savitur vareṇyam iti sāvitrīm 
vyāhṛtayaḥ pūrvā yasyās tām vyāhṛtipūrvikāṃ 
tisraḥ prakṛtā eva tā vyāhṛtayo gṛhyante prakṛtaparatvād asya na sapta satyāntāḥ 
sahasrakṛtvas tv abhyasya bahir etat trikaṃ dvijaḥ 
mahato 'py enaso māsāt tvacevāhir vimucyate 
bahir ity anāvṛto deśa ucyate 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
grāmanagarābhyāṃ bahir araṇye nadīpulinādau 
sahasravārān abhyasya āvartya 
nanu kṛtvasuco 'py āvṛttiḥ pratipādyate abhyasyety anenāpi 
tatra paunaruktyam 
sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvād adoṣaḥ 
abhyasyety anena sāmānyato 'bhyāsa uktas tatra viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sahasrakṛtveti 
na ca kṛtvasujantād evobhayāvagatis tasya kriyāviśeṣāpekṣatvāt 
na hi devadattaḥ pañcakṛtvo 'hna ity ukte yāvad bhuṅkta iti nocyate tāvād vākyārthaḥ samāpyate 
nanu cābhyasyety anenāpi na kācid viśiṣṭā kriyopāttā 
satyam 
japaḥ prakṛtas tam abhyasyeti pratīyate 
āvṛttiḥ paunaḥpuṇyena sevā 
mahato 'py enasaḥ 
mahat pāpaṃ ca brahmahatyādi 
tato 'pi mucyate kiṃ punar upapātakebhyaḥ 
apiḥ saṃbhāvane na samuccaye 
bhedopādānena samuccayāvagamo yathā devadattasyātra prabhutvaṃ yajñadattasyāpi 
iha na tathā nirdeśaḥ 
kebhyaḥ punar upapātakebhyo 'yaṃ mokṣa ucyate 
govadhādīny upapātakāni 
tāni ca pratipāpam āmnātaprāyaścittāni sarahasyāni 
yāni vā saṃvetti na kṛtāny anuktaparihārāṇy avaśyaṃbhāvitayā ca jñāyate kṛtānīti 
teṣām api nityāni saṃdhyopāsanādīny apanodakāni 
yadi caitat prāyaścittaṃ syāt tadā tatraivāvakṣyat japed vai niyatāhāraḥ trir vai vedasya saṃhitām itivat 
prāyaścitte cāsmin prāyaścittaprakaṇam evānarthakaṃ syāt 
ko hi daivaśapto japamātrasādhyāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ hitvā kṛcchreṣu śarīraprāṇahareṣv adhyavasyet 
uktaṃ ca 
arke cen madhu vindeta kim arthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet 
iṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptau ko vidvān yatnam ācaret 
tathā
paṇalabhyaṃ hi na prājñaḥ krīṇāti daśabhiḥ paṇaiḥ  iti

atrocyate 
vidhir evāyam 
pāpapramocanārtha evāyaṃ prayogaḥ 
yat tūktaṃ viṣamaśiṣṭair vikalpo na sidhyati iti japaprāyaścitta evāsmin vikalpārtho bhaviṣyati 
aghamarṣaṇādibhiḥ sarvapāpāpanodanam uktam tenāsya vikalpaḥ 
aghamarṣaṇe hi tryaham upavāsa uktaḥ 
ihāśnann eva māsikena prayogeṇa śudhyati 
tato na dūraviprakṛṣṭena tapasā pramīyate yena viṣamaśiṣṭatā syāt 
atha vā pūrvakṛtasyainasaḥ śuddhir eṣā grahādausthityādisūcite daive doṣe 
tasmān mokṣaḥ 
aniṣṭam ena ucyate 
tasmān mucyate 
tatphalena na saṃbadhyata ity arthaḥ 
tvacevahiḥ 
jīrṇayā tvacā muktaḥ sarpo yathā bhavati 
niravaśeṣeṇa pāpanāśa etena pratipādyate 
yat tu dauścarmādisūcitaṃ pūrvakṛtam aśubhaṃ tatra smṛtyantare prāyaścittam āmnātaṃ bahu 
tat prāyaścitteṣv eva nidarśayiṣyāmaḥ 
etad evābhipretyoktam 
japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva vinipāto na dṛśyate 
iti  
etayarcā visaṃyuktaḥ kāle ca kriyayā svayā
brahmakṣatriyaviḍyonir garhaṇāṃ yāti sādhuṣu 
etayā sāvitryā 
visaṃyukto hīnasaṃdhyopāsanas tyaktasvādhyāyaś ca 
garhaṇāṃ nindāṃ sādhuṣu viśiṣṭeṣu yāti prāpnoti 
kīdṛśīṃ garhaṇāṃ prāpnoty ata āha kāle ca kriyayā svayā 
kālaḥ ā ṣoḍaśād ity asmin viyukte gate nindyate 
evam upanīto 'pi svādhyāyārambhayogyaḥ sāvitrīvarjito vrātya eva bhavati 
trayāṇāṃ yā sādhāraṇī svakriyā seha nirdiṣṭā 
sā copanayanam eva 
kālaśabdaś caivamarthavān 
adhyayanādisvakarmavivakṣāyām etāvad eva vācyaṃ syāt yat kriyayā svayeti 
yoniśabdo janmaparyāyo jātyarthaṃ gamayati 
viprādijātīya ity arthaḥ 
arthavādo 'yaṃ vrātyaprāyaścittārthaḥ 
oṃkārapūrvikās tisro mahāvyāhṛtayo 'vyayāḥ 
tripadā caiva sāvitrī vijñeyaṃ brahmaṇo mukham 
oṃkāraḥ pūrvo yāsāṃ tā oṃkārapūrvikāḥ 
mahāvyāhṛtayaḥ prakṛtā eva bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ity ete śabdā abhidhīyante 
avyayā avināśinyaḥ 
phalasya dīrghakālatvād evam ucyate 
anyathā sarva eva śabdā nityāḥ iti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam 
tripadā tat savitur ity eṣā sāvitrī brahmaṇo mukham 
ādyatvān mukhavyapadeśaḥ ataś cārambhe adhyeyam etad ity asyaivārthavādaḥ 
atha vā mukhaṃ dvāram upāyo brahmaprāptir anena bhavatīty etad evāha 
yo 'dhīte 'hany ahany etāṃ trīṇi varṣāṇy atandritaḥ 
sa brahma param abhyeti vāyubhūtaḥ khamūrtimān 
ākāśa iva sarvavyāpī vibhuḥ saṃpadyate khamūrtiḥ khasvabhāvavān bhavati 
na tu mūrtiḥ śarīram ākāśasya śarīrābhāvāt 
atha kim idaṃ brahma yad rūpāpattir ucyate 
paramātmānandarūpaḥ yasyeme kṣetrajñāḥ pavanajavoddhatasya vārirāśer ivormayaḥ 
te yathā praśāntāvasthe tasmiṃs tadrūpā bhavanti 
evam amī tadrūpā ātmānaḥ saṃpadyante 
viśeṣataś ca sarvam etad dvādaśe vakṣyate 
adhyayanam idaṃ gāyatryāś coditaṃ na japo na cāvṛttigaṇanāsti 
atandrita itivacanād bahukṛtvaḥ karaṇaṃ pratīyate 
sakṛtprayoge hi nāsti tandrāśaṅkā 
mokṣārthino 'yaṃ vidhiḥ 
ekākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma prāṇāyāmāḥ paraṃ tapaḥ 
sāvitryās tu paraṃ nāsti maunāt satyaṃ viśiṣyate 
oṃkāra ekākṣaram 
tat paraṃ brahma brahmaprāptihutvāt 
tajjapas tadarthabhāvanam tayā brahmaprāpter evam ucyate 
om iti brahmābhidhānam 
evaṃ hy āhuḥ tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ iti 
tatparaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ kutaḥ 
anyābhyaḥ brahmopāsanābhyaḥ 
annaṃ brahmety upāsīta ādityo brahmety ādeśaḥ iti evamādyābhya upāsanābhyaḥ oṃkāropāsanā prakṛṣyate adhyayanād eva tatprāptyabhidhānāt śabdasyaiva ca brahmatvena śravaṇāt 
śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati iti 
sarvo hy artho vāgvyavahārānatītaḥ vācaś ca sarvasyā oṃkāro mūlam 
tathā ca śrutiḥ tad yathā śaṃkunā sarvāṇi patrāṇi saṃtṛṇṇāny evam oṃkāreṇa sarvā vāk saṃtṛṇṇā 
oṃkāra evedaṃ sarvam iti 
saṃtardanam anusṛtiḥ āśrayabhāvāpattir vā 
kathaṃ punaḥ sarvā vāg oṃkāreṇa saṃtṛṇṇā 
vaidikyās tāvad oṃkārapūrvakatvam uktam 
laukikyā api tadādīni vākyāni syuḥ ity āpastambavacanāt 
upaniṣadbhāṣye caitad anyathā vyākhyātam 
tat tv ihānupayogān na pradarśitam 
prāṇāyāmaśabda ācamanavad viśiṣṭetikartavyatāke prāṇanirodhe vartate 
paraṃ tapaḥ cāndrāyaṇādibhyaḥ 
kiṃ punas tasya śraiṣṭhyam 
bhaktir eṣā 
sāvitryāḥ paraṃ mantrajñānaṃ nāsti 
eṣām iti praśaṃsā 
maunāt satyaṃ viśiṣyate 
maunaṃ vāṅniyama ucyate 
tasya ca yat phalaṃ tato 'dhikaṃ satyavacanāt prāpyate 
satyavacane vidhyartho 'pi tathānuṣṭhito bhavati 
maune tu kevalam anṛtapratiṣedhānuṣṭhānam eva 
arthavādo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
kṣaranti sarvā vaidikyo juhotiyajatikriyāḥ 
akṣaraṃ tv akṣaraṃ jñeyaṃ brahma caiva prajāpatiḥ 
yāvantaḥ kecana vaidikā homā agnihotrādayaḥ ye ca yāgā jyotiṣṭhomādayaḥ te sarve kṣaranti na paripūrṇā bhavanti 
phalaṃ vā tadīyaṃ sravaty āśu vinaśyati 
akṣaraṃ tv etad oṃkārākhyam akṣaraṃ jñeyam akṣayaphalam 
brahmībhūtasya na punaḥ saṃsārāpattiḥ 
ato 'kṣayaphalatvād akṣaram ucyate 
eko 'kṣaraśabda uddeśyaḥ saṃjñāśabdo dvitīyo yaugikaḥ kriyāśabdaḥ 
brahma ca tad eva 
prajāpatiś coṃkāra eva 
stutir eṣā 
juhotiyajatīti dhātunirdeśas tayoḥ kriyāpratipādyārthā yāgahomāḥ 
vyaktyapekṣaṃ bahutvam 
atha vā dhātvarthanirdeśa evāyaṃ juhotiyajatīti 
kriyās tadvyatiriktā dānādyāḥ 
dvandvaś cāyam juhotiyajatīti ca kriyāś ca 
homayāgau prādhānyāt pṛthag upādīyete 
atroktā oṃkārasya stutiḥ kevalasyāpi japavidhānārtheti kecit 
na hi prakṛtavidhiśeṣataivātra punaḥ parāmarśābhāvāt 
vaiśvānare hy aṣṭatvādīnām yad aṣṭākapālo bhavati gāyatryā cainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti yan navakapālas trivṛtaivāsmiṃs tejo dadhāti iti 
sarvatra vaiśvānarapadāpekṣayā tadekavākyatve saṃbhavati na vākyabhedakalpanayā vidhyantarasaṃbhavaḥ 
iha tv akṣaraṃ jñeyam iti na pūrvāpekṣā nāpi sāvitryādīnāṃ punaḥ parāmarśo 'sti 
ataḥ svapadārthair eva vākyārthaparisamāpter nānyaśeṣatā 
jñeyam ity atra kṛtvo vidhāyakaḥ 
brahmapadena ca saṃbandhād brahmarūpatayā jñeyam upāsyaṃ bhāvanīyam 
bhāvyamāne ca tasmin mānasajapa ukto bhavati 
vidhiyajñāj japayajño viśiṣṭo daśabhir guṇaiḥ 
upāṃśuḥ syāc chataguṇaḥ sāhasro mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ 
vidhiviṣayo yajño vidhiyajño jyotiṣṭomādiḥ 
yat karma yajeteti coditam bāhyena vyāpāreṇa ṛtvigādisarvāṅgasaṃpattyā kriyate sa vidhiyajña ihocyate 
japas tu na yajñaḥ 
praśaṃsayā yajña upacāreṇocyate 
ato nāsau vidhiyajñaḥ 
sa viśiṣṭaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ śreṣṭho yajño jyotiṣṭomāder daśabhir guṇaiḥ 
mahāphalatvam etena japasyocyate 
yad eva yāgāt phalaṃ tad eva bahutaraṃ japāt pāpyate 
na ca yāgebhyaḥ śrautebhyo japasyādhikaphalatvaṃ yuktam 
tathā hi sati kaḥ śarīradhanaparikṣayarūpeṣu yāgeṣv adhyavasyet 
tasmāt praśaṃsaiṣā 
pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnotītivat 
etāvad asyārthaḥ tad eva svargādiphalam avāpyate kiṃ tu lokavat prayatnaviśeṣāt 
phalaparimāṇaviśeṣo 'viśeṣitvāt yajñasya svargagrāmaputrapaśvādi yasya yajñasya yat phalaṃ tat tajjapāt prāpyate 
upāṃśuḥ śataguṇaḥ yad anyo na śṛṇoti samīpastho 'pi 
sahasra guṇaḥ sāhasro mānasaḥ manovyāpāramātreṇa yaś cintyate 
japamātraviṣaya upāṃśutvādiguṇaḥ prakṛtasya yo 'dhītety anena vicchedāt tena ya prāyaścittādau japo yaḥ śāntiko yaś cābhyudayikaḥ sarvatraite guṇāḥ 
sahasram asyāstīti sāhasraḥ 
guṇānāṃ prakṛtatvāt sahasraguṇasadbhāvaḥ pratīyate 
guṇaśabdaś cāvayavavacanaḥ 
phalabhūmā ca saṃbandhād avagamyate 
ye pākayajñāś catvāro vidhiyajñasamanvitāḥ 
sarve te japayajñasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm 
mahāyajñāḥ pākayajñā ucyante brahmayajñaṃ varjayitvā catvāro yajñā bhavanti 
vidhiyajñā uktās taiḥ samanvitāḥ sahitāḥ 
kalām aṃśaṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ nārhanti 
ṣoḍaśena bhāgena na samā bhavanti 
atha vārhatiḥ prāptyaṅge mūlyapaṇane vartate 
arhaśabdāt tipaṃ kṛtvā arhanti rūpam 
japyenaiva tu saṃsidhyed brāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ 
kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate 
japyenaiva siddhiṃ kāmyaphalāvāptiṃ brahmaprāptiṃ vā prāpnuyāt 
nātra hṛdi saṅkā kartavyā 
yaj jyotiṣṭomādibhyo mahāprayāsebhyo bhāvanābhyaś ca yal labdhavyaṃ yaj japena kathaṃ sidhyatīti 
sidhyaty eva 
kuryād anyad anityaṃ jyotiṣṭomādi 
atha vā tad api na kuryād yato maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate 
mitram eva maitram 
sarvabhūtamaitrīratena brāhmaṇena bhavitavyam 
agniṣoṃiyapaśuhiṃsāyāṃ ca kuto maitrī 
ayam arthavād eva na punaḥ paśvaṅgakarmapratiṣedhaḥ pūrvaśeṣatvāvagateḥ 
pratyakṣaśrutivihitatvāc ca teṣām 
atikrānto japavidhiḥ 
indriyāṇāṃ vicaratāṃ viṣayeṣv apahāriṣu 
saṃyame yatnam ātiṣṭhed vidvān yanteva vājinām 
indriyāṇāṃ saṃyame yatnam ātiṣṭhed ity etāvāñ chāstrārthaḥ 
pariśiṣṭo 'rthavādaḥ ā saṃdhyopāsanavidheḥ 
saṃyamaḥ pratiṣiddheṣu viṣayeṣu pravṛttiparihāro 'pratiṣiddheṣv apy atisaktivarjanam 
tatra pratiṣiddhaparihāras tair eva pratiṣedhaiḥ siddhaḥ 
apratisiddheṣv apy atisaktiniṣedhārtho 'yaṃ ślokasaṃghātaḥ 
etad evāha 
vicaratāṃ viṣayeṣu svātantryeṇa vastuśaktyā pravartamānānām 
apahāriṣu viṣayeṣv apaharanty ākarṣanty ātmasātkurvanti pāratantryam āpādayanti puruṣaṃ ta apahāriṇo viṣayā manoharā ya ucyante 
tatra vicaratāṃ vividhaṃ viśeṣeṇa caratām 
yadīndriyāṇi viśeṣeṇa na careyur aparihāriṇo 'pi tadā viṣayāḥ kiṃ kuryuḥ 
bhavantu vā niraṅkuśānīndriyāṇi yadi viṣayāḥ pratyākhyāyikās tathāpi susaṃyamaḥ puruṣeṇātmā 
yatas tūbhayaṃ sāparādham ato yatna āstheyaḥ durniyamāni hy etāni 
niyanteva vājinām 
yantā sārathir aśvānāṃ yathā rathayuktānāṃ svabhāvato vicalanaśīlānāṃ saṃyame niyame yatnaṃ karoti te na tadānicchayā unmārgeṇa vahanti vidheyatāṃ tasya bhajanta evam indriyāṇi vidheyīkartavyāni 
ekādaśendriyāṇy āhur yāni pūrve manīṣiṇaḥ 
tāni samyak pravakṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ 
saṃkhyānirdeśo 'yaṃ pramāṇāntaragamyo na śāstrārthaḥ sauhārdena tu vyutpādyate 
tāni pūrve manīṣiṇa āhuḥ 
parastān nāmataḥ karmataś ca vakṣyāmi 
ānupūrvyam anākulatā 
pūrvagrahaṇān neyaṃ tārkikair eva vyavasthā kalpitā kiṃ tu pūrveṣām apy ācāryāṇāṃ sthitaiva 
etām ajānanto nāgamikā iti lokair upahasyante ity ato 'yaṃ veditavyaḥ 
prasiddhāḥ padārthā vyākhyātāś ca prāk 
śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī 
pāyūpasthaṃ hastapādaṃ vāk caiva daśamī smṛtā 
śrotrādīni prasiddhāni 
adhiṣṭhānabhedāc cakṣuṣī iti dvivacanam 
anyatra tadādhārāyāḥ śakter ekatvād ekavacanam 
upasthaḥ śukrotsarjanaḥ puṃso rajas tadādhāraś ca striyāḥ 
dvandvanirdiṣṭayoḥ prāṇyaṅgatvād ekavadbhāvaḥ 
vāk tālvādiḥ śabdābhivyañjakaḥ śarīrāvayavavacanaḥ 
nāmanirdeśo 'yam 
buddhīndriyāṇi pañcaiṣāṃ śrotrādīny anupūrvaśaḥ 
karmendriyāṇi pañcaiṣāṃ pāyvādīni pracakṣate 
kāryam idānīm eṣām āha svarūpāvadhāraṇārtham 
na hi tāni prayakṣāni 
buddhīndriyāṇi buddher indriyāṇi janakāni kāryakaraṇāni 
kāryakaraṇasaṃbandhe ṣaṣṭhī 
śrotrādīny anupūrvaśaḥ 
ādiśabdasya prakārārthatā mā vijñāyīti 
anupūrvaśaḥ krameṇety arthaḥ 
kramaś ca saṃniveśāpekṣo bhavaty ataḥ pūrvaślokoktā vyavasthāśrīyate 
karmendriyāṇi 
parispandātmakam atra karma vivakṣitam 
ekādaśaṃ mano jñeyaṃ svaguṇenobhayātmakam 
yasmin jite jitāv etau bhavataḥ pañcakau gaṇau 
ekādaśasaṃkhyāpūrakaṃ mana indriyāṇām 
svo guṇo manasaḥ saṃkalpaḥ 
tenobhayaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ vā saṃkalpyate 
atha vā buddhīndriyeṣu karmendriyeṣu svaviṣayapravṛttau saṃkalpamūlatvād ubhayātmakam ucyate 
yasmiñ jite etau buddhīndriyavargaḥ karmendriyavargaś ca pañcakau prākpradarśitaparimāṇau jitau bhataḥ 
tattvākhyānam etat 
indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayam 
saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhiṃ nigacchati 
prasaṅgas tatparatā 
tena hetubhūtena doṣaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ ca ṛcchati prāpnoti 
nātra saṃśayo niścitam etat 
saṃniyamya tāni indriyāṇi tataḥ siddhim abhipretārthāvāptiṃ śrautasmārtakarmaṇām anuṣṭhānaphalaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ gacchati prāpnoti 
na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati 
haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate 
tiṣṭhatu tāvad viṣayābhilāṣaḥ śāstropadeśān na kriyate 
kiṃ tu dṛṣṭam eva sukhaṃ tāvan nivṛtter bhavati 
tathā hi sevyamānā viṣayā api adhikaṃ garddham utpādayanty udarapūraṃ bhuktavatas tṛptasyātisauhityam api gatavato bhavati hṛdayasamīhā kim iti śaknomi anyad bhoktum aśaktyā tu na pravartate 
tato naiṣā bhogena śakyā nivṛttir na kadācit kāmo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāmānāṃ kāmyamānānāṃ spṛhaṇīyānām arthānām upabhogena sevayā śāmyati nivartate 
bhūyo 'dhikataraṃ vardhate 
haviṣā ghṛtena kṛṣṇavartmā agnir iva 
duḥkharūpaś cābhilāṣaḥ 
anupabhuktarasasya tv abhilāṣānutpattiḥ 
tattvaprasaṃkhyānam etat 
uktaṃ ca 
yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavas striyaḥ 
nālam ekasya tat sarvam iti matvā śamaṃ vrajet 
yaś caitān prāpnuyāt sarvān yaś caitān kevalāṃs tyajet 
prāpaṇāt sarvakāmānāṃ parityāgo viśiṣyate 
pūrvoktaṃ hetutvenopajīvyāyaṃ nigamaślokaḥ paṭhitaḥ 
yadā sevayā vardhate kāmaḥ ato ya etān kāmān kāmī sarvān prāpnuyāt sevetānekamaṇḍaleśvara iva taruṇaḥ yaś caitāṃś tyajati kevalāni īṣad api na spṛśati naiṣṭhika eva bālaḥ 
tayor yaḥ prāpako bhoktā tasmāt sa viśiṣyate atiśayena śreṣṭho bhavati yaḥ parityajed iti 
etac cātmapratyakṣam 
na tathaitāni śakyante saṃniyantum asevayā 
viṣayeṣu praduṣṭāni yathā jñānena nityaśaḥ 
yady evam araṇyavāsa eva tarhi prāpte na hi tatra viṣayā saṃnidhīyante 
asaṃnihitāś ca na seviṣyante 
tadartham āha nāsevayā indriyāṇi niyantavyānīti 
niḥsukhaḥ syāt 
atha ca smaranti na pūrvāhṇamadhaṃdināparāhṇān aphalān kuryād yathāśaktidharmārthakāmebhyaḥ 
na ca śarīradhāraṇam asevayā bhavati 
kiṃ tu garddhaniṣedho 'yam ucyate 
sa ca garddhaḥ satyām api sevayāṃ jñānena viṣayagatadoṣajñānena asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutam ityādiśāstroktena svasaṃvidā ca vipākavirasatayā 
kiṃ vipākaphalam evādidoṣabhāvanayā vairāgyābhyāsena krameṇa spṛhā nivartate 
na tu sahasaiva tyaktuṃ śakyate 
kiṃ tu nityaśaḥ nityakālam 
jñānaviśeṣaṇam etat 
praduṣṭāni pravṛttāni 
doṣatvāt pravṛttāny eva praduṣṭāny ucyante 
ayaṃ śas tatra tatra nityaśaḥ anupūrvaśaḥ sarvaśaḥ pūrvaśa iti vyāsamanuprabhṛtibhir mahāmunibhiḥ prayujyate 
tasya sādhutve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tatra śasvidhau ekavacanāc ca vīpsāyām iti paṭhyate 
tatra vīpsārthaḥ kathaṃcit dyotayitavyaḥ 
anye tu śasas tiṣṭhatyarthasya kvipi rūpaṃ varṇayanti 
kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ caitat napuṃsakam 
nityasthitena jñānenety arthaḥ 
vedās tyāgaś ca yajñāś ca niyamāś ca tapāṃsi ca 
na vipraduṣṭabhāvasya siddhiṃ gacchanti karhicit 
ayam atra vidhir eva 
vedās tadviṣayam adhyananajapādi 
tyāgo dānaṃ lakṣaṇayā 
atha vāpratiṣiddhasyāpi madhumāṃsabhakṣaṇāder nivṛttiḥ phaladety anena varjanam 
vipraduṣṭo bhāvaś cittaṃ yasya tasya 
siddhiṃ na gacchanti phalasādhakāni na bhavanti kasmiṃścid api kāle 
ato 'nuṣṭhānakāle nābhipretādigatamānasena bhavitavyam 
śakyaṃ tarhi sarvetaravikalpatiraskareṇa karmaṇi mana ādheyam 
aṅgaṃ hi karmasu viṣayacintātyāgo 'nena vākyena vihitaḥ 
tadabhāve karmanaiṣphalyaṃ syāt 
eṣa hi bhāvadoṣo yat karmānuṣṭhāne pravṛttasya tatparatātyāgena vyasaneṣu mano 'vadhānam 
śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā ca yo naraḥ 
na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sa vijñeyo jitendriyaḥ 
śrutvā vaṃśagītādidhvanim tvaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ ityādivacanaṃ śrutvā na hṛṣyati 
rūkṣaparuṣākrośavācaḥ śrutvā na glāyati na manoduḥkhaṃ bhajati 
glāniḥ khedaḥ 
spṛṣṭvā rāṅkavakauśeyādivastram ajalomakutapaṃ ca samatvenānubhavati 
evaṃ suveṣataruṇījananaṭaprekṣāsu śatrudarśane ca samaḥ

tṛtīyarthe tasiḥ

ārambhakālas tv iha noktaḥ saṃdhyāśabdenaiva samarpitatvāt

nitya eva naityakaḥ 
nityo 'yaṃ vidhir ity evaṃ sthitaprajñaḥ

anye tu vidhir vidhā prakāra itykartavyatetyādi cakṣate

asya tu vidhes tadā nityatvaṃ brahmasatraṃ hi tat smṛtam ityādivākyebhyo 'vasātavyam

anadhyāyeṣv adhyetavyam 
na nirodha iti vā pāṭhaḥ

dṛṣṭānto vāyam 
vedāṅgeṣv iva vede 'py anadhyāyo nāsti

etac ca pradarśanārtham 
śaśvajjapapraiṣādimantrāṇāṃ karmāṅgānāṃ vaidikavākyoccāraṇamātradharmo 'nadhyāyānadhyayanaṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidhiprayukta iti manyamāno homādimantreṣu caturdaśyādiṣv anuccāraṇaṃ prapadyeta yaḥ sa nyāyasiddhenārthenānūdyamānena pratibodhyate 
svādhyāyādhyayanavidhiprayuktam anadhyāyānukramaṇaṃ na vedadharmaḥ tato nāsti karmāṅgamantreṣv anadhyāyaḥ 
naityake svādhyāye pūrveṇa vākyena sarvāśramiṇāṃ vihite nitye svādhyāyavidhau 
naityake nāsty anadhyāyo brahmasatraṃ hi tat smṛtam 
brahmāhutihutaṃ puṇyam anadhyāyavaṣaṭkṛtam 
pūrvavidhiśeṣo 'yam arthavādaḥ

svaḥ putraḥ upanītaś ca 
pūrve anyopanītā apy adhyāpyāḥ 
nanu ca dharmata ity ucyate etair adhyāpitair dharmo bhavati 
arthadaś ca dṛṣṭenopakaroti 
tatra kuto 'dṛṣṭakalpanā 
kenoktaṃ kalpaneti 
śrute kā kalpanā 
sākṣād eva hi śrutam adhyāpyā daśa dharmata iti 
upādhyāyas tv āha dharmaśāstravyavasthocyate 
etair adhyāpitair dharmātikramo na bhavati na punar arthade adhyāpite vidyādānalakṣaṇo dharmo bhavati 
nāpṛṣṭaḥ kasyacid brūyān na cānyāyena pṛcchataḥ 
jānann api hi medhāvī jaḍaval loka ācaret 
adhīyānenānupasannena yadi nāśitam apākṣaraṃ visvaraṃ vādhītaṃ tadāpṛṣṭena na vaktavyam nāśitaṃ tvayaivam etat paṭhitavyam iti 
śiṣyasya tv apṛcchato 'pi vaktavyam 
pṛcchamāno 'pi yady anyāyena pṛcchati tathāpi na vaktavyam 
praśayapūrvakam asmin vastuni me saṃdehas tad upadeṣṭum arhasi iti śiṣyadharmeṇa praśno nyāyena 
anyathā tu jānann api jaḍavan mūka iva loke varteta ācared ajña iva tūṣṇīm āsīta 
śāstraviṣayo 'yam apṛṣṭasaṃdehāpanayananiṣedhaḥ 
vyavahāre tu vakṣyati niyukto vāniyukto vā dharmajño vaktum arhati iti 
anye tv aviśeṣeṇecchanti 
adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati 
tayor anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati 
asya pratiṣedhasyātikrame doṣam āha 
adharmeṇa pṛṣṭo 'nyāyapṛṣṭaś ca yaḥ prabravīti evam etad uktam adhyetum iti 
yaś ca pṛcchati 
tāv ubhāv api mriyete aprāptakālau 
athaiko vyatikramakārī sa eva mriyate 
yady anyāyena pṛṣṭo na vakti tadā praṣṭaiva vātha prativakti tadobhāv api 
anenānyāyapraśne doṣadarśanena praṣṭur nyāyyaḥ praśnavidhiḥ 
didveṣaṃ vā dveṣyatāṃ loke prāpnoti 
dharmārthau yatra na syātāṃ śuśrūṣā vāpi tadvidhā 
tatra vidyā na vaptavyā śubhaṃ bījam ivoṣare 
yad uktam adhyāpyā daśa dharmataḥ iti tasyaivāyaṃ prakārāntareṇa saṃkṣepataḥ pratinirdeśaḥ nāpūrvārthābhidhānam prakṛtānuvādatvāt 
arthaśabda upakāramātralakṣaṇāparo draṣṭavyaḥ vidyāvinimayenāpi pūrvam adhyayanasyoktatvāt 
tadvidhā adhyāpanānurūpā 
mahati mahatī svalpe svalpeti 
tatra vidyā 
vidyate jñāyate yayā sarvo 'rtha iti sā vidyā pāṭho 'rthāvabodhaś ca 
anupakārī nādhyāpyaḥ na cāsyārthavivaraṇaṃ kartavyam 
uṣaro bhūmibhāga ucyate yasminn akhile 'pi mṛttikādoṣād bījaṃ na prarohati 
śubhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vrīhyādikaṃ lāṅgalādinopyate 
evaṃ vidyāpi kṣetre hy uptā mahāphalā bhavati 
na caitan mantavyam artham ādāya yad adhyāpanaṃ sā bhṛtiḥ 
na hi paṇaparimāṇasaṃbhāṣaṇapūrvikā tatra pravṛttiḥ yadeyad dadāsi tadaitad adhyāpayāmi iti 
etad bhṛte rūpam 
na punar arthopakāragandhamātreṇa 
yat tu na pūrvaṃ kiṃcid gurave upakurvīteti nāsau pūrvopakārapratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tu snāsyatāvaśam ājñaptena gurvartho yathāśakti saṃpādyaḥ 
taccheṣa eva pratiṣedho na pṛthag vākyam 
vidyayaiva samaṃ kāmaṃ martavyaṃ brahmavādinā 
āpady api hi ghorāyāṃ na tv enām iriṇe vapet 
samaṃśabdaḥ sahārthe 
apratipāditayā svadeha eva jarjaritayā yuktaṃ brahmavādino vedādhyāyino maraṇam na punar apātre pratipādanam 
anena ca jñāyate adhyāpanam apy adhītavedenāvaśyaṃ kartavyam na kevalaṃ vṛttyartham 
nāpi vāryādidānavat phalakāmasyaivādhikāraḥ 
tathā ca śrutiḥ yo hi vidyām adhītyārthine na brūyāt sa kāryahā syāt 
śreyaso dvāram apāvṛṇuyāt 
adhyāpayen mahad etad yaśasyaṃ vāco 'dhikāraṃ kavayo vadanti 
asmin yoge sarvam idaṃ pratiṣṭhitam 
ya evaṃ vidur amṛtā te bhavanti 
sa kāryahā syāt ity anenānadhyāpane doṣam anuvadantī śrutir evāvaśyakartavyatāṃ jñāpayati 
iriṇe pūrvoktaprayojanatrayābhāvo yatra 
āpady api hi ghorāyāṃ kaṣṭāyām api 
kaṣṭā āpaduktaśiṣyābhāvaḥ 
etac cāvaśyakartavye saty upapadyate 
nityatve hi mukhyābhāve pratinidhiśiṣyopādānenādhyapananivṛttiḥ prāptā 
vrīhyabhāvavan nīvāraiḥ 
ato 'syām avasthāyām adhyāpanādhikāranivṛttir eva 
yathoktalakṣaṇātithyabhāve 'tithipūjānivṛttiḥ 
vaped iti lakṣaṇayā bījadharmeṇādhyapanam ucyate 
bījaṃ kila kṣetroptaṃ bahuphalaṃ bhavaty evaṃ vidyāpi 
anye tu dhanābhāvanimittām āpadam ācakṣate 
atyantadurgatenāpi neriṇe vaptavyeti varaṃ mriyatām 
sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti naiṣa vidhir atikrānto bhavati saty api tathāvidhādhyāpane vṛttyupāye 
tad etad ayuktam 
arthado naiveriṇam pūrvoktānuvādatvād iriṇaśabdasya 
yadi cārthado 'pi na bhavati katham āpadi tatra pravṛttiḥ saṃbhāvyate yā niṣidhyate 
vidyā brāhmaṇam etyāha śevadhiṣṭe 'smi rakṣa mām 
asūyakāya mām mādās tathā syāṃ vīryavattamā 
ayam apy arthavāda eva 
vidyā mūrtimatī kaṃcid upādhyāyam āgatya āha proktavatī 
śevadhir nidhis tava asmi rakṣa mām 
kā punas te rakṣā 
asūyakāya kutsākarāya nindakāya māṃ mādāḥ 
nindakaṃ mādhyāpaya 
tathā caivam ahaṃ vīryavattamā atiśayena tava kāryakāriṇī bhavāmi 
vīryaṃ kāryanivṛttau sāmarthyātiśayaḥ 
śevadhiṣṭe 'smi iti kṛtaṣatvaṃ paṭhitaṃ tacchāndasaprayogānukaraṇam 
yam eva tu śuciṃ vidyā niyataṃ brahmacāriṇam 
tasmai māṃ brūhi viprāya nidhipāyāpramādine 
yaṃ śiṣyaṃ śuciṃ jānīyāḥ niyataṃ saṃyatendriyaṃ yatnaparaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ tasmai māṃ brūhi 
yo hi nidhiṃ pāti rakṣati 
yato 'sāv apramādī na pramādyati na skhalati tatparatvāt 
śaktāptārthadādīnāṃ sarvaśiṣyāṇām etadguṇasaṃyoge deyety asmād arthavādād gamyate 
brahma yas tv ananujñātam adhīyānād avāpnuyāt 
sa brahmasteyasaṃyukto narakaṃ pratipadyate 
yo 'bhyāsārtham adhīyānasyānyaṃ coddiśyaivaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya tatsaṃnikarṣam anya āgatya tadbrahmāpūrvaṃ gṛhṇīyāt saṃdehaṃ vāpanudet tasyaiṣa doṣa ucyate 
yāvad anujñām asau na dāpyate yathaite tvatsakāśād adhīyata evam apy aham apy adhīyīyety anujñātum arhasi iti labdhānujñāṃ śikṣeta 
anyathā tu yadbrahmādhyayanaṃ tat steyam iva 
so 'dhyetānena brahmacaureṇa saṃyukto narakaṃ mahāyātanāsthānaṃ prāpnoti 
adhīyānād iti pañcamī ākhyātopayoge iti 
apāyasya vā gamyamānatvād brahma hy adhyetur niṣkrāmatīva 
lyablope vā karmaṇi 
adhīyānaṃ śrutvāpnoti śikṣate 
laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vāpi tathādhyātmikam eva vā 
ādadīta yato jñānaṃ taṃ pūrvam abhivādayet 
atikrāntaṃ prāsaṅgikam 
abhivādanavidhir idānīṃ prakramyate 
loke bhavaṃ laukikaṃ lokācāraśikṣaṇam 
atha vā gītavāditrakalānāṃ jñānaṃ vātsyāyanaviśākhikalāviṣayagranthajñānaṃ vā 
vaidikaṃ vidhinoditaṃ vedavedāṅgasmṛtiviṣayam 
ādhyātmikavidyātmopaniṣadvidyā 
ātmopacārād vā śarīrasya vaidikam 
etaj jñānaṃ yataḥ śikṣeta taṃ pūrvam upadeṣṭāraṃ puruṣam abhivādayet 
prathamasaṃgame yad āśīḥprayogārthaṃ vakṣyamāṇasvarūpeṇa prayogeṇa śabdena saṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ so 'bhivādayater arthaḥ 
pūrvam iti prathamam 
tenāsau saṃbodhyaḥ na punas tadīyaṃ vacanam apekṣitavyam 
tadā hi pratyabhivādayitā bhavet 
abhivādayed ity anenaiva siddhatvāt pūrvaśabdo 'narthaka iti cet tan na 
sati hy asminn ayam artho labhyate 
dhātūpasargārthaparyālocanayā hy ābhimukhyena vadanamātraṃ pratīyate 
anyenāpi saṃbodhitasya bhavaty eva 
ye tu pūrvaṃ svayonigurubhya iti vyācakṣate tad aprakṛtasaṃśabditam ity upakṣyam 
sāvitrīmātrasāro 'pi varaṃ vipraḥ suyantritaḥ 
nāyantritas trivedo 'pi sarvāśī sarvavikrayī 
abhivādanādyācāravidheḥ stutir iyam 
sāvitrīmātraṃ sāraṃ pradhānaṃ yasya sa evam ucyate sāvitrīmātrādhyayanaḥ 
varaṃ śreṣṭho vipro yadi suyantrito bhavati śāstranigṛhītātmā 
ayantritas trivedo 'pi śāstravid api 
sarvāśī sarvam aśnāti lokācāragarhitaṃ sākṣād apratiṣiddham api 
evaṃ sarvavikrayī 
pradarśanārthāv aśanavikrayāv anyasyāpi pratiṣiddhasya 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yathānyaniyamatyāgān nindyate evaṃ pratyutthānādityāgād api 
atha kathaṃ varaṃ vipra iti yāvatā varo vipra iti bhavitavyam 
kecid āhuḥ sāmānyopakramasya viśeṣasyābhidhānāt varam etat kiṃ tat yat suyantrito vipra iti 
anye tv āhur āviṣṭaliṅgo varaśabdo napuṃsakaliṅgo 'py asti 
śayyāsane 'dhyācarite śreyasā na samāviśet 
śayyāsanasthaś caivainaṃ pratyutthāyābhivādayet 
śayyā cāsanaṃ ceti jātir aprāṇinām iti dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ 
tasmin śreyasā vidyādyadhikena gurvādinā ca na samāviśen na sahāsīta 
kiṃ sarvasminn eva 
nety āha 
adhyācarite kalpite śayyātvenāsanatvena ca 
yat tu śilāphalakādis tatra na doṣaḥ 
vakṣyati ca āsīta guruṇā sārdham iti tasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ 
anye vyācakṣata adhyācarite adhiṣṭhita iti 
na samāviśet tatrottarakālam api na kevalaṃ sahāsanapratiṣedhaḥ 
sa hi vakṣyamāṇenaiva siddhaḥ 
vidhau ca saṃbhavati nānuvādo yuktaḥ 
tatra kecid ācārato bhedaṃ vyācakṣate 
yad guror asādhāraṇyena śayyātvenāsanatvena ca vijñātam yatra guruḥ śete āste ca tatra śiṣyaḥ pratyakṣaṃ prokṣaṃ ca nopaviśet 
yatra tu kathaṃcid ete kriye guruṇā kṛte tatra guror apratyakṣaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
īdṛśam evādhyācaritam ucyate na svasvāmisaṃbandhena yad adhiṣṭhānam 
śayyāsanasthasya ca yadi śreyān āgacchati tadā tata utthāyābhivādanaṃ kartavyam 
yat tu yānāsanasthaḥ iti tad gurūddiṣṭam avarohaṇam 
śayyāsanatyāga eva bhūmiṣṭhena kartavya iti tasyārthaḥ 
idaṃ tv aguroḥ śreyasaḥ pratyutthānam āsanasthasyaiva saṃbhavati 
ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati 
pratyutthānābhivādābhyāṃ punas tān pratipadyate 
pūrvasyārthavādaḥ 
sthavire vṛddhavayasy āyāty āgacchati yūnas taruṇasya ūrdhvaṃ prāṇāḥ jīvitahetavo 'ntarmaruta ūrdhvam āsyād bahir nikrāmanti 
apānavṛttiṃ parityajya jīvavicchedaṃ cikīrṣanti 
pratyutthāya yad abhivādanaṃ kriyate tena yathāpūrvaṃ jīvitasthemne kalpante 
pratipadyate pratyujjīvati 
abhivādanaśīlasya nityaṃ vṛddhopasevinaḥ 
catvāri saṃpravardhante āyur dharmo yaś balam 
sarvān eva prati pūrvābhibhāṣitā yathārhābhivādanaśīlatā na punar abhivādanaśabdoccāraṇam eva 
śīlaśabdena prayojanāpekṣābhāva ucyate 
nityaṃ vṛddhān upasevate priyavacanādinā 
yathāśaktyā hy upakāreṇa cārādhayate 
tasya catvāri saṃpravardhante 
āyur dharmo 'mutra svargādiphalapādapaḥ 
yaśobale ca prāgukte 
arthavādo 'py ayaṃ phalāvagamahetuḥ 
abhivādāt paraṃ vipro jyāyāṃsam abhivādayan 
asau nāmāham asmīti svaṃ nāma parikīrtayet 
yean śabdena paraḥ saṃbodhyate āśiṣaṃ prati prayojyate kuśalapraśnaṃ vā kāryate so 'bhivādaḥ 
asmād abhivādād abhivādapratipādakāc chabdāt param avyavahitapūrvaṃ imaṃ śabdam uccārayet asau nāmāham asmīty 
asāv iti sarvanāma sarvaviśeṣapratipādakam 
abhimukhīkaraṇārtho 'yam īdṛśaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ mayā tvam abhivādyase āśīrvādārtham abhimukhīkriyase 
tato 'dhyeṣaṇām avagamya pratyabhivādam āśīrdānādi kartum ārabhate 
na ca sāmānyavācinā sarvanāmnā prayujyamānenaitad uktaṃ bhavatīdaṃ nāmadheyena mayābhivādyase ity ato 'dhyeṣaṇām anavabudhya kasyāśiṣaṃ prayuṅktām api ca svanāma parikīrtayed iti śrutam 
tatrāsau devadattanāmāham ity uktenābhivādanaṃ pratipadyeta 
asāv ity etasya padasyānarthakyād arthānavasāyaḥ 
smṛtyantaratantreṇāpi vyavaharanti ca sūtrakārāḥ 
yathā pāṇiniḥ karmaṇi dvitīyā iti dvitīyādiśabdaiḥ 
ihāpy asāv iti 
svaṃ nāmātidiśata iti yajñasūtre 'pi paribhāṣitam 
yady evaṃ svaṃ nāmety anenaiva siddhe 'sau nāmety anarthakam 
nāmaśabdaprayogārtham 
katham 
svaṃ nāma kīrtayed idaṃ nāmāham iti 
anena svarūpeṇāham asmīti 
samānārthatvād vikalpaṃ manyante 
atra ślokadvaye etāvad abhivādanavākyasya rūpaṃ siddham abhivādaye devadattanāmāhaṃ bhoḥ 
uttareṇa ślokena bhor ity etad vidhāsyate 
jyāyāṃsam iti vacanāt samahīnānām apy abhivādanam asti na tv ayaṃ prakāraḥ jyāyoviṣayatvād asya 
nāmadheyasya ye kecid abhivādaṃ na jānate 
tān prājño 'ham iti brūyāt striyaḥ sarvās tathaiva ca 
vittādyādhikyenāviduṣo 'pi yathāvidhy abhivādyatāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tannivṛttyartham idam 
ye kecid avidvāṃso nāmadheyasya saṃskṛtasyoccāritasya abhivādam abhivādārtham 
abhivāditā etena vayam ity avaiyyākaraṇā na jānatem saṃskṛtaṃ nāvabudhyante tān prājño nārīś cābhivādyāḥ 
ete na saṃskṛtam ucyamānaṃ pratipadyate tatra vidhyekadeśaṃ svanāmagrahaṇaṃ hitvā abhivādaye 'ham ity etāvad eva brūyāt 
tad api cen nāvabudhyante laukikenāpabhraṃśenāpy abhivādyā ity evamarthaṃ prājñagrahaṇam 
tadīyām abodhaśaktiṃ jñātvohitavyo 'bhivādaprayogo nopadeśa evādartavyaḥ 
striyo 'py evam eva 
sarvagrahaṇaṃ gurupatnīnāṃ saṃskṛtaprayogajñānām api 
anye tu ya upanāmikayā prasiddho vanamālīvarṇa iti pitṛkṛtaṃ yat tasya nāma tan na prasiddham yat prasiddhaṃ na tan nāmety ato 'sau svanāma kīrtayet 
anye tu pratyabhivādaṃ na jānata iti varṇayanti 
pratyabhivāde 'śūdre iti nāmānte pluto vihitaḥ 
taṃ ye na vidus teṣv aham ity eva vācyam 
vyākaraṇaprayojanopanyāsaprasaṅgena caitan mahābhāṣyakāreṇa pradarśitam 
avidvāṃsaḥ pratyabhivāde nāmno ye na plutiṃ viduḥ 
kāmaṃ teṣu tu viproṣya strīṣv ivāyam ahaṃ vadet 
smṛtyantarasāmarthyād evāyam abhivādaśabdaḥ pratyabhivāde vartata ity āhuḥ 
yadi caitad evaṃ na vyākhyāyate tadā nābhivādyaḥ sa viduṣeti sarveṇa sarvam abhivādapratiṣedhaḥ āśrīyamāṇe ayam ahaṃ vaded iti smṛtyantaravirodhaḥ 
asmiṃs tv evaṃ vyākhyāte sa pratiṣedhaḥ stutyālambano na vidhāyaka etad arthānusāritayā nīyate 
bhoḥśabdaṃ kīrtayed ante svasya nāmno 'bhivādane 
nāmnāṃ svarūpabhāvo hi bhobhāva ṛṣibhiḥ smṛtaḥ 
svasya nāmno 'nte bhoḥśabdaṃ kīrtayet 
svagrahaṇam abhivādyamānapratiṣedhārtham 
pariśiṣṭo 'rthavādaḥ 
na ca nāmākṣarāṇām evānte 'pi tu tataḥ pareṣām aham asmi iti 
eṣa hi tatretikaraṇaṃ prayogāvadhāraṇārtham 
evam eva prayoktavyaḥ 
api ca devadatto bho aham iti duḥśiṣṭe prayoge vilambitāyāṃ pratipattau saṃmukhībhāvaś cireṇa syāt tatra kāryavirodhaḥ 
vyavahitasaṃbandhe kaścin naivāvadhānavān syāt 
svarūpabhāvaḥ svarūpasya sattā 
atha vābhivādyanāmnāṃ svarūpe bhavati tatsthāne bhavaty atas tannāmanivṛttiḥ 
bhāvasādhanaḥ kartṛsādhano vā bhāvaśabdaḥ 
svarūpabhāva iti saptamyanto vā paṭhitavyaḥ 
bhobhāvaḥ 
bho ity etasya yad bhavanaṃ yat svarūpaṃ tan nāmnāṃ svarūpam 
yathaiva nāma gṛhītvā kasyacit saṃbodhanaṃ kriyate devadatta śrūyatām iti evaṃ bhoḥśabdo 'py āmantritavibhaktyantaḥ saṃbodhanāyaivaṃ ṛṣibhiḥ smaryate 
āyuṣmān bhava saumyeti vācyo vipro 'bhivādane 
akāraś cāsya nāmno 'nte vācyaḥ pūrvākṣaraḥ plutaḥ 
abhivādane kṛte pratyabhivādaḥ pitrābhivādayitā evaṃ vācyaḥ āyuṣmān bhava saumeti 
ityśabdaḥ prakāre 
āyuṣmān edhi dīrghāyur bhūyāś cirañjīvety evamādiśabdaparigrahaḥ śiṣṭācāraprasiddho bhavati 
akāraś cāsya pratyabhivādyasya yan nāma tadante yo 'kāraḥ sa plutaḥ kartavyaḥ 
pluta iti trimātrasya saṃjñā 
akāragrahaṇam ikārādīnām api pradarśanārtham 
ajapekṣam eva cāntatvaṃ draṣṭavyam 
vyajñanāntasyāpi yo 'ntyaḥ svaras tasya bhavati 
pūrvākṣara eva plutabhāvino 'kārasya viśeṣaṇam etat 
akṣaram atra vyañjanam 
tatra pūrvaśliṣṭaḥ sa evam ucyate 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
pūrva eva nāgantur akāraḥ plutaḥ kartavyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi ya eva nāmni vidyate sa eva plāvayitavyaḥ 
sarvaṃ caitad evaṃ vyākhyānaṃ bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ smṛtisāmarthyena 
śabdārthaprayoge ca manvādibhyo 'dhikataraḥ prāmāṇye bhagavān pāṇiniḥ 
sa ca pratyabhivāde 'śūdre ṭeḥ plutiṃ smarati 
ṭiśabdena yo 'ntyoc tadādiśabdarūpam ucyate 
vipragrahaṇam avivakṣitam 
kṣatriyādīnām apy eṣa eva vidhiḥ 
smṛtyantarasamācāro hy evam eva sthitaḥ 
na caiṣāṃ vidhyantaram asti 
atrodāharaṇam āyuṣmān devadatta 
vyañjanāntasya āyuṣmān edhi somaśarman 
yo na vetty abhivādasya vipraḥ pratyabhivādanam 
nābhivādyaḥ sa viduṣā yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ 
yo na vetti pratyabhivādanam ity evaṃ vācyam abhivādasyety atiricyate na saṃgacchate 
naivam 
abhivādasya anurūpaṃ pratyabhivādanam ity evaṃ yojanā kriyate 
yena svanāmoccāryābhivādanaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya nāmānte plutiḥ kartavyā 
yas tv ahaṃ bho ity evam abhivaden na tasya nāmoccāraṇaṃ nāpi plutir iti 
nābhivādya ity abhivādanaśabdoccāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ 
yathā vihitam abhivādanaṃ kartavyam na punar ahaṃ bho ityādi tasya prāg darśitatvāt 
yathā śūdra iti ca dṛṣṭāntenaitad eva jñāyate 
śūdrasyāpi vṛddhavayaso 'bhivādyatvaṃ pūrvābhibhāṣyatvam iṣyate 
viduṣeti pādapūraṇārtham 
brāhmaṇaṃ kuśalaṃ pṛcchet kṣatrabandum anāmayam 
vaiśyaṃ kṣemaṃ samāgamya śūdram ārogyam eva ca 
kṛtābhivādanapratyabhivādanayoḥ sauhārde prāpte jijñasāpraśne jātibhedāśrayaḥ śabdaniyamo 'yam iṣyate 
praṣṭavyānāṃ jātiniyamo 'yam na praṣṭṝṇām 
nātyantabhinnārthatvāc ca eteṣāṃ svarūpaniyamo 'yaṃ vidhīyate 
ārogyānāmayaśabdau samānarthau 
evaṃ kṣemakuśalaśabdāv api nātyantabhinnau 
kuśalaśabdo yady api prāvīṇyavacanas tathāpīha saṃyoginām arthānāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ cānapāye vartate 
ete 'vaśyaṃ prayoktavyāḥ 
anyeṣām api yathāpratibhaṃ viśeṣajijñāsayāpratiṣedhaḥ 
tathā mahābhārate kasmiṃścid adhyāye darśitam 
kecid iha samāgamyeti liṅgān na gurvādiviṣayo 'yaṃ praśnaḥ kiṃ tarhi savayasām eva 
abhigamanaṃ hi gurau vihitam na yadṛcchayā samāgamaḥ 
abhigamane 'pi samāgamo 'stīti yatkiṃcid etat 
avācyo dīkṣito nāmnā yavīyān api yo bhavet 
bhobhavatpūrvakaṃ tv enam abhibhāṣeta dharmavit 
pratyabhivādanakāla anyatra ca dīkṣito jyotiṣṭomādiṣu dīkṣaṇīyātaḥ prabhṛtyā avabhṛthān nāmnā na vācyas tasya yan nāmadheyaṃ tan noccārayitavyam 
yavīyān kanīyān acirakālajātaḥ 
apiśabdāt jyeṣṭhasyādīkṣitasyāpi nāmagrahaṇaniṣedho 'numīyate 
tathā ca gautamaḥ nāmagotre guroḥ samānato nirdiśet 
mānaḥ pūjā tatpūrvakaṃ nāma grahītavyam tatreśvaro janārdanamiśra iti 
kathaṃ tarhi dīkṣitena kāryārthaṃ saṃbhāṣaḥ kartavyaḥ 
bhobhavatpūrvakam 
bhoḥśabdaṃ pūrvaṃ prayujya enaṃ dīkṣitam abhibhāṣeta dīkṣitayajamānādiśabdair yaugikaiḥ 
na tu bhoḥśabdapūrvakaṃ nāmagrahaṇam abhyanujñāyate 
bhobhavacchabdaḥ pūrvo yasyābhibhāṣaṇasya tad evam ukte dvayoś caitayoḥ śabdayor ekatra vākye prayogābhāvād vyavasthāṃ vyācakṣate 
yadā tena saha saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ bhavati tadāmantritavibhaktyantena bhoḥśabdena saṃbodhyaḥ 
yadā tu tadīyaguṇākhyānaṃ parokṣaṃ karoti tatrabhavatā dīkṣitenaivaṃ kṛtam tatrabhavān evaṃ karoti ity evaṃ prayoktavyam 
bhavad iti ca prātipadikamātram upāttam yathā vibhaktyā saṃbandham upaiti tadantaṃ prayoktavyam 
parapatnī tu yā strī syād asaṃbaddhā ca yonitaḥ
tāṃ brūyād bhavatīty evaṃ subhage bhaginīti ca 
arthaprayuktaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ striyā saha yadā bhavati tadaivaṃ kartavyam 
yā tāvat parasya patnī sā bhavati subhage atha vā bhavati bagini 
bhavacchabdo 'yaṃ strīpratyayāntaḥ saṃbuddhau kṛtahrasvaḥ 
bhavatīty atretikaraṇaṃ padārthaviparyāsakṛtasvarūpaṃ paraṃ bodhayati subhage bhaginīty atra prakāre 
brūyād ity adhikārāc chabdasvarūpagrahaṇaṃ siddham 
ācāryatāyāṃ ca mātar yaśasvini kanīyasī ca duhitar āyuṣmatīty evamādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ saṃbhāṣyā 
patnīgrahaṇāt kanyāyā naiṣa vidhiḥ 
asaṃbaddhā ca yonitaḥ 
mātṛpakṣapitṛpakṣābhyāṃ yā jñātitvaṃ nāgatā mātuladuhitrādis tāsām anyaṃ vidhiṃ vakṣyati jñātisaṃbandhiyoṣitaḥ iti 
nanu ca tenaiva tatsiddham asyotsargasyānyatra caritārthatvāt kim asaṃbaddhā cety anena 
nātra paunaruktyodbhāvane yatitavyam padyagrantho 'yam 
mātulāṃś ca pitṛvyāṃś ca śvaśurān ṛtvijo gurūn 
asāv aham iti brūyāt pratyutthāya yavīyasaḥ 
gurūn iti vacananirdeśān na ya evātra gurur uktaḥ sa eva gṛhyate 
kiṃ tarhi gautamīya iva sāmānyaśabdo vittādijyeṣṭhavacanaḥ 
tān yavīyaso bhāgineyādeḥ svavayopekṣayā hīnavayasaḥ 
asāv aham iti svaṃ nāma nirdiśyate 
tatparaś cāhaṃśabdo 'bhyanujñāyate 
etac ca pratyutthāyāgatānāṃ kartavyam 
abhivādane bhoḥśabdaprayogo niṣidhyate 
uktaṃ ca gautamīye pratyuttānam abhivādyāḥ iti 
mātṛṣvasā mātulānī śvaśrūr atha pitṛṣvasā 
saṃpūjyā gurupatnīvat samās tā gurubhāryayā 
etāś ca gurupatnīvat saṃpūjyāḥ pratyutthānābhivādanāsanadānādibhiḥ 
gurupatnīvat ity anenaiva siddhe samāstā iti vacanam anyad apy ājñādi gurupatnīkāryaṃ kadācid anujānāti 
itarathā prakaraṇāt saṃpūjyā ity abhivādanaviṣayam eva syāt 
palitavayasaś ca striyaḥ smaryante 
kanīyasīnām apy eṣa evābhivādanavidhiḥ 
bhrātur bhāryopasaṃgrāhyā savarṇāhany ahny api 
viproṣya tūpasaṃgrāhyā jñātisaṃbandhiyoṣitaḥ 
bhrātur jyeṣṭhasyeti draṣṭavyam 
upasaṃgrāhyā pādayor abhivādyā 
savarṇā samānajātīyā 
kṣatriyādistrīṇāṃ tu jñātisaṃbandhidharmo bhrātur bhāryāṇām api 
viproṣya jñātisaṃbandhiyoṣitaḥ 
viproṣya pravāsāt pratyāgatena 
na hi proṣitasyopasaṃgrahaṇasaṃbhavaḥ 
jñātayaḥ pitṛpakṣāḥ pitṛvyādayaḥ saṃbandhino mātṛpakṣāḥ śvaśurādayaś ca teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhānāṃ yāḥ striyaḥ 
pūjārūpatvād upasaṃgrahaṇasya na kanīyāṃsaḥ pūjām arhanti 
pitur bhaginyāṃ mātuś ca jyāyasyāṃ ca svasary api 
mātṛvad vṛttim ātiṣṭhen mātā tābhyo garīyasī 
pituś ca yā bhaginī mātuś ca yā bhaginī tasyām svasari cātmīyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ bhaginyāṃ mātṛvad vṛttir atidiśyate 
nanu ca mātṛṣvasuḥ pitṛṣvasuś cāyam ukta eva dharmo mātṛṣvasā mātulānī ity atra 
athocyate 
tatra gurupatnīvad ity uktam 
iha tu mātṛvad vṛttir ity ucyata iti 
naiṣa bhedaḥ 
tulyā hi gurupatnyāṃ mātari ca vṛttiḥ 
kecid āhuḥ mātā tābhyo garīyasīty etad vaktum anūdyate bhaginyoḥ pitur mātuś ca garīyastvam 
yadā mātājñāṃ dadāti svasrādayaś ca tadā mātur ājñā kriyate na tāsām 
na caitad vācyam etad api siddham mātā gauraveṇātiricyate iti arthavādattvāt tasya 
anye tu gurupatnyā mātuś ca vṛttibhedaṃ manyante 
gurupatnyāḥ pūrvājñādyāvaśyakam 
mātuś tu śaiśavāt vāllabhyenānyathātvam api 
lālanāt tatrobhayāpadeśān mātṛṣvasuḥ pitṛṣvasuś ca vyavasthā 
śaiśave lālanaṃ tulyam eva svasyāṃ svasari 
atītaśaiśavasya tu gurupatnīvat saṃpūjyatvam iti 
na cānenaivaitat sidhyati 
asati hi vākyadvaye mātṛvad vṛttir ity etāvatā prākaraṇikī abhivādananivṛttir eva vijñāyeta 
atha punaḥ snehavṛttir atidiśyate 
daśābdākhyaṃ paurasakhyaṃ pañcābdākhyaṃ kalābhṛtām 
tryabdapūrvaṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ svalpenāpi svayoniṣu 
uktaṃ pūrvam prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati iti 
tatra kiyadbhir varṣaiḥ sthāviryaṃ bhavati 
loke hi śiraḥpālitye sthaviravyavahāraḥ tannirūpaṇārtham idam 
daśabhir varṣair janmano 'dhikair api paurāṇāṃ sakhyam ākhyāyate 
tena daśavarṣādhiko jyeṣṭho bhavati api tu mitravad vyavahartavyaḥ 
yathoktaṃ bho bhavann iti vayasyeti 
daśabhyo varṣebhya ūrdhvaṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ 
ākhyānam ākhyā 
daśābdā ākhyā yasya sakyasya 
tripado bahuvrīhiḥ 
ākhyānimittatvād varṣāṇāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam nimittanimittinor bhedasyāvivakṣitatvāt 
etāvāṃś ca samāsāntarbhūto 'rthaḥ yaḥ pūrvajo daśavarṣāṇāṃ yāvat sa sakhaiva bhavati 
pure bhavāḥ paurāḥ teṣām 
puragrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham grāmavāsinām apy eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 
ye kecid ekasmin grāme vasanti tāvad yasmin parasparapratyāsattihetur vidyate te sakhāyaḥ 
ye tu kalāṃ kāṃcana bibhrati śilpagītavādyādikāṃ teṣāṃ pañcavarṣāṇi yo 'dhikaḥ sa sakhā tata ūrdhvaṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ 
trayo 'bdāḥ pūrve yasya tac chrotiyāṇāṃ sakhyam 
alpenāpi kālena svayoniṣv ekavaṃśyeṣu katicid ahāni yo 'dhikaḥ sa jyeṣṭhaḥ 
kiyān punaḥ svalpakālaḥ 
na tāvad abdaḥ 
tryabdapūrvam iti nirdiśyālpenety ucyamānas tato nyūnaḥ pratīyate 
ekavacananirdeśāc ca na varṣadvayam 
nāpy eko 'bdaḥ svalpeneti veśeṣaṇānupapatteḥ 
paricchinnaparimāṇo hy abdavācyo 'rthas tasyāhorātramātreṇa nyūnasya nābdatvam asti 
tasmād alpeneti kālasāmānyam apekṣate 
saṃvatsarād avaraś ca tasya viśeṣaḥ 
apiśabdaś caiva śabdasyārthe draṣṭavyaḥ 
alpenaiva kālena sakhyam bahunā tu jyeṣṭhatvam eva 
etac ca samānaguṇānāṃ samānajātīyānāṃ ca draṣṭavyam 
etena laukikaṃ sthaviralakṣaṇaṃ nivartitasāpekṣikam āśritam 
anye tu vyacakṣate 
nānena sthaviratvaṃ lakṣyate kiṃ tarhi sakhitvam eva 
yathāśrutatyāgena sthaviralakṣaṇaṃ syat iyatā kālena sakhā paratas tu jyeṣṭhaḥ iti 
ayaṃ ca ślokārthaḥ 
ekatra pure vasanti daśavarṣāṇi yāvat tāni mitrāṇi 
kalāś catuḥṣaṣṭis tadvidāṃ saṃgatyā pañcabhir varṣaiḥ 
svayoniṣu svalpenāpi ca kālena saha vasatāṃ mitratvam eva 
ataś ca sarvo vayasā tulyo vayasyaḥ kiṃ tarhi etad eva 
samānavayastve caitallakṣaṇam 
yuktam etat 
kiṃ tūttaraśloko virudhyate 
tatra hi jāteḥ prādhānyam na vayasaḥ 
yadi cātreyatā kālena jyaiṣṭhyam uktaṃ bhavati tadā vijātīyānām apy āśaṅkyamānaṃ na nivartyata iti yuktam 
pūrve ca vyākhyātāra ādyam eva vyākhyānaṃ manyante 
brāhmaṇaṃ daśavarṣaṃ tu śatavarṣaṃ tu bhūmipam 
pitāputrau vijānīyād brāhmaṇas tu tayoḥ pitā 
daśavarṣāṇi jātasya yasya sa bhavati daśavarṣaḥ paricchedakaḥ kālaḥ tasya paricchedyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrutaḥ 
na ca tasyoccanīcatādi kārśyādi vā kālena parimātuṃ śakyam kiṃ tarhi tadīyā kācit kriyā 
sā ca janmanaḥ prabhṛti nityasamavāyinī prāṇadhāraṇalakṣaṇaiva 
evaṃ śatavarṣam iti 
pitāputrau tau draṣṭavyau 
tayoḥ saṃpradhāryamāṇayor brāhmaṇaḥ pitā 
ciravṛddhenāpi kṣatriyeṇa svalpavarṣo 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttāyābhivādyaś ceti prakaraṇārthaḥ 
vittaṃ bandhur vayaḥ karma vidyā bhavati pañcamī 
etāni mānyasthānāni garīyo yad yad uttaram 
uktaṃ jāter utkarṣahetutvam 
hīnajātīyenottamajātīyaḥ pūjyaḥ 
idānīṃ samānajātīyānāṃ ya abhivādanādipūjāhetavas teṣāṃ balābalam ucyate 
tatra vayasaḥ punar abhidhānaṃ balābalartham 
vittādisaṃbandho 'tra sarvatra pūjāhetuḥ 
vittavattvaṃ bandhumattvaṃ mānasthānam iti 
ayam atrārthaḥ 
na viśiṣṭabandhutaiva pitṛvyamātulādirūpatā mānakāraṇaṃ bandhumānyo bahubandhuḥ sa pūjyaḥ 
vayaḥ prakṛṣṭam iti jñeyam 
īdṛśa eva cārthe prāyeṇāyaṃ prayujyate 
pitrā putro vayaḥstho 'pi satataṃ vācya eva saḥ 
iti 
yāvac ca vayaḥ pūjāhetuḥ tad uktam eva daśābdākhyam iti 
karma śrautaṃ smārthaṃ tadanuṣṭhānaparatā 
vidyā sāṅgasopakaraṇavedārthajñānam 
nanu vidvān yajate vidvān yājayatīty avidyasya karmānuṣṭhānānadhikārāt vidyayā vinā kathaṃ karmaṇāṃ mānahetutā 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
pakarṣo 'trābhipretaḥ 
atiśayavatī vidyā mānahetuḥ 
svalpavidyasyāpy anuṣṭhānopapattiḥ 
yo yāvaj jānāti sa tavaty adhikriyate 
na vidyāyā vācanikam adhikārahetutvam api tu sāmarthyalakṣaṇam 
aviditakarmasvarūpo hy avaidyas tiryakkarmā kvādhikriyatām 
śakyaṃ hy anena katicitsmṛtivākyāny upaśrutya japatapasyam anuṣṭhātum 
agnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ tu vedavākyāvabodha upakaroti 
tatrāpi yo yāvaj jānāti sa tāvaty adhikriyate 
agnihotravākyānāṃ yo 'rthaṃ vetti sa tatrādhikriyate 
kratvantarajñānaṃ na tatropakārakam 
athocyate 
vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ iti kṛtsnavedaviṣayo 'yaṃ vidhir avabodhaparyantaḥ 
tatra kṛtsnasya vedasyāvabodhe kartavye kuto 'yaṃ pratibhāgāvabodhasaṃbhavaḥ yenocyate yo 'gnihotravākyasyārthaṃ vetti vākyāntarārtham avidvān apy adhikriyate iti 
atrocyate 
ekaśākhādhyayanaṃ tāvad avaśyaṃ kartavyam 
tatra yenaikaśākhādhītā tasyāś cārtho 'vadhṛtaḥ so 'navadhṛtaśākhāntarārtho 'dhikriyate 
nanu ca sarvatraika eva śāstrārthaḥ 
yadi nāma padavarṇānupūrvībhedaḥ śāstrarūpaṃ tv abhinnam 
padārthanyāyavyutpattyā vāvabodhaḥ 
na ca pratiśākhaṃ padārthā bhidyante 
nāpi nyāyaḥ 
tatra yenaiva hetunaikasyāḥ śākhāyā artho 'vadharyate śākhāntare 'py asāv asti na vyutpattyantaram apekṣate 
tatra yady ekā śākhāvagatā sarvā evāvagatā bhavanti 
satyam 
yāny ekasyām agnihotrādīny upadiṣṭāni teṣāṃ śākhāntare 'py upadiśyamānānāṃ mā bhūd bhedaḥ 
kiṃ tu kasyāṃcic chākhāyāṃ kānicit karmāṇi naivopadiśyante 
yathā bāhvṛce āśvalāyanake darśapūrṇamāsau śyenādir ābhicārakaḥ anye ca somayāgavājapeyabṛhaspatisavādayaḥ 
tatra yat tacchākhādhīnam agnihotrajyotiṣṭomādi tatrādhikriyate 
śākhāntaraṃ tv anadhītam aśrutaṃ kathaṃ tadvihitāni karmāṇy tacchākhādhyāyī vettu 
na caite somayāgā nityā yenānanuṣṭhānapratyavāyabhayāt parijñānāya śākhāntaram anviṣyate 
ādhānaṃ tu yady api tatra na paṭhitaṃ tatrāpy uddharāhavanīyam ity āhavanīyasya vidhānam 
lokāt tadartham anavabudhyamānaḥ ko 'yam āhavanīyo yasyādhānam iti śākhāntaram anviṣyati 
tataḥ śākhāntare paṭhyamānam ādhānaprakaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ paryālocayati 
evam āmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā paurṇamāsena veti śrutvā kīdṛśam anayoḥ karmaṇo rūpam iti tathaiva śākhāntaraṃ gaveṣayate 
evam anyad api yat kāmyaṃ nityaṃ cānuṣṭheyaṃ tasya yat kiṃcid aṅgajātaṃ tatra nāmnātam ādhvaryavam audgātraṃ vā tat parijñāya tathaiva śākhāntarādhigamaḥ 
yat tu śākhāntarādhītam anuṣṭheyaṃ tasya na vedanasaṃbhavaḥ 
anekaśākhādhyāyinas tu tadarthaparasya sarvam etat pratyakṣam iti 
astīdṛśīṃ vidyām antareṇāpi karmānuṣṭhānam 
atha vā īṣadvyutpattyāpi saṃbhavaty anuṣṭhānaṃ 
yasya tu nirmalā vidyā vyākhyeyāni vidyāsthānāni tasya vidyā mānyatāsthānam 
garīya iti dvayor dvayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇe 'yam īyasunpratyayaḥ 
caturdaśavidyāsthanajñaḥ paṅgvandhanirdhanādir anadhikṛto 'pi vidyayaiva pūjyate 
teṣāṃ virodhe balābalam āha garīyo yad yad uttaram 
ekasya vittam anyasya bahubandhutā tatra vittavato bandhumān mānyaḥ 
yasmāc ca yat paraṃ tat tasmād gurutaram 
tathā bandhor vayaḥ tataḥ pūrvasmād api vittāt tad guru siddham 
ata upapannam śrutaṃ tu sarvebhyo garīyas tanmūlatvād dharmasya iti gautamavacanam 
garīya iti kathaṃ prakarṣapratyayo yāvatā naiva pūrvasya gurutvam 
yadi hi dve guruṇī tatrottarīyasya garīyastvam asti 
tarhi pūrvāpekṣayā vittasya nāstīti cet samudāye sāmānyena gurutve 'pekṣite aparasya prakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ yujyata īyasūn 
mānaḥ pūjā tasya sthānaṃ kāraṇam 
mānyasthānāni iti vā pāṭhe 'ntarbhūtabhāvārtho draṣṭavyaḥ 
mānyatvasthānāni mānyatvakāraṇāni 
ekaikaguṇasaṃbandhe parasya jyāyastvam uktam 
yatredānīṃ dvau pūrvāv ekasya bhavato 'parasyaikaḥ para iti tatra katham ity ata āha 
pañcānāṃ triṣu varṇeṣu bhūyāṃsi guṇavanti ca 
yatra syuḥ so 'tra mānārhaḥ śūdro 'pi daśamīṃ gataḥ 
pañcānām eteṣāṃ mānasthānānāṃ yatra bhūyāṃsi bahūny asarvāṇi sa mānyaḥ 
tatra paratvam nātīvādartavyam 
ekasya vittabandhū dve anyo vṛddhavayāḥ 
tatra pūrve bādhake 
saty api bahutve yadi na śreṣṭhāni bhavanti ekaṃ caikasyātyutkṛṣṭam tadā sāmyam 
na punaḥ parabādhakatvam 
garīya ekāpekṣayā caritārthatvāt 
yadi tu bhūyāṃsi gunavanty atyutkṛṣṭāni tadā sāmye 'pi saṃkhyayā pareṣāṃ pūrvāṇi paraiś ca samasaṃkhyāni tadā na pūrvataratayā bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi sāmānyam eva 
nanu ca yatra guṇavanti syuḥ so 'tra mānārha ity abhidhānena samasaṃkhyasyāpi pūrvasya bādhakatvam eva yuktam 
naivam 
tulyatve guṇānām etasya caritārthatvāt 
yathaiko 'pi vidyāvān aparo 'pi tayor yasya guṇavatī prakṛṣṭā vidyā sa praśasyate 
evaṃ sarvatra 
triṣu varṇeṣu brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyeṣu 
yady ete guṇā bhūyāṃsaḥ prakṛṣṭāś ca kṣatriyasyāpi bhavanti tadā hīnaguṇena brāhmaṇena jātyutkṛṣṭenāpi kṣatriyaḥ pūjyaḥ 
evaṃ kṣatriyeṇa vaiśyaḥ 
evaṃ tribhir api dvijātibhiḥ śūdro 'pi daśamīm itaḥ 
daśamī antyāvasthocyate 
atyantavārdhakopalakṣaṇam etat 
evaṃ ca vittabandhū śūdrasya na māne hetū traivarṇikān prati daśamīgrahaṇāt 
karmavidye tu naiva tasya saṃbhavato 'nadhikārāt 
bhūyāṃsīty ādhikyamātraṃ vivakṣitaṃ na bahutvasaṃkhyaiva 
tena dviviṣayatāpi siddhā bhavati 
na hy ayaṃ saṃkhyāvācyeva bahuśabda ity atra pramāṇam asti 
bhūyaḥśabdaś cāyaṃ na bahuśabda ādhikye ca tatra tatra dṛṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ 
bhūyāṃś cātra parihāraḥ bhūyasābhydayena yokṣye iti pratyayārthabahutvam api na vivakṣitam 
jātyākhyāyām hy etad bahuvacanam 
vivakṣāyāṃ hi ekasya guṇavato mānahetutvaṃ na syāt 
tataś ca pūrvo 'vagatir bādhyate 
śūdro 'pi daśamīm ity atra ca kevalasyaiva vayasaḥ prakarṣe mānahetutvaṃ bruvann avivakṣāṃ darśayati 
samācāraś caivam eva 
cakriṇo daśamīsthasya rogiṇo bhāriṇaḥ striyāḥ 
snātakasya ca rājñaś ca panthā deyo varasya ca 
ayam anyaḥ pūjāprakāraḥ prāsaṅgika ucyate 
cakrī rathiko gantryādiyānādhirūḍhaḥ 
tasya panthā deyaḥ 
yena bhūmibhāgena grāmādi deśāntaraṃ gamyate sa paddhatiḥ panthā ucyate 
tatra yadi pṛṣṭhataḥ saṃmukhato vā rathika āgacchet tadā tadgamanoparodhinaḥ pathipradeśāt padātir apakrāmet 
daśamīstho 'tyantapariṇatavayāḥ 
rogī vyādhinātyantapīḍitaḥ 
bhārī gṛhītavrīhyādigurudravyaḥ 
so 'pi yathopasartum aśakto 'nugrāhyaḥ 
striyā anapekṣya jātiguṇabhartṛsaṃbandhān strītvamātreṇaiva 
rājā ca viṣayeśvaro 'trābhipretaḥ na kṣatriya eva 
tathā cottaratra pārtivagrahaṇena nigamane pṛthivyā īśvaraḥ pārthivaḥ 
nanu copakrame rājaśabdaśravaṇād vākyāntaragataḥ pārthivaśabdas tatpara eva yuktaḥ 
rājaśabdo hi kṣatriyajātivacano vijñātaḥ 
sa tāvad anupajātavirodhitvād upakramagato mukhyārtho grāhyaḥ 
balādivākye tu tatsāpekṣakṣatriyajātivihitena dharmeṇa pṛthivīpālanākhyena pārthivaśabdasya prayogasaṃbhavena jātyantaraviṣayatvam ayuktam 
atrocyate 
mānyatātra śrutā 
snātako nṛpamānabhāgīti 
tatra kṣatriyajātīyamātrān mānyatvaṃ snātakasya siddham eva brāhmaṇaṃ daśavarṣam iti 
tatra hi bhūmipaśabdaḥ kṣatriyajātimātropalakṣaṇārtha ity uktam 
upalakṣaṇatvāc ca rājajāteḥ kṣatriyasyāpi prajeśvarasyāyaṃ dharmo vijñāyate 
varo vivāhāya pravṛttaḥ 
eteṣāṃ panthā deyaḥ 
tyāgamātraṃ ca dadatyarthaḥ 
tyāgaś ca patho 'pasaraṇam 
ata eva caturthī na kṛtā 
teṣāṃ tu samavetānāṃ mānyau snātakapārthivau 
rājasnātakayoś caiva snātako nṛpamānabhāk 
teṣāṃ tu samavetānām ekatra saṃnipatitānāṃ mānyau snātakapārthivau prakṛtena pathodānena 
nṛpamānabhāk nṛpasya sakāśān mānaṃ bhajate labhate 
ṣaṣṭhī nirdhāraṇe 
cakryādīnāṃ tv anyoynaṃ vikalpaḥ 
sa ca śaktyapekṣaḥ 
upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayed dvijaḥ 
sakalpaṃ sarahasyaṃ ca tam ācāryaṃ pracakṣate 
ācāryādiśabdānām evārthanirūpaṇārtham idam ārabhyate 
sopacāro hi loke eṣāṃ prayogaḥ 
na ca śabdārthasaṃbandhasya smartṛbhir ācāryapāṇiniprabhṛtibhir etan nirūpitam 
iyaṃ cācāryapadārthasmṛtir vyavahāramūlā na vedamūlā pāṇinyādismṛtivat 
na hy atra kiṃcit kartavyam upadiśyate 
asya śabdasyāyam artha iti siddharūpo 'yam arthaḥ na sādhyarūpaḥ 
upanīya upanayanaṃ kṛtvā yo vedam adhyāpayati grāhayati sa ācāryaḥ 
grahaṇaṃ cātrādhyetrantaranirapekṣaṃ vākyānupūrvīsmaraṇam 
kalpaśabdaḥ sarvāṅgapradarśanārthaḥ 
rahasyam upaniṣadaḥ 
yady api te 'pi vedaśabdenaiva gṛhītās tathāpi dvitīyas teṣāṃ vyapadeśo 'sti vedāntā ity antaśabdaṃ samīpavacanaṃ manyamāno naite vedā iti manyeta tadāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaṃ rahasyagrahaṇam 
anye tu rahasyaṃ vedārthaṃ varṇayanti 
tena na svarūpagrahaṇamātrād ācāryakaniṣpattiḥ api tu tadvyākhyānasahitāt 
tathā cābhidhānakośe 'bhihitam vivṛṇoti ca mantrārthān ācāryaḥ so 'bhidhīyate iti 
mantragrahaṇaṃ vedavākyopalakṣaṇārtham 
asmiṃś ca vyākhyāne 'rthāvabodho 'py ācāryakaraṇavidhiprayuktaḥ syān na kevalaṃ saṃpāṭhamātram 
tataś ca sarvasya sarvaḥ svādhyāyavidher anuṣṭhāpakaḥ syāt 
astu paraprayukte 'py anuṣṭhāne svādhyāyavidher brahmacāriṇaḥ svārthasiddhiḥ 
yadā tarhi kāmyatvād ācāryakaraṇavidher ācāryo na pravartate tadā svādhyāyavidhyarthānuṣṭhānaṃ na prāpnoti 
tataś ca nityaḥ svādhāyavidhiḥ syāt 
na ca rahasyaśabdo vedārthavacanatayā prasiddhaḥ 
tasmāt pūrvam eva rahasyagrahaṇasya prayojanam 
prādhānyād vā pṛthag upādānam 
yat tu vivṛṇoti ca mantrārthān ity asmṛtir evaiṣā mantraśabdasyopalakṣaṇatve pramāṇābhāvāt 
tasmāt pāṭhābhiprāyam asya vidheḥ prayojakatvam 
ato vedasvarūpagrahaṇe māṇavakasya jāte ācāryakaraṇavidhinirvṛttiḥ 
ekadeśaṃ tu vedasya vedāṅgāny api vā punaḥ 
yo 'dhyāpayati vṛttyartham upādhyāyaḥ sa ucyate 
vedasyaikadeśo mantraḥ brāhmaṇaṃ vā 
vedavarjitāni vā kevalāny aṅgāny eva yo 'dhyāpayati tathā sarvam api vedam 
vṛtthyarthaṃ jīvikārtham nācāryakaraṇavidhivaśena sa upādhyāyo nācāryaḥ 
anyenopanītaṃ yaḥ kṛtsnam api vedam adhyāpayati nāsāv ācāryaḥ 
upanīyāpi yaḥ kṛtsnaṃ vedaṃ nādhyāpayati so 'pi nācāryaḥ 
yady evam ekadeśagrahaṇam upādhyāyalakṣaṇe kṛtam ācāryalakṣaṇe upanayanagrahaṇam yas tarhy anupanetā kṛtsnavedādhyāpakaś ca tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam 
nāsāv ācāryo nāpy upādhyāyaḥ 
na cāpi nāmāntaraṃ tasya śrutam 
ucyate 
alpaṃ vā bahu vā yasya śrutasya ity anena gurur asāv ācāryān nyūna upādhyāyād apy adhikaḥ 
api punaḥ śabdau pādapūraṇārthau 
niṣekādīni karmāṇi yaḥ karoti yathāvidhi 
saṃbhāvayati cānnena sa vipro gurur ucyate 
niṣekagrahaṇāt pitur ayaṃ gurutvopadeśaḥ 
niṣeko retaḥsekaḥ sa ādir yeṣāṃ karmaṇām 
ādigrahaṇāt sarve saṃskārā gṛhyante 
tāni yaḥ karoty annena ca yaḥ saṃbhāvayati saṃvardhayati 
caivenam iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
arthas tu sa eva annenaiva saṃbhāvanopapatteḥ 
arthāntaranirdeśaḥ enaṃ kumāram 
nanu cānvādeśaḥ 
na ceha kumārasya pūrvam upadeśaḥ 
naivam 
kasyānyasya niṣekādīni kriyante 
sāmarthyād api nirdeśo na nirdeśata eva 
tāni yaḥ karoti 
evam ābhyāṃ guṇābhyāṃ hīnaḥ kevalajanakatve pitaiva bhavati na guruḥ 
na caivaṃ mantavyam asati gurutve nāsau mānyaḥ 
sarvaprathamam asāv eva mānyaḥ 
tathā ca bhagavān vyāsaḥ
prabhuḥ śarīraprabhavaḥ priyakṛt prāṇado guruḥ 
hitānām upadeṣṭā ca prathyakṣaṃ daivataṃ pitā  iti 
vipragrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham 
agnyādheyaṃ pākayajñān agniṣṭomādikān makhān 
ya karoti vṛto yasya sa tasyartvig ihocyate 
āhavanīyādīnām agnīnām utpādakakarma agnyādheyam ucyate 
vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhīta iti vihitam 
pākayajñā darśapūrṇamāsādayaḥ 
agniṣṭomādayo makhāḥ somayāgaḥ 
makhaśabdaḥ kratuparyāyaḥ 
etāni karmāṇi yasya yaḥ karoti sa tasyartvig ity ucyate 
yasya tasyetiśabdau saṃbandhitāṃ darśayataḥ 
yasyaivaitāni karmāṇi karoti tasyaivāsāv ṛtvig ucyate nānyasya 
sarva eta ācāryādayaḥ saṃbandhiśabdāḥ 
vṛtaḥ prārthitaḥ śāstrīyeṇa vidhinā kṛtavaraṇaḥ 
mānyatāprasaṅgād ṛtviksaṃjñopadeśo 'tra na hi brahmacāridharmeṣu ṛtvijām avasaraḥ 
ācāryādivat pūjya ity asminn avadhau tallakṣaṇam ucyate 
ya āvṛṇoty avitathaṃ brahmaṇā śravaṇāv ubhau 
sa mātā sa pitā jñeyas taṃ na druhyet kadācana 
ya ubhau śravaṇau brahmaṇā vedādhyāpanena āvṛṇoti sa mātā sa pitā jñeyaḥ 
nedam adhyāpakasya matāpitṛśabdavācyatāvidhānam 
ācāryādiśabdavat prasiddhārthau hi pitṛmātṛśabdau 
janakaḥ pitā 
jananī mātā 
upacāreṇādhyāpakastutyarthaṃ prayujyete 
yathā gaur vāhīka iti 
loke hy antyantopakārakau mātāpitarau prathitau tau hitaṃ janayato bhaktādinā puṣṇītaḥ svaśarīrānapekṣam api putrahite pravartete 
ato mahopakārakatvāt tābhyām upādhyāyaḥ stūyate 
yo vidyāyāṃ upakaroti sa sarvopakārakebhyaḥ śreyān 
avitathaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat 
avitathena satyena brahmaṇānakṣaravisvaravarṇitena tan na druhyeta 
apakāro drohas tad upari avajñānaṃ ca 
kadācana niṣpannagranthagrahaṇe taduttarakālam api na druhyeta 
tathā ca niruktakāraḥ
adhyāpitā ye gurūn nādriyante viprā vācā manasā karmaṇā vā 
nādriyante avajñāṃ kurvanti 
yathaiva te
śiṣyā 
na guror bhojanīyāḥ
na bhogāya kalpante 
tathaiva tān na bhunakti śrutaṃ tat 
pāṭhāntaram ātṛṇatti iti 
arthāt karṇau bhinatti vidhyatīty upamayādhyāpanam evocyate 
aviddhakarṇaḥ kila sa smṛto naraḥ śrutaṃ na yasya śrutigocaraṃ gatam 
iti 
sarvādhyāpakānām ācāryopādhyāyagurūṇām ayaṃ kṛtavidhyasyāpi drohapratiṣedhaḥ 
upādhyāyān daśācārya ācāryāṇāṃ śataṃ pitā 
sahasraṃ tu pitṝn mātā gauraveṇātiricyate 
stutyakrameṇa prakṛṣṭapūrvavidhānam 
upādhyāyāc chreṣṭa ācāryas tasmāt pitā tato 'pi māteti 
daśādisaṃkhyānirdeśaḥ stutimātram 
pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt parasya parasyātiśayo vivakṣitaḥ 
ata eva sahasraṃ pitur iti vacanam 
upādhyāyān daśātiricyate 
daśabhya upādhyāyebhyo 'dhikaḥ 
kathaṃ punar atra dvitīyā 
atir ayaṃ karmapravacanīyaḥ 
upādhyāyān atikramyātikramyātiricyate gauraveṇa sātiśayena yujyate 
atha vādhikyam atirekaḥ taddhetuke 'bhibhave dhātur vartate 
gauravādhikyenopādhyāyān abhibhavati 
atiricyata iti karmakartari dvitīyā cāviruddhā duhipacyor bahulaṃ sakarmakayoḥ iti bahulagrahaṇāt 
nanu cānantaram eva vakṣyati garīyān brahmadaḥ pitā iti iha cācāryāt pitur ādhikyam ucyate tad itaretaravyāhatam 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
ihācāryo nairuktadarśanenādhyāpakaḥ saṃskāramātreṇācāropadeśamātreṇa cābhipretaḥ ācārya ācāraṃ grāhayatīti 
na caiṣa niyamaḥ svaśāstrasiddhābhir eva saṃjñābhir vyavahāraḥ 
guruśabdo hy atra pitari paribhāṣitaḥ ācārye ca tatra tatra prayujyate 
tena svalpopakārād upanayanamātrakarād ācāragrāhakād adhyāpanarahitād idaṃ pitur jyāyastvam 
asmiṃś ca krame vivakṣite samavāya eteṣāṃ mātā prathamaṃ vandyā tataḥ pitā tata ācāryas tata upādhyāyaḥ 
mukhyācāryasaṃnidhau pitari ca saṃskartari saṃnihite kaḥ kramaḥ 
ata āha 
utpādakabrahmadatror garīyān brahmadaḥ pitā 
brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ceha ca śāśvatam 
utpādako janakaḥ brahmadātā adhyāpakaḥ tau dvāv api pitarau 
tayoḥ pitror garīyān pitā yo brahmadaḥ 
ataḥ pitrācāryasamavāye ācāryaḥ prathamam abhivādyaḥ 
atra heturūpam arthavādam āha 
brahmajanma hi brahmagrahaṇārthaṃ janma brahmajanma 
śākapārthivāditvāt samāsaḥ 
asmin samāse upanayanaṃ brahmajanma 
atha vā brahmagrahaṇam eva janma 
tad viprasya śāśvataṃ nityaṃ pretyopakārakam iha copakārakam 
kāmān mātā pitā cainaṃ yad utpādayato mithaḥ 
saṃbhūtiṃ tasya tāṃ vidyād yad yonāv abhijāyate 
ślokadvayam arthavādaḥ 
mātāpitarau yad enaṃ dārakam utpādayato janayato mitho rahasi parasparaṃ tat kāmād dhetor manmathaparavaśau 
saṃbhūtiṃ tasya tāṃ vidyāt 
tasya dārakasya saṃbhavotpattir yad yonau mātṛkukṣāv abhijāyate 'ṅgapratyaṅgāni labhate 
saṃbhavaś ca yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ te tathaiva vinaśyanti 
ataḥ kiṃ tena saṃbhavena yasyānantarabhāvī vināśaḥ 
ācāryas tv asya yāṃ jātiṃ vidhivad vedapāragaḥ 
utpādayati sāvitryā sā satyā sājarāmarā 
ācāryāt tu yat tasya janma tad avināśi 
gṛhīte vede 'vagate ca tadarthe karmānuṣṭhānāt svargāpavargaprāptir ity asya sarvasyācāryamulatvāt sa śreṣṭhaḥ 
yāṃ jātim utpādayati yaṃ saṃskāram upanayanākhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ janmeti janmasaṃstutiṃ nirvartayati sāvitryā tadanuvacanena sā jātiḥ satyā sājarāmarā 
yady apy ete 'bhinnārthāḥ śabdās tathāpīhopanayanākhyasya janmano mātṛjanmanaḥ sakāśāṅ guṇātiśayavivakṣāyāṃ prayuktāḥ 
na hi jarāmṛtyū prāṇinām iva jāteḥ saṃbhavataḥ 
avināśitvaṃ tv ekenaiva śabdena śakyate pratipādayitum 
na ca tat pratipādyate 
vedapāraga ācāryo yāṃ jātiṃ vidhivat sāvitryā upanayanāṅgakalāpena sāvitrīśabdasya tallakṣaṇatvāt utpādayati sā śreyasīti padayojanā 
jātir janma 
alpaṃ vā bahu vā yasya śrutasyopakaroti yaḥ 
tam apīha guruṃ vidyāc chrutopakriyayā tayā 
ya upādhyāyo yasya māṇavakasyopakaroti śrutasya śrutenety arthaḥ 
alpaṃ vā bahu vā kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat 
tam api svalpaśrutopakāriṇaṃ guruṃ vidyāt 
evaṃ tu yojanā jyāyasī 
yasya śrutasya sāmānādhikaraṇye vedaviṣayasya vedāṅgaviṣayasya vā śāstrāntaraviṣayasya tarkakalāśāstrasya yad alpaṃ bahu vā tenopakarotīty adhyāhāraḥ 
śrutaṃ ca tadupakriyā cāsau śrutopakriyā tayā upakārakriyayā taddhetutvāc chrutam upakriyeti sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
guruvṛttis tatra kartavyā tadvyapadeśo vā tatrācāryādiśabdavat smaryate 
brāhmasya janmanaḥ kartā svadharmasya ca śāsitā 
bālo 'pi vipro vṛddhasya pitā bhavati dharmataḥ 
brahmagrahaṇārthaṃ janma brāhmam upanayanaṃ tasya kartā 
svadharmasya śāsitā upadeṣṭā vedārthavyākhyānena 
sa tādṛśo bālo 'pi brāhmaṇo vṛddhasya jyeṣṭasya pitā bhavati 
pitṛtulyā tatra vṛttiḥ kartavyā jyeṣṭhenāpi 
kathaṃ punaḥ kanīyāñ jyeṣṭham upanayate 
aṣṭame hy upanayanam 
yāvac ca nādhītaśrutavedas tāvan nācāryakaraṇavidhāv adhikriyate 
evaṃ tarhi nopanayanam atra brāhma janma kiṃ tarhi svādhyāyagrahaṇam eva 
tasya kartā adhyāpayitā 
svadharmasya vedārthasya śāsitā vyākhyātā pitā bhavati 
dharmataḥ pitṛdharmās tatra kartavyāḥ 
dharmata iti dharmanimittaṃ tatra pitṛtvam 
na ca te dharmā adhyāpakavyākhyātroḥ pitṛsaṃbandhinaḥ siddhāḥ santi 
ato vidhīyate brāhmaṇavat kṣatriye vartitavyam iti 
adhyāpayāmāsa pitṝn śiśur āṅgirasaḥ kaviḥ 
putrakā iti hovāca jñānena parigṛhya tān 
pūrvasya pitṛvad vṛttividher arthavādo 'yaṃ parakṛtināmā 
aṅgirasaḥ putraḥ kavir nāma śiśur bālaḥ pitṛtulyān pitṛvyamātulatatputrādīn adhikavayaso 'dhyapayāñ cakāra adhyāpitavān 
sa cāhvānanimitteṣu tān putrakā āgacchata ity ājuhāva 
jñānena parigṛhya tān svīkṛtya śiṣyān kṛtvā 
te tam artham apṛcchanta devān āgatamanyavaḥ 
devāś caitān sametyocur nyāyyaṃ vaḥ śiśur uktavān 
te pitrādisthānīyā putrakā ity āhvānena āgatamanyava utpannakrodhās tam arthaṃ putraśabdāhvānaṃ devān pṛṣṭavantaḥ 
anena bālena vayam evam āhūyāmahe 
kim etad yuktam 
te devāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ sarve samavāyaṃ kṛtavantaḥ sametya ekamatyaṃ sthāpayitvaitān kaveḥ pitṝn ūcur uktavanto nyāyyaṃ yuktaṃ vo yuṣmān śiśur uktavān 
ajño bhavati vai bālaḥ pitā bhavati mantradaḥ 
ajñaṃ hi bālam ity āhuḥ pitety eva tu mantradam 
yasmān na ca vayasā svalpena bālo bhavati kiṃ tarhy ajño mūkho vṛddho 'pi yaḥ 
mantrada upalakṣaṇam 
mantrān vedān yo dadāty adhyāpayati vivṛṇoti ca sa pitā bhavati 
vaiśabda āgamāntarasūcakaḥ 
devānām apy eṣa āgamaḥ purāṇa eva 
tathā caitihyasūcakaḥ paropadeśa āhur iti 
ajñaṃ mūrkhaṃ bālam ity āhur asmatpūrve 'pi 
piteti mantradam 
itikaraṇaṃ svarūpaparatām bodhayati 
yataḥ parataḥ śrūyate 
bāla ity etena śabdenājñamātraḥ 
ataś ca bālaśabdād dvitīyāyā abhāvaḥ 
chāndogye śaiśavaṃ brāhmaṇam etad vastutaḥ smṛtikāreṇa varṇitam 
na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ 
ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān 
iyam aparādhyāpakapraśaṃsā 
hāyanaśabdaḥ saṃvatsaraparyāyaḥ 
na bahubhir varṣaiḥ pariṇatavayā mahān pūjyo bhavati na palitaiḥ keśaśmaśruromabhiḥ śuklaiḥ na vittena bahunā na bandhubhiḥ 
prāguktāni mānyasthānāny āpadyante 
samuditair na mahān bhavati kiṃ tarhi ekayaiva vidyayā 
yasmād ṛṣayaś cakrire 
ṛṣir darśanāt 
niḥśeṣavedārthadarśino niścityemaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpitavantaḥ 
yo 'nūcānaḥ anuvacanam adhyāpanaṃ kṛtsnāṅgasya vedasya sa no 'smākaṃ mahāñ chreṣṭhaḥ 
karotir vyavasthāpane vartate nābhūtajanane 
viprāṇāṃ jñānato jyaiṣṭhyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu vīryataḥ 
vaiśyānāṃ dhānyadhanataḥ śūdrāṇām eva janmataḥ 
ayam apy arthavāda eva 
yad uktaṃ vittādibhyaḥ samuditebhyaḥ kevalāpi vidyā jyāyasīti tad eva saprapañcam anena nirdiśyate 
brāhmaṇānāṃ jñānena jyaiṣṭhyaṃ na vittādibhiḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ vīryataḥ vīryaṃ dravyasya kauśalaṃ dṛḍhaprāṇatā ca 
vaiśyānāṃ dhānyadhanataḥ 
dhānyasya pṛthagupādānād dhanaśabdo hiranyādivacanaḥ brāhmaṇaparivrājakavat 
bahudhano vaiśyaḥ sa jyeṣṭhaḥ 
ādyāditvāt tṛtīyārthe tasiḥ 
hetau tṛtīyā 
na tena vṛddho bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ 
yo vai yuvāpy adhīyānas taṃ devāḥ sthaviraṃ viduḥ 
na tena vṛddha ucyate yenāsya palitaṃ dhavalaṃ śiraḥ śiraḥsthāḥ keśāḥ 
kathaṃ tarhi yo vai yuvāpi taruṇo 'pi atha cādhīte taṃ devāḥ sthaviraṃ viduḥ bruvate 
devāḥ kila sarvasya veditāra iti praśaṃsā 
yathā kāṣṭhamayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ 
yaś ca vipro 'nadhīyānas trayas te nāma bibhrati 
iyam adhyayanādhyetṛstutiḥ kāṣṭhamayo dāruṇā yaḥ kriyate krakacādinā hastyākṛtiḥ sa yathā niṣphalaḥ na hastikāryaṃ rājñāṃ śatruvadhādi karoti evaṃ yo brāhmaṇo nādhīte sa kāṣṭhatulyaḥ na kvacid adhikārī 
carmamayo mṛgaḥ carmavikāro 'nyo 'pi yo mṛgaḥ sa niṣphalo nākheṭakādikāryaṃ karoti 
traya ete nāmamātraṃ bibhrati na tasyārtham 
yathā ṣaṇḍḥo 'phalaḥ strīṣu yathā gaur gavi cāphalā 
yathā cājñe 'phalaṃ dānaṃ tathā vipro 'nṛco 'phalaḥ 
ṣaṇḍho napuṃsaka ubhavyañjano 'śaktaḥ strīgamane yathā strīṣv aphalaḥ 
yathā gaur gavi strīgauḥ strīgavyām evaṃ tathā vipro 'nṛco 'nadhīyāno 'phalaḥ 
saptāṣṭaślokāḥ adhyetṛveditroḥ praśaṃsārthā atikrāntāḥ idānīm aśraddhasya śiṣyasyādhīyānasyetas tataś cittaṃ vyākṣipyate 
ahiṃsayaiva bhūtānāṃ kāryaṃ śreyo 'nuśāsanam 
vāk caiva madhurā ślakṣṇā prayojyā dharmam icchatā 
adhyāpayituḥ krodhotpattau tāḍanaparuṣabhāṣaṇādyam atyarthaṃ prāptaṃ niṣidhyate 
ahiṃsayā atāḍanena bhūtānāṃ bhāryāputradāsaśiṣyasodaryāṇām 
śreyo'rtham anuśāsanaṃ kāryam 
bhūtagrahaṇān mā śiṣyasyaiva vijñāyi 
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalāvāptiḥ śreyaḥ tadartham anuśāsanam 
agranthako vopadeśaḥ śāstrādhyāpanavyākhyāne vā 
yathāsaṃbhavam atitāḍanaṃ krośanaṃ cātra pratiṣidhyate 
īṣattāḍanaṃ tv abhyanujñātam eva rajjvā veṇudalena vā iti 
kathaṃ tarhi mārge sthāpyāḥ 
vāk caiva madhurā sāntvapūrvikā 
priyayā vācā ślakṣṇayā noccair uddhatena kākarūkṣeṇa svareṇa priyeṇāpi adhīṣva putraka mā cittam anyatrābaddhāḥ śraddhayā samāpya śīghraṃ prapāṭhakaṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ vihariṣyasi śuśubhiḥ savayobhiḥ 
yas tu na tathā śraddhām upaiti tasyokto vidhiḥ veṇudenena iti 
proyojyā vaktavyā 
dharmam icchatā 
evaṃ sātiśayo 'dhyāpanadharmo bhavati 
yasya vāṅmanase śuddhe samyaggupte ca sarvadā 
sa vai sarvam avāpnoti vedāntopagataṃ phalam 
yasyādhyāpayitur anyasya vā saṃkṣobhahetau sati vāṅmanasī śuddhe na kāluṣyaṃ gacchataḥ 
samyaggupte cotpanne 'pi kāluṣye na paradrohavyavasāyo na ca tatpīḍārthaḥ karmārambhaḥ etat samyaggopanaṃ vāṅmanasayoḥ 
sarvadāgrahaṇaṃ puruṣamātradharmārthaṃ nādhyāpayitur eva adhyāpanakāle 
sa vai sarvam avāpnoti 
vedāntā vedasiddhāntāḥ 
siddhaśabdasyātyantaṃ siddha iti siddhe śabdārthasaṃbandhe ity atrātyantaśabdasyeva lopaḥ 
vaidikeṣu vākyeṣu ya siddhānto vyavasthitārtho 'sya karmaṇa idaṃ phalam ity upagataḥ abhyupagato vedavidbhiḥ tatphalaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti 
evam ca vadatā vāṅmanasasaṃyamasyānena vākyena kratuṣu puruṣobhayadharmatoktā bhavati 
kevalapuruṣadharmātikrame hy asati kratuvaiguṇye 'saṃyato 'pi vāṅmanasābhyāṃ kim iti kṛtsnaṃ phalaṃ na prāpnoti yenocyate saṃyamī sarvam āpnoti iti 
anye tu vedāntān rahasyabrāhmaṇān vyācakṣate 
teṣu yad abhyupagataṃ phalaṃ nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ niṣphalānāṃ ca yamaniyamānāṃ tatphalaṃ brahmaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ sarvam āpnoti 
kathaṃ punar nityāni brahmaprāptyarthānīti ced asti keṣāṃcid darśanam 
atha vā vedasyānto 'dhyāpanasamāptis tato yat phalam ācāryakaraṇavidhis tat prāpnoti 
evaṃ tu vyākhyāne 'dhyāpanavidhyarthataiva syāt 
nāruntudaḥ syād ārto 'pi na paradrohakarmadhīḥ
yayāsyodvijate vācā nālokyāṃ tām udīrayet 
ayam aparaḥ puruṣārthamātradharmaḥ 
arūṃṣi marmāṇi tudati vyathayatīty aruṃtudo marmasparśinīr vāco 'tyantodvejanakarīr ākrośavāco yo vadati 
ārtaḥ pīḍito 'pi pareṇa na tādṛśam apriyaṃ bhāṣeta 
tathā paradrohaḥ parāpakāraḥ tadarthaṃ karma taddhīś ca na kartavyā 
atha vā paradrohaś cāsau karma ca tatra dhīḥ buddhir api na kartavyā 
yayā vācā narmaprayuktayāpi para udvijate atha ca tāṃ vācaṃ nodīrayet 
vākyaikadeśam api tādṛśaṃ noccārayed yata ekadeśād arthaprakaraṇādinārthāntarasūcanaṃ pratīyate 
yataḥ sā vāg alokyā svargādilokaprāptipratibandhinī 
saṃmānād brāhmaṇo nityam udvijeta viṣād iva 
amṛtasyeva cākāṅkṣed avamānasya sarvadā 
bhikṣamāṇasya brahmacāriṇo gṛhe vopādhyāyasya jīvikayādhyāpayato yatra saṃmānaṃ na syān na tena cittasaṃkṣobham ādadīta api tu saṃmānād evodvijeta pūjayaiva dīyamānaṃ na bahu manyeta 
amṛtam ivākāṅkṣed abhilaṣed avamānam avajñāṃ sarvadā 
utkaṇṭhāsāmānyāt adhīgarthatvam ākāṅkṣer āropya ṣaṣṭhī kṛtā 
nanu cānarcitam abhojyam 
satyaṃ cittasaṃkṣobhapratiṣedhārtham etat 
na tu tādṛśasya bhojyatocyate 
saṃmānāvamanayoḥ samena bhavitavyaṃ na punar avamānaṃ prārthanīyam 
brahmacāriṇas tv avamatam api bhikṣādānam 
na cāyaṃ pratigrahaḥ yo 'rcitaṃ pratigṛhṇāti itty etasya yena viṣayaḥ syāt 
sukhaṃ hy avamataḥ śete sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate 
sukhaṃ carati loke 'sminn avamantā vinaśyati 
pūrvasya vidher arthavādo 'yaṃ phaladarśanārthaḥ 
so 'vamānān na kṣubhyati sa sukhaṃ śete 
anyathā dveṣeṇa dahyamāno na kathaṃcin nidrāṃ labhate 
pratibuddhaś ca taccintāparo na sukhaṃ vindati 
utthitaś ca śayanāt kāryeṣu sukhaṃ carati 
yas tv avamānasya kartā sa tena pāpena vinaśyati 
anena kramayogena saṃskṛtātmā dvijaḥ śanaiḥ 
gurau vasan saṃcinuyād brahmādhigamikaṃ tapaḥ 
saṃskṛtātmā upanīto dvijo 'nena kramayogena tapaḥ saṃcinuyāt 
adhyeṣyamāṇa ity ata ārabhya yad brahmacāriṇaḥ kartavyam uktam tasya anena iti pratyavamarśaḥ 
anena vidhisaṃghātena kramayogena krameṇānuṣṭhīyamānena tapa ātmasaṃskāraṃ niṣkalmaṣatvalakṣaṇam 
yathā tapasā cāndrāyaṇādinā niṣkalmaṣatvaṃ bhavaty evam anenāpi vedagrahaṇārthena yamaniyamasamūhena 
ataḥ saṃcinuyāt śanair atvarayārjayec ca vardhayec ca 
kramaḥ paripāṭī idaṃ kṛtvedaṃ kartavyaṃ oṃkārapūrvikāḥ ityādiḥ 
tena yogaḥ saṃbandho yasyānuṣṭhānasyeti yāvat 
brahmaṇaḥ ādhigamikam adhigamārtham 
adhyayanabodhāv adhigamaḥ 
tapoviśeṣair vividhair vrataiś ca vidhicoditaiḥ
