vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ sarahasyo dvijanmanā 
tapoviśeṣaiḥ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādibhir vividhair bahuprakārair ekāhāracaturthakālāhārādibhir abhikṣiṇvatā śarīram 
vrataiś copaniṣadmahānāmnikādibhiḥ 
vidhinoditair gṛhyasmṛtiṣv āmnātair anuṣṭhīyamānair vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ 
ye tu pūrvaśloke tapaḥ śabdo brahmacāridharme prayukta ihāpi tapoviśeṣās ta evābhipretā ity āhuḥ na te samyaṅ manyante vrataśabdenaiva teṣāṃ saṃgṛhītatvāt 
vratam iti hi śāstrato niyama ucyate 
sāmānyaśabdatvāc ca vrataśabdasya mahānāmnikādīnām api grahaṇasiddhiḥ 
tasmāt tapāṃsy upavāsādīny abhipretāni 
iha kecid veda ity atraikavacanaṃ vivakṣitaṃ manyante 
yady api tavyapratyayanirdeśād viniyogato vedasya prādhānyaṃ saṃskāryatayā pratīyate tathāpi vidhito vastutaś cārthāvabodhe guṇabhāva eva 
guṇe ca saṃvivakṣite 'rthāvabodhaparyanto hy ayaṃ vedaviṣayo māṇavakasya vyāpāro vidhivṛttaparyālocanayāvasīyate 
ayaṃ hy atra vidhyarthaḥ adhītena vedenārthāvabodhaṃ kuryāt na saṃskāryatvam anyathā nirvahati 
sarvo hi kāryāntare śeṣabhūtaḥ saṃskriyate 
vedasya ca dṛṣṭam eva kāryam adhītasya svārthabodhajanakatvam anyathā saktūñ juhoti itivat prādhānyaṃ śrutam apy utsṛjyeta 
dhātur apy avabodhārtha eva 
adhigamanaṃ hi jñānam ucyate 
sarve gatyarthā jñānārthāḥ iti smṛtam 
svarūpagrahaṇaṃ ca vedasya prāg eva vihitam saṃhatya hastāv adhyeyam ityādinā 
tasyaivārthagrahaṇaparyantatānena pratipādyate 
vivakṣām eva matvānekavedādhyayanam aprāptaṃ pratiprasaviṣyate vedān adhītya iti 
yady apy anekavedādhyayanam asti kvaikatvavivakṣopayujyate 
bāḍham upayujyate 
ekasyām eva śākhāyām adhītāyāṃ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ iti vidhyarthanivṛttiḥ 
icchātas tv anekavedādhyayanam yadi na vidhicoditaṃ ka unmatto dantakalaśikayātmānaṃ kleśayiṣyati 
asty evātra vidhyantaraṃ vedān adhītya iti tac ca phalakāmasya 
phalaṃ ca svargaḥ 
athāsya vidher vākyaśeṣe kiṃcid āmnāyate ghṛtakulyādayo 'nyad vā tatas tad eva bhavitum arhati 
brahmacāriṇo hi vidhir arthāvabodhaviṣayo dṛṣṭaprayojanaś ca avabodhasya karmānuṣṭhānopayogadarśanād viduṣaḥ karmaṇy adhikārāt 
ekaikavedādhyayanam adṛṣṭāyaiva 
anyathaikavedādhyayanenaiva svādhyāyavidhinirvṛtter asati dharmāya vidhau vedān adhītyetyādivacanam anarthakam eva syāt 
atroyate 
katham ayaṃ pakṣaḥ saṃgaccheta yāvataiko 'yaṃ vidhir vedo 'dhigantavya iti sa cet saṃskāravidhitvād dṛṣṭakarmānuṣṭhānopayogāc ca nādṛṣṭārthaḥ kalpyate tad anekavedādhyayane 'pi tulyam 
tatrāpi hy ayaṃ prakāro 'sty eva 
vairūpyaṃ ca syāt 
kvacid ādhānavidhivad avabodhadvāreṇa nityakāmyakarmasaṃbandhaḥ kvacit sākṣāt phalārthateti 
atha matam vedān adhītya iti vidhyantaram etat na vācāryakaraṇavidhiprayojyam 
tat phalakāma evātrādhikriyata iti 
tad asat 
na caitad vidhyantaram 
prakṛtasyaiva vidher asatyāṃ saṃkhyāvivakṣāyāṃ pañcaṣaṭsaptādiśākhādhyayanaṃ yāvacchaktiprāptaṃ trayaṃ niyamayati 
na cādhīyīteti vidhir atra śrūyate 
api tu gṛhasthāśramam āvaset ity ayam atra vidhiḥ 
yad api saṃkhyāyā vivakṣitatvam uktaṃ tad atyantāsaṃbaddham 
viniyogato hi saṃkhyāvivakṣā nopapādanataḥ 
sa ca viniyogaḥ svādhyāyārtham adhyayanam āha 
nārthena guṇabhāvena dvitīyāntābhyām avagataṃ prādhānyam apaiti 
evaṃ hy āśrīyamāṇe grahe 'py ekatvaṃ vivakṣyeta grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭi iti 
pradhānabhūtasyāpi hi tasya saṃmārgaṃ pratyasty eva sādhanabhāvaḥ 
na tv asau śabdenābhidhīyate 
yathā grahair juhotīti home 'pi guṇabhāvaḥ 
tasmād abhidhānaviniyogābhyāṃ prādhānyaṃ svādhyāyasya 
sati ca prādhānye na vivakṣitam ekatvam 
hanta tarhi yady ekenāpi vedena gṛhītena nivarteta svādhyāyavidhyarthaḥ vaktavyam anekavedādhyayanaprayojanam 
tṛtīye vakṣyāmaḥ 
nanu yady avabodhaparyanto 'yaṃ vidhis tadā gṛhīte 'pi svarūpato vede yāvadarthāvabodho na jātas tāvadantarā madhumāṃsādiyamaniyamānuṣṭhānam avyāvṛttaṃ syāt 
tatra ko doṣaḥ 
śiṣṭasamācāravirodhaḥ 
na hi śiṣṭā adhīte vede tadartham upaśṛṇvanto 'pi madhumāṃsādi varjayanti 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
asti hi smṛtyantaraṃ vedam adhītya snāyāt iti 
tatrādhītyeti pāṭhamātram ucyate 
snāyād iti ca svakālasvādhyāyavidhyaṅgayamaniyamanivṛttir lakṣyate 
yathaiva madhumāṃse pratiṣiddhe evaṃ snānam api 
tatra snānam anujñāyamānaṃ sāhacaryān madhumāṃsādīny api tulyaprakaraṇatvād anujānāti 
strīsaṃprayogas tu vacanāntareṇa aviplutabrahmacaryaḥ iti pratiṣiddhaḥ 
tadvyatikrame ca na svādhyāyavidher arthāvabodhakāle kiṃcit parihīṇam 
na hi tasyām avasthāyāṃ tadaṅgam sarveṣāṃ yamaniyamānāṃ grahaṇāntatvāt 
puruṣārthas tv ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
ata eva kathaṃcid viplave nāvakīrṇiprāyaścittam 
vrasthasya hi retaḥseko vikāraḥ na ca vratasthaś cāndrāyaṇādinānenopapātakaprāyaścittenādhikriyate 
kiṃ punaḥ snāyād iti lakṣaṇatve kāraṇam 
ucyate 
na tāvad idaṃ snānam adbhiḥ śarīrakṣālanarūpam adṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgāt 
brahmacāriniyamānāṃ cāvadhyaprekṣatvād asya cāvadhisamarpakatvenāpekṣitārthavidhinopapatteḥ 
na punar evaṃ teṣām avadhyantarāpekṣā 
svādhyāyavidhyarthā hi te 'tas tannivṛttir eva teṣām avadhiḥ 
tasya ca nivṛttir viṣayanivṛttyā 
adhyayanaṃ ca tasya viṣayaḥ 
tannivṛttiḥ pratyakṣaiva 
satyam yad yasya śrutaviṣayaniṣṭhataiva syāt 
aśruto 'py asya viṣayaḥ phalabhūto 'rthādhigamo 'pi saṃskāravidhitvānyathānupapattyā viṣayatām āpannaḥ 
yataḥ śrutādhyayananiṣṭhatve vidhitvam evāsya vyāhanyeta 
vidher hi svārthānuṣṭhāpakatvaṃ rūpam 
svārthaś ca kāryakaraṇetikartavyatātmakaḥ 
tac ca vidhyarthavyatirekeṇa nānyat kiṃcit 
na kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ ekapadopādānāt 
adhīyītety adhyayanādidhātvārthāvacchinno bhāvārthaḥ 
yamaniyamānuṣṭhaṇam itikartavyatā 
na tatra tāvad asya vidheḥ svārthānuṣṭhāpakatvasaṃbhavaḥ 
yato viṣayānuṣṭhānadvārikā sarvā vidhīnāṃ svārthānuṣṭhānasaṃpattiḥ 
tasyāsya viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vidhyantaravaśād eva siddham 
ācāryasya hi vidhir asti upanīya śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayet iti 
na cādhyāpanam antareṇādhyayanasiddhiḥ 
ata ācāryaḥ svavidhisaṃpattyartham adhyayane māṇavakaṃ pravartayati svayaṃ ca jñātvā nācāryeṇāpravartitasyānuṣṭhānasaṃbhavaḥ 
ato 'vaśyam ācāryavidhiprayuktatā eṣitavyā 
tatprayuktatve sati siddham anuṣṭhānam iti na svādhyāyādhyayane māṇavakasya vidhinā kaścid arthaḥ 
ataḥ prayoktṛtvāsaṃbhavāt kīdṛśī vidhirūpatāsya vidheḥ 
svarūpanāśe prasakte sa prakāro 'nviṣyate yathāsya prayoktṛtvaṃ labhyate 
tatra niścitas tāvad ayaṃ saṃskāravidhiḥ 
na ca niṣphalaḥ saṃskāraḥ 
adhyayane sati yādṛśasya tādṛśasyārthabandhasya darśanāt tasya ca sakalatatkarmānuṣṭhānopayogitvāt 
ataḥ śrutādhyayanaviṣayasaṃbaddhāvabodhakartavyatāto vidhiḥ pratīyate 
yady api ca vastusvābhāvyena vākyagrahaṇasamantaram avabodho jāyate na tu niścitarūpo bhavati 
ato yena prakāreṇa niścayo bhavati tasminn aṃśe vidheḥ prayoktṛtvam 
niścayo vicārya saṃśāyādivyudāsena bhavati 
na ca vicāro 'nyataḥ prāptaḥ 
nācāryavidheḥ tasyādhyayanamātreṇa nivṛtteḥ 
nāpi dṛṣṭakāryaprayuktaḥ kiṃ vicāram antareṇa puruṣasya na siddhyed yadarthaṃ pravarteta 
yadṛcchayā grāmādikāmasyeva vicāro 'pi prāpta iti cet evaṃ tarhy aniyatatvāt puruṣecchāyāḥ kaścin na vicārayet 
yadi vicārayen nādhyayanasamanantaram 
ato 'syāṃśasyāprāptatvād yāvad aprāptaṃ vidher viṣaya ity asti vidher vyāpāraḥ 
tasmād adhyanasyānyataḥ prāptatvāt tatsaṃbandhasyāvabodhasyāniścitarūpasya vastusvābhāvyenotpattes tādṛśasya na kvacid arthavattvāt saty api tasmin saṃskārakatvān nirvyūḍhe niścitasyaiva phalavatkarmānuṣṭhānopayogitvān niścayasya vicārasādhyatvāt tasya ca niyatakālāvaśyakartavyatāprāptes tannivṛttyarthaṃ vicāraparyavasāyī vidhir ayam avatiṣṭhate 
ato bhavaty ākāṅkṣā niyamānām 
kiṃ śrutādhyayanaparyavasānāvadhir utākṣiptaniścitāvabodhajananārthavicāraparyavasānaḥ 
ato 'syāṃ apekṣāyāṃ vedam adhītya snāyāt ity anenāvadhisamarpaṇaṃ kriyate 
tatra prakṛtasyāpekṣāyāś cāviśeṣād yuktā lakṣaṇā 
nanu kim idam ucyate 'śrutovabodhaḥ yāvatā adhigantavyaḥ iti śrūyata eva 
vede smṛtiṣu cānyāsu vedam adhīte svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ iti ca paṭhyate 
mānavyā api smṛter etat smṛtimūlatvād abhinnārthataiva 
ākṣiptāvabodhābhiprāyo 'yam adhigamaḥ 
yadi vā svarūpagrahaṇam evādhigamaḥ 
avabodhaparyantatā tu tenaiva nyāyena labhyate 
na ca visamañjasam eko 'yaṃ vidhis tasya ca viṣayāṃśaḥ kaścid ācāryavidhinā prayujyate kasyacid aṃśasya sa eva prayojaka iti vairūpyam 
kim atrānupapannam arthabhūtasyaivāvagamāt 
yat tūktam anekavedādhyayanam adṛṣṭārthaṃ yuktam iti tasya ṣaṭtriṃśadābdikam ity atra parihāraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
vedaśabdo mantrabrāhmaṇavākyasamudāyātmikā śākhām ācaṣṭe 
tadavayave 'pi vākye vedaśabdasya prayogadarśanāt tadāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaḥ kṛtsnaśabdaḥ 
yady apy ekasmin vākye 'dhīte vākyāntarasyāpi vedaśabdavācyatvād anivṛttam adhyayanaṃ saṃskārakarmatvād grahavat tathāpi vispaṣṭārthaṃ kṛtsnagrahaṇam 
anye tv aṅgaviṣayaṃ kṛtsnaśabdaṃ varṇayanti 
vedaśabdo hy uktaparimāṇasya vākyasamudāyasya vācakaḥ 
tatra ṛṅmātreṇāpi nyūne na svādhyāyo 'dhīto bhavati 
tasmāt kṛtsnaśabdo 'ṅgādhyayanaprāptyarthaḥ 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇo dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgo vedo 'dhyeyaḥ iti 
nanu yo vedaḥ sa kṛtsna ity etad atra pratīyate 
na cāṅgāni vedaśabdavācyāni 
tatra kūto 'ṅgaiḥ sāhitya 
yā tv eṣā smṛtiḥ ṣaḍaṅgo vedo 'dhyeyaḥ iti tatra svaśabdenāṅgāny upāttāni 
iha tu vedaviśeṣaṇatvāt kṛtsnaśabdasya katham ivāṅgāni gṛhyeran 
ucyate 
svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ iti mūlaivaiṣā smṛtiḥ 
sā cāvabodhaparyantā vyavasthāpitā 
avabodhaś ca nāntareṇāṅgāni kalpata ity arthasiddham aṅgānām upādānam 
ato nigamaniruktavyākaraṇamīmāṃsāvedanam api vidhyākṣiptam 
evam artham aṅgānām upādānam aṅgīkṛtya kṛtsnaśabdo dyotakatvena yukta upādātum 
tatra yathārambhakāṇi puruṣasya hastapādādīny aṅgāny ucyante naivaṃ vedasya niruktādīny ārambhakāṇi 
atha ca bhaktyāṅgtvena vedasyocyante 
na kila tair vinā vedaḥ svārthāya prabhavanty ato 'ṅgānīvādhyāso 'tra 
evam adhyāropitavedatvena kṛtsnaśabda upapadyate 
sarahasya iti 
rahasyam upaniṣadaḥ 
saty api vedatve prādhānyāt pṛthag upādānam 
vedam eva sadābhyasyet tapas tapsyan dvijottamaḥ 
vedābhyāso hi viprasya tapaḥ param ihocyate 
prakṛtaśeṣatayā prāpta eva grahaṇārtho 'bhyāso 'nūdyate stutyartham na punar vidhyantaram 
sadāśabdo graṇakālāpekṣa eva 
tapaḥśabdaḥ śarīrakleśajananeṣv āhāranirodhādiṣu śāstrīyeṣu vartate 
iha tu tajjanyātmasaṃskāro varābhiśāpādisāmarthyaṃ lakṣaṇayocyate 
tat tapas tapsyan tapasārjayitum icchan arjanāṅge saṃtāpe dhātur vartate 
karmakartṛtvasyāvivakṣitatvāt parasmaipadam 
heturūpo dvitīyaślokārdho 'rthavādaḥ 
vedābhyāso hi yāvat kiṃcit prakṛṣṭaṃ tapaḥ tataḥ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vedābhyāsas tattulyaphalatām āropya stūyate 
ā haiva sa nakhāgrebhyaḥ paramaṃ tapyate tapaḥ 
yaḥ sragvy api dvijo 'dhīte svādhyāyaṃ śaktito 'nvaham 
ayam aparo vājasaneyakasvādhyāyavidhir brāhmaṇe 'rthavādānuvādaḥ 
ā nakhāgrebhya eveti saṃbandhaḥ 
haśabda aitihyasūcakaḥ 
paramaśabdāt tapasaḥ prakarṣe pratipanne nakhāgragrahaṇaṃ prakṛṣṭasyāpi prakarṣam āha 
nakhāgrāṇi nirjīvāni tāny api tapasānena vyāpyante 
tapo hi kṛcchrādikaṃ nakhāgrāṇām avyāpakatvān na niḥśeṣaphalapradam 
idaṃ tu tāny api vyāpnotīti praśaṃsā 
tapyate tapa iti 
tapas tapaḥ karmakasyaiva iti yagāmanepade 
yaḥ sragvy api 
srag asyāstīti sragvī kṛtakusumadāmā puruṣa ucyate 
anena ca brahmacāriniyamatyāgaṃ darśayati 
parityajyāpi brahmacāridharmān yadi śaktito yāvac chaknoti svalpam apy anvahaṃ pratyahaṃ vedam adhīte so 'pi prakṛṣṭena puruṣārthena yujyate 
stutir iyaṃ na punar niyamatyāge 'dhyayanam ucyate 
yo 'nadhītya dvijo vedam anyatra kurute śramam 
sa jīvann eva śūdratvam āśu gacchati sānvayaḥ 
yeṣāṃ tāvat kṛtsnaśabdo 'ṅgaparigrahārthaḥ teṣām aniyatakrame 'dhyayane prāpte kramo niyamyate 
prathamaṃ vedo 'dhyetavyaḥ tato 'ṅgāni 
yeṣāṃ tu vedasyaivāsākalpyāśaṅkānivṛttyartham teṣāṃ traividyavratāntaraṃ vedasyaiva prāptam adhyayanam 
agṛhīte vede 'ṅgānām adhyayanaṃ nābhyanujñāyate 
yo dvijo vedam anadhītyānyatra śāstre aṅgeṣu tarkaśāstragrantheṣu vā śramam abhiyogātiśayaṃ kurute sa jīvann eva śūdratvam āpnoti 
āśu kṣipram 
sānvayaḥ putrapautrādisaṃtatyā saha 
śramo yatnātiśayas tanniṣedhāyogāt tatsamāptau yathāvasaram anyāny api vidyāsthānāni paṭhyante 
śūdratvaprāptivacanaṃ nindātiśayaḥ 
dvija iti vacanād upanītasyāyaṃ kramaniyamaḥ 
prāk copanayanād aṅgādhyayanam aniṣiddhaṃ śikṣāvyākaraṇādi yad vedavākyair na miśritam 
nanu ca svādhyāyavidhināṅgāny ākṣipyante 
taṃ ca vidhim ācāryaprayukto māṇavako 'nutiṣṭhati 
prāg upanayanād asaty ācārye kuto 'ṅgādhyayanasaṃbhavaḥ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
tasmād anuśiṣṭaṃ putraṃ lokyam āhuḥ iti pitrā yaḥ saṃskartavyaḥ 
sa enaṃ prāg upanayanād vyākaraṇādy adhyāpayiṣyati 
dvijātīnāṃ tatra tatrādhikāraḥ śrutaḥ 
tatrācāryādiśabdavat suhṛttvāt tadarthanirūpaṇārtham āha 
mātur agre 'dhijananaṃ dvitīyaṃ mauñjibandhane 
tṛtīyaṃ yajñadīkṣāyāṃ dvijasya śruticodanāt 
mātuḥ sakāśād agre ādāv adhijananaṃ janma puruṣasya 
dvitīyaṃ mauñjibandhane upanayane 
ṅyāpor bahulam iti hrasvaḥ 
tṛtīyaṃ jyotiṣṭomādiyajñadīkṣāyām 
dīkṣāpi janmatvena śrūyate punar vāraṃ tad ṛtvijo garbhaṃ kurvanti yad dīkṣayanti iti 
trīṇi janmāni dvijasya śrutinoditāni 
nanu evaṃ sati trijaḥ prāpnoti 
astu 
dvijavyapadeśe tāvad upanayanaṃ nimittam 
tadvyapadeśanibandhaś ca śrautasmārtasāmayikācārikakarmādhikāraḥ 
prathamatṛtīyajanmābhidhānaṃ dvitīyajanmastutyartham 
sarvajanmaśreṣṭhaṃ tat 
adīkṣito hi yajña eva nādhikriyate anupanītas tu na kvacid eva 
anye tv ādyatvasāmānyād ādhānaṃ yajñadīkṣāṃ manyante 
tasyāpi janmasaṃbhavo 'sti ajāta evāsau yo 'gnīn nādhatta iti 
tatra yad brahmajanmāsya mauñjībandhanacihnitam 
tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tv ācārya ucyate 
tatra eteṣu trijanmasu yad etad brahmajanma upanayanaṃ mauñjībandhanacihnitaṃ mekhalābandhanenopalakṣitam 
tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī 
tayā hy anūktayā tanniṣpannaṃ bhavati 
anena ca sāvitryanuvacanam upanayane pradhānaṃ darśayati tadarthaṃ hy asau samīpam ānīyate 
pitācāryaḥ 
mātāpitṛnirvartyaṃ janma 
ato rūpakabhaṅgyā tatrāpy ācāryasāvitryau mātāpitarāv uktau 
mauñjībandhanacihnitam ity uktam 
tatra rajjvāsañjanād ācāryaḥ pitṛvan mānyaḥ syāt tadartham ucyate 
vedapradānād ācāryaṃ pitaraṃ paricakṣate 
na hy asmin yujyate karma kiṃcid ā mauñjibandhanāt 
vedapradānād ācāryaṃ pitaraṃ paricakṣate 
kṛtsnavedādhyāpanān nopanayanāṅgabhūtasāvitryanuvacanamātrād eva 
pradānaṃ māṇavakasya vedākṣaroccāraṇe svīkārotpādanam 
yady evam yāvan nācāryeṇa pitṛtvaṃ prāptaṃ tāvan na māṇavako dvitīyaṃ janma samaśnute 
aprāptadvijabhāvaś ca prāg ivopanayanāt kāmacāraḥ syāt 
ata āha na hy asmin prāṅ mauñjibandhanād asya māṇavakasya kiṃcit karma śrautasmārtam ācārapratiṣṭhaṃ vādṛṣṭārthaṃ prayujyate na tatrādhikriyate 
upanayanasamanantaram eva sarvair dvijātipuruṣadharmair adhikriyate 
nanu avaidyatvāt tasyām avasthāyāṃ katham adhikriyatām 
etadartham evoktam gurau śiṣyaś ca yājyaś ca iti 
ācāryeṇāsau śikṣayitavyaḥ 
tad uktam śaucācārāṃś ca śikṣayet 
yathā ca gautamaḥ upanayanādir niyamaḥ iti 
ācāryasya tu vedasamāpanānto vyāpāraḥ 
nābhivyāhārayed brahma svadhāninayanād ṛte 
śūdreṇa hi samas tāvad yāvad vede na jāyate 
ā mauñjibandhanāt ity anuvartate 
yadi vā yāvad vede na jāyata ity arthavādato 'vadhipariniścayaḥ 
brahma vedas tan noccārayet 
pitur ayam upadeśaḥ 
yathā madyapānādibhyo rakṣet tathā vedākṣaroccāraṇāt 
kecit tv imam eva brahmābhivyāhāraniṣedhaṃ prāg upanayād vyākaraṇādyaṅgadhyayane jñāpakaṃ varṇayanti 
ṇijarthaṃ vyācakṣate pitrā na vacanīyaḥ bālyāt tu kānicid avyaktāni vedavākyāni svayaṃ paṭhato na doṣaḥ 
etat tu na yuktam 
smṛtyantare hi paṭhyate na brahmābhivyāharet iti 
arthavāde ca śrutaṃ śūdreṇa hi samas tāvad iti 
yathā śūdro duṣyati tadvad ayam apīty uktaṃ bhavati 
svadhāśabdena pitṛbhyaḥ kalpitam annam ihocyate 
atha vā pitryaṃ karma svadhāśabdenocyate 
tan ninīyate tyajyate prāpyate yena mantreṇa sa svadhāninayanaḥ śundhantāṃ pitaraḥ ityādiḥ 
taṃ varjayitvānyamantro noccārayitavyaḥ 
anupanītenodakadānanavaśrāddhādi pituḥ kartavyam ity asmād eva pratīyate 
pārvaṇaśrāddhādau tv agnimattvābhāvād anadhikāraḥ 
piṇḍānvāhāryake hi tad vakṣyate 
tṛtīye caitan nipuṇam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ 
kṛtopanayanasyāsya vratādeśanam iṣyate 
brahmaṇo grahaṇaṃ caiva krameṇa vidhipūrvakam 
upanīya guruḥ śiṣyam ity anena śaucācārādhyayanānāṃ krama uktaḥ 
ataś ca tenaiva krameṇa paṭhet 
upanayanānantaram adhyayane prāpte kramāntarārtham idam ārabhyate 
upanītasya traividyādivrataṃ ca kartavyam 
tataḥ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ 
kṛtopanayanasya brahmacāriṇo vratādeśanam iṣyate kriyate cācāryaiḥ 
śāstravaśenaivam iṣyate 
ataś ca kartavyataivaiṣaṇā pratipādyate 
tato brahmaṇo vedasya grahaṇaṃ krameṇānena vidhipūrvakam ity anuvādaḥ ślokapūraṇārthaḥ 
yady asya vihitaṃ carma yat sūtraṃ yā ca mekhalā 
yo daṇḍo yac ca vasanaṃ tad tad asya vrateṣv api 
gṛhyakārair vratanāmadheyakāni karmāṇy upadiṣṭāni 
saṃvatsaraṃ vedaṃ bhāgaṃ vā kiṃcij jighṛkṣata 
iyaṃ vratacaryā yo yamaniyamasamūhaḥ 
tatra pūrvavratasamāptau vratāntarārambhe upanayane ye vidhayas tādṛśa eva vratādeśeṣu 
atha prāgupāttānāṃ kā pratipattiḥ 
apsu prāsanam 
nanu ca tad uktaṃ prāgupāttānām 
vinaṣṭānāṃ kā pratipattiḥ 
vināśe śāstranoditaṃ caiṣāṃ kāryam anyopādānāc ca teṣāṃ nivṛttiḥ 
yac carma yasya brahmacāriṇo vihitaṃ yathā kārṣṇaṃ brāhmaṇasya rauravaṃ kṣatriyasya iti 
evaṃ daṇḍādiṣv api draṣṭavyam 
tasya vrateṣv api 
prakṛtatvād vrataśabdo vratādeśe vartate 
sevetemāṃs tu niyamān brahmacārī gurau vasan 
saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ tapovṛddhyartham ātmanaḥ 
vakṣyamāṇasya yamaniyamasamūhasya pṛthakprakaraṇatvena śloko 'yaṃ gauravakhyāpanārthaḥ 
evaṃ tu yat pūrvam uktaṃ tad avaśyakartavyam 
idaṃ tu tato gurutaram anuṣṭhīyamānaṃ mahate phalāya 
brahmacārigrahaṇaṃ prakaraṇāntaratvenātaddharmāśaṅkayānusaṃdhānārtham yadi brahmacāridharma eva āsīt kiṃ tarhīdam ucyate prakaraṇāntaram iti 
pūrvebhya eteṣām atiśayāt samānadharmatvād etāvatā vailakṣaṇyena prakaraṇāntaratvavyavahāraḥ 
pariśiṣṭāni padāni ślokapūraṇārthatayānūdyante 
seveta anutiṣṭheta 
imān vakṣyamāṇān 
buddhau saṃnihitatvād idamā nirdiśyante 
gurau vasan gurusamīpe vidyādhyayanārthaṃ vasan iti nityasaṃnidhānam āha 
saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ prāguktena mārgeṇa 
tapovṛddhyartham adhyayanavidhyanuṣṭhānajanyātmasaṃskārārtham 
tānīdānīṃ pūrveṇa pratijñātān niyamān āha 
nityaṃ snātvā śuciḥ kuryād devarṣipitṛtarpaṇam 
devatābhyarcanaṃ caiva samidādhānam eva ca 
pratyahaṃ snātvā śuciḥ snānenāpanītāśucibhāvo devarṣipitṛtarpaṇaṃ kuryāt 
yadi punaḥ śuciḥ na tadāvaśyaṃ snāyāt 
śucigrahaṇena śuddhihetutayātra snānasyopadiṣṭatvān na snātakavratavat tadanuṣṭheyam 
ata eva smṛtyantare ca snānaṃ pratiṣiddham 
sa pratiṣedho mṛdā snānasya prasādhanalakṣaṇasya 
gautamena tu snānam evaṃ vihitam daṇda ivāpsu pariplavate 
malāpakarṣaṇaṃ karanigharṣaṇādinā na kartavyam 
asaty amedhyādisaṃsarge na yat svedajaṃ vastrareṇusaṃyogādisahajaṃ malaṃ tad aśucitvam āpādayati 
tad dhi niyatarūpam eva 
tathā ca brāhmaṇaṃ kiṃ nu malaṃ kim ajinaṃ kim u śmaśrūṇi kiṃ tapaḥ iti dharmasādhanatām evaṃvidhasya maladhāraṇasya darśayati 
kathaṃ punaḥ snānasya śaucārthatā pratīyate 
na punaḥ snātaḥ śuciś cobhayaviśiṣṭo devakārye viniyujyate 
snātasyāśucitvābhāvāt kṛtaśaucācamanādeḥ snānavidhānāt snātvā cācāntaḥ punar ācāmet iti ca snātasyāpi śucir ity etāvatā yādṛśī suddhis tasyāṃ vijñāyamānāyāṃ snānam api sati nimitte prāptaṃ punar ucyate 
smṛtyantaraṃ cedam asaty aśucitve nimitte pratiṣedhārtham 
tathā ca vedam adhītya snāyāt iti samāpte svādhyāyavidhau pratiprasaviṣyati 
kuryād devarṣipitṛtarpaṇam 
udakadānaṃ devādibhyo gṛhasthadharmeṣu yad uktaṃ tādṛśam eva pratīyate tarpaṇaśabdasāhacaryāt 
yad eva tarpayaty adbhiḥ iti tathā devatās tarpayati iti gṛhyakārair udakasādhano 'yaṃ vidhir uktaḥ 
udakatarpaṇam iti caitat saṃvijñāyate 
te devā gṛhyakāraiḥ paṭhitā agniprajāpatibrahmetyādayaḥ 
teṣāṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ na sauhityotpādanam kiṃ tarhi taduddeśenodakāñjaliprakṣepaḥ 
ato 'yam udakadravyako yāga evokto bhavati 
na hy anyathā devatātvaṃ bhavati 
yāgasaṃpradānaṃ hi seti smaryate na tṛpteḥ kartrī 
etāvad dhi devatālakṣaṇam sūktabhājo havirbhājaś ca devatāḥ 
tatra sūktaṃ stutyatayā bhajante haviḥ saṃpradānatayā 
tarpyatvena codakadānasaṃpradānatām eva guṇavṛttyā vakti 
gurvādisaṃpradānaṃ gavādinā taduddiśyamānasvāmyena pratīyate 
devatāpi saṃpradānabhūtaḥ 
saṃpradānatvasāmyāt tṛpyantīty ucyate 
yadi devatātṛptyartham etat syāt tadā saṃskārakarmodakatarpaṇaṃ syāt 
na ca devatānāṃ saṃskāryatvopapattiḥ 
na hi tāḥ kvacid upayuktā upayokṣyante vā 
na cākṛtākariṣyamāṇakāryasya saṃskāratopapattiḥ 
ṛṣayo ye yasyārṣeyāḥ 
yathā parāśarāṇāṃ vasiṣṭhaśaktipāraśaryā iti 
gṛhyakārais tu mantradṛśa ṛṣayas tarpaṇīyatvenoktāḥ madhucchando gṛtsamado viśvāmitra iti 
aviśeṣābhidhānād ṛṣiśabdasyobhaye 'pi prāptāḥ 
viśeṣasmṛtitvāt gṛhyasmṛtes ta eva grahītuṃ nyāyyāḥ 
pitaraḥ pūrvapretāḥ pitṛpitāmahāḥ sapiṇḍāḥ samānodakāś ca 
pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇaṃ tarpaṇam eva 
etac ca śrāddhavidhau pratyakṣeṇa vakṣyate 
devatābhyarcanam 
atra kecic cirantanā vicārayāṃcakruḥ kā etā devatā nāma yāsām idam abhyarcanam ucyate 
yadi tāvac citrapustakanyastaḥ caturbhujo vajrahasta ityādyāḥ pratikṛtaya iti laukikā vyavaharanti 
ato gauṇas tatra devatāvyavahāraḥ 
atha yāḥ sūktahaviḥsaṃbandhinyo vaidikībhyaś codanābhyo mantravākyebhyaś cāvagamyante śabdārthasaṃbandhavidaś ca smaranti agniḥ agnīṣomau mitrāvaruṇau indro viṣṇuḥ iti 
yady evaṃ tatkriyāsaṃbandhitayaiva teṣāṃ devatātvaṃ nārthasaṃbandhitayā 
tatrāpi yasyaiva haviṣo yā devatā tena coditā tasyaiva sā bhavati 
tathā hi āgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ity āgneye puroḍāśe devatā na saurye carau 
ayaṃ ca teṣāṃ nirṇayaḥ mukhyāsaṃbhavād gauṇasyaiva grahaṇaṃ nyāyyam samācārāc ca 
ataḥ pratimānām evaitat pūjāvidhānam 
yac cātra tattvaṃ tad vratavad devadaivatye ity atra vakṣyāmaḥ 
samidādhānaṃ sāyamprātar agnau dāruśakalaprakṣepaṇam 
varjayen madhu māṃsaṃ ca gandhaṃ mālyaṃ rasān striyaḥ 
śuktāni yāni sarvāṇi prāṇināṃ caiva hiṃsanam 
madhu sāragham 
mādhvīkasya tu madyatvāt prāg apy upanayanāt pratiṣedho nityaṃ madyaṃ brāhmaṇo varjayet iti 
māṃsaṃ prokṣitādy api 
gandhaśabdena surabhitvātiśayayuktāni karpūrāguruprabhṛtīni dravyāṇi saṃbandhilakṣaṇayā pratiṣidhyante 
teṣām anulepanādyupabhogapratiṣedhaḥ 
gandhas tu svadeśān nirgata āgacchatīty aśakyo niṣeddhum 
tatrāpy ākasmikasyāpy apratiṣedhāt bhogecchayā tv agurudhūpādau doṣa eva 
ata upādhyāyena candanavṛkṣādicchedane niyuktasya tadgandhasyāghrāṇe vastusvabhāvata utpadyamāne na doṣaḥ 
mālyasāhacaryāc cedṛśo gandhaḥ pratīyate 
yas tu nedṛśo hṛdayonmādakaraḥ kuṣṭhaghṛtapūtidārvādigandhas tasyāpratiṣedhaḥ 
mālyaṃ kusumaṃ grathitam 
rasāḥ madhurāmlādayaḥ 
nanu ca nīrasasya bhojyatvāsaṃbavāt prāṇavṛttir eva na syāt 
satyam 
udriktarasāḥ kevalā guḍādayo niṣidhyante 
saṃskārakaraṇe dravyāntargatānām api pratiṣedhaḥ 
atha vātyantarasinaḥ saṃskṛtasyānnasya saktipratiṣedho 'yam 
yathoktam
yo 'her iva dhanād bhīto miṣṭānnāc ca viṣād iva 
rākṣasībhya iva strībhyaḥ sa vidyām adhigacchati  iti 
anye tu śṛṅgārādīn manyante 
nāṭakādiprekṣaṇena kāvyaśravaṇena vā rasapuṣṭir na kartavyā 
anyeṣāṃ tu darśanam ikṣvāmalakādīnāṃ yo 'ntardravarūpodakavat sa rasas tasya niṣpīḍitasya pṛthak kṛtasya pratiṣedho na punas tadantargatasya 
tac caitad ayuktam 
na hi rasaśabdo dravaparyāyaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
yatra ca yasyocitam upabhogāntatvaṃ tad eva tasya niṣidhyate 
tena madhumāṃsyor bhojane pratiṣedhaḥ na darśanasparśanayoḥ 
gandhamālyasyāpi sarīramaṇḍanābhimānatayopādānaṃ niṣidhyate na tu kathaṃcid dhastādinā grahaṇam 
evaṃ striyo maithunasaṃbandhena 
tadāśaṅkayaiva ca prekaṇālambhau niṣetsyati 
tathā ca gautamaḥ strīprekṣaṇālambhane maithunaśaṅkāyām iti 
śuktāni prāptāmlarasāni kevalāt parivāsād dravyāntarasaṃsargād vāmlatām āpannāni 
teṣāṃ ca dvijātidharmatvād eva siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
punargrahaṇaṃ gauṇaśuktaparigrahaṇārtham 
tena rūkṣaparuṣā vāco niṣiddhā bhavanti 
yad uktaṃ gautamena śuktā vācaḥiti tad idaṃ sarvagrahaṇaṃ cāsyaivārthasyāviṣkaraṇārtham 
rasaśuktāny anūdya sarvāṇīti vidhīyate 
tato gauṇaparigrahaḥ siddho bhavati 
ye tv evaṃ vyācakṣate śuktaśabdena rasapratiṣedhaḥ sarvaśabdenāmānasāni vacāṃsi ta idaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ 
arthapratiṣiddhānāṃ pratiṣedhārthaṃ sarvagrahaṇaṃ kasmān na bhavati 
tathā sati ca dadhyādeḥ śuktībhūtasya pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti 
yadi tu prāptim āśritya punaḥ pratiṣedha uktārtho vyākhyāyate tathā sati na kaścid doṣaḥ 
prāṇināṃ maśakamakṣikādīnāṃ bālyād dhiṃsane prāpte yatnataḥ parihārārthaṃ punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
svādhyāyavidhyaṅgatvārtho vā 
na kevalaṃ hiṃsāyāṃ puruṣārthapratiṣedhātikramo yāvat svādhyāyavidhyarthātikramo 'pi 
śuktādiṣv apy evaṃ kasmān na kalpyata iti ced asti tatra viṣayāntare sāvakāśatvam ekarūpasya viṣayasya vyarthatvaṃ sati gatyantare garīyaḥ 
abhyaṅgam añjanaṃ cākṣṇor upānacchatradhāraṇam 
kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca nartanaṃ gītavādanam 
ghṛtatailādinā snehena śiraḥśarīramrakṣaṇam abhyaṅgaḥ 
añjanaṃ cākṣṇoḥ 
akṣigrahaṇaṃ vṛttapūraṇārtham 
anayoś cāpi dehamaṇḍanārthatayā pratiṣedho nauṣadhārthatayā gandhamālyādisāhacaryāt 
upānahau carmapāduke na kevale 
chatradhāraṇaṃ ca svahastena parahastena vobhayasyāpi niṣedhaḥ 
kāmo rāgaḥ 
manmathasya strīpratiṣedhād eva siddhaḥ 
krodho roṣaḥ 
lobho mohaḥ 
ahaṃkāramamakārau cittadharmāv ete 
nartanaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇāṃ harṣāya gātravikṣepo bharatādidṛṣṭābhinayaprayogaś ca 
gītaṃ ṣaḍjādisvarapradarśanam 
vādanaṃ vīṇāvaṃśādibhiḥ svaravacchabdakaraṇaṃ paṇavamṛdaṅgādyabhighātaś ca tālānuvṛttyā 
dyūtaṃ ca janavādaṃ ca parivādaṃ tathānṛtam 
strīṇāṃ ca prekṣaṇālambhāv upaghātaṃ parasya ca  
dyūtam akṣakrīḍā 
samāhvayaḥ kukkuṭādibhiḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ dyūtaśabdasya sāmānyaśabdatvāt 
janair vādaḥ akāraṇena laukikeṣv artheṣu vākkalahaḥ deśavārtādyanveṣaṇaṃ praśno vā 
parivādaḥ asūyayā paradoṣakathanam 
anṛtam anyathā dṛṣṭam anyathā ca śrutaṃ yad anyathocyate 
sarvatra varjayet ity anuṣaṅgād dvitīyā 
strīṇāṃ ca prekṣaṇālambhau 
avayavasaṃsthānanirūpaṇaṃ prekṣaṇam idam asyāḥ śobhate 'ṅgam idaṃ neti 
ālambhaḥ āliṅganam 
maithunaśaṅkāyāṃ caitau pratiṣidhyete bālasya yathātatham 
parasyopaghāto 'pakāraḥ kasyāṃcid arthasiddhau prabandhaḥ 
kanyālābhādau pṛcchyamānena ayogyasyāpy ayogyatvaṃ na vaktavyam tūṣṇīm āsitavyam anṛtapratiṣedhāt 
ekaḥ śayīta sarvatra na retaḥ skandayet kvacit 
kāmād dhi skandayan reto hinasti vratam ātmanaḥ 
ekaḥ śayīta sarvatra na retaḥ skandayet kvacit ayonāv api yonau strīpratiṣedhād eva siddhatvāt 
atrārthavādaḥ kāmād dhi skandayan 
icchātra kāmaḥ 
hastavyāpārādināyonau maithunena ca retaḥ śukraṃ skandayan kṣarayan hinasti nāśayati brahmacaryavratam ātmanaḥ 
svapne siktvā brahmacārī dvijaḥ śukram akāmataḥ 
snātvārkam arcayitvā triḥ punar mām ity ṛcaṃ japet 
kāmād vratalopenāvakīrṇiprāyaścittam akāmāt tv idam āha 
svapnagrahaṇam avivakṣitam akāmata ity etad eva nimittam 
na hi svapne kāmasaṃbhavaḥ 
ato yady asuptasyāpi kathaṃcid anicchayā svamalāsṛgavayavavat prakṣarati śukraṃ tatrāpy etad eva prāyaścittam 
akāmato retaḥ siktvedaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt punar mām ity etad ṛcaṃ japet 
udakumbhaṃ sumanaso gośakṛnmṛttikākuśān 
āhared yāvad arthāni bhaikṣaṃ cāhar ahaś caret 
yāvadbhir arthaḥ prayojanam upādhyāyasya sidhyati tāvad udakumbhādi āharet 
pradarśanārthaṃ caitat 
anyad api gṛhopayogi yad agarhitaṃ karma tat kuryāt 
garhitaṃ guruvyatirekeṇocchiṣṭāpamārjanādi na kārayitavya ity evamartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
yataḥ sāmānyena śuśrūṣā gurau vihitā 
yāvān artha eṣām iti vigrahaḥ 
bhaikṣaṃ cāhar ahaś caret 
siddham annam atyantālpaṃ yātrāviṣayaṃ bhaikṣam atrocyate 
naikānnādī iti pratiṣedhe 'nnaśabdopādānād annaṃ pratīyate 
samāhṛtya bhaikṣaṃ nivedyāśnīyāt iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt siddhānnapratipattiḥ 
śuṣke hy anne bhikṣite kutas tasyāśanam 
samāhṛtya gurugṛhe pacyamānasya bhaikṣaprakṛtitā syān na bhaikṣatā 
prasiddhyā cedṛśam eva bhaikṣam ucyate 
ahar ahaḥ 
nanu baikṣeṇa vartayen nityam ity etasmād eva suddham ahar ahaś caraṇaṃ sidhyati 
vṛttividhānārthaṃ nityagrahaṇam 
paryuṣitenāpi ghṛtādisnehasaṃyuktena syād vṛttis tadartham idam ahar ahar bhikṣitvāśitavyam 
na punar ekasminn ahani bhikṣitam aparedyuḥ parivāsya yat kiṃcit snehayuktam iti pratiprasavena bhuñjīta 
yebhyo bhaikṣam āsādayitavyaṃ tān vakti 
vedayajñair ahīnānāṃ praśastānāṃ svakarmasu 
brahmacāry āhared bhaikṣaṃ gṛhebhyaḥ prayato 'nvaham 
vedajñaiś ca ya ahīnā vedādhyayanena saṃyuktāḥ yajñānāṃ ca saty adhikāre kartāra ahīnā avarjitā tadupetā iti yāvat 
svakarmasu ca praśastāḥ 
yeṣāṃ yajñ 'dhikāro nāsty anyasmin śaste karmaṇi tatparāḥ 
atha vā svakarmapraśastās te ucyante ye svavṛttāv eva saṃtuṣṭā na vārddhuṣikādivṛttyupajīvinaḥ 
teṣāṃ gṛhebhyo bhaikṣam āhared yācitvā gṛhṇīyāt prayataḥ śuciḥ 
anvaham ity anuvādaḥ 
guroḥ kule na bhikṣeta na jñātikulabandhuṣu 
alābhe tv anyagehānāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vivarjayet 
saty apy etadguṇayoge gurugṛhe na bhikṣeta 
pūrvaṃ kulaṃ vaṃśas tato guror ye pitṛvyādayas tebhyo 'pi na grahītavyam 
jñātayo brahmacāriṇaḥ pitṛpakṣāḥ teṣāṃ kule 
bandhuṣu ca mātṛpakṣeṣu mātulādiṣu 
naivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kartavyo gurujñātyādiṣv iti yato guroḥ kula iti kulaśabdenaiva teṣāṃ saṃgṛhītatvāt 
kutas tarhi bhikṣeta 
etadvyatirekeṇānyagehebhyaḥ 
alābhe 'saṃbhave 'nyagehānāṃ sarva eva yadi grāmo gurujñātibandhubhir vyāpto bhavaty anye naiva santy santo vānnaṃ na dadati 
eteṣv api gṛheṣu bhikṣitavyam 
anyābhāve prathamaṃ bandhuṃ bhikṣeta tadabhāve jñātiṃ tadabhāve gurukulam 
sarvaṃ vāpi cared grāmaṃ pūrvoktānām asaṃbhave 
niyamya prayato vācam abhiśastāṃs tu varjayet 
pūrvoktānāṃ vedayajñair ahīnānāṃ asaṃbhave sarvaṃ grāmam anapekṣavarṇavibhāgaṃ vicaret bhrāmyej jīvanartham 
kevalam abhiśastān kṛtapātakatvena prasiddhān adṛṣṭapātakān api varjayitvā 
tathā ca gautamaḥ sārvavarṇikaṃ bhaikṣyacaraṇam abhiśastapatitavarjam 
niyamya vācaṃ bhikṣāvākyaṃ varjayitvā ā bhaikṣalābhād anyāṃ vācaṃ noccaret 
dūrād āhṛtya samidhaḥ saṃnidadhyād vihāyasi 
sāyaṃprātaś ca juhuyāt tābhir agnim atandritaḥ 
dūragrahaṇam aparigṛhītadeśopalakṣaṇārtham 
grāmāt kila dūram araṇyam na ca tatra kasyacit parigrahaḥ 
anupalakṣaṇe hi dūrārthe kiyad dūram ity anavasthitaḥ śāstrārthaḥ syāt 
āhṛtya ānīya 
saṃnidadhyāt sthāpayet 
vihāyasi gṛhasyopari 
na hi nirālambane 'ntarikṣe nidhānaṃ saṃbhavati 
tābhiḥ sāyaṃprātar juhuyāt 
āharaṇaṃ tu tātkālikam anyadā vecchayā 
vihāyasi nidhānam adṛṣṭārtham ity āhuḥ 
anye tu bruvate saṃpratyānīymānaṃ vṛkṣād dāru ārdraṃ bhavatīti gṛhasyopari anyasya vā prakārādes tata evāvagantavyam 
akṛtvā bhaikṣacaraṇam asamidhya ca pāvakam 
anāturaḥ saptarātram avakīrṇivrataṃ caret 
agnīndhanabhaikṣacaraṇe nairantaryeṇa saptarātraṃ saptāham akṛtvā 
anāturaḥ avyādhitasya san avakīrṇivrataṃ nāma prāyaścittam ekādaśe vakṣyamāṇasvarūpaṃ caret kuryāt 
doṣagurutvakhyāpanārtham na tv etad atra prāyaścittam eva 
smṛtyantare hy atrālapam anyat prāyaścittam uktam ājyahomaḥ savitur vā retasyāsyām iti 
ihāpi ca liṅgaṃ yadi prāyaścittam idam abhaviṣyat tadā strīgamanam ivāvakīrṇiprāyaścittaprakaraṇe nimittatvenāpaṭhiṣyat 
ye tu vyācakṣate saptarātram etad ubhayam avaśyakartavyam 
akaraṇāt tatra doṣaḥ 
kṛtasaptarātrasya tu parato 'kriyāyāṃ na doṣaḥ 
tāni ca saptāhāni prāthamyād upanayanāt prabhṛti gṛhyante 
tad etad ayuktam ā samāvartanāt kuryāt iti virodhāt 
uparitanānantaraślokavirodhāc ca 
baikṣeṇa varttayen nityaṃ naikānnādī bhaved vratī 
bhaikṣeṇa vratino vṛttir upavāsasamā smṛtā 
nanu ca bhaikṣam ahar ahaś caret iti śrutam evaitat 
evaṃ hi bhaikṣacaryā dṛṣṭārthā bhavati 
uktaṃ ca nivedya gurave 'śnīyāt iti 
na ca tadaśanaṃ bhaikṣasaṃskāraḥ yena vṛttyarthaḥ syāt 
kecid āhuḥ anūdyate naikānnādī bhaved vratīti vaktum 
etad apy asat bhaikṣaśabdenaivaikānnādanasya niṣedhāt 
bhikṣāṇāṃ samūho bhaikṣam ucyate 
tataḥ kuta ekānnādanaprāptiḥ 
tasya pitryebhyo 'nujñānārthaṃ sarvam etad anūdyate 
baikṣeṇa vartayed atmānaṃ bhaikṣabhojanena pālayet 
jīvitasthitiṃ kuryān naikasya saṃbandhi annam adyān naikabhikṣānnaṃ bhuñjīta 
na punar iyam āśaṅkā kartavyā naikasvāmikaṃ bhuñjīta api tu bahusvāmikam avibhaktabhrātṛsaṃbandhi 
ekasyānnam ekaṃ vānnam ekānnam tad atti bhuṅke ekānnādī 
vratī brahmacārī 
prakarṇād eva labdhaḥ ślokapūraṇārtho vratiśabdaḥ 
atrārthavādaḥ 
bhaikṣeṇaiva kevalena vratino yā vṛttiḥ śarīradhāraṇam upavāsatulyaphalā sā vṛttiḥ smaryate 
vratavad devadaivatye pitrye karmaṇy atharṣivat 
kāmam abhyarthito 'śnīyād vratam asya na lupyate 
ayam apavādo nimittaviśeṣe bhaikṣavṛttyupadeśasya 
devadaivatye devoddeśena brāhmaṇabhojane kriyamāṇe pitrye ca pitṝn uddiśyābhyarthito 'dhyeṣitaḥ kāmam ekānnam aśnīyāt 
na tu svayaṃ yāceta 
tac ca vratavad vratāviruddhaṃ madhumāṃsavarjitam ity arthaḥ 
vratavad ṛṣivad iti ca śabdadvayenaika evārtha ucyate na punar grāmāraṇyayoḥ karmabhedena vyavasthā 
vṛttānurodhāt tu dvirabhidhānam 
ṛṣir vaikhānasas tadaśanābhyanujñāne māṃsam api brahmacāriṇo 'nujñātaṃ syāt 
tasya hi vaiṣkam apy upabhuñjīta iti māṃsāśanam apy asti 
devā devatā yasya tad devadaivatyam 
tac cāgnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu daiveṣu karmasu brāhmaṇabhojanam āmnātam āgrahāyaṇyādiṣu cāmnātam brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā svastyayanaṃ vācayet iti 
tatreyam anujñā 
anye tu saptamyādāv ādityādidevoddeśena yat kriyate brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ tad devadaivatyaṃ manyante 
tad asat 
na hi bhujer devatāsaṃbandho 'sti ayāgasādhanatvāt tasya 
na tūddeśyamātraṃ devatā upādhyāyāya gāṃ dadāti gṛhaṃ saṃmārṣṭi ity upādhyāye gṛhe 'pi prasaṅgāt 
bhujer hi pratyakṣo bhoktrā saṃbandhaḥ 
ādityas tu na kārakam na coddeśyo gṛhavat na tadarthaṃ bhojanam 
dvitīyā hi bhoktrarthatāṃ jñāpayati nādityārthatām 
na caitat kvacin noditam ādityādyuddeśena brāhmaṇān bhojayet iti 
samācārād vidhiḥ kalpyata iti cen na tasyopalabhyamānamūlatvāt 
asti hi mūlam bāhyāḥ smṛtayaḥ 
tatra tarhi brāhmaṇabhojanena devatāḥ prīṇayed iti śāstrārthaḥ 
na cāyam arthaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum 
na hi devatāprītipradhānaḥ śāstrārthaḥ kiṃ tarhi vidhyarthapradhānaḥ 
na cāsmin vidhyartha ādityādīnāṃ devatābhimatānāṃ viṣayadvārakaḥ saṃbandhaḥ nāpy adhikāradvārakaḥ 
na hi bhedanādivan nimittam nāpi paśvādivat svasaṃbandhitayā kāmyate abhogyarūpatvāt 
atha tadgatā tuṣṭiḥ kāmyate 
sāpy ātmasiddhau pramāṇāntaram apekṣate 
na ca tad asti 
na hy ādityādituṣṭiḥ pratyakṣādisiddhā paśvādivad yena kāmyena pareṣṭividhinā yujyeta 
atha tu matprabhur it svābhipretena phalen yajayiṣyantīti 
etad api pramāṇābhāvād upekṣaṇīyam 
na cāsminn arthe vidhiḥ pramāṇam 
sa hi jñātasyānuṣṭhātṛviśeṣaṇasya svasaṃbandhitayā puruṣaṃ niyuṅkte na punaḥ kāmyamānasya sadbhāvam avagamayati 
pramāṇāntarāvagataṃ hi kāmyam anuṣṭhātṛviśeṣaṇam anuṣṭhānasādhyam anuṣṭhātṛsaṃbandhīti vidhiḥ pramāṇam iti mimīte 
athāyaṃ yāgas tasya ca bhojanaṃ pratipattiḥ 
bhavatu yadi śiṣṭasamācāraḥ 
bhojanaṃ tāvan na devatāsaṃbandhi sākṣād iti na sādhyam 
yāgavyavahitas tu saṃbandho na nivāryate 
na cātra yāgabuddhyā pravartate kiṃ tarhi brāhmaṇeṣu bhojiteṣu devatā tuṣyatīti 
ato na devatā bhojanakārakaṃ na kārakaviśeṣaṇam 
tato na viṣayatvena saṃbandhaḥ 
uddeśyatvam apy ādityādīnāṃ nāsti 
bhojane hi sa uddiśyate yasmai bhojanaṃ dīyate 
tac ca brāhmaṇebhyaḥ 
na coddeśyamātraṃ devatā upādhyāyāya gāṃ dadāti gṛhaṃ saṃmārṣṭi iti gṛhopādhyāyayor api prasaṅgāt 
nanu ca pitrye kathaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanam 
tatrāpi hi na pitarau devatāḥ syuḥ 
na ca homasya pitryatvam devatāntaraśravaṇāt 
ādityādiprīter iva pitṛprīteḥ pramāṇāntarāsiddhatvān na vidheḥ saṃbandhaḥ sādhyatayā 
atra vadanti 
siddhā hy atra pitṛprītiḥ 
ātmanām avināśitvāt pitaraḥ siddhās teṣāṃ ca śarīrasaṃbandhaḥ kriyate karmabhyaḥ 
tadbhojanaṃ hy atra pradhānam 
tasya hi phalaṃ śrutam bhojayan puṣkalaṃ phalam āpnoti 
tac ca phalaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tasya tṛptiḥ syād iti 
tṛptiś ca prītimātraṃ na manuṣyāṇām iva bhujikriyāphalaṃ sauhityalakṣaṇam utpadyate 
kācit pitṝṇāṃ prītiḥ svakarmavaśato yatra tara jātāv utpannānām 
prītimātravacano 'yaṃ dhātuḥ sauhityaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ 
sa pramāṇāntarāvaseyaḥ 
na cātraitac codanīyam putraḥ kartā pitṛṣu kathaṃ kartṛgāmiphalam 
na hīmāni karmāṇi vaidikāni parasya phaladānīti nyayavido vadanti 
yataḥ pitara evātrādhikāriṇaḥ kartāraś ca 
apatyotpādanenaiva sarvam etat pitṛbhiḥ kṛtam 
evam artham evāsāv utpāditaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭam upakāraṃ kariṣyati iti 
tataś ca yathā sarvasvāre 'bhāvād auttarakālikeṣv aṅgeṣu brāhmaṇāḥ saṃsthāpayata me yajñam iti praiṣyaṃ mṛtasya kartṛtvam 
evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam 
etāvān viśeṣaḥ 
tatrādhikārāntaraprayuktā jīvikārthino bhṛtiparikrītā ṛtvijaḥ kartāraḥ 
iha tu tadvidhiprayukta eva putraḥ 
yathaivotpattividhiprayuktasya putrārtheṣu pituḥ saṃskāreṣu adhikāro 'nuśāsanaparyantatvāt tasya vidheḥ evaṃ pitrarthe śrāddhādau putrasya 
tathaiva jīvinaḥ pituḥ vṛddhau tu mātāpitarau ity avaśyaṃ kartavyam 
evaṃ diṣṭaṃ gataṃ tasyāpi 
na cāyaṃ vaiśvānaravat kāmyo 'dhikāraḥ 
vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte 
yasmin jāta etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati 
pūta eva sa tejasvy annāda indriyavān ha bhavati iti 
evamādiputraphalārthino 'dhikāraḥ pitur vaiśvānare na cūḍādiṣv ivāvaśyakaḥ 
iha tu pitryam ā nidhanāt kāryam iti yāvajjīvikaḥ 
na kartur vaidikaṃ phalam ity etad anyathā pariṣkriyate 
yathaiva vaiśvānaraviśiṣṭaputravattālakṣaṇaṃ pitur eva phalaṃ nākartṛgāmitā phalasya evam ihāpi putrasyaiva tatphalaṃ yā pituḥ prītiḥ 
ubhayathā pitṛkartṛgāmitā phalasya na virudhyate 
apatyotpādanenaivaitādṛśasya phalasyeṣṭatvāt pitṝṇām api nākāmitaphalāpattiḥ 
yadi na śrāddhe pitaro devatāḥ kathaṃ tarhi pitryam etat karmeti devatātaddhitaḥ 
uddeśyatvasāmānyād iti vadāmaḥ 
yuṣmadupakārārtham idaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanam iti pitara upadiśyante 
piṇḍapitṛyajñe tu pitaro devatā eva 
na śrāddhe pitṝṇāṃ devatātvaṃ manyante 
yat tu brāhmaṇā bhojyante tad yathāgnau homa ājyapuroḍāśādīnāṃ hy avadānasya 
tādṛśam etat 
tathā ca brāhmaṇāḥ pitṛtvam āpadyante 
ato 'nnapariveṣaṇakāle pitara evoddeśyā yuṣmabhyam idaṃ na mama iti 
brāhmaṇās tv āhavanīyasthānīyāḥ 
etāvān viśeṣo yad āhavanīye haviḥ prakṣipyate brāhmaṇānāṃ tu saṃnidhāpyate te tu svayam upādadata iti 
na ca śrāddhaṃ yāgo na tatra devatārthaḥ svāhākāraḥ sviṣṭakṛdādiṣu darśaṇāt 
ato yāgo 'pi san śrāddhakarma pitryarthaṃ bhaviṣyati 
pitṝṇāṃ devatātvaṃ phalabhāvitvaṃ na virotsyate 
tṛtīye kiṃcid anuktam eva tatsaṃbaddhaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
tasmān nādityādayo brāhmaṇabhojane devatā iti sthitam 
nanu cāvyāpakam etad api lakṣaṇam yāge uddeśyaḥ devatā ity antareṇāpi yāgasaṃbandhe devatāvyavahāradarśanāt 
devatānāṃ ca pūjanam daivatāny abhigacchet iti na pūjā nāpy ābhimukhyena gamanaṃ pādavihārātmakaṃ devatāḥ prati saṃbhavati 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
yatra devatācodanā tatraitat pūjāvidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati vaiśvadevadevatāsv agnihotrādisaṃbandhinīṣu vā 
nanu caivam api nopapadyate 
na hi devatāyāḥ pūjyatvaṃ saṃbhavati svarūpahāniprasaṅgāt 
pūjākarmatve hi yāgasaṃpradānatā syāt 
uktam na kriyāntarasya kiṃcid bhavati iti 
śaktir hi kārakam sā ca pratikriyaṃ bhidyate 
kāryāvagamyatvāc ca tasyā yāvat kāryaṃ bhedo nyāyyaḥ 
ato yat saṃpradānaṃ tat saṃpradānam eva na tasya karmāpattiḥ 
kathaṃ tarhi pācakāya dehi paceḥ kartā dadāteḥ saṃpradānam 
śaraiḥ kṣatāṅgaḥ priyayā kaṭākṣair nirīkṣyamāṇo vivaśo jagāma 
ukto 'tra parihāraḥ 
śaktiśaktimator bhedasyaupacārikatvāt siddham vrajati bhuktvā iti 
tasmād yadi pūjāviṣayam etat na devatālābhaḥ atha devatā ādityādayaḥ na pūjāvidhiḥ 
na hi devatāyāṃ siddhāyām uddiśya pūjā vidhīyate 
na hy ādityādīnāṃ devatāsāmānyaśabdaḥ gośabdavac chāgaleyādīnām 
atrocyate 
satyaṃ nādityādayaḥ svarūpato devatāḥ 
saṃbandhiśabdo 'yam 
vidhita eva devatārtho 'vagantavyo yasya haviṣaś codyate sā tasya devatā iti 
sa evāgnir āgneyād anyatra na devatety uktam 
kiṃ tu na pūjāvidhiḥ pūjyamānam antareṇa saṃbhavati 
devatāś ca pūjyatvena śrutāḥ 
tatra yadi devatārthe mukhyena pūjā saṃbhavati tadā yāga eva pūjā vijñeyā 
tasya cārupatvād asati dravyadevatāśravaṇe pūrvāhṇakālavidhyartho 'yam anuvādo vijñeyaḥ 
ataḥ pūrvāhṇe daivatāni kartavyānīty uktaṃ bhavati 
kim ucyate devatā na śrūyate 
yāvatā na sākṣād devatāśabdo 'sti 
nāyaṃ sāmānyavacano devatāśabdaḥ 
yāsām anyatra devatātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tāsām etat pūjāvidhānam 
tenāgnir ādityo rudra indro viṣṇuḥ sarasvatīty evamādayaḥ pūjyāḥ 
pūjārthaṃ ca dhūpadīpamālyopahārādīnāṃ nivedanam 
tatragnes tāvat sākṣāt saṃbandhaḥ 
tac ca ādityasya dūradeśavartitvāc chucau deśe taduddeśena gandhādiprakṣepaḥ 
indrādīnāṃ svarūpasyāpratyakṣatvād indrādiśabdoddeśenaiva tathā vidhānam 
yady api pūjyamānapradhānā pūjā tathāpi hi pūjyamānānāṃ kāryāntaraśeṣabhāve pūjaiva kartavyatayā vijñāyate 
dravyapradhāne hi na vidhiviṣayatvasaṃbhavaḥ 
tāni dvaidhaṃ guṇapradhānabhūtāni iti yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate iti 
nyāyyaṃ tu stutiśāstrādivat 
yathā na stutiḥ stutyarthā evm iyam api pūjā na pūjyārthā 
stautisaṃsatyor nirdeśo nāstīti cet atroktaṃ dvitīyā saktuṣu darśanāt 
evaṃ mṛdaṃ gāṃ daivataṃ pradakṣiṇāni kurvīta iti dakṣiṇācāratā vidhīyate 
dakṣiṇena daivāni karmāṇi kartavyāni 
na hi mṛdādivad devatāyā dakṣiṇena mārgeṇa sthānam amūrtatvāt yujyate 
evaṃ daivatāny abhigacchet iti 
pādavihāravyāpāreṇa devatāsamīpaprāptyasaṃbhavād gameś ca jñānārthatvād abhigamanaṃ smaraṇāt kiṃ viśiṣyate 
devatā abhigacchet karmakāle manasā dhyāyec cittavyākṣepatām ākulatākhyāṃ parihared ity arthaḥ 
tathā copalabhyamānamūlaiveyaṃ smṛtir bhavati 
yasyai devatāyai havir gṛhītaṃ syāt tāṃ manasā dhyāyed iti 
nanu caitad apy uddeśyatvānyathānupapatteḥ prāptam eva 
savyākṣepasyākulasya ca saṃbhavād adoṣaḥ 
evaṃ devasvaṃ devapaśavo devadravyam ityādayo vyavahārās tādarthyenopakalpiteṣu paśvādiṣu draṣṭavyāḥ 
daṇḍādhikāre tu pratikṛtiviṣayam eva devatāvyavahāram icchanti 
anyathā vyavasthābhaṅgaḥ syāt 
kalpitadevatārūpāṇāṃ pratikṛtīnāṃ kalpitenaiva svasvāmibhāvena yat saṃbandhi tad eva devabrāhmaṇarājñāṃ tu dravyaṃ vijñeyam uttamam ityādiṣu devadravyam 
na hi devatānāṃ svasvāmibhāvo 'sti mukhyārthāsaṃbhavād gauṇa evārtho grāhyaḥ 
kaḥ punar atra gauṇo 'rthaḥ 
sarvatra hi sādhāraṇaguṇayogād gauṇārthāvagatiḥ 
agnir māṇavaka ityādiṣu śukle māṇavake tadguṇadarśanāt 
te ca guṇāḥ pratyakṣādyavaseyāḥ 
iha tu devatārthasya kāryāvagamyatvāt kāryataḥ svarūpaviśeṣānavagamāt kutaḥ pratikṛtiṣu sādhāraṇaguṇāvasāyaḥ 
atrocyate 
mantrārthavādeṣu tathāvidharūpaśravaṇāt teṣāṃ ca guṇavādena vyākhyānam 
tanmūlam apaśyanto yathāśrutārthagrāhiṇas tādrūpyam indrādiṣu pratipādyamānāḥ pratikṛtiṣu sādṛśyaṃ paśyantīti yuktaiva gauṇatā 
yat tu śrāddha eva vaiśvadevabrāhmaṇabhojanaṃ daivadevatyam ācakṣate teṣāṃ pitryāṅgatvāt tasya pitryagrahaṇena gṛhītatvād anarthakaṃ punarvacanam 
sāmānyaśabdatvāc ca kuto viśeṣāvagatiḥ 
sāhacaryād iti cet yadi na pitryaśabdena grahaṇaṃ bhavet 
gobalīvardanyāyo 'pi asati viṣayabhede bhavati 
brāhmaṇasyaiva karmaitad upadiṣṭaṃ manīṣibhiḥ 
rājanyavaiśyayos tv evaṃ naitat karma vidhīyate 
yad etad ekānnabhojanakarmādiṣṭam etad brāhmaṇasyaiva manīṣibhir vidvadbhir vedād upalabhyopadiṣṭaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayos tu naitad icchanti 
na kadācit tayor abhaikṣyabhojanam 
nanu ca śrāddhabhojane brāhmaṇānām evādhikāraḥ 
ye tatra bhojanīyāḥ syur ye ca varjyā dvijottamāḥ 
arhattamāya viprāya iti vacanād brāhmaṇasyaiva pratigrahādhikāraḥ 
tatra kuto 'yaṃ pratiṣedho rājanyavaiśyayor iti 
pratiprasavaś cāyaṃ nāpūrvavidhiḥ 
prāptisavyapekṣāś ca pratiṣedhā bhavanti 
ucyate 
bhuktavatāṃ brāhmaṇānām eva śiṣṭasyānnasya pratipattir āmnātā jñātiprāyaṃ prakalpayet iti 
na ca tatra jātyapekṣā yasya jñātiḥ sa tena bhojayitavyaḥ 
na ca tatra kṣatriyādayaḥ pratigrahītṛtayā saṃbadhyante api tu jñātayaḥ 
ato 'syāḥ prāpteḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
codito guruṇā nityam apracodita eva vā 
kuryād adhyayane yogam ācāryasya hiteṣu ca 
nodito guruṇāniyukto 'pi kuryād adhyayane yogaṃ yatnam 
nanu cāhūto 'dhīyīta ity uktam 
katham apraṇoditasya yoga ucyate 
gṛhītavedaikadeśasya pariśeṣakaguṇārtham etad ucyate 
na tatrācāryaniyogo 'pekṣitavyaḥ 
evam ācāryāya hitaṃ yad udakumbhāharaṇādi śrāntasaṃvāhanādi tad apy aniyuktena kartavyam 
śarīraṃ caiva vācaṃ ca buddhīndriyamanāṃsi ca 
niyamya prāñjalis tiṣṭhed vīkṣamāṇo guror mukham 
kutaścid āgato guror mukhaṃ vīkṣamāṇas tiṣṭhen nopaviśet 
niyamya ca śarīraṃ 
pādahastacālanahasitāni na kuryāt na kiṃcid vadet anupayogi 
buddhīndriyāṇi niyacchet 
yad āścaryarūpaṃ kiṃcid gurusakāśe na tat punaḥ punar bhāvayet 
śrotrādīny api 
cakṣurniyamas tu guruvaktraprekṣaṇād eva siddhaḥ 
manaś ca niyacchec chāstrīyān vikalpān gṛhakuśūlādyārambhān manasā varjayet 
uktas tu saṃyame yatnam iti saktipratiṣedhārthaḥ sa pratiṣedhaḥ 
gurusaṃnidhau svalpo 'pīndriyāṇām apratiṣiddhe 'pi viṣaye prasaro na deyaḥ 
prāñjalir ūrdhvakṛtakarakapotaḥ 
nityam uddhṛtapāṇiḥ syāt sādvācāraḥ susaṃvṛtaḥ 
āsyatām iti coktaḥ sann āsītābhimukhaṃ guroḥ 
na kevalaṃ sūtrakāt pānir uddhartavyaḥ api tu vāsaso 'pi 
nityagrahaṇaṃ na tiṣṭhata evāyaṃ pāṇyuddhāraḥ nāpy adhyayanavelāyāṃ kiṃ tarhi tato 'nyatrāpi 
sādhvācāraḥ sādhuḥ anindyaḥ ācāro vāgvyavahārādiḥ kāryaḥ 
aślīlādibhāṣaṇam asaṃnidhāne 'pi guror nityagrahaṇān na kartavyam 
susaṃvṛtaḥ vāṅmanaścakṣurbhiḥ niyatātmā 
svalpo 'pi doṣas taṃ pariharet 
anāvṛto loka ucyate yo yathākāmī tadviparītaḥ susaṃvṛtaḥ 
anye tu manyante vastreṇācchāditaśarīro gurusaṃnidhau bhavet nottarīyam avatārayet 
evaṃ tiṣṭhet 
yadā tu guruṇāsyatām ity ukta etena śabdena bhrūvikṣepādinā vā vidheḥ pratipādanārthatvāt pratipādanaṃ ca na śabdavyāpāra eva 
tadā āsīta upaviśet 
abhimukhaṃ saṃmukham 
hīnānnavastraveṣaḥ syāt sarvadā gurusaṃnidhau 
uttiṣṭhet prathamaṃ cāsya caramaṃ caiva saṃviśet 
hīnaṃ nyūnam annaṃ bhuñjīta gurusaṃnidhau 
nyūnatā ca parimāṇataḥ kvacit kvacit saṃskārataḥ 
yadi saṃskṛtam ājyadadhikṣīrādivyañjanaṃ bhikṣāto labdhaṃ syāt tadā yadi guruṇā tādṛśam annaṃ na bhuktaṃ syād ekakāle ca guruṇā saha bhojane 
yadi guros tādṛśam annaṃ gṛhe na siddhaṃ syāt tadā tat tena nāśitavyam 
atha guror api tādṛśam annaṃ syāt tadāpacayaḥ kartavyaḥ 
vastraṃ yadi guror aurṇaṃ syāt tadā na kārpāsādi śiṣyeṇa prāvarītavyam 
veṣa ābharaṇamaṇḍanādiḥ 
so 'pi hīnaḥ 
sarvadā brahmacaryāt pareṇāpi 
ata eva veṣagrahaṇam 
na ca brahmacāriṇo maṇḍanam iṣyate 
uttiṣṭhet prathamaṃ cāsya śayyāyā rātryuparame āsanād vā utthānāvasaraṃ buddhvā prathamaṃ pūrvaṃ guror utthiṣṭhet 
caramaṃ paścāt svāpakāle supte gurau saṃviśec chayyāṃ samāśrayed āsane copaviśet 
pratiśravaṇasaṃbhāṣe śayāno na samācaret 
nāsīno na ca bhuñjāno na tiṣṭhan na parāṅmukhaḥ 
pratiśravaṇam āhūyamānasya kārye niyujyamānasya gurusaṃbandhivacanākarṇanam 
saṃbhāṣā guruṇā sahoktipratyuktikaraṇam 
te pratiśavaṇasaṃbhāśe 
śayānaḥ sve srastare nikṣiptagātraḥ 
na samācaren na kuryāt 
nāsīna āsane copaviṣṭaḥ 
na bhuñjānaḥ 
na tiṣṭhann ekasminn eva deśe 'vicalann ūrdhvaṃ sthitaḥ 
na punaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ 
yasyāṃ diśi gurur dṛśyate tataḥ parāvṛtya sthito na kuryāt 
āsīnasya sthitaḥ kuryād abhigacchaṃs tu tiṣṭhataḥ 
pratyudgamya tv āvrajataḥ paścād dhāvaṃs tu dhāvataḥ 
kathaṃ tarhi 
āsīno yadājñāṃ dadāti tadā sthita āsanād utthāya pratiśravaṇasaṃbhāṣe kuryāt 
abhigacchaṃs tu tiṣṭhataḥ 
tiṣṭhan gurur yadādiśati tadābhigacchaṃs tadabhimukhaḥ katicit padāni gatvā 
āvrajata āgacchataḥ pratyudgamya abhimukham eva gatvā 
pratir ābhimukhye 
dhāvato vegena gacchataḥ paścād dhāvan 
paścād vā vasatas tathā 
parāṅmukhasyābhimukho dūrasthasyaitya cāntikam 
praṇamya tu śayānasya nideśe caiva tiṣṭhataḥ 
tathā parāṅmukhasya guroḥ saṃmukhopaviṣṭaḥ śiṣyaḥ 
yadi guruḥ parāvṛtya kathaṃcit sthitaḥ preṣyati tāṃ diśaṃ gatvābhimukhībhūya pūrvoktaṃ kartavyam 
dūrasthasya samīpaṃ antikam etya āgatya prāpya 
āsīnasyāpi śayānasya praṇamya prahvo bhūtvā gātrāṇy avanamayya 
nideśe nikaṭe tiṣṭhato 'pi praṇamyaiva yat prāg uktam abhigacchann iti 
nīcaṃ śayyāsanaṃ cāsya nityaṃ syād gurusaṃnidhau 
guros tu cakṣurviṣaye na yatheṣṭāsano bhavet 
nīcam anunnataṃ guruśayyādyapekṣayā ca nīcatvam 
nityagrahaṇād brahmacaryād uttarakālam api 
guroś ca dṛṣṭigocare yatra guruḥ paśyati tatra na yatheṣṭam āsīta pādaprasāraṇāṅganiṣaṅgādinā 
āsanagrahaṇaṃ ceṣṭāmātropalakṣaṇārtham 
yatheṣṭaceṣṭo na bhavet 
nodāhared asya nāma parokṣam api kevalam 
na caivāsyānukurvīta gatibhāṣitaceṣṭitam 
nodāharen noccārayed asya guror nāma kevalaṃ upādhyāyācāryabhaṭṭādyupapadarahitaṃ parokṣam api 
na caivāsyānukurvīta sadṛśaṃ na kuryān nāṭyakāra iva 
gatiḥ evam asmadgurur apakrāmati 
bhāṣitam drutavilambitamadhyamatvādi 
ceṣṭitam evaṃ bhuṅkte evam uṣṇīṣaṃ badhnāti evaṃ parivartata ityādi 
upahāsabuddhyāyam anukaraṇapratiṣedhaḥ 
guror yatra parīvādo nindā vāpi pravartate 
karṇau tatra pidhātavyau gantavyaṃ vā tato 'nyataḥ 
yatra deśe durjanasaṃpāte guroḥ parīvādaḥ saṃbhūtadoṣānukathanaṃ nindā avidyamānānāṃ doṣāṇām abhidhānaṃ pravartate tatra karṇau pidhātavyāv aṅgulyādinā saṃvarītavyau 
tataḥ predeśād vānyatra gantavyam 
parīvādāt kharo bhavati śvā vai bhavati nindakaḥ 
paribhoktā kṛmir bhavati kīṭo bhavati matsarī 
pūrvapratiṣedhaśeṣo 'yam arthavādaḥ 
ata evaṃ vyākhyeyam 
parīvādāñ chrutvā kharo bhavati 
hetau lyaplope vā karmaṇi pañcamī parīvādaṃ śrutvā 
nindako nindāśrāvī upacārān nindaka ucyate 
tathā saṃskartāvaghātakaḥ 
śravaṇaniṣedhād eva sākṣāt karaṇaniṣedhasiddhiḥ 
paribhoktā yo gurum upajīvati kusṛtyānuvartate 
matsarī gurusamṛddhim abhyuccayaṃ na sahate 'ntar dahyate 
anayor aprāptatvād apūrvo vidhiḥ 
parivādaparīvādayor ghañy amanuṣye bahulam iti dīrghatvādīrghatve 
dūrastho nārcayed enaṃ na kruddho nāntike striyāḥ 
yānāsanasthaś caivainam avaruhyābhivādayet 
atra parapreṣaṇena gandhamālyāder arpaṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
svayaṃkṛte pareṇa ca kārite tulyaṃ kartṛtvam 
prayojake 'pi kartṛtvasmaraṇād ity etayā buddhyā prāpte paramukhenārcane pratiṣedhaḥ 
aśaktau grāmāntarasthasya na doṣaḥ grāmāntaraṃ gacchaty upādhyāye bhavān abhivādayatāṃ sa gatvā tam abhivādayata ityādivyavahāradarśanāt 
na kruddhaḥ 
gurau krodhāsaṃbhavād anyanimitte 'pi krodhe pūjākāle tattyāgena cittaprasādo 'bhidhīyate 
kruddham ity anye paṭhanti 
nāntike samīpe striyāḥ kāminyāḥ sthitam 
gurvārādhanaparatvāc chuśrūṣākalāpasya yena cittakheda āśaṅkyate sa niṣidhyate 
ataḥ striyā ity evaṃ vyākhyātam 
yānaṃ gantryādi 
āsanaṃ pīṭhikāmañcādi 
tato 'varuhya avatīrya abhivādayet 
śayyāsanasthaḥ ity atrāsanād utthānam uktam anenāvarohaṇaṃ vidhīyate 
mañcād vāsanād utthānam anavarohato 'pi saṃbhavati 
avarohaṇaṃ tarhi anutthitasya ca na saṃbhavati 
ato 'nenaiva siddhe śayyāsanety atrāsanagrahaṇam anarthakam 
nānarthakam 
yadi śiṣyaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ pratyagdeśād āgataṃ guruṃ manyeta tadāsanastha eva saṃbhramaparāvṛttas tadabhimukhībhūta uttiṣṭhen na tūtthāyābhiparāvarteta 
tathā hy utthānakriyayā saṃmukhībhavanaṃ vyavadhīyeta 
tataḥ kupyed guruḥ 
parāṅmukhasyottiṣṭhato gurur evam api manyeta nāyaṃ mamābhyutthito nimittāntarakṛtam evāsyābhyutthānam 
tasmād arthavad ubhayatrāpy āsanagrahaṇam 
prativātānuvāte ca nāsīta guruṇā saha 
asaṃśrave caiva guror na kiṃcid api kīrtayet 
yasyāṃ diśi gurur vyavasthitas tato deśād yadā vāyuḥ śiṣyadeśam āgacchati śiṣyadeśāc ca gurudeśaṃ te prativātānuvāte 
ekaṃ prativātam aparam anuvātam 
tadapekṣayā guruṇā saha nāsīta api tu tiryagvātasevī guror bhavet 
avidyamānaḥ saṃśravo yatra tasminn asaṃśrave na kiṃcid api gurugatam anyagataṃ vā kīrtayet 
yatra gurur vyaktaṃ na śṛṇoti oṣṭhasaṃcalanādinā śiṣyasaṃbandhinā jānāti kiṃcid ayam etena saṃbhāṣate tan na kīrtayet 
go'śvoṣṭrayānaprāsādaprastareṣu kaṭeṣu ca 
āsīta guruṇā sārdhaṃ śilāphalakanauṣu ca 
yānaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate 
go'śvoṣṭrair uktaṃ yānaṃ go'śvoṣṭrayānam 
dadhighaṭādivat samāse yuktaśabdasya lopaḥ 
kevaleṣu tu aśvapṛṣṭādiṣv ārohaṇaṃ nāsti 
yadi svatantro yānaśabdo vijñāyeta tadā syād apy anujñā 
samācārāt tu kādācitkam anujñānaṃ dṛśyate 
prāsāda uparigṛhādīnāṃ yā bhūmis tasyāṃ gṛhādibhūmivat siddhaṃ sahāsanam 
prastaraḥ darbhāditṛṇākīrṇaḥ āstaraḥ 
kaṭaḥ tu śaravīraṇādikṛtaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
śilā giriśikharādāv anyatra vā 
phalakaṃ dārumayam āsanaṃ potavartādi 
naur jalataraṇasaṃplavaḥ 
tena potādāv api siddhaṃ bhavati 
guror gurau saṃnihite guruvad vṛttim ācaret 
na cānisṛṣṭo guruṇā svān gurūn abhivādayet 
uktā guruvṛttir idānīm anyatrātidiśyate 
adhyayanadharmatvāt sarvasyāsya gurur atrācāryo vijñeyaḥ 
tasya yo gurus tasmin saṃnihite guruvad vartitavyam 
saṃnihita iti na tadgṛhagamanam abhivādanādyarthaṃ kartavyam 
gurugṛhe vasan guruṇānisṛṣṭo ananujñātaḥ svān gurūn mātāpitṛprabhṛtīn nābhivādayituṃ gacchet na punar gurugṛhe sthitasya yad sve gurava āgacchanti tadā tadabhivādane gurvajñāpekṣitavyā 
kuta etat mātāpitror atyantamānyatvāt 
pitṛvyamātulādīnām apy abhivādanapravṛttasya na kaścid guruvṛtter vighnaḥ 
ārādhanārtha evāyaṃ sarvaḥ prayāsaḥ 
mātāpitṛgurusaṃnipāte kaḥ kramo 'bhivādanasyety uktam sarvamahatī mātā 
pitrācāryayos tu vikalpaḥ 
yataḥ pitṛtvādhyāropeṇācāryasya gauravaṃ vihitam 
ataḥ pitā śreṣṭhaḥ 
yataś coktam garīyān brahmadaḥ pitā iti tata ācāryaḥ 
ato 'yam vikalpaḥ 
vidyāguruṣv etam eva nityā vṛttiḥ svayoniṣu 
pratiṣedhatsu cādharmād dhitaṃ copadiśatsv api 
ayam apy atideśaḥ 
ācāryād anye upādhyāyādayo vidyāguravaḥ 
teṣv evam eva vartitavyam śarīraṃ caiva ityādikṛtyā 
svayoniṣu jyeṣṭhabhrātṛpitṛvyādiṣu 
nityā vṛttir guruvṛttiḥ 
vidyāgurūṇāṃ tv ācāryavyatirekeṇa yāvadvidyāgrahaṇam 
adharmād akāryāt paradāragamanādeḥ pratiṣedhatsu vayasyeṣv api 
abhyantaragatyārūḍhatayākāryaṃ cikīrṣanyaḥ suhṛdādis tam ā keśagrahaṇān mitram akāryebhyo nivartayet iti 
tasmin samahīnavayaske 'pi guruvad vartitavyam 
hitaṃ ca vidhirūpam agranthakam upadiśatsu 
atha vā hitasyopadeṣṭāro 'bhijanā ucyante 
śreyaḥsu guruvad vṛttiṃ nityam eva samācaret 
guruputre tathācārye guroś caiva svabandhuṣu 
śreyāṃsa ātmāpekṣayā vittavayovidyādyatiśayayuktāḥ 
teṣu guruvad vṛttiṃ yathāsaṃbhavam abhivādanapratyutthānādi sarvadaiva samācaret 
bahavo 'tra śabdā gatārthāḥ prayujyante 
teṣāṃ vṛttavaśāt prayogo na duṣyati 
śreyaḥsv ity etāvād vaktavyam 
guruvad ity ākṣipyate 
vṛttim ityādi prāptam eva 
tad etat sarvasminn evāsmin granthe svayam utprekṣyam 
guruputre tathācārye 
ācāryagrahaṇenādhyāpakatvaṃ lakṣyate 
yady asaṃnihite gurau tatputro 'dhyāpayati katicid ahāni tadā tasmin guruvad vṛttiḥ 
pāṭhāntaram guruputreṣv athāryeṣu 
āryaśabdo guṇavadbrāhmaṇajātivacanaḥ 
śūdrāc cāryo jyāyān iti prayogadarśanāt 
na ca sarvasmin guruputre vṛttir eṣā vidhīyate 
guroś caiva svabandhuṣu 
svagrahaṇaṃ guruvaṃśyartham 
guruvaṃśasaṃbandhitaivātra nimittam na vayovidyādyapekṣyate 
bālaḥ samānajanmā vā śiṣyo vā yajñakarmaṇi 
adhyāpayan gurusuto guruvan mānam arhati 
ye na paṭhanti guruputraviśeṣaṇārthaṃ pūrvatrācāryagrahaṇam teṣām adhyāpayitari guṇavati samānajātīye sarvaguruvṛttiḥ prāptānena viśeṣeṇāvasthāpyate 
adhyāpayan gurusuto guruvan mānaṃ pūjām arhati nānādhyāpayan 
nanu ca vidyāgrahaṇanimittatvād guruvṛttir adhyāpayad guruvad guruputre 'py adhyāpayitari prāptaiva 
śaiśavabrāhmaṇanidarśanāt kanīyaso 'pi siddhety ato bālaḥ samānajanmā vā ity evamartham api na vaktavyam 
satyam 
yo vedaṃ vedaikadeśaṃ vādhyāpayati tasyānācāryasyāpy eṣā vṛttir uktā 
ayaṃ tu na grāhakaḥ kevalaṃ katicidahāny aharbhāgaṃ vādhyāpayati ato nācāryo nopādhyāya ity aprāptau vidhir ayam 
asmād eva vacanād anyasya bhagnamantrāder adhyāpakasya na sarvā guruvṛttiḥ kartavyeti vijñāyate 
ye ca pūrvatrācāryaśabdaṃ paṭhanti teṣām uttarārtham idam anūdyate 
utsādanaṃ ca iti vakṣyati 
śiṣyo vā yajñakarmaṇi 
yajñakarmagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham 
kvacid aṅge vedaikadeśe mantrabhāge kasmiṃścid brāhmaṇabhāge vā tathāpi guruvat pūjyaḥ yadi tu guruputraḥ 
tasmād anena prakāreṇa kāṃcid vidyāṃ śikṣeta tadā tena tasmin guruvad vartitavyam ity uktam evam arthavādatvād asyārambhasya 
ye tu vyācakṣate adhyāpayann ity anenādhyāpanasāmarthyaṃ lakṣyate adhyāpanasamarthaś ced adhyāpayatu mā vādhyāpayet gṛhītavedaś ced guruvad draṣṭavyaḥ  teṣām śābdam etad vyākhyānaṃ satyaṃ bhavati 
śatā lakṣaṇārthaḥ sa tu kriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti 
kriyā cātra śrutā guruvan mānam arhati 
utsādanaṃ ca gātrāṇāṃ snāpanocchiṣṭabhojane 
na kuryād guruputrasya pādayoś cāvanejanam 
abhyaktasyodvartanam utsādanaṃ na kuryāt 
guruputrasya 
pādayoś cāvanejanaṃ prakṣālanam 
asmād eva pratiṣedhād gurāv etad anuktam api kartavyatayā pratīyate 
yadā tu guruputra eva guruḥ saṃpadyate kṛtsnavedādhyāpanopayogitayā tadā svanimittaṃ tatrocchiṣṭabhojanādy asti 
tad anena na pratiṣidhyate 
ātideśikasyānena niṣedho naupadeśikasya 
guruvat pratipūjyāḥ syuḥ savarṇā guruyoṣitaḥ 
asavarṇās tu saṃpūjyāḥ pratyutthānābhivādanaiḥ 
guruyoṣito gurupatnyaḥ 
savarṇāḥ samānajātīyāḥ 
guruvat pratipūjyā ājñākaraṇādinā 
asavarṇās tu kevalaiḥ pratyutthānābhivādanaiḥ 
bahuvacanād ādyartho 'trāntarbhavati 
tena hi priyahitādi gatyādy ananukaraṇādy apy atidiśyate 
abhyañjanaṃ snāpanaṃ ca gātrotsādanam eva ca 
gurupatnyā na kāryāṇi keśānāṃ ca prasādhanam 
ghṛtatailādinā keśakāyopadehanam abhyañjanam 
gātrāṇām utsādanam udvartanam 
kāryasāmānyāt pādadhāvanam api 
sarvathā śarīrasparśasādhyā yā kācid anuvṛttiḥ sā sarvā pratiṣidhyate 
vakṣyati ca hetuṃ svabhāva eṣa nārīṇām iti 
keśānāṃ ca prasādhanaṃ vinyāsaracanādikaraṇam kuṅkumasindūrādinā sīmantotthāpanam 
pradarśanārthaṃ caitad uktam 
tena dehaprasādhanam api candanānulepanāni niṣidhyante 
gurupatnī tu yuvatir nābhivādyeha pādayoḥ 
pūrṇaviṃśativarṣeṇa guṇadoṣau vijānatā 
pūrṇaviṃśativarṣeṇa taruṇenety arthaḥ 
bālasya ā ṣoḍaśād varṣād adoṣaḥ 
pūrṇāni viṃśativarṣāṇi yasya sa evam ucyate 
ayaṃ kālo yauvanodbhedopalakṣaṇārthaḥ 
ata evāha guṇadoṣau vijānatā 
kāmaje sukhaduḥkhe guṇadoṣāv abhipretau strīgatau ca svākṛtidurākṛtilakṣaṇau dharyacāpale vā 
sarvathātantrā viṃśatisaṃkhyā 
svabhāva eṣa nārīṇāṃ narāṇām iha dūṣaṇam 
ato 'rthān na pramādyanti pramadāsu vipaścitaḥ 
eṣā prakṛtiḥ strīṇāṃ yan narāṇāṃ dhairyacyāvanam 
saṅgād dhi striyaḥ puruṣān vratāc cāvayeyuḥ 
ato 'rthāt tv asmād dhetor na pramādyanti 
dūrata eva striyaḥ pariharanti 
pramādaḥ sparśādikaraṇam 
vastusvabhāvo 'yaṃ yat taruṇī spṛṣṭā kāmakṛtaṃ cittasaṃkṣobhaṃ janayati 
tatra cittasaṃkṣobho 'pi pratiṣiddhaḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvad aparo grāmyadharmasaṃrambhaḥ 
pramadāḥ striyaḥ 
avidvāṃsam alaṃ loke vidvāṃsam api vā punaḥ 
pramadā hy utpathaṃ netuṃ kāmakrodhavaśānugam 
na caitan mantavyam niyamitāni yena ciram indriyāṇi atigurupātakaṃ gurudāreṣu duṣṭena bhāvena prekṣaṇam apīti ya evaṃ veda tasya na doṣaḥ pādasparśādau iti 
yata evaṃvidhān api doṣān yo jānīte yo vā na kiṃcij jānīte tau strīviṣaye samānau 
yato nātra vidvattā prabhavati 
śaknuvanti striyaḥ sarvaṃ utpatham amārgaṃ lokaśāstraviruddhaṃ viṣayaṃ netuṃ prāpayituṃ kāmakrodhavaśānugaṃ santam 
kāmakrodhābhyāṃ yaḥ saṃbadhyata ity arthaḥ 
avathāviśeṣopalakṣaṇārthaṃ caitat 
atyantabālaṃ atyantavṛddhaṃ ca prāptayogaprakarṣaṇaṃ ca varjayitvā yena niranvayam ucchinnā saṃsārapuruṣadharmās tadvyatirekeṇa na kaścit puruṣo 'sti yaḥ strībhir nākṛṣyate ayaḥ kānteneva lohaḥ 
na cātra strīṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇutā vastusvābhāvyāt taruṇījanadarśane puṃsām unmathyate cittam viśeṣato brahmacāriṇām 
mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano bhavet 
balavān indriyagrāmo vidvāṃsam api karṣati 
ato vivikāsanaḥ nirjane śūnye gṛhādau nāsīta 
nāpi niḥśaṅkam aṅgasparṣādi kuryāt 
aticapalo hīndriyasaṃghāto vidvāṃsam api śāstranigṛhītātmānam api karṣati harati paratantrīkaroti 
kāmaṃ tu gurupatnīnāṃ yuvatīnāṃ yuvā bhuvi 
vidhivad vandanaṃ kuryād asāv aham iti bruvan 
kāmam ity aruciṃ sūcayati 
uttareṇa caitat saṃbadhyate viproṣya pādagrahaṇam iti 
bhuvi tu pādavandanam iṣyata eva 
yuvatīnāṃ yuvā dvayor yūnor ayaṃ vidhiḥ 
yadi bālo brahmacārī vṛddhā vā gurupatnī tadā pādopasaṃgrahaṇam aviruddham 
asāv aham iti prāg uktasya vidher anuvādaḥ 
vidhivad iti vyastapāṇinā 
viproṣya pādagrahaṇam anvahaṃ cābhivādanam 
gurudāreṣu kurvīta satāṃ dharmam anusmaran 
pravāsād etya pādayor grahaṇaṃ savyena savyam iti 
anvaham ahany ahani 
abhivādanaṃ bhūmau 
satāṃ śiṣṭānāṃ eṣa dharma ācāra ity anusmaran 
yathā khanan khanitreṇa naro vāry adhigacchati 
tathā gurugatāṃ vidyāṃ śuśrūṣur adhigacchati 
sarvasya śuśrūṣāvidheḥ phalam idam 
gurvārādhanadvāreṇa svādhyāyavidhyarthavādaḥ 
yathā kāścin manuṣyaḥ khanitreṇa kuddālādinā bhūmiṃ khanan vāri prāpnoti nākleśena evam ayaṃ vidyāṃ gurugatāṃ śuśrūṣuḥ gurusevāparo 'dhigacchati 
muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā syād atha vā syāc chikājaṭaḥ 
nainaṃ grāme 'bhinimlocet sūryo nābhyudiyāt kvacit 
muṇḍaḥ sarvataḥ keśavapanaṃ kārayet 
jaṭilo vā 
jāṭā parasparam atyantaṃ saṃlagnakeśāḥ tadvāñ jaṭilaḥ 
śikhājaṭaḥ śikhaiva vā jaṭā yasya 
jaṭākārāṃ śikhāṃ dhārayet praiśiṣṭe muṇḍaḥ 
tathā ca kuryād yathā grāme sthitasya sūryo nābhinimlocen nāstaṃ gacchet 
grāmagrahaṇam nagarasyāpi pradarśanārtham 
astamayasamayam araṇye saṃbhāvayet 
evaṃ grāme nābhyudiyād udayo 'pi sūryasya yathāraṇyasthasya brahmcāriṇo bhavati tathā kuryāt 
enaṃ prakṛtaṃ brahmacāriṇam 
anye tu grāmaśabdaṃ grāmyeṣu dharmeṣu svāpādiṣu vartamānaṃ na nimloced ity evamarthaṃ varṇayanti 
tathā ca uttaratra śayānam ity āha 
tato 'yaṃ saṃdhyayoḥ svapnapratiṣedhaḥ nāraṇye tatkālāvasthānam 
bālo hi brahmacārī bibhīyāt 
gautamena tu bahiḥsaṃdhyatvaṃ parato godānād uktam 
godānavrataṃ ca ṣoḍaśavarṣe tadā ca prāptaḥ śaknoty araṇye saṃdhyām upāsitum 
taṃ ced abhyudiyāt sūryaḥ śayānaṃ kāmacārataḥ 
nimloced vāpy avijñānāj japann upavased dinam 
atredaṃ prāyaścittaṃ caret 
brahmacāriṇaṃ śayānaṃ nidrāvaśaṃ gatam abhyudiyāt svenodayenābhivyāptadoṣaṃ kuryāt 
abhir abhāge iti karmapravacanīyatvam 
tato dvitīyā śayānam iti 
itthaṃbhūtaṃ suptam iti lakṣaṇaṃ vā svāpakāle yady udyeta 
japann upavased dinam 
kecid āhuḥ prātar atikrame dinaṃ japovavāsau rātrau tu bhojanam paścimātikrame tu rātrau japopavāsau prātarbhojanam iti 
dinaśabdaḥ pradarśanārthaḥ 
gautamavacanaṃ cāpy udāharanti tiṣṭhed ahar abhuñjāno 'bhyastam itaś ca rātriṃ japan sāvitrīm iti 
tad ayuktam 
ubhayatrāpi divaiva prāyaścittaṃ yuktam dinaśabdasya pradarśanārthatve pramāṇābhāvāt 
na hy asya tatsāpekṣasya svārthapratipādanam 
nirapekṣaṃ caitat 
tasmād vikalpo yuktaḥ 
tatra yasya sarvāṃ rātriṃ jāgrato na vyādhiḥ pravartate sa rātrau japiṣyati anyas tu divaiva 
japaś ca gautamavacanāt sāvitryā eva 
nanu atra kathaṃ gautamaḥ pramāṇīkriyate
ucyate 
sāpekṣam idaṃ vākyaṃ japed iti japanīyasyānirdeśāt 
satyām apekṣāyāṃ śrutyantarād yuktā viśeṣāvagatiḥ 
iha tu kālasya nirdeśaḥ 
nāsti kālāntaraṃ pratyapekṣeti na gautamo 'pekṣate 
atha vā saṃdhyātikrame prāyaścittābhidhānāt sāvitrījapaḥ siddha eva 
yuktaṃ ca sāvitryās tu paraṃ nāstīti 
kāmacārataḥ 
jñātvaiva saṃdhyākāle yaḥ svapiti 
avijñānāt 
cirasuptasya saṃdhyākālo 'yaṃ vartata ity anavabodho 'vijñānam 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
icchayā pramādakṛte cātikrame etad eva prāyaścittam 
yaḥ punar abhyuditānastamitsaṃdhyām atikrāmati tasya prāyaścittam abhojanaṃ nityānām karmaṇāṃ samatikrama iti 
atha vā yaḥ kāmacāreṇa śāstrātikramaṇaṃ karoti tasya tad avijñānam eva 
sūryeṇa hy abhinimluktaḥ śayāno 'bhyuditaś ca yaḥ 
prāyaścittam akurvāṇo yuktaḥ syān mahatainasā 
pūrvaprāyāścittavidher ayam arthavādaḥ 
nimlocanenābhiduṣṭaḥ abhinimluktaḥ 
evam abhyuditaḥ 
prāyaścittaṃ pūrvoktaṃ na karoti 
tadā mahatā pāpena saṃbadhyate na svalpena 
narakādiduḥkhopabhognimittam adṛṣṭapāpam ucyate 
ācamya prayato nityam ubhe saṃdhye samāhitaḥ 
śucau deśe japañ japyam upāsīta yathāvidhi 
evaṃ mahān doṣo 'bhyudayanimlocanayoḥ 
tasmād ācamya prayatas tatparaḥ samāhitaḥ parihṛtacittatatkarmvikṣepaḥ 
śucau deśe japañ japyaṃ praṇavavyāhṛtisāvitryākhyam 
upāsīta ubhe saṃdhye 
saṃdhyayor evātropāsyatvam 
upāsanaṃ ca tatra bhāvaviśeṣaḥ 
atha vobhe saṃdhye pratyupāsīta bhagavantaṃ savitāram 
mantro hi taddevatyo 'tas tam evopāsīta 
saṃhṛtasakalavikalpas tadgataikamanā bhavet 
prāguktasya vidheḥ śeṣo 'nuvādaḥ 
upāsanaṃ kevalaṃ vidheyam 
anye tu śucau deśa ity etadvidhyartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ ity āhus 
teṣāṃ paunaruktyam 
sarvasyaiva kartavyasya śucinā karma kartavyam iti vihitam 
aśucideśasaṃbandhe ca kā śucitā 
yadi strī yady avarajaḥ śreyaḥ kiṃcit samācaret 
tat sarvam ācared yukto yatra vāsya ramen manaḥ 
yadi strī ācāryānī 
avarajaḥ kanīyān 
ācāryād upalabhya śreyaḥ dharmāditrivargaṃ samācaret tat sarvam ācaret 
saṃbhavati hi tayos tadācāryasaṃparkāt parijñānam 
śūdro vācāryabhṛtaka avarajaḥ 
sa yady upadiśet evaṃ pāyuliṅgau mṛdvāriṇā prakṣālyete nipuṇau hastau prakṣālaya vismṛtas te mṛdvārikramaḥ tvadīya ācāryo 'sakṛn mayā pāyuprakṣālane jalaṃ dadatā dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ pūrvam adbhiḥ śaucaṃ karoti tato mṛdbhiḥ ity evamādi samācaret tatsamācārādyupapanna upadiśet 
tathā cācāryānī ācamanaṃ śikṣayet 
tat sarvam ācared yuktaḥ śraddayā 
na strīśūdrācaritam ity avajānīta 
samācared iti ca samācārapūrvaka upadeśa evātrābhipretaḥ 
vakṣyati ca dharmaḥ śaucaṃ samādeyāni sarvataḥ iti 
ācāryeṇaiva kadācid ādiṣṭaṃ bhavati brāhmaṇi ācamaya putrasthānīyam etaṃ yathāvidhipūrvakam 
brūyāc ca asya mūtrapurīṣaśuddhyarthaṃ mṛdvāriṇī deye iti 
tatra tadīyavacanam anuṣṭheyam evam mṛdo gṛhāṇa evam adbhiḥ prakṣālaya iti 
atha vā gurugṛhe lohopalajalaśuddhyādiḥ strīśūdrābhyāṃ samācaryamāṇaḥ pramāṇīkartavyaḥ 
etāvadācārasya strīśūdrasaṃbandhinaḥ prāmāṇyārtho 'yaṃ śloko yujyate 
nanu sarvasyācārasyāvedavitsaṃbandhinaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ ghaṭate 
anuktam etat 
na hi svalpo 'py ācāra avedavidāṃ pramāṇībhavati 
athāsti mūlaṃ vedavitsaṃbandhaḥ sa eva tarhi pramāṇam kiṃ strīgrahaṇena 
na caivaṃvidhe viṣaye strīśūdrācārasya prāmāṇyam abhipretam 
tathā hi sati prāmāṇyābhidhānaprakaraṇa evāvakṣyat 
tasmāc chreyaḥ padārthanirūpaṇārtho 'yam upodghāta iti paramārthaḥ 
yad vācāryavacasāṃ prāmāṇyānuvādo 'yam 
yat strīśudrāv api brūyātāṃ tad apy anuṣṭhātuṃ yuktam kiṃ punar ācāryopadiṣṭam 
yatra cāsya ramet parituṣyen manaḥ 
etad apy ātmanas tuṣṭhiḥ ity atra vyākhyātam 
sarvathā nāsya ślokasyātīva prayojanam asti 
dharmārthav ucyate śreyaḥ kāmārthau dharma eva ca 
artha eveha vā śreyas trivarga iti tu sthitiḥ 
yat praśasyaṃ yad ācaryamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭe nopahanti yac chreyo loka ucyate kiṃ punas tad iti suhṛd bhūtvānvācaṣṭe 
nāyaṃ vedamūlo 'rthaḥ nācāryādiśabdavat padārthakathanam 
kiṃ tarhi śreyo'rthī sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ pravartate 
tatredam ucyate idaṃ śreyaḥ etadarthaṃ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tatra matāntarāṇi tāvad upanyasyati 
keṣāṃcit mataṃ dharmārthau śreyaḥ 
dharmaḥ śāstravihitau vidhipratiṣedhau 
artho gobhūmihiraṇyādiḥ 
etad eva śreyaḥ etadadhīnatvāt puruṣaprīteḥ 
aparaṃ mataṃ kāmārthāv iti 
kāmas tāvan mukhya eva puruṣārthaḥ 
prītir hi śreyaḥ artho 'pi tatsādhanatvāt 
evaṃ hi cārvākāḥ āhuḥ kāma evaikaḥ puruṣārthas tasya sādhanam arthaḥ dharmo 'pi yady asti 
dharma eva sarvebhyaḥ śreyān sarvasya tanmūlatvāc ca 
uktaṃ ca dharmād arthaś ca kāmaś ca iti 
artha eveti vaṇijaḥ prayogajīvinaḥ 
siddhāntas tu trivarga iti tu sthitiḥ 
ato dharmāvirodhināv arthakāmāv api sevitavyau na tadvirodhinau 
tathā ca gautamaḥ na pūrvāhṇamadhyaṃdināparāhṇān aphalān kuryāt yathāśakti dharmārthakāmebhyaḥ iti 
tryātmako vargas trivargaḥ 
triṣu samuditeṣv ayaṃ rūḍhaḥ 
ācāryaś ca pitā caiva mātā bhrātā ca pūrvajaḥ 
nārttenāpy avamantavyā brāhmaṇena viśeṣataḥ
anyo 'pi na kaścid avamantavyaḥ ete punar viśeṣataḥ 
prāyaścittādhikyam atrety arthaḥ 
ārttena taiḥ pīḍitenāpy 
avamānam avajñā prāptāyāḥ pūjāyā akaraṇaṃ nyakkāraś cānādarākhyaḥ 
brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ pūraṇārtham 
ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ 
mātā pṛthivyā mūrtis tu bhrātā svo mūrtir ātmanaḥ 
pūrvasyāyam arthavādaḥ 
yat paraṃ brahma vedāntopaniṣatprasiddhaṃ tasya ācāryo mūrtiḥ śarīram 
mūrtir iv mūrtiḥ 
prajāpater hiraṇyagarbhasya pitā 
yeyaṃ pṛthivī saiva mātā bhārasahatvasāmānyāt 
bhrātā ca svaḥ sodaryaḥ ātmanaḥ kṣetrajñasyeti praśaṃsā 
ete sarve devatārūpāḥ mahattvayuktā avamatā ghnanti prasāditā abhipretaiḥ kāmair yojayanti 
evaṃ tatsamā ācāryādaya iti stutiḥ 
yaṃ mātāpitarau kleśaṃ sahete saṃbhave nṛṇām 
na tasya niṣkṛtiḥ śakyā kartuṃ varṣaśatair api 
bhūtārthānuvādeneyam aparā praśaṃsā 
kleśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mātā ca pitā ca nṝṇām apatyānāṃ saṃbhave garbhāt prabhṛti yāvd daśamād varṣāt 
mātuḥ kleśaḥ garbhadhāraṇam 
prasavaḥ prāṇaharaḥ strīṇām 
jātasya ca saṃvaraṇayogaḥ kleśaḥ 
sa sarvasya svayaṃ saṃvedyaḥ 
pitur apy upanayanāt prabhṛti ā vedārthavyākhyānāt 
saṃbhavaśabdenātra garbhādāham ucyate 
tad dhi na kleśāvaham kiṃ tarhi taduttarakālabhāvinya etāḥ kriyāḥ tā hi kleśasādhyāḥ 
na tasya kleśasya niṣkṛtir ānṛṇyaṃ pratyupakārasamatvaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ varṣaśatair janmabhir bahubhiḥ kiṃ punar ekena janmanā 
asaṃkhyadhanadānena mahatyā vāpada uddharaṇena mātāpitror niṣkṛtir iti 
tayor nityaṃ priyaṃ kuryād ācāryasya ca sarvadā 
teṣv eva triṣu tuṣṭeṣu tapaḥ sarvaṃ samāpyate 
tasmāt tayor mātāpitror ācāryasya ca sarvadā yāvajjīvaṃ yat priyaṃ teṣāṃ tat kuryāt na sakṛd dvis trir vā kṛtvā kṛtī bhavet 
teṣv evācāryādiṣu triṣu tuṣṭeṣu bhaktyārādhiteṣu tapaḥ sarvaṃ bahūn varṣagaṇāṃś cāndrāyaṇāditapas taptvā yat phalaṃ prāpyate tat tatparitoṣād eva labhyata iti 
teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ śuśrūṣā paramaṃ tapa ucyate 
na tair anabhyanujñāto dharmam anyaṃ samācaret 
kathaṃ punas tapaḥphalam atapasā mātrādiśuśrūṣayā 
yasmāt etac ca sarvottamaṃ tapo yat teṣāṃ pādasevanam 
tair ananujñāto māṇavakaḥ dharmam anyaṃ tatsevāvirodhinaṃ tīrthasnānādirūpaṃ vratopavāsādi ca śarīraśoṣaṇayā teṣāṃ cittakhedakaram 
jyotiṣṭomānuṣṭhāne 'py anujñā grahītavyā 
yato 'vamānapratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ 
mahārambheṣu ca karmasu bahudhanavyayāyāsasādhyeṣu muhyamānā avamantavāḥ bhaveyuḥ 
nityakarmānuṣṭhāne tv anujñā nopakāriṇī 
ta eva hi trayo lokās ta eva traya āśramāḥ 
ta eva hi trayo vedās ta evoktās trayo 'gnayaḥ 
kāryakāraṇayor abhedād evam ucyate 
trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ prāptihetutvāt ta eva trayo lokā ucyante 
ta eva ca trayaḥ prathamād brahmacaryād anye traya āśramāḥ 
gārhasthyādibhir tribhir āśramair yat phalaṃ prāpyate tat tais tribhis tuṣṭaiḥ 
ta eva trayo vedā vedatrayajapatulyaphalatvāt 
ta eva trayo 'gnayaḥ 
agnisādhyakarmānuṣṭhānaphalāvāptes tac chruśrūṣātaḥ 
eṣāpi praśaṃsaiva 
pitā vai gārhapatyo 'gnir mātāgnir dakṣiṇaḥ smṛtaḥ 
gurur āhavanīyas tu sāgnitretā garīyasī 
kenacit sāmānyenāyaṃ pitrādīnāṃ gārhapatyādivyapadeśaḥ 
sāgnitretā ādhānāgnitretā yā garīyasī mahāphalā 
trāṇaṃ trāṇārtham itā prāptā tretā iti śabdavyutpattiḥ 
triṣv apramādyann eteṣu trīṃl lokān vijayed gṛhī 
dīpyamānaḥ svavapuṣā devavad divi modate 
eteṣv apramādyann ārādhane 'skhalan 
tathā ca tadārādhāt trīn lokāñ jayet svīkuryād ādhipatyam āpnuyāt 
gṛhī 
gṛhasthāvasthasya hi putrasya pitrādīnāṃ tatkṛtam ārādhanam upayujyate 
tadā hi tau vṛddhau bhavataḥ 
dīpyamānaḥ śobhamānaḥ prakāśamāno vā svenaiva tejasā 
devavad ādityavad divi loke modate 
imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛbhaktyā pitṛbhaktyā tu madhyamam 
guruśuśrūṣayā tv evaṃ brahmalokaṃ samaśnute 
ayaṃ lokaḥ pṛthivī 
bhārasahatvāt tulyā mātā pṛthivyā 
pitṛbhaktyā madhyamo loko 'ntarikṣam 
prajāpatiḥ pitoktaḥ 
madhyamasthānaś ca prajāpatir nairuktānām 
sa hi varṣakarmaṇāṃ prajānāṃ pātā vā pālayitā vā 
brahmalokam ādityalokam 
ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥ 
lokaḥ sthānaviśeṣas tam aśnute prāpnoti 
arthavādā ete 
tatra nābhiniveṣṭavyam 
na ca lokādhipatyakāmasya tadārādhanādhikāraḥ 
nāyaṃ kāmyo vidhiḥ 
pitṛtvam evātra nimittam akaraṇe śāstrātikramaḥ 
sarve tasyādṛtā dharmā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ 
anādṛtās tu yasaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥ 
ādṛtāḥ satkṛtāḥ 
ādṛtavacanena pratyupakāraparatvaṃ lakṣyate 
yo hy ādṛto bhavati sa parituṣṭaḥ pratyupakārāya yatate 
atha vā ādṛtaḥ parituṣṭaḥ ucyate 
dharmasya cānantyāt paritoṣānupapatteḥ phaladānotsukatvaṃ lakṣyate 
sarvāṇi tasya karmāṇy āśu phaladāyīni bhavanti 
yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ śuśrūṣayā parituṣṭāḥ 
etais tv anārādhitair yat phalakāmena kiṃcit kriyate śubhaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ niṣphalam 
sarvāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāṇi śrautasmārtāni karmāṇi 
arthavādo 'yam 
puruṣārtho hy ārādhanavidhiḥ 
tadatikrame puruṣaḥ pratyavayan mahatā pāpena karmopārjite 'pīṣṭaphalabhoge pratibadhyate 
ata ucyate sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyā iti 
yāvat trayas te jīveyus tāvan nānyaṃ samācaret 
teṣv eva nityaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kuryāt priyahite rataḥ 
uktārtho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
nānyaṃ samācared dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā tadanujñānam antareṇety uktam 
teṣv eva nityaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kuryāt 
priyahite rataḥ 
priyaṃ ca hitaṃ ca tat 
yat prītikaraṃ tat priyaṃ yat pālanaṃ tad dhitam 
teṣām anuprodhena pāratryaṃ yad yad ācaret 
tat tan nivedayet tebhyo manovacanakarmabhiḥ 
paratra janmāntare yasya phalaṃ bhujyate tat pāratryam 
chāndasaṃ rūpam etat 
śuśrūṣāyā avirodhenānyaṃ yaṃ yaṃ dharmaṃ samācaret taṃ taṃ nivedayet tebhyas tān jñāpayet 
anuparodhagrahaṇam evamarthaṃ kṛtam 
yat teṣāṃ virodhi tatra naivānujñāṃ dāpayitavyāḥ 
kaścid ṛjuprakṛtir abhyarthamāna ātmaparādharmam avagaṇayyānujānāti tannivṛttyartham etat 
manovacanakarmabhiḥ 
na nivedanam adṛṣṭārtham api tu yādṛśam anujñānaṃ tādṛśam eva karmaṇā darśayet 
atha vaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kartavyaḥ 
manovacanakarmabhiḥ pāratryaṃ yad yad ācaret tat tan nivedayet tebhya iti 
triṣv eteṣv iti kṛtyaṃ hi puruṣasya samāpyate 
eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ sākṣād upadharmo 'nya ucyate 
itiśabdaḥ samāptivacanaḥ kārtsnyaṃ gamayati 
yatkiṃcana puruṣasya kartavyaṃ yāvān kaścana puruṣārthaḥ sa eteṣv ārādhiteṣu samāpyate paripūrṇam anuṣṭhito bhavati 
eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣāttvena 
anyaś cāgnihotrādir upadharmaḥ pratihārasthānīyo na sākṣād rājavat iti praśaṃsā 
avamānapratiṣedhaḥ priyahitakaraṇam tadvirodhinaḥ kartavyasyānanuṣṭhānam avirodhino 'py ananujñātasya ca 
pariśiṣṭaḥ ślokasaṃghāto 'rthavādaḥ 
śraddadhānaḥ śubhāṃ vidyām ādadītāvarād api 
antyād api paraṃ dharmaṃ strīratnaṃ duṣkulād api 
śraddadhāna āstikyopagṛhītāntarātmābhiyukto yaḥ śiṣyaḥ sa śubhāṃ vidyāṃ nyāyaśāstrāditarkavidyām 
atha vā yā śobhate kevalaṃ sā viśadakāvyabharatādividyāvibhūṣitā mantravidyā vā na dharmopayoginī tām avarād api hīnajātīyād apy ādadīta śikṣate 
na tv atra śubhā vedavidyā veditavyā āpadi vidhir bhaviṣyati anāpadi tu naiveṣyate 
yā tv aśubhā śāmbhavī māyākuhakādi vā tāṃ na kvacit 
antyaś cāṇḍālas tasmād api yaḥ paro dharmaḥ śrutismṛtyapekṣayā paro 'nyo laukikaḥ 
dharmaśabdo vyavasthāyām api prayujyate 
eṣo 'tra dharmaḥ iti yadi caṇḍālo 'pi brūte atra pradeśe mā ciraṃ sthā mā vāsminn ambhasi snāsīḥ eṣo 'tra grāmīṇānāṃ dharmo rājñā kṛtā vā maryādā iti 
na caivaṃ mantavyam upādhyāyavacanaṃ mayā kartavyaṃ dhik cāṇḍālaṃ jālmaṃ yo māṃ niyuṅkte iti 
na punar iyaṃ buddhiḥ kartavyā paro dharmo brahmatattvajñānam 
na hi caṇḍālādes tatparijñānasaṃbhavaḥ vedārthavittvābhāvāt 
na cānyatas tatsaṃbavaḥ 
na hi vṛścikamantrākṣaravad brahmopadeśo 'sti 
strīratnam iva 
strī cāsau ratnaṃ ca tad iti vā 
upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyena iti vā 
yadā yatkiṃcid utkṛṣṭaṃ vastu tad ratnam ucyate tadā viśeṣaṇam iti 
atha tu marakatapadmarāgādīny eva ratnaśabdavācyāny utkarṣasāmānyād anyatra prayogaḥ tadopamitam iti 
yā strī kāntisaṃsthānalāvaṇyātiśayavatī atha dānyabahudhanasutādiśubhalakṣaṇā sā duṣkulād dhīnakriyāder apy āneyā 
abrāhmaṇāt ity asya vidher ayam upodghātaḥ 
alābena tu pradarśitaḥ 
viṣād apy amṛtaṃ grāhyaṃ bālād api subhāṣitam 
amitrād api sadvṛttam amedhyād api kāñcanam 
pūrva imau cāpady abrāhmaṇād apy adhyetavyam ity asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ 
anena lokapravādo dṛṣṭāntīkriyate 
evaṃ hi laukikā āhuḥ asatas sad upādeyam 
viṣe 'pi yad amṛtaṃ tad grāhyam eva yathā haṃsa udakāt kṣīraṃ gṛhṇāti 
rasāyaneṣu keṣucit viṣaṃ ity etad abhipretyoktam 
bālo 'pi yat kiṃcid akasmāt subhāṣitaṃ māṅgalikaṃ prasthānādau vakti tad grāhyam 
amitrāder api satāṃ yad vṛttaṃ śiṣṭācāraḥ 
na dveṣyas tenaitad ācaritam iti tyājyaḥ 
prasiddhataro 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ amedhyād api kāñcanaṃ suvarṇam 
asadāśrayād apy ete yathā gṛhyate tadvad abrāhmaṇād adhyayanam iti 
striyo ratnāny atho vidyā dharmaḥ śaucaṃ subhāṣitam 
vividhāni ca śilpāni samādeyāni sarvataḥ 
ratnāni maṇayaḥ śambarapulindādibhyo 'py upāttāḥ śuddhās tadvad vidyādy apīti 
śilpāni ca vicitrapatracchedyādīny aduṣṭāny agarhitāni cailanirṇejanapaṭarañjanabandhādīni 
sarvato jātiviśeṣam anapekṣya samādeyāni svīkartavyāni niścitātidhairyabhāvaiḥ 
viṣād apy amṛtam ity evamādibhir anekavākyatvāt samānaprakramatvena sarva ete 'rthavādāḥ 
abrāhmaṇād adhyayanam āpatkāle vidhīyate 
anuvrajyā ca śuśrūṣā yāvad adhyayanaṃ guroḥ 
ayaṃ tv atra vidhiḥ 
āpad brāhmaṇādhyāpakabhāvaḥ 
āpadaḥ kāla āpatkālaḥ 
āpad ityeva siddhe kālagrahaṇaṃ vṛttapūraṇārtham 
pāṭhāntaram āpatkalpa iti 
kalpanaṃ kalpa āpady eṣāṃ kalpanā vidhīyate upadiśyate 
yad ācāryaḥ prārabdhādhyapanaḥ prāyaścittenānyena vā nimittena śiṣyaṃ hitvā deśāntaraṃ vrajet na ca brāhmaṇo 'nyo 'dhyāpakas tasmin deśe labhyate bālatvād dūradeśagamanam aśakyam tadā 'brāhmaṇāt kṣatriyāt tadabhāve vaiśyād adhyayanam 
prakṛtatvāt vedaḥ kṛtsnaḥ iti vedagrahaṇaṃ vidhīyate 
yady apy atrābrāhmaṇaśabdo brāhmaṇajāter anyatra jātitraye vartamānaṃ puruṣatvam ācaṣṭe tathāpi neha śūdrasya grahaṇam tasyādhyāpanādhikārābhāvāt 
saty adhyayane 'dhyāpakatvam 
atha śāstrātikrameṇa śūdrasyāpy adhitavedatvasya saṃbhavaḥ kṣatriyavaiśayayor adhyāpakatvasyeva 
tad api na 
yato dhāraṇe śarīrabhedas tasyāmnātaḥ 
tato daṇḍamahatvān mahad etad akāryam anumīyate 
ninditakarmābhyāse patanaṃ tatsaṃsargāc ca brahmacāriṇo 'tyantaduṣṭatā syāt 
kṣatriyavaiśayor adhyāpakatvaniṣedhāt niṣedhāt tulyadoṣaḥ iti ced asty atra viśeṣaḥ 
yatra daṇḍaprāyaścitte guruṇī tatra mahādoṣatā svapayos tu svalpadoṣatā 
na ca kṣatriyavaiśyayor adhyāpane mahatī daṇḍaprāyaścitte śūdraseva 
kiṃ ca dve nindite karmaṇy adhyayanam adhyāpanaṃ ca kṣatriyavaiśyayos tv ekam eva 
niṣiddhādhyāpanasaṃsargas tv anenaivānujñātaḥ nāsau doṣakaraḥ 
niṣiddhādhyayanena tu śūdreṇa saṃsarge na kiṃcit praṃāṇam asti 
anuvrajyā ca śuśrūṣā 
vandanapādaprakṣālanādiśuśrūṣāpratiṣedhārtham anuvrajyaiva śuśrūṣā nānyeti 
yāvad adhyayanaṃ yāvad grahaṇam 
nābrāhmaṇe gurau śiṣyo vāsam ātyantikaṃ vaset 
brāhmaṇe vānanūcāne kāṅkṣan gatim anuttamām 
abrāhmaṇe gurau vāso 'dhyayanāya pūrveṇokto naiṣṭhikasyāpi prāpto viśeṣeṇa niṣidhyate 
ātyantikaṃ vāsaṃ yāvajjīvikam 
na vasen na kuryāt 
vāsaṃ vased iti 
sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvād vāsaṃ vased iti saṃbandhaḥ kalpyaḥ 
guruviṣayo vāsas taṃ vaset 
samāptādhyayano 'nyatra gacchet 
nanu cādhyayanamātram anujñātam ātyantikasya vāsasya kutaḥ prāptiḥ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
gurau tasya vāsa uktaḥ adhyāpayitā ca gurur uktaḥ 
ato bhavaty āśaṅkā 
brāhmaṇe vānanūcāne 
vāśabdo 'py arthaḥ 
brāhmaṇo 'pi ady anūcāno vṛttābhijanasaṃpanno na bhavati na ca vyākhyānādhyayanaśīlḥ 
anuvacanenaite 'pi guṇā lakṣyante yato 'nanuvaktaryarhābhāvād evāvāsaḥ siddhaḥ 
gatir atra sukhātiśayaprāptir vivakṣitā 
anuttamā yasyā anyottamā nāsti tāṃ kāṅkṣan paramātmānandarūpaṃ mokṣam 
yadi tv ātyantikaṃ vāsaṃ rocayet guroḥ kule 
yuktaḥ paricared enam ā śarīravimokṣaṇāt 
atyantaṃ bhavam ātyantikaṃ vāsaṃ guroḥ kule naiṣṭhikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yadi rocayet tadā yuktas tatparaḥ paricared enaṃ gurum ā śrīrasya vimokṣaṇāt pātād yāvaccharīraṃ dhriyata ity arthaḥ 
ā samāpteḥ śarīrasya yas tu śuśrūṣate gurum 
sa gacchaty añjasā vipro brahmaṇaḥ sadma śāśvatam 
naiṣṭhikabrahmacaryasya phalavidhir ayam 
śarīrasya samāptir jīvitatyāgaḥ 
ā tataḥ kālād yo guruṃ śuśrūṣate paricarati 
sa gacchati vipro brahmaṇaḥ sadma sadanaṃ sthānaṃ śāśvatam na punaḥ saṃsāraṃ pratipadyata iti yāvat 
añjasā akliṣṭena mārgeṇa 
na gatyantareṇa tiryaktvena manuṣyādijanmanā vyavadhīyate 
brahmaśabdena cetihāsadarśane devaviśeṣaś caturvaktraḥ tasya sadma sthānaviśeṣaḥ divi vidyate 
vedāntavādināṃ tu brahma paramātmā tasya sadma svarūpam eva tadbhāvāpattiḥ 
na pūrvaṃ gurave kiṃcid upakurvīta dharmavit 
snāsyaṃs tu guruṇājñaptaḥ śaktyā gurvartham āharet 
naiṣṭhikasyāyaṃ gurave 'rthadānaṃ pratiṣidhyate snāsyato gurvarthavidhānāt 
na ca naiṣṭhikasya snānam asti 
prakṛtaś ca naiṣṭhika eva 
upakurvāṇasya tu upanayanāt prabhṛti yāvat snānam asty eva sati saṃbhave yathāśaktyā dānam 
pūrvaṃ snānād gurave kiṃcid upakurvīta dadyāt dadātyarthe dhātuḥ sopasargo 'taś ca svasādhyā caturthī 
atha vā kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam iti tataḥ saṃpradānatvam 
dharmavitpadam anuvādaḥ 
snāsyaṃs tu snānakāle prāpte guruṇā ādīṣṭam amum artham āhara iti 
tataḥ śaktyā yāvantaṃ śaknoti tāvantam 
gurvartham 
guror idaṃ gurvartham 
guror yena prayojanaṃ tam āhared upanayet 
nanu ayaṃ naiṣṭhikasya gurvarthakaraṇapratiṣedhaḥ 
na hy ete dve vākye ekena pratiṣedhaḥ apareṇa gurvarthavidhiḥ 
snāne gurvartho 'vaśyaṃ kartavyam ity ayaṃ vidhiḥ 
pratiṣedhas taccheṣaḥ 
upakārapratiṣedhe ca sarvaśuśrūṣāvidhir anarthakaḥ syāt 
na ca dānam evopakāraḥ yena dhanopakāra eva niṣidhyeta nānyaḥ priyahitādiḥ 
arthavādatve tv ayathārthatā na doṣaḥ 
gamyate cātraikavākyatā 
kṣetraṃ hiraṇyaṃ gām asvaṃ chatropahaham antataḥ 
dhānyaṃ vāsāṃsi śākaṃ vā gurave prītim āharan 
uktam uddiṣṭaṃ gurvarthaṃ kuryāt tatra na sarvaṃ kartavyam ity evamartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
yadi gurur viruddham ādiśet amuṣyastriyam āhara iti sarvasvaṃ vā dehi iti tan na kartavam 
kiṃ tarhi kṣetram dhānyānāṃ bhavanabhūmiḥ kṣetram ucyate 
hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇam 
vāśabdo vikalpārthaḥ 
na samuditāni deyāni 
antataḥ anyābhāve chatropanaham api 
dvandvanirdeśāt sāhityadānam 
vāsāṃsīti sarvatra saṃkhyā na vivakṣitā 
prītim āharann iti etad āhared iti pūrvasaṃbandhaḥ 
prītam āhared iti vā pāṭhe atraiva kriyāparisamāptiḥ 
prītim āvahed iti vā 
prītim utpādayituṃ dhānyādy āharet 
svatantraiva vā prītir āhāryatayocyate 
tataś ca dravyopadeśasya pradarśanārthatā siddhā bhavati 
anyad api yad evaṃvidhaṃ prītijanakaṃ maṇimuktāpravālahastyaśvagantrīrathādi tad api deyam iti gamyate 
tathā ca gautamaḥ vidyānte gurur arthena nimantryaḥ 
āhared yadi syād ātmīyaṃ śaktyāgataṃ tadā na ced yācñādinārjayet 
ācārye tu khalu prete guruputre guṇānvite 
gurudāre sapiṇḍe vā guruvad vṛttim ācaret 
naiṣṭhikasyāyam upadeśaḥ 
asaty ācārye tatputre śrotriyatvādiguṇayukte gurupatnyām ācāryāṇyāṃ vā sapiṇḍe vā guror eva vaset 
tatra ca guruvad vṛttim ācared bhaikṣanivedanādi sarvaṃ kuryāt 
dāraśabdo bahuvacanānto bhāryāvacano vaiyākaraṇaiḥ smaryate 
smṛtikārās tv ekavacanāntam api prayuñjate dharmaprajāsaṃpanne dāre nānyāṃ kurvīta iti 
etṣv avidyamāneṣu sthānāsanavihāravān 
prayuñjāno 'gniśuśrūṣāṃ sādhayed deham ātmanaḥ 
avidyamānatā sarveṣām abhāvaḥ yadi vā guṇahīnatā 
eteṣv asatsv agniśuśrūṣāṃ prayuñjīta agniśaraṇopalepanam agnīndhanam ācāryavat saṃnidhānaniyamād bhṛtyavad ahorātrāsanam eṣāgneḥ śuśrūṣā tāṃ kurvan dehaṃ sādhayet śarīraṃ kṣapayet 
yathāndhaś cakṣuṣmān ucyate evaṃ sādhayed iti 
sthānāsana eva vihāraḥ tadvān na kadācid āsīta evaṃ viharet 
anye tu manyante sthānāya svastikādinā yad āsanaṃ dhyānakāle tat sthānāsanam vihāro 'nyo bhikṣācaraṇādiḥ
