evaṃ carati yo vipro brahmacaryam aviplutaḥ 
sa gacchaty uttamasthānaṃ na ceha jāyate punaḥ 
evam iti naiṣṭhikavṛttiṃ pratyavamṛśati 
evaṃ yo brahmacaryaṃ caraty aviplutaḥ askhalaḥ sa prāpnoty uttamasthānaṃ dhāma paramātmaprāptilakṣaṇam 
na ceha punar jāyate na saṃsāram āpadyate 
brahmarūpaṃ saṃpadyata iti 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ
dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
iti śrībhaṭṭamedhātithiviracite manubhāṣye
dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
atha tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśadābdikaṃ caryaṃ gurau traivedikaṃ vratam 
tadardhikaṃ pādikaṃ vā grahaṇāntikam eva vā 
dvividho brahmacārī pūrvatra pratipāditaḥ naiṣṭhika upakurvāṇaś ceti 
ā samāpteḥ śarīrasya yas tu śuśrūṣate gurum ity anena naiṣṭhikabrahmacaryam uktam 
ā samāvartanāt iti pakṣāntaram api sūcitam 
tatra naiṣṭikasya nāmadheyasya pratilambhenaiva nimittavatā avadhiśeṣaḥ sugamitaḥ 
niṣṭhām samāptiṃ gacchati naiṣṭhikaḥ 
śrutyaiva kālo vihitaḥ ā samāpteḥ iti 
upakurvāṇasya
anena kramayogena 
tapoviśeṣair vividhair vrataiś ca vidhicoditaiḥ 
vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ 
iti saṃkhyāyā avivakṣāyā caikadvitricatuḥpañcaṣaṭsaptādiśākhādhyayanaṃ yathāśakti prāptaṃ niyamyate 
traivedikaṃ vrataṃ caryam 
trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ samāhāras trivedī tadgrahaṇaprayojanaṃ traivedikam 
grahaṇakriyā vṛttāv antarbhavati vedādhigamasya prāgvihitatvāt 
vrataṃ brahmacāridharmakalāpaḥ 
caryaṃ caritavyam 
kṛtyo vidhau 
evam āharaṇādīnāṃ grahaṇāntatāyāṃ prāptāyām āha ṣaṭtriṃśadābdikam iti 
gṛhīte 'pi vede kālaḥ pūrayitavyaḥ 
yadi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyartho dharmaḥ tasya ca svādhyāyavidher grahaṇe nivṛttiḥ kimarthā tarhi dvādaśavārṣikī grahaṇottarakālaṃ vratacaryānuvṛttiḥ 
atyalpam idam ucyate 
darśapūrṇamāsādiṣv apy āgneyādiyāgebhyaḥ parāñci yāny aṅgāni tatrāpy etad vaktavyam 
samastāṅgānuṣṭhāna evārād upakārakādyaṅgayuktād viśiṣṭakramakād vidhyarthasaṃpady avagatāyāṃ paricodanāśabdād eva vidhiḥ saṃpadyate 
atha mahato ladhīyāṃsas tadardhikapādikagrahaṇāvadhayaḥ pakṣāḥ santi 
teṣu satsu kaḥ khalu mahāprayāsam aticirakālaṃ tāvad dvādaśavārṣikaṃ vracaraṇam ādriyeteti cet
phalabhūmārthino 'ṅgabhūyastvam anuṣṭhāsyanti 
tad uktaṃ prayatnaviśeṣāt phalaviśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam iti 
nanu ca nārthāvabodhād ṛte grahaṇadvāreṇa svādhyāyādhyayanasya kiṃcid aparaṃ phalam asti 
evaṃ hy āhuḥ na tasyādhyayanamātraṃ tatrabhavanto yājñikāḥ phalaṃ samāmanantīti 
tathā dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanaṃ nāma iti śabarabhāṣye 
tasya na ca kaścid viśeṣo dṛśyate 
yady evaṃ grahaṇakāle 'py antareṇa vratadharmānuṣṭhānaṃ grahaṇānuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ 
kaś caivam āha arthāvabodhārthaḥ svādhyāyavidhir iti 
svādhyāyavidhiḥ svārtha eva 
nānyasyānyārthatāyāṃ pramāṇam asti 
arthāvabodho hi grahaṇe sati vastusvabhāvata utpadyate na vidhitaḥ 
atha kiṃ svargādiphalārthino 'yaṃ vidhiḥ 
etad api kathaṃ bhaviṣyati 
kā tarhīyaṃ vāco yuktiḥ phalaviśeṣeṇa iti 
eṣā vāco yuktiḥ 
saṃskāravidhis tāvad ayaṃ svādhyāyapradhānaḥ tasya svādhyāye karmaṇy utpannatvāt 
saṃskāravidhayaś ca na sākṣād adhikāram arhanti kiṃ tu saṃskāryadvāreṇa sādhikāravidhyantaram anupraviśanti 
yathā vrīhim avahanti iti darśapūrṇamāsādhikāraviṣayāgneyādiyāgasādhanabhūtapuroḍāśaprabhṛtivrīhituṣakaṇavipramocanādisaṃskāradvāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsāpūrvasaṃbandham anubhavati avaghātaḥ na tannirapekṣaḥ sa eva kartavyatayā pratīyate 
evam hi vedasya saṃskāryatvaṃ nānyatrāśeṣabhūtasya nirvahati 
dṛṣṭaḥ svādhyāyādhyayanānantram arthāvabodhaḥ 
ata idam adhyayanam arthāvabodhaparyantam avaghāta iva taṇḍulaniṣpattiparyantaḥ 
etāvāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ 
prakaraṇe 'dhītatvād avaghāto jhaṭ iti labdhādhikāravidhyantarasaṃbandhaḥ 
ayaṃ tv anārabhyādhītatvād avabodhaparyavasāyī sakalaphalakarmānuṣṭhānopayogitayā gamyamāno 'dhikāraḥ 
tathā vidhyarthanivṛttir eva phalaviśeṣo 'bhipretaḥ 
vidher hi puruṣārthatvaṃ vyutpannāvagamam tat sākṣād bhavatu vā paraṃparayā veti na viśeṣaḥ 
gamyamānādhikāratvāc ca svatantra evāyaṃ vidhiḥ svātmānam anuṣṭhāpayati yady api nityakāmaśrutiṣv arthāvabodha upayujyate 
ye tv arthāvabodhadvāreṇa jyotiṣṭomādividhyekakāryatvam icchanti tatphalasyaiva ca prayatnaviśeṣād atiśayam āhus teṣām ācāryakaraṇavidhinā kim aparāddham yena mahatā yatnena tadekakāryatā niṣidhyate 
aprāmāṇyaṃ vedasya bhavatīti cet astu 
na prayojanavaśena yuktisāmarthyāyāto 'rtho hātuṃ śakyate 
yuktis tu yuktyantareṇa balīyasā bādhyate 
ācāryakaraṇavidhyekakāryatve tv asya vidhirūpataiva hīyate svārthasyāvivakṣitatvāt 
tattulyaṃ jyotiṣṭomādyanupraveśe 'pi 
yadā tu svatantro 'yaṃ vidhiḥ svārthānuṣṭhāpakas tatsamānaskandhas tadā svayam evetikartavyatayā yukto 'nuṣṭhīyate 
tatra ye vikalpitāḥ kalpā laghīsāṃso garīyāṃsaś ca teṣāṃ laghiyasā siddhe garīyasām anuṣṭhānaṃ vidhyartha eva viśeṣam āvahati 
yathādhāne ekā deyā tisro deyā dvādaśa deyāḥ ityādi 
anuṣṭhite cāsmin vidhau svasāmarthyāc chruto vā bhavatu pratīyamāno vā kalpo vā pramāṇabhedo 'yaṃ na saṃbandhabheda sarvathobhyataḥ sparśato na mucyāmahe yady asya vidhiḥ svārthānuṣṭhāpako jyotiṣṭomādyupakārakatvaṃ ca 
nanu kim idaṃ pūrvāparaviruddhaṃ pralapyate 
prāguktam na sākṣāt saṃskāravidhayo 'dhikārasaṃbandhinaḥ idānīṃ tu svatantra evāyaṃ vidhiḥ svārthānuṣṭhāpaka iti 
yathāyaṃ viśeṣaśrutenānvayinā na saṃbadhyate gamyamānas tv adhikāraḥ saṃskāravidhīnām apy aviruddha iti 
nāyaṃ viśeṣo yady asya vidhiprayuktam anuṣṭhānam arthāvabodhāṃśa iṣyate 
pāṭhamātrasyācāryavidhiprayuktatvāt saṃskāravidhīnām adhikārasaṃbandho 'bhyupagataḥ syāt 
atha vidhyantaropakārakatvāt tatprayuktam anuṣṭhānam tathā saty adhikṛtasyādhyayanaṃ syān nādhītavedasyādhikāraḥ 
tadā ca śūdrasyādhikāro durnivāraḥ 
na cādhyayanānantaraṃ vedārthaśravaṇaṃ prāpnoti 
yadaiva hi yadṛcchayā kutaścid adhigataṃ bhavati jyotiṣṭomanāma karma vaidikaṃ svargaphalam iti tadaiva taditikartavyatāṃ śikṣet 
tatkāla eva ca tadupayogino mantrān yājamānān adhīyīta 
atra kecid āśrayinyāyena pariharanti 
yathaiva hi sviṣṭakṛdādaya ubhayarūpāḥ saṃskārārthakarmatayā evaṃ svādhyāyādhyayanam apy abhidhānaviniyogānusāritayā kriyāphalāvabodhadarśanena ca saṃskārakarma phalavat karmārthakarma 
ataḥ sādhikāratvasiddhiḥ 
kaḥ punar adhikārī 
upanītas traivarṇiko māṇavaka iti brūmaḥ 
brahmacāridharmeṣu hy etad āmnāyate 
liṅādayo hy avinābhūtaniyojyārthavidhyarthapratipādakāḥ 
tatra viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ kvacic chabdasamarpito viśeṣo bhavati svargakāmo yāvajjīvam agnihotraṃ juhoti 
kvacid śruto 'py anvitābhidhānasāmarthyabalena kalpyo viśvajidādiṣu 
kvacit prakaraṇād vastusāmarthyād vidhyantaraparyālocanayāpi ca pratīyate 
tad etad iha sarvam asti 
prakṛto brahmacārī 
vastusāmarthyena cārthāvabodha upajāyate 
sa ca sarvavidhiṣūpayujyate viduṣo 'dhikārāt 
tad idam apare na mṛśyanti 
saṃskāravidhitvenaivāsya pratīyamānādhikāratā 
yataḥ saṃskārakarmāṇi saṃskāryārthatayānuṣṭhīyante 
yadi ca saṃskārye na dṛśyeta viśeṣas tataḥ saktuvat saṃskārarūpatā hīyeta 
asti cātra phalavatkarmāvabodhalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ 
yat tu sviṣṭakṛdādivat iti tat prakṛtipratyayavijñānāgamyatvarūpahānitayā yuktobhayarūpatā 
tasmāt sthitaṃ svatantro 'yaṃ vidhir māṇavakasyeti 
ataś ca svata evānuṣṭheyo nāvaghātādivad darśapūrṇamāsādyadhikāraniyogākṣepeṇa 
evam anekavedādhyayanam api draṣṭavyam 
tatrāpi hy ekena vedena nirvṛtte vidhyarthe kim ity anekavedādhyayanam 
phalabūmnā tu yujyate 
phalaṃ ca pūrvavat na tu vākyaśeṣādhītaṃ payodadhyādi 
evām sthita ekavedādhyāyinaḥ svaśākhānadītānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmopayogināṃ karmānuṣṭānakāle sāmarthyāt tadākṣiptam adhyayanam anujñātaṃ bhavati 
yady apy adhītavedasyādhikāre adhīta iti 
anye tu brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇo dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgo vedo 'dhyeyaḥ iti niṣkāraṇa ity etasyādhikārapadatāṃ manyante 
niṣkāraṇaḥ kāraṇaṃ prayojanam anuddiśya nityakarmavat kartavyam na hy asyādhikārasamarpakatvam antareṇa viṣayadvāreṇa kriyākārakatadviśeṣaṇatvādinānvayaḥ saṃbhavati 
tasmāt saty api saṃskāravidhitve gamyamānādhikāratvaṃ śrūyamāṇādhikāratvaṃ vāviruddham 
apare tu saṃskāravidhitvād anadhikāratām eva jyāyasīṃ manyante 
anuṣṭhānaviśeṣalābhārtho hy adhikāra upāsyate 
sa ceha saṃskāryaviśeṣadarśanād eva siddhaḥ 
saṃskāravidhayaḥ prayojanāpekṣāḥ 
kriyāphalam evātra vidhisādhyam 
tac ca karmasthaṃ grahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyata evāviruddham 
aśrute vibhāge smṛtyantarād vibhāgāvagatiḥ prativedaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dvādaśābdāni iti 
ke punar atra trayo vedā abhipretāḥ 
ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmaveda iti 
atha kiṃ nātharvaṇo veda iti 
ka evam āha 
kiṃ tv atra yathāśrutaṃ saṃskāryatvanirbarhaṇāyām arthāvabodhaniṣṭhatayā tasya vidher anuṣṭhānalābhaḥ 
avabodho hi sakalakarmānuṣṭhānopayogīti 
ātharvaṇaś cābhicārādyupadeśabahulaḥ 
tasmān na jyotiṣṭomādikarmāṇi vidhīyante 
nāpi teṣāṃ kiṃcid āṅgam 
trayyaiva hautrādhvaryavaudgātrādisakalatadaṅgaparisamāptiḥ 
pradhānotpattividhayaś ca trayyām eva jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ santi 
brahmatvam api trayyām eva vidyate 
triśabdaś ca saṃkhyāvacanaḥ 
na ca saṃkhyāśabdāḥ kaṃcid dharmam ekam anapekṣya pravartante 
ato yeṣām eveha karyopadeśaparatā ta eva triśabdenābhigadituṃ śakyante 
na cātharvaṇasya tatkāryānupraveśaḥ 
na tatra pradhānavidhayo jyotiṣṭomādīnām nāṅgavidhayaḥ 
śyenādiṣv abhicārayajñeṣu ta evartvijaḥ saivānyāpītikartavyatā 
veśeṣo 'pi yaḥ so 'pi trayyām evopadiṣṭaḥ 
ata ṛgyajuṣām ṛksāmabhyāṃ caikatra karmaṇi samāveśābhāvāt trivedīvyapadeśānupapatter nātharvaṇasyeha grahaṇaṃ svādhyāyaśabdavācyatvāt tv adhyayanavidhes tadviṣayatvam aviruddham 
tadardhikam 
ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃkhyā pratyavamṛśyate 
tato 'rdham aṣṭādaśavarṣāṇi 
atrāpi vibhāgakalpanā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi 
atrāpi pādikam 
pādaś caturbhāgabhāginī saiva saṃkhyā 
nava varṣāṇi 
caturtho bhāgaḥ 
prativedaṃ trīṇi 
kathaṃ punas tribhir varṣair vedaḥ śakyo grahītum 
bhavati kaścin medhāvitamaḥ 
apara āha 
na grahaṇasvarūpaprayuktā dharmāḥ kiṃ tarhi tadviṣayeṇa vidhinā prayujyante 
tatrāpi nivṛtte grahaṇe yadi kānicid ahāni niyamānupālanam adhyayanakāle kriyate tāvat saṃpādyata eva śāstrārthaḥ 
bhavet svādhyāyavidhyarthaṃ tāvataivāṅgakalapānuṣṭhānam 
asamāptagrahaṇasya tadvratanivṛttau vratasnātakavyapadeśaḥ 
ataḥ kālaviśeṣavidhānaṃ yuktam 
tribhir varṣaiḥ vinā na vratasnātako bhavati 
tad yady api snānaṃ vedasamāptāu iti kecit smaranti tathāpi tadarthavratasamāptāv api prayoga upacārād ukta eva 
tad ayuktam 
saty api vidhiprayukte yāvadadhyayanabhāvitaiva vratānāṃ yuktā 
adhyayanasaṃyogena hi tāni codyante 
yāvadadhyayanaṃ bhavitum arhanti 
vacanād eva hi trisāṃvatsarī vratavaryā prāg api grahaṇād yady etat pṛthagvākyam 
atha tu grahaṇāntikam evety ekaṃ vākyam tato nāsty agṛhīte vede vratanivṛttiḥ 
evakāreṇaivam eva pakṣam anumanyante 
yadi nāsty agṛhīte vede tannivṛttiḥ kathaṃ tarhi vratasnātako vedasnātaka iti bhedena vyapadeśaḥ 
caturthe vakṣyāmaḥ 
ṣaṭtriṃśadabdāḥ samāhṛtāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadabdam tatra bhavaṃ ṣāṭtriṃśadābdikam 
evaṃ traivedikam 
tadardhaparimāṇaṃ tadardhikam 
evaṃ pādikaṃ grahaṇāntikam iti 
sarvatra ata iniṭhanau iti matvarthīyaḥ 
na tu yasya yatparimāṇaṃ tat tasyāstīti śakyate 'padeṣṭum 
vedān adhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam 
aviplutabrahmacaryo gṛhasthāśramam āvaset 
traivedikam adhyayanam uktam 
ekadvivedādhyayanam aprāptaṃ vikalpyate 
vedaśabdaḥ śākhāvacano vyākhyātaḥ 
tisraḥ śākhā adhīyīta dve ekāṃ vaikaikasmād vedān na tv ekasmād eva 
trayī trividyeti paṭhyate 
adhītya gṛhītvā vedam uktayā vratacaryayā 
gṛhasthāśramam āvaset 
gṛhasthāśramasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyati udvaheta dvijo bhāryām ityādi 
āvased anutiṣṭhet 
anekārthā dhātavaḥ 
āṅ maryādāyāṃ vartate 
kṛtadāraparigraho rūḍhyā gṛhastha ucyate 
gṛhaśabdo dāravacanas tatra tiṣṭhati 
tasya yo vihitaḥ padārthasamūho vidhiniṣedhātmakaḥ sa āśramaśabdenocyate 
yathopanītasya brahmacaryāśrama ā samāvartanāt kṛtavivāhasya gārhasthyam iti 
aviplutam akhaṇḍitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ strīsaṃprayoganivṛttir yasya sa evam ucyate 
vākyabhedaś cātra draṣṭavyaḥ 
ākhyātavyavahāreṇa āviplutabrahmacaryo bhaved gṛhasthāśramaṃ ca pratipadyate 
ekavākyatāyāṃ kadācana viplave gārhasthyādhikāra eva hīyeta 
adya punaḥ puruṣārthatayā vidhānena tadatikrame prāyaścittena yujyate na tv adhikārī na bhavati 
adhītyāvased iti ca paurvāparyamātraṃ vivakṣitam nādhyayanasamanantarabhāvitā vivāhasya lyapkāryāt paurvāparyavidhānād ānantaryaṃ na śabdārthaḥ 
ataś ca svādhyāyādhyayanavivāhayor antarāle vyākaraṇādiśāstraśravaṇaṃ vedārthajñānārthaṃ labhyate 
vidvān eva hi gārhasthye 'dhikriyate na yathādhyayanavidhau mūrkhaḥ 
yady api bālyāvasthāyāṃ tiryaksamānadharmā svam adhikāraṃ pratipattum asamarthas tathāpi pitrācāryeṇa vānuṣṭhāpyate 
vastutas tayor evādhikāraḥ 
apatyānuśāsane pitur adhikāro 'patyotpattividhes tāvatābhinirvartyatvāt 
anuśāsanaṃ ca vidhiniṣedhādhikāradvayapratipādanam 
tatra yat pratipādymāno 'pi nāvabudhyate tad andha iva hastagrāhikayā kāryate 
yathāgnisaṃsparśakūpādipātād gāḍhahastāvaṣṭambhādinā dhāryate evam adṛṣṭād api madyapānādeḥ 
yathā vānicchann auṣadhāpānādau pravartate evaṃ śāstrīyeṣv api padārtheṣu 
yadā tv īṣadvyutpannas tadaivaṃ niyujyeta idam idaṃ kartum arhasi iti 
evaṃ saty adhītavedo māṇavakaḥ pitrācāryeṇaivaivaṃ pratibodhyitavyo gṛhītavān asi vedaṃ tvam idānīṃ tadarthajijñāsāyām adhikriyase tatas tadaṅgāni śrotum arahasi iti 
etāvatā pitur apatyotpādanādhikāranivṛttiḥ 
tad uktaṃ kiyatā punar utpādito bhavati yāvatā svayam adhigatakṛtyo bhavati iti 
ataḥ sthitam etat nādhītyaiva vivāho yāvad vedārtho nādhigataḥ 
evaṃ ca padayojanā kartavyā 
adhītya adhyayane nivṛtte 'py aviplutabrahmacaryaḥ syāt 
prāptāyāṃ ca nivṛttau punarvacanaṃ niyamāntarāṇāṃ madhumāṃsavarjanādīnāṃ nivṛttiparam 
tena yāvad adhyayanaṃ tāvat sarve niyamā anuṣṭhātavyāḥ 
samāpte tv adhyayane 'rthāvabodhkāle strīnivṛttir eva karaṇīyā strīsevā na vidhātavyā 
brahmacaryaśabdo yady api brahmagrahaṇārthaṃ yadvratagrahaṇaṃ tatra vyutpādyate tathāpi strīnivṛttipara evāsya tatra prayoga iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
yathākramam 
ya evādhyetṝṇāṃ pāṭhakramaḥ prasiddhas tenaiva prathamaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭis tato brāhmaṇaṃ pitṛpitāmahādyabhijanaprabandhopakramaṃ bhavati 
na hīdṛśe 'rthe vaktāro na kulena na śīlena na krameṇeti 
etena caitat pratipāditaṃ bhavati yā eva pitrādibhiḥ śākhādhītā sā na tyājyeti 
taṃ pratītaṃ svadharmeṇa brahmadāyaharaṃ pituḥ 
sragviṇaṃ talpa āsīnam arhayet prathamaṃ gavā 
taṃ brahmadāyaharaṃ prathamaṃ gavārhayet 
brahma ca dāyaś ca te ubhe harati svīkarotīti brahmadāyaharaḥ 
dīyata iti dāyo dhanaṃ brahma vedo haraṇaṃ adhigamaḥ 
gṛhītavedaḥ pitrā kṛtavibhāgo gārhasthyaṃ pratipadyate nirdhanasyānadhikārāt 
yadi tu pitā nirdhanas tadā sāṃtānikatayā dhanam arjayitvā vivāhayet 
anye tu brahmaiva dāyo brahmadāya iti pūrvokavidhyanuvādaṃ manyante pitur iti 
nanu cācāryasya māṇavakādhyāpane 'dhikāra uktaḥ kim idam ucyate pitur brahmadāyaharam iti 
ucyate 
yasya pitā vidyate tasya sa evācāryaḥ 
abhāve pitur aśaktau vānyasyādhikāraḥ 
ācāryāntaropādānena pitur adhikāro nivartata eva 
svayaṃ vādhyāpayatv anyopādānena veti na viśeṣaḥ 
yad apy āhuḥ varo dakṣiṇety upanayane nityavad dakṣiṇāmnānāt parakartṛkatvam eveti 
tad asat 
upanayane hy ayaṃ vidhiḥ varo dakṣiṇā iti 
upanetā ca pitā vācāryo vā tau dvāv api svādhikārapravṛttau nānatyantaram apekṣete 
ānamanārthaṃ hi dakṣiṇādānam 
na cādhikārāntarataḥ pravṛttasyānatir upayujyate 
tenāyaṃ dakṣiṇāśabda ānamanārthābhāvād arthād dhiraṇyadānavad adṛṣṭārthadānopalakṣaṇārtho vijñeyaḥ 
pitraiva cāsau tāvatā dhanena svāmī kartavyo yena varadānam asya saṃpadyate 
athāyam āgrahaḥ nānatyarthād dānād ṛte dakṣiṇāśabdasyopapattiḥ 
na vā mukhye sati lakṣaṇā nyāyeti 
evaṃ tarhi yasya pitā na tatsthānīyo nācāryaḥ sa yadātmānam upanayet satyakāmavat tadviṣayo dakṣiṇāvidhir bhaviṣyati 
tasyāpi ceṣadapetaśaiśavasyātmasaṃskārāyāstyevādhikāra iti pratipāditam 
tasmād ubhayathā pitur adhikāraḥ svayam upanayamānasyānyam ācāryam upādadānasya vā 
pratītam abhimukhībhūtaṃ gṛhāśramapratipattau 
na tu naiṣṭhikam samāptādhyayanavidhyartham api grāmapratipattau 
sragviṇam 
yāvantaḥ kecana gṛhyakārair madhuparkakarmaṇi dharmā āmnātās teṣāṃ pradarśanārtham etat 
talpa āsīnaṃ mahārhaparyaṅkaśayanopaviṣṭam 
pūjādhikārārhaṃ śayānam 
gavā madhuparkeṇa 
madhuparke 'sau vidhiḥ pākṣika āmnātaḥ 
ato gośabdena tatsādhanakarmaviśeṣo lakṣyate 
arhayet pūjayet 
adhikārāt pitācāryo vā 
prathamaṃ pūrvaṃ vivāhāt 
pratītaṃ svadharmeṇety anuvādaḥ 
svadharmeṇa brahmadāyaharam svadharmeṇa cārhayed iti saṃbandhe na viśeṣaḥ 
guruṇānumataḥ snātvā samāvṛtto yathāvidhi 
udvaheta dvijo bhāryāṃ savarṇāṃ lakṣaṇānvitām 
satyām api vedavratasamāptau guruṇānumataḥ abhyanujñātaḥ snāyāt 
snānaśabdena gṛhyoktasaṃskāraviśeṣo lakṣyate brahmacāridharmāvadhiḥ 
yathā cātra lakṣaṇā tathā prāg vyākhyātam 
tad ahar eva gṛhyakāroktaṃ kaṃcin madhuparkapūjāvihitasaṃskāraṃ prāpya samāvṛtto gurukulāt pitṛgṛhaṃ pratyāgata ity anuvādaḥ 
udvahetety etadvidhiśeṣam etat sarvaṃ prāptam eva na tu samāvartanaṃ vivāhāṅgam 
tena yaḥ pitṛgṛha evādhītavedas tasya samāvṛttyasaṃbhave 'pi bhavaty eva vivāhaḥ 
kecit samāvartanaṃ vivāhāṅgaṃ snānaṃ manyante 
ktvāśrutyā bhedapratipattir iti ced evaṃ tarhi samāvartanaṃ vivāhāṅgaṃ snānasaṃskāraṃ vakṣyati 
saviśeṣaṃ hi tatra snānam āmnātam eva snātakena ityādi 
atha vā yamaniyamatyāgābhiprāyaṃ samāvṛttivacanam 
samāvṛttaḥ prāktanīm evāvasthāṃ niyamarahitāṃ pratipanna ity arthaḥ 
viśeṣābhiprāyaṃ ca niyamtyāgavacanam 
brahmacāriṇo hi sātiśayā yamaniyamā na tathottareṣām 
yathāvidhīti svadharmenetivat 
udvaheta dvijo bhāryām 
udvaheteti vivāhavidhiḥ 
saṃskārakarma vivāhaḥ bhāryām iti dvitīyānirdeśāt 
na ca prāgvivāhād bhāryā siddhāsti yasyā vivāhasaṃskāraḥ kriyeta cakṣuṣa ivāñjanasaṃskāraḥ 
kiṃ tarhi nirvartyate vivāhena 
yathā yūpaṃ chinattīti chedanādayaḥ saṃskārā yasya kriyante sa yūpaḥ evaṃ vivāhenaiva bhāryā bhavatīti 
vivāhaśabdena pāṇigrahaṇam ucyate 
tac cātra pradhānam 
evaṃ hi smaranti vivāhanaṃ dārakarma pāṇigrahaṇam iti 
ihāpi vakṣyati pāṇigrahaṇasaṃskāraḥ iti lājahomādyaṅgam 
tac ca gṛhyād akhilaṃ jñātavyam 
nodvahet kapilāṃ kanyām iti kanyāgrahaṇāt kanyāyā ayaṃ saṃskāro na strīmātrasya 
kanyāśabdaś cātra prakaraṇe 'pravṛttapuṃsaṃprayogāyāṃ yoṣiti vartata iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
svarṇāṃ samānajātīyām 
lakṣāṇānvitām 
lakṣaṇāni avaidhavyaprajādhanasūcakāni varṇarekhātilakādicihnāni jyotiḥśāstrāvagamyāni tair anvitāṃ yuktām śubhalakṣaṇānvitām ity arthaḥ 
yady apy aniṣṭasūcakam api lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati kiṃ tu sūcakair eva śāstrais tādṛśīṃ vivāhayet ataḥ praśastalakṣaṇā lakṣaṇavatī draṣṭavyā 
abhipretasūcaka eva lakṣaṇaśabdo loke prayujyate 
salakṣaṇo 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ salakṣaṇā strīti yā śubhalakṣaṇā saivam ucyate 
tatrādhikāracintā kartavyā 
saṃskāravidhitvād evādhānavad anuṣṭhānalābhāt yathaiva hy ādhānam āhavanīyādidvāreṇa nityakāmyakarmopayogi tadaṅgāhavanīyādinirvṛttyartham anuṣṭhīyate evaṃ vivāho 'pi asyāpi bhāryānirvartakatvena dṛṣṭādṛṣṭapuruṣārthopayogitvāt 
tathā hi khedāt puṃsaḥ strīmātraviṣayāyāṃ pravṛttau prasaktāyāṃ kanyāparadāraniṣedhāt svadāreṣu kāminaḥ khedanivṛttiḥ 
sahadharmaś caritavyaḥ iti tayā saha sarvadharmeṣv adhikārād adṛṣṭapuruṣārthasiddhis tadadhīnā 
atra kecin mīmāṃsante 
rāgiṇaḥ pūrvoktena prakāreṇa dṛṣṭasiddhyarthaṃ vivāhaṃ svataḥ kurvanti 
teṣāṃ ca kṛtavivāhānāṃ saṃbhavet sa dvijātikarmavidhitvena karmānuṣṭhānasiddhyartho vivāhaḥ 
yasya kathaṃcit strīniṣṭhā nivṛttā na tasya vivāhaḥ 
asati vivāhe karmānadhikārād anadhikṛtasya cānanuṣṭhāne doṣābhāvāt puruṣārthānuṣṭhānāny ananutiṣṭhato 'nāśramiṇo 'py avasthānam aviruddham 
tad etad asat 
yathaiva kāmaḥ puruṣārthas tathaiva dharmo 'pi puruṣārthatve prayojakaḥ 
sarvo 'pi puruṣārthasiddhyarthaṃ pravartate 
yadi caitad evaṃ syāt saṃvatsaram anāśramī būtvā ityādi nopapadyeteti 
nipuṇaṃ caitad āśramavikalpāvasare ṣaṣṭhe nirṇeṣyāmaḥ 
yādṛśī kanyā voḍhavyā tām idānīṃ darśayati 
asapiṇḍā ca yā mātur asagotrā ca yā pituḥ 
sā praśastā dvijātīnāṃ dārakarmāṇi maithune 
mātur yāsapiṇḍā pituś ca yāsagotrā sā dārakarmaṇi praśastā 
sapiṇḍagrahaṇaṃ mātṛbandhūpalakṣaṇārtham 
mātur hi sāpiṇḍyaṃ strīṇāṃ smṛtyantare tṛtīyapuruṣāvadhi 
na tu tribhya ūrdhvaṃ mātṛbandhubhyo vivāha iṣyate kiṃ tarhi pañcamād ūrdhvam 
evaṃ hi gautamaḥ paṭhati ūrdhvaṃ saptamāt pitṛbandhubhyo mātṛbandhubhyaḥ pañcamāt iti 
tena yathāśrutisamanvayābhāvāt sāpiṇḍyābhāvaḥ smṛtyantaravaśena mātṛsaṃbandhitayā vyākaraṇīyaḥ 
tenaivam uktaṃ syāt mātur anvayajā jāyā na bhavati 
avadhiś ca gautamīya eva 
tena mātāmahamātāmahayor 'nvaye jātā sā putrasaṃtater bāndhavasāmīpyāt pañcamīṃ yāvan na vivāhayitavyā 
ato mātṛṣvasṛtadduhitṝṇāṃ pramātāmahasaṃtatijānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ bandhutvāviśeṣāt 
asagotrā ca yā pituḥ 
gotraṃ vasiṣṭhabhṛgugargādivaṃśaḥ smaryate 
samānagotrā vasiṣṭhā na vasiṣṭhair vivahante na gargā gargaiḥ 
vāsiṣṭhe tu mātṛsagotrāyā api pratiṣedhaḥ
pariṇīya sagotrāṃ tu samānapravarāṃ tathā 
kṛtvā tasyāḥ samutsargaṃ dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret 
mātulasya sutāṃ caiva mātṛgotrāṃ tathaiva ca 
gautamena tu paṭhyate asamānapravarair vivāhaḥ iti 
tatra gotrasamatve saty api pravarabhedaś ced yujyate vivāhaḥ 
tad ayuktam yataḥ smṛtyantare hy ubhayaṃ niṣidhyate asamānārṣagotrajām iti 
ārṣaṃ pravara ity eko 'rthaḥ 
kathaṃ punar gotrabhede samānārṣeyatvam 
kim iti na bhavati yadi smaryate 
śrutismṛtipramāṇako 'yam artho na pratyakṣagocaro yena virodhaḥ syāt 
ke punar amī pravarā nāma 
atyalpam idam ucyate 
idam api vaktavyam kiṃ punar etad brāhmaṇatvaṃ nāma tathā katarad etad gotraṃ nāma 
yathaiva samāne puruṣatve brāhmaṇatvādiviśeṣaḥ evaṃ samāne brāhmaṇatve vasiṣṭhādigotrabhedaḥ pratigotraṃ ca samānārṣeyāṇi 
yasyaitad gotraṃ tasya taiḥ śabdaiḥ pravarāśrayaṇaṃ kartavyam 
evaṃ vivāhaniṣedhe 'pi 
smaranti ca sūtrakārāḥ gotrabhedasaṃbandhena pravarān yasyaitad gotraṃ tasyeme pravarāḥ iti 
gotrabhedas tu tadgotrajair eva 
smaryate vayaṃ parāśarā vayam upamanyavaḥ iti 
yady api gotravat pravarān api smaranti tathāpi bahutvāt kadācid vismareyur iti gotram upalakṣaṇīkṛtya pravarasmṛtir upanibaddhā 
gotraṃ tu smaranti 
na ca tasya kiṃcid upalakṣaṇam asti ya evaṃrūpas tasyedaṃ gotram iti 
etāvat tatra smaraṇam 
yāvadgotraṃ saṃtatisamānajātīyatvam 
eṣa ca gotrapravarabhedaḥ brāhmaṇānāṃ na rājanyaviṣām 
tathā hi kalpasūtrakāraḥ paurohityād rājanyavaiśayoḥ iti 
yady api gotraviśeṣavyapadeśe sati prāptapratiṣedhenāpi pravarādhikāre vacanam idam upapadyate kiṃ tu na teṣāṃ gotrasmaraṇam asti 
kas tarhi kṣatriyavaiśyayor vivāhe 'pi bandhūnām avadher niyamaḥ 
ucyate 
sarvavarṇaviṣayam etat ūrdhvaṃ saptamāt pitṛbandhubhyaḥ iti 
ihāpy asagotrā caśabdād asapiṇḍā 
tathā cānuvartyamānaḥ sapiṇḍaśabdaḥ pūrvavad bandhusaṃbandhopalakṣaṇārthaḥ 
tena pitṛṣvasur anvayastrīṇām anyāsāṃ ca prapitāmahasaṃtatistrīṇāṃ ā saptamāt puruṣāt pratiṣedhaḥ siddho bhavati 
saptamapuruṣāvadhayaḥ sapiṇḍāḥ smaryante 
anye tu gotraṃ vaṃśam āhuḥ 
na tatrāvadhyapekṣā 
yāvad etaj jñāyate vayam ekavaṃśā iti tāvad avivāhaḥ 
asminn api pakṣe asapiṇḍā cety anuvartate 
tena pūrvavat pitṛṣvasrādiduhitṝṇāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
asmiṃs tu pakṣe samānārṣagotrāṇāṃ pratiṣedho durlabhaḥ 
na hi tatraitad asti vayam ekavaṃśyā iti 
ucyate 
aitihāsikena taddarśanena samarthayante 
tatra hi varṇayanti 
ṛṣir vasiṣṭhādir ādyo vaṃśasya kartā tadgotrās tataḥ prasūtāḥ pravarāḥ iti tatputrapautrās tapovidyādyatiśayaguṇayogena prakhyātatamāḥ 
smṛtyantarād eṣa eva niyamaḥ 
idaṃ tv atra nirūpyaṃ yad etat samānapravarair iti tatra nāmadheyatas tāvat samānatvaṃ na saṃkhyātaḥ 
nāmadheyasamānatve ca kiṃ yatra sarvāṇy eva samānāni tatra pratiṣedha utaikasminn api samāne 
tatra yadi samuditānāṃ pravaratvam tatra samāne kasmiṃścid bhinne 'nyasminn anyaḥ samudāyaḥ saṃjāta ity asamānapravaratvāc ca pratiṣedhaḥ 
evaṃ copamanyūnāṃ parāśarāṇāṃ ca syād vivāhaḥ 
bhinnaṃ tayor gotram 
eka upamanyavaḥ apare parāśarāḥ pūrveṇa ca nyāyena pravarabhedaḥ 
upamanyūnāṃ vāsiṣṭhabhāradvājaikapād iti pravarāḥ 
parāśarāṇāṃ vāsiṣṭhagārgyapārāśaryeti 
athaikaikasya pravaratvam ekasminn api samāne pratiṣedhaḥ 
tad yathā māṣā na bhoktavyā miśrā api na bhujyante 
kiṃ punar atra yuktam 
ekaikasya pravaratvam 
tathā hi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛśyate 
ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte trīn vṛṇīta iti pratipanna ekaḥ 
tatsāmye 'py āhaiṣām avivāha iti 
dvijātigrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārtham 
śūdrasyāpi ā saptamāt pitṛtaḥ pañcamān mātṛta ity asti 
dārakaraṇaṃ dārakriyā dārakarma 
tatra praśastā praśaṃsayā vihitety arthaḥ 
maithunī 
mithune bhavā maithunī na maithunī amaithunī 
pitur iti saṃbadhyate pitṛbījād evotpannā jātamātrā 
niyogo vihitas tata utpannāyā nāsti pūrvoktaviśeṣaṇair niṣedhaḥ 
ataḥ pṛthaṅ niṣidhyate amaithunīti 
tato niyogotpannā kāmato na vivāhyā maithunītvāt 
anye tu amaithune iti paṭhanti 
dharmārthe dārakarmaṇi praśastā na maithune 
stutiś ceyaṃ na pratiṣedhaḥ 
īdṛśī yoḍhā sā saty api maithune dharmārthaiva bhavati 
mahānty api samṛddhāni go'jāvidhanadhānyataḥ 
strīsaṃbandhe daśaitāni kulāni parivarjayet 
vakṣyamāṇasya pratiṣedhasya nindārthavādo 'yam 
samṛddhiḥ saṃpattiḥ 
dhanaṃ vibhavaḥ 
mahānty api prakṛṣṭāny api 
dhanaviśeṣaṇārtham āha go'jāvidhanadhānyataḥ 
tṛtīyārthe tasiḥ 
go'jāvidhanena ca dhānyena ca 
dhanagrahaṇaṃ go'jādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇārtham 
dhanarūpā ye go'jādayaḥ 
kūṭasaṃpannatā hi dhānyaṃ 
strīsaṃbandho vivāhaḥ strīprāptyarthaṃ saṃbandhaḥ strīsaṃbandhaḥ 
hīnakriyaṃ niṣpuruṣaṃ niśchando romaśārśasam 
kṣayyāmayāvyapasmāriśvitrikuṣṭhikulāni ca 
hīnās tyaktāḥ kriyā yasmin kule jātakarmādayaḥ 
saṃskārā na kriyante nityāś ca pañcayajñādayaḥ 
niṣpuruṣaṃ strīprasu 
yatra prāyeṇa kanyā jāyante na pumāṃsaḥ 
niśchandaḥ vedādhyayanavarjitam 
romaśārśasam 
dvandvaikavadbhāvena kuladvayaṃ nirdiṣṭam 
bahudīrghair bāhvādiṣu lomabhir yutam 
arśāṃsi gudendriyagatāny adhimāṃsanibaddhāni tāni hi rogarūpatvāt pīḍākarāṇi 
kṣayo rājayakṣmāvyādhiḥ 
āmayāvī mandāgnir yasya bhuktam annaṃ samyaṅ na jīryati 
apasmāraḥ smṛtibhraṃśādyupaghātakṛt 
śvitraṃ śarīragatā cchedavatī śvetatā 
kuṣṭhaṃ prasiddham 
sarva ete vyādhiviśeṣavacanāḥ śabdā romaśād ārabhya matvarthīyapratyayāntā nirdiṣṭāḥ 
pūrvair vyākhyātṛbhir dṛṣṭamūlatāsya pratiṣedhasya varṇitā 
mātuḥ kulaṃ dvipado 'nuharanti 
tato hīnakriyādīnāṃ yā prajā sāpi tacchīlā syāt 
vyādhayaś ca saṃkrāmanti 
evaṃ hi vaidyake paṭhyate sarve saṃkrāmiṇo rogā varjayitvā pravāhikām 
nodvahet kapilāṃ kanyāṃ nādhikāṅgīṃ na rogiṇīm 
nālomikāṃ nātilomāṃ na vācālāṃ na piṅgalām 
pūrvaḥ kulāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
ayaṃ tu svarūpāśrayaḥ 
yasyā kadruvarṇāḥ kanakavarṇā vā keśāḥ sā kapilā 
adhikāṅgī ṣaḍaṅguliḥ 
rogiṇī bahurogā duṣpratikāravyādhigṛhītā ca 
bhūmnīniḥ matvarthīyo nityayoge vā 
alomikā akeśā 
lomāni keśā apy ucyante 
bāhumadhye jaṅghādvaye vā sarvalomnām abhāvaḥ 
vācālā svalpa eva vaktavye bahulaṃ paruṣaṃ ca bhāṣate 
piṅgalā akṣirogeṇa maṇḍalākṣī kapilapiṅgalākṣī vā 
narkṣavṛkṣanadīnāmnīṃ nāntyaparvatanāmikām 
na pakṣyahipreṣyanāmnīṃ na ca bhīṣaṇanāmikām 
ṛkṣaṃ nakṣatram tannāmikā ārdrā jyeṣṭhā ityādi 
vṛkṣanāmnīṃ śiṃśapā āmalakīti 
nadī gaṅgā yamunā tannāmnī 
ṛkṣāṇi ca vṛkṣāś ca nadyaś ceti dvandvaḥ tāsāṃ nāmānīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ 
tato dvitīyena nāmaśabdenottarapadalopī samāsaḥ 
antyanāmikā barbarīśabarītyādi 
parvatā vindhyamalayādayaḥ 
pūrvavat samāsātmakapratyayaḥ 
pakṣināmnī śukī sārikā 
ahiḥ sarpas tannāmnī vyālī bhujaṅgī 
preṣyā dāsī ceṭī daranī 
bibhiṣaṇaṃ nāma bhayajanakam ḍākinī rākṣasī 
avyaṅgāṅgīṃ saumyanāmnīṃ haṃsavāraṇagāminīm 
tanulomakeśadaśanāṃ mṛdvaṅgīm udvahet striyam 
avyaṅgāṅgīṃ 
avyaṅgāny aṅgāni yasyā saivam ucyate 
avyaṅgaśabdo 'vaikalyavacanaḥ pravīṇodārādiśabdavad yady api vyutpādyate 'vikalāny aṅgāni yasyeti ataś cāṅgaśabdasya dvitīyasyāvayavini śaktaucityena saṃsthānasya paripūrṇatā sāvyaṅgaśabdenocyate 
saumyaṃ madhuraṃ nāma 
strīṇāṃ sukhodyam atra darśitam 
haṃsa iva vāraṇa iva gacchati 
yādṛśī haṃsānāṃ hastināṃ ca vilāsavatī mantharā gatir yasyāḥ 
tanuśabdo nālpavacanaḥ kiṃ tarhy ānuparimāṇe vartate 
tanvaṅgī socyate yā nātisthūlā nātikṛśeti 
mṛdūni susparṣākaṭhināparuṣāṇy aṅgāni yasyāḥ sā 
tām udvahet striyaṃ kanyādhikārāt kanyām 
yady evaṃ nālomikām ityādipratiṣedho 'narthako 'smād eva vidhānāt yā naivaṃrūpā tasyā avivāhyatā siddhā 
satyam evam 
eka evārtho dvābhyāṃ vidhimukhena pratiṣedhamukhena codyamānas tu spaṣṭo budhyate 
kanyāśabdaś cātra prakaraṇād ananubhūtasaṃbhogāsu strīṣu pravartate 
tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ aspṛṣṭamaithunāṃ sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ vindeta iti 
na cānyena saṃskṛtānyena punaḥ saṃskartuṃ śakyā kṛtasya karaṇābhāvāt 
ataś coḍhāyā apravṛttabhartṛsaṃyogāyāḥ kathaṃcit svairiṇītve bhartṛpravāsādinā nānyena vivāho 'sti saty api kanyātve 
tathā cedṛśī vasiṣṭhoktir madhye paṭhitā 
anyatrāpy uktam ananyapūrvāṃ yavīyasīṃ bhrātṛmatīṃ striyam udvaheta iti 
yasyās tu na bhaved bhrātā na vijñāyeta vā pitā 
nopayaccheta tāṃ prāñjaḥ putrikādharmaśaṅkayā 
yasyā bhrātā nāsti tāṃ na vivahet 
putrikādharmaśaṅkayā putrikātvaśaṅkayā 
putrikādharmaḥ kadācid asyāḥ kṛto bhavet pitrety anayā śaṅkayā anena saṃdehena 
kathaṃ ceyaṃ śaṅkā bhavati 
yadi na vijñāyeta pitā deśāntare proṣito mṛto vā 
sā ca mātrā pitṛsapiṇḍair vā dīyate 
prāptakālā pitary asaṃnihita etair api dātavyeti smaryate 
smṛtiṃ cottaratra darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
pitari tu saṃvijñayamāne nāsti putrikātvaśaṅkā 
sa hi svayam evāha kṛtā vā na kṛtā vā iti 
vāśabdaś cec chabdārthe draṣṭavyaḥ 
yadi pitā na vijñāyeta tadā kanyakā na voḍhavyā 
anye tu svatantram etat pratiṣedhadvayam ācakṣate 
yadi pitā na vijñāyeta ananeyaṃ jāteti gūḍhotpannāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
evaṃ ca saṃbandhaḥ 
yasyā bhrātā nāsti tāṃ putrikātvaśaṅkayā nopayaccheta 
na vijñāyeta ity atra putrikāśaṅkayety etan na saṃbadhyate 
asmin prakaraṇe yatra nāsti dṛṣṭagataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā asapiṇḍā ca ity atra śloke tadatikrame vivāhasvarūpānirvṛttir eva 
ataḥ sagotrādivivāhaḥ kṛto 'py akṛta eva 
vidhyavagamarūpatvād ādhānavad vivāhasya vidhyatikramarūpād apagamāt 
yathādhānavidhau yat kiṃcid aṅgaṃ na jñātaṃ tadabhāve nāhavanīyādinivṛttiḥ evaṃ sagotrādikāyā na bhāryātvam 
tasmāt tyājyaiva kṛtatādṛśasaṃskārapratirūpikāpi 
tatrabhavanto vasiṣṭhādayaḥ prāyaścittam api smaranti tādṛśavivāhe 
yady api karmaṇa eva tadaṅgapratiṣedhātikrame vaiguṇyam na sākṣāt puruṣasya doṣaḥ tathāpi vācanikaṃ prāyaścittam 
atha vā sagotrāgamanaṃ niṣiddham 
tadarthe vyāpāre pravartamāne yad uktaṃ tat prāyaścittaṃ bhavet 
yas tu hīnakriyādipratiṣedhas tasya dṛṣṭadarśanamūlatvān nirvartate vivāhaḥ bhavaty asau bhāryā nāsti tasyās tyāgaḥ 
evamartha eva mahanty api iti pūrvasmāt pratiṣedhād bhedaḥ stavanārthaṃ paṭhitaḥ 
evam eva ca śiṣṭasamācāraḥ 
kadācit kapilādirūpāṃ upayacchati na sagotrām 
savarṇāgre dvijātīnāṃ praśastā dārakarmaṇi 
kāmatas tu pravṛttānām imāḥ syuḥ kramaś 'varāḥ 
udvaheta dvijo bhāryām iti saty api dvitīyānirdeśe bhāryāyāḥ pradhānatve guṇakarmatve ca vivāhasya vivakṣitam ekatvam anuvādagatoddeśyatvāt yathā yūpaṃ chinattīti 
yasyānyataḥ svarūpam avagataṃ tasyānyatra kāryāntaravidhānārtham anūdyamānasya yathāvagatasvarūpasyaivānuvādo bhavati yathā gṛhaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti pūrvāvagatisāpekṣatvād anuvādasya 
nirjñātasaṃkhyākā hi grahā daśa etān adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇāti ityādivākyaiḥ kāryaṃ cavagataṃ grahair juhotīti 
ato 'vagatyantarāpekṣatvād grahaśabdasya na vivakṣyate saṃkhyā 
iha tu bhāryālakṣaṇo 'rtho nānyataḥ siddho 'smād eva vākyād avagantavyo 'to yathāśruti pratīyate prātipadikārthavat saṃkhyāpi vivakṣiteti 
pañcame caitad vistaratas tarkeṇa vakṣyate 
sthitāyāṃ saṃkhyāvivakṣāyāṃ dvitīyasyāḥ kṛte 'pi pāṇigrahaṇe na bhāryātvam 
yathā saty āvahanīye na dvitīya āhavanīyaḥ 
iṣyate ca kvacin nimitte bhāryāntaraparigrahas tadartham idam ārabhyate 
etad evābhipretya gautamīye paṭhitam dharmaprajāsaṃpanne dāre nānyāṃ kurvīta anyatarāpāye tu kurvīta iti 
savarṇā samānajātīyā 
sā tāvad agre prathamato 'kṛtavijātīyadāraparigrahasya praśastā 
kṛte savarṇāvivāhe yadi tasyāṃ kathaṃcit prītir na bhavati atha vāpattyārtho vyāpāro na niṣpadyate tadā kāmahetukāyāṃ pravṛttāv imā vakṣyamāṇāḥ savarṇāvarāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ śāstrāt tu jñātavyāḥ 
ata ekatvasya savarṇāniyamasya cāyam apavādaḥ 
nanu ca savarṇāvivāhe pāratantryaṃ pratīyate 
na savarṇāyā bahutvaṃ 
ekatvasaṃkhyātikramas tāvat pratīyate 
asavarṇābhyanujñānenāpy atikrāntaṃ cet kaḥ savarṇāyā niṣedhakaḥ 
tathā gautamenāviśeṣeṇaiva paṭhitam anyatarāpāye tu kurvīta iti 
uttaraśloke sā ca svā ca iti savarṇāvivāho 'sti 
śūdraiva bhāryā śūdrasya sā ca svā ca viśaḥ smṛte 
te ca svā caiva rājñaś ca tāś ca svā cāgrajanmanaḥ 
varṇabhede sati savarṇāniyamaḥ 
yathaiva brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyādis trayo bhavanti evaṃ śūdrasya jātinyūnā rajakatakṣakādistriyaḥ prāptāḥ 
ataḥ savarṇeyam ucyate 
utkṛṣṭajātīyā tu pūrvatra kramagrahaṇād aprāptā 
sā ca śūdrā svā ca vaīśyā vaiśyasya 
te ca vaiśyāśudre svā ca rājanyasya 
evam agrajanmano brāhmaṇasya 
brāhmaṇakrameṇa nirdeśe kartavye śūdraprakrameṇa nirdeśaḥ pūrvoktam evārtham upodbalayati 
yad uktam vikalpa ānupūrvyeṇa nāvaśyaṃ samuccayaḥ 
na brāhmaṇakṣatriyayor āpady api hi tiṣṭhatoḥ 
kasmiṃścid api vṛttānte śūdrā bhāryopadiśyate 
yady apy atyantarūpavatī śūdrā viprarājanyau ca vīraprakṛtī daśamīm api daśām aśnuvīyātāṃ tathāpi śūdrāṃ nādhivoḍhārau 
atrārthavādaḥ 
kasmīmścid api vṛttānte na kvacid itihāsopākhyāne 'py upadiśyate varṇyate 
āpadi garīyasyām adhikāyām āpadi 
pūrvatrānujñātānena pratiṣiddhā ato vikalpaḥ 
nanu ca śāstralakṣaṇayor ekaviṣayasaṃnipāte ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavad vikalpo yukto na tu rāgalakṣaṇāyāḥ pravṛtter niṣedhena 
na ca śūdrā śāstralakṣaṇā 
kevalaṃ rāgatas tatra pravṛttir apratiṣiddheti pūrvaśāstrasyārthaḥ 
niṣedhas tu śāstralakṣaṇa ity avivāhyaiva śūdrā 
etad evābhipretya yājñavalkyena paṭhitam yad ucyate dvijātīnāṃ śūdrādāropasaṃgrahaḥ 
na tan mama matam iti 
atrocyate 
sarvatropadeśānarthakatayaiva vikalpa āśrīyate 
yadi cātyantam eva śūdrāpratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadā kṣatriyavaiśye eva pratiprasūyeyātām āpady abhyanujñāne 
pratiprasavaśāstram ayaṃ ca pratiṣedhaḥ dvayam api vyarthaṃ syāt savarṇāyā niyamena siddhatvāt 
tad idam anujñātaṃ pratiṣedhaś ca svaṃ svaṃ virudhyamāne vikalpyete 
nanu ca vikalpe kāmacāraḥ 
tasya ca pratiprasavata eva siddheḥ pratiṣedho vaktavyo naiva 
na yathākāmataḥ kṣatriyavaiśyayor vivāha evaṃ śūdrāyāḥ anyatrāpado garīyāḥ 
idaṃ tu pratipattuṃ yuktaṃ yat savarṇāniyamenāsavarṇānivṛtter arthataḥ kṛtāyāḥ punaḥ śūdrānivṛttir asavarṇānivṛtter anityatvaṃ jñāpayati 
anityatve cāpadi savarṇāyā alābhe vā bhavati cāyam avagamaḥ śūdrā na voḍhavyā itare tu voḍhavye 
hīnajātistriyaṃ mohād udvahanto dvijātayaḥ 
kulāny eva nayanty āśu sasaṃtānāni śūdratām 
pūrvasya pratiṣedhasya śeṣo 'yaṃ nindārthavādaḥ 
hīnajātiḥ śūdraiva tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt sasaṃtānāni śūdratām iti nigamanāt 
ta ete dvijātayaḥ mohād dhanalobhajād avivekāt kāmanimittatvād vā kulāni śūdratāṃ gamayanti 
tasyāṃ jātāḥ putrāḥ śūdrā bhavanty evaṃ tatputrapautrā iti 
atha ucyate sasaṃtānānīti 
saṃtāno 'patyotpattiprabandhaḥ putrapautrādiḥ 
śūdrāvedī pataty atrer utathyatanayasya ca 
śaunakasya sutotpattyā tadapatyatayā bhṛgoḥ 
śūdrāṃ vindati pariṇayati śūdrāvedī sa patati patita iva 
atrir utathyasya tanayaḥ putras tayor etan matam ity upaskaraḥ 
ayaṃ tāvad ardhaślokaḥ pūrvapratiṣedhaśeṣaḥ 
śaunakasya sutotpattyā 
śāstrāntaram idam 
abhyanujñāya śūdrāyām ṛtāv upagamanaṃ niṣedhati sutotpattir hy ṛtau yugmāsu rātriṣu bhavati 
ṛtau śūdrāṃ na gacched ity arthaḥ 
tadapatyatayā bhṛgoḥ 
idam api smṛtyantaram 
tāny eva śūdrotpannāny apatyāni yasya sa tadapatyaḥ tadbhāvas tadapatyatā 
bhṛgor etan matam 
ṛtāv apy upapannatarāsu jātāpatya upeyāt 
patitatvavacanaṃ cātra nindaiva na tv asya patitadharmatā patatsyodakam ityādi 
etac ca vakṣyāmaḥ 
śūdrāṃ śayanam āropya brāhmaṇo yāty adhogatim 
janayitvā sutaṃ tasyāṃ brāhmaṇyād eva hīyate 
arthavādo 'yam 
yadi putram utpādayati tasyāṃ tato brāhmaṇyād eva hīyate 
apatyasyābrāhmaṇatvam iti nindaiva 
sutam iti ca pulliṅganirdeśāt sutotpatter ity atra samānasaṃhitatve 'pi putrotpattir evābhipretā 
tathā ca darśitaṃ yugmā rātrayo varjyāḥ iti 
daivapitryātitheyāni tatpradhānāni yasya tu 
nāśnanti pitṛdevās tan na ca svargaṃ sa gacchati 
sārvakāliko 'yaṃ niṣedhaḥ 
yadi kathaṃcic chūdrāpi vyuhyate tadaitāni karmāṇi tatpradhānāni na kartavyāni 
na ca tayā saha traivarṇikastrīvad dharme 'dhikāo 'stīty arthaḥ 
bhāryātvād adhikāre prāpte niṣedho 'yam 
ataḥ svadharme dhanaṃ viniyuñjānasya na tadīyānujñopayujyate yathā dvijātistrīṇām 
anyatra tv arthakāmayoḥ sāpy anaticaraṇīyaiva 
preṣyāvat tatkarmopayogo na niṣidhyate śrāddhādāv avahananādikārye tatra na doṣaḥ syāt 
pariveṣaṇādi na kārayitavyā 
tatra daivaṃ karma darśapūrṇamāsādi devatoddeśena ca brāhmaṇabhojanam vratavat ity atra yathā vyākhyātam 
pitryaṃ śrāddhodakatarpaṇādi 
ātitheyam atither ārādhanaṃ bhojanapādyādi 
nanu ca sajātyā sthitayānyayā ity asty eva pratiṣedhaḥ 
naiva 
sthitayā iti tatra śrūyate 
ṛtumatyāṃ savarṇāyāṃ kathaṃcid vāsaṃnihitāyāṃ prāpnoti kṣatriyāvaiśyāvat 
api ca nāsāv adhikāre pratiṣeshaḥ kiṃ tarhi ājyāvekṣaṇādau 
patnyāvekṣitam ājyaṃ bhavatīty aṅgatvenopādīyate 
patnīty atra kratvartheṣu yathā kayācid upāttayā siddhir aniyamena prāptā 
yathā bahvīṣu savarṇāsu yayā kayācit savarṇayā kriyate evam asavarṇayāpi mā kārīty evamartho 'sau pratiṣedhaḥ 
prādhānyam adhikāritvāt 
nāśnanti pitṛdevās tam iti karmanaiṣphalyam āha 
na ca svargaṃ sa gacchati 
yady apy atithir aśnāti tatphalaṃ svargādi na bhavatīti 
svargagrahaṇam atithipūjāphalopalakṣaṇārtham anuvādaś ca dhanyaṃ yaśasyam ityādi 
vṛṣalīphenapītasya niḥśvāsopahatasya ca 
tasyāṃ caiva prasūtasya niṣkṛtir na vidhīyate 
arthavādo 'yam 
vṛṣalyāḥ pheno vṛṣalīpheno vaktrāsavaḥ sa pīto yena 
palāṇḍubhikṣitādivat paranipātaḥ 
pāṭhāntaram vṛṣalīpītaphenasya 
pītaḥ pheno yasyeti vigrahaḥ vṛṣalyā pītaphenaḥ 
tṛtīyā iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ 
pītaḥ pheno vāneneti vigrahe vṛṣalyā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ 
arthas tu sarvavṛttiṣv eka eva 
saṃprayujyamānayor adharaparicumbanādy avaśyaṃbhāvi tena ca sahacāriṇā dharmeṇa maithunasaṃbandho lakṣyate 
prakaraṇāc ca vivāhapratiṣedhaśeṣo 'yaṃ na pṛthagvākyam 
tattve hi cumbanādivarjaṃ niyogadharmo bahumataḥ syāt 
tasmād gacchañ chūdrāṃ cumbanādiparivarjanena na kiṃcic chāstrārtham anulaṅghate 
tasyāṃ caiva prasūtasya ṛtau tu gacchata ity arthaḥ 
niṣkṛtiḥ śuddhir nāsti iti nindātiśayo 'yam 
caturṇām api varṇānāṃ pretya ceha hitāhitān 
aṣṭāv imān samāsena strīvivāhān nibodhata 
vakṣyamāṇasya saṃkṣepopanyāsaḥ 
hitāś cāhitāś ca 
kecid dhitāḥ kecin na 
aṣṭāv iti saṃkhyānirdeśaḥ 
samāsaḥ saṃkṣepaḥ 
strīsaṃskārārthā vivāhāḥ strīvivāhāḥ 
kah punar evaṃ vivāho nāma 
upāyataḥ prāptāyā kanyāyā dārakaraṇārthaḥ saṃskāraḥ setikartavyatāṅgaḥ saptarṣidarśanaparyanto pāṇigrahaṇalakṣaṇaḥ 
brāhmao daivas tathaivārṣaḥ prājāpatyas tathāsuraḥ 
gāndharvo rākṣasaś caiva paiśācaś cāṣṭamo 'dhamaḥ 
saṃkhyayāṣṭav ity uddiṣṭānāṃ nāmadheyānīmāni 
adhamagrahaṇaṃ paiśācasya nindārtham 
yo yasya dharmyo varṇasya guṇadoṣau ca yasya yau 
tad vaḥ sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi prasave ca guṇāguṇān 
dharmād anapeto dharmyaḥ śāstravihita ity arthaḥ 
yasya ca vivāhasya yau guṇadoṣau iṣṭāniṣṭaphalahetutvād guṇadoṣau 
prasave 'patyajanmani 
guṇā guṇāh aguṇāḥ doṣāḥ 
voḍur eva svarganarakādilakṣaṇau guṇadoṣau tatprayojanam arthāt svargādikam 
yā īdṛśā eva bhavanti 
gatārtham api bhūyaḥ pratipattaye kathayanti 
ṣaḍ ānupūrvyā viprasya kṣatrasya caturo 'varān 
viṭśudrayos tu tān eva vidyād dharmyān arākṣasān 
ṣaḍ vivāhā brāhmaṇasyānupūrvyā 
ānupūrvī kramaḥ nāmoddeśaḥ kremeṇa 
kṣatrasya 
kṣatriyavacanaḥ kṣatraśabdaḥ 
tasya caturo 'varān uparitanān āsuragāndharvarākṣasapaiśācān vidyāt 
vaiśyaśūdrayos tān evārākṣasān rākṣasaṃ varjayitvā 
caturo brāhmaṇasyādyān praśastān kavayo viduḥ 
rākṣasaṃ kṣatriyasyaikam āsuraṃ vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ 
āsuragāndharvayor ayaṃ niṣedho brāhmaṇasya punar brāhmādividhānena 
evaṃ kṣatriyasya rākṣasam evaiko na gāndarvāsurau 
āsura eva vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ 
vihitapratiṣiddhānāṃ vikalpaḥ 
tataś ca nityavad vihitābhāve vikalpiteṣu pravṛttiḥ 
yasya ca yo vihitaḥ sa tadvivāhābhāvam anapekṣya prathamata eva yadi vihitapratiṣiddheṣu pravarteta tatra puruṣo duṣyed apatyaṃ cānabhipretam utpadyeteti śāstrakāreṇa darśitaṃ prasave ca guṇāguṇān ityādinā na tu sapiṇḍādipariṇayanavat vivāhasvarūpānivṛttiḥ 
pañcānāṃ tu trayo dharmyā dvāv adharmyau smṛtāv iha 
paiśācaś cāsuraś caiva na kartavyāu kadācana 
kṣatriyādiviṣayeyaṃ smṛtir na brāhmaṇaviṣayā rākṣase virodhāt 
na hi vadhabhedane brāhmaṇaḥ kartum arhati asyācaraṇasya kṣatriyādiviṣayatayopapatteḥ 
pañcānāṃ tu vivāhānāṃ prājāpatyāt prabhṛti trayo vivāhā dharmyāḥ 
dvau na kartavyau paiśācaś cāsuraś ca 
prājāpatyaḥ kṣatriyādīnām aprāpto 'pi vidhīyate rākṣaso 'pi vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ 
āsurapaiśācayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
idam atra vyavasthā 
brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍ vivāhāḥ 
tatra brāhmaḥ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhas tato nyūnau daivaprājāpatyau tābhyām apy ārṣas tato 'pi gāndharvas tato 'py āsuraḥ 
yeṣām ayaṃ śloko brāhmaṇaviṣayo 'pi teṣāṃ rākṣaso 'pi brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyavṛttāv avasthitasya bhavati 
vikarmasthasyāpi vadhabhedanābhyāṃ prāyaścittiyato na tu rākṣaso na vivāha iti te manyante 
tatra brāhmasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ phalenaiva darśitam 
niṣedhābhāvena cetareṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ nyūnatā phalāpacayavacanād eva 
āsurasya punar vaiśyaśūdrayor vidhānena parisaṃkhyā brāhmaṇakṣatriyayoḥ pratīyate 
ṣaḍ iti ca vidhānam 
ato vikalpaḥ 
sa ca vyavasthayā 
itarāsaṃbhavena tasyāśrayaṇaṃ tulyam 
vikalpo hi vrīhiyavad anekavivāhavidhānena ca samuccyāsaṃbhavād eva siddhaḥ 
sati vā saṃbhave kriyeta cet tathāpi dharmāpatyayor nyūnaphalo 'sau 
atha kṣatriyasya rākṣaso mukhyaś caturbhiḥ ślokair vikalpena vidhānāt 
catura ity anenāsuragāndharvapaiśācā api rākṣasaṃ kṣatriyasyaikam ity anena te pratiṣiddhaḥ 
ato vikalpitāḥ na mukhyāḥ 
prakṛtāpekṣatvāc ca rākṣasaikavidhiḥ 
prājāpatye nāsti parisaṃkhyānam 
ataḥ prājāpatyo 'pi kṣatriyasya rākṣasatulyaḥ 
evaṃ vaiśyaśūdrayor api prājāpatyo nityavad āmnāto na pratiṣiddhaḥ 
āsurapaiśācau tu tayor vihitapratiṣiddhau 
rākṣaso 'py arākṣasān ity anena pratiṣiddhaḥ trayo dharmyā ity anena vihitaḥ 
brāhmaṇasya paiśāco naivāsti kṣatriyādīnāṃ brāhmadaivārṣā iti sthitam 
pṛthak pṛthag vā miśrau vā vivāhau pūrvacoditau 
gāndharvo rākṣasaś caiva dharmyau kṣatrasya tau smṛtau 
pṛthak pṛthag ity anuvādaḥ pūrveṇaiva siddhatvāt 
miśrāv iti vidhīyate nirapekṣāṇām itareṣāṃ gāndharvarākṣasayor vihitatvāt 
vrīhiyavavad aprāpte miśraṇavacanam idam 
vrīhibhir yajeta yavair vety ekayāgaprayogaviṣayatvenetaretarānapekṣadravyavidhānād vikalpo na miśrībhāvaḥ 
miśrībhāve hi na vrīhiśāstrārtho 'nuṣṭhitaḥ syān na ca yavaśāstrārthaḥ 
evam ihaikasyāṃ kanyāyāṃ svīkartavyāyāṃ yugapad upāyadvayam aprāptaṃ vidhīyate 
tasya viṣayaḥ yadā pitṛgehe kanyā tatrasthena kumāreṇa kathaṃcid vṛṣṭigocarāpannena dūtisaṃstutena tadratāpi tathaiva paravatī na ca saṃyogaṃ labhate tadā vareṇa saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā naya mām ito yena kenacid upāyena ity ātmānaṃ nāyayati sa ca śaktyatiśayād dhatvā chittvā cety evaṃ harati tadā icchayānyonyasaṃyogaḥ ity etad apy asti gāndharve rūpam hatvā chittvā iti ca rākṣasarūpam 
tāv etau vivāhau kṣatriyasaiva bhavataḥ 
dharmyau kṣatriyasya tau pūrvacoditāv ity anuvādaḥ 
anye tv āhuḥ yaḥ kṣatriyo bahuvivāhān kurute sa kāṃcid gāndharvena vivāhe pariṇayate kāṃcid rākṣaseṇety eṣa miśrapakṣaḥ 
atha vā sarvā evānyatareṇeti pṛthak pṛthak 
anena caitaj jñāyate 
kṣatriyasyānayor evāniyamena pravṛttiḥ prājāpatyādīnāṃ tu ya eva prathamaṃ kṛtas tenaivānyāpi vivāhyā 
idānīṃ svarūpam eteṣām āha 
ācchādya cārcayitvā ca śrutaśīlavate svayam 
āhūya dānaṃ kanyāyā brāhmo dharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ 
ācchādyeti 
ācchādanaviśeṣo 'bhipretaḥ anyasyaucityenaiva prāptatvāt 
utkṛṣṭenācchādanena yathādeśaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yathāyogyena vāsasā paridhāpya 
arhayitvā 
anenālaṃkaraṇakaṭakakaṇikādinā prītiviśeṣasatkāraviśeṣair arcanaṃ kṛtvā 
etenācchādanārhaṇena kanyāyā varasya cānyatarasaṃbandhe pramāṇābhāvād ubhayopayogaḥ kāryaḥ 
śrutaśīlavate 
anye 'pi smṛtyantaroktā varaguṇā draṣṭavyāḥ yuvā dhīmāñ janapriyaḥ 
yatnāt parīkṣitaḥ puṃstve iti 
svayaṃ prāgayācitaḥ 
svapuruṣapreṣaṇair āhūya antikadeśam ānāyya varam 
yad dānaṃ sa brāhmo dharmo vivāhaḥ 
aviśeṣavacano 'pi dharmaśabdaḥ pūrvāpekṣitatvāt tatpara eva draṣṭavyaḥ 
ayācitalābho 'bhyarhaṇāpūrvako brāhmo vivāha iti lakṣaṇārthaḥ 
nanu cedam ayuktaṃ strīsvīkārārtho vivāha iti 
yāvad vivāhaparyantaṃ caitad dānam 
nākṛte vivāhe dānārthanivṛttiḥ 
sa hi tasyāḥ pratigrahakālaḥ 
na cāsati parigrahe dānaṃ parisamāpyate 
na svatvanivṛttimātraṃ dānam 
parasvatvāpattiparyantaṃ hi tat 
tathā ca vakṣyati teṣāṃ tu niṣṭhā vijñeyā vidvadbhiḥ saptame pade iti 
evaṃ vivāhakāla eva kanyā dātavyā 
tathā ca gṛhyakāras tasminn eva kāle brāhmavivāhe kāṇḍikadharmaṃ darśayati yat tu prāg vivāhād dānaṃ tadupasaṃvādanavacanamātram 
na hi tasminn akriyamāṇe 'bhipretakāle 'vaśyaṃ vivāhanirvṛttiḥ 
kaścit prāgnirūpite na dadyād api itaro vā kadācin na pratigṛhṇīyāt 
tasmāt prāgvivāhād upasaṃvādaḥ kartavyaḥ tadā tvayeyaṃ deyā mayā ceyaṃ voḍhavyeti 
yathaivāntaḥkratuḥ sopakriyo 'coditatatsiddhārtho 'rthād bahiṣkriyate 
ye tu manyante yathaiva gavāder dravyasyādṛṣṭārthatayā dīyamānasya mantrapūrvakeṇa pratigraheṇa dānam api nirvartate tenaivedam uktaṃ dadātiṣu caivaṃ dharmeṣv iti 
evaṃ ceha pratigrahamantrasthānīyo vivāha iti 
tathā ca upayamanaṃ vivāha ity eko 'rthaḥ 
upayamanaṃ ca svakaraṇam 
evaṃ ha sma bhagavān pāṇiniḥ smarati upād yamaḥ svakaraṇe iti 
ato vivāhaḥ kanyāsvīkārārthaḥ 
tad ayuktam 
svīkṛtāyā vivāho bhāryākaraṇārthaḥ 
nānena karmaṇā pratigṛhṇīyād iti vidhir asti 
na ca vaivāhikā mantrā pratigrahaprakārakāḥ yathā devasya tvā pragṛhṇāmi iti mantrāḥ 
yat tu svakaraṇa iti tan na viruddham 
vivāhasyāpy asti svakaraṇarūpatā 
dānena svatvamātre pratipanne vivāhena viśiṣṭaṃ svatvaṃ kriyate 
neyaṃ gavādidravyavat svaṃ yatheṣṭaviniyojyatayā api tu jāyātvena 
viśiṣṭa eva hi svasvāmibhāvo jāyāpatilakṣaṇasaṃbandhaḥ 
tathā ca darśayiṣyati maṅgalārthaṃ svastyayanaṃ vivāheṣu pradānaṃ svāmyakāraṇam iti 
yajñe tu vitate samyag ṛtvije karma kurvate 
alaṃkṛtya sutādānaṃ daivaṃ dharmaṃ pracakṣate 
vitate prārabdhatantre jyotiṣṭomādau yajñe tatkarmakāriṇa ṛtvije 'dhvaryave sutāya duhitur dānam 
alaṃkṛtyety anuvādaḥ kanyādānasya sarvasyaivaṃrūpatvāt 
ācchādyālaṃkṛtāṃ vivāhayet iti sāmānyo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ 
nanu gauś cāśvaś cāśvataraś cetyādy ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇātvena śrutam 
na kvacit kanyādānaṃ kratvarthatayā coditam 
kim atra kratvarthatayā 
pravṛtte yajña ṛtvije yāṃ dadāti sa daivo vivāhaḥ 
asti copakāragandhas tadīyakaraṇam 
akarmoddeśenāpi dīyamānaṃ tatkarmakaraṇapravṛttasya janayaty evānumānaviśeṣam 
etāvatopakārasaṃbandhena brāhmād daivo nyūnaḥ 
ekaṃ gomithunaṃ dve vā varād ādāya dharmataḥ 
kanyāpradānaṃ vidhivad ārṣo dharmaḥ sa ucyate 
strī gavī puṅgavaś ca mithunam 
ekaṃ dve vā varād gṛhītvā kanyāyā dānam ārṣo dharmaḥ 
dharmata iti 
dharma evāyam nātra vikrayabuddhiḥ kartavyā uccanīcarṇāpākaraṇābhāvād ity abhiprāyaḥ 
sahobhau caratāṃ dharmam iti vācānubhāṣya ca 
kanyāpradānam abhyarcya prājāpatyo vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ 
saha dharmo yuvābhyāṃ kartavyaḥ iti vacanena paribhāṣāṃ kṛtvā niyamya yad dānaṃ sa prājāpatyaḥ 
dharmagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārtham 
dharme cārthe ca kāme ca tulyayogakṣemateti mitho 'sya paribhāṣāvacanasyārthaḥ 
dharmaśabda evoccāryate saha dharmaś caryatām iti na tu dharmārthakāmāḥ saheti 
sa tu dharmaśabdaḥ smṛtyantaravaśād arthakāmayor upalakṣaṇārtho vyākhyātaḥ 
yady enāṃ nāticarasi dharmārthakāmeṣu tadā tubhyam iyam dīyate iti kṛtasaṃvitkāyābhyupagatatadarthāya vivāhakāle yad dānaṃ tatraivaṃ samuccārayitavyaṃ saha dharmaṃ caratām iti 
arthakāmayor abhiprete 'pi sahatve tadaprakrtatvād anuccāraṇam 
tathā ca gautamaḥ prājāpatye saha dharmaṃ caratām iti mantraḥ 
mantragrahaṇena caitad darśayaty adhikṛtarūpam eva prayoktavyam mantravat 
na hi mahāsatvānām arthakāmaviṣaye sahitatvaṃ paribhāṣituṃ yuktam gamyate tu smṛtyantarebhyaḥ 
anayaiva saṃvidā doṣeṇāsya nyūnatā 
asti hy atra dātur varād upakāralipsā 
svaśabdenaitad vacanaṃ vācyate na punar ayaṃ dātur eva vacananiyamaḥ 
anubhāṣyety anenaiva siddhatvād vācety anarthakaṃ syāt anubhāṣaṇe vāgindriyasya sādhanatvāt 
tathā ca gṛhyakāraḥ etad vaḥ satyam ity uktvā varaṃ vācayed etan naḥ satyam iti 
anuśabdaś ca prāptārthasyaiva vācā niścayam āha 
jñātibhyo draviṇaṃ datvā kanyāyai caiva śaktitaḥ 
kanyāpradānaṃ svācchandyād āsuro dharma ucyate 
jñātibhyaḥ kanyāyā eva pitrādibhyaḥ kanyāyai ca strīdhanaṃ datvā kanyāyā āpradānam ānayanam āsuro vivāhaḥ 
svācchandyāt svecchātaḥ na śāstrata ity ārṣād bhedam āha 
tatra hi śāstraṃ niyāmakam asti ekaṃ gomithunam iti 
iha tu kanyāyā rūpasaubhāgyādiguṇāpekṣaṃ chandaḥ 
icchayānyonyasaṃyogaḥ kanyāyāś ca varasya ca 
gāndharvaḥ sa tu vijñeyo maithunyaḥ kāmasaṃbhavaḥ 
icchayā ca varsya kumāryāś ca prītyā parasparasaṃyoga ekapradeśe saṃgamanam 
tasyeyaṃ nindā maithunyaḥ kāmasaṃbhavaḥ 
mithunaprayojano maithunaḥ tasmai hito maithunyaḥ 
eṣa evārtho vispaṣṭīkṛtaḥ kāmasaṃbhava iti 
saṃbhavaty asmād iti saṃbhavaḥ 
kāmaḥ saṃbhavo 'syeti 
hatvā chittvā ca bhittvā ca krośantīṃ rudatīṃ gṛhāt 
prasahya kanyāharaṇaṃ rākṣaso vidhir ucyate 
prasahya abhibhūya kanyāpakṣād balātkāreṇa kanyāyā haraṇaṃ rākṣaso vivāha ity etāvad atra vivakṣitam 
hatvetyādy anuvādaḥ 
prasahyāpajihīrṣato yadi kaścit pratibandho vartate tadā prāptam eva hananādi 
hantuḥ śaktyatiśayaṃ jñātvā svātmabhayād upekṣeraṃs tadā bhavaty eva rākṣaso na vadhādyavaśyaṃ kartavyam 
hatvā daṇḍakāṣṭhādinā tāḍayitvā 
chittvā khaḍgādiprahāreṇāṅgāni khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā 
bhittvā prākāradurgādi 
krośantīṃ rudantīṃ kanyām anicchām 
ayaṃ gāndharvād viśeṣaḥ 
anāthāpahriye paritrāyadvam ityādy uccaiḥ śabdakaraṇaṃ krośanam 
rodanam aśrukaṇamokṣaḥ 
udvijitāyāḥ striyā dharmo 'yam 
suptāṃ mattāṃ pramattāṃ vā raho yatropagacchati 
sa pāpiṣṭho vivāhānāṃ paiśacaḥ prathito 'dhamaḥ 
rākṣasapaiśācayor anicchā tulyā 
rākṣase hananam paiśāce vañcanam 
suptāṃ nidrayābhibhūtām 
mattāṃ kṣībāṃ madyaparavaśām 
pramattāṃ vātasaṃkṣobheṇa naṣṭacetanām 
raho 'prakāsam upagacchati maithunadharme pravartate sa paiśāco vivāhaḥ sarvavihāhānāṃ pāpiṣṭhaḥ pāpahetuḥ 
dharmāpatyaṃ na tataḥ saṃpadyate 
iha gāndharvarākṣasapaiśācānāṃ prakṛtavivāhasāmānādhikaraṇyāt saṃyogaharaṇopagamā eva pāṇigrahaṇasaṃskāranirapekṣā vivāhā iti manyante 
teṣāṃ brāhmādiṣv api dānavivāhayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt saṃskāro vinivartate 
yathā ca na nivartate tathā darśitam 
lakṣaṇayā vivāhaprayojanadāne vivāhaśabdaḥ 
gāndharve tu bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena duṣyantaśakuntalāsaṃgamane varṇitam anagnikam amantrakam iti taddarśanena pāṇigrahaṇasaṃskāro 'sti mantrādi varjitas tu 
paiśāce punar vivadante mukhyaṃ copagamanaṃ 
na ca kanyātvam apaiti saṃskārais tadvinivartanāt 
ataś ca pāṇigrahaṇikā mantrāḥ kanyāsv eva pratiṣṭhitāḥ iti pratiṣedhasyāpravṛtter asty eva mantravat saṃskārasaṃbandhaḥ 
sa ca pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃskārapratiṣedhārthaḥ 
sā hi mantraiḥ saṃkṛtatvād vyapagatakanyābhāvā 
ata eva bhavatu prathamam upagamas tato 'kanyādoṣo nāsti 
tathā ca kānīnaḥ karṇa iti darśanam 
yadi tu puruṣaprayogeṇa kanyātvam apeyāt katham iyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ kanyāyāḥ putraḥ kānīnaḥ iti 
atha tv asaṃskṛtā kanyocyate tato yuktam karṇādayo hy anūḍhāyāḥ putrāḥ iti 
mukhye 'bhyupagamane kanyāyā apatyotpatteḥ saṃbhavaḥ 
varṇyate cetihāsādiṣu tathābhūtāyā vivāhaḥ atha madyamadādinā nirvṛtte ratisaṃbandhe kimarthaḥ saṃskāra iti 
atrocyate 
yady api strīpuṃsadharmo nivṛtto 'tikrāntaś ca kanyāgamanapratiṣedhas tathāpi tayā sahādhikārārthaṃ punaś ca gamane kanyāgamanaṃ mā bhud iti tadarthaṃ saṃskārakaraṇam 
kanyāgamanapratiṣedhātikarmasaṃbandhena puruṣārthatayāpi nindyate vivāho 'yam 
tad ayuktam 
yato 'yaṃ loke kanyāśabdaḥ puṃsāsaṃprayuktāṃ striyam ācaṣṭe na saṃskārabhāvasāpekṣām 
akṛtasaṃskārā api puruṣaiḥ kṣatayonayo na kanyā iti vyavahriyante 
tāsāṃ ca veśaśritānāṃ gamane na kanyāgamanadoṣaḥ 
yady api kumārīkanyāśabdau prathamavayovacanāv iṣyete tathāpi vivāhavidhāv anupabhuktapurvām eva striyam ācakṣate 
tathā ca kumāraveśadhāriṇīṃ nātiprakāśapravṛttapuṃsaṃprayogāṃ bhāryātvenārthayamāno 'nyair avabodhyate naiṣā kumārī naṣṭo 'syāḥ kaumāro bhāvaḥ 
saṃskāraparilopaś ca syāt 
garbhādhānaṃ hi mantravat kartavyam viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu iti kḷptāyāś ca kalpanam aśakyam 
tatrāyathārtho mantraprayogaḥ syāt 
na cānūḍhāyāḥ paiśācadharme mantraprayogaḥ ūḍhāyās tacchravaṇāt 
na ca paiśācavarjam anyeṣu vivāheṣu tatkalpayituṃ uktaṃ yuktam aviśeṣaśravaṇāt 
tasmān mukhyopagamapakṣa evamādayo bahavo doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti 
ata āliṅganopagūhanaparicumbanādiṣūpagamanārtheṣu vyāpāreṣu sāhacaryāt tādarthyāc copapūrvo gamir draṣṭavyaḥ 
yat tu kānīnaḥ putraḥ iti tatra mukhyārthāsaṃbhavāl lakṣaṇayā saṃskārābhāvapratipattiḥ 
yat tu saṃskāradarśanaṃ tat tu kvacid eva 
yady api yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate jñātājñatāpi vā satī iti tatra ya evopagantā sa eva na saṃskartā 
na tv asau paiśāco vivāhaḥ 
paiśāce hi yenaiva samupabhuktā tasmā eva dīyate sa evaināṃ saṃskarotīti 
garbhiṇyās tu saṃskāro vācanikaḥ 
etac ca sarvaṃ nipuṇataraṃ punar navame vakṣyate 
apare manyante satyaṃ mukhyam upagamanam amukhyatve tu gamanapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ iti 
yadi hi mukhyam upagamas tadā sa eva vivāho 'nyasyānantaroktena nyāyenābhāvāt 
tataś ca nāsti tasya pratiṣedhasya viṣayaḥ yataḥ icchayā gāndharvo haṭhād rākṣaso 'nyathā paiśācaḥ 
na cānyaḥ prakāro 'sti yena sa viṣayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt 
asti tv asya viṣayaḥ yatra haṭhād rahasi gamanam yā vā pitṛbhyāṃ dīyate na copasaṃskriyate 
na cāsau gāndharvaḥ kanyecchāyā abhāvāt 
ata eva bhartur api na kanyāgāmitvam viṣayāntarasya saṃbhavāt 
tasmāt kṣatayonyāḥ saṃskāraniṣedhād brāhmādivad upāyatvāt tadvac ca vivāhaśabdopapatteḥ prakaraṇasāmarthyāḍ gauṇa evopagamārthaḥ 
eṣām ca bhedaḥ aprārthitopanato bhūmihiraṇyādivad brāhmaḥ 
ṛtviktvena viśeṣeṇa daivaḥ 
gomithunenārṣaḥ 
yācñayāyacñayā vā sahobhau caratāṃ dharmam iti vacanavyavasthayā prājāpatyaḥ 
śeṣāḥ subodhabhedāḥ 
brāhmādīnām idam arthe taddhitaḥ 
brahmādisaṃbandhitā ca stutyāropyate 
evaṃ sarveṣu 
paiśācaḥ piṣācānām ayaṃ yukta iti nindā 
adbhir eva dvijāgryāṇāṃ kanyādānaṃ viśiṣyate 
itareṣāṃ tu varṇānām itaretarakāmyayā 
dvijāgryāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ kanyādānaṃ kanyāṃ dadatām adbhir eva dānaṃ śasyate 
brāhmaṇāya yadā kanyāṃ dadāti tadādbhir eva dadyāt 
kathaṃ punar āpodānakaraṇam 
na hi tābhir vinā dānam asti adbhir vācyaṃ namaḥpūrvaṃ bhikṣā dānaṃ dadāti vai 
evaṃ dharmeṣu iti niyamāt 
atha vā adbhir evety avadhāraṇenārṣāsuraprājāpatyān apavadati 
tatra hi na kevalā āpaḥ kāraṇam gomithunādidravyagrahaṇam api saṃvidvyavasthā ca 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
yathā gohiraṇyādi dravyaṃ dīyate na kiṃcit paribhāṣyate iyaṃ gaus tvayaiva saṃvāhanīyedṛśāni tṛṇāny api deyāni evaṃ kanyāpi deyā na duhitṛsnehena jāmāta paribhāṣaṇaṃ kārayitavyaḥ 
na ca tasmād dhanaṃ grahītavyam iti 
kṣatriyādīnāṃ tu itaretarakāmyayā parasparecchayā yadi kanyāvarayoḥ parasparam abhilāṣo bhavati tadā dānaṃ kartavya netarathā brāhmavivāhavat 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
dhanaṃ vā gṛhītvādbhir eva vety eṣa itaretarakāmyārthaḥ 
asmin pakṣe brāhmaṇasya sarvaviṣayatā jñāpitā bhavati 
yo yasyaiṣāṃ vivāhānāṃ manunā kīrtito guṇaḥ 
sarvaṃ śṛṇuta taṃ viprāḥ samyak kīrtayato mama 
yad uktam guṇadoṣau ca yasya yau iti tat smārayati 
bahavo vaktavyatayā pratijñātās tatra vakṣyamāṇaiḥ ślokair ayam artha ucyata iti viśeṣajñānārthaṃ yuktaḥ punar upanyāsaḥ 
eṣām vivāhānām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī 
evaṃ vivāhānāṃ yasya vivāhasya yo guṇaḥ kīrtita ācāryeṇa manunā sarvaṃ śṛṇuta taṃ guṇaṃ viprāḥ 
bhṛgur maharṣīn āmantrayate 
samyag avaiparītyenānākulaṃ kīrtayataḥ kathayataḥ 
daśa pūrvān parān vaṃśyān ātmānaṃ caikaviṃśakam 
brāhmīputraḥ sukṛtakṛn mocayaty enasaḥ pitṝn 
pūrve vaṃśyā pitṛpitāmahādayaḥ 
apare putrapautrādayaḥ 
tān mocayaty enaso narakādiyātanābhya uddharati 
brāhmena vivāhena ūḍhā tasyāṃ yo jātaḥ putraḥ sa sukṛtakṛt puṇyakṛd yadi bhavati 
pitṝn paralokagatān 
pitṛśabdo 'yaṃ pretaparyāyaḥ na hi putrādisaṃtater anyathā pitṛvyapadeśasaṃbhavaḥ 
daśaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate pūrvāparaśabdābhyām ekaviṃśakam iti nirdeśāt 
arthavādaś cāyam 
tenāgatān anutpannān kathaṃ mocayatīti na vācyam 
pūrveṣāṃ tv apatyakṛtena śubhena śrāddhādinā bhavaty eva pāpān mokṣa iti śrāddhādhikāre kathayiṣyate 
ato daśāparān enaso mocayatīty etad uktaṃ bhavati daśapuruṣā yasmin kule 'pāpā jāyanta ity ālambanam 
daivoḍhājaḥ sutaś caiva sapta sapta parāvarān 
ārṣoḍhājaḥ sutas trīṃs trīn ṣaṭ ṣaṭ kāyoḍhajaḥ sutaḥ 
daivena vidhinoḍhā daivoḍhā 
tasyāṃ jāto daivoḍhājaḥ 
sutaḥ putraḥ 
kaḥ prajāpatiḥ 
sa devatā yasya vivāhasya sa kāyaḥ 
saṃskārakarmaṇi grahaṇalakṣaṇe 'saty eva devatāsaṃbandhe prajāpater devatātvam adhyāropyate bhaktyā 
yad api tatra prājāpatyo yāgo 'sti sa tu vivāhasādhāraṇaḥ na kāyavyapadeśe kāraṇam 
āsurādiṣu ca na kācid gatiḥ syāt 
na hy āsurebhyo vivāhebhyo yāgo 'sti 
kāyoḍhaja iti hrasvatvaṃ ṅyāpoḥ saṃjñāchandasor bahulam iti 
nanu ca yad yan nyūnaphalaṃ tat tat paścān nirdiṣṭam 
tatrārṣasya prājāpatyāt paścād abhidhānaṃ yuktam 
asty atra kāraṇaṃ yenādhikaphalasya prājāpatyasya paścān nirdeśaḥ 
pañcānāṃ tu trayo dharmyāḥ ity atra prājāpatyasya grahaṇam iṣyate itarathārṣasya syāt 
brāhmādiṣu vivāheṣu caturṣv evānupūrvaśaḥ 
brahmavarcasinaḥ putrā jāyante śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥ
prasave ca guṇāguṇān ity uktam tad idam 
anupūrvaśaḥ ānupūrvyeṇety asminn arthe smṛtikāraiḥ prayujyate 
śrutādhyayanavijñānasaṃpattinimitte ca pūjākhyātī brahmavarcasam 
tadvanto brahmavarcasinaḥ 
innanto 'yam 
śiṣṭānāṃ saṃmatā anumatā agarhyā adviṣṭāḥ priyā iti yāvat 
ataś cāmatyarthatvān matibhuddhīty asyāviṣayatvena ktena ca pūjāyām ity etena nāsti samāsapratiṣedhaḥ 
saṃbandhasāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ ca ṣaṣṭhī 
rūpasattvaguṇopetā dhanavanto yaśasvinaḥ 
paryāptabhogā dharmiṣṭhā jīvanti ca śataṃ samāḥ 
rūpaṃ manoharākṛtiḥ 
sattvaṃ nāma guṇo dvādaśe vakṣyate 
tābhyām upetā yuktāḥ 
āḍhyā dhanavantaḥ 
śrutaśauryādiguṇayuktatayā khyātāḥ yaśasvinaḥ 
paryāptabhogāḥ sraganulepanagītavādyādibhiḥ sukhasādhanair avikalair nityayuktāḥ 
sukhasādhanaiḥ pūrvoktair aviyogo bhogaḥ sa paryāpto 'kṣataḥ samagro yeṣāṃ te paryāptabhogāḥ 
dharmānuṣṭhānatatparā dharmiṣṭhāḥ 
dharmaśabdaḥ keṣāṃcid guṇavacanaḥ 
ato guṇavacanād ity ātiśāyikaḥ 
śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvanti 
itareṣu tu śiṣṭeṣu nṛśaṃsānṛtavādinaḥ 
jāyante durvivāheṣu brahmadharmadviṣaḥ sutāḥ 
brāhmādivyatirikteṣu gāndharvādivivāheṣu nṛśaṃsam anṛtaṃ ca vadanti nṛśaṃsānṛtavādinaḥ 
nṛśaṃsaṃ mātṛbhaginyādāv aślīlākrośavacanam 
anṛtaṃ prasiddham 
nṛśaṃsaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca nṛśaṃsānṛte 
te vadituṃ śīlam eṣām iti śabdavyutpattiḥ 
brahmadharmo vedadharmo vedārthas taṃ dviṣanti nindati vā na śraddadhate vā 
ata eva durvivāheṣv iti nindā 
aninditaiḥ strīvivahair anindyā bhavati prajā 
ninditair ninditā nṝṇāṃ tasmān nindyān vivarjayet 
samāsato vivāhānāṃ phalapradarśanam etat 
ye yasya vivāhā vihitās te 'ninditās tair ūḍhānāṃ yā prajā putrādilakṣaṇā sānindyā bhavati praśasyety arthaḥ 
ninditaiḥ pratiṣiddhaiḥ ninditā garhitā 
tasmād duḥkhabhāginī prajā mā bhūd iti nindyān vivarjayet 
pāṇigrahaṇasaṃskāraḥ savarṇāsūpadiśyate 
asavarṇasv ayaṃ jñeyo vidhir udvāhakarmaṇi 
pāṇigrahaṇaṃ nāma gṛhyakāroktaḥ saṃskāraḥ savarṇāsu samānajātīyāsūhyamānāsu upadiśyate śāstreṇa vidhīyate kartavyatayā pratipādyate 
asavarṇāsu yad udvāhakarma tatrāyaṃ vakṣyamāṇo vidhir jñeyaḥ 
śaraḥ kṣatriyayā grāhyaḥ pratodo vaiśyakanyayā 
vasanasya daśā grāhyā śūdrayotkṛṣṭavedane 
brāhmaṇenohyamānayā kṣatriyayā śaro brāhmaṇapāṇiparigṛhīto grāhyaḥ pāṇigrahaṇasthāne śarasya vidhānāt 
pratodo balīvardānām āyāsaḥ kriyate yena vāhyamānāḥ pīḍyante hastinām ivāṅkuśaḥ 
vasanasya vastrasya daśā grāhyā śūdrayā 
utkṛṣṭajātīyair brāhmaṇādivarṇair vedane vivāhe 
ṛtukālābhigāmī syāt svadāranirataḥ sadā 
parvavarjaṃ vrajec caināṃ tadvrato ratikāmyayā 
ukto vivāhaḥ 
tasmin nirvṛtte samupayāte dāratve tad ahar evecchayopagame prāpte tannivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate 
na vivāhasamanantaraṃ tad ahar eva gacchet kiṃ tarhi ṛtukālaṃ pratīkṣeta 
gṛhyakārais tu ata ūrdhvam akṣāralavaṇāśinau brahmacāriṇāv adhaḥśāyinau syātāṃ 
trirātraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ saṃvatsaraṃ vā paṭhitam 
tatra saty api saṃvatsarasyāntarāpatite ṛtau gamanaṃ nāsti 
evam asmāt kālād ūrdhvam asaty ṛtau gamanaṃ nāsti 
evam ete smṛtī avirodhinyau bhavataḥ 
trirātrādīnāṃ tu vikalpaḥ atyantarāgapīḍitayor gamanam daiyavator tu brahmacaryam 
ṛtur nāma strīṇāṃ śoṇitadarśanopalakṣitaḥ śarīrāvasthāviśeṣo garbhagrahaṇasamarthaḥ kāla ucyate 
upalakṣaṇatvāc ca darśanasya nirvṛtte 'smin vakṣyamāṇakālānuvartī bhavaty eva 
tasya kāla ṛtukālaḥ 
sāhacaryād vā kāla eva ṛtuḥ 
tathā ca samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ 
ṛtukāle 'bhigantuṃ vratam asyety ṛtukālābhigāmī 
vrate iti ṇiniḥ yathā sthaṇḍilaśāyī aśrāddhabhojīti 
syād bhaved ity arthaḥ 
yady apy astiparā vidhivibhaktis tathāpy upagamavyāpāraṃ nidadhāti abhigāmī syād abhigacched ity arthaḥ 
na hy anupagacchann abhigāmī bhavati 
kīdṛśaṃ punar etad vratam 
kim ṛtāv abhigantavyam eva athartāv eva gantavyam iti 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
kim ayaṃ niyama uta parisaṃkhyeti 
nanu ca vratam iti śāstrato niyama ucyate 
tatraiva cāyaṃ ṇiniḥ 
ataḥ parisaṃkhyā katham āśaṅkyate 
ucyate 
parisaṃkhyāyām api śāstrīyatvaṃ niyamarūpatā ca vidyata iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
kas tarhy anyor viśeṣaḥ 
vidhiviśeṣo niyamaḥ 
atha vidhiḥ kaḥ 
yaḥ śabdaḥ kartavyatābodhakaḥ agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ iti 
na hy agnihotrasyaitad vacanam antareṇānyataḥ kutaścit kartavyatāvagamaḥ 
niyamaḥ punar yatrādṛṣṭasiddhyarthasya vacanam antareṇa pākṣikī prāptiḥ 
yathā same yajeta iti darśapaurṇamāsādiyāgavidhānād deśamātram ākṣiptam 
na hi kaścid deśam anāśritya yāgaprayogaḥ saṃbhavati 
dvividhaś ca deśaḥ samo viṣamaś ca 
yatra yadā tāvat same yajeta tadaitad vacanam anuvāda eva 
yadā tv icchāyā niraṅkuśatvād viṣame yiyakṣati tadaitad vacanaṃ samadeśaṃ vidadhad arthavat vihite same viṣamasyānāśrayaṇam avidhānāt 
etat sāmarthyāt tannivṛttiḥ 
vidhinibandhane hy anuṣṭhāne kim ity avihitaṃ kriyeta 
tatkaraṇe hi na yathācoditānuṣṭhānasiddhiḥ 
idaṃ cātra smārtam udāharaṇam 
prāṅmukho 'nnāni bhuñjīta 
bhuñjānasya yadṛcchayā yāṃ kāṃcid diśam āśritya bhojanaṃ prāptam 
tatra kadācit prācī kadācid itarā yā kācit prāptā 
tatra yadā prācī na tadetarā yadetarā na tadā prācīti 
tatrāprāptipakṣe vidhyarthaṃ vacanaṃ prāṅmukho 'nnāni bhuñjīta iti 
tatrātikramāc chāstrārthaṃ jahāti 
evam iha yadṛcchayopagamanam ṛtāv anupagamanam pakṣe vidhīyamānam upagamanam ananuṣṭhīyamānam śāstrātikramakāritāṃ janayet 
yathānye śāstravihitārthā atikramyamāṇāḥ prāyaścittahetavo bhavanti tathānugamanam 
athartāv anṛtau ca gamane rāgataḥ prāpte vacanam ṛtāv upeyād iti tadaivaṃ vacanaṃ mṛgyate ṛtāv evopeyād anṛtāu na gacchet 
yathā pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ iti kṣutpratighātenārthena śaśakādiṣv api pañcanakheṣu bhakṣyatā prasaktā tadvyatirikteṣv api vānarādiṣu 
na ca tatra paryāyeṇaiva pravṛttiḥ 
yugapat tatra cānyatra ca prasaktau pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ iti vacanam itaraparisaṃkhyānārthaṃ saṃpadyate 
evam iha parisaṃkhyeti 
nanu ca parisaṃkhyāṃ doṣatrayavatīm ācakṣate 
trayo hi tatra doṣāḥ prāduḥṣyuḥ svārthatyāgaḥ parārthakalpanā prāptabādhaś ca 
pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ iti yadānvayataḥ pañcanakhaviṣayaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ pratīyate tadā tattyaktaṃ bhavati tadvyatiriktaniṣedhaparatvād vākyasya 
aśrutaś ca niṣedhaḥ ataḥ parārthakalpanā 
arthitvāc ca sarvaviṣayaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ yat prāptaṃ tasya bādhaḥ 
evam etena parisaṃkhyāyāṃ trayo doṣāḥ 
naitat sāram 
saty arthitve śrutyarthāsaṃbhave vākyasyānarthakyaṃ mā bhūd ity etatparatā na viruddhā 
vidhir atyantam aprāptau niyamaḥ pākṣike sati 
tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyā nakhiṣv iva 
kiṃ punar atra yuktam 
tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyālakṣaṇasya vidyamānatvāt parisaṃkhyeti 
ṛtāv api gamanaṃ prāptam anṛtāv api 
na tu yadartau tadānṛtāv iti 
yathā saty arthitve yad bhojanaṃ tatra niyamo 'śrāddham na punar āhāratyāgena aśrāddham eva bhuñjāna āste 
evam iha sati khede yad gamanaṃ tatra niyamo 'nṛtau na gacched ity avagacchati 
arthitvāc ca gamane prasakte kālavidānaparataiva yuktā vākyasya 
anyathānārabdho 'rtha upadiṣṭaḥ syāt 
kiṃcāpatyotpattividheḥ kṛtavivāhasyānuṣṭeyatvād ṛtau ca tatsaṃbhavāt prāptam eva gamanam 
utpannaputrasya ca na dvitīyaputrotpādanaṃ vaidham 
apatyam utpādayed ity ekatvavivakṣāyāṃ vidhyarthanivṛtteḥ 
na ca gamanam evādṛṣṭārthatayā śakyaṃ vidhātum 
saṃkāravidhitvādhikāragrahaṇāt kalpanāyāś cāśakyatvād apatyotpattividhyākṣepād ṛtau gamanasya 
yadi cātrartāv upeyād iti tad anṛtupratiṣedhārtham 
tatrānuvādaḥ paraṃ parisaṃkhyā 
tatra hy arthāntaralakṣaṇayāpy arthavattā bhavati 
evaṃ ca kṛtvā gautamīyenāvipratipattiḥ 
evaṃ tatroktam ṛtāv upeyāt sarvatra vā pratiṣiddhavarjam iti 
satvatra vā ity eṣa vikalpaḥ kāmacārānujñānārthaḥ 
na punaḥ sarvadartāv anṛtau ca niyamopapattiḥ 
yadi ca pūrvatra ṛtāv upeyāt iti niyamaḥ sarvatra vā ity atrāpi sa evopeyād ity anuprayujyamānaśabdo niyamārthaḥ prāpnoti ekaprakramatvāt na hi sa eva śabdaḥ punar anuccāryamāṇo bhinnārtho bhavituṃ yuktaḥ 
na cartor anyatra niyamārthatopapadyate ity uktam 
tasmād ṛtau gamanavacanam anṛtau pratiṣedhārtham 
tatrānutpannaputrasya vidhyantarān niyama eva 
utpannaputras tu yathākāmī 
anṛtau pratiṣiddhe gamane bhāryecchayā punaḥ pratiprasūyate parvavarjaṃ vrajec caināṃ tadvrata iti 
tad iti bhāryāyāḥ pratyavamarśaḥ 
taccittagrahaṇaṃ vratam asyeti tadvrataḥ 
ratikāmyayā vināpy apatyārthenotpannaputra ṛtāv anutpannaputro vānṛtau suratasaṃbhogecchayā tadvrata enāṃ vrajen nātmecchayety arthaḥ 
atha vā tacchabdo ratikāmyayety atrāpy apekṣyate smṛtiśāstratvād asya 
tad ratikāmyayā parvavarjam anyatrāpi vrajet 
tatraivākāraśleṣo draṣṭavyaḥ aratikāmyayā atmana iti śeṣaḥ 
yathā tu vyākhyātaṃ tathā na kiṃcid atrāpraśleṣeṇāpi vā tacchabdasya samāsopasarjanasyāsaṃbandhena 
parvāṇi vakṣyati 
amāvāsyām aṣṭamīṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ caturdaśīm iti 
svadāranirataḥ 
svadāreṣu nirataḥ syāt tatprītibhāvanāparaḥ 
atha vā svadāreṣv eva ramate na paradārān ramayed iti paradārapratiṣedhaḥ 
sadā yāvajjīvam etad vrataṃ paripālanīyam 
ataḥ sthitam etat 
trīṇi vākyāny atra ṛtukālābhigāmī syād ity etad ekam 
anutpannaputrasya niyamānuvādarūpaṃ dvitīyam bhāryāprayuktasya parvavarjam ṛtāv anṛtau ca na suratecchayā 
svadāranirata iti tṛtīyam 
eṣāṃ ca padayojanā ṛtukālābhigāmī syād apatyārtham ratikāmyayā tu tadvrata enāṃ vrajet svadāranirataś ca syāt 
ṛtuḥ svābhāvikaḥ strīṇāṃ rātrayaḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ 
caturbhir itaraiḥ sārdham ahobhiḥ sadvigarhitaiḥ 
ṛtulakṣaṇārthaṃ śloko 'yam 
vaidyakādiśāstrāvagamyo 'yam artho na vidhimūla eva 
evaṃ yugmāsu putrāḥ ity etāv api ślokau 
ṣoḍaśarātrayas tāḥ strīṇāṃ māsi māsi svābhāvika ṛtuḥ 
pramāṇāntaramūlatvāc cāśrutam api māsi māsīti gamyate 
svabhāve bhavaḥ svābhāvikaḥ svasthaprakṛtīnāṃ yo bhavati 
vyādhyādinā kasyāścit prāptakālo 'pi nivartate ghṛtatilādhyauṣadhopayogena rativaśena cākāle 'pi saṃvartate 
ataḥ svābhāvika ṛtus tā rātraya ucyante 
caturbhir itaraiḥ 
catvāry ahāni yāni sadbhir vigarhitāni pratiṣiddhastrīsparśasaṃbhāṣaṇādīni tāni ca prathamaśoṇitapradarśanāt prabhṛti 
ahargrahaṇaṃ ca sarvāhorātropalakṣaṇārtham 
taiḥ saha 
tāsām ādyāś catasras tu ninditaikādaśī ca yā 
trayodaśī ca śeṣās tu praśastā daśarātrayaḥ 
tāsāṃ rātrīṇāṃ yā ādyāḥ prathamaśoṇitadarśanāc catasras tā ninditāḥ na tatra gamanam asti 
tisṛṣu tāvat sparśo 'pi nāsty aśucitvāt 
caturthyāṃ tu snātāyā vasiṣṭhavacanāt saty api śucitve ratisaṃbhogo nāsti catasṝṇāṃ garhitatvavacanāt 
yā caikādaśī yā ca trayodaśī sāpi ninditā evaṃ pratiṣiddhagamanā 
ṛtudarśanāt prabhṛty ekādaśītradośyau gṛhyete na candratithī 
tāsām iti nirdhāraṇaviṣayatvena rātrīṇāṃ saṃbandhāt samānajātīyaś ca nirdhāryatayā pratīyate kṛṣṇā gavāṃ saṃpannakṣīreti 
ṣaḍrātragamanapratiṣedho 'yam adṛṣṭārthāḥ 
śeṣāḥ praśastā daśarātrayaḥ 
ṣaṇṇāṃ pratiṣedhād daśasu prāśastyaṃ siddham evānūdyate 
yugmāsu putrā jāyante striyo 'yugmāsu rātriṣu 
tasmād yugmāsu putrārthī saṃviśed ārtave striyam 
tāsu daśasu yā yugmā rātrayaḥ ṣaṣṭhy aṣṭamī daśamī dvādaśī caturdaśī ṣoṣaśī tāsūpagacchataḥ putrā jāyante 
ayugmāsu striyo duhitaraḥ 
tasmāt putrotpattisiddhyarthaṃ yugmāsu saṃviśed bhajeta maithunadharmeṇa striyam artave 
anuvādo 'yam 
ayam api niyama eva anutpannaputrasyāyugmāsv agamanam 
pumān puṃso 'dhike śukre strī bhavaty adhike striyāḥ 
same 'pumān puṃstriyau vā kṣīṇe 'lpe ca viparyayaḥ 
śukraṃ vīryaṃ puruṣasya retaḥ striyāḥ śoṇitam 
uktaṃ bhagavatā vasiṣṭhena śukraśoṇitasaṃbhavaḥ puruṣaḥ iti 
strībījād adhike puṃbīje 'yugmāsv api putro jāyate yugmāsv api strībījasyādhikye kanyaiva 
ayugmāsv api rātriṣu putrārthino gamanānuṣṭhānārtham etat 
yadā paripuṣṭam ātmānaṃ vṛṣyāhārayogena samadhikavīryaṃ manyeta striyāś ca kathaṃcid apacayaṃ tadā putrārthī gacched ity upadiṣṭaṃ bhavati 
ādhikyaṃ cātra na parimāṇataḥ kiṃ tarhi sārataḥ 
same 'pumān miśrīkṛte puṃstriyau 
apumān napuṃsakam iti kecit 
anye sāmya iti paṭhanti 
ubhayoḥ sāmye pumān eva 
puṃstriyau vā 
garbhādhānyāṃ yadā vāyur dravarūpatvāt saṃsṛṣṭe śukraśoṇite samaṃ vibhajata ekatra bhāgam anyatra tāvad eva tadā yamau jāyete 
tatra same vibhāge 'pi strībījādhikye strī puṃbījādhikye pumān 
kṣīṇe bīje sārataḥ viparyayo 'grahaṇaṃ garbhasya napuṃsakotpattir vā 
nindyāsv aṣṭāsu cānyāsu striyo rātriṣu varjayan 
brahmacāry eva bhavati yatra tatrāśrame vasan 
nindyāsu ṣaṭsv anyāsu cānindyāsv apy aṣṭāsu rātriṣu striyo varjayan pariharan dve rātrī avaśiṣṭe yadi gacchati parvavarjam tadā brahmacāry eva bhavati brahmaryaphalaṃ prāpnoti 
yatra tatrāśrame vasan 
arthavādo 'yam 
na tu vānaprasthādyāśrameṣu rātryabhyanujñā jitendriyatvavidhānāt sarvāśrameṣu gārhasthād anyeṣu vīpsāyāś cārthavādatayāpy upapatteḥ 
etāś ca rātrayo varjyā na krameṇaiva kiṃ tarhi yathecchayā parvavarjaṃ gamanaṃ yathā na bhavati tathā rātridvayam abhyanujñāyate 
kiṃ punar brahmacaryasya phalam 
viśeṣāśravaṇāt svargaḥ 
kvacit tu śrūyate na brahmacārī pratyavaiti iti svalpair atikramair na duṣyatīti 
na kanyāyāḥ pitā vidvān gṛhṇīyāc chulkam aṇv api 
gṛhṇañ chulkaṃ hi lobhena syān naro 'patyavikrayī 
āsure śulkapratiṣedho 'yam uttaratra ca kanyārthasaṃgrahopādānāt 
vidvān grahadoṣajñaḥ 
kanyāpitā svalpam apy arthaṃ dhanaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt 
gṛhṇāno 'patyavikrayadoṣeṇa yujyate 
kaḥ punar eṣaḥ śulko nāma 
ābhāṣaṇapūrvaṃ varād gṛhītam 
yatra tūccanīcapaṇāpaṇo bhavati kanyāguṇāpekṣamūlyavyavasthā sa kraya eva 
iha tu mahāguṇāyā api kanyāyāḥ svalpaṃ dhanam 
anābhāṣaṇapūrvaṃ vā grahaṇam 
na vikrayasyaiṣa dharma ity ato vikrayādhyāropeṇa nindyate 
strīdhanāni tu ye mohād upajīvanti bāndhavāḥ 
nārīyānāni vastraṃ vā te pāpā yānty adhogatim 
pūrvasyaiva śeṣaḥ 
strīnimittāni dhanāni kanyādāne varād yāni gṛhyante 
ye bāndhavāḥ pitrādayaḥ mohād upajīvanti 
yathoktaṃ jñātibhyo draviṇaṃ datvā iti 
suvarṇarajatādi dhanam 
nārīyānāni 
yānam aśvādi 
vastraṃ vā 
etāvanmātram api na jātūpajīvanīyaṃ vāso yānādi kiṃ punar bahu 
upajīvatāṃ phalam ācaṣṭe 
te pāpāḥ śāstrapratiṣiddhasamācaraṇād adhogatiṃ narakaṃ yānti 
atha vā strīdhanānīti navame darśayiṣyati 
tāni ye mohād upajīvanti bāndhavāḥ pitā tatpakṣāś ca bhartā bhartṛpakṣāś ca 
evaṃ yānādi 
evaṃ vastram 
strīṇām buddhau saṃnidhānāc chābdaḥ saṃnidhiḥ kalpyate yathā rājapuruṣaḥ kasya 
rājñaḥ iti 
ārṣe gomithunaṃ śulkaṃ kecid āhur mrṣaiva tat 
alpo 'py evaṃ mahān vāpi tāvān eva sa vikrayaḥ 
strīgavī ca puṃgavaś ca gomithunam 
kecid āhur etad ādeyam iti 
manos tu mataṃ mṛṣaiva tat mithyā 
nādeyam ity arthaḥ 
alpo 'py evam 
alpasādhano 'lpaḥ 
evaṃ mahān bhavati 
tāvān eva vikrayaḥ 
yāsāṃ nādadate śulkaṃ jñātayo na sa vikrayaḥ 
arhaṇaṃ tat kumārīṇām ānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca kevalam 
kiṃ varād dhanādhigamo vikrayo bhavati 
neti brūmaḥ 
jñātayaḥ kanyāyām adhikṛtāḥ svārtham ādadate gṛhṇanti tadā sa vikrayaḥ 
arhaṇaṃ kanyārthe dhanagrahaṇaṃ kanyānāṃ tad arhaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ bhavati 
bahumānaḥ kanyānām ātmani bhavati īdṛśyo vayaṃ yad dhanaṃ datvā vivāhyāmahe 
anyatrāpi pūjyā bhavanti subhagā etāḥ iti 
ābharaṇādi vā tena dhanena kartavyam ato 'bhyarhitāḥ śobhāvatyo bhavanti 
ānṛśaṃsyam apāpatvaṃ kevalaṃ na svalpo 'py adharmagandho 'sti 
ato 'nenārthavādena kanyārthaṃ dhanagrahaṇaṃ vidhīyate 
pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś caitāḥ patibhir devarais tathā 
pūjyā bhūṣāyitavyāś ca bahukalyāṇam īpsubhiḥ 
na kevalaṃ varād ādāya dātavyaṃ kanyābandhubhir api tu tair api dātvyam 
pitṛbhiḥ sāhacaryāt pitṛśabdaḥ pitāmahapitṛvyādiṣu vartate 
tato bahuvacanaṃ 
vyaktyapekṣaṃ vā bahuvacanam 
evaṃ patibhiḥ śvaśurādibhir vyaktyapekṣaṃ vā 
devarāh patyur bhrātaraḥ 
pūjyāh 
putrajanmādyutsaveṣu nimantraṇapūrvakamānāśrayabahumānam ādareṇa bhojanādinā pūjyāḥ 
bhūṣayitavyāḥ 
vastrādyalaṃkāreṇāṅgalepanādibhir maṇḍayitavyāḥ 
atra phalaṃ bahukalyāṇam īpsubhiḥ 
kalyāṇaṃ kamanīyaṃ putradhanādisaṃpadarogatāparibhava ityādi bahuśabdāt sarvam īpsubhir āptum icchubhiḥ prāptukāmaiḥ 
phalārthī vidhir ayam 
yatra nāryas tu pūjyante ramante tatra devatāḥ 
yataitās tu na pūjyante sarvās tatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ 
devatā ramante tuṣyanti prasīdanti 
prasannāś ca svāmina evābhipretena phalena yojayanti 
yatra tu na pūjyante tatra sarvāḥ kriyāḥ yāgahomadānādyā devatārādhanabuddhyā copahārādayo yāḥ kriyante 'phalās tā ity arthavādaḥ 
vaivādhike 'gnau kurvīta gṛhyam karma yathāvidhi 
pañcayajñavidhānaṃ ca paktiṃ cānvāhikīṃ gṛhī 
atikrāntaṃ vivāhaprakaraṇam 
kṛto vivāho yasminn agnau tatra kurvīta gṛhyaṃ karma agnisādhyam aṣṭakāpārvaṇaśrāddhahomādi gṛhyasmṛtikārair uktam 
pañcayajñā vakṣyamāṇās teṣāṃ vidhānam anuṣṭhānam tasminn evāgnau 
yady apy aviśeṣeṇa pañcayajñavidhānam ity uktaṃ tathāpi vaiśvadevahomo 'gnisādhyaḥ udakatarpaṇādau tu na kiṃcid agninā kāryam 
kathaṃ tarhi nirdeśo 'gnau pañcayajñavidhānaṃ kāryam iti 
kecid āhur ekāpi saptamī viṣayabhedād bhidyate 
tasmāt pañcayajñaikadeśe pañcayajñaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 
atha vā pañcayajñavidhānam ity atra agnāu iti na saṃbadhyate vaiśvadevahomasya pūrveṇaivāgnyadhikaraṇasya siddhatvāt 
evaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyate gṛhī tu pañcayajñavidhānaṃ kuryāt 
agnau tu vaivāhike gṛhyakarmapaktiṃ cānvāhikīm agnāv ity apekṣyate 
gṛhaśabdo dāravacanaḥ 
gṛhī tu sa kṛtadāraparigraho bhāryādvitīya idam idaṃ kuryād iti 
vivāhe cāgniḥ kaiścid gṛhyakārair araṇinirmanthanād ādhātavya ity uktam 
aparair yataḥ kutaścid dīpyamānam ānīya hotavyam iti 
anena tasmin gṛhyam iti vacanena dhāraṇam agner arthād uktaṃ bhavati 
atra kecid āhuḥ 
śūdrasyāpi vaivāhikāgnidhāraṇam asti tasyāpi pākayajñādhikārāt 
na cātra jātiviśeṣa upāttaḥ kevalaṃ gṛhī iti śrutam 
śūdro 'pi gṛhī tasyāpi dāraparigrahasyoktatvāt 
etad evānyatra paṭhitam 
karma smārthaṃ vivāhāgnau kurvīta prayahaṃ gṛhī 
iti 
atrocyate 
gṛhyaṃ karma vaivāhike 'gnāv iti śrutam 
na ca gṛhyaṃ nāma kiṃcit karmāsti 
tatra gṛhyasmṛtikāroktaṃ gṛhyam iti lakṣaṇayā mantavyam 
gṛhyakāraiś ca traivarṇikānāṃ eva karmāmnātam na śūdrasya uktāni vaitānikāni gṛhyāṇi vakṣyāmaḥ iti 
uktānukīrtanasya etad eva prayojanaṃ yeṣām eva vaitānikeṣv adhikāras teṣām eva gṛhyeṣv iti na punar yathānyair vyākhyātaṃ tad dharmaprātyartham 
tādarthye hi vivakṣite tasyāgnihotreṇa prāduṣkaraṇahomakālau vyākhyātau iti nāvakṣyat 
na ca gṛhe bhavaṃ gṛhyam iti yuktam 
śālāvacano gṛhaśabdo dāravacano vā 
na tāvat kasyacit karmaṇaḥ śālādhikaraṇatvena viśeṣataḥ samāmnātā yad gṛham ity anūdya gṛhiṇo vidhīyate 
yad api gṛhasaṃskārakaṃ vāstuparīkṣādi tad api traivarṇikānām eva na śūdrasya 
atha dāravacanas tatrāpi gṛhīty anenaiva gatatvān na kiṃcit 
yad api smṛtyantaram
karma smārtaṃ vivāhāgnau kurvīta pratyahaṃ gṛhī 
dāyakālāhrte vāpi śrautaṃ vaitānikāgniṣu 
iti atrāpi kiṃcit smārtam iti viśeṣānupādānād anyasāpekṣataiva 
na hi sarvam agnau smārtaṃ karma saṃbhavati 
na ca homaviṣayatve pramāṇam asti 
na hy avaśyam agnyadhikaraṇa eva homaḥ 
tasmād gṛhyakāroktaṃ gṛhyam iti vaktavyam 
ete hi smṛtī gṛhyakāravihitaṃ karmānuvadataḥ 
tathā ca kutaḥ śūdrasyāgniparigrahaḥ 
kiṃ ca śrautaṃ vaitānikāgniṣu iti aparaṃ tatrāmnāyate tatra avaśyam ayaṃ traivarṇikaviṣaya eṣitavyaḥ 
sa eva pūrvatra cāturvarṇyapara uttaratra traivarṇikapara ity ekasya śabdasya tātparyabhedo 'bhyupagataḥ syāt 
na cābhede saṃbhavati bhedo nyāyyaḥ 
anvahaṃ bhavānvāhikī 
pratidivasaṃ yaḥ pāko bhuktyarthaḥ sa tasminn evāgnau kartavyaḥ 
pañcasūnā gṛhasthasya cullī peṣaṇy upaskaraḥ 
kaṇḍanī codakumbhaś ca vadhyate yās tu vāhayan 
pañcayajñavidher adhikāranirdeśo 'yam 
sūnā iva sūnāḥ 
māṃsavikrayārthapaśuvadhasthānam āpaṇadayo vā māṃsasyotpādakatayānuṣṭhīyamānāḥ pāpahetavaḥ 
evaṃ cullyādayo 'pi pāpahetutvād adhyāropeṇa sūnāsamāḥ 
na hi teṣāṃ śāstrapratiṣedhaḥ sākṣāt 
nāpi sāmānyaḥ kaścit pratiṣedho 'sti 
na hi tāpaghātāya kasyacin na spṛhā syāt 
na kācit tatsādhyakriyā dṛśyate yā vacanāntareṇa niṣiddhā 
na cāsmād eva vacanāt pratiṣedhānumānam uttareṇaikavākyatāvagamāt 
pratiṣedhaparatve vākyabhedaḥ syāt 
kiṃ caitatpadārthasādhyām arthakriyāṃ padārthāntareṇa sādhayet tasyāḥ prāptiṃ pañcayajñānām 
na ca lakṣaṇāny uktāni 
yena tatsamānakāryasyānyasyāpi pratiṣedha ucyate 
yo vā parakīyam annam adhyān nadyādāv udakārthaṃ kuryāt tasyaite yajñāḥ syuḥ 
yadi ca cullyādīnāṃ niṣedho 'bhipretaḥ syāt tadā pratiṣedhārthīyam eva padam adhīyīta kim anumānena 
svaśabdād balīyasī pratipattiḥ 
prāyaścittārthatve tv ekādaśe 'bhidhānaṃ yuktam 
niṣedhair evānanuṣṭhānam eva syāt 
aparihāryatvāc ca cullyādīnām aśakyo niṣedhaḥ 
asati ca niṣedhe kutaḥ prāyaścittam 
tasmān na doṣavighātārthaṃ pañcamahāyajñāḥ 
kiṃ tarhi nityasaṃbandheṣu cullyādiṣv āropitāsaddoṣaniṣkṛtyarthatayā nityārthatayā nityatvaṃ yajñānām āha 
vadhyate 
ādivarṇaṃ vety etad dantoṣṭhyaṃ paṭhyate 
hanyate duṣkṛtena śarīradhanādinā nāśyate 
saṃbadhyate vā pāpena paratantrīkaraṇaṃ vā badhnāter arthaḥ 
vāhayan 
svakārye vyāparaṇaṃ vāhanam

peṣaṇī dṛṣadupalo vā 
upaskaro gṛhopayogi bhāṇḍaṃ kuṇḍakaṭāhādi 
kaṇḍanī yayā vrīhyādi kaṇḍyate 
kumbho jalādhāraḥ 
tāsāṃ krameṇa sarvāsāṃ niṣkṛtyarthaṃ maharṣibhiḥ 
pañca kḷptā mahāyajñāḥ pratyahaṃ gṛhamedhinām 
tāsāṃ cullyādīnāṃ sūnānāṃ niṣkṛtyarthaṃ tadutpannadoṣaniryātanārthaṃ krameṇādhilepanaṃ cullyāś takṣaṇaṃ peṣaṇyā ity evamādikramaḥ 
maharṣibhiḥ kḷptāḥ kartavyatayā smṛtāḥ pañca mahāyajñāḥ 
pratyahaṃ gṛhamedhināṃ gṛhasthānām 
gṛhamedhiśabdo gṛhasthāśrame vartate 
pratyaham iti 
anupādānāt kālaviśeṣasya yāvajjīvam iti pratīyate 
ataś ca nityatvasiddhiḥ 
mahāyajñā iti karmanāmadheyam etat 
adhyāpanaṃ brahmayajñaḥ pitṛyajñas tu tarpaṇam 
homo daivo balir bhauto nṛyajño 'tithipūjanam 
eṣām ayaṃ svarūpavidhiḥ 
adhyāpanaśabdenādhyayanam api gṛhyate yena japo 'hutaḥ ity atra vakṣyati 
na ca japo 'pi śiṣyān apekṣate 
sāmānyena ca śrutaṃ svādhyāyenarṣibhyaḥ ity ṛṇāvedanaśrutau 
ata ubhe adhyāpanādhyayane yathāsaṃbhavaṃ brahmayajñaḥ 
tarpaṇam annādyenodakena veti vakṣyati 
homo vakṣyamāṇābhyo devatābhyo 'gnau 
baliḥ śiṣṭa ulūkhalādau ca 
sa bhautaḥ 
bhūtādidevatāsyeti bhautaḥ 
nāmadheyam etat karmaviśeṣasya 
divācāribhyo bhūtebhya iti hi tatra baliharaṇaṃ bhūtaśabdena vihitam 
sāhacaryāt sarva eṣa karmagaṇo bhūtayajñaśabdenocyate 
yathā cāturmāsyeṣv ekaṃ havir vaiśvadevam āmikṣā kṛtsnam eva ca parva vaiśvadevena yajeteti 
baliśabdo 'nagnihome vartate 
devejyābalir iti smaranti 
atithīnāṃ pūjanam ārādhanāṃ nṛyajñaḥ 
nanu ca svādhyāyaḥ kathaṃ yajñaḥ 
na hi tatra devatā ijyante nāpi śrūyante 
kevalaṃ vedākṣarāṇy avivakṣitārthāny uccāryante 
uktaṃ cāmnāyaśabdābhyāse kecid āhur anarthakānīti 
satyam 
stutyāṃ yajñasabdo bhāktaḥ mahacchabdaś ca 
atithipūjāyām api bhākto yajñaśabdaḥ 
yady apy atither devatātvaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpy utpattau bhojayet pūjayed iti ca śrutaṃ nātithibhyo yajeteti 
yathā puruṣarājāya yat karma vā iti 
ete pañcayajñā na yugapat prayojyāḥ ekādhikārāsaṃbandhāt pṛthag adhikāraśravaṇāt 
ekādhikārasaṃbandhatve triṣu caturṣu vā kṛteṣu na kiṃcit kṛtaṃ syād yāvat kṛtaṃ ca na krtaṃ 
yathāgneyāgnīṣomīyopāṃśuyāgānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsayāgānām ekadvyanuṣṭhāne nādhikārasiddhiḥ 
yathātraiva vaiśvadevahome sviṣṭakṛdantānāṃ devatānāṃ kasyāṃścid antarāye na homādhikāranirvṛttiḥ 
ekaikasya cātrādhikāraḥ śrutaḥ 
svādhyāye nityayuktaḥ syāt daive ca nityayuktaḥ syāt iti 
adhikārapadānuṣaṅgeṇa pṛthakprayogaḥ 
ātithye cādhikārāntaraṃ śrutaṃ dhanyaṃ yaśasyam iti 
tatra catvāraḥ svādhīnāḥ ātithyaṃ tu saṃnihite 'tithau 
na cātithir nimantrayitavyaḥ ātithyābhāvāt 
svayam upasthito hy atithir bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ 
tasmāt pañcānām anyatamānuṣṭhāne itareṣām ananuṣṭhānād yadi nāma pratyaveyān na tu kṛtaṃ akṛtaṃ bhavati 
ato 'nagnikatvād vaiśvadeve 'nadhikṛtasya svādhyāyodakatarpaṇādau bhavaty evādhikāraḥ 
agniparigrahasya ca smṛtyantare kālāntarasyāpi śrutatvān nāvaśyaṃ vivāha eva parigrahaḥ 
evaṃ hi smṛtiḥ bhāryādir agnir dāyādir vā iti 
nanu cākṛtavivāhasya dāyakālam ādhānaṃ bhaviṣyati 
bhavati hy etad evaṃ yady ādhānavidhiḥ svārthaḥ syāt 
agnyarthaṃ tv ādhānam 
agniś ca karmārthaḥ 
karmāṇi ca bhāryādvitīyasya na kevalasya śrutāni 
yad api kaiścid gṛhyakāraiḥ parameṣṭhiprāṇāgnim ādhāya śrāddhaṃ kuryād ity uktaṃ bhavati tad api sabhāryasyaiva 
sa evāsya dāyakālaḥ 
na cānagnikasya śrāddhaṃ nāsti 
anupanītasyāpi hy etad vihitam anyatra svadhāninayanāt iti 
na ca tasyādhānam asti viduṣo 'dhikārād idānīṃ cāvidyatvāt 
śrāddhaṃ tu vacanān niṣādasthapativad yathāśakti kāryam iti 
pitṛvyādināgniparigrahe tu viduṣāṃ saṃbhavān nāvaidyasyādhikāraḥ 
atha śrāddhaprakaraṇa evāgnyādhānaṃ vihitaṃ tadā tadaṅgatvenādhāya niṣpanne śrāddhe parityāgo bhaviṣyati 
kecit tu smṛtyantaram udāharanti laukike 'py agnau vaiśvadevahomaḥ kartavyaḥ 
śuṣkānnair apare 
pañcaitān yo mahāyajñān na hāpayati śaktitaḥ 
sa gṛhe 'pi vasan nityaṃ sūnādoṣair na lipyate 
nityatvam atra vidhīyate 
anyad anūdyate 
viguṇā apy ete yathāśakti kartavyāḥ 
etad api nityatvāt prāptam eva 
tasmād yathāsaṃbhavaṃ śaktita iti 
ādyāditvāt tasiḥ 
hāpayatīti prakṛtyartha eva ṇijarthasyāvivakṣitatvāt 
atha vā hananaṃ hā saṃpadāditvāt kvip tām āpayatīti ṇyat āpnoteḥ kartari kvip tadantāt prātipadikād dhātvarthe ṇic 
na hāpayati na tyajed ity arthaḥ 
svagṛhe vasann avaśyabhāvinīṣu sūnāsu na tatpāpena saṃbadhyata iti praśaṃsā 
devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ pitṝṇām ātmanaś ca yaḥ 
na nirvapati pañcānām ucchvasan na sa jīvati 
ananuṣṭhānanindayā prakṛtavidhistutiḥ 
kecic caturthyā paṭhanti
devatātithibhṛtyebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś cātmane tathā 
na nirvapati pañcabhyaḥ  iti 
nirvāpo hy atra dānam na tādarthyopakalpanamātram 
tatsaṃbandhena pradhānatvāc caturthī yuktā
