etebhyo yaḥ pratyahaṃ na dadāty ucchvasann api prāṇann api śvāsapraśvāsavān api na jīvati mṛta eva jīvitaphalābhāvāt 
bhṛtyāś cātra vṛddhau tu mātāpitarau iti ślokanirdiṣṭā veditavyāḥ na dāsāḥ karmanimittatvāt tebhyo dānasya 
atha vā garbhadāsādayo vārddhake karmasv aśaktā api niyamato lakṣyante 
bharaṇaṃ jīrṇagavādīnām avaśyam iti vibhāge vakṣyāmaḥ 
uktaṃ ca gautamena bhartavyas tena kṣīṇavṛttiḥ 
devatābhyaś ca nirvāpo 'gnau homaḥ sthaṇḍile ca baliharaṇaṃ tu vaiśvadevebhyo darśapūrṇamāsadevatābhya iti vā agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi iti saṃbandhād anyaḥ ko vāsti nirvāpaḥ 
ato devatāgrahaṇena gṛhītatvād bhūtānāṃ pṛthag upādānam 
ātmagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
yathātmano bhojanena vinā nāsti jīvitaṃ tadartham annopayogo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī jīvitasyeṣṭaviṣayatvāt sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti vidheś ca evaṃ devatādibhyo 'pīti 
ahutaṃ ca hutaṃ caiva tathā prahutam eva ca 
brāhmyaṃ hutaṃ prāśitaṃ ca pañcayajñān pracakṣate 
etaiḥ śabdaiḥ kasyāṃcid vedaśākhāyām eteṣāṃ vidhānam 
ataḥ śrutimūlatāṃ pañcayajñavidhānasya darśayituṃ tatprasiddhyā punar nirdiśati 
yaś cāhutādiśabdair uddiśya tatprakaraṇe vā kaścid dharmo vihita iti noktaḥ so 'pi grahītavya iti saṃjñāntaranirdeśe dvitīyaṃ prayojanam 
yathā brahmayajñaśrāddhodvāhaparikriyetyādi 
japo 'huto huto homaḥ prahuto bhautiko baliḥ 
brāhmyam hutaṃ dvijāgryārcā prāśitaṃ pitṛtarpaṇam 
yo 'yam ahuto nāma yajña uktaḥ sa japo veditavyaḥ 
svādhyāyenārcayed ṛṣīn iti śravaṇād vedādhyayanaṃ japārthaḥ 
yad vā mānase vyāpāre smaraṇam 
ubhayatrāpi japatiḥ paṭhyate vyaktāyāṃ vāci mānase ceti 
agnau homo hutam 
bhūtabaliḥ prahutam 
yady apy ayaṃ homas tathāpy agnau bāhulyena homānāṃ prasiddher bhūtayajño na homa ity āśaṅkāyāṃ prahuta ity uktam 
prakarṣeṇāsau homa iti stutyā 
dvijāgryānāṃ brāhmaṇānām arcā brāhmyaṃ hutam 
ātithyakarma dvijāgryārcā 
svādhyāye nityayuktaḥ syād daive caiveha karmaṇi 
daivakarmaṇi yukto hi bibhartīdaṃ carācaram 
yad uktaṃ pañcasu mahāyajñeṣv ekaikasmin pṛthagadhikāro na samudāya eko 'dhikāra iti tad anena prakaṭīkroti 
yadā dāridryādidoṣād anyato vā kāraṇāt kathaṃcid asaṃpattau nātithyādipūjā ghaṭeta tataḥ svādhyāye nityayuktena bhavitavyam 
daive karmaṇi 
vaiśvadevadevatābhyo 'gnau homo daivaṃ karma 
bhūtayajñapitṛyajñayoḥ saty api daivatve prakaraṇād agnāv eva homo daivam ucyate 
atra arthavādam āha 
daive karmaṇi yuktaḥ tatparo bibharti dhārayati carācaraṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca 
sarvasya jagataḥ sthiter hetur bhavatīty arthaḥ 
kathaṃ punar agnyāhutyā sarvasya jagataḥ sthitir bhavatīty ata āha 
agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityam upatiṣṭhate 
ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ 
agnau yajamānena prāstā kṣiptā āhutir hūyamānaṃ carupuroḍāśādy ucyate 
ādityam adṛśyena rūpeṇa prāpnoti 
sarvarasānām āhartādityo 'ta āhutirasasyādityaprāptir ucyate 
ataḥ sa rasa ādityaraśmiṣu kālena paripakvo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa jāyate 
tato 'nnaṃ vrīhyādi 
tataḥ prajāḥ sarvaprāṇinaḥ 
evam agnau juhvat sarvajagadanugrahe vartate yajamānaḥ 
pūrvasya vidheḥ śeṣo 'yam na punar yathāśrutārthaniṣṭhaḥ 
tattve hi vṛṣṭikāmasyādhikāraḥ syāt 
na ca tacchrutam 
prakṛtaśeṣatayānvayasaṃbhave na kalpanāyā avasaraḥ 
yathā vāyuṃ samāśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥ 
tathā gṛhastham āśritya vartante itarāśramāḥ 
apareṇa prakāreṇa mahāyajñānām avaśyakartavyatāṃ darśayati 
vāyuḥ prāṇas tam āśritya sarve jīvanti 
na hy aprāṇasya jīvitam asti prāṇadhāraṇam eva jīvanam 
jantuśabdaḥ prāṇimātravacanaḥ 
sarvagrahaṇaṃ devarṣīṇām apy atiśayayuktānāṃ vāyvāyattam eva jīvanam 
evaṃ gṛhasthaḥ prāṇatulyaḥ sarvāśramiṇām 
ataḥ sarvopajīvanīyena bhavitavyam iti vidhyarthaḥ 
itaragrahaṇād yady api gṛhasthād anya āśramiṇaḥ pratīyante tathāpi na gṛhasthapratiṣedhārtham etat 
snātakasya hi viśeṣeṇātithyādidānaṃ vihitam 
tasmād itaragrahaṇaṃ gṛhasthāśramatulyatārtham 
na ca śrūyate nātmanātmani vartante śarīrakuṭumbasthitiṃ prāpnuvanti 
itare ca ta āśramā itarāśramā iti samāsaḥ 
yasmāt trayo 'py āśramiṇo jñānenānnena cānvaham 
gṛhasthenaiva dhāryante tasmāj jyeṣṭhāśramo gṛham 
yasmāt trayo 'py āśramiṇo jñānena vedārthavyākhyānajanyena annena ca dhāryanta upakriyante gṛhasthena tasmāj jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha āśramo gṛham 
gṛhīti pāṭhe bahuvrīhiḥ gṛham iti pāṭhe viśeṣaṇasamāso jyeṣṭhāśrama iti 
atrāpi gṛhasthair evety aucityānuvādaḥ na vānaprasthādīnām adhyāpanādipratiṣedhaḥ 
vānaprasthasya tāvad vihitam etat etān eva mahāyajñān nirvapet iti 
pravrajitasya yady api samo bhūteṣu hiṃsānugrahayoḥ anārambhī ity anugrahaḥ pratiṣiddhas tathāpi vedārthavyākhyānaṃ bhikṣuśātre vihitam 
jñānavairāgyabhāvanābhyāsātiśayavidhānāc ca tayor nātiprayatno vedārthavyākhyāne 
brahmacāriṇas svārthalopān nādhyāpakatvam bhaikṣavṛttyupadeśāc ca kuto 'nnadānam 
ato gṛhasthānām eva prāyeṇa tatsaṃbhavād evam uktaṃ gṛhasthair eva 
sa saṃdhāryaḥ prayatnena svargam akṣayam icchatā 
sukhaṃ cehecchatātyantaṃ yo 'dhāryo durbalendriyaiḥ 
sa gṛhāśramaḥ 
prayatnena saṃdhāryo 'nuṣṭheyo 'kṣayasvargakāmeneha ca sukham icchatā 
atyantaṃ yasya sukhasyānto nāsti 
atyantaśabdo nityatāṃ gamayati 
ya āśramo 'dhāryo 'śakyo dhārayituṃ durbalendriyaiḥ 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yataḥ strīsaṃbhogasusaṃskṛtabhojanādi gṛhasthasyāvaśyaṃbhāvi tataś cendriyāṇāṃ viṣayasaktau doṣaḥ ata ucyate prayatnena āśramāntarebhyo dhārayitavyaḥ 
atrāpi mahān indriyasaṃyamaḥ 
anṛtau na gantavyam paradārā na gantavyāḥ śeṣānnaṃ bhoktavyam 
viṣayasaṃnidhāne yo niyamaḥ sa duṣkaraḥ 
svargam akṣayam iti 
nānena sarveṣāṃ gṛhasthakarmaṇāṃ svargaphalatocyate keṣāṃcin nityatvāt keṣāṃcit phalāntaraśravaṇāt 
ye 'py aśrutaphalāḥ svargaphalatayā kalpyante teṣām api kevalānām anuvāde na kaścid viśeṣaṇe hetuḥ 
tasmād vihitābhipretaphalānuvādo 'yam 
na cādhikārāntaram idam 
teṣām eva yāvajjīvikaṃ svargakāmasyeti ca śakyaṃ vaktum 
sukhaṃ cehecchatā ityavidheyena tulyatvāvagamāt 
na hīha sukhakāmenety etac chakyaṃ karmaphalatayā jñātum viśeṣasyānirdeśāt 
sarvā hi prītir grāmaputrādilābhair viśeṣair avacchinnā pratīyate 
anavacchedena prītimātraṃ cet svarga eva 
na ca tasyaihikatvam 
tasmād dṛṣṭasukhāptikāmānuvādo 'yam 
aniketā hy anya āśramiṇo vṛkṣamūlaniketanāḥ paragṛhavāsino duḥkham āsate 
tasmād ayaṃ tāvad anuvādaḥ 
tattulyatayāyam apy anuvāda eva 
ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā bhūtāny atithayas tathā 
āśāsate kuṭumbibhyas tebhyaḥ kāryaṃ vijānatā 
ete kuṭumbibhyo gṛhibhyaḥ sakāśād arthayante āditsanti 
ātmopakāralipsāśāsanam ākāṅkṣā 
atas tebhyo devādibhyaḥ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vihitahomādi vijānatā śāstrasthitam 
kuṭumbaṃ dārāḥ 
prākṛtapuruṣeṇāpi yā mahāyāsopanibaddhā sā na yuktā viphalīkartuṃ kiṃ punar devatāstutiḥ 
svādhyāyenārcayetarṣīn homair devān yathāvidhi 
pitṝñ chrāddhaiś ca nṝn annair bhūtāni balikarmaṇā 
svādhyāyam adhīyīta iti ya evārthaḥ sa eva svādhyāyenārcayed ṛṣīn iti 
yad bhavati śrāddhādareṇa pādyārghamālyānulepanena tad arcocyate 
stutivacanaṃ cedam 
na cobhayor api svādhyāyaṛṣipūjayoḥ karaṇam 
agnyādidevatās tāvakā mantrā ṛṣīn abhiṣṭuvanti 
tasmāt praśaṃsāmātram ṛṣīn svādhyāyenārcayed iti 
atha vā neha marīcyādaya ṛṣayo 'bhipretāḥ kiṃ tarhi vedā eva 
svādhyāyaśabdaś ca kriyāśabdo nātra vedavacano yathā svādhyāho 'dhyetavyaḥ iti 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati adhyayanena vedān pūjayet yathāvidhy abhyaset anyathā pūjāyā asaṃbhavāt 
atrāpy arcā bhākta eva 
na hi home devatā pradhānā kārakaṃ hi devateti 
pitiṝn śrāddhena 
atra yathāśruta eva niyogaḥ 
sa ca śrāddhavidhau nirṇeṣyate 
nṝn atithibhikṣuprabhṛtīn arcayet 
arcāpūrvakam annaṃ tebhyo dadyād ity arthaḥ 
dadyād ahar ahaḥ śrāddham annādyenodakena vā 
payomūlaphalair vāpi pitṛbhyaḥ prītim āvahan 
dadyāt kuryāt 
ahar ahaḥ pratidivasam 
śrāddham 
nāmnā dharmātideśaḥ 
śrāddhaṃ nāma pitryaṃ karmāmāvāsyāyāṃ vihitam 
tadīyetikartavyatā śrāddham ity anena nāmnātidiśyate 
annādyeneti 
tilair vrīhiyavaiḥ ityāder anuvādo 'yam 
uttaratra vivakṣitārthaḥ 
udekeneti 
payaḥ kṣīram 
ekam apy āśayed vipraṃ pitrarthaṃ pāñcayajñike 
na caivātrāśayet kiṃcid vaiśvadevaṃ prati dvijam 
śrāddhaśabdena vidhānāt sarvasmiṃs tadvidhāne prāpte kaścid itikartavyatābhāgo nivartyate na caivātrāśayet kiṃcit 
nātrānvāhike śrāddhe vaiśvadevaṃ prati viśvān devān uddiśya dvijabhojanam 
atra kecid āhuḥ 
prāpte bhojana āśayed iti punarvacanam apūrvatvam asya darśayati 
tenaitāvad evaitac chrāddhaṃ yat pitṝn uddhiśya brāhmaṇa eko bhojyate na tv anyā kācid arghapātrādihomādyetikartavyatāsti 
brahmacaryaṃ svādhyāyaniṣedha ity evamādi na bhavati 
ekam apy āśayed vipram 
trayāṇāṃ niyamād ekaikam ubhayatrety asyāvidhitvād aprāpta eko vidhīyate 
ekam api bhojayet sati saṃbhave bahūn api 
pitrarthaṃ pitṛtṛptyartham 
pāñcayajñikam 
pañcayajñabhavaṃ pāñcayajñikaṃ tadantargatam 
pāñcayajñikaśabdaḥ śrāddhe prayuktaḥ 
na hy etat pāñcayajñikaṃ tarpaṇam 
tena tarpaṇabhojanayoḥ samuccayaḥ 
asya tu vikalpo bhaviṣyati yad eva tarpayaty adbhiḥ iti 
vaiśvadevasya siddhasya gṛhye 'gnau vidhipūrvakam 
ābhyaḥ kuryād devatābhyo brāhmaṇo homam anvaham 
viśvedevārtho vaiśvadevaḥ pāka ucyate 
sarvārtho viśvadevaśabdo 'pi saṃpradānamatropalakṣaṇārthaḥ 
tenātithyādyarthatāpy uktā bhavati 
siddhasya homam ābhyo vakṣyamāṇābhyo devatābhyaḥ kuryāt 
siddhaśabdena devatoddeśena devasya tveti mantravān nirvāpo na kartavyaḥ iti darśayati kevalaṃ sarvārthe niṣpannapāke homādi kartavyam iti vidhyarthaḥ 
gṛhye 
yathāvidhihomādikaraṇanirdeśaḥ 
vidhipūrvakaṃ samācāraprāptāṃ parisamūhanaparyukṣaṇādirupām itikartavyatām āha 
brāhmaṇaśabdas traivarṇikādhikārapradarśanārthaḥ 
anvahaṃ nityam ity arthaḥ 
devatāgrahaṇaṃ svāhākāraprāptyartham 
ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśād agner idam iti prayogaḥ syāt 
devatāśabdena tu svāhākāreṇa vā devebhyo haviḥ saṃpradīyata iti 
yājyānte punar vaṣaṭkārasya vidhānāt smārtahome tv abhāvaḥ 
svāhākāras tu sarvatra 
tasmiṃś ca sati agnaye svāhā iti prayogaḥ 
agneḥ somasya caivādau tayoś caiva samastayoḥ 
viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyo dhanvantaraya eva ca 
ādāv ity anuvādaḥ 
pāṭhakrameṇaivāgner ādau siddhatvāt te pṛthag āhutī 
tayoś ca samastayor agnīṣomābhyām iti viśvebhyo devebhya iti prayogaḥ 
ekaivāhutir dhanvantaraye svāhā 
kuhvaiḥ caivānumatyai ca prajāpataya eva ca 
saha dvyāvāpṛthivyoś ca tathā sviṣṭakṛte 'ntataḥ 
saha dvyāvāpṛthivyoḥ dvyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ svāheti 
tathā sviṣṭakṛte 'ntataḥ 
sviṣṭakṛd iti guṇapadam 
agniś ca guṇībhūtaḥ svataḥ 
smṛtyantare agnaye sviṣṭakṛte iti vacanāt śrutau sarvahomeṣv eva cāmnānāt 
antata iti pāṭhāt siddhe vacanaṃ smṛtyantare 'dhikānām āhutīnām āmnānāt sati samuccaye prāk sviṣṭakṛta āvāpaḥ kartavya iti darśayitum 
nanu caikatvād dhomasya devatāvikalpo yuktaḥ 
kutaḥ punar ekatvaṃ homasya 
iyam eva homānām utpattiḥ agneḥ somasya ca ityādi 
tatra cotpattāv eva devatāviśeṣeṇāvaruddhatvād bhinnā eva homāḥ pratīyante 
evaṃ samyag ghavir hutvā sarvadikṣu pradakṣiṇam 
indrāntakāppatīndubhyaḥ sānugebhyo baliṃ haret 
samyag ananyacittatayā devatādhyānaparaḥ 
evam etābhyo devatābhyo 'gnau hutvā tataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ 
parthamaṃ prācyāṃ tato dakṣiṇasyāṃ ity eṣa pradakṣiṇāvartaḥ 
indraḥ antikaḥ appatiḥ induḥ pratidiśam 
aparaś cāha ahavirbhāg indur iti 
yadi naitena śabdena baliharaṇaṃ syāt katham indor havirbhāktvam 
baliharaṇaṃ ca homa eveti vyākhyātam 
vṛttabhaṅgabhayāc cātra na śabdasya rūpavivakṣeti smṛtyantaropāttair eva śabdair uddeśaḥ kartavyaḥ 
sanugebhyaḥ 
anugā anucarās tatpuruṣāḥ tathā cendrapuruṣebhya ityādi prayogaḥ 
marudbhya iti tu dvāri kṣiped apsv adbhya ity api 
vanaspatibhya ity evaṃ musalolūkhale haret 
atretikaraṇaḥ rūpavivakṣārthaḥ 
apsv ity adhikaraṇam 
adbhya iti devatānirdeśaḥ 
vanaspatibhya iti musalolūkhale 
dvandvaikavadbhāve na vikalpitam ādhāradvayam 
nirdeśaguṇavṛttyā pradhānabhūtāyā āhuter āvṛttir yuktā 
na ca musalolūkhalasyaikīkṛtasyāhutisaṃbandhaḥ śakyaḥ kartum pṛthaktvasya tatrāpy upalambhāt 
na hi kṣīrodakavat anayor vyāmiśraṇasaṃbhavaḥ 
tatra yady ulūkhale kriyate netaratra homaḥ kṛtaḥ atholūkhale na musale 
na ca bhāgaśa āhutiḥ saṃbhavati niyataparimāṇatvāt 
dvandvanirdeśo 'tra saṃyuktayor anyataratra homo yuktaḥ 
ucchīrṣake śriyai kuryād bhadrakālyai ca pādataḥ 
brahmavāstoṣpatibhyāṃ tu vāstumadhye baliṃ haret 
ucchīrṣakaṃ prasiddhadevatāśaraṇaṃ śīrṣasthānam tatra śriyai baliṃ kuryāt 
pādataḥ adhobhāge gṛhasya bhadrakālyai 
tasyā api sthānaṃ dvārasya pūrvabhāge 
anye ucchīrṣakaṃ gṛhaśayanasya śirobhāgam āhuḥ pādau casyādhobhāgam 
tena khaṭvādāv ayaṃ homaḥ bhūpradeśe vā gṛhasthaśayanasthāne 
brahmavāstoṣpatibhyām 
saty api dvandvanirdeś pṛthag ete āhutī brahmaṇe vāstoṣpataya iti ca 
yatra tūbhayadevatātvam agnīṣomavat tatra sahagrahaṇaṃ samastagrahaṇaṃ vā karoti tayoś caiva samastayoḥ saha dyāvāpṛthivyoś ca iti aprasiddhasāhacaryāt 
vāstu gṛham tanmadhye 
viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyo balim ākāśa utkṣipet 
divācarebhyo bhūtebhyo naktaṃcāribhya eva ca 
caśabdād ekaiveyam āhutiḥ 
viśvebhyo devebhya iti gṛhākāśe gṛhān niṣkramya vā 
divā divācāribhyaḥ naktaṃ naktaṃcāribhyaḥ 
bhūtebhya ity anuṣajyate 
kecid ete āhutī sāyaṃprātar vibhāgenāhur divācārebhya iti 
tad ayuktam 
sāyam amantrahomaṃ vakṣyati 
etena mantrapratiṣedhena śabdoddeśyatā mā bhūn mānasas tūddeśaḥ kena nivāryate 
na ca tena vinā homasiddhiḥ 
etad eva tu vaktavyaṃ kṛto 'yaṃ vibhāgāvagamaḥ 
gṛhyakārair eveti cet astu 
pṛṣṭhavāstuni kurvīta baliṃ sarvānnabhūtaye 
pitṛbhyo baliśeṣaṃ tu sarvaṃ dakṣiṇato haret 
pūrvayor āhutyoḥ śeṣo 'yam 
ādhāravidhānārtham ādyo 'rdhaślokaḥ 
āvāsakasyopari ya āvāsas tat pṛṣṭhavāstu 
ekaśālāyā apy uparibhāgaḥ 
tatra baliṃ kurvīta divācāribhyo naktaṃcāribhyaś ca 
sarvānnabhūtaye 
tādarthye caturthī na saṃpradāne 
homādyaśrutatvād baliśabdasya pūrvaśeṣatvād ādhārāpekṣatvāc ca pūrvayor āhutyoḥ 
na kvacid api vaiśvadeve sarvānnabhūtir devatātvena smṛtyantare śrutā 
tasmād ayam asyārthaḥ 
sarveṣām annānāṃ kḷptyartham etac ca kartavyam etasmin baliharaṇe kṛte sarvāṇy annāni bhavanti 
avayavaprasiddhyā tv arthāvagama upapadyamāne samudāyārthakalpanam uktam 
devatāpekṣayā vā 'dṛṣṭaḥ kaścid arthaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ 
baliśeṣaṃ 
śeṣagrahaṇāt pātre samuddhṛtya tato homaḥ kartavyaḥ na tu sthālīsthād eva balidānāni grahītavyāni 
dakṣiṇataḥ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tadabhimukha iti yāvat 
sarvaṃ yāvan mātraṃ gṛhītam 
śunāṃ ca patitānāṃ ca śvapacāṃ pāparogiṇām 
vāyasāṃ ca kṛmīṇāṃ ca śanakair nirvaped bhuvi 
annaṃ pātre samuddhṛtya śvādīnām upakārāya bhuvi niḥkṣipet 
pāparogiṇaḥ kuṣṭhikṣayyādayaḥ 
vayāṃsi pakṣiṇaḥ 
śanakair bhūmyutthitarajasā yathā na saṃsṛjyeta 
bhūgrahaṇaṃ na pātrapratiṣedhāya kiṃ tarhi śvapacapatitakuṣṭhibhyo na haste dātavyam 
upakāravidhānaṃ cedam 
ata eva ṣaṣṭhyāyaṃ ślokaḥ paṭhyate na caturthyantena 
pakṣiṇāṃ tādṛgdeśe vidhātavyaṃ yatrābibhyataḥ śvādibhyaḥ khādanti 
kṛmīṇām iti tādṛśe deśe yatra teṣāṃ saṃbhavaḥ 
evaṃ yaḥ sarvabhūtāni brāhmaṇo nityam arcati 
sa gacchati paraṃ sthānaṃ tejomūrtiḥ patharjunā 
pūrvasyopasaṃhāraḥ 
sarvagrahaṇād anyeṣām api mṛgakukkuṭamārjārādīnāṃ grāme saṃbhavatām annenopakartavyam 
arcatir anugrahe na pūjāyāṃ śvādīnāṃ tadasaṃbhavāt 
avajñānapratiṣedhārthaṃ caivam upāttam nānugṛhṇātīti paṭhitam 
paraṃ sthānaṃ dhāma brahma prāpnoti 
patharjunā 
na saṃsārayonīr bahvīr bhrāmyati 
kiṃ punar etat phalavidhānam 
neti brūmaḥ 
nityo 'yaṃ vidhir ity uktam 
nitye ca phalaśravaṇam arthavādaḥ 
na hy atra vidhiḥ śrūyate 
gacchatīti vartamānāpadeśo 'yam 
tejomūrtiḥ kevalatejaḥśarīraḥ na pāñcabhautikaṃ śarīram abhisaṃbadhyate bodhasvabhāva eva bhavati 
niṣkalmaṣatā vānena lakṣyate 
śuddhaprakṛtir bhavatīty arthaḥ 
bhūtānukampanaṃ cedam 
asati śāstrātikrame pāpasaṃbandhasyābhāvāc chuddhatā yuktā 
itarathā pāpasya malarūpatvān na tejomūrtiḥ 
asati ca pāpe paraṃ dhāma śreṣṭham aduḥkharūpaṃ prāpnotīty etad api yuktam eva 
kṛtvaitad balikarmaivam atithiṃ pūrvam āśayet 
bhikṣāṃ ca bhikṣave dadyād vidhivad brahmacāriṇe 
atithilakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyati 
tam abhyāgataṃ santaṃ pūrvam āśayed bhojayet sarvabhoktṛbhyo gṛhasaṃnihitebhyaḥ 
bhikṣāṃ bhikṣave ca yācamānāya dadyāt 
bhikṣāśabdena svalpaparimāṇam annadānam ucyate 
uktaṃ hi prasṛtir bhikṣā 
antaḥpuraprasiddhaṃ caitat 
brahmacāriṇe vidhivat 
anyasmā api pākhaṇḍādirūpāya bhikṣave na vidhivad dātavyā 
brahmacāriṇe tu vidhivat svastivācanapūrvaṃ bhikṣādānam ity eṣa vidhiḥ 
atha vā bhikṣuḥ parivrāḍ brahmacārī prathamāśramī 
caśabdaś cāsthāne vṛttānurodhāt 
brahmacāriṇe ca iti paṭhitavyam 
evaṃ tu vānaprasthāya na dānaṃ syāt 
tasmād bhikṣate iti bhikṣuḥ tasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ brahmacārigrahaṇam 
tena tribhyo 'py āśramibhyo bhikṣādānaṃ niyamato 'nujñātaṃ bhavati 
pākhaṇḍādīnāṃ tu patitādivat 
sarvagrahaṇena bhikṣopakāro yathāśakti vihita eva 
yat puṇyaphalam āpnoti gāṃ dattvā vidhivad guroḥ 
tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti bhikṣāṃ dattvā dvijo gṛhī 
nityaṃ bhaktadānam arthine śaktito dātavyam 
idaṃ tv adhikārāntaram 
yad gurave gā dattvā phalam āpnoti tad bhikṣāṃ dattvā govratasyāviśiṣṭam iti 
smṛtyantare sarvaphalatā pāpapramocanārthatāpi godānasya śrutā 
yāvatām alpopakārāṇāṃ mahopakāraiḥ phalasāmyam ucyate teṣāṃ lokavat parimāṇataḥ phalaviśeṣo 'vagantavyaḥ 
prāpyate tad eva phalam na tu cirakālam 
āvācyo hy ayaṃ nyāyaḥ paṇalabhyaṃ hi kaḥ prājñaḥ krīṇāti daśabhiḥ paṇaiḥ iti 
samānaphalatve mahāprayāsānarthakyaṃ prāpnoti 
agur yathāvidhi iti kecit paṭhanti 
tatra nañalpavacano draṣṭavyo 'lpagur iti 
 puṇyaṃ dharmas tasya phalam 
bhikṣām apy udapātraṃ vā satkṛtya vidhipūrvakam 
vedatattvārthaviduṣe brāhmaṇāyopapādayet 
atha vidhivad ity uktam so 'yaṃ vidhir ucyate 
aprakṛtasyodapātrasya śravaṇaṃ sarvadā nṛṇām na bhikṣādānasyaiveti darśayitum 
satkṛtya pūjayitvā 
vidhiḥ pūrvo yasya dānasya tad vidhipūrvakam 
pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇavacanaḥ 
śāstranimittakam etad ity arthaḥ 
itikartavyatā vā vidhiḥ sā pūrvaṃ kartavyā 
uktaṃ ca pūrvaṃ bhikṣādānam dadāti satkṛtya pūjayitvā 
vedasya tattvārthaḥ pāramārthiko niḥsaṃśayo 'rthas taṃ vetti tasmai brāhmaṇāyopapādayed dadyāt 
brāhmaṇāyeti jātiniyamaḥ 
viduṣa iti guṇaniyamaḥ 
tena yat kiṃcid dātavyaṃ tad brāhmaṇāya tasmai ca vedārthavide pūjāpūrvakam ity arthatrayavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ dadāty arthoddeśena pauruṣeyatvān nānākārārthavidhānam 
prāpte dāne doṣaḥ 
naśyanti havyakavyāni narāṇām avijānatām 
bhasmabhūteṣu vipreṣu mohād dattāni dātṛbhiḥ 
pūrveṇa yādṛś deyaṃ tat patram uktam 
anenāpatre dadataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
naśyanti niṣphalāni bhavanti 
havyāni devatoddeśena yāni brāhmaṇabhojanādīni kriyante 
pitryakarmāṅgabhūtāny anyāni kavyāni śrāddhāni 
bhasmabhūteṣu 
bhasmatāṃ prāptā bhasmabhūtā 
upamāne vā bhūtaśabdaḥ bhasmānīva yathā kāṣṭhabhūta iti 
kiṃ punar bhasmanā sāmyam 
yathā tan na kvacid upayujyate 'vakararūpam apohyam evam īdṛśo brāhmaṇaḥ kriyābhyo 'pohitavya iti tātparyārthaḥ 
narāṇām avijānatāṃ naśyantīti saṃbandhaḥ 
mohād dattāni dātṛbhiḥ 
avijānatāṃ mohād iti cānuvādaḥ 
yac chāstreṇāpohitaṃ tan mohād eva kriyate 
kīdṛśāḥ punar abhasmabhūtāḥ 
tān āha 
vidyātapaḥsamṛddheṣu hutaṃ vipramukhāgniṣu 
nistārayati durgāc ca mahataś caiva kilbiṣāt 
vidyātapobhyāṃ samṛddhās tadvyatiriktā bhasmabhūtāḥ 
samṛddhir atiśayinī saṃpattiḥ 
bahuvidyaya mahatā ca tapasā yuktā evam ucyante 
samudāyasaṃbandhinī api vidyātapasī saṃbandhisaṃbandhād avayavabhūtamukhaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pratipadyete 
viprāṇāṃ mukhāny agnaya ity atra vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt samāsaḥ 
yathāgnau hutaṃ phalavad bhasmani hutaṃ niṣphalam evam īdṛśaṃ bhojanaṃ brāhmaṇamukhanikṣiptaṃ hutam iti bhojanam eva styutyocyate 
yāgahomādi mahāphalatayā prasiddham 
ataḥ prakhyātatamaguṇenāprakhyātam upamīyate 
nistārayati durgāt 
durgaṃ vyādhiśatrurājapīḍādijīvitam upasthitam 
tato nistārayati rakṣati na tena saṃmṛśyate 
mahataś ca pāpāt paraloke 'pi narakādigates trāyate 
na kevalam ābhyudayikakarmedṛkpātraviṣayam 
prāyaścittārtham api tadguṇāyaiva datavyam 
saṃprāptāya tv atithaye pradadyād āsanodake 
annaṃ caiva yathāśakti saṃskṛtya vidhipūrvakam 
saṃprāptāya svayam upasthitāya na tu nimantritāya 
na hi nimantrito 'tithir bhavati 
prāptideśaṃ ca vakṣyati bhāryā yatrāgnayo 'pi vā iti 
āsanodake dadyāt 
pādadhāvanopayogi prathamam udakaṃ tata āsanaṃ bhojanaṃ ca 
yathāśakti saṃskṛtyety annaviśeṣaṇam 
saviśeṣam annaṃ saṃskṛtya dadyād bhojayet 
vidhipūrvakam 
vidhiḥ pūrvo yasmin dāne tad evam ucyate 
vidhiḥ śāstraṃ tat pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ pramāṇam ity arthaḥ 
śilān apy uñchato nityaṃ pañcāgnīn api juhvataḥ 
sarvaṃ sukṛtam ādatte brāhmaṇo 'narcito vasan 
atyantadaridrasyāpy atithipūjāvyatikramo na yuktaḥ 
śilān kedāralavanaśeṣān 
uñchata uccinvataḥ 
etac ca vṛttisaṃkocopalakṣaṇārtham 
pañcāgnīn api juhvataḥ 
anena śāstrānuṣṭhānasaṃpanno 'tyantadaridraś ca yady atithim āgataṃ na pūjayaty annadānādinā tadā tadanuṣṭhānaṃ sa vṛttisaṃyamo niṣphalatām eti 
tataś ca sarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ puṇyam ādatte atithir gṛhṇāti niṣphalīkurute 
anarcito vasan 
tasmād arcayed iti vidhyarthaḥ 
vasann iti liṅgāt sāyam āgate vidhir ayam 
pañcāgnayas tretā gṛhyaḥ sabhyaś ca 
atha ko 'yaṃ sabhyo nāmāgniḥ 
evaṃ ha smāhuḥ 
grāmāntare proṣitasya yatra laukikapākaḥ kriyate mahāsādhanasya bahuveśmasu yo gṛhyāgārād eva śītāpanodārthaṃ vihriyate sa sabhyaḥ 
homas tarhi tatra kaḥ 
yāvatā tasmin gṛhyāṇi iti niyamaḥ 
asmād eva vacanāt vaiśvadevahomaḥ proṣitasya laukike 'py astīti manyante 
vrīhiyavaiḥ śuṣkadhānyair yatra lelihānaṃ susamiddhaṃ paśyet tatrābhijuhuyād iti smṛtivacanam udāharanti 
iha bhavantas tv āhuḥ 
upaniṣatsu pañcāgnividyoktā 
tatra teṣāṃ kalpitāgnirūpāṇi 
tadrūpeṇa yad upāsanaṃ yac ca vedanaṃ sa homa iti kalpyate 
sā hi sarvaśrautebhyaḥ karmabhyo 'tiśayaphaleṣyate 
evaṃ hi tatrāmnāyate steno hiraṇyasya surāṃ pibaṃś ca guros talpam āvasan brahmahā ca te patanti catvāraḥ saṃsargī ca 
pañcānām api yat phalaṃ tad atithāv ārādhite 'vimukhīkṛte naśyatīti praśaṃsātiśayenāvaśyakartavyatāṃ darśayati 
yady api prātarāśe 'py atithibhojananiyamaḥ sāyaṃ tu tadvyatikrame prāyaścittādhikyam 
yathāśaktīti pūrvaśloke 'nnaviṣayaṃ ye manyante ta evam āhur yathāśakty atithayaḥ pūjayitavyāḥ eko dvau bahava iti 
tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vākcaturthī ca sūnṛtā 
etāny api satāṃ gehe nocchidyante kadācana 
yadi dāridryāt sāyam annadānaṃ na ghaṭate tadā naivaṃ mantavyam pradhānam atither bhojanam tac ca me nāstīti kim anena madgṛhe praviṣṭena iti 
yato 'śaktasya tṛṇādidānenāpy ātithipūjāvidhiḥ syāt 
atha vā nāyaṃ vidhir bhojana eva paryavasyati kiṃ tarhi nivatsyataḥ śayanādi dātavyam 
tṛṇagrahaṇaṃ srastaropalakṣaṇārtham 
bhūmir āsanaśayanavihārasthānam 
sūnṛtā vāk priyahitavacanaṃ kathāprastāvādi vā 
etāny apy annābhāve satām āgatasyātither nocchidyante kiṃ tu dīyante sarvakālam 
ekarātraṃ tu nivasann atithir brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ 
anityaṃ hi sthito yasmāt tasmād atithir ucyate 
nātiprasiddho loke 'tithiśabdārtha iti tadarthalakṣaṇam āha 
ekarātraṃ vasataḥ paragṛhe 'tithitvam 
tac ca brāhmaṇasya na jātyantare 
dvitīye 'hni pūjāvidhau kāmacāraḥ 
abhyudayaviśeṣārthinas tadadhikāraḥ na naiyamikaḥ 
tathā cāpastambaḥ ekarātriṃ vāsayet pārthivāṃl lokān abhijayati dvitīyām āntarikāṃś tṛtīyāṃ divyān iti phalakāmasya dvitīyādirātriṣv adhikāraṃ darśayati 
atraiva nirvacanaṃ dārḍhyārtham āha anityaṃ hi sthitiḥ 
tiṣṭhater atipūrvasyāyaṃ śabdaḥ 
auṇādikaiḥ kathṃcid vyutpattiḥ
naikagrāmīṇam atithiṃ vipraṃ sāṃgatikaṃ tathā
upasthitaṃ gṛhe vidyād bhāryā yatrāgnayo 'pi vā 
ekasmin grāme yo vasati vaiśvadevakalopasthito 'pi nātithiḥ 
sāṃgatikaḥ sahādhyāyī sakhyur anyaḥ 
tasya hy uttaratra vidhir bhaviṣyati vaiśaśūdrau sakhā ca iti 
yo 'pi sarveṇa saṃgacchate vicitraparihāsakathādibhiḥ sāṃgatikaśabdena yuktaḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ prāg adṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi 
na ca gṛhasthasya proṣitasyāsya sarvalakṣaṇalakṣito 'py atithiḥ 
kiṃ tarhi upasthitaṃ gṛhe vidyāt 
yatrāsya nityaṃ sthānam vasatisthānam yad ucyate 
proṣitasyāpi bhāryā yatrāgnayaś ca tatrāsaṃnihitasyāpi gṛhasthasya bhavaty evātithiḥ 
ato yathā saṃvidhāyāgnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pravasati tadvad atithaye 'pi saṃvidhātavyam 
vāśabdāt tv evaṃ pratīyate 
bhāryāgnibhiḥ saha yadā pravāsas tadā bhavaty eva grāmāntarasthasyāpy atithiḥ 
asaṃnihitasyāpi gṛhe bhāryāgniṣu satsu 
tataś ca yadi bhāryayā saha pravased agnayaś ca gṛha eva bhaveyus tadā nātithipūjāniyama iti 
vāśabda upasthitaṃ gṛhe vidyād ity etadapekṣayā na parasparāpekṣayā bhāryāgnīnām 
upāsate ye gṛhasthāḥ parapākam abuddhayaḥ 
tena te pretya paśutāṃ vrajanty annādidāyinām 
upāsanaṃ tadabhyāsaḥ 
yo brāhmaṇo 'nayaiva buddhyā tatra tatropatiṣṭheta yathātithir avaśyaṃ bhojanaṃ labheta tasyeyaṃ nindā 
yas tacchīlaḥ parasya saṃbandhinaṃ pākam annam upāste na tu kadācit 
tena karmaṇā pretya paśutāṃ balīvardādijātiṃ vrajati prāpnoti 
annādidāyinas tadgṛhe dantitāṃ gardabhatām aśvatāṃ vā prāpnoti 
gṛhasthasyaiṣa doṣaḥ utpannasthālīpākasya 
apraṇodyo 'tithiḥ sāyaṃ sūryoḍho gṛhamedhinā 
kāle prāptas tv akāle vā nāsyānaśnan gṛhe vaset 
sāyaṃkālo 'stamayādiḥ pradoṣāntaḥ 
tasyāṃ velāyām atithir āgato 'praṇodyaḥ apratyākhyeyaḥ bhojanaśayanāsanādibhiḥ pratipūjyaḥ 
kena 
gṛhamedhinā 
medho yajñaḥ 
gṛhamedho mahāyajñānām iyam ākhyā 
tatrādhikārī gṛhamedhī 
gṛhastha iti yāvat 
sūryoḍha ity arthavādaḥ sūryeṇoḍhaḥ prāpitaḥ 
daivopanītatvād avaśyaṃ pūnārhaḥ 
kāle dvitīye vaiśvadevakāle prāptaḥ akāle vā sāyaṃ bhojane nivṛtte 'pi 
nāsya gṛhasthasya anaśnan gṛhe vaset 
yadi śeṣam asti tan nivedanīyam 
na ced dviḥ pākaḥ kartavyaḥ 
na vai svayaṃ tad aśnīyād atithiṃ yan na bhojayet 
dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ vātithipūjanam 
sūpaghṛtadadhiśarkarādi yad utkṛṣṭam annaṃ tat svayaṃ nāśnīyād atithau saṃnihite yāvat tasmai na dattam 
yat tu āturasya yavāgūrasakaṭukādi tad anicchate na deyam 
tādṛśam adattam aśnato na doṣaḥ 
sarvathā na saṃskṛtam annaṃ svayaṃ bhoktavyam kadannam atithir na bhojanīya ity evaṃparam etat 
dhanāya hitaṃ dhanasya nimittaṃ veti dhanyam 
evaṃ yaśasyādayaḥ śabdāḥ 
arthavādo 'yaṃ nityatvād atithibhojanasya sati saṃnidhāne 'titheḥ pūrvaseṣatvāc ca 
stutitvenānvaye saṃbhavati nādhikārāntarakalpanā yuktā 
āsanāvasathau śayyām anuvrajyām upāsanam 
uttameṣūttamaṃ kuryād dhīne hīnaṃ dame samam 
bahuṣv atithiṣu yugapadupasthiteṣv itaretaraṃ samahīnajyāyassv āsanādiprakalpanaṃ guṇāpekṣam nāviśeṣeṇa 
āsanaṃ bṛsyādi 
āvasathaṃ viśrāmabhūmiḥ 
śayyā khaṭvādi 
anuvrajyā gacchato 'nugamanam 
upāsanaṃ tatsamīpe kathāprastāvena saṃnidhānam 
etad uttameṣūttamam 
dūram anuvrajyata uttamaḥ nātidūraṃ madhyamaḥ katiciditpadāni hīnaḥ 
vaiśvadeve tu nirvṛtte yady anyo 'tithir āvrajet 
tasyāpy annaṃ yathāśakti pradadyān na baliṃ haret 
sarvārtham annaṃ vaiśvadevaśabdenocyate 
tasmin nirvṛtte niṣpanne bhuktavatsu sarveṣu niḥśeṣite 'nne yady anyo 'tithir āgacchet tasmai dadyāt punaḥ pakvānnam 
na tu tasmāt pākabaliṃ haret 
agnāv api homo neṣyate na kevalaṃ baliharaṇam 
yataḥ sāyaṃprātaḥ pāke homo baliharaṇam na cāntarālike 
tathā ca vakṣyati sāyaṃ tv annasya iti 
evaṃ ca yady apy asakṛd ahnaḥ pacet tathāpi na pratipākaṃ vaiśvadevam āvarteta 
yathāśakti saṃskāraviśeṣeṇetarathā vā 
na bhojanārthaṃ sve vipraḥ kulagotre nivedayet 
bhojanārthaṃ hi te śaṃsan vāntāśīty ucyate budhaiḥ 
prāsaṅgiko 'tither ayam upadeśaḥ 
bhojanārthy etatkulīno 'muṣya putro 'smīti na nivedayen na kathayet 
sve kulagotre ātmīyaṃ kulaṃ pitṛpitāmahādyabhijano gotraṃ gargabhārgavādi nāmadheyaṃ vā 
gotraskhalitaṃ nāmāntaravivakṣāyāṃ yan nāmāntaram udāhriyate tad ucyate 
adhyayanam api smṛtyantrapratiṣiddham tad api na nivedyam 
asyārthavādaḥ 
bhojanārthaṃ bhojanaṃ lipse prakhyātakulajātitvāt ity anenārthena hetunā kulagotre śaṃsan kathayan vāntāśī vāntam udgīrṇam aśnāti nigiratīty evam ucyate budhaiḥ 
na brāhmaṇasya tv atithir gṛhe rājanya ucyate 
vaiśyaśūdrau sakhā caiva jñātayo gurur eva ca 
kṣatriyo brāhmaṇasyādhvanīno 'pi prathamabhojanakāla upasthite 'pi nātithiḥ 
ato na tasmai niyamato deyam 
evaṃ vaiśyaśūdrābhyām api 
sakhijñātī ātmasame nātithī 
guruḥ prabhuvad upacaryaḥ nivedya pacanakriyā ity uktam 
yadi tv atithidharmeṇa kṣatriyo gṛham āvrajet 
bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu kāmaṃ tam api bhojayet 
tatra atither dharmaḥ kṣīṇapathyodanatvaṃ paragrāmavāso bhojanakālopasthānam 
tādṛśena rūpeṇa yadi kṣatriyo gṛham āgato bhavati tadā tam api bhojayet 
bhojanavacanād anyā paricaryā nivartate 
priyahitavacanaṃ tv aviśeṣeṇa gṛhābhyāgatasya vihitam 
ayaṃ ca tasya bhojanasya kālaḥ 
bhuktavatsu vipreṣu brāhmaneṣv anatithiṣu vā gṛhasaṃnihiteṣu prathamaṃbhojiṣu tataḥ sa bhojayitavyaḥ 
kāmam iti niyamābhāvam āha 
kāmyo 'yaṃ vidhir na nitya ity arthaḥ 
kāmaś cānirdiṣṭaḥ viśeṣaphaleṣu svargaḥ 
yadi vā dhanyaṃ yaśasyam ityādy atra saṃbandhanīyam 
vaiśyaśūdrāv api prāptau kuṭumbe 'tithidharmiṇau 
bhojayet saha bhṛtyais tāv ānṛśaṃsyaṃ prayojayan 
atither dharmo 'tithidharmaḥ 
sa yayor asti tāv atithidharmiṇau 
atithidharmaś ca prāg vyākhyātaḥ 
kuṭumbaṃ gṛham tatra prāptāv āgatau vaiśyaśūdrāv api bhojayet kṣatriyavat 
tayos tu bhojanakālaḥ kṣatriyakālāt pareṇa 
yata āha bhojayet saha bhṛtyais tau 
bhṛtyā atra dāsā ucyante 
teṣāṃ ca bhojanakālo bhuktavasv atithijñātibāndhaveṣu sarveṣv arvāg dampatibhyām 
sahaśabda ekakālatāmātralakṣaṇārthaḥ 
ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kāruṇyam anukampāṃ prayojayan pramāṇīkurvann āśrayann iti yāvat 
anena pūjyatāṃ vārayati 
anugrāhyo hy anukampyo na pūjyaḥ 
anukampyeṣu yadi ca śakyate 'nugrahaḥ kartuṃ tataḥ kriyate 'bhyudayārthinā na tv akaraṇād atither atikramaḥ 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yādṛśo 'tithibhojanād utkṛṣṭo dharmaḥ anukampyānugrahān na tādṛśas tato nikṛṣṭaḥ 
itarān api sakhyādīn saṃprītyā gṛham āgatān 
prakṛtyānnaṃ yathāśakti bhojayet saha bhāryayā 
sakhā mitraṃ sa ādir yeṣām 
ādiśabdaḥ prakāre jñātibandhusaṃgatasahādhyāyiprabhṛtīn gṛhṇāti guruvarjam 
saṃprītyāgatān 
atither dharmasya prakṛtatvān niṣedhārthaṃ saṃprītigrahaṇam 
tān bhojayet 
prakṛtya prakarṣeṇānnaṃ kṛtvā saṃskṛtya 
yathāśaktīti upalakṣaṇārthaḥ śaktiśabdaḥ 
yāvatī śaktir yādṛśaṃ ca yo 'rhati tam uddiśya tādṛśa eva saṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ 
bhāryayā saha 
yo bhartur bhojanakālaḥ sa eva bhāryāyā api pṛthak tasyā bhojanakālasyābhāvāt 
evaṃ hy uktam avaśiṣṭaṃ tu dampatī iti 
mahābhārate patyur ūrdhvaṃ bhāryāyā bhojanaṃ darśitam 
draupadīsatyabhāmāsaṃvāde draupadyā strīdharmān kathayantyoktam sarveṣu patiṣu bhuktavatsu śeṣānnam aśnāmi 
patiśeṣānnabhojanaṃ strīṇāṃ dharmaḥ 
tasmān na bhāryābhojanakāle sakhyādīnāṃ bhojanaṃ vidhīyate 
nāpy ekapātrāśanaṃ sahārthaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi naikākinas te bhojayitavyāḥ 
api tu bhāryāpi tatra bhuñjīta 
tataś ca avaśiṣṭaṃ tu dampatī iti tad atra bādhyate 
yadi patyuḥ kaścid abhyarhitaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ syād arucyā vā na bhuñjīta tadā bhāryā taddeśe bhuñjīta 
evaṃ sauhārdaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhaviṣyati 
suvāsinīḥ kumārīś ca rogiṇo garbhiṇīḥ striyaḥ 
atithibhyo 'nvag evaitān bhojayed avicarayan 
suvāsinyo vadhvo navoḍhā striyaḥ snuṣā duhitaraś ca 
anye tu jīvacchvaśurā jīvatpitṛkāś ca prasūtā api suvāsinya ucyante ity āhuḥ 
atithibhyo 'nvag evaitān anugatān eva bhojayet 
prārabdhabhojaneṣv evātithiṣu tatsamakālaṃ bhojayet 
anye tv agra iti paṭhanti 
avicārayan 
katham atithiṣv abhojiteṣu bālā bhuñjata ity evaṃ viciktsā na kartavyā 
adattvā tu ya etebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ bhuṅkte 'vicakṣaṇaḥ 
sa bhuñjāno na jānāti śvagṛdhrair jagdhim ātmanaḥ 
etebhyo 'tithyādibhyo bhṛtyaparyantebhyo yo bhojanam adattvā pūrvaṃ prathamam avicakṣaṇaḥ śāstrārtham ajānāno bhuṅkte sa śvagṛdhair adyate pretaḥ 
tām jagdhim ātmanas taiḥ khādanaṃ na jānāti 
evaṃ hi sa manyate mūḍhamatir atrāham eva bhuñje evaṃ tu na budhyate yad īdṛśam aśanaṃ tat svaśarīrasya śvagṛdhrair adanam 
tatphalatvād evam ucyate 
bhuktavatsv atha vipreṣu sveṣu bhṛtyeṣu caiva hi 
bhuñjīyātāṃ tataḥ paścād avaśiṣṭaṃ tu dampatī 
viprā atithayaḥ svā jñātyādayaḥ 
teṣu kṛtabhojaneṣu tadavaśiṣṭaṃ dampatī jāyāpatī aśnīyātām 
paścāt kadācit tebhyaḥ kalpayitvā śiṣṭavyapadeśe saty ādau bhojanaṃ syāt tadartham uktaṃ paścād iti 
dampatyor bhojanakālavidhānartham idam 
ādyo 'rdhaśloko 'nuvādaḥ 
devān ṛṣīn manūṣyāṃś ca pitṝn gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ 
pūjayitvā tataḥ paścād gṛhasthaḥ śeṣabhug bhavet 
anuvādamātram idaṃ pūrvasya pañcayajñānuṣṭhānavidher gṛhasthabhojanakālasya ca 
anye tv arthāntaravidhānam api varṇayanti 
pūrvatra jāyāpatyor ekakālam avaśiṣṭabhojanaṃ vihitam 
anena striyā apohya puṃsa eva vidhīyate 
tataś ca pūrvaṃ bhṛtyebhyaḥ prāk patyur bhāryā bhuñjīta 
evaṃ vā kṛtvā bhojayet 
etad apy upapannaṃ bhaviṣyati 
itarathā taiḥ saha bhāryā na bhujñītety arthakalpanāyāṃ tathāśrutapadānvayabhaṅgaḥ syāt 
yat tu mahābhārate darśanaṃ taddarśanam eva na vidhānam vidhau vikalpayiṣyate 
tad ayuktam anuvādatvād asya 
na ca gṛhastha ity ekavacanavirodhaḥ sahādhikārāj jāyāpatyoḥ 
tatra ca sahārthasya prādhānyān na dvivacanāpattiḥ 
yathā brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhīta iti saty api bhāryayā sahādhikāre naikavacanaṃ virudhyate 
tat kasya hetoḥ 
eko hi tatra pradhānam aparo hi guṇabhūtaḥ 
na ca guṇaḥ svasaṃkhyām upajanayituṃ śaknoti 
ataḥ pradhānasyaikasaṃkhyatvāt saty api patyarthānupraveśe ekavacanam eva yuktam 
eka eva gṛhasthaśabdaḥ patnyāṃ vartate sa ca sahavivakṣāyām 
sā caikabuddhiviṣayatvena pradhānayor guṇayor vā 
tasmān na patnyāḥ prāk puṃso bhojanam 
ataḥ sthitam anuvādo 'yam pratipattidārḍhyāya 
ye 'pi gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ pūjayed ity arthavādavacanaṃ devatāpadaṃ matvā pūjayed iti saṃbandhād gauṇam evārcāvidhitvaṃ samarthayante 
na hi mukhyasya devatārthasya pūjyatvasaṃbhavaḥ yajistutisaṃbandhenaiva devatātvasya mukhyatvāt 
tathā ca gṛhyā ity āha 
gṛhe bhavā gṛhyāḥ 
tāś ca pratikṛtaya eva 
na hi yāgasaṃpradānabhūtānāṃ gṛhasaṃbandhitāsiddhiḥ 
teṣām api devatārtho gauṇo na pūjārthaḥ 
kuta etat 
gṛhasthasya yā yaṣṭavyās tā gṛhyā ity upapadyate 
aghaṃ sa kevalaṃ bhuṅkte yaḥ pacaty ātmakāraṇāt 
yajñaśiṣṭāśanaṃ hy etat satāṃ annaṃ vidhīyate 
pāpaṃ kevalaṃ sa bhuṅkte hṛdaye nidhatte gṛhṇāti nānnasya mātrām api yaḥ pacet pākaṃ kārayed ātmakāraṇād ātmānam uddiśya kṣudhito 'ham idaṃ vā mahyaṃ rocata iti tad eva pacyatām 
tasmād anātureṇa nātmārtham annaṃ pācanīyam 
āturasya tu śarīradhāraṇaṃ yenopāyena bhavati vidhyantarātikrameṇāpi tasyāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti vacanāt 
evaṃ kecid asyārtham āhuḥ 
etad ayuktaṃ smṛtyantaravirodhāt 
evaṃ hy āhuḥ
yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe 
tad tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā 
dayitam iṣṭaṃ spṛhaṇīyam 
yadi ca na pacyeta kṛtas tādṛśasya dānasaṃbhavaḥ 
tasmād ayam asyārthaḥ 
taduddeśas tāvan nityasya pākasya naiva vidyate 
suhṛtsvajanādiṣv āgateṣu taduddeśaḥ 
anyathā tv anuddiṣṭaviśeṣapāke atithyādibhyo dānaṃ vidhīyate 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
ya tebhyo 'dattvā bhuṅkte tasyāyaṃ doṣaḥ 
atha vā sarvasminn atithyādibhir bhukte nātmārthaṃ punaḥ pākaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ śeṣaṃ dampatī bhuñjīyātām 
sarvopayoge na punaḥ pākaḥ 
yajñaśiṣṭāśanam 
pūrvasya śeṣabhojanasya praśaṃsaiva 
yajño jyotiṣṭomādiḥ śiṣṭam upayuktaśeṣam tasya caitad aśanam 
tattulyaphalam yat satāṃ śāstrānuṣṭhānaparāṇāṃ gṛhasthānām atithyādibhuktaśiṣṭaṃ vidhīyate 
rājartviksnātakagurūn priyaśvaśuramātulān 
arhayen madhuparkeṇa parisaṃvatsarān punaḥ 
atithipūjāprasaṅgenānyeṣām api keṣāṃcit pūjyānāṃ gṛhāgatānāṃ pūjāviśeṣo vidhīyate 
rājā abhiṣikto na kṣatriyamātram 
atimahatī hy eṣā pūjā na tāṃ sarvaḥ kṣatriyo 'rhati 
na hi snātakagurubhyāṃ tasya sahopadeśo yuktaḥ 
pūjāsāmyaṃ guruṇā na tasya yuktam liṅgadarśanāc ca 
tad yathaivādo manuṣyarāja āgate ity ātithyeṣṭibrāhmaṇam govadho madhuparkavidhāv ukto goghno 'tithir iti puruṣarājaviṣayaṃ darśayati 
tena kṣatriye 'kṣatriye vā janapadeśvare pūjeyaṃ prayoktavyā 
śūdre tu nāsti mantravattvam 
nanu ca śūdrasya mantroccāraṇaṃ niṣiddham 
na punaḥ śūdrasaṃpradānake karmaṇi brāhmaṇādīnām 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
arghāṇām api bhūtebhyas tvā ityādimantoccāraṇam asti 
nanu ca mahābhārate śūdrakartṛkam api madhuparkakarma śrūyate 
tad arham āsanaṃ caiva yathāvat pratyavedayat 
madhuparkaṃ ca gāṃ caiva tasmai bhagavate svayam 
bhagavate vāsudevāya vidura iti 
tatsādhane dadhani bhaktyā madhuparkaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 
tādarthyāt tacchabdo bhavati āyur vai ghṛtam itivat 
rājaśabdas tāvaj jānapadeśvaravacano na kṣatriyamātre vartate 
priyo jāmātey āhuḥ 
snātako vidyāvratābhyām ubhābhyām 
anyathārtvigguravaḥ sarve snātakā eva 
āśramāntrasthānāṃ bhaikṣacaryā vihitā na tv atithidharmeṇa bhojanam 
atha vāciranirvṛttavedādhyayanaḥ snātako gṛhyate 
etān arhayet pūjayet 
madhuparkaśabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam 
gṛhyāt tasya svarūpāvagamaḥ 
parisaṃvatsarān iti rājādipūjyaviśeṣaṇam 
parigato 'tikrāntaḥ saṃvatsaro yeṣāṃ tān 
yadi saṃvatsare 'tīte āgacchanti tadā madhuparkārhā arvāṅ na 
kecid evaṃ vyācakṣate 
yadi saṃvatsarād arvāg āgacchanti tadānatīte 'pi saṃvatsare prathamapūjāyāḥ punar labhate pūjām 
anye tv āhuḥ 
sāṃvatsarikī teṣāṃ pūjā na yāvad āgamanam 
asmin pakṣe 'rvāg āgamanaṃ na pūjāpratibandhakam 
pāṭhāntaraṃ parisaṃvatsarād iti 
yāvad eva saṃvatsaraṃ tāvat parisaṃvatsarāt tata ūrdhvaṃ punaḥ pūjyā ity arthaḥ 
rājā ca śrotriyaś caiva yajñakarmaṇy upasthite 
madhuparkeṇa saṃpūjyau na tv ayajña iti sthitiḥ 
yajñe nimitte 'rvāg api saṃvatsarāt prāptyartho 'yam iti kecit 
anye tu pūrvasyaiva rājaśrotriyayor upasaṃhāram āhuḥ 
anupasaṃhāre hi na tv ayajña iti nopapadyate 
atra śrotriyo yaḥ snātakaḥ prāg uktaḥ yadi vā ṛtvag eva 
tasya hi yajñakarmaṇi prāripsyamāne madhuparkadānaṃ vihitam 
yady apy asakṛt saṃvatsarasya somena yajeta kṛtārghyā evainaṃ yājayeyuḥ 
evaṃ kḷptamūlaiṣā smṛtir bhaviṣyati 
itarathā kalpyeta mūlam 
anye tu sarvān ṛtvigādīñ chrotriyaśabdena nirdiṣṭān manyante 
tathā cāviśeṣeṇa gautamena paṭhitam ṛtvigācāryaśvaśurapitṛvyamātulānām upasthāne madhuparkaḥ ity uktvā yajñavivāhayor arvāk iti paṭhitavān 
ataś ca sarveṣām evārghyāṇāṃ yajñe nimitte 'rvāg api saṃvatsarād arghārhatā syāt 
na tv ayajña iti ca pratiṣedho 'rvāk saṃvatsarān nordhvam ity evaṃ jñeyaḥ 
iha dvitīye pāde 'nekadhā pāṭhapratipattiḥ 
kecit paṭhanti 
tate yajña upasthitau iti 
teṣāṃ ayam arthaḥ 
tate prārabdhe yajñe yadi prāptau bhavato nimantryānītau tadeyaṃ madhuparkakriyā tayoḥ 
na punaḥ prārabhyamāṇe 
eṣa pakṣaḥ kaiścid dūṣyate 
dīkṣito na dadātīti dīkṣitasya sarvadānapratiṣedhān madhuparkadānam anujñāyamānaṃ tadviruddhaṃ syāt 
na ca śakyaṃ vaktum dānam etan na bhavati arhayed iti nodanāt pūjaiṣā vidhīyate 
yato 'sti madhuparke dadhidānaṃ māṃsabhojanādidānaṃ ca 
athocyate 
svayam eva tatparakīyaṃ bhujyate iti 
evaṃ sati steyadoṣaḥ syāt 
vacanān na iti ced asty eva tarhi dadātyarthaḥ 
coditaṃ ca dadātiḥ madhuparkaṃ ca dadyād iti 
tasmād viruddham 
dīkṣito na dadātīty anena syād virodhaḥ yadi yajñaśabdaḥ somayāgeṣv eva vartate 
darśapūrṇamāsādayo 'pi yāgāḥ tadviṣayo 'yaṃ vidhir bhaviṣyati 
naitad yuktam 
evaṃ sati samācāravirodhaḥ 
na hi śiṣṭāḥ somayāgebhyo 'nyatra kvacid arghyāya madhuparkam āharanti 
ācāro vedādaraḥ 
ato 'yam eva pāṭho yuktaḥ yajñakarmaṇy upasthite iti 
prārabhyamāṇayajña āgataṃ śiṣṭā madhuparkeṇa pūjayanti na pravṛttayajñāḥ 
ataś caitad api na vicārayāmaḥ 
sāmānyataḥ prāptasya dānasya bhavatu nivṛttir na punas tadviṣayatayaiva śrutasya 
yajñaś cāsau karma ca tad yajñakarma tasminn upasthite prāpte 
sāyaṃ tv annasya siddhasya patny amantraṃ baliṃ haret 
vaiśvadevaṃ hi nāmaitat sāyaṃprātar vidhīyate 
uktaḥ prathamaḥ 
idānīṃ dvitīyaḥ pāka ucyate 
sāyaṃ dināntaḥ pradoṣas tatra siddhasyānnasya sarvaḥ pākayajñikavidhir āvartanīyo brahmayajñapitṛyajñavarjam 
nanu ca baliṃ hared ity etāvac chrutam 
baliharaṇaṃ ca prasiddhyā bhūtayajña eva 
tatra kuto 'gnau homo 'tithyādidānaṃ ca 
atha vaisvadevaṃ hi nāmaitad iti vaiśvadevaśabdaḥ sarvārthatāṃ pratipādayati 
viśveṣāṃ devānām idaṃ vidhīyate 
sāyaṃprātar yādṛśaṃ prātas tādṛśam eva sāyam etadartham eva prātaḥśabdaḥ 
anyathā prātarvihitam eva kim anena sāyaṃprātar vidhīyate 
evaṃ tarhi brahmayajñapitṛyajñāv api kartavyau 
ucyate 
annasya siddhasyeti vacanād yad annasādhyaṃ tad eva kartavyam 
na tv adhyayanasādhyo brahmayajño nāpy udakasādhyaṃ tarpaṇam 
evaṃ ca saṃbandhaḥ kriyate 
siddhasyānnasya baliṃ haret 
etad vaiśvadevākhyaṃ karmānnasya siddhasyobhayoḥ kālayor vidhīyate 
annaśabdād vaiśvadevaśabdāc caivaṃ vyākhyāyate 
amantram 
mantraśabdena devatoddeśena śabdavān svāhākārānto 'gnaye svāhety evamādir niṣidhyate 
na hy anye mantrā vaiśvadeveṣu viniyuktāḥ 
teṣu ca mantratvaṃ praśaṃsayocyate 
na tu svādhyāye 'paṭhitānāṃ mantratvam asti 
svādhyāyaikadeśaḥ kaścid ṛgyajuḥsāmādyātmako vedādhyāyibhir mantra iti vyavahriyate 
vyavahārataś ca padārthāvagamanam 
na ca yaiḥ śabdair baliharaṇādi kriyate te kutracit paṭhyante 
kevalam agnyādibhyo devebhyo homaṃ kuryāt iti śruteḥ svāhākāreṇa vā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vā devebhyo haviḥ saṃpradīyate iti vākyāntareṇa sarvahomeṣu svāhākāro vihitaḥ yājyānte vaṣaṭkāro niyamitaḥ yājyāyāṃ vaṣaṭkaroti iti 
svāhākāraśabdayoge caturthī smaryate 
ato yāgo devatāyā uddeśyatvāt uddeśyatvaṃ ca devatāyāḥ śabdāvagamyarūpatvāt śabdenaivocitatvāt iyaṃ ghaṭanā kriyate agnaye svāhā ityādi 
yady evaṃ teṣāṃ niṣedhaḥ kathaṃ tarhi yāganirvṛttiḥ 
na hi tubhyam idaṃ na madīyam iti yāvad uddeśo na kṛtas tāvad yāgasvarūpanirvṛttiḥ 
na hi tyāgaḥ kevalo yāga uddeśaśūnyaḥ 
satyam 
śabde niṣiddhe manasoddeśaṃ devatāyāḥ patnī kariṣyati 
yathā śūdro namaskāram uccārayati 
anujñāto 'sya namaskāro 'mantraḥ namaskāreṇa pratyāmnātaḥ śūdrasya mantra iti namaskāro 'nujñāto 'sya na devatāpadam 
tatra ca devatāyā viniyogāt siddhir ity uktam 
iha bhavantas tv āhuḥ svāhākāro namaskāreṇa pratyāmnātaḥ śūdrasya devatāpadaṃ tv aniṣiddham 
atha sāyaṃvaiśvadevahome kaḥ kartā 
uktaṃ patny eva saṃnidhānād baliharaṇavad amantrakaṃ kariṣyatīti 
pitṛyajñaṃ tu nirvartya vipraś candrakṣaye 'gnimān 
piṇḍānvāhāryakaṃ śrāddhaṃ kuryān māsānumāsikam 
vaiśvadevikād vaikalpikāc chrāddhān nityam idaṃ śrāddhāntaram ucyate 
candrakṣaye 'māvāsyāyām 
tatrāpi na yasyāṃ kasyāṃcana velāyāṃ kiṃ tarhi pitṛyajñaṃ nirvartya 
śrauto yaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñas taṃ kṛtvā 
evaṃ ca yas tasya kālaḥ sa evāsyāpi labhyate 
tad uktam amāvāsyāyām aparāhṇe piṇḍapitṛyajña iti 
anāhitāgner apy aupāsanayogo 'sty eva 
tathā cāha 
evam anāhitāgnir nitye śrapayitvā ityādi 
agnimān vaivāhikenāgninā tadvān dāyakālāhṛtena vā 
vipragrahaṇam avivakṣitam 
kṣatriyavaiśyayor apīṣyate 
evaṃ smṛtyantareṣu hy aviseṣaṇoktam 
piṇḍānvāhāryakam iti 
nāmadheyam idam asya śrāddhasya 
piṇḍānām anu paścād āhriyate 'nuṣṭhīyate 
tat piṇḍānvāhāryakaṃ bhavati 
māsaś cānumāsaś ca tayor bhavaṃ māsānumāsikam 
māsānumāsaśabdasamudāyo māsagatāṃ vīpsām ācaṣṭe 
māsi māsi kartavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati 
ataś ca nityatāsiddhiḥ 
yady apy anumāsaśabdād vīpsāvagatir bhavati māsaśabdo 'tiricyate tathāpi padyagranthe gaurvaṃ nādriyate 
śrāddham ity etad api nāmaiva 
kuryād iti vidhiḥ 
pitṝṇāṃ māsikaṃ śrāddham anvāhāryaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
tac cāmiṣeṇa kartavyaṃ praśastena prayatnataḥ 
anvāhāryaṃ darśapaurṇamāsayoḥ śrautayor dakṣiṇartvijām 
yad etan māsikaṃ śrāddham amāvāsyāyām etat pitṝṇām anvāhāryam 
yathānvāhāryeṇartvijaḥ prīyante tadvat pitaraḥ śrāddhena 
etena pitrarthatāṃ śrāddhasyāha 
yathāgnyādidevatārtho darśādiyāga evaṃ na śrāddhe pitaraḥ kiṃ tarhi tadupakārārtham eva śrāddham 
tathā ca pitṝṇām iti ṣaṣṭhī 
kevale hi devatātve caturthyāvirahāyogaḥ 
pakṣe pāṭhāntaram arthāntaraṃ ca piṇḍānāṃ māsikam iti 
anvāhāryaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
anenāpi pitṛyajñavad avaśyakartavyatocyate 
na tv idam aṅgam 
tad etad āmiṣeṇa māṃsena kartavyam 
praśastena apratiṣiddhena viseṣavihitena vā 
dvau māsau matsyamāṃsena iti yad vakṣyati 
ayaṃ ca mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ 
tadabhāve dahighṛtapayo'pūpādi vidhāyiṣyate 
māṃsaṃ ca vyañjanam bhaktādibhojyasya 
na punar etad eva kevalaṃ bhojyam yena vakṣyati guṇāṃś ca sūpaśākādyān tathā yāvantaś caiva yaiś cānnaiḥ iti 
kiṃ punaḥ śrāddhe homabrāhmaṇabhojanapiṇḍanirvapaṇādīni karmāṇi sarvāṇy eva samapradhānāni śrāddhaśabdavācyāni uta kiṃcid aṅgam atra kiṃcit pradhānam 
ucyate 
śrāddhaṃ bhojayet śrāddhaṃ bhuktam anena iti sāmānādhikaraṇyād brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ mukhyaṃ pratīyate 
tathā cāha 
tatra ye bhojanīyāḥ syur ye ca varjyā dvijottamāḥ 
yāvantaś caiva yaiś cānnais tān pravakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ 
tatra tasmiñ chrāddhe ye dvijottamā brāhmaṇā bhojanīyā ye ca parihartavyāḥ yāvanto yatsaṃkhyākā dvau daive ityādi yaiś cānnaiḥ tilair vrīhiyavaiḥ ityādi tad etat sarvam idānīṃ vakṣyāmi 
tac chṛṇuta 
etad atra prādhānyena saṃpādyam 
etena vinā śrāddhaṃ na kṛtaṃ bhavati 
anyac ca yac cāṅgajātam ārād upakārakaṃ saṃnipatyopakārakaṃ vā tasminn asaṃpanne śrāddhaṃ na kṛtaṃ bhavati saguṇaṃ tan na syāt 
ata eteṣāṃ prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ punar upanyāsaḥ 
dvau daive pitṛkṛtye trīn ekaikam ubhayatra vā 
bhojayet susamṛddho 'pi na pravarteta vistare 
yady api pratijñātasya vastunas tenaiva krameṇa viśeṣakathanaṃ yuktam tathāpīha svalpavaktavyatvād bhojanīyā iti prāptaṃ parityajya saṃkhyānirdeśo 'nena kriyate 
devān uddiśya dvau brāhmaṇau bhojayet 
pitṝṇāṃ kṛtye trīn 
ubhayatra vā daiva ekaṃ pitrye caikam 
yady api pitrye ity atra pitur idam iti pitṛśabdena devatācodanā tathāpi pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahā uddeśyāḥ 
tatraikaikasyaikaiaṃ bhojayet na tv evaikaṃ sarvebhyaḥ pṛthakpṛthag devatātvāt 
uktaṃ ca gṛhyakareṇa na tv evaikaṃ sarveṣām piṇḍair vyākhyātam iti 
yathaikaḥ piṇḍaḥ sarvebhyo na nirupyate tathaiva brāhmaṇo 'pi na bhojyata ity arthaḥ 
ihāpi vakṣyati nimantrayeta tryavarān iti 
bhojanārtham eva tannimantraṇam nādṛṣṭārtham 
ataś ca pitṛkṛtye trīṃs trīn iti draṣṭavyam 
tathā cāha na cāvarān bhojayet iti 
evaṃ ca kṛtvā ekaikam api vidvāṃsam ity etad apy evam eva draṣṭavyam ekaikasyaikaikam iti 
api ca naivātraikaikam ubhayatrety etad vidhīyate vistarapratiṣedhartho 'yam anuvādaḥ 
yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣaya mā cāsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣva iti 
yady evaṃ dvau daive ity eṣo 'pi vidhir na syād asyāpy anyārthatayopapatteḥ 
athāyaṃ vidhir aprāptatvād ekaikam ity eṣo 'pi kasmān na bhavati 
atrāha 
mā bhūd dvayor eko 'pi vidhiḥ 
kutas tarhi saṃkhyāvagamaḥ 
nimantrayeta tryavarān iti 
nanu tatra daivagrahaṇaṃ nāsti 
smṛtyantarāt tarhi saṃkhyāvagamaḥ ayujo vā yathotsāham iti yugmān daive iti 
yadi vāyaṃ saṃkhyāvidhiḥ syād vistaraprāptyabhāvāt pratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ 
tasmād yāvadbhir brāhmaṇair bhojitair vistare ye doṣās te na bhavanti tādvanto bhojanīyāḥ 
pitrye 'yugmāḥ daive tu dvāv eva 
atisamṛddho 'py atyartham āḍhyo 'pi 
na pravarteta vistare 
na cāyam adṛṣṭārtho vistarapratiṣedhaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi 
satkriyāṃ deśakālau ca śaucaṃ brāhmaṇasaṃpadaḥ 
pañcāitān vistaro hanti tasmān neheta vistaram 
etān doṣān āpādayati 
vistaro 'to neṣyate 
yadi tu śakyante satkriyādaya upapādayituṃ tadā yathotsāham 
satkriyā annasaṃskāraviśeṣaḥ 
deśo dakṣiṇapravaṇādiḥ avakāśeṣu cokṣeṣu iti vakṣyamāṇaḥ 
kālaḥ aparāhṇaḥ madhyāhnāc calite sūrye iti 
śaucam ātmabrāhmaṇapreṣyagatam 
brāhmaṇānāṃ saṃpat guṇavadbrāhmaṇalābhaḥ 
ete guṇā avaśyaṃ saṃpādyāḥ 
te ca vistareṇa naśyanti 
vistāro vaiguṇyam 
brāhmaṇabahutve cāsau prasajjati 
tasmān neheta na kuryāt 
prathitā pretakṛtyaiṣā pitryaṃ nāma vidhukṣaye 
tasmin yuktasyaiti nityaṃ pretakṛtyaiva laukikī 
na yathā daivāni karmāṇy adevatārthāny evaṃ pitryaṃ nāma tatkarmaitat 
kiṃ tarhi prathitā khyātā vedavidām pretakṛtyā pretopakriyā 
vidhukṣaye 
vidhuś candras tasya kṣaya amāvāsyā 
tithikṣaye iti pāṭhāntaram 
vidhikṣaye iti tu pāṭho nirduṣṭaḥ 
evaṃ hi tatra yojanam 
pitryaṃ nāma vidhicoditaṃ karma kṣaye gṛhe 
tasmin karmaṇi pitrye 
yuktasya tatparasya 
nityaṃ kartur upatiṣṭhate 
pretakṛtyaiva 
tasyāpi pretasya kṛtyā upakāraḥ śrāddhādi putraiḥ kriyate 
putrapautrādisaṃtatyavicchedaḥ śrāddhaphalam anena prakāreṇa pratipādyate 
na ca tatphalakāmasyāyam adhikāraḥ nityatvasya pratipāditatvāt 
anye tv adhikārāntaram idaṃ saṃtatyavicchedakāmasyecchanti 
laukikī iyaṃ kartavyatā smārtety arthaḥ 
śrotriyāyaiva deyāni havyakavyāni dātṛbhiḥ 
arhattamāya viprāya tasmai dattaṃ mahāphalam 
śrotriyaḥ chāndasaḥ kṛtsnamantrabrāhmaṇikāṃ śākhām adhīte yas tasmai havyāni śrāddhāṅgabhojanāni viśvān devān uddiśya yāni vihitāni tāni deyāni 
kavyāni pitṛbhya uddiśya yāni bhojanāni 
arhattamāya 
arhatā pūjyatā yogyatā ca 
mahākulīnaḥ pūjyate mahākule jāto vidyāvṛttasaṃpannaś ca 
tasmai dattaṃ śrāddhād anyad api mahāphalam 
evaṃ vā  aśrotriyāya dānaṃ niṣphalam śrotriyāya abhijanavidyādiguṇarahitāya svalpaphalam arhattamāya mahāphalam 
ekaikam api vidvāṃsaṃ daive pitrye ca bhojayan 
puṣkalaṃ phalam āpnoti nāmantrajñān bahūn api 
yad uktam arhattamāya iti tad darśayati 
vidvāṃsam ekam api bhojayan puṣkalaṃ phalam āpnoti 
vidvattā ca vyākhyātā vedārthavedanam 
yata āha nāmantrajñān bahūn api 
mantragrahaṇaṃ vedopalakṣaṇārtham 
asaṃbhave pañcānāṃ vedaviduṣām ekaikam api vidvāṃsaṃ bhojayed iti vidhyarthaḥ 
puṣkalaṃ puṣṭaṃ vipulam 
dūrād eva parīkṣeta brāhmaṇaṃ vedaparagam 
tīrthaṃ tad dhavyakavyānāṃ pradāne so 'tithiḥ smṛtaḥ 
na vedaparaga ity eva bhojayitavyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi dūrāt parīkṣeta nipuṇato mātāpitṛvaṃśadvayapariśuddhijñānam 
yathoktam ye mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaś ca daśapūruṣam samanuṣṭhitavidyātapobhyāṃ puṇyaiś ca karmabhiḥ yeṣām ubhayato brāhmaṇyaṃ nirṇayeyuḥ ity eṣā dūrāt parīkṣā 
tathā tattvato 'dhyayanavijñānakarmānuṣṭhānavedanaṃ ca 
vedasya pāraḥ samāptiḥ taṃ gato vedaparagaḥ 
na vedasaṃhitāṃ brāhmaṇamātraṃ vā paṭhann arho bhavati 
asmād eva darśanāt śrotriyaśabdena vedaikadeśam apy adhīyāna ucyata iti gamyate 
tīrthaṃ tad dhavyakavyānām 
tīrtham iva tīrthaṃ yenodakaṃ grahītum avataranti tat tīrtham 
tena yathā mārgeṇodakārthino gacchanta udakaṃ labhante evaṃ tādṛśena brāhmaṇena havyakavyāni pitṝn gaccantīti praśaṃsā 
anyasminn api iṣṭāpūrtadānena brāhmaṇo 'tithiḥ yathātithaye svayam upasthitāya nirviciktsaṃ dīyate dattaṃ mahāphalam evam īdṛśāya brāhmaṇāya havyakavye nirvicikitsaṃ dātavye mahāphale bhavataḥ 
sahasraṃ hi sahasrāṇām anṛcāṃ yatra bhuñjate 
ekas tān mantravit prītaḥ sarvān arhati dharmataḥ 
anṛcāṃ anṛgarthavidām 
upalakṣaṇam yato 'nṛcānāṃ prāptir eva nāsti śrotriyāyaiveti niyamāt 
samāsāntaḥ chāndasatvān na kṛtaḥ vṛttānurodhāc ca 
evaṃ hi paṭhanti 
api māṣaṃ maṣaṃ kuryān na tu chando vicālayet 
iti 
atha vā anṛcā iti prathamābahuvacanam 
anṛcāḥ sahasraṃ yathā bhuñjate iti saṃbandhaḥ 
yathā sahasraṃ gāva iti 
ekaḥ prītas tarpito bhojito mantravid vedārthavit sarvāṃs tān anṛcān arhati svīkaroti ātmasāt karoti tair abhedam āpadyate 
abhede ca yat teṣu sahasreṣu bhojiteṣu phalaṃ tad ekasminn avāpyate ity avagatir utpadyate 
nindeyam aviduṣo vidvadvidhyarthā 
na punaḥ sahasrasaṃkhyātānām ekasya ca samaphalatvam ucyate 
viduṣāṃ vidhānād aviduṣāṃ prāptir eva nāsti 
athāpy asati viduṣi śrotriyāyaivety anena pākṣikī aviduṣo 'pi prāptir āśaṅkyate tathāpi vistarasya pratiṣedho mā bhūd ity ato yathāśrutārthasaṃbhavaḥ 
jñānotkṛṣṭāya deyāni kavyāni ca havīṃṣi ca 
na hi hastāv asṛgdigdhau rudhireṇaiva śudhyataḥ 
jñānena vidyayā utkṛṣṭaḥ adhikaḥ tasmai deyāni kavyāni 
ayam asau hastarudhiradigdhopamārthaḥ 
rudhiradigdhau hastau rudhireṇopamṛjyamānāv adhikataraṃ rajyete na nirmalau bhavataḥ evam avidvān brāhmaṇaḥ bhojyamānaḥ pitṝn adho nayatitarām 
yāvato grasate grāsān havyakavyeṣv amantravit 
tāvato grasate preto dīptaśūlarṣṭyayoguḍān 
saty api śrāddhaprakaraṇe vākyād bhoktur ayaṃ doṣānuvādaḥ 
tathā coktam
tasmād avidvān bibhiyād yasmāt tasmāt pratigrahāt 
iti 
śūlarṣṭyayo āyudhaviśeṣāḥ ayoguḍaḥ āyasaḥ piṇḍaḥ 
yadarthaṃ śrāddam ārabdhaṃ sa dīptān taptāyaḥpiṇḍān yamapuruṣair āśyate 
vyāsadarśanāt tu bhojayitur ayaṃ doṣo na bhoktuḥ 
na pitṝṇāṃ na tāvan mṛtānām anyakṛtena pratiṣedhātikrameṇa doṣasaṃbandho yuktaḥ kṛtābhyāgamādidoṣāpatteḥ 
yadi hi putreṇa tādṛśo brāhmaṇo bhojitaḥ ko 'parādho mṛtānām 
nanu copakāro 'pi putrakṛtaḥ pitṝṇām anena nyāyena na prāpnoti 
na prāpnuyād yadi tādarthyena śrāddhādi noditaṃ syāt 
iha tu nāsti codanā pitur upakārakāmenaivaṃ kartavyam śyenavat 
yat tu tāvato grasate pretaḥ iti tad bhojayitṛsaṃbandhe 'py upapadyate 
yasya brāhmaṇa īdṛśaḥ śrāddhaṃ bhuṅkte sa idaṃ phalam āpnoti iti yuktaḥ saṃbandhaḥ 
prākaraṇikaś cāyam avidvadbhojanapratiṣedhaḥ 
tadatikramaṇe karmavaiguṇyam tadvaiguṇye ca śrāddhādhikārān nivṛttir eva doṣaḥ 
pitṝṇāṃ śrāddhopakārāl lābhaḥ 
tato 'pi vidhyatikrame putrasya yuktaḥ pratyavāyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi tad bhagavato vyāsasya vacanam
grasate yāvataḥ piṇḍān yasya vai haviṣo 'vidaḥ 
grasate tāvataḥ śūlān gatvā vaivasvatakṣayam 
pāṭhāntaraṃ pretya iti 
bhoktur eva pretyatā 
nāviduṣā daivapitryayor bhoktavyam 
jñānaniṣṭhā dvijāḥ kecit taponiṣṭhās tathāpare 
tapaḥsvādhyāyaniṣṭhāś ca karmaniṣṭhās tathāpare 
sarvaguṇebhyo vidyāṃ praśaṃsituṃ guṇavibhāgakathanam praśaṃsā ca viduṣe dānārthā 
jñāne vidyāyāṃ niṣṭhā prakarṣo yeṣāṃ te jñānaniṣṭhāḥ jñānādhikāriṇaḥ 
gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇānām api bahuvrīhiḥ 
bhṛśam abhyastavedārthās tatparā evam ucyante 
evaṃ sarvatra niṣṭhānteṣu draṣṭavyam 
tapaś ca svādhyāyaś ceti dvandvagarbho bahuvrīhiḥ 
tapāṃsi cāndrāyaṇādīni svādhyāyo vedādhyayanam 
karmāṇy agnihotrādīni 
sarva ete guṇāḥ sarveṣu samuccitā iti draṣṭavyāḥ 
na hi ekaguṇasadbhāva itaraguṇahīnasya pātratām āpādayati kiṃ tu kasyacit ko 'pi prakarṣa ucyate 
yathā ca niṣṭhāśabdaḥ samāptivacanaḥ prakarṣaṃ lakṣayati 
tanniṣṭhas tatpara ucyate 
sarvaguṇasadbhāve 'pi yadi ekatra prakarṣo 'nye ca guṇāḥ madhyamāḥ tathā ca bhavaty eva pātram 
aprakṛṣṭe tv ekasmin sarvaguṇasadbhāve 'pi na pātratāṃ labhante 
samuccayaś ca vyākhyāyate yena jñānarahitasya karmānuṣṭhānasadbhāva ity uktaṃ dvitīye 
anyais tu jñānaniṣṭhaḥ parivrājako vyākhyāyate 
tasya hi ātmajñānābhyāsaḥ karmanyāsena viśeṣato vihitaḥ 
taponiṣṭho vānaprasthaḥ 
sa hi tāpasa ity ākhyāyate grīṣme pañcatapās tu syāt iti 
tapaḥsvādhyāyaniṣṭhāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ 
karmaniṣṭhā gṛhasthāḥ 
ataś cānāśramiṇo niṣidhyante 
tathā ca paurāṇikāḥ cāturāśramyabāhyebhyaḥ śrāddhaṃ naiva prayojayet 
jñānaniṣṭheṣu kavyāni pratiṣṭhāpyāni yatnataḥ 
havyāni tu yathānyāyaṃ sarveṣv eva caturṣv api 
guṇavibhāge prayojanam āha 
kavyāni pitṝn uddiśya yad dīyate tat kavyam 
tāni jñānaniṣṭheṣu pratiṣṭhāpyāni pradeyānīty arthaḥ 
yatnavacanāt tadabhāve caturṣv api havyavat 
pitrye jñānaniṣṭhāḥ pātratamāḥ 
uktaṃ hi pātrāṇām api tat pātram iti 
annadānam aviśeṣeṇa caturbhyo 'pi iti ślokārthaḥ 
nyāyaḥ śāstrīyo vidhiḥ 
aśrotriyaḥ pitā yasya putraḥ syād vedaparagaḥ 
aśrotriyo vā putraḥ syāt pitā syād vedapāragaḥ 
saṃśayopanyāsārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
jyāyāṃsam anayor vidyād yasya syāc chrotriyaḥ pitā 
mantrasaṃpūjaṇārthaṃ tu satkāram itaro 'rhati 
yasya pitā apāṭhaḥ svayaṃ tu vedapāragaḥ sāṅgavedādhyāyī itarasya tu pitā vedapāragaḥ svayaṃ tu mūrkhaḥ tayoḥ kaḥ śreyān iti saṃśayaṃ kṛtvā siddhāntam āha 
anayoḥ svayaṃśrotriyapitṛmūrkhasvayaṃmūrkhapitṛśrotriyayoḥ svayaṃmūrkhapitṛśrotriyaṃ jyāyāṃsaṃ praśasyaṃ śrāddhe yogyaṃ jānīyāt yady asya śrotriyaḥ pitā 
itaro mantrapūjanārthaṃ na brāhmaṇabuddhyā kiṃ tu mantrās tena ye 'dhītās te tatra pūjyante 
na mantrāṇāṃ śrāddhe pūjā vihitā tasmān nāsau bhojayitavyaḥ 
ślokadvayena saṃśayasiddhāntarūpopanyāsenārthavādabhaṅgyā pitṛśrotriyatvam ātmaśrotriyatvaṃ ca śrāddhabhojane kāraṇam ity etad ucyate na kevalam ātmaśrotriyatvam 
na tu svayam anadhīyānasya pitṛśrotriyatvena bhojyatā vidhīyate 
tad uktam dūrād eva parīkṣeta iti 
atrādhyayanaparīkṣā puruṣadvayaviṣayānena niyamyate 
jātiguṇaparīkṣā tu tato 'dhikapuruṣaviṣayāpi yathā 
atas tasyaiva viśeṣābhidhānārthatvād apaunaruktyam 
na śrāddhe bhojayen mitraṃ dhanaiḥ kāryo 'sya saṃgrahaḥ 
nāriṃ na mitraṃ yaṃ vidyāt taṃ śrāddhe bhojayed dvijam 
satyām eva śrotriyatvādipūrvaguṇasaṃpadi maitryādinimittena pratiṣedho 'yam 
mitraṃ samānasukhaduḥkham ātmanirviśeṣaṃ na śrāddhe bhojayet 
dhanair anyair asya mitrasya svīkāro maitrīkaraṇam 
avicchedo vā maitryam upakāra iti yāvat 
na kevalaṃ na mitraṃ bhojayet yāvad ariṃ śatrum api 
nāriṃ na mitraṃ yaṃ vidyāt 
yatra na rāgo na dveṣo na cānyaḥ kaścit saṃbandho yatra prītinimittā kāryārthatā śaṅkyate arimitrayoḥ pradarśanārthatvāt 
tathā saṃbandhāśaṅkayaiva mātāmahādayo 'nukalpapakṣoktāḥ 
śatrāv api maitrīkaraṇārthadānasaṃbhāvanā yadi maitrīkaraṇam iti saṃgrahaḥ arisaṃgrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam 
vispaṣṭārthaṃ bhaviṣyati 
yasya mitrapradhānāni śrāddhāni ca havīṃṣi ca 
tasya pretya phalaṃ nāsti śrāddheṣu ca haviḥṣu ca 
pūrvasya pratiṣedhasyārthavādo 'yam 
mitraśabdo 'yaṃ bhāvapradhānaḥ mitrapradhānāni maitrīpradhānāni 
tenobhayor mitrayoḥ śeṣaḥ 
devatoddesena dānam adṛṣṭārthaṃ vā kevalaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ havīṃṣi iti lakṣyate 
pretya phalaṃ nāsti 
nanu cāsamānakartṛtvāt kāryānutpattiḥ 
preṇaḥ kartā puruṣaḥ śrāddhakṛt astitāyā nañarthopahitāyāḥ phalam 
kecid āhuḥ 
pretyetiśabdāntaraṃ paralokavacanaṃ nipātasaṃjñam 
atha preṇo 'pi phalaṃ kartṛ tasya phalaṃ pretya prakarṣeṇa nikaṭam āgatyāpi na bhavati na bhogyatāṃ yāti 
yaḥ saṃgatāni kurute mohāc chrāddhena mānavaḥ 
sa svargāc cyavate lokāc chrāddhamitro dvijādhamaḥ 
saṃgatāni mitrabhāvān yaḥ kurute śrāddhena mohāt śāstrārtham ajānānaḥ sa svargāc cyavate 
na prāpnoti svargam ity arthaḥ 
asaṃbandhasāmānyāc cyavata ity ucyate 
yathā prāptaḥ svargaṃ tataś cyutaḥ svargeṇa na saṃbadhyate evam ayam api 
anena ca srāddhaphalāprāptir eva kathyate 
sarvaśeṣatā hi tathā bhavati 
śrāddhamitraḥ śrāddhaṃ mitram asyeti 
mitralābhahetutvāt śrāddham eva mitram ato bahuvrīhiḥ 
dvijānām adhamaḥ 
dvijagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham 
śūdreṇāpi na mitrāṇi bhojanīyāni 
nanu cābrāhmaṇyād eva śūdrasya mitratvaprāptir nāsti 
kenaiṣā paribhāṣā kṛtā śūdrasya brāhmaṇair mitrair na bhavitavyam 
samānajātīyānām eva mitravyavahāro nottamajātīyānāṃ hīnajātīyaiḥ saha iti cet 
etad api na 
evaṃ hy āha śvetaketur ha vā āruṇeyaḥ asti me pañcāleṣu kṣatriyo mitram iti 
kiṃ ca saṃbandhopalakṣaṇārthaṃ ca mitrapratiṣedho vyākhyātaḥ 
bhavanti ca śūdrasya brāhmaṇā arthasaṃbandhinaḥ pāraśavasya jñātayo 'pi 
saṃbhojanī sābhihitā paiśācī dakṣiṇā dvijaiḥ 
ihaivāste tu sā loke gaur andhevaikaveśmani 
saṃśabdaḥ sahārthe vartate 
saha bhujyate yayā sā saṃbhojanī 
maitryā hi sahabhojanaṃ pravartate 
goṣṭhībhojanaṃ vā saṃbhojanam iṣyate 
piśācānām ayaṃ dharmo yat śrāddhe mitrasaṃgrahaḥ 
rathyāḥ puruṣāḥ piśācāḥ 
sā dakṣiṇā ihaiva loke āste nāmutra phalaṃ dātuṃ samarthā 
gaur yathāndhaikasminn eva gṛhe tiṣṭhati evam iyaṃ dakṣiṇā ihaivāste mitrajanārthaiva bhavati 
na pitṛbhya upakārārthāya prabhavati 
dānaṃ dakṣiṇā 
yatheriṇe bījam uptvā na vaptā labhate phalam 
tathānṛce havir datvā na dātā labhate phalam 
iriṇam ūṣaram 
yasmin kṣetre bhūmidoṣāt bījam uptaṃ na codgacchati tad iriṇam 
yatra vaptā karṣako na labhate phalam 
evam anṛce vedādhyayanarahite havir daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca datvā na labhate phalam 
anṛca iti saptamyantam 
ṛco vedopalakṣaṇārtham 
dātṝn pratigrahītṝṃś ca kurute phalabhāginaḥ 
viduṣe dakṣiṇāṃ datvā vidhivat pretya ceha ca 
viduṣe yā dakṣiṇā dīyate sā dātṝn phalabhāginaḥ kurute iti yuktam 
pratigrahītāras tu katarat phalaṃ bhuñjate 
yadi tāvad adṛṣṭam tad ayuktam anoditatvāt pratigrahasya dṛṣṭaphalalābhena pravṛtteḥ 
atha dṛṣṭam tad aviduṣo 'pi dṛśyate 
satyam 
praśaṃsaiṣā 
īdṛśam etad viduṣe dānaṃ yat pratigrahītāpy adṛṣṭaphalabhāg bhavet 
saty api dṛṣṭe kiṃ punar dāteti 
pretya svarga iha kīrtiḥ yathāśāstram anutiṣṭhatīti janaiḥ sādhuvādo dīyate 
vidhivad ity anuvādo dadāti caivaṃ dharmyeṣv iti 
kāmaṃ śrāddhe 'rcayen mitraṃ nābhirūpam api tvaritam 
dviṣatā hi havir bhuktaṃ bhavati pretya niṣphalam 
yatnena bhojayec chrāddhe bahvṛcaṃ vedapāragam 
śākhāntagam athādhvaryuṃ chandogaṃ tu samāptikam 
vedapāragaśākhāntagasamāptikāḥ śabdā ekārthāḥ samantrabrāhmanikāyāḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ śākhāyā adhyetṝn ācakṣate 
na mantrasaṃhitāyā nāpi brāhmaṇasya tadekadeśasya vā 
vedaikaśākhādhyāyino 'pi śrotriyā ucyante 
atas tannivṛttyartham uktaṃ śrotriyāya deyam iti 
śrotriyaś ca vedādhyāyī 
vedaśabdaś ca samantrabrāhmaṇikāṃ śākhām ācaṣṭe 
tadekadeśam api yā kṛtsnaśākhādhyāyī kathaṃ gṛhyetety evamartham idam 
nanu cāśramiṇo bhojanīyā ity uktam 
tatrānadhītasakalasvādhyāyānāṃ naiva gārhasthyādyāśramasaṃbhavaḥ 
evaṃ hy uktam vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ iti 
brahmacāriṇas tarhi prakrāntavedādhyayanasya asamāptigasyāpi syāt 
vedapāragaśākhāntagasamāptikaśabdair ekārthaiḥ kārtsnyaṃ sarvair eva pratipādyate 
ekenaiva siddhe vṛttānurodhān nānārūpaikārthānekaśabdoccāraṇam 
vedānāṃ pāraṃ gacchati 
śākhāyā antaḥsamāptir asyāstīti samāptikaḥ 
adhvaryur yajurvedaśākhādhyāyī nāyam ṛtvig viśeṣavacano 'dhvaryuśabdaḥ 
adhvaryavaḥ pravacanam ucyate 
tadadhyayanasaṃbandhāt puruṣo 'dhvaryuḥ 
chandogaḥ sāmavedādhyāyī 
smṛtyantare trisāhasravidyaḥ samāptika uktaḥ 
tatra sahasraśabdaḥ sahasragītisaṃbandhāt sāmavede vartate tasya imāḥ sāhasryas tisraḥ sāhasryaḥ vidyā yasya trisāhasravidyaḥ 
tāṇḍavamauktikyaṃ sāmagānām iti sahasravartmanaḥ sāmavedasya tasya tisro vidyāḥ 
daśatayī catuḥṣaṣṭi brāhmaṇaṃ ca bāhvṛcyam 
anye tv ātharvaṇikaniṣedhārtham idaṃ ślokam manyante 
kārtsnyād vivakṣāyām etad evāvakṣyat
adhīte vedaśākhāṃ yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ taṃ bhojayed dvijam 
iti 
nanu cātharvaṇikaniṣedhe 'py etatsamānam 
tatrāpi śakyam evaṃ vaktuṃ tanniṣedhe prāyeṇa na bhojya ātharvaṇikaḥ ity evam evāvakṣyat 
svaśabdena niṣedhapratipattir lāghavaṃ ca 
naitad evam 
kim anyavidhānenānyaniṣedho 'vagamyate svaśabdena vā niṣedhaḥ 
vicitrā dharmopadeśasya kṛtir manoḥ 
eṣām anyatamo yasya bhuñjīta śrāddam arcitaḥ 
pitṝṇāṃ tasya tṛptiḥ syāc chāśvatī sāptapauruṣī 
kaścin manyeta pitṛkṛtye trīn ity uktam 
pūrvaśloke ca nānāśākhādhyāyina upāttāḥ 
tatra sabrahmacāriṇāṃ nāsti prāptir iti tadāśaṅkānivṛttyartham idam 
eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ traividyānām anyatamo bhojanīyaḥ 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
samānaśākhādhyāyino nānāśākhādhyāyino vā bhojanīyāḥ 
arcitaḥ pūjitaḥ prārthita arghādinā 
sāptapauruṣī tṛptiḥ 
saptapuruṣān vyāpnoti 
anuśatikāder ākṛtigaṇatvād ubhayapadavṛddhiḥ 
kālamahatvopalakṣaṇārthaṃ caitat 
dīrghakālā pitṝṇāṃ tṛptir bhavati 
yāvat saptapuruṣā āgāminaḥ putrapautrādayo jātā janiṣyante vā tāvat tathāvidhabrāhmaṇadānāt pitaras tṛpyanti 
śāśvatī nāntarā vicchidya punar udbhavati 
kiṃ punaḥ sarvadā sthitaiva 
eṣa vai prathamaḥ kalpaḥ pradāne havyakavyayoḥ 
anukapas tv ayaṃ jñeyaḥ sadā sadbhir anuṣṭhitaḥ 
pitṛyajñam ity ārabhya pañcaviṃśatimātrāḥ ślokā atikrāntās tatraitāvan artho 'bhihitaḥ 
amāvāsyāyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kartavyam 
śrotriyo vidvān sādhucaraṇaḥ pratyākhyātābhijanaḥ śrotriyāpatyam asaṃbandhī bhojanīyaḥ 
pariśiṣṭaṃ sarvam arthavādārtham 
eṣo 'nantarokataḥ prathamo mukhyaḥ kalpo vidhiḥ śrāddhe yad asaṃbandhine dīyate 
ayaṃ tu vakṣyamāṇo 'nukalpo jñeyaḥ 
mukhyābhāve yo 'nuṣṭhīyate pratinidhinyāyena so 'nukalpa ucyate 
sadetyādi stutyarthaḥ 
mātāmahaṃ mātulaṃ ca svasrīyaṃ śvaśuraṃ gurum 
dauhitraṃ viṭpatiṃ bandhum ṛtvigyājyau ca bhojayet 
svasrīyo bhaginyāḥ putraḥ 
viṭpatir jāmātā prajāvacanatvāt viṭśabdasya 
atithir anye 
sa hi sarvaviśāṃpatiḥ gṛhābhyāgato loke 'pi viṭśabdenocyate 
bandhuḥ śālaḥ sagotrādiḥ 
na brāhmaṇaṃ parīkṣeta daive karmaṇi dharmavit 
pitrye karmaṇi tu prāpte parīkṣeta prayatnataḥ 
nāyaṃ daive karmaṇi brāhmaṇaparīkṣāpratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tarhi kāṇaślīpadyādīnāṃ kadācid daive 'bhyanujñānārthaḥ 
pitrye karmaṇi śrāddhakāle prāpte parīkṣāṃ yatnena kuryāt na daive 
kadācid vakṣyamāṇān api bhojayet 
yet cābhyanujñāyante tān darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
anye tu vakṣyamāṇasya pratiṣedhaprakaraṇasya yatnato varjanārtham upakramamātraṃ ślokaḥ na tu kāṇādīnāṃ daive 'bhyanujñānārthaḥ 
ye stenapatitaklībā ye ca nāstikavṛttayaḥ 
tān havyakavyayor viprān anarhān manur abravīt 
stenaḥ cauraḥ 
patitaḥ pañcānāṃ mahāpātakānām anyatamasya kartā 
klībo napuṃsakaḥ ubhayavyañjano vātaretāḥ ṣaṇḍhaś ca 
nāstikā lokāyatikādayaḥ 
nāsti dattaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti paraloka iti ye sthitaprajñās teṣāṃ vṛttir ācāraḥ aśraddadhānatā nāstikavṛttir yeṣāṃ te nāstikavṛttayaḥ 
uttarapadalopīsamāsaḥ 
nāstikā ity eva siddhe vṛttipadasamāśrayaṇaṃ ślokapūraṇārtham 
atha vā nāstikebhyo vṛttir jīvanaṃ yeṣāṃ ta evam ucyante 
tān havyakavyayor daive pitrye ca anarhān manur abravīt 
pratiṣedhādarārthaṃ manugrahaṇam sarvadharmāṇāṃ manunoktatvāt 
jaṭilaṃ cānadhīyānaṃ durvālaṃ kitavaṃ tathā 
yājayanti ca ye pūgāṃs tāṃś ca śrāddhe na bhojayet 
jaṭilo brahmacārī tasya hy ayaṃ keśaviśeṣaḥ pākṣiko vihito muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā syāt iti 
upalakṣaṇaṃ ca jaṭā brahmacāriṇas tato muṇḍo 'pi pratiṣidhyate 
tasya cānadhīyānasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
nanu śrotriyāyaiva deyāni iti cānadhīyānasya prāptir eva nāsti 
prakrāntādhyayanaḥ anadhītavedaḥ agṛhītavedaś cet prāpnuyāt 
nanu ca vedapāragaḥ iti vacanāt kutaḥ prakrāntādhyayanasya prāptiḥ 
evaṃ tarhi adhītavedo 'py asvīkṛtavedo 'nadhīyāno 'bhipretaḥ 
vratastham api dauhitram ity anena vā dauhitrataivātra nādhyayanam iti kaścin manyeta tadartham idam 
anadhīyānasya pratiṣedhād viduṣas tasyādhikāro 'stīty avagamyate 
durvālaḥ skhalitalohitakeśo vikalendriyo vā 
tasya hi nirvacanaṃ kurvanti 
dūrvayā śādvalenāpy alaṃ tasya vāso bhavatīti 
sa hi dūrvayaiva prāvriyate lajjayā ca vāsasām abhāve tāvanmātreṇāpy apidadhāti śepham 
kitavo dyūtakāraḥ 
yājayanti ca ye pūgān saṃghān 
vrātyastomādibhir vrātyānāṃ hi saṃhitānāṃ yāgo vihitaḥ 
pratiṣiddhaṃ ca tad yājanaṃ vrātyānāṃ yājanaṃ kṛtvā iti 
vayaṃ brūmaḥ 
yaḥ kramaśaḥ pratyekam api bahūn yājayati bahukṛtva ārtvijyaṃ karoti so 'pi na bhojyaḥ 
tath ca vasiṣṭhaḥ yaś cāpi bahuyājyaḥ syād yaś copanayate bahūn iti 
kecid āhuḥ śrāddhagrahaṇāt pitrya evaiṣāṃ pratiṣedho na tu daive
tad ayuktam 
tad api śrāddhāṅgam eva śrāddhaśabdena yuktaṃ vaktum 
cikitsakā devalakā māṃsavikrayiṇas tathā 
vipaṇena ca jīvanto varjyāḥ syur havyakavyayoḥ 
bhiṣajaḥ cikitsakāḥ 
devalakāḥ pratimāparicārakāḥ 
ājīvanasaṃbandhenaitau pratiṣidhyete 
dharmārthatve tu cikitsakadevakatvayor adoṣaḥ 
māṃsavikrayiṇaḥ saunikāḥ 
dvitīyāntapāṭhe pūrvaślokād ākhyātānuṣaṅgaḥ 
vipaṇena jīvantaḥ pratiṣiddhena paṇena 
pratiṣiddhāḥ paṇā daśamādhyāye vakṣyante 
tena ye jīvanti te varjyāḥ ubhayatra 
māṃsavikrayiṇas tu dharmārtham api niṣidhyante 
yasya kenacin māṃsam upahṛtam anyasya ca tenārthaḥ upahṛtamāṃsasya ghṛtena homopayoginā sa māṃsaṃ ghṛtena vinirmimīte bhavaty asau dharmārtho vinimayaḥ 
vikrayaśabdavācyatā vinimayasyāpi bhavatīty ata īdṛśā dharmārthamāṃsavikayiṇo 'pi pratiṣidhyante 
preṣyo grāmasya rājñaś ca kunakhī śyāvadantakaḥ 
pratiroddhā guroś caiva tyakāgnir vārdhuṣis tathā 
preṣya ājñākaraḥ 
grāmeṇa yo yatra kutracit kāryeṇa preṣyate 
evaṃ rājapreṣyaḥ 
kunakhī śyāvadantakaḥ 
pratiroddhā guror vāgvyavahāre 'nyatra ca yo guroḥ pratibandhe prātikūlye ca vartate 
tyaktāgnis tretāvasathyayor anyatarasyāpi 
vārdhuṣiḥ saty anyasmin jīvikopāye vṛddhijīvikaḥ 
vṛddhis tu yoktā dhānyānāṃ vārdhuṣitvaṃ tad ucyate 
iti yat smaraṇaṃ tat svaprakriyāyām eva 
vaiyākaraṇā hi vṛddhijīvino dhānyād anyatrāpi vārdhuṣikaśabdaṃ smaranti 
te ca śabdārthasmaraṇe pramāṇatarā abhiyogavaśāt 
yakṣmī ca paśupālaś ca parivettā nirākṛtiḥ 
brahmadviṭ parivittiś ca gaṇābhyantara eva ca 
yakṣmī vyādhitaḥ 
rājayakṣmagṛhīta ity anye 
paśupālaḥ yaṣṭihastas tadvṛttijīvanaḥ 
nirākṛtiḥ saty adhikāre mahāyajñānuṣṭhānarahitaḥ 
adyatve 'py anupajīvyaḥ anaddhā nirākṛtir ucyate 
evaṃ hi śatapathe yo na devān arcati na pitṝn na manuṣyān iti 
yais tu paṭhyate asvādhyāyaśrutadhanair nirākṛtir udātdṛtaḥ iti na te śabdārthasaṃbandhavidaḥ 
tasyehāprāptir eva śrotriyaniyamāt 
nirākartā devādīnāṃ nirākṛtir iti dhātvarthānugamo 'sti 
dharmadharmiṇoś cābhedavivakṣāyāṃ ktināpi prayoga upapanna iti 
nipūrvo 'yaṃ dhātur apavarjane vartate 
nirākṛtā apavarjitā ucyante bhojanān nirākṛtā adhikārān nirākṛtā iti 
avarjanaṃ cākṛtiḥ sā nirgatāsmād iti nirākṛtiḥ 
saṃsthānaṃ cākṛtis tathā ca kutsāyāṃ nirdraṣṭavyo durākrtir niṣidhyate 
āha ca vāgrūpavayaḥśīlasaṃpannaḥ 
vāksaṃpanno vāgmī paṭuvāgindriyaś ca 
bahujihvo na bhojyāḥ 
rūpasaṃpanno manoharāvayavasaṃniveśaḥ 
vayaḥsaṃpannaḥ 
yuvabhyo dānaṃ prathamaṃ prativayasa ity eke iti 
saṃjñāśabdo vāyaṃ ktijantaḥ 
brahmadviṭ brāhmaṇānāṃ vedasya vā dveṣṭā brahmaśabdasyobhayārthavācitvāt brahmajño brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ iti 
gaṇaḥ saṅghaḥ 
sahaikayā kriyayā jīvanti ye te gaṇaśabdavācyās tadartargatāś cāturvidyabrāhmaṇāḥ 
parivettṛparivittī vakṣyamāṇasvarūpau 
kuśīlavo 'vakīrṇī ca vṛṣalīpatir eva ca 
paurnarbhavaś ca kāṇaś ca yasya copapatir gṛhe 
cāraṇanaṭanartakagāyanādayaḥ kuśīlavāḥ 
avakīrṇī viplutabrahmacaryaḥ 
vṛṣalī śūdrā tasyāḥ patiḥ 
asatyām anyasyāṃ ca manyante 
vṛṣalyā eva ca yaḥ patiḥ yasya dvijātibhāryā nāsti 
kuta etat 
prakaraṇāntare vigarhitācārasaṃgrahaṃ śrūyate etān vigarhitācārān iti 
śūdrāvivāhaś ca sarveṣām anujñātatvāt na garhitaḥ 
sa ca kṛtasajātīyāpariṇayanasyānujñātaḥ 
ato 'satyāṃ sajātīyāyāṃ vṛṣalyā bhartā pratiṣidhyate atra 
paunarbhavaḥ 
punarbhūḥ punarūḍhā 
vakṣyati navame 'dhyāye patyā vā parityaktā iti 
kāṇa ekenākṣṇā vikalaḥ 
yasya ca upapatir jāyājāro 'vasthitāyāṃ bhāryāyām asti 
upekṣayā nindyate 
tad uktaṃ annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi patyau bhāryāpacāriṇī iti 
bhṛtakādhyāpako yaś ca bhṛtakādhyāpitas tathā 
śūdraśiṣyo guruś caiva vāgduṣṭaḥ kuṇḍagolakau 
bhṛtakādhyāpakaḥ bhṛtakaḥ san yo sthito 'dhyāpakaḥ 
bhṛtaka iti yadīyad dadāsi vedam adhyāpayāmi iti yaḥ pravartate paṇena sa bhṛtakādhyāpakaḥ 
eṣā hi bhṛtiḥ prasiddhā kāyavāhādiṣu 
yas tv iyatā dhaneneyad adhyāpayāmi iti na niścitya vacanavyavasthayā pūrvam adhyāpayati labhate cādhyāpanārtham nāsau bhṛtakādhyāpakaḥ 
anirūpitaparimāṇapūrve cārthadāne vihitam adhyāpanam 
evaṃ bhṛtakādhyāpitaḥ 
yo vyutpannabuddhiḥ satyakāmavat svayaṃ bhṛtiṃ datvādhīte sa evam ucyate 
yas tu pitrādinā bhṛtiṃ datvā upādhyāyāntarābhāve 'dhyāpyate na tasya vigarhitācāratvam 
bālo hi pitrā pratiṣiddhebhyo nivartanīyaḥ 
etad uktam gurau śiṣyaś ca yājyaś ca iti 
śūdrasya śiṣyo vyākaraṇādividyāsu guruś ca śūdrasyaiva 
upasarjanībhūtasyāpi saṃbandhaḥ smṛtiśāstratvāt vigarhitācāratvasya sarvaśeṣatvāt 
śūdragurutvaṃ ca garhitaṃ nānyat 
vācā duṣṭaḥ paruṣānṛtabhāṣī 
abhiśasta ity anye 
kuṇḍagolakau vakṣyamāṇau 
akāraṇe parityaktā mātāpitror guros tathā 
brāhmair yaunaiś ca saṃbandhaiḥ saṃyogaṃ patitair gataḥ 
asati kāraṇe yaḥ parityajati mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ācāryaṃ ca 
guruśabdaḥ sāmānyaśabdatvād upādhyāye 'pi pravartate 
yat tu tathā sati mātāpitṛgrahaṇaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt gurutvād eva siddher ata ācārya eveha gurur iti vyācakṣate 
tad ayuktam 
asati mātāpitṛgrahaṇe guruśabdaḥ pitary eva kṛtrimākṛtrimanyāyena pravartate 
pṛthagupādāne tu śāstrāntaravad ācāryaḥ śreṣṭho gurūṇām iti sāmānyaśabdatā siddhā bhavati 
parityāgakāraṇaṃ ca tyajet pitaraṃ rājaghātakam ityādi 
mātāpitroḥ parityāgas tatpādasevādeḥ śuśrūṣāyāḥ akaraṇam tadārādhane atatparatvam 
guror evam eva 
adhyāpanasamarthe 'dhyāpayitari ca tattyāgenānyatrādhyayanam 
patitaiḥ saṃyogaṃ gataḥ saṃbandhaṃ kṛtavān 
brāhmair yājanādhyāpanādhibhir yaunaiḥ kanyādādibhiḥ 
nanu ca patitatvād evāsau varyaḥ 
kecid āhuḥsaṃvatsareṇa patati patitena sahācaran nārvāg ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
atha keyaṃ vāco yuktiḥ saṃbandhasaṃyogaṃ gata iti 
nātra saṃbandhaśabdo vaiśeṣikādiprasiddhyā saṃyogādivacanaḥ kiṃ tarhi kriyaivātra saṃbandhahetutvāt saṃbandhaśabenocyate 
yājanādilakṣaṇe saṃyogaśabdaś ca saṃbandhamātram upalakṣayati 
agāradāhī garadaḥ kuṇḍāśī somavikrayī 
samudrayāyī bandī ca tailikaḥ kūṭakārakaḥ 
agārasya gṛhasya dagdhā 
garaṃ dadātīti 
pradarśanārthaṃ ca garagrahaṇaṃ viṣādīnām api 
kuṇḍasya annam aśnāti 
evaṃ golakasya pradarśanārthatvāt kuṇḍasya 
somaṃ vikrīṇīte 
oṣadhiḥ somas taṃ yo vikrīṇīte yāgārtham auṣadhārthaṃ vā 
anye tu somasādhanān jyotiṣṭomādiyāgān āhuḥ 
teṣāṃ ca vikrayo yady api na saṃbhavati amūrtatvāt kriyāyās tathāpy aviduṣām evaṃvidhasyācārasya darśaṇād ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
dṛśyante hy avidvāṃsa evaṃ vadanto yan mayā sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ tat te 'stu iti 
sukṛtaṃ sukṛtaiḥ sādhitaṃ dharmam 
tathā ca yāṃ ca rātrīm ajāyethā yāṃ ca pretāsi tad ubhayam antareṇeṣṭāpūrtaṃ te lokaṃ sukṛtam āyuḥ prajāṃ vṛñjiyaṃ yadi me druhyuḥ iti 
yathaiva śapathā evaṃ dānavikrayāv api vācā yaḥ karoti sa varjyate 
akāryatā cāta eva īdṛśānāṃ śapathadānavikrayādīnāṃ vācā kriyamāṇānām anumīyate 
samudra udadhis taṃ yo yāti 
bandī stutipāṭhakaḥ 
tailikaḥ tilādīnāṃ bījānāṃ peṣṭā 
kūṭakārakaḥ sākṣyeṣv anṛtavādī 
pitrā vivadamānaś ca kitavo madyapas tathā 
pāparogy abhiśastaś ca dāmbhiko rasavikrayī 
pitrā yo vivadate paruṣaṃ bhāṣate rājakule vyavaharatīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣabhaṅgyā bhāgādinimittam 
tathā ca gautamaḥ pitrākāmena viraktān iti 
pratiroddhā guror ity anenaitat kathaṃ punaruktam ucyate 
anyaḥ pratirodhaḥ anyaś ca vivādaḥ 
yat kiṃcit guror abhipretaṃ vastu katham idaṃ sidhyet iti tatra saṃbandhakathanam pratirodhaḥ 
nyāyye 'pi vastuni tadicchāpratighātaḥ pratiroddhṛtvam 
pratirāddheti tatra pāṭhāntaram 
ābhimukhyena hiṃsitā hastādinā guroḥ pratiroddhā capeṭādidānena 
asmin pakṣe sthitam anyatvaṃ vivādasya 
kitavo dyūtasya kārayitā sabhikaḥ 
yas tu svayaṃveditā sa prāg eva niṣiddhaḥ 
kekaram anye paṭhanti kekaro madyapa iti 
sa ca valitaprekṣī adhyardhadṛṣṭiḥ 
kātaram anye 
sa ca śukapakṣatārakaḥ 
madyapaḥ 
surāyā anyasyāriṣṭāder madyasya pātā surāpaḥ patitatvenaiva nirastaḥ 
pāparogī kuṣṭhī 
sa hi loke 'tyantanindyaḥ pāparogīty abhidhātuṃ yuktaḥ 
asmād eva ca pratiṣedhāt yakṣmīty atra na sarvo vyādhigṛhīto gṛhyate kas tarhi kṣayī 
yadi hi sarvo gṛhyeta tenaiva siddhatvāt pāparogīti nākariṣyat 
abhiśastaḥ pātakopapātakayoḥ karteti loke prasiddhaḥ asaty api tatkartṛkatvaniścaye 
dāmbhikaḥ chadmanā dharmaṃ carati lokapaktyartham na kartavyam iti kṛtvā karoti 
rasavikrayī viṣasya vikretā 
tasya hy etad abhidhānam 
upāṃśubhedī rasadaḥ rasadaḥ sattrī ityādi viṣado rasada ucyate 
dhanuḥśarāṇāṃ kartā ca yaś cāgredidhiṣūpatiḥ 
mitradhrug dyūtavṛttiś ca putrācāryas tathaiva ca 
dhanuḥ śarāṃś ca yaḥ śilpīva karoti 
yaś cāgredidhiṣūpatiḥ 
didhiṣūśabdaḥ kākākṣivad ubhayena saṃbadhyate 
smṛtiśāstratvāc cedṛśaḥ saṃbandho labhyate 
lekhāloṣṭhādayo 'pi smṛtyarthaṃ saṃketyante bhavanti cārthakarāḥ 
ata etan na vācyam katham ekaśabdaḥ samāsāntargato dvābhyāṃ bhinnaprasthānābhyām abhisaṃbadhyeta iti 
gautamena hi dvayaṃ niṣiddham 
ihāpi saṃbandhabhede liṅgam 
dvipadaḥ samāsaḥ 
na hy agredidhiṣūpatir nāma kaścid asti 
etau ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇau 
mitradhruk 
mitraṃ yo druhyati 
mitrasya yaḥ kāryopaghāte vartate 
dyūtavṛttir dyūtaṃ jīvikā yasya 
nanu ca kitavo madayapaḥ ity atroktam eva 
nāvaśyaṃ dyūtavṛttir eva dyūtasya prayojakaḥ kiṃ tarhi yaḥ svayaṃ devituṃ na jānāti gurubhayād vā na dīvyati 
vyasanī tu devaiḥ śaptatayānyaṃ devayati 
tadartho dvitīyaḥ kitavaśabdaḥ 
atha vā anṛtaśtīkā dyūtasabhāsthāṇavo dyūtavṛttayaḥ 
putra ācāryo 'dhyāpako yasya 
mukhyam ācāryatvaṃ na putre saṃbhavati 
bhrāmarī gaṇḍamālī ca śvitry atho piśunas tathā 
unmatto 'ndhaś ca varjyāḥ syur vedanindaka eva ca 
vyādhiveśeṣavacā ete 
bhrāmarī apasmārī 
gaṇḍamālī kapole kaṇṭhe piṭakā mālākārā jāyante 
śvitrī śvetakuṣṭhaḥ 
piśunaḥ paramarmaprakāśakaḥ karṇejapaḥ 
unmattaḥ anavasthitacitto dhātusaṃkṣobheṇa piśācagṛhītaḥ yatkiṃcanavādī yatkiṃcanakārī vā 
andhaḥ cakṣurvikalaḥ 
vedanindakaḥ 
nanu ca brahmadviṭśabdenaiva brahmaśabdasyānekārthakatvāt vedanindako gṛhīta eva 
naivam 
anyā nindā anyo dviṣaḥ 
cittadharmo dveṣaḥ taduparyaprītiśabdena kutsanaṃ nindā 
hastigo'śvoṣṭradamako nakṣatrair yaś ca jīvati 
pakṣiṇāṃ poṣako yaś ca yuddhācāryas tathaiva ca 
hastyādīnāṃ vineta damakaḥ gatiśikṣayitā 
nakṣatrair yaś ca jīvati 
nakṣatraśabdena jyotiḥśāstraṃ lakṣyate tena jīvati jyotiṣikaḥ 
pakṣiṇāṃ śyenādīnām ākheṭārthaṃ poṣayitā 
yuddhācāryo dhanurvedopadeśakaḥ 
srotasāṃ bhedako yaś ca teṣāṃ cāvaraṇe rataḥ 
gṛhasaṃveśako dūto vṛkṣāropaka eva ca 
srotāṃsi udakāgamāḥ teṣāṃ bhedakaḥ 
setuṃ bhittvā deśāntare vrīhyādisekārthaṃ nayati 
teṣāṃ ca srotasām eva cāvaraṇe rataḥ 
āvaraṇaṃ ācchādanam 
yataḥ pradeśād udakam udbhavati tat sthagayati 
gṛhāṇāṃ saṃniveśopadeśakaḥ vāstuvidyājīvī sthapatiḥ sūtradhārādiḥ 
na tv ātmano gṛhāṇāṃ saṃniveśayitā 
dūto rājñaḥ preṣyo dāsavad viniyojyaḥ 
dūtas tu saṃdhivigrahādāv eva preṣyate 
vṛkṣān ropayati mūlyena 
dharmārthaṃ tu na doṣaḥ avigarhitācāratvāt 
vihitaṃ vṛkṣāropaṇam daśāmravāpī narakaṃ na yāti 
śvakrīḍī śyenajīvī ca kanyādūṣaka eva ca 
hiṃsro vṛṣalavṛttiś ca gaṇānāṃ caiva yājakaḥ 
śvabhiḥ krīḍati śvakrīḍī 
krīḍārthaṃ śuno bibharti 
śyenair jīvati krayavikrayādinā 
prāguktaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ poṣakaḥ pañjarādisaṃsthitānāṃ dhārayitā 
kanyām akanyāṃ ya karoti sa kanyādūṣakaḥ 
hiṃsraḥ svabhāvakrūraḥ vadharataḥ 
vṛṣalavṛttiḥ śūdrebhyaḥ sevādinā yo jīvati 
vṛṣalaputraḥ iti pāṭhāntaram 
kevalā eva vṛṣalāḥ putrā yasya 
śūdrāpatyaiś ca kevalaiḥ iti garhitācāraḥ 
gaṇānāṃ devatāyājakaḥ 
gaṇayāgāḥ prasiddhāḥ 
ācārahīnaḥ klībaś ca nityaṃ yācanakas tathā 
kṛṣijīvī ślīpadī ca sadbhir nindita eva ca 
ācāro gṛhābhyāgatānāṃ pūjādiprayukter laukikasamācāraḥ tena varjitaḥ 
klībo 'lpasatvaḥ bhagnotsāhaḥ kartavyeṣu 
yācanakaḥ sadaiva yo yācate yaś ca yācñayā parān udvejayati 
vastusvabhāvo 'yaṃ yācñayā yācyamānodvejanam 
nandyādibhyo yuḥ svārthe kaḥ 
kṛṣijīvī svayaṃkṛtayā kṛṣyā jīvati sati copāyāntare asvayaṃkṛtayāpi 
ślīpadī ekaḥ pādo mahān yasya 
sadbhir ninditaḥ durbhagaḥ vināpi doṣeṇa satāṃ dveṣyaḥ 
aurabhriko māhiṣikaḥ parapūrvāpatis tathā 
pretaniryāpakaś caiva varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ 
urabhrā meṣās taiś carati krayavikrayādinā vyavaharati taddhanapradhāno vā 
evaṃ māhiṣikaḥ 
paraḥ pūrvo yasyāḥ tasyāḥ patiḥ bhartā 
yā anyasmai dattā anyena vā ūḍhā tāṃ punaḥ yaḥ saṃskaroti punar bhavati bhartā paunarbhavo naro bharttāsāv iti śāstreṇa 
pretān yo niryāpayati vahati 
ete yatnato varjanīyāḥ 
etān vigarhitācārān apāṅkteyān dvijādhamān 
dvijātipravaro vidvān ubhayatra vivarjayet 
vigarhito ninditaḥ ācāraḥ karmānuṣṭhānam eṣām iti 
kāṇādayaḥ pūrvadoṣaliṅgena 
stenādayo 'nubhūyamānadoṣāḥ pratyakṣādinā 
ubhayatra daive pitrye ca 
varjayet pariharet 
apāṅkteyāḥ paṅktiṃ nārhanti 
bhavārthe ḍhak kartavyaḥ 
anarhatvam eva paṅktāvabhavanena pratīyate 
anyair brāhmaṇaiḥ saha bhojanaṃ nārhanti 
ata eva paṅktidūṣakā ucyante 
taiḥ sahopaviṣṭā anye 'pi dūṣitā bhavanti 
brāhmaṇo hy anadhīyānas tṛṇāgnir iva śāmyati 
tasmai havyaṃ na dātavyaṃ na hi bhasmani hūyate 
yathaite stenādayaḥ paṅktidūṣakāḥ evam anadhīyānas tattulyadoṣa ity evamarthaṃ punarvacanam 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
adhīyānānāṃ kāṇādīnām asati vartamāne vigarhitācāratve daive kadācit prāptyartham 
anadhīyāno brāhmaṇo varjyaḥ yas tu adhīte tasmai havyaṃ kavyam iti na dīyate  evamartham evātra havyagrahaṇam 
havye anadhīyānaḥ kevalo varjyaḥ 
ye ca dṛśyamānagarhitācārāḥ 
ato ye ca vacanena ubhyatra pratiṣiddhās te daive pitrye ca varjyāḥ anye tu pitrya eva 
tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ
atha cen mantravid yuktaḥ śārīraiḥ paṅktidūṣaṇaiḥ 
adūṣyaṃ taṃ yamaḥ prāha paṅktipāvana eva saḥ  iti 
tṛṇāgnir iva śāmyatīti 
tṛṇāgnir yathā na śaknoti havīṃṣi paktum hutamātreṇa haviṣā śāmyati udvāti ca 
yasminn agnau hutaṃ na bhasmībhavati 
na tato homāt phalam 
evaṃ hi śrūyate asamiddhe na hotavyam 
agnir vai sarvā devataḥ iti 
evam anadhīyāno brāhmaṇas tṛṇāgnitulyaḥ 
etad evāha na hi bhasmani hūyate iti 
yathā tṛṇāgniḥ prāg bhasmībhavati na tatra hūyate evaṃ tādṛśo brāhmaṇo na bhojyate 
apaṅktyadāne yo datur bhavaty ūrdhvaṃ phalodayaḥ 
daive karmaṇi pitrye vā taṃ pravakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ 
asya pratiṣedhavidheḥ phalam āha 
paṅktim arhantīti paṅktyāḥ 
na paṅktyāḥ apaṅktyāḥ 
daṇḍyādidarśanād rūpasiddhiḥ 
tebhyo dāne yaḥ phalodayaḥ phalotpattir bhavati dātuḥ taṃ sarvam idānīṃ bravīmy avahitā bhavateti 
avratair yad dvijair bhuktaṃ parivettrādibhis tathā 
apāṅkteyair yad anyaiś ca tad vai rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate 
avratāḥ asaṃyatāḥ śāstrācāravarjitāḥ 
parivettṛprabhṛtayo yady api śāstrabāhyās tathāpi bhedena smaraṇārthaṃ doṣagurutvārthaṃ vā kathyante 
anye cāpaṅkteyāḥ kāṇaślīpadyādayaḥ 
tair yad annaṃ bhuktaṃ śrāddhe bhavati tad rakṣāṃsi devadviṣo bhuñjate na ca pitaraḥ 
ato niṣphalaṃ tacchrāddhaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ bhavati 
rakṣograhaṇam arthavādaḥ 
dārāgnihotrasaṃyogaṃ kurute yo 'graje sthite 
parivettā sa vijñeyaḥ parivittis tu pūrvajaḥ 
agre ādau jātaḥ agrajaḥ sodaryo bhrātocyate 
evam hi paṭhyate
pitṛvyaputrān sāpatnān paranārīsutāṃs tathā 
dārāgnihotrasaṃyoge na doṣaḥ parivedane  iti 
atra sodaryo 'grajaḥ 
tasmin sthite 'kṛtadārāgnisaṃyoge 
tiṣṭhati prakṛtavyāpāranivṛttau prayuktaḥ 
agnihotraśabdaḥ karmavacano 'pi tadarthe 'gnyādhāne vartate 
smṛtyantare viśeṣaḥ paṭhyate
unmattaḥ kilbiṣī kuṣṭhī patitaḥ klība eva ca 
rājayakṣmāmayāvī ca na yogyaḥ syāt pratīkṣitum 
etad apy anadhikāropalakṣaṇārtham 
ataś cāpāṅkteyo 'pi gṛhyate 
kālaviśeṣo 'dhiko vyapekṣate 
tathā ca smṛtiḥ aṣṭau varṣāny udīkṣeta ṣaḍ ity eke iti 
eṣā ca varṣasaṃkhyā yadā kanīyān prāptavivāhakālaḥ tataḥ prabhṛti draṣṭavyaḥ 
vivāhakālaś ca svādhyāyavidhinivṛttiḥ 
nanu ca proṣitādhikāre tat paṭhitam 
bhartari proṣite yaḥ strīṇāṃ pravāsakālas tam upakramya bhrātarītyādi paṭhitam 
satyam 
vākyāntare proṣitaśabdasya pratyakṣaḥ saṃbandho 'vagataḥ 
vākyāntare tu saṃbandhe pramāṇaṃ vaktavyam 
na ca tad asti yathā svaritenādhikāra iti 
na cātra tacchabdo 'sti 
na ca tadapekṣayā vinaiva tasya vākyasyāparipūrṇatvam 
vasiṣṭhena cāviśeṣeṇāgniśabdena smārtasyāpy agner grahaṇaṃ kṛtam 
kecit pitary apy akṛtādhāne vidhim icchanti 
agrajaśabdasya yaugikatvāt pitāpy agrajo bhavatīti 
yady apy evam anyo 'pi yo 'grajas tatrāpy evaṃ prāpnoti 
na cāyam agrajānujavyavahāraḥ pitāputrayor vidyate 
smṛtyantare 'pi tu paṭhyate bhrātari ca jyāsasi iti 
parivittiḥ pūrvajo jyeṣṭhaḥ 
parivittiḥ parīvettā yayā ca parividyate 
sarve te narakaṃ yānti dātṛyājakapañcamāḥ 
prasaṅgāt parivedanasaṃbandhinām anyeṣām api doṣadarśanadvāreṇa niṣedhaṃ karoti 
niṣedhaparivarjitaḥ paribhūto vā vedanena parivittiḥ 
parivarjyaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ karoti parivedanaṃ parīvettā 
yayā kanyayā ca parividyate 
sarve te narakaṃ yānti 
dātā yājakaś ca yeṣāṃ narakagāmināṃ pañcamaḥ 
dātā kanyāyā evaṃ prakṛtatvāt pitrādiḥ 
yājako vivāhe yaḥ karoti homaṃ yo vā tatropadeṣṭā 
atha vā teṣām eva parivettṛparivittitatkanyādātṝṇāṃ jyotiṣṭomādīnām api yajñānām ṛtvik 
tasmāj jyeṣṭhena tathā kartavyaṃ yathāsya kanīyaso bhrātur vivāhe vighanakatṛtvaṃ na bhavati 
kanīyasāpi kālapratīkṣā dvādaśāṣṭaṣaḍvārṣādiviṣayā kartavyā 
kanyayāpi tādṛśāya dātuṃ na deyam 
dātṛyājakau pañcamau yeṣām iti dvandvagarbho bahuvrīhiḥ 
bhrātur mṛtasya bhāryāyāṃ yo 'nurajyeta kāmataḥ 
dharmeṇāpi niyuktāyāṃ sa jñeyo didhiṣūpatiḥ 
niyogadharmeṇa pravṛtto bhrātur mṛtasya tadbhāryāgamane yo 'nurajyeta prītiṃ bhāvayet 
kāmataḥ
