niyogadharmātikrameṇa sakṛt sakṛd ṛtau ityevaṃ vidhiṃ hitvā icchānurāgaṃ gāḍhāliṅganaparicumbanādi kuryād asakṛd vā pravarteta cetasā vā vikriyeta kāminīpremadṛṣṭibandhavacanādiliṅgenānurāgitvena vibhāvito didhiṣūpatir vedyaḥ 
agredidhiṣūpatilakṣaṇaṃ tu smṛtyantarāt jñeyam jīvaty agredidhiṣūpatiḥ iti 
kecit tu naivāyaṃ samāmnāye śloko 'stīty āhuḥ 
aparipūrṇaṃ ca liṅgaṃ bruvate 
dvayasya lakṣaṇe kartavye na kartavyakariṇām ekasyopapadyate 
smṛtyantare caitad ubhayaṃ lakṣyate
parapūrvāpatiṃ dhīrā vadanti didhiṣūpatim 
yas tv agredidhiṣūr vipraḥ saiva yasya kuṭumbinī 
na tv iha saṃbhavati parapūrvāpateḥ pṛthag eva niṣiddhatvāt 
tasmād anyo didhiṣūpatiḥ 
paradāreṣu jāyete dvau sutau kuṇḍagolakau 
patyau jīvati kuṇḍaḥ syān mṛte bhartari golakaḥ 
patyau jīvati tadgṛhe sthitāyāṃ tadbhāryāyāṃ yo gūḍhotpannaḥ bhaṅgyā upapatitvena vā patyuḥ kṣamayā jāyate so 'nyajātaḥ kuṇḍa ucyate 
mṛte tu golakaḥ 
etāv aniyuktāsutāv iti kecit 
tad ayuktam 
tayor abrāhmaṇyād evāprāptiḥ 
tasmān niyogotpannau kuṇḍagolakau 
kathaṃ punar aniyuktāsutayor abrāhmaṇyam itarayos tu brāhmaṇyam 
jātilakṣaṇe patnīgrahaṇāt sarvavarṇeṣu tulyāsu patnīṣu iti 
saṃbandhiśabdaś ca patnīśabdo bhartṛśabdavat 
yajñasaṃyoge ca patnīśabdo vyutpādyate na cānyadīyayā bhāryayā sahānyasya yajñādhikāraḥ 
yady evaṃ niyogotpannayor api samānanyāyatvān naiva brāhmaṇyam 
daśama etan nirṇeṣyāmaḥ 
mā bhūd vā niyuktāniyukāsutayoḥ kasyacid api brāhmaṇyam 
nanūktam asati brāhmaṇye prāptyabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ 
patitapratiṣedhād eva etad bhaviṣyati 
dvijātikarmabhyo hāniḥ patanam 
dvijatikarmatve sati śrāddhabhojanasya kutaḥ patite prāptiḥ 
āmnāyate ca pratiṣedho ye stenapatitāḥ 
te tu jātāḥ parakṣetre prāṇinaḥ pretya ceha ca 
dattāni havyakavyāni nāśayanti pradāyinām 
jātyākhyāyām iti bahuvacanaṃ prāṇina iti 
brāhmaṇyādivyapadeśam avajānate prāṇina ity evaṃ vyapadeśārhā na vyapadeśāntaram arhanti 
atas te nāśayanti havyakavyāni niṣphalīkurvanti pradāyināṃ dātṝṇām 
parivettrādīnāṃ loke nātiprasiddhatvāt śabdaiś cāsmṛtatvād vyavasthārthaṃ lakṣaṇapraṇayanam 
apaṅktyo yāvataḥ paṅktyān bhuñjānān anupaśyati 
tāvatāṃ na phalaṃ tatra dātā prāpnoti bāliśaḥ 
paṅktim arhantīti paṅktyāḥ 
sadbhir ekatrāsanabhojanādyarhatā paṅktyatā tadabhāvād apaṅktyaḥ 
sa yāvataḥ paṅktyān vidvattapasviśrotriyān bhuñjānān anupaśyati tāvatāṃ na tatra pitṛtṛptyākhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati 
ataḥ stenādayaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurvatā tataḥ pradeśād apasāraṇīyāḥ 
bāliśo mūrkhaḥ 
vīkṣyāndho navateḥ kāṇaḥ ṣaṣṭeḥ śvitrī śatasya ca 
pāparogī sahasrasya dātur nāśayate phalam 
nanu cāndhasya kuto darśanam yenedam ucyate vīkṣyāndho navater iti 
satyam 
tatpradeśasaṃnidhānam anena lakṣyate 
yāvān deśaś cakṣuṣmato dṛṣṭigocaras tāvato deśād anāvṛtād andho vivāsanīyaḥ 
kāṇaḥ ṣaṣṭeḥ 
nātrāyam artho 'ta ūrdhvaṃ bhojyā iti 
kevalaṃ saṃkhyāpacayena doṣalāghavaṃ prāyaścittaviśeṣārthaṃ jñāpyate 
śvitrī kuṣṭhī bhaṇyate 
pāparogī prasiddhaḥ 
yāvataḥ saṃspṛśed aṅgair brāhmaṇāñ chūdrayājakaḥ 
tāvatāṃ na bhaved datuḥ phalaṃ dānasya paurtikam 
yāvato brāhmaṇān spṛśaty aṅgaiḥ paṅktigataḥ 
atrāpy aṅgasya sparśanaṃ na vivakṣitam kiṃ tarhi pūrvavat taddeśasaṃnidhiḥ 
paurtikaṃ phalam 
pūrte bhavaṃ paurtikam 
bahirvedidānād yat phalaṃ tat paurtikam 
vedavic cāpi vipro 'sya lobhāt kṛtvā pratigraham 
vināśaṃ vrajati kṣipram āmapātram ivāmbhasi 
prasaṅgāc chūdrayājakasyāpratigrāhyatānena kathyate 
vedavid api yadi tasya śūdrayājakasya saṃbandhino dravyasya pratigrahaṃ karoti lobhād ity anuvādaḥ so 'pi vināśaṃ vrajati abhilaṣitenārthena viyujyate dhanaputrapaśuśarīrādinā 
kiṃ punar avedavit 
vedavidaḥ kila pratigrahe nātīva doṣa iti vakṣyati 
āmapātram apakvaṃ śarāvādibhājanam 
ambhasi jale kṣiptam 
somavikrayiṇe viṣṭhā bhiṣaje pūyaśoṇitam 
naṣṭaṃ devalake dattam apratiṣṭhaṃ tu vārdhuṣau 
tasyāṃ jātau jāyate yatra viṣṭhāsya bhojanaṃ bhavati 
evaṃ bhiṣaje 
naṣṭaṃ niṣphalam udvegakaraṃ vā 
naṣṭaṃ hi dravyaṃ udvegaṃ janayati 
avidyamānā pratiṣṭhā sthitir yasya tad apratiṣṭham 
nānārūpaiḥ śabdair evaṃvidhasya dānasya naiṣphalyam kartuś ca doṣasaṃbandhaḥ pratipādyate 
naṣṭam apratiṣṭham iti nānayor arthābhedaśaṅkā kāryā kāryavibhedāt 
yat tu vāṇijake dattaṃ neha nāmutra tad bhavet 
bhasmanīva hutaṃ dravyaṃ tathā paunarbhave dvije 
ayam api pūrvavad vyākhyeyaḥ 
vāṇijakasya bhojanaṃ niṣiddham 
na taddeśasaṃnidhiḥ 
na hi yathā pūrvatra vīkṣyeti dṛṣṭigocare deśe lakṣaṇayā saṃnidhis tadvad iha tādṛśaṃ kiṃcin nibandhanam asti 
paunarbhavo navame vakṣyate 
itareṣu tv apaṅktyeṣu yathoddiṣṭeṣv asādhuṣu 
medo'sṛṅmāṃsamajjāsthi vadanty annaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ 
ye 'sminn apaṅktyadānaphalapradarśanaprakaraṇe paṭhitāḥ andhādayas tebhyo 'nye stenādayaḥ pratikāṇḍoddiṣṭās teṣu yathoddiṣṭeṣu bhojiteṣu dātur imāny upatiṣṭhante medo'sṛṅmāṃsādīni 
tādṛśajātau jāyate yatraitadāhāro bhavati kṛmikravyādgṛdhrādijātāv iti 
manīṣiṇo vedavido vadanti 
sarvasyāyam arthaḥ 
apaṅkteṣu bhojiteṣu śrāddhādhikāro na kṛto bhavaty akaraṇe ca vidhyatikramadoṣo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī nityatvād asya vidheḥ 
apaṅktyopahatā paṅktiḥ pāvyate yair dvijottamaiḥ 
tān nibodhata kārtsnyena dvijāgryān paṅktipāvanān 
apaṅktyaiḥ pūrvoktair upahatā dūṣitā paṅktiḥ pariṣad yair brāhmaṇaiḥ pāvyate nirdoṣā kriyate 
tān vakṣyamāṇaiḥ ślokaiḥ śṛṇuta 
kārtsnyena niḥśeṣeṇa bravīmi 
arthavādarūpāṇy anyāni padāni 
yathaivaikatra bhuñjāno duṣṭo dūṣayati aduṣṭān evaṃ paṅktipāvanaḥ svaguṇātiśayād anyeṣām api doṣān apanudatīty asyārthaḥ 
na cānenāpaṅktyānāṃ bhojanam anujñāpyate kiṃ tarhi paṅktipāvano 'vaśyam anveṣitavyaḥ 
tasmiṃś ca labdhe yady anye nātinipuṇataḥ parīkṣitāḥ tripuruṣaṃ yāvat tathāpi tathāpi na ced upalabhyamānadoṣāḥ vṛthāpi bhojayitavyā ity evamarthaḥ paṅktipāvanopadeśaḥ 
agryāḥ sarveṣu vedeṣu sarvapravacaneṣu ca 
śrotriyānvayajāś caiva vijñeyāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ 
agryāḥ uttamāḥ sarvasaṃśayavyudāsena nipuṇataḥ svīkṛtavedāḥ 
sarveṣu ca pravacaneṣu agryāḥ ity evam 
procyate vyākhyāyate yair tāni vedārthaḥ pravacanāny aṅgāni 
ṣaḍaṅgo vedo yair abhyasto 'bhyasyate ca 
śrotriyānvaye jātāḥ pitṛpitāmahādayo yeṣāṃ tādṛśā eva 
nanu cedṛśā eva bhojyatayā vihitās tatra ko 'tiśayo yenedānīṃ paṅktipāvanatvam ucyate 
kiṃcidvidvadbhyo dānam sati śrotriyatve vihitam 
na ceha vidvattopāttā 
na ca tayā paṅktipāvanatvopapattiḥ 
guṇaviśeṣāpekṣaṃ hi paṅktipāvanatvaṃ na guṇāpacaye yuktam 
tasmād vidvadabhāve kevalaśrotriyāya dānārtham etat 
asati viduṣe śrotriyāya dānaṃ mukhyam eva na gauṇam ity uktaṃ bhavati 
bahuvacanaṃ vyaktyapekṣam 
cakāraḥ samuccaye 
triṇāciketaḥ pañcāgnis trisuparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit 
brahmadeyānusaṃtāno jyeṣṭhasāmaga eva ca 
triṇāciketākhyo vedavibhāgo 'dhvaryūṇām pītodakā jagdhatṛṇāḥ ityādiḥ 
tadadhyayanasaṃbandhāt puruṣo 'tra triṇāciketa ucyate 
anye ca triṇāciketam adhīyānānāṃ vratam āmnātam 
tat yena caritaṃ sa triṇāciketaḥ 
atrāpi lakṣaṇayaiva puruṣa ucyate 
na caivaṃ mantavyaṃ tāvanmātreṇa paṅktipāvanatvam kiṃ tarhi sati śrotriyatvādiguṇayoge 'dhiko 'yaṃ guṇo draṣṭavyaḥ paṅktipāvanahetutayā 
pañcāgnividyā nāma chāndogyopaniṣadi vidyāmnāyate steno hiraṇyasya ityādi yasyāḥ phalam 
tadadhyayanasaṃbandhāt puruṣo 'pi pañcāgniḥ pūrvavat 
anye tu pañcāgnayo yasya trayas tretāgnayaḥ sabhyāvasathyau ca dvau pañcāgniḥ 
tatra sabhyo nāma yo mahāsādhanasya śītāpanodārtham eva bahuṣu deśeṣu vyavahriyate 
trisuparṇo nāma mantras taittirīyake bāhvṛcye ca ye brāhmaṇās trisuparṇaṃ paṭhanti ityādiḥ 
ṣaḍaṅgo vedas taṃ vettīti ṣaḍaṅgavit 
brāhmadharmeṇa āhūya dānena yā dattā tasyānusantānas tato jātaḥ 
jyeṣṭhasāmagaś ca 
jyeṣṭhadohāni āraṇyake sāmāni tāni gāyati sa evam ucyate 
atrāpi sāmagānena tadvratācaraṇena vā puruṣa ity ucyate 
vedārthavit pravaktā ca brahmacārī sahasradaḥ 
śatāyuś caiva vijñeyā brāhmaṇāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ 
vedasyārthaṃ jānāti 
nanu ca ṣaḍaṅgavid ukta eva 
satyam 
aṅgair vinā svayam apy ūhati prajñayā yaḥ sa iha vedārthavid abhipretaḥ 
atha vā tasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ punaḥ punaḥ kriyate 
na vedārthajñānena vinā saty apy anyaguṇayoge śrāddhārhāḥ 
pravaktā vyākhyātā vedārthasyaiva 
brahmacārī 
sahasradaḥ 
aviśeṣopādānena gavāṃ sahasraṃ yo dattavān 
idaṃ ca yuktam 
sahasraśabdasya bahunāmatvāt bahu yo dadāti udāro vety arthaḥ 
na hi gavāṃ saṃkhyeyatve pramāṇam asti 
vede 'py uktam gāvo vai yajñasya mātaraḥ iti 
aviśeṣacodanāyāṃ gāvaḥ pratīyante 
śatāyur vṛddhavayāḥ 
sa hi paripakvakaṣāyatayā pāvanatvam aśnute 
śatam āyur asyeti śatāyuḥ 
varṣāṇi saṃkhyeyāni prasiddheḥ 
atha vā śataśabdo bahvarthaḥ bahvāyuḥ 
vṛddhavayastvaṃ cātrābhipretam 
uktaṃ tu gautamīye yuvabhyo dānaṃ prathamam eke pitṛvat iti 
evamartham eva ca brahmacārigrahaṇam iha vyācakṣate 
sa hi pūrvavayā bhavati 
pūrvedyur aparedyur vā śrāddhakarmaṇy upasthite 
nimantrayīta tryavarān samyag viprān yathoditān 
uktā yādṛśā brāhmaṇā bhojanīyāḥ 
idānīm anyetikartavyatocyate 
pūrvedyur yad ahaḥ śrāddhaṃ kartavyam amāvāsyāyāṃ trayodaśyāṃ vā tataḥ pūrvasminn ahani caturdaśyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ vā śvaḥ śrāddhe kartavye brāhmaṇān nimantrayet 
aparedyus tadahar eva vā 
vikalpaś cātra niyamāpekṣaḥ 
yaḥ śaknoti niyamān pālayituṃ sa pūrvedyuḥ aśaktas tadahar eva 
adhikaniyamānupālanāc ca mahāphalam 
nimantraṇe kartavye adhyeṣaṇapūrvakam vyāpāraṇam abhyupagamanaṃ ca 
trayo 'varā yeṣāṃ te tryavarāḥ 
yady atyantaṃ nyūnās tadā trayaḥ 
śaktau tv ayujo yathotsāham ity uktam 
avaśiṣṭaḥ padasaṃghātaḥ ślokapūraṇārthaḥ 
upasthite prāpte 
yathoditān yathoktān 
nimantrito dvijaḥ pitrye niyatātmā bhavet sadā 
na ca chandāṃsy adhīyīta yasya śrāddhaṃ ca tad bhavet 
pitrye śrāddhe nimantrito niyatātmā bhavet 
saṃyatātmā brahmacaryaṃ parirakṣet anyāṃś ca yamaniyamān anutiṣṭheta snātakavratādīn 
puruṣavratānāṃ nṛtyagītādipratiṣedhānāṃ karmāṅgatā vidhīyate 
tathā kartavyaṃ śrāddhakṛtā yathāsau brāhmaṇo nimantraṇāt prabhṛti saṃyatendriyo bhavati anyathā śrāddhaṃ duṣyet 
na ca chandāṃsi vedān adhīyīta 
yac ca vedākṣaroccāraṇam adhyayanaṃ tan niṣidhyate 
japas tu saṃdhyopāsanādāv apratiṣiddhaḥ 
yasya tatkartavyaṃ srāddhaṃ bhavet 
pitrye śrāddhe nimantritavan niyatātmā bhavet 
saṃyatātmā ca so 'pi niyatātmā bhaved iti padayojanā 
ato bhoktuḥ kartuś ca nimantraṇāt prabhṛti tulyo niyamo 'nadhyayanaṃ ca 
nimantritān hi pitara upatiṣṭhanti tān dvijān 
vāyuvac cānugacchanti tathāsīnān upāsate 
nimantritena niyatātmanā bhavitavyam ity asya vidher arthavādo 'yam 
yasmān nimantritān brāhmaṇān adṛśyena rūpeṇa pitara upatiṣṭhanti taccharīram anpraviśanti yathā bhūtagrahāviṣṭam 
vāyuvad anugacchanti 
yathā vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ puruṣaṃ gacchantam anugacchati na gacchantaṃ prāṇo jahati evaṃ pitaro vāyubhūtā bhavanti 
tathāsīnān brāhmaṇān upāsate 
gacchatsv anugacchanti upaviṣṭeṣūpaviśanti 
nimantritā dvijā pitṛrūpāpannā bhavantīty arthaḥ 
tasmān na svatantrair nimantritair bhavitavyam 
ketitas tu yathānyāyaṃ havye kavye dvijottamaḥ 
kathaṃcid apy atikrāman pāpaḥ sūkaratāṃ vrajet 
ketita upanimantritaḥ 
havye kavye daive pitrye ca 
aṅgīkṛtya nimantraṇam abhyupagamya śrāddhabhojanam yadi kathaṃcid atikrāmati bhojanakāle na saṃvidhīyate brahmacaryaṃ ca na rakṣati tadā sūkaratāṃ gacchati sa brāhmaṇaḥ 
kathaṃcit kāmād vismṛtya vā 
yathānyāyam iti vṛttapūraṇam 
anye tv āhuḥ 
prārthyamānasyānabhyupagama evātikramaḥ 
tathā ca srāddhakalpe uktam aninditenāmantrito nātikrāmet iti 
etac cāyuktam 
lipsayā pravṛttiḥ śrāddhe na punaḥ śāstrataḥ 
tatrāsatyāṃ lipsāyāṃ yadi nāṅgīkaroti tadā ko doṣaḥ 
āmantritas tu yaḥ śrāddhe vṛṣalyā saha modate 
dātur yad duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ pratipadyate 
vṛṣalīśabdaḥ strīmātropalakṣaṇārthaḥ sāmānyena brahmacaryasya vidhānāt 
ato brāhmaṇy api vṛṣaly eva 
vṛṣasyati cālayati bhartāram iti yaugikatvaṃ darśayati 
ato 'yam arthaḥ 
bhojanam aṅgīkṛtya tadahaḥ yaḥ striyā saha modate ramate tayā saha suratasaṃbhogecchayā saṃlāpāliṅganādy api yo janayati tasyāyaṃ doṣaḥ 
dātuḥ śrāddhasya kartuḥ yad duṣkṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ tasmin saṃkrāmati 
aniṣṭaphalayogamātram anena nirdiśyate 
anyathā yatra dātā puṇyakṛt tatra na kaścid doṣaḥ syāt 
modanaṃ harṣotpattiḥ 
tena saṃlāpāliṅganādy api na kartavyam 
akrodhanāḥ śaucaparāḥ satataṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ 
nyastaśastrā mahābhāgāḥ pitaraḥ pūrvadevatāḥ 
akrodhanāḥ krodhavarjitāḥ 
śaucaparāḥ 
śaucaṃ śuddhatā mṛdvāribhyāṃ prāyaścittenāntaḥśuddhyā vā 
satataṃ śuddher viśeṣanam 
tena niṣṭhīvanādāv ācamanādi tatkṣaṇam eva kartavyam 
brahmacāriṇaḥ strīsaṃbhogaṃ pariharati 
nyastaśastrāḥ 
nyastaṃ tyaktaṃ śastraṃ yaiḥ 
śastragrahaṇaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyopalakṣaṇārtham 
mahābhāgāḥ 
audāryadhanitvādiguṇayogo mahābhāgatā 
yata evaṃvidhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ rūpam te ca brāhmaṇān āviśanti atas tais tadrūpadhāribhir bhavitavyam ity arthavādenāyam artho vidhīyate 
pūrvadevatāḥ pitaro nāma kalpāntare 'py ete devatā eveti stutiḥ 
pūrvakālaṃ pitṝṇām arcanīyatvāt pūrvagrahaṇam 
yasmād utpattir eteṣāṃ sarveṣām apy aśeṣataḥ 
ye ca yair upacaryāḥ syur niyamais tān nibodhata 
ya eteṣāṃ ptṝṇām utpattir ye ca pitaro yair upacaryāḥ 
brāhmaṇena somapāḥ kṣatriyeṇa haviṣmantaḥ ityādi 
tat sarvam apy aśeṣata idānīm ucyamānaṃ nibodhata budhyadhvam 
niyamair ity anuvādaḥ pūrvam eva vihitatvāt niyatātmā bhavet iti 
bahuvacanaṃ bahutvān niyamānām 
manor hairaṇyagarbhasya ye marīcyādayaḥ sutāḥ 
teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ putrāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ prajāpatiḥ 
tasya putro hairaṇyagarbho manuḥ 
tathā coktaṃ prathamādhyāye evaṃ sarvaṃ sa sṛṣṭvedaṃ māṃ ca iti 
tasya manor ye marīcyādayaḥ putrāḥ atryaṅgirasāv ityādayas teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ ye putrās ta ete pitṛgaṇāḥ 
nanu ca pitrādayaḥ sarvasyātmīyāḥ pitaraḥ 
evaṃ hi coditam pitre pitāmahāya prapitāmahāya piṇḍān nirvapet 
tathā ata ūrdhvaṃ putrās tribhyo dadyuḥ iti 
tatra kim idam ucyate ṛṣīṇāṃ putrāḥ pitaraḥ somapā nāma viprāṇām iti 
na ca vikalpaḥ śakyaḥ pratipattum somapebhyo dadyāt pitṛpitāmahebhyo vā iti 
ata utpattau putreṇa kartavyam iti śrūyate 
saṃbandhiśabdaś ca putraśabdaḥ 
tathā pitā yasya tu vṛttaḥ syāt iti 
tasmād vaktavyo 'sya prakaraṇasyārthaḥ 
ucyate 
stutir iyaṃ pūrvavidhiśeṣabhūtā 
nātra teṣāṃ saṃpradānatā śrutā 
nanu ca upacaryāḥ iti vidhir asti 
nāyaṃ caratiḥ sāmānyakriyārūpo vidhiviṣayo bhavitum arhati 
upacāro nāma kaścid dānayāgādivad vede na pratīyate 
prāyeṇa hy ayaṃ karotivat saṃnihitakriyāparatayā prayujyate 
saṃnihitaṃ ca śrāddham 
tatra viśiṣṭhasaṃpradānakaṃ vihitaṃ na śakyaṃ punar vidhātum vidheyatvena ca na saṃnidhir asti 
saṃnihitasya caratir bādhakaḥ 
yo 'pi loke gurava upacaryāḥ itiprayogas tatrāpi śuśrūṣālakṣaṇārthaḥ pādadhāvanādiḥ pratīyate 
so 'pi yathoditānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ na saṃbhavati 
prakṛtyaikavākyatayā cārthavattopapatter nārthāntarakalpanāpi saṃbhavati 
yadi ca somapādayo yathāvarṇaṃ śrāddhe devatātvenābhipretāḥ syus tato 'bhijanavarṇanam upayogi 
stāvakatve tu sarvam upapadyate 
yaḥ kaścit pitṛdveṣāt pitrye karmaṇy upahatabuddhir anādaravānt syāt tasya pravṛttyartham idam ārabhyate 
maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ mṛtamanuṣyarūpāḥ pitaraḥ ye na tarpitāḥ śrāddhe kiṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyanti tarpitā vā kiṃ guṇam iti 
yata ete mahāprabhāvāḥ 
sarvasya jagataḥ prabhur hiraṇyagarbhas tasya putro manuḥ tasyaite pautrāḥ 
ata eva ṛṣīṇāṃ cety ucyate 
na manor ye kecid anye putrāḥ kiṃ tarhi ṛṣayas te ca prathitaprabhāvā marīcyādayaḥ 
teṣāṃ putrāḥ pitaraḥ 
bahuvidhāś ca pratipattāro ya etādṛśebhyo 'rthavādavākyebhyaḥ pravartantetarām 
ye ca vyācakṣate somapādidṛṣṭiḥ pitṛṣu kartavyā iti te pramāṇābhāvād upekṣaṇīyāḥ 
na hi yathāditye brahmadṛṣṭiḥ upadiśyate evam iha tādṛśaṃ kiṃcana vacanam asti 
ye 'py āhuḥ gṛhītvā gotranāmanī pitṛbhyo dadyāt iti tac caitadgotraṃ somapāḥ ityādivarṇabhedena 
tad apy ayuktam 
nāmanirdeśo 'yaṃ na gotranirdeśaḥ somapānām iti śravaṇāt 
gotranāmadheyatve 'pi nāmaśabda upapadyata eveti cet evaṃ tarhi gotranirdeśe vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ syāt pitṝṇāṃ somapā gotram iti na tu pitaraḥ somapā iti 
athābhedopacāreṇa gotreṇa saṃtānavyapadeśo dṛṣṭa ity ucyate yathā babhrur mandur iti 
atrocyate 
idam iha nirūpyaṃ kim etad gotraṃ nāma 
ādipuruṣaḥ saṃjñākārī vidyāvittaśauryaudāryādiguṇayogena khyātatamo yena kulaṃ vyapadiśyate 
evaṃ tarhi sarveṣām eva brāhmaṇādīnām avāntaragotrabhedāḥ santīti 
smaranti ca yādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ tatsaṃtānajāḥ puruṣā vayam amuṣyakule jātāḥ ity atas tenaiva vyapadeśo yuktaḥ 
na hi somapā vayam iti kaścid gotratvena somapān smarati yathā bhṛgugargagālāvān 
brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tair eva gotravyapedeśo yuktaḥ 
tāni hi mukhyāni gotrāṇi 
rūḍhirūpeṇa na tatra gotraśabdaḥ pravartate 
na hi teṣāṃ gotratve etallakṣaṇam asti ādipuruṣaḥ saṃjñākārī gotram iti anāditvād etadgotrāṇām brāhmaṇādijātivat 
na hi parāśarajanmata ūrdhvaṃ pārāśaravyapadeśaḥ keṣāṃcid brāhmaṇānām 
evaṃ sati ādimattā vedasya prasajyeta 
ato nityatvād etasya gotravyapadeśasyodakatarpaṇādau tad eva gotraṃ śrayitavyam 
ye tu saṃjñākāriṇas te na nityāḥ idānīṃtanāḥ 
na ca nitye saṃbavaty anityasomapādānaṃ vaidike karmaṇi yuktam 
ato brāhmaṇair yathāgotraṃ gārgyāya gargagotrāya vā svadhā idam udakam astv iti evamādiśabdenoddeśaṃ kṛtvā tato nāmoccārya udakadānādi kartavyam 
kṣatriyādīnāṃ naitādṛśo gotravyavahāro vidyate 
na hi yathā brāhmaṇo gotraṃ niyataṃ smarati evaṃ kṣatriyādayaḥ 
tasmāt teṣāṃ laukikam eva gotram ādipuruṣaḥ saṃjñākārī khyātatama iti 
atas tena gotreṇa śrāddhādau vyapadiśyante ādimatāpi nāmadheyenaiva 
na tu teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ havirbhugityādigotratayā śrāddhādau vyapadeśam arhanti 
ye 'py āhur ajñātapitrādināmakā ye teṣām etaiḥ śabdaiḥ śrāddhādi codyate somapān āhvayāmi somapebhyaḥ svadhā iti 
etad api na samyak 
uktaṃ hi nāmāny avidvāṃs tataḥ pitāmahaprapitāmaheti 
yadi cārthavādatayā na prakṛtaśeṣatvenārthvattā labhyeta tata eva kalpā āśriyeran 
na tv ekavākyatayānvaye saṃbhavati vākyabhedakalpanenārtho nyāyyaḥ 
virāṭsutāḥ somasadaḥ sādhyānāṃ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ 
agniṣvāttāś ca devānāṃ mārīcā lokaviśrutāḥ 
śrāddhārthavādā amī ślokāḥ aśeṣeṇaikavākyatvāt 
na hi sādhyānāṃ pitaraḥ śrāddhasaṃpradānaṃ śiṣyante devatātvāt sādhyānām 
devatānāṃ ca na karmasv adhikāraḥ niyojyatvābhāvāt 
na hi devatā niyoktuṃ śakyate devatātvahāniprasaṅgāt 
adhikāre sati pratipattavyaṃ kartṛtvam 
kartṛtve ca kutaḥ saṃpradānabhāvaḥ 
na cānyad devatārūpam 
virājaḥ sutāḥ virāṭsutāḥ somasado nāma te sādhyānāṃ pitaraḥ 
īdṛśam eva nityaṃ karmāvaśyaṃ kartavyam yat sādhyāḥ pūrvadevāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyā api pitṝn arcayanti 
agnau pakvaṃ carupuroḍāśādikaṃ svadante agniṣvāttāḥ devānām indrāgnyādīnāṃ pitaraḥ 
marīcer jātā mārīcāḥ 
lokaviśrutāḥ prasiddhāḥ 
daityadānavayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām 
suparṇakinnarāṇāṃ ca smṛtā barhiṣado 'trijāḥ 
sarva ete daityādayah śāstrānadhikṛtāḥ arthavādārthaṃ saṃkīrtyante 
teṣāṃ ca svarūpam itihāsaprasiddham 
suparṇā pakṣiviśeṣāḥ 
kinnarā aśvamukhās tiryañcaḥ 
evaṃvidham etat pitryaṃ karma yad daityadānavarakṣāṃsi yajñavidhvaṃsakarāṇy api nātivartante tathā tiryañco 'py asaṃjñāsmṛtikāḥ 
atrer jātā barhiṣado nāma 
somapā nāma viprāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ havirbhujaḥ 
vaiśyānām ājyapā nāma śūdrāṇāṃ tu sukālinaḥ 
uktārthaḥ prāg evāyaṃ slokaḥ 
somaṃ pibanti jyotiṣṭomādidevatā indrādayaḥ 
havirbhujaś carupuroṣāśādidevatāḥ 
ājyapā āghārāvājyabhāgaprayājādidevatāḥ 
sukālinaḥ 
kālayanti apavarjayanti karmeti sukālinaḥ 
karmāpavargahomadevatā ayāś cāgnesyanabhiśastīś ca ityādivihitāḥ 
somapās tu kaveḥ putrā haviṣmanto 'ṅgiraḥsutāḥ 
pulastyasyājyapāḥ putrā vasiṣṭhasya sukālinaḥ 
havirbhuja eva haviṣmantaḥ 
kavir bhṛguḥ 
kāvyaṃ vadanty uśanasam iti smaranti bhārgavaṃ ca 
yathaitā devatā ṛṣīṇāṃ putrā evaṃ tvadīyāś cāpi pitaro devatārūpā eveti māvamaṃsthāḥ 
anagnidagdhān agnidagdhān kāvyān barhiṣadas tathā 
agniṣvāttāṃś ca saumyāṃś ca viprāṇām eva nirdiśet 
anagnidagdhaḥ somaḥ 
na hy agninā tasya pāko 'sti 
tena yā devatā ijyante tā apy anagidagdāḥ samṛddhās tadguṇata ucyante 
evam agnidagdhāni carupuroḍāśādīni havīṃṣi agninā pacyante 
tair yā devatā ijyante tā agnidagdhāḥ 
pūrvavad evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate 
ye agnidagdhā ucyante tān agnidagdhān nirdiśet 
ye anagnidagdhās tānt somapān eva nirdiśet 
evaṃ kāvyān barhiṣada iti 
kaveḥ putrāḥ kāvyās te ca somapās tu kaveḥ putrāḥ ity uktāḥ 
barhiṣado 'trijā uktāḥ 
nāyam evakāro yathādeśam draṣṭavyaḥ 
tathā hy ayam arthaḥ syāt 
viprāṇām eveti pitaro na kṣatriyādīnām 
tac ca prāguktena virudhyate 
na caite varṇabhedena pitṛtvenoktāḥ yena tasmād ācchidya brāhmaṇādisaṃbandhitā eṣām ucyate 
tasmād apakṛṣya evakāro 'gniṣvāttan eva saumyān eva nirdiśed ity evaṃ saṃbandhanīyaḥ 
vipragrahaṇam anuvādatvāt kṣatriyādipradarśanārtham 
evaṃnāmānaś caite pitaro vede śrūyante agniṣvāttāḥ pitaro ye 'gnidagdhā ye anagdagdhāḥ iti tān mantrān udāhṛtya vivṛṇoti 
atha vaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyate 
ya etaiḥ śabdaiḥ pitara ucyante tān viprāṇām eva nirdiśet svapitṝn 
na ca śabdabhedenārthabhedaśaṅkā kartavyā 
vipragrahaṇam adhikāryupalakṣaṇārthaṃ prādhānyāt 
pradhānena hy upalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati rājā gacchati iti 
ya ete tu gaṇā mukhyāḥ pitṝṇāṃ parikīrtitāḥ 
teṣām apīha vijñeyaṃ putrapautram anantakam 
ete tu mukhyā gaṇāḥ somapādayaḥ pitṝṇām 
teṣām api putrapautrāḥ anantā vidyante 
te 'pi pitara eva 
asmād vāniyamavacanād etad gamyate 
na somapādaya uddeśyāḥ 
yadi hi teṣām api putrapautrāḥ pitaras te hy uddeśyāḥ syuḥ na ca teṣāṃ kiṃcin nāmadheyam āmnātam 
tasmād arthavādataivāvasīyate 
gavāśvaprabhṛtitvāt putrapautram ity ekavadbhāvaḥ 
anantakam aparimitam 
svārthe kaḥ 
ṛṣibhyaḥ pitaro jātāḥ pitṛbhyo devamānavāḥ 
devebhyas tu jagat sarvaṃ caraṃ sthāṇv anupūrvaśaḥ 
na pitryaṃ karma daivāt karmaṇo nyūnaṃ draṣṭavyam 
api tu tad eva pradhānatamam 
yato janmajyeṣṭhāḥ pitaro devānām 
tathā hi ṛṣibhyaḥ pitara utpannāḥ pitṛbhyo devā ity eṣa sṛṣṭikramaḥ 
devebhyo 'nyat sarvaṃ jagat caraṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāṇu sthāvaram anupūrvaśaḥ prathame 'dhyāye uktaḥ kramaḥ 
atikrānto 'rthavādasaṃpātaḥ 
rājatair bhājanair eṣām atho vā rajatānvitaiḥ 
vāry api śrāddhayā dattam akṣayāyopakalpate 
rājatāni ca bhājanāni rūpyamayāni pātrāṇi 
tadabhāve rajatānvitaiḥ dārumayāni tāmramayāni sauvarṇāni vā raupyeṇaikadeśayuktāni kartavyāni 
etac ca pātraṃ deyaṃ ghṛtamadhvādivyañjanasauhityākṣiptaṃ pātram tatreyaṃ rūpyamayatā vidhīyate pātre 
yac ca piṇḍanirvapaṇādi taddhastābhyām eva kartavyam 
yad apy udakaninayanaṃ piṇḍeṣv avanejanādi ca tad api hastābhyām eva apasavyena hastena iti vacanāt 
yat tūdakatarpaṇam ānvahikaṃ tad api hastenāpasavyena savyena vā kartavyam 
idaṃ hi śrāddhaprakaraṇe paṭhitam 
tan na 
aprākaraṇikasya karmaṇo 'ṅgam apy anārabhyādhītam 
tatraiva vacanam asti 
bhavatu anuvādaḥ syāt 
vāry api 
apiśabdaḥ pātrapraśaṃsāṃ sūcayati 
tiṣṭhatu tāvat saṃskṛtabhojanadānaṃ vārimātram api yadi rūpyapātreṇa dīyate tadrūpyaguṇasaṃbandhād akṣayaṃ bhavati 
akṣayāyopakalpate 
akṣayāyās tṛpter hetur bhavatīty arthaḥ 
śraddhayeti sarvadāneṣu vihitatvād anuvādaḥ 
devakāryād dvijātīnāṃ pitṛkāryaṃ viśiṣyate 
daivaṃ hi pitṛkāryasya pūrvam āpyāyanaṃ smṛtam 
devān uddiśya yat kriyate tad daivaṃ kāryam 
tataḥ pitṛkāryaṃ viśiṣyate viśeṣeṇa kartavyam uddiśyate 
anena pitryasya prādhānyam āha 
daivaṃ tatrāṅgaṃ karmety uktaṃ bhavati 
aṅgakarmatām eva spaṣṭayati 
daivaṃ hi yad brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ tat pitṛkāryasyāpyāyanaṃ vṛddhikaram 
na svataḥpradhānaṃ pitryasyaiva poṣakam 
teṣām ārakṣabhūtaṃ tu pūrvaṃ daivaṃ niyojayet 
rakṣāṃsi vipralumpanti śrāddam ārakṣavarjitam 
rakṣaiva ārakṣaṃ tat prāptaṃ ārakṣabhūtaṃ ārakṣārtham ity uktaṃ bhavati 
upamāyāṃ vā bhūtaśabdaḥ rakṣārtham iva 
yadā tu rakṣārtham ataḥ pūrvaṃ daivaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ niyojayet nimantrayet āsane copaveśayet 
aparo 'rthavādaḥ 
rakṣāṃsi adṛśyāni kānicit satvātni itihāse 
kriyā vipralumpanti ācchidyanti pitṛbhyaḥ śrāddham 
ke punar devā uddeśyāḥ 
gṛhye tāvat viśvān devān havāmahe iti mantrasya viniyogād viśvedevāḥ pratīyante 
purāṇe 'py uktam viśvedevā iti śrutiḥ iti 
daivādyantaṃ tad īhete pitrādyantaṃ na tad bhavet 
pitryādyantaṃ tv īhamānaḥ kṣipraṃ naśyati sānvayaḥ 
ādiś ca antaś ca ādyantau 
daivaṃ ādyantāv asyeti daivādyantam 
daivena karmaṇā ādir upakramaḥ śrāddhasya kartavyaḥ 
ataś ca nimantraṇaṃ devānāṃ pūrvaṃ kartavyam 
antaḥ samāptiḥ 
visarjiteṣu pitryeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu paścād devānāṃ visarjanaṃ kartavyam 
gandhādidāne 'pi daivopakramatāṃ manyante 
na tu teṣāṃ padārthānāṃ daivenopakramasamāptī saṃbhavataḥ āvṛttiprasaṅgāt 
prayogadharmaś cāyaṃ daivādyantatā na pratipadārthadharmaḥ 
padārthānāṃ tu gandhamālyādīnāṃ daivopakramatāviśeṣeṇa kartavyam uddiśyate 
tāvat pravṛttikenaiva krameṇa siddhyati 
nimantraṇaṃ tāvad daivapūrvaṃ kartavyam 
yata eva prathamaḥ padārtha ārabdhas tata evānyeṣām ārambho yuktaḥ 
padārthaḥ padārthāntarārambhaṃ niyacchati yataḥ 
tad uktam prakṛtyā kṛtakālānāṃ guṇānāṃ tadupakramāt iti 
tac chrāddhakarma īheta kuryāt 
pariśiṣṭo 'rthavādaḥ 
pitryādyantaṃ na tad bhavet 
daivādyantatvasya vihitatvāt pitryādyantapretiṣedho 'rthavādatayā laukikavākyavan neyaḥ 
loke hi kiṃcid vidhāya tadviparītam aprāptam api niṣedhati 
kriyā hi drvayaṃ vinayati nādravyam iti 
kṣipraṃ naśyati sānvayaḥ 
saṃtānāphalapradarśanarūpo 'yaṃ nindārthavādaḥ 
ataś ca sarvaṃ pariveṣaṇādi daivapūrvakaṃ kartavyam 
yat tv antarā bhaktādyupanayanaṃ pipāsatāṃ ca pānādidānaṃ tad yasyaivecchā prathamam upajātā tasmā evopanetavyam 
anarthinas tadanurodhenopanīyamāne pradhānavidhibādhaḥ syāt harṣayet brāhmaṇān iti 
tathā kaścin madhurarasapriyo 'paro 'mlarasasātmyas tatra bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca vividhaṃ pānāni surabhīṇi ca iti bahuṣu pānakeṣu satsu yady anyānurodhena na anyatra rasasātmyam āpādayet tato vyādhir asya janitaḥ syāt 
tasmād upakramasamāpane eva daivādinā 
śuciṃ deśaṃ viviktaṃ ca gomayenopalepayet 
dakṣiṇāpravaṇaṃ caiva prayatnenopapādayet 
śucir bhasmāsthikapālakādyanupahataḥ 
vivikto vistīrṇo bahubhir janair anākīrṇaḥ 
dakṣiṇāpravaṇo dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśy avanataḥ 
tādṛśaṃ deśaṃ yatnena saṃpādayet 
svabhāvataś cet tādṛśo na labhyate tathā kartavyaṃ yathā svavyāpāreṇa saṃpādyate 
taṃ ca gośakṛtopalepayet 
mṛdādayo nivartante gomayenopalepaniyamāt 
avakāśeṣu cokṣeṣu jalatīreṣu caiva hi 
vivikteṣu ca tuṣyanti dattena pitaraḥ sadā 
avakāśo deśaḥ 
cokṣāḥ svabhāvaśucayo manaḥprasādajanakā araṇyādayaḥ 
jalatīrāṇi saritsamīpapulinādīni 
vivikteṣu vijaneṣu tīrtheṣu ca 
vidhyantaram idam 
ataś ca gomayopalepananiyamo nāsti upapādayed iti vacanāt 
yatra saṃpādyaṃ śucitvaṃ tatrāsau niyamaḥ 
svabhāvataḥ śuciṣu dṛṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktam ity etāvataiva yogyatā 
eteṣu deśeṣu dattena kṛtena śrāddhenātyantatuṣṭāḥ pitaro bhavantīti 
āsaneṣūpakḷpteṣu barhiṣmatsu pṛthak pṛthak 
upaspṛṣṭodakān samyag viprāṃs tān upaveśayet 
upakḷpteṣu kalpiteṣu vinyasteṣu pṛthak pṛthak vibhāgena 
naikam āsanaṃ dīrghadhautaphalakādi sarvebhyo dadyāt 
parasparaṃ yathā na spṛśanti tathopaveśanīyā iti pṛthaggrahaṇam 
barhiṣmatsu darbhaviṣṭarāstīrṇeṣu 
upaspṛṣṭodakān snātān kṛtācamanavidhīṃś ca 
tān pūrvanimantritān upaveśayet 
upaveśya tu tān viprān āsaneṣv ajugupsitān 
gandhamālyaiḥ surabhibhir arcayed devapūrvakam 
upaveśanānantaraṃ gandhamālyair arcayet 
gandhān kukuṅkumakarpūrādīn dadyāt 
mālyāni kusumasrajaḥ 
surabhigrahaṇaṃ mālyaviśeṣaṇam 
nirgandhāni puṣpāṇi na dadyāt 
gandheṣv api yuktaṃ viśeṣaṇam santi gandhā asurabhayas tannivṛttyartham 
atha vā surabhibhir dhūpaiḥ 
svatantraṃ surabhigrahaṇam 
daivebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ dattvā tataḥ pitryebhyo dātvayam 
idaṃ tu daivapūrvagrahaṇaṃ prāgbhojanapravṛtteḥ padārthānāṃ tadādiniyamārtham 
pravṛttabhojanānāṃ tu pānavyañjanādiṣu na niyama ity evamarthaṃ āhuḥ 
anyathā ko 'rthaḥ punar abhidhāne syāt 
ajugupsitān aninditān viprān 
anuvādo 'yam 
tādṛśānām eva vidhānam 
atha vā saty api bhūtapratyayanirdeśe prakṛtyarthakartavyatāniṣedha evāyam 
upariṣṭān na jugupseta na nindetety uktaṃ bhavati 
pratyayārthamātratyāgo varaṃ na sarvapadārthatyāga iti manyante 
anuvāde hi kṛtsnam eva padam anarthakam 
teṣām udakam ānīya sapavitrāṃs tilān api 
agnau kuryād anujñāto brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaiḥ saha 
anulipteṣu sragviṣu surabhidhūpāñ jighratsu arghodakam upanetavyam 
tenaiva sapavitrāṃs tilān api 
pavitraśabdo darbheṣu vartate 
teṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām udakam ānīya datvā tair anujñāto 'gnau homaṃ kuryāt 
brāhmaṇair anujñātaḥ kuryād iti saṃbandhaḥ 
saha sarve yugapad anujñāṃ dadyuḥ 
anujñāpanavākyam api sāmarthyaprāptam 
na hi te 'prārthitā anujānīran 
tataś ca agnau karvāṇi kariṣye ity evamādīni praśnavākyāni labhyante 
anujñāvākyam api sāmarthyāt prāptam 
sarvaṃ caitat sādhubhiḥ śabdaiḥ kartavyam 
pradarśitaṃ caitat gṛhyakāraiḥ agnau karavāṇi kariṣye iti cānujñāpayed oṃkurv ity evaṃ brūhyuḥ 
agneḥ somayamābhyāṃ ca kṛtvāpyāyanam āditaḥ 
havirdānena vidhivat paścāt saṃtarpayet pitṝn 
yad agnau kartavyaṃ tad ucyate 
agneḥ caturthyarthe ṣaṣṭhī 
agnir ekā devatā 
somayamābhyām iti dvandvasya devatātvam agnīṣomavat 
anayor devatayor ādita āpyāyanaṃ havirdānena kṛtvā paścāt saṃtarpayet pitṝn 
piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ ca kuryād ity arthaḥ 
gṛhye tv anyā devatāḥ samāmnātāḥ 
yeṣāṃ gṛhyaṃ nāsti teṣām idaṃ devatāvacanam 
āpyāyanaṃ poṣaṇam 
haviṣā devatāḥ puṣyanti ity arthavādaḥ 
agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇāv evopapādayet 
yo hy agniḥ sa dvijo viprair mantradarśibhir ucyate 
smārtasya vaivāhikasya dāyāder vā agner abhāve vidhir ayam ucyate 
laukikasya tu pitṛyajñaniṣedhāt bhāvābhāvāv acintyau 
na paitṛyajñiko homo laukike 'gnau iti vakṣyati 
kathaṃ punas tasyāgner abhāvaḥ 
proṣitasyāgninā vinā dravyabrāhmaṇadeśasaṃpattau ca śrāddhakāla uktaḥ nāmāvasyaiva 
tatra proṣitena yadi paṅktipāvanaḥ prāpto dravyaṃ vā kālaśākādi tatrāyaṃ vidhir ucyate 
nanu ca proṣitasya kathaṃ śrāddhādhikāraḥ 
yadi tāvad bhāryā pravasati agnināpi tatraiva saṃnidhātavyam 
yato nobhābhyām agner viraha iṣyate bhāryayā yajamānena ca 
evaṃ hi śrūyate nāgnir antaritavyaḥ pravastām iti 
atha kevala eva gṛhasthaḥ pravaset tadā bhaved agnyabhāvaḥ 
kiṃ tu madhyakatvād etasya sahādhikārāc ca bhāryāyām asaṃnihitāyām tadicchāyā abhāvāt kathaṃ sādhāraṇasya śrāddhe viniyogaḥ 
sādhāraṇe hi dravye anyatarānicchāyāṃ tyāga eva na saṃvartate 
athocyate 
tīrtheṣv api śrāddhakaraṇam anena nyāyena na prāpnoti 
tatremāni vacanāni virudhyante
puṣkareṣv akṣayaṃ śrāddhaṃ tapaś caiva mahāphalam 
mahodadhau prabhāse ca tadvad eva vinirdiśet  iti 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
bhāryayā saha tīrthayātrāṃ gacchataḥ sāgnikasyopapatsyate 
iha tu bhāryayā saha pravāsaḥ tadā nāsty agner abhāvaḥ 
atha kevalasya tadā bhāryecchāyā aparijñānād anadhikāraḥ 
ucyate 
pravasan bhāryām anujñāpayati dharmāya viniyogaṃ dravyasya kariṣyāmi iti 
tatprāptānujño 'dhikariṣyate 
prāk copanayanād asaty agniparigrahe vidhir ayaṃ bhaviṣyati 
asti cānupanītasya śrāddhādhikāraḥ 
svadhāninayaṇād iti darśitam 
snātasya ca prāg vivāhāt pitṛmaraṇādāv agnyabhāvaḥ 
nanu ca parameṣṭhimaraṇe 'gniparigrahaḥ kāṭhake paṭhyate 
kṛtadārasyāsau draṣṭavyo na snātakamātrasya 
dvau hi kālau smārtakasyāgner vihitau bhāryādir dāyādir vā 
tatra yena vivāhakāle na parigṛhīto 'gniḥ pitrāvibhaktatvāt jyeṣṭhena vā saha vasatā bhrātṝṇām avibhaktānām eko dharmaḥ pravartate iti anena tasyāsau dvitīyaḥ kālaḥ dāyakālād ṛte vā iti 
eṣa eva dāyakālo yadā pitā mriyate 
tadapekṣam evaitat 
śucir bhūtaḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāt bhrāṣṭryo hāgnim ānīya pratijāgṛyāt iti 
na ced agnyādhānaṃ śrāddhāṅgam 
tathā sati na tadarvāg yasyotpattiḥ śrāddhaṃ vā vartate 
na cāpy atyāgo 'sti 
eṣa aupasado 'gnis tasmin pākayajñaḥ iti paṭhyate 
na ca pākayajñe 'py abhāryasyādhikāraḥ 
patnyavekṣitam ājyaṃ bhavati 
vrataṃ ca patny upeyāt iti darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate 
na ca yadā patnī tadaitat vratopāyanājyāvekṣaṇe patnīkartṛke bhaviṣyata iti śakyam avakalpayitum nityavad āmnānāt 
vidhir hotavyaḥ prāpnoti 
nanu ca na pitṛmaraṇam eva dāyakālaḥ 
evaṃ hi paṭhyate sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā vibhajeran tataḥ sutāḥ iti 
vibhāgasyāyaṃ kālo na dāyasya 
vibhāge 'pi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yato dharmyā pṛthakkriyā iti paṭhyate 
tasyāś ca dharmatvaṃ vibhaktānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak śrāddhakaraṇenātithyādipūjayā ca 
na ca nava śrāddhaṃ saha dadyuḥ ityādīni vākyāni samāptavidyāviṣayāṇi 
īṣadvidyo rāgodrekāt svadāraniyamaṃ mātikramiṣam iti kṛtavivāhaḥ prakrāntavedārthapravaṇas tasya saṃvatsaramātreṇa vidyāsamāptāv idam ucyate sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā vibhajeran iti 
tadā mṛtabhāryasya punar dārāṃś cikīrṣata ā dāraprāpter bhavaty agner abhāvaḥ 
sarvathā patnyā saha yaṣṭavyam ity astitvavacane sati nākṛtavivāhasyāgniparigrahaḥ 
evaṃ sthite 'gner abhāve āhutī brāhmaṇasya haste prakṣipet 
kasya brāhmaṇasya 
ya eva nimantritās teṣām anyatamasya daiva upaveśitasyānyasya vā nimantritasya 
arthavādo yo hy agniḥ iti 
mantradarśibhiḥ saṃmataś cedam arthavidbhiḥ 
akrodhanān suprasādān vadanty etān purātanāḥ 
lokasyāpyāyane yuktān śrāddhe devān dvijottamān 
ayam arthavāda eva 
brāhmaṇānāṃ devatārūpatvaṃ saṃpādayati 
agnir devatā 
tatra hutaṃ tanmukhena devatā aśnanti 
brāhmaṇo 'py evaṃrūpaḥ 
taddhaste 'pi kṣiptaṃ devatā aśnanty eva 
kiṃ punar devatānāṃ rūpaṃ yena brāhmaṇo 'pi devatārupa ucyate 
ata āha akrodhanān iti 
kathaṃ bruvate 
tadarthaṃ darśayati 
ya evaṃsvabhāvā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ haste ājyāhutī prakṣeptavye 
anye tv āhuḥ 
pūrvatrākrodhanā ityādinā pitṝn uddiśya nimantritānāṃ stutyānām akrodhanādidharmo vihitaḥ 
anena devanimantritānām iti viśeṣaḥ 
tathā cāha śrāddhe devān iti 
purātanā munaya evaṃ vadanti 
dvitīyānto vā paṭhitavyaḥ 
purātanān etān devānt sādhyadevān asmin kalpe samutpannān 
lokasyāpyāyane yuktān 
evaṃ śrāddhaṃ bhuñjate 
tatra naivaṃ mantavyam dṛṣṭasukhārthno lobhāt svārthe pravartante 'taś ca kim ity eṣāṃ pūjā kriyate 
yata āpyāyayanti lokaṃ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ divaṃ cāto naiṣām avajñā kartavyā 
apasavyam agnau kṛtvā sarvam āvṛt parikramam 
apasavyena hastena nirvaped udakaṃ bhuvi 
agnau yat kartavyam agnaye svadhā namaḥ iti āhutiprakṣepalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tad apasavyam 
dakṣiṇena hastena kartavyam na savyena nobhābhyām ubhayor hastayor muktam iti niṣedhāt 
hastadvayasaṃyogena kartavyatāśaṅkāyām apasavyenety uktam iti kecit 
idaṃ tv ayuktam 
yā agnāv āhutayo hūyante tāsāṃ ca yā āvṛt parikramas tasyāpasavyatā vidhīyate 
dakṣiṇāsaṃsthā āhutīḥ kuryāt nodaksaṃsthāḥ yathā daive 
darvyā vā havirbhis tu kārayitavyaṃ nodīcyāṃ kiṃ tarhi dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ yathodakaṃ pitryeṇa tīrthena kāryate 
sarvagrahaṇād anyad api pariveṣaṇādy apasavyam eva kartavyam 
apasavyena hastenodakaṃ nirvapet 
śanaiḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
atrārthaḥ 
anyathā rājatair bhājanaiḥ ity anena rājatabhājanaprāptaye savyahastavidhiḥ 
āvṛt tirāvṛt 
trīṃs tu tasmād dhaviḥśeṣāt piṇḍān kṛtvā samāhitaḥ 
audakenaiva vidhinā nirvaped dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ 
yat taddhomārthaṃ pātre gṛhītam annaṃ tasmād dhutaśiṣṭāt trīn piṇḍān kṛtvā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi mukhaṃ kṛtvā nirvapet 
darbheṣu pitṝn uddiśya prakṣipet 
saṃhataṃ dravyaṃ piṇḍaśabdenocyate 
tena viśadam annaṃ na dātavyam 
audakena 
audako vidhir yaḥ samanantaram evoktaḥ apasavyena ityādi 
atredaṃ saṃdihyate 
kiṃ yat tadannaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanārthaṃ sādhitaṃ tato 'py uddhṛtya haviḥsaṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ uta pṛthak caruḥ sādhanīya iti 
kiṃparimāṇaṃ ca tad dhavir iti 
na hy atra caturo muṣṭīn ityādiparimāṇasaṃbhavaḥ 
vicāritam etat 
viśeṣāśravaṇāt kāmacāraḥ 
parimāṇaṃ yāvatā arthasiddhir bhavati 
audakavidhyatideśāc ca svahastenāpasavyena piṇḍanirvapaṇam na rājataiḥ pātraiḥ 
samāhitagrahaṇaṃ vṛttapūraṇārtham 
nyupya piṇḍāṃs tatas tāṃs tu prayato vidhipūrvakam 
teṣu darbheṣu taṃ hastaṃ nirmṛjyāl lepabhāginām 
nyupya dattvā darbheṣu tān piṇḍān taṃ hastaṃ nirmṛjyād darbheṣu teṣu yeṣv eva piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kṛtam 
smṛtyantaradarśanāt darbhamūleṣu mārjanam 
apare ca na hastasaṃlagnasyānnasyodakasyaiva darbheṣu saṃśleṣaṇam 
yadi na kiṃcid api haste saṃśliṣyet tathāpi hastaṃ darbheṣu nimṛjyād eva 
na hy etat pratipattikarmaiva 
yenāsati vacanaprayojane na kriyeta 
neha śrūyate hastalagnaṃ nirmṛjyāt kiṃ tarhi hastam eva 
nanu ca lepabhāginām iti srūyate 
tatrāsati lepe na prāpnoti 
ataḥ kim ucyate yadi na kiṃcid api haste saṃśliṣyet tathāpi kartavyam iti 
ucyate 
sākṣāt mūrtam annaṃ kadācin na śliṣyati 
piṇḍeṣv anuvartyamāneṣu annarasa uṣmāvasaṃparkāt saṃkrāmati haste 
sa eva lepa ucyate 
lepabhāginām iti ṣaṣṭhī nirmārjanasya tatsaṃbandhitām āha 
na ca lepabhāginaḥ pratyakṣadṛśyāḥ santi yeṣāṃ svasvāmyādisaṃbandho lepasya kriyeta 
tasmāḷ lepabhāginām ayaṃ bhāgo 'stv iti manasā dhyāyeta 
śabdena voddiśet 
anye tu prapitāmahāt pūrve ye pitaras tān lepabhāgina āhuḥ 
asmin darśane prapitāmahapitre prapitāmahapitāmahāyetyādibhiḥ śabdair uddeśaḥ kartavyo 'sati tannāmanivedane 
hastam ity ekavacananirdeśād ekenāpasavyena hastena piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ darśayati 
prayata ity anuvādah vihitatvāt 
vidhipūrvakam iti śāstrāntaradṛṣṭaṃ vidhiṃ parigṛhṇāti 
gandhamālyadhūpācchādanasiddhopahāraiḥ piṇḍaṃ nirvapet iti śaṅkhaḥ 
yas tv iha vidhiḥ śrutaḥ sa svamatenaivoka iti vidhipūrvakam ity etad anarthakam 
tasmāc chāstrāntaravidhyupasaṃhārārthaṃ vidhipūrvakam iti vacanam 
ācamyodak parāvṛtya trir āyamya śanair asūn 
ṣaḍṛtūṃś ca namaskuryāt pitṝn eva ca mantravat 
darbheṣu piṇḍān dattvodīcīṃ diśaṃ parāvarteta 
savyena mārgeṇa 
smṛtyantare hi savyāvṛd udak parāvṛttya iti paṭhyate 
uttarābhimukhaḥ sthitvā ācāmet 
ācamya trīn prāṇāyāmān kuryāt 
asūn prāṇān āyamya saṃnirudhya ity eva 
atra ca gāyatrīṃ śirasā ityādividhir nāsti 
śanair yathā nātipīḍā bhavati 
tathā cāha 
yathāvākyaṃ prāṇān āsitvā 
tad abhimukha eva sakṛṇ namaskuryāt 
vasantāya nama ityādi 
pitṝṃś ca namaskuryāt 
mantravat 
namo vaḥ pitaraḥ ityādinā mantreṇa 
pitṝṇāṃ namaskāraḥ piṇḍābhimukhena kartavyaḥ 
abhiparyāyavṛttyā iti hi smṛtyantaram 
udakaṃ ninayec cheṣaṃ śanaiḥ piṇḍāntike punaḥ 
avajighrec ca tān piṇḍān yathānyuptān samāhitaḥ 
yata eva pātrād udakena prāk piṇḍadānād darbheṣūdakaninayanaṃ kṛtaṃ tata eva punar ninayanaṃ piṇḍāntike piṇḍasamīpe kartavyam iti 
śeṣagrahaṇaṃ pratipattyarthaṃ tasyodakasya 
tathā hi śeṣaśabda upapanno bhavati 
ataś ca kathaṃcit tasyābhāve nāsti punar ninayanam 
gṛhye tu nityaṃ ninayanam ity uktam 
avajighrec ca tān piṇḍān 
avaghrāṇaṃ gandhopalabdhiḥ 
gṛhye tu caroḥ prāṇabhakṣaṃ bhakṣayet ity uktam 
yathānyuptān yena krameṇa niruptān pitre pitāmahāya prapitāmahāyeti 
samāhita iti ślokapūraṇam 
piṇḍebhyas svalpikāṃ mātrāṃ samādāyānupūrvaśaḥ 
tān eva viprān āsīnān vidhivat pūrvam āśayet 
atyantālpikā mātrā avayavo bhāgas tam eva 
yo brāhmaṇo 'yaṃ pitaram uddiśya upaveśitaḥ tadīyāt piṇḍāt kiṃcinmātraṃ sa evāśayitavyaḥ 
anupūrvaśa ity uktārtham 
iha tacchabdāt prakṛtaparāmarśakād agnyabhāva ity atra na prakṛtavacanam 
pūrvam anyasmād adanīyāt 
dhriyamāṇe tu pitari pūrveṣām eva nirvapet 
vipravad vāpi taṃ śrāddhaṃ svakaṃ pitaram āśayet 
uktaṃ pitṛbhyaḥ piṇḍān nirvapet iti 
ka ete pitaro nāma 
anekārtho hi pitṛśabdo janayitari vartate 
janakaḥ piteti saṃbandhiśabdo dṛśyate 
pūrvapramītāḥ pitrādayo 'nye ca saṃbandhinaḥ pretāḥ pitara ucyante 
tathā ca namo vaḥ pitaraḥ ityādimantrā bahuvacanāntāḥ samarthā nigadā bhavanti 
ata eva strīśrāddhe nohyante 
namas te mātar namas te patāmahī ityādi na kriyate 
ata ekoddiṣṭe saṃkhyohaḥ kriyate na prātipadikohaḥ 
tathā ca sūtrakāraḥ ekavan mantrān ūheta ityādi 
namas te pitar ity evam ūhaḥ kriyate 
yo bhrātuḥ pitāmahāder vā ekoddiṣṭaṃ karoti sa caivam ūhati namas te bhrātaḥ namas te pitāmaha namas te pitṛvyetyādi 
pitṛvyādīnām anapatyānāṃ śrāddhaṃ vihitam 
yo yata ādadīta sa tasmai dadyāt iti 
devatāviśeṣavacano 'py asti pitṛśabdaḥ kūṭasthanitye 'rthe vartate 
niruktakārā hi daivate madhyasthān pitṝn samāmananti marutaḥ rudrākṣabhṛtaḥ pitaraḥ iti 
evam anekārthe pitṛśabde viśeṣāvadhāraṇārtham āha 
dhriyamāṇe jīvati pitari sati pūrveṣāṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahatatpitṝṇāṃ nirvapet trayāṇāṃ bahuvacananirdeśāt 
tathā ca gṛhye yebhyaḥ pitā dadyāt tebhyaḥ putro dadyāt pitāputrau ced āhitāgnī syātām iti 
nanu ca na caturthaṃ piṇḍo gacchatīyāhuḥ 
satyam 
naivātra caturthaḥ piṇḍo dīyate 
pakṣāntaram āha vipravad vā 
yathā brāhmaṇā nimantraṇāpūrvakaṃ brahmacāriṇo niyamavaṇtaś ca pūjyante tathaiva jīvatpitṛkeṇa pitā bhojanīyaḥ 
śrāddhaṃ srāddhartham annaṃ srāddham 
atra ca pitṛtvam eva bhojyatve karaṇaṃ na jātiguṇāv apekṣyau 
evaṃ hy āhuḥ pitṛprītyarthaṃ śrāddham tatra mṛtasya prītau kartavyāyāṃ ko jīvati pitari paribhavo yenāsau na bhojayet 
svakam ity anuvādaḥ saṃbandhiśabdatvād eva siddheḥ 
bhojanam atra pituś coditaṃ hitam piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ tu darbheṣu pitṝṇāṃ kartavyam etat ta iti virodhāt 
yadi hi pātrasthānīyā darbhās tadā jīvataḥ pituḥ svāmye dānotpattau alpikāṃ mātrām āśayed iti na yujyate 
jīvato hi svam icchāviniyojyam 
na ca tasmin piṇḍe 'ñjanādidānam upapadyate ardhajaratīyaprasaṅgāt 
na hy atrāñjanādisaṃskṛtena pituḥ kiṃcit prayojanam asti 
tasmād adṛṣṭārtham añjanādidānam 
añjanādirahitaṃ tu kadācid ātmanaḥ pituḥ parasya vā bhojanayogyaṃ bhavatīty evam ardhajaratīyam 
tasmād asmin pakṣe piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ dvayoḥ pitāmahaprapitāmahayoḥ 
gṛhyakārās tu smaranti jīvatpitṛkasya na piṇḍapitṛyajño na śrāddham kiṃ tarhi anārambha eva tasya karmaṇo homāntatā vā 
pitā yasya tu vṛttaḥ syāj jīvec cāpi pitāmahaḥ 
pituḥ sa nāma saṃkīrtya kīrtayet prapitāmaham 
pitur nāmasaṃkīrtanena tadīyāvāhanapiṇḍadānabrāhmaṇbhojanāni lakṣyante 
kīrtayet prapitāmaham 
jīvate pitāmahāya na dadyāt 
kiṃ tarhi tataḥ pūrvābhyāṃ pituḥ pitṛbhyo nipṛṇīyāt iti smaranti 
pitāmaho vā tacchrāddhaṃ bhuñjītety abravīn manuḥ 
kāmaṃ vā samanujñātaḥ svayam eva samācaret 
yathā jīvatpitā bhojyate tadvat pitāmaho 'pi 
anujñāṃ pitāmahāt prāpya samācaret svayam 
parato dvayor dadyāt prapitāmahāya ekasmā eva vā 
eṣa kāmaṃ svayam ity anayor arthaḥ 
teṣām dattvā tu hasteṣu sapavitraṃ tilodakam 
tat piṇḍāgraṃ prayacchet tu svadhaiṣām astv iti bruvan 
yad uktaṃ piṇḍebhyaḥ svalpikāṃ mātrām āśayet iti tasyāyaṃ kālavidhir deśavidhiś ca 
agradeśāt piṇḍasya mātrā ādātavyā 
darbhāṃs tilodakaṃ ca dattvā tadanantaraṃ piṇḍabhāgaṃ prayacchet 
svadhaiṣām astv iti bruvan 
eṣām iti sarvanāmnā viśeṣanāmāni gṛhyante 
evaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyate yeṣāṃ yāni nāmāni tāny uccārya svadhāstv iti brūyāt 
ataḥ svadhāśabdayoge caturthyā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ svadhā devadattāyāstu svadhā yajñadattāyāstv iti 
evaṃ vyākhyāne śāstrāntaravirodho na bhavati 
pāṇibhyāṃ tūpasaṃgṛhya svayam annasya varddhitam 
viprāntike pitṝn dhyāyan śanakair upanikṣipet 
ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ svayaṃ gṛhītvā annasya vardhitam annena pūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ viprāntike rasavatyagārādīnām yatra brāhmaṇā bhojyante tasmin deśe upanikṣipet brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpe sthāpayet 
anye tu vyacakṣate 
vardhitaṃ parivartulam annam ucyate 
tad viprāntike pitṝn dhyāyan tubhyam idam iti dhyātvā nikṣipet yathā vikiram 
tad ayuktam 
upanīya sarvaṃ pariveṣayet iti vakṣyati 
ataḥ pariveṣaṇārthaṃ pradeśāntarād ānīya tasyopanikṣepo 'yam 
ubhayor hastayor muktaṃ yad annam upanīyate 
tad vipralupanty asurāḥ sahasā duṣṭacetasaḥ 
dvābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ annam upanetavyaṃ pariveṣṭavyam na caikeneti 
parveṣaṇam upanayanam eva 
tatas tatrāpy ayam eva dharmaḥ pūrvoktaḥ 
tasyārthavādaḥ 
ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ muktaṃ varjitam aparigṛhītaṃ yad annam upanīyate pariveṣaṇārthaṃ tad vipralumpanti vināśayanty asurāḥ 
sahasā balena 
duṣṭacetasaḥ pāpātmānaḥ 
asurā devadviṣaḥ 
ubhayor ity adhikaraṇe saptamī 
muktam akṛṣṭam asthitam 
bhavanti ca pratiṣedhopasaṃnidhāne 'pi kārakavibhaktayaḥ grāmān nāgacchaty āsane nopaviśati triratraṃ nopavasati 
guṇāṃś ca sūpaśākādyān payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ madhu 
vinyaset prayataḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmāv eva samāhitaḥ 
guṇā vyañjanāni 
eṣām eva pradarśanārtham uttaraḥ prapañcaḥ 
sūpaśākādyān vinyased bhūvāv eva upayaccheta na dārumaye phalakādau 
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca vividhaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca 
hṛdyāni caiva māṃsāni pānāni surabhīṇi ca 
dhānāśaṣkulyādayo bhakṣyāḥ 
kharaviśadam abhyavaharaṇīyaṃ hi bhakṣyam ity ucyate 
bhojyaṃ ghṛtapūrādiḥ 
upanīya tu tat sarvaṃ śanakaiḥ susamāhitaḥ 
pariveṣayet prayato guṇān sarvān pracodayan 
upanīya viprāntike sarvam etaḍ ḍhaukayitvā 
tataḥ pariveṣayet 
bhujyadhikaraṇopādānam āvarjanam 
bhuñjānasya pariveṣaṇaṃ yady apy antikadeśa apekṣitaṃ tathāpi teṣām antike nidhātavyaṃ yathā bhuñjānānām uccheṣaṇena na saṃsṛjyate 
guṇān bhakṣyabhojyāder dravyasya ye guṇā amlatvādayas tān praṇodayamāna idaṃ amlam idaṃ madhuram idaṃ khāṇḍavam ity evam āvedite teṣāṃ yad rocate tat tad dadyād iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ 
śanakair ityādy anuvādaḥ ślokapūraṇārthaḥ 
nāsram āpātayej jātu na kupyen nānṛtaṃ vadet 
na pādena spṛśed annaṃ na caitad avadhūnayet 
asraṃ aśrurodanam 
tan na pātayen na kuryāt 
prāyeṇa pretaśrāddhādāv iṣṭaviyogajena duḥkhānusmaraṇenāśrupāto jāyate 
tasya niṣedhaḥ 
ānandāśruṇas tv akasmāt patato na doṣaḥ 
na jātu kadācid apy aśruvimocanaṃ kuryāt 
na kupyet krodhaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt 
anṛtavacanasya puruṣārthatayā niṣiddhasya karmārtho 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
na pādena spṛśed annam ucchiṣṭam anucchiṣṭaṃ ca 
na caitad annam avadhūnayed avakampayet 
hastādinotkṣipya punar na vikṣipet 
anye tu vyācakṣate vāsasā dhūlyādyapanayanārthaṃ yad avadhūnanaṃ na tad annasyopari kartavyam 
asraṃ gamayati pretān kopo 'rīn anṛtaṃ śunaḥ 
pādasparśas tu rakṣāṃsi duṣkṛtīn avadhūnanam 
asyārthavādaḥ 
aśruvimocanaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ pretān gamayati prāpayati śrāddham 
na pitṝṇām upakārakaṃ bhavati 
pretāś cātra piśācavad bhūtaviśeṣā vivakṣitāḥ na tv asapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ saṃpratimṛtāḥ 
rakṣāṃsi bhūtapretavad avagantavyāni 
arayaḥ prasiddhāḥ 
tathā duṣkṛtīn duṣkṛtācaraṇān pātakinaḥ 
yad yad roceta viprebhyas tat tad dadyād amatsaraḥ 
brahmodyāś ca kathāḥ kuryāt pitṝṇām etad īpsitam 
yad yad annaṃ vyañjanaṃ pānaṃ cābhilaṣeyus tat tad amatsaraḥ alubdho dadyāt 
matsara iti lobhanāma 
roceta prītiṃ janayet 
brahmodyāḥ 
brahmaṇi vede yā udyante kathyante tā brahmodyāḥ devāsurayuddhaṃ vṛtravadhaḥ saramākṛtyam ityādyāḥ 
atha vā kaḥ svid ekākī carati ityādi 
brahmādyāś ca kathāḥ iti pāṭhaḥ 
tatpradhānamantrārthanirūpaṇādyāḥ kathāḥ saṃlāpā laukikaiḥ śabdaiḥ 
pitṝṇām etad īpsitam abhilaṣitam ity arthavādaḥ 
svādhyāyaṃ śrāvayet pitrye dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi 
ākhyānānītihāsāṃś ca purāṇāni khilāni ca 
svādhyāyo vedaḥ 
manvādigranthā dharmaśāstrāṇi 
ākhyānāni sauparṇamaitrāvaruṇādīni bāhvṛcye paṭhyante 
itihāsā mahābhāratādayaḥ 
purāṇāni vyāsādipraṇītāni sṛṣṭyādivarṇanarūpāṇi 
khilāni śrīsūktamahānāmnikādīni 
harṣayed brāhmaṇāṃs tuṣṭo bhojayec ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ 
annādyenāsakṛc caitān guṇaiś ca paricodayet 
saty api nimitte na svaṃ duḥkhaṃ kenacit prakāreṇa dīrgheṇocchvāsādinā prakaṭayed api hṛṣṭavat syāt 
brāhmaṇān harṣayet 
gītādinā paraprayuktena aviruddhena vā prasaṅgāgatena parihāsena 
svādhyāye paṭhyamāne ciraṃ kaścid udvijet 
tadā tato viramyākhyānakair gītādinā ca ramayet 
śanair bhojayet 
katicid grāsān gṛhṇīta sādhv etat samyak bhojanam ity evamādibhiḥ priyavacanair bhojayet 
śanair na saṃrambheṇa brūyāt 
annādyena pāyasādinā 
guṇaiś ca vyañjanair dānārtham udyatai rasavattayā yojayan bhojanārtham utsāhayet 
svādyāḥ imāḥ śaṣkulyaḥ suraseyaṃ kṣīriṇīti pātrastham evamādihastagṛhītaṃ kṛtvā purasthitaḥ punaḥ punar brūyād ity eṣā paricodanā 
vratastham api dauhitraṃ śrāddhe yatnena bhojayet 
kutapaṃ cāsanaṃ dadyāt tilaiś ca vikiren mahīm 
anukalpapakṣe dauhitrasya yatnena bhojyatocyate 
kutapo 'jalomasūtraiḥ kambālākāraḥ paṭaḥ 
udīcyeṣu kambala iti prasiddhaḥ 
taṃ āsanaṃ dadyāt 
na dauhitrapakṣe kiṃ tarhi anyadāpi 
yato vakṣyati trīṇi śrāddhe pavitrāṇi iti śrāddamātraviṣayatvāt 
tilaiś ca vikiren mahīm 
tilāṃś ca mahyāṃ bhuvi nikṣipet 
trīṇi śrāddhe pavitrāṇi dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ 
trīṇi cātra praśaṃsanti śaucam akrodham atvarām 
pavitrāṇi pāvanāni sādhutvasaṃpādakāni 
ādyaḥ ślokārdho 'nuvādaḥ 
uttaras tu vidheyārthaḥ 
śaucam aśucisaṃsargaparihāraḥ 
pramādād vā jātasyāśucitvasya mṛdvāryādinā yathāśāstraṃ śuddhiḥ 
atvarāṃ viśrabdhaṃ bhojanādyanuṣṭhānam 
atyuṣṇaṃ sarvam annaṃ syād bhuñjīraṃs te ca vāgyatāḥ 
na ca dvijātayo brūyur dātrā pṛṣṭā havirguṇān 
uṣṇam eva atyuṣṇam atigatam uṣṇam iti 
prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇa iti yathā 
sarvam annaṃ guṇāś ca 
yasyoṣṇasya bhojanam ucitaṃ tatraivedam uṣṇatāvidhānam na tu dadhyodanādeḥ yat tad uṣṇam aprītikaraṃ vyādhijanakaṃ ca 
tatra harṣayed brāhmaṇān iti virudhyeta 
uṣṇabhojanavidhānāc ca na sakṛt sarvam annaṃ pariveṣṭavyam 
tathā hi bahubhojināṃ śītaṃ bhaved annam 
tasmād bhukte punar dadyāt 
na ca bhuñjānebhya ucchiṣṭatvāt dānam ayuktam iti vācyam 
bhojanavidhir evaṃrūpa eva 
ā ṭṛpter bhojayitur vyāpāraḥ 
na hy atraudanādi pratigrāhyatayā saṃbadhyate 
ata eva na tatra pratigrahamantra odanādiṣu prayujyate 
vāgyatāḥ vāk yatā niyamitā yaiḥ 
chāndasaḥ paranipātaḥ 
vācā vā yatāḥ 
sādhanaṃ kṛteti samāsaḥ 
kartṛvacanaś ca tadā yataśabdaḥ vyāpāraniṣedho niyamanam vācaś ca vyāpāraḥ śabdoccāraṇam tatpratiṣedhaḥ kriyate 
vyaktāvyaktaśabdoccāraṇaṃ na kartavyam 
haviṣo guṇā na ca vaktavyāḥ

nanu vāṅniyamād evaitat siddham 
satyam 
abhinayādināpi na kartavyam 
brūviḥ pratipādane vartate 
brūyur iti na śabdoccāraṇam eva 
yāvad uṣmā bhavaty annaṃ yāvad aśnanti vāgyatāḥ 
pitaras tāvad aśnanti yāvan noktā havirguṇāḥ 
pūrvasya vidher arthavādo 'yam 
uṣmā auṣṇyam 
yad veṣṭitaśirā bhuṅkte yad bhuṅkte dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ 
sopānatkaś ca yad bhuṅkte tad vai rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate 
veṣṭitam uṣṇīṣādinā 
udīcyā hi śāṭakaiḥ śiro veṣṭayanti 
ye tu vyācakṣate cūḍākārair api keśair veṣṭitaśirā bhavati iti na te yuktivādinaḥ 
keśās te veṣṭyante na śiraḥ 
na ca keśā eva śiraḥ 
śirasthā hi te 
sūtrādes tu na niṣedhaḥ 
na hi tatra veṣṭanavyavahāro loke 
dakṣiṇābhimukhasya doṣavacanāt svalpe pradeśe dakṣiṇetaradigabhimukhasyāpi bhojanam anujānāti 
anyathā udaṅmukhānāṃ vidhānāt kuto dakṣiṇasyāḥ prāptiḥ 
upānahau carmamayaṃ pādatrāṇam 
anye tu carmapāduke upānahāv iti vyācakṣate 
rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate na pitara iti nindā 
cāṇḍālaś ca varāhaś ca kukkuṭaḥ śvā tathaiva ca 
rajasvalā ca ṣaṇḍhaś ca nekṣerann aśnato dvijān 
varāhaḥ śūkaraḥ 
sa ca grāmyaḥ 
śvasaṃnidhānato nekṣerann iti yady api śrutam tathāpi tatpradeśasaṃnidhim eva śiṣṭā nānumanyante 
tathā ca ghrāṇena śūkaraḥ ityādi kriyāntaram arthavādena śrūyate

saṃnihitānāṃ tu svarūpānuvādo 'yam 
sūkaro vijighrati 
kukkuṭaḥ pakṣān uddhunoti 
tasmāt pariśrite dadyāt iti vidhiḥ 
prayojanam etad doṣābhāve 'pariśrite 'pi dadyāt 
ṣaṇḍho napuṃsakam 
home pradāne bhojye ca yad ebhir abhivīkṣyate

home agnihotrādau śāntyādihome vā

abhyudayārthe 
bhojye brāhmaṇā yatra dharmāya bhojyante 
daive haviṣi darśapaurṇamāsādau 
pitrye śrāddhe 
yad abhivīkṣyate kriyamāṇaṃ karma 
tad gacchaty ayathātatham 
yadarthaṃ kriyate tadviparītaṃ bhāvayati 
yady api śrāddhaprakaraṇaṃ tathāpi vākyād anyatrāpi homādāv ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
ghrāṇena sūkaro hanti pakṣavātena kukkuṭaḥ 
śvā tu dṛṣṭinipātena sparśenāvaravarṇajaḥ 
pakṣakṛtena vāyunā kukkuṭo hanti 
vyākhyātam etat 
tāvati deśe nivāraṇīyam eṣāṃ saṃnidhānaṃ yāvati sthitāḥ paśyanti 
avaravarṇajaś cāṇḍālaḥ prakṛtitvāt 
sparśādayaś ca prakṛtakriyāparāḥ na vyavakṣitasvarūpā iti vyākhyātam 
ato 'vādyam etat cāṇḍālasya sāmānyataḥ sparśapratiṣedhād asatyāṃ prāptau pratiṣedhānarthakyam 
ataḥ śūdro 'varavarṇajaḥ tasya ca dvijātiśrāddhasparśaniṣedho nātmīye iti 
vivakṣite 'pi nānnapānādisparśadoṣo 'yam ucyate kiṃ tarhi yo deśaḥ parigṛhīto nadīpulinādir apariśritas tasya sparśaḥ 
tasya hi vāyvādityādinā śuddhir uktā 
ataḥ satyāṃ prāptau yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
khañjo vā yadi vā kāṇo dātuḥ preṣyo 'pi vā bhavet 
hīnātiriktagatro vā tam apy apanayet punaḥ 
preṣyo bhṛtakaḥ 
apiśabdād anyo 'pi yadṛcchayā saṃnihito bāndhavādir apaneyaḥ 
tasmāt pradeśād apasārayet 
khañjo gativikalaḥ ajaṅgamādi 
hīnātiriktagātraḥ ṣaṇḍaḥ kuṇikhaṇḍīkaḥ ślīpadyādiḥ 
brāhmaṇaṃ bhikṣukaṃ vāpi bhojanārtham upasthitam 
brāhmaṇair abhyanujñātaḥ śaktitaḥ pratipūjayet 
atithitvenāgataṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhikṣukaṃ bhikṣārthinaṃ brāhmaṇam api bhojanapravṛttair brāhmaṇair anujñātaḥ śaktyā pūjayet 
bhojanena bhikṣādānena vā yuktārthatayārcayet 
yataḥ sa pākas tadahas tadartha eva 
sārvavarṇikam annādyaṃ saṃnīyāplāvya vāriṇā 
samutsṛjed bhuktavatām agrato vikiran bhuvi 
varṇaśabdaḥ prakāre draṣṭavyaḥ 
sarvaprakārair vyañjanair upetam annādyaṃ saṃnīya ekīkṛtya vāriṇā āplāvya bhuktavatāṃ tṛptānāṃ tṛptāḥ sma itivacanānantaram agrataḥ samutsṛjet vikiret naikasminn eva deśe kiṃ tarhi viśīrṇam 
bhuvi 
na pātreṣu 
bhūmāv api na śuddhāyām kiṃ tarhi vakṣyati darbheṣu vikiraḥ iti 
sakṛt trir vā vikiraṃ kuryāt iti śaṅkhaḥ 
asaṃskṛtapramītānāṃ tyāgināṃ kulayoṣitām 
ucchiṣṭaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ syād darbheṣu vikiraś ca yaḥ 
nāsya kāryo 'gnisaṃskāraḥ ity atrivarṣā asaṃskṛtās teṣāṃ pramītānām 
pātrastham ucchiṣṭaṃ darbheṣu vikiraś ca teṣāṃ bhāgadheyam 
bhāga eva bhāgadheyaśabdenocyate ha hi teṣāṃ śrāddhopakāro nāsti 
tyāgināṃ gurvādīnām 
atha vā kulayoṣitāṃ kulastrīṇām adṛṣṭadoṣāṇāṃ bhāryāṇāṃ tyaktāraḥ 
svatantre tu kulayoṣitām ity asminn anūḍhāḥ kanyāḥ kulayoṣita iti vyācakṣate 
ata ucchiṣṭaṃ tebhya uddeṣṭavyam 
na ca vācyam apavitram ucchiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ bhāgadheyena kalpatām iti 
vacanān nāsty apavitratā somocchiṣṭavat 
uccheṣaṇaṃ bhūmigatam ajihmasyāśaṭhasya ca
dāsavargasya tat pitrye bhāgadheyaṃ pracakṣate 
pātrasthasya pūrveṇa pratipattir uktā 
bhūmau nipatitasyocchiṣṭasya dāsavargārthatānena kathyate 
ajihmo 'kuṭilaḥ 
aśaṭhaḥ analasaḥ 
tādṛśasya dāsavargasya sa bhāgaḥ 
tasmāt prabhūtaṃ dātavyam yena bhūmau buñjānasya patatīti 
ā sapiṇḍakriyākarma dvijāteḥ saṃsthitasya tu 
adaivaṃ bhojayec chrāddhaṃ piṇḍam ekaṃ ca nirvapet 
saṃsthitasya dvijāter ā sapiṇḍakriyākarma prathamamṛtasya ā sahapiṇḍakaraṇākhyaṃ karma kartavyam 
sahapiṇḍadānaṃ pūrvābhyāṃ na kartavyam 
kathaṃ tarhi kartavyam 
piṇḍam ekaṃ ca nirvaped iti 
caśabda evaśabdasyārthe tasmā eva pretāyaikaṃ piṇḍaṃ nirvapet 
brāhamaṇo hi tasmā eva bhojayitavyaḥ 
smṛtyantare anyāpi itikartavyatā vaiśeṣī smaryate āvāhanāgnaukaraṇarahitam iti 
agnaukaraṇaśabdena cātra agnau kariṣye ity anujñāpanaṃ pratiṣidhyate na punar homaḥ 
tathā hi gṛhye pretaśrāddham evādhikṛtya homa āmnāyate 
yasmiṃś ca kāle karma kartavyaṃ yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tat smṛtyantarād anveṣṭavyam 
ādyam ekādaśe 'hani 
mṛtāhe 'pi ca kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram 
pratisaṃvatsaraṃ caiva śrāddhaṃ vai māsikārthavat  iti 
tathā ca kāṭhake evaṃ sāṃvatsatsarikam iti 
ekādaśagrahaṇaṃ cāśaucanivṛttyupalakṣaṇārtham 
yataḥ śucir bhūtaḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāt iti śrūyate 
saṃvatsarānte hi sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ gṛhyakārāḥ smaranti 
etac ca śrāddham ekoddiṣṭaṃ tadaṅgabhūtaṃ ca nirvapaṇam 
yat tu śraute pitṛbhyo dadyāt itivacanāt pitṛpitāmahāya prapitāmahāya ceti akṛte sapiṇḍīkaraṇe neha dānaṃ yuktam 
na hi smṛtyā śrutir bādhituṃ śakyata iti 
sahapiṇḍakriyāyāṃ tu kṛtāyām asya dharmataḥ 
anayaivāvṛtā kāryaṃ piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ sutaiḥ 
yadā tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati tadā anayaivāvṛtā pārvaṇaśrāddhavidhinā tribhyo dadyāt 
āvṛd itikartavyatā 
sapiṇḍīkaraṇaśrāddhaṃ daivapūrvaṃ niyojayet 
pitṝn evāśayet 
atra punaḥ pretaṃ na nirdiśet 
pitaraś cātra prāk sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pitṛvargam anupraveśitāḥ pitāmahādaya ucyante 
tān āśayet 
tatra punaḥ śabdas teṣv eva brāhmaṇeṣu preta āvāhayitavyaḥ tatra hi sarvais taiḥ saha saṃsargas tasya saṃsṛjanāya tatkarma 
yad api viṣṇunā paṭhitam pretāya brāhmaṇān bhojayet pretapitre pretapitāmahāya ca pretaprapitāmanaya iti atrāpi naivaṃ śrūyate pṛthak bhojayed iti 
tatra yathā bahudaivatyaṃ havir bahvīr devatā uddiśya sakṛd ekaṃ hūyate evaṃ brāhmaṇo 'pi bahūn uddiśya bhojyeteti na kiṃcid anupapannam 
tathā hi sahavacanam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati pitrye ca na yugmā bhojitā bhavanti 
yathā ekaikam ubhayatra vā iti yeṣāṃ vidhis tanmate ekaḥ sarvoddeśena bhojyate 
evam etad draṣṭavyam 
nanu evaṃ sati pitṛkṛtye trīn iti sarvadevasahoddeśaḥ prāpnoti 
ekaikasmin brāhmaṇe sarva uddeśyeran tatrāpi na pṛthag grahaṇam asti 
kathaṃ nāsti 
gṛhye hi paṭhyate na tv evaikaṃ sarveṣām 
piṇḍair vyākhyātam 
kiṃ ca pretapātraṃ pitṛpātreṣu secayed arghārtham ity āha 
tatra kṛtāsannapātrābhāve pretapātrodakasya kutaḥ pātrād arghadānam 
yadi tāvat saṃmīlitāt tad ayuktam pitāmahādes tat kalpitam na pituḥ 
na cānyārthaṃ kalpitād ity anyārthatā yuktā 
atha kṛtvārghadānaṃ paścāt saṃnayanaṃ kuryāt 
tadā kṛtvārghadānaṃ tadarthaṃ saṃnayanasya svatantrārgharthaṃ prasecayed iti virudhyed vacanam 
uktenātra prakāreṇa na kaścana virodhaḥ 
atha ko 'yaṃ preto nāma 
prapitāmahāya piṇḍaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇād ūrdhvaṃ na dīyate yatas teṣv evānupraviṣṭaḥ 
tathā ca smṛtiḥ 
yaḥ sapiṇḍīkṛtaṃ pretaṃ pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet 
vidhighnas tena bhavati pitṛhā copajāyate  iti 
pṛthag eva hi tasmai nirūpyate 
na tv ekaḥ sarvebhya iti 
mantrāś ca etam evārtham abhivadanti ye samānā  ityādayaḥ 
atrocyate 
nāyaṃ pretaśabdo 'yateḥ kriyāyogena vartate 
rūḍhir iyaṃ mṛtaḥ preta idānīṃ pretaḥ ucyate 
na hi dūram adhvānaṃ gataḥ preta ucyate 
asti ca kriyāyogaḥ aviśeṣeṇa pūrvapreta idānīṃ prete ca 
tathā ca śrutiḥ prayann evāsmāl lokād ye samānāḥ iti aciramaraṇe pretaprayogaṃ darśayati pretāyānnaṃ dinatrayam iti sadyaḥsaṃsthitam adhikṛtya 
yat tu pṛthak piṇḍena iti asyāyam arthaḥ 
sapiṇḍīkaraṇād ūrdhvam ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kartavyam 
yadā yadā śrāddhaṃ tadā tadā tribhyaḥ mṛtāhani pitṛbhyas tribhya eva kartavyam 
naikasmā eva pitre 
tathā anayaivāvṛtā kāryam iti pārvaṇaśrāddhe kartavyatā vātidiśyate 
nanu ca anayaiva iti prakṛtaparāmarśāḥ pratīyante saṃnihitavacanatvāt sarvanāmnām saṃnihitaś caikoddiṣṭavidhiḥ 
naivam 
yadi hi kṛte 'pi sapiṇḍīkaraṇe ekasyaiva kriyeta tadā bhedanirdeśa eva nopapadyate 
tuśabdaś ca prakṛtāyām itikartavyatāyāṃ bhedaṃ sūcayati asapiṇḍakriyāyām eṣa vidhiḥ sahapiṇdakriyāyāṃ punaḥ kṛtāyāṃ nāyaṃ mantavyaḥ iti 
ato vyavahitāpi buddhisthatvāt pārvaṇatātidiśyate 
kiṃ ca krte sapiṇḍīkaraṇe yadaikoddiṣṭaṃ syāt kartavyam tadā tribhyo dānam iti amāvāsyāyāṃ iti cet ko viśeṣaḥ 
tatrāpi sahapiṇḍakriyām ity evamarthaḥ kiṃ nāsti 
na ca mānavaśāstre kālāntaraṃ mṛtāhe pratisaṃvatsaraṃ cetyādi pratītaṃ yena tadviṣayam etad vyākhyāyate 
ato viśeṣāt sarvatraikoddiṣṭāni prāpnuvanti 
tatra mahābhāratavacanaṃ virudhyeta tīrthāni prakṛtyoktaṃ śrāddhena tarpayāmāsa sa vai pūrvaṃ pitāmahān iti
yad api smṛtyantaraṃ pratisaṃvatsaraṃ caiva śrāddhaṃ vai māsikārthavat  tatrāpi māsikaśabdenāmāvāsyayām eva śrāddham ucyate sarvaśrāddhānāṃ tasya prakṛtitvāt 
tatra hi dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ 
na tu pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram iti etan māsikaśabdenābhidhātuṃ yuktam 
na hi tasya viśiṣṭāḥ kecid dharmāḥ samāmnātā yair bhidyeta 
ekoddiṣṭaṃ tv ādyam ekādaśe kṣatriyasya trayodaśe ityādy atrāpi vidyate 
ato naikoddiṣṭaṃ māsikaśabdenābhidātuṃ yuktam 
māsakālasaṃbandhād dhi tan māsikam ucyate 
na ca tasya māsenaiva saṃbandhaḥ kālāntareṇāpi saṃbandhasya darśitatvāt 
śucir bhūtaḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāt iti māsād ūrdhvam api karaṇān māse cākaraṇān nātra māsikaśabdena tasyābhidhānam 
amāvāsyāyā utpattau paurṇamāsikaśabdaśravaṇāt piṇḍānāṃ māsikaśrāddham iti niyatatvāt kālāntarasaṃyogasyābhāvāt dharmatvāc ca yuktas tadīyadharmātideśaḥ 
āmaśrāddham api pārvaṇaprakṛtikam eva 
tatprakṛtitve ca tribhyo dāne prāpte ekoddiṣṭatā vidhīyate 
yad api yājñavalkyavacanam
mṛtāhani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram 
pratisaṃvatsaraṃ caivam ādyam dekādaśe 'hani 
tatrāpy evam etādṛśītikartavyatā ucyate 
tatrāpi hy amāvāsyam eva prakṛtatvenāvagatam 
ato na māsakālayoge 'pi ekoddiṣṭe tadīyadharmātideśo 'nyatra yuktaḥ 
na hi bhikṣuko bhikṣukād yācate 
so 'pi yato yasya vikāraḥ 
kiṃ ca ekam eva śrāddham 
tasmān na māsikaśabdasya sāmānyasyaikoddiṣṭaviśeṣaviṣyatāyāṃ pramāṇam asti 
yājñavalkye 'py evam iti 
yady anantarāvamarśaḥ tadā sapiṇḍīkaraṇetikartavyatātideśaḥ prāpnoti 
tadanantaraṃ hy etac chrutam 
etat sapiṇḍīkaraṇam iti paṭhitvā arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt iti ca tato 'nantaram uktam mṛtāhni ityādi 
tasmāt saṃnidhānam akāraṇīkṛtya dharmavatvenāmāvāsyasyaivam iti nirdeśaḥ 
mantrāś cāsmatpakṣam sutarām avadyotayanti 
saṃsṛjyadhvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha iti pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha vartamānā ucyante 
saṃsṛjyadhvam iti bahuvacanaṃ pūjāyām 
tathā ca niruktakāraḥ etā u tyā uṣasa iti 
etās tā uṣasa ity ekasyā eva pūjanārthe bahuvacanam iti 
atha saṃsṛjyadhvam iti yeṣu piṇḍeṣu nikṣipyante ta ucyante 
yaś ca nikṣipyate sa bahuvacanena pūrvavat pūrvebhiḥ pitṛbhir iti 
evaṃ ca pūrvebhir ity evam eva bahuvacanaṃ prāyogikaṃ bhaviṣyati 
itarathā saṃsṛjyadhvam iti nikṣipyamāṇapiṇḍābhidhāne upayatra bahuvacanam ayathārthaṃ kalpyam iti 
tad etad api na kiṃcit 
yata ekaikena piṇḍena piṇḍāṃśaḥ saṃsṛjyate 
caturthaṃ piṇḍam utsṛjya traidhaṃ kṛtvā piṇḍeṣu nidadhyāt iti 
ato naivātra yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāsti yena bahuvacanam avakalpeta 
ekaikābhidhānena kuta ānvayikaṃ saṃsṛjyadhvam iti bahuvacanaṃ parokṣavattvābhidhānaṃ na kalpyate 
pūrvebhir iti nikṣipyamāṇapiṇḍavacanāc ca na ebhir iti nirdeśo yuktaḥ syāt 
na cāyaṃ mantro vidhāyako yena tadarthanirṇaye prayatāmahe 
abhidhāyako 'yam 
abhidhānaguṇaṃ ca viniyogataḥ 
viniyogaś ca saṃsargaḥ taṃ ca prakāśayati 
saṃkhyātra na viniyuktā na prakāśāptā saṃbhavamātreṇānvīyate 
tasya ca mantrāt pūrvaṃ pratipattiḥ 
ye 'py āhuḥ caturthaśabdaḥ pūrvatara upapadyate 
pitā hi prathamaḥ tadapekṣayā prapitāmahāt pūrvaś caturtha iti 
etad api na samyak 
pūrveṣāṃ piṇḍān nidhāya caturṇāṃ pūṇaś caturthaḥ pretapiṇḍa eva bhavati 
pitrupakramaṃ cedaṃ śrāddhaṃ na pretopakramam 
evaṃ hy ucyate pitṝn evāśayet punaḥ pretaṃ na nirdiśet iti 
yasyāyaṃ pretāya prathamaḥ piṇḍas tatas tatpitre ityādikramaḥ tasyāpi kṛto 'yaṃ niyamaḥ ya evāsau caturthas tasyaivedaṃ traidhaṃ karaṇaṃ piṇḍeṣu nidhānaṃ vidhīyate 
etāvad dhi tad vākyaṃ caturthaṃ piṇḍam utsṛjet traidhaṃ kṛtveti 
tatrānantaryād utsṛjatinā saṃbandhaś caturthapiṇḍam ity anayoḥ pratīyate 
traidhaṃ kṛtvety atra tu kasyedaṃ traidhaṃ karaṇam ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃnihitaḥ piṇḍaḥ saṃbadhyate 
tāvataiva nirākāṅkṣīkṛte vākye caturtham ity asya saṃbandhe na kiṃcit pramāṇam asti 
tatra yasya kasya vibhāge prāpte smṛtyantarān nirṇayaḥ
nirupya caturaḥ piṇḍān piṇḍadaḥ pratināmataḥ 
ye samānā iti dvābhyām ādyaṃ tu vibhajet tridhā  iti 
ādyatvaṃ dānābhiprāyeṇa na punar ādipuruṣasaṃbandhāt 
tathā hi prapitāmahādiḥ syāt pitāmahāt pūrvaḥ pitāmaho 'pi pituḥ pūrva ity anavasthānād apratipattiḥ 
dānaṃ tu niyatakramato vyavasthitam āditvam 
evaṃ ca caturtham iti padena viśiṣṭe piṇḍe kriyātraye 'pi smṛtyantaravaśād dānakrameṇaivādyasya vibhāgo yuktaḥ 
ato yad uktaṃ kāṭhake pūrvapretasyeṣṭo vibhāgaḥ pratīyate iti kāsāvasyeṣṭatā 
yac coktam ata eva tasmai adānam yata eva vāsāv antarbhāvitaḥ tan na kiṃcit 
vacanān na dīyate na caturthaṃ piṇḍo gacchati iti 
tathā triṣu piṇḍaḥ pravartate iti 
yat svayaṃ svakṛtaḥ pāṭhaḥ punaḥ pretaṃ nirdiśet iti vyākhyātaṃ ca antarbhāvite pūrvaprete punardānaṃ niṣedhati  naivāyaṃ pāṭho 'sti pratiṣedhārthīyo na' paṭhyate samuccayārthaś cakāraḥ paṭhyate 
saty api vā tatra pāṭhe yaḥ sapiṇḍīkṛtam ity atra pṛthakpiṇḍapratiṣedhasya yā gatir uktā saivātra veditavyā 
yāni tu vākyāni
sapiṇḍīkaraṇād ūrdhvaṃ pratisaṃvatsaraṃ sutaḥ 
ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu kurvīta pitror anyatra pārvaṇam 
ityādīni yady etāni vākyāni santi tadā kim ayāmāvāsyāyā nāmaghoṣaṇikayā 
na caitāni vākyāni śiṣṭaparigṛhītāsu prasiddhāsu smṛtiṣu kāsucid upalabhyante 
tasmān na kiṃcidviśeṣe liṅgam asti yena pūrvapretapiṇḍān nidhīyata iti pratipadyemahi 
tasmāt samācāro na tyājyaḥ 
ayam eva pakṣo yuktiyukta iti darśitaḥ 
tasmān matabhedenāpacchedataḥ pūrvapretanidhānapakṣopanyāsaḥ keṣāmcit 
asapiṇḍakriyākarma dvijāteḥ saṃsthitasya ca 
adaivaṃ bhojayec chrāddhaṃ piṇḍam ekaṃ ca nirvapet 
atra sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ mṛte pitari jīvati pitāmahe pākṣikaṃ jñeyam 
yadā na jīvantam atikramya dadāti ity evaṃ nāśnīyate 
yadā tu sa eṣāgratā syād iti pakṣas tadā pitāmaham atikramya pūrvaiḥ saṃsarjanīyaḥ 
evaṃ tu putrasyāpi mṛtasya pitrā vikalpenaiva kartavyam evam anapatyabhāryāmaraṇe jīvanmātṛkasyaiṣa eva vidhiḥ 
pramattānām itare kurvīraṃs tāś ca teṣām iti 
sutair apatyair ity arthaḥ 
yady api sutagrahaṇaṃ tatsthānāpannānām anyeṣām api grahaṇam yadi svaśabdena nāsti niṣedhaḥ 
śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā ya ucchiṣṭaṃ vṛṣalāya prayacchati 
sa mūḍho narakaṃ yāti kālasūtram avākśirāḥ 
yady api śrāddhabhujo doṣagrahaṇaṃ tathāpi kartur ayam upadeśaḥ 
tena tathā kartavyaṃ yathā na prayacchati 
ṛtviṅniyamavat 
vṛṣalaḥ śūdraḥ 
avākśirā ūrdhvapādaḥ 
prakṛta eva sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ mā vijñāyīti śrāddhagrahaṇam 
śrāddhabhug vṛṣalītalpaṃ tad ahār yo 'dhigacchati 
tasyāḥ purīṣe taṃ māsaṃ pitaras tasya śerate 
vṛṣalī strīmātropalakṣaṇārtham etad ity āhuḥ 
niruktaṃ kurvanti 
vṛṣasyati calayati bhartāram iti vṛṣalī 
sā ca brāḥmaṇī anyā vā sarvā niṣidhyate 
tathā ca smṛtyantaraṃ tadahar brahmacārī syān niyataḥ iti 
talpaśabdena maithunasaṃyogo bhaṇyate 
na śayanārohaṇapratiṣedha eva 
ahargrahaṇam ahorātralakṣaṇāparam 
rātrāv api niṣedhaḥ syāt 
purīṣa iti nindārthavādo nivṛttyarthaḥ 
pitaras tasya śrāddhabujaḥ 
ayam api pūrvavad vacanīyaḥ 
idaṃ tu yuktaṃ yad ubhayor niyama iti 
naimittiko 'yaṃ bhoktur dharmaḥ śrāddhabhojane nimitte vidhīyate 
prakarṇāc ca karmārtho 'pi 
pṛṣṭvā svaditam ity evaṃ tṛptān ācāmayet tataḥ 
ācāntāṃś cānujānīyād abhito ramyatām iti 
ācamanikam annapānaṃ dattvā praṣṭavyāḥ svaditam ity anena śabdena 
smṛtyantarāc cānnaṃ parigṛhya praśno 'yaṃ kartavyaḥ 
bhavati hi kasyacid ayaṃ svabhāvo yad asaṃnihitam annaṃ saty api tadabhilāṣe yantraṇayā na mṛgyate saṃnihitaṃ tu gṛhṇāti 
tṛptān ācāmayet 
anye tu tṛptāḥ stha ity anena śabdena praṣṭavyāḥ 
jñātvā ca tṛptāṇ svaditam iti anena śabdena bṛṃhaṇīyāḥ 
vakṣyati pitre svaditam ity eva vācyam iti 
ācāntāṃś cānujānīyād abhito ramyatām iti 
abhitaḥ ubhataḥ ihaiva svagṛhe vā yatheṣṭam āsyatām ity arthaḥ 
svadhāstv ity eva taṃ brūhur brāhmaṇās tadanantaram 
svadhākāraḥ parā hy āśīḥ sarveṣu pitṛkarmasu 
bhukavadbhir gṛhagamanābhyanujñātair anantaraṃ svadheti vācyam 
svadhākāraḥ svadhāśabdoccāraṇam 
prakṛṣṭā āśīḥ 
pitṛkāryeṣu sarveṣu pakvānnāpakvānnaśrāddheṣu 
tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣām annaśeṣaṃ nivedayet 
yathā brūyus tathā kuryād anjñātas tato dvijaiḥ 
bhuktam annaṃ tebhyo nivedayitavyam 
praṣṭavyās te idam asti iti 
yathā brūyus tathā kuryād anujñātaḥ 
ato 'nanujñātena nānyatra viniyoktavyam 
pitrye svaditam ity eva vācyaṃ goṣṭhe tu suśṛtam 
saṃpannam ity abhyudaye daive rucitam ity api 
anyenāpi tatkālocitopasthitenaivam ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ modayitavyaḥ 
anyas tv āha anujñāpanam etaiḥ śabdair bhojanādipravṛttau kartavyam 
ataś ca śrāddhakṛtā parituṣṭyaivaṃ vaktavyam 
svadadhvam iti na hi svaditam 
svadatu ity vā pāṭhaḥ 
etasyārthasya pratipādakam etad vyākhyānaṃ smṛtyantarasamācārasāpekṣaṃ tasmāt pravṛttabhojanāḥ śrāddhakṛtānyena vaivaṃ prīṇayitavyāḥ 
goṣṭhe goṣu tiṣṭhantīṣv ekadeśeṣu suśṛtam iti vācyam 
astv iti sarvatra pratīyate 
daive rucitaṃ rocitam iti vā 
aparāhṇas tathā darbhā vāstusaṃpādanaṃ tilāḥ 
sṛṣṭir mṛṣṭir dvijāś cāgryāḥ śrāddhakarmasu saṃpadaḥ 
aprāhṇe śrāddhaṃ kartavyam 
śrāddhakarmasu saṃpadaḥ 
saṃpādayitavyāny etāni vastūni 
aviśeṣābhidhāne 'py aparāhṇe na sarvaśrāddheṣu 
evaṃ hi smṛtyantaram
pūrvāhṇe daivikaṃ kāryam aprāhṇe tu paitṛkam 
ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu madhyāhne prātar vṛddhinimittakam  iti 
vāstu veśma tasya saṃpādanaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ sudhādinā bhittīnāṃ gomayena bhūmer upalepanaṃ dakṣiṇapravaṇatā ca 
sṛṣṭir visargaḥ akārpaṇyenānnavyañjanadānam 
mṛṣṭir mārjanaṃ 
annasaṃskāraviśeṣaḥ 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
saṃpad eṣā vibhavaśaktiḥ na tv etair vinā akaraṇam 
darbhāḥ pavitraṃ pūrvāhṇo haviṣyāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ 
pavitraṃ yac ca pūrvoktaṃ vijñeyā havyasaṃpadaḥ 
darbhāḥ prasiddhāḥ 
pavitraṃ mantrāḥ 
haviṣe hitāni yogyāni haviṣyāṇi pūrvaśloke tāny vakṣyante 
pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ śucyācāratā 
yac ca pūrvoktam 
vāstusaṃpādanaṃ sṛṣṭir mṛṣṭir brāhmaṇāś ca śreṣṭhāḥ śrutaśīlasaṃpannāḥ 
havyasaṃpadaḥ 
havyaṃ devatoddeśena yāgādi brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ ca 
havyaśabdaḥ karma daivikam upalakṣayati 
munyannāni payaḥ somo māṃsaṃ yac cānupaskṛtam 
akṣāralavaṇaṃ caiva prakṛtyā havir ucyate 
munir vānaprasthaḥ tasyānnāni āraṇyāni nīvārādīni 
etac ca pradarśanaṃ grāmyāṇām api vrīhyādīnām 
tathārvācīne śloke sarvagrahaṇam 
uttaratra ca havir yac cirarātrāya iti prakramya tilair vrīhiyavair māṣaiḥ iti grāmyāṇām apy anukramaṇam 
payaḥ kṣīram 
tadvikārā api dadhyādayo gṛhyante smṛtisamācārābhyām 
soma oṣadhiviśeṣaḥ 
anupaskṛtam adhikṛtam apratiṣiddham 
sūnāmāṃsādy anupaskṛtam 
akṣāralavaṇam 
atra saṃdihyate kiṃ dvaṃdvagarbho nañsamāsaḥ uta nañsamāsa eva 
akṣāralavaṇam uta lavaṇaviśeṣaḥ 'kṣāralavaṇam' tato 'nyad abhyanujñāyate 
lavaṇam evaṃ bhavitum arham 
dvandvagarbhe hi vṛttidvayam āśrayaṇīyam 
pratipadaṃ ca nañaḥ saṃbandhabhedaḥ 
tad guru bhavati 
prakṛtyā havir anāśrite viśeṣe etad dhavir vijñyam 
haviṣyeṇa vartate haviṣyāt prātarāśād bhuṅkte ityādi sāmānyacodanāsu tad dhaviṣyaṃ jñeyam 
visarjya brāhmaṇāṃs tāṃs tu prayato vāgyataḥ śuciḥ 
dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ākāṅkṣyan yācetemān varān pitṝn 
prāsaṅgikaḥ pūrvaślokaḥ 
idānīṃ prakṛtaśeṣam evāha 
visarjyānujñāya yathāsukhavihāre 
brāhmaṇāṃs tān prabhuktavataḥ 
anantaraṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam īkṣamāṇa imān varān abhilaṣitārthān pitṝn yāceta svapitṝn prārthayet 
svapitṝn dhyāyan yuṣmāsu prasanneṣv idaṃ naḥ saṃpadyatām ity evaṃ yācitavyam 
ke punas te varā yācitavyā ity ata āha 
dāttāro no 'bhivarddhantāṃ vedāḥ saṃtatir eva ca 
śraddhā ca no mā vyagamad bahudeyaṃ ca no 'stv iti 
mantravad ayaṃ ślokaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ 
evaṃ nirvapaṇaṃ kṛtvā piṇḍāṃs tāṃs tadanantaram 
gāṃ vipram ajam agniṃ vā prāśayed apsu vā kṣipet 
tadanantaraṃ varayācanānantaraṃ piṇḍān pitṛbhyo niruptān gavādīn prāśayet 
agnau prakṣepa eva prāśanam 
prāpayet iti pāṭhāntaram 
piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kecit parastād eva kurvate 
vayobhiḥ khādayanty anye prakṣipanty anale 'psu vā 
brāhmaṇabhojanāt parastāt kṛte brāhmaṇabhojane kecit haviḥ kurvanti 
vayobhiḥ pakṣibhiḥ khādayanty anye 
adhikeyaṃ pūrvasmāt pratipattiḥ 
analo 'gniḥ 
etat pūrvoktam evānūditam 
ucchiṣṭasaṃnidhau caitat parastāt piṇḍadānam iṣyate 
pativratā dharmapatnī pitṛpūjanatatparā 
madhyamaṃ tu tataḥ piṇḍam adyāt samyak sutārthinī 
ādyantayoḥ piṇḍayor eṣā pratipattiḥ 
madhyamaṃ tu tataḥ 
teṣāṃ piṇḍānāṃ yo madhyamaḥ taṃ dharmapatnī putrārthinī adyāt 
yā na kāmārthamūḍhā 
patir eva mayā paricaraṇīyo manasāpi vyabhicāro na kartavya iti yasyā niyamaḥ sā pativratā patikbhaktā 
pitṛpūjane śrāddhādikarmaṇi tatparā śraddhāvatī 
prayatnena tadārādhanādau pravartate 
saṃyag adyād ācamanādividhinā niyamena ca 
āyuṣmantaṃ sutaṃ sūte yaśomedhāsamanvitam 
dhanavantaṃ prajāvantaṃ sātvikaṃ dhārmikaṃ tathā 
bhakṣayitvā tu taṃ piṇḍaṃ sutaṃ putraṃ sūte janayati 
medhā grahaṇaśaktiḥ tayā samanvitaṃ yuktam 
satvaṃ nāma guṇaḥ sāṃkhyeṣu prasiddhaḥ dairyotsāhādidyotyas tadyuktam 
prakṣālya hastāv ācamya jñātiprāyaṃ prakalpayet 
jñātibhyaḥ satkṛtaṃ datvā bāndhavān api bhojayet 
piṇḍeṣu pratipāditeṣu tau hastau prakṣālayet 
tataḥ ācamanavidhiṃ kuryāt 
jñātīn praiti gacchati prāpnotīti jñātiprāyaṃ kuryāt 
jñātibhyo dadyāt 
tebhyaḥ satkṛtaṃ datvā bāndhavebhyo 'pi dadyāt 
jñātayaḥ sagotrāḥ mātṛśvaśurapakṣā bāndhavāḥ 
atra cocyate yad uktam yathā brūyus tathā kuryāt iti 
yadi tair uktam gṛhān asmadīyān etad annaṃ prāpyatām iti tadā vaiśvadevahomādīnāṃ kā gatiḥ 
pākāntaraṃ kartavyam 
atha vādṛṣṭārtham evānnaśeṣanivedanaṃ nityavad āmnāyate 
śeṣam annam ity ukte iṣṭebhya iti brūyur iti pākṣikaṃ caitat syād yadi te gṛhṇīyuḥ 
uccheṣaṇaṃ tu tat tiṣṭhed yāvad viprā visarjitāḥ 
tato gṛhabaliṃ kuryād iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ 
bhuñjānānāṃ yatkiṃcid bhujyadhikaraṇapātrasaṃlagnaṃ bhūmipatitaṃ ca tan na tasmād deśād avamārṣṭavyam yāvad brāhmaṇā na niṣkrāntāḥ 
tato gṛhabaliṃ niṣpanne śrāddhakarmaṇy anantaraṃ vaiśvadevahomānvāhikātithyādibhojanaṃ kartavyam baliśabdasya pradarśanārthatvāt 
anye tu bhūtayajña eva baliśabdena prasiddhataraḥ 
tataś cāgnau homo na prāg virudhyate ity āhuḥ 
na caitad vācyam pitrye karmaṇi prārabdhe kathaṃ karmāntarasya tadantaḥkaraṇam 
yathaiva pūrvedyur nimantriteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu sāyaṃprātar homakaraṇaṃ dvyahakalpe śrāddhasya viruddham evaṃ vaiśvadevahomo 'py aupasadāgnikaḥ 
tena bhūtayajñāt parāñcaḥ padārthā utkṛṣyante nārvāñcaḥ 
atrocyate 
yadi prāg agnau vaiśvadevahomaḥ kriyate tataḥ śrāddhānantaraṃ baliharaṇam tathā sati devayajñabhūtayajñau vyavadhīyetām 
tataś ca kramoparodhaḥ 
na ca vaiśvadevasya kālabādhaḥ kriyate pitṛśrāddhakālahāneḥ 
tasmāt sarvaṃ mahāyajñānuṣṭhānaṃ śrāddhād auttarakālikam 
havir yac cirarātrāya yac cānantyāya kalpate 
pitṛbhyo vidhivad dattaṃ tat pravakṣāmy aśeṣataḥ 
cirarātraśabdo dīrghakālavacanaḥ 
yac cānantyāya kalpate dīrghakālatṛptaye jāyate tad ubhayaṃ bravīmīti praṇidhānārtham ucyate 
kalpate preta ity adhyāharyam 
tilair vrīhiyavair māṣair adbhir mūlaphalena vā 
dattena māsaṃ tṛpyanti vidhivat pitaro nṛṇām 
tilādigrahaṇaṃ netaradhānyaparisaṃkhyānārtham api tūktānāṃ phalaviśeṣapradarśanārtham 
etair vidhivad dattair api māsaṃ prīyante 
vidhivat pitaro nṛṇām ityādyanuvādapadāni vṛttapūraṇārthāni 
dvau māsau matsyamāṃsena trīn māsān hāriṇena tu 
aurabhreṇātha caturaḥ śākunenātha pañca vai 
urabhrā meṣāḥ 
śakunaya āraṇyāḥ kukkuṭādyāḥ 
matsyāḥ pāṭḥīnādyāḥ 
ṣaṇmāsāṃś chāgamāṃsena pārṣatena ca sapta vai 
aṣṭāv eṇasya māṃsena rauraveṇa navaiva tu 
rurupṛṣataiṇā mṛgajātiviśeṣavacanāḥ 
rauraveṇa pārṣatena aiṇeyeti vikāre taddhitaḥ 
daśamāsāṃs tu tṛpyanti varāhamahiṣāmiṣaiḥ 
śaśakūrmayos tu māṃsena māsān ekādaśaiva tu 
varāhaś cāraṇyasūkaraḥ 
saṃvatsare tu gavyena payasā pāyasena ca 
vārdhrīṇasasya māṃsena tṛptir dvādaśavārṣikī 
śrutānumitayoḥ śrutasaṃbandhasya balīyastvāt gavyena payasā iti saṃbandhaḥ na māṃsena prākaraṇikena 
anye tu caśabdaṃ samuccayārthīyaṃ paṭhitvā vyākhyānayanti māṃsena gavyena payasā pāyasena vā 
payovikāraḥ pāyasaṃ dadhyādi 
payaḥsaṃskṛta odanaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
vārdhrīṇaso jaracchāgaḥ 
evaṃ hi nigameṣu paṭhyate 
tripibaṃ tv indriyakṣīṇaṃ śvetaṃ vṛddham ajāpitam 
vārdhrīṇasaṃ tu taṃ prāhur yājñikāḥ pitṛkarmaṇi 
pibato yasya trīṇi jalaṃ spṛśanti karṇau jihvā ca sa tribhiḥ pibatīti tripibaḥ 
yat tu śaṅkhena gomāṃsabhakṣaṇe prāyaścittam āmnātaṃ tan madhuparkāṣṭakāśrāddhebhyo 'nyatra jñeyam 
kālaśākaṃ mahāśalkāḥ khaḍgalohāmiṣaṃ madhu 
ānantyāyaiva kalpyante munyannāni ca sarvaśaḥ 
kālaśākaṃ viśiṣṭaśākaṃ prasiddham 
kṛṣṇe vāstukabhede vā 
mahāśalkāḥ śalyakā ucyante 
anye tu matsyān saśalkān āhuḥ 
khaḍgo gaṇḍakaḥ 
lohaḥ kṛṣṇaś chāgaḥ sarvaraktaś ca 
tathā purāṇam
kṛṣṇaś chāgas tathā rakta ānantyāyaiva kalpate 
lohaśabdo varṇalakṣaṇayā tadvarṇayukte chāge vartate 
ayaḥkṛṣṇaṃ tāmraṃ lohitaṃ ubhayatrāpi lohaśabdaḥ prayujyate 
yady api caiṣa varṇo meṣādiṣv api saṃbhavati tathāpi smṛtyantaraprasiddhyā chāga eva gṛhyata iti vyācakṣate 
anye tu śakunir lohitapṛṣṭhaḥ nāmaikadeśena devadatto datta itivat pratipādyata ity āhuḥ 
samācāraś cobhayatrāpy anveṣyaḥ 
madhu mākṣikam 
sarvatrātra prītyatiśayotpattir vivakṣitā na tu yathāśruta eva kālaḥ 
tathā hi dvādaśavarṣāṇy akaraṇaṃ syāt 
tatra virudhyeta pitryam ā nidhanāt kāryam iti 
yat kiṃcin madhunā miśraṃ pradadyāt tu trayodaśīm 
tad apy akṣayam eva syād varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca 
yat kiṃcid annaṃ madhunā saṃyuktam 
trayodaśyāṃ varṣāsu ca maghāsu cādhikam iti 
tadā ca tad akṣayam eva 
ṛtunakṣatratithīnāṃ ca samuccayaḥ 
āpastambavacanāt tu varṣāsu trayodaśyaṣṭamīdaśamīṣv api 
maghāsu cāntareṇāvivakṣā 
evaṃ ha smāha maghāsu cādhikam iti 
api naḥ sa kule bhūyād yo no dadyāt trayodaśīm 
pāyasaṃ madhusarpirbhyāṃ prākchāye kuñjarasya ca 
prakṛtāṃ trayodaśīṃ varṣādiguṇayuktām adhikṛtyedam ucyate 
evaṃ pitara āśāste 
asmakaṃ kule bhūyāt sa tādṛśo jāyatām utkṛṣṭaguṇaḥ yaḥ prāguktāyāṃ trayodaśyām asmabhyaṃ dadyāt pāyasaṃ madhusarpiḥsaṃyuktam 
tathā kuñjarasya hastinaḥ prākchāye prācyāṃ diśi gatāyāṃ chāyāyām aparāhṇetare kāla ity arthaḥ 
śeṣe 'hani hastino dīrghā prācī chāyā bhavati 
prākchāyām iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
chāyāyāṃ hi brāḥmaṇā bhojyante 
agrimaṃ karma tu yady alpatvāc chāyāyāṃ na saṃbhavati taddeśāntare tatsamīpe kartavyam 
aṅgatvāt sati saṃbhave tatsarvāṅgopetaṃ pradhānaṃ hastichāyāyām eva 
yat tu vyācakṣate grahoparāgo hastichāyocyate 
hastī vai bhūtvā svarbhānur āsurir ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat iti
tad ayuktam 
tatra hi gauṇo hastiśabdaprayogaḥ 
smṛtyantare ca pṛthag eva hastichāyā grahoparāgād āmnātā hastichāyā grahaṇaṃ candrasūryayoḥ iti 
yad yad dadāti vidhivat samyak śraddhāsamanvitaḥ 
tat tat pitṝṇāṃ bhavati paratrānantam akṣayam 
yad yad iti vīpsāyām apratiṣiddhaṃ sarvam annam anujānāti 
vidhivat samyak śabdānuvādaḥ 
śraddhāsamanvita ity etad atra vidhīyate 
śraddayā dātavyam 
tathā dattam anantam akṣayaṃ bhavati pitṝṇāṃ paraloke 
anantam iti vā kālāvadhiniṣedhaḥ 
akṣayam iti mātrayā vyayābhāvam āha 
sarvakālaṃ bhavati prabhūtaṃ ca 
kṛṣṇapakṣe daśamyādau varjayitvā caturdaśīm 
śrāddhe praśastās tithayo yathaitā na yathetarāḥ 
daśamyādīnāṃ vacanāt phalātiśayotpattiḥ 
anyāsv api tu satyāṃ śraddhāyāṃ kartavyam 
caturdaśyāṃ tu niṣedha eva 
yukṣu kurvan dinarkṣeṣu sarvān kāmān samaśnute 
ayukṣu tu pitṝn sarvān prajāṃ prāpnoti puṣkalām 
yuñji dināni dvitīyācaturthyādīni 
ṛkṣaṃ nakṣatraṃ tāni bharaṇyādīni yuñji bhavanti 
pratipattṛtīyāpañcamīsaptamīnavamyās tithayo 'yuja ucyante 
dvitīyācaturthīṣaṣṭhyaṣtamīdaśamyo yujaḥ 
evam ekādaśyayukprabhṛtau draṣṭavyam nakṣatreṣv api 
sarvān kāmān 
te ca kāmā itihāsapurānayor bhedenopattāḥ 
puṣkalāṃ prajām 
dhanavidyābalapuruṣaiḥ puṣṭā puṣkalā 
yathā caivāparaḥ pakṣaḥ pūrvapakṣād viśiṣyate 
tathā śrāddhasya pūrvāhṇād aparāhṇo viśiṣyate 
pūrvapakṣaḥ śuklapakṣaḥ aparaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣaḥ 
caitrasitādyā māsā iti 
yathā śrāddhasya śuklapakṣāt kṛṣṇapakṣo viśiṣyate prakṛṣṭaphalado bhavati tathā pūrvāhṇād aparāhṇo viśeṣavacanāt 
pūrvāhṇe 'pi kadācit kartavyam eveti pratīyate 
nanu ca prasiddhena dṛṣṭāntena bhavitavyam 
na cāparapakṣasya pūrvapakṣāc chrāddhaṃ prati viśeṣa uktaḥ 
kecid āhuḥ 
kṛṣṇapakṣe daśamyādau ity etasmāt pratīyate 
evaṃ tu brūmaḥ 
vacanāt tv apūrvatvāt ity anena nyāyenāpratisiddhasya dṛṣṭāntatāstīti 
vidhir api dṛṣṭāntavacanād eva śakyo 'vagantum 
prācīnāvītinā samyag apasavyam atandriṇā 
pitryam ā nidhanāt kāryaṃ vidhivad darbhapāṇinā 
yat kiṃcit pitryaṃ tatra karmaṇy ayaṃ vidhiḥ 
padārthāḥ prāg vyākhyātāḥ 
atandriṇā analasena śraddadhāneneti yāvat 
ā nidhanād ā maraṇāt yāvajjīviko 'yaṃ vidhir ity arthaḥ 
darbhapāṇinā 
tad uktam darbhāḥ pavitram iti 
tad grathitaśīrṣakaṃ darbhamayaṃ pavitram ucyate 
rātrau śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta rākṣasī kīrtitā hi sā 
saṃdhyayor ubhayoś caiva sūrye caivācirodite 
nanu cāparāhṇavidhānāt kuto rātryādiṣu prāptiḥ 
atha mataviśeṣavacanena anyatrāpy astīti jñāpitam 
satyam 
pūrvāhṇād aparāhṇo viśiṣyate iti yadapekṣaṃ viśeṣavacanaṃ tatraivāstīti sāmānyajñānaṃ pravartate 
tena pūrvāhṇa eva kadācit tasyānya uttarakāla iti kecid āhuḥ 
grahaṇaṃ candrasūryayoḥ iti candragrahādiṣu rātryādāv api prāptaḥ tanniṣedhārtham 
ataś ca saṃdhyāyāṃ candrasūryayor uparāgeṇa rātrau candragrahaṇe pratiṣedhāt vidhānād vikalpaḥ 
anye tv āhuḥ madhyāhnakālaḥ pūrvāhṇāparāhṇābhyām anyas tatrāpy etena pratiṣedhena kartavyam iti jñāpyet 
sūrye caiva pūrvāhṇakālatvāt prathamodite sūrye pratiṣedhaḥ 
rākṣasīty arthavādaḥ 
anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ trir abdasyeha nirvapet 
hemantagrīṣmavarṣāsu pāñcayajñikam anvaham 
pūrvoktena vidhinā itikartavyatākalāpena pūrvedur nimantraṇādibhiḥ saṃvatsarasya triḥ śrāddhaṃ kurvīta 
keṣu māseṣv ity ata āha hemantagrīṣmavarṣāsu 
māsānumāsikam ity asya triḥ saṃvatsaravidhir vaikalpikaḥ 
pāñcayajñikaḥ pañcamahāyajñamadhye yaḥ paṭhitaḥ so 'nvahaṃ kartavyaḥ 
asya ca prācīnāvītyapasavyodaṅmukhabrāhmaṇabhojanam ity etāvaty evetikartavyatā 
evamartham eva punar upanyāsaḥ 
evaṃ triḥsaṃvatsaravidhir anāhitāgner ity evaṃ pūrve vyācakṣate pramāṇaṃ tu ta eva vidanti 
na paitṛyajñiyo homo laukike 'gnau vidhīyate 
na darśena vinā śrāddham āhitāgner dvijanmanaḥ 
pitṛyajñāṅgabhūto homaḥ paitṛyajñikaḥ sa laukike smārte 'gnau na vidhīyate 
śāstreṇa kartavyatayā na codyate 
tasmāt triḥ saṃvatsarasyānāhitāgninā kartavyam 
yady api triḥkṛtam api bhavaty eva kṛtaṃ laukike 'gnau tathāpi saṃvatsarāpekṣayā akṛtam eva tad bhavati 
prasthabhojano hi nyūne bhukte 'bhukta iti 
arthavādatayā pūrvaśeṣam idaṃ pūrve vyācakṣate 
idaṃ tu yuktam 
yadi laukiko 'gnir vivāhādāv aparigṛhītas tasmiñ chrāddhāṅgabhūto homo na kartavya ity ucyate 
homapratiṣedhena ca tadvyatiriktam anyat karma kartavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati 
itarathā parigṛhītāgner api pārvaṇaśrāddhāṅgatvena vidhānād anagnikasya śrāddhānadhikāra eva syāt 
yathāndhasyājyāvekṣaṇāśaktyā na darśapaurṇamāsayor adhikāraḥ 
asmiṃs tu sati sāgnikasya homavat śrāddham anagnikasya tadvarjitam api jñāpitaṃ bhavati 
tathā ca agnyabhāve ity asyāyam eva viṣayaḥ 
ye 'pi vyācakṣate piṇḍapitṛyajño 'bhipretaḥ tatra yo homaḥ sa laukike smārte 'gnau nāsti te 'pi na yuktam āhuḥ 
astv evam anāhitāgnir nityatve śrapayitvā juhuyād ityādi 
na darśeṇa vinā śrāddhaṃ grahoparāgādāv āhitāgniḥ pratiṣedha ity āhuḥ 
etat tu samācāraviruddham 
anye tu paṭhanti na vinā darśa ity asyāhitāgninā māsānumāsikaṃ kartavyam nāsya triḥsaṃvatsaravidhiḥ 
naivāyaṃ pāṭho 'stīty anye 
kas tarhy asyārthaḥ 
dārśāt śrāddhād anyad āhitāgner maghāśrāddhādi na niyamena bhavatīti dārśam eva tasya niyatam 
anāhitāgnes tu hemantādivihitāny api niyatānīti 
yad eva tarpayaty adbhiḥ pitṝn snātvā dvijottamaḥ 
tenaiva kṛtsnam āpnoti pitṛyajñakriyāphalam 
pāñcayajñikaṃ yac chrāddham ahar ahar ity uktaṃ tasya vaikalpikatvam anenocyate 
udakatarpaṇaṃ yat kriyate snātvā tenaiva pitṛyajñakriyāphalaṃ prāpnoti 
yad uktam ekam apy āśayet iti tasya nāsti niyamena kartavyatā 
ukadatarpaṇam avaśyaṃ kartavyam 
vasūn vadanti tu pitṝn rudrāṃś caiva pitāmahān 
prapitāmahāṃs tathādityān śrutir eṣā purātanī 
pitṛdveṣād apravartamānasya pravṛttyartham idam 
tristhānā vasvādyā devatāh pitaro 'pi ya eva piṇḍabhājaḥ 
ato devatātvenaite draṣṭavyāḥ 
śrutir eṣā śrūyate etad vede 
ataḥ purātanī nityatvād vedasya 
vighasāśī bhaven nityaṃ nityaṃ vāmṛtabhojanaḥ 
vighaso bhuktaśeṣaṃ tu yajñaśeṣaṃ tathāmṛtam 
ādyena ślokapādenātithyādibhuktaśiṣṭasyānnasya yad bhojanaṃ vihitaṃ tad anūdyate 
māṅgalikatayā maṅgalāvasānāni śāstrāṇi prathante 
pitryād daivaṃ karma śastataram 
yajñaśeṣam 
anena jyotiṣṭomādihaviḥśeṣasya bhojanaṃ vighasasya tulyatayocyate 
uttareṇārdhaślokena sauhārdam eva tasya vedārthavyākhyānam 
kasyāṃcic chākhāyām ābhyāṃ śabdābhyāṃ vidhānaṃ dṛṣṭam ato vyāmohaṃ nivartayati 
vighasam aśnātīti vighasāśī 
amṛtaṃ bhojanam asyety amṛtabhojanaḥ 
bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ bhṛtyabhuktaśiṣṭam iti draṣṭavyam 
bhuktaśeṣam iti pāṭhe sāmarthyād atithyādibhuktam iti draṣṭavyam 
anye tu prakṛtatvāc chrāddhabhuktaśeṣam iti draṣṭavyam 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram bhuñjīta pitṛsevitaḥ iti
