śrāddhāṅgaṃ caitad bhojanaṃ kecid āhuḥ 
anye tu puruṣārtho bhojananiyamo 'yam ity āhuḥ 
vasūn vadanti ity anenaiva śrāddhaprakaraṇasyāpravṛttatvāt 
yajñaśeṣaṃ yajñopayuktadravyaśeṣam iti draṣṭavyam 
etad vo 'bhihitaṃ sarvaṃ vidhānaṃ pāñcayajñikam 
dvijātimukhyavṛttīnāṃ vidhānaṃ śrūyatām iti 
pūrvaṃ hi vyavahitasya pāñcayajñikam iti mahāyajñavidher upasaṃhāro māṅgalikatayaiva 
uttareṇa ślokārdhena vakṣyamāṇādhyāyārthaikadeśopanyāsaḥ 
tau coktaprayojanau 
dvijātimukhyā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ vṛttayo jīvikāḥ karmāṇi 
dvijātīnāṃ vā mukhyavṛttaya iti 
uttaratraiva darśayiṣyāma iti prasiddham 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyām saṃhitāyāṃ
tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ 
mānyā kāpi manusmṛtis taducitā vyākhyā hi medhātitheḥ 
sā luptaiva vidher vaśāt kvacid api prāpyaṃ na yat pustakam 
kṣoṇīndro madanaḥ sahāraṇasuto deśāntarād āhṛtair
jīrṇoddhāram acīkarat tata itas tat pustakair lekhitaiḥ 
iti śrībhaṭṭavirasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithisvāminaḥ kṛtau manubhāṣye
tṛtīyo 'dhyāyḥ samāptaḥ 
atha caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
caturtham āyuṣo bhāgam uṣitvādyaṃ gurau dvijaḥ 
dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ kṛtadāro gṛhe vaset 
saṃkṣepeṇātikrāntasyādhyāyadvayasyārthaṃ kathayaty anusmaraṇāya 
gārhasthyadharmasyāyaṃ vṛttividhir iti dvitīyaṃ ślokaprayojanam 
aniyataparimāṇatvād āyuṣaś caturthabhāgavyavasthāvidhānam āśramiṇām anupapannam ataḥ śloko 'yaṃ vihitāśramakālānuvādārthaḥ 
yady api ca śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ ity etadapekṣayā kathaṃcid upapadyetāpi tathāpi svaprakaraṇe grahaṇāntikam iti avadhyantarasya brahmacaryavihitatvāt gṛhasthas tu yadā paśyet iti gārhasthye 'pi kālāntarapratipatter anuvādataivānumīyate 
caturtham ādyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ 
janmāpekṣam ādyatvam 
gurau uṣitvā brahmacaryaṃ kṛtvā tato dvitīyaṃ caturtham āyuṣo bhāgaṃ kṛtavivāho gṛhe vaset 
gṛhasthāśramam anutiṣṭhet tatra vaset 
adroheṇaiva bhūtānām alpadroheṇa vā punaḥ 
yā vṛttis tāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīved anāpadi 
dehi dehi iti yācamānasya yaḥ parasya cittavikāraḥ khedātmako jāyate sa droho 'bhipretaḥ na punar hiṃsaiva tasyāḥ sarvasāmānyenaiva pratiṣedhāt 
alpadroheṇeti 
yācñayā vinā yadi na vartyate tadā svalpaṃ yācitavyam eṣo 'lpadrohaḥ 
yā vṛttir jīvanopāyaḥ kṛṣisevādi yasyāṃ vṛttau parasya pīḍā na bhavati sā āśrayitavyā 
sāmānyopadeśo 'yam 
samāsthāya āśritya jīvet 
āpadi daśame vidhir bhaviṣyati 
asmāc copadeśād vakṣyamāṇābhya anyāpi vṛttir bhavatīti gamyate 
anyathā vakṣyamāṇaviśeṣaniṣṭhatve sāmānyasyopadeśasyānarthakyam eva syāt 
tena ca yājanādhyāpane kusīdam amṛtādimadhye apaṭhitam api labhyate 
alpīyasī yā uñchavṛttir gṛhītā asau hy alpadrohaḥ 
tathā ca gautamaḥ kṛṣivāṇijye cāsvayaṃ kṛte 
kusīdaṃ ca 
jīvanamātro 'yaṃ vidhiḥ dhanasaṃcayas tu vakṣyamāṇair eva niyataiḥ karmabhiḥ 
yātrāmātraprasiddhyarthaṃ svaiḥ karmabhir agarhitaiḥ 
akleśena śarīrasya kurvīta dhanasaṃcayam 
pūrveṇānvāhikajīvanavidhāv upāya uktaḥ anena dhanasaṃcaye niyama upadiśyate 
svaiḥ karmabhiḥ dhanasaṃcayaṃ kuryāt 
tāni ca karmāṇy uttaratra vakṣyante 
saṃcayaprayojanam āha yātrāmātraprasiddhyartham 
na bhogāya dhanasaṃcayakleśaḥ kartavyaḥ kiṃ tarhi yātrāmātraprasiddhyartham 
ātmakuṭumbasthitir yātrā tatparimāṇaṃ yātrāmātram tasya prasiddhir niṣpattiḥ tadarthas tatprayojanam 
nityakarmanivṛttir ātmasthitāv evāntarbhūtāni hy akurvata na ātmasthitiḥ 
āha ca na nirvapati pañcānām ucchvasan na sa jīvati 
atha vā saty api śāstrīyatve yatra loko garhate tad varjyam eva 
yathā narasya mahākulīnasya bhuktavibhavasya nikṛṣṭakulāt prāptaśrīkāt samānajātīyād api pratigrahādinā kenacid upāyena jīvanam 
akleśena śarīrasya 
sevāvāṇijye mahākleśe dūrādhvagamanādinā 
tādṛśe na kartavye 
saṃcayo rāśīkṛtaparirakṣaṇam 
tānīdānīṃ karmāṇi nāmatas tāvad āha 
ṛtāmṛtābyāṃ jīvet tu mṛtena pramṛtena vā 
satyānṛtābhyām api vā na śvavṛttyā kadācana 
nāmnaiva keṣāṃcit stutiḥ pratīyate 
prayojanaṃ ca praśastābhāve ninditeṣu pravṛttiḥ 
tatra mṛtapramṛte atyantanindite 
tato 'pi satyānṛtam 
yata āha tenaiva vāpi jīvyate iti 
apiśabdo 'rucisūcanārthaḥ 
nāmato nirdiśya svarūpato vyācaṣṭe 
ṛtam uñchaśilaṃ jñeyam amṛtaṃ syād ayācitam 
mṛtaṃ tu yācitaṃ bhaikṣaṃ pramṛtaṃ karṣaṇaṃ smṛtam 
uñchaś ca śilaś ca uñchaśilam 
tad ṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ satyavratatulyam 
kṣetrāl lūnasya vrīhyāder gṛhaṃ khalaṃ vā nīyamānasya yaḥ pulākaḥ patitaḥ svāmino 'napekṣitas tasyoccayanam uñchaḥ tad ṛtam 
na tatreyaṃ buddhir ādheyā parakīyam etat na gṛhṇāmi iti 
evaṃ ca khalāt paribhraṣṭasya lūnasyālūnasya vānekaprarohavato grahaṇaṃ śilaḥ 
amṛtaṃ syād ayācitam atyantaprītikaratvāt 
mṛtam iva yācitam bhaikṣam iti 
yācitam ity eva siddhe bhaikṣaśabdena sāmūhikataddhitāntena bahavo yācitavyā ity ucyate naikaḥ kadarthanīyaḥ 
tad uktam alpadroheṇa iti 
prāyeṇa ca bhaikṣaśabdasya bhaikṣyāśy ātmaviśuddhyartham ity evamādau siddhānnaviṣaye prayogasiddheḥ sāmānyaviṣayārthaṃ yācitaśabdopādānam 
tena nedaṃ siddhānnabhikṣaṇam eva agnimataḥ parāgnipakvena vaiśvadevādivirodhāt 
na cedaṃ bhojanārtham eva bhikṣaṇam kiṃ tarhi sthityartham 
sthitiś ca na bhojanamātrasādhyā gṛhasthasya kiṃ tarhi yāvat kiṃcid gṛhopayogi 
ata edhodakaparidhānādy api bhikṣitavyam gṛhopakaraṇaṃ ca sthālyapidhānādi 
brahmacāriṇas tu bhojanakāle vidhinā pākāsaṃbhavān niyamataḥ siddhānnaviṣayaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ pratīyate 
bhikṣāśabdaś cāyaṃ bhikṣyamāṇadravyagataṃ parimāṇam apy ācaṣṭe 
bhikṣāmātraṃ na dadāti yācitaḥ prasṛtimātraṃ bhikṣeti 
tena gohiraṇyādibhikṣaṇaṃ na prasṛtaśabdenābhyanujñāyate pratigrahādyarthā yācñeti 
nanu bhaikṣagrahaṇam api pratigraha eva 
naivam grahaṇamātraṃ pratigrahaḥ 
viśiṣṭa eva svīkāre pratipūrvo gṛhṇātir vartate 
tena na svīkāramātre 
pratigrahasamartho 'pi pratigrahaḥ pratyavaraḥ iti adṛṣṭabuddhyā dīyamānaṃ mantrapūrvaṃ gṛhṇataḥ pratigraho bhavati 
na ca bhaikṣe devasya tvā ādimantroccāraṇam asti na ca prītyādinā dānagrahaṇe 
na ca tatra pratigrahavyavahāraḥ 
ataḥ pratigrahād arthāntaram evedaṃ mṛtāmṛtaśabdābhidheyam 
ataś ca nātra yācyamānasya ayācyamānasya vā mahāsattvatayā upakārāntarāpekṣā jāyate yena vā dadato jātyādyapekṣā yuktimatī pratigrāhyasya 
evaṃ karuṇayā ca pradīyamānaṃ gṛhṇato na pratigrahaḥ 
nanu ca karuṇayā dānam adṛṣṭāyaiva 
neti brūmaḥ 
na ca tatra dānadharmaḥ kiṃ tarhi karuṇābhyāsāt paropakārād vā 
tatra yathā hitopadeśādāv anugrāhyasya vidhir jātyādi nāpekṣate tadvat karuṇayā dāne 
tathā ca śiṣṭā naivaṃvidhe dāne vedatattvārthaviduṣe brāhmaṇāya ity etad anurudhyante 
ata evābrāhmaṇā api dainyam āpannāḥ pareṇa dattaṃ gṛhṇānā na brāhmaṇavṛttiṃ pratigraham āśritā bhavanti 
sthitam etat 
pratigrahe yady api yācitāyācitapūrvakatvaṃ vidyate tathāpi na tenaiva mṛtāmṛtaśabdārthaḥ viṣayāntarasya darśitatvāt 
yājanādhyāpanayor apy etad rūpam asti 
kaścid yājayitvā yājakatvaṃ labhate kaścit prārthyate 
evam adhyāpane yojyam 
ato yāvatā kācid vṛttir yācñayā sā dainyāvahatvāt maraṇam iveti mṛtaśabdenābhidhīyate 
karṣaṇaṃ tu maraṇād api pāpīyaḥ 
lāṅgalākarṣaṇaṃ hi bhāravāhatvam 
tac ca khalu janapadakarma 
satyānṛtaṃ tu vāṇijyaṃ tena caivāpi jīvyate 
sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet 
naivaṃ mantavyaṃ satyānṛtobhayarūpatā śāstreṇa vāṇijye 'bhyanujñāyata iti 
kiṃ tarhi vastusvabhāvavādo 'yam 
lobhagrahaṇam evānṛtam 
jīvyata iti vacanād vāṇijyā jīvanāyaiva na dhanasaṃcayāya 
sevā śvavṛttiḥ 
yathā hi śvā preryate kṛcchreṇa ca labhate tathā ca sevakaḥ 
sevā preṣyatvam 
yatra kutracit karmaṇi preṣyate ucite 'nucite vā sa sevakaḥ 
ata utkṛṣṭenāyudhakarmādinā ye rājānam upasarpanti te na śvavṛttayaḥ 
kusūladhānyako vā syāt kumbhīdhānyaka eva vā 
tryahaihiko vāpi bhaved aśvastanika eva vā 
uktam ātmakuṭumbasthityai dhanasaṃcayaḥ kāryaḥ na bhogāya kleśa āśrayaṇīyaḥ 
tat tu kim anvaham arjanīyam utaikadaiva cirakālaparyāptam iti noktam 
tatra kālavilambārtham idam ārabhyate 
kusūle dhānyam asyeti gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiḥ 
pāṭhāntaram kuśūladhānyakaḥ iti 
kusūlaparimitaṃ dhānyaṃ kusūladhānyam tad asyāstīti matvarthīya ikaśabdaḥ 
dhānyādhikaraṇam iṣṭakādikṛtaṃ kusūlaḥ koṣṭha iti cocyate 
tena cātra parimāṇaṃ lakṣyate 
tatra yāvan māti tāvat saṃcetavyam 
na punar ādhāraniyamo 'sti 
kusūlena ca mahāparigrahaṇasyāpi bahubhṛtyabandhudāradāsaputragavāśvādimato 'pi yāvatā sāṃvatsarī sthitir bhavati tāvad anujñāyate 
yato vakṣyati yasya traivārṣikaṃ bhaktam iti 
dhānyagrahaṇam apy avivakṣitam 
suvarṇarūpyādy api tāvatyāḥ sthiteḥ paryāptam arjayato na doṣaḥ 
sarvathādhikaṃ tato nārjanīyam iti vākyārthaḥ 
kumbhī uṣṭrikā 
ṣaṇmāsiko nicaya etena pratipādyata iti smaranti 
tryaham aihikam asyeti tryahaihikaḥ 
kuṭumbasya nityakarmārthaṃ ca bhaktacayaṃ karoti yaḥ sa tryahaihikaḥ 
śvo bhavaṃ śvastanaṃ bhaktam tad asyāstīti pūrvavat matvarthīyaṃ kṛtvā nañsamāsaḥ kartavyaḥ 
sadyas tātkāliko bhavet 
tadahararjitaṃ vyayīkartavyam 
asya vikalpasya vyavasthām āha 
caturṇām api caiteṣāṃ dvijānāṃ gṛhamedhinām 
jyāyān paraḥ paro jñeyo dharmato lokajittamaḥ 
yo yaḥ svalpakālasaṃcayaḥ sa sa dharmair jyāyān adhikaḥ 
dharmādhikyāc ca phalādhikyaṃ bhavati 
lokajittamaḥ 
lokāñ jayaty ādhipatyenāvatiṣṭhate bhogyatayā svīkaroti 
prakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ tamaḥ 
aviśeṣopādānāl lokaḥ svargaḥ pratīyate 
teneyam atra vyavasthā 
mahāparigraho yo bahvapatyo 'saṃvibhaktaputraḥ akṛtakanyāvivāhaś ca sa kusūladhānyakaḥ 
yas tu pariṇatavayāḥ prāptaputraḥ kṛtakaraṇaḥ sa yāvad yāvac chamam eti tāvat tāvad itarān kalpān āśrayet 
ṣaṭkarmaiko bhavaty eṣāṃ tribhir anyaḥ pravartate 
dvābhyām ekaś caturthas tu brahmasatreṇa jīvati 
eṣāṃ kusūladhānyakādīnāṃ gṛhasthānām ekaḥ ṣaṭkarmā bhavati 
yo mahāparigrahaḥ prāguktas tasya ṣaḍ vṛttikarmāṇi bhavanti 
kāni punas tāni 
prakṛtāni uñchaśilāyācitayācitalābhakṛṣivāṇijyāni 
adhyāpanayājanapratigraḥāḥ yācitāyācitagrahaṇād antarbhavanti 
bahukuṭumbako nityakarmasaṃpattyarthaṃ ca sarvā vṛttīḥ samuccitāḥ kuryāt kṛṣivāṇijye api 
ye 'pi adhyāpanam adhyayanam ityādīni prathamādhyāyapaṭhitāni ṣaṭkarmāṇi vyācakṣate teṣāṃ prakaraṇavirodho niṣprayojanaṃ vādhyayanādīnām upādānam anyatraiva teṣāṃ vihitatvāt 
anyaḥ dvitīyaḥ kuṃbhīdānyas tribhiḥ pravartate 
pro 'narthakaḥ yāvad vartate tāvat pravartata iti 
vartanaṃ ca sthitisaṃpattiḥ 
prakṛtānāṃ ca yāni kānicit kvacit kṛṣivāṇijye vihāya 
praśastataro hi pūrvasmāt kumbhīdhānyakaḥ 
yato vakṣyati sā vṛttiḥ sadvigarhitā gorakṣakān vāṇijikān iti 
yad apy uktaṃ gautamena kṛṣivāṇijye vāsvayaṃkṛte kusīdaṃ ca ity anāpady eva 
tatrāpy asvayaṃkaraṇapakṣe doṣo 'sty eva laghīyāṃs tu bhaviṣyati 
dvābhyām ekaḥ 
atrāpi yācitalābhaṃ varjayitvā trayāṇāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dve gṛhyete 
ayācitam api tāvad gṛhyate yāvat tryahaparyāptam 
caturthas tu brahmasatreṇa jīvati 
brahmasatraṃ śiloñchayor anyatarā vṛttiḥ 
satatabhavatvāt satram iva na tadahaḥparisamāpanīyā vṛttiḥ ataḥ satram ity ucyate ahar ahar nityam anuṣṭhānāt 
brahmaśabdo brāhmaṇaparyāyaḥ 
teṣām idaṃ satram 
asmād brahmaśabdāt pūrvo 'yaṃ vṛttiprapañco brāhmaṇaviṣaya eva vijñeyaḥ 
kṣatriyādīnāṃ tu tatra tatra vakṣyati 
kathaṃ punaḥ śiloñchavṛttyā jīvanaṃ saṃbhavati yāvatā śaradgrīṣmayor eva kṣetre khale vā śilapulākapātasaṃbhavaḥ 
athocyate 
graiṣmebhyo graiṣmāṇi śāradāni śāradebhyo 'rjayiṣyati iti 
ṣāṇmāsikavṛttir eva syāt nāśvastanikaḥ 
athānyathāpi saṃbhavati yāvatas tāvato vrīhyādeḥ kathaṃcit patitasyopādānam 
satyam 
na tadbhojanāya paryāptam 
saṃcinvāno yadā paryāptaṃ prāpsyati tadāśiṣyati pañcāhādyasaṃbhavāt 
tathā ca mahābhārate śiloñchavṛttiḥ pakṣāntāśano varṇyate 
so 'yam asyām avasthāyāṃ gṛhasthas tāpasaḥ saṃvṛtta iti cet kiṃ tv evam apy aśvastanikatvaṃ virudhyate 
yathopapādasthitikas tadā syāt nāśvastanikaḥ 
aśvastaniko hy ucyate ya ahany ahany arjayati yātrikam tad ahar eva ca vyayīkaroti na dvitīye 'hṇi sthāpayati 
yadi ca na pratyahaṃ śiloñchavṛtter bhojanaṃ nivartate kuto 'śvastaniko bhavet kathaṃ ca tathāvidhasya jīvanaṃ putradārabharaṇaṃ ca 
ata eva kecit tribhir anyaḥ pravartata ity ata ārabhyānyathā vyācakṣate 
tribhir yājanādhyāpanapratigrahaiḥ dvābhyām pratigrahaḥ pratyavaraḥ iti pratigrahavyudāsena yājanādhyāpane pratigṛhyete 
brahmasatram adhyāpanam 
tad dhi vṛttaye paryāptam 
yat tu vartayaṃś ca śiloñchābhyām iti sa catuṣṭayavyatirikto 'nya eva 
atrocyate 
yaḥ śilaparimāṇān daśadvādaśān yavān vrīhīn vā bahubhya ādatte yāvad ekāhayātrikaṃ sa śilavṛttiḥ 
yas tv ekaikaṃ yātrārtham āharati sa uñchavṛttiḥ 
smṛtyantare cāyaṃ yāyāvaravṛttir uktaḥ 
ataś ca sārvakālikam apy upapadyate 
na ca vaiśvadevādikriyāvirodhaḥ na ca putradārāṇām abharaṇadoṣaś ca yācitabhaikṣād atyantālpagrahaṇāt 
vartayaṃś ca śiloñchābhyām agnihotraparāyaṇaḥ 
iṣṭīḥ pārvāyaṇāntīyāḥ kevalāḥ nirvapet sadā 
parva cāyanāntaś ca tayor bhavāḥ pārvāyaṇāntīyāḥ 
svārthikam aṇaṃ kṛtvā vṛddhāc chaḥ kartavyaḥ 
parveṣṭir darśapūrṇamāsau ayanānte ca yajña āgrayaṇākhyaḥ 
kevalagrahaṇāt kāmyā iṣṭayo niṣidhyante 
vaiśvadevahomabaliharaṇe 'pi tasya nānvhaṃ bhavataḥ 
na hi tasya sarvadā tāvad dhanaṃ bhavati 
ataḥ kevalagrahaṇān mahāyajñanivṛttiḥ 
nanu cāgnihotram api tat tasya naiva bhavati 
tad api dravyasādhyam eva 
pakṣahomān hoṣyati 
bhāryābharaṇaṃ katham iti cet
sāpi tām vṛttim āśrayiṣyati 
yadā ca bhāryā vratam etad dhārayitum aśaktā tadā bhartur api nāsty adhikāraḥ 
atha cāndrāyaṇādiṣu pravṛttasya kathaṃ bhāryāyā jīvanam iti cet
acodyam etad vidyamānatvāt atithyādiśiṣṭam aśiṣyata iti 
nanu vaiśvadevahomābhāvāt vidyamāne 'pi strīdhane na bhojanaṃ yuktam ubhayor vighasāśitvavidhānāt 
ataḥ strīdhanena vaiśvadevaṃ kariṣyati dharmakārye 'nujñānāt strīdhanagrahaṇasya 
naivam 
tasyām avasthāyām agnihotramātraṃ dharmaḥ na vaiśvadevahomaḥ 
bhavatu vā 
yasyās tarhi dhanaṃ nāsti kathaṃ jīvatu 
tasmād yasyāsamarthā bhāryā nāsau śiloñchavṛttāv adhikriyate 
vartayann ātmānaṃ jīvayan 
na lokavṛttaṃ varteta vṛttihetoḥ kathaṃcana 
ajihmām aśaṭhāṃ śuddhāṃ jīved brāhmaṇajīvikām 
lokavṛttaṃ nāmocyate yena prākṛtajano 'lpasattvo vartate dambhenāsatpriyākhyānena ca tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ brahmā jaya jīva iti 
tathā vicitraparihāsakathābhiḥ 
vṛttihetoḥ jīvikārthatayā na kartavyam etat 
yas tu narmaśīlas tasya na doṣaḥ 
ajihmām 
yasyānyac ca hṛdaye 'nyac ca bahiḥ sa jihma ucyate 
dveṣamatsarātmā darśayaty apriyaṃ vadatām 
aśaṭhām 
agnihotrakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ lokārjanena pratigrahādilobhārtham na śāstrārthaśraddadhānatayā kuryāt sa śaṭhaḥ 
ātmadharmatve 'pi jaihmyaśāṭhyor jīvikāpy abhedopacarād vyapadiśyate ajihmām aśaṭhām 
śuddhām iti 
śuddhir vṛttyantareṇāmiśrīkaraṇaṃ pūrvadoṣadvayena ca 
ekapadalabhyo 'py ayam artho vṛttānurodhād gobalīvardavad bahudadaiḥ pratipādyate 
atha kathaṃ brāhmaṇajīvikāṃ jīved iti dvitīyā yāvatā jīvatir karmakaḥ 
kathaṃ caikasyaiva dhātor ekatra dviḥ prayogaḥ 
na hi bhavati gamanaṃ gacchet iti sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ 
ucyate 
sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo na viruddhaḥ 
yathā aśvapoṣaṃ puṣṭaḥ iti 
anuṣṭhānāṅge ca vartanārthe jīvatir vartate 
tena sakarmakatvam iti na doṣaḥ 
jīvet jīvanartham anutiṣṭhet 
tryahaihikāśvastanavṛttidārḍhyārthaṃ prasaṃkhyānam idam āha 
saṃtoṣaṃ param āsthāya sukhārthī saṃyato bhavet 
saṃtoṣamūlaṃ hi sukhaṃ duḥkhamūlaṃ viparyayaḥ 
saṃtoṣa āśrayitavyaḥ na bahūnām upajīvyaḥ syām iti yācñākleśa āstheyaḥ 
sukhārthī saṃyato bhavet 
saṃyamo yātrikād dhanād adhike nābhilāṣaḥ 
saṃtoṣo manasvināṃ sukhamūlam 
duḥkhasya mūlaṃ viparyayaḥ asaṃtoṣaḥ 
mahad viduṣāṃ dainyam abhilaṣite vastuny asaṃpattiḥ 
tasmāt saṃtoṣam āśrayet 
ato 'nyatamayā vṛttyā jīvaṃs tu snātako dvijaḥ 
svargyāyuṣyayaśasyāni vratānīmāni dhārayet 
vṛttiviṣayo nidhir vṛttiśabdenoktaḥ 
tenānyatamayeti na tadapekṣam ekajīvitam anyatamena nivṛttividhānāt 
ato vṛttisamuccayajīvinaḥ pitṛdhanaṃ prāptavataś ca vratādhikāro na yujyate 
anyathā ekavṛttijīvana eva syāt 
vratānīmāni 
mānasaḥ saṃkalpo vratam ucyate śāstravihitam idaṃ mayā kartavyam idaṃ vā na kartavyam ity evam 
svargāyuṣyayaśasyāni vratadhāraṇaphalāni kecid āhuḥ 
ataś caitat phalārthino vrateṣv adhikāraḥ 
tad ayuktam 
anityatvam evaṃ sati prasajyeta 
tatrottaraśloke nityagrahaṇaṃ bādhyeta 
śrutau caiṣāṃ nityatā jñāpitā yāvat hi enasā yukto bhavati iti 
svargādīnāṃ kāmyatvenānvaye nādhikṛtaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ pratipadyeran 
vedoditaṃ svakaṃ karma nityaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ 
tad dhi kurvan yathāśakti prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim 
vedamulatvāt smṛtīnāṃ vedoditam iti śrūyate 
svakaṃ karma vakṣyamāṇo vratasamūhaḥ 
vihitatvāt svakam ity ucyate 
nityaṃ kuryāt yāvajjīvam 
atandritaḥ analasaḥ 
etad vratadhāraṇaṃ kurvan yathāśakti 
anena satyāṃ śaktau yathāsaṃbhavam anuṣṭhānam āha 
tad uktam manasā vā tatsamagram ācāram anupālayan 
paramāṃ gatiṃ brahmatvaprāptirūpām 
nehetārthān prasaṅgena na viruddhena karmaṇā 
na kalpyamāneṣv artheṣu nārtyām api yatas tataḥ 
prasajyeta yatra puruṣaḥ sa hi prasaṅgo 'bhipreto gītavāditrādiḥ 
tatra hi rāgiṇaḥ sajjantīva 
ato gītavāditrādibhir arthān dhanāni neheta nārjayet 
viruddhaṃ karma pratiṣiddhaṃ śāstreṇa akulocitaṃ ca 
na ca pitrādyāgateṣu dhaneṣu kalpyamāneṣu sthitisamartheṣu 
anyāni necchet 
nārtyāṃ āpady api yatas tataḥ 
prasahya satpratigraheṇa pravartitavyam ekasyāpady enam apy anujñāsyati 
indriyārtheṣu sarveṣu na prasjyeta kāmataḥ 
atiprasaktiṃ caiteṣāṃ manasā saṃnivartayet 
indriyāṇām arthā viṣayā rūparasādayaḥ teṣu na prasajyeta na saktim atyantāṃ sevāṃ kuryāt 
manoharā yuvatayaḥ vaṃśagītaṃ svādavad rasaḥ karpūrādigandhaḥ rāgavat sparśaḥ ete viṣayāḥ 
tān nātyantaṃ seveta 
kāmataḥ kāmapradhānatayā 
sarveṣu ayācitopamaṃ teṣv api nityasevī syāt 
atiprasaktiś caivaiṣām 
nivṛttyupāyo 'nena kathyate 
na hi vastuprasaktir nivartituṃ śaktyā manasā tu pratipakṣabhāvanayā nivartya 
ādau tāvad durupapadakatva 
upasthiteṣv api bhuktapūrveṣu kṣaṇavirasatāsvabhāvaś ca vināśitvaṃ śāstraniṣedhāc ca saṅgasya narakāpāta ity evamādi cintayet 
yathoktam na tathaitāni śakyante iti 
sarvān parityajed arthān svādhyāyasya virodhinaḥ 
yathātathā yāpayaṃs tu sā hy asya kṛtakṛtyatā 
ye vedābhyāsavirodhino 'rthās te sarve tyaktavyāḥ rājāmātyagṛhopasthānādayaḥ 
ye 'py anayā lokayātrayā saktasya kṛṣikusīdādyadhikalābho bhavati tena ca poṣayiṣyate tadā kuṭumbavibhavavataś ca dāsīdāsaṃ bahu bhaviṣyatīti 
sā hy asya snātakasya kṛtakṛtyatā kṛtārthatā yaṃ nityasvādhyāyī yathākathaṃcit kuṭumbakaṃ jīvayatīti 
vayasaḥ karmaṇo 'rthasya śrutasyābhijanasya ca 
veṣavāgbuddhisārūpyam ācaran vicared iha 
vayasa iti sārūpyāpekṣā ṣaṣṭhī 
veṣavākbuddhīti samāhāre dvandvaḥ 
sārūpyam iti svārthe ṣyañ 
tenāyam artho bhavati vayādyucitā veṣādayaḥ kartavyāḥ 
sārūpyam aucityam anyasyākṛtyādeḥ sādṛśyāsaṃbhavāt 
veṣaḥ keśābaraṇādivinyāsaḥ 
tatra prathame vayasi śikhaṇḍakaḥ yauvane kauntalādidhāraṇam vārdhake jaṭāmuṇḍanādi 
vayonurūpā vāk 
evaṃ buddhis trivargānuṣṭhānadhāraṇaṃ prathamam jīryataḥ kevalaṃ dharmapradhānam 
karmānurūpo veṣaḥ arthānurūpataś ca 
tena hi bhavitavyaṃ kulānurūpeṇa daśanarāgadhammillādi uddhatam api nauddhatyam āvahati 
tad uktam asya lokavyavahāro viṣayaḥ iti 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
nāyaṃ vidhyarthaḥ aparair niścitārthatvāt 
lokavyavahāramūlas tv ayam anuvādaḥ evaṃ vartamāno lokavṛttānuvartī bhavati na lokadveṣyatām iti 
buddhivṛddhikarāṇy āśu dhanyāni ca hitāni ca 
nityaṃ śāstrāṇy avekṣeta nigamāṃś caiva vaidikāṇ 
buddhivṛddhikarāṇi itihāsapurāṇāni tarkaśāstrāṇi bārhaspatyauśanasādīni 
hitāni upakārakāṇi dṛṣṭārthāni vaidyakajyautiṣādīni arthaśāstrasya pṛthagupadeśāt 
vaidikā nigamā vedārthajñānahetavo nigamaniruktavyākaraṇamīmāṃsāḥ 
ṛco ruḍhigrahaṇe tv adṛṣṭārthatā syāt 
yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ śāstraṃ samadhigacchati 
tathā tathā vijānāti vijñānaṃ cāsya rocate 
samadhigamo 'bhiniveśaḥ abhyāsa iti yāvat 
vijānāti viśeṣeṇa jānāti 
pratyakṣaṃ caitad abhyasyamāne granthe 'pi yad vidyata iti 
tadā vijñānaṃ cāsya rocate 
ujjvalaṃ bhavatity arthaḥ 
pūrvasyāḥ smṛter mūlakathanam etat 
rucer anabhilāṣārthatvād rucyarthānām iti saṃpradānatvābhāvaḥ 
ṛṣiyajñaṃ devayajñaṃ bhūtayajñaṃ ca sarvadā 
nṛyajñaṃ pitṛyajñaṃ ca yathāśakti na hāpayet 
tṛtīyādhyāye vihitānāṃ mahāyajñānām anuvādo viśeṣābhidhānārthaḥ 
sa ca viśeṣa uttaratra vakṣyate anīhamāhaḥ iti 
anye tu manyante 
vratādhikāre punarvacanaṃ niyamasiddhyartham 
tenedṛśaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kartavyaḥ yāvad gārhasthyaṃ mayā mahāyajñā na hāpayitavyāḥ 
na tv iyam āśaṅkā kartavyā dvirvacanaṃ dvirvidhānārtham 
na hy atra vidhiḥ śrūyate 
kevalaṃ na hāpayed ity ucyate 
nityatvāc ca hāniḥ prāptaiva 
na vihitapratyabhijñānataḥ kaścit karmabhede hetur asti 
yathāśakti pakvānnena āmena vā mūlaphalair vā 
etān eke mahāyajñān yajñaśāstravido janāḥ 
anīhamānāḥ satatam indriyeṣv eva juhvati 
etān mahāyajñān eke yajñaśāstrāvido gṛhasthā indriyeṣv eva juhvati saṃpādayanti 
katame punas te 
anīhamānā 
ye necchanti dhanaṃ tyaktagṛhavyāpārā dehasāṃnyāsikādayaḥ 
śiloñchavṛtter apy evaṃ vidhim icchanti paṅgvādīnāṃ ca 
teṣāṃ hi dārakaraṇaṃ vakṣyati yady arthitā tu dāraiḥ syāt iti 
na caiteṣām pañcayajñādhikāraḥ 
adravyatvād bharaṇamātraṃ te labhante nādhikaṃ karmānuṣṭhānārtham api 
juhotiḥ karotyarthanirvartyatāṃ lakṣyati 
na hi kriyāviśeṣo yāgaḥ kriyāviśeṣasya homasya karmatāṃ pratipadyeta 
na hi bhavati pacati pākam iti 
bhavati tu pākaṃ karoti yāgaṃ karoti iti 
sāmānyaviṣayākāṃkṣās tu kriyā dravyakarmāṇi sādhanīkurvanti 
icchati bhoktum śaknoti bhoktum jānāti bhoktum 
dṛṣṭaś ca viśeṣaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇārthaḥ ayaṃ gauḥ padā draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
evaṃ ca homaṃ kecid indriyeṣu tatsaṃyamam eva vyācakṣate 
apareṣāṃ prāṇasaṃvādopaniṣadi yad yad bhaktaṃ prathamam āgacchet tad dhomīyaṃ sa yāṃ prathamāhutiṃ juhuyāt prāṇāya svāhā ityādinā 
anye tu ya evottaraśloke upāsanāvidhir uktaḥ sa evāyaṃ homaḥ 
tathā ca tayor ekavākyatā pratīyate 
nanu cottaratra vāci prāṇaṃ nendriyam 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
ādhyātmikatvopalakṣaṇārtham indriyagrahaṇam 
bāhyasādhanasādhyatā nāstīty etad atra vivakṣitam 
vācy eke juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe vācaṃ ca sarvadā 
vāci prāṇe ca paśyanto yajñanirvṛttim akṣayām 
yadāyaṃ puruṣa ucchvasiti tadaivam anena dhyātavyam vācaṃ prāṇe juhomi iti 
bhāṣamāṇena ca vāci prāṇaṃ juhomi iti 
etāvataiva pañcayajñā nirvṛttā bhavanti 
yadi nityāḥ phalāya na vaktavyāḥ 
ātmajñayāś cātrādhikriyante 
vihito hy ayam arthaḥ pañcāgnyupāsanāyām upaniṣatsu kauṣītakī brāhmaṇe vistareṇa 
akṣayaṃ phalataḥ apunarāvṛttiphalatvāt 
jñānenaivāpare viprā yajante tair makhaiḥ sadā 
jñānamūlāṃ kriyām eṣāṃ paśyanto jñānacakṣuṣā 
tair makhaiḥ prakṛtair mahāyajñair yajante tadviṣayam adhikāraṃ niṣpādayanti 
ato 'rthabhedād yajante yajñair iti sādhyasādhakabhāvopapattiḥ 
yathāgniṣṭomayājīti 
kathaṃ punar jñānena yāganirvṛttiḥ 
devatoddeśena dravyatyāgātmako yāgaḥ 
na ca jñānam evaṃrūpam 
ucyate 
yajanta iti yāgakāryanirvṛttir atrābhipretā 
yadi jñānāt kāryanirvṛttiḥ kimarthaṃ tarhi karmaṇām anuṣṭhānam 
na hy aviṣayaḥ karmānuṣṭhānasaṃbhavaḥ 
atheyaṃ buddhiḥ ya u cainam evaṃ veda iti jñānasyāpi phalasādhanatvena śravaṇāt kṛtaṃ karmānuṣṭhāneneti 
tad asat anyaśeṣatayā tasyārthavādatvāt 
atrocyate 
uktam asmābhir anīhamānā ātmajñā adhikriyante 
ta eva jñānino 'bhipretāḥ na karmānuṣṭhānavedinaḥ 
teṣāṃ vedasaṃnyāsikatayā gṛhe avatiṣṭhamānānāṃ mahāyajñānāṃ bhāvaneyam ucyate 
dravyasādhyānāṃ ca mahāyajñānām ātmajñānasaṃpādanam evam ucyate 
svādhyāyodakatarpaṇayos tu karmasādhyatām eva ṣaṣṭhe vakṣyati 
atra kāraṇarūpam arthavādam āha jñānamūlām 
jñānaṃ mūlam asyāḥ kriyāyāḥ 
sarvasya karmānuṣṭhānasya jñānaṃ mūlam 
na hy avidvān kiṃcid anuṣṭhātuṃ śaknoti 
tad uktam vidvān yajeta iti 
paśyanto jñānacakṣuṣā 
jñānaṃ cakṣur iva 
yathā cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ gṛhyate evaṃ jñānāt jñāyate 
na tat jñānaṃ veda evābhipretaḥ 
agnihotraṃ ca juhuyād adyante dyuniśoḥ sadā 
darśena cārdhamāsānte paurṇamāsena caiva hi 
agnihotrādayaḥ śabdāḥ śrutau gṛhyasmṛtiṣu ca karmaviśeṣavacanatayā prasiddhāḥ 
setikartavyatākāḥ tatra vihitāḥ 
teṣām ayam anuvādo na tv atrāpūrvavidhiḥ rūpavacanāt 
kevalaṃ homaviṣayā kartavyatā śrutā na dravyaṃ na devatā 
agnihotrādi nāmadheyaṃ ca viśeṣākāṅkṣyam 
ataḥ śāstrāntarāvagataviśeṣavacanataiva pratīyate 
yady evaṃ tata eva kartavyatāvagamād anarthakam idam 
vedasaṃnyāsikāyāṃ prakṛtopāsanāsaṃvādanārtham 
yathaiva vācy eke juhvati prāṇam jñānenaiveti ca pañcamahāyajñāḥ saṃpādyante 
tadvad etad apīti 
kaś cāyam upālambhaḥ kim arthaṃ punarvacanam iti sarvaśrutīnāṃ smṛtīnām ca yad ekadeśe 'bhihitaṃ tasyaivānyatra punarvacanasya codyāpatteḥ 
uktaś ca sāmānyataḥ parihāraḥ pratipattṛbhedān na paunaruktyam iti 
yathā pratipattṛbhedād indriyabhedo naikena cakṣuṣā sarve draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti bahūnīndriyāṇi prayojanavanti evaṃ śākhābhedaḥ smṛtibhedaś ca 
athocyate kasmād rupāvacanam iti 
eṣo 'pi na doṣaḥ 
pratiśākham itikartavyatāyā bhedaḥ kasyābhidhānaṃ kriyatām 
sarvābhidhāne gauravam 
ekatarābhidhāne anyataraparityāgaḥ 
tad api codyam eva 
uktaṃ cānuvādo 'yaṃ na vidhiḥ 
vidhau hi codyam etat syāt 
anyatra vihitaṃ kim arthaṃ punar vidhānam iti 
ādyante dyuniśoḥ 
nātra yathāsaṃkhyam kiṃ tarhi diva ādau niśāyāś cādau evaṃ divo 'nte niśāyāś cānta iti 
sāyaṃprātaḥ kālāv etena parigṛhyete 
tatroditahominām aharādau anuditahomināṃ niśānte 
dyuśabdo divasaparyāyaḥ 
sadā 
yāvajjīvaṃ sāyaṃprātar homaḥ kartavyaḥ 
darśena yajetety atrādhyāhartavyam 
na hi tatrotpattau juhuyād ity asti kiṃ tarhi darśena yajeteti 
tadanuvādaś cāyam 
ata evādhyāhāraḥ kriyate 
ata eva aviśeṣaśravaṇe 'pi ardhamāsānta iti kṛṣṇapakṣānte darśaḥ śuklānte paurṇamāsaḥ 
tathā ca srutiḥ darśe ca darśena yajeta pūrṇamāsyāṃ pūrṇamāsena yajeta iti 
sasyānte navasasyeṣṭyā tathartvante dvijo 'dhvaraiḥ 
paśunā tv ayanānte tu samānte saumikair makhaiḥ 
sasyaśabdo vrīhyādidhānyavacanaḥ 
tasyāntaḥ kṣayaḥ 
pūrvasasyeṣu kṣīṇeṣu navasasyeṣṭyā yajeta āgrayaṇenety arthaḥ 
na cātra pūrvasasyakṣaya āgrayaṇanimittam nāpi navasasyāgamaḥ kiṃ tarhi akṛtāgrayaṇasya navānnāśanaṃ pratiṣiddham 
yenāha nāniṣṭvā navānnam adyāt iti 
ato navasasyabhakṣaṇam āgrayaṇenety arthaḥ 
tena yajeteti vyācakṣate 
asmiṃs tu pakṣe pūrvasasyābhāvāt navasasyasya bhāvād anyato vā asatyāṃ cāśiśikṣāyāṃ na niyamatayā āgrayaṇaṃ prāpnoti 
athedaṃ sasyānta iti navotpattyupalakṣaṇam tadāniṣṭvā bhakaṣaṃ prāpnoti 
tasmād dve ete vākye 
nāniṣṭvāśnīyāt ity ekam sasyānte iti dvitīyam 
sasyāntagrahaṇena ca sasyotpattir evābhipretā niyatatvāt tasyā nimittasyopapattiḥ 
kṣayas tv aniyataḥ dhanināṃ hi traivārṣikāny api dhānyāny atra pravartante 
ata eva sūtrakāraḥ sasyaṃ nāśnīyād agnihotram ahutvā iti tathā yadā varṣasya tṛptaḥ syād athāgrayaṇena yajeta iti 
tathedam aparam śaradi navānnam iti kālaviśeṣavidhāyakam 
tatra yasya pūrvasasyakṣayo nāsti sa śaradam ādriyate itaras tu na 
evam ubhayor arthavattā ca bhavati 
itarathā evam evāvakṣyata navasasyotpattau navasasyeṣṭyā yajeta iti 
yas tv āha nāniṣṭvā navasasyeṣṭyā na cānnam aśnīyāt iti tena utpanneṣv api navasasyeṣu vidyamānasya asti śaratpratipālanam 
navasasyotpattinimittatvāc ca asatyām api navānnāśanecchāyāṃ niyamataḥ āgrayaṇam 
ṛtvante 
ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaraḥ itidarśanena cāturmāsyānām etat karaṇam ucyate 
adhvaraśabdena tāny evābhipretāni 
ayanayor ādī ayanānte 
te ca dve ayane dakṣiṇam uttaraṃ ca 
tatra paśuyāgaḥ kartavyo dviḥ saṃvatsarasya 
sūtrakāras tv āha ṣāṇmāsyaḥ sāṃvatsaro vā iti 
samānte 
samāśabdaḥ saṃvatsaraparyāyas tasya cāntaḥ samāptiḥ śiśire 
na ca tatredaṃ saumikayāgavidhānam kiṃ tarhi gate tasmin vasanta āgate 
tathā ca śrutiḥ vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta iti 
etāvanti nityāni karmāṇi 
tāni yathā kathaṃcid vedasaṃnyāsikenāpi saṃpādyānīti sarvasya tātparyam 
nāniṣṭvā navasasyeṣṭyā paśunā cāgnimān dvijaḥ 
navānnam adyān māṃsaṃ vā dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ 
agnimān āhitāgnir atrābhipretaḥ vratādhikārāt 
tasya homasya yājurvedikaṃ vratam 
nāniṣṭvā paśunā māṃsaṃ samaśnīyān nāgrayaṇena navānnam iti 
niyamānupālane phalam āha 
dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ 
āyuḥśabdena prabandhavatyaḥ prāṇāpānavṛttaya ucyante 
dvitīyā ca saty api jīvater akarmakatve 'pi iṣikriyāpekṣayā 
sannanto 'pi dhātur icchāyāṃ vartate 
atrāpi darśane iṣeḥ karma prakṛtyartho na bāhyam icchā vekṣyamāṇaṃ prati guṇabhūtā prakṛtipratyayau prayayārthaṃ saha bruvata iti sannantād anyatrāpi 
asminn api darśane āyuḥśabdena kālo lakṣayiṣyate dīrghakālaṃ jīvanam icchan 
tatra kālatā vāvagantavyā karmasaṃjñā hy akarmaṇām iti karmatvam 
eṣa cāhitāgneḥ paśubandhe niyamaḥ āgrayaṇe 'pi 
gṛhyāgnimato 'pi gṛhyasmṛtiṣu niyamatayā āgrayaṇaṃ vihitam 
yac cedaṃ śaradi navannam iti tat vrīhiśyāmākayor na yavānām 
na ca sasyamātreṇa sasyeṣṭiyāgaḥ na ca māṣam udgādinā 
yata idaṃ śāstrāntarasāpekṣam na svato vidhāyakam ity uktam 
śāstrāntareṣu ca vrīhiśyāmākayavair āgrayaṇeṣṭir vihitā 
kiṃ tv anyad api sasyaṃ nāśitavyam akṛtāyām āgrayaṇeṣṭau 
yad uktam aviśeṣeṇa sasyaṃ nāśnīyāt iti 
tanniṣedhe hy abhiprete iyad evāvakṣyat āgrayaṇaṃ vrīhiśyāmākayavānām sasyaṃ nāśnīyād agnihotram ahutvā iti 
evaṃ sūtrakāreṇa paṭhitam āgrayaṇaṃ vrīhisyāmākayavānām sasyaṃ nāśnīyād agnihotram ahutvā iti 
ato 'yaṃ sasyaśabdo na pratiniyataviṣaya eva 
navenānarcitā hy asya paśuhavyena cāgnayaḥ 
prāṇān evāttum icchanti navānnāmiṣagardhinaḥ 
nityatām eva samarthayate akaraṇadoṣadarśanena 
navena sasyena anarcitā akṛtahomā agnayo 'syāhitāgneḥ prāṇān evāttum icchanti bhakṣayitum 
gardhinaḥ gardhaṃ abhilāṣātiśayaḥ tad asyāstīti matvarthīya iniḥ 
āsanāśanaśayyābhir adbhir mūlaphalena vā 
nāsya kaścid vased gehe śaktito 'narcito 'tithiḥ 
uktam idam uttarārtham anūdyate 
na kaścid atithir anarcito gṛhe vaset 
sarvo 'tithir arcito gṛhe vasanīyaḥ 
śaktitaḥ 
eko dvau bahavo yāvantaḥ śakyante 'rcayituṃ sarve āsanādibhir arcanīyāḥ 
arcāpūrvakam etad ebhyo vasatāṃ prakalpayitum na tu sarveṇa sarvam āsanāśanaśayyānāṃ svatvanirvṛttir ucyate 
bhaktayūṣamāṃsānnājyāśanāsaṃbhave pṛthag upādānāt mūlaphalaṃ dātavyam 
pāṣaṇḍino vikarmasthān baiḍālavratikāñ chatān 
haitukān bakavṛttīṃś ca vāṅmātreṇāpi nārcayet 
atra vaset iti liṅgāt sāyam ātithyapratiṣedho 'yaṃ pāṣaṇḍyādīnām ity āhuḥ 
tad ayuktam 
arcanīyatātra nivāryate 
na tu sarveṇa sarvabhaktādyadānam evocyate 
divāpi bhuñjānānāṃ katicit kṣaṇāvāsa upapadyate eva 
ato na liṅgaṃ sāyaṃkālasya vaset iti 
tatra pāṣaṇḍino bāhyaliṅgino raktapaṭanagnacarakādayaḥ 
vikarmasthā atrānāpadi ye varṇāntaravṛttyā jīvanti 
yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatravṛttyā kṣatriyo vaiśyavṛttyā ityādi 
baiḍālavratikā dāmbhikāḥ 
ye ca lokāvarjanārtham agnihotrādy anutiṣṭhanti iti gṛhādi lipsāmaha iti na śāstracoditatvena svadharmatayā 
śaṭhā yeṣām anyat hṛdaye 'nyad vāci 
upakāraṃ kasyacit pratijñāya kartavyatayā avadhīrayanti na kurvanti 
haitukā nāstikāḥ 
nāsti paralokaḥ nāsti dattam nāsti hutam ity evaṃ sthitaprajñāḥ 
bakavṛttayaḥ dāmbhikā eva īṣadbhedabhinnaḥ 
bhedaḥ parasparaṃ darśayiṣyate 
vāṅmātreṇāpi 
tiṣṭhatu tāvad āsanādidānam pūjāpūrvakaṃ svāgatam āsyatām atra ity evamādy api na vaktavyāḥ 
annadānaṃ tu śvapacādivad iṣyate 
tathā ca bhagavān kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'nnadānam evādhikṛtya smarati sma na pṛcchej janma na śrutam iti 
nātra pātragaveṣaṇā kartavyety arthaḥ 
vedavidyāvratasnātāñ chrotriyān gṛhamedhinaḥ 
pūjayed dhavyakavyena viparītāṃś ca varjayet 
vedaś ca vidyā ca vratāni ca taiḥ snātāḥ tatra parisamāptiṃ gatāḥ 
vividhā snātakā gṛhyante 
tatra vedasnātakā adhītavedāḥ 
vidyāsnātakā vidyārthajijñāsānivṛttāḥ 
vidyāsaṃnidhānād vedaviṣayaiva gṛhyate 
tasyā eva vastuto vidyātvam 
vratāni ṣaṭtriṃśadābdikam ityādīni 
satyām api vedatadarthajijñāsāsamāptau na tāvaty eva snānam kiṃ tarhi ṣaṭtriṃśadabdādikālaḥ pūrayitavyaḥ iti pakṣo 'py asti 
anye tu ye 'nadhītyaiva vedaṃ varṣatrayāt snānti te vratasnātakā ity ācakṣyante 
anadhītavedasya kutaḥ snānam ity apakṣo 'yam 
nanu ca śrotriyagrahaṇaṃ kim arthaṃ snātakatvenaiva siddhatvāt 
atiśayārtham 
tena vedābhyāsaratā gṛhyante śrotriyāḥ 
gṛhamedhino gṛhasthāḥ 
nānena bhikṣutāpasabrahmacāriṇām apūjanīyatvam ucyate kiṃ tarhi bhaikṣyabhojitvāt teṣāṃ nātithitvasaṃbhavaḥ 
brahmacāriṇo gurugṛhāt tāpasasya ca vanān nānyatra vāsaḥ 
pravrajitasyāpi bhaikṣārthī grāmam iyāt iti na grāme vāsaḥ 
ato 'nyeṣām āśramiṇāṃ gṛhād anyatra vāsāt kathamcit saṃbhave 'pi prāyikam etad gṛhamedhina iti 
havyena kavyena 
daivakarmaṇi śāntyādau pitrye vā śrāddhe ta eva pūjyāḥ 
viparītāḥ asnātakāḥ varjyāḥ pūrvoktadoṣābhāve 'pi 
śaktito 'pacamānebhyo dātavyaṃ gṛhamedhinā 
saṃvibhāgaś ca bhūtebhyaḥ kartavyo 'nuparodhataḥ 
apacamānā brahmacāriparivrājakā ity āhuḥ 
tad ayuktam tebhyo nityavad dānaṃ vihitam eva bhikṣāṃ ca bhikṣave dadyāt iti 
tasmād ye daridrā bhaikṣajīvanāś ca pākhaṇḍyādayaḥ tebhyaḥ śaktito dātavyam 
yāvadbhyaḥ śakyate yāvac ca pacyate 
pacikriyāvirahanimittatvāc ca siddhānnadānam evedam 
saṃvibhāgaś ca 
anyenāpi dhanena indhanaparidhānauṣadhādyupayoginā saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ kaścid aṃśo dātavyaḥ 
sarvabhūtebhyaḥ 
bhūtaśabdo 'yaṃ cetanātmakaṃ jagad ācaṣṭe 
yathā gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam iti 
acetanānāṃ cetanavad upakārārthatayā saṃvibhāgānupapatteḥ cetanāvatsv evāvatiṣṭhate 
ataś ca prarohadharmakāś cetanāvantaḥ iti darśane vṛkṣādīnām api jalasekādyartho dhanasaṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ 
bahvartho 'yaṃ bhūtaśabdaḥ 
kaścit prādhānye vartate bhūtam iyaṃ brāhmaṇy asmin gṛhe 
kvacit paiśācavacano bhūtopasṛṣṭaḥ iti 
kvacid viparīte 'rthe vartate bhūtam āha iti 
kvacid atikrāntakālavacano bhūto dhātvarthaḥ iti 
kvacid devatāviśeṣe bhūtebhyo baliḥ iti 
kvacic cetanāvanmātravacano na hiṃsyād bhūtāni iti 
kvacit prāptivacano mahad bhūtaś candramā iti 
kvacid upamāyāṃ vartate yathā kāvyabhūtaḥ iti 
kvacid utpattivacano yathā devadattasya putro bhūtaḥ iti 
iha tu yaḥ padārthas tad vyākhyātam 
bhūtebhya iti tādarthye caturthī 
anuparodhataḥ 
ātmakuṭumbapīḍā yathā na bhavati tatpartyāptaṃ sthāpayitvā adhikena saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tad uktam bhṛtyānām uparodhena iti 
rājato dhanam anvicchet saṃsīdan snātakaḥ kṣudhā 
yājyāntevasinor vāpi na tv anyata iti sthitiḥ 
rājagrahaṇam āḍhyavarṇopalakṣaṇārtham 
tathā ca vakṣyati sīdadbhiḥ kupyam icchadbhir dhanaṃ vā pṛthivīpatiḥ 
yācyaḥ syāt iti 
tena rājaśabdaḥ kṣatriyajātau mukhyaḥ tathāpi śāstrāntaraparyālocanayā janapadeśvaravacana iti gamyate 
janapadeśvarā hi bahudhanā bhavanti 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati ye 'tyantasaṃpannā go'jāvidhanadānyais tebhyaḥ pratigrahītavyam 
tathā sati adroheṇa ity etad ādṛtaṃ bhavati 
āḍhyā hi dadato nātīva pīḍyante 
svapadhanebhyas tu parigṛhṇato doṣaḥ syāt 
mukhyārthavṛttau ca rājaśabde brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ pratiṣidhyate 
tatra sarvasmṛtivirodhaḥ syāt 
smṛtyantare hi paṭhyate ādadīta praśastadvijātibhyaḥ śuśrūṣoś ca śūdrād apakvānnam iti 
pratiṣedhe 'pi na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt iti rājaśabdo janapadeśvaravacana eva 
kiṃ ca na kṣatriyasya tatra pratiṣedhaḥ arājanyaprasūtitaḥ iti vacanāt 
ata eva na kṣatriyajātīyāt tatra tanniṣedhaḥ tathā sati arājanyaprasūtitaḥ iti na vaktavyaṃ syāt 
na hy arājanyaprasūtitaḥ kṣatriyā bhavanti 
teneyam atra vyavasthā kṣatriyād rājño yathāśāstravartinaḥ pratigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ anyasmāt punar na 
yājyāntevāsinoḥ 
dhanāpekṣā ṣaṣṭhī 
tasanto vā paṭhitavyaḥ 
kriyānimittatvād etayoḥ śabdayor yājanādhyāpanābhyāṃ jīved ity uktaṃ bhavati 
anye tv āhuḥ anyeṣām upapātakaprāptiś cauryādīnāṃ copāyānāṃ niṣiddhatvāt īśvaram ārādhya jīvet prītidāyena svastivācanakena vā 
na cāyaṃ sevakaḥ 
sā vṛttir niṣiddhā 
evaṃ kṛtopakārād ayājayann api yājyād ādadīta 
nivṛtte 'pi saṃbandhe kṛtyo vartata iti 
saṃsīdann iti 
pitrādidhane sati na kartavyam 
tad uktam na kalpamāneṣv artheṣu 
tasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ 
na cāyam āpaddharmaḥ 
na hy avasāda āpat kiṃ tarhi arjitadhanābhāvaḥ 
āpat tu vihitopāyābhāvo dhanakṣayaś ca 
saty api dhānyadhanabahutve annaparikṣaye durbhikṣādāv ātithyasaṃnihitānnatā kṣutpīḍitasya āpat akṣudhitasyāpi dhanābhāvād avasāda ity eṣa etayor viśeṣaḥ 
na tv anyataḥ svalpadhanānnānupakāryāt gṛhṇīyāt 
na sīdet snātako vipraḥ kṣudhā śaktaḥ kathaṃcana 
na jīrṇamalavadvāsā bhavec ca vibhave sati 
yadi ca kutaścid dhanārthād vyāpārād vyāhanyeta na tadaivāpaddharmān āśrayet 
kiṃ tarhi punar utpadyate 
tad uktam ā mṛtyoḥ śriyam anvicchet iti 
ataś ca yadi kathaṃcit kṛṣato varṣādyabhāvena sasyanāśo bhaven neyatā tyāgena sahasaiva parapiṇḍopajīvanā yācñāpareṇa bhavitavyam 
satyāṃ yuktau jīrṇamaline ca vāsasī dhanavibhave sati neṣyete 
kḷptakeśanakhaśmaśrur dāntaḥ śuklāmbaraḥ śuciḥ 
svādhyāye caiva yuktaḥ syān nityam ātmahiteṣu ca 
kalpanam 
chedanaṃ dantavāsasaḥ ity etadapekṣaṃ caitat kalpanaṃ niyamataḥ 
ata eva śucir ity āha 
dīrghakeśasya hi snānādiṣu kleśasādhyatvād alasaḥ syāt tathāśucitvaprasaṅgaḥ 
yadi tu keśādiprasṛto 'pi snānaparaḥ syān naiva dhāraṇaṃ duṣyet 
dāntaḥ darpavārjitaḥ 
śuciḥ artheṣu śrutinimittair mṛdvāryācamanādibhiś ca 
vedādhyayane ca nityābhiyuktaḥ 
ukto 'py ayam artha ādarārthaḥ punaḥ punar ucyate 
ātmahitāni vyādheḥ pratīkārādinā ajīrṇātivelaguruvidāhibhojanavarjanādīni 
vaiṇavīṃ dhārayed yaṣṭiṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum 
yajñopavītaṃ vedaṃ ca śubhe raukme ca kuṇḍale 
yajñopavītakuṇḍalayor dhāraṇaṃ śarīrasaṃyogaḥ 
yasya ca yasminn aṅge samucitaḥ saṃniveśaḥ sa tatraiva viniyojanīyaḥ 
yathā kuṇḍalaṃ karṇayor upavītaṃ kāya iti karṇābharaṇasya kuṇḍālākhyatvāt 
kaṇṭhasaktasya ca sūtrasya dakṣiṇabāhūddhāraṇenopavītatvāt 
dṛṣṭaprayojanatvāc ca yaṣṭyādinā sarvadāṅgasaṅgaḥ 
tathā hi yaṣṭidhāraṇaṃ śrāntasyāvalambanārthaṃ saṃmukhāgataghātakagavādinivāraṇārthaṃ ca 
uddhṛtodakena śaucasya vihitatvāt ādhārāpekṣayā kamaṇḍalur niyamyate 
sa ca tulyakāryatvāt kalaśādīn nivartayati na kuṇḍalakaṭakādīn 
ataś ca purīṣanimittasyodakaśodhyāśucitvāpanodārthaṃ sodakatvaṃ kamaṇḍaloḥ 
uktaṃ ca muhūrtam api śaktiviṣaye nāśuci tiṣṭhet iti 
śaktiviṣaye iti yadi pūrvagṛhītam udakam upayuktam anyathāprāptam aśucitvanimittaṃ ca śleṣmaniṣṭhīvanādyutpannaṃ tatrodakālābhād aśucitvaṃ na doṣaḥ 
tathāpi mūtrapurīṣavisraṃsane snānaṃ vakṣyati vinādbhir apsu vāpyārtaḥ śārīraṃ saṃniveśya tu 
sacailo bahir āplutya iti 
śuciś ca smṛtyantare pratipadam āmnātaḥ 
evaṃ ha smāha bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ
apsu pāṇau ca kāṣṭhe ca kathitaḥ pāvakaḥ śuciḥ 
tasmād udakapāṇibhyāṃ parimṛjya kamaṇḍalum 
paryagnikaraṇaṃ homaṃ manur āha prajāpatiḥ 
kṛtvā cāvaśyakāryāṇi ācāmec chaucavittamaḥ 
baudhāyanenāpy uktam atha kamaṇḍaluṃ dhāryam ity upakramya
tasmāc chaucaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā parimṛjya kamaṇḍalum 
paryagnikaraṇaṃ hy etad yad vastuparimārjanam 
tathā 
kamaṇḍaluṃ pariharet pūrvāvastho 'py aśaucataḥ 
na cainaṃ kutsayed vidvān na śaṅken na ca dūṣayet 
ākāraviśeṣanimittaś cāyaṃ śabdo na jātim ādriyate 
ato mṛnmayasya sauvarṇasya rājatasya vā eṣaiva śuddhir na prakṛtijātisaṃbandhinī 
mūtrādisparśe tu prakṛtijātiśuddhir avadheyā 
hastamārjanaṃ tūcchiṣṭapuruṣasaṃsparśādyaśucitvāt 
tathā ca gautamaḥ kvacic chaucarthaṃ saṃnidhāya ity āha 
ata ihāpi saṃnidhānam evābhipretam na svātmanā grahaṇam 
vedo darbhamuṣṭis tasya ca prāṇopasparśanaṃ darbhaiḥ ityādi prayojanam 
ataś cādṛṣṭārthānāṃ sārvakālikaśarīrasaṃbandhaḥ dṛṣṭārthānāṃ tu saṃnidhir nityam prayojanatas tu grahaṇam iti 
śubhe darśanīye ākārataḥ tāpachedakaṣaiś ca suvarṇaśuddhyā 
nekṣetodyantam ādityaṃ nāstaṃ yāntaṃ kadācana 
nopasṛṣṭaṃ na vāristhaṃ na madhyaṃ nabhaso gatam 
upasṛṣṭo grahoparaktaḥ 
udake pratibimbito vāristhaḥ 
nabhaḥ antarikṣaṃ tasya madhyagataṃ paśyen na madhyāhnakāle 
na laṅghayed vatsatantrīṃ na pradhāvec ca varṣati 
na codake nirīkṣeta svarūpam iti dhāraṇā 
vatsabandhanārthā rajjur vatsatantrī vatsapaṅktir vā tāṃ na laṅghayen nāpakrāmet 
tathā ca gautamaḥ nopari vatsatantrīṃ gacchet 
svarūpaṃ śarīrasaṃsthānam 
svagrahaṇāt parasya rūpaprekṣaṇaṃ na paryudasyate 
iti dhāraṇā eṣa niścayaḥ śāstreṣu 
mṛdaṃ gāṃ daivataṃ vipraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu catuṣpatham 
pradakṣiṇāni kurvīta prajñātāṃś ca vanaspatīn 
prasthitasyābhimukhāgatān mṛdādīn pratyayaṃ vidhiḥ 
mṛdādayo yena dakṣiṇo hastaḥ tena kartavyāḥ 
uddhṛtā ca mṛdevaṃ kartavyā 
evaṃ hi śāstrāntaraṃ prasthānādhikāre paṭhati pradakṣiṇam āvartya iti 
daivataṃ paṭādilikhitam arcārtham 
gautamas tu devatāyatanāni sapradakṣiṇam anuvarteta iti paṭhati 
lokaprasiddhyā caturbhujamārtaṇḍāgārādi devatāyatanaṃ vijñeyam 
yajñagṛhāṇi ca it vakṣyati 
madhu ghṛtamahācaryāt sāragham maṅgalyamadhyapāṭhāc ca 
prajātā vanaspatayo mahāpramāṇāḥ prasiddhā vanaspatayo mahāvṛkṣāh pramāṇataḥ puṣpaphalātiśayato vā prasiddhā udumbarādayaḥ 
ūrg vā udumbaraḥ ity arthavādaḥ 
ye tu guṇādhikān prajñātān ācakṣate te nirmūlaprasiddhimātrapramāṇakā upekṣaṇīyāḥ 
nopagacchet pramatto 'pi striyam ārtavadarśane 
samānaśayane caiva na śayīta tayā saha 
pramattaḥ kāmaśaraiḥ pīḍito 'pi 
ārtavaṃ strīliṅgaśoṇitaṃ māsi māsi prasiddham 
taddarśane na gacchet 
ekasyāṃ ca śayyāyāṃ tayā saha na śayīta 
sparśapratiṣedhād eva tat siddham iti cen nāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
vratam idam prāyaścittabhedaś ca 
rajasābhiplutāṃ nārīṃ narasya hy upagacchataḥ 
prajñā tejo balaṃ cakṣur āyuś caiva prahīyate 
rajaḥ pūrvokam ārtavam 
abhiplutāṃ tena saṃbaddhām 
pūrvasyārthavādaḥ 
tāṃ vivarjayatas tasya rajasā samabhiplutām 
prajñā tejo balaṃ cakṣur āyuś caiva pravardhate 
vṛddhivacanaṃ stutir eva 
nāśnīyād bhāryayā sārdhaṃ nainām īkṣeta cāśnatīm 
kṣuvatīṃ jṛmbhamāṇāṃ vā na cāsīnāṃ yathāsukham 
nityam āsyaṃ śuci strīṇām iti śucitvavacanam strīśūdrocchiṣṭam iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ 
dvayam api viṣayavibhāgena vyavasthitam 
tatra śucitvavacanaṃ striyaś ca ratisaṃsarge iti smṛtyantradarsanena ratistrīviṣayaṃ vijñāyate 
ataḥ pratiṣedho 'pi pāriśeṣyād aratistrīṣu mātṛbhaginyādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ 
yato ratir neha prītimātram kiṃ tarhi manmathanimitto bhāvaviśeṣa iti śṛṅgārapūrvako 'bhilāṣādirūpaḥ 
atas tadyuktāsu śucitvam viparītāsu pratiṣedhaḥ 
ratinimittārthatayā bhāryayā saha bhojane prāpte vacanam idam ārabhyate nāśnīyād bhāryayā sārdham iti 
atha saṃsargagrahaṇena vṛṣasyato saṃprayogaviśeṣaḥ kathyate 
tadānīṃ paricumbanād eva śucitvam iti nāsti bhāryayā saha bhojanaprāptiḥ 
tatredaṃ punarvacanaṃ vratajñāpanārtham 
tataś ca yāvajjīvikaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kartavyo yathā bhāryayā saha bhojanaṃ na bhavati 
etac ca sahabhojanam ekādhikaraṇam ekakāladeśaṃ nañarthaviṣayatayā codyata iti gatocchiṣṭapratiṣedhagatārthaśaṅketi 
sa punar ayam īdṛśaḥ sahārthaviśeṣaḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ smṛtyantarasamācārādeḥ 
śeṣaśabdārtho hy anyāpekṣitamātram 
tathā itarān api sakhyādīn bhojayet saha bhāryayā iti 
nātraikādhikaraṇatā bhujer avagamyate kiṃ tarhi bhāryayā samānadeśatā bhoktuḥ samānakālatā vā 
anye tv anyad ucchiṣṭam iti vyācakṣate bhuktojjhitam ucchiṣṭam 
ekasyāṃ tu patnyāṃ ekasmin kārye saha bhojanam 
evaṃ tu vyākhyāyamāne śūdreṇa saha bhojanaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ syāt prasiddhiś ca tyaktā bhavet 
asya saṃsparśād ucchiṣṭavyavahāraḥ sahabhojanenāpi tad asti 
kecit tu samānadeśakālam eva bhojanaṃ pratiṣiddham dṛṣṭārthatvād upadeśasyeti 
puṃsā svabhāvabhedāt kaścid bahubhojinyā na tuṣyet anyaḥ svalpabhojinyām api viśrambhayatīti chadmanā vartate mama purataḥ svalpam aśnāti iti 
tathāsadṛśā evam anye 'pi niyamāḥ 
nainām īkṣeta cāśnatīm 
paśyato hi bhuñjānā vivṛtāsyatayā rūpavikāreṇa bhartre na roceta 
kṣavathuḥ śirasthena vāyunā pūryamāṇāyā nāsikāyāḥ śabdas tatrāpi vaktravaikṛtyāt prītir na syāt 
jṛmbhamāṇāsyena vilambitaṃ vāyor ucchvasanam aṅgapratyaṅgaprasāraṇaṃ vā 
tad apy evam eva 
yathāsukhaṃ cāsīnā anavagrathitakeśī bhūmau nipatitagātrī vā 
nāñjayantīṃ svake netre na cābhyaktām anāvṛtām 
na paśyet prasavantīṃ ca tejaḥkāmo dvijottamaḥ 
parasyāñjayantī śobhata eva 
anāvṛtāṃ apāvṛtavasanām 
avaguṇṭhitām eva hi veśeṣeṇa spṛhayanti 
nirvasanāṅgīṃ nipuṇataraṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ na sarvataḥ sarvā susaṃsthānā bhavatīti nirambarā nekṣaṇīyā 
tejaḥkāmaḥ 
tejaḥ varṇojjvalatā utsāhaprayogaś ca 
nānnam adyād ekavāsā na nagnaḥ snānam ācaret 
na mūtraṃ pathi kurvīta na bhasmani na govraje 
saty api yajñopavīte nityānugatatvāt tasya anācchādakatvād upanayanavibhedenopadeśāt ekavāsāḥ 
aṅgacchādakādi dvitīyaṃ vāso bhojanakāle syāt 
na mūtram 
mūtragrahaṇam atrotsargasyopalakṣaṇārtham 
pathi rathyāyām 
govraje 
yena yatra vā gāvaś carituṃ vrajanti 
na pālakṛṣṭe na jale na cityāṃ na ca parvate 
na jīrṇadevāyatane na valmīke kadācana 
cityām agnyartha iṣṭakākūṭe 
parvatagrahaṇam araṇyodyānopalakṣaṇārtham 
tathā hi viśeṣapratiṣedho bhaviṣyati parvatamastake iti 
sāmānyena ca pratiṣedhe parvatavāsinām amehaṇaprasaṅgaḥ 
valmīkaḥ kṛmikṛto mṛttikāsaṃcayaḥ 
na sasatveṣu garteṣu na gacchan nāpi ca sthitaḥ 
na nadītīram āsādya na ca parvatamastake 
na gacchan nāpi ca sthitaḥ 
gacchatas tiṣṭhataś ca pratiṣedhād āsīnasyābhyanujñānam 
na cāsanne nadyās tīre nadījale na 
saṃsargaśaṅkā yatra bhavati tadāsannam 
parvatasya mastakaṃ śṛṅgam 
vāyvagnivipram ādityam apaḥ paśyaṃs tathaiva gāḥ 
na kadācana kurvīta viṇmūtrasya visarjanam 
saṃmukhīnatvād vāyvādīnām aṅgaviprekṣitenāpi na mūtrayan paśyet 
vāyoś cārūpatvād darśanaṃ tatpreritavarṇaloṣṭhādibhramaṇād avaseyam 
vāyucakre tv ayaṃ pratiṣedho viprayuktaḥ 
sarvato hi vāyur vāti 
asyārthavādaḥ 
pratyagniṃ pratisūryaṃ ca pratisomodakadvijam 
pratigu prativātaṃ ca prajñā naśyati mehataḥ 
kecid imaṃ ślokam asminn adhyāye nādhīyate 
nanu codaṅmukhasya mehanavidhānāt pūrvasyām udayāc ca sūryasya kutas tadābhimukhyaṃ bhaved yena pratisūryaṃ niṣidhyate 
arthavādo 'yam nātarikṣe na divi itivat 
atha vodagayane udīcīṃ diśam ākramet syāt saṃbhavaḥ 
prakṛtaviṣayo vā pratiṣedhaḥ 
pratisaṃdhyam iti paṭhanti 
tad ayuktam 
saṃdhyayoṣ ca yathā divā ity anujñānāt vegadhāraṇasya ca niṣiddhatvāt 
tasmāt prativātam iti paṭhitavyam 
pūrvaśeṣo 'yam 
mehataḥ 
śatraṃtas tasanto vā 
mehataḥ puruṣasya mehanād vā 
tiraskṛtyoccaret kāṣṭhaloṣṭhapatratṛṇādi ca 
niyamya prayato vācaṃ saṃvītāṅgo 'vaguṇṭhitaḥ 
tiraskṛtya antardhāya kāṣṭhādi tadupari mūtrayet 
āvaraṇaṃ vā tiraskāraḥ kāṣṭhādibhir bhūmiṃ chādayitvoccaret 
tṛtīyāntapāṭhas tadā spaṣṭataraḥ 
kāṣṭhe patreṇa tṛṇena vābhyuccaret mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cotsṛjet 
niyamya vācaṃ prayataḥ loṣṭhaiḥ anucchiṣṭaḥ 
saṃvītāṅga ācchāditaśrīraḥ 
avaguṇṭhitaḥ śiraḥ prāvṛtya anyatroktam karṇasthabrahmasūtraḥ iti 
mūtroccārasamutsargaṃ divā kuryād udaṅmukhaḥ 
dakṣiṇābhumukho rātrau saṃdhyayoś ca yathā divā 
mūtroccārasamutsargaṃ tyāgam 
chāyāyām andhakāre vā rātrāv ahani vā dvijaḥ 
yathāsukhamukhaḥ kuryāt prāṇabādhabhayeṣu ca 
chāyā kuḍyakapāṭādibhiḥ sūryaraśmīnām āvaraṇam 
andhakāraḥ meghadhūmikāsvarbhānurātrikṛto jyotirantarāyaḥ 
yathāsukhaṃ mukham asyeti 
yayā diśā sukhaṃ bhavati tasyām evoccaret 
yatra digbhāgo na jñāyate andhakāre tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
prāṇabādhaḥ prāṇapīḍā 
bhayaṃ caurādikṛtam 
nāgniṃ mukhenopadhamen nagnāṃ nekṣeta ca striyam 
nāmedhyaṃ prakṣiped agnau na ca pādau pratāpayet 
dhavitrādināgnir dhmātavyaḥ 
nagnāṃ nekṣeta striyam 
anyatra maithunāt iti smṛtyantaram 
nāmedhyam 
medhyo yajñas tadarthaṃ medhyam 
amedhyaṃ yad ayajñiyaṃ palāṇḍumūtrapurīṣādi 
tan nāgnau kṣipet 
utkṣipya pādau sākṣād agnau na tāpayet 
avacchādya tāpayitvā svedādyartham agnitāpanam adoṣaḥ 
adhastān nopadadhyāc ca na cainam abhilaṅghayet 
na cainaṃ pādataḥ kuryān na prāṇābādham ācaret 
khaṭvāsthaḥ adhastād vahnidhānīṃ na kuryāt 
upadhānaṃ sthānam 
avalaṅghanam utplutya gamanam 
pādataḥ aplutasya pādau yena tadupari syāt tathā na kuryāt 
prāṇābādhaṃ prāṇapīḍākaram atiśramavegāgamanādi nācaret 
nāśnīyāt saṃdhivelāyāṃ na gacchen nāpi saṃviśet 
na caiva pralikhed bhūmiṃ nātmanopaharet srajam 
saṃdhyākālaḥ saṃdhivelā 
saṃveśanaṃ svāpaḥ 
svādhyāyaṃ niṣetsyati 
smṛtyantare
catvāry eva tu karmāṇi saṃdhyākāle tu varjayet 
āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ tathā saṃpāṭham eva ca 
na caiva pralikhet 
prakarṣeṇa lekhanaṃ vidāraṇaṃ bhūmer niṣidhyate 
na tu vartikādinākṣaravinyāsaḥ 
nātmanopaharet srajam 
grathitāni puṣpāṇi srak 
tām svayaṃ kaṇṭhe śirasi vā pradhṛtā mlānatayā gurutvena vātmano na vyapanayet 
arthād anyenāpanayed ity uktaṃ bhavati 
sarva evāyaṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ vidhir iti kecit 
nāpsu mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā ṣṭhīvanaṃ vā samutsṛjet 
amedhyaliptam anyad vā lohitaṃ vā viṣāṇi vā 
lohitaṃ rudhiram 
viṣāṇīti bahuvacanaṃ kṛtrimākṛtrimabhedena sthāvarajaṅgamabhedena garādiprakārabhedena vā 
naikaḥ śūnyagṛhe svapyān na śreyāṃsaṃ prabodhayet 
nodakyayābhibhāṣeta yajñaṃ gacchen na cāvṛtaḥ 
śūnyaṃ gṛhaṃ yatra na kaścit prativasati 
na śreyāṃsam 
kanīyān vṛttādibhir jyeṣṭham idaṃ te yuktam idam ayuktam iti hetūpadeśādinā na prabodhayet 
udakyā rajasvalā 
tayā saha saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ na kuryāt 
yajñaṃ gacchen na cāvṛtaḥ 
yajñabhūmim animantrito na gacchet 
darśanāya tu kāmam iti gautamaḥ 
ato yajñe bhojanādipratiṣedho 'yam avṛtasya 
agnyagāre gavāṃ goṣṭhe brāhmaṇānāṃ ca saṃnidhau 
svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharet 
goṣṭhaśabdo 'yaṃ nivāsavacanaḥ samāsapratirūpakāt śabdāntaram 
brāhmaṇānām iti bahuvacanaṃ vivakṣitam 
pāṇigrahaṇaṃ bāhūpalakṣaṇārtham 
bhojane ātmakartṛke 
na vārayed gāṃ dhayantīṃ na cācakṣīta kasyacit 
na divīndrāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kasyacid darśayed budhaḥ 
gām ātmīyāṃ parakīyāṃ vā pibantīṃ apaḥ payo vā na vārayet 
na cānyasmai kathayet 
prāgdohakālād ayaṃ vidhiḥ 
dohakāle tu prasravaṇaṃ vihitam 
strīliṅganirdeśāt puṃvatsanivāraṇe na niṣedhaḥ 
indrāyudhaṃ śakradhanur vijñānacchāyeti yā kāśmīreṣu kathyate 
divīty anuvādaḥ 
kecit tu parvatādisthasya darśane na doṣa ity āhus tadarthaṃ divīti 
nādhārmike vased grāme na vyādhibahule bhṛśam 
naikaḥ prapadyetādhvānaṃ na ciraṃ parvate vaset 
adhārmikāḥ pātakopapātakino yatra bāhulyena vasanti sa grāmas tatsaṃbandhād adhārmika ity ucyate 
tatra na vaset 
grāmagrahaṇaṃ nivāsadeśopalakṣaṇārtham 
tena nagare 'pi pratiṣedhaḥ 
vyādhibahulo 'nūpo deśaḥ 
vyādhibahule jāṅgaladeśe na vaset 
yatra daivadoṣād vyādhayaḥ pravṛttās taṃ deśaṃ tyajet 
ekaḥ asahāyo nādhvānaṃ prapadyeta 
na śūdrarājye nivasen nādhārmikajanāvṛte 
na pāṣaṇḍigaṇākrānte nopasṛṣṭe 'ntyajair nṛbhiḥ 
janapadaiśvaryaṃ rājyaṃ 
yo janapadaḥ śūdravaśavartī tatra na vaset 
mantrisenāpatidaṇḍakārikādyāḥ sapta prakṛtayo rājyam 
yatra sarvāḥ śūdrajātīyāḥ tatra nivāsaniṣedho 'yam 
nanu ca nādārmike vaset ity anenaiva tatsiddham adhārmikajanāvṛta iti 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
pūrvapratiṣedho yatra te nivasanti 
ayaṃ punar anyatrāpi nivāsato 'nyatra saṃnihitā yadi bhavanti tathāpi tatra pradeśe na vasitavyam 
tathā cāvṛtagrahaṇam atra 
yaḥ pradeśa etair āvṛto na tatra sthātavyam 
evaṃ pāṣaṇḍijanair ya ākrānto deśaḥ 
yady apy adhārmikās te vedabāhyatvāt tathāpi teṣāṃ dharmabuddhir iti bhedena nirdeśaḥ 
antyair upasṛṣṭe saṃbaddhe 
atha vā upatapte upasṛṣṭe 
yathā vāhlīkā mlecchaiḥ 
na bhuñjītoddhṛtasnehaṃ nātisauhityam ācaret 
nātiprage nātisāyaṃ na sāyaṃ prātar āśitaḥ 
upanītaḥ sneho yasya sa nāśitavyaḥ piṇyākayūṣamāṃsāni 
tasya kratuparyuṣitānāṃ ca payovikārāṇāṃ pratiprasavaṃ kariṣyati 
takrakilāṭādyapekṣayaiva bahuvacanam 
sākṣādvikāro hi dadhy eva 
tanmātraprasave 'bhiprete dadhigrahaṇam evākariṣyat 
tenāvidhānārthaḥ 
na hi dadhnaḥ paryuṣitatvam asti 
tasmād udaśvittakrakilāṭādikānāṃ payovikārāṇāṃ nāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
nātisauhityaṃ tṛptiṃ na kuryāt 
tatra kukṣer bhāgaḥ 
eko hy annasya aparo hi dravasyodakādeḥ aparo deṣasaṃcaraṇārtha ity evaṃ bhoktavyam iti  tat kāryam 
atiprage prāhṇe prathamodita eva sūrye na bhuñjīta 
prahare atīte kṛśānāṃ pūrvāhṇe itareṣāṃ madhyāhne 
nātisāyam astasamayasamaye na bhuñjīta 
na sāyaṃ bhuñjīta prātar āśitas tṛptaḥ 
tasmāt sākāṃkṣam aśitavyaṃ kāladvaye 'pi 
tad uktam sāyaṃ prātar manuṣyāṇām aśanaṃ devanirmitam iti 
yadi tu prātas tṛptaḥ syāt sāyaṃ na bhuñjīta 
atha vaivaṃ vyākhyāyate 
na sāyaṃ prātar āśitaḥ syāt ubhayor annakālayor na tṛpyet 
tathā ca yājñavalkyaḥ sāyam īṣadbhojanam āha 
na kurvīta vṛthāceṣṭāṃ na vāry añjalinā pibet 
notsaṅge bhakṣayed bhakṣyān na jātu syāt kutūhalī 
vṛthāceṣṭā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayor vyāpārayor anupakāraḥ 
yathā itaradeśādivārtāparatvam 
saṃhatau pāṇī añjaliḥ 
tenodakaṃ na pibet 
vārigrahaṇāt kṣīrādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ 
na utsaṅge 
bhakṣyā dhānāśaṣkulyādayaḥ 
tān utsaṅga ūrvor upari na bhakṣayet 
bhakṣyagrahaṇāt phalānām api pratiṣedhaḥ 
saktvodanādes tu nirupasecanīyasyānadanīyatvād utsaṅge prāptir eva nāsti 
kutūhalaṃ asati projane kim etat syād iti niścaye atyartham utkalikā 
na jātu kadācit 
na nṛtyen naiva gāyec ca na vāditrāṇi vādayet 
nāsphoṭayen na ca kṣveḍen na ca rakto virodhayet 
nartanaṃ gātravikṣepaviśeṣaḥ lokaprasiddha eva 
gāyanaṃ ṣaḍjādisvarataḥ śabdasya karaṇam 
laukikasya cāyaṃ pratiṣedho na vaidikasya vihitatvāt 
vāditrāṇi vīṇāvaṃśamṛdaṅgādīni 
teṣāṃ svayaṃkartṛkaṃ vādanaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
vādakais tu vādyamānānām apratiṣedhaḥ 
na hi ṇyantād ayaṃ ṇijanta iti pramāṇam asti 
āsphoṭanaṃ karamardāsphoṭanādi pāṇinā bhūmau bahunirghātaḥ sa śabdaḥ 
kṣveḍeti avyaktaṃ dantaiḥ śabdakaraṇam kṣveḍaniketi prasiddhā 
valganaṃ anyat 
rāgī parituṣṭe na virodhayet virodhaṃ na kuryāt 
pīḍite na niṣedhaḥ 
ghañantāṇṇic kartavyaḥ 
na pādau dhāvayet kāṃsye kadācid api bhājane 
na bhinnabhāṇḍe bhuñjīta na bhāvapratidūṣite 
kāṃsye bhājane pādau na prakṣālayet 
bhinnabhāṇḍe ekadeśabhinne 'pi 
sarvabhinneṣv arthata eva pratiṣedhaḥ 
patrapuṭakādīnāṃ tu bhinnabhāṇḍāvyavahārāt chidritānām api na doṣaḥ 
bhāvaḥ antarhṛdayābhiprāyaḥ 
yatra mano na parituṣyati 
śabdaduṣṭe vā patadgṛhādau 
tatrāpi naivaṃ bhāvaprasādo bhavati 
upānahau ca vāsaś ca dhṛtam anyair na dhārayet 
upavītam alaṃkāraṃ srajaṃ karakam eva ca 
pitrādibhyo 'nyair dhṛtaṃ na dhārayet 
nirṇijyāśaktau iti gautamaḥ 
karakaḥ kamaṇḍalus tasya pitrādidhṛtasyāpi dhāraṇaṃ samācāraviruddham 
saṃbandhirūpo 'sāv iṣyate 
yasyaiva saṃbandhī tasyaiva śucir nānyasya 
alaṃkāro dantavalayādiḥ 
karakādibhir alpārthaiḥ sāhacaryāt maṇimuktādes tu na niṣedha iti kecit 
nāvinītair vrajed dhuryair na ca kṣudvyādhipīḍitaiḥ 
na bhinnaśṛṅgākṣikhurair na vāladhivirūpitaiḥ 
avinītā adāntā gāvo 'śvāśvatarādayaḥ 
dhuryā dhuraṃ vahanti yujyante 
gantryāder upalakṣaṇam 
cagrahaṇaṃ aniyuktair api dhuri kevalair adāntaiḥ gamanaṃ neṣyate 
bhagnaṃ śṛṅgaṃ yasya anaḍuhaḥ tasyaiva śṛṅgasaṃbhavaḥ nāśvādeḥ 
vāladhiḥ pucchas tena virūpitāḥ chinnapucchādayaḥ 
tādṛśena na yāyāt 
ārohaṇam eva smṛtyantare pratiṣiddham 
vinītais tu vrajen nityam āśugair lakṣaṇānvitaiḥ 
varṇarūpopasaṃpannaiḥ pratodenākṣipan bhṛśam 
dṛpyamānā api kecid vinayaṃ na saṃgṛhṇanti 
tadartham āha vinītair iti suśikṣitaiḥ 
āśugaiḥ kṣipragāmibhiḥ 
lakṣaṇānvitaiḥ praśastāvartādiyuktaiḥ na śūnyamastakādibhiḥ 
varṇarūpayuktaiḥ 
śobhanena varṇena rukmaśoṇādinā rūpeṇa saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa 
śobhanatvaṃ ca lakṣaṇavidyāto jñātvyam 
bhṛśam akṣipan apīḍayan 
punaḥ punaḥ pratodena aṅkuśādinā atyantam udvekṣyamāṇā vighaṭayanti 
bālātapaḥ pretadhūmo varjyaṃ bhinnaṃ tathāsanam 
na chindyān nakharomāṇi dantair notpāṭayen nakhān 
prathamodite savitari muhūrtatrayaṃ bālātapavyapadeśaḥ 
pretadhūmo dahyamānasya śavasya yaḥ 
āsanaṃ bhinnaṃ chidritaṃ bhagnam 
etad varjyam 
nakhāni romāṇi ca na chindyāt svayaṃ vyasanena atipravṛddhāni tu nāpitena kārayet 
dantaiś ca nakhān notpāṭayet pravṛddhān api 
anye tv evam abhisaṃbadhnanti 
na chindyān nakharomāṇi dantair iti 
nakhāṃś ca dantenāpi na pātayet 
nakhabhaṅgayojanāsu hi kāminyo nānā nakhān dārayanti 
na mṛlloṣṭhaṃ ca mṛdnīyān na chindyāt karajais tṛṇam 
na karma niṣphalaṃ kuryān nāyatyām asukhodayam 
vimardanaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ karaṇaṃ loṣṭhasya mṛtsaṃbandhinaḥ 
kecit tu mṛdo loṣṭhasya sudhādisaṃbandhino 'pi 
mṛdaś ca mardanam utkṣipyotkṣipya pātanam hastena saṃhananaṃ vā 
etac ca mardanaṃ yatkiṃcanakāritayā prāptaṃ nīṣidhyate na tu śaucādyarthe prayojane 
niṣphalagrahaṇasya purastād apakarṣāt 
tenaiva siddhe prāyaścittaviśeṣārthaḥ punar ārambhaḥ 
karajā nakhāḥ 
na karma 
nanu ca na kurvīta vṛthāceṣṭām ity anenaiva niṣphalaṃ karma 
atrāhuḥ 
ceṣṭā bhautiko vyāpāraḥ 
iha tu sāmānyasya paryudāsaḥ 
tena manorājyādikalpāḥ pariharaṇīyāḥ 
āyatir āgāmī kālaḥ 
yasmāt karmaṇa āgāmini kāle asukhaṃ duḥkham utpadyate yathā ajīrṇabhojanam kuṭumbabhṛtim acintayitvā mahato dhanasya vyayaś ca 
taṃ na kuryāt 
atrārthavādaḥ 
loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakādī ca yo naraḥ 
sa vināśaṃ vrajaty āśu sūcako 'śucir eva ca 
asmād eva kevalāl loṣṭhagrahaṇāt pūrvoktamṛlloṣṭham iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso vijñāyate 
ubhayaprādhānye hi mṛdgrahaṇaṃ loṣṭha iva atrākariṣyata 
tasyaiva hastena sumardatvāt prāptaḥ paryudāsaḥ 
sudhāyās tu kāṭhinyād yatnasādhyaṃ mardanam tan naivāsati prayojane prāptam 
mṛlloṣṭhamardanaṃ tu hastena puruṣāṇāṃ svabhāvataḥ keṣāṃcit prāpnoti 
tasya paryudāsaḥ 
tṛṇacchedī prakṛtaḥ 
dantair nakhān khādati 
sūcakaḥ piśunaḥ karṇejapaḥ 
yaḥ parasya doṣān asataḥ sato vā parokṣaṃ vyākhyāpayati 
aśucir uktārthaḥ 
vināśam āśu vrajati 
na yathānyāni vaidikāny aniyatakālāni phalāni evam etat kiṃ tarhi ihaiva janmani acirād dhanādinā viyogo vināśaḥ 
na vigṛhya kathāṃ kuryād bahir mālyaṃ na dhārayet 
gavāṃ ca yānaṃ pṛṣṭhena sarvathaiva vigarhitam 
abhiniveśena paṇabandhādinā yal laukikeṣu śāstreṣu vārtheṣv itaretaraṃ jalpanam ahopuruṣikā yā sā vigṛhya kathā 
bahirmālyam 
vāsaso bahiḥ kaṇṭhasthāṃ srajaṃ vāsasā chādayet 
tathā ca samācāraḥ 
apare bahir ity anāvṛto deśa ucyate 
tatra nagararathyādau na prakaṭamālyo bhrāmyed ity āhuḥ 
atha vā bahirgandhaṃ bahirmālyam yasya gandho nātisaṃvedyate 
evaṃ smṛtyantaram nāgandhāṃ srajaṃ dhārayed anyatra hiraṇmayyā iti 
gavāṃ ca pṛṣṭhe yānaṃ paryāṇaṃ vinā sākṣād gavārohaṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
sarvatheti 
paryāṇādyantarāye 'pi gantryādiyukte 'pṛṣṭhayānatvād apratiṣedhaḥ 
advāreṇa ca nātīyād grāmaṃ vā veśma vāvṛtam 
rātrau ca vṛkṣamūlāni dūrataḥ parivarjayet 
āvṛtasya vāṭaparikṣepādinā grāmasya advārapraveśapratiṣedhaḥ 
anāvṛtasya tu dvāravato 'pi yathākāmam 
nākṣair dīvyet kadācit tu svayaṃ nopānahau haret 
śayanastho na bhuñjīta na pāṇisthaṃ na cāsane 
antareṇāpi glaham parihāsena nākṣair dīvyed iti 
kadācidgrahaṇaṃ śalākādīnām api darśanārtham 
tena sarvasya dyūtasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
svayaṃ carmamayaṃ pādatrāṇam upānahau te ātmanā hastena daṇḍādinā vā gṛhītvā deśāntaraṃ na nayet 
ātmīyayoś cāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ svayam iti prakṛtatvāt 
tena ca gurvādisaṃbandhinyor aniṣedhaḥ 
śayane khaṭvādau upaviśya na bhuñjīta pāṇau ca kavalaṃ sthāpayitvā bhājanādyanantaritena āsane annaṃ sthāpayitvā 
ānantaryād bhojyasya pratinirdeśaḥ na bhoktuḥ 
sarvaṃ ca tilasaṃbaddhaṃ nādyād astam ite ravau 
na ca nagnaḥ śayīteha na cocchiṣṭaḥ kvacid vrajet 
astam ite āditye 
pratilakṣaṇe karmapravacanīyatvāt dvitīyā 
na cocchiṣṭaḥ 
nanu ca brahmacaryadharmeṣv etat pratiṣiddham 
puruṣadharmatā ca tasya jñāpitā 
na tādarthyam eva 
satyam 
vratarūpatājñāpanārtha upadeśo 'yam 
tena yāvajjīvikaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kartavyaḥ 
ārdrapādas tu bhuñjīta nārdrapādas tu saṃviśet 
ārdrapādas tu bhuñjāno dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt 
ādikarmaṇi vidhim imaṃ samācaret 
ārdrapādo bhojanam ācaret 
na cātṛpteḥ pādau saṃcann āsīta 
saṃviśet śayane gātrāṇi nāvakṣipet 
saṃveśanaṃ śayane gātrasaṃyojanam 
asya phalam āha dīrgham āyur iti 
nāyam āyuṣkāmasya vidhiḥ kiṃ tarhi pūrvavan nityaḥ 
āyuranuvādas tv arthavāda eva 
acakṣurviṣayaṃ durgaṃ na prapadyeta karhicit 
na viṇmūtram udīkṣeta na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret 
durgaṃ durgārohaṃ parvatādi tarugulmalatāgahanaṃ cāraṇyam 
tan na prapadyeta 
nākrāmen na gacched cakṣurviṣayaṃ sarpacaurāder antarhitasya bhāvāśaṅkayā 
cakṣurgrahaṇam āgamāder api pramāṇasya lakṣaṇam 
na viṇmūtram 
udīkṣaṇaṃ varṇādinā nirūpaṇam 
nirūpaṇaṃ ca cirakālaprakṣaṇena bhavatīty ata eva tan na kartavyam 
daivāt kvacid dṛśyamāne na doṣaḥ 
nadībāhutaraṇaṃ ca svasthasya niṣidhyate na vṛkādibhaye 
adhitiṣṭhen na keśāṃs tu na bhasmāsthikapālikāḥ 
na kārpāsāsthi na tuṣān dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ 
kapālikāḥ bhagnaśakalāni 
dīrgham āyuḥ 
vyākhyātā dvitīyā 
na saṃvasec ca patitair na cāṇḍālair na pulkasaiḥ 
na mūrkhair nāvaliptaiś ca nāntyair nāntyāvasāyibhiḥ 
nanu ca nādhārmikajanāvṛte nopasṛṣṭe 'ntyajaiḥ iti coktam evaitat 
neti brūmaḥ 
tatra nivāsaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ 
iha tu saṃvāsaḥ 
yatra grāme te vasanti na tatra vastavyaṃ gṛhasthityeti tatroktam 
saṃvāsas tu taiḥ saha saṃvyavahāro dānagrahaṇādibhir maitrīkaraṇam tadgṛhasamīpe ca vāso 'pi ekataḥ chāyopajīvanam ityādi 
āvṛtagrahaṇāc ca tatra bāhulyaṃ gamyate 
yasmin grāme bhūyāṃsas te tasya samīpe 'pi na vastavyam iti tasyārthaḥ 
iha tv abāhulye 'pi samīpavāsādi pratiṣidhyata ity eṣa vivekaḥ 
pulkasā niṣādāḥ śūdrāyāṃ jātāḥ 
antyā medaprabhṛtayo mlecchāḥ 
antyāvasāyīti niṣādastriyāṃ caṇḍālāj jāto vakṣyate niṣādastrī caṇḍālāt ityādi 
avaliptā madoddhatāḥ dhanādinā garvitāḥ 
na śūdrāya matiṃ dadyān nocchiṣṭaṃ na haviṣkṛtam 
na cāsyopadiśed dharmaṃ na cāsya vratam ādiśet 
śūdrasya dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaviṣaye hitāhitopadeśo na kartavyaḥ 
śūdrasya mantritvaṃ na kartavyam iti yāvat 
vṛttyarthaś cāyaṃ niṣedhaḥ 
sauhārdādinā tu na doṣaḥ 
bhavanti hi śūdrāḥ kulamitrāṇi 
maitryā cāvaśyaṃ hitam upadiśyate 
anujñātā ca sarvavarṇe brāhmaṇasya maitrī maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate 
ye tu vyācakṣate apṛcchato na brūyād ity upanyasya yuktaṃ śāstrāntarasiddhatvāt nāpṛṣṭaḥ kasyacid brūyāt iti
tad ayuktam 
tatra hi svādhyāyaviṣayaṃ svaravarṇagatam anyad vāsaṃgataṃ kurvato vināśitaṃ tvayetyādāv apṛṣṭena na vaktavyam 
tathā cāmī nādhyāpyā ity asmin prasaṅga idam uktam nāpṛṣṭo brūyāt iti 
aśiṣyasyāpṛcchato visvaraṃ vyakṣaraṃ vā paṭhato na kiṃcid vaktavyam iti tasyārthaḥ 
nocchiṣṭam iti 
ucchiṣṭaśabdo 'yaṃ bhujinimitte 'prāśastye vartate 
kṛtamūtrapurīṣo 'py anācānta ucchiṣṭa ucyate yathā vakṣyāmaḥ na spṛśet pāṇinocchiṣṭaḥ 
bāhulyenocchiṣṭaprayogo bhujisaṃbandhena 
bhuñjānasya hy antarāsyasaṃsparśena bahirantaḥ sthitasyocchiṣṭatvaṃ bhavati 
tathā ca na smaśrūṇi gatāny āsyamiti śmaśrubhyo 'nyad āsyānupraviṣṭam ucchiṣṭaṃ karotīti jñāpayati 
ataś ca bhoktur bhujyamānasya pātrāder adhikaraṇasya cocchiṣṭavyavahāraḥ 
kvacic cāyam upayuktetaravacano 'pi havirucchiṣṭaṃ dakṣiṇā iti 
tatra samācārāt pātragṛhītam ucchiṣṭapuruṣasaṃbandham īṣadbhuktam ucchiṣṭam ucyate 
yad api viśadam odanādipātrastham aspṛṣṭam api bhoktrā tad api saṃbandhāt samācārataḥ parihriyate 
tatra cchiṣṭam api dātavyam nocchiṣṭam iti vidhipratiṣedhāv ekaviṣayāv ṛtānṛtaśūdravyavasthayā haviḥśeṣabhedena vā vikalpyeta 
atha vā sthālīstham atithyādibhuktaśiṣṭaṃ paryuṣitaprāyam ucchiṣṭam tan na śūdrāya datavyam 
tatrocyate 
jīrṇavasanasāhacaryāc caitad eva pratipattuṃ yuktam 
upayuktetaravacanatvāc ca śiṣer upasargasya tadarthānuguṇyena vartanād dhavirucchiṣṭaṃ dakṣiṇetivat prayogo 'py aviruddhaḥ 
evam anayoḥ smṛtyor avirodho bhaviṣyati yady api rūḍhyācamanārhāḥ prāyo 'tra vacane dṛśyante 
yat tu vaiśyavac chaucakalpaś ca iti tad dāsaśūdraviṣayam 
bhuktojjhitam eva pratīyata iti darśyiṣyāmaḥ 
na haviṣkṛtam 
haviṣe kṛtaṃ havirarthaṃ kalpitam 
bahuvacanaḥ samāsas tādarthyenopakalpitapratiṣedhāt 
daṇḍāpūpikayā yatra havirgandho 'sti tat sarvaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
tena havirarthitayā saṃkalpitasya haviṣaḥ pravṛttasya haviḥśeṣasyābhuktojjhitasya haviṣaḥ pratiśeṣaḥ siddho bhavet 
tathā ca kṛtam iti karotiḥ kriyāsāmānyavacanaḥ prayuktaḥ 
havirarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ saṃkalpitam iti vacanam 
tenocchiṣṭasyāpi yāvat prākṛtena saṃkalpena haviṣkṛtavyapadeśo na yathāvat sarvāvasthasya pratiṣedho vijñāyate 
anyais tu havirmiśraṃ haviṣkṛtam iti vyākhyātam 
saṃsṛṣṭapratiṣedhāc ca kevasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ 
viprasaṃsṛṣṭapratiṣedhe viprasyevety uktam 
kathaṃ punaḥ saṃsṛṣṭapratiṣedhe kevalapratiṣedhaḥ 
kevalapratiṣedhenāpradhānaḥ kadācit saṃsṛṣṭapratiṣedhaḥ śakyate vaktum 
yatra saṃsṛṣṭāv api pṛthaktvena pratibhāsete yatra vā cakṣuṣā pratibhāsamāne rūpe rasādinā tatprayogo bhavati tatrāpi bhavaty eva tadāśrayo vyavahāraḥ 
yathā surādisaṃpṛktāsu saktupiṇḍīṣv anatarhite 'pi surādirūpe rase tatpratyayād asty eva surāpānaprāyaścittam 
nanu caivam apy adravarūpatvāt piṇḍībhir ekatāpannāyāḥ surāyā na pānopapattiḥ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
prāyikeṇaucityānuvādena pānam upādīyate 
abhyavahāra eva tu niṣidhyate 
yathā ca bhakṣyābhakṣyaprakaraṇam etat 
bhakṣaṇaṃ cābhyavahāramātraṃm 
tasya viśeṣāḥ pānakhādanacarvaṇādayaḥ 
gandhasya punar anāśrayasyāpy upalabdher na tato dravyasadbhāvāvagamaḥ 
dūrasthe 'pi karpūrādau gandha upalabhayate 
sūkṣmadravyāvayavāvagamakalpanāyāṃ dravyasya parimāṇāvayavaḥ syāt 
yatra tu saṃsṛṣṭayor ekībhāvo na cānyas tatpratyayaḥ na tatra kevalāśrayau vidhipratiṣedhau pravartitum arhataḥ 
yathā kṣīraṃ pātavyam iti saṃmiśritayoḥ kṣīrodakayoḥ pītayor na kṣīraṃ bhavati nodakam dravyāntaratvāt 
anyad dhi tatra rūpam anyaś ca rasasaṃsthānādi tatpratyayahetur astīti dravyāntaraṃ tat 
yady evaṃ madyodake saha pīte yadi bhavetām tadā madyapānaprāyaścittaṃ na prāpnoti dravyāntaratvāt 
naiṣa doṣaḥ abhibhavati rasāntarāṇi madyaṃ tiktarasavat 
tato rasapratyabhijñānād bhavaty eva tat prāyaścittam 
yatra tu bahūdakaṃ svalpaṃ madyādi tatra saṃsargaprāyaścittam api nipuṇam ekādeśe nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ 
tasmāt kevalāśrayaḥ pratiṣedha āskanded api saṃsargam 
yathā māṣā na bhoktavyā iti miśrā api na yujyante 
saṃsargāśrayas tu kena hetunāsaṃsṛṣṭe varteta 
gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃgamāj jalam ānayety ukte na kevalāyā gaṅgāyā ānayati na yamunāyāḥ 
samācāra eveti cet samācāra evodāhartavyaḥ 
na cāsyopadiśed dharmam 
nanu ca na śūdrāya ity aviśeṣeṇa dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaviṣayamatidānapratiṣedhād dharmopadeśaniṣedho 'pi siddha eva 
satyam 
punarvacanaṃ śeṣārtham 
tataḥ prāyaścittopadeśo 'nujñāto bhavati 
śaraṇāgataṃ parityajya ity atra caitad darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
anye tu pārvaṇaśrāddhapākayajñādiṣv itikartavyatāṃ na śikṣayet yājakatvādirūpeṇety āhuḥ 
atra codayanti yadi dharmopadeśaḥ śūdrasya niṣidhyate kutas tarhi dharmavittvam 
aviduṣaś ca nānuṣṭhānasaṃbhavas tataḥ śūdrānuṣṭhātṛkadharmaśāstrānarthakyam 
acodyam etat 
atikrāntaniṣedhasya lipsayā brāhmaṇasya copadeṣṭṛtvasaṃbhavāt 
na hi brahmahatyā sarvasvadānacodanāpratigrahaṃ prayuṅkte 
saṃbhavati lipsā prayoktrī 
nanu cāsti vacanam prabrūyād itarebhyaś ca iti 
vṛttyupāyaprāptau 
ata evaṃ prakṛtam sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇo vidyād vṛttyupāyān yathāvidhi 
prabrūyād itarebhyaś ca iti 
yas tv āśritaśūdras tasyāvaśyam upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ 
aviduṣā vidhipratiṣedhātikramāt saṃvāso niṣiddhaḥ na mūrkhair nāvaliptaiś ca iti 
yat tu vyācakṣate dharmaśāstropadeśas tadarthavyākhyānaṃ vānena niṣidhyate śāstradvayena na cāsyopadiśet iti 
ekena śāstrādhyayanam aperaṇārthavyākhyānam 
agranthakas tūpadeśo na kenacin niṣiddhaḥ 
teṣām evaṃvadatāṃ tasya śāstravicāraḥ iti siddhatvāt punaruktam 
iha vadanti 
vyākaraṇādau dharmāvabodhārthaśāstre dharmaśabdaḥ 
tad dhi na dharmaśāstram atīndriyārtham iti pratiṣedhānupadeśāt 
bhavati tu dharmaśāstravabodhārtham 
śaknoti hi vaiyākaraṇaḥ padārthānusaraṇena gahanaṃ vākyārtham unnetum 
dharmaśāstratvāc ca tasya śāstra ity anena gatatvāt pṛthag ucyate 
yuktam etat yadi kaścin na brūyāt pradhāne 'nadhikṛtasya kuto 'ṅgeṣu prāptir iti 
vedaḥ smṛtiśāstre ca pradhānam 
na ca tatra śūdrasyādhikāraḥ 
na cāsya vratam ādiśet 
vrataśabdena kṛcchrāṇy ucyante etair vrataiḥ iti prayogadarśanāt 
tāny abhyudayakāmasya nopadiśet 
prāyaścittārthatayā tv iṣyata evopadeśaḥ 
snātakavratānāṃ prāptir eva nāsti asnātakatvāt 
evaṃ sāvitrādīnām apy adhyayanābhāvād adhyayanaṃ copanayanābhāvād upanayanaṃ ca tadvidhau jātitrayaśravaṇāt 
yo hy asya dharmam ācaṣṭe yaś caivādiśati vratam 
so 'saṃvṛtaṃ nāma tamaḥ saha tenaiva majjati 
pūrvasya pratiṣedhasya nindārthavādaḥ 
tenaiva saheti 
ubhayor doṣam āha śṛṇvataḥ śrāvayataś ca 
majjaty avagāhate tat prāpnotīti yāvat 
na saṃhatābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ kaṇḍūyed ātmanaḥ śiraḥ 
na spṛśec caitad ucchiṣṭo na ca snāyād vinā tataḥ 
saṃhatābhyāṃ saṃśliṣṭābhyām itaretarasaṃsṛṣṭābhyāṃ yugapad dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
pāṇibhyām iti bāhū saṃhatau niṣedhati 
ātmana iti na parasya 
ataś cānyena saṃhatābhyāṃ kaṇḍūyato na doṣaḥ 
śirograhaṇāt pṛṣṭhādāv adoṣaḥ 
na spṛśec caiva śiraḥ 
hastenātmano 'nyena vāvayaveneti kecit 
tan na pāṇibhyām iti prakṛtatvāt 
na ca snāyāc chirasā vinā 
nityanaimittakayoḥ snānayor ayam vidhiḥ 
nanu svinnasya laukike snāne kuta etat 
snānavidhināikavākyatvāt 
vihitasnānāpekṣā pratyāsattyā yuktimatī 
loke tu vidher abhāvād aprāptiḥ 
snātiś cāyaṃ sarvāṅgasaṃbandhini salilagomūtrādi prakṣālane vartate śirovarjite ca 
tatra caṇḍālādisparśane śirovarjitam api yadṛcchāprasaktaṃ nivāryate na ca snāyād vinā tataḥ 
asti ca laukikam aśiraskam api snānam yena śiraḥsnānam śiraḥsnātas tu tailena iti 
keśagrahān prahārāṃś ca śirasy etān vivarjayet 
śiraḥsnātaś ca tailena nāṅgaṃ kiṃcid api spṛśet 
ātmanaḥ parasya vety aviśeṣeṇa kecid icchanti 
anye tv ātmana iti prakṛtam abhisaṃbadhnanti 
krodhanimittaś cāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
suratasaṃbhoge tu kāminyāḥ keśagrahaḥ sa na niṣidhyate 
śiraḥsnānaṃ kṣālitam aneneti rājadantāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt paranipātaḥ 
śiraḥsnāta iti bāhulakena samāsaḥ 
nāṅgam ātmīyam 
na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇīyād arājanyaprasūtitaḥ 
sūnācakradhvajavatāṃ veśenaiva ca jīvatām 
uktam rājato dhanam anvicchet iti 
rājaśabdaś cāyaṃ kṣatriyajātāv akṣatriye 'pi janapadeśvare dṛṣṭaproyogaḥ brāhmaṇānāṃ rājyam iti 
tatra pratigrahavidhau tanniṣedhe ca janapadeśvaravacano gṛhyate 
yenāha arājanyaprasūtita iti 
janapadaiśvaryaṃ hi sarvavarṇasaṃbhavi lipsayā 
ato viśeṣyate rājanyāt kṣatriyād yasya prasūtir utpattir nāsti tasmād rājño janapadeśvarān na gṛhṇīyāt 
kṣatriyād api lubdhād ucchāstravartino vakṣyamāṇena pratiṣedhena 
sūnā paśumāraṇasaṃjñapanapūrvakeṇa māṃsakrayeṇa yo jīvati sa sūnāvān 
khaṭika iti loke presiddhaḥ 
dvajo madyapaṇyaḥ tatkrayavikrayajīvī 
veśaḥ paṇyavṛttiḥ tayā yo jīvati strī vā pumān vā 
daśasūnāsamaṃ cakraṃ daśacakrasamo dhvajaḥ 
daśadhvajasamo veśo daśaveśasamo nṛpaḥ 
uttarasyottarasya doṣagurutvajñāpanārtham etat 
āpady upāyo vakṣyate 
daśasūnāsahasrāṇi yo vāhayati saunikaḥ 
tena tulyaḥ smṛto rājā ghoras tasya pratigrahaḥ 
sūnayā carati saunikaḥ 
vāhayati svārthasādhane vyāpārayati 
ghoraḥ bhīṣaṇo 'yam narakādihetutvāt 
avayutyavādena rājapratigrahe nindā 
yo rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇāti lubdhasyocchāstravartinaḥ 
sa paryāyeṇa yātīmān narakān ekaviṃśatim 
lubdha ādānaśīlaḥ sāmantakādibhyaḥ 
ucchāstravartī 
śrutaśīle ca vijñāya ityādiśāstram atikramya vyavaharati asaddaṇḍaparastrīharaṇādinā 
paryāyeṇa ekatra phalam anubhūyānyatra gacchati 
narakaśabdo niratiśayaduḥkhavacanaḥ 
kevaladuḥkhaśravaṇārthāpattyā vā deśaviśeṣavacanaḥ 
ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyā arthavādaḥ 
tāmisram andhatāmisraṃ mahārauravarauravau 
narakaṃ kālasūtraṃ ca mahānarakam eva ca 
saṃjīvanaṃ mahāvīciṃ tapanaṃ saṃpratāpanam 
saṃhātaṃ ca sakākolaṃ kuḍmalaṃ pūtimṛttikam 
lohaśaṅkum ṛjīṣaṃ ca panthānaṃ śālmalīṃ nadīm 
asipatravanaṃ caiva lohadārakam eva ca 
ślokatrayaṃ spaṣṭārtham   
etad vidanto vidvāṃso brāhmaṇā brahmavādinaḥ 
na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇanti pretya śreyo 'bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ 
pūrvasya pratigrahaniṣedhavidher upasaṃhāra eṣaḥ 
rājñaḥ pratigraho vividhaduḥkhanarakādihetur iti jānanto vidvāṃso brāhmaṇā na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ 
pretya bhavāntare śreyaḥ kalyāṇam ye kāṅkṣanti kāmayante 
pretyeti tu lyabantapratirūpakaṃ śabdāntaram 
brahma vedas taṃ vadanti paṭhanti 
vidvadgrahaṇaṃ brahmavādigrahaṇaṃ ca duḥkhātiśayadarśanārtham 
teṣāṃ cātīva pratigrahād doṣaḥ 
vakṣyati tasmād api vidvān bibhīyāt iti 
brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharmārthau cānucintayet 
kāyakleśāṃś ca tanmūlān vedatattvārtham eva ca 
triyāmā rātriḥ tasyāḥ paścimo brāhmo muhūrtaḥ 
tatra nidrāṃ tyajet 
vibuddhaś ca tasmin kāle dharmārthāv anucintayet 
yasmiṃś ca dharma āsevyamāne yādṛśaḥ śarīrakleśo bhavati tam api cintayet 
svalpaś ced dharmo mahāntaṃ kāyakleśaṃ janayati yo dharmāntaravirodhī taṃ pariharet 
artho 'pi sevādiḥ atikleśakaraḥ so 'pi varjyaḥ 
sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti 
aniścitya na kiṃcid kuryāt 
na ca manorājyādivikalpān kuryāt 
svabhāvo hy ayaṃ puruṣāṇām asati bāhye vyāpāre manaso vikalpāḥ paradravyābhilāṣādirūpāḥ samudbhavanti 
tannivṛttyartham idaṃ puruṣārtham 
tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvena cintyo vedasya tattvārthaḥ 
rahasyam ātmajñānaṃ cintayed vedāntavidhinābhyasyet 
atha vā karmakāṇḍe 'pi yo vedas tasyārthas taṃ nirūpayet 
ayaṃ vidhiḥ ayam arthaḥ idaṃ karmaivaṃ rūpam iyam atra devatā idaṃ dravyam ayam atrādhikārī iyam itikartavyatā ityādi svabuddhyā niścinuyāt 
vyākhyātṝṇāṃ matabhedād dhetūn nirūpayed asya samyagjñānam asya bhrāntir iti 
utthāyāvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ 
pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ japaṃs tiṣṭhet svakāle cāparāṃ ciram 
anantaraṃ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau śayanaṃ jahyāt 
āvaśyakaṃ mūtraviṭtyāgaḥ 
prāyeṇa tasyāṃ velāyāṃ puruṣās taṃ kurvanti 
tatra āvaśyakas tyāga ucyate mukhadantadhāvanādiś ca taṃ kṛtvā kṛtaśaucaḥ ekā liṅge ityādividhinācāntaḥ 
samāhito vikalpāntaratiraskāreṇa saṃdhyāṃ tiṣṭhet 
japan sāvitrīṃ bhagavati savitari mano dadhyāc ciram 
arkadarśanāvadhiḥ kāla uktaḥ saṃdhyāsamayaḥ 
tato 'py adhikaṃ kālaṃ japed āyuḥkāma ity evamartham ayaṃ prāg uktaḥ sāṃdhyo vidhir antarhitaḥ 
aparāṃ ca saṃdhyāṃ sve kāle astamayasamayād ārabhya tārakodayād ūrdhvam api 
ṛṣayo dīrghasaṃdhyatvād dīrgham āyur avāpnuyuḥ 
prajñāṃ yaśaś ca kīrtiṃ ca brahmavarcasam eva ca 
yadartho 'yaṃ punar vidhis tad darśayati 
āyurādiphalakāmo dīrghakālasaṃdhyājapaṃ kuryāt 
saty api nityatve daighyād guṇāt phalam idam 
anagnikasya proṣitasyaitat saṃbhavati 
anyasya tv agnihotrakāloparodho dīrghasaṃdhyāvidhisaṃpādanāt 
dīrghasaṃdhyā guṇata ucyate 
saṃdhyāsahacarite japādividhau saṃdhyāśabdo vartate 
dīrghā saṃdhyaiṣām iti bahuvrīhiḥ 
ṛṣigrahaṇam arthavādaḥ 
śrāvaṇyāṃ prauṣṭhapadyāṃ vāpy upākṛtya yathāvidhi 
yuktaś chandāṃsy adhīyīta māsān vipro 'rdhapañcamān 
śravaṇayuktā paurṇamāsī śrāvaṇī 
evaṃ prauṣṭhapadī 
tatra upākṛtya upākarmākhyaṃ karma kṛtvā yathāvidhy adhīyīta 
prākkūlān ityādiprāgukto vidhiḥ smaryate 
yuktas tatparaḥ 
chandāṃsi vedān 
chandaḥśabdo 'yaṃ vedavacano na gāyatryādivacanaḥ 
tena brāhmaṇādīn apy adhīyānasyaiṣa paramavidhiḥ 
ubhayatrāpi cāyaṃ yukta eva pratyayāviśeṣāt 
ayaṃ vikalpo vyavasthitaḥ 
chandogāḥ prauṣṭhapadyām upākurvanti bahvṛcā adhvaryavaḥ śrāvaṇyām 
puṣye tu chandasāṃ kuryād bahir utsarjanaṃ dvijaḥ 
māghaśuklasya vā prāpte pūrvāhṇe prathame 'hani 
ardhapañcameṣu māseṣu gateṣu yaḥ puṣyo nakṣatraṃ tatrotsarjanaṃ kartavyam 
utsargoktaṃ karma gṛhyakārair āmnātam 
bahir ity anāvṛte deśe 
anayor upākarmotsargayor gṛhyāt svarūpaṃ jñātavyam 
yathāśāstraṃ tu kṛtvaivam utsargaṃ chandasāṃ bahiḥ 
viramet pakṣiṇīṃ rātriṃ tad evaikam aharniśam 
utsargaṃ kṛtvā dve ahanī rātrim iyantaṃ nādhīyīta 
tad aharniśam 
dvitīyaṃ cāhar eva na rātrir ity etāvantaṃ kālaṃ viramen nādhīyīta 
ubhayatohaḥpakṣā rātriḥ pakṣiṇī 
yad vā yasminn ahany utsargaḥ kṛtas tad ahaḥ saiva ca rātriḥ anadhyāye 
dvitīyasminn ahany adhyetavyam 
ādye tu pakṣe dvitīyam ahar anadhyāyo rātrau tv adhyayanam ucyate 
ata ūrdhvaṃ tu chandāṃsi śukleṣu niyataḥ paṭhet 
vedāṅgāni ca sarvāṇi kṛṣṇapakṣeṣu saṃpaṭhet 
ato 'smād utsargakarmaṇaḥ kṛtād ūrdhvaṃ parataḥ śuklapakṣeṣu chandāṃsi mantrabrāhmaṇasamudāyātmakān vedān paṭhet 
aṅgāni ca śikṣāyajñasūtravyākaraṇādīni kṛṣṇapakṣeṣu saṃpaṭhet 
nāvispaṣṭam adhīyīta na śūdrajanasaṃnidhau 
na niśānte pariśrānto brahmādhītya punaḥ svapet 
yatra varṇasvarābhivyaktiḥ sphuṭā na bhavati tad avispaṣṭam 
tac ca drutāyāṃ vṛttau prāyeṇa bhavati 
niśānte paścimarātribhāge 
suptotthito yadādhīyīta punaḥ śrāmyet tadā na śayīta 
na niśānte pariśrānto brahmādhītya śayīta tu evaṃ yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ 
yathoditena vidhinā nityaṃ chandaskṛtaṃ paṭhet 
brahmacchandaskṛtaṃ caiva dvijo yukto hy anāpadi 
chandāṃsi gāyatryādīny abhipretāni taiḥ kṛtaṃ yuktaṃ brahma ṛksāma 
anekārthatvāt karoter ayam atrārtho vyākhyāyate 
yathā gomayān kurviti saṃhare pṛṣṭhaṃ kurvity unmardane evam atra yujer arthe vartate 
brahma ca chandaś ca brahmacchandasī tābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ yuktaṃ brahmacchandaskṛtam 
brahma brāhmaṇam yajurvede brahma yajūṃṣi gāyatryādiyuktāṃś ca mantrān 
ekasminn evāvasthānake paṭhanti 
na yathā bāhvṛcye chāndogye ca vibhāgenaikasmin granthe mantrā anyatra brāhmaṇam 
evaṃ prakārabhedād vedānām evaṃ yuktam iti pūrve vyākhyātavantaḥ 
yathoditena 
pūrvo vidhir anāpady upasaṃhriyate 
āpadi adhyāpakasyāsaṃnidhānaṃ bahudevatāvibhāgam apekṣamāṇasya tatrāguṇavataḥ vismṛtya syāt 
tasmād āpady ayaṃ vibhāgo nādaraṇīyaḥ 
imān nityam anadhyāyān adhīyāno vivarjayet 
adhyāpanaṃ ca kurvāṇaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ vidhipūrvakam 
imān vakṣyamāṇān anadhyāyān adhīyāno vivarjayet 
adhyāpanaṃ ca kurvāṇaḥ 
adhyāpanagrahaṇam anadhīyato grahaṇārtham abhyāsārthaṃ ca 
nityam notsargād eva prabhṛti 
kiṃ tarhy ardhapañcameṣv api māseṣūpākarmaṇaḥ prabhṛti 
śiṣyāṇām anuvādaḥ 
karṇaśrave 'nile rātrau divā pāṃsusamūhane 
etau varṣāsv anadhyāyāv adhyāyajñāḥ pracakṣate 
anilo vāyuḥ 
vegena vāti vāyau vāyvantarasaṃgharṣād dvaniḥ śrūyate yatra sa karṇaśravo vāyuḥ 
karṇābhyāṃ śrūyate yaḥ sa karṇaśravaḥ 
sādhanaṃkṛteti samāsaḥ 
avasthāviśeṣopalakṣaṇārthaṃ karṇagrahaṇam 
śrūyate karṇābhyām eva 
tena yadaivaṃ vāyuśabdaḥ śrūyate tadā nādhyetavyam 
pāṃsūn samūhati pāṃsūn samāharati pāṃsusamūhanaḥ 
pāṃsur dhūliḥ 
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat tathābhūtasya vāyor vā 
yatas tataś ca vṛṣṭe deve yadi vāyur īdṛśo vāti tāvatkālo 'nadhyāyaḥ 
adhyāyajñā adhyāpanavidhijñāḥ 
vidyutstanitavarṣeṣu maholkānāṃ ca saṃplave 
ākālikam anadhyāyam eteṣu manur abravīt 
vidyut taḍit 
stanitaṃ garjitam 
dvandvanirdeśād yugapad eteṣu samuñciteṣv anadhyāyaḥ 
maholkā divaḥ patatāṃ jyotiṣāṃ prabhā uktās tāsāṃ saṃplavaḥ atrāmutra ca patanam 
ākālikaśabdo nimittakālād ārabhyānyedyur yāvat sa eva kālaḥ sa ucyate 
manugrahaṇaṃ ślokapūraṇārtham 
vikalpārtham anye 
etāṃs tv abhyuditān vidyād yadā prāduṣkṛtāgniṣu 
tadā vidyād anadhyāyam anṛtau cābhradarśane 
nāyam anadhyāyo yasyāṃ kasyāṃcana velāyām upajāteṣv eteṣu kiṃ tarhi prāduṣkṛtāgniṣu 
saṃdhyākāla ity arthaḥ 
tadā hy agnayo juhūṣayā niyamataḥ prāduṣkriyante 
prāduḥśabdaḥ prākāśye 
anṛtau 
ṛtur vārṣās tābhyo 'nyaḥ śaradādiḥ 
tatra vābhradarśane 
prāduṣkṛtāgniṣv ity apekṣyate 
nirghāte bhūmicalane jyotiṣāṃ copasarjane 
etān ākālikān vidyād anadhyāyān ṛtāv api 
nirghāta āntarikṣa utpātadhvaniḥ 
jyotiṣāṃ candrādityaguruprabhṛtīnām upasarjanaṃ pariveṣaṇam itaretarapīḍanaṃ ca 
ṛtāv api 
apigrahaṇaṃ varṣāsu kila notpātā gaṇyanta ityabhiprāyeṇa 
prāduṣkṛteṣv agniṣu tu vidyutstanitaniḥsvane 
sajyotiḥ syād anadhyāyaḥ śeṣe rātrau yathā divā 
trisaṃnipāte pūrveṇākālikam uktam 
anena dvayoḥ saṃnipāte 'pi sajyotir ucyate 
stanitaṃ ca tanniḥsvanaś cāsau stanitaniḥsvanaḥ 
vidyuc ca stanitaniḥsvanaś ca vidyutstanitaniḥsvanam 
samāhāradvandvaḥ 
tasmin saṃdhyāyām upajāte dvaye sajyotir anadhyāyaḥ 
sūryo jyotiḥ divā 
naktam agnir jyotiḥ 
prātaḥsaṃdhyāyām utpanne divaivānadhyāyaḥ rātrau tu nāsti 
evaṃ paścimasaṃdhyāyāṃ rātrāv anadhyāyaḥ na prātar adhyayanadoṣaḥ 
vidyutstanitavarṣāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ prakṛtānāṃ vidyutstanitayor vibhajya nirdeśo bhavati 
varṣāḥ śeṣaḥ tasmiṃs tṛtīye dṛśyamāne pūrvotka ākāliko 'nadhyāyaḥ 
tadapekṣayoktaṃ yathā divā tathā rātrāv api 
jyotiḥ prasiddhataraṃ jyotiṣṭomādi 
śeṣam iti pāṭhaḥ 
śeṣaṃ hūyamānam ahar anadhyāyahetur bhavatīti 
atha kasmān naivam uktaṃ śeṣaṃ tv ākālikaṃ smṛtam iti 
vicitrā ślokānāṃ kṛtir manoḥ 
nityānadhyāya eva syād grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca 
dharmanaipuṇyakāmānāṃ pūtigandhe ca sarvaśaḥ 
nipuṇaṃ dharmaṃ ye kāmayante te grāmanagayor nādhīyīran 
dharmaśabdaś ca svargādau dharmaphale vartate 
yadi vādharmeṇānanuvedho dharmasya naipuṇyam tena suparipūrṇo vidhyartho 'nuṣṭhito bhavati 
ataś cāśaktasyānujñānaṃ bhavati 
pūtigandhaḥ kutsitagandhaḥ tasmin nāsikāpathaṃ gacchaty anadhyāyaḥ 
sarvaśaḥ sarvasmin śavagandhe 'pi 
antargataśave grāme vṛṣalasya ca saṃnidhau 
anadhyāyo rudyamāne samavāye janasya ca 
antargataḥ śavo yasmin grāmamadhye sthito yāvan na nirhṛtaḥ 
vṛṣalasya 
nātra śūdro vṛṣalas tasya prāg eva niṣiddhatvāt na śūdrajanasaṃnidhau iti 
kiṃ tarhi tatprāyikeṇādharmeṇādhārmikatvaṃ lakṣyate 
tena yaḥ pāpācāras tatsaṃnidhānāc ca tena niṣedhaḥ 
rudyamāne rudanaśabde sati 
bhāvamātre rudyamānaśabdaḥ 
samavāyo janasya 
yatra bahavo janāḥ kāryārtham ekatra saṃghaṭitā bhavanti tādṛśe deśe nādhyeyam 
atha vā janasya samavāye rudyamāne rudatīty arthaḥ 
bahuṣu rudatsu pratiṣedhaḥ 
chāndasaṃ kartary ātmanepadam 
udake madhyarātre ca viṇmūtrasya visarjane 
ucchiṣṭaḥ śrāddhabhuk caiva manasāpi na cintayet 
caturmuhūrto 'rdharātraḥ 
saiva mahāniśā 
prathamād ardharātrād dvau muhūrtāv uttarād dvau 
udake nadītaḍāgādisthaḥ 
antarjale japas tv anadhyāyarūpatvād aghamarṣaṇādir na niṣidhyate 
udaye ity anye paṭhanti 
prathamodayakāle sūryasyānadhyāyaḥ 
ucchiṣṭo bhujisaṃbandhenākṛtācamano yāvat 
kṛtamūtrapurīṣo 'pi prāg ācamanād ucchiṣṭa ucyata eva 
ācamanārhāprātyayamātravacana ity anye 
tena kṛtaniṣṭhīvanādir api gṛhyate 
manasāpi 
nānyatrānadhyāye manasā cintanam abhyanujñāyate 
kiṃ tarhi doṣagauravārtham eteṣāṃ nimittānām 
pratigṛhya dvijo vidvān ekoddiṣṭaniketanam 
tryahaṃ na kīrtayed brahma rājño rāhoś ca sūtake 
eka uddiśyate yasmiṃs tad ekoddiṣṭaṃ navaśrāddham 
tatra niketanaṃ nimantraṇaṃ pratigṛhya aṅgīkṛtya tryaham anadhyāya āmantraṇāt prabhṛti 
evaṃ rājā candramāḥ tasya sūtakam rāhuṃ pratyamṛtasravaṇam 
caśabdāt sūryasya ca 
atha vā janapadeśvarasya rājñaḥ sūtakaṃ putrajanmotsavaḥ 
rāhoḥ sūtakaṃ candrasūryayor uparāgaḥ grahaṇam iti prasiddham 
yāvad ekānudiṣṭasya gandho lepaś ca tiṣṭhati 
viprasya viduṣo dehe tāvad brahma na kīrtayet 
ekam anudiśya āmaśrāddham tasya yāvac chrāddhakṛtau gandhalepau tiṣṭhatas tāvad anadhyāyaḥ 
pūrvasmād vidhau vidhyantaram 
dvitīyasminn ahani kṛtasnāno 'panītatadgandho 'dhyayanārhaḥ 
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitad asator api gandhalepayor yāvad bhuktam annaṃ na jīrṇaṃ tāvan nādhīyīta 
viduṣa iti tasyaiva śrāddhabhojanādhikāram anuvadati 
śayānaḥ prauḍhapādaś ca kṛtvā caivāvasakthikām 
nādhīyītāmiṣaṃ jagdhvā sūtakānnādyam eva ca 
prasāritapādaḥ pādāropitapādo vā khaṭvāsanādau vā saṃhatapādaḥ 
avasakthikā vastrādinā jānvor madhyasya ca bandhaḥ 
āmiṣaṃ māṃsam 
sūtakagrahaṇaṃ śāvāśaucāder api pradarśanārtham 
nīhāre bāṇaśabde ca saṃdhyayor eva cobhayoḥ 
amāvāsyācaturdaśyoḥ paurṇamāsyaṣṭakāsu ca 
nīhāro diṅmoho dhūmikety anarthāntaram 
bāṣparajovṛtā iva yena diśaḥ kriyante 
bāṇaśabdaḥ śaranirghoṣaḥ 
dantyoṣṭhyam anye paṭhanti vyācakṣate ca vīṇā bāṇa iti 
mahāvrate hi prayogo dṛśyate 
śatatantrīko bhavati vīṇā vitantrīti ca 
caturdaśyāṃ ubhayor api pakṣayoḥ 
aṣṭakāś ca sarvā aṣṭamyaḥ smṛtyantarasamācārābhyām 
anye tv aṣṭamīṣu ity evaṃ paṭhanti 
amāvāsyā guruṃ hanti śiṣyaṃ hanti caturdaśī 
brahmāṣṭakāpaurṇamāsyau tasmāt tāḥ parivarjayet 
pūrvasyārthavādo nityārthaḥ 
tena yatra nityatvajñāpakaṃ na kiṃcit sa vikalpate 'nadhyāyaḥ 
vakṣyati ca dvāv eva varjayen nityam iti 
tāḥ parivarjayed adhyayanakriyātaḥ 
pāṃsuvarṣe diśāṃ dāhe gomāyuvirute tathā 
śvakharoṣṭre ca ruvati paṅktau ca na paṭhed dvijaḥ 
gomayuḥ śṛgālaḥ 
tasya virutaṃ śabdakaraṇam 
śvakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ paṅktyavasthitānāṃ śabdaṃ kurvatām anadhyāyaḥ
