ekaikasya samānajātīyapaṅktau 
nādhīyīta śmaśānānte grāmānte govraje 'pi vā 
vasitvā maithunaṃ vāsaḥ śrāddhikaṃ pratigṛhya ca 
antaḥśabdaḥ sāmīpyavacanaḥ 
śmaśānasamīpe grāmasamīpe ca 
govraje gāvo yatra carituṃ vrajanti 
goṣṭho vā govrajaḥ 
strīsaṃprayogakāle yat prāvṛtaṃ vāsas tad eva prāvṛtya nādhīyīta 
maithunaśabdaḥ sāhacaryāt tatkālapravṛtte vāsasi vartate 
śrāddhikaṃ śrāddhanirmitaṃ śuṣkānnādyam api gṛhītvā nādhīyīta 
prāṇi vā yadi vāprāṇi yat kiṃcic chrāddhikaṃ bhavet 
tad ālabhyāpy anadhyāyaḥ pāṇyāsyo hi dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ 
śrāddhanimittaṃ dīyamānaṃ bhaktādi śrāddhikam iti prasiddham tannivṛttyartham idam ucyate 
na kevalaṃ vrīhitaṇḍulādipratigraha eva śrāddhe 'nadhyāyahetuḥ 
yāvad anyad api prāṇi vā gavādi tathā aprāṇi vāsoyugādi 
tad apy ālabhya pratigrahakāle hastena spṛṣṭvā nādhīyīta 
yatas tad eva tasya bhojanam 
pāṇir evāsyam asyeti pāṇyāsyaḥ 
śrāddhe bhojanaṃ tannimittaṃ ca dravyagrahaṇaṃ tulyam iti darśayati 
caurair upaplute grāme saṃbhrame cāgnikārite 
ākālikam anadhyāyaṃ vidyāt sarvādbhuteṣu ca 
upapluta upadrutaḥ 
yatra bahavaś caurā grāme ghātārthaṃ patanti tatra nādhyeyam 
saṃbhrame yatrāgninā saṃbhramo bhayaṃ janyate gehadāhādipravṛttenādagdhe 'pi gehādau 
ākāliko 'nadhyāyaḥ 
pravṛttikālād ārabhya yāvad anyedyuḥ sa eva kālaḥ 
anyeṣu cādbhuteṣūtpāteṣu divyabhaumāntarikṣeṣu śilāplavādiṣu divā darśanādiṣu 
upākarmaṇi cotsarge trirātraṃ kṣepaṇaṃ smṛtam 
aṣṭakāsu tv ahorātram ṛtvantāsu ca rātriṣu 
utsarge pakṣiṇy ahorātraṃ ca pūrvam uktam anena trirātreṇa vikalpyate 
upākarmaṇy apūrvo vidhiḥ 
aṣṭakā ūrdhvam āgrahāyaṇyās tamisrapakṣe 'ṣṭamyas tisraś catasro vā 
yady api sarvāsv aṣṭamīṣv ahorātram uktaṃ tathāpi nityārtho 'yam ārambho yukta eva 
vikalpaś ca sarvatrāsmin prakaraṇe kṛtārthatvāpekṣaḥ 
ṛtvantāsu ahorātram ity anuṣajyate 
ṣaḍ ṛtavaḥ 
teṣāṃ yatra pūrvo nivartate aparaś ca pravartate tatrānadhyāyaḥ 
rātrigrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārtham 
nādhīyītāśvam ārūḍho na vṛkṣaṃ na ca hastinam 
na nāvaṃ na kharaṃ noṣṭraṃ nerinastho na yānagaḥ 
īriṇaṃ bahir grāmaṃ jalatṛṇavarjito deśa ūṣarāparaparyāyaḥ 
yānaṃ gantrīśakaṭaśibikādi 
tena gacchato niṣedhaḥ 
na vivāde na kalahe na senāyāṃ na saṅgare 
na bhuktamātre nājīrṇe na vamitvā na śuktake 
vivādaḥ krośapūrvako vyākrośaḥ 
kalaho daṇḍādinetaretaratāḍanam 
senā hastyaśvarathapadātiḥ 
saṅgaraḥ saṅgrāmaḥ 
asaṅgare 'pi senāsthasya niṣedhaḥ 
bhuktamātraṃ yāvad ārdrapāṇiḥ iti smṛtyantaram 
ajīrṇaṃ pūrvedyur bhuktam aparedyur apariṇatam ucyate 
vamanaṃ prasiddham 
śuktake udgāre 'saty apy ajīrṇe tadahar aparedyur vā 
atithiṃ cānanujñāpya mārute vāti vā bhṛśam 
rudhire ca srute gātrāc chastreṇa ca parikṣate 
atithigrahaṇaṃ śiṣṭopalakṣaṇārtham 
anityāgamanaḥ śiṣṭaś cātithis tasmin gṛha āgate 'sāv adhyeṣitavyaḥ adhimahe iti tenānujñāto 'dhīyīta 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram śiṣṭe ca gṛham āgate iti 
mārute vāyau vāti vegena 
nanu karṇaśrave ityādy uktam eva 
satyam 
tato 'dhikatare tato varṣābhyo 'nyatra vāpi pratiṣedhaḥ 
atha vā vāti pariśuṣyati vānaḥ śoṣaṇārthatvāt 
mārutagrahaṇaṃ ca vātamātropalakṣaṇārtham 
adhyayanaśrameṇa dhatuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣv apy anadhyāyaḥ 
mārute vardhamāne vidhāyiny adhyetarīti bhinnasaṃbandhe vyadhikaraṇasaptamyau 
rudhire jalaukādinā parisrute atha vā śastreṇa ca parikṣate śarīre rudhire srute 
gātrādivākyenaikavākyatā 
sāmadhvanāv ṛgyajuṣī nādhīyīta kadācana 
vedasyādhītya vāpy antam āraṇyakam adhītya ca 
ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmadhvanau srūyamāṇe nādhīyīta 
ṛgvedayajurvedabrāhmaṇayor apratiṣedhaḥ 
pañcaviṃśe ca śrūyamāṇa ṛgyajuṣayor apy ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
vedasyānto yatra vedaḥ samāptim upaiti mantrānto brāhmaṇāntaś ca 
āraṇyako nāma vedaikadeśaḥ 
tam adhītyānyo grantho nādhyetavyaḥ 
ṛgvedo devadaivatyo yajurvedas tu mānuṣaḥ 
sāmavedaḥ smṛtaḥ pitryas tasmāt tasyāśucir dhvaniḥ 
sāmagītadhvanāv ṛgyajuṣasyānadhyāya uktaḥ 
tatrāyam arthavādaḥ 
devā devatā asya devadaivatyo devatāstutipara ity arthaḥ 
ṛcaḥ prāyeṇa stutipradhānāḥ 
ata uktaṃ devadaivatya iti 
manuṣyāṇāṃ karmapradhānatvād yajurvede ca karmaṇāṃ bāhulyopadeśād etena sāmyena yajurvedo mānuṣa ity ucyate 
mānuṣaśabdo manuṣyajātivacanaḥ 
abhedādhyāsād yajurvedo mānuṣa ity uktam 
pitryaḥ pitṛbhyo hitaḥ 
pitaro vā devatā asyeti yathā kathaṃcit pitṛśabdasaṃbandhena śrūyate 
trayo lokās teṣāṃ traya evādhiṣṭhātāraḥ 
divo devatā bhūmer manuṣyā antarikṣasya pitaraḥ 
evaṃ trayo vedāḥ 
dvayor devamanuṣyasaṃbandhoktatvāt pāriśeṣyāt pitryaḥ sāmavedaḥ 
tasyāśucir dhvaniḥ 
nātra tadīyasya dhvaner aśucitvaṃ paramārthato vijñeyam 
kiṃ tarhi yathāśucisaṃnidhāne nādhyetavyam evaṃ tatsaṃnidhāna iti sāmānyam aśucitvālambanam 
ayaṃ cādhyayanavidhau prakaraṇāt sāmni gīyamāne ṛgyajuṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na yajñaprayoge 
etad vidanto vidvāṃsas trayīniṣkarṣam anvaham 
kramataḥ pūrvam abhyasya paścād vedam adhīyate 
etat trilokyādhiṣṭhātṛsaṃbandhitvam ṛgvedo devadaivatyaḥ ityādi vidanto vidvāṃsaḥ prājñās trayyā niṣkarṣaṃ sārabhūtaṃ pūrvam abhyasya praṇavavyāhṛtisāvitrākhyam uktena krameṇa paścād vedam adhīyate paṭhanti 
tena trayo lokās tisro devatā etattrikādhyayanena parigṛhītā bhavanti 
ukto 'py ayam artho dvitīye 'dhyāye punar ucyate 
yathānadhyāyeṣu na paṭhyate tathā trayīniṣkarṣe prāg anadhīte 
paśumaṇḍūkamārjāraśvasarpanakulākhubhiḥ 
antarāgamane vidyād anadhāyam aharniśam 
antarāgamane 'dhyāpyādhyāpakayor madhyena adhīyānānāṃ vā 
aharniśam ahorātram 
gautame tu tryaham upavāso vipravāsaś coktaḥ 
śmaśānādhyayane ca etad eva 
atra vikalpo vijñeyaḥ 
dvāv eva varjeyan nityam anadhyāyau prayatnataḥ 
svādhyāyabhūmiṃ cāśuddhām ātmānaṃ cāśuciṃ dvijaḥ 
nityagrahaṇāt pūrvatrānadhyāyānāṃ vikalpaḥ 
tatrāpi yeṣāṃ nityatvamātraṃ tat pradarśitam eva yatra nityagrahaṇam arthavādo vā yathā amāvāsyā guruṃ hanti iti 
bhūmeś cāśuddhir asthibhagaliṅgādikāmedhyādisaṃsargaḥ 
ātmanas tu pañcame vakṣyate 
yady apy adhyayanavidhiprakaraṇa etāv anadhyāyau tathāpi naityake bhavataḥ 
na hy aśucir adhikriyate 
tathā ca brāhmaṇam tasya vā etasya yajñasya dvāv anadhyāyau yad ātmāśucir yad deśaḥ iti 
brahmayajñaś ca nityo japaḥ 
amāvāsyām aṣṭamīṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ caturdaśīm 
brahmacārī bhaven nityam apy ṛtau snātako dvijaḥ 
brahmacārī bhavet 
brahmacāridharmo maithunanivṛttir atidiśyate na punar bhikṣācaraṇādiḥ 
apy ṛtāv iti saṃbandhāt tad eva prathamaṃ hṛdayam āgacchati 
anye tu madhumāṃsanivṛttim apīcchanty eteṣv ahaḥsu 
tatra smṛtyantaram udāhāryam 
ṣaṣṭhyaṣṭamīm amāvāsyām ubhayatra caturdaśīm 
varjayet paurṇamāsīṃ ca taile māṃse bhage kṣure 
anye tv āhur brahmacārīti viśiṣṭāśramiṇo nāmadheyam etat 
ata āśramāntaravartini gṛhasthādau prayujyamāno vedagrahaṇārthadharmalakṣaṇayātideśārtho bhavati 
brahmacārī bhavet 
paraśabdo hi paratra prayujyamāno vatyarthaṃ gamayati 
sarveṣu brahmacāridharmeṣu prāpteṣv agnīndhanabhaikṣyacaraṇādayaḥ ā samāvartanāt kuryāt iti vacanāt gṛhasthaḥ śeṣabhuk iti ca pratyakṣe vinivartante 
kevalaṃ madhumāṃsamaithunapratiśedhamātram atidiśyata iti 
prasiddhas tu brahmacāriśabdo maithunanivṛttāv eveti yatkiṃcid etat 
na snānam ācared bhuktvā nāturo na mahāniśi 
na vāsobhiḥ sahājasraṃ nāvijñāte jalāśaye 
nityasya snānasya bhuktavataḥ prāptyabhāvān nāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
smṛtyantare hi snānaṃ mahāyajñāḥ śeṣabhojanam ity arthakramaḥ śrutaḥ 
na caṇḍālasparśanādinimittakasyāpi nāśuci kṣaṇam api tiṣṭhet iti virodhāt 
ata icchālakṣaṇasya gharmādyapanodahetor ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
āturo vyādhigṛhītaḥ 
tasya sarvaprakārasnānapratiṣedho 'śucitve pi sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti 
kā tarhi tasya śuddhiḥ 
mārjanaṃ mantravat prokṣaṇaṃ vastratyāga evamādi kartavyam 
mahāniśā caturmuhūrta ubhayto 'rdharātritaḥ 
ye tu mahatī niśā yasmin kāle hemantādau iti vyācakṣate teṣāṃ māghaphālgunayoḥ prātaḥsnānavidhivirodhād apavyākhyānam 
nāpi haimantikīṣu rātriṣu niṣedha iti pramāṇam asti dvitīyasya niśāśabdasyābhāvāt 
vāsobhir iti sāmarthyalakṣaṇe śītādau vāsasāṃ bahutve sati pratiṣedhaḥ 
ekena vihitam eva na nagnaḥ snāyād iti 
dvābhyām aniyamaḥ 
bahūnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
jalāśayo jalādhāraḥ 
avijñātaḥ gādhāgādhatayā grāhādibhayena ca 
ajasraṃ sarvadety arthaḥ 
devatānāṃ guro rājñaḥ snātakācāryayos tathā 
nākrāmet kāmataś chāyāṃ babhruṇo dīkṣitasya ca 
pratikṛtayo 'tra devatās tāsāṃ chāyāsaṃbhavāt 
guruḥ pitā 
ācārya upanetā 
bhedopādānam ātideśikagauravanivṛttyartham 
tena mātulādiṣu nāyaṃ vidhir iti 
kecit samācāravirodhān naitad yuktam govalīvardavad bhedo vijñeyaḥ iti vadanti 
babhruḥ kapilo varṇaḥ 
tadguṇayuktaṃ dravyam 
babhrv atra gauḥ kapilā somalatā vā ubhayor babhruśabdena vede prayogadarśanāt 
kāmata ity abuddhipūrvam adoṣaḥ 
madhaṃdine 'rdharātre ca śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā ca sāmiṣam 
saṃdhyayor ubhayoś caiva na seveta catuṣpatham 
madhyāhne 'rdharātre mahāniśāyāṃ samāṃsaṃ ca śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā na seveta ciraṃ na tatrāsīta 
yadi kathaṃcid grāmādi gacchato nāntareṇa catuṣpathaṃ mārgāntaram asti tadā tāvanmātrasaṃbandho na niṣidhyate 
kecit tu cakāram evaṃ yojayanti 
śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā sāmiṣaṃ cānyad api bhojanam 
asmiṃś ca saṃbandhe samācāro 'nveṣyaḥ 
nānyathā vyavahitaḥ saṃbandho labhyate 
udvartanam apasnānaṃ viṇmūtre raktam eva ca 
śleṣmaniṣṭhyūtavāntāni nādhitiṣṭhet tu kāmataḥ 
udvartanam abhyaṅgamalāpakarṣaṇaṃ piṣṭādi 
apasnānam upayuktam udakam 
niṣṭhyūtam aśleṣmarūpam api bhuktvā tyaktaṃ tāmbūlavīṭikādi 
adhiṣṭhānaṃ tad uparisthānam 
kāmataḥ 
ajñānapūrvam adoṣaḥ 
vairiṇaṃ nopaseveta sahāyaṃ caiva vairiṇaḥ 
adhārmikaṃ taskaraṃ ca parasyaiva ca yoṣitam 
vairī śatrus tasya sadaiva upāyanapreṣaṇāny ekatra sthānāsane gṛhamānādikathāpravṛttir ityevamādi na kāryam 
adhārmikaḥ pātakī yaś ca kusṛtyā vartate 
taskaraś cauraḥ 
asmād eva ca bhedopādānād adhārmiko na sarvaḥ kiṃ tarhi yathā vyākhyātam 
parasya yoṣitam striyam 
yoṣidgrahaṇān na patny eva kiṃ tarhy avaruddhāpi vairakaraṇatvād ubhayor dṛṣṭadoṣanimittaiś ca pratiṣedhaḥ sāhacaryāt 
uttaratra ca dāragrahaṇam adṛṣṭadoṣātiśayadarśanārtham 
na punar evaṃ vaktavyam yoṣitam iti sāmānyanirdeśe dāraśabdārthavādād viśeṣāvagatiḥ 
nāyam asyārthavādaḥ 
bhinnam evaitad vākyam 
na hīdṛśam anāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃcana vidyate 
yādṛśaṃ puruṣasyeha paradāropasevanam 
ajīrṇakārakabhojanādi suvarṇāpaharaṇādi na hīdṛśam anāyuṣyam āyuṣyakṣayakaraṃ yādṛśaṃ paradāragamanam 
adṛṣṭena dṛṣṭena ca doṣaḥ 
kṣatriyaṃ caiva sarpaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca bahuśrutam 
nāvamanyeta vai bhūṣṇuḥ kṛśān api kadācana 
avamāna anādaro gauravābhāvas tiraskāraś ca 
kṛśān api tadātve prītiṃ kartum asamarthān api 
etat trayaṃ hi puruṣaṃ nirdahed avamānitam 
tasmād etat trayaṃ nityaṃ nāvamanyeta buddhimān 
nirdahet avamantāraṃ puruṣam 
trayam avamānitam 
kṣatriyaḥ sarpo dṛṣṭyā śaktyā brāhmaṇo japahomair adṛṣṭena ca doṣeṇa 
tasmād etat trayaṃ nityam ity upasaṃhāraḥ 
vidhāya doṣadarśanaṃ punar upasaṃhāro yatnena parihārārthaḥ 
yatnātiśayāc ca prāyaścitte gauravam apy anumīyate 
nātmānam avamanyeta pūrvābhir asamṛddhibhiḥ 
ā mṛtyoḥ śriyam anvicchen naināṃ manyeta durlabhām 
asamṛddhir dhanādyasampattiḥ kṛṣyādinā dhanārjanāvasare 
tatra nātmāvamantavyaḥ durbhago 'ham akṛtapuṇyo nāsminn avasare dhanaṃ mayā labdham kuto 'nyadā prāpsyāmi iti nāvasādo bhāvanīyaḥ 
ā mṛtyoḥ śriyam anvicchet 
āntyād ucchvāsād dhanārjanakāmo na tyaktavyaḥ 
na cainām śriyaṃ durlabhāṃ manyeta 
avaśyaṃ mama saṃpadyate madvyavasāyaḥ iti grahadauḥsthityādy aparigaṇayya tadarjane parvartitavyam 
asti kasyacit subhāṣitam
hīnāḥ puruṣakāreṇa gaṇayanti grahasthitim 
sattvodyam asamarthānāṃ nāsādhyaṃ vyavasāyinām 
anena caitad darśayati 
nāhaṃ durgataḥ kleśaprāpyadhana ādhānādau nādhikriye 
tato 'gnihotrahomakleśād uttīrṇo 'smi iti yasya buddhiḥ sa na samyaṅ manyate iti 
atas tadarthaṃ prayateta 
satyaṃ brūyāt priyaṃ brūyān na brūyāt satyam apriyam 
priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 
arthaprayuktavacanaṃ satye niyamyate 
yathādṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ ca satyaṃ 
priyaṃ brūyāt 
dvitīyo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ 
audāryādiguṇānukathanaṃ parasyādṛṣṭenāpi kenacid avasareṇa 
tathā putrajanmādi brāhmaṇa putras te jātaḥ ity asaty api svaprayojane yadi satyaṃ tad vaktavyam 
yadi tasya tan na viditam 
satyaṃ priyam apriyaṃ vāsti 
priyaṃ darśitam brāhmaṇa putraḥ ityādi 
apriyaṃ yathā brāhmaṇa kanyā te garbhiṇī 
tad asatyaṃ na brūyāt satyam api kanyāgarbhagrahaṇam apriyatvād aprakāśyam 
satyāṃ gatau tūṣṇīm āsitavyam 
nanu garbhiṇyām agarbhiṇīti vaktavyaṃ priyatvāt ata āha priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyād iti 
evaṃ ca yasya prathamaḥ sākṣātkāras tena tatra tūṣṇīm āsituṃ na labyate 
eṣa sanātano dharmaḥ 
sanātano nityo vedas tena vihitatvād dharmo 'pi sanātanaḥ 
bhadraṃ bhadram iti brūyād bhadram ity eva vā vadet 
śuṣkavairaṃ vivādaṃ ca na kuryāt kenacit saha 
atra prathamasya bhadraśabdasya nañlopaṃ vyācakṣate 
yad abhadraṃ tad bhadram iti brūyāt 
itikaraṇaḥ pradarśanārthaḥ 
kalyāṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ siddhaṃ śreya ityādayaḥ siddhāḥ śabdāḥ prayoktavyāḥ 
pūrvapadasyāpi pradarśanārthatve 'ndhe cakṣuṣmān mūrkhe prājña ityādivacanaṃ labhyate 
atha vā bhadram ity eṣa eva śabda evamādiṣu vaktavyaḥ 
śuṣkavairam asaty arthādiprayojana āhopuruṣikaṃ vākyaṃ na kartavyam 
evaṃ rājādhikaraṇe vivādaṃ śuṣkam evetyādi sampadyate 
kenacid asamarthenāpi 
nātikalyaṃ nātisāyaṃ nātimadhyaṃdine sthite 
nājñātena samaṃ gacchen naiko na vṛṣalaiḥ saha 
atikalyaśabdaś cāharmukhe vartate 
uṣaḥkāle na gantavyam 
atisāyaṃ paścimasaṃdhyāsamaye 'jñātena puruṣeṇa saha na gacchet asahāyaś ca vṛṣalaiḥ śūdraiś ca saha 
hīnāṅgān atirikāṅgān vidyāhīnān vayo'tigān 
rūpadraviṇahīnāṃś ca jātihīnāṃ ca nākṣipet 
hīnāṅgāḥ kāṇakuṣṭhikubjādayaḥ 
atiriktam adhikaṃ aṅge yeṣāṃ ślīpadyādayāḥ 
vidyāhīnā mūrkhāḥ 
vayo'tigā atyantavṛddhāḥ 
rūpahīnā duḥsaṃsthānāś cipiṭakekarādayaḥ 
draviṇahīnāḥ daridrāḥ 
draviṇaṃ dhanaṃ tena hīnā varjitāḥ 
jātyā hīnā nikṛṣṭajātayaḥ kuṇḍagolakādyāḥ 
tān nākṣipet 
ākṣepaḥ kutsā 
eteṣāṃ etaiḥ śabdair āhvānam eva kutsā 
na spṛśet pāṇinocchiṣṭo vipro gobrāhmaṇānalān 
na cāpi paśyed aśuciḥ svastho jyotirgaṇān divi 
ucchiṣṭo bhuktavān anācāntaḥ kṛtamūtrapurīṣaś ca 
aśucimātram ihocchiṣṭaśabdenocyate 
tathā cocchiṣṭasya gavādisparśaḥ pratiṣidhyate 
aśuciśabdena prāyaścittaṃ vakṣyati 
prāṇigrahaṇam atantram 
anyenāpy aṅgena sparśo neṣyate 
vastrādyantarite na niṣedhaḥ 
divi jyotirgaṇaṃ na pasyet 
svastho 'nāturaḥ 
divītivacanād bhūmau jyotiṣo 'gner apratiṣedhaḥ 
spṛṣṭvaitān aśucir nityam adbhiḥ prāṇān upaspṛśet 
gātrāṇi caiva sarvāṇi nābhiṃ pāṇitalena tu 
aviśeṣavacane 'pi prāṇāś cakṣurādaya eva mūrdhanyā ucyante 
prāṇaśabdaś cakṣurādivacano vede prāṇasaṃbhava upaniṣadi dṛśyate 
gātrāṇi aṃsajānupādādīni 
pāṇitalenāpo gṛhītvā spṛśet 
anāturaḥ svāni khāni na spṛśed animittataḥ 
romāṇi ca rahasyāni sarvāṇy eva vivarjayet 
animittataḥ kaṇḍūyanādinimittaṃ vinā 
svāni khāni cakṣurādīni chidrāṇi na spṛśet 
rahasyāni kakṣopasthagatāni vivarjayet prakṛtena sparśena 
ślokapūraṇārtham ākhyātāntaropādānam 
anye tv āhuḥ ākhyātāntaranirdeśād darśanaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
maṅgalācārayuktaḥ syāt prayatātmā jitendriyaḥ 
japec ca juhuyāc caiva nityam agnim atandritaḥ 
abhilaṣītāyur dhanādisiddhir maṅgalam 
tadartham ācāro maṅgalācāro gorocanātilakaśubhaphalādisparśas tena yukto nityaṃ tat sevāparaḥ syāt 
nanu cācārasya prāmāṇyam uktam eva 
satyam 
adṛṣṭasyārthasyānenocyate 
dṛṣṭabuddhyā hi kriyamāṇasya vyabhicāradarśanena kaścid anādaraparaḥ syāt 
tadarthaṃ punar ucyate 
yathā prasthānakāle saṃnihite punaḥ kathanaṃ dadhyādau vandanaṃ śuklanivasanadarśanam dakṣiṇataḥ kapiñjalavāsitam phalite vṛkṣe dakṣiṇata eva vāyasasya  evamādi maṅgalārtham ādaraṇīyam viparītaṃ varjanīyam 
jitendriyo viṣayeṣv alālasaḥ 
puruṣārthatayaitad asakṛd uktam api vinipātanvṛttyartham ucyate 
agner anyatrāpi homasaṃbhavāj juhuyād agnim ity āha 
atandrita ity uktānuvādaḥ 
maṅgalācārayuktānāṃ nityaṃ ca prayatātmanām 
japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva vinipāto na vidyate 
vinipātaḥ prākṛtāśubhanimittako daivopadravo vyādhir dhananāśa iṣṭaviyogādiḥ 
sa evam ācārāṇāṃ māṅgalyakān nivartate 
anenāpi nityataivoktā bhavati saty api phalārthatve 
na hi kaścid daivopadravānivṛttim arthyate 
ato nityagrahaṇam anuvādaḥ 
athāpi kaścid anarthī syāt tathāpi nitya evāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
evaṃ cobhayārthatā tasya nityādhikāravṛttir vinipātanivṛttiś ca 
vedam eva japen nityaṃ yathākālam atandritaḥ 
taṃ hy asyāhuḥ paraṃ dharmam upadharmo 'nya ucyate 
japec ca juhuyāc caivety uktam 
tatra tāvaj japasya sādhanam āha vedam eva japed iti 
avaśiṣṭo 'rthavādaḥ 
yathākālaṃ yasmin yasmin kāle 
vīpsāyām avyayībhāvaḥ 
yadaiva hy aihikī ceṣṭā nātipadyate tadaiva japet 
anyāny agnihotrādikarmāṇi niyatakālāni 
japasya tu śucitvam eva kālaḥ 
ayaṃ mukhyo dharmaḥ 
upadharmaḥ 
dharmasya samīpe upadharmaḥ 
samīpapradhānas tatpuruṣo nāvyayībhavaḥ 
upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti yathā 
dharmāntaranindā vedajapastutyarthā na tanniṣedhārthā 
vedābhyāsena satataṃ śaucena tapasaiva ca 
adroheṇa ca bhūtānāṃ jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm 
adroho 'hiṃsā 
bhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāni 
jātismaraphalāny etāni karmāṇi catvāri yāvajjīvam anuṣṭhīyamānāni bhavanti 
jātir janmāntaram 
pūrvabhavā paurvikī 
paurvikīṃ saṃsmaran jātiṃ brahmaivābhyasyate dvijaḥ 
brahmābhyāsena cājasram anantaṃ sukham aśnute 
nanu ceṣṭaphalakāmaḥ sarvaṃ samīhate 
na ca janmāntarānusmaraṇam ekāntasukhaṃ yena phalatvena vedābhyāsādicatuṣṭayasya varṇyate 
tata āha paurvikīṃ jātiṃ smaran brahma veda abhyasyate tatra śraddhāvān bhavati 
īdṛśo brahmābhyāso yena janmāntaraṃ smaryate iti 
smaran punas tadabhyāse vartate 
tasmāc cānekajanmābhyastād anantaraṃ brahmaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ sukham 
ajasram apunarāvṛttim aśnute prāpnoti 
anantaśabdena sukhaviśeṣa upalakṣyate asādhanā paritṛptir ātmanaḥ 
tasyājasrapadena śāśvataṃ pratipādyate 
tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ prāpyate na caitat kṣīyate 
samānārthāv apy apunaruktau 
yathā vṛttakaṃ vahataḥ purīṣam iti vṛttakam udakaṃ purīṣaṃ ca 
tatraiko rūḍho 'paraḥ kriyāśabdaḥ 
purīṣaṃ pūraṇasamarthaṃ vṛttakam udakam 
sāvitrān śāntihomāṃś ca kuryāt parvasu nityaśaḥ 
pitṝṃś caivāṣṭakāsv arcen nityam anvaṣṭakāsu ca 
pūrvoktānāṃ homānāṃ svarūpam ucyate 
sāvitrāḥ savitradevatākāḥ 
parvasu ca paurṇamāsyamāvāsyayoḥ kartavyāḥ 
śāntyarthā homā aniṣṭanivṛttiprayojanāḥ 
dravyaṃ cātrājyam evānupāttadravyaviśeṣeṣu sarvahomeṣu śrūyate sarvasmai vā etad yajñāya gṛhyate yat dhruvāyām ājyam iti 
parvasv iti ca saptamī dvitīyārthe draṣṭavyā 
adhikaraṇam agnir homasya na karma kvacit 
hotavyāni paṭhyante lājājyamāṃsasaktudadhipayodhānāḥ piṣṭam ityādi 
ete ca homā apūrvāḥ 
yāvatī ca samācārād itikartavyatā sā prāg darśitā 
aṣṭakā ūrdhvam āgrahāyaṇyās tamisrapakṣāṇāṃ tisro 'ṣtamyaḥ keṣāṃcit hemantaśiśirayoś caturṇām aparapakṣāṇām iti vacanam 
tatra pitṝn arcayec chrāddhena 
pitṛśabdaḥ pūrvapramītapitrādivacanaḥ 
anvaṣṭakās tā eva navamyaḥ 
dūrād āvasathān mūtraṃ dūrāt pādāvasecanam 
ucchiṣṭānnaniṣekaṃ ca dūrād eva samācaret 
pādāv avasicyete yenodakādinā tat pādāvasecanam 
tad dūrāt kṣipet 
atha vā pādaprakṣānanam eva dūrāt kuryāt 
niṣekaḥ pariṣekaḥ 
tailādikṛtasnānodakam api śakyate niṣekaśabdenābhidhātum 
upayuktaśeṣasya tyājyasyāyaṃ dūrato nikṣepa ucyate 
tad dhi niṣekaśabdena prasiddhataram 
maitraṃ prasādhanaṃ snānaṃ dantadhāvanam añjanam 
pūrvāhṇa eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam 
arthavādeṣu paśvaṅgasaṃstave maitraḥ pāyur iti śrūyate 
tad ihāpy abhedopacārān mitraḥ pāyus tatra bhavaṃ śaucaṃ maitram 
prasādhanaṃ keśaracanām upalepanādi 
atha vā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye pade maitraṃ prasādhanam 
akṛtaśakṛtāpi prātaḥ pāyuprakṣālanaṃ kartavyam 
yathā hi suptasya lālāsrāvāder avaśyaṃ bhāvitvān mukhadhāvanaṃ vihitam evam etad api vinaiva vā nimittena mukhasya jaghanyayor aṅgayoḥ prakṣālanam avaśyaṃ kartavyam 
anye tv āhur mitrakāryaṃ maitram tat sarvakāryebhyo 'ntaraṅgebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ kartavyam 
tatrāpy aśuceḥ kṣaṇam apy avasthābhāvāt svakāryāpekṣayā pūrvatvaṃ draṣṭavyam 
tadā ca pūrvāhṇaśabdaḥ kāryāntarebhyaḥ pūrvatāmātropalakṣaṇārthaḥ na punar aparāhṇapratiṣedhārthaḥ 
atha vā mitra ādityaḥ 
tadupasthānaṃ maitram 
daivatāny abhigacchet tu dhārmikāṃś ca dvijottamān 
īśvaraṃ caiva rakṣārthaṃ gurūn eva ca parvasu 
abhivādayed vṛddhāṃś ca dadyāc caivāsanaṃ svakam 
kṛtāñjalir upāsīta gacchataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nviyāt 
śrutismṛtyuditaṃ samyaṅ nibaddhaṃ sveṣu karmasu 
dharmamūlaṃ niṣeveta sadācāram atandritaḥ 
ācārāl labhate hy āyur ācārād īpsitāḥ prajāḥ 
ācārād dhanam akṣayyam ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam 
na cāyam eṣa vidvattādiguṇasaṃpannaḥ sādhyate 
prajāyā hy ete guṇāḥ prārthyante 
tad uktam
tayā gavā kīm kriyate yā na dhenur na garbhiṇī 
ko 'rthaḥ putreṇa jātena yo na vidvān na dhārmikaḥ 
akṣayyam api prabhūtaṃ yad asadvyasanair api akṣayyam 
alakṣaṇaṃ skandhopari tilakādi dāridryādidaurbhāgyasūcakam 
tad apy ācāro hanti 
tena hy adharma ācāraparatvena naśyati 
durācāro hi puruṣo loke bhavati ninditaḥ 
duḥkhabhāgī ca satataṃ vyādhito 'lpāyur eva ca 
sarvalakṣaṇahīno 'pi yaḥ sadācāravān naraḥ 
śraddadhaṇo 'nasūyaś ca śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati 
yad yat paravaśaṃ karma tat tad yatnena varjayet 
yad yad ātmavaśaṃ tu syāt tat tat seveta yatnataḥ 
yat paraprārthanayā svaparahitādi kriyate tat paravaśaṃ varjyate na tu yad vṛttisādhyam ārtvijyādi 
tad dhi svavaśam eva 
tadviṣayakam eva bhṛtyādi svīkriyate 
na cānena paravaśam api dīkṣitasya niṣidhyate smṛtyā śrutiṃ bādhitum anyāyyatvāt ukte ca viṣaye sāvakāśatvāt smṛteḥ 
yat tv ātmano vaśyam svalpayā dhanamātrayā paropakāraḥ svalpo 'pi svayaṃ tat karma kuryat 
nityakarmāsaṃpattau kuṭumbopayogini dhane 'sati kartavyaiva yācñā upāyāntarābhāve 
kiṃ tu viśeṣato yakṣye viśeṣato dāsye iti 
satyāṃ kasyāṃcid dhanamātrāyāṃ saṃtoṣapareṇa bhavitavyam ity evam asya tātparyam 
sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham 
etad vidyāt samāsena lakṣaṇaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ 
yācñāṃ nindati 
yat paravaśaṃ tat sarvaṃ duḥkham 
tiṣṭhatu tāvat parasya gṛhadvāry upasthānam anuvṛttir atra cāmutra ca bhramaṇam 
yat tu
saṃkalpa eva yācñāyāṃ hṛdayaṃ na prasahyate 
nūnaṃ māyām asaṃdigdhāṃ sṛṣṭir nāsau svayaṃbhuvaḥ 
samāsena saṃkṣepeṇaitad duḥkhasya lakṣaṇaṃ yā yācñā 
sukhaṃ caitad yāspṛhā 
yat karma kurvato 'sya syāt paritoṣo 'ntarātmanaḥ 
tat prayatnena kurvīta viparītaṃ tu varjayet 
ātmatuṣṭeḥ prāguktāyāḥ punar vacanaṃ smaraṇārtham 
viṣayaś ca tasyā darśana eva 
yatra karmaṇi kriyamāṇe kiṃkathikā na bhavati tat kartayam 
yatra tu hṛdayaṃ na tuṣyati tad varjanīyam 
ācāryaṃ ca pravaktāraṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ gurum 
na hiṃsyād brāhmaṇān gāś ca sarvāṃś caiva tapasvinaḥ 
ācārya upanetā 
pravaktā adhyāpako vyākhyātā 
gurus tābhyām anyaḥ pitṛvyamātulādiḥ 
sarvāṃś caiva tapasvinaḥ 
prāyaścittapravṛttān pātakino 'pīti sarvagrahaṇam 
aviśeṣeṇa sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra tatra hiṃsā niṣiddhā 
punarvacanam ācāryādīnām ātatāyinām api niṣedhārtham iti kecit 
yas tu guruṃ vā bālavṛddhau vā ityādir arthavādo 'syaiva pratiprasavaḥ 
upādhyāyas tv āha 
nāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
paryudāso 'yam 
saṃkalpavidhānārtho nodyantam ādityam īkṣeta itivat 
ataḥ prayatne 'tikrānte bhavaty ayaṃ saṃkalpapratiṣedha iti 
atha vā duruktabhāṣaṇaṃ hiṃsā vāgbhis tais tair jaghāna tām iti prayogadarasanāt 
atha vā pratikūlācaraṇe hantiḥ prayuktaḥ 
nāstikyaṃ vedanindāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca kutsanam 
dveṣaṃ stambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca krodhaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca varjayet 
vedapramāṇakānām arthānāṃ mithyātvādhyavasāye nāstikyam 
śabdena pratipādanaṃ nindā 
punaruktau vedo 'nyo 'nyavyāhato nātra satyam astīti bhāvadoṣeṇa na pūrvapakṣabhaṅgyā 
agnyādayo devatās tāsāṃ kutsanaṃ nindaiva 
yathā dagdhadaivena hatāḥ sma iti daive bhavanti vaktāraḥ 
dveṣo mātsaryādihetukāprītiḥ 
stambho 'haṃkārād anamrātā 
māno 'haṃkāra ātmābhimānaḥ paṇḍito 'ham āḍhyo 'ham iti 
amarṣaḥ krodhas taikṣṇyaṃ pāruṣyam 
dveṣapūrvakaḥ krodhaḥ 
parasya daṇḍaṃ nodyacchet kruddho nainaṃ nipātayet 
anyatra putrāc chiṣyād vā siṣṭyarthaṃ tāḍayet tu tau 
yena damyate sa daṇḍaḥ karalaguḍaśiphārajjuvidalādi 
taṃ parasya kruddhaḥ san nodyacchen notkṣipet 
prahārārthaṃ tiryag api na nipātayet 
nipātaṇaṃ vegena tadaṅgasaṃyogaḥ 
putraśiṣyāv anutāḍayec chiphāveṇudalacapeṭābhir yathāṣṭame vakṣyati na daṇḍena 
tau ca na krodhena kiṃ tarhi śiṣṭyartham anuśāsanārtham bālyād yadi cāpalam ācarataḥ 
yathā pṛṣṭatas tu śarīrasya itīṣat tāḍyau 
śiṣyagrahaṇaṃ dāsīdāsasyāpi pradarśanārtham samānakāryatvāt 
brāhmaṇāyāvaguryaiva dvijātir vadhakāmyayā 
śataṃ varṣāṇi tāmisre narake parivartate 
aviśeṣeṇa sarvaviṣaye tāḍane niṣiddhe brāhmaṇe tatkriyāyā doṣātiśayadarśanārthaṃ pañcaślokī 
avagūrya udyamyaiva daṇḍādi vadhakāmyayā tāḍanecchayā vinaiva nipātena śataṃ varṣāṇi narake pacyate parivartate tatphalam upabhuṅkte 
tāḍayitvā tṛṇenāpi saṃrambhān matipūrvakam 
ekaviṃśatim ājātīḥ pāpayoniṣu jāyate 
saṃrambhaḥ krodhāveśaḥ na tu narmaṇā 
buddhipūrvam 
ekaviṃśatim ājātīḥ 
jātir janma 
ākāro 'narthakaḥ pralambata itivat 
pāpānāṃ yonaya iti tiryagjantavo duḥkhabahulāḥ 
tiṣṭhatu tāvad daṇḍādiḥ pīḍākaraḥ padārthaḥ 
tṛṇenāpi tāḍane dīrghakālo narakānubhavaḥ 
ayudhyamānasyotpādya brāhmaṇasyāsṛg aṅgataḥ 
duḥkhaṃ sumahad āpnoti pretyāprājñatayā naraḥ 
asṛg lohitam 
tad aṅgataḥ aṅgād yatrotpādayati brāhmaṇasya khaḍgaprahārādinā 
ayudhyamānasya na tu droṇācāryavat kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa yuyutsoḥ 
sumahad duḥkhaṃ narakādi pretya mṛto janmāntare 
aprājñatayety anuvādaḥ 
prājño hi śāstrārthajñānān na katham apy evaṃ kuryāt 
śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūnt saṃgṛhṇāti mahītalāt 
tāvato 'bdān amutrānyaiḥ śoṇitotpādako 'dyate 
īṣatprahāre pūrvaphalam 
adhike tu pāṃsavo rajāṃsi dhūlyavayavās tān yāvanto yatparimāṇān gṛhṇāti saṃhanti brāhmaṇāṅgacyutaṃ bhūmipatitaṃ lohitam tāvato 'bdāṃs tāvanti varṣāṇy amutra paraloke 'dyate śvaśṛgālair yaḥ śoṣitasyotpādakaḥ prahartā 
na kadācid dvije tasmād vidvān avagured api 
na tāḍayet tṛṇenāpi na gātrāt srāvayed asṛk 
pūrvasya kriyātrayapratiṣedhavidher udyamananipātanaviṣayasyopasaṃhāraḥ 
na kadācid āpady apīty arthaḥ 
adhārmiko naro yo hi yasya cāpy anṛtaṃ dhanam 
hiṃsāratiś ca yo nityaṃ nehāsau sukham edhate 
sāmānyataḥ sarvahiṃsāpratiṣedhaśeṣo 'yam 
adharmaḥ śāstrapratiṣiddho 'gamyāgamanādiḥ taṃ caraty adhārmikaḥ 
yasya cānṛtam eva dhanam 
sākṣye vyavahāranirṇayādau cāsatyam uktvā utkocadhanaṃ sādhayati 
yaś ca hiṃsāratir hiṃsāyām abhirato vairānubandhād arthahetor vā parān hinasti 
nāsau sukham edhate na sukhaṃ prāpnoti ihāsmiṃl loke 
na sīdann api dharmeṇa mano 'dharme niveśayet 
adhārmikāṇāṃ pāpānām āśu paśyan viparyayam 
dharmaḥ śāstramaryādā 
tena vartamānaḥ sīdann apy avasādam api prāpnuvan nādharme mano niveśayet 
yata adhārmikā yady api cauryotkocadambhādibhir dhanasamṛddhā dṛśyante tathāpi teṣām āśu viparyayo dṛśyate dhananāśādiḥ 
ato na dharmād vicalet 
suhṛd bhūtvā dṛṣṭam arthaṃ darśitavān 
idānīṃ śāstrārtham āha 
nādharmaś carito loke sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva 
śanair āvartamānas tu kartur mūlāni kṛntati 
aniyatakālatvād vaidikānāṃ śubhāśubhaphalānāṃ karmaṇām evam ucyate 
nādharmaś caritaḥ anuṣṭhitaḥ sadyaḥ phalati phalaṃ dadāti 
vede hi kevalaṃ karmaṇāṃ vihitapratiṣiddhānāṃ sukhaduḥkhapalatvaṃ śrutam 
kālaviśeṣas tu nāvagamitaḥ 
vākyavyāpāro hi kartavyatāvagamaparatve 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandhabodhamātre paryavasyati na kālaviśeṣam ākṣipati phalavatāṃ karmaṇām 
nityānāṃ tu na phalataḥ kartavyatā 
pratiṣiddhaparihāre 'pi naiva narakādiduḥkhanivṛttikāmasyādhikāraḥ kiṃ tu śāstrapratiṣedhasāmarthyāt 
sa tu pratiṣedho duḥkhaphalatvaṃ pratiṣiddhānuṣṭhānasya bodhayati 
nipunata etad ucyamānam atigranthavistaram ākṣipatīty uparamyate 
gaur iva 
sādharmyavaidharmābhyām ayaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
yathā gauḥ pṛthivī vyuptabījā na tadaivānekasasyaśālinī bhavati kiṃ tarhi paripākam apekṣate tādṛśaṃ vaidikaṃ karmeti sādharmyam 
vaidharmyeṇāpi yathā gauḥ paśur vāhadohābhyāṃ sadyaḥ phalati naivaṃ dharmādharmau 
adharmagrahaṇaṃ dharmasyāpi phaladānaṃ prati kālāniyamapradarśanārtham 
āvartyamānaḥ kālenopacīyamānaḥ 
kartuḥ pratiṣiddhānuṣṭhātuḥ mūlāni kṛntati chinatti 
mūlakartanena sarveṇa sarvavināśa upalakṣyate 
yathā mūlacchedād vṛkṣādisthāvarāṇām apunarbhavas tadvad adharmakāriṇām 
yadi nātmani putreṣu na cet putreṣu naptṛṣu 
na tv eva tu kṛto 'dharmaḥ kartur bhavati niṣphalaḥ 
idam ayuktaṃ yad anyakṛtasya karmaṇo 'nyagāmitā phalsyocyate 
kartuḥ phaladāni vaidikāni karmāṇi 
na vaiśvānaranyāyo 'sti śravaṇābhāvāt 
na hi putrādyarthatātra śrutā 
satyam 
putre pīḍyamāne pīḍitasya pitur adhikataraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati 
ataḥ kartur eva duḥkham 
putrasyāpi svakṛtāt paurvadehikāt karmaṇas tatphalam ity aviruddham 
evaṃ naptṛṣv api draṣṭavyam 
naptāraḥ pautrāḥ 
kṛto 'dharma iti saṃhitāyās tulyatvād dharmādharmau dvāv apy upāttau 
adharmeṇaidhate tāvat tato bhadrāṇi paśyati 
tataḥ sapatnān jayati samūlas tu vinaśyati 
adharmeṇa prabhudrohādinā edhate vṛddhiṃ labhate 
tāvat tasminn eva kāle 
tato dhanaṃ grāmaṃ vā prāpya tato bhadrāṇi bahubhṛtyagavāśvādi saṃpattilakṣaṇāni paśyaty anubhavati 
tataḥ sapatnān arīn daridrāñ jayati paribhavati 
tarhi dharme sthitān kutaścana kusṛtihīnā labhante 
atas teṣāṃ dāridryaśabda aiśvarye paribhavaḥ 
samūlaṃ ca kiyantaṃ kālam evaṃ bhūtvā saputrajñātidhanabāndhavā ucchidyante 
tasmād dharmo na hātavyaḥ 
satyadharmāryavṛtteṣu śauce caivāramet sadā 
śiṣyāṃś ca śiṣyād dharmeṇa vāgbāhūdarasaṃyataḥ 
satyaṃ yathādṛṣṭārthavāditā 
dharmaḥ śrutiviṣayau vidhipratiṣedhau 
satyasya tādrūpye 'pi bedena nirdeśo 'tiśayārthaḥ 
anṛtaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ svabhāvabhūtam 
ato yatnena punaḥ punaḥ pratiṣidhyate 
āryavṛttaṃ sadācāraḥ 
āryāḥ śiṣṭās teṣāṃ vṛttam ācaritam 
tatra āramet 
ratiḥ paritoṣaḥ 
eteṣv artheṣu paritoṣo 'nena vidhīyate 
anyān apy evam ācārān dṛṣṭvā manaḥprasādaṃ kuryāt 
śiṣyāś caiva bhāryāputradāsacchātrā dharmeṇānuśāsanīyāḥ 
pṛṣṭhatas tu śarīrasya ityādidharmāḥ 
vāgbāhūdarasaṃyataḥ 
saty asati ca prayojane abahubhāṣitā vāksaṃsamaḥ 
bāhvoḥ saṃyamo bāhubalāśrayaṇena kasyacid api apīḍanam 
udarasya saṃyamo 'naudarikatā abahubhojitvam 
audarikatā bahubhojitvaṃ bhojyaviśeṣe gardhayā paragṛhe bāhulyena bhojanam 
ukto 'py arthaḥ punar ucyate bahukṛtvo 'pi pathyaṃ vaditavyam iti sarvatra paunaruktyaparihāraḥ 
parityajed arthakāmau yau syātāṃ dharmavarjitau 
dharmaṃ cāpy asukhodarkaṃ lokasaṃkruṣṭam eva ca 
uktas trivargaḥ puruṣārthaḥ 
kaścit tulyatāṃ manyamānaḥ  arthakāmaparihāreṇa yathā dharmaḥ sevyate tadvirodhī jyotiṣṭomādiḥ 
sa hy arthavirodhī dakṣiṇādidānena kāmavirodhī dīkṣitasya brahmacaryavidhānāt 
evam arthakāmāv api dharmaparihāreṇa na seveta 
tatra na hiṃsyād bhūtāni iti yatra kāmo hiṃsāyā vairānubandhād yaḥ kaścid vaktum iṣyate tatra sa viṣayapratiṣedhāya yatra tu kasyacid dhiṃsayārthakāmāv iṣyete tatra nāsti hiṃsādoṣaḥ  iti parvartate tadbhrāntinivṛttyartham idam ucyate 
parityajet pariharet tādṛśārthakāmau yatra dharmavirodhaḥ 
evaṃ sarvato dharmasya balīyastvam uktvā kasmiṃścid viṣaye tasyāpi parihartavyatām āha dharmaṃ cāpy asukhodarkam 
udarkaḥ uttarakālaḥ so 'sukho yasya  yathā sarvasvadānaṃ vā dadāti dhārmiko 'yaṃ mahāpuṇyaḥ iti yathā nadītīreṣv ekānteṣv api prākṛtajanā bahavaḥ paśyanti tatra snānam 
bhavatīty arthasnānaṃ dharmārjanasamakṣāpekṣā tu sādhuvādāya 
yathā ca tīrthakākebhyo dānam 
bhavati dānaṃ dharmaḥ dātṛtvaprasiddhyutpādanārthatvāt  tebhyo bhidyate 
atha vā yad garhyatayā lokaḥ saṃkrośati  yathā gor avadhyasya vadhaḥ māṃsasya bhakṣaṇaṃ ca  tad vigarhitataraṃ paśvantarebhyo loke 
dṛṣṭamūlaś cāyam ahisparśavat pratiṣedhaḥ 
vihito 'yam artha ity avaidyatayā prākṛtajanā ajānānā adhārmikatvaṃ yaṣṭuḥ prakhyāpayeyus teṣāṃ ca bahutvataḥ prasiddhyā śiṣṭā apy evaṃ prasiddhamūlam anavagacchantaḥ parivarjayeyuḥ 
tad uktam dhārmike sati rājani iti 
etad uktaṃ pūrvair vyākhyātam ity anugatam 
na hi pratyakṣaśrutivihitasya smṛtyā bādho nyāyyaḥ 
idaṃ tu yuktataram udāharaṇam 
niyogadharmaḥ smṛtyā vihito lokasaṃkruṣṭatvān na kriyate 
tathā yaḥ kaścid anāthataruṇīṃ striyaṃ kāruṇyād bibharti tatra yadi lokasaṃkroṣa āśaṅkyate  strītvenaivāsmā eṣā rocate  sa lokasaṃkruṣṭadharmaḥ 
na pāṇipādacapalo na netracapalo 'nṛjuḥ 
na syād vākcapalaś caiva na paradrohakarmadhīḥ 
pāṇipādābhyāṃ capalaḥ 
tṛtīyā iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ 
cāpalaṃ ca hastenānupayujyamānasyāpi vastuno grahaṇāpasāraṇe 
parastrīprekṣaṇacitrasaṃdarśanādi netracāpalam 
paradrohārthaṃ karmabuddhiś ca na kartavyā 
yenāsya pitaro yātā yena yātāḥ pitāmahāḥ 
tena yāyāt satāṃ mārgaṃ tena gacchan na riṣyati 
yo dharmaḥ pitrādibhir anuṣṭhitaḥ yaiś ca saha prītir bhāvitā yaiḥ saha kanyāvivāhādiḥ kṛtaḥ yaiva ca śākhā adhītā sa eva panthā āśrayaṇīyaḥ 
tathā kurvan na riṣyati na bādhyate loke na nindyate 
anye tv aviduṣaḥ puruṣadharmeṣv ahiṃsādiṣu pratyupāyo 'yam rājapaṭaha iva mlecchādīnām 
agnihotrādayas tu svapratyayāpekṣā eva 
atra codayanti 
yadi nirmūlaḥ pitrādibhir anuṣṭhito 'rthaḥ kathaṃ tasya dharmatvam 
athāsti mūlam tat putrasyāpi bhaviṣyati kiṃ pitrādigrahaṇena 
tad etat parihṛtam aviduṣāṃ mūlam ajānānām upadeśo 'yam iti 
anye tu yatra nipuṇato 'pi nirūpyamāṇe saṃdeho na nivartate ubhayathā vākyārthapratipattiḥ tatra pitrādyācaritaḥ panthā āśrayaṇīya ity āhuḥ 
etad api cintyam 
na hi nityasaṃdigdhaṃ nāma pramāṇam asti 
avaśyaṃ hy ekārthaniṣṭhena vākyena bhavitavyam 
vikalpiteṣu vā padārtheṣu pitrādyācaritaṃ karmānucaraṇīyam yato 'nya ācaritavantaḥ 
satāṃ mārgam iti 
yadi pitṛpitāmahādibhiḥ kaiścit kathaṃcid adharma ācaritapūrvaḥ sa na āśrayaṇīya iti satāṃ mārgam ity āha 
ṛtvikpurohitācāryair mātulātithisaṃśritaiḥ 
bālavṛddhāturair vaidyair jñātisaṃbandhibāndhavaiḥ 
mātāpitṛbhyāṃ jāmībir bhrātrā putreṇa bhāryayā 
duhitrā dāsavargeṇa vivādaṃ na samācaret 
na samācared ity ekaikena saṃbadhyate 
saṃśritā āśrayāgatā upajīvinaḥ 
vaidyā vidvāṃso bhiṣajo vā 
jñātayaḥ pitṛpakṣāḥ 
saṃbandhino vaivāhyāḥ 
bāndhavā mātṛpakṣā mātṛṣvasrīyaprabhṛtayaḥ 
jāmayo bhaginyāḥ svavāsinaś ca 
vivādo virodhaḥ pratikūlācaraṇaṃ vākkalahaś ca 
etair na kuryāt   
etair vivādān saṃtyajya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate 
etair jitaiś ca jayati sarvāṃl lokān imān gṛhī 
etair vivādaiḥ kriyamāṇair yaḥ pāpayogo bhavati akartus tena na saṃbandhaḥ 
sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyata ity ucyate 
etaiś ca jitair upekṣitaiḥ sarvāṃl lokāñ jayati svīkarotīty arthavādaḥ 
ācāryo brahmalokeśaḥ prājāpatye pitā prabhuḥ 
atithis tv indralokeśo devalokasya cartvijaḥ 
ācāryo brahmalokasyeśaḥ prabhus tasmin parituṣṭe brahmalokaḥ prāpyate 
ato guṇato brahmalokeśa ity ucyate 
prājāpatye loke pitā prabhuḥ 
jāmayo 'psarasām loke vaiśvadevasya bāndhavāḥ 
saṃbandhino hy apāṃ loke pṛthivyā mātṛmātulau 
ākāśeśās tu vijñeyā bālavṛddhakṛśāturāḥ 
bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ samaḥ pitrā bhāryā putraḥ svakā tanuḥ 
bhāryā putraḥ svkīyā tanur ātmīyam eva śarīram  
chāyā svā dāsavargaś ca duhitā kṛpaṇaṃ param 
tasmād etair adhikṣiptaḥ sahetāsajvaraḥ sadā 
yo bhṛtyavargaḥ sa ātmīyā chāyā 
yathā chāyā nityānugatā na krodhaviṣaya evaṃ bhṛtyavargo 'pi 
duhitā kṛpaṇam anukampyā dayanīyā 
etaiḥ pūrvoktair adhikṣiptaḥ paruṣavacanair ākṛṣṭaḥ kopitaḥ saheta kṣameta 
asajvaro 'vidyamānajvaraḥ jvarābhāvena ca cittasyāsaṃkṣobho lakṣyate 
jvaritasya hi cittasaṃkṣobho bhavati tadvat kruddhasya 
atha vā pāṭhāntaram asaṃjvaraḥ 
saṃtāpaḥ saṃjvaraḥ 
sa nañā pratiṣidhyate 
pratigrahasamartho 'pi prasaṅgaṃ tatra varjayet 
pratigraheṇa hy asyāśu brāhmaṃ tejaḥ praśāmyati 
parasmād adṛṣṭaprayuktād yal labhyate sa pratigrahaḥ 
tatra samarthaḥ śakto 'pi prasaṅgaṃ punaḥ pravṛttiṃ varjayet 
śrutādhyayanaśīlasaṃpattir dravyavidhijñatā ca sāmarthyam 
tasmād avidvān bibhiyāt ity atroktam apy etad uttarārthaṃ punar anūdyate 
tad darśayati 
na dravyāṇām avijñāya vidhiṃ dharmyaṃ pratigrahe 
prājñaḥ pratigrahaṃ kuryād avasīdann api kṣudhā 
avijñāya kāmopabhogādyarthaṃ na pratigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ 
etad uktaṃ bhavati ātmanaḥ kuṭumbasthityai nityakarmasaṃpattyai ca pratigrahaḥ kartavyah nānyathā 
avasīdann api kṣudhā apratigṛhṇan yady apy avasādaṃ gacchati 
avasādaḥ śarīrasyānabhivṛddhiḥ 
atha vā dravyāṇāṃ vidhiṃ dharmyaṃ pratigrahe ity evaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyate 
ko 'sau dharmyo vidhiḥ 
dharmyaṃ prayojanaṃ vijñāya pratigrahamantraṃ dravyāṇāṃ ca devatāḥ agnaye hiraṇyaṃ rudrāya gām ityādiḥ 
aviduṣo dravyaviśeṣaṃ prati pratigrahe doṣātiśayam āha 
hiraṇyaṃ bhūmim aśvaṃ gām annaṃ vāsas tilān ghṛtam 
pratigṛhṇann avidvāṃs tu bhasmībhavati dāruvat 
bhasmībhavati dāruvat 
yathā dārv agninā dagdhaṃ bhasmībhavati tathā yo brāhmaṇo vidyāsaṃpanno na bhavati sa etāni hiraṇyādīni dravyāṇi pratigṛhṇan bhasmībhavati 
hiraṇyam āyur annaṃ ca bhūr gauś cāpy oṣatas tanum 
aśvaś cakṣus tvacaṃ vāso ghṛtaṃ tejas tilāḥ prajāḥ 
bhūr gauś ca tanuṃ śarīram oṣato dahataḥ 
hiraṇyam āyur vibhaktipariṇāmaḥ oṣatītikartavyaḥ 
evam aśvaś cakṣur ityādiṣu kriyāpadānuṣaṅgaḥ kartavyaḥ 
atapās tv anadhīyānaḥ pratigraharucir dvijaḥ 
ambhasy aśmaplaveneva saha tenaiva majjati 
yasya tapo nāsti 
anadhīyāno na cādīte 
adhyayanena prakṛtā vidvattā lakṣyate 
samudite caite vidyātapasī pratigrahādhikāranimittam 
ubhayaguṇabhraṣṭaḥ pratigrahe cābhilāṣī sa tena saha majjaty adho gacchati 
kena saha 
anyasyānirdeśād dātuś ca saṃnidhānāt tena saheti gamyate 
pratigrahītā taṃ plavam ivātmottāraṇāyāśrayate 
yas tv īdṛśo 'pātrabhūtaḥ sa dātāram ātmānam ubhāv apy adho nayati yathāmbhasy aśmaplavaḥ 
aśmamayaḥ plavaḥ aśmaplavaḥ 
pāraṃ tarati yena sa plavo nāvādiḥ 
tatra yathāśmany ārūḍho nadītaraṇārtham ambhasi majjaty aśmaplavena saha gamyate 
dātā hi brāhmaṇāya ādadānaś ca tādṛśo brāhmaṇaḥ ubhāv api narakaṃ gacchataḥ 
tasmād avidvān bibhiyād yasmāt tasmāt pratigrahāt 
svalpakenāpy avidvān hi paṅke gaur iva sīdati 
ato narakabhayād avidvān mūrkhaḥ pratigrahāt bibhiyāt trasyeta na pratigṛhṇīyād iti yāvat 
tiṣṭhatu tāvad dhiraṇyādīni dravyāṇi svalpakenāpi trapusīsādinā asāreṇa svalpayā mātrayā pratigṛhītenāvidvān paṅke kardame gaur iva sīdati 
na vāry api prayacchet tu baiḍālavratike dvije 
na bakavratike pāpe nāvedavidi dharmavit 
pratigrahītur dharma uktaḥ 
idānīṃ dātur ucyate 
apiśabdāt sarvaṃ deyaṃ nivāryate 
yatra vāri na kasmaicid vāryate tad api naibhyo dātavyaṃ kuto 'nyad dravyaṃ dīyate 
atiśayoktyā dravyāntaradānaniṣedho 'yam 
vāriṇas tu sarvārthatvād aniṣedhaḥ 
nanu ca baiḍālavratikān vāṅmātreṇāpi nārcayet ity uktam eva 
satyam 
tatrārcā niṣiddhā iha tu dānam 
tac ca dhanasya nānyasya 
evaṃ dviḥpratiṣedho 'rthavān bhavati 
tathā cottaratra vakṣyati vidhināpy arjitaṃ dhanam iti 
ataḥ pāṣaṇḍyādibhyaḥ sāvajñam annadānaṃ na niṣidhyate 
atra kaścid āha yady avedavidi iti śrutaṃ tathāpy anadhīyāna ity api draṣtavyam 
tathāhi kevalavedādhyāyibhyo dānam uktam 
na ca dāmbhikebhyaḥ kāmyaṃ yuktam 
sa idaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ 
kva punar vedādhyāyimātrāya vidyārahitāya dānam uktam 
śrotriyāyaiva deyāni iti cet 
na tv arhattamāya ity aprāptikatvād atra vidyāyā vinā 
vākyāntarāṇi ca viduṣe dakṣiṇā ityādīny ekaprakaraṇagatāni santy eva 
atas tatparyālocanayobhayaviśeṣaṇaceṣṭayā deyam iti gamyate 
ataḥ śrutārthaparityāge na kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ 
yat tu sāmyam ayuktam iti 
vacanagamye 'rthe kā nāmāyuktatā 
biḍālavratena carati baiḍālavratikaḥ 
bakānāṃ vrataṃ tad asyāstīti bakavratikaḥ 
adhikaraṇāvivakṣāyāṃ saptamī 
saṃpradānavivakṣāyāṃ caturthī yuktā 
triṣv apy eteṣu dattaṃ hi vidhināpy arjitaṃ dhanam 
dātur bhavaty anarthāya paratrādātur eva ca 
dhanagrahaṇād annadānaṃ na niṣidhyata ity uktaṃ bhavati 
vidhināpy arjitaṃ satpratigrahakrayādinā śāstrābhyanujñātena prakāreṇa 
dātur ādātuś ca tādṛśaṃ dānaṃ paratrobhayor anarthāya 
yathā plavenaupalena nimajjaty udake taran 
tathā nimajjato 'dhastād ajñau dātṛpratīcchakau 
aupala āśmanaḥ 
jalasaṃtaraṇāya nāvādiḥ plavas tena yas tarati tarituṃ pravartate so 'dhastāj jalasya majjaty antardhīyate 
evam ajñau dātṛpratīcchakau 
pratīcchakaḥ pratīcchāṃ karotīti ṇicaṃ kṛtvā ṇvul kartavyaḥ 
pratīpsaka iti pāṭhāntaram 
tatra sannantād āpnoter ṇvul 
arthas tūbhayor eka eva 
dharmadhvajī sadālubdhaś chādmiko lokadambhakaḥ 
baiḍālavratiko jñeyo hiṃsraḥ sarvābhisaṃdhakaḥ 
upacāreṇaitau śabdau prayujyete 
anekasmiṃś copacārahetau sa eva saṃbhavati yannimittaṃ prayogas tadavadhāraṇapratiṣedhaviṣayaprakḷptyartham 
dharmo dhvajam iva 
vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt samāsaḥ 
kadācit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyartha iti 
tataḥ so 'syāstīti matvarthīyaḥ 
yaḥ khyātyartham eva dharmaṃ karoti na śāstraparatayā sa evam ucyate 
yas tatraiva dharmaṃ karoti yatra janāh paśyanti svapuruṣaiś ca khyāpayanti dhārmikatvaprasiddhyā pratigrahādi lapsye iti 
lubdho matsarī kṛpaṇaś ca 
lokaṃ dabhnoti vañcayati lokadambhakaḥ 
chadmanā carati chādmikaḥ 
chadma vyājaḥ 
prakāśaṃ dhārmiko rahasi nikṣiptam apaharaty aprakāśyaṃ prakāśayati 
dhārmiko 'yam etasya yat samakṣaṃ kathitaṃ tan nānyatra yātīti kenacid viśvasya kathitaṃ dṛśyate yāvad yata eva gopyaṃ tasyaivābhimukhe kathitam iti paradrohaḥ 
sarveṣāṃ cābhisaṃdhātākṣepakaḥ paraguṇān na sahate 
īdṛśo baiḍālavratiko jñeyaḥ 
abhisaṃdhakaḥ abhisaṃdhatta iti 
ātaś copasargaḥ iti kaḥ 
tataḥ svārthe kaḥ 
sarveṣām abhisaṃdhaka iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ 
kecid atra ślokaṃ paṭhanti 
yasya dharmadhvajo nityaṃ suradhvaja ivocchritaḥ 
pracchannāni ca pāpāni baiḍālaṃ nāma tad vratam  iti 
eṣa evārthaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa kathyate 
ekaikaguṇasaṃbandhe baiḍālavratiko jñeyaḥ 
asmād eva ślokād evam anumīyate 
pracchannāni ca pāpānīti viśeṣāśravaṇāt sarveṣāṃ caiṣāṃ pāpatvād ubhayathācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pratipāditāḥ 
kecid imaṃ ślokam adhyāpitāḥ kecit pūrvam 
ubhayaṃ ca pramāṇam 
tena yady api aṅgadī kuṇḍalī pīnaskandhaḥ pṛthuvakṣā devadattaḥ iti samuditānāṃ lakṣaṇatvaṃ pratīyate tathāpīha pratyekam etāni lakṣaṇāni 
adhodṛṣṭir naiṣkṛtikaḥ svārthasādhanatatparaḥ 
śaṭho mithyāvinītaś ca bakavratacaro dvijaḥ 
bakavratalakṣaṇam adhonirīkṣaṇam 
atha vā nīcadṛṣṭiḥ 
nīco dīnaḥ 
sarvadaiva vyāpārayati kathaṃcit kutaścana labhate 'dhamād api gṛhṇāti 
niṣkṛtir niṣṭhuratā tayā carati tatpradhāno naiṣkṛtiko 'samyagbhāṣī 
alīkavinītaḥ śrayati praśrayaṃ namratāṃ kārye tu vyāghātakaḥ 
biḍālo 'līkanidrāṃ karoty āmiṣaṃ jighṛkṣan 
evaṃ sopadhau dharmacaraṇo baiḍālavratika uktaḥ 
tathaiva bakavratacaro 'pi 
bakā hi matsyān gṛhṇanto jalacareṣv avajñāṃ darśayanti 
atha ca matsyagrahaṇabuddhaya eva 
vratena śīlitaṃ karmocyate 
pradarśitaṃ padānām apaunaruktyam 
athāpi syāl lakṣaṇatvād adoṣaḥ 
avijñātaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati 
paunaḥpunyābhidhānena sugraho 'rtho bhavati 
kaḥ punaḥ baiḍālavratikabakavratikayor bhedaḥ 
ucyate 
ayaṃ svārthasādhanaparo nānyasya kāryaṃ vihanti 
pūrvas tu mātsaryāt svārthasiddhāv asatyām api parasya nāśayati 
ye bakavratino viprā ye ca mārjāraliṅginaḥ 
te patanty andhatāmisre tena pāpena karmaṇā 
svaśabdaiś va vyākhyātaḥ ślokaḥ 
na dharmasyāpadeśena pāpaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caret 
vratena pāpaṃ pracchādya kurvan strīśūdradambhanam 
pāpaṃ krtvā vrataṃ prāyaścittaṃ na kuryāt dharmasyāpadeśena dharmam apadiśya loke khyāpayati dharmārtham ahaṃ vrataṃ karomi na me prāyaścittanimittam asti iti paramārthatas tu prāyaścittārtham eva karoti 
evaṃ na kartavyam 
pāpaṃ pracchādyāpahnutya tena vratena strīśūdradambhanaṃ na kuryāt 
prakaṭaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kartavyam anyatra rahasyāt 
pretyeha cedṛśā viprā garhyante brahmavādibhiḥ 
chadmanā caritaṃ yac ca vrataṃ rakṣāṃsi gacchati 
iha padārthasvābhāvyenānyoddeśenāpi kṛtaṃ yat phalaṃ tato bhavaty eva 
tathā hi guruniyoge pravṛtto dharmoddeśena guruvacanaṃ karomīti na kāmahetoḥ 
arthasvābhāvyāt tu kāmaṃ pratijanayati 
evaṃ kaścin manyate vratāni pāpāpanodārthāni 
tāni anyoddeśenāpi kriyamāṇāni na svabhāvaṃ jahati 
evam etan mama prāyaścittam ubhayārthaṃ bhaviṣyati 
loke tapasvīti khyāto bhaviṣyāmi 
pāpaṃ capanotsyate 
tasyaivaṃ buddhimato nivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate 
tadaitad vrataṃ chadmanā caritam anuṣṭhitaṃ rakṣāṃsi gacchati niṣphalaṃ bhavati na pāpam apanudatīty arthaḥ 
na kevalaṃ kāryākaraṇaṃ bhavati yādvad īdṛśā viprā vratacāriṇo garhyante nindyante brahmavādibhiḥ vedapramāṇajñaiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ 
aliṅgī liṅgiveṣeṇa yo vṛttim upajīvati 
sa liṅgināṃ haraty enas tiryagyonau ca jāyate 
pratyāśramaṃ liṅgadharaṇam 
yathā brahmacāriṇo mekhalādidhāraṇaṃ gṛhasthasya vaiṇavadaṇḍakuṇḍalakamaṇḍalvādi vānaprasthasya carmacīrajaṭādi parivrājakasya kaṣāyavasanadaṇḍādi 
etena veṣeṇānāśramī yo bhikṣāhetor loke carati vṛttim upajīvati sa liṅginām enaḥ pāpaṃ harati ānṛṇyaṃ tarpayati 
tiryagyonau tiraścāṃ śvaśṛgālādīnāṃ yonau jāyate 
na cātraitad āśaṅkanīyaṃ liṅgināṃ yat pāpaṃ tat tebhyo 'pasṛtya tasmin saṃcaratīty asaṃbhāvyam 
akartavyatā paraliṅgadhāraṇasya pratīyate 
aśrute 'pi pratiṣedhe nindārthavādād eva tadavagatiḥ 
parakīyanipāneṣu na snāyād dhi kadācana 
nipānakarttuḥ snātvā tu duṣkṛtāṃśena lipyate 
nipibanty asminn ato veti nipānaṃ jalāśayaḥ 
sa ca vāpīkūpataḍāgādiḥ 
tasmin parakīye pareṇa yad ātmārthaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvārthaṃ notsṛṣṭaṃ tatra na kadācit snāyāt 
nityaṃ caṇḍālādisparśane ca naimittikaṃ gharmasvedāpanodārthaṃ ca sarvaṃ snānaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
atra vyatikrame doṣam āha 
nipānasya yaḥ kartā tasya yatkiṃcid duṣkṛtaṃ tasya kenacid aṃśena bhāgena lipyate saṃbadhyate 
nindārthavādo yaṃ praiṣedhaśeṣaḥ 
yānaśayyāsanāny asya kūpodyānagṛhāṇi ca 
adattāny upabhuñjāna enasaḥ syāt turīyabhāk 
yānādini parakīyāny adattāny upayuñjāna enasas tadīyasya turīyabhāk caturthaṃ bhāgaṃ prāpnuyāt 
atra kaścid āha adattānīti vacanāt sarvārthatayāpy upakalpitāni nopayojyāni 
tad ayuktam parakīyādhikārāt 
na ca tāni parakīyāni 
tyaktaṃ hi tat samyak 
turīyagrahaṇam avivakṣitam iti prāg eva vyākhyātam 
nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥsu ca 
snānaṃ samācaren nityaṃ gartaprasravaṇeṣu ca 
sarvā nadyo devakhātāḥ 
atas tāsām ubhayathāsaṃbhavād devakhātagrahaṇavācyatvena talliṅgaṃ paṭhitavyam 
taḍāgādīni hi devakhātāni manuṣyakhātāny api santi 
na ca devaiḥ khanyante 
kevalaṃ mahatvam asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvena lakṣyate 
yamān seveta satataṃ na nityaṃ niyamān budhaḥ 
yamān pataty akurvāṇo niyamān kevalān bhajan 
pratiṣedharūpā yamā brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ surā na peyā ityādayaḥ 
anuṣṭheyarūpā niyamāḥ vedam eva japen nityam ityādayaḥ 
na nityaṃ niyamān 
nānena niyamānām asevocyate kiṃ tu yamānāṃ niyamebhyo nityatvam 
tathā cāha yamān pataty akurvāṇaḥ 
brahmahatyādir yamalope sati 
patitatvāt saṃdhyopāsanādibhir nādhikriyate 
na tu tathā niyamalope 
tathā ca śiṣṭasmaraṇam
patati niyamāvān yameṣv asakto na tu yamavān niyamālaso 'vasīdet 
na niyamān asamīkṣya buddhyā yamabahuleṣv atisaṃdadhīta buddhim  iti
yeṣām api pāribhāṣikā yamaniyamāḥ 
ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ brahmacaryam akalkatā 
asteyam api pañcaite yamāś caiva vratāni ca 
akrodho guruśuśrūṣā śaucam ācaralāghavam 
apramādaś ca niyamāḥ pañcaivopavratāni ca 
teṣām api gurulāghavam anena ślokena pratipādyate 
ato nānena yamānāṃ sevocyate nāpi niyamānām asevā ubhayeṣāṃ taiḥ śāstrair vihitatvāt 
pūrveṇa ślokena vratādhikāro vicchinnaḥ 
idānīṃ pratiṣedhaprakaraṇam ārabhyate 
nāśrotriyatate yajñe grāmayājikṛte tathā 
striyā klībena ca hute bhuñjīta brāhmaṇaḥ kvacit 
tatra bhojanam eva tāvad arthitvād yatra kutracit prāptaṃ niṣidhyate 
aśrotriyo 'nadhīyānas tena tate prārabdhe yajña ṛtvigbhir vāśrotriyais tate na bhuñjīta brāhmaṇaḥ 
grāmayājī grāmayājakas tena yatra hūyate yatra ca strī homaṃ karoti 
chāndogye hi strīṇāṃ gṛhyasmṛtikārair agnihotrahoma ukto 'tas taṃ paśyan pratiṣedhati 
atha vā yatra yajñe strī pradhānaṃ bhartā dāridryādidoṣair upahataḥ strī ca saudāyikena dhanena jñātibalena ca darpitā tatrāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
klībo napuṃsakam 
aślīlam etat sādhūnāṃ yatra juhvaty amī haviḥ 
pratīpam etad devānāṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet 
pūrvasya pratiṣedhavidher arthavādo 'yam 
aślīlam aślāghyaṃ sādhūnām śiṣṭānām 
yatra hy ete havir juhvati yajñaṃ kurvanti 
devānāṃ pratīpaṃ partikūlam 
tasmād īdṛśe gamanaṃ parivarjayet 
mattakruddhāturāṇāṃ ca na bhuñjīta kadācana 
keśakīṭāvapannaṃ ca padā spṛṣṭaṃ ca kāmataḥ 
yāvan madādiyoga eteṣāṃ tāvad abhojyatā 
anye bāhulyaṃ manyante 
bāhulyena yaḥ kṣībo bhavati madyaśauṇḍas tadannaṃ na bhoktavyam 
evaṃ krodhapradhānasya bhṛśaṃkopanasya ca prāyeṇa cāturasya rogāmayavyādeḥ 
keśakīṭair avapannaṃ saṃsargeṇa dūṣitam 
kīṭāś ca kecin mṛtā dūṣayanti na jīvanto yathā makṣikā gṛhagodhāś ca 
anye tu jīvanta eva 
kīṭagrahaṇaṃ kṣudrajantūnāṃ kṛmipataṅgānām api pardarśanārtham 
keśagrahaṇaṃ nakharomṇāṃ dūṣikādīnāṃ malānām samācārāt 
pādena buddhipūrvaṃ kāmakāreṇa spṛṣṭam 
pramādatas tu na doṣaḥ 
bhrūṇaghnāvekṣitaṃ caiva saṃspṛṣṭaṃ capy udakyayā 
patatriṇāvalīḍhaṃ ca śunā saṃspṛṣṭam eva ca 
bhrūṇahā brahmaghnas tenāvekṣitaṃ nipuṇato dṛṣṭam 
pradarśanaṃ caitad anyeṣām api pātakinām 
pātakibhiḥ spṛṣṭasya tu pratiṣedhaḥ 
taiḥ spṛṣṭasya tu pratiṣedhaḥ snānavidhānād eva siddhaḥ 
udakyā rajasvalā tayā spṛṣṭasya pratiṣedhaḥ nāvekṣitasya 
nanu ca tatsparśino 'pi yāvat snānaṃ vakṣyati atas tenaivāśucitve siddhe kutas tatspṛṣṭasya bhojanaprāptiḥ 
ucyate 
prakṣālya tad annaṃ bhojyam 
atha vā bhrūṇahagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanartham ity uktam 
tatra kaścin manyeta divākīrtiślokapaṭhitānāṃ pradarśanārtham iti 
tathā codkyāvekṣitasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ syāt 
etena śunā saṃspṛṣṭaṃ vyākhyātam 
ata uktaṃ patitānām evānyeṣāṃ pradarśanārtham 
tad atra yuktaḥ patitasūtiketyādīnām 
udakyāgrahaṇaṃ sūtikāyā nidarśanārtham 
patatriṇā 
patatrī pakṣī sa ca kravyādo gṛdhravāyasādiḥ samācārān na tu haṃsādiḥ 
gavā cānnam upāghrātaṃ ghuṣṭānnaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ 
gaṇānnaṃ gaṇikānnaṃ ca viduṣā ca jugupsitam 
ghuṣṭānnaṃ yad udghuṣya dīyate 'nāmantritāya kasmaicid arthine maṭhasatrabhaktādiviśeṣānuddeśena 
yad vānyasmai pratiśrutyānyasmai dīyate 
pratipattijñāne hy ayaṃ dhatuḥ paṭhyate 
tadabhāve bādhitaṃ smaranti yajñavivāhādiṣv anāmantritabhojanam 
ayaṃ ca gaṇaḥ saṃghātas tasmād bhrātṝṇāṃ tv avibhaktānāṃ na gaṇavyapadeśaḥ 
bhrātṝṇām avibhaktānām eko dharmaḥ pravartate iti vacanād ekaś ca dharmas teṣām ātithyādikriyaiveti navame darśitam jyeṣṭha eva tu gṛhṇīyāt pitryaṃ dhanam aśeṣataḥ iti 
tasya ca grahaṇam avaśyakartavyeṣv adhikāra iti darsayati 
sādhāraṇasyāpi anyasyātanmadhyagatasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
gaṇikā veśyā 
jugupsitaṃ ninditam 
viduṣā vedārthavidā 
bhakṣyam api bisakhalyādi 
stenagāyanayoś cānnaṃ takṣṇo vārdhuṣikasya ca 
dīkṣitasya kadaryasya baddhasya nigaḍasya ca 
gāyano yo gītena jīvati 
anyasya tv aparāntakādigānaṃ vihitam eva 
kadaryaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ 
baddhanigaḍayor viśeṣaḥ eko vāṅmātreṇāvaruddhaḥ aparo rajjvāyasanigaḍair yantritaḥ 
viśadasya ca ity anye paṭhanti 
kaṣṭaṃ ca viśadam ācakṣate 
abhiśastasya ṣaṇḍhasya puṃścalyā dāmbhikasya ca 
śuktaṃ paryuṣitaṃ caiva śūdrasyocchiṣṭam eva ca 
puṃścalī yasya kasycin maithunasaṃbandhena ghaṭate 
nanu ca gaṇikānnaṃ pratiṣiddham eva 
naitad evam 
anyā gaṇikā anyā puṃścalī 
gaṇikā veśyāveśena jīvati 
puṃścalī tv indriyacapalā 
dāmbhiko baiḍālavratikādiḥ sopadho dharmacaraṇaḥ 
prāyaścittaviśeṣārthaṃ śūdrocchiṣṭaṃ pratiṣidhyate sarvasyaivocchiṣṭabhojanapratiṣedhāt 
anye tu śūdrocchiṣṭaṃ sthālīsthaṃ bhojyānnaṃ śūdrabhuktaśiṣṭam ucchiṣṭam ucyata ity āhuḥ 
pāṭhāntaraṃ tu ucchiṣṭam aguros tathā iti 
ucchiṣṭam ucyate yat parasya sparśanād aśuddhaṃ bhuktojjhitaṃ ca 
ātmīye hy abhukto 'jjhita ekagrāsāśanam eva syāt 
na caiṣa śiṣṭānāṃ samācāro yat sakṛdannaṃ dattaṃ bhuktvā punar ācamya pātrāntare gṛhītaṃ bhujyate 
tathā nādyād annam 
tathāntare 'bhyutthānādikriyāntarasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
ata ā tṛpteḥ prāg ācamanāt paścāt sparśe na doṣaḥ 
sahabhojanaṃ tu saty api parasya sparśe padārthāntaratvān nocchiṣṭabhojanam 
atra pitrā putrādibhiḥ śiṣṭaṃ saha bhujyate 
tathā cāpastambādayo deśagrahaṇāt prasaṅgena anupanītena saha bhojanam nindanti nopanītena 
asmiṃs tu pakṣe vijātīyaiḥ saha bhojanapratiṣedhaḥ 
vyavadhānāntaram āśrayaṇīyam 
bhuktojjhitaṃ tu dhātvarthayogād ucchiṣṭam anyadīyam api 
cikitsakasya mṛgayoḥ krūrasyocchiṣṭabhojinaḥ 
ugrānnaṃ sūtikānnaṃ ca paryācāntam anirdaśam 
smṛtyantare viśeṣaḥ śrūyate śalyā nartakajīvinaḥ 
mṛgayur mṛgavyādhaḥ 
ākheṭakārthaṃ māṃsavikrayārthaṃ vā yo mṛgān hanti 
krūra anṛjuprakṛtiḥ duṣprasādaḥ 
ucchiṣṭabhojī niṣiddhocchiṣṭabhojī 
ugro jātiviśeṣaḥ 
rājety etasya vede prayogo dṛśyate 
ugro madhyamaśīriva iti 
na ca tasyānyaḥ pratiṣedho 'sti doṣapradarśanaprakāreṇa ca na śrūyate rājānnaṃ teja ādatte ity arthavādāc ca pratiṣedhaḥ 
sūtikānnaṃ sūtikām uddiśya yat kṛtaṃ tatkulīnair api tad abhojyam 
tad anādyam anirdaśaṃ daśāhāni yāvat 
tena yady api kṣatriyādīnāṃ daśāhād ūrdhvam āśaucaṃ tathāpi daśāhāni na bhojyam 
pāṭhāntaraṃ sūtakānnam iti 
sūtakaśabdena ca tadvantaḥ puruṣā lakṣyante 
yeṣāṃ kule sūtakaṃ te daśāhaṃ na bhojyānnā iti 
yasmin pakṣe sarveṣāṃ daśāhaṃ sūtakāśaucaṃ tatrāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
yadā tu mātāpitroḥ sūtakaṃ mātur veti pakṣas tadā yāvad āśaucaṃ na bhojyam 
anirdaśagrahaṇam āśaucanivṛttyupalakṣaṇārtham 
tena kṣatriyādīnāṃ yasya yāvad āśaucakālaḥ sa tāvatkālam abhojyānnaḥ 
sūtakānnam anirdaśam iti paṭhitavye vṛttānurodhāt paryācāntapadena vyavadhānam 
anyais tu svatantram anirdaśagrahaṇaṃ vyākhyātam 
sūtakaśabdena āśaucakālo 'nudyotyate 
anirdaśaṃ gavādīnāṃ payaḥ 
paryācāntaṃ śaucācamanavyapetam ardhabhukte kenacit kāraṇena yady ācāmati tadā punar bhuktojjhitaṃ nāśitavyam 
anarcitaṃ vṛthāmāṃsam avīrāyāś ca yoṣitaḥ 
dviṣadannaṃ nagaryannaṃ patitānnam avakṣutam 
arcārhasya yad avajñayā dīyate tad anarcitam 
na tu suhṛdādeḥ 
vṛthāmāṃsaṃ devādyarcanaśiṣṭaṃ yan na bhavaty ātmārthaṃ yat sādhitam 
avirā strī yasyā na bhartā nāpi putraḥ 
dviṣañ chatruḥ 
nagarī nagarasvāmy arājāpi 
avakṣutam upari yasmin kṣavathuḥ kṛtaḥ 
piśunānṛtinoś cānnaṃ kratuvikrayakasya ca 
śailūṣatunnavāyānnaṃ kṛtaghnasyānnam eva ca 
piśuno yo viśrabdham arthaṃ kathitaṃ bhinatti paracchidravādī vā parokṣam 
anṛtī kṛtakauṭasākṣyaḥ 
kratuvikrayakaḥ kratur yajñas taṃ kṛtvā vikrīṇīte kratuphalaṃ madīyaṃ tavāstv iti mūlyena dadāti 
yady api paramārthataḥ krator vikrayo nāsti tathāpi yasyaivaṃvidhā yātrānyavipralambhena vā pravṛttis tasya pratiṣedhaḥ

strījitāḥ yeṣāṃ bhāryaiva gṛhe kartrī hartrī ca svayaṃ parijanasya ca neśas tena sarvatra tadvaśavartinaḥ 
pretānnaṃ maraṇāśauce tatkulīnā abhojyānnāḥ 
anirdaśagrahaṇaṃ kālopalakṣaṇārtham 
yadānirdaśagrahaṇaṃ pūrvatra svatantram āśaucasaṃbandhinām aviśeṣeṇānnaṃ pratiṣedhati tad iha pretānnakṛtaṃ yasyāpy āśaucaṃ nāsti suhṛdbāndhavādeḥ 
kāruṇyāc caturthīśrāddhādipravṛttasya yad annaṃ tan na bhojyam 
daśāhikaṃ nāvamikaṃ caturthīśrāddam aṣṭamī ityādi rāmāyaṇe varṇitam anyair api gṛhyakāraiḥ 
atuṣṭikaraṃ yasmin bhujyamāne cittatuṣṭir na bhavet 
rājānnaṃ teja ādatte śūdrānnaṃ brahmavarcasam

athedānīm atikramaphalaṃ darśayati 
rājānnabhojinas tejonāśaḥ 
evaṃ sarvatra draṣṭavyam 
suvarṇakārādayaḥ śabdāḥ śilpiviśeṣajīvināṃ vācakāḥ

evaṃ rajakādiṣv api draṣṭavyam 
carmāvakrntati chindati carmāvakartinaḥ 
tena karmaṇā ye jīvanti teṣām eṣā rūḍhiḥ 
iha yeṣāṃ pūrvatra pratiṣedho nāsti kevalaṃ doṣaḥ śrūyate teṣāṃ tata eva pratiṣedho 'numeyaḥ 
kārukānnaṃ prajāṃ hanti balaṃ nirṇejakasya ca

prajāyā vighāto 'nutpattiḥ

indriyaṃ śukram

ya ete 'nye tv abhojyānnāḥ kramaśaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

pratipadanirdiṣṭebhyo ye 'nye 'py abhojyānnā asmin prakaraṇe paṭhitās teṣāṃ yad annaṃ tat tvagasthiromādi 
yas tadīyāyās tvaco bhuktāyā doṣaḥ sa evānnasyāpi 
bhuktvāto 'nyatamasyānnam amatyā kṣapaṇaṃ tryaham 
matyā bhuktvā caret kṛcchraṃ retoviṇmūtram eva ca 
tryahaṃ kṣapaṇam abhojanam 
amatyā abuddhipūrvam 
buddhipūrve tu kṛcchraṃ caret 
tac ca kṛcchraṃ smṛtyantaraikavākyatvāt taptakṛcchram 
tatra retoviṇmūtraprāśane taptakṛcchram āmnātam amatyā pāne payo ghṛtam udakaṃ vāyuḥ pratitryahaṃ taptātikṛcchraḥ 
tato 'sya saṃskāraḥ iti 
aprakaraṇe ca prāyaścittavacanaṃ doṣātiśayadarśanārtham 
anyatamasyeti ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāt parigrahaduṣṭa evedaṃ prāyaścittaṃ manyante na kālasvabhāvasaṃsargaduṣṭe 
śuktaparyuṣitādau caturvidhaṃ hy abhojyam 
kāladuṣṭaṃ śuktaparyuṣitādi 
saṃsargaduṣṭaṃ madyānugatādi

atrocyate

ṣaṣṭīnirdeśo 'py asti

pañcame hi tayoḥ pratiṣedho nāsti

tatra tarhi kim artham 
tatraiva vakṣyāmaḥ 
yady api garhitānādyayor jagdhiḥ abhojyānāṃ tu bhuktvānnam iti ca tat sarvam ekādaśe vibhāgato nirṇeṣyate 
nādyāc chūdrasya pakvānnaṃ vidvān aśrāddhino dvijaḥ 
ādadītāmam evāsmād avṛttāv ekarātrikam 
aviśeṣeṇa śūdrānnaṃ pratiṣiddham 
tasyedānīṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayatocyate aśrāddhinaḥ 
kva punaḥ śūdrānnaṃ pratiṣiddham 
śūdrasyocchiṣṭam eva ca ity atra 
nanu ca tatra śūdrasyocchiṣṭaṃ nānyad annam 
neti brūmaḥ 
evaṃ tatra saṃbandhaḥ śūdrasyānnaṃ nādyāt ucchiṣṭam anyasyāpi 
yat tu prāg vyākhyātaṃ tat pūrveṣāṃ darśanam ity asmābhir api saṃvarṇitam 
aśrāddhinaḥ śrāddhaśabdena pākayajñādikriyā śūdrasya vihitā lakṣyate 
tatas tatkriyānanuṣṭhāyinaḥ 
sacchūdrād anyasya yat pakvam annaṃ tan nādyāt 
aśraddhinaḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
aśraddhāvān ity arthaḥ 
tathā cottaraśloke śraddhāyāḥ prādhānyam evāha vadānyasya iti 
āmaṃ śuṣkaṃ dhānyaṃ taṇḍulādi 
tathā ekarātrikam ekasminn ahani paryāptaṃ na bahu 
śrotriyasya kadaryasya vadānyasya ca vārdhuṣeḥ 
mīmāṃsitvobhayaṃ devāḥ samam annam akalpayan 
yo brāhmaṇaḥ sarvaguṇopetaḥ śrotiryagrahaṇasya pradarśanārthatvāt 
śrotriyo vidvān vihitadharmānuṣṭhānaparaḥ 
kiṃ tu kadaryaḥ kṛpaṇo mitraṃ jñātim atithim arthinaṃ nābhinandati na kasmai kiṃcid api dātum īhate 
itaro vārdhuṣir duṣṭakarmā vṛddhijīvī 
atha vadānya udāraḥ śraddadhāno gṛhāgateṣu parituṣyati śraddhayā bhojanādinā pūjayati 
tayor annaṃ devāḥ samaṃ tulayam akalpayan vyavasthāpitavantaḥ 
yadi nāmaiko guṇavān sādhucaraṇas tathāpi kadaryatayopahataḥ 
uktaṃ hi lobhaḥ sarvaguṇān iva iti 
itaro yadi nāma śraddadhanaḥ tathāpi karmadoṣād apraśastaḥ 
evaṃ mīmāṃsitvā vicārya devair vyavasthā kṛtā tulyam etad iti 
tān prajāpatir āhaitya mā kṛḍhvaṃ viṣamaṃ samam 
śraddhāpūtaṃ vadānyasya hatam aśraddayetarat 
devān prajāpatir āgatyācaṣṭa mā kṛḍhvam evaṃ viṣamaṃ samīkaraṇam anyāyyam 
kaḥ punar anayor adhika iti devā ūcuḥ 
punaḥ prajāpatir āha 
vadānyasya śraddhavato yad annaṃ tat pūtaṃ pavitraṃ śraddayā vārdhuṣeḥ 
itarad yad annaṃ śrotriyasya tat karmaṇopahatam apraśastam 
devaprajāpatisaṃvādo 'rthavādaḥ 
aśraddadhānasya guṇavato 'pi na bhoktavyam ādareṇa śūdrasyāpi bhoktavyam 
śraddhayeṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ca nityaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ 
śraddhākṛte hy akṣaye te bhavataḥ svāgatair dhanaiḥ 
iṣṭam antarvedi yat kriyate yajñādi karma 
pūrtaṃ tato 'nyatra saṃmānādy adṛṣṭārtham 
te śraddhayā kartavye 
tathā svāgataiś ca dhanaiḥ śobhanenāgacchanti yāni dhanāni śrutaśauryatapaḥkanyādinā 
evam akṣaye 'kṣayaphale bhavataḥ 
yāni tu na svāgatāni nākṣayaphalāni na punar niṣphalāni 
tathā hi tair api svāmyam utpadyate 
tena ca yāgādayaḥ kartavyāḥ 
na ca yāgadānādiprakaraṇe kusīdādipratiṣedhaḥ śruto yena tadaṅgaṃ syāt 
tasmād yāvantaḥ svargotpattihetavaḥ tair arjitena dhanena yāgādayaḥ kartavyāḥ

ke punas te praśastadhanopāyāḥ 
ata ucyate

anye tu manyante

smāhāradvandvaḥ

tenaiva bhāvena tayaivecchayā yad evecchati tad eva labhata ity uktaṃ bhavati 
sarvaphalatvaṃ sarvadravyāṇāṃ pradarśitaṃ bhavati 
yo 'rcitaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāty arcitam eva vā 
tāv ubhau gacchataḥ svargaṃ narakaṃ tu viparyaye 
pūjāpūrvakaṃ dātavyam 
tādṛśam eva ca pratigrahītavyam 
nāvajñayā dātavyam iti ślokasya tātparyam 
arcitam iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam 
na vismayeta tapasā vaded iṣṭvā ca nānṛtam 
nārto 'py apavaded viprān na datvā parikīrtayet 
tapasānuṣṭhitena vismayaṃ na kuryāt 
atitīvraṃ tapo mayā kṛtaṃ suduścaram ity evaṃ manasi na kartavyam 
iṣṭvā yāgaṃ kṛtvā anṛtaṃ na vadet 
aviśeṣeṇa pratiṣiddhasyāpi puruṣārthatayā punaḥ pratiṣedho yāgāṅgatvajñāpanārthaḥ 
pratiṣedhātikrame hi jyotiṣṭomāder aṅgahīnatā bhavati 
ārtaḥ pīḍito 'pi brāhmaṇair na tān apavaden na nindeta 
datvā gavādi dravyaṃ na kasyacid agrataḥ parikīrtayed idaṃ mayā dattam 
yajño 'nṛtena kṣarati tapaḥ kṣarati vismayāt 
āyur viprāpavādena dānaṃ ca parikīrtanāt 
pūrvasya pratiṣedhasyārthavādo 'yam 
anṛtena hetunā yajñaḥ kṣarati sravati niṣphalo bhavati 
yad arthaṃ kṛtaṃ tan na saṃpadyate 
evaṃ sarvatra 
dharmaṃ śanaiḥ saṃcinuyād valmīkam iva puttikāḥ 
paralokasahāyārthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apīḍayan 
mahati dāne mahati ca tapasi mahati ca yajñe jyotiṣṭomādau yady asamarthas tadā nodāsīnena bhavitavyam 
kiṃ tarhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ svalpena dānena svalpena tapasā yathāśakti paropakareṇa japahomābhyāṃ smārtābhyāṃ dharmaḥ saṃcetavyaḥ 
yathā mṛtsaṃghātaṃ puttikāḥ pipīlikāḥ saṃcinvanti 
paralokasahāyārtham iti dharmaphalānuvādaḥ 
sarvabhūtāny apīḍayan 
yācñayā dharmārthayā bhūtānāṃ pīḍā na kartavyā 
nāmutra hi sahāyārthaṃ pitā mātā ca tiṣṭhataḥ 
na putradāraṃ na jñātir dharmas tiṣṭhati kevalaḥ 
bhūtānuvādo 'yam 
amutra janmāntare sahāyārthaṃ narakādiduḥkhād uddharaṇārthaṃ na kasyacit suhṛdbāndhavādeḥ śaktir asti 
kevala eva jīvatā yo dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ sa tam uddharati 
ekaḥ prajāyate jantur eka eva pralīyate 
eko 'nubhuṅkte sukṛtam eka eva ca duṣkṛtam 
yathā jantuḥ prāṇī eka eva jāyate na suhṛdbāndhavādinā saha eka eva pralīyate na suhṛdo bāndhavāḥ sahamaraṇam anubhavanti 
yadi nāma bhāryānyo vā bhakto janas tanmaraṇakāla ātmānaṃ hanyāt tathāpi pṛthag evāsau maraṇakriyā 
anayā na garbhaikyam atrivad anubhavanti 
evaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte api pṛthag evānubhavanti 
nanu ca na putradāram ity uktam 
yāvatā putraḥ śrāddhādikriyayā pitur upakaroty eva mṛtasya evaṃ bhāryāpi 
satyam 
dhārmikasyaiva tādṛśaḥ putro bhavatīti tatparam etat 
yathā jīvataḥ kasyacid dhastagrāhikayā kaścit sahāyo bhavati evaṃ mṛtasya putro dharmadvāreṇaivopakaroti 
mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭaloṣṭasamaṃ kṣitau 
vimukhā bāndhavā yānti dharmas tam anugacchati 
saha gacchati 
idaṃ pratyakṣasiddhaṃ prasaṃkhyānārtham ucyate 
mṛtasya śarīraṃ kṣitāv utsṛjya kāṣṭham iva niṣprayojanaṃ vimukhā bāndhavāḥ pratigacchanti 
dharmas tu kevalaṃ puruṣam anugacchati 
tasmād dharmaṃ sahāyārthaṃ nityaṃ saṃcinuyāc chanaiḥ 
dharmeṇa hi sahāyena tamas tarati dustaram 
upasaṃhāro 'yam 
dustaraṃ tamaḥ kṛcchreṇa yat tīryate 
tamo duḥkham 
tad api dharmeṇa sahāyena sutaraṃ bhavati 
na hi tādṛśe tamasi majjatīty arthaḥ 
dharmapradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ tapasā hatakilbiṣam 
paralokaṃ nayaty āśu bhāsvantaṃ khaśarīriṇam 
dharmaḥ pradhānaṃ yasyāsau dharmapradhānaḥ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ yathāvihitakarmānuṣṭhāyī 
tapasā hatakilbiṣam 
kathaṃcit pramādakṛtavyatikrame tapasā prāyaścittena hatakalmaṣaṃ śātravyatikrame jāto 'sau doṣas tasmiṃs tatprāyaścittena naṣṭe paralokaṃ nayati bhāsvantaṃ paralokaṃ devasthānaṃ svargādi nayati prāpayati 
kaḥ prakṛtatvād dharma eva 
śarīriṇaṃ puruṣam 
khena śarīreṇa khaśarīrī 
na yathānyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pāñcabhautikaṃ śarīram evaṃ tasya 
kiṃ tarhi kham eva śarīraṃ brahma 
vibhutvam anenocyate 
uttamair uttamair nityaṃ saṃbandhān ācaret saha 
ninīṣuḥ kulam utkarṣam adhamān adhamāṃs tyajet 
bahuprakāratvād uttamasya tadapekṣā vīpsā 
kaścij jātyotkṛṣṭaḥ kaścid vidyayā kaścic chīlena 
atha vā saṃbandhibhedād yaḥ kaścit saṃbandho yena kenacid uttamena yogyaḥ 
uttamair uttamair jātyādibhir utkṛṣṭaiḥ kanyādānādilakṣaṇān saṃbandhān ācaret kuryān ninīṣur netuṃ prāpayitum icchuḥ kulam utkarṣaṃ śraiṣṭhyam 
adhamān adhamāṃs tyajet 
uttamair eva vidhānād adhamānāṃ tyāge siddha uttamāsaṃbhave madhyamānujñānārthaṃ tyāgavacanam 
adhamā nikṛṣṭāḥ 
uttamān uttamān eva gacchan hīnāṃs tu varjayan 
brāhmanaḥ śreṣṭhatām eti pratyavāyena śūdratām 
uttamān gacchaṃs taiḥ saha saṃbandhaṃ kurvan brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhatām eti 
brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayor api pradarśanārtham 
pratyavāyena viparītācaraṇena hīnaiḥ saha saṃbandhena prātilomyena śūdratāṃ gacchati 
jāter anapāyāt tattulyatāṃ prāpnotīty uktaṃ bhavati 
dṛḍhakārī mṛdur dāntaḥ krūrācārair asaṃvasan 
ahiṃsro damadānābhyāṃ jayet svargaṃ tathāvrataḥ 
kartavyeṣu dṛḍhaniścayo dṛḍhakārī 
yat karoti tad avaśyaṃ samāpayati na punaḥ kāryam ārabhyāsamāpya nivartate 
nānavasthita ity arthaḥ 
tad uktam prārabdhasyāntagamanam 
mṛdur aniṣṭhuraḥ 
krūrācāraiḥ stenādibhir na saṃbandhaḥ 
taiḥ saha saṃbandham akurvan 
tathā damadānābhyāṃ svargaṃ jayet prāpnuyāt 
tathāvrataḥ 
etad vrataṃ niyamaṃ dhārayan 
damasya pṛthag upādānād dānto dvandvasahiṣṇur draṣṭavyaḥ 
edhodakaṃ mūlaphalam annam abhyudyataṃ ca yat 
sarvataḥ partigṛhṇīyān madhv athābhayadakṣiṇām 
edhaḥ indhanaṃ kāṣṭhādi 
annaṃ pakvam āmaṃ vā 
abhyudyatam abhimukham upanītam 
etat sarvataḥ pratigrahītavyam 
patitābhiśastacaṇḍālādipratilomavarjaṃ śūdrād anyasmād vā īṣatpāpakarmaṇaḥ 
madhu mākṣikam 
abhayaṃ dakṣiṇeva 
dṛṣṭāntārtham etat 
pratigraho hi parakīyasya dravyasya tadicchayā svīkāraḥ na cānnarūpatā 
na hy atra kasyacit svāmyaṃ nivartate na ca kasyacid upajāyate 
ataḥ stutyā dakṣiṇāśabdaprayogaḥ 
yathā caṇḍālādibhyo 'py araṇye kāntāre vā rakṣā caurādibhyo 'ṅgīkriyamāṇā na doṣāya evam etad edhādi gṛhyamāṇaṃ na doṣāya 
anāpadi cāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
āpadi tu caṇḍālādibhyo 'pi vakṣyati 
abhyudyataśabdaś cānnenaiva saha saṃbadhyate pratyāsattyā naidhādibhiḥ 
ata edhādiṣu yacñāviruddhā 
dhārmikebhyo dvijātibhyaḥ kartavyas tu parigrahaḥ ity adhārmikebhyo dvijebhyaḥ śūdrāc cāprāptaḥ 
iṣyate ca dravyaviśeṣopayācñā 
tadartham idam 
āhṛtābhyudyatāṃ bhikṣāṃ purastād apracoditām 
mene prajāpatir grāhyām api duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ 
edhād atirekeṇa yad anyad dravyaṃ tasyāpy anena viśeṣeṇa grāhyatocyate 
bhikṣāśabdaś ca praśaṃsāyāṃ prayuktaḥ na bhikṣaiva vivakṣitā yady apy ayaṃ siddhānnālpatāvacanaḥ 
bhikṣā kila svalpatvān nātīva doṣāvahā brahmacāriṇaś ca sārvavarṇikī vihitā 
evam anyad apy anena viśeṣeṇa tattulyaṃ dṛṣṭam 
bhikṣāśabdasyaivaṃvidhārthavivakṣayā prayogaḥ 
tathā hi mahābhārate
gatvā hy ubhau bhārgavakarmaśālāṃ
pārthau pṛthāṃ prāpya mahānubhāvau 
tau yājñasenīṃ paramapratītau
bhikṣety athāvedayatāṃ narāgryau  iti 
āhṛtopahṛtā taṃ deśamānītā yatra pratigrahītā sthitaḥ 
abhyudyatā agre sthāpitā vacaneneṅgitena vā gṛhyatām iti niveditā 
purastāt pūrvam apracoditā ayācitā pratigrahītrā svayaṃ paramukhena vā dātrā pūrvaṃ noktam idaṃ me dravyam asti tat prasādam āśritya gṛhyatām iti kevalam atarkitopapāditā tatkāla eva darśitābhiprāyā 
tādṛśīṃ bhikṣāṃ prajāpatir hiraṇyagarbho mene manyate sma 
kim iti duṣkṛtakarmaṇo 'pi sakāśād grāhyeti 
duṣkṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karma yasyāsau duṣkṛtakarmā 
nāśnanti pitaras tasya daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca 
na ca havyaṃ vahaty agnir yas tām abhyavamanyate 
athāgrahaṇanindārthavādaḥ 
atha yo yatraitām avadhīrayati tasya pitaraḥ śrāddhaṃ nāśnanti na pratīcchantīti 
agniś ca devebhyo havyaṃ na vahati 
pitryād daivāc ca karmaṇo na phalaṃ labhyata ity arthaḥ 
atra kaścid āha 
anupayujyamānam api dātur anugrahārtham avaśyam īdṛśaṃ grahītavyam 
tat tv ayuktam 
nirdoṣatāsyāyācitapratigrahasyocyate 
pratiprasavo hy ayam 
pratiṣiddhasya ca pratiprasavo bhavati 
laukikyā cārtitayā prāptiḥ pratiṣiddhā saiva pratiprasūyate 
śayyāṃ gṛhān kuśān gandhān apaḥ puṣpaṃ maṇīn dadhi 
dhānā matsyān payo māṃsaṃ śākaṃ caiva na nirṇudet 
śayyādīny anāhṛtāny api na nirṇuden na pratyācakṣīta 
yadi gṛhe 'vasthitāni dravyāṇi kaścid ucyate ca idam idam āharāmi etat partīkṣyatām tadā na pratyākhyeyāni 
gurūn bhṛtyāṃś cojjihīrṣann arciṣyan devatātithīn 
sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyān na tu tṛpyet svayaṃ tataḥ 
gurava upadeśātideśair bahavaḥ 
bhṛtyā āśritāḥ smṛtyantare tu saṃkhyātāḥ 
vṛddhau tu mātāpitarau bhāryā sādhvī sutaḥ śiśuḥ 
tān uddhartum icchuḥ kṣudhāvasannān 
devatātithīṃś cārciṣyan nityakarmasaṃpatyartham ityarthaḥ 
sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt sādhubhyo 'sādhubhyaś ca 
na tu tṛpyet svayaṃ tataḥ 
tṛptiḥ kṣunnivṛttir upabhogaś ca tan na kuryāt 
gurvādiprayojanam eva tad grahītavyaṃ na tv ātmārtham 
kathaṃ tarhy ātmā yāpayitavyaḥ 
ata āha 
guruṣu tv abhyatīteṣu vinā vā tair gṛhe vasan 
ātmano vṛttim anvicchan gṛhṇīyāt sādhutaḥ sadā 
abhyatīteṣv atīteṣu vinā vā taiḥ jīvanto 'pi yadi pṛthag vasanti 
gurugrahaṇaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca bhṛtyānām api pradarśanārtham 
ātmano vṛttiṃ jīvanaṃ pratīcchan arthayamānaḥ sādhubhyaḥ dhārmikebhyaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt 
jāter atrānupādānāt śūdrād api dhārmikād asti parigrahaḥ 
tad uktaṃ nādyāc chūdrasya ityādi 
ārdhikaḥ kulamitraṃ ca gopālo dāsanāpitau 
ete śūdreṣu bhojyānnā yaś cātmānaṃ nivedayet 
ardhasīrī ardhikaḥ kuṭumbī bhūmikarṣaka iti ya ucyate 
gopāladāsau saṃbandhiśabdau 
yo yasya gāḥ pālayati sa tasya bhojyānnaḥ 
yaś cātmānaṃ nivedayet 
ahaṃ tvaccharaṇaḥ tvayi viśrabdho vatsyāmi ity evaṃ ya ātmānam arpayati so 'pi bhojyānnaḥ 
yādṛśo 'sya bhaved ātmā yādṛśaṃ ca cikīrṣitam 
yathā copacared enaṃ tathātmānaṃ nivedayet 
ātmanivedanam eva vyaktīkaroti 
asya śūdrasya yādṛśa ātmā bhavet yatkulīno yaddeśo yacchilpaś ca 
yac cikīrṣitam 
anekakāryeṇa tvām aham āśrito dharmeṇa anyena vā prayojanena rājakularakṣādinā 
yathā vopacarec chilpenānena tvāṃ seve pādavandanādi gṛhakṛtyakaratve sarvasmin nivedita ātmā nivedito bhavati 
anye tu ātmā vai putranāmāsi ity apatyavacanam ātmaśabdaṃ manyamānāḥ yasya śūdrasya kāmataḥ pravṛttā duhitā vivāhyate tasyānena bhojyānnatocyata ity āhuḥ 
tad ayuktam 
na tāvad ayam ātmaśabdo duhitari vispaṣṭaṃ prayuktaḥ 
putraśabdo hi puṃsy eva prasiddhataraḥ 
na ca parokṣaśabdopadeśena kiṃcit prayojanam 
etāvad eva vaktuṃ yuktaṃ dadyād duhitaraṃ ca ya iti 
anye tv ardhikādigrahaṇaṃ śūdropalakṣaṇārthaṃ varṇayanti 
tena pāraśavasya śvaśurasya ca bhojyānnatā siddhā bhavati 
yo 'nyathā santam ātmānam anyathā satsu bhāṣate 
sa pāpakṛt tamoloke stena ātmāpahārakaḥ 
anyathā bhūtam adhārmikaṃ santaṃ satsu śiṣṭeṣv anyathā bhāṣate dhārmiko 'ham iti 
anyena vā prayojanena cāśrito 'nyad darśayati sa sarveṣāṃ pāpakṛtām adhikatamaḥ pāpakṛt 
stenaś cauraḥ 
ātmāpahārako 'nyaś cauro dravyam apaharaty ayaṃ punar ātmānam eveti nindātiśayaḥ 
vācy arthā niyatāḥ sarve vāṅmūlā vāgviniḥsṛtāḥ 
tāṃ tu yaḥ stenayed vācaṃ sa sarvasteyakṛn naraḥ 
śabdārthayor nityasaṃbandhād vāci śabde 'rthā niyatā ucyante 
vāṅmūlā vaktuḥ svābhiprāyaprakāśanasya tadadhīnatvāt tanmūlā ucyante 
vāco viniḥsṛtāḥ saṃbhūtāḥ śrotur api pratipattes tattulyatvād vāgviniḥsṛtā ucyante 
na cātra paunaruktyāśaṅkāparihāre prayatitavyam anuvādatvād asya yathākathaṃcid vastuparihāratvāt 
tāṃ vācaṃ yaś corayati muṣṇāty anyad uktvānyad anutiṣṭhaty anyenābhiprāyeṇa saṃgacchate 'nyac ca darśayati sa sarvasteyakṛt 
nāsti tad dravyaṃ suvarṇādi yat tena nāpahṛtaṃ bhavatīti nindārthavādo 'nṛtavacanasya 
maharṣipitṛdevānāṃ gatvānṛṇyaṃ yathāvidhi 
putre sarvaṃ samāsjya vasen mādhyasthyam āsthitaḥ 
gṛhasthasyaivedaṃ prakārāntaram ucyate 
maharṣīṇām ānṛṇyaṃ svādhyāyena pitṝṇām apatyotpādanena devānāṃ yajñair yathoktam tribhir ṛṇair ṛṇavā iti gatvā kṛtvaitat trayaṃ putre prāptavyavahāre sarvagṛhakuṭumbavyavahāraṃ samāsajya saṃnyasya vased gṛha eva 
mādhyasthyam āsthitas tyaktāhaṃkāraḥ 
idaṃ me dhanam idaṃ me putradāram idaṃ me dāsīdāsam iti svabuddhiṃ saṃtyajyāsīta 
nāhaṃ kasyacin na kaścin mameti tyaktasvatṛṣṇatā mādhyasthyam 
ayaṃ ca saṃnyāsaḥ kāmānāṃ ca dṛṣṭānāṃ ca karmaṇām na sarveṣām 
uttaratra darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
ekākī cintayen nityaṃ vivikte hitam ātmani 
ekākī cintayāno hi paraṃ śreyo 'dhigacchati 
kṛte sarvakarmasaṃnyāsa idaṃ tasya viśeṣataḥ kartavyam 
ekākī asahāyaḥ sann avidyamānasaṃbhāṣaṇo 'nākule vivikte nirjane rahasi cintayed dhyāyed dhitam ātmany upaniṣatsu yā brahmopāsanā vihitās tā abhyaset 
taccintayā tadabhyāse paraṃ śreyo mokṣākhyam adhigacchati prāpnoti 
eṣoditā gṛhasthasya vṛttir viprasya śāśvatī 
snātakavratakalpaś ca sattvavṛddhikaraḥ śubhaḥ 
adhyāyārthopasaṃhāraḥ 
eṣā vṛttir viprasya gṛhasthasyoktā 
śāśvatī nityā 
anityā tv āpadi yā vakṣyate 
vipragrahaṇād brāhmaṇasyaiva snātakavratānāṃ kalpo vidhiḥ 
satvaṃ nāmātmaguṇas tasya vṛddhikaraḥ 
śubhaḥ praśastaḥ 
praśaṃsaiṣā 
anena vipro vṛttena vartayan vedaśāstravit 
vyapetakalmaṣo nityaṃ brahmaloke mahīyate 
sarvasyāsya phalakathanam etat 
anena vipro vartayan vartamāno vedaśāstravid vyapetakalmaṣaḥ pratiṣedhāparādhajaṃ pāpaṃ kalmaṣaṃ tadvyapetaṃ vyapanītaṃ prāyaścittaiḥ 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
vihitakaraṇāt pratiṣiddhasyānāsevanāt kathaṃcit kṛtasya prāyaścittair niṣkrītatvāt 
brahmaloke mahīyate brahmaloke sthānaviśeṣe mahimānaṃ prāpnoti 
darśanāntaraṃ brahmarūpaḥ sampadyata iti siddham 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyām
caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ 
iti bhaṭṭavīrasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithiviracite
manubhāṣye caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ 
atha pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
śrutvaitān ṛṣayo dharmān snātakasya yathoditān 
idam ūcur mahātmānam analaprabhavaṃ bhṛgum 
brahmacārigṛhasthyor adhyāyatrayeṇa ye dharmā vihitās tāñ chrutvā ṛṣayo marīcyādayo bhṛgum ācāryam idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ vastv abruvan pṛṣṭavantaḥ 
nanu cātra snātakasyeti śrūyate 
tatra brahmacārigrahaṇaṃ kim artham 
ucyate 
vṛttasaṃkīrtanam etat 
brahmacāriṇo dharmā uktā eva 
mahātmānam analaprabhavam iti ca bhṛguviśeṣaṇam 
analād agneḥ prabhava utpattis yasya tam 
nanu prathame 'dhyāye ahaṃ prajāḥ sisṛkṣuḥ ity atra manor apatyaṃ bhṛgur uktaḥ 
satyam 
arthavādaḥ 
amutra agneḥ sakāśād bhṛgor janma śrutaṃ taddarśanenaivam uktam 
tathā ca nāma nirvacanam 
bhṛṣṭād retasaḥ prathamam udadīpyata tad asāv ādityo 'bhavat yad dvitīyam āsīt tad bhṛguḥ iti 
upacārato vaitad ucyate 
tejasvitāsāmānyād agner iva prasava iti 
na cātrābhiniveṣṭavyaṃ kataraḥ pakṣo yukta iti 
anidaṃparatvād asya śāstrasya 
sarva evāyaṃ praśnaprativacanasaṃdarbho vakṣyamāṇasyānnadoṣasya gauravajñāpanārthaḥ 
parigrahaduṣṭād annasvabhāvaduṣṭaṃ gurutaram iti 
saṃbandhidoṣāt svarūpadoṣo balavān antaraṅgatvāt 
nanu ca pūrvaṃ bahutaraṃ prāyaścittaṃ śrūyate amatyā kṣapaṇaṃ tryaham iti 
idaṃ tu śeṣeṣūpavased ahaḥ iti 
tat katham asya gurutaratvam 
ucyate 
laśunādyapakṣam etat 
teṣu hi matyā jagdhvā patet iti patitaprāyaścittaṃ bhavati  
evaṃ yathoktaṃ viprāṇāṃ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatām 
kathaṃ mṛtyuḥ prabhavati vedaśāstravidāṃ prabho 
yan maharṣibhiḥ pṛṣṭaṃ tad idānīṃ darśayati 
evam iti śāstravyāpāraparāmarśaḥ 
yathoktam iti śāstrārthaṃ parāmṛśati 
etena śāstrasaṃdarbheṇa yādṛśo dharma uktas tatpunas tam anutiṣṭhatāṃ dvijātīnām 
vipragrahaṇasya darśanārthatvād vakṣyati etad uktaṃ dvijātīnām iti 
kathaṃ mṛtyuḥ prabhavati snātakāvasthāyāṃ brahmacaryāvasthāyāṃ vā 
yataḥ paripūrṇāyurbhis tair bhavituṃ yuktaṃ puruṣāyuṣajīvibhiḥ 
śatavarṣaṃ puruṣāṇām āyus tataḥ purāpamṛtyunā maraṇam eṣāṃ na yuktam 
yata uktam ācārāl labhate hy āyuḥ japatāṃ juhvatām iti 
na tān uvāca dharmātmā maharṣīn mānavo bhṛguḥ 
śrūyatāṃ yena doṣeṇa mṛtyur viprān jighāṃsati 
anabhyāsena vedānām ācārasya ca varjanāt 
ālasyād annadoṣāc ca mṛtyur viprān jighāṃsati 
nanu ca svadharmam anutiṣṭhatām iti praśnena yuktam yena doṣeṇa iti uttaraś ca grantho naivopapadyate 
ucyate 
anabhyāsenetyādidṛṣṭāntatvenocyate 
yathā bhavadbhiḥ pratipannā vedānabhyāsādayaḥ purāyuṣo maraṇahetavaḥ evaṃ vakṣyamāṇo 'nnadoṣaḥ 
satsv api vedābhyāsādiṣu na tāvat svadharmo yaḥ pūrvatra kathitaḥ kiṃ tv ayam annadoṣo garīyastaraḥ 
pṛthak prakaraṇāc caitad abhidhīyate   
laśunaṃ gṛñjanaṃ caiva palāṇḍuṃ kavakāni ca 
abhakṣyāṇi dvijātīnām amedhyaprabhavāni ca 
laśunādayaḥ padārthā loke prasiddhā eva 
kavakaśabdo jātiśabdaḥ 
kvacit kṛyākur iti prasiddhe 'rthe manyate 
chatrākāni kavakāny eva 
tathā hi kavakaśabdena pratiṣiddhaṃ chatrākaśabdena prāyaścittaṃ vakṣyati chatrākaṃ viḍvarāhaṃ ca iti 
na ca chatrākaṃ nāma padārthāntaraṃ prasiddham 
na cākṣaravarṇasāmānyena yo yac chatrākāras taṃ taṃ chatrākam iti yuktaṃ pratipattum 
tathā sati suvarcalādīnāṃ samācāravirodhī pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti 
tasmād yāny eva kavakāni tāny eva chatrākāṇi 
tathā ca niruktakāraḥ kṣuṇṇam ahicchatrakaṃ bhavati yat kṣudyate iti 
tena yāny etāni bhūmāv akṛṣṭāyām anupūrvajāyāṃ ca sitavarṇāni jāyante tāni ca kavakāni 
vakṣyati ca bhaumāni kavakāni iti 
darśitaṃ ca padā kṣuṇṇam iva iti 
pādaprahāreṇa yāni kṣudyante 
yato yāni vṛkṣād gulmāj jāyante teṣāṃ tadākārāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ 
kukuṇḍāni kavakāni vaidyake vyākhyātāni 
etac ca vyākhyānaṃ na gavādiśabdavat 
śāke kavakaśabdo loke ca prayujyate 
ato 'sya samācārād vaidyakādiśāstrārthe niścayaḥ 
pradarśitaś cāsau 
laśunādīnāṃ tu samānavarṇagandhā api viṣṇunā pratiṣiddhāḥ 
pārāśarikāyāṃ tu śabdenaiva niṣedhaḥ prāyaścittaviśeṣārtha uktaḥ cāndrāyaṇam iti 
tena lavatakakarṇikārādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
amedhyaprabhavāny amedhyajātāni ca saṃsargajātāni 
anye tv āhur mūlavāstūkavat kevalāmedhyaprabhavānāṃ yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
tataś ca yāny adhikapuṣṭyarthaṃ dhānyaśākādīny amedhyakṣetrajātāni saṃsṛjyante tāni na duṣyantīti 
tad ayuktam śruteḥ sarvasyāpy abhakṣyatvād 
ihāpi ca yady amedhyasaṃsargam antareṇa na kiṃcid vastūtpadyate tataḥ syād api 
yatas tu kiṃcin medhyāj jāyate kiṃcit saṃsṛṣṭāt tato 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kevale 'medhyaprabhave na saṃsṛṣṭe avatiṣṭhate 
māṃsasya saty api śukraśoṇitāmedhyaprabhavatve nāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pṛthakprakaraṇārambhāt tasya 
lohitān vṛkṣaniryāsān vraścanaprabhavāṃs tathā 
śeluṃ gavyaṃ ca pīyūṣaṃ prayatnena vivarjayet 
vṛkṣakoṭarasrāveṇa hetvantareṇa vā bahir yan mūlaskandhaphalapalāśaśākhākusumavyatiriktaṃ vṛkṣalagnaṃ jāyate sa vṛkṣaniryāsaḥ 
lohitagrahaṇāt karpūrādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ 
vraścanāc chedanād yeṣāṃ prabhavo janma 
evaṃ vṛkṣāder valkapradeśā ye tatraiva jāyante teṣām alohitānām apratiṣedhaḥ 
śeluḥ śleṣmātakaḥ prasiddho vaidyakādiśāstrebhyaḥ 
na tu sutasya kṣīrasya santānikā aprasiddhatvāt 
yat tu pīyūṣasāhacaryāt santānikā yuktā iti bhavati sāhacaryaṃ viśeṣahetur ubhayatra prayoge sati na punaḥ sāhacaryam adṛṣṭaprayogāṇāṃ prayogajñāpakam 
gavyaṃ ca 
gavyagrahaṇān māhiṣāder apratiṣedhaḥ 
anādyam agnimātrasaṃyogāt piṇḍībhūtam anāsaktaṃ ca 
sadyaḥprasūtāyā goḥ kṣīraṃ pīyūṣaśabdenocyate 
nanu ca kṣīrasya savikārasya daśāhaṃ cābhakṣyatāṃ vakṣyati 
tricaturāṇi vāhāni tādṛśaṃ kṣīraṃ bhavati 
satyam 
yadi kathaṃcit kasyāpi daśāhat pareṇa bhavati tad idam arthavat 
prayatnenetyādi padadvayaṃ ślokapūraṇārtham 
abhakṣyāṇīty anuvartate 
vṛthākṛsarasaṃyāvaṃ pāyasāpūpam eva ca 
anupākṛtamāṃsāni devānnāni havīṃṣi ca 
atra kṛsarasaṃyāvam iti samāhāre dvandvaḥ 
tilaiḥ saha siddha odanaḥ kṛsaraśabdenocyate 
saṃyāvo bhojyaviśeṣaḥ sarpirguḍatilādikṛtaḥ pureṣu prasiddhaḥ 
ye tu yauter miśraṇārthatvād yāni miśrīkṛtyānnāni sādhyante mudgamakuṣṭhakādibhis tāni saṃyāvaśabdenocyante iti teṣāṃ kṛsaragrahaṇam anarthakam 
so 'pi hy anena prakāreṇa saṃyāva eva 
vṛthāśabdaḥ sarvatrānuṣajyate 
yad ātmārthaṃ kriyate na devapitratithyartham 
tadā kṛsarādīnām upadeśa iti 
tad ayuktam 
na hi gṛhasthā ekenārthena pacanti 
haviṣa ivāvāpāt prabhṛti tādarthyenoddeśaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi anuddiṣṭaviśeṣasya sāmānyataḥ kṛtasyānnasya pañcayajñānuṣṭhānaṃ vihitam 
tatrākṛtavaiśvadevasya bhojane vihitātikramaḥ na punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ samasti 
tathā hi dve prāyaścitte bhavataḥ 
vihitātikramāt pratiṣiddhasevanāc ca 
kṛsarādayas tu devatāviseṣaṃ vāstuyajñādiviṣayam anuddiśya kṛtāś ced āhnikavidhayo 'pi pratiṣidhyante 
yaś cāpi nātmārthaṃ pacet iti so 'py avaśyakartavyatvāt kṛtātikramasya bhojanaprāptyanuvādo na punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
tathā sati dvimūlakalpanāprāyaścittaṃ syād ity uktam 
na cānyārthatvenāpi kṛtasyātmārthatā pākasya niṣeddhuṃ śakyate 
pacyamānārtho hi pākas tasya taddvārikā na śakyā ātmārthatā niṣeddhum tenaiva vṛttividhānāt 
na hi bhṛtyādiśiṣṭabhojanaṃ gṛhasthasya śeṣasaṃskāro na cātra saṃkalpaḥ śruto yena madarthaṃ pacyatām iti pākakāle saṃkalpamātraṃ niṣidhyate 
ātmārthaṃ cottarakālam avicāryety ucyate 
mithyāsaṃkalpadoṣaś ca syāt 
devatārthatayā saṃkalpitasyātmārthatayā yoga iti 
tasmād ayam anuvādo yat pacen nātmārtham evopayojyaṃ prāg vidher vaiśvadevikād iti 
tathā ca apakvabhojane 'pi vidhim etaṃ smaranti 
yadannaḥ puruṣo rājaṃs tadannās tasya devatāḥ iti 
na ca bubhukṣamāṇasyaivādhikāraḥ gārhasthyapratipattinimittatvāt 
tena yad ahar na bhuñjīta tad ahar apy akurvan pratyavaiti 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
svārthaṃ vā pacatu parārthaṃ vā pākṣīd iti sarvathā kṛtavaiśvadevātikramaṇavratā api na pravartante iti nityatām anuvadati 
yac cāpi paṭhati 
laukike vaidike vāpi hutotsṛṣṭe jale kṣitau 
vaisvadevas tu kartavyaḥ pañcasūnāpanuttaye  iti 
anenāpi nityataivocyate 
na hi vaidike vaiśvadevasaṃbhavaḥ 
na ca smārtavacane pramāṇam asti 
pāyasāpūpam iti 
payasā siddha odanaḥ pāyasḥ na dadhyādipayovikāraḥ 
apūpāḥ puroḍāśāḥ 
devānnāni samācārapramāṇakāni 
havīṃṣi śrutivihitāni hotavyāni  prāg grahahomād  yato haviḥśeṣasya bhakṣyatāṃ vakṣyati 
anupākṛtasya ayajñātasya paśor māṃsāni 
upākaraṇaṃ paśoḥ saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ 
sa paśuyāgeṣu vihitaḥ 
etena ca yajñopayuktaśeṣabhakṣyatā māṃsasya lakṣyate 
vṛthāśabdādhikāre 'py anupākṛtagrahaṇam atithyādiśiṣṭasyāpi go'vyajamāṃsasya pratiṣedhārtham 
go'vyajamāṃsam eva vānupākṛtaśabdena vivakṣitam 
go'vyajasyaiva tatrālambhaś codito yataḥ śiṣṭaṃ prokṣitam ity uktam 
anirdaśāyā goḥ kṣīram auṣṭram aikaśaphaṃ tathā 
āvikaṃ saṃdhinīkṣīraṃ vivatsāyāś ca goḥ payaḥ 
yadīha anirdaśāhaṃ goḥ kṣīram iti pāṭhaḥ uṣṭrādīnām api dāśāhādikaḥ pratiṣedha āśaṅkyate 
anirdaśāgrahaṇānuvṛttyā tatra samācāra ātyantikapratiṣedhārtha āśrayaṇīyaḥ 
anirdaśāyā iti tu strīliṅgapāṭhe āśaṅkaiva nāsti 
na hi taddhitāntair anirdaśāyā uṣṭram ityādibhiḥ saṃbandhopattiḥ 
uttaratra ca punaḥ kṣīragrahaṇāt samācārāc ca uṣṭraikaśaphāvikānirdaśagavīkṣīrāṇi savikārāṇi pratiṣidhyante 
saṃdhinīvivatsayos tu kṣīram eva 
anirdaśā ca gaur ucyate yasyāḥ prasūtāyā daśāhāny anatikrāntāni 
saṃdhinī yā ubhayoḥ prāptadohā kathaṃcid anyatarasmin duhyate 
prātaradugdhā sāyaṃ duhyate 
sā tu svalpakṣīratvād ekasminn eva kāle sāsau saṃdhinī 
kaścid āha yā mṛtasvavatsā parakīyaṃ vatsaṃ saṃcārya duhyate sā saṃdhinī 
vivatsā tu yā saty eva vatse vinākṛtavatsā vatsaprasravaṇam anapekṣya kuṣṭhakayavaśālituṣādinā bhojanaviśeṣeṇa duhyāt 
vivatsāyā iti 
tenaiva vatsagrahaṇenāvatsā dhenur ānīyatām itivad gor iti labdhe gograhaṇam ajāmahiṣyor apratiṣedhārtham 
na punar anirdaśāyā ity atra 
ataś ca gograhaṇaṃ tatrājādyupalakṣaṇārtham 
tathā ca gautamaḥ goś ca kṣīram anirdaśāyāh sūtake 
ajāmahiṣyoś ca ity āha 
payograhaṇaṃ saṃdhinīkṣīram iti samāsāntavartinaḥ kṣīrapadasya nātisukaraḥ saṃbandho yataḥ 
āraṇyānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ māhiṣaṃ vinā 
strīkṣīraṃ caiva varjyāni sarvaśuktāni caiva hi 
āraṇyā gohastimarkaṭādayaḥ 
puṃsāṃ kṣīrābhāvaḥ 
sarveṣāṃ mṛgāṇām iti jātimātravivakṣāyāṃ puṃliṅganirdeśasāmarthyāt strībhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ 
mṛgakṣīraṃ kukkuṭāṇḍam itivat 
darśitaṃ caitat puṃbhāvavidhau mahābhāṣyakāreṇa 
māhiṣaṃ vinā payo'pekṣayā napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ 
strī mānuṣī 
yady api strī gauḥ somakrayaṇī ityādau sāsnādimatyarthe prayogadarśanam tathāpi jātyantarasyāprakṛtatvāt prasiddhataratvāt tatra prayogaḥ syāt 
striyo madhuram icchanti striyo ratnam anuttamam iti nāry eva pratīyate 
evakāram añjanādipratiṣedhe vyācakṣate 
na kevalaṃ strīkṣīraṃ bhakṣaṇe varjyam kiṃ tarhy anyāsv apy evaṃvidhāsu kriyāsu 
eṣa tu smṛtyantarasamācārasāpekṣa eva śabdaḥ sūcako yuktaḥ na tv asyārthasya vācakaḥ
