dadhi bhakṣyaṃ ca śukteṣu sarvaṃ ca dadhisaṃbhavam 
yāni caivābhiṣūyante puṣpamūlaphalaiḥ śubhaiḥ 
aviśeṣeṇa sarvaśukteṣu pratiṣiddheṣu keṣucid ayam apavādaḥ 
śuktāny ucyante yāni prāptasārasyāni kālātyayena dravyāntarasaṃsargeṇa vāmlatām apadyante 
yathāmrātakādīni madhurāṇi cirakālam atirasatvāc chuktāni bhavanti 
niṣpīḍito madhurarasaḥ kālato 'mlatām etītyādinā evaṃvidhāni 
yāni tu svabhāvato 'mlāni dāḍimāmalakajambīrādīni tāni naiva śuktāni 
yāni ca prāptakālotpattyādīni 
na hy ayam āmlaparyāyaḥ śuktaśabdaḥ 
tatra kevalāni pākataḥ śuktāni pratiṣidhyante 
dravyāntaraiś ca puṣpamūlakādibhir yojitāny atra jñāyante 
tathā ca gautamaḥ śuktaṃ kevalam adadhi 
abhiṣūyante 
abhiṣava udakena saṃsṛjya parivāsanam 
yady evaṃ kāla eva tarhy amlatāhetuḥ 
satyam 
etāny api dravyāṇi 
tṛtīyā ca karaṇe sahayoge vā 
puṣpādibhir udakena saha abhiṣūyante saṃdhīyante 
kecit tv āhuḥ 
yatra puṣpamūlāṇy amlatām janayanti 
yāni dāḍimāmalakādīni śuktāni tāni bhakṣyāṇi yāni drākṣādibhir madhurair abhiṣūyante saṃdhīyante tāni na bhakṣyante 
abhiṣavo hy ucyate śuktatājananam 
yāni puṣpādibhiḥ śuktīkriyante 
na ca drākṣādīni śuktatāpādakāni 
kiṃ tarhi kevala eva kālaḥ 
etat tu na samyak aśabdārthatvāt 
na hi somam abhiṣuṇotīti śuktaṃ karotīti pratipattiḥ 
kiṃ tarhi ya eva prāg vyākhyāto 'rthaḥ 
dadhisaṃbhavam udaśvinmastukilāṭakūrcikādi 
kravyādaḥ śakunīn sarvān tathā grāmanivāsinaḥ 
anirdiṣṭāṃś caikaśaphaṃṣ ṭiṭṭibhaṃ ca vivarjayet 
kravyāda āmamāṃsabhakṣakāḥ kaṅkagṛdhrādayaḥ 
abhakṣyavat kevalāmamāṃsabhakṣakā gṛhyante 
na tūbhayaraktā mayūrādayaḥ 
grāmanivāsinaḥ akravyādā api 
ekaśaphā aśvāśvataragardabhādayaḥ 
anirdiṣṭās tu na bhakṣyatvenoktās te na bhakṣyā iti 
ye tūktās tatraiva bhakṣyāḥ 
ye tūṣṭravaḍavaṛkṣagauragardabhāḥ prajākāmas teṣāṃ ca māṃsam aśnīyād iti 
nanu ca śrutita eva tatra bhakṣyāvāptiḥ 
pratyuta nirdiṣṭagrahaṇe sati śrutau coditānām anyatra bhakṣyāśaṅkā anidiṣṭān varjayen na nirdiṣṭān iti vākyārthapratipatteḥ 
na ca smṛtau kecid bhakṣyatvena nirdiṣṭāḥ yena tadvyatiriktaviṣayam anirdiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ vyākhyāyeta 
ataḥ śrutau ye nirdiṣṭās te na bhakṣyā iti prāpnoti 
ucyate 
ācārāvirodhī sa smṛtyarthaḥ 
anirdiṣṭagrahaṇam anuvādaḥ 
ṭiṭṭibhaḥ śakunir eva ṭiṭīti yo vāśate 
prāyeṇa śabdānukaraṇanimittaṃ śakunīnāṃ nāmadheyapratilambhaḥ 
taduktaṃ niruktakāreṇa kāka iti śabdānukṛtis tad idaṃ śakuniṣu bahulam iti 
kalaviṅkaṃ plavaṃ haṃsaṃ cakrāhvaṃ grāmakukkuṭam 
sārasaṃ rajjudālaṃ ca dātyūhaṃ śukasārike 
kalaviṅko grāmacaṭako nigameṣūktaḥ 
grāmavāsitvāt tasya siddhe pratiṣedhe punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ striyāś caṭakāyā abyanujñānārthaḥ 
puṃśabdo hy ayaṃ vṛṣabavat 
anye tv āraṇyasya nivṛttyarthaṃ manyante 
te hi varṣāsu vanavāsino bhavanti 
bāhulayavyapadeśāc ca grāmacaṭakā ucyante 
yathā mahiṣā āraṇyāḥ 
plavahaṃsacakravākānāṃ vakṣyamāṇajālapādapratiṣedhāt siddhe pratiṣedhe nityārthaṃ grahaṇam 
ata āṭyādīnāṃ vikalpena bhakṣaṇaṃ gamyate 
grāmakukkuṭam 
grāmagrahaṇād āraṇyābhyanujñānam 
kutaḥ punar āraṇyasyābhakṣyatāśaṅkā 
smṛtyantare hi kukkuṭo vikirāṇām iti paṭhyate 
ataś cāviśeṣeṇābhakṣyatā prāptā vacanena tasya sāmānyapratiṣedhasya viśiṣṭaviṣayatā prajñāyate 
nanu vikalpaḥ kasmān na bhavaty anena śāstreṇāsyābhyanujñānāc chāstrāntareṇa cāviśeṣeṇa tasyāpi pratiṣedhāt 
nāyaṃ vikalpasya viṣayaḥ 
virodhe hi tulyabalānāṃ vikalpo na cātra virodho 'sti 
na hy anayoḥ smṛtyoḥ śāstrabhedo 'pi sāmānyasya viśeṣa upasaṃhartuṃ nyāyyatvāt śākhāntaratas tṛtīyasyāpy ekaśāstrasya darśitatvāt 
yady evaṃ jālapādapratiṣedhasyāpi haṃsādiviśeṣa evopasaṃhāro yukto nāviśeṣeṇa kākajālapādānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
bhaved evaṃ yady apauruṣeyo 'yaṃ granthaḥ syāt 
bhinnakartṛke tv apauruṣeyatve na sāmānyasya kiṃcit prayojanaṃ haṃsādiviśeṣamātraparyavasāne 
bhinnakartṛkatve tu pauruṣeyatve sati sāmānyadarśino viśeṣaviṣayam ajñānaṃ saṃbhavati viśeṣadarśino 'pi sāmānyaviṣayam 
ubhayoś ca mūlakalpanāyām ekasya sāmānyavedanaṃ vacanamūlaṃ kalpyate anyasya viśeṣavacanam 
tayoś ca vaidikayor bhinnaśākhādītayor asati śāstrabhede ekavākyataiva nyāyyā 
na ca vede paryanuyogo 'sti kiṃ sāmānyena yadi viśeṣaniṣṭhatā tasya kartur abhāvāt 
śrutād dhi tatra pratipattiḥ kevalaśabdaśaktisamāśritā 
na prayojanavaśenārthāntarakalpanam 
rajjudālādayaḥ śākunikebhya upalabdhavyāḥ 
pratudān jālapādāṃś ca koyaṣṭinakhaviṣkirān 
nimajjataś ca matsyādān saunaṃ vallūram eva ca 
pratudya prahṛtya cañcvā ye bhakṣayanti 
svabhāva eṣa eṣāṃ pakṣiṇām 
pratudāḥ śatapatrādayaḥ 
jālapādā āṭyādayaḥ 
teṣāṃ vikalpa uktaḥ 
nanu ca yatra vikalpa anyataratrecchātaḥ pravṛttiḥ 
sā cāpratiṣiddheṣv api sthitaiva 
laukikaṃ hi bhakṣaṇam tat saty evārthitve 
na śāstrīyam yena niyamataḥ syāt 
tatra vikalpitasya pratiṣedhasya na kiṃcit prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ 
ucyate 
dattottaram etat 
yatrābuddhipūrvaprayogāc chabdād evārthāvagatiḥ 
pauruṣeyas tv ayaṃ granthaḥ samāhitacetasā prayatnavatā śatasāhasrikaṃ saṃkṣeptum ācāryeṇa praṇītaḥ yatrāśakyam anarthakaṃ prayoktum 
ata ācāryābhidhānam unnīyate 
na tu jālapādapratiṣedhe 'sati tadviśeṣaṃ haṃsaṃ svaśabdena niṣedhayati 
yata etad api smaraṇam eva 
anye tv anyena jālapādas tv iti pramādapāṭhaḥ syāt 
uktaṃ caitad iṅgitena ceṣṭitena mahatā vā sūtrapraṇayanenācāryāṇām abhiprāyā lakṣyante 
viśeṣaś cātrānumīyate 
jālapādādi na bhakṣayetit vivakṣate sāmānyapratiṣedha ubhayor arthavattvāya 
yatra māṃsavikrayārthāḥ paśavo hanyante sā sūnā 
āpaṇo māṃsasyety eke 
vallūraṃ māṃsaṃ saṃśoṣya cirasthāpitam 
nakhair vikīrya bhakṣayanti te nakhaviṣkirāḥ 
mayūrabalākādayaḥ 
āpatsu iti vacanāt tu teṣāṃ pākṣikī bhakṣyāpy asti 
sa hi paṭhati kukkuṭo vikirāṇām iti 
na cāsya mānavasya vacanasya kukkuṭopasaṃhāraḥ śakyo vaktuṃ kukkuṭanāmagrahaṇasyānarthakaprasaṅgāt 
bakaṃ caiva balākāṃ ca kākolaṃ khañjarīṭakam 
matsyādān viḍvarāhāṃś ca matsyān eva ca sarvaśaḥ 
bakabalākākākolādīnāṃ matsyādagraṇāt siddhe pratiṣedhe tadanyeṣāṃ vikalpārthaṃ punarvacanam 
matsyādā apakṣiṇo 'pi matsyādagrahaṇād abhakṣyā vijñeyāḥ nakrādayaḥ kriyānimittatvān matsyādaśabdasya 
kākolaś ca śyeno deśāntaraprasiddheḥ ayaṃ bāhlīkeṣv evam ucyata iti prasiddham 
viḍvarāhapratiṣedhāc cāraṇyābhyanujñā grāmavāsipratiṣedhaś ca pūrvasūtre prakaraṇāc chakuniviśeṣaṇārtho vijñeyaḥ 
evaṃ hi ceha viḍvarāhagrahaṇam arthavad bhavati 
grāmavāsī śūkaro viḍvarāhaḥ 
nanu ca yadi tatra prakaraṇād grāmavāsinaḥ pakṣiṇo gṛhyante ihāpi matsyādāḥ pakṣiṇa eva grahītuṃ nyāyyāḥ 
naivam 
na cātra śakunīnāṃ prakaraṇam asti viḍvarāhamatsyānām apakṣiṇām api nirdeśārtham 
sarvaśaḥ sarvadā 
utsargo 'yam 
asyāpavādaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
yo yasya māṃsam aśnāti sa tanmāṃsāda ucyate 
matsyādaḥ sarvamāṃsādas tasmān matsyān vivarjayet 
pūrvasya matsyapratiṣedhavidher arthavādo 'yam 
yatsaṃbandhimāṃsaṃ yo 'śnāti sa tanmāṃsasaṃbandhinyāśanakriyayā vyapadiśyate 
yathā sarpādo nakulaḥ mārjāro mūṣakāda ityādi 
yas tu matsyādaḥ sa sarvamāṃsāśī bhavati 
gomāṃsāda ity api vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ 
ato nindātiśayān matsyān vivarjayet 
pāṭhīnarohitāv ādyau niyuktau havyakavyayoḥ 
rājīvāḥ siṃhatuṇḍāṃś ca saśalkāś caiva sarvaśaḥ 
pāṭhīnarohitau matsyajātiviśeṣau tayor havyakavyaniyogena śrāddhādau bhakṣyatābhyanujñāyate nānvāhike bhojane 
rājīvasiṃhatuṇḍasaśalkānāṃ sarvaśaḥ havyakavyābhyām anyatrāpy anivṛttir bhojane 
rājīvāḥ padmavarṇāḥ kaiścid iṣyante 
aparais tu rājayo rekhā yeṣāṃ santi 
siṃhatuṇḍāh siṃhakṛtimukhāḥ 
saśalkāḥ śakalinaḥ 
na bhakṣayed ekacarān ajñātāṃś ca mṛgadvijān 
bhakṣyeṣv api samuddiṣṭān sarvān pañcanakhāṃs tathā 
ekacarāḥ sarpolūkādaya ekākinaś caranti 
ajñātān nāmato jātiviśeṣataś ca 
mṛgadvijān 
mṛgāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca na bhakṣyāḥ 
bhakṣyeṣv api samuddiṣṭān 
ye pratiṣiddhās te tādrūpye asati bhakṣyatāṃ prāptāḥ samuddiṣṭā iva bhavanti 
na tu bhakṣyāṇāṃ samuddeśo 'sti 
parihartavyatayā viśeṣato 'vijñātā bhakṣypakṣapatitā bhakṣyeṣv api samuddiṣṭā ity evam ucyante 
pañcanakhāś ca vānaraśṛgālādayaḥ 
sarvagrahaṇaṃ pādapūraṇārtham 
śvāvidhaṃ śalyakaṃ godhāṃ khaḍgakūrmaśaśāṃs tathā 
bhakṣyān pañcanakheṣv āhur anuṣṭrāṃś caikatodataḥ 
pañcanakhānāṃ madhyāc chvāvidhādayo bhakṣyāḥ 
smṛtyantare tu khaḍge vikalpaḥ 
tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ khaḍge tu vivadante iti 
uṣṭravarjitā ekatodato go'vyajamṛgā bhakṣyāḥ 
nanu ca śvāvitprabhṛtīnāṃ pañcanakhānāṃ bhakṣyatvavacanād anyeṣām abhakṣyatāsiddheḥ sarvān pañcanakhān iti pratiṣedhavacanam anarthakam 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
sarvaśabdena pratiṣedhe spaṣṭā pratipattir bhavati 
bhakṣyaviśeṣanirdeśena tadanyeṣāṃ yā abhakṣyatāpratipattiḥ sā ānumānikī pratipattiḥ 
gauravaṃ hi tathā syāt 
chatrākaṃ viḍvarāhaṃ ca laśunaṃ grāmakukkuṭam 
palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanaṃ caiva matyā jagdhvā pated dvijaḥ 
chatrākaṃ kavakāni 
viḍvarāhaḥ grāmaśūkaraḥ svatantraviharaḥ 
etāni bhakṣayitvā patito bhavet 
patitaprāyaścittaṃ kuryāt 
vakṣyati ca garhitānnādyayor jagdhiḥ surāpānasamāni ṣaṭ 
amatyaitāni ṣaḍ jagdhvā kṛcchraṃ sāntapanaṃ caret 
yaticāndrāyaṇaṃ vāpi śeṣeṣūpavased ahaḥ 
amatyā abuddhipūrvaṃ ṣaṭ jagdhvā ṣaṇṇām anyatamam api 
bhakṣaṇasya avidheyatvanimittatayā sāhityasyāvivakṣā 
śeṣeṣu abhakṣyeṣu bhakṣaṇe lohitavṛkṣaniryāsādiṣu ekam ahorātraṃ na bhuñjīta 
ahaḥśabdo rātrāv api dṛṣṭaprayogaḥ 
ahaś ca kṛṣṇam ahar arjunaṃ ca iti 
yeṣu cātra prakaraṇe pratiṣiddheṣu prāyaścittādhikāre pratipadaṃ prāyaścittam anyad vakṣyate kravyādasūkara ityādi tatra tad eva draṣṭavyaṃ pratipadavihitatvāt asya copavāsasyānyatra caritārthatvāt 
saṃvatsarasyaikam api caret kṛcchraṃ dvijottamaḥ 
ajñātabhuktaśuddhyarthaṃ jñātasya tu viśeṣataḥ 
bhojyaśūdragṛhabhojino brāhmaṇasyedam ucyate 
yasya śūdrasya gṛhe yāni brāhmaṇānām abhojyāny annāni saṃbhavanti na dūrataḥ parihriyante tādṛśasya gṛhe yo brāhmaṇo 'nnaṃ bhuṅkte tasya pratiṣiddhānnabhojanāśaṅkāyāṃ prājāpatyakṛcchracaraṇam upadiśyate 
aviśeṣanodanāyāṃ prājāpatyaṃ kṛcchraṃ pratīyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
ajñātabhuktaśuddhyartham ajñātadoṣaśaṅkāyām āha 
doṣo yadi bhuṅkte tasya śuddhyartham 
nanu ca īdṛśasya śuddhiṃ vakṣyati adṛṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktam iti 
tasya viṣayaṃ tatraiva darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
jñātasya tu doṣasya viśeṣataḥ vaiśeṣikaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kartavyam yasya yad vihitaṃ pratipadam 
yajñārthaṃ brāhmaṇair vadhyāḥ praśastā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 
bhṛtyānāṃ caiva vṛttyartham agastyo hy ācarat purā 
bhakṣyaprasaṅgena hiṃsābhyanujñāyate 
atyarthaṃ kṣutpīṣāyāṃ bhṛtyāder bhojanāntarāsaṃbhave bhakṣyamṛgapakṣivadhaḥ kartavyaḥ 
bhṛtyāḥ prāg vyākhyātāḥ 
agastyas tathākṛtavān ity agastyagrahaṇaṃ praśaṃsārtham 
yajñārtham ityādyo 'rdhaśloko 'rthavāda eva 
tatra hi vadhaḥ pratyakṣaśrutivihitatvād eva siddhaḥ 
praśastā ye bhakṣyatayānujñātāḥ 
eṣa evārtha uttaraśloke vistarataḥ karmārthavādatayā kathyate 
babhūvur hi puroḍāśā bhakṣyāṇāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām
purāṇeṣv ṛṣiyajñeṣu brahmakṣatrasaveṣu ca 
ṣaṭviṃśatsaṃvatsaraṃ nāma satram 
tatra mṛgapakṣivadha āmnātaḥ 
so 'nenānūdyate 
idaṃ tatra brāhmaṇam saṃsthite 'hani gṛhapatir mṛgayāṃ yāti sa tatra yān yān mṛgān hanti teṣāṃ tarasāḥ puroṣāśā bhavanti 
arthavādatvād babhūvur iti bhūtapratyaye na vivakṣā 
tenādyatve 'pi bhavanti 
evaṃ purāṇeṣv api 
na kevalaṃ kaścid adyatve satrāṇāṃ vyavahāra iti darśanābhiprāyam etat purāṇeṣv iti 
na punar adyatve yadi kecit sarvāṇy eva hareyuḥ teṣām eṣa vidhir na bhavatīti mantavyam 
atha vā yaḥ svayaṃ śāstrārthaṃ veditum asamarthaḥ kevalaṃ paraprasiddhyā mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ iti nyāyena pravartate tatra tv etad ucyate purāṇeṣv iti 
nāyam idaṃprathamako dharmaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi anādiḥ 
purāṇā ṛṣayo brāhmaṇāḥ kecana tapaḥsiddhāḥ jātyantaraṃ vā 
yathā mahābhāratādau varṇitam 
na cātra nirbandhaḥ kartavyaḥ ṛṣīṇāṃ jātyantaratve gandharvādivat kathaṃ yāgeṣv adhikāraḥ iti 
yato 'yam arthavādo yena kenacid ālambanena pratīyate 
brahmakṣatrasavāḥ brahmakṣatriyayajñāḥ 
yat kiṃcit snehasaṃyuktaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyam agarhitam 
tat paryuṣitam apy ādyaṃ haviḥśeṣaṃ ca yad bhavet 
bhakṣyaṃ yat kiṃcit snehasaṃyuktam 
bhojyam odanādi 
bhuktibhujyor ekārthatve 'pi pṛthagupādānād viṣayabhedo 'yaṃ pratīyate 
agarhitaṃ śuktatām anāpannam 
tat paryuṣitam apy ādyam 
rātryantare paryuṣitam ucyate 
pūrvedyuḥ siddham apy aparedyuḥ paryuṣitaṃ bhavati 
snehasaṃyuktam iti 
evaṃ saṃdihyate 
kiṃ yat snehasaṃyuktaṃ sat paryuṣitaṃ rasamiśraśākādi tat paryuṣitam aśitavyam uta śuṣkasyāpi paryuṣitasya bhakṣaṇakāle snehasaṃyogaḥ kartavyaḥ 
bhakṣāpūpādy api paryuṣitaṃ bhojanakāle snehena saṃyojya bhakṣayitavyam iti 
atra saṃdihyate snehayuktānāṃ bhakṣyatocyate tat paryuṣitam ādyam iti 
uddiśyamānaṃ snehasaṃyuktam nipatanaṃ na punar vidheyārthe 
na hi tacchabdasaṃbandho 'sya śruto yat paryuṣitaṃ tat snehasaṃyuktam ādyam iti 
ucyate 
haviḥśeṣāṇāṃ paryuṣitānām asnehasaṃyuktānāṃ teṣāṃ vacanam anartham 
na ca teṣāṃ snehasaṃyuktānāṃ parivāsaḥ saṃbhavati 
evaṃ ca teṣāṃ vacanam arthavad bhavati yadi bhojanakāle teṣāṃ snehasaṃyogo nāpekṣyate 
atas teṣāṃ tāvad bhojanakāla eva snehasaṃyoganirapekṣatayā vacanasyārthavattvam 
yady evaṃ tathāpi na saṃdehaḥ 
arthavattvād viśeṣapadasya vidheyarthatā snehasaṃyuktaśabdasya nyāyyā 
ucyate 
etāvad atra saṃdehe bījam 
yathāśrutasaṃbandhasya balīyastvāt kiṃ haviḥśeṣapadam anuvādo 'stu utānarthanakatvaṃ mā prāpad iti yat paryuṣitaṃ tena snehasaṃbandhaḥ kriyatām 
tatrānarthakyād vyavahitakalpanā jyāyasī 
samācārān nirṇayaḥ 
sarpistailavasāmajjāḥ snehāḥ 
cirasthitam api tv ādyam asnehāktaṃ dvijātibhiḥ 
yavagodhūmajaṃ sarvaṃ payasaś caiva vikriyā 
cirasthitaṃ dvirātrādyantaritam 
apiśabdād āktam ity atrāpi saṃbandhayitavyam 
snehāktam api yavagodhūmajaṃ saktvapūpādi 
payaso vikriyā vikārā dahimathitādayaḥ 
etad uktaṃ dvijātīnāṃ bhakṣyābhakṣyam aśeṣataḥ 
māṃsasyātaḥ pravakṣyāmi vidhiṃ bhakṣaṇavarjane 
ādyena ślokārdhena pūrvaprakaraṇam avacchinatti 
tad etad anantaram anukrāntaṃ prakaraṇam etat dvijātīnāṃ na śūdrāṇām iti uttaraṃ tu yad vakṣyate tac chūdrāṇām apīti prakaraṇavyavacchedaprayojanam 
ataś ca māṃsabhakṣaṇe prakāro vakṣyate 
yac ca tadvarjanena phalaṃ tac chūdrasyāpi bhavatīti 
anyathā abhakṣyāṇi dvijātīnām ity adhikārāl laśunādiṣv iva śūdrasya māṃsabhakṣaṇe 'pi kāmacāraḥ syāt 
yady evaṃ devādyarcane śiṣṭasya māṃsasya bhakṣyatā vakṣyate devān pitṝṃś cārcayitvā khādan māṃsaṃ na duṣyati iti 
devādyarcanaṃ medhyena māṃsena 
ye ca dvijātīnāṃ pratiṣiddhā mṛgaśakuntās te 'medhyāḥ 
ataś ca teṣāṃ māṃsena devārcanāsaṃbhavād ataccheṣasyābhakṣyatvād anye 'pi prakaraṇabhedāḥ yathā brāhmaṇādīnāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ pratiṣiddhāḥ te śūdrasyāpi prakārāntareṇa pratiṣiddhā bhavanti 
tatra prakaraṇabhedena na kiṃcid ucyate 
laśunādipratiṣedhaḥ śūdrasya na bhavati 
asti tāvat prakaraṇabhedena prayojanaṃ laśunādipratiṣedhe śūdrasyādhikāro mā bhūd iti 
māṃse 'pi devādyarcane gṛhasthasyādhikārād agṛhasthasya śūdrasya yathākāmyam 
nanu ca pākayajñe śūdrasyādhikārataḥ sthita eva 
bhojanaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ ca vihitam 
na ca laśunādibhiḥ pākayajñāḥ kriyante 
tataś ca nāpi śūdrasya yathākāmyaṃ laśunādayo bhakṣyāḥ syuḥ 
ko doṣaḥ 
dvijātigrahaṇam anarthakam 
parihṛtam etad agṛhasthasya proṣitasya vā kāmacāraḥ 
na ca gṛhasthena yad ahutaṃ tan na bhoktavyam 
śeṣabhug bhavet ity asyāyam arthaḥ akṛtavaiśvadevakriyeṇa na bhoktavyam 
tatra yasyaiva yāgasādhanatā dravyasya tad eva medhyaṃ hotavyam 
anye tu bhojanakāle kutaścid āhṛtya madhyagehe vā bhujyate 
tac cāhutaśeṣam api na pratiṣiddham 
māṃse tu punarvacanān niyamaḥ na kadācid devānupayuktaṃ bhojyam iti 
yadi cāturvarṇyasyātrādhikāras tadā yad vakṣyati parastāt śuddhavidhau caturṇām api varṇānām iti tad anarthakam 
tatraiva tasya prayojanaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
atha śvamāṃsādy apy śūdrasya bhakṣyaṃ prāpnoti dvijātigrahaṇāt pūrvatra 
kiṃ tv ekādaśe viḍvarāhakharoṣṭrāṇām ityādiślokatrayanirdiṣṭāḥ śūdrasyāpi na bhakṣyā iti jñāpakaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
prokṣitaṃ bhakṣayen māṃsaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca kāmyayā 
yathāvidhi niyuktas tu prāṇānām eva cātyaye 
agnīṣomīye paśau hutaśiṣṭaṃ māṃsaṃ lakṣaṇayā prokṣitam ucyate 
nanu prokṣitaśabdo yaugika ukṣasecana ity asya dhātoḥ prakṣālanakriyānimittakaḥ 
tathā ca prokṣaṇīr āsādaya ghṛtaṃ prokṣaṇīyam iti prokṣaṇībhir udvejitāḥ stha iti sarvatra kriyāyogāt prayujyate 
yady āsecanasādhanam tatra kuto vaidikasaṃskāranimittakānāṃ svasaṃbandhe paśulakṣaṇādvāreṇa māṃse pravartate 
mukhyaṃ ca śabdārtham atikramya kim iti lakṣaṇāśrīyate 
ataḥ prakṣālitam udakādinā yuktam 
satyam yady atra vākyāntarāṇy arthavādāś ca śeṣabhūtā na syuḥ anupākṛtamāṃsāni  asaṃskṛtān paśūn mantraiḥ iti 
atas tatparyālocanayāyam evārtho 'vatiṣṭhate 
yady evaṃ tata eva siddhatvāt kim anena 
kecid āhuḥ anuvado 'yam 
māṃsecchayā bhakṣaṇasya vidhis tāvad ayaṃ na bhavati kṣutpratighātārthino lipsayā pravṛttyupapatteḥ 
sa hi vidhir ucyate yaḥ puruṣasya dṛṣṭena prayojanena pravṛttāv asatyāṃ pravṛttyavabodhakaḥ yāvijjīvam agnihotraṃ juhuyāt iti 
śāstram evātra pramāṇam 
yatra asmin kṛte idam abhimatam abhinirvartate akṛte vāyam anartha āpatati evam anvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate tatra śāstram eva mṛgyate 
yatra tu nāyam anyato 'vagamaḥ kevalāgamaikagocaraḥ sa vidhir iti cocyate 
iha tu bhojane kṛte puṣṭir upajāyate yad duḥkhaṃ tan nivartata iti bālā api stanapāyino 'nupadiṣṭam avayanti 
niyamo 'pi bhavati tadrūpānavadhāraṇāt 
yadi tāvat prokṣitaṃ ca bhakṣayed eveti niyamas tadā kālaviśeṣāvacchedābhāvād āhāravihārakālā apy avasīdeyur anavaratam aśnann evāsīta aśakyaś cārtha upadiṣṭaḥ syāt 
yathoktam aśrāddhabhojī iti yad ahar eva pratyaveyāt iti 
mahābhāṣyakāreṇa vidhiviśeṣa eva ca niyama uktaḥ 
asaṃbhavati ca vidhau kuto niyamaḥ 
na cānyena prokṣitam anyena labhyeta 
tasmād ayam anarthaḥ 
atha prokṣitam eveti aprokṣitaṃ neti parisaṃkhyā 
na hi prokṣitāprokṣitobhayabhakṣaṇasya tyāgād aśanāyā nivṛttau yugapat paryāyeṇa vā pravṛttyā parisaṃkhyālakṣaṇasya vidyamānatvāt 
tathāpy anupākṛtamāṃsāni ity eva siddham 
anye tv asya pakṣasyaivaṃ doṣam upapādayante 
aviśeṣeṇa sarvāprokṣītapratiṣedhe śakunīnām api pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti 
na ca yeṣām eva prokṣaṇaṃ vihitaṃ teṣāṃ tu pratividhānādyabhāvād iti na viśeṣaparigrahe pramāṇam asti 
tad ayuktaṃ manyante 
evaṃ sati bhedena śakunīnāṃ pratiṣedhānukrameṇa gamakatvāt 
tasmāc chrutakarmāṅgatvena niyamasya prokṣitamāṃsabhakṣaṇasyāyam anuvāda iti yuktaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayā 
yathā yajñe 'vaśyaṃ bhakṣaṇam abhakṣaṇāc chāstrātikramaḥ evam uttareṣv api nimitteṣu 
anuvādaś cet parisaṃkhyāpekṣāpy astu 
go'vyajamāṃsam aprokṣitaṃ na bhakṣayed ity ananaitad anupākṛtānām evāsadrūpam anūdyate aprokṣitasyāpi brāhmaṇakāmyādinimitteṣv anujñāpanārthaḥ 
anyac ca anarcitaṃ vṛthāmāṃsam api cāturthikena vṛthāmāṃsaśabdena etad anuparijñānārtham itarathā na vijñāyeta kiṃ tad vṛthāmāṃsam iti 
atha vā ekatra bhoktur upadeśo 'nyatra kalpayitvā yena devādyarcanaṃ na kṛtaṃ tadīyaṃ māṃsam anyenāpy atithyādinā na bhoktavyam 
anadhikṛtenāpi devādyarcanena hy atithyādayaḥ paragṛhe tadīyena māṃsena devārcane 'dhikriyate 
atha kalpayitvā yadi kṛtaṃ tadārhaty aśitum 
dvitīyas tu praṣedho devān pitṝn iti svagṛhe 'dhikṛtānām akṛtavatāṃ bhakṣaṇāya 
yas tarhi asaṃskṛtān paśūn mantraiḥ iti sa uktaḥ prokṣaṇaśabdārthaḥ 
evaṃ pañcāpi niṣedhavākyāni pṛthagarthāni darśitāni 
brāhmaṇānāṃ ca kāmyayā 
kāmyā kāmanā icchā 
kāmyāśabdaḥ chāndasaḥ 
yadā brāhmaṇādīnām aprokṣitānām idam anujñānam tadā kiṃ punar ayaṃ niyamaḥ 
abhakṣaṇe śāstrātikramaḥ 
uta pratiprasavamātram 
pratiprasave bhoktavyaṃ vivāhe punar bhoktavyam iti vacanād api pratiṣedhāpravṛttir vivāhe gamyate 
na bhojanārtham āvaśyakaṃ kiṃ tu brāhmaṇā yadi garīyāṃsas tadā tadvacanātikramo na yuktaḥ 
anye tu krītvādiśloke brāhmaṇānām ity anuvartya śaśādimāṃsasyāpi vidhim icchanti 
yajñavivāhayor anyatra ca goṣṭhībhojanādau yadi brāhmaṇā arthayante tadā teṣāṃ māṃsaṃ svarūpeṇa devauddeśikayā na pratiṣiddham avasthāviśeṣeṇa prokṣaṇam devārcanādīni kartavyāni 
viśeṣaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ 
tasya brāhmaṇakāmanānimittata abhyanujñātā na tu kravyādān śakunān ityādeḥ pratiṣedhasya nivṛttis tu mahāphalā iti kṛtasaṃkalpas tasyāpy anujñānam iṣyate prokṣite 'prokṣite ca kṛtārcane 'kṛtārcane vā 
yathāvidhiniyukta tu prāṇānām eva cātyaye 
madhuparke ca śrāddhe ca niyukto 'prokṣaṇenāpi bhakṣayet 
eṣa hi yathāśāstraṃ niyogas tatra śrāddhe niyamā uktā eva 
ketitas tu yathānyāyam kathaṃcid apy atikrāman iti 
śrāddhaṃ bhokṣya ity abhyupatyedam ahaṃ nāśnāmīti na labhyate vaktum abhakṣyam aśucikaraṃ vyādhijananaṃ ca varjayitvā haviṣyavidhānān na bhakṣyaṃ yad yad rocate tat tan nāprītikaraṃ dīyate 
ata idaṃ vacanaṃ madhuparka eva 
nanu madhuparke nāsti niyogaḥ 
aśitavyaṃ madhuparkārheṇeti niyamaḥ nāsau madhuparkasya vidhiḥ 
sa hi tatrādhikṛto na dhanyo rājādiḥ 
yathaiva nāsyānaśnan gṛhe vaset iti gṛhasthasya niyamo dṛśyate 
etenāvagamyate amatike na dātavyam iti 
yais tu kāmacāra evaṃ pūjitasamādānena pūjyasyāśanena na hi tat tadarthaṃ karma 
nanu cātithyam evānityam 
satyam 
dṛṣṭaṃ prītyutpādanena dharmārtham anuṣṭhānam 
tasya niyamoktadharmārtham eva dātus tasya hi gor utsargapakṣe vihito nāmāṃso madhuparkaḥ syāt iti 
nanv ārtvijye vacanasyāpi viṣaya iti cet 
astv ayam api pūrvavad anuvādaḥ śrāddhe ārtvijye ca 
nanu cārtvijye uktam eva iḍādibhakṣaṇaṃ yajamānasya tatra śāstranibandhano niyamaḥ nartvijām 
satyam 
kiṃ tu ṛtvijo yadi na bhakṣayanti te pravādyante 
aviditena adṛṣṭenāpi doṣeṇa yujyante 
nanu teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇam adhikṛtānām āstām 
na hi te karmaphalena yujyante 
bhṛtyādir hi parikrīto vihitān padārthān anutiṣṭhati 
vihitaś ca yajamānapañcamā iḍāṃ bhakṣayanti iti 
teṣāṃ bhakaṣaṇato 'syābhyupagatārtvijyānāṃ niyataṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ tadā tenānūdyata iti yuktam 
na hi śrāddhabhujām ṛtvijāṃ ca bhakṣaṇe śāstrīyayogaḥ 
yajamānasyaivānuvādaḥ kimartha iti cen nānuvādaḥ prayojanam apekṣate 
kiṃ tarhi prāptam asti cātrocyate 
atrāpi yadā gopena govadhapūjābhyupagatā tadāvaśyam aśitavyam 
tadanugrahārtham asau madhuparkapūjāṃ pratīkṣati 
ataḥ pūrvā tena kriyā saṃpādanīyā 
anyathā prākramikasyābhāvād aparpūrṇena madhupareṇa tadanugrahāsampattes tasmin pratiṣiddhamāṃsāśane madhuparkapūjārtvijyaṃ ca prathamam evābhyupagantavyam 
brāhmaṇabhojane ca 
brahmacāriṇas tu vratavad ity anujñānād anaśanam eva grāhyaṃ māṃsasya 
prāṇānām eva cātyaye 
prakṛtatvād devādyarcanam antareṇa abhakṣyamāṇe vyādhinā kṣudhā bhojanāntarāsaṃbhave jīvanāśaśaṅkāyāṃ go'jāvi bhakṣayitavyam 
sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet ity etacchrutimūlo 'yaṃ niyamaḥ 
ataś cedṛśe nimitte māṃsam anaśnann ātmahā saṃpadyate 
ātmavadhaś ca sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet tasmād u ha na purāyuṣaḥ svaḥkāmī preyād alokyaṃ hy etad bhavati ityādiśrutibhir mantrārthavādaiś ca tair doṣavān neti jñāpitaḥ 
tathāhi mantraḥ
asuryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ 
tāṃs te pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātmahano janāḥ  iti 
brahmacāriṇo 'pi prāṇātyaye bhakṣaṇam iṣyate 
tasyaiva bālyādyavasthānimittaṃ vācanikaṃ prāyaścittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti brahmacārī tu yo 'śnīyān madhu māṃsaṃ kadācana iti 
kṣudhā tu prāṇātyayāśaṅkāyāṃ pratiṣiddhamāṃsāśanam apīti vyāsaḥ 
jāghanīnidarśanenaikāhikaṃ ceṣyate 
etāvatā atītavyādhau tu na śakyam etat jñātum avaśyam aśitenānena jīvatīti 
tatra na pratiṣiddhagrāmyakukkuṭādimāṃsabhakṣaṇam iṣyate 
prokṣaṇadevābhyarcanarahitasya tu prakṛtatvād asty anujñānam 
vyādheś ca na kevalam utpannasya nivṛttyarthaṃ yāvat kṛśakṣayyāturadurbālādīnāṃ sarvakālaṃ māṃsāśanaṃ niyamata iṣyate 
strīmadyanityāḥ kṣayiṇaḥ śramavyādhyā ca karśitāḥ 
nityamāṃsarasāhārā āturāś cāpi durbalāḥ 
aprokṣitasyāpi chāgamāṃsasya devatādyarcanaṃ tu tair avaśyaṃ kartavyam 
asaṃbhave tu kasmiṃścid ahani na doṣaḥ 
prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvaṃ prajāpatir akalpayat 
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sarvaṃ prāṇasya bhojanam 
prāṇaḥ kauṣṭhyo vāyuḥ jīvabījabhūtaḥ 
pañcavṛttasyodānādikasya śarīrasthityartham idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat prajāpatir annatvenākalpayat 
idam iti sāmānyato nirdiśya viśeṣaṇaṃ nirdiśati sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamam iti 
ato hetoḥ sarvaṃ prāṇasya bhojanam 
tiryakprakṣimanuṣyasarīsṛpāvasthahetumadbhedanirdeśāt dvitīyaṃ sarvagrahaṇam apunaruktam 
yataḥ prajāpatinā sarvam āpadi prāṇasya kalpitam 
ataḥ sarvam etasya bhojanam 
tathā ca prāṇasaṃvadopaniṣadi śrūyate sa hovāca kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti 
yad idaṃ kiṃcit āśvabhya ā kīṭapataṅgabhyaḥ iti 
carāṇām annam acarā daṃṣṭriṇām apy adaṃṣṭriṇaḥ 
ahastāś ca sahastānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ caiva bhīravaḥ 
carāś caraṇpatanaraṇotsāhayoginaḥ śyenanakulādayaḥ 
teṣām acarāḥ sarpakapotādayaḥ annam 
evaṃ daṃṣṭriṇāṃ siṃhavyāghrādīnāṃ adaṃṣṭriṇaḥ rurupṛṣatādayo mṛgāḥ 
ahastāḥ sarpamatsyādayaḥ sahastānāṃ nakulaniṣādādīnām 
śūrāṇāṃ mahotsāhayuktānāṃ jīvitanirapekṣāṇāṃ bhīravaḥ priyajīvitāḥ 
alpasattvā annatvena hanyante 
nāttā duṣyaty adann ādyān prāṇino 'hany ahany api 
dhātraiva sṛṣṭā hy ādyāś ca prāṇino 'ttāra eva ca 
attā bhakṣayitā 
ādyān prāṇinaḥ attuṃ śakyān 
pratidivasaṃ bhakṣayan na duṣyati 
dhātraiva prajāpatinā attāra ādyā ubhaye 'pi sṛṣṭāḥ 
tasmāt prāṇātyaye māṃsam avaśyaṃ bhakṣaṇīyam iti triślokī vidher asyārthavādaḥ 
yajñāya jagdhir māṃsasyety eṣa daivo vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ 
ato 'nyathā pravṛttis tu rākṣaso vidhir ucyate 
yajñārthaṃ māṃsasya piṇḍaprāśitrādijagdhir aśanam 
eṣa daivo vidhiḥ devair etad vihitam 
anyathā tu māṃsāśinaḥ sarīrapuṣṭyarthakamāṃsāśane pravṛttiḥ sa rākṣaso vidhiḥ 
piśācānāṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇe sthitir iti nindā 
krītvā svayaṃ vāpy utpādya paropakṛtam eva vā 
devān pitṝṃś cārcayitvā khādan māṃsaṃ na duṣyati 
mṛgapakṣimāṃsaviṣayam idaṃ śāstram 
rurupṛṣatādīnāṃ śaśakapiñjalādīnāṃ māṃsaṃ devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ cārcanaṃ kṛtvā khādato na doṣaḥ 
yathā gṛhe vaiśvadevādyarthe kṛte saṃvidhānaṃ vināpi vaiśvadevenodanādibhojanam asti na tathā māṃsasya 
evamartham etat punarvacanaṃ devān pitṝṃś cārcayitveti 
anyathā gṛhasthasya pūrvam eva bhojanam evaṃ rūpam 
devebhya iti tena śabdenoddiśya śucau deśe māṃsasya prakṣepaḥ 
yadi vā agnaye vāyave sūryāya jātavedasa iti devārcanaṃ kartavyam 
agnau evaṃrūpā āhutayaḥ kṛtā agnimato 'nyatra na bhavanti 
na cāgau homena vinā baliharaṇaṃ kartavyam karmāntarasya prayogāntarasya ca pratipāditatvāt 
āstāṃ tāvad etat 
anye tu śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇām arcanam āhuḥ 
dṛṣṭaś ca śrāddhe 'rcanaprayogaḥ 
pitṝṃś caiva devān vadanti 
tataś ca sarvasmṛtikāraiḥ śrāddham eva vihitam na punar anyā kācid eva kriyā 
kathaṃ punar māṃsasya krayasaṃbhavaḥ yāvatā āpaṇabhūmer māṃsaṃ krīyamāṇaṃ saunam āpadyate 
saunikair ahatasya svayaṃ mṛtasya paśor māmsam abhakṣyam anārogyakaratvāt 
ucyate 
vyādhaśākunikādibhir āhṛtaṃ kreṣyate 
na ca te saunikā iti prasiddhās taiś ca vikrayārthaṃ bhrāmyadbhir gṛha ānītaṃ bhavati 
tadā saṃbhavati krayaḥ 
na hi tat saunam ucyate 
svayaṃ vāpy utpādya 
brāhmaṇo yācñayā kṣatriyo mṛgayākarmaṇā 
nādyād avidhinā māṃsaṃ vidhijño 'nāpadi dvijaḥ 
jagdhvā hy avidhinā māṃsaṃ pretas tair adyate 'vaśaḥ 
pūrvoktād devādyarcanaśiṣṭāt brāhmaṇakāmanādinimittāt antaraṃ yad bhakṣaṇaṃ so 'vidhis tena nāśnīyāt māṃsam 
uktānuvādo 'yam 
āpadi prāṇātyaye devādyarcanam api nāpekṣyam 
nanu caitad api nimittatayoktam eva 
tataś ca vidhir evāyaṃ nāvidhiḥ 
satyam 
prokṣitasaṃbandhād go'vyajasyaiva tatra saṃnidhānāśaṅkāyāṃ śaśādiviṣaye 'bhyanujñānārtham anāpadīty ucyate 
vidhyarthānuṣṭhānaparo vidhijña ucyate 
tathā laukikānuṣṭhāne 'pi jānātir upacārāt prayujyate 
eṣa sa tajjānātīti anuṣṭhānapare prayuñjate 
atra phalakathāyām  jagdhvā aśāstrīyeṇa nimittena 
preto mṛtas taiḥ prāṇibhir avaśo 'dyate 
yena viṣayeṇa yo yeṣāṃ māṃsam aśnāti tasya vividhā pīḍā bhavati etāvanmātraparam etat 
anyathā prāyeṇa chāgādimāṃsam aśnāti lokāḥ na ca chāgādayo māṃsāśinaḥ 
atha vā tatkṣtena pāpena kravyādbhir apy adyamānas tair adyata ity ucyate 
na tādṛśaṃ bhavaty eno mṛgahantur dhanārthinaḥ 
yādṛśaṃ bhavati pretya vṛthāmāṃsāni khādataḥ 
prasiddhārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
niyuktas tu yathānyāyaṃ yo māṃsaṃ nātti mānavaḥ 
sa pretya paśutāṃ yāti saṃbhavān ekaviṃśatim 
saṃbhavān janmāni 
avaśyaṃ prāṇātyayasaṃbhave devārcanaṃ yo na karoti atha ca māṃsam aśnāti sa duṣyaty eva 
asaṃskṛtān paśūn mantrair nādyād vipraḥ kadācana 
mantrais tu saṃskṛtān adyāc chāśvataṃ vidhim āsthitaḥ 
prokṣaṇādayaḥ paśubandhe mantravantaḥ saṃskārā vihitās te yeṣāṃ kriyante paśūnāṃ vaidikayāgaśeṣāṇāṃ māṃsam adyāt 
śāśvatam 
śāśvato nityo vaidika ity arthaḥ 
āśthita āśritaḥ 
kuryād ghṛtapaśuṃ saṅge kuryāt piṣṭapaśuṃ tathā 
na tv eva tu vṛthā hantuṃ paśum icchet kadācana 
yady eṣāṃ buddhiḥ syāt sītāyajñakhaṇḍiyajñacaṇḍikāyāgādiṣu samācārapramāṇeṣu paśuvadhaḥ phalakāmasya nyāyyaḥ dṛṣṭā hi paśuvadhopayācitakenātiśayavatī sasyasaṃpattiḥ iti tanniṣedhārtham āha saṅge prastāvāt paśuvadhaprasaṅge ghṛtapaśuṃ kuryāt ghṛtapaśum eva kuryāt 
paśunā yaṣṭavye tatsthāne ghṛtena yajeta devatāḥ 
tad dhi sāmānyena yāgadravyam 
atha vā piṣṭapaśuṃ piṣṭamayapaśupratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā devatābhya upaharet piṣṭena vā puroḍāśādi kṛtvā 
katham ayaṃ vṛthā paśubandhaḥ 
ucyate 
śiṣṭānāṃ samācāraḥ pramāṇam na tu strīśūdrajanānām avaidyatvāt 
nātra vedamūlatā śakyā kalpayitum 
devatārādhanārthaṃ tadā hy etad ācaranti 
na ca devatārādhanārthāni vaidikāni karmāṇi guṇatvena devatāśruteḥ 
anvayavyatirekamūlatāṃ cātrecchanti dṛśyate paśuvadhopayācitakena phalasaṃpatti iti manyamānāḥ 
ato na vedamūlatā 
anvayavyatirekāv api bhrāntimātram asakṛdvyabhicārāt 
ato 'yaṃ śloko nyāyaprāptārthānuvāda eva sauhārdād ācāryeṇa paṭhitaḥ 
yāvanti paśuromāṇi tāvatkṛtvo ha māraṇam 
vṛthāpaśughnaḥ prāpnoti pretya janmani janmani 
tāvatīr janmanām āvṛttīr māraṇaṃ prāpnoti 
vṛthāpaśughnaḥ śrutismṛtyor acoditaṃ paśuvadhaṃ yaḥ karoti 
tac ca prakaraṇān mahānavamyādiṣu laukikair yat kriyate 
paśughna iti kapratyaye chāndasaṃ rūpam 
yajñārthaṃ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā 
yajño 'sya bhūtyai sarvasya tasmād yajñe vadho 'vadhaḥ 
nāyam anantarokto doṣaḥ śrutismṛticodite vadhe 
yo vadho yajñāṅgabhūtas tannirvṛttyartham eva svayaṃbhuvā prajāpatinā paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ utpāditāḥ 
svayam evety arthavādaḥ 
asya jagato viśvasya 
yajñaḥ jyotiṣṭomādiḥ 
bhūtyai bhūtir vibhavaḥ puṣṭiḥ sphītiḥ 
tasmāt tatra yo vadhaḥ so 'vadho vijñeyaḥ 
hiṃsājanyasya pāpasya nivṛtter evam ucyate 
oṣadhyaḥ paśavo vṛkṣās tiryañcaḥ pakṣiṇas tathā 
yajñārthaṃ nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanty ucchritīḥ punaḥ 
kathaṃ punar yajñe hiṃsādoṣo nāsti 
ucyate 
hiṃsā hiṃsyamānasya mahān apakāraḥ prāṇaviyogena putradāradhanavibhavādiviyogena sarvānarthotpatter duṣkṛtasya ca samanantaraṃ narakādiphalavipākasya pratyāsatteḥ 
yajñe tu hatānām upakāraḥ nāpakāraḥ narakādiphalānutpatteḥ 
yato yajñe nidhanaṃ vināśaṃ gatā ucchritīr utkarṣaṃ jātito devagandharvayonitvaṃ dvīpāntareṣūttarakuruprabhṛtiṣu varṣāntare vā janma prāpnuvanti 
arthavādaś cāyam 
na hy atra vidhiḥ śrūyate prāpnuvanti iti vartamānopadeśāt 
na cārthavādāt pratitiṣṭhanti itivad vidhipratipattir yuktā vidhyantarasyābhāvād asaṃbhavāc ca 
sarvo 'yam avidhimāṃsabhakṣaṇapratiṣedhaśeṣaḥ 
aihalokasaṃpādyatayāpy ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ na tv eva tu vṛthā hantuṃ paśum icchet iti 
yac cābhyanujñānam yajñārthaṃ pasavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ iti tat sarvaṃ bhaṣaṇapratiṣedhatayā pratīyate 
tathā ca vakṣyati nākṛtvā prāṇināṃ hiṃsām ityādi 
na cātra vidher asti saṃbhavaḥ 
na tiraścām adhikāraḥ saṃbhavati viśeṣavijñānābhāvāt 
na cānadhikṛtasya kartṛtvam 
nāpy akartṛtve śāstrīyāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpattiḥ 
na hy atra dṛṣṭā vastusvābhāvyena phalotpattiḥ 
yathā viṣam aviduṣo 'pi pītavato janayaty eva svaphalam 
naivaṃ vaidikārthāḥ 
acaitanyāc cauṣadhyādīnām ṛtviṅnyāyo 'pi nāsti 
dṛṣṭaṃ kila kutaścana karmaṇaḥ paraprayuktād apy ṛtvijāṃ phalam yaḥ kāmayeta pāpīyān syāt ityādi 
tatra vidhyantaraśeṣatvābhāvāt spaṣṭatvāc ca vidhipratipatter manuṣyādhikāratvāc ca śāstrasya yukto 'ṅgavyāpārasamāśrito vācanikas tāvanmātro 'dhikāraḥ 
yathā parakīyāśvamedhāvabhṛthe brāhmaṇasya prāyaścittam uktam 
iha tv adhikāra eva nāstīty uktam 
oṣadhyo darbhādayaḥ 
paśavaś chāgādayaḥ 
vṛkṣāḥ pūjyāḥ 
tiryañcaḥ apaśavo 'pi paśavo yeṣāṃ haviṣṭvena codanā kapiñjalān ālabhate iti 
bhārapravahaṇād anaḍvāhas tiryañco vājapeyādau tiryañca iti vyapadiśyante 
yady api teṣāṃ tatra nidhanaṃ nāsti tathāpi yāvatī ca pīḍā vidyata iti sā nidhanaśabdena lakṣyate 
pakṣiṇaḥ kapiñjalādayaḥ 
yady api te paśutvena cocyante aprasiddhataraprayogās tu sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ saptāraṇyāḥ iti 
gavādayo 'pakṣiṇaḥ 
catuṣpājjātivacanaḥ paśuśabdaḥ 
gobalīvardavad vā bhedo draṣṭavyaḥ 
yāvatyaḥ kāścic chāstracoditahiṃsās tāḥ saṃkṣpya darśayati 
madhuparke ca yajñe ca pitṛdaivatakarmaṇi 
atraiva paśavo hiṃsyā nānyatrety abravīn manuḥ 
eṣv artheṣu paśūn hiṃsan vedatattvārthavid dvijaḥ 
ātmānaṃ ca paśuṃ caiva gamayaty uttamāṃ gatim 
madhuparko vyākhyātaḥ 
tatra govadho vihitaḥ 
yajñaḥ jyotiṣṭomādiḥ 
tatra saṃsthaikādaśinyādipaśuvadho nirūḍhapaśuvadhādiḥ svatantra eva ca 
pitṛdaivataṃ pitaro devatā yasmin karmaṇy aṣṭakādau na tu śrāddham 
tad dhi siddhena māṃsena vihitam na ca paśuvadhaś coditaḥ 
na cedam eva vidhāyakaṃ yuktam utpattau śrāddhasya hiṃsāyā acoditatvāt asya ca vispaṣṭavidhānād aṣṭakāpaśuvadhenāpi netuṃ śakyatvāt vidhitve cāsya mūlakalpanāprasaṅgāt vidhyantaraśeṣatāyāś ca vakṣyamāṇatvāt 
yeṣāṃ tu mataṃ pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca karma mahāyañjādi 
brāhmaṇair vadhyāḥ bhṛtyānāṃ caiva vṛttyartham āpadi paśuhiṃsanam aprāptaṃ prāṇātyaye 'bhyanujñāyate   
gṛhe gurāv araṇye vā nivasann ātmavān dvijaḥ 
nāvedavihitāṃ hiṃsām āpady api samācaret 
avedavihitahiṃsāpratiṣedho 'yam 
na ca vedavihitābhyanujñāyate 
na ca gurau vasato brahmacāriṇo 'raṇye ca tapasyato 'nyā kācid dhiṃsāsti 
avakīrṇino brahmacāriṇaḥ syād api 
vānaprasthasya tu naivāsti 
brahmacāriṇo 'py ātmopekṣaṇaṃ naiveṣyate 
ato 'yaṃ vidhir eva śrāddhe 
gṛha ity anuvāda eva 
yadi cāyaṃ vidhiḥ syād  araṇye āpady api iti kim ālambanam etat syāt 
na ca vānaprasthasya sāgnikasyāpi paśuyāgo 'sti 
puroḍāśāś carūṃś caiva ity atra darśayiṣyāma iti kecit 
upādhyāyas tv āha 
yuktaṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ 
vānaprasthasya tu aparājitāṃ vāsthāya ityādinātmatyāgāgo 'pi vihitas tasya nāsti jīvitārthā hiṃseti sphuṭataraṃ tatraiva nirūpayiṣyate 
nanu cāpady ayaṃ pratiṣedha ucyate 
tat kutas tatraivānujñānaṃ vyākhyāyate 
satyam 
anyathā na kiṃcid anena kṛtaṃ syāt 
arthavādārtham iti ced arthavādasyāpy ālambanam anveṣaṇīyam 
ato nāpady ayaṃ pratiṣedho vidhiś cāpdy aviruddhaḥ 
bahubhedād āpadām alpīyasyām āpadi māsikam ardhamāsikaṃ vā bhojanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti buddhyā pravṛttir niṣidhyate 
yadā tv eṣā buddhir adhunaivānaśnan na jīvāmi yadā vābhimukhāgata udyataśastra ātatāyī tadāpady anujñā 
evaṃ sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet iti śrutir anugṛhītā bhavati   
yā vedavihitā hiṃsā niyatāsmiṃś carācare 
ahiṃsām eva tāṃ vidyād vedād dharmo hi nirbabhau 
vedavihito yaḥ prāṇivadhaḥ so 'smiñ jagati carācare sthāvarajaṅgame nityo 'nādiḥ 
yas tu tantrādiḥ so 'nvayavyatirekabhrāntyā idānīṃtanaḥ 
ato vaidikīm hiṃsām ahiṃsām eva vidyāt amutra pratyavāyābhāvāt 
ahiṃseti kāryata ucyate na svarūpataḥ 
nanu ca saiva hiṃsārūpā 
abhedāt kathaṃ kāryo bhedaḥ 
ucyate 
vedād dharmo hi nirbabhau 
dharmasyādharmasya ca yat kathanaṃ tad vedād eva pauruṣeyāṇām aprāmāṇyāt 
vedaś ca tasyā evābhyudayahetutvaṃ kvacit jñāpayati 
svarūpābhedo 'pi nāsti kratvarthapuruṣārthatvena bhedād āśayabedena pravṛtteḥ 
laukikyāṃ māṃsīyato dviṣāṇasya vā pravṛttiḥ vaidikyāṃ tu śāstreṇa coditam idaṃ kratuvartham iti 
nirbabhau niḥśeṣeṇa bhātaḥ prakāśatāṃ gata iti yāvat 
yo 'hiṃsakāni bhūtāni hinasty ātmasukhecchayā 
sa jīvaṃś ca mṛtaś caiva na kvacit sukham edhate 
akāro 'tra pratiṣedhārthīyaḥ praśliṣṭo draṣṭavyaḥ 
ahiṃsakānāṃ ca pratiṣedhāt sarpavyāghrādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ 
yo bandhanavadhakleśān prāṇināṃ na cikīrṣati 
sa sarvasya hitaprepsuḥ sukham atyantam aśnute 
bandhanavadhā eva kleśāḥ 
atha vā viśasanādayaḥ 
tān yo na kartum icchati viśasanam eva yena na kṛtam tadviṣayecchaiva yasya nivṛttā 
na kevalaṃ pīḍāṃ na karoti yāvad dhitaṃ prepsitum icchati sarvasya sa sukham atyantam aśnute 
yad dhyāyati yat kurute ratiṃ badhnāti yatra ca 
tad avāpnoty ayatnena yo hinasti na kiṃcana 
yac cintayati śulkam arhaṇādi 
yatra ca ratim abhilāṣaṃ badhnāty abhipretya vastuni 
tad ayatnena svalpenaiva kālenāvāpnoti 
yat tu kurute karmaṇā tat karmaniṣpattisamantaram evāvighnena prāpnoti 
nākṛtvā prāṇināṃ hiṃsāṃ māṃsam utpadyate kvacit 
na ca prāṇivadhaḥ svargyas tasmān māṃsaṃ vivarjayet 
sarvasya hiṃsāpratiṣedhaślokasaṃghātasya māṃsabhakṣaṇaseṣatāṃ darśayati 
yāvat prāṇino na hatās tāvan māṃsaṃ notpadyate 
hiṃsā cātiśayena duḥkhāvahā 
tasmān māṃsaṃ vivarjayet 
nanu ca svayaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhavaty eva māṃsam kim idam ucyate nākṛtvā iti 
arthavādo 'yam 
svayaṃ mṛtānāṃ ca māṃsaṃ rogahetutvād aprāptam eva 
na hy adatvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣyate 
na ca rogahetor dānam asti 
utpadyata iti māṃsasya hiṃsānimittatvāt kartṛvyapadeśe samānakartṛkatvaṃ bhavaty evāviruddham 
atha vā utpadyata iti na ca svargya iti 
na svargānutpattihetumātram abhipretam api tu narakādiduḥkhahetutvam 
samutpattiṃ ca māṃsasya vadhabandhau ca dehinām 
prasamīkṣya nivarteta sarvamāṃsasya bhakṣaṇāt 
aśucisthāne kukṣau garbhavṛddhiḥ śukraśoṇitābhyāṃ vāśucibhyāṃ prabhāvaḥ 
tathā vadhabandhau śarīravatāṃ tatkṛtau 
etat sarvaṃ prasamīkṣya nipuṇabuddhyā tatvato nirūpya 
nivarteta sarvamāṃsasya bhakṣaṇāt sarvasyāpratiṣiddhasyāpi kiṃ punaḥ pratiṣiddhasya 
arthavādo 'yam 
na punas tatvataḥ aśucy eva māṃsaṃ jñeyam 
na hi tadaśucitvavidhiparaṃ vākyam 
na bhakṣayati yo māṃsaṃ vidhiṃ hitvā piśācavat 
sa loke priyatāṃ yāti vyādhibhiś ca na pīḍyate 
vidhir devārcanaṃ tad dhitvā yo na bhakṣayati kiṃ tarhi vidhinā bhakṣayati 
sa lokasya priyatāṃ prāpnoti 
priyaḥ sarvasya bhavati 
vyādhibhiś ca 
kṛśadurbalāder māṃsam aśnato vyādhir upajāyate 
tenāpi vidhinaivāśitavyam 
tathā bhakṣayan vyādhibhiś ca na pīḍyate 
anyathā aśnann api māṃsaṃ pīḍyata eva vyādhibhiḥ 
piśācavad iti 
piśācās tiryagjātiviśeṣās te vidhim anapekṣya māṃsam aśnanti 
tato 'nyo 'pi tathā bhakṣayan piśācasadṛśo bhavatīti nindyate 
anumantā viśasitā nihantā kravikrayī 
saṃskartā copahartā ca khādakaś ceti ghātakāḥ 
anyena hanyamānaṃ svaprayojanato yady anyo 'numodate sādhv ayaṃ hantā karotīty anumantā 
viśasitā hatasyāṅgavibhāgakāraḥ 
upahartā pariveṣakaḥ 
khādaka ity ete sarve ghātakāḥ 
aghātakeṣu khādanasaṃskāravikrayādikartṛṣu ghātakatve 'dhyāropite nindā na punas tatvata ete ghātakā eva 
laukikī hi vadhakriyā prāṇatyāgaphalā 
tasya kartā ghātakaḥ smṛtito gamyate 
svatantraḥ karteti viśeṣaśāstrādinā yaḥ prāṇaviyojanaṃ prāṇināṃ kroti sa hantocyate 
krayavikrayādyāś ca kiryās tato 'nyā eva 
nanu ceyam api smṛtir eva ete anumantṛprabhṛtayo ghātakā iti 
nedaṃ śabdārthasaṃbandhe pramāṇam kiṃ tarhi dharmādharmayoḥ 
abhiyuktataro hi tatra bhavān pāṇiniḥ 
manvādayaś ca lokaprasiddhaiḥ padārthair vyavaharanti na śabdārthasaṃbandhavidhiṃ smaranti 
prayoktāro hy ete na smartāraḥ 
nanu ca tam ācāryaṃ prakṣate ityādeḥ smaranty ete 
satyam 
na tatra śāstrasmṛtivirodhaḥ 
na ca teṣāṃ vākyānām anyat prayojanam asti 
iha tu gauṇenāpi prayojanenārthavādatayāpy upapatter na ghātakatvaṃ śakyam avasātum 
ye 'py āhur bhakṣakaś cen na vidyate vadhako 'pi na vidyata iti bhakṣaṇaprayukta eva vadhaḥ prayojakaś ca kartā smaryate 
tato mukhyam eva ghātakatvam 
ato ghātakaprāyaścittam eva khādakasya yuktam iti 
tad ayuktam iti brūmaḥ 
pṛthakprāyaścittaṃ hatānāṃ rasāsvādakasya jagdhvā māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ ca iti 
yad api prayojakatvena kartṛtvam uktaṃ tad api naivāsti 
idaṃ hi tasya lakṣaṇam
preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇābhyāṃ tu yaḥ svatantrasya codakaḥ 
sa kartā caiva hetuś ca mukhyo nopacaran paraḥ  iti 
vadhako hi jīvanaprayuktyā pravartate māṃsavikrayeṇa jīviṣyāmīti na tu khādakena viniyujyate 
atha tatsamarthācaraṇaṃ prayojakatvam 
yo 'yaṃ kriyāṃ kartum adhyavasitas tatrānukūlyena yaḥ saṃvidhitsuḥ sa prayojaka iti 
etad apy atra naivāsti 
sādhanopanidhānaṃ trasataḥ paśor asvatantrīkaraṇaṃ khaḍgopanayanam ity evaṃ saṃvidhānaśabdavācyaṃ yuktam 
tena vinā kriyā na niṣpadyate 
atha yadarthaḥ kriyārambhaḥ sa prayojakaś ceti cet māṇavakam adhyāpayatīty adhyāpanahetukartṛsaṃjñāpratilambhaḥ na hy adhyayanam adhyāpayatyarthaḥ 
na cāsau kaṃcid uddiśya hanane pravartate 
yenāsya tadarthanirūpaṇāya bhakṣaṇe 'narthā pravṛttiḥ syāt 
sarva ime svabhūtyai yatante 
na kena kaśct paro 'nugrahītavya iti muhūrtam apy avatiṣṭhate ity api pūrṇakāmaḥ 
atha svārthaṃ pravṛttasya bhakṣayitāram antareṇa pravṛttir anarthikā 
tasmiṃs tu sati phalavatī 
phalaṃ ca prayojakam 
tac ca khādakādhīnam iti pāraṃparyeṇa khādakaḥ prayojaka iti 
evaṃ tarhi yo dveṣād vadhyate sa hantuḥ prayojakaḥ syāt 
tataś ca hanyamāna eva hantā saṃpadyate 
na hi dveṣeṇa vinā hantṛtvopapattir iti 
tathā brahmahatyāyām api sarvasvadānaṃ pātakasaṃprayojakam 
na hi pratigrāhayitāram antareṇa pratigrahopapattis tataś ca pratigrāhī na kevalaṃ pratyaveyād api tu dātāpi 
rūpavatī ca strī smaraśaradahyamānahṛdayena rāgiṇā darśitaspṛhātiśayena śīlaṃ rakṣantī pratyaveyāt 
tasmān nedaṃ prayojakalakṣaṇam 
tau hi vadhakakhādakau svārthapravṛttau naṣṭāśvadagdharathavad itaretaropakāram anubhavantau na punar anyataraprayojakau 
śūdraviṭkṣatraviprāṇām ity atra śloke nipuṇam etan nirṇītam 
svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchati 
anabhyarcya pitṝn devāṃs tato 'nyo nāsty apuṇyakṛt 
adhikapuṣṭyarthaṃ yo māṃsam aśnāti tasyeyaṃ nindā 
na tu rogotpattibhayāśaṅkayā 
yata āha 
yo vardhayitum icchantīti 
tasyāpy anabhyarcya pitṝn devān 
na tu rogahetots tv arcanam akurvato 'pi kathaṃcid asaṃbhavān na doṣaḥ 
varṣe varṣe 'śvamedhena yo yajeta śataṃ samāḥ 
māṃsāni ca na khāded yas tayoḥ puṇyaphalaṃ samam 
devādyarcanaśiṣṭasya śaśādimāṃsasya bhakṣaṇam anujñātam 
tato nivartamāno 'śvamedhaphalam aśnute 
aśvamedhasya phalam sarvān kāmān avaśyaṃ sarvāvijitīḥ ityādi 
na cātra codanīyam kathaṃ mahāprayāsena bahudhanavyayena ca tulyaphalatā māṃsanivṛtteḥ syāt 
yata eṣo 'pi saṃyamo 'tiduṣkaraḥ 
kiṃ ca lokavat parimāṇataḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ syād ity ayaṃ nyāyo jṛmbhata eva 
ataḥ phalavidhau na doṣaḥ 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ 
arthavāda evāyam 
yato varṣe śataṃ samā iti cārthavādapakṣe sughaṭam 
na hi prativarṣam aśvamedhasya vidheyatvasaṃbhavaḥ 
nāpi varṣe śatam tāvataḥ kālasyādhikāriṇo jīvanādyasaṃbhavāt 
puṇyaṃ ca phalaṃ ca puṇyaphalam 
samāhāradvandvaḥ 
ṣaṣṭhīsamāse hy asāmarthyam  
phalamūlāśanair medhyair munyannānāṃ ca bhojanaiḥ 
na tatphalam avāpnoti yan māṃsaparivarjanāt 
medhyair devārhaiḥ 
munyannāni nīvārādyannāny akṛṣṭapacyajanitāni 
ayam arthavāda eva 
māṃ sa bhakṣayitāmutra yasya māṃsam ihādmy aham 
etan māṃsasya māṃsatvaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ 
nāmadheyanirvacanam arthavādaḥ 
māṃ sa bhakṣayitā 
sa iti sarvanāma sāmānyāpekṣaṃ yogyenārthena nirākāṅkṣīkaroti yasya māṃsam aśnāti 
na māṃsabhakṣaṇe doṣo na madye na ca maithune 
pravṛttir eṣā bhūtānāṃ nivṛttis tu mahāphalā 
prāṇasyānnam ity ata ārabhya yāvad ayaṃ śloko 'rthavādasaṃghāta eva 
dvitrāḥ ślokā vidheyārthāḥ 
na māṃsabhakṣaṇe doṣo yathā krītvā svayaṃ vāpy utpādya iti tathāyam api ślokaḥ 
nivṛttis tu mahāphalety etad atra śrūyate 
bahubhir nindārthākarair īdṛśaḥ saṃskāro jāto yan na kiṃcin māṃsam aśitavyam 
bhūtānāṃ vṛttyartham āha na māṃsabhakṣaṇe doṣa iti 
devārcanaśiṣṭe brāhmaṇakāmyādiṣu nimitteṣu prāgukteṣu na doṣaḥ 
kiṃ tu yady aśitum icchanti 
nivṛttir na bhakṣayāmīti saṃkapapūrvikā mahāphalā 
phalaviśeṣāśruteḥ svargaḥ phalam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ 
evaṃ madye kṣatriyādīnām maithune tu sarvavarṇānām divodakyāparvakālād anyatra 
alpasv alpā pravṛttir eṣā śāstrīyā 
bhūtānāṃ śarīrasthitihetvarthā pravṛttiḥ 
tathā cāyurvedakṛt 
āhāro brahmacaryaṃ ca nidrā ceti trayaṃ matam 
mādakaṃ ca striyaś caiva hy upastambhanam āyuṣaḥ  iti 
yas tu tena vināpi śaknoti jīvituṃ tasya nivṛttir mahāphalā 
pradarśanārthaṃ caitat 
aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddhaviṣayāṇām anyāsām api nivṛttīnām evam eva 
yatra vidhānaṃ puruṣasya pravartamānasya prītyatiśayotpattiprayojanam anindyam garheta vā yato nivṛttiḥ phalāya yathā madhvaśanaṃ saṃpannabhojanaṃ rāṅkavaṃ paridhānam ity evamādi 
tathā ca śiṣṭasamācāraḥ 
vyāsaś ca bhagavān evam āha 
ye tu saṃsaktito 'śiṣṭāpratiṣiddhā api yathā hasitakaṇḍūyanādayas tato nivṛttir dharmāya 
pretaśuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi dravyaśuddhiṃ tathaiva ca 
caturṇām api varṇānāṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ 
caturṇām apītivacanaṃ sāmānyavihitā dharmāḥ śūdrasya nedṛśaṃ yatnam antareṇa bhavantīti jñāpanārtham 
preteṣu jīvatāṃ śuddhiḥ 
supsupeti samāsaḥ 
prāpaṇaṃ cāpretavan nimittā śuddhir iyaṃ viśeṣasya 
ataś ca yady api śuddhivacanaṃ pratijñāyate tathāpy aśuddhisāpekṣatvāc chuddheḥ śāstrapratyayakārakatvād ubhayoḥ apratijñātāpi prathamam aśuddhir ucyate 
dantajāte 'nujāte ca kṛtacūḍe ca saṃsthite 
aśuddhā bāndhavāḥ sarve sūtake ca tathocyate 
anujāto dantajātād bālatara iti smaranti 
tathāvibhāgenoddeśamātram idaṃ yatas tadapekṣa āśaucakālabhedo bhaviṣyati 
tad yathā smṛtyantare ā dantajanmanaḥ tathā bāle deśāntarasthe ca ityādinā sadyaḥśaucaṃ śrutam 
bāla ajātadanto vijñeyaḥ 
evaṃ ca nṛṇām akṛtacūḍānām ity etad ekarātrikam āśaucaṃ dantajāte 'py avasthāpyate 
evam ete smṛtī viṣayavyavasthayā avirodhinyau bālaviṣaye bhavataḥ 
naiśikī ca śuddhir ā cūḍākaraṇāt 
yato nivṛttamuṇḍakānāṃ trirātraṃ vakṣyati 
tac ca trirātraṃ prāg upanayanāt parataḥ śuddhyed vipraḥ ityādi 
ye tu daśāhaṃ śāvam āśaucam ity etān pakṣān vayovibhāgena varṇayanti smṛtyantarāt samācārāc ca vyutkrameṇa saṃbandhayanti daśāham upanītasya anupanītasya caturahaṃ kṛtamuṇḍasya tryahaṃ jātadantasyaikāham anujātasya sadyaḥśaucikādayas tu vikalpāḥ 
evaṃ tryahacaturahayoḥ kṛtacūḍasya 
teṣāṃ mate smṛtyantaraprasiddho vṛttasvādhyāyāpekṣo na vikalpaḥ pratipāditaḥ syāt 
taccottaratra darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
sarvavyāpāranivṛttyā mṛta ucyate saṃpūrvasya tiṣṭhater vyāpāroparamadarśanāt 
bāndhavāḥ sapiṇḍāḥ samānodakāś ca 
sūtake ca putrajanmādau 
tathocyate aśuddhā bāndhavāḥ sarva ity etenāsya saṃbandhaḥ 
kathaṃ punar atra vayobhedapratipattir yāvatā kṛtamuṇḍa iti saṃskārasaṃbandho gamyate 
kṛtopanayane cety atra śrutam eva 
ata eva kṛtacauḍaḥ kiyantaṃ kālam ucyata iti naiva śrūyate 
ucyate 
dantajātānujātasāhacaryāt kṛtamuṇḍaḥ kālalakṣaṇārtho vijñāyate 
sa ca kālo 'tra prathamatṛtīyavarṣaḥ 
yady api prathame varṣe vaikalpikaṃ muṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tasmint samāśrīyamāṇe ā dantajanmanaḥ sadyaḥ ity etad bādhitaṃ bhavati 
tad apy ayuktam 
kiyān avadhiḥ kṛtamuṇḍa iti 
caśabdāt kṛtamuṇḍe ceti kṛtopanayane ceti labyate saṃskārāntaraprāptau vyapadeśāntarapravṛtteḥ 
evaṃ caitayā smṛtyā ekavākyatā bhaviṣyati ā dantajanmanaḥ sadyaḥ ity atrāpi 
trirātram ā vratādeśāt iti vratādeśagrahaṇaṃ kālopalakṣaṇārtham eva 
na ca brāhmaṇasyānityo 'ṣṭamavarṣe evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayor yaś ca kālaḥ tadā śūdrasya na kaścit kāla uktaḥ syāt 
tatrāpy atītaśaiśavasya paripūrṇaṃ sarveṣām itivacanāt 
ataś ca ā aṣṭamād varṣād ūrdhvaṃ caturṇām api varṇānāṃ sarvāśaucam śūdrasyāpi tasya kālasya sadbhāvāt 
yasmiṃs tu pakṣe ekādaśe varṣe kṣatriyavaiśyayor upanayanaṃ lakṣyate tadā śūdrasya na kaścit kāla uktaḥ syāt 
tatrāpy atītaśaiśavasya paripūrṇam arvāk trirātram 
śaiśavasya nivṛttiś ca smṛtyantare prāg aṣṭamāc śiśuḥ proktaḥ anyais tu ā ṣḍaśād bhaved bālaḥ iti 
ye 'pi ṣoḍaśād bālyanivṛttim āhus teṣām apy aṣṭamād ūrdhvaṃ māsiky eva śuddhiḥ 
evaṃ paṭhyate ūrdhvaṃ tu ṣaḍbhyo varṣebhyaḥ śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsikī 
anyatra paṭhitam aṣṭavarṣasya māsa iti 
nanu vakṣyamāṇebhya eva vākyebhya eṣā vayobhedavyavasthā labhyate 
kim anena dantajāta ity uddeśena 
satyam 
sukhāvabodhārtham 
daśāhaṃ śāvam āśaucaṃ sapiṇḍeṣu vidhīyate 
arvāk saṃcayanād asthnāṃ tryaham ekāham eva vā 
sāpiṇḍyalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyate 
arvāk saṃcayanād iti caturahopalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyati 
āhitāgneḥ saṃcayanaṃ caturthyām iti vacanam asti 
ayaṃ ca vikalpo vṛttasvādhyāyāpekṣo vṛttāpekṣo vā 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram 
ekāhād brāhmaṇaḥ śuddho yas tu brahmāgnisaṃyutaḥ 
tryahāt kevalavedas tu nirguṇo daśabhir dinaiḥ 
tatra trivedasyāgnimata ekāhaḥ 
dvivedasya tu tryaham 
nirguṇasya daśāham 
gautamena paṭhitaṃ sadyaḥ śaucam 
tac ca viśeṣa eva brāhmaṇasya svādhyāyānivṛttyartham 
tatra kriyāntarāṇi
ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyānnaṃ na bhujyate 
dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaś ca nivartate 
ityādyāḥ kriyā nivartante 
kevalaṃ bahuvedasyāguṇyamānaṃ praṇaśyatīti svādhyāyo na nivartate 
tathā vṛttyapekṣo yukto vikalpaḥ 
ṣaṭkarmajīvino daśāhaḥ tribir anya ity asya caturahaḥ dvābhyām eka ity asya tryahaḥ 
dāśāhika āśauce pratigrahādāv anadhikārāt prāṇayātraiva durlabhā 
ye tu vayāṃsi catvāri catvāraś cāśaucakālāḥ ato yathāvayo yathāsaṃkhyena saṃbandhaḥ teṣāṃ dantajāte daśāhaḥ prāpnoti upanīte tu mṛte ekāha eva 
tatra smṛtyantarasamācāravirodhaḥ 
atha virodhaparihārārthaṃ prātilomyena saṃbandhaḥ kriyate 
upanīte daśāhaḥ kṛtamuṇḍe caturahaḥ tryaho dantajāte ekāho 'nujāta iti 
atrāpi nivṛttacauḍakānāṃ trirātrāt iti virodhena vikalpo yuktaḥ svaśabdena trirātrasyānuvidhānāt caturahasya vṛttibhedena saṃcayabhedena viṣayatvasiddheḥ 
smṛtyantreṇaivam ekavākyatā bhavati ekāhād ityanena 
anyathā vayobhedena vikalpe vyākhyāyamāne vṛttasvādhyāyāpekṣo mānave śāstre kena vikalpo labhyate 
ato gautamavacanād yasya prātyahikena pratigraheṇa vināpi vṛttir asti kusūladhānyādes tasya bahusvādhyāyasya svādhyāyādhyayanamātre sadyaḥśuddhiḥ 
ye 'pi tryahadayaḥ kalpās tatrāpi tryahaihikādīnāṃ tāvanmātra eva viśuddhir vṛttyarthe pratigrahe 'nenaiva gautamadarśanena 
anyathā brāhmaṇasya svādhyāyina ity evāvakṣyat na svādhyāyānivṛttyartham iti 
ato yady apy aviśeṣeṇaikāhāc chuddhir ityādi śrutam tathāpi niyatakriyāviṣayaṃ vijñyam 
yena nityavad brāhmaṇasya daśāham āha śuddhyed vipro daśāhena iti 
na hy anyat punarvacane prayojanam asti 
tasmād vikalpo 'yaṃ yuktena mārgeṇa vyākhyeyaḥ 
yatra punar bālādau sadyaḥśaucam nivṛttamuṇḍakādau trirātram tatra vikalpābhāvāt sarvakriyāsu śucitvam 
sapiṇḍatā tu puruṣe saptame vinivartate 
samānodakabhāvas tu janmanāmnor avedane 
anvayasaṃjñāvijñānād bāndhavagrahaṇānuvṛtteś cānvayajāḥ saptamapuruṣāvadhayaḥ sapiṇḍā ucyante 
yebhyaḥ svasya pitā dadyāt tebhyaḥ putraḥ iti jīvatpūrvapitrāder vidhānāt ṣaṭ tāvad yogyatayā sapiṇḍā bhavanti 
yady api pitṛbhyo dīyate ātmanā saptama ataḥ pitāmahaprapitāmahādyāḥ pūrvānvayajātās te sapiṇḍā iti vyapadiśyante 
pūrve ṣaṭ sapiṇḍāḥ 
apare putrādayaḥ ṣaḍ eva 
yata ekasyāḥ piṇḍadānakriyāyāḥ sahabhāvāt sapiṇḍādyupadeśo labhyate putrāder api sahabhāvaḥ pautrādinā kriyamāṇo 'yam tena yebhyo dīyate yaiś ca saha saṃpradānavān bhaviṣyati sarve te sapiṇḍā vyapadiśyante 
yato na tatra piṇḍadānam avadhyupalakṣaṇatvāc chaṅkha iva śaṅkhavelāyām āgantavyam iti 
tena yāvad uktaṃ syāt prapitāmahasya yaḥ prapitāmahas tadanvayajā ye yāvat saptamās te sapiṇḍā evaṃ svasaṃtatau pitrādisaṃtatau draṣṭavyam 
yata eva bhedas tam upādāya gaṇanā kartavyā yāvat saptamāvadhi 
yathā pitāmaho yeṣām ekas te tata ārabhya saptamāvadhayaḥ sapiṇḍā ity eva sarvatra 
tadanvayajatve copalakṣaṇe jāter anāśrayaṇād vijātīyā api kṣatriyādayo brāhmaṇādīnāṃ sapiṇḍā bhavanti 
ata eva tajjananādyāśauce brāhmaṇasya daśāha eva teṣāṃ tu svakāla eva dvādaśāhādiḥ 
ataḥ sarvasya vijātīyanimitte vijātīyasapiṇḍanimitte vā janmādau svakāla eva śuddhiḥ 
kṣatriyādīnāṃ brāhmaṇāpekṣayā tripuruṣaṃ sāpiṇḍyam 
tathā ca śaṅkhaḥ
yady ekajātā bahavaḥ pṛthakkṣetrāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ 
ekapiṇḍāḥ pṛthakśaucāḥ piṇḍas tv āvartate triṣu 
pṛthakkṣetrāḥ bhinnajātīyāsu strīṣv ity arthaḥ 
pṛthagjanāḥ pṛthakkṣetrasamānajātīyā apy anekamātṛkā bhavanti tadartham ubhayor upādānam 
ekapiṇḍāḥ sapiṇḍā bhavanti 
kiṃ tu pṛthakśaucāḥ svajātinimitta eva teṣāṃ śuddhikālaḥ 
brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyādeḥ sūtakādau daśāhaḥ brāhmaṇasya sūtake teṣāṃ dvādaśāhaś ca 
tathā cānyo 'pi viśeṣaḥ piṇḍas triṣv āvartate 
triṣv eva bhavati puruṣeṣu 
samānajātīyāpekṣayā kṣatriyādīnāṃ brāhmaṇavat ṣaṭ puruṣasya sāpiṇḍyam ekajātāḥ pṛthakkṣetrāḥ ityādiviśeṣaṇopādānāt 
asamānajātīyāpekṣaṃ tripuruṣatvam anena vākyena śakyate pratipādayitum 
eṣa evārtho 'nayā smṛtyā spaṣṭīkriyate
kṣatraviṭśūdradāyādā ye suyur viprasya bāṇdhavāḥ 
teṣām āśauce viprasya daśāhāc chuddhir iṣyate 
ṣaḍbhis tribhir athaikena ityādi ca 
strīṇāṃ tu vijātīyānāṃ bhartṛkālena jīvati bhartari śuddhiḥ 
āha ca
sūtau mṛte tu dāsānāṃ patnīnāṃ cānulomataḥ 
svāmitulyaṃ bhavec chaucaṃ mṛte svāmini paitrakam 
anye paṭhanti asavarṇāsutānām iti prathamaṃ pādam 
yady ayam asti pāṭhas tadā putrāṇām api śūdrāṇāṃ pitṛgṛhe vyavasthitānāṃ tatparatantrāṇāṃ pitṛjātyapekṣayā daśāhādir eva śuddhikālaḥ 
dāsāś cātra vaitanikā gṛhyante 
ye tu garbhadāsās teṣāṃ vidhyantaraṃ śrūyate
kāravaḥ śilpino vaidyā dāsīdāsaṃ tathaiva ca 
rājāno rājabhṛtyāś ca sadyaḥśaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  iti 
sparśane caivam eteṣāṃ śucitvaṃ vijñeyam na punar dānabhojanādikriyāsu 
yataḥ karmanimittā ete śabdāḥ ataḥ kiṃ viparyaye śuddhiḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ pratiprasavā uta kāścid evābhyanujñāyante 
yato rājñaś ca kāryāvidhātārtham ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ yāny eva karmāṇi tāny eva hṛdayam āgacchanti 
tathaiva ca samācāraḥ 
nanu ca nātra sparśapratiṣedhaḥ śrutaḥ 
yāvatā smṛtyantare paṭhyate
asthisaṃcayanād ūrdhvam aṅgasparśo vidhīyate 
tathānyac ca
tribhiś caturbhir vāhobhir brāhmaṇaḥ spṛśyatām iyāt 
ekādaśena śuddhiḥ syān mṛtake sūtake tathā 
rājñaḥ ṣaṣṭhe saptame vā sparśaḥ dvādaśāhenānnaśūddhiḥ 
vaiśyasya sparśanam aṣṭame navame vā pakṣeṇānnaśuddhiḥ 
śūdrasya sparśanam ekādaśe dvādaśe vā māsenānnaśuddhiḥ iti hāritaḥ 
tathā vākyantaram api
sparśe krameṇa varṇānāṃ tricatuḥpañcaṣair dinaiḥ 
bhojyānno daśabhir vipraḥ śeṣā dvitriṣaḍuttaraiḥ 
ete ca vikalpāḥ prayojanāpekṣayā guṇavad aguṇāpekṣayā vyavasthāpanīyāḥ 
sarveṣāṃ tāvad brāhmaṇasya bhaktadāsās tricaturair ahobhiḥ sparśanena dūṣayanti 
garbhadāsās tu sadyaḥ 
evam itareṣām api varṇānā 
yatredaṃ sadyaḥśaucaṃ tatra sarvatra snānaṃ vāsasā ca 
dravyasya śuddhir yā yasya vihitā iti jñāpayiṣyate 
kanyānām api tripauruṣeyi sapiṇḍatā 
saputrāṇāṃ tu strīṇāṃ tripuruṣaṃ vijñāyate iti vasiṣṭhaḥ 
āśauca evaitat 
vivāhe tu vidhir darśitaḥ 
sthitam etat saptamapuruṣo maryādā ṣaṭpuruṣāḥ sapiṇḍā iti 
saptame prāpte vinivartate 
samānodakabhāvaḥ samānodakavyapadeśaḥ 
janmanāmnor avedane 
janma ca ayam asmatkule jātaḥ nāma amuṣmād idaṃ nāmakāt pitṛpitāmahādeḥ 
ubhayor avedane nivṛttir 
ataś cānyatare jñāte 'py aniṣṭodakaṃ jñeyam 
avatīrya nadīm anyad vā jalāśayaṃ nābhidaghnabhugno dakṣiṇābhimukhaḥ savyottarābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām udakaṃ kṛtvānavekṣamāṇāḥ pratyāvrajeyuḥ iti 
janane 'py evam eva syān mātāpitros tu sūtakam 
sūtakaṃ mātur eva syād upaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ 
evam etat sapiṇḍānāṃ janane 
yathaiva daśāhādayaḥ kalpāḥ ṣaṭkarmādivṛttyapekṣayā svādhyāyālpamahatvāpekṣayā ca vyavasthitā maraṇe tathaiva janane 'py āśaucamātram atidiśyate kālānavacchinnam 
sāmarthyāc cāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā tatsaṃbandhasakalalābhaḥ 
kālāvacchinnātideśe tu ekenaiva mukhyatvād daśāhena saṃbandhaḥ svādhyāyādiṣv syāt 
yadi vā pāṭhapratyāsattyā daśāhādyapekṣayā ekāhena ekenaiva ca nirākāṃkṣīkṛtatvād anyais tryahādibhir na saṃbandhaḥ syāt 
tatreyaṃ smṛtir aviśeṣeṇa vṛttasvādhyāyāpekṣāyāṃ vyavasthāyāṃ mṛtasūtakayor vidadhatī janane guṇādyanapekṣayā jātimātre sthāpyamānā virudhyeta 
samācāraś ca bādhitaḥ syāt 
nanu evaṃ strīṇām api tryahaikāhādayaḥ kalpāḥ sūtikānāṃ prāpnuvanti samācāravirodhinaḥ 
atrocyate 
yady ayaṃ vikalpaḥ syāt tad evam 
vyavasthita evāsīt kalpaḥ 
tathā hi tuśabda upapannataro bhavati 
sūtakaśabdaś ca nāśauce vartate 
lakṣaṇayā sūtakasaṃbandhy aśaucaṃ lakṣayet 
lakṣaṇāyāḥ sāhacaryād aspṛśyataiva lakṣayituṃ yuktā 
yadi ca sarvam āśaucam abhipretaṃ syād āśaucagrahaṇam evākariṣyat aśaucaṃ mātur eva iti 
ataś ca smṛtyantare trirātram aspṛśyatoktyā iha tadabhāvas tayor vikalpaḥ sūtakaṃ mātur eva 
mātāpitror mātur eveti pitur vikalpaḥ 
upaspṛśya snātvā śucir bhavatīti 
upakramamātram idaṃ vakṣyamāṇena ślokena pitur api tryaham eva 
nirasya tu pumāñ chukram upaspṛśyaiva śudhyati 
baijikād abhisaṃbandhād anurundhyād aghaṃ tryaham 
sahetukaṃ tryaham upadiśann apasparśanaśuddhiṃ pūrvoktām anumanyate 
kim artham ucyata iti cet sarūpavidhitayārthavādārtham na vidheyatayā jartilayavāgvā vā juhuyāt itivat 
nirasya tu śukraṃ maithunadharmeṇa saṃprayujya śukrotsargād anantaraṃ upaspṛśya snātvā śucir bhavati 
ato baijikād abhisaṃbandhāt 
bījanimitto baihikaḥ 
abhisaṃbandhaḥ apatyotpattiḥ 
atas tatra kathaṃ nānurundhyān nānuvarteta 
agham āśaucaṃ tryaham 
yādṛśaṃ ca śukranirasanena akṛtasnānasyāśucitvam na tādṛśam eva prasave api tu tryaham 
pūrvaślokārdhatryahaśeṣatayānūdyate 
ata evopaspṛśyeti snānam ucyate snānaṃ maithuninaḥ smṛtam iti vacanān nācamanam 
putre tu jāte tadahaḥ spṛśyataiveti kecit 
tathā ca śaṃkha āha kumāraprasave nāḍyām acchinnayāṃ guḍatilahiraṇyavastraprāvaraṇagodhānyapratigraheṣv adoṣas tadahar ity eke 
tasmāt sa divasaḥ puṇyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanaḥ 
smaraṇāc caiva pūrveṣāṃ tadahar na praduṣyati  iti 
tathā śrāddham apy eke kurvantīti ca 
anena pituḥ sarvathāśaucābhāva eva 
tatraite smṛtī pūrvavad vṛttisadasadbhāvāpekṣayā vikalpyete 
ahnā caikena rātryā ca trirātrair eva ca tribhiḥ 
śavaspṛśo viśudhyanti tryahād udakadāyinaḥ 
trayas trirātrā navāhāni 
ekena ca ahnā ekayā ca rātryā ahorātraḥ 
evaṃ daśāho vṛttānurodhād evam upadiṣṭaḥ 
śavaspṛśaḥ śavasya snānālaṃkārādikāriṇaḥ 
anyeṣāṃ snānamātraṃ vakṣyati tanniryāpakānāṃ ca 
tathā ca prakaṭīkariṣyati pretāhāraiḥ samam ity atra 
etac ca samānodakānām mūlyena vā nirharatām 
anāthanirharaṇe tu smṛtyantare 
na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃcin nāśaucaṃ śubhakarmaṇām 
jalāvagāhanāt teṣāṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate 
yat tu asapiṇḍaṃ dvijam iti tatra vai vakṣyāmaḥ 
udakadāyinaḥ samānodakāḥ 
teṣāṃ ca pṛthakpiṇḍe ca saṃsthite iti sadyaḥśaucam api vakṣyate 
tatra vikalpaḥ 
sapiṇḍeṣv etad asvādhyāyādyapekṣam 
guroḥ pretasya śiṣyas tu pitṛmedhaṃ samācaran 
pretāhāraiḥ samaṃ tatra daśarātreṇa śudhyati 
pitṛmedhaḥ carameṣṭiḥ 
anye tu sarvaṃ karmaiva lakṣyata iti prāhuḥ 
tat kurvan śiṣyo daśarātreṇa śudhyati 
brahmacāriṇo 'py ayaṃ vidhir asty eva 
pretāhāraiḥ samaḥ 
pretaṃ haranti niryāpayanti tathā teṣāṃ daśāhaḥ 
evaṃ śiṣyasyāpīty arthaḥ 
rātribhir māsatulyābhir garbhasrāve viśudhyati 
rajasy uparate sādhvī snānena strī rajasvalā 
garbhasrāve garbhamāsasamā rātrīḥ striyā eva śuddhir yuktā iha vākye tasyāḥ śrutatvāt 
sapiṇḍānāṃ tu smṛtyantarasamācārāv anveṣaṇīyau 
vasiṣṭhena tu sapiṇḍānāṃ tryahaḥ samāmnātaḥ ūnadivarṣe prete garbhapatane sapiṇḍānāṃ trirātram aśaucam 
srāvas tu garbhasya māsatrayād ūrdhvaṃ prāg daśamān māsāt 
kecit tu prāṅ navamād ity āhuḥ 
aprāptakālasya pātaḥ srāva ucyate 
na punar dravarūpasyaiva 
tathā gautamena garbhasraṃsane garbhamāsasamā rātrīḥ iti paṭhitam 
saptamāsyāś ca jīvanti 
ataḥ saptame māse pūrṇam āśaucam 
etat tu jīvato jātasya yuktam anyathā tu garbhamāsasamā ity eva 
iha rajasvalāyā rajasy uparate snānena śuddhir āmnātā 
smṛtyantare tryahād ūrdhvam 
tatraivaṃ vyavasthā 
prāk tryahād rajonivṛttāv api nāsti śuddhir ūrdhvam anuparate 'pi bhavati 
kiṃ tu viśuddhyatīti 
prakṛte punaḥ sādhvīti vacanād anivṛtte rajasi vaidikakarmādhikārānupraveśo nāsti na punaḥ sparśādiniṣedhaḥ 
utktam ādyāś catasro ninditāḥ iti 
rajasvalā strī rajasy uparate snānena sādhvī bhavati śuddhā karmayogyety evaṃ padayojanā 
strīgrahaṇaṃ varṇamātrastryartham 
pūrve tu ślokā brāhmaṇaviṣayā vyākhyātās tadāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaṃ strīgrahaṇam 
uttaratrāpi yatra viśeṣapramāṇaṃ nāsti tatrāpi varṇamātraviṣayatayaiva yathā nṛṇām akṛtamuṇḍānām iti 
nṛṇām akṛtamuṇḍānāṃ viśuddhir naiśikī smṛtā 
nirvṛttamuṇḍakānāṃ tu trirātrāc chuddhir iṣyate 
imāḥ ṣaṣṭhīḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti kartṛlakṣaṇāḥ kecid vyācakṣate 
akṛtacūḍa ekāhena śuddhyati 
tathā vayo'vasthāpekṣo 'pi vikalpa ity ekīyamatam uktam 
tasyaiva ślokasya vyavasthāvākye ime 
anye tv adhyāhāreṇa saṃbandhalakṣaṇā āhuḥ akṛtamuṇḍānāṃ mṛtānāṃ ye sapiṇḍāḥ 
tatrottarapakṣaḥ samācārābhipretaḥ 
smṛtyantare sadyaḥśaucam apy āmnātam 
viṣayas tatraiva darśitaḥ ā dantajanmanaḥ sadyaḥ ā cūḍān naiśikī nirvṛttacūḍakānāṃ trirātram iti 
ūnadvivārṣikaṃ pretaṃ nidadhyur bāndhavā bahiḥ 
alaṃkṛtya śucau bhūmāv asthisaṃcayanād ṛte 
ūne asaṃskṛtasya dve varṣe yasya jātasya gate sa ucyate ūnadvivārṣikaḥ 
taṃ pretaṃ bāndhavā bahir grāmaṃ nidadhyur bhūmau nikhātāyāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ 
smṛtyantare nikhanet iti paṭhyate 
alaṃkṛtya pretālaṃkāraiḥ 
ūnadvivarṣe 'pi śrūyamāṇo 'laṃkāraḥ samācārāt kṛtopanayanādāv api vijñeyaḥ 
śucau yatrāsthīni bhūpradeśe na santi 
asthisaṃcayarahitatvena yā śuddhā tatra nikhāya sthāpyaḥ 
smaśāne kilāsthīni saṃcitāni bhavanti 
ata etena vacanena tato 'nyatra nidhānam ucyate 
na punas tādṛśasyāsthisaṃcayo na kartavya ity eva vākyārthaḥ 
agnisaṃskārābhāvād eva tadaprāpteḥ  
nāsya kāryo 'gnisaṃskāro na ca kāryodakakriyā 
araṇya kāṣṭhavat tyaktvā kṣapeta tryaham eva tu 
kāṣṭhavad iti nirapekṣatām āha 
śrāddham api na kartavyaṃ na codakam 
udakakriyāniṣedhena śrāddhaniṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ aṅgāṅgibhāvāt 
ataḥ samācāraprasiddhaḥ śrāddhaniṣedho liṅgena sādhayitavyaḥ 
anye tu smṛtyantaradṛṣṭanikhananapratiṣedhārthaṃ varṇayanti 
tataś ca vikalpaḥ 
kṣapeta udāsyeta 
śāstracoditaṃ vyāpāraṃ na kuryāt 
nātrivarṣasya kartavyā bāndhavair udakakriyā 
jātadantasya vā kuryur nāmni vāpi kṛte sati 
ā trivarṣasyeti ā tṛtīyād varṣāt pratiṣedhaḥ 
na punaś caturvarṣādau 
evamartham evādiśabdaṃ kecit paṭhanti nātrivarṣasya kartavyā trivarṣāder iti 
samācāraś caivam eva 
jātadantasya vā kuryuḥ 
udakakriyāsāhacaryād agnisaṃskāro 'bhyanujñāyate 
nanu ca vikalpe kāmacāraḥ 
tatra kaḥ prayāsasādhyaṃ vittakṣayakaram anuṣṭhānapakṣam āśrayeta 
vyarthas taddupadeśaḥ 
ucyate 
sarvavilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ pitror adhikāraḥ 
pretopakārārtham etat kriyate 
naimittikatvād avaśyakartavyam ity etat prāg evoktam 
tatrāvaśyakartavyatāpratiṣedho 'stītīha niścīyate 
pretopakārārthatvam astīty abhyanujñānena jñāpyate 
tatrākaraṇe nāsti vidhyatikramaḥ 
pretopakāras tv anuṣṭhānād bhavatīti vidhipratiṣedhayor nāsāmañjasyam 
sabrahmacāriṇy ekāham atīte kṣapaṇaṃ smṛtam 
janmany ekodakānāṃ tu trirātrāc chuddhir iṣyate 
sabrahmacārī samānacarṇo 'ta ekodakā rūḍhyā āsapiṇḍebhyaḥ parigṛhyante 
teṣām itaretaraṃ janmani sūtake trirātram 
sadyaḥśaucam api smṛtyantarād udakadāyināṃ vikalpitaṃ draṣṭavyam 
strīṇām asaṃskṛtānāṃ tu tryahāc chuddhyanti bāndhavāḥ 
yathoktenaiva kalpena śuddhyanti tu sanābhayaḥ 
asaṃskṛtā yā vāṅmātreṇa pratigṛhītā na ca vivāhitās tāsāṃ maraṇe bāndhavāḥ patipakṣās trirātreṇa 
sanābhayas tu sapiṇḍāḥ svapitṛpakṣā yathoktena kalpena nirvṛttacauḍakānām iti jāter adhikārāt trirātreṇa 
anyais tūkam sodaryā daśarātreṇa iti 
teṣāṃ cābhiprāyaḥ 
aṣṭavarṣāyāḥ kanyāyā dānaṃ vihitam 
adattāyāś ca nirvṛttacauḍakavyapadeśābhāvāt puṃsa ivopanītasya tadānīṃ kalpāntarasyānāmnānād daśāha eva yuktaḥ 
anyais tu paṭhitam ahas tv adattakanyāsu bāleṣu ca viśodhanam iti 
tatra vyākhyātāraḥ pañcadaśābdadeśīyāpi yā hy adattā kanyā tiṣṭhet tadahar evāśaucam 
mukhyam āmnānam atikramya kālakṣapaṇe pramāṇābhāvāt 
tatrocyate 
bāleṣu ca iti ko 'syārthaḥ 
yāvatā uktam eva yogavibhāge ā dantajanmanaḥ sadyaḥ iti 
na caitena tad bādhituṃ yuktam sāmānyarūpatvād asya tasya ca viśeṣavyavasthāpanarūpatvāt 
ato 'yam ekāhaḥ pṛthag ukto 'pi ā cūḍād eva vyavatiṣṭhate sāmānyasya viśeṣāpekṣatvāt 
tasmād anārṣa evāyam ardhaślokaḥ pratipadyate sparśaviṣayatayā neyaḥ 
sparśapratiṣedho hi mṛtakasūtakayor bālasyāpi puṃvat prāptaḥ 
tadartham etad uktaṃ syāt ahas tv adattakanyāsu bāleṣu ca viśodhanam iti 
evaṃ ca viṣayasaptamyāśritā bhavati 
sā ca yuktā kārakavibhaktitvāt 
itarathā adhyāhṛtya bhāvalakṣaṇā saptamī vyākhyāyeta bāleṣu mṛteṣu jīvatāṃ śuddhiḥ iti 
na ca tadupasparśanād āśaucam etenaitat siddhyatīti 
viṣayāntare tasya ca caritārthatvāt bhūmau parivṛtatvāt bhūmau parivṛtasya ca sparśanasaṃbhavāt 
aviśeṣoktau kuto viśeṣapratipattir iti cet 
tasyācamanakalpo vidyata ity etat saṃnidhau tādṛśasyaiva sparśasya pratīyamānatvāt 
tathā ca rajasvalāspṛṣṭino bālasya sparśanaṃ necchanti 
athāsya viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt 
tathā gautamena tad uktaṃ svasyāṃ smṛtau 
yuktam evādhātum etasya 
tasmād yuktaivādhānakālalakṣaṇā 
akṣāralavaṇānnāḥ syur nimajjeyuś ca te tryaham 
māṃsāśanaṃ ca nāśnīyuḥ śayīraṃś ca pṛthak kṣitau 
kṣāralavaṇam 
yavakṣārādi kṣāram 
lavaṇaṃ saindhavādi 
tan na bhuñjīran 
lavanaviseṣaṇaṃ vā kṣāragrahaṇaṃ tena saindhavasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
nimajjanaṃ ca nadītaḍāgādāv atīrthasnānam aṅgaparigharṣaṇādivarjanam 
māṃsāśanaṃ ca yāvad āśaucaṃ smṛtyantarāt pratiṣidhyate 
evaṃ paṭhyate na striyam upeyur na mārjayeyur na māṃsam aśnīyuḥ 
gṛhyakāras tu tryaham anaśnanta āsīran krītotpannena vā varteran ity āha 
śayīraṃś ca sthaṇḍile parasaṅgavarjam 
sūtake 'pi brahmacaryaṃ smṛtyantare pradarśitam 
saṃnidhāv eṣa vai kalpaḥ śāvāśaucasya kīrtitaḥ 
asaṃnidhāv ayaṃ jñeyo vidhiḥ saṃbandhibāndhavaiḥ 
saṃnidhau yatrāsau mṛtas tatra tat saṃnidhīyate 
anye tu prayāṇakāle ye saṃnihitās teṣām evāyaṃ vidhir ity āhuḥ 
saṃbandhinaḥ samānodakāḥ 
bāndhavāḥ sapiṇḍāḥ 
anye tu grāmāntare nagarāntare 'vasthānam asaṃnidhānaṃ manyante 
teṣāṃ ca
vigataṃ tu videśasthaṃ śṛṇuyād yo hy anirdaśam 
yac cheṣaṃ daśarātrasya tāvad evāśucir bhavet 
videśo grāmāntarādiḥ pūrvavat 
vigataṃ mṛtam 
anirdaśam 
upalakṣaṇam etat 
yasya ya āśaucakālas taccheṣaṃ tasyāśaucam 
punar daśarātragrahaṇaṃ ślokapūraṇārtham 
utpattyapekṣayā janmamaraṇayor āśaucakālavikalpenāvaśyam apekṣyam 
yadā sūtakādyutpannaṃ tadā prabhṛti daśāhādi kalpaḥ na yadā sapiṇḍair jñātam iti 
ataś ca yadātithinā jñātaṃ sūtakādi na tu gṛhasthena tadāpy abhojyam annam 
tathaivotpattinimittamātram idam ubhayatreti 
daśāham āśaucināṃ tata ūrdhvam trirātraikāhāśaucinā tu sacailasnānajā sadyaḥ śuciḥ 
atikrānte daśāhe ca trirātram aśucir bhavet 
saṃvatsare vyatīte tu spṛṣṭvaivāpo viśuddhyati 
yasya yaḥ kṛta āśaucakālo daśāhādis tasya tadūrdhvaṃ trirātram 
yasya tu tryahaikāhādis tasya tata ūrdhvaṃ savāsasaḥ snānamātram eva 
tathā cottaratra vakṣyati savāsāḥ ityādi 
saṃvatsare atīte atikrānte spṛṣṭvaivāpaḥ snātvā śudhyed ity arthaḥ 
hastena ca sapādena ityādivacanāt sarvāṅgasparśanaṃ pratīyate tac ca snānam eva 
nirdaśaṃ jñātimaraṇaṃ śrutvā putrasya janma ca 
savāsā jalam āplutya śuddho bhavati mānavaḥ 
samānodakānām ayaṃ vidhiḥ 
tryahaikāhapakṣe ca sapiṇḍānām api 
savāsā vāsasā sahitaḥ 
jalam āplutya snātvety arthaḥ 
bāle deśāntarasthe ca pṛthakpiṇḍe ca saṃsthite 
savāsā jalam āplutya sadya eva viśudhyati 
bāle 'dantajāte sūnau 
deśāntarasthe pṛthakpiṇḍe ca saṃsthite ity ekārthāni padāni 
pṛthakpiṇḍaḥ samānodaka iti yāvat 
tasmin deśāntarasthe saṃsthite sadyaḥ śuddhiḥ 
saṃnidhau tryahāt tūdakadāyinaḥ ity uktam 
antardaśāhe cet syātāṃ punar maraṇajanmanī 
tāvat syād aśucir vipro yāvat tat syād anirdaśam 
atrāpi daśāhagraṇam āśaucakālopalakṣaṇārtham 
yasya ya āśaucakālas tasminn anivṛtte yadi punar anyad āśaucanimittam utpadyate tadā pūrvaśeṣeṇaiva śuddhir na tv antarā nipatitaṃ yat tadīyād ahnaḥ prabhṛti daśāhādigaṇanā kartavyā 
tathā ca gautamaḥ tac ced antaḥ punar āpatet taccheṣeṇa śuddhyeyuḥ iti 
maraṇajanmanī iti samāse yatnam antareṇa kramāpratipatter vyantareṇāpy upanipātaprāptau samācārāt samānajātīya eveti draṣṭavyam 
punaḥśabdaś ca samānajātīyāpekṣayā samarthataro bhavati 
vipragrahaṇam apy āśaucinām upalakṣaṇārtham 
smṛtyantare tu vihitam rātriśeṣe dvābhyām prabhāte tisṛbhiḥ iti 
etasya brāhmaṇasya pretasparśe daśarātram āśaucam iti prakṛtya na ced antarā mriyeta jāyeta vā śiṣṭair eva divasaiḥ śuddhyeta itīyaṃ smṛtiḥ samānajātīyāsamānajātīyabhedaṃ nānumanyate 
trirātram āhur āśaucam ācārye saṃsthite sati 
tasya putre ca patnyāṃ ca divārātram iti sthitiḥ 
ācārya upanetā 
tasmin saṃsthite trirātraṃ śiṣyasya 
tasya ācāryasya putre patnyāṃ ca saṃsthitāyām ahorātram 
śrotriye tūpasaṃpanne trirātram aśucir bhavet 
mātule pakṣiṇīṃ rātriṃ śiṣartvigbāndhaveṣu ca 
vedaśākhādhyāyī śrotriyaḥ 
upasaṃpannaḥ maitryā prayojanena vā kenacit saṃgataḥ śīlena yukto vā 
pūrvaṃ tu sabrahmacāriṇy ekāham agṛhītavede dṛṣṭam 
abhidhānakośe tu upasaṃpanno mṛtaparyāyaḥ 
bahukālatvād āśaucasya pūrvaiva vyākhyā jyāyasī 
anye tu śrotriye mātule trirātram ity eva saṃbandhanti pakṣiṇīṃ rātrim iti śiṣyādibhiḥ 
bāndhavāḥ śyālakamātṛṣvasreyādayaḥ 
yadā tu mātule pakṣiṇīm iti saṃbandhas tadā mātule bāndhavatvād eva siddhā pakṣiṇī 
punarvacanaṃ nityārtham 
tenānyeṣu bāndhaveṣu yathākāmam 
prete rājani sajyotir yasya syād viṣaye sthitaḥ 
aśrotriye tv ahaḥ kṛtsnam anūcāne tathā gurau 
rājaśabdo 'yam abhiṣekādiguṇayogini varṇamātre lakṣaṇayā vartate 
yata āha yasya syād viṣaye sthitaḥ 
jātiviśeṣāvacchinnaviṣayeśvaravacanatve lakṣaṇā na ca śabdārthaḥ 
sajyotiḥ 
saha jyotiṣā vartate 
divā prete divaiva rātrau tu tan nāsti 
evaṃ rātrau rātrir eva nāhaḥ 
idam eva jñāpakam anyatra rātrigrahaṇe 'hargrahaṇe 'py ahorātrapratipatteḥ 
yathā rātribhir māsatulyābhiḥ tryaham ekāham iti 
ahnā caikena ity atra tu rātrigrahaṇaṃ pādapūraṇārtham 
rātrāv agnir jyotiḥ 
evaṃ hy agnihotrabrāhmaṇe agninā vai tejasā tejasviny ādityena tejasā na bhavati 
aśrotriye avedādhyāyini anūcāne kṛtsnam ahaḥ 
rātrau na bhavaty eva utpanne 'pi rātrau nimitte 
kathaṃ punar aśrotriye 'nūcāne 
evaṃ hi smaryate pravacane sāṅge 'dhītīti 
satyaṃ pravaktāpy anūcāna ucyate 
tenaivaṃ kathaṃcid aṅgādigranthārthānyaḥ pravakti tasminn ayam ahar vidhiḥ 
upasaṃpanne ca gurau pūjyatvena mukhye ācārye vā vidhyantarabhāvāt 
kecit tu aśrotriye tv ity atra nañaṃ saṃbadhnanti 
iha nañaḥ praśleṣeṇa yo 'nyeṣām upādhyāyas tasya ca na kaścit tatremaṃ vidhim ācakṣate 
śuddhyed vipro daśāhena dvādaśāhena bhūmipaḥ 
vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhena śūdro māsena śudhyati 
kṣatriyādīnāṃ prāguktavṛttādyapekṣas tryahacaturahādikalpavyāvṛttyartham idam 
brāhmaṇe daśāhas tv anūdyata eva 
atra tv idaṃ vācyam kena kṣatriyādīnāṃ dvādaśāhena niyatakālāprāptir yena kalpāntaravyāvṛttyarthatāvagamyate 
iyam eva hy eṣām iyatkālasya prāpakam 
saty asmiṃs tatra daśāho 'yam āśaucakālas tadupalakṣaṇārtho vijñāyate 
na ca saty apy asmiṃs tasyopalakṣaṇārthatā 
saty api cāturvarṇyādhikāre yasyaiva daśāha uktas tasyaivetare kalpā iti 
smṛtyantare ca brāhmaṇavivakṣayaivoktam ekāhād brāhmaṇasya syāt svādhyāyaḥ ityādi 
teṣāṃ tu smṛtyantare yāni kalpāntarāṇy āmnātāni tāni vikalpyante 
ekādaśe āśaucakālaḥ kaścid vivaraṇakāra āha śuddhyed vipro daśāhena iti 
atrāhargrahaṇaṃ vivakṣitam tena daśamyāṃ rātrau nāsty āśaucam 
tataḥ pūrvedyur nimantraṇādi yuktam 
agniṃ cādhāsyataḥ paurvāhṇikajāgaraṇādināśauca upakrānto bhaviṣyati 
tad ayuktam 
aharvivakṣāyām ādyāsv api rātriṣu na syād āśaucam 
atha daśāhaṃ śāvam iti etasmāt tatra bhaviṣyati 
atrāvivakṣāyāṃ kiṃ pramāṇam 
tasmād ahaḥśabdo 'yam ahorātravacana iti pradarśitam 
tathā ca pūrvaśloke ahaḥ kṛtsnam iti rātrinivṛttyarthaṃ kṛtsnagrahaṇam 
na vardhayed aghāhāni paratyūhen nāgniṣu kriyāḥ 
na ca tat karma kurvāṇaḥ sanābhyo 'py aśucir bhavet 
yasyaiṣā buddhiḥ ya uktās tryahādayaḥ kalpās tulyaṃ daśāhena vikalpyante na vṛttādivyavasthayeti tataś ciratarakālam anyasya saṃbhave kim ity ekāhapakṣaṃ nityasvādhyāyākleśakaraṃ pratipatsye daśāham apāśrayāmi niṣkarmasukham āsiṣye iti  taṃ prati sauhārddena sā vyavasthā spaṣṭīkriyate 
naite tulyā api tu vyavasthitā eva 
vyavasthā ca prāg darśitā 
anyathā yasyāśaucakālo vihitas tasya tataḥ kālāvadhikasya kuto vṛddhiprāptiḥ yenaivam arthvat syāt 
vispaṣṭārthatve ko doṣaḥ 
anye tv āhur atīteṣv apy ahaḥsu yāvat snānādikriyā na kṛtā tāvan naiva śuddhiḥ 
vipraḥ śudhyaty apaḥ ityādi vakṣyati 
tatrāśucitvād ananuṣṭhānena na duṣyāmīti snānādiṣu śuddhaye na pravartate 
tatraivam ucyate na vardhayet nātīteṣv ahaḥsu bāhyāśauce vilambitavyam 
ye tv ahaḥśabdo daśamasyāhno yā rātris tasyām āśaucaṃ na bhavatīti te na samyaṅ manyata ity uktam 
tathā ca gautamaḥ āśaucamadhya āśaucāntara utpanne taccheṣeṇa śuddhiḥ ity uktvā ekasyāṃ rātrau śeṣāyāṃ tayaiva śuddhiṃ manyamāna āha rātriśeṣe dvābhyām iti 
pratyūhen nāgniṣū kriyāḥ 
aśucitvāt sarvaśrautasmārtakriyānivṛttau prāptāyām idam ucyate 
agniṣu yāḥ kriyāḥ sāyaṃhomādyās tā na pratyūhen na pratyasyet 
pratyūho nirhāsa ananuṣṭhānam 
na ca svayaṃ kuryād yata āha na ca tatkarma kurvāṇaḥ sanābhyo 'pīti 
sanābhyo 'pi nāśuciḥ syāt kiṃ punar anyaḥ 
tathā gṛhyam nityāni nivarteran vaitānavarjaṃ śālāgnau caike ity uktvā āha anya etāni kuryuḥ iti 
na ca yad agnyādhānaṃ homamātram eva kriyate kiṃ tarhi sāṅgaprayogaḥ tatraiva kartur narasya saṃbhavāt pradhānahomasya tu dravyatyāgarūpatvāt svayaṃkartṛtaiva 
ato homavaiśvadevadarśapūrṇamāsādyā nivartante 
anyeṣāṃ tu japasaṃdhyopāsanādīnāṃ nivṛttir na darśitā 
tāni ca nityāni 
ato anyeṣām evābhyanujñānaṃ yataḥ smṛtyantare pratiṣiddham homaḥ svādhyāyaś ca nivartate iti 
ato nityakāṃyabhedena vyavasthā 
kāmyaṃ tu naiva kartavyam aśucitvād adhikārāpagamāt 
nanu ca nityeṣv api naivāśucer adhikāraḥ 
na ca śaucam aṅgam 
yadi viguṇaṃ nityam anuṣṭhīyate na kāmyam ity ucyate 
athāsmād vacanād bhavati 
maivam 
iha yad api mānaṃ tad asyānya etāni kuryur iti parakartṛtvam abhyanujñāyate 
tac ca viguṇatvān nityeṣūpapadyate na kāmyeṣu 
vaiśvadeve tu vivadante 
smṛtyantaraṃ codāharanti 
homaṃ tatra na kurvīta śuṣkadhānyaphalair api 
evaṃ yajñavidhānaṃ tu na kuryān mṛtyujanmanoḥ 
ataḥ saṃdhyāhomau darśapūrṇamāsau sāṃvatsarikaṃ cāśvayujyādi kartavyam 
upākaraṇaṃ tu nakṣatrāśrayam eva na paurṇamāsyāśrayam 
divākīrtim udakyāṃ ca patitaṃ sūtikāṃ tathā 
śavaṃ tatspṛṣṭinaṃ caiva spṛṣṭvā snānena śudhyati 
divākīrtiś cāṇḍālaḥ atyantāśucisāhacaryād bhārate ca prayogadarśanān mārjāramūṣikasaṃvāde 
tasminn api ca kāle 'bhūd divākīrtir bhayārditaḥ 
iti 
na nāpitaḥ tasya spṛśyatvāt bhojyānnatvāc ca 
yat tu śmaśrukarmaṇi tasyedaṃ snānam ity āhus tad api siddhatvād avācyam 
avaśyaṃ śmaśrukarmāṇi kārayato romāṇi gātrāṇi spṛśanti tāni śarīrāc cyutāny aśuddhānīti siddhaṃ snānam 
tatspṛṣṭinaṃ tasya spṛṣṭaṃ tatspṛtam tad asyāstīti tatspṛṣṭī 
yenaite spṛṣṭās tad api snānam eva 
iha sarvasyāpratyāsatteḥ tatspṛṣṭinam ity anena saṃbandhaḥ śavasyaiva kecid āhur na divākirtyādīnām 
anye tu ekavākyopanipātād ante śrutatvāt sarveṣāṃ buddhau saṃnidhānāt tacchabdena sarvanāmnā parāmarśa iti 
atra hi śavaparyantānāṃ dvandvaṃ kṛtvā spṛṣṭīty anena saṃbandhaḥ 
tatra tatspṛṣṭīti samāsārthasya buddhau saṃnihitatvāt tacchabdenāvamarśaḥ 
na hi kevalasya śavasya spṛṣṭipadena saṃbandho lakṣyate patitādibhir itaretarayuktatvāt 
kiṃ tu kevalasya padāntasaṃbandhaḥ 
dvandve hy ekaikaḥ śabdaḥ sarvārthābhidhāyī 
tataḥ sarve pratyāsannaḥ 
athāpi śavaspṛṣṭiśabdasya tatspṛṣṭipadena saṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā tato 'nyair abhisaṃbandhaḥ 
tathā sati patitādīnāṃ spṛṣṭipadena saṃbandho na syāt 
tasmāt samācārata eva nirṇayaḥ 
ācamya prayato nityaṃ japed aśucidarśane 
saurān mantrān yathotsāhaṃ pāvamānīś ca śaktataḥ 
aśucayaḥ saṃnidhānāt pūrvoktā eva 
sūryadaivatyā mantrāḥ saurāḥ ud u tyaṃ jātavedasam ityādayaḥ 
pāvamāṇyaḥ dāśatayīṣu navame maṇḍale 'dhītāḥ svādiṣṭayā ityādyāḥ 
yathotsāhaṃ śaktita iti ca eka evārthaḥ 
vṛttavaśāc chabdadvayaṃ paṭhitam 
bahuvacananirdeśāt tritvasaṃkhyāvaśyaṃ kartavyā 
paratas tu yadi gurutarakāryātyayo na bhavati tadā kartavya eva japaḥ 
mantragrahaṇāt pāvamānīr iti ca ṛcām upādānād asamāpte 'pi sūkte tribhya ūrdhvaṃ bhavaty eva śuddhiḥ 
śvāpy atra prakṣeptavyaḥ 
so 'py aśucir eva 
paṭhitaṃ ca gautamīye 'sminn eva varge śunaś ca 
yad upahanyād ity eke iti 
prayataḥ ananyamanā mantradevatādidhyānaparaḥ 
atha vā prayato devatādipūjāpravṛtto yadā paśyet tadaiva kuryān nānyadeti 
nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsti sasnehaṃ snātvā vipro viśudhyati 
ācamyaiva tu niḥsnehaṃ gām ālabhyārkam īkṣya vā 
naro manuṣyas tasyedam nāram 
sasnehaṃ māṃsamajjādigdham 
gor ālaṃbhanaṃ sparśaḥ 
arkadarśanagavālambau vikalpyete 
ādiṣṭī nodakaṃ kuryād ā vratasya samāpanāt 
samāpte tūdakaṃ kṛtvā trirātreṇaiva śudhyati 
ādeśa ādiṣṭam 
vratādeśanasaṃbandhād rūḍhirūpeṇa brahmacāry ucyate 
tasya brahmacaryāśramasthasya sato ye sapiṇḍāḥ pramīyante teṣām ayam aniṣṭodakadānapratiṣedhaḥ 
prākpramītānāṃ tu vihitam anvāhikaṃ kuryād devapitṛtarpaṇam iti 
ā vratasyeti ā samāvartanād ity arthaḥ 
na punar āntarālikasāhasikād ity arthaḥ 
vratacaraṇasamāpteḥ samāvṛttaḥ sa sarveṣām ekaikasyodakaṃ kṛtvaikasminn ahani trirātram āśaucaṃ kuryāt 
mātus tūdakadānaṃ vratino 'pīṣyate 
na ca vratalopaḥ 
smṛtyantaram udāharanti aparādhya ādiṣṭī nodaka iti 
vṛthāsaṃkarajānāṃ pravrajyāsu ca niṣṭhatām 
ātmanas tyāgināṃ caiva nivartetodakakriyā 
jātaśabdaḥ pratyakem abhisaṃbadhyate 
vṛthajāto yo na devān arcayati na pitṝn na manuṣyān iti 
saty adhikāre 'nāśramī hutāhutaparityaktaḥ saṃvatsaram anāśramī bhūtvā ityādi cirakālāvasthāne mahādoṣaśravaṇāt 
brahmacāriparivrājakābhyām anyasya parapākaratitvam 
ātmārthas tu pāko niṣiddhaḥ 
saṃkarajātā itaretarajātivyatikareṇa pratilomā āyogavādayaḥ 
ninditatvād vṛthājātasāhacaryeṇa 
anulomās tu saty api saṃkīrṇayonitve mātṛjātīyatvād adhikāritvāc ca neha gṛhyante 
na cānulomeṣu saṃkīrṇayonivyavahāraḥ 
saṃkīrṇayonayas tv etāḥ pratilomānulomajāḥ iti 
aniyuktā sutādayayaś cānekapuruṣasaṃsargajāḥ veśyājātāś ca 
pārastraiṇeyās tu asatyanekapuruṣasaṃsargeṇa saṃkarajātāḥ 
ayaṃ ca sapiṇḍānāṃ niṣedhaḥ na tatputrāṇām iti kecit 
ātmatyāgināṃ tu putrāṇām api 
tad ayuktam aviśeṣaśravaṇāt 
pravrajyāsu bāhyāsu bhagālavaraktapaṭādyāsv anadhikārād bahuvacananirdeśāt vratādidarśanabhedena bāhyāḥ 
ātmanas tyāgināṃ puruṣāṇām āyuṣo 'kṣaye svecchayā śarīraṃ tyajanti 
vṛddhānām acikitsyamahāvyādhīnāṃ ca bhiṣakpratyakhātānām iṣyata eva 
yathoktam 
vṛddhaḥ śaucasmṛter luptasya pratyākhyātabhiṣakkriyaḥ 
ātmānaṃ ghātayed yas tu bhṛgvagnyanaśanāmbubhiḥ 
tasya trirātram āśaucaṃ dvitīye tv astisaṃcayaḥ 
tṛtīye tūdakaṃ kṛtvā caturthe śrāddham ācaret  iti 
kuṣṭyādes tu vyādhigṛhītasya iṣyata eva 
yathoktaṃ luptaceṣṭasya 
gṛhasthāvasthāyām api
mahāprasthānagamanā vṛthā necchanti jīvitum 
luptaceṣṭaś cocyate yaḥ śaucādiṣv asamarthaḥ saṃdhyopāsanādiṣu ca 
aparikṣīṇaśarīro vā sādayed yas tv ātmānam aluptaceṣṭo vā 
atas tadviparītasyānujñānaṃ bhavati 
smṛtyantareṣv anyeṣām apy udakakriyāniṣedho vihitaḥ 
yathoktam 
rājabhir nihatānāṃ ca śṛṅgidaṃṣṭrisarīsṛpaiḥ 
ātmanas tyāgināṃ caiva śrāddham eṣāṃ na kalpayet 
udakaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ ca pretebhyo yac ca dīyate 
nopatiṣṭhanti tat sarvam antarikṣe vinaśyati 
nārāyaṇabaliḥ kāryo lokagarhābhayān naraiḥ 
tasmād ebhyo 'pi dātavyam annam eva sadakṣiṇam 
tathānyatra 
caṇḍālād udakāt sarpād brāhmaṇād vaidyutād api 
daṃṣṭribhyaś ca paśubhyaś ca maraṇam pākakarmaṇām 
tathā coktam 
nṛṇāṃ caivāgnidānāṃ ca snānālaṃkārakāriṇām 
taptakṛcchradvaye śuddhir aśrupāte 'nuyāyinām 
tenoddiṣṭaṃ na caivanyaiḥ kāryam asyaurdhvadehikam 
na ca nāmāpi kartavyaṃ tadvaṃśasya tadīyakam 
atyantanarakasthasya tasya pāpīyaso 'dhikam 
kāraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ nāma sarvaṃ caiva bhayāvaham 
saṃvartena āsv eva kriyāsu sāntapanam āmnātam parāśareṇa taptakṛcchram vasiṣṭhena taptakṛccharasahitaṃ cāndrāyaṇam 
tatrāpūrvādiviśeṣā upekṣyāḥ 
yad uktam caṇḍālad udakāt ityādy upakramya maraṇaṃ pāpakarmaṇām iti tatredaṃ saṃdihyate 
kiṃ yaś cāṇḍāladir buddhipūrvam ātmānaṃ ghātayati tasyāyaṃ vidhir aurdhvadehikākaraṇam tatkaraṇe ca prāyaścittam uta pramādahastasyānicchata iti 
kutaḥ saṃdehaḥ 
iha gautamena prāyānāśakaśastrāgniviṣodakodbandhanaprapatanaiś cecchatām ity uktam 
iha cāviśeṣeṇa śrutam caṇḍālād udakāt iti 
tatra smṛtyantareṇaikaśāstratvād udakād ity atra tāvad avaśyam icchatām iti saṃbadhyate 
sāhacaryād anyatrāpi tathaivety āśaṅkā jāyate 
kiṃ ca pāpakarmaṇām iti śrūyate 
pāpaṃ ca karma pratiṣiddham 
atra pratiṣiddhaṃ yo 'nutiṣṭhati sa pāpakarmety upapadyate 
anuṣṭhātṛtvaṃ ca svavyāpāreṇa paraprayoktṛtayā ca 
tatra na vaidyutadaṃṣṭriśṛṅgyādayaḥ 
te ca na prayujyante 
nāpi te śvabhrodakakhaḍgādisthānīyāḥ 
yena tadupādānenātmānaṃ ghnan svatantraḥ kartā syāt 
kiṃ tarhi yasyedṛśaṃ maraṇam upanataṃ sa pūrvajanmani kṛtapāpaka iti śāstreṇa jñāpyate 
yathā śyāvadantaprabhṛtayaḥ 
tatrāpi kim etena jñāpitena 
aṅgahīnādīnāṃ pūrvapāpasaṃbandhitvaṃ jñāpyate 
prāyaścittam anuṣṭheyaṃ yathā vasiṣṭhenoktam 
kasyacit kṛcchradvayacaraṇaṃ kasyacid abhyadhikam api 
iha mṛtyunā saṃbandhikārasyāpahṛtatvān nārtho 'nena 
yadi vāsau kṛtapātaka ity avasīyate 
tena saha yena kenacit yaunamaukhasrauvāḥ saṃbandhāḥ kṛtāḥ so 'pi pāpakārī syāt 
na caivaṃ śiṣṭānām ācāraḥ 
na hi tādṛśena saṃbandhaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kenacid vicikitsyante 
prāyaścittaṃ nācaranti 
ata icchatām anumīyate 
ye tu gobrāhmaṇahatānām iti smṛtyantare paṭhitvā ātmanas tyāginām iti pṛthak paṭhanti tena viśeṣapakṣaḥ pratibhāti 
ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ punar atra yuktam 
icchatām iti 
kutaḥ 
pāpakarmavacanāt 
svecchayā yaś cātmavyāpattihetau vyāpāre pravartate tena tasmād u ha na purāyuṣaḥ svaḥ kāmī preyāt iti śāstram atikrāntaṃ bhavati 
sa ca yuktaḥ pāpakarmeti vyapadeṣṭum 
nanu coktaṃ na hi te khaḍgādisthānīyāḥ yenecchayā vadhopapattiḥ 
ucyate 
yaḥ pramādaṃ na rakṣati tena tat kṛtam eveti 
tena yaś cāṇḍāladasyubhūyiṣṭhe 'raṇya ekākī gacchati tasya yady api caṇḍālā māṃ ghnantv itīcchā na bhavati tathāpi tatsamarthācareṇena pramādasyāparihṛtatvād bhavaty eva śāstrātikramaḥ 
evaṃ yo bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ tarati saṃdigdhāṃ vā nāvam adhirohaty akuśalakarṇadhārādhiṣṭhitām evaṃ tasya vyāpadyamānasya vegakṣayeṇa nauparivartanādinā vā yuktaiva pāpakāritā 
tathā cāgādhatāṃ daṇḍādinā grāhamakarasaṃgaṃ cājñātvā snātāro yady apahriyeran na duṣyeyuḥ 
evaṃ yas tu dṛḍhabandhanāṃ tanvaritrāṃ tariṃ tīvrāmbhasi kuśalāvahitasamarthaprerakapreryamāṇām adhirūḍhaḥ sahasotpatite javini pavane cakravātena picchalam avāptavān plavavyāptyā mriyeta na śāstram atikramet 
evaṃ sarpopahataṃ deśaṃ ca apariharan daṣṭo vyāpadyeta pratyaveyād eva nānyathā 
evaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāṃ gāṃ hastinaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā dūram anapakrāmato hanyamānasya yukto 'trikramaḥ 
evam araṇye varṣāsūccarantīṣu vidyutsu grāmanagaryor apraveśe duṣṭataiva 
grāmasthasyopari kathaṃcid vidyutpātaḥ syāt tadā na kiṃcid aparādhyati 
ato yuktam idṛśaṃ yathāvihitakriyākaraṇam 
tatra codakakriyāniṣedhaḥ sarvaurdhvadehikapradarśanārthaḥ smṛtyantare 'syodāhṛtatvāt 
pāṣaṇḍam āśritānāṃ ca carantīnāṃ ca kāmataḥ 
garbhabhartṛdruhāṃ caiva surāpīnāṃ ca yoṣitām 
śāstraparityāgena bāhyadarśanāśrayaṃ naraśiraḥkapālaraktāmbarādidhāraṇaṃ pāṣaṇḍam tadāśritāḥ kṛtatalliṅgparigrahāḥ taddarśanavaśavartinyaḥ 
carantīnāṃ ca kāmataḥ 
tadācārakulasthitityāgenecchāmātrānuvṛttyaikānekaparapuruṣasaṃprayogaḥ kāmacāraḥ 
bhartur viṣagarādidānena garbhasya ca pātanaṃ drohaḥ 
surāpyaḥ yathāpratiṣedhaṃ pratiṣiddhāyāḥ pātena 
atra kaścid āha brāhmaṇo na pibet surām iti saty api jātyarthāviśeṣe liṅgāt puṃsa eva brāhmaṇasya pratiṣedho na striyā iti 
yady api strīpuṃsayor ekā jātis tathāpi strītvapuṃstvaliṅge bhidyete 
iha ca brāhmaṇa iti puṃlliṅgasya śabdasya śravaṇād aśrutāyāḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
