yadi yathāśrutaṃ tṛtīyo bhāgaḥ samāśriyeta yac ca tapasi ṛddhe iti tatrāpi kālāpekṣā yuktaiva 
na jñāyate kiyatā tapasā ṛddhir bhavati 
ataḥ kālaparicchedo na vacanārhaḥ 
uktam atra na śatavarṣāpekṣayā tṛtīyāyur bhāganiścayaḥ saṃbhavati 
uktaś ca kālaḥ kāyapāke pravrajyā pratipattavyā 
yāvatā tapasā yāvati ca vayasi punar madavṛddhir nāśaṅkyate tadā parivrajet 
vihṛtyāsitvā yathoktaṃ vidhim anuṣṭhāyeti yāvat 
saṅgatyāgaś ca mamatāparigrahaḥ ekārāmatā 
āśramād āśramaṃ gatvā hutahomo jitendriyaḥ 
bhikṣābalipariśrāntaḥ pravrajan pretya vardhate 
samuccayapakṣaṃ upodbalayati 
āśramād āśramam iti 
gṛhasthāśramād vānaprasthāśramaṃ gatvā hutahoma ubhayor apy āśramayor yadā jitendiryas tadā parivrajet 
pretya vardhate mṛtvā vibhūtyatiśayaṃ prāpnoti 
bhikṣābalidānena pariśrāntaḥ ciram 
āśramadharmānuvādo 'yam 
ṛṇāni trīṇy apākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet 
anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajaty adhaḥ 
apākaraṇam ṛṇasaṃśuddhiḥ 
mano mokṣe neveśayet 
mokṣaśabdena pravrajyāśramo lakṣyate 
tatra prādhānyena mokṣaikaphalatocyate 
na tathānyeṣv āśrameṣu 
tato mokṣaḥ parivrājyā 
kāni punas tāni trīṇi ṛṇāny ata āha 
adhītya vidhivad vedān putrāṃś cotpādya dharmataḥ
iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñair mano mokṣe niveśayet 
tribhir ṛṇair ṛṇavā jāyate yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ svādhyāyenarṣibhyaḥ iti śrutyanuvādinī smṛtir iyam 
nanu ca gṛhī bhūtvā pravrajet 
atha vetarathā brahmacaryād eva pravrajet iti jābālaśrutiḥ 
ucyate 
utpattimātram āśrityoktam udāharati 
tatredaṃ virudhyate anutpādya tathā prajām iti 
yady eṣā śrutir asti kiṃ tarhi 
idam ucyate 
pratyakṣavidhānād gārhasthyasya iti 
pravrajet iti tena tu pravrajitenemāni karmāṇi kartavyāny anayā vetikartavyatayety etan nāsti 
gṛhasthasya tv agnihotrādīni sāṅgakalapāny āmnātānīty etadabhiprāyam etat 
ye tv etāṃ śrutim adṛṣṭvā smārtā eva naiṣṭhikādayas te ca gṛhasthāśrameṇa pratyakṣaśrutividhānena bādhyante 
ye ca klībādyanadhikṛtaviṣayatayā smṛtivākyānām arthavattāṃ varṇayanti teṣām abhiprāyaṃ na vidmaḥ 
yadi tāvad ājyāvekṣaṇaviṣṇukramādyaṅgāśaktau śrauteṣu nādhikriyate yatas tathāvidhāṅgayuktaṃ karma yaḥ saṃpādayituṃ samarthas taṃ praty adhikāraśrutīnāṃ arthavattve jāte na tad asamartham api kurvīteti 
yady evaṃ smārtheṣv api naiṣṭhikasya gurvartham udakumbhādyāharaṇaṃ bhaikṣaparicaraṇam pārivrājye 'pi na dvitīyām api rātriṃ grāme vaset iti kutaḥ paṅgvadhayoḥ smārtakarmakramādhikāraḥ 
upanayanaṃ caiṣām asti liṅgam 
tata eṣāṃ vivāhārthanaṃ yady arthitā tu dāraiḥ iti 
yady apy upanayanam ādityadarśanam agnipradakṣiṇaṃ parītyeti ca vihitam yato nānupanītasya vivāhasaṃbhavo vrātyatvāt ato yāvac chakyaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ viguṇam api brahmacaryam evam asti 
klībasya tu prakṛter anupaneyataiva 
sa ca pitataś ca na kvacid adhikṛtaḥ 
tasmād anadhikṛtaviṣayaṃ pārivrājyaṃ naiṣṭhikatā ceti na manaḥ paritoṣam ādadhāti 
satyam uditahomanindāvad bhaviṣyati 
samuccayapakṣam āśritya anapākṛtya iti nindāvacanam na punaḥ pratiṣedha eva 
atha vā yadākṛtadāraparigrahasya pravrajyāyām adhikāra ity evam etan neyam 
anadhītya dvijo vedān anutpādya tathā prajām 
aniṣṭvā caiva yajñaiś ca mokṣam icchan vrajaty adhaḥ 
yajñair āhitāgnir nityaiḥ paśusomaiḥ 
prājāpatyāṃ nirūpyeṣṭiṃ sarvavedasadakṣiṇām 
ātmany agnīnt samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajed gṛhāt 
prājāpatyā adhvaryuvede vihitā 
tasyāṃ ca sarvasvadānam vihitam 
tāṃ kṛtvātmany agnayaḥ samāropyante 
samāropaṇe 'pi vidhis tata evāvagantavyaḥ 
sārvavedasaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāstīty anyapadārthaḥ 
vedo dhanam tat sarvaṃ deyam 
idam arthe vihitaḥ svārthiko va prajñāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt 
anye tu puruṣamedhaṃ prājāpatyām iṣṭim āhuḥ 
tatra brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabhate iti prathamaḥ paśuḥ brahmā ca prajāpatiḥ mukhyena vyapadeśapravṛtteḥ prājāpatyaḥ puruṣamedhaḥ 
sarvasvadānam agnisamāropaṇaṃ pravrajyā ca tatraiv vihitā 
evaṃ hi tatra śrutiḥ athātmany agnīnt samāropya tatrāropaṇenādityopasthānād apekṣamāṇair araṇyam abhipretāt tadaiva devamanuṣyebhyaḥ sthiro bhavati iti 
yat tv ātmany agnīnt samāropya pravrajyayā vyapadiṣṭā athāha eta eva ātmano yajñā ity atas tanmaraṇāt tasyai dattā ātmany eva samāropitā bhavanti 
ato bhāryāmaraṇapakṣe pravrajyā nāvaśyaṃ punar dārakriyā iti tan na 
kiṃ tu tasyāḥ pūrvamaraṇe bhāryāyai datvāgnīn antyakarmaṇīti paṭhitam iti vaktavyam iti 
pauruṣeyo hy ayaṃ grantho na vedaḥ yenoktam upālabhemahīti parihāraḥ syāt 
yo dattvā sarvabhūtebhyaḥ pravrajaty abhayaṃ gṛhāt 
tasya tejomayā lokā bhavanti brahmavādinaḥ 
gārhasthyanindayā caturthāśramapraśaṃsā 
yajñe hi paśavo hanyante 
prarohadharmakāś cetanāḥ iti darśane tṛṇauṣadhīnāṃ cheda ity etad bhūtabhayam 
tad gṛhāt pravrajitasya samāropitāgner nāstīty uktam 
abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo datveti 
anenāśuṣkāṇāṃ tṛṇapalāśānām anupādānam āha 
tejomayā nityaprakāśā 
udayāstamayau yatrādityasya na vibhāvyete 
yathoktam ata ūrdhvam ādityo naivodeti na vāstam eti ity upaniṣatsv ity evam āhur vacāṃsi 
yasmād aṇv api bhūtānāṃ dvijān notpadyate bhayam 
tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaścana 
eṣa evārthaḥ punar uktaḥ 
dehād vimuktasya vārtamānikaṃ śarīraṃ yasya patatīty arthaḥ 
āgārād abhiniṣkrāntaḥ pavitropacito muniḥ 
samupoḍheṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet 
pavitrair mantrajapair darbhakamaṇḍalukṛṣṇājinair upacito yuktaḥ 
atha vā pāvanaiḥ kṛcchraiḥ 
munir akiṃcidvādī 
samupoḍheṣu upahṛteṣu kenacit kāmeṣu spṛhaṇīyeṣu mṛṣṭabhojanādiṣu yadṛcchāto gītādiśabdeṣu saṃnihiteṣu putrādiṣu vā samupasthiteṣu nirapekṣo bhavet 
naitāṃś ciraṃ snigdhena cakṣuṣā paśyen nākarṇayen na taiḥ sahāsīta 
yata āha 
eka eva caren nityaṃ siddhyartham asahāyavān 
siddham ekasya saṃpaśyan na jahāti na hīyate 
ekarāmatānena vidhīyate 
eka evety anena pūrvasaṃstutaparityāga ucyate 
asahāyavān iti bhṛtyādeḥ pūrvasyāpi parigraho na kartavyaḥ 
saṃvidrāgadveṣavinirmuktasya sarvasamatā evaṃ bhavati 
anyathā eṣa eva bhṛtyādir antikasthaḥ tatraivaṃ buddhiḥ syāt ayaṃ madīyo nāyam iti 
eṣa eva saṅgo 'vadhihetur yathā tv eṣa saṃpatsyate yadā na jahāti na kvacit putrādis tena tyakto bhavati 
ato na hīyate na viyujyate putrādibhis tadviyogaduḥkhaṃ nāsādayati 
itarathā saṅgāt punas tyāge mahad duḥkham 
na tasya kaścin mriyate sa na kasyacid iti 
anagnir aniketaḥ syād grāmam annārtham āśrayet 
upekṣako 'sāṃcayiko munir bhāvasamāhitaḥ 
śrautānām agnīnāṃ pūrvam abhāva ukto 'nena gārhasthyasyocyate 
atha vā pākapratiṣedho 'yam agnyarthasya cendhanasya śītādinivṛttiprayojanasya 
niketo gṛham 
grāmam ekāṃ rātrim annārtham āśrayet 
kṛtaprayojano 'raṇye śeṣaṃ kālam 
eṣā caikarātrir grāme gautamenokā 
tatra yadi samayā grāmaṃ tadānnārtha eva praveśaḥ 
atha dūratas tadaikāṃ rātriṃ vaset 
dvitīyām araṇye saṃbhāvayet 
upekṣakaḥ acetaneṣv api bhāveṣu kamaṇḍalvādiṣu na tan nijāyattaṃ kuryāt 
atha vā śarīrasya vyādhipratīkāraṃ na kuryāt 
anye tv asaṃkasukaḥ iti paṭhanti 
asthiraḥ saṃkusukaḥ tanniṣedhena cittavṛttidhairyam upadiśati 
muniḥ saṃyatavāgindriyaḥ 
bhāvena cittena samāhitaḥ manasā vikalpān varjayet 
bhāvenaiva samāhito na vāṅmātreṇa 
kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlāni kucailam asahāyatā 
samatā caiva sarvasminn etan muktasya lakṣaṇam 
bhikṣābhojanapātraṃ kapālaṃ karparam 
niketo vṛkṣamūlāni 
kucailaṃ sthūlajīrṇavastrakhaṇḍam 
samatā śatrau mitre ubhayarūparahite svātmani ca 
muktasya lakṣaṇam 
aciraprāpyatā mokṣasyocyate na punar iyataiva mukto bhavati 
nābhinandeta maraṇaṃ nābhinandeta jīvitam 
kālam eva pratīkṣeta nirveśaṃ bhṛtako yathā 
anenākleśitābhihitā 
na maraṇaṃ kāmayeta 
nāpi jñānātiśayalābhārthī jīvitam 
kālam eva pratīkṣeta 
yad yadā bhaviṣyati tat tadaivāstu iti cintayet 
yathā bhṛtako nirveśam 
bhṛtiṃ gṛhītvā kālaṃ paripālayati ahar etasya mayā kartavyam iti nāntarā vicchede mūlyalābhaḥ evaṃ saṃsārakṣayāc charīrapāte mokṣo bhavaty etena vidhinā na svecchāvṛttena 
dṛṣṭipūtaṃ nyaset pādaṃ vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ pibet 
satyapūtāṃ vaded vācaṃ manaḥpūtaṃ samācaret 
cakṣuṣā mārgaṃ nirūpya yasmin pradeśe prāṇinaḥ pīḍāṃ na gacchanti tatra pādaṃ nidadhyāt 
satyāṃ vācaṃ vaded iti siddhe pūtagrahaṇaṃ satyaśabdasyopalakṣaṇatām darśayati 
tenāpaviddhaṃ bhavati 
manasā pūto manaḥpūtaḥ sadā syāt 
paradravābhidhyānādi na kuryāt 
ativādāṃs titikṣeta nāvamanyeta kaṃcana 
na cemaṃ deham āśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kenacit 
śāstram atikramya yaḥ kaścid vadati so 'tivādaḥ apriyākrośaḥ 
titikṣeta kṣameta na pratyākrośet 
na ca manasā krudhyetety ato vakṣyati ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet iti 
anena manasaḥ kṣobho vinivāryate na kuśalaśabdābhidhānaṃ vidhīyate 
tadā hi mithyāvādī syād anyad dhṛdaye 'nyat tu vācā vadan 
nāvamanyeteti 
avajñānaṃ na kasyacit kuryāt 
gurvādipūjanaṃ nātikrāmet 
na cemaṃ deham yadi kaścit praharec charīre tena saha vairaṃ kuryāt 
kim anena me śarīreṇa naṣṭenānaṣṭena vā tejomayaṃ me śarīraṃ bhavatu iti dhyāyet 
krudhyantaṃ na pratikruddhed ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet 
saptadvārāvakīrṇāṃ ca na vācam anṛtāṃ vadet 
saptadvārāṇi ca dharmārthau dharmakāmāv arthakāmau kāmārthau kāmadharmau arthadharmau trivarga iti 
atra avakīrṇāṃ vikṣiptām etadviṣayāṃ na vācaṃ vaded anṛtām 
bhedāśrayatvād eteṣām bhedasya sarvasyāsatyatvād anṛtām ity uktam 
kiṃ tarhi mokṣāśrayām eva vadet 
atha vā sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇās te vāco dvārāṇi 
atha vā ṣaḍ indriyāṇi buddhiḥ saptamī 
etair gṛhīteṣv artheṣu vāk pravartate 
subvibhaktaya ity anye 
adhyātmaratir āsīno nirapekṣo nirāmiṣaḥ 
ātmanaiva sahāyena sukhārthī vicared iha 
ātmatatvapratividhānāpādānaparam ekāgratvam adhyātmam 
tadratis tadarthacintāpara āsīta 
nirapekṣa ity uktānuvādo viṣayāny ebhyo dharmebhyo 'nuṣṭhānārthaḥ 
nirāmiṣo niḥspṛhaḥ 
māṃsam āmiṣam tena spṛhāṃ lakṣayitvā pratiṣedhas tatrātiśayavatī prāṇināṃ spṛhā 
anyat prāg uktam eva 
na cotpātanimittābhyāṃ na nakṣatrāṅgavidyayā 
nānuśāsanavādābhyāṃ bhikṣāṃ lipseta karhicit 
utpātā divyāntarikṣabhaumā uparāgagrahodayaketūdayadigdāhāvanicalanādayaḥ tatphalaṃ na kathayed bhikṣālipsayā 
nimittaṃ gṛhadausthityādi 
nakṣatravidyā adya kṛttikākarmaṇyāyātrānakṣatram ityādi 
aṅgavidyā hastalekhyādilakṣaṇam 
anuśāsanaṃ rājñas tatprakṛtīnām evaṃ yuktaṃ vartitum etena saṃdhir anena vigrahaḥ idaṃ tvayā kim iti kṛtam idaṃ kiṃ na karoṣīti 
vādo 'bhimānahetukaḥ śāstrārthavipratipattau sādhanadūṣaṇādyupanyāsaḥ 
na tāpasair brāhmaṇair vā vayobhir api vā śvabhiḥ 
ākīrṇaṃ bhikṣukair vānyair āgāram upasaṃvrajet 
ākīrṇam 
yatra bahavo 'nnalābhāya saṃghaṭitās taṃ pradeśaṃ bhikṣārthaṃ varjayet 
kḷptakeśanakhaśmaśruḥ pātrī daṇḍī kusumbhavān 
vicaren niyato nityaṃ sarvabhūtāny apīḍayan 
pātrāṇi vakṣyati 
daṇḍās trayaḥ 
tridaṇḍī hi saḥ 
kusumbhaḥ kamaṇḍaluḥ na mahārajanam 
uttaraślokārdhasyārthaḥ prāg vihita eva 
ataijasāni pātrāṇi tasya syur nirvraṇāni ca 
teṣām adbhiḥ smṛtaṃ śaucaṃ camasānām ivādhvare 
ataijasāni suvarṇādyaghaṭitāni pātrāṇi bhikṣāyā jalasya ca 
nirvraṇāny acchidrāṇi 
adbhir ammātreṇa camasānām iva nirlepatve 
lepasaṃbhave tu tadapanayo 'pi dravyāntareṇa kārya iti grāhyam 
alābuṃ dārupātraṃ ca mṛnmayaṃ vaidalaṃ tathā 
etāni yatipātrāṇi manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt 
vaidalaṃ vaṃśādividalakṛtam 
yatipātrāṇi bhikṣārthaṃ jalārthaṃ ca 
ekakālaṃ cared bhaikṣaṃ na prajjeta vistare 
bhaikṣe prasakto hi yatir viṣayeṣv api sajjati 
bhaikṣakāryasya bhojanasyaikakālatā vidhīyate na punar bhaikṣacaraṇasyaiva 
dvirbhojanapratiṣedho 'trābhisaṃhitaḥ 
tatra sakṛc caritvā dvitīyasmin kāle śeṣayitvā na bhuñjīta tadartho bhojanapratiṣedhaḥ 
ata evāha na prajajjeta vistara iti 
dvitīyabhojanārthitayā hi vistaraḥ prāpnoti 
ekārāmasya na bhṛtyārthena bhaikṣavistara iti 
hetuṃ bruvan sakṛdbhojane 'pi sauhityaṃ niṣedhati 
vidhūme sannamusale vyaṅgāre bhuktavajjane 
vṛtte śarāvasaṃpāte bhikṣāṃ nityaṃ yatiś caret 
bhuktavanto janā yasmin kāle sa bhuktavajjanaḥ evaṃ vidhūmādayo 'pi 
śarāvāṇāṃ saṃpāta ucchiṣṭānāṃ bhūmau tyāgaḥ sa yadātīto bhavati 
sarveṇaitena prathame pākakāle bhikṣādānāvasaro nivṛtto yadā bhavati tadā bhikṣitavyam ity āha 
vidhūma ityādinā dvitīyapākapravṛttim āha 
sannā musalā avaghātān nivṛttāḥ sthāpitāḥ 
alābhe na viṣādī syāl lābhe caiva na harṣayet 
prāṇayātrikamātraḥ syān mātrāsaṅgād vinirgataḥ 
īdṛśe kāle yadi kutaścin na labhyate tadā viṣādaś cittaparikhedo na grahītavyaḥ 
lābhālābhayor harṣaviṣādau na grāhyau 
prāṇayātrikī prāṇadhāraṇārthā mātrā parimāṇaṃ bhaikṣasya 
anenaitad darśayati 
bhaikṣāsaṃbhave prāṇayātrā phalamulodakādibhir apy aparigṛhītaiḥ kartavyā 
mātrā pātradaṇḍādi tatra saṅgaḥ prayatnenopārjanam tato vinirgato nivṛttaḥ 
akāma iti yāvat 
abhipūjitalābhāṃs tu jugupsetaiva sarvaśaḥ 
abhipūjitalābhaiś ca yatir mukto 'pi badhyate 
abhyarcya yaṃ dadāti so 'bhipūjitalābhaḥ 
taṃ jugupseteti ninded garheta 
ataś ca ninditaṃ na samācaret 
sarvaśaḥ sarvakālam 
ekam apy ahas tādṛśaṃ bhaikṣaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt 
uttare 'rthavādaḥ 
na hi muktasya bandhasaṃbhavaḥ 
alpānnābhyavahāreṇa rahaḥsthānāsanena ca 
hriyamāṇāni viṣayair indriyāṇi nivartayet 
raho nirjano deśaḥ tatra sthānāsane kartavye 
ekārāmatāyāḥ phalam indriyajayo 'nena pradarśyate 
atha vā niṣkutūhalatānenocyate 
yatra bahavo janasaṃghātāḥ strīpuṃsātmakā vicitrābharaṇā dṛśyante na tatra kṣaṇam api tiṣṭhet 
indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena rāgadveṣakṣayeṇa ca 
ahiṃsayā ca bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate 
nirodhaḥ svaviṣayapravṛttipratibandhaḥ 
amṛtatvāya kalpate amṛtatvāya samartho yogyo bhavatīty arthaḥ 
yathā ātmajñānam evam etad apīti darśayati 
avekṣeta gatīr nṝṇāṃ karmadoṣasamudbhavāḥ 
niraye caiva patanaṃ yātanāś ca yamakṣaye 
paramārthabhāvanāprasaṃkhyānam idam ucyate duḥkhātmakasaṃsārasvarūpanirūpaṇam 
kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ pravrajābhaikṣacaryādiśarīrakleśaṃ suhṛtsvajanaputradāradhanavibhavatyāgaduḥkhahetuṃ pariṇamayya virodhataḥ svacchandataś cāviguṇam anuṣṭhāsyati 
manuṣyāṇāṃ gatayo duḥkhabahulāḥ karmadoṣebhyaḥ pratiṣiddhasevanebhyo hiṃsāsteyapāradāryapāruṣyapaiśunāniṣṭasaṃkalpādibhyaḥ samudbhanti 
ihaiva jīvaloke dāridravyādhiparibhavād vā vaikalyādayo gatayaḥ phalopabhogādayaḥ 
amutra niraye narake patanaṃ mūtrapurīṣādyamedhyasthāne kṛmikīṭādijanma 
yamagṛhe ca yātanāḥ kumbhīpākādayaḥ 
tathedam aparam avekṣyam 
viprayogaṃ priyaiś caiva saṃyogaṃ ca tathāpriyaiḥ 
jarayā cābhibhavanaṃ vyādhibhiś copapīḍanam 
avekṣeteti kriyāpadasaṃbhavāt dvitīyā 
priyāḥ putrādayo bāndhavās tair viyogo 'prāptakāle mṛtaiḥ 
apriyaiḥ śatrubhiḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃgrāmādibhiḥ saṃyogaḥ 
jarayā 
caturthe vayasy avasthāviśeṣo jarā tayābhibhavanaṃ śarīrākāranāśaḥ aśaktiḥ indriyavaikalyam kāsaśvāsādivyādhibāhulyam sarveṣām akāmyatā upahāsyatetyādibhir jarābhibhavaḥ 
vyādhibhiḥ prāg api jarasa upapīḍanaṃ keṣāṃcit 
atha mahatī tṛṣṇā evaṃsthitasyāpi bhavati 
evaṃ tarhi idam apratīkāram anicchato 'py utpadyate 
dehād utkramaṇaṃ cāsmāt punar garbhe ca saṃbhavam 
yonikoṭisahasreṣu sṛtīś cāsyāntarātmanaḥ 
prāṇānām utkramaṇam antarvicchedaḥ 
duḥsahā ca sā pīḍā 
garbhe ca saṃbhavaḥ 
tatra nānāvidhaṃ dukhaṃ indriyāṇām anudbhedāt tamorūpatā kukṣisthasya mātṛsaṃbandhināhāreṇa atiśītoṣṇena hīnātimātreṇa vaidyoktā pīḍā 
yonikoṭisahasreṣu sṛtīḥ saraṇāni prāptās tiryakpretakṛmikīṭapataṅgaśvādyāḥ kṣetrajñasya 
nanu ca vibhur antarātmeṣyate nityaś ca 
tasya sakalajagadvyāpinaḥ kuta utkramaṇam kva ca yonisaraṇam 
saṃbhavo'pari garbhe nityasyānupapannaḥ 
ucyate 
asti keṣāṃcid darśanaṃ yathāyam antaḥśarīram aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣas tiṣṭhati tanmātramanobuddhyahaṃkārātmakaḥ sa yāvatsaṃsāram eti dharmaḥ tasya copacitasya caitanyaśaktir āvirbhavati 
atas tadīyadharmā antarātmana upacaryante 
atha vā tasya bhāvārthā ye prāṇādayas teṣūtkrāmatsu samutkrāmatīty ucyate 
evaṃ saṃbhavo 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ 
punaś caitad dvādaśe vakṣyāmaḥ 
kiṃ bahunā 
adharmaprabhavaṃ caiva duḥkhayogaṃ śarīriṇām 
dharmārthaprabhavaṃ caiva sukhasaṃyogam akṣayam 
adharmāt prabhava utpattiḥ 
duḥkhena yo yogaḥ pīḍānubhavaḥ 
dharma uktalakṣaṇo yaḥ padārthaḥ tataḥ sukhenākṣayena saṃyogaḥ 
etad apy avekṣyam 
pārivrājyaṃ ca mukhyo dharma ity abhiprāyaḥ 
sūkṣmatāṃ cānvavekṣeta yogena paramātmanaḥ 
deheṣu caivopapattim uttameṣv adhameṣu ca 
yogaś cittavṛttisthairyaṃ yathā patañjalinā darśitam 
tenātmanaḥ kṣetrajñasya sūkṣmatām anvavekṣeta 
śarīrādau prāṇādau vā nātmabuddhiḥ kartavyā kiṃ tarhi yogajena jñānātiśayena sarvebhya etebhyo 'ntarbahistattvebhyo vyatirikto boddhavya ity evaṃparam etat 
na tu sthūlādivikalpā ātmanaḥ santi 
yathā cottameṣu devādiśarīreṣv asyopapattiḥ śarīrādhiṣṭhātṛtayā phalopabhogaḥ sarvagatasyāpi sataḥ evam adhameṣu tiryakpretapiśācādiṣu 
ekatvapakṣe paramātmavibhūtaya eva kṣetrajñā iti sthitiḥ 
ataḥ paramātmano gatīr anvavekṣetety uktam 
bhūṣito 'pi cared dharmaṃ yatra tatrāśrame rataḥ 
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu na liṅgaṃ dharmakāraṇam 
bhūṣitaḥ kusumakaṭakādyābharaṇaiḥ 
dharmaḥ parivrājakasya yad vihitam ātmopāsanādi tad yatnataś caret 
yasminn āśrame yo vihitas taṃ caret 
na tridaṇḍādiliṅgadhāraṇamātrād yatim ātmānaṃ manyeta 
api tu samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu syāt 
rāgadveṣalobhān yatnataḥ parihared iti tātparyam 
na liṅgatyāgena bhūṣaṇābhyanujñānam 
phalaṃ katakavṛkṣasya yady apy ambuprasādakam 
na nāmagrahaṇād eva tasya vāri prasīdati 
kaluṣitam udakaṃ katakavṛkṣaphale nikṣipte prasīdati svacchaśuddharūpatām āpdyate 
kiṃ tu na tasya phalasya nāmagrahaṇena tan nirmalībhavati 
api tv anuṣṭhānam apekṣate 
evaṃ liṅgadhāraṇaṃ phalanāmasthānīyam 
na tāvanmātrāt siddhir yāvad ekārāmatopāsanasarvasamatādidharmo nānuṣṭhitaḥ 
pūrvaśeṣārthavādaḥ 
saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jantūnāṃ rātrāv ahani vā sadā 
śarīrasyātyaye caiva samīkṣya vasudhāṃ caret 
yad uktam dṛṣṭipūtaṃ nyaset iti tasya prayojanapradarśanaśloko 'yam 
śarīrasyātyaye 'pi śarīrapīḍāyām api satyāṃ rātrāv ahani vā tṛṇāstaraṇe śayanārtham āstīrṇe 'pi śarīraniṣaṅgo 'navekṣyādṛṣṭvā na kartavyaḥ 
asmin vyatikrame prāyaścittam 
atha vātyantasūkṣmāḥ kecana kṣudrajantavo ye sarve śarīrāvayavasaṃvalanamātreṇaiva naśyanti tadartham idam 
ahnā rātryā ca yāñ jantūn hinasty ajñānato yatiḥ 
teṣāṃ snātvā viśuddhyarthaṃ prāṇāyāmān ṣaḍ ācaret 
jantūn kṣudrajantūn iti draṣṭavyam 
teṣāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ yat pāpaṃ tadviśuddhyartham iti saṃbandhaḥ 
prāṇāyāmā brāhmaṇasya trayo 'pi vidhivat kṛtāḥ 
vyāhṛtipraṇavair yuktā vijñeyaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ 
brāhmaṇaśabdena jātidharmatām āha 
na parivrājakasyaiva vidhir ayam 
trayo 'pi 
tribhya ūrdhvaṃ phalādhikyam trayas tv avaśaṃ kartavyāḥ 
vyāhṛtayaḥ oṃkārapūrvikāḥ ity atra yā uktāḥ 
praṇava oṃkāraḥ 
tair yuktāḥ 
prāṇāyāmakāla etad dhyātavyam 
ete trividhāḥ kumbhakarecakapūrakākhyāḥ 
tatra ca mukhyasya nāsikyasya ca vāyor bahir niṣkramaṇanirodhena kumbhakapūrakākhyāḥ anucchvāsato bahir nairantaryeṇa vāyor utsargeṇa recako bhavati 
avadhir dvitīyādhyāye nidarśitaḥ 
yadi vā tapasā punar yāvatā kālena na pīḍopajāyate 
dahyante dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malāḥ 
tathendriyānāṃ dahyante doṣāḥ prāṇasya nigrahāt 
dhātavaḥ suvarṇādayaḥ teṣāṃ dhmāyamānānāṃ suvarṇam evāvaśiṣyate 
tathendriyāṇāṃ viṣayadarśane yau prītiparitapau jāyete tayor yat pāpaṃ tasya dāhaḥ prāṇanirodhāt 
prītiparitāpotpattir mumukṣor niṣiddhā 
sā tu śarīriṇaḥ tyaktasaṅgasyāpi yādṛcchikarūpaśabdādyupanatau kayācin mātrayā vastusāmarthyena niyatendriyasyāpy upajāyate 
atas taddoṣanivṛttyarthāḥ prāṇāyāmāḥ 
prāṇāyāmair dahed doṣān dhāraṇābhiś ca kilbiṣam 
pratyāhāreṇa saṃsargān dhyānenānīśvarān guṇān 
prāṇāyāmair ity etat pūrvaślokena darśitam 
apare tv āhuḥ 
doṣā rāgādayas tān dahet 
katham prāṇāyāmair dagdhum ete śakyante 
yuktaḥ pāpasya tair dāhaḥ 
adṛṣṭā ca tasyotpattiḥ śāstralakṣaṇam tathā nivṛttir api 
rāgādayas tu pratyakṣavedyāḥ 
teṣāṃ ca nivartyanivartakabhāvaḥ pratyakṣādivedya eva yukto bhavitum na śāstrīyaḥ 
yadi śāstram evaṃ vaded viramaṇaśīlaṃ nivartayed iti kiṃpramāṇaṃ bhavet 
tasmād rāgādinimittam aśubhācaraṇaṃ doṣaśabdenocyate 
tasya kāryadāhād dāhaḥ 
svarūpato hi svarasata eva karmaṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvān nāśaḥ 
eṣa eva ca dāhaḥ na tv anyasyeva bhasmībhāvaḥ 
evaṃ ca pūrvaślokārthānuvādaḥ 
dhāraṇābhiś ca 
nanu ca kilbiṣaṃ pāpaṃ doṣaś ca tad eva tatraitāvad vaktavyaṃ prāṇāyāmair dhāraṇābhiś ca doṣān dahet 
kiṃ kilbiṣam ity anena 
kilbiṣam iti vāstu kiṃ doṣagrahaṇena 
ucyate 
doṣagrahaṇam avaśyaṃ kartavyam viśiṣṭasya pāpasya prāṇāyāmair dāho yathā vijñāyeta na sarvasyeti 
doṣaśabdena hi rāgādaya ucyante 
atas tannimitta eva pāpe upacāro yathoktaḥ 
evaṃ tarhi tad eva kriyatām kiṃ kilbiṣam ity anena 
pādapūraṇārtham ity adoṣaḥ 
tatrotpannasya pāpasya prāṇāyāmā dahanā ucyante 
dhāraṇās tu doṣānutpattim eva kurvanti 
kāḥ punar etā dhāraṇāḥ 
śamayamādibhir niyamād viṣayadarśanābhilāṣeṇa prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ mano dhāryate tatraiva sthāne niyamyate 
tāś ca viṣayagatadoṣabhāvanā asthisthūṇām ityādyāḥ 
kāntilāvaṇyatāruṇyasaṃsthānaśauryādayaḥ strīṣu dṛśyamānā abhilāṣahetavaḥ 
te ca savikalpaṃ pratyakṣagrāhyāḥ 
vikalpāś ca manodhārāḥ 
ato vikalpāntarair mūtrapurīṣapūrṇaṃ nama iti tasmin viṣayagatadoṣabhāve kaṭakakarpaṭānvitaṃ strīdravyaṃ nāma adhikaṃ prāṇino yat pratnataḥ parihartavyam abhilaṣanti yāpy eṣā sukhaleśabhrāntiḥ sā kṣaṇabhaṅginī tadāsevanena ghorā dīrghakālāś ca yamayātanāḥ  ityādibhiḥ śakyante niroddhum 
etad eva tatprasaṃkhyānam ucyate 
evaṃ bhojanādiṣv api bhāvayitavyam 
yad etac charkarāghṛtapūrahaiyaṅgavīnapāyasādi yac ca bhaikṣaṃ kadannādibhiḥ samam etac charīradhāraṇatayā viśeṣābhāvāt kasyacit prakṛter jihvāgre kṣaṇalavamātravartamānasya viśeṣo yaḥ saviśeṣatayā pratibhāseta gandharvanagaraprakhyo 'yaṃ kṣaṇikāvabhāsaḥ iti 
evam anyatrāpi sparśadoṣo bhāvayitavya ity evam upadiśati 
anye tv āhuḥ 
kauṣṭhyasya vāyor mukhanāsikāsaṃcāriṇaḥ śarīraikadeśāntarhṛdayākāśād abhyāsavaśato dhāraṇaṃ dhāraṇā 
nanu ca prāṇāyāmebhya etāsāṃ sādhāraṇānāṃ ko bhedaḥ 
bāhulalāṭādāv api yathecchaṃ vyāhṛtyādidhyānarahitaṃ dhāraṇā prāṇāyāmā recanenādhikriyanta iti viśeṣaḥ 
anye tu maitrī muditā karuṇā upekṣā etā dhāraṇā iti manyante 
maitrī kṛpā mudopekṣā sarvaprāṇiṣv avasthitā 
brahmalokaṃ nayanty āśu dhyātāraṃ dhāraṇās tv imāḥ 
tatra maitrī dveṣābhāvaḥ na tu suhṛtsnehaḥ tasya bandhātmakatvāt 
kṛpā karuṇā cittadharmaḥ duḥkhitajanadarśanena katham ayam asmād duḥkhād uddhriyet iti samuddharaṇakāmanā 
na tv ahiṃsānugrahayor anārambha ity uktam 
ata etad evam ucyate cittadharmo 'yam abhyasitavyaḥ 
muditā śokavyāvṛttir vyādhyādinimitte duḥkhe narakādibhayaje vā na tu harṣaḥ tasya rāgahetutvāt 
upekṣā viṣaye anugrāhakeṣu upaghāte ca prasiddhaiva 
manaso vāntarhṛdayākāśe brahmacintāparatayā niścalatā dhāraṇā 
pratyāhāreṇa saṃsargam 
indriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saha saṃbandhas tatra pravṛttiḥ saṃsargaḥ tan dahet pratyāhāraḥ 
tato 'pasaraṇam indriyāṇāṃ pratibandhakaraṇaṃ vā 
āścaryarūpeṇa na kaṭakādau rūpavatstrīsaṃdarśane vā sthagayitavye cakṣuṣī anyatra vā dṛṣṭir upaneyā 
evaṃ sarvendriyeṣu 
evaṃ ca samādhānaṃ yogino 'pratibaddhaṃ bhavati 
dhyānenānīśvarān guṇān 
guṇānt satvarajastamāṃsi 
te cānīśvarāḥ paratantrāḥ cetanādhīnamūrtayaḥ 
puruṣasyānatasya sukhādirahitasya yo 'bhimāno ahaṃ sukhy ahaṃ duḥkhī iti nirguṇasya guṇamanyatābhimānasya guṇapuruṣavivekadhyānena dagdhavyaḥ 
cidrūpaḥ puruṣo nirguṇo guṇamayī prakṛtiḥ ity evaṃ guṇapuruṣavivekaḥ kartavyaḥ 
sa kathaṃ kartavyaḥ 
dhyānena kiṃ punar dhyeyam ata āha 
uccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu durjñeyām akṛtātmabhiḥ 
dhyānayogena saṃpaśyed gatim asyāntarātmanaḥ 
antarātmā antaryāmī puruṣaḥ tasya gatiḥ svarūpaṃ yathāvad vijñeyam 
sukhaduḥkhābhimāno na kevalaṃ manuṣyajanmani kiṃ tarhi uccāvaceṣu nānāvidheṣu bhūteṣu tiryakpretapiśācādiṣv ahaṃ mameti pratyayo 'vidyākṛto nivartyaḥ 
atha vā katham ayaṃ vibhur antarikṣāj jyāyān divo jyāyan ebhyo lokebhyaḥ sarvakāmaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvasparśaḥ idam abhyasyato vijighatsor vipipāsor evaṃvidhe 'pi sukhe duḥkhe śarīrasya śarīreṣv asarvabhogatayā so 'haṃ nāma  aho karmaṇāṃ māhātmyam yad ayaṃ sarvātmakaḥ svatantraḥ paratantrīkriyate karmabhiḥ naitāni kariṣye duṣṭasvāmisthānīyāni  bhṛtaka iva karmāṇi pratipālayiṣye 
yathā bhṛtakaḥ kaścit svāminaṃ nibandhenārādhayituṃ praviṣṭaḥ san yaṃ manyate yāvad durādharṣa iva no daṇḍaśīlas tarjanāparaḥ paruṣabhāṣī nainaṃ bhūyaḥ paricariṣyāmi yan mayāsmāt kiṃcid bhṛtyādi gṛhītaṃ tad evāsya karmakaraṇena śodhayāmi evaṃ dhyāyann āsīta 
kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalopabhogenāntaṃ yāsyāmi anyāni ca na kariṣyāmi ity evamādi dhyeyam 
tathā kim ete kṣetrajñāḥ paramātmano vibhūtaya uta svatantrāḥ  naivaṃparamātmano 'nyaḥ kaścid asti iti vedāntaniṣevaṇādinā nicitya dhyātavyam 
anye punar āhuḥ 
dhyānaṃ ca yogaś ca dhyānayogam 
tena antarātmanaḥ gatiṃ saṃpaśyen nirūpyopyāsīta gatiṃ dhyānena yogena ca 
atha vā dhyānārtho yogaḥ cittasthair yaṃ tat kṛtvā ātmano gatiṃ saṃpaśyed upāsanābhir anapāyāmṛtādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ vedāntābhihitarūpaṃ niṣkalmaṣam abhimukhīkuryāt 
akṛtā asaṃskṛtāḥ śāstreṇātmāno yais tair na śakyaṃ jñātum 
samyagdarśanasaṃpannaḥ karmabhir na nibadhyate 
darśanena vihīnas tu saṃsāraṃ pratipadyate 
anantarasya vidheḥ phalam āha 
samyagdarśanam anantaroktam ātmano yathārthajñānam tena saṃpannaḥ kṛtasākṣātkāraḥ 
karmabhir na nibadhyate 
saṃsāraṃ nānuvartate 
kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhogena kṣayād anyeṣām akaraṇāt 
na punar anena kevalāt jñānān mokṣa ukto bhavati 
darśanenādhyātmikena vedāntopadiṣṭena yo virahitaḥ kevalakarmakārī sa saṃsāram eti 
ahiṃsayendriyāsaṅgair vaidikaiś caiva karmabhiḥ 
tapasaś caraṇaiś cograiḥ sādayantīha tat padam 
idaṃ tu jñānakarmaṇoḥ samuccayān mokṣa iti ślokadvayaṃ jñāpakam 
pūrveṇa jñānam uktam 
anena karmāṇy ucyante 
kāni punar vaidikāni karmāṇi yeṣāṃ phalaṃ tat padaṃ prāpnotīty ucyate 
yāni tāvat kāmyāni yeṣāṃ svavidhivākye śrutam eva svargādi phalam 
tadvyatirekeṇa phalāntarakalpanāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ 
saṃkīrṇaphalatāśrayaṇaṃ vānarthakaṃ syāt 
tāvatā ca vākyārthasya samāpter vidhyanapekṣitatatpadaprāptilakṣaṇaphalena kathaṃ saṃbandhaḥ 
śrutenaivānvayinā vidhyarthasaṃpanne 'nyat vidhir nāpekṣate 
atrocyate 
asty evātra vākyāntaram yajñena tad āpnoti iti rahasyādhikāre 
tataś ca saṃyogapṛthaktvāt phaladvayaṃ yuktam 
ataś ca sarveṣām eva kāmyānām avicchinnaphalayogitā paramapadaprāptyarthatā ca na virotsyate 
tatra ca yāgadvayena prayogabhedena svargāpavargau bhavataḥ 
na cātra yajñaviśeṣaḥ śruto yena nityānām etat phalaṃ syān na kāmyānām 
athocyeta 
nityeṣv aśrutatvāt phalāvacchedasyāvirodhāt tadviṣayatā yuktā na kāmyeṣu 
tāvataiva yajñenety asya sarvaviṣayatvalābhād iti cet
kim atra phalaśravaṇena 
kartavyatāniṣṭhāni ca vaidikāni vākyāni 
sā ca kartavyatāntareṇa vaidikaṃ phalapadaṃ yāvajjīvādipadair avagamiteti 
tatrāpi phalasaṃbandho nāpekṣita eva 
kalpyamāno 'dhikatvān naikārthyaṃ yāyāt 
ato yajñeneti vākyam apratiṣṭhamānaṃ vivikte viṣaye sarvaṃ yajñaśabdavācyaṃ nityaṃ kāmyaṃ ca gocarayati 
na caitat phalaṃ kāmyānām apavargakāma ity aśrutatvāt 
etad abhiprāyam evoktam kāmātmatā na praśastā iti 
mahābhārate 'pi mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi iti 
ataś ca bhedagrāhapariveṣṭitāntaḥkaraṇasya tṛṣṇāvidyāvato 'nirmuktāhaṃkāramamakārasyābhisaṃhitaparimitaphalaprāptiḥ 
itarasya tv anabhisaṃdhāyaphalaviśeṣacoditatvāt kartavyam iti buddhyā vartamānasyāparimitaniratiśayānandarūpabrahmāvāptiḥ 
na caitac codanīyam ekasaptaśataṃ kratavo yāvanto vā teṣāṃ sarveṣām anuṣṭhānasyāśakyatvād anārambhopadeśatā syāt iti 
yato darśanasaṃpattyaivātrānuṣṭhānasaṃpattiḥ 
ata evoktam samyagdarśanasaṃpannaḥ iti 
sarve ca kratavo darśanasaṃpādanīyāḥ 
tathā coktam jñānenaivāpare viprā yajante iti 
atha vā yāṃl lokān etīty avacchedanirdeśaḥ svargakāmaḥ putrakāma iti 
atītānādibhedagrahavāsitāntarātmāno dṛṣṭaphalalobhenāsatyenaiva pradhāne puruṣārthe pravartante 
yathā bālaḥ puṣṭyarthe auṣadhe śikhā te vardhiṣyate ity asatyayaiva śikhāvṛddhyā pravarttyata iti kecit 
aparaṃ matam 
nityāny atra karmāṇy abhipretāni 
tāny akriyamāṇāni pratyavāyahetutayā pratibandhakāni 
atas tair anuṣṭhīyamānair asati pratibandhe uktaṃ vaidikaiś caiva karmabhir iti 
yady api tāni na mokṣārthatayā coditāni 
ugrair atyantaṃ śarīratāpahetubhiḥ 
tasya brahmaṇaḥ 
padaṃ sthānaṃ brahmalokam 
sādhayanti svīkurvanti 
atha vā tadīyapadaṃ yādṛśas tasyādhikāraḥ sarveśvaratvaṃ svātantryaṃ tadrūpaprāptir iti yāvat 
asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanam 
carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhi pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ 
vairāgyajananam etat 
tiṣṭhantu tāvat kṛmikīṭapataṅgādiśarīrāṇi jalaukobhūmisvedajādīnām 
yad idaṃ mānuṣaśarīraṃ spṛhaṇīyatvenābhipretam yat pātāśaṅkino nityabhītā manuṣyās tan mūtrapurīṣakuṭīgṛhakam iva 
tad idānīṃ kuṭīgṛhakena nirūpayati 
asthīni sthūṇā iva 
tair avaṣṭabdham 
snāyunā baddham 
māṃsaśoṇitābhyām upari digdhalepanam 
upari dehacarmaṇā avanaddham 
atha vā tata upari ācchāditam 
pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ 
odanasya pūrṇa itivat ṣaṣṭhī 
jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanam āturam 
rajasvalam anityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsam imaṃ tyajet 
jarā ca carame vayasi śarīrāpacayahetur avasthāviśeṣaḥ 
āturaṃ nityagṛhītaṃ rogaiḥ 
rajasvalaṃ spṛhayālu sarvapadārtheṣu tadasampatyāṃ ca mahadduḥkhaṃ sarvasmin soḍhe apratīkāram anivartyam 
ata etad avekṣya tyajed idaṃ śarīram 
bhūtānāṃ bhūvikārāṇāṃ medomajjāśleṣmamūtraśukraśoṇitānām ayaṃ vāsas te hy atra vasanti nātmano 'yaṃ vāsaḥ sarvagatatvāt tasya 
atas tṛṣṇā śarīre na kartavyā 
nadīkūlaṃ yathā vṛkṣo vṛkṣaṃ vā śakunir yathā 
tathā tyajann imaṃ dehaṃ kṛcchrād grāhād vimucyate 
yas tāvad ayaṃ kuṭīrūpako dehas tasya dṛṣṭānte nadīkūlaṃ vṛkṣa iti 
na svecchayāgnipreveśādinā tyaktavyaḥ kiṃ tu tṛṣṇā tatra na kartavyā 
anuddiṣṭapūrva āpātas tadā bhaviṣyati karmakṣayāt vṛkṣasyeva kūlasthasya 
yad uktam nābhinandeta maraṇam iti 
yas tu labdhajyotir vaśīkṛtaprāṇasaṃcāro mohavikāranigṛhītamanās tena pūrvam utkramaṇaṃ kartavyam 
yathā śakunir vṛkṣaṃ tyajati 
grāha iva grāhaḥ duḥkhahetutvasāmyāt 
tad āha kṛcchrāt prāptipūrvakasyāpi yāvaccharīraṃ vastusāmarthyād bhavaty eva kṛcchram 
pūrvavipratipattāv etad ucyate 
priyeṣu sveṣu sukṛtam apriyeṣu ca duṣkṛtam 
visṛjya dhyānayogena brahmābhyeti sanātanam 
prītiparitāpakṛtaś cittasaṃkṣobho harṣaśokādilakṣaṇo 'nenopāyena parihartavyaḥ 
yat kiṃcit priyaṃ karoti tan mama sukṛtasya viśeṣyate tasyedaṃ phalam naiṣa kartā mama snehabuddhyā priyam na cāyaṃ me śātravaṃ śaknoti kartuṃ duṣkṛtaṃ pīḍākaram ity evaṃ vimṛśya dhyānayogena citte bhāvayet 
ato 'sya na priyakāriṇi rāgo nāpriyakāriṇi dveṣo jāyate 
evaṃ kurvāṇaḥ sanātanaṃ śāśvataṃ brahmābhyeti abhimukhaṃ prāpnoti 
acirādipathena na vyavadhīyate 
śāśvatagrahaṇād anāvṛttiḥ pratīyate 
yadā bhāvena bhavati sarvabhāveṣu niḥspṛhaḥ 
tadā sukham avāpnoti pretya ceha ca śāśvatam 
cittadharmopadeśo 'yam 
na spṛhā kāryābhipretavas tūpādānaparihāreṇa nispṛhatvam api tu tatkāraṇatyāgena 
bhāvaś cittadharmo vātmano vābhilāṣalakṣaṇaḥ 
sarvabhāveṣu 
padārthavacano dvitīyo bhāvaśabdaḥ 
sarvagrahaṇenāvaśyakartavyeṣv api pānabhojanādiṣu śarīrasthitihetuṣv abhiṣvaṅgo niṣidhyate na punar icchā 
sā hy asya bhāvinī vastusāmarthyajā bubhukṣā pipāsā ca 
bhinnā cecchā spṛhātaḥ 
rāgānubandhinī dainyanimittā spṛhā 
icchā tu bhojanādau bhuktapītāhārapariṇāmasamanantaraṃ svayaṃ upajāyate 
anena vidhinā sarvāṃs tyaktvā saṅgāñ chanaiḥ śanaiḥ 
sarvadvandvavinirmukto brahmaṇy evāvatiṣṭhate 
saṅgāṃs tyaktvā sarvān 
gavāśvahastihiraṇyadāsabhāryākṣetrāyatanādiṣu mamedam iti buddhiḥ saṅgaḥ 
tattyāgād ekārāmatāyāḥ parigrahaṇena ca 
enaṃ prathamam upāśrityainaṃ prādhānyena tato 'nena vidhinā pūrvoktena kriyākalāpena bāhyādhyātmikenānuṣṭhitena brahmaṇi cidrūpe 'vatiṣṭhate 
na karmāṇi badhnanti 
sarvadvandvaiḥ śubhāsubhakarmārthaiḥ sukhaduḥkhair vinirmukto bhavati 
dhyānikaṃ sarvam evaitad yad etad abhiśabditam 
na hy anadhyātmavit kaścit kriyāphalam upāśnute 
dhyāne sati bhavati dhyānikam 
dhyāne kriyamāṇe labhyate 
kiṃ tat 
yad etad anantaram abhiśabditam uktam ābhimukhyena na tātparyeṇa pratipāditam 
sukṛtaduṣkṛtayos tayoḥ priyāpriyahetutvanyāsaḥ 
puruṣasya yad apriyakartṛtvaṃ taj jvarasyeva pīḍāhetutvam agner iva durupasarpaṇadagdhṛtvam 
yathā nāgnidagdho 'gniṃ dveṣṭi evaṃ puruṣam apy apriyakāriṇaṃ manyeta na pratiṣeddhā syāt etac ca dhyāne sati ekāgre citte bhavati 
sarvakālam etad dhṛdayenābhyasitavyam 
yathā sukhaduḥkhe ime karmaṇaḥ phalam 
na rājā sukhasya grāmāder datā api tu madīyāyāsena prathamopasarpaṇalābhaḥ 
pūrvakṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ karma dātṛ na rājā 
evaṃ daṇḍo nodvejayitā karmāṇi mām udvejayanti na rājā nāpi śakto 'nyaḥ kaścit 
etat sarvadā dhyātavyaṃ cintayitavyam 
yad api saṃsāravairāgyajananāyoktam asthisthūṇam ityādi tad api nityaṃ bhāvanīyam 
na hy anadhyātmavit 
adhyatmaṃ cittam atrocyate 
yad etad abhiśabditaṃ na vetti na niścinoti nābhyāsena bhāvayati 
sa na kriyāphalam upāśnute 
parivrājakasya yā baikṣacaryā kriyā grāmaikarātravāsādiś ca na tatphalaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ labhate 
yāvad asthisthūṇādibhāvanayā bhāvenaiva nirabhilāṣatā sarvatra notpannā yāvac ca karmasu phalanyāsena rāgadveṣaprahāṇaṃ na kṛtam ity arthaḥ 
tac ca nityaṃ yadā evaṃ cittaṃ pujyate tadā bhavati nākasmād iti 
atha vā brahmany evāvatiṣṭhate iti etasya yad etad abhiśabditam iti parāmarśaḥ 
brahmaṇy avasthānaṃ dhyānikam na tu kriyānuṣṭhānamātralabhyam 
kiṃ tad dhyeyam ity ata āha na hy anadhyātmavid iti 
ātmānam adhikṛtya yo grantho vedāntādiḥ so 'dhyātmam na veda 
atha vātmany adhi yo nirvṛttas tad adhyātmam yathāyam ātmā dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇādivyatiriktaḥ neṣāṃ nāśe naśyati kartā karmaṇāṃ bhoktā tatphalānām bhedagrāhākṛṣṭasya sarvam etad bhavati 
yadā tv ayam apahatapāpmā na doṣair na kāryaiḥ spṛśyate ekatvād eṣa eva sarvam idam na tato 'nyad vyatiriktam asti 
prabhāsamātraṃ pṛthaktvam 
harisavarṇasodakādikā upaniṣado yo na veda dhyānenaikāgrayā saṃtatayā matyā na dārḍhyam utpādayati sa na yathoktaṃ kriyāphalaṃ labhate 
ata ātmā vedāntābhihitasvarūpo nityam āhāravihārakālaṃ varjayitvā dhyeya iti ślokārthaḥ 
atha vā yady api pravrajyādhikāras tathāpi gṛhasthasyāpi kriyāphalagraheṇa nirdeśaḥ yadi kriyāpradhānaḥ 
ata etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yady apy agnihotrādīni karmāṇi kurvate gṛhasthāḥ rahasyavidyāvidaś ca na bhavanti yā vidyāḥ karmasūpaviṣṭā udgīthā atha vā yāvatī udgītham anvayante ityādinā tena nipuṇāḥ karmakāṇḍajñā api na tataḥ paripūrṇaphalaṃ cirakālabhāvi labhante 
eṣo 'rtho vajasaneyake chāndogye ca śrutidvaye nidarśitaḥ 
yo vā etad akṣaraṃ gārgy aviditvā yajate juhoti tapas tapyate bahūny api varṣasahasrāny antavad eva tad bhavati iti tathā yad eva vidyayā karoti śraddhayā upaniṣadā tad eva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati chandogyoktam 
yas tu yathoktām adhyātmopadiṣṭāṃ vidyāṃ viditvā karoti tasyaiva phalātiśayaḥ 
uktaṃ ca tad ya itthaṃ vidur ya ime 'raṇye śraddhā tapa ity upāsate iti 
yam abhisaṃbhavati ityādivijānatāṃ karmakāriṇām arcirādimārgeṇa brahmalokaprāptim eṣāṃ śrutir āha 
evam ātmajñānārthaṃ dhyeye vihite vedajapo na prāptaḥ tatsādhanatayātas taṃ vidhatte 
adhiyajñaṃ brahma japed ādhidaivikam eva ca 
ādhyātmikaṃ ca satataṃ vedāntābhihitaṃ ca yat 
japamātram asyābhyanujñāyate na punar gṛhasthādivad abhyāsārtham adhyayanam 
yajñeṣv adhi adhiyajñaṃ vidhāyakaṃ brāhmaṇam 
ādhidaivikam adhidaivaṃ bhavaṃ devatāprakāśakamantrāḥ 
teṣām eva viśeṣa ādhyātmikam iti 
ahaṃ manur abhavam ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ ityādi 
vedānta iti yad abhihitaṃ tad api karmajñānasamuccayaṃ brahmatvāya darśayati 
idaṃ śaraṇam ajñānām idam eva vijānatām 
idam anvicchatāṃ svargam idam ānantyam icchatām 
idam iti vedākhyaṃ brahmācaṣṭe 
so 'pi brahmaiva 
tathā coktam 
dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat

pūrvasya vidher ayam arthavādaḥ 
ajñānām atadarthavidāṃ japādiṣv adhikāreṇa 
tathā ca bhagavatā vyāsena siddhir jāpakānāṃ darśitā 
atha vā ajñā anātmajñāḥ śāstrānavagatātmatatvā api tadupāsanāparā alabdhacittasthairyās teṣāṃ vedaḥ śaraṇam

narakeṣu kīṭapataṅgādiyoniṣu cānupapatteḥ 
idam eva vijānatām 
kathaṃ punar viduṣāṃ śaraṇam ata āha 
idam anvicchatāṃ svargam 
etāvad ete karmakāṇḍajñā ātmany alabdhamanaḥpratiṣṭḥā vā teṣāṃ karmānuṣṭhānāt svargādiphalaṃ labhyate 
itare tyaktasaṅgāḥ prakṣīṇarāgādidoṣā jñānātmatattvopāsanāparās teṣām ānantyam apunarāvṛttir iti 
sarveṣāṃ veda eva śaraṇam nānyaḥ panthā astīty arthaḥ 
anena kramayogena parivrajati yo dvijaḥ 
sa vidhūyeha pāpmānaṃ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati 
krameṇa yogo 'nuṣṭhānam 
ātmajñānakarmaṇoḥ samuccaye yaḥ krama uktaḥ tena ṛṇāpākaraṇaṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ 
vidhūya pāpmānam aśva iva romarajāṃsi tathaivātmavidyayā 
yathoktam yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanty evam etadvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyati iti 
paraṃ brahmādhigacchati 
tadrūpaḥ saṃpadyate nivṛttabhedagraha iti vidyāśramaphalavidhiḥ 
eṣa dharmo 'nuśiṣṭo vo yatīnāṃ niyatātmanām 
vedasaṃnyāsikānāṃ tu karmayogaṃ nibodhata 
vedasya saṃnyāsaḥ tyāgaḥ sa eṣām astīti vedasaṃnyāsikāḥ 
vedaśabdena yāgahomādeḥ karmaṇas tyāga ucyate na punar japatyāgaḥ 
ātmacintanaṃ tu vihitam eva 
kevalaṃ dhanasādhyāḥ śarīrakleśasādhyāś ca tīrthayātrādaya upavāsādayaś ca niṣidhyante 
yāni tv ātmaikasādhanasādhyāni saṃdhyājapādikarmāṇi teṣām aniṣedhaḥ 
tad etat svasthāna eva darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
ādyenārdhena pravrajyāśramopasaṃhāraḥ 
uttareṇa vedasaṃnyāsikasya karmopadeśapratijñā 
brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprastho yatis tathā 
ete gṛhasthaprabhavāś catvāraḥ pṛthag āśramāḥ 
sarve 'pi kramaśas tv ete yathāśāstraṃ niṣevitāḥ 
yathoktakāriṇaṃ vipraṃ nayanti paramāṃ gatim 
nanu ca saṃnyāsikakarmāṇi vakṣyāmīti pratijñayāśramānukramaṇam aprakṛtam 
kecid āhur na saṃnyāsa āśramāntaram atraivāntarbhāvo 'syeti darśayitum 
sa ca kasmin 
gṛhasthe 'ntarbhāvitaḥ 
gṛhe hi vāsas tasya 
anyais tu pravrajyāyām saṅgatyāgasāmānyāt 
ato nāsyāntarbhāve prayojanaṃ puruṣadharmair yatidharmaiś ca na yāgādāv adhikariṣyati vaiśeṣikaiś ca svaśabdavidhānāt 
anāśramitvāt saṃvatsaram anāśramī iti prāyaścittaprasaṅgād iti cet vacanenaivāsyā vyavasthāyā viditatvāt kutaḥ prāyaścittaprāptiḥ 
tasmād gṛhasthāditulyatayā saṃnyāsikaṃ praśaṃsitum āśramāntarasaṃkīrtanam 
tac ca samuccayaṃ draḍhayitum 
gṛhasthānām avasthitir eṣām ity arthaḥ 
gṛhasthaḥ prabhavaḥ sthitihetur eṣām iti vigrahaḥ   
sarveṣām api caiteṣāṃ vedaśrutividhānataḥ 
gṛhastha ucyate śreṣṭhaḥ sa trīn etān bibharti hi 
idam ayuktaṃ vartate 
vedaśāstraśrutyā gārhasthasya vidhānaṃ pratijñāyate itareṣāṃ ca bhartavyatvam 
gārhasthasya pratyakṣaśrutividhānenaivāśramāntarāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ 
saṃnihitatapaḥsmṛtibhyo balīyasī śrutiḥ 
athocyeta naivāyam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate vedaśrutyāvidhānād iti 
ayam abhisaṃbandhaḥ 
saty api caitasmin vidhāne gṛhasthasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ tadbharaṇanimittaṃ sa trīn etān ity anena pratipādyate tatra vaktavyaṃ katham āsramāntarāṇāṃ śrutatvāt  śrautatve ca spaṣṭeyaṃ smṛtir virudhyate pratyakṣavidhānād gārhasthyasya ityādinā 
na ca saṃbandhāntarasaṃbhavaḥ 
athocyeta gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet iti jābālaśrutim apekṣya sarvāny eva śrutānīti smṛtivirodhas tāvad aparihṛta eva 
kiṃ ca naiṣā śrutir vidhātrī 
na hy etat śrutam evaṃ vane vā vihartavyam imāni vanasthenaiva karmāṇi kartavyānīmāni pravrajitena iti yathādānāt prabhṛty ā carameṣṭi sarvaṃ gṛhasthakarma pratyakṣam uktaṃ naivam āśramāntarāṇām 
kevalaṃ nāmamātraṃ śrūyate gṛhī bhūtvā ityādi 
tasmāt pūrvāparaviruddhaṃ gārhasthyamūlam āśramāṇām ivopadiśyate 
atrocyate 
satyam ādhānāt prabhṛti gṛhakarmāṇi pratyakṣaśrutāni kṛtadāraparigrahasya 
tatra vivāhe prayuktinirūpanāt kiṃ karma śrutibhiḥ prayujyate 
agnihotrādibhiḥ svāhādhikāraḥ śruteḥ athāpatyotpattividhinā uta dṛṣṭena puruṣārthena 
nanu rāgaḥ strīmātraṃ prayuṅkte na vivāham 
yena vinā yan na niṣpadyate tat tasya prayojakam iti nyāyaḥ 
rāgiṇāṃ ca strīmātreṇa gṛhyakarmanirvṛttiḥ 
kim iti vivāham apekṣeran 
satyam 
yadi vacanāntare strīmātre gamanaṃ niṣiddhaṃ syāt 
samāne 'pi sarvatra vedādhigame śāstrato gamyāgamyavivekaḥ 
ataś ca dhīraprakṛtīnāṃ na vivāham antareṇa svārthasaṃpattir iti yuktaiva vedasya prayojakāśaṃkā 
yady evaṃ sarvasya na prayojakāni santi 
sarveṣāṃ tasmin saty arthanivṛttau kiṃ tena nirūpitena 
yo 'sti vivāhaprayojakaḥ so 'stu 
āśramāntarāṇi pratyakṣavidhāne gārhasthasya katham upapadyanta ity etadadhikṛtā vivāhaprayukticintā tu kenāṃśena saṃgacchate 
ucyate 
yāvad uktaṃ sarveṣām arthasiddhir iti 
satyam 
ekena prayuktāv anyasya prasaṅgād upakārasiddhau na pṛthakprayoktṛtvakalpanā 
yathā vrīhayaḥ puruṣārthena jīvanena prayuktāḥ karmasu viniyujyante 
na karmaṇi dhanārjanaṃ prayujyate 
yathā vā vidyā saty apy vaidasyānadhikāre na prayujyate svādhyāyavidhinaiva tatsiddheḥ 
evam iha kāmataḥ pravṛttisiddher na karmaśrutayaḥ prayoktavyāḥ 
tenākṛtavivāham api kṛtyakarmavidhaya upapatsyante 
ataś ca yo brahmacarya eva kathaṃcit paripakvakaṣāyaḥ sa na vivakṣate 
tataḥ sa dvitīyatvābhāvān nādhikariṣyate 
ataś ca śrauteṣv anadhikārāt tādṛśasyāśramāntaratāpatsyeta 
anye manyante 
nāyaṃ dhanatulyo vivāhaḥ 
yathā dhanena vinā jīvanam anupapannam iti sa vai jīved dhanataḥ evaṃ na striyam antareṇa jīvanābhāva ity ata eva na dṛṣṭaṃ niyaminaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃbhavatīti dharmādhikārārtho 'pi prayukto vivāhaḥ 
avaśyaṃ caitad evaṃ vijñeyam adhikārotpattyarthe yatnaḥ kartavya iti 
itarathā hi kṛtotsargasyāśucitvād adhikārāpanaye jananādi śuddhakālāvasthe ca saṃpādayato na nityakarmātikramaḥ syāt 
tataś ca kenārthena mṛtādiśuddhau kleśam ādadhyāt 
tad api vihitam eveti cet evaṃ tāvanmātrasyātikramo na punar vidhisahasrasya 
athocyeta kasya punar vidher ayaṃ vyāpāro yadadhikṛtatvasaṃpattyartham adhikṛtaḥ syām iti puruṣeṇa yatnaḥ kartavya ity upadiśati

agnayo 'pi kāmyeṣu lipsayā pravartamānena tadadhikārasiddhyartham adhīyate 
tathā hi teṣu jāteṣv āhitāgnitve yāvajjīvaśrutayaḥ 
bhāryāvataś cādhāne 'dhikāraḥ

atra pūrve vadanti

tataś ca viduṣaḥ sataḥ saty adhikāre yaḥ kanyāṃ yācamāno na prāpnuyād yāvat sarvataḥ palitas tasya vānaprasthādāv adhikāraḥ

nanu ca evaṃ gṛhāśrame sthitvā vidhivat snātako dvijaḥ iti dvijagrahaṇam upakrame śrutam 
tasya cānupajātavirodhitvāt traivarṇikārthitā niścitā 
ataś cedaṃ brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ traivarṇikapradarśanārtham eva yuktam 
yady ekavākyatopakramopasaṃhāryor na syāt tadā naivaṃ syāt 
ekavākyatve tu balavad upakramārthaḥ śakyaḥ pratipattum 
kṛtsnavākyaparyālocanayā yo 'rthaḥ sa niścīyate 
ato dvijagrahaṇaṃ brāhmaṇaparatayopasaṃhartavyam 
asti brāhmaṇasya dvijātitvam na tu sarveṣu dvijātiṣu brāhmaṇyam 
atrāpi dvijaśabdārthe saṃbhavati nanvayini lakṣaṇā nyāyyā 
tathā ca mahābhārate śūdrasyāpi traya āśramāḥ śrūyante śuśrūṣākṛtakṛtyasya iti upakramya āśramā vihitāḥ sarve varjayitvā nirāmiṣam 
pārivrājyam ity ārthaḥ 
naivaṃ tasyāyam arthaḥ sarva āśramās tu na kartavyāḥ 
kiṃ tarhi śuśrūṣayāpatyotpādanena ca sarvāśramaphalaṃ labhate 
dvijātīn śuśrūṣamāṇo gārhasthyena sarvāśramaphalaṃ labhate parivrājakaphalaṃ mokṣaṃ varjayitvā 
ato brāhmaṇadharma eva cāturāśramyam iti siddham 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ
ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ 
iti bhaṭṭavīrasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithikṛtau
manubhāṣye ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ 
atha saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
rājadharmān pravakṣyāmi yathāvṛtto bhaven nṛpaḥ 
saṃbhavaś ca yathā tasya siddhiś ca paramā yathā 
dharmaśabdaḥ kartavyatāvacana ity uktam 
yad rājñā kartavyaṃ tad idānīm ucyata iti pratijñā 
kartavyaṃ ca dṛṣṭārthaṃ ṣāḍguṇyādi adṛṣṭārtham agnihotrādi 
tatreha prādhānyena dṛṣṭārtham upadiśyate 
tatraiva ca rājadharmaprasiddhiḥ 
rājaśabdas tu neha kṣatriyajātivacanaḥ kiṃ tarhy abhiṣekādhipatyādiguṇayogini puruṣe vartate 
ata evāha yathāvṛtto bhaven nṛpaḥ 
nṛpagrahaṇena janapadaiśvaryavato 'dhikāram āha 
pramāṇāntaramūlā hy atra dharmā ucyante na sarve vedamūlāḥ 
anyamūlatve ca yad atra dharmaśāstrāviruddhaṃ tad ucyate 
tathā ca kātyāyanaḥ
arthaśāstroktam utsṛjya dharmaśāstroktam āvrajet  iti 
yathāvṛttaḥ yad vṛttaṃ yat prakāraṃ vāsyeti ca bahuvrīhiḥ 
anyapadārtho rājā 
yathārthaprādhānye 'vyayībhāvaḥ syāt 
vṛttaṃ paripālanārtho vyāpāro 'dṛṣṭārthaś ca 
saṃbhavaś ca utpattiḥ 
sa ukto rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ ityādinā 
paramā prakṛṣṭā siddhir vijigīṣor aikādhipatyam 
rājavṛttasya phalapratijñeyam 
brāhmaṃ prāptena saṃskāraṃ kṣatriyeṇa yathāvidhi 
sarvasyāsya yathānyāyaṃ kartavyaṃ parirakṣaṇam 
brahma vedaḥ 
tatra śrutaḥ saṃskāro brāhmaḥ 
sa vedādhyayanajanyo grahaṇavato 'rthalakṣaṇo vedasya svādhyāyavidhir nirvartya ity arthaḥ 
upanayanaṃ tu brahmagrahaṇārthatvād brāhmam iti yuktam 
tathā ca vakṣyati traividyebhyas trayīṃ vidyām iti 
itarathā viditaveditopadeśaḥ syāt 
garbhādānādi smṛtiśāstrād aṣṭācatvāriṃśasaṃskāram 
kṣatriyeṇeti 
etena kṣatriya eva rājyādhikārīti sūcitam 
kṣatriyābhāve tadatideso 'pi grāhyaḥ 
anyathā prajālopaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ 
sarvasya karadasya dīnānāthadeś ca 
asyeti svaviṣayavāsināṃ yathāsvaṃ janapadapuranirdeśaḥ 
yathānyāyaṃ 
nyāyaḥ śāstraṃ dharmaśāstrarūpam nārthaśāstram auśanasādipraṇītam tam anatikramya 
parirakṣaṇaṃ paripālanam 
apāyaparihāraḥ durbalānāṃ balavadbhir anabhibhavaḥ śāstramaryādānatikramaś ca 
duḥkhatrāṇaṃ parirakṣā 
śāstrātikrame cādṛṣṭaṃ duḥkham 
atas tadanatikrame rājabhayena rakṣitā bhavanti 
rājadaṇḍe duḥkham iti cen mahato narakādiduḥkhād rājadaṇḍanam alpīyaḥ 
kartavyam iti vidhiḥ 
adhikāraś cāṣṭame nirūpitaḥ 
arājake hi loke 'smin sarvato vidrute bhayāt 
rakṣārtham asya sarvasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ 
vidrute pīḍite 'pratiṣṭhite vā 
prabhuḥ prajāpatiḥ 
stutir iyam 
indrānilayamārkāṇām agneś ca varuṇasya ca 
candravitteśayoś caiva mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ 
anilo vāyuḥ 
vitteśo dhanapatir vaiśravaṇaḥ 
mātrā avayavāḥ 
śāśvatīḥ sārabhūtāḥ 
nirhṛtya niṣkṛṣya 
yasmād eṣāṃ surendrāṇāṃ mātrābhyo nirmito nṛpaḥ 
tasmād abhibhavaty eṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā 
eṣām indrādīnāṃ suraśreṣṭhānāṃ mātrābhis tejoṃśair nirmitas tasmād dhetor abhibhavati durnirīkṣyamukho bhavati 
tejasā hetunā 
niṣkṛṣya nirmita utpāditaḥ yataḥ kṛṣir utpādane dhātur vartate 
tenāpāyāvadhitvān mātrābhya iti pañcamī tṛtīyā vā paṭhitavyā 
tapaty ādityavac caiṣa cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi ca 
na cainaṃ bhuvi śaknoti kaścid apy abhivīkṣitum 
tapati tapatīva 
saṃmukho 'śakyadarśanatvād evam ucyate 
tad āha na cainaṃ bhuvi śaknoti 
brāhmaṇā jātyutkṛṣṭā brahmavarcasvino 'pi nainam abhimukhaṃ vīkṣituṃ śaknuvanti 
tad uktam tam upary āsīnam adhastād upāsīran 
so 'gnir bhavati vāyuś ca so 'rkaḥ somaḥ sa dharmarāṭ 
sa kuberaḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa cendraḥ svaprabhāvataḥ 
agnyādidevatānāṃ mātrāśayatvāt tacchaktiyogitayaivam ucyate 
prabhāvaḥ alaukikī yā śaktiḥ 
bālo 'pi nāvamantavyo manuṣya iti bhūmipaḥ 
mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati 
manuṣyo 'yam ity evaṃ bālo 'pi bhūmipo rājā nāvamantavyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi mahatī kācid eṣā devatā etena mānuṣeṇa rūpeṇa sthiteti 
ato 'dṛṣṭenāpi doṣeṇa rājany avajñā na yujyeta 
ekam eva dahaty agnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam 
kulaṃ dahati rājāgniḥ sapaśudravyasaṃcayam 
asya vidher arthavādaślokā ete 
rājadharmo 'pi san sarvapuruṣārtho 'yam 
yo 'gniṃ hastādinā spṛśati samiddhasyāpy antikavartī bhavati sa durupasarpī naraḥ pramādaskhalito dahyate 
rājā tu kruddhaḥ saputradhanadārabāndhavaṃ dahati 
kulaṃ ye kecid jñātayaḥ svajanāś ca 
tān apy aparādhasaṃbandhāt paśubhir dhanasaṃcayaiś ca saha nāśayati 
kāryaṃ so 'vekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśakālau ca tattvataḥ 
kurute dharmasiddhyarthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 
naitan mantavyaṃ bandhur me rājā suhṛd veti 
kasya rāja bhaven mitraṃ kāni mitrāṇī rājani 
prayojanāpekṣayā ca śatrau mitravad ācaranti mitre śatruvat 
tathāśaktāḥ kaṃcid aparādhaṃ kṣamante śaktiṃ prāpyonmūlayanti 
evaṃ deśakālāv api 
ato dharmasiddhyarthaṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ kurute 
kṣaṇān mitraṃ kṣaṇena śatruḥ naikarūpa eva rājā bhavati 
ato na viśvasitavyaṃ rājani 
maitrād vāllabhyāt saujanyād vā tattulyavayodṛṣṭyā na vartitavyam api tu sarvadā nayena draṣṭavyaḥ 
yasya prasāde padmā śrīr vijayaś ca parākrame 
mṛtyuś ca vasati krodhe sarvatejomayo hi saḥ 
prasanna ārādhanayā śriyaṃ dadāti 
kruddho mṛtyunā yojayati 
ataḥ śrīkāmenārādhanīyaḥ 
na kevalaṃ śriyā yojayati yāvad asya śatravaḥ santi tān api parākramya paritoṣito hanti 
ataḥ śatruvadhakāmena yathāvat paricaraṇīyaḥ 
padmā 
śrīḥparyāyo 'pi padmāśabdo mahattvapratipādanārthaḥ prayuktaḥ mahatīṃ śriyaṃ dadātīty arthaḥ 
ete cārthā rājñaḥ prāpyante yataḥ sarvatejomayo 'sau agnyāditycandramasāṃ tejo bibharti 
taṃ yas tu dveṣṭi saṃmohāt sa vinaśyaty asaṃśayam 
tasya hy āśu vināśāya rājā prakurute manaḥ 
pratyavāyād yathā naśyati jano naivam abhipretārthalobhena ataḥ punaḥ punar āha 
taṃ rājānaṃ yo dveṣṭi prātikūlyena vartate tasmin sa tv asaṃśayaṃ naśyati 
tasya hy āśu vināśaya 
anyaḥ kaścid aparādhaṃ kṣamate aśakyarājanivedanena 
tatra vyavahārabhāgasya dhanaparikṣayo bhavati bhūto 'py arthaḥ sākṣiṇāṃ cittavaicitryād anyathātvam āyāti  ity apekṣamāṇaḥ kaścit kṣametāpi 
rājñā tadvināśārtham aparādhena manasi sthitena bhādhyata evāsau 
śaktimatvād rājñaḥ prayatamānasya svatantravirodho jāyate 
tasmād dharmaṃ yam iṣṭeṣu sa vyavasyen narādhipaḥ 
aniṣṭaṃ cāpy aniṣṭeṣu taṃ dharmaṃ na vicālayet 
yataḥ sarvatejomayo rājā tasmād dhetor iṣṭeṣu vallabheṣu mantripurohitādiṣu kāryagatyā dharmaṃ kāryavyavasthāṃ śāstrācārāviruddhāṃ vyavasyen niścitya sthāpayen na vicālayet 
sā tādṛśī rājño 'nujñā nātikramaṇīyā  adya pure sarvair utsavaḥ kartavyaḥ 
mantrigehe vivāho vartate tatra sarvaiḥ saṃnidhātavyam 
tathā paśavo nādya sainikair hantavyāḥ 
na śakunayo bandhayitavyāḥ 
nartikā dhanikair ārādhanīyā etāvanty ahāni 
evam aniṣṭeṣv api  etena saṃsargo na kartavyaḥ 
etasya gṛhe praveśo na deyaḥ 
evaṃvidho 'tra dharmaḥ paṭahaghoṣādinā rājñādiṣṭo nātikarmaṇīyaḥ 
na tv agnihotrādidharmavyavasthāyai varṇāśramiṇāṃ rājā prabhavati smṛtyantaravirodhaprasaṅgāt avirodhe cāsmin viṣaye vacanasyārthavatvāt 
tadarthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ goptāraṃ dharmam ātmajam 
brahmatejomayaṃ daṇḍam asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥ 
uktā rājotpattiḥ 
daṇḍotpattir idānīm ucyate 
tasmā idaṃ tadartham rājñaḥ prayojanasiddhaye daṇḍam asṛjad īśvaraḥ prajāpatiḥ 
ko rājño 'rtho daṇḍena 
ucyate 
goptāraṃ sarvabhūtānām 
goptā rakṣitā daṇḍa eva 
na daṇḍena vinā rājā rakṣituṃ śaknoti 
ato rājatvasiddhyartha eva daṇḍaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ 
dharmam ātmajaṃ brahmatejomayam iti daṇḍastutiḥ 
na yāgadānādiḥ dharmaḥ kiṃ tarhi daṇḍa eva 
na cāyaṃ prāṇadhanahāritvād adharmo vijñeyaḥ api tv eṣa eva dharmaḥ 
ātmajaḥ śarīrād eva jātaḥ prajāpateḥ 
na ca pāñcabhautikaḥ kiṃ tarhi brahmaṇo yat kevalaṃ tejas tena nirmitaḥ 
pūrvaṃ rājasṛṣṭeḥ 
tasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca 
bhayād bhogāya kalpante svadharmān na calanti ca 
tasya daṇḍasya bhayāt 
saṃbandhimātravivakṣāyāṃ bhayahetutvaṃ nāstīti ṣaṣṭī 
daṇḍabhayāt sthāvarāṇi bhūtāni bhogāya phalakusumacchāyādibhir bhogārthaṃ kalpante tatsamarthā bhavanti 
yo hi sthāvaraḥ phalaṃ na dadāti sa pariśoṣyate 
na cet pariśuṣyati sarvato vyāptadeśatvāc chitvāgārīkriyate 
etayā vṛkṣopamayā daṇḍyasya rājāpathyakāriṇaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ kartavyam chedanamūlotpāṭanādinā daṇḍaḥ praṇeyaḥ 
sthāvaragrahaṇaṃ stutyā dṛṣṭāntārtham īdṛśo 'yaṃ daṇḍo yat sthāvarā api daṇḍyante kiṃ punaś carāḥ 
na tu sthāvarāṇāṃ daṇḍo 'yam ity eṣā buddhir asti 
svadharmān na calanti akāle na puṣyanti na prasuvate 
taṃ deśakālau śaktiṃ ca vidyāṃ cāvekṣya tattvataḥ 
yathārhataḥ saṃpraṇayen nareṣv anyāyavartiṣu 
anyāyavartino ye rājāpathyakāriṇo mahāmātyādayas teṣām ayaṃ daṇḍa ucyate 
anyeṣāṃ tu parasparavyavahāriṇām anubandhaṃ parijñāya ity atrocyate 
tatraiva cāyaṃ śloko vyakhyātaḥ 
vidyātrādhikā sā ca vedārthaviṣayā 
yathārhataḥ yathārhaṃ yo yasya yogya ity arthaḥ 
saṃpraṇayet pravartayet kuryād iti yāvat 
etat sarvam avekṣya nirūpya tattadapekṣo daṇḍaḥ kartavyaḥ 
anyathāpraṇīto rājño dṛṣṭam anartham āvahet 
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭabhedena svaprakṛtijanapadabhedena saptamāṣṭamayor daṇḍamātṛkāślokayor bhedaḥ 
sa rājā puruṣo daṇḍaḥ sa netā śāsitā ca saḥ 
caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmasya pratibhūḥ smṛtaḥ 
sa eva vastuto rājā 
tasmin sati rājaśaktiḥ 
sa eva puruṣaḥ 
yena balīyaso 'pi puruṣān strīvan nyakkṛtya vaśīkaroti 
sa netā 
kāryāṇi tena nīyante 
śāsitā 
śāsanaṃ rājājñā tasyāḥ śāsanībhāvaḥ daṇḍe sati 
dharmataḥ kartṛtvam aupacārikam 
caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ yo dharmas tatra sa pratibhūr iva 
yathā pratibhūś calituṃ na dadāti tadvad daṇḍo 'pi 
daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati 
daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
na rājā śāstraṃ śāsti kartavyākartavyor vidhiniṣedhayoḥ kiṃ tarhi daṇḍa eva 
daṇḍa evābhirakṣati balavadbhyo durbalān 
supteṣu rājapuruṣeṣu daṇdabhayād eva na yathākāmaṃ loko vyavaharati 
dvividho daṇḍaḥ rājadaṇḍo yamadaṇḍaś ca 
samīkṣya sa dhṛtaḥ samyak sarvā rañjayati prajāḥ 
asamīkṣya praṇītas tu vināśayati sarvataḥ 
dhṛtaḥ praṇītaḥ pravartitaḥ 
samīkṣya 
pūrvoktadeśakālādy apekṣya samīkṣya 
rañjayaty anurāgaṃ prajāsu janayati 
viparītaṃ praṇīyamāno na kevalaṃ svakāryaṃ na karoti yāvad durupayukto viṣavad vināśayaty arthaṃ janasya 
yadi na praṇayed rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ 
śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ 
apraṇayanād daṇḍasya ye balavattarā balīyāṃso balenādhikā mahāprāṇatayā śastrahastamanuṣyā bhūyastvena vā te durbalāṇ apakṣyan śūle matsyān iva 
yathā matsyā śūlāḥ kriyante bhojanārtham evam aśakto jano 'dhikaśaktibhir upahīyeta dhanaśarīradāraharaṇādinā 
tasmād daṇḍārhān atandrito 'nalaso daṇḍayet 
kuto mayā samīkṣā śakyā kartum naiva daṇḍaṃ karomi iti naivaṃ buddhiḥ kartavyā 
adyāt kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ śvāvalihyād dhavis tathā 
svāmyaṃ ca na syāt kasmiṃścit pravartetādharottaram 
śvakākādayo 'py atyantādhamā devaiḥ saha saṃspardheran 
devebhyo dātavyaṃ haviś carupuroḍāśādi tat te adyur yadi daṇḍena na nivāryeran 
anyad api yat svāmyaṃ svasvāmibhāvaḥ sa na syāt jāyāpatyoḥ pitāputrayoḥ 
jāyāyāḥ patir na syāt svātantryeṇa striyaḥ pravarteran 
adharottaram 
yad adharaṃ vṛṣalādi tad uttaraṃ pradhānaṃ syāt 
yad uttaraṃ brāhmaṇādi tad avaratāṃ nikṛṣṭatām iyāt 
śūdrā dharmam upadiśeyuḥ 
vaidiko dharmo nānuṣṭhīyeta 
sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥ 
daṇḍasya hi bhayāt sarvaṃ jagat bhogāya kalpate 
svabhāvenaiva prakṛtyaiva śuciḥ śuddho dharmārthakāmeṣu sa tādṛśo naro durlabhaḥ duḥkhair labdhuṃ śakyaḥ 
kiṃ tu daṇḍajito daṇḍena jīyate pathi sthāpyate 
tadbhyān na yathākāmaṃ pravartate 
jagad bhogāyeti prāg uktam eva 
devadānavagandharvā rakṣāṃsi patagoragāḥ 
te 'pi bhogāya kalpante daṇḍenaiva nipīḍitāḥ 
ye devāḥ parjanyo vāyur āditya ityādayaḥ bhogāya kalpante śītoṣṇavarṣair niyatair oṣadhīḥ pācayanti taddaṇḍabhayāśaṅkinaḥ 
anyathā kim iti sūryācandramasau dhātṛparjanyau vā svasmāt kāryakālān niyatān na vicaletām 
kadācid dve ahanī trīṇi vā nodiyāt sūryaḥ sati svātantrye 
daṇḍāt tu bibhyan nātikrāmati maryādām 
tathā ca śrutiḥ
bhayāt sūryaḥ pratapati bhayāt tapati candramāḥ 
bhayād agniś ca vāyuś ca  iti 
dānavādayaś ca yad idam akhilam aharniśaṃ na jagad upaghnanti 
daṇḍamāhātmyam etat 
pataṅgavayāṃsi gṛhamaṇḍanāḥ śukasārikādayo yad bālānām akṣiṇī notpāṭayanti śyenakākakaṅkagṛdhrādayo yaj jīvato nādanti tad apy evam eva 
uragāḥ sarpāḥ kevalaṃ krodhaviṣātmakāḥ saṃbhūya sarve na daśanti sarvaṃ prāṇijātam tad daṇḍasāmarthyam 
ataḥ stutir eṣocyate 
tad devādayo mahardhikā acetanā vā svarmaryādāto na vicalanti bhayāt kiṃ punar manuṣyāḥ 
atra ślokaḥ pūrvaiḥ paṭhitaḥ 
dṛṣṭvā tu dainyaṃ vanapāṭalānāṃ
puṣpapragalbhaṃ kuṭajaprahāsam 
saṃbandhadānena tadā jahāsa
nīco 'pi randhraṃ praharaty avaśyam  iti 
duṣyeyuḥ sarvavarṇāś ca bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ 
sarvalokaprakopaś ca bhaved daṇḍasya vibhramāt 
daṇḍasya vibhramo 'karaṇam anyāyena vā karaṇam 
tasmin sati sarvavarṇā duṣyeyuḥ itaretarastrīgamanena saṃkarapravṛtteḥ 
setavo maryādāḥ tāḥ sarvā bhidyeran 
sarvamaryādāparilopaḥ syād ity arthaḥ 
brāhmaṇāś ca śūdravad varteran śūdrāś ca brāḥmaṇavat 
ataś ca sarvalokaprakopaḥ syāt 
trayo 'pi lokā itaretaraṃ vṛṣṭyātapādinā nopakuryuḥ 
yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati pāpahā 
prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati 
etad dvayaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ praśastatamam 
atas tenāsatā rūpakabhaṅgyā stauti 
dvirūpo daṇḍaḥ duḥkhado bhayadaś ca 
bhayahetutvaṃ śyāmatayā duḥkhahetutvaṃ lohitākṣatvena 
parisamāptā daṇḍastutiḥ 
daṇḍo 'vaśyaṃ kartavyaḥ 
sa ca deśādyapekṣayeti 
anyaḥ sarvo 'rthavādaḥ 
netā cet 
netā daṇḍasya nāyakaḥ 
sa cet sādhu paśyati sunirūpitaṃ deśakālādikaṃ kṛtvā pālayati 
tatra prajā na muhyanti na kenacid doṣeṇa yujyante 
tasyāhuḥ saṃpraṇetāraṃ rājānaṃ satyavādinam 
samīkṣyakāriṇaṃ prājñaṃ dharmakāmārthakovidam 
idaṃ saṃpraṇetuḥ sādhu darśanam satyavāditā samīkṣyakāritā prājñatā trivarge kauśalaṃ ca 
satyavādī yaḥ śāstrānusāritayā daṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kutaścin mahādhanatvaṃ vijñāya na taṃ vardhayati na ca vallabhasya rāgād avanaṃ karoti 
prājñaḥ deśādīnāṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvārtham avasthāviśeṣajñaḥ 
kadācid deśena kālo bādhyate kālena vā deśaḥ 
ubhau vā tau vidyāśaktī 
tayoś ca parasparam utsargāpavādabhāvajñaḥ 
kāryavaśād arthaś ca bādhaka eva bādhyatām ity ataḥ prājñatvam upayujyate 
dharmādīnāṃ ca gurulaghutābhāvaḥ 
svalpo yatra dharmas tasmin sādhyamāne mahān anartho bhavati tatra dharmas tyajyate 
prāyaścittena samādhāsyata ity evamādi boddhavyam 
taṃ rājā praṇayan samyak trivargeṇābhivardhate 
kāmāndho viṣamaḥ kṣudro daṇḍenaiva nihanyate 
samatvena daṇḍapātanena śatrau mitre ca vardhate 
kāmāndhaḥ rāgapradhānaḥ 
viṣamaḥ krodhanaḥ 
kṣudraḥ chalānveṣāt 
daṇḍenaiva nihanyate prakṛtikopenādṛṣṭena vā doṣeṇa 
daṇḍo hi sumahat tejo durdharaś cākṛtātmabhiḥ 
dharmād vicalitaṃ hanti nṛpam eva sabāndhavam 
sumahad yat tejaḥ sa daṇḍaḥ 
akṛtātmabhiḥ śāstreṇa gurūpāsanayā sahajena vā vinayena ye 'nabhivinītās tair durdharaḥ na śakyate samyak praṇetum 
naivaṃ mantavyam ājñāmātreṇa daṇḍaḥ praṇīyate kā tasya durdharatā 
yato yas tatra na jāgarti prayatnavān na bhavati taṃ pramādinaṃ sabāndhavaṃ daṇḍo hanti 
na śarīreṇa kevalena rājā naśyati yāvat putrapautrādyanvayena saha 
tato durgaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca lokaṃ ca sacarācaram 
antarikṣagatāṃś caiva munīn devāṃś ca pīḍayet 
deśādyanapekṣayā yatra daṇḍaḥ praṇīyate tatra sarājakasya janapadasya tiryaksthāvarasahitasya nāśaḥ 
tato mantribhir janapadaiś ca rājā vijñāpanīyaḥ tyaktavyo vā tādṛśo deśaḥ 
devamunayaḥ pīḍyante 
itaḥpradānajīvanā devāḥ 
asmiṃś cānuṣṭhānādyucchedān naṣṭā eva devamunayaḥ 
tathā ca purāṇakāraiḥ
varṇāśramebhyaḥ sthitvā tu loke 'smin yaḥ pravartate 
svargādau devayonīnāṃ sthitihetuḥ sa vai smṛtaḥ  iti 
prathamāt ślokād ārabhya yāvad ayaṃ ślokas tatrāyam arthasaṃgrahaḥ samavṛttena kṣatriyeṇa janapadaparipālanaṃ kartavyam 
tac ca daṇḍena vinā na bhavatīti sa deśādyapekṣayāvaśyaṃ nipuṇato nirūpya svarāṣṭre pararāṣṭre vā yathāśāstraṃ praṇeyaḥ 
anyathā tu pravṛttāv ubhayalokanāśaḥ 
anyaḥ sarvo 'rthavādaḥ 
so 'sahāyena mūḍhena lubdhenākṛtabuddhinā 
na śakyo nyāyato netuṃ saktena viṣayeṣu ca 
sahāyasaṃgrahārthaṃ prakaraṇam idānīm ārabhyate 
yasya ca nirūpaṇā vakṣyamāṇā tatsahāyādiguṇayoginaś cāryasabhyasenāpatidaṇḍādhikāriṇo na santi tena svayam eva niḥśaṅkaṃ nayakālaguṇasaṃpannenāpi nyāyato na praṇetuṃ śakyaḥ 
nyāyaḥ śāstrānusāriṇī deśādyapekṣayā ca vyavasthā 
ataḥ sahāyāḥ śobhanāḥ kartavyāḥ 
yathā svayaṃ mūḍho vicitto 'saṃskṛtabuddhir asti sakto viṣayeṣu lubdho dhanaviniyogaṃ yathāvan na karoti tena tādṛśenaitair doṣair yuktena na samyak dhriyate evam asahāyenāpīti tātparyam 
yas tu viparītas tena śakyate 
eṣa evārtho vaiparītyenocyate 
śucinā satyasaṃdhena yathāśāstrānusāriṇā 
praṇetuṃ śakyate daṇḍaḥ susahāyena dhīmatā 
śucir alubdhaḥ 
satyasaṃdhaḥ satyapradhānaḥ 
satyam eva purodhāya sarvakriyāsu pravartate sa vijitendriyaḥ 
ajitendriyasya kutaḥ satyam 
yathāśāstram anusarati vartate 
susahāyaḥ śobhanāḥ sahāyā asyeti 
amūrkhair bhaktyanuraktaiḥ sahāyair yuktaḥ 
dhīmatā prājñena 
yo 'sau mūḍhaḥ prāguktas tasyāyaṃ pratipakṣatayoktaḥ
ataḥ pañcabhir doṣair hīnas tāvadbhir eva guṇair yukto daṇḍapraṇayane 'dhikṛto dṛṣṭādṛṣṭapalātiśayabhāg bhavatīti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ 
svarāṣṭre nyāyavṛttaḥ syād bhṛśadaṇḍaś ca śatruṣu 
suhṛtsv ajihmaḥ snigdheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamānvitaḥ 
pitṛpitāmahādikramāgato deśo vyapadeśahetuḥ 
kāśmīrakasya kāśmīraḥ pāñcālasya pāñcālāḥ svarāṣṭram 
tatra nyāyavṛtto nyāyena varteta 
nyāyayogād vṛttaṃ nyāyaḥ 
ato bahuvrīhiḥ 
nyāyavṛttiḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
etat pūrvasiddham anūdya śatruṣu bhṛśadaṇḍatā vidhīyate 
pararāṣṭrāṇi punaḥ pīḍayet na tatra vighnādy upekṣaṇīyaṃ rāṣṭrīyoparodho vā 
tathā kurvataḥ pratāpa upajāyate 
pratāpadhanasya śatravo namanti 
brāhmaṇeṣu sarvatra kṣamānvitaḥ 
aparādheṣv api sāmnā daṇḍaḥ prayojyaḥ na krodhena 
pararāṣṭravāsino 'pi rāṣṭraghātakāle yadi śakyante rakṣituṃ tadā na hanyante 
snigdheṣu suhṛtsu ajihmo 'kuṭilabuddhiḥ 
kāryasiddhikṛt tatkāryapradhānaḥ syāt 
samānābhyudayapratyavāyāḥ suhṛdaḥ snigdhāḥ 
evaṃvṛttasya nṛpateḥ śiloñchenāpi jīvataḥ 
vistīryate yaśo loke tailabindur ivāmbhasi 
prakrāntavṛtteḥ stutir iyam 
śiloñchenāpi jīvato 'tyantakṣīṇakośasya vistīryate yaśaḥ prathate 
tataś ca pararāṣṭrāṇi svayaṃ namante svarāṣṭrikaś cānurāgād avicalito bhavati 
atas tu viparītasya nṛpater ajitātmanaḥ 
saṃkṣipyate yaśo loke ghṛtabindur ivāmbasi 
ato vṛttād viparītasya calitasya 
atra hetur ajitātmatā 
yathāśāstram aniyatātmā yaḥ 
sve sve dharme niviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣām anupūrvaśaḥ 
varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca rājā sṛṣṭo 'bhirakṣitā 
svadharmāṇāṃ ca rājā sṛṣṭo 'bhirakṣitā 
svadharmaniṣṭhānām apālane rājñaḥ pratyavāyaḥ 
dharmacyutās tu yadi kenacid upahanyeran na tatra rājño 'tīva doṣa iti sve sve dharme ity anena darśayati 
atha vā na śliṣyate aniviṣṭānām iti 
ye tu śāstrān mitrādyupadeśād vā svadharmāyattāḥ na teṣāṃ rājā dvaidhena varteta 
varṇagrahaṇaṃ strībālavṛddhānāṃ rakṣārtham 
na hi te āśramasthāḥ 
āśramagrahaṇaṃ tarhi kimartham 
prādhānyārtham brāhmaṇavasiṣṭhavat 
prayojananirdeśo vāyam 
āśramasaṃdhyopāsanādidharmāc calitum eṣāṃ na deyaḥ 
na caivaṃ daṇḍādyapaghātaḥ kartum eteṣāṃ deyaḥ 
itarathā bādhāparihāraḥ 
evaṃ rakṣā vijñeyā 
saṃdhyopāsanādyakaraṇeṣu nāmānyasya kasyacid bhavati 
dvirūpā rājñaḥ kartavyateti varṇāśramagrahaṇam 
etad evoktam varṇān āśramāṃś ca nyāyato 'bhirakṣet iti 
tena yad yat sabhṛtyena kartavyaṃ rakṣatā prajāḥ 
tat tad vo 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ 
vakṣyamāṇāvabodhārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
tena rājñā sabhṛtyena tadīyaiḥ sahāyair yat kartavyaṃ prajārakṣaṇārthaṃ tad idānīm ucyate 
brāhmaṇān paryupāsīta prātar utthāya pārthivaḥ 
traividyavṛddhān viduṣas tiṣṭhet teṣāṃ ca śāsane 
prātar utthāya śayanaṃ tyaktvā yathāvidhānaṃ kṛtasaṃdhyopāsanaḥ prathamaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ darśanaṃ dadyāt 
upāsanam antikopaveśanakuśalapraśnādikaraṇam 
pariḥ pādapūraṇaḥ 
tiṣṭhet teṣāṃ ca śāsane 
ājñākaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ śāsanam 
yadi kasyacid upakārāyādiśeyus tadviruddhaṃ na śaṅkyam nāpy anarthakam anutiṣṭhet 
traividyavṛddhān 
tisṝṇāṃ vidyānāṃ samāhāraḥ traividyam tad adhītinaḥ traividyā rūḍhyā ṛgvedādivedatrayādhyāyina ucyante 
viduṣas tadarthavedinaś ca 
evaṃvidhā ye brāhmaṇās tān upāsīta tadīyām ājñāṃ kuryāt 
vṛddhās traividyānāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ prakarṣavanto 'dhyayanavijñānayoḥ 
vṛddhāṃś ca nityaṃ seveta viprān vedavidaḥ śucīn 
vṛddhasevī hi satataṃ rakṣobhir api pūjyate 
vṛddhān vayasthabrāhmaṇān 
etad apūrvam anyat pūrvasiddhaṃ viprān ityādi 
śucīn nirupādhīn 
etad apy apūrvam 
yathaivādhyayanavijñāne upāsyatvakāraṇam evaṃ śucitvam api 
dvitīyaślokārdho 'rthavādaḥ 
rakṣobhiḥ 
rakṣāṃsi nirdayāni mahābalāni sarvadharmaśūnyāni tāny api vṛddhasevinaṃ pūjayanti 
vṛddhasevāyāḥ prayojanam āha 
tebhyo 'dhigacched vinayaṃ vinītātmāpi nityaśaḥ 
vinītātmā hi nṛpatir na vinaśyati karhicit 
tebhyaḥ vidvadbrāhmaṇebhyo vṛddhebhyaḥ vinayaṃ rājavṛttam adhigacchet śikṣeta 
vinītātmā 
yady api svayaṃbuddhyāpi vinīto 'rthaśāstrair vā tathāpi vṛddhopadeśe yatnavān syāt 
dṛṣṭakarmāṇaḥ śāstrajñebhyo nipuṇatarāḥ 
atha vā pāṭavātiśayajananārthaṃ vinītenāpi svabhāvato vṛddhebhya āryebhya ātmā vineyaḥ 
svabhāvaśuddhasya suvarṇasya tejaḥsaṃyogādinādhīyamānasaṃskāro viśuddhatararūpavān asau dṛśyate 
yasya vinayādhānasya phalaṃ na vinaśyatīti 
bahavo 'vinayān naṣṭā rājānaḥ saparigrahāḥ 
vanasthā api rājyāni vinayāt pratipedire 
pūrvokta evārthaḥ ślokatrayeṇaiva dṛḍhīkriyate 
avinītāḥ saparigrahā naṣṭāḥ 
putradārahastyaśvādisaṃpat parigrahaḥ 
ye tu vinayinaḥ na te rāṣṭraṃ prāpya hārayanti 
yāvat te dūrasthā vanasthā api kośahīnā api rājyaṃ pratipedire labdhavantaḥ 
veno vinaṣṭo 'vinayān nahuṣaś caiva pārthivaḥ 
sudāḥ paijavanaś caiva sumukho nimir eva ca 
ubhayatrāpy udāharaṇāni lokasiddhāni varṇayanti 
etāni mahābhāratād ākhyānāni jñeyāni 
pṛthus tu vinayād rājyaṃ prāptavān manur eva ca 
kuberaś ca dhanaiśvaryaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ caiva gādhijaḥ 
brāhmaṇyaṃ caiva gādhijaḥ 
nanu ca rājyādhikāre ko brāhmaṇyaprāptyupanyāsāvasaraḥ 
rāṣṭraprāptir eva yathāpūrvaṃ varṇayitavyā 
ucyate 
dhanaiśvaryād api jātyutkarṣo duṣprāpaḥ sarvādhikārahetutvāt 
nanu ca kathaṃ tasya vinayo hetuḥ 
ṣāḍguṇyaprayogaḥ apramādaḥ ativyayavarjanaṃ alobhaḥ vyasanāsevanaṃ evamādīni vinayaḥ 
tad etad brāhmaṇyasyaikam api na kāraṇam 
tapo hi tatra kāraṇatvena śrutam viśvāmitras tapas tepe nānṛṣeḥ putraḥ syām ity evamādi 
ucyate 
nārthaśāstroktaiva nītir nayaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi śāstrīyo vidhir lokācāraś ca 
śāstre ca tapasā jātyutkarṣo janmāntare prāpyate iti vihitam eva 
viśvāmitrasya brāhmaṇyaṃ tu tasminn eva janmani kṣatriyasya sata ityākhyātam eva 
traividyebhyas trayīṃ vidyād daṇḍanītiṃ ca śāśvatīm 
ānvīkṣikīṃ cātmavidyāṃ vārtārambhāṃś ca lokataḥ 
vidyām iti dvitīyāntapāṭhe adhigacchet ity anuṣañjyanīyam 
samāptabrahmacaryasya rājyopadeśāt trayyarthādhigamena tanniṣpatter abhyāsārtho 'yam upadeśaḥ 
tryavayavā vidyā trividyā tām adhīyate traividyāḥ tebhyas trayīm ṛgvedādivedatrayaṃ vidyāt 
saṃdigdheṣu padārtheṣu vedebhyo nirṇayaṃ kuryāt 
taiḥ saha vedārthaṃ cintayed iti yāvat 
na rājatvābhimānān madāvalepena sarvajño 'ham iti buddhyā saṃdihyamānān arthān upekṣeta 
daṇḍanītiṃ ca 
daṇḍaviṣayā nītiḥ 
daṇḍo damanam ity āhuḥ yena śatravaḥ svaprakṛtayo viṣayavāsinaś cānyāyakāriṇo damyante sa daṇḍo 'mātyādisaṃpat 
nītis tasya prayojanaṃ tatra vidhiḥ taṃ śikṣeta 
tadvidbhyaś cāṇakyādigrathavidbhyaḥ 
śāśvatīm iti stutiḥ 
yady api daṇḍanītyāpy asya sarvalokaḥ śakyate jñātum anvayavyatirekamūlatvād asyārthasya tathāpy abudhabodhanārthāni tāni śāstrāṇi budhānāṃ ca saṃvādārthānīti yukto daṇḍanītiśāstrādhigamaḥ 
evaṃ ānvīkṣiky api tarkavidyārthaśāstrādikā 
ātmavidyā adhyātmavidyā 
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye vā pade 
ātmane yā hitānvīkṣikī sā tarkāśrayā 
tāṃ śikṣeta 
sā hy upayujyate vyasanābhyudayoparamacittasaṃkṣobhopaśamāya 
yā tu bauddhacārvākāditarkavidyā sā nātīva kṛtvā kvacid upayujyate 
pratyutāstikyam upahanti yo nātinipuṇamatiḥ 
yadā tu svatantrām ānvīkṣikīṃ veda tadā tasya dūtasaṃvādādiṣu vākyavaiśadyānām upayogo nopahāsyo bhavati 
vārtārambhāṃś ca 
paṇyānām arthaparijñānaṃ vāṇijyakauśalam samayena bārhaspatyena tatra parijñānaṃ vārtā 
tannimittā ārambhā vārtārambhāḥ 
vārtāsvarūpaṃ jñātvā tadviṣayakāryā pravṛttir ārambhaḥ 
etal lokato vidyāt 
vaṇijyājīvano 'tra loko 'bhipretaḥ 
te hi tatra kuśalā bhavanti 
lokata iti ca pūrvayor anuṣaṅgaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tena sarvatra tadvidbhya iti labhyate 
indriyāṇāṃ jaye yogaṃ samātiṣṭhed divāniśam 
jitendriyo hi śaknoti vaśe sthāpayituṃ prajāḥ 
indriyajayasya brahmacāridharmeṣu sarvapuruṣārthatayopadiṣṭasya punar ihopadeśo rājadharmeṣu mukhyo 'yaṃ vinaya iti jñāpayitum 
tad idam āha jitendriya ityādi 
sarvasyaitat prasiddham ajitendriyasya na prajā vaśe tiṣṭhanti 
yogas tātparyaṃ 
divāniśam ahorātram 
daśa kāmasamutthāni tathāṣṭau krodhajāni ca 
vyasanāni durantāni prayatnena vivarjayet 
idam aparam indriyajayopadeśasya prayojanam 
ajitendriyasya duṣpariharāṇi vyasanāni 
durantāni duḥkhakaraḥ antaḥ avasānaṃ yeṣām 
prathamaṃ prāptikāle sukhayanti vyasanāni paścāt tu vairasyaṃ janayanti 
tato durantāny ucyante 
atha vā duṣprāpaḥ antaḥ eṣām 
na hi vyasaninas tato nivartituṃ śaknuvanti 
kāmād dhetoḥ samutthānaṃ janma yeṣām 
eṣām varjane prayojanam āha gurulaghubāvaṃ ca 
kāmajeṣu prasakto hi vyasaneṣu mahīpatiḥ 
viyujyate 'rthadharmābhyāṃ krodhajeṣv ātmanaiva tu  
arthadharmaviyogena vyavahita ātmaviyogaḥ 
krodhajeṣu sarvair viyujyate iti viśeṣaḥ 
tānīdānīṃ vyasanāni svanāmato darśayati 
mṛgayākṣo divāsvapnaḥ parivādaḥ striyo madaḥ 
tauryatrikaṃ vṛthāṭyā ca kāmajo daśako gaṇaḥ 
ākheṭakāryo mṛgavadho mṛgayā 
akṣas tadviṣayakrīḍā 
etayos tv anarthatvaṃ prasiddham 
divāsvapnaḥ karmānuṣṭānakāle karmasv avyāpāraḥ 
na divāśabdenāhar eva vivakṣitam 
tad uktam jāgartavye prasuptakāḥ iti 
atha vā mukhya eva divāsvapnaḥ 
sa hi pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvakāryavighātī 
sa ca darśanārthinām anyeṣāṃ tadasaṃpatter dveṣyatājanakaḥ prajāsu 
parivādaḥ rahasi paradoṣāvarjanam 
tena sarvāḥ prakṛtayo virajyanti 
aparivādyānāṃ ca parivāde 'dharmaḥ sthita eva 
striyo madaḥ ity etayor anartharūpatā supratītā 
tauryatrikaṃ nṛtyagītavāditrāṇi 
vṛthāṭyā aprayojanam īṣatprayojanaṃ vā itas tataś ca paribhramaṇam 
daśa parimāṇo daśakaḥ 
kāmajaḥ kāma icchā tato jāyate 
viśiṣṭamukhopabhogārtho vā anubhūtaviśeṣād vā jāyamānaḥ kāmajaḥ 
paiśunyaṃ sāhasaṃ droha īrṣyāsūyārthadūṣaṇam 
vāgdaṇḍajaṃ ca pāruṣyaṃ krodhajo 'pi gaṇo 'ṣṭakaḥ 
amātyādito ye sukṛtabāndhavās tatra yan nigopanīyaṃ tasya prakāśanaṃ paiśunyam 
sāhasaṃ jyāyaso nīcakarmaṇi viniyogaḥ svalpenaivāparādhena karādhānaṃ kārāvarodho vā 
drohaḥ upāṃśuvadhaḥ tatropaghāto vā jīvata eva 
īrṣyā sarvasādhāraṇasya viṣayasya sādhāraṇyavyāvṛttiḥ asahanaṃ vā 
guṇinām guṇeṣu doṣāviṣkaraṇam asūyā 
arthadūṣaṇam arthānām adānaṃ haraṇaṃ vā 
vāgdaṇḍapāruṣye prasiddhe 
krodhaḥ dveṣaḥ 
tatpradhānā etat kurvanti 
dvayor apy etayor mūlaṃ yaṃ sarve kavayo viduḥ 
taṃ yatnena jayel lobhaṃ tajjāv etāv ubhau gaṇau 
uktaṃ tāvat kāmajasya vyasanavargasya lobho mūlam 
viṣayopabhogaspṛhā kāmaḥ icchā abhilāṣaḥ lobhaḥ ity anarthāntaraṃ yataḥ 
krodhajasya kathaṃ lobho mūlam yenocyate tajjāv etāv ubhau gaṇāv iti 
ucyate 
nātra lobhakāraṇatā tayor vargayor abhipretā 
kiṃ tarhi vargadvayatulyatā lobhasya 
yam etāni sarvāṇi vyasanāny anartham upajanayanti tam evaiko lobho vyasanahīnasyāpi 
tad uktam lobhaḥ sarvaguṇān iva iti 
ata upacārata etad uktaṃ tajjāv etāv iti 
yadi lobho na jāyeta kathaṃ samānaphalāni syuḥ 
kāraṇadoṣo hi kāryadoṣaṃ bhāsayati 
atas tatkāryatvād vyasaneṣu ced doṣaḥ dhruvaṃ kāraṇasyāpy asau doṣa ukto bhavati 
atha vā lubdha eva paiśunādibahiṣkāryeṣv abhiṣvaṅgaṃ gacchati 
itaras tu svalpake viṣaye anunayena vopaśāmyati 
seyam upacārāl lobhamūlatā vyasanavargadvayasyocyate 
pānam akṣāḥ striyaś caiva mṛgayā ca yathākramam 
etat kaṣṭatamaṃ vidyāc catuṣkaṃ kāmaje gaṇe 
divāsvapnādibhyo 'sya catuṣkasya gaṇasya bahudoṣataratvaṃ prasiddham eva 
daṇḍasya pātanaṃ caiva vākpāruṣyārthadūṣaṇe 
krodhaje 'pi gaṇe vidyāt kaṣṭam etat trikaṃ sadā 
ayam api trikaḥ paiśunādibhyaḥ pāpīyān iti supratītam 
saptakasyāsya vargasya sarvatraivānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ 
pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ gurutaraṃ vidyād vyasanam ātmavān 
pānadyūtayoḥ pānaṃ garīyaḥ 
tatra hi saṃjñāpraṇāśaḥ anunmattasyonmattatvam apretasya pretatvam kaupīnaprakāśanam śrutaprajñāprahāṇam mitrahāniḥ sadbhir viyogaḥ asadbhiś ca saṃprayogaḥ gītādiṣv arthaghneṣu prasaṅgaḥ ratamantraprakāśanaṃ ca mānino 'py upahāsyatā gambhīraprakṛter api yatkiṃcanavāditā madavegeneti pānadoṣāḥ 
dyūte tu jitam evākṣaviduṣā anakṣajñasyāpi pākṣikaḥ parājayaḥ 
strīdyūtavyasanayor dyūtavyasanaṃ garīyaḥ 
yena tad eva jitaṃ dravyaṃ tasyāpi viṣaṃ bhavati 
tathā ca tannimito vairānubandho jayaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ kevalaṃ parājayaḥ bhuktanāśaḥ 
mūtrapurīṣavegadhāraṇāc ca śarīre śaithilyaṃ vyādhinidānam eva tena kṣudrādibhiḥ svapīḍātiśayāt 
mātary api ca mṛtāyāṃ dīvyaty eva 
kṛtakṛtyeṣu ca na suhṛdbhir api kṛṣyate 
taptāyasapiṇḍavat paradravyāṇi pariharato na pratyayate ca 
kṣudhite durgate 'nnādyupapattyupekṣāviṣayatā sarvaguṇasaṃpannasyāpi tṛṇavad avajñeyatā 
iti dyūtadoṣāḥ 
strīvyasane tv apatyotpattiḥ pratikarmabhojanabhūyiṣṭānubhavanam dharmārthaparigrahaḥ 
śakyā ca strī rājahite niyoktum apavāhayituṃ vā 
strīmṛgayāvyasanayoḥ strīvyasanaṃ garīyaḥ 
adarśanaṃ kāryāṇām strīvyasanasaṅgena rājakāryeṣu ca nirvedaḥ kālātipātanam dharmalopaḥ pānadoṣānubandhaḥ arthaghneṣu cānṛtādiṣu prasaṅga iti 
mrgayāyāṃ tu vyāyāmaḥ pittaśleṣmabandhaḥ medādināśaḥ cale sthire vā kāye lakṣyaparicayaḥ praharaṇe vaiśāradyopajananam grāmyajanaparijayaś ceti 
evaṃ kāmajasya catuṣkasya vargasya svavarge pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pāpīyaḥ 
krodhajasyāpi ca daṇḍapātadoṣānubandhaḥ arthaghneṣv evānṛtādiṣu saṅgaḥ 
daṇḍapātavākpāruṣyayor daṇḍapātanaṃ garīyaḥ 
daṇḍapātane hi śarīravināśādiśakyaṃ pratisaṃdhānam 
vākpāruṣye tv amarṣajaḥ krodhāgniḥ śakyate dānamānāmbhobhiḥ śamayitum 
vākpāruṣyārthadūṣaṇayor vākpāruṣyaṃ garīyaḥ 
tejasvino hi pāruṣyavacanacittasaṃkṣobhe bhayaṃ nāsādayanti 
tathā ca pravādaḥ 
sthiraṃ sādhvasitaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhittvā vāsthipraveśitam 
viśalyam aṅgaṃ kurvanti na vāco hṛdayād api 
rohate sāyakair viddhaṃ vanaṃ paraśunā hatam 
vācā duruktaṃ bībhatsan na saṃdohati vākkṣatam 
bhāgyāyattatvād arthasyeti na tejasvino 'rthadūṣaṇaṃ gaṇayanti 
evam etayor vargayoḥ pūrvasya pūrvasya garīyastvaṃ nidarśitam 
vyasanasya ca mṛtyoś ca vyasanaṃ kaṣṭam ucyate 
vyasany adho 'dho vrajati svar yāty avyasanī mṛtaḥ 
yady api mṛtyuvyasane sarvaṃ haretāṃ tathāpy evaṃ viśeṣaḥ 
mṛtyur asmiṃl loke sarvaharaḥ vyasanaṃ punar iha cāmutra ca 
tad idam āha vyasany adho 'dho vrajati 
narakaṃ gacchatīty arthaḥ 
vyasaniśabdena atyanto 'bhyāsa etadvargaviṣaya ucyate 
ataś cābhyāsaḥ pratiṣidhyate na tv īṣadāsevanam 
vyasanabhūtā hy ete dharārthakāmaprāṇaharā bhavanty anyasyāpi puruṣasya kiṃ punā rājñaḥ 
kiṃ ca asevanam apy ayuktaṃ pānādīnām aśakyaṃ ceti 
yato 'bhyāsapratiṣedhaḥ 
maulāñ chāstravidaḥ śūraṃl labdhalakṣān kulodgatān 
sacivān sapta vāṣṭau vā kurvīta suparīkṣitān 
pitṛpitāmahānvayāgatā bahusutadhanabāndhavāḥ prakaṭagobhūmidhanās taddeśavāsino maulāḥ 
mūlaṃ pratiṣṭhā tatra bhavā maulāḥ 
śāstravidaḥ 
śāstraṃ śāsanaṃ bhṛtyavijñānam 
tenānye 'pi guṇā gṛhyante 
tad yathā prājñaḥ dṛḍhakārī dhārayiṣṇur dakṣaḥ vāgmī prabalaḥ pratipattimān utsāhaprabhāvayuktaḥ kleśasahaḥ śucir dānaśīlaḥ yogyasattvayuktaḥ staṃbhacāpalahīnaḥ priyo vairiṇām akartā iti 
śūraśabdena rājakārye śarīrakalatrāpatyadhanādiṣv api nirapekṣa ucyate 
tathā maraṇe 'bhīruḥ yuddhotsāhī eka eva paribhavabhayād bahubhir virudhyate dṛḍhaprahārī balavān 
labdhalakṣāḥ 
paridṛṣṭakarmatām anenāha 
dṛṣṭakhaḍgavyāpārāḥ kṛtārthādhikārāḥ anubhūtamantribhūmayaḥ 
kulodgatān kulāṃkuśanigṛhītā hy akārye na vartante 
sacivān sahāyān 
nityam ete rājñaḥ pārśvavartino bhaveyuḥ 
sapta vāṣṭau vā 
niyamo 'yam 
yena cālpa ekacittā bhavanti 
tataś ca rājamantra udghāṭikaḥ syāt 
bahūnām api mantrabhedaḥ 
tasmād etāvanta eva kartavyāḥ 
suparīkṣitān dharmārthakāmabhayopadhābhiḥ 
seyaṃ parīkṣocyate 
purohitaḥ  svalpakārye rājñā vyājenādhikṣiptaḥ bahunārthasaṃpradānenāptapuruṣair ekaikam amātyam upajapet rājavināśāya etac ca sarvamantribhyo rocate atha kathaṃ bhavate iti 
pratyākhyāne dharmopadhāśuddhaḥ 
senāpatiḥ  kenacid upadeśena pūrvavad adhikṣiptaḥ bahunā ca saṃpradānenāptapuruṣair ekaikam amātyam upajaped rājavināśāya etac ca sarvamantribhyo rocate atha kathaṃ bhavate iti 
pratyākhyāna arthopadhāśuddhaḥ 
parivrājikā antaḥpure labdhaviśvāsā ekaikam amātyam upajapet  sā rājamahiṣī bhavantaṃ kāmayate kṛtasamāgamopayā iti 
pratyākhhyāne kāmopadhāśuddhaḥ 
rājaprayuktā eva kecit puruṣāḥ pravādam āviṣkuryuḥ kṛtasamayair amātyai rājā hanyate iti 
upalabdhapravādaḥ purohitasyāptaḥ kaścid amātyeṣu mantraṃ śrāvayet imaṃ pravādam upaśrutya bhavatāṃ nigraho rājñā kriyate iti 
teṣām eva cānyatamaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtasaṃvitkaḥ pratyekaṃ rājāmātyeṣūtsāhayet 
tatra ye pratyācakṣate te bhayopadhāśuddhāḥ 
atha vā maulṃās tāvat kuryād arthasamāhartṛsaṃnidhātṝn 
ye arthaṃ grāmebhyaḥ samāharanti samāhṛtaṃ ca rakṣanti viniyuñjate ca 
sarvathārthavyavahāriṇo maulāḥ kartavyā ity uktaṃ bhavati 
śāstravidḥ buddhisacivā mantriṇaḥ 
śūrān balādhyakṣān 
labdhalakṣān ityādi sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṇam 
ekaikasya samuditaparīkṣā ca yoktā rājaviṣayā rājāmātyeṣūtsāhanam iti sā na yukteti manyante 
eṣa eva hi buddhibhedo bhaved amātyānām 
tasmād anyā kācit strī sādhvī prayojyā anyaś ca vināśaviṣaya udāhāryaḥ 
api yat sukaraṃ karma tad apy ekena duṣkaram 
viśeṣato 'sahāyena kiṃ tu rājyaṃ mahodayam 
yat sāmānyaṃ gṛhasthasya gṛhakṛtyaṃ go'śvādipālanaṃ sukaram iti sthitam 
sa eva gāṃ pālayati sa eva dogdhi 
na śakyam etad ekena kartum 
tad apy ekena duṣkaraṃ viśeṣato 'sahāyena 
duṣkaram aśaktena na śakyaṃ kartum 
kathaṃ hy eko gāṃ cārayatu kathaṃ ca bhāryāṃ rakṣatu 
rājyaṃ tu pratimahāraṃbham udayakarma tadyogaḥ phalavāṃś ca 
apekṣamāṇasya mahat phalam udeti 
na caikena ṣāḍguṇyaṃ vedituṃ śakyam 
tasmād ātmasamāḥ parīkṣitāḥ sahāyās teṣu teṣu kāryeṣu kartavyāḥ 
taiḥ sārdhaṃ cintayen nityaṃ sāmānyaṃ saṃdhivigraham 
sthānaṃ samudayaṃ guptiṃ labdhapraśamanāni ca 
tair buddhisacivair mukhyaiś cārthādhikāribhiḥ saha sāmānyaṃ yan nātirahasyaṃ tac cintayet saṃdhivigraham kiṃ saṃdhiḥ saṃprati yukto 'tha vigrahaḥ ubhayatra guṇadoṣān vicārayet 
idaṃ kartavyāvadhāraṇaṃ tu svabuddhyā kuryād yathāsya paraprayojyatā na bhavati 
idaṃ cāparaṃ cintayet sthānam 
tac caturvidham daṇḍakośapurarāṣṭrāṇi 
tatra daṇḍo hastyaśvarathapadātayaḥ 
teṣāṃ pratikarma poṣaṇarakṣaṇādi cintyam 
na hy asamādhānaṃ pradhānam 
tathā kośasya hemarūpyabāhulyaṃ pracurarūpyatā āyavyayalakṣaṇaṃ ca 
kośasya yāni yāny āyasthānāni tāni na vyayitavyāni na vilambanīyāni bhṛtyānām 
tathā rāṣṭrasya deśaparyāyasya svājīva ātmasaṃdhāraṇaḥ parasaṃdhāraṇo nadīvṛkṣāḥ paśavyaḥ śatrudveṣakrāntaprāyaḥ guptagocaraḥ paśumān adevamātṛkaḥ āpadi ca daṇḍakarasaha ityevamādi 
purasya vakṣyati tat syād āyudhasaṃpannam iti 
atha vā sthānaṃ svadeśāc cāpracyavanam 
evaṃ samudāyo 'pi cintyaḥ 
tatra kṛṣir vrajagulamasthānāni vāṇijyaśulkadaṇḍa ity evamādi 
guptiṃ svarāṣṭragatāṃ vakṣyati 
labdhapraśamanaṃ ca devatāśramavidyāvatāṃ dhārmikāṇāṃ ca mānadānatyāgāyogaḥ ucitānāṃ cābhyanujñānam 
sarvabandhanamokṣaḥ 
anugraho dīnavyādhitānām 
utsavānāṃ cāpūrvāṇāṃ pravartanam pravṛttānām anuvṛttiḥ 
yac ca kośadaṇḍopaghātakam adhārmikacaritraṃ tad apanīya dharmavyavahārān sthāpayet 
adharmacāritram akṛtam anyasya kṛtaṃ vānyaiḥ pravartayet 
na vā dharmakṛtaṃ cānyair nivartayed iti 
evaṃ sthānādīni cintyāni 
teṣāṃ svaṃ svam abhiprāyam upalabhya pṛthak pṛthak 
samastānāṃ ca kāryeṣu vidadhyād dhitam ātmanaḥ 
teṣāṃ pṛthak pṛthag ekaikasya rahasy abhiprāyaṃ hṛdayanihitaṃ bhāvam upalabhya samastānāṃ saṃhatānāṃ yat kāraṇaṃ kaścit puruṣaḥ pariṣadi apratibhānavān bhavati rahasi pragalbhaḥ kaścit pariṣady āsāditaprajñaḥ 
tataś ca tān samastān pṛcchet 
tataḥ svayaṃ yad yuktataraṃ hitam ātmane tad vyavasyed vidadhyāt 
tatprāmāṇyaṃ teṣām evānyatamenopadiṣṭaṃ vā yad apratyanīkaṃ nirdoṣaṃ ca 
sarveṣāṃ tu viśiṣṭena brāhmaṇena vipaścitā 
mantrayet paramaṃ mantraṃ rājā ṣāḍguṇyasaṃyutam 
vipaścitā viduṣā arthaśāstrajñena 
paraṃ mantram atyantaṃ gopanīyaṃ mantrayet ṣāḍguṇyayuktam 
adhikataraprajño hi brāhmaṇaḥ dhārmikatvāc ca viśvasanīyaḥ 
nityaṃ tasmin samāśvastaḥ sarvakāryāṇi nikṣipet 
tena sārdhaṃ viniścitya tataḥ karma samārabhet 
tādṛśi brāhmaṇe sarvarāṣṭramaṇḍalaṃ nikṣipya viśvasto rājyasukhaṃ bhuñjīta ca 
tena saha viniścitya yānāsanādi karma vyavahārasaṃgrahādi samācaret 
anyān api prakurvīta śucīn prājñān avasthitān 
samyag arthasamahartṝn amātyān suparīkṣitān 
yad uktam sapta cāṣṭau vā iti tasyāyam apavādaḥ 
arthasamāhartṝn saṃnidhātṝn suparīkṣitān upadhābhiḥ kuryāt 
nirvartetāsya yāvadbhir itikartavyatā nṛbhiḥ 
tāvato 'tandritān dakṣān prakurvīta vicakṣaṇān 
sarva ete mantrajñā vicakṣaṇāḥ vidvāṃsaś cādhikārikāḥ kartavyāḥ 
dakṣān bhayasaṃnidhāne 'py avasādahetāv atyutsāhavantaḥ 
atandritān analasān 
uktaṃ cādhyakṣapracāre
buddhimān anuraktaś ca yukto dharmārthakovidaḥ 
śucir dakṣaḥ kulīnaś ca mantrī yasya sa rājyabhāk 
tasmin nikṣipya kāryāṇi bhogasaṅgī na naśyati 
rājavaśyavidhis tena dānānugrahaṇair iti 
teṣām arthe niyuñjīta śūrān dakṣān kulodgatān 
śucīn ākarakarmānte bhīrūn antarveśmane 
arthe āyavyayavyavahāre 
śucīn artheṣv aspṛhān niyuñjīta 
tāny arthasthānāny udāharaṇena darśayati ākarakarmānta iti 
ākarāḥ suvarṇarūpyādyutpattisaṃskārasthānāni 
karmāntā bhakṣyakārpāsāvāpādayaḥ 
antarveśmane antaḥpurabhojanaśayyāstrīgṛhāṇi 
bhīravas tatra niyojyāḥ 
śūrā hi rājānam ekākinam upajaptā hanyuḥ 
dakṣā sarve 'pi vyutthānaśīlatayā dvandvoparipātam aparigaṇayya svāminaḥ kāryaṃ kāle nātipātayanti 
dūtaṃ caiva prakurvīta sarvaśāstraviśāradam 
iṅgitākāraceṣṭajñaṃ śuciṃ dakṣaṃ kulodgatam 
dūtasyāyam adhiko guṇaḥ iṅgitākāraceṣṭajñatā 
paraviṣaye rājño mantriṇāṃ ca saṃdhitsatām iṅgitāni dūtasyādareṇa saṃparigrahaḥ viśvasanam muhur muhuḥ saṃpūrṇatadvākyasya tasya cābhinandanam 
etāni viparyastāny upekṣeta 
ākāraḥ śarīravaikṛtyaṃ mlānir mukhasya varṇavaikṛtyaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvo dīrghoṣṇaniḥśvāsatā 
evamādivikārair dainyaṃ sūcayati asti kācid āpadasya tenāyaṃ vivarṇaḥ iti 
vākyavaiśāradyam śārīrasaṃskāraḥ prasannamukhatā evamādi harṣaṃ sūcayati 
śuciḥ strīgate 'rthe gamanaviśeṣaiḥ 
yataḥ strīsaṃbandhe mantrabhedaḥ paribhavaś ca 
anuraktaḥ śucir dakṣaḥ smṛtimān deśakālavit 
vapuṣmān vītabhīr vāgmī dūto rājñaḥ praśasyate 
anuraktaḥ ahāryo bhavati 
dakṣaḥ deśakālau nātikrāmati 
smṛtimān amuṣitasmṛtiprasaṅgena svāmisaṃseśaṃ kathayati 
deśakālavit deśakālau jñātvānyad apy asaṃdiṣṭaṃ tatkālayogyaṃ kathayati 
vapuṣmān svākṛtiḥ priyadarśanatvān nipuṇam ucitaṃ vakti 
vītabhīḥ anena nipuṇam ucyate 
vāgmī saṃdeśasyottare prativacanasamartho bhavati 
uktānāṃ dūtaguṇānāṃ saṃpādanaprayatne prayojanam āha 
amātye daṇḍa āyatto daṇḍe vainayikī kriyā 
nṛpatau kośarāṣṭre ca dūte saṃdhiviparyayau 
amātye senāpatau daṇḍo hastyādibalam āyattam tadicchayā kāryeṣu pravṛtteḥ 
daṇḍe vainayikī 
yo vineyaḥ svapararāṣṭragataḥ sa daṇḍyo yataḥ 
vinayāśritā vainayikī 
kriyā kāryam 
nṛpatau kośrāṣṭre āyatte 
saṃcayasthānaṃ kośaḥ 
rāṣṭraṃ janapadaḥ 
dve ca te parādhīne na kartavye svayam eva vilambhanīyaphalagrāsāc ca 
dūte saṃdhiviparyayau 
priyavacanena svāmikāryapradarśanena saṃdhiḥ tadvaiparītyena vigrahaḥ 
etad ubhayaṃ dūtāyattam 
evaṃ dūtārthānuvādaḥ 
eṣa evārthaḥ punar ucyate 
dūta eva hi saṃdhatte bhinatty eva ca saṃhatān 
dūtas tat kurute karma bhidyante yena mānavāḥ 
dūtaḥ saṃdhatte yathoktam 
saṃhatān ekībhūtān sa eva bhinatti 
anuktam api priyaṃ saṃdiśati pratikūlam anācaritam ityādi 
suvarṇādidravyam apratiśrutam ity āha 
evaṃ bhinatti dūtaḥ 
tad etat karmāntaropadiṣṭam yena rājāno bhidyante 
vākpāruṣyāpannā evaṃ saṃbhavanti 
anyad api dūtakāryaṃ darśayati 
sa vidyād asya kṛtyeṣu nigūḍheṅgitaceṣṭitaiḥ 
ākāram iṅgitaṃ ceṣṭāṃ bhṛtyeṣu ca cikīrṣitam 
budhvā ca sarvaṃ tattvena pararājacikīrṣitam 
tathā prayatnam ātiṣṭhed yathātmānaṃ na pīḍayet
