sa dūto yātvyasya rājñaḥ kṛtyeṣu kāryeṣu 
jāṅgalaṃ sasyasaṃpannam āryaprāyam anāvilam 
ramyam ānatasāmantaṃ svājīvyaṃ deśam āvaset 
dhanvadurgaṃ mahīdurgam abdurgaṃ vārkṣam eva vā 
nṛdurgaṃ giridurgaṃ vā samāśritya vaset puram 
uktaprakāreṇa dviguṇotsedhenaiṣṭakena śailena dvādaśahastād ūrdhvam uddhatena tālamūlena kapiśīrṣacitāgreṇa dṛḍhapraṇālyā parikṛtaṃ mahīdurgam 
agādhenāśrayaṇīyena codakena pariveṣṭitam abdurgam 
samantato 'rdhayojanamātraṃ ghanamahāvṛkṣānvitaṃ vārkṣam 
caturaṅgabalādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravarāyudhavīrapuruṣaprāyaṃ nṛdurgam 
giripṛṣṭhe durāroham evaikamārgānugatam antarnadīprasravaṇodakaṃ giridurgam 
sarveṇa tu prayatnena giridurgaṃ samāśrayet 
eṣāṃ hi bāhuguṇyena giridurgaṃ viśiṣyate 
trīṇy ādyāny āśritās tv eṣāṃ mṛgagartāśrayāpsarāḥ 
trīṇy uttarāṇi kramaśaḥ plavaṅgamanarāmarāḥ 
ādyāni trīṇi dhanurdurgādīni 
āśritāḥ āśrayaṃ kṛtavantaḥ 
mṛgāḥ 
gartāśrayā gargaranakulādayaḥ 
apsarā grāhakūrmādayaḥ 
eṣāṃ durgāṇāṃ tadāśritānāṃ ca yādṛśā guṇadoṣās tādṛśā eva rājñām api bhavantīti pradarśanārtham 
trīṇy uttarāṇi 
plavaṅgamāḥ kapayaḥ 
yathā durgāśritān etān nāpahiṃsanti śatravaḥ 
tathārayo na hiṃsanti nṛpaṃ durgasamāśritam 
durgavidhānaprayojanaśloko 'yam 
atyalpabalā api durgāśritā mahābalair aribhir na sahasā śakyante 'bhibhavitum ato durgāśrayo yuktaḥ 
ekaḥ śataṃ yodhayati prākārastho dhanurdharaḥ 
śataṃ daśasahasrāṇi tasmād durgaṃ vidhīyate 
suprasiddham etad durgaprayojanam 
prākāradṛṣṭāntena giridurgabalam etad iti 
tad ayuktam mahīdurge 'pi prākārasaṃbhavāt 
tasmāt sarveṣāṃ durgāṇāṃ tatprayojanaṃ svabuddhyā rūpyate 
tat syād āyudhasaṃpannaṃ dhanadhānyena vāhanaiḥ 
brāhmaṇaiḥ śilpibhir yantrair yavasenodakena ca 
āyudhaiḥ khaḍgaprāsādibhiḥ saṃpannam upetam 
āyudhagrahaṇaṃ varmaśirastrāṇopaskārāder anyasyāpi yuddhopakaraṇasya pradarśanārtham 
dhanaṃ rūpyasuvarṇādīni 
vāhanāni rathāśvādayaḥ 
śilpibhir yantrāvāhatakṣaprabhṛtibhiḥ 
yavasena 
brāhmaṇair mantripurohitair anyair vā 
daṇḍikāpotena dhvajaśaṅkayā kadācin nṛpadharmasāhāyyena pravartante 
pradarśanārthatvāc ca bhiṣagauṣadhādy apekṣeta 
saṃrohaṇādyupayogi saṃnidhāpayitavyam 
tasya madhye suparyāptaṃ kārayed gṛham ātmanaḥ 
guptaṃ sarvartukaṃ śubhraṃ jalavṛkṣasamanvitam 
suparyāptam 
yāvad ātmano rājño rājaputrakośāyudhāśvāgārādiṣūpayujyate 
guptaṃ bahukakṣākam 
gṛhaṃ kārayet 
sarvartukaṃ sarvartumālyaphalaiḥ śobhitam 
sarve ṛtavo yatreti 
ṛtuśabdena tatkāryāṇi puṣpaphalādīni lakṣyante 
sarvartugam iti pāṭhe sarvān ṛtūn gacchati prāpnotīti vyutpattiḥ 
arthas tu sa eva 
yo yatra bhavati sa tena vyāpta ity ucyate 
śubhraṃ sudhādhavalitam 
jalavṛkṣasamanvitaṃ dhārāgṛhodyānavanasaṃpannam 
tad adhyāsyodvahed bhāryāṃ savarṇāṃ lakṣaṇānvitām 
kule mahati saṃbhūtāṃ hṛdyāṃ rūpaguṇānvitām 
tad gṛham āśritya bhāryā tatra sahāyārthaṃ mahataḥ kulād udvoḍhavyā 
etatsaṃbandhena saṃrakṣaṇārtham 
savarṇām ityādāv ucyate tat prāk pradarśitam 
hṛdyāṃ manoramāṃ kāntilāvaṇyayuktām 
rūpaṃ saṃsthānam 
guṇā vacanācaraṇādayaḥ 
tair anvitāṃ yuktām 
purohitaṃ ca kurvīta vṛṇuyād eva cartvijaḥ 
te 'sya gṛhyāṇi karmāṇi kuryur vaitānikāni ca 
saty api dvitīyānirdeśe na prādhānyāvagame vivakṣitam evaikatvam anyatrāpy upādānāt yūpaṃ chinatti bhāryāṃ vindeta itivat 
ṛtvijo vṛṇuyāt 
teṣāṃ ca saṃkhyā śrutita evāvagantavyā 
guṇāś ca nātisthūlo nātikṛśaḥ nātidīrgho nātihrasvaḥ nātivṛddho nātibālaḥ 
saptapuruṣān vidyātapobhyāṃ puṇyaiś ca karmabhiḥ samanuṣṭhitobhayabhāvān 
tān prati nābrāhmaṇyam āśaṅkyate vidvān yājayati ityādi 
gṛhyāṇi karmāṇi śāntisvastyayanādīni 
vaitānikāni vaihārikāṇi tretāgniviṣayāṇi 
yajeta rājā kratubhir vividhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ 
dharmārthaṃ caiva viprebhyo dadyād bhogān dhanāni ca 
āptadakṣiṇair bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ pauṇḍarīkādibhiḥ 
bhogān dhanāni ca 
vastragandhavilepanādayo bhojanaviśeṣāś ca bhogāḥ 
dhanāni suvarṇādīni 
nityam eva taddānam icchanti 
dharmārthaṃ tasyotpattyartham eva 
sāṃvastsarikam āptaiś ca rāṣṭrād āhārayed balim 
syāc cāmnyāyaparo loke varteta pitṛvan nṛṣu 
baliṃ karaṃ dhānyādīnāṃ ṣaṣṭhāṣṭamādibhāgam 
āptair arthādyupadhāśuddhaiḥ 
yathoktam āmnāyaparaś ca syāt 
āgamapradhānatarkaśāstrāṇy āśrayet 
atha vā pāraṃparyāgatam eva bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāt nādhikam 
varteta pitṛvan nṛṣu 
karadeṣv anyeṣu ca snehabuddhyā varteta 
adhyakṣān vividhān kuryāt tatra tatra vipaścitaḥ 
te 'sya sarvāṇy avekṣeran nṝṇāṃ kāryāṇi kurvatām 
adhyakṣā adhikṛtāḥ pratyavekṣitāraḥ tān kuryāt 
vividhān bahuprakārān mṛdūn ugrān dhārmikān arthārjanaparāṃś ca 
tatra tatra suvarṇakoṣṭhāgāre paṇyakupyakarmasv adhikṛtāḥ pratyavekṣitāras tān śulkanauhastyaśvarathapadātyādīn vipaścitaḥ sthāpayet 
sarva ete amātyaguṇasaṃpady uktā vijñeyāḥ 
yathoktam adhyakṣapracāre te 'dhyakṣāḥ sarvāṇi kāryāṇy avekṣerann anyeṣāṃ nṛṇāṃ tatsthānopayogināṃ kāryāṇi kurvatām hastyadhyakṣeṇa hastipakāḥ aśvādhyakṣeṇa turaṅgamādyāḥ gavādhakṣeṇa karṣaṇādayaḥ 
āvṛttānāṃ gurukulād viprāṇāṃ pūjako bhavet 
nṛpāṇām akṣayo hy eṣa nidhir brāhmo 'bhidhīyate 
gurukule 'dhītāvagatavedārthā gārhasthyaṃ pratipitsavo dhanena pūjayitavyāḥ 
idam api naiyyamikadānam 
ata evāha nṛpāṇām akṣaya iti 
nityatvād akṣayo yāvajjīvikaḥ 
kāmyatve cāphalabhāvi nivartate 
yad uktam sāṃtānikaṃ yakṣyamāṇam iti tad evedam 
anye tv āhuḥ 
tatrārthibhyo dānaṃ vihitam iha tv anarthinām adhikārāt vidhānamātrayā vastrayugādidānena ca narāṇāṃ pūjā kartavyā 
tathā cāha viprāṇāṃ pūjako bhaved iti 
nidhir iva nidhiḥ uttamaphalatvāt 
brahmasaṃnihito brāhmaḥ 
na taṃ stenā na cāmitrā haranti na ca naśyati 
tasmād rājñā nidhātavyo brāhmaṇeṣv akṣayo nidhiḥ 
brāhmaṇebhyo yo 'rtho dattaḥ na taṃ stenā āṭavikādayaḥ amitrāś ca śatravo haranti 
na bhūmiṣṭham iva vismṛtya prātibhāvyena vā naśyati 
na skandati na cyavate na vinaśyati karhicit 
variṣṭham agnihotrebhyo brāhmaṇasya mukhe hutam 
eṣa evārtho 'vaśyānuṣṭheyaḥ prakārāntareṇa punar ucyate 
agnau yad dhūyate tat kadācit skandati adhaḥ patati hūyamānam tathā cyavate puroḍāśādi kṣāmatayā 
tataś ca karmavaiguṇayād vinaśyati śiṣṭānām 
idaṃ tu yad brāhmaṇebhyo dānam na tasyaite doṣāḥ santi 
ata evāha variṣṭham agnihotrebhyaḥ agnau homebhya ity arthaḥ 
mukhyārthavṛttyā karmanāmadheyam evāgnihotraśabdas tadā cādigrahaṇaṃ vyākhyeyam 
mukhe hutam iti 
pāṇir eva brāhmaṇasya mukham pāṇyāsyo hi dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ it vacanāt 
variṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭham 
arthavādaś cāyam na punar homanindaiva 
samam abrāhmaṇe dānaṃ dviguṇaṃ brāhmaṇabruve 
ācārye śatasāhasram anantaṃ vedapārage 
viprebhya iti ca prakṛtam 
tathā ca prāg apy uktam vedatattvārthaviduṣe brāhmaṇāya iti 
na ca yathāśrutadānaphalopapattiḥ 
kīdṛśaṃ hi tatsāmyam jātitaḥ parimāṇataḥ upakārato vā 
yadi tāvaj jātitas tad iti auṣadhapānoddeśena devalebhyo dattaṃ khādyadānaṃ duḥkhāyaiva syāt 
tiktakaṭukaṣāyāṇi prāyaśa auṣadhāni virecanīyāni na prītijananāni 
atha parmāṇataḥ tatrāpi yadi dravyam anapekṣya kevalaparimāṇasāmyam suvarṇaṃ dattaṃ tatparimāṇaṃ tāmraṃ labhyeta anyad vā mṛtkāṣṭhādi 
atha jātitaḥ parimāṇataś ca tatra prāg uktā eva doṣāḥ 
athopakārataḥ tatrāpi hi yadi tajjātīya evopakāraḥ vyādhinivṛttir auṣadhopakāraḥ 
asati ca vyādhau phalasya vinivṛttiḥ ato vyādhinivṛttiphalakenauṣadhadānena vyādhir ākṣeptavyaḥ 
susamaṃ vā anyaduḥkham iti prāptam 
tasmād yathā nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām upavītaṃ devānām upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kurute ity upavyānaviśeṣān nivītādayo na pṛthag vākyāni tathedam api draṣṭavyam 
atrocyate 
nātrākhyātaśravaṇam asti sarveṣāṃ samatvāt 
tatra yady arthavādaḥ sahasraṃ vedapārage iti tad arthavādo 'stu 
athāyaṃ vidhiḥ vidhyantaraśeṣabhāvāt sarvatra vidhir abhyupetavyaḥ viśeṣābhāvāt 
nivītādiṣu tu upavyathate ity atrākhyātadarśanāt tadarthasya vidhiviṣayatvayogyatvābhāvād ekatvāvagamāc ca yuktārthavad eva tarhy anukto viśeṣaḥ 
yat tu nābrāhmaṇebhyo dānam asti iti tad vismṛtaṃ bhavet dīnānāthādibhyaḥ sarvavarṇebhyo dānasya vihitatvāt 
etāny eva ca vidhāyakāni vākyāni brāhmaṇebhyo rājñāṃ dānasya 
yat tūktaṃ yathāśrutaphalānupapattiḥ sarvaprakāreṇāsyābhyupagamyamānatvāt iti
atrocyate 
laukikīyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ samam iti 
yal loke nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ tad evam ucyate samalavaṇāḥ saktavaḥ iti 
upakārāpekṣā ca dviguṇam iti saṃkhyāśrutiḥ yāvat tasyopakāras tāvad dviguṇo bhavati 
na taddravyaprāptir nāpi tajjātīya evopakāraḥ kiṃ tu prītyatiśayotpattiḥ 
na ceha phalaviśeṣaśrutir yeneyam āśaṅkāpi syāt kiṃ tad eva dravyaṃ prāpyeta uta sa evopakāraḥ iti 
aśrutaphalaviśeṣeṣu svargaḥ phalam 
kiṃ ca tilādidāne prajāptiḥ phalaṃ śrūyate 
tatra kā dravyasāmyāśaṅkā 
tasmāc cāyam apy artha uttarottaro 'tra ca pātrātiśayadānāt phalātiśayasiddhiḥ 
tathā cāha pātrasya hi viśeṣeṇa iti 
brāhmaṇabruve 
bruvaśabdaḥ kutsāyām 
jātimātrabrāhmaṇo 'dhyayanādiguṇahīna ity arthaḥ 
ācārya upanetā 
vedapāragaḥ adhyayanaśravaṇābhyāṃ vedasyāntaṃ gataḥ 
pātrasya hi viśeṣeṇa śraddadhānatayaiva ca 
alpaṃ vā bahu vā pretya dānasya phalam aśnute 
pātayate 'dharmakarmaṇaḥ pātyamānaṃ vā trāyata iti pātraṃ saṃpradānam 
atha vā ghṛtatailādyādhāraḥ pātram upacārād idam api pātram 
atrāpi hi dravyaṃ nidhīyate 
āha ca nṛpāṇām akṣayo hy eṣa nidhir brāhmo 'bhidhīyate iti 
tasya viśeṣo bhedaḥ saguṇanirguṇatvādiḥ 
tena hetunā dānasya phalam avāpyate 
alpaṃ vā 
guṇavate vṛttasvādhyāyasaṃpannāya dattaṃ bahu nirguṇāya tv alpam 
tathā śraddadhānatayāpi vā 
deśakālavidhānena dravyaṃ śraddhāsamanvitam 
pātre pradīyate yat tu tad dharmasya prasādhanam 
tatra deśaḥ svanivāsadeśād anyo jānapadaḥ 
dūradeśaproṣitāyāṃ saṃnihitatvād dattam asya hetur upaghātaḥ 
yajñapravṛttasya kenacid aṅgena nyūnatā 
grahoparāga ity evamādiḥ 
vidhānam 
udakapūrvakasvastivācanasaṃskāratiśayo bhāvaprasāda ityādi 
dravyaṃ gobhūhiraṇyādi 
śraddhā prāptyabhilāṣātiśayaḥ katham idaṃ me nivarteti buddhisaṃtānaḥ 
pretyeti 
kriyāsamantaraṃ phalotpatter aniyamam āha na punar janmāntaraphalatām eva vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phala eva kāmasya niyamāvagamāt 
samottamādhamai rājā tv āhūtaḥ pālayan prajāḥ 
na nivarteta saṃgrāmāt kṣātraṃ dharmam anusmaran 
sarvopāyaparikṣaye rājño vihitaṃ yuddham 
tatra saṃgrāmabhūmigatasyāhūtasya samanyūnādhikabalenopekṣāpratiṣedhārtham idaṃ padam 
na mantavyaṃ nikṛṣṭabalaṃ na hanmīti 
atha vā ye śatrava āṭavikādayaḥ prāksthitāṃ maryādām atilaṅghya deśam utkrāmanti śatrubhir vā rājñaḥ saṃdadhate na cet te yuddhena vinā niyantuṃ śakyante tadā nikṛṣṭabalair api tair yoddhavyam eva 
yady api tair asau śabdena nāhūtaḥ vastutas tv āhūta eva bhavati 
eṣa hi kṣatriyāṇāṃ dharmaḥ yad āhūtaḥ prakṛtais tair yuddhe sarveṇa saha yoddhavyam eva 
jātivayaḥśikṣāpuruṣakārādi nāpekṣitavyam 
eṣa dharmaḥ smartavyaḥ 
saṃgrāmeṣv anivarttitvaṃ prajānāṃ caiva pālanam 
śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājñāṃ śreyaskaraṃ param 
trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tulyaphalatvāya śloko 'yam 
āhaveṣu mitho 'nyonyaṃ jighāṃsanto mahīkṣitaḥ 
yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ 
āhūyante yuddhārtham itare yatra vīrāḥ sa āhavaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ 
mithaḥ spardhamānāḥ 
anyonyaṃ parasparaṃ jighāṃsanto hananecchavaḥ 
yuddhyamānāḥ praharantaḥ 
paraṃ śaktyā parayā śaktyā yathābalam ity arthaḥ 
chāndasatvāt parayā ity asya sthāne param iti rūpam 
aparāṅmukhāḥ yuddhyamānāḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ 
svargaṃ yānti 
nanu ca rājyalobhāt pravṛttānāṃ dṛṣṭasya phalasya saṃbhavāt kutaḥ svargaḥ 
ucyate 
na kūṭair āyudhaiḥ ityādinā vakṣyamāṇayuddhaniyamāpekṣaḥ svargaḥ 
na hi teṣāṃ niyamānām anyat prayojanam asti 
atha vā niścite parājaye nirāśasya yad yuddhāvataraṇam tac ca svargāyaiva tyaktarājyasyāpi śaktapraṇipātena tadanujīvanasaṃbhavāt 
tasmād arhas tatphalasaṃbhavaḥ 
asmād eva vacanān nātmatyāganiṣedhasya viṣayo 'yam 
mahīkṣitaḥ maṇḍaleśvarāḥ na punas tadanujīvinaḥ 
teṣāṃ hi svāmyarthaiva pravṛttiḥ na svārthā 
ataś ca kutas teṣāṃ phalasaṃbhavaḥ ṛtvijām iva dakṣiṇāpaṇena parikrītānām 
evam eṣām api bhṛtiparikrītānāṃ kutaḥ svargādiphalotpattiḥ 
nanu ca aviśeṣeṇaitad uktam
udyatair āhave śastraiḥ kṣatradharmahatasya ca 
sadyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate yajñaḥ  iti 
tathā
dvāv imau puruṣau loke sūryamaṇḍalabhedinau 
parivrāḍ yogayuktaś ca śūraś cābhimukho hataḥ  iti 
tathā bhārate yuddhaprekṣiṇām api svargaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ 
mantraliṅgāni ca santi
ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūraso ye tanutyajaḥ 
ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt 
sahasradakṣiṇānāṃ yajamānānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ ca raṇaśirasi tyaktaprāṇānāṃ mahāphalatvaṃ darśayanti ye yudhyante 
na ca maraṇāyaiva kriyante 
na hi saṃparigrahakāle 'yam upasaṃvādo 'sti yathā hotrodgātrādīnāṃ svapravacanasamākhyāniyatārtvijyapadārthānuṣṭhānāyaiva varaṇam 
tasmāt prabhukāryoddeśena yan maraṇaṃ tad anukrāntaphalāyaiva 
na ca paraprayuktāt karmaṇo 'nyasya phalaṃ nāsti 
aśvamedhāvabhṛthe hi brahmaghnasya snānād ayajamānasyaiva śuddhiḥ 
atrocyate 
prajārthe yuddhe prāṇatyāgo dharmāyaiva 
yad uktam udyatair āhave iti tadā bhṛtiparikrītasyāsvatantrasya yasya vā kuru prayāṇaṃ raṇe ity eva parikaro baddhas tadapekṣaṃ etat yajñasaṃsthāvacanam 
evaṃbhūtaś ca abhimukho hataḥ iti 
atha vā narakābhāva eva sūryamaṇḍalabhedanam yuddhyamānasya bhaviṣyati 
yatra viṣayāntareśvareṇa rājñā parasya rājño viṣayo hanyate bhajyate jano lupyet tatra tadarthaṃ yuddhe prāṇatyāgo dharmārthaḥ 
andhatamo hi narake tadabhāvāt sati prākāśye sūryamaṇḍalabhedanavacanam 
sūryamaṇḍalaṃ bhinatti upariṣṭāl lokān āpnoti nādhaḥprapatatīty arthaḥ 
bhṛtiparikrītasya prabhoḥ saṃgrāme samupasthite tam eva jahato narakanipatanam tadarthaṃ yudhyamānasya bhartṛpiṇḍānṛṇyaṃ gatavato duṣkṛtenāpratibadhyamānasya svaiḥ sukṛtair yukta eva svargādilābhaḥ 
ata uktam sadyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate yajñaḥ iti 
avyavadhānena yajñaphalam aviśeṣaśrutau svargam avāpnotīty arthaḥ 
evaṃ bhārate 'pi bhṛtiparikrītānāṃ svargaphalāvāptivacanam upapadyate 
yuddhaprekṣiṇāṃ tu svargāvāptir arthavāda eva 
atha vā bahuṣu jīvanopāyeṣu satsu yac chastreṇa jīvanaṃ tato niyamāt svargaḥ 
yat tu na maraṇāya krīyanta iti śastrabhṛtāṃ bhṛtidāne nānyad yuddhāt prayojanam asti viśeṣānupadeśāt  sarvakāryodyatāḥ sarvaprakāraṃ madarthaḥ saṃpādanīya iti parikrīyante  tatra yadā yuddham upasthitaṃ bhavati tadā ā śarīrapātāt prabhor arthaḥ kartavyaḥ tathānṛṇyaṃ bhavati 
anupasthite tu yuddhe yadi bhṛtyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati tadā sarve 'nṛṇā eva 
udyukte hy asau tatkārye tādṛśa evāsyopasaṃvādaḥ 
yuddhakāle yoddhavyaṃ bhavatīti liṅgadarśanam api tūpapadyata eva 
aśvamedhāvabhṛte tu spaṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tasmāt samāgame teṣām iti 
iha tu yuddhasādhyam iti viśeṣaḥ 
tān idānīm adṛṣṭārthān niyamān darśayati 
na kūṭair āyudhair hanyād yudhyamāno raṇe ripūn 
na karṇibhir nāpi digdhair nāgnijvalitatejanaiḥ 
kūṭāni yāni bahiḥkāṣṭhamayāny antarniśitaśastrāṇi 
karṇinaḥ 
śarā ye śalyasya mūle madhye vā karṇākāraiḥ phalakaiḥ kriyante 
te hi praviṣṭā duruddharā bhavanti uddhriyamāṇāḥ prahārair abhinnam api śariraikadeśaṃ bhindanti 
digdhāḥ viṣopaliptāḥ 
agninā jvalitam ādīpitaṃ tejomayaphalakaṃ yeṣām 
etair na yoddhavyam 
na ca hanyāt sthālārūḍhaṃ na klībaṃ na kṛtāñjalim 
na muktakeśaṃ nāsīnaṃ na tavāsmīti vādinam 
rathasthena rathārūḍha eva hantavyaḥ sthalasthito na hantavyaḥ 
klībo napuṃsakaḥ pauruṣahīno vā 
anyatra dṛḍha āsīna upaviṣṭo rathapṛṣṭhe bhūmau vā 
tavāsmīti vadati yas tam api na hanyāt 
śabdaniyamo 'tra na vivakṣitaḥ 
dīnaṃ vadann evaṃjātīyakair api śabdaiḥ tvadīyo 'ham tvām āśrito 'smi iti na hantavyaḥ 
na suptaṃ na visannāhaṃ na nagnaṃ na nirāyudham 
nāyudyamānaṃ paśyantaṃ na pareṇa samāgatam 
na nagnam 
na bhagnam iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
visannāhasya pratiṣedhān nagnasya prāptir eva nāsti 
tena śirastrāṇādyabhāvenaikadeśena nagnatayā nagno draṣṭavyaḥ 
bhagasyāpi parāvṛttapratiṣedhāt saṃmukhastho 'pi tvayā saha na yudhyeyam iti vakti sa nānubandhanīyo 'vaśyaṃ yoddhavyam iti 
nāyudhyamānaṃ paśyantaṃ 
yaḥ prekṣaka eva kevalaḥ sa na hantavyaḥ 
yas tu prekṣate yudhyate ca na tatra pratiṣedhaḥ 
pareṇa samāgataḥ 
anyena saha yudhyamāno 'nyena na hantavyaḥ 
nāyudhavyasanaprāptaṃ nārtaṃ nātiparikṣatam 
na bhītaṃ na parāvṛttaṃ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran 
āyudhavyasanam āyudhakṛcchram āyudhabhaṅgaḥ kuṇḍalibhāvaḥ khaḍgasya jyācheda ity evamādiḥ taṃ prāptam 
ārtaḥ hataputrabhrātrādiḥ 
bhītaṃ mukharāgādinā vijñāya śastrasaṃmukham api 
parāvṛttaṃ pratyāvṛtya sthitam 
ete niyamāḥ 
pratiṣedhapakṣe pratyavāyaḥ 
tadā ca svargaprāptivacanam arthavādaḥ 
kiṃ punar atra yuktam 
puruṣārthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayet itivat 
tathā hi naño mukhyārthavṛttitā bhavati 
satāṃ dharmam iti 
śiṣṭānām eṣa ācāra ity āha anusmarann iti 
yas tu bhītaḥ parāvṛttaḥ saṃgrāme hanyate paraiḥ 
bhartur yad duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ pratipadyate 
naivaṃ mantavyam parāvṛtto yadi hanyate tadā duṣkṛtī ahatas tu neti 
kiṃ tarhi parāvṛttamātranibandhanaṃ doṣavacanam 
kiṃ ca na parāvṛttahateneyaṃ buddhiḥ kartavyā anubhūtakhaḍgaprahāro 'smy anṛṇaḥ kṛtabhartṛkṛtyaḥ iti 
tathāvidhāḥ prahārā na kasmaicid arthāyeti doṣātiśayadarśanena darśayati bhartṛsaṃbandhiduṣkṛtam iti 
yac ca vacanam uttaratra tadīyasukṛtagrahaṇam iti tad arthavādaḥ 
na hy anyena kṛtaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ vānyasya saṃbhavati 
na ca sukṛtasya nāśaḥ 
kiṃ tu mahatā duṣkṛtena pratibandhe cirakālabhāvitā sukṛtasya phalasyocyate 
yac cāsya sukṛtaṃ kiṃcid amutrārtham upārjitam 
bhartā tat sarvam ādatte parāvṛttahatasya tu 
yac cāsya sukṛtaṃ kiṃcid bhartā tat sarvam ādatta iti 
amutrārtham upārjitam 
artho 'syāstīty arthaḥ 
arśa āditvāc ac 
amutrāmuṣmiṃl loke yat prayojanaṃ tad arjitaṃ tad asya niṣphalaṃ bhavati 
amutrārtho 'syeti vā amutrārtham 
vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiḥ gamakatvāt prayojakatvāc ca 
rathāśvaṃ hastinaṃ chatraṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ paśūn striyaḥ 
sarvadravyāṇi kupyaṃ ca yo yaj jayati tasya tat 
kupyaṃ śayanāsane tāmrabhājanādi 
yo yaj jayati tasya tat 
rājñaḥ svāmitvād grahaṇe prāpte tadapavādārtham etat 
suvarṇarūpyabhūmyāvāsakādi rājña eva 
evamarthaṃ parigaṇanam 
āyudhasaṃvāhanādi rājña eva 
dhānyādīnāṃ pṛthagupādānād dhanaśabdena gomahiṣyādikam ucyate 
tathā rājadhanaṃ cārdham iti prayuñjate 
rājñaś ca dadyur uddhāram ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ 
rājñā ca sarvayodhebhyo dātavyam apṛthagjitam 
yena yaj jitaṃ tena tad grahītavyam ity asyāyaṃ viśeṣa ucyate 
svayam uddhāraṃ rājñe dadyur uttamadravyam uddhṛtya dadyur ity arthaḥ 
na sarvaṃ tair grahītavyam 
iti eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ 
indro vai vṛtraṃ hatvā ityādy upakramya sa mahān bhūtvā devatā abravīd uddhāraṃ ma uddharata iti 
rājñā vā pṛthagjaye svayaṃjaye yatrāyaṃ vibhāgo nāsti anenāyaṃ grāmo jitaḥ eṣa ca parakīyaḥ sāmantādiḥ sarveṇa sarva utkhātamūlaḥ sakṛtkṛtaḥ tatra rājñā labdhapraśamananyāyena bhṛtyāḥ saṃvibhajanīyāḥ 
eṣo 'nupaskṛtaḥ prokto yodhadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 
asmād dharmān na cyaveta kṣatriyo ghnan raṇe ripūn 
upasaṃhāro 'yam 
yodhā yoddhāraḥ teṣāṃ dharmo yodhadharmaḥ 
anupaskṛtaḥ agarhitaḥ avikrto vā 
ata evāha sanātanaḥ 
svecchayā pravartito vikṛtaḥ syāt 
na cyaveta na caleta sarvadānutiṣṭhet 
kṣatriyagrahaṇaṃ mukhyas tasyātrādhikāra iti darśayitum na tv anyasya tatsthānāpannasya nāyaṃ dharma iti 
alabdhaṃ caiva lipseta labdhaṃ rakṣet prayatnataḥ 
rakṣitaṃ vardhayec caiva vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet 
na kṣatriyaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ syād brāhmaṇavat kiṃ tv alabdhārjane yatnaṃ kuryāt 
arjitaṃ ca dhanaṃ rakṣet 
rakṣitaṃ ca vardhayet 
kośasaṃcayaṃ kuryāt 
tataḥ pātrebhyo dadyāt 
na yathāyaṃ vyayaṃ kuryāt 
tad uktam āyād alpataro vyayaḥ iti 
etac caturvidhaṃ vidyāt puruṣārthaprayojanam 
asya nityam anuṣṭhānaṃ samyak kuryād atandritaḥ 
puruṣasya ye 'rthās teṣām prayojanaṃ caturvidham 
catasra etāḥ kriyās tatra prayojyāḥ arjanarakṣaṇavardhanadānāni 
upakāravacano 'rthaśabdaḥ 
puruṣārthasiddhyartham etat prayojanam 
tasya caturvidhasya prasaktasya nityam anuṣṭhānaṃ kuryāt   
alabdham icched daṇḍena labdhaṃ rakṣed avekṣayā 
rakṣitaṃ vardhayed vṛddhyā vṛddhaṃ pātreṣu nikṣipet 
nityam udyatadaṇḍaḥ syān nityaṃ vivṛtapauruṣaḥ 
nityaṃ saṃvṛtasaṃvāryo nityaṃ chidrānusāry areḥ 
udyato daṇḍo 'nenety udyatadaṇḍaḥ 
udyata udyuktaḥ savyāpāra iti yāvat 
tatra hastyādibalaṃ nityaṃ yogyābhir abhivinayet 
śikṣā vāhanadamanādibhir vidheyā 
karaṇayogyā abhyāsāś ca 
tadvāhanādiṣu vastrābharaṇasaṃskāra ityādir udyatadaṇḍatā 
tathā kurvato 'syotsāhaśaktiyogo maṇḍale prakāśībhavati 
tathā nityaṃ vivṛtapauruṣaḥ 
vivṛtaṃ prakāśatām āgataṃ pauruṣaṃ kartavyam 
saṃdhipālāṭavīsthānādiṣv āptapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ saṃniruddhāḥ kavacinaḥ satataṃ jāgaraṇārthaṃ niyojyāḥ 
nityaṃ saṃvṛtasaṃvāryaḥ 
saṃvaraṇīyaṃ saṃgopanīyam ātmagataṃ kṛtvā tatsthānaṃ saṃvṛtaṃ kartavyam upagraheṇa paropajāparakṣaṇena ca 
nityaṃ chidrānusaraṇena sarvaṃ śatroḥ kṛtyapakṣaṃ jñātvā jhaṭ iti tad upajāpaḥ 
nityam udyatadaṇḍasya kṛtsnam udvijate jagat 
tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni daṇḍenaiva prasādhayet 
anantarasya phalam 
sarvaṃ jagad udvijate bibheti 
pratāpakhyātir bhavati ceti 
tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni svaprakṛtīḥ parāṃś ca daṇḍenaiva prasādhayet 
evaṃ yatnavato bhītāḥ śatravo namanty ayatnenaiva 
amāyayaiva varteta na kathaṃcana māyayā 
budhyetāriprayuktāṃ ca māyāṃ nityaṃ susaṃvṛtaḥ 
māyā chadma tena na varteta 
aviśvasanīyas tathā syāt 
na ca paraprakṛtīr ajñātarūpā upajapet 
ariṇā prayuktāṃ ca māyāṃ yathāvad budhyeta 
buddhyā jñātvopajāpaṃ kuryāt 
tatra kṛtyapakṣaś caturvidhaḥ 
kruddhalubdhabhītāvamānitaiḥ 
tatra yena kṛtaṃ śilpaṃ kiṃcid upakāro vā darśitaḥ tau vipralabhyete prasādena niyojyete avamanyete vā 
tadartho 'pi tatsamānaḥ śilpopakārī krudhyati nāsyāsmadīyaṃ śilpam upakāro vopayujyate tādṛśā upajāpasahā bhavanti 
tathā vāllabhyenopagṛhītaḥ paścān mānādhikārābhyāṃ bhraṣṭaḥ pravāsitabandhutadvallabhaḥ prasabham abhipūjya svīkṛtaḥ sakulyair antarhitaḥ sarvasvam āhāritas tatsamānakarmavidyo 'nyaḥ pūjyate so 'vadhīryate ity evamādiḥ kruddhaḥ 
kenacit kṛtaṃ paiśunyaṃ tatsamānadoṣebhyo daṇḍitam antarbhramadaṇdapātāḥ sarvādhikārasthāḥ sahasopacitārthā ityādir lubdhavargaḥ 
parikṣīṇaḥ kadaryo vyasanī bahuṛṇa ityādir bhītavargaḥ 
ātmasaṃbhāvitaḥ śatrupūjām arthitaḥ nīcair upahataḥ tīkṣṇaḥ sāhasiko bhogenāsaṃtuṣṭa ityevamādir avamānitavargaḥ 
etat parasyopajapet ātmanaś ca rakṣet 
nāsya chidraṃ paro vidyād vidyāc chidraṃ parasya ca 
gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ 
eṣa evārthaḥ punar ucyate 
tathā yatnātiśayaṃ kuryād yathā parasya chidram anvicched ātmanaś ca rakṣet 
ya evaṃ kruddhādiḥ kāpaṭikādicārapuruṣair jñāyate sa evātmīyo 'nunīyata iti 
kūrmavad aṅgaṃ gūhed rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ 
paropajāpāt svacchidrarakṣaṇaṃ mahāprayojanam ity etad anenāha 
bakavac cintayed arthān siṃhavac ca parākramet 
vṛkavac cāvalumpeta śaśavac ca viniṣpatet 
yathā apsu durgāśrayam api matsyabalaṃ svabhāvatas tadgrahaṇārthaṃ bakaḥ paryudāsanaparatayā tadgrahaṇopāyaṃ dhyānādiyogād āsādayati evam arthacintābhiyogātiśayena suduṣprāpā apy arthā āsādyanta iti matvā
na nirvedaṃ gacchet 
yathā ca śaśo 'lpakāyatvāc chaknoti niṣpatitum upari saṃghād api tathā eko 'py asahāyaḥ sarvataḥ samutthitasāmantaprakopo 'śakto 'vasthātuṃ durge 'risaṃpātaṃ kṛtvā tasmād viniṣpated guṇavati saṃśrayārtham 
yathā ca vṛkaḥ paśugrahaṇābhiyogād pālapramādam āsādyāvalumpate evaṃ svārakṣāpara iti matvā tadgrahaṇābhiyogo na moktavyaḥ bhaviṣyati sa kālo yatrāyaṃ vṛkavad avaluṃpiṣyate 
yathā siṃho mahākāyān api hastyādīn hanti parākramotsāhaśaktiyogāt evaṃ mahad aribalam iti na bhetavyam alpaprāṇenāpi kadācid utsāhavatā mahāprāṇo nihanyata iti 
evaṃ vijayamānasya ye 'sya syuḥ paripanthinaḥ 
tān ānayed vaśaṃ sarvān sāmādibhir upakramaiḥ 
ye paripanthinaḥ pratipakṣatayā vartante te vaśam ānetavyāḥ na tv ānukūlyena ye vartante 
te 'pi sāmādibhiḥ pūrvam na prathamata eva daṇḍena 
yati te tu na tiṣṭheyur upāyaiḥ prathamais tribhiḥ 
daṇḍenaiva prasahyaitāṃś chanakair vaśam ānayet 
sāmādibhir aśakyā daṇḍena vaśam ānetavyā iti yad uktaṃ tad ida 
daṇḍena prasahya abhibhūya śanakair yādṛśo daṇḍopakramas tena na sāhasikatayā 
sāmādīnām upāyānāṃ caturṇām api paṇḍitāḥ 
sāmadaṇḍau praśaṃsanti nityaṃ rāṣṭrābhivṛddhaye 
vakṣyamāṇānāṃ sāmādīnām upāyānāṃ sāmadaṇḍau nigadyete praśasyatayā 
sati sāmni kṣipraṃ kaṃpo na bhavati 
daṇḍe tu sarvasiddhiḥ 
yathoddharati nirdātā kakṣaṃ dhānyaṃ ca rakṣati 
tathā rakṣen nṛpo rāṣṭraṃ hanyāc ca paripanthinaḥ 
ye rājānam abhidruhyanti teṣāṃ ye suhṛdbāndhavāḥ saṃbandhopasarpiṇo vā na te vināśayitavyāḥ yadi na tatkāryābhyantarāḥ 
ya eva duṣṭās ta eva nigrāhyāḥ na tatsaṃbandhina ity etan nirdātṛdṛṣṭāntena pratipādyate 
yathā dhānyakakṣayoḥ sahotpannayor atyantasahitayor api naipuṇyena dhānyaṃ rakṣati kakṣam uddharati evaṃ svarāṣṭre yāv atyantasuhṛdāv api tayor doṣavān yaḥ sa eva nigrāḥyaḥ na yaḥ susaṅgato 'pi 
ataḥ sādhvasādhuvivekena sādhavo takṣyā asādhavo nigrāhyāḥ 
mohād rājā svarāṣṭraṃ yaḥ karśayaty anavekṣayā 
so 'cirād bhraśyate rājyāj jīvitāc ca sabāndhavaḥ 
yas tu rājā pūrvoktavivekam akṛtvā mohenānavekṣayā svarāṣṭraṃ karśayati sa daṇḍaiḥ saha bhraśyaty acirād rājyāj janapadānanurāgeṇa prakṛtikopena jīvitāc ca 
sāhasikair ekākibhir api jīvitanirapekṣair hanyate 
śarīrakarṣaṇāt prāṇāḥ kṣīyante prāṇināṃ yathā 
tathā rājñām api prāṇāḥ kṣīyante rāṣṭrakarṣaṇāt 
svarāṣṭre 'tyantam avahitenānurāga utpādanīyaḥ 
tad dhi śarīrasthānīyam 
śarīre karśite 'pathyabhojanarukṣabhojanādibhir yathā prāṇā utkrāmanti evaṃ rāṣṭrakarśanād api 
rāṣṭrasya saṃgrahe nityaṃ vidhānam idam ācaret 
susaṃgṛhītarāṣṭro hi pārthivaḥ sukham edhate 
saṃgraho rakṣāvidhānam 
susaṃgṛhītaṃ rakṣāvidhānena vaśīkṛtaṃ paripālitaṃ vā yena svarāṣṭraṃ sa pārthivaḥ sukham edhate 
dvayos trayāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ madhye gulmam adhiṣṭhitam 
tathā grāmaśatānāṃ ca kuryād rāṣṭrasya saṃgraham 
dvayor grāmayor madhye gulmaṃ kuryāt 
gulmo rakṣitṛpuruṣasamūhaḥ 
tenaivādhiṣṭhitaṃ saṃgrahaṃ kuryāt 
tadyuktam adhiṣṭhātāraṃ puruṣaṃ kuryāt 
adhikārī saṃgraha ihocyate 
evaṃ trayāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ ca 
atha vā rājabhāvyārthagrahaṇasthānaṃ saṃgrahaḥ 
grāmasyādhipatiṃ kuryād daśagrāmapatiṃ tathā 
viṃśatīśaṃ śateṣaṃ ca sahasrapatim eva ca 
ekaikasmin grāme 'dhipatiṃ kuryāt 
tadupari daśagrāmapatim 
evaṃ sarvatra 
grāmadoṣān samutpannān grāmikaḥ śanakaiḥ svayam 
śaṃsed grāmadaśeśāya daśeśo viṃśatīśine 
viṃśatīśas tu tat sarvaṃ śateśāya nivedayet 
śaṃsed grāmaśateśas tu sahasrapataye svayam 
ye grāmadoṣā ekagrāmādhikṛtena na śakyante samādhātum tān daśeśāya nivedayet 
evam aśaktau yāvat sahasrapatir vijñāpyaḥ   
yāni rājapradeyāni pratyahaṃ grāmavāsibhiḥ 
annapānendhanādīni grāmikas tāny avāpnuyāt 
ekāgrāmādhikṛtasya vṛttir iyam 
grāmiko grāmādhikṛtas tāny avāpnuyād gṛhṇīyāt vṛttyarthaṃ rājñe pradātavyāni grāmavāsibhiḥ 
annādīni tu dhānyādeḥ ṣaṣṭhāṣṭamabhāgādiḥ 
yathā vakṣati dhānye 'ṣṭamaṃ viṣām ityādi 
daśī kulaṃ tu bhuñjīta viṃśī pañca kulāni ca 
grāmaṃ grāmaśatādhyakṣaḥ sahasrādhipatiḥ puram 
daśasu grāmeṣv adhikṛto daśī 
evaṃ viṃśī 
chāndasaḥ śabdasaṃskāraḥ 
kulaṃ grāmaikadeśaḥ kvacid haṭṭa iti prasiddhaḥ kvacid uṣṭa iti 
etad eva pañcaguṇaṃ viṃśatigrāmeṣv adhikṛtaḥ 
sarvaṃ grāmaśatādhyakṣaḥ 
puraṃ nagaraṃ sahasreśaḥ 
sthānakarmānurūpeṇa vṛttiṃ kalpetety etat satyam 
teṣāṃ grāmyāṇi kāryāṇi pṛthakkāryāṇi caiva hi 
rājño 'nyaḥ savicaḥ snigdhas tāni paśyed atandritaḥ 
teṣāṃ grāmakāryeṣv itaretaraṃ vipratipattiḥ 
anyaḥ svakārye 'nyaḥ sacivo mahattamaḥ snigdho rāgadveṣavarjito darśanāya niyoktavyaḥ 
nagare nagare caikaṃ kuryāt sarvārthacintakam 
uccaiḥsthānaṃ ghorarūpaṃ nakṣatrāṇām iva graham 
uccaiḥsthānaṃ pradhānabhūtam ity arthaḥ 
ghorarūpaṃ pratāpavantam 
nakṣatrāṇām iva grahaṃ aṃgārakam hastyaśvādibalasaṃpannam 
sa tān anuparikrāmet sarvān eva sadā svayam 
teṣāṃ vṛttaṃ pariṇayet samyag rāṣṭreṣu taccaraiḥ 
sa nagarādhikṛtas tān sarvān api patīn anuparikrāmet svabalena pūrayet 
sati prayojane 
teṣāṃ sarveṣām adhipatīnāṃ tadvṛttaṃ samyak pariṇayet samyagrūpatayā parijānīyāt 
kaiḥ 
rājacaraiḥ kāpaṭikādibhiḥ 
rājño hi rakṣādhikṛtāḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ 
bhṛtyā bhavanti prāyeṇa tebhyo rakṣed imāḥ prajāḥ 
parasvam ādātuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ asamyakkāriṇaḥ prāyeṇādhikṛtāḥ santo bhavanti 
prāk śucayo 'pi rakṣanti vittāni 
ataḥ prākśucitvānumānena nopekṣaṇīyāḥ yatnataḥ pratijāgaritavyāḥ 
tebhyo rakṣed imāḥ prajāḥ 
na kevalaṃ rājārthanāśaḥ anavekṣayā yāvat prajā api nirdhanīkurvanti 
ye kāryikebhyo 'rtham eva gṛhṇīyuḥ pāpacetasaḥ 
teṣāṃ sarvasvam ādāya rājā kuryāt pravāsanam 
ye rakṣādhikṛtāḥ kāryikebhyo vyavahartṛbhyo vyāpāravadbhyo halaleśoddeśikayā daṇḍayanti janapadān teṣāṃ sarvasvaharaṇapravāsane rājā kuryāt 
rājakarmasu yuktānāṃ strīṇāṃ preṣyajanasya ca 
pratyahaṃ kalpayed vṛttiṃ sthānakarmānurūpataḥ 
yuktānāṃ niyuktānāṃ strīṇām antaḥpuradāsyādīnām 
preṣyajanasya dolakavāhādeḥ 
pratyahaṃ vṛttiṃ kalpayet na sāṃvatsrīyaṃ sakṛd dadyād grāmaṃ tad ekadeśaṃ vā 
sthānakarmānurūpataḥ 
sthānaṃ pradhānaṃ niyogaḥ śayyārakṣādi karma śarīravyāpāraḥ tadanurūpeṇa vṛttir deyā 
pradhāne sthāne svalpe 'pi karmaṇi mahatī vṛttiḥ nikṛṣṭe sthāne mahaty api karmaṇi svalpetyetad ubhayānurūpam 
paṇo deyo 'vakṛṣṭasya ṣaḍ utkṛṣṭasya vetanam 
ṣāṇmāsikas tathācchādo dhānyadroṇas tu māsikaḥ 
avakṛṣṭaḥ saṃmārjanaśodhanaviniyuktaḥ tasya bhaktārthaṃ paṇo deyaḥ 
utkṛṣṭasya ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣu gateṣv ācchādavastram 
dhānyadroṇaś ca māsikaḥ 
caturāḍhako droṇaḥ 
paṇaparimāṇaṃ vakṣyati 
vṛttikalpanārthā ete 
krayavikrayam adhvānaṃ bhaktaṃ ca saparivyayam 
yogakṣemaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vaṇijo dāpayet karān 
karagrahaṇavidhiḥ 
kiyatā mūlyena krītam etat kiyac ca vikrīyamāṇaṃ labhate kiyatā ca kālena vikrīyate kiyatpratibhāvena naśyati atha na  ityevamādirūpakrayavikrayaparīkṣā 
adhvānaṃ cirāciragamanaprāpyatām 
bhaktaṃ saktvodanādimūlam 
parivyayas tadupakaraṇaṃ sarpiḥsūpaśākādi dhanādi ca 
yogakṣemam araṇye kāntāre vā gacchato rājabhayaṃ caurabhayaṃ niścauratā vetyādi 
etad apekṣya vanigbhyaḥ karā ādātavyāḥ 
vaṇigbhir dāpayet karān iti pāṭho yuktaḥ gatyādiniyamena karmasaṃjñāyā abhāvāt 
daṇḍavacano vā dhātuḥ tadā daṇḍivad dvikarmakatvam 
yathālpālpam adanty ādyaṃ vāryokovatsaṣaṭpadāḥ 
tathālpālpo grahītavyo rāṣṭrād rājñābdikaḥ karaḥ 
kṣīṇakṛṣer nyūnaḥ karo grahītavya ity evam artham etat 
vāryokasaḥ jalaukasaḥ 
ṣaṭpadāḥ bhramarāḥ 
yathā te svalpam ādadānāḥ paripuṣṭā bhavanti tathā rājñā mūlachedo na kartavyaḥ 
yathā phalena yujyeta rājā kartā ca karmaṇām 
tathāvekṣya nṛpo rāṣṭre kalpayet satataṃ karān 
etad evāha 
karmaṇāṃ kartā vāṇijakaḥ rājā ca phalena yujyeta tathā karān kalpayet 
na parimāṇaniyamakāraṇam asti 
yatra mahān lābhas tatrādhikam apy uktaparimāṇātikrameṇa grahītavyam 
pañcāśadbhāga ādeyo rājñā paśuhiraṇyayoḥ 
dhānyānām aṣṭamo bhāgaḥ ṣaṣṭho dvādaśa eva vā 
mūlyādhikayoḥ paśuhiraṇyayoḥ pañcāśadbhāgo grāhyaḥ 
dhānyānāṃ bhāgaviśeṣaḥ sukaraduṣkarāpekṣayā mantavyaḥ 
pañcāśatpūraṇaḥ pañcāśaḥ 
viṃśatyādibhyaḥ iti pakṣe tamaṭ 
pañcaśadbhāga iti pāṭhe dvibhāgādivat saṃkhyāntaram 
ādadītātha ṣaḍbhāgaṃ drumāṃsamadhusarpiṣām 
gandauṣadhirasānāṃ ca puṣpamūlaphalasya ca 
drumaśabdena vṛkṣā ucyante 
śeṣaṃ prasiddham 
eteṣāṃ ṣaṣṭho bhāgo lābhād grahītavyaḥ 
patraśākatṛṇānāṃ ca carmaṇāṃ vaidalasya ca 
mṛnmayānāṃ ca bhāṇḍānāṃ sarvasyāśmamayasya ca 
mriyamāṇo 'py ādadīta na rājā śrotriyāt karam 
na ca kṣudhāsya saṃsīdec chrotriyo viṣaye vasan 
tathā kuryād yathā kṣudhāsya viṣaye śrotriyo nāvasīdati 
yasya rājñas tu viṣaye śrotriyaḥ sīdati kṣudhā 
tasyāpi tat kṣudhā rāṣṭram acireṇaiva sīdati 
anantaravidher atikramaphalam etat 
śrutavṛtte viditvāsya vṛttiṃ dharmyāṃ prakalpayet 
saṃrakṣet sarvataś cainaṃ pitā putram ivaurasam 
dharmyāṃ vṛttim 
yayā kuṭumbadharmasyāvasādanaṃ na bhavati 
vṛttiṃ prakalpya sarvato rakṣec caurādibhyaḥ svayam adhikavyayāc ca 
saṃrakṣyamāṇo rājñā yaṃ kurute dharmam anvaham 
tenāyur vardhate rājño draviṇaṃ rāṣṭram eva ca  
dhārmikaśrotiyarakṣāyāḥ phalam etad āyurdraviṇarāṣṭravṛddhiḥ 
yat kiṃcid api varṣasya dāpayet karasaṃjñitam 
vyavahāreṇa jīvantaṃ rājā rāṣṭre pṛthagjanam 
kṛṣidhanaprayogakrayavikrayādivyavahāreṇa jīvantaṃ pṛthagjanaṃ brāhmaṇāc chrotriyād anyaṃ karaṃ dāpayet 
karasaṃjñā saṃjātā asya karasaṃjñitam 
kārukān śilpinaś caiva śūdrāṃś cātmopajīvinaḥ 
ekaikaṃ kārayet karma māsi māsi mahīpatiḥ 
śilpamātropajīvinas tān māsaṃ māsam ekam ahaḥ karma kārayet 
ātmopajīvinaś ca śūdrā veśabhāravāhādayaḥ 
nocchindyād ātmano mūlaṃ pareṣāṃ cātitṛṣṇayā 
ucchindan hy ātmano mūlam ātmānaṃ tāṃś ca pīḍayet 
karaśulkāder agrahaṇam ātmano mūlachedaḥ atibahugrahaṇaṃ pareṣām 
tac ca tṛṣṇayā bhavatīty anuvādaḥ 
ātmano mūlacchedenātmapīḍā bhavati kośakṣayāt 
atas te 'pi pīḍyante 
upasthite vigrahe kṣīṇakośaśaktir aribhir aparuddhoddharaṇe 'vaśyaṃ bhavet 
sā ca teṣāṃ mahatī pīḍā 
yat tu sārvakālikaṃ karagrahaṇaṃ tatsaṃpādayato na kheditā bhavati 
tīkṣṇaś caiva mṛduś ca syat kāryaṃ vīkṣya mahīpatiḥ 
tīkṣṇaś caiva mṛduś caiva rājā bhavati saṃmataḥ 
tīkṣṇamṛdutā nityam abhyasanīyā 
tādṛśo rājā prajānāṃ saṃmato bhavaty abhipretaḥ 
amātyamukhyaṃ dharmajñaṃ prājñaṃ dāntaṃ kulodgatam 
sthāpayed āsane tasmin khinnaḥ kāryekṣaṇe nṛṇām 
prajānāṃ saṃbandhini kāryadarśane khinnaḥ śāntaḥ 
dharmajñādiguṇayuktaṃ sarvasaham amātyaṃ tasmin kāryekṣaṇe niyuñjīta 
na punas tasminn eva siṃhāsane 
evaṃ sarvaṃ vidhāyedam itikartavyam ātmanaḥ 
yuktaś caivāpramattaś ca parirakṣed imāḥ prajāḥ 
sahāyasaṃgrahaprabhṛtyuktasyārthasya evam iti parāmarśanam 
vidhāya kṛtvā itikartavyam upakārakam itikartavyam ucyate 
yuktas tatparaḥ 
ata evāpramattaḥ 
atha vā buddhyaskhalanam apramattatā sarvakāle 
evaṃ prajāḥ parirakṣet 
vikrośantyo yasya rāṣṭrād dhriyante dasyubhiḥ prajāḥ
saṃpaśyataḥ sabhṛtyasya mṛtaḥ sa na tu jīvati 
pūrvokayor apramādayor anyathātve doṣam āha 
yadi samyag gulmasthānāni prati na jāgarti tadā chidrānveṣibhir dasyubhiḥ coraiḥ prajā hriyante 
tāsu kiṃ kariṣyati 
atas tādṛśo rājā mṛta eva 
jīvitaṃ maraṇam eva 
ato 'pramattena bhavitavyam 
vikrośantyaḥ ākrandantyaḥ 
hriyante saṃpaśyataḥ sabhṛtyasya nirdiṣṭaṃ drakṣyate 
kevalaṃ ca bhṛtyās tadīyāḥ paśyanti nānudhāvanti mokṣayanti 
sarve te mṛtakalpāḥ 
kṣatriyasya paro dharmaḥ prajānām eva pālanam 
nirdiṣṭaphalabhoktā hi rājā dharmeṇa yujyate 
prāptaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte rājā 
sa dharmeṇa yujyate 
anyathānugrāhakāṇām eva pālanaṃ kurvan pratyavaiti 
utthāya paścime yāme kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ 
hutāgnir brāhmaṇāṃś cārcya praviśet sa śubhāṃ sabhām 
paścimo yāmaḥ brāhmo muhūrtaḥ 
ata āha kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ 
hutāgnir iti 
na ca brāhme muhūrte homavidhānam asti 
tadā hi caturmuhūrtaśeṣā rātrir bhavati 
homaś ca vyuṣṭāyāṃ rātrau samāpya kārya uṣaḥkalpatyāgena 
ārcya brāhmaṇān pūjayitvā sabhāṃ śubhāṃ maṅgalavatīṃ praviśet 
tatra sthitaḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ pratinandya visarjayet 
visṛjya ca prajāḥ sarvā mantrayet saha mantribhiḥ 
tatra tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajāḥ darśanārtham āgatāḥ pratinandya yathārhasaṃbhāṣaṇekṣaṇābhyutthānābhivādanair harṣayitvā visarjayet yathāgatam anujānīyāt 
tato visarjiteṣu teṣu mantrayet saha mantribhiḥ kiṃ kartavyam iti 
svapararāṣṭragatakartavyatānirūpaṇaṃ mantrapañcāṅgaṃ dharśayiṣyate 
giripṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya prāsādaṃ vā rahogataḥ 
araṇye niḥśalāke vā mantrayed avibhāvitaḥ 
mantradeśavidhiḥ 
rahogataḥ vivikte nirjane deśe sthitaḥ 
avibhāvitaḥ anumānenāpi yathā na janā jānanti daṃ vastu vidyate iti tathā kuryāt 
niḥśalākam 
śalākā iṣīkāḥ 
yatra tṛṇam api nāsti yena na kaścit tiṣṭhati iti saṃbhāvanāsti tan niḥśalākam 
imāny aṅgāni karmaṇām ārambhopāyaḥ puruṣadravyasaṃpat deśakālavibhāgaḥ vinipātapratīkāraḥ kāryasiddhir iti 
atha vā prārthanākālaṃ nātipātayet tatra dīrgho mantraḥ syāt 
na teṣāṃ brūyāt guptamantraś ca syāt 
yasya mantraṃ na jānanti samāgamya pṛthagjanāḥ 
sa kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkte kośahīno 'pi pārthivaḥ 
mantraprakāśanivāraṇārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
pṛthagjanā amantriṇo mantravidbāhyāḥ 
jaḍamūkāndhabadhirāṃs tairyagyonān vayo'tigān 
strīmlecchavyādhitavyaṅgān mantrakāle viśodhayet 
yat kiṃcit prāṇijātaṃ tan mantrayamāṇo viśodhayet tataḥ pradeśād apaśodhayet mantrabhedāśaṅkayā 
tiryagyoniṣu ca śukasārikādayo 'pi mantraṃ bhindanti 
gavāśvadayo 'pi yogārūḍhāḥ parivartitanikāyāḥ sadasadvārttāharā bhavanti 
tathā antardhānādayo 'pi narendravidyāḥ śrūyante 
vyaṅgatvād eva grahaṇe siddhe gobalīvardavad itareṣāṃ grahaṇam 
avyaṅgasya hastapādādichedane na mantraniyamāsthā kartavyā  nāyaṃ kutracit gantuṃ śaknoti  ihaivāvaruddha āste kathaṃ mantrān bhetsyati iti 
atha vā evaṃvidhā mantriṇo na kartavyāḥ buddhivibhramasaṃbhavāt 
ato nāptā api tato 'pasarpaḥ 
bhindanty avamatā mantraṃ tairyagyonās tathaiva ca 
striyaś caiva viśeṣeṇa tasmāt tatrādṛto bhavet 
mānād apetā avamatāḥ 
kṣudrādayo 'pamānāsatve kadācit kiṃcic chṛṇuyuḥ kadācid vākṣarāṇy uccārayituṃ śaknuyuḥ tato mantrabhedaḥ syāt 
śaknuvanti nipuṇāḥ kiṃcid āgameṣv anumātum 
madhaṃdine 'rdharātre vā viśrānto vigataklamaḥ 
cintayed dharmakāmārthān sārdhaṃ tair eka eva vā 
dharmādīnāṃ parasparavirodhaṃ cintayet 
anyatamavṛddhau sarvotthitir jayet 
parasparaviruddhānāṃ teṣāṃ ca samupārjanam 
kanyānāṃ saṃpradānaṃ ca kumārāṇāṃ ca rakṣaṇam 
dharmārthakāmānāṃ vā mantriṇāṃ vā samupārjanaṃ saṃgrahaṇam 
kanyānāṃ saṃpradānaṃ svakāryasiddhivaśena cintyam 
kumārāṇāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ rakṣaṇam 
tava vayam ity evamādibhir dharmam arthaṃ ca te grāhayitavyāḥ 
navaṃ hi dravyaṃ yena yenārthajātenopadihyate tat tad ācūṣati 
evam asaṃskṛtabuddhayo yad yad ucyante tat tat prathamaṃ gṛhṇanti 
yady asadbhiḥ saṃsṛjyante tadā tatsvabhāvas teṣāṃ prāpnoti 
te ca duḥsaṃskāropadigdhāḥ na śakyante vyasanebhyo nivartayitum 
uktaṃ ca nīlīrakte vāsasi kuṃkumāṅgarāgo durādheyaḥ 
tasmāt te nityam anuśāsanīyāḥ 
tatrāpi ye guṇavatas tān vardhayet 
itarān īṣat saṃvibhajet 
jyeṣṭhaṃ mahāguṇam amatsaraṃ yauvarājye 'bhiṣiñcet 
evaṃ rājaputrarakṣaṇe nityaṃ yatnavatā bhavitavyam 
dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ caiva kāryaśeṣaṃ tathaiva ca 
antaḥpurapracāraṃ ca praṇidhīnāṃ ca ceṣṭitam 
yena saṃdhānaṃ vigraho vāpi kāryas tena ca dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ cintyam 
ārabdhakāryasaṃbandhaṃ cintayet avasthāpanāya 
kakṣāntareṣv antarvaṃśikasainyādhiṣṭhito 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśet 
tatra sthavirastrīpariśuddhāṃ devīṃ paripaśyen nāpariśuddhām 
devyā gṛhalīno hi bhrātā bhadrasenaṃ rājānaṃ jaghāna mātuḥ śayanāntargataś ca putraḥ kārūśam 
viṣadigdhena nūpureṇa vairantyaṃ devī jaghāna mekhalayā sauvīram veṇyāṃ gūḍhena śastreṇa vidūrathaṃ 
tasmād etāni visraṃbhasthānāni yatnataḥ parīkṣeta 
muṇḍajaṭilakuhakapratisaṃsargaṃ bāhyadāsībhir antaḥpuradāsīnāṃ pratiṣadhayet 
praṇidhīnāṃ ca kārpaṭakādīnāṃ cāraparaṃparābhiś ceṣṭitaṃ cintayet 
kṛtsnaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ karma pañcavargaṃ ca tattvataḥ 
anurāgāparāgau ca pracāraṃ maṇḍalasya ca 
akṛtāraṃbhaḥ kṛtānuṣṭhānam anuṣṭhitaviśeṣaṇaṃ karmaphalasaṃgrahaḥ tathā sāmabhedadānadaṇḍam etad aṣṭavidhaṃ karma 
atha vā vaṇikpatha udakasetubandhanaṃ durgakaraṇam kṛtasya vā tatsaṃskāraniyamaḥ hastibandhanaṃ khanikhananaṃ śūnyaniveśanaṃ dāruvanachedanaṃ ceti 
apare tv āhuḥ
ādāne ca visarge ca tathā praiṣaniṣedhayoḥ 
pañcame cārthavacane vyavahārasya cekṣaṇe 
daṇdaśudhyoḥ sadā yuktas tenāṣṭagatiko nṛpaḥ 
aṣṭakarmā divaṃ yāti rājā śatrubhir arcitaḥ 
ity auśanasau ślokau 
tatra svīkaraṇam ādānam balīnām 
bhṛtyebhyo dhanadānam visargaḥ 
praiṣaḥ duṣṭatyāgaḥ 
arthādhikṛtānām atipravṛttinirodhaḥ niṣedhaḥ 
asatpravṛttiniṣedhaś ca arthavacanam 
varṇāśramāṇāṃ svakarmasaṃśaye vyavahārāvekṣaṇam 
parasparābhiyoge daṇḍanipātanaṃ parājitānāṃ ca 
pramādaskhalite tu prāyaścittam ity etad aṣṭavidhaṃ karma 
pañcavargaḥ kāpaṭikodāsthitagṛhapativaidehikatāpasavyañjanāḥ 
paramarmajñāḥ pragalbhachātrāḥ kāpaṭikāḥ 
tān arthamānābhyām upasaṃgṛhya mantrī bhrūyāt rājānaṃ māṃ ca pramāṇaṃ kṛtvā yatra yad akuśalaṃ tat tadānīm evāśrāvyaṃ tvayā iti 
pravrajyāyāḥ pratyavasitaḥ udāsthitaḥ 
sa ca prajñāśaucayuktaḥ sarvānnapradānasamarthāyāṃ bhūmau prabhūtahiraṇyāntevāsī karma kārayet 
kṛṣikarmaphalāc ca sarvapravrajitānāṃ grāsācchādanāvasathān pratividadhyāt 
teṣāṃ ye vṛttikāmās tān upajapet evam etenaiva vṛttena rājārthaś caritavyaḥ bhaktavetanakāle copasthātavyam iti 
sarvapravrajitāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vargam upajapeyuḥ 
karṣako vṛttikṣīṇaḥ prajñāśaucayuktaḥ gṛhapativyañjanaḥ 
sa kṛṣikarma kuryād yathoktāyāṃ bhūmāv iti 
vāṇijiko vṛttikṣīṇaḥ prajñāśaucayuktaḥ vaidehikavyañjanaḥ 
sa vaṇikkarma kuryāt pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmāv iti samānam 
muṇḍo jaṭilo vā vṛttikāmaḥ tāpasavyañjanaḥ 
sa nagarābhyāśe prabhūtajaṭilamuṇḍāntevāsī śākaṃ yavamuṣṭiṃ vā māsāntaritaṃ prakāśam aśnīyād dharmavyājena gūḍhaṃ yatheṣṭam āhāram 
tāpasavyañjanāntevāsinaś cainaṃ prasiddhayogair arcayeyuḥ 
arthalābham agre śiṣyāś cādiśeyur dāhaṃ caurabhayaṃ duṣṭavadhaṃ videśapravṛttam ca idam adya śvo vā bhaviṣyati idaṃ vā rājā kariṣyati iti 
tad asya gūḍhamantriṇas tatprayuktāḥ saṃpādayeyuḥ 
ye cāsya rājño 'vaśyabhartavyā lakṣaṇavidyām aṅgavidyāṃ jaṃbhakavidyāṃ māyāgatam āśramadharmaṃ nimittajñānaṃ cādhīyānā sattriṇaḥ 
tatra rājā etān pañcasaṃsthān etair mantribhiḥ svaviṣaye 'vasthāpayet 
mantripurohitasenāpatiyuvarājadauvārikāntarveśikādiṣu sadvyapadeśaveṣaśilpabhāṣāvido janapadāpadeśena sattriṇaḥ saṃcārayet 
tathā kubjavāmanakirātamūkajaḍabadhirāndhanaṭanartakagāyanādayaḥ striyaś cābhyantaracāriṇyaḥ aṭavyāṃ vanecarāḥ kāryāḥ grāme grāmīṇakādayaḥ puruṣavyāpārārthāḥ svavyāpāraparaṃparāḥ 
parasparaṃ caite boddhavyās tādṛśair eva tādṛśāḥ 
cārisaṃcāriṇaḥ saṃsthā gūḍhāś cāgūḍhasaṃjñitāḥ 
evaṃ pañcavargaṃ prakalpya parasyātmanaś asmād eva pañcavargān mantripurohitādīnām anurāgāparāgau vidyāt 
pravarteta tathā rājamaṇḍalapracāraḥ ko māṇḍalikaḥ saṃdhivigrahādau kasmin pracāre iti 
madhyamasya pracāraṃ ca vijigīṣoś ca ceṣṭitam 
udāsīnapracāraṃ ca śatroś caiva prayatnataḥ 
etasmin rājamaṇḍala imāś catasro rājaprakṛtayo mukhyā bhavanti vijigīṣur arir madhyama udāsīna iti 
tatra ca yo rājā prakṛtisaṃpannaḥ aham evaṃvidhāṃ pṛthivīṃ vijeṣye abhyutthitaḥ sa vijigīṣuḥ utsāhaśaktiyogāt 
śatrus trividhaḥ sahajaḥ prākṛtaḥ kṛttrimaḥ 
svabhūmyantara iti madhyamaḥ anayor arivijigīṣvor asaṃhatayor nigrahasamarthaḥ na saṃhatayoḥ 
udāsīnaḥ arivijigīṣumadhyamānām asaṃhatānāṃ nigrahasamarthaḥ na tu saṃhatānām 
etāḥ prakṛtayo mūlaṃ maṇḍalasya samāsataḥ 
aṣṭau cānyāḥ samākhyātā dvādaśaiva tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ 
etāḥ smṛtāḥ 
etā mūlaprakṛtayo maṇḍalasya vyākhyātāḥ 
aṣṭau cānyāḥ 
āsāṃ catasṝṇāṃ prakṛtīnām ekaikasyāḥ prakṛter mitram amitraṃ ceti dve dve prakṛtī 
etā aṣṭau ādyāś catasra evam ubhayato dvādaśa bhavanti 
amātyarāṣṭradurgārthadaṇḍākhyāḥ pañca cāparāḥ 
pratyekaṃ kathitā hy etāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa dvisaptatiḥ 
amātyādayaḥ pañcaprakṛtayaḥ dvādaśānāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ ekaikasyā bhavanti 
ataḥ ṣaṭdvādaśakā dvisaptatiḥ 
anantaram ariṃ vidyād arisevinam eva ca 
arer anantaraṃ mitram udāsīnaṃ tayoḥ param 
vijigīṣubhūmyantaram ariṃ vidyāt tathā arimitramitraṃ ca 
evam aribhūmyantaraṃ vijigīṣor mitraṃ bhavati 
udāsīnas tayoḥ paraḥ 
arimitralakṣaṇaṃ ca sahajakṛtrimayor api draṣṭavyam 
tān sarvān abhisaṃdadhyāt sāmādibhir upakramaiḥ 
vyastaiś caiva samastaiś ca pauruṣeṇa nayena ca 
saṃdadhyād vaśīkuryāt 
pauruṣanayau sāmadaṇḍāv eva 
tatra coktam sāmadaṇḍau praśaṃsanti iti 
saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yānam āsanam eva ca 
dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ ca ṣaḍ guṇāṃś cintayet sadā 
tatra hiraṇyādidānobhayānugrahārthaḥ saṃdhiḥ tadviparīto vigrahaḥ ekāntatāgamanaṃ yānam upekṣāyām āsanam saṃdhivigrahopādānaṃ dvaidhībhāvaḥ parasyātmārpaṇaṃ saṃśrayaḥ 
ete ṣaḍ guṇāḥ 
eteṣāṃ yasmin guṇe 'vasthito manyeta ahaṃ śakṣyāmi durgaṃ kārayitum hastinīr bandhayitum khanīḥ khanayitum vaṇikpathaṃ prayojayitum jatuvanaṃ chedayitum adevamātṛkadeśe kṣetrāṇi bandhayitum ity evamādīni parasya vittāni vyāhartum buddhivighātārthaṃ guṇam upeyāt 
evaṃ ca sati 
āsanaṃ caiva yānaṃ ca saṃdhiṃ vigraham eva ca 
kāryaṃ vīkṣya prayuñjīta dvaidhaṃ saṃśrayam eva ca 
ekena saṃdhāyāparasmin yāne śaktaṃ mṛṣā vigṛhṇīyāt 
evam āsanam api saṃdhāya vigṛhya ca 
sarvam etat kāryaṃ vīkṣya prayuñjīta 
nātra niyataḥ kālaḥ 
yadaiva yad yuktaṃ manyeta tadaiva tad ācaret 
yadi kālaniyamo lakṣayituṃ na śakyate upadeśaḥ kim artham 
evam āha na śakyate viśeṣo durlakṣaḥ sāmānyaṃ tu sulakṣaṇam 
etad apy abudhānām upayujyate 
saṃdhiṃ tu dvividhaṃ vidyād rājā vigraham eva ca 
ubhe yānāsane caiva dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ 
samānayānakarmā ca viparītas tathaiva ca 
tadā tv āyatisaṃyuktaḥ saṃdhir jñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ 
samānayānakarmā 
yānaphalaṃ sahitau tulyau gacchāvaḥ samānaphalabhāgitayā na ca tvayāham ullaṅghanīyaḥ 
yat tato lapsyate tat tava mama ca bhaviṣati 
atha vā tvam anyato yāhi aham anyatra yāsyāmi ity evam asamānayānakarmā viparītaḥ 
svayaṃkṛtaś ca kāryārtham akāle kāla eva vā 
mitrasya caivāpakṛte dvividho vigrahaḥ smṛtaḥ 
svayaṃ vigrahasya kālo yadāvaśyaṃ svabalenotsahate paraṃ karṣayitum utsāhayuktaḥ prakṛtayaḥ saṃhatā vivṛddhāś ca svakarmakṛṣyādiphalasaṃpannāḥ parasyaitāny apahariṣyanti karmāṇi kṣīṇalabdhaprakṛtiḥ paraḥ śakyās tatprakṛtaya upajāpenātmīyāḥ kartum sa svayaṃ vigrahasya kālaḥ 
akāla etad viparītaḥ 
tatrāpi vigraho mitrasyāpakṛte 
yadi śatruṇā tadīyaṃ mitram apakṛtam tadā tad vicintya akāle 'pi vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ 
yady api svayam api śatror anantaraṃ mitraṃ bhavati tathāpi tena mitreṇa sahāyena śakyaḥ śatrur apabādhitum 
śatror anantaraṃ mitraṃ bhavati śatros tu śatrur viṣayānantaram 
pāṭḥantaraṃ mitreṇa caivāpakrte 
tena yady asau bādhito bhavati tadākāle 'pi vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ 
etad vigrahasya dvaividhyaṃ svakāryārthaṃ mitrakāryārthaṃ ca 
atha vātmano 'bhyucchrayād ekaḥ prakāraḥ mitreṇāpakṛte vyasanini tatraiva dvitīyaḥ 
ekākinaś cātyayike kārye prāpte yadṛcchayā 
saṃhatasya ca mitreṇa dvividhaṃ yānam ucyate 
ekākino mitreṇa vā saṃhatasya yānam iti dvaividhyam yānasya 
satyāṃ śaktāv ekākinaḥ anyathā saṃhatasya 
ātyayikaṃ kāryaṃ parasya vyasanotpattiḥ 
tadā hy abhigamanīyatamo bhavati 
parataḥ kadācil labdhocchrayo durucchedyaḥ 
kṣīṇasya caiva kramaśo daivāt pūrvakṛtena vā 
mitrasya cānurodhena dvividhaṃ smṛtam āsanam 
ātmasaṃvaraṇam āsanam 
tad api dvividham 
kṣīṇasya balakośopanayena vṛddhasyāpi śatruṃ pratyapekṣā 
āsanaṃ ca mitrānurodhena 
yadi mitrasya kṣīṇasya śatruṇā saha saṃbandho nedṛśo bhavati tadīyena mitreṇa nāyam uttambhanīya ity atas tadanuvṛttyāsīta 
sa ca kṣayo daivāt pūrvakṛtena vety anuvādaḥ 
vṛddhikṣayau sarvasyaitena kāraṇena bhavataḥ 
tatra daivaṃ svakṛtapramādaḥ ativyayaśīlatā apratijāgaraṇaṃ sve bale 
pūrvakṛtam aśubhaṃ karmāpi 
viparyayeṇa vaitad vyākhyeyam 
mohāt iti pāṭhāntaram 
arthas tu daivaśabdena vyākhyātaḥ 
balasya svāminaś caiva sthitiḥ kāryārthasiddhaye 
dvividhaṃ kīrtyate dvaidhaṃ ṣāḍguṇyaguṇavedibhiḥ 
balasya sthitiḥ svāminaś ca bhedena 
durgasvāminaḥ svalpena balena senāpater anyatra mahatā balena yuktasya 
atha vā balaśapathānugrahārthaḥ kaścit kartavyo hiraṇyādilābhāpekṣayā paras tv adhikenāśu 
dvaidhībhāvo nāmāyam upāyaḥ 
tasyaitad eva rūpam  yad dvidhā sthitir balasvāminoḥ 
atraivaṃrūpasya tasyāparaṃ dvaidhaṃ vaktavyam 
na ca tad anena kiṃcid ucyate 
kevalaṃ balasya svāminaś ca sthitir etad dvividham 
tatra vaktavyam māyāyāṃ dvaidhībhāvaḥ tasyedaṃ dvaividhyam 
ucyate 
sāmarthyalabhyam etat parānugrahārtham etat kartavyam savakāryārthaṃ ceti 
eṣa dvidhābhāvasya dvaidhībhāvaḥ 
arthasaṃpādanārthaṃ ca pīḍyamānasya śatrubhiḥ 
sādhuṣu vyapadeśaś ca dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ 
śatrubhiḥ pīḍyamānasya arthasaṃpādanārtham anyatra saṃśrayaḥ 
arthaḥ pīḍānivṛttiḥ tatsaṃpādanārthaṃ śakyam anyam āśrayet svadeśaṃ hitvā tatra gacchet 
vyapadeśaś cāpīḍite 'pi āgāmipīḍāparihārāya vyapadeśārtham anyaṃ saṃśrayet 
eṣo 'sya sahāyako vartate na śakyo 'yam upapīḍayitum iti vyapadeśasiddhir na kenacid upapādyate 
vyapadeśaprayojanasaṃśrayo vyapadeśaśabdenoktaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena 
pāṭhāntaraṃ vyapadeśārtham iti 
kva punaḥ saṃśrayaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tad āha sādhuṣu 
ye sādhavo rājānas teṣām anyatamam āśrayet yebhyaḥ sakāśāt kusṛtir nāśaṅkyate 
sādhuśabdena paribhavatrāṇasāmarthyādayo guṇāḥ pratipādyante 
yadāvagacched āyatyām ādhikyaṃ dhruvam ātmanaḥ 
tadātve cālpikāṃ pīḍāṃ tadā saṃdhiṃ samāśrayet 
āyatir āgāmī kālaḥ 
yady evaṃ manyeta samabalo mamāyam api eṣa nyūnabalo vā kālāt tu labdhakṛtyopajāpena mitragraheṇa vā śaknomy enam abhibhavitum tadā saṃdhiṃ kuryāt 
ādhikyam adhikabalatā 
dhruvaṃ niścitam 
tadātve vartamānakālavacano 'yam 
yadā prahṛṣṭā manyeta sarvās tu prakṛtīr bhṛśam 
atyucchritaṃ tathātmānaṃ tadā kurvīta vigraham 
prahṛṣṭā utsāhānurāgayuktā dānamānābhyām upasaṃgṛhītā ātmīyāḥ prakṛtīr amātyādikā manyeta 
atyucchritam ātmānaṃ kośahastyaśvādisaṃpadā 
tadā kenacid apadeśena saṃdhidūṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā vigraham āśrayet 
yadā manyeta bhāvena hṛṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ balaṃ svakam 
parasya viparītaṃ ca tadā yāyād ripuṃ prati 
bhāvo harṣapoṣakāraṇam 
bahunā dhanena saṃvibhaktatā kṛṣyādikarmāṇi phalitāny eṣām ityādi harṣapoṣayoḥ kāraṇam 
balaṃ hastyaśvarathapādātam 
parasya yadā viparītaṃ tadā śatruṃ prati yāyād abhiṣeṇayec chatrum ity arthaḥ 
na vigrahakāraṇāny eva yānakāraṇāni kiṃ tarhi tāny api apacayaś ca harṣapoṣayoḥ parasya prakṛtīnām 
yadā tu syāt parikṣīṇo vāhanena balena ca 
tadāsīta prayatnena śanakaiḥ sāntvayann arīn 
vāhanaṃ hastyaśvaratham 
balaṃ pādātam 
gobalīvardavad bhedaḥ 
parikṣīṇe bale sati sāntvayann arim āsīta 
sāmopapradānābhyām anukūlanaṃ sāntvanam 
manyetāriṃ yadā rājā sarvathā balavattaram 
tadā dvidhā balaṃ kṛtvā sādhayet kāryam ātmanaḥ 
aśakyaṃ saṃdhānaṃ balavatā ruddhasya durgasaṃśrayaṇaṃ ca hitam durgaṃ ca balāvasthāpanam eva dvaidhībhāvāt 
sa ca prāguktārthaḥ 
balīyān eva hi vyasane balaṃ dvaidhā karotīti dṛśyate 
yadā parabalānāṃ tu gamanīyatamo bhavet 
tadā tu saṃśrayet kṣipraṃ dhārmikaṃ balinaṃ nṛpam 
gamanīyatamaḥ abhibhavanīyatamo durgastho 'ham iti manyate tadā kṣipraṃ durgam ujjhitvānyaṃ saṃśrayed dhārmikam yataḥ kusṛtir nāśaṅkyate yasya yaśomayī sthiraprakṛtiḥ 
balinam ity etenaitat sudarśitam 
nigrahaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ ca kuryād yo 'ribalasya ca 
upaseveta taṃ nityaṃ sarvayatnair guruṃ yathā 
balinam ity uktam 
kiyatā balena balavān bhavatīty etadartham idam ucyate 
yā duṣṭās tadīyāḥ prakṛtayo yaś ca śatrur ubhayasyāpi nigrahe samarthaḥ sa āśrayitavyaḥ 
sa guruvat parisevitavyo mānam ujjhitvā 
naivaṃ mantavyam mahārāja eṣo 'pi samatvena vārttāvahe iti 
prabhuvad asau sevitavyaḥ 
sarvayatnair upāyaiḥ priyavacanair avasare samīpe saṃnidhānena 
yadi tatrāpi saṃpaśyed doṣaṃ saṃśrayakāritam 
suyuddham eva tatrāpi nirviśaṅkaḥ samācaret 
yadi tasminn api saṃśraye saṃpaśyej jānīyāt kathaṃcid doṣaṃ saṃśrayakāritam 
doṣadarśanaliṅgāni ca 
dattvānutāpaḥ kṛtapūrvahomaṃ vimānanā duścaritānukīrtanam 
dṛṣṭer adānaṃ pratikūlabhāṣaṇam etāś ca duṣṭasya bhavanti vṛttayaḥ 
tatas tatrāpi saṃśraye doṣakāriṇi vijñāte 
apiśabdād āśraye nirdoṣe 'sati 
suyuddham eva tasminn api kāle nirvikāraḥ kuryāt 
na hi saṃśraye vināśaḥ 
dṛśyate hy alpabalenāpi mahābalo jīyamānaḥ 
api cāntyāvasthāyām ubhayathā guṇaḥ  vijaye rājyam parājaye dhruvaḥ svarga iti 
yuddhasya tu śobhanatvaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
ekaikaguṇāśrayeṇa maṇḍalavijayāya yāyāc chāktaḥ 
sarvopāyais tathā kuryān nītijñaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 
yathāsyābhyadhikā na syur mitrodāsīnaśatravaḥ 
upāyavacanāt sāmādibhir vyastaiḥ samastair vā 
sarvagrahaṇāt tu yena śakyante saṃdhyādināpi 
tathā kuryāt tena prakāreṇa yateta 
nītijñaḥ arthaśāstrajñaḥ svābhāvikaprajñaḥ nayādyabhijño vā rājā 
yathāsya śaktitrayeṇābhyadhikā mitrādayo na bhaveyuḥ tathā prakṛtyādisamādiṣṭe karmapravartane ca tebhyo 'dhikam ātmānaṃ kuryāt 
ślokānurodhān madhyamagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam 
so 'pi tu draṣṭavyaḥ na mitram ity upekṣyam 
svaprayojanavyatirekeṇa na mitraṃ nāma 
vyavasthitaṃ hi mitram 
ādhikyam upagataṃ svārthagativaśāc ca mitram apy arir bhavati 
tathā ca vyāsa āha
na kaścit kasyacin mitraṃ na kaścit kasyacid ripuḥ 
sāmarthyayogād vijñeyā mitrāṇi ripavas tathā  iti 
etair upāyair maṇḍalaṃ vicārayet 
āyatiṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ tadātvaṃ ca vicārayet 
atītānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ guṇadoṣau ca tattvataḥ 
kāryāṇi karmāṇī prayojanāni 
teṣām sarveṣām āripsamānānām āyatiḥ pariṇāmyāgāmikālaḥ tadātvaṃ pāraṃbhāvasthāvarttamānakālaḥ taṃ ca vicārayet 
tattvatas tattvena 
anekamukhāni hi kāryāṇi kṣaṇāc cānyathā bhavantīti 
tatra yeṣām ubhau kālau na śudhyatas tāni kāryāṇi katham ārabheteti tadvicārārthopadeśaḥ 
atītānām atikrāntānāṃ ca sarveṣām guṇadoṣau tatvato vicārayet 
atrāpy atītānāṃ guṇadoṣau vicārya yāni karmāṇi guṇavanty atītāni tāny eva kathaṃ nāma punar ārabhetety atītakāryaguṇadoṣatattvavicāraṇopadeśa evamarthaḥ 
āyatyāṃ guṇadoṣajñas tadātve kṣipraniścayaḥ 
atīte kāryaśeṣajñaḥ śatrubhir nābhibhūyate 
evaṃ hi yo hy āyatyām āgāmini kāle kāryāṇāṃ guṇadoṣau vijānāti niyamenāsau vimṛśyakārīti svayaṃ cārabhate na sa doṣam 
evamarthaṃ hi jñānam 
tadātve vartamāne yaḥ kṣipram avadhārayati kārye na vilambate tadātve kṣipraniścayaḥ kṣiprakārī bhavati guṇavat karoti na doṣavat 
atīte kṛte sati kārye śeṣato yaḥ kāryam eva budhyate na tatparisamāpto labhata iti guṇavatsarvakāryaphalasaṃbandhād abhyadhikaḥ śatrubhir nābhibhūyeta 
na hi dharmaśāstre ṣāḍguṇyopadeśaḥ śakyate kartuṃ dṛṣṭa iti diṅmātram uktam 
yathainaṃ nābhisaṃdadhyur mitrodāsīnaśatravaḥ 
tathā sarvaṃ saṃvidadhyād eṣa sāmāsiko nayaḥ 
yathā na tais taiḥ prayogair abhisaṃdadhyus tathā kuryād arjitair itarair vopāyair ity eṣa saṃkṣepiko nyāya ity upasaṃhāraḥ ṣāḍguṇyasya 
atisaṃdhānavirodhaś caivaṃ na bhavati 
kṛtyānām upajāparakṣaṇāt vyasaneṣu pratikārāt svamaṇḍalasaṃgrahāt guṇopāyānāṃ samyakprayogāt karmasv abhyutthānam ity evaṃ draṣṭavyam 
idānīm abhiyāsyataḥ karmāha 
yadā tu yānam ātiṣṭhed arirāṣṭraṃ prati prabhuḥ 
tadānena vidhānena yāyād aripuraṃ śanaiḥ 
yadopacikīrṣaty arirāṣṭraṃ praty abhimukhena tadānena vidhanena gacched atvaramāṇaḥ 
vakṣyamāṇopanyāsaḥ sukhāvabodhanārthaḥ 
mārgaśīrṣe śubhe māsi yāyād yātrāṃ mahīpatiḥ 
phālgunaṃ vātha caitraṃ vā māsau prati yathābalam 
yātavyāpekṣayā balāpekṣayā dīrghaṃ yoddhum icchan balaprāyaḥ śāradavāsantikasasyaprāyaṃ pararāṣṭraṃ mārgaśīrṣe yāyāt 
atra hi gacchan śāradaṃ phalaṃ gṛhādigataṃ sukham gṛhṇāti vāsantaṃ sasyam upaharati kāmaś ca mahān durgoparodhādikāryakṣamaḥ mārgaś ca prasiddhavakrapathopabhṛtakāśodakavīrudho na bhavanti kālaś ca nātyuṣṇaśītaḥ upacitam api na sasyaṃ nānāprayuktaṃ priyaṃ sasyatrayopaghātakālaviprakarṣāpekṣayā ca para āśrayaṃ saṃdhatte ubhayasasyopaghātāvakarṣaṇaṃ samyakkṛtaṃ bhavati ātmanaś ca balāpacaya iti 
upaghātamātracikīrṣayā paradeśāder alpakālasādhye vā yātari balaprāyaḥ phālgunacaitrayor yāyāt vāsantikasasyaprāyadeśam 
tadāpy ātmano yavasādi bhavati paropaghātakṣetragatasasyopaghātāt 
yathābalam iti yena prakāreṇa balānurūpaṃ yāyād ity arthaḥ 
asyāpavādaḥ 
anyeṣv api tu kāleṣu yadā paśyed dhruvaṃ jayam 
tadā yāyād vigṛhyaiva vyasane cotthite ripoḥ 
etad vyatirekeṇa anyeṣv api prāvṛḍādikāleṣu 
yadā manyetātmano 'vaśyaṃbhāvi vijayaṃ tadā yāyāt 
yadā hastyaśvabalaprāyaṃ varṣāsv aśvabalaṃ hastibalaṃ tadā hi svabalakālaprabhāvād ekāntiko jayaḥ 
vyasanaṃ parasya svabalakośādigatam 
tasminn utpanne svabalakālanirapekṣo yāyāt 
vyasanapīḍito hi śatruḥ sādhyo bhavati 
kāṣṭham iva guṇopayuktasaṃniyogamātrād eva vinaśyati 
vigṛhyeti yātavyam evāvaṣṭabhyāhūya yāyāt 
mahān asminn evāvagamyate 
kṛtvā vidhānaṃ mūle tu yātrikaṃ ca yathāvidhi 
upagṛhyāspadaṃ caiva cārān samyag vidhāya ca 
mūle svadurgarāṣṭre kuryād atha pārṣṇigrāhaś ca 
tatra vidhānaṃ pratividhānaṃ kṛtvā durgaṃ tāvat prabhūtadhānyādikaṃ susajjayantraprākāraparikhādi kāryam 
rāṣṭrasyāpi svabalaṃ śreṇībalebhyo rakṣāṃ vidhāya kuryāt 
dānamanebhya upasaṃyamya pratyanteṣu prakṣeptavyaṃ pārṣṇigrāhaṃ prati prāha tatsamarthaś ca balaikadeśaḥ svarāṣṭre sthāpayitavyaḥ 
yātrāprayojanaṃ yātrikaṃ hastyaśvādibalayogyaṃ ca praharaṇadhāraṇādi sajjam 
yathāvidhi paropadeśaṃ kṛtvā 
āspadaṃ pratiṣṭhānam 
kiṃ tarhy ato 'parakīyāḥ kruddhādayo draṣṭavyās tān upagṛhya svīkṛtya ākārasya paraviṣaye nivṛttes tajjñānāya samyag yathāvad vidhāya prayujya 
kim ayaṃ dṛṣṭopasaṃgrahaṃ kartum ārabdham uta śatruparimaṇḍalaṃ kopayitum atha madhyamam udāsīnaṃ vā saṃśrayitum tathā mūlayātrāṃ vā hartukāmo vidhivac chedaṃ vā kartukāma ityādi yathā caitad evaṃ tathā 
saṃśodhya trividhaṃ mārgaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ ca balaṃ svakam 
sāṃparāyikakalpena yāyād aripuraṃ prati 
trividhaḥ panthā jāṅgala ātapa āṭavika iti 
kecid āṭavikasthāne vanaprakṣepāt trividha iti 
apara unnato nimnaḥ sama iti 
evaṃ trividhaṃ saṃśodhya mārgarodhivṛkṣagulmalatāvicchedena sthalanimnayoḥ samīkaraṇaṃ nadīgartayos tīrthakaraṇaṃ pathirodhakavyālasamucchedaḥ pravartakānām ātmīkaraṇaṃ yavasendhanādimattā ceti 
ṣaḍvidhaṃ balam iti 
kecit hastyaśvarathapadātisenākośakarmakarātmakaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ balam iti 
anye kośasthāne prakṣepaṇam iti 
apare maulabhṛtyaśreṇimitrāmitrāṭavikabalabhedāt 
sāṃparāyikavidhānena 
sāṃparāyikaṃ yuddhe kṛcchram tatprayojanaṃ yasya tat sāmparāyikam 
durgakalpena vā ripuṃ prati yāyāt 
sa ca sainyaniveśas teṣu teṣu ca sthāneṣu sthāvarajaṅgamadaṇḍo bahumukhaparidhaphalakaśākhābhiḥ prākāra ityādis tādṛśasthāpitaḥ 
viśeṣatas tu yātrāgataḥ 
śatrusevini mitre ca gūḍhe yuktataro bhavet 
gatapratyāgate caiva sa hi kaṣṭarato ripuḥ 
śatrusevini gūḍhe pracchanne mitre gataprayāgate ca yuktataraḥ syāt abhiyuktatara ādṛtataro bhavet na viśvased ity arthaḥ 
yasmāt sa kaṣṭataro ripur anyebhyaḥ kruddhādibhyaḥ 
evaṃ ca yuktataravacanāt kaṣṭataravacanāc ca gatapratyāgatam agrāhyam anyasyeti gamyate 
sa caturvidhaḥ 
kāraṇād gatas tato viparītakāraṇād āgato yathā doṣeṇa gataḥ punar āgato guṇam ubhayoḥ parityajya 
kāraṇenāgata iti yaḥ sa tyājyo laghubuddhitvād yatkiṃcitkārīti 
punar asya pratyayas tu na kāryaḥ 
kāraṇād gataḥ kāraṇāgataḥ yathā svāmidoṣeṇa gataḥ parasmāt svadoṣeṇāgata iti satkartavyo yadi saṅgitvād āgatas tato grāhyaḥ 
atha paraprayuktas tena vā doṣeṇāpakartukāma iti tato neti 
pararāṣṭraṃ pratyabhiprasthitaḥ 
daṇḍavyūhena tanmārgaṃ yāyāt tu śakaṭena vā 
varāhamakarābhyāṃ vā sūcyā vā garuḍena vā 
tatra daṇḍākāro vyūho daṇḍavyūhaḥ 
evaṃ śakaṭākṛtisthānāc chakaṭa ityādi yojyam 
purastād balādhyakṣo madhe rājā paścāt senāpatiḥ pārśvayor hastinas teṣāṃ samīpe 'śvās tataḥ padātaya ity eṣa sarvataḥ samavāyo daṇḍavyūho 'tiryag bhavati sarvato bhayakāryaḥ 
sūcīvyūhaḥ sthalasamutthānasainikaḥ pravīrapuruṣamukho 'tidīrgha ūrdhvo yataḥ parakakṣo 'nyaiḥ samaṃ pravartamānaḥ 
makaravyūhas tu mukhe jaghanayoḥ pṛthur ubhayato yena praśastaḥ sarvaṃ na phalgubalaṃ labhate na cārtham 
tad dhi śūrair hanyamānam anyeṣām api bhaṅgāya bhavati 
tasyāntam anyakāryam avaruddhaṃ niścayenāvatiṣṭhate 
pariśiṣṭaṃ tu balaṃ vyūhasyāntaḥ prakṣipet 
evaṃ racanāviśeṣair uktair uktaprayojanāpekṣayā vā viśeṣeṇa tu samāyāṃ bhūmau daṇḍagaruḍasūcibhir yāyāt 
viṣamāyāṃ saṃkaṭāyāṃ śakaṭamakaravarāhair iti 
yataś ca bhayam āśaṅket tato vistāreyed balam 
padmena caiva vyūhena niviśeta sadā svayam 
tasmin pathi yasmāt pradeśāt parihitakāribhyo bhayāśaṅkā syāt tena pradeśena pūrvagṛhād vistāreyed balaṃm gavyūtimātram adhikaṃ vā 
yavasaṃpannadṛḍhaprahāravistīrṇaśatrupuṣṭaparasparam avaruddharathikāśvārohakarībalāny avahitāni bhavanti 
samantād vibhṛtaparimaṇḍalo madhyaniviṣṭavijigīṣuḥ padmavyūhaḥ 
evaṃ nityaṃ niviśet purān nirgacched grāmād vā 
senāpatibalādhyakṣau sarvadikṣu niveśayet 
yataś ca bhayam āśaṅket prācīṃ tāṃ kalpayed diśam 
senāpatiḥ samagrasya dhanasyādhipatir balādhyakṣaḥ tayor bahutvābhāvād dvivacananirdeśāc ca sarvadikṣu tadasaṃbhava iti tatpuruṣās tacchabdenocyante 
tadīyapuruṣasaṃniveśāc ca sarvadikṣu tāv eva saṃniveśitau bhavataḥ 
tena bhinnais turagagajādibhis tatpratibaddhaniveśānāṃ saṃyodhanāya samantato niveśya giriṃ vanaṃ gartaṃ vā pṛṣṭhato 'dhyakṣaṃ kṛtvā 
yato bhayam āśaṅketa yathā sā prācī dig bhavati 
evaṃ niveśaṃ kuryād abhimukhanirgamārtham iva vidvadbhiḥ 
gulmāṃś ca sthāpayed āptān kṛtasaṃjñān samantataḥ 
sthāne yuddhe ca kuśalān abhīrūn avikāriṇaḥ 
gulmān manuṣysamavāyān 
kecit sākṣāt samantataḥ saśaṅkhapaṭahā anye viparītāḥ 
tatra cotpannaṃ duścikitsaṃ mahate cānarthāya 
guṇair viśeṣayati 
āptān āptasadṛśān ityabhedārtham 
kṛtasaṃjñān 
kṛtā saṃjñā saṃbodhanāya yais te kṛtasaṃjñās tān 
avasare yuddheṣu śaṅkhabherīnādadhvajādibhir vādyais tūryam evāhariṣyāmaḥ tadapagamāśaṅkāyāṃ caivam eva kuryāt 
śaṅkhe āhate dhvaje vochrite pṛthak pṛthaga vasthātavyam evaṃ saṃhatair evaṃ prahartavyam evaṃ vyāvartitavyam ityādi sthitam 
sthāne kuśalā anyaiḥ śūraiḥ śakyam āgantuṃ sametena śakyam asmin vayam apṛthak pare pṛthag ityādi 
yuddhe anusaraṇādau kuśalā bhavantaḥ saṃhatakair yodhanīyāprasāraṃ kṛtvā praviṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭhadeśāt prahāriṇaḥ citraṃ yojayitavyāḥ bhagnānām anekāyanaśatānāṃ pṛṣṭaṃ grāhyam ityādi 
abhīravaḥ anena vistīrṇasametāḥ 
avikāriṇo 'bhedātmakair yair yuktam aparasya 
evam etān gulmān samantatas trisṛṣu dikṣu gavyūtimātravyāpī pratyaham aniyatadeśān bahūn sthāpayet 
bhayapratibodhanārtham avahito bhavet 
jano viśvasto bhavati dānamānakāryadarśanādibhiḥ 
apavṛtte yuddhe 'mātyādibhiḥ saha sarveṣāṃ svārthaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ mama nāmamātrāṃ rājeti sarve vayaṃ samānavibhavopabhogāya jaye rājyaṃ parājaye svarga iti hetunā āgatāḥ 
saṃhatān yodhayed alpān kāmaṃ vistārayed bahūn 
sūcyā vajreṇa caivaitān vyūhena vyūhya yodhayet 
asaṃhatā hi balavad vistīrṇaṃ balam āsādyāvayavaśo vidhvaṃsanāya vāhanāghātaiḥ kṣayaṃ yānti tadvināśe cotpānnā ime ato 'lpān ātmīyān saṃhatān yodhayet 
anyonyāpekṣayā yudhymānān abhighnataḥ itaretarānugrahāt parasparānurāgāt spardhāyāṃ ca parān saṃhatān soḍhuṃ samarthā bhavanti 
kāmaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ kāryārthaṃ bahūn vistārayed viprakīrṇān yodhayed ityādi manyeta 
bhinnāṃs tāṃś caitān bhayam eṣyati parān svān vā bahūn dṛṣṭvā trāsaḥ syād iti 
sūcī pūrvokto 'kṣavyūhabhedo 'grataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca tridhā vyavasthitaḥ pārśvayor bhedana 
tena cātmānaṃ sūcivyūhaṃ vibhajya yodhayet 
satāṃ ca sarvavyūhānāṃ pratiṣṭhāvyūhanasamarthāv iti pratigṛhītāv evaṃ kāraṇāt 
yadā tu parabale hy etāv eva bhavatas tadā sve bale viparyayaḥ kāryaḥ 
tulyatve tu puṣṭimatvānuraktakuśalamānanaprabhūtaikārthakāritvād ity ato viśeṣe yathāsaṃbhavavākyaiḥ 
yodhayed iti vacanād rājā svayaṃ tatpratisaṃdhānārthaṃ vyūhadurgādyāśraye pratigrahabhūtas tiṣṭhet 
samānatantreṇoktam
dve śate dhanuṣāṃ gatvā rājā tiṣṭhet pratigrahaḥ 
bhinnasaṃghātanārthaṃ tu na yudhyetāpratigrahaḥ  
syandanāśvaiḥ same yudhyed anūpe nau dvipais tathā 
vṛkṣagulmāvṛte cāpair asicarmāyudhaiḥ sthale 
senānāṃ deśasya prakḷptyartham āha 
samapradeśe rathair aśvaiś ca yudhyeta 
tatra hi teṣām apratighātaḥ 
anūpaḥ pānīyaprāyaḥ 
tatrāpy alpodake hastibhir agādhodake tu naubiḥ 
teṣāṃ hi tatra sukhapracāratā 
vṛkṣair gulmaiś ca saṃchanne dhanurbhiḥ 
tadgrahaṇāc ca balīvardagartādyākulo gṛhyate samānakāryatvāt 
sthalam iti pāṣānavṛkṣalatāgartādirahito deśaḥ tasmin siddhiḥ 
dhāryaiḥ śarādibhir āyudhaiś ca śaktyādibhir yudhyeta āsannayuddhatvāt 
evaṃ sāmarthyapradarśanārthatvād asya 
kiṃ ca 
kaurakṣetrāṃś ca matsyāṃś ca pañcālān śūrasenajān 
dīrghāṃl laghūṃś caiva narān agrānīkeṣu yojayet 
kurukṣetraṃ prasiddham 
matsyasaṃjño virāṭadeśaḥ 
nāgapure pañcālā ubhaye kānyakubjā āhichatrāś ca 
śūrasenajā māthurāḥ 
kvacic cātra bhāvārthe pratyayo luptanirdiṣṭaḥ 
etad deśajā hi prāyeṇa mahāvarṣmāṇo balavantaḥ pṛthuvakṣasaḥ śūrā abhimānino durviṣahā ity atra ye 'nikasthitāḥ pareṣāṃ bhayahetavo bhavanti 
dīrghakāyā adhyastālpadeśā api dīrghaśvāsakarā mahākayatvāt 
laghavas tu maraṇāsamarthā nirbhayena janena pracchannā viddhāḥ praharanto 'pakārāsamarthāḥ 
ādarśabhūtāś caita itareṣāṃ bhavanti 
praharṣayed balaṃ vyūhya tāṃś ca bhṛśaṃ parīkṣayet 
ceṣṭāś caiva vijānīyād arīn yodhayatām api 
vyūhaṃ racayitvā svabalaṃ bhṛśaṃ darśayan kim eṣāṃ jīyate jitā evāmī yuṣmatpratāpena ity evaṃ praharṣayet 
jaye mahān arthalābhaḥ āśritopāśritasukham vadhe vāpi svargo bhartṛpiṇḍaniryātanaṃ ca parājaye tritayābhāvaḥ ityādi naimittiko 'pi tadupadeśaḥ 
tādṛśanimittaniyamān mānaya sahasvorvyāvaśayaṃbhāvo yadi pradhānapuruṣaḥ svajanavadho rājā tadapratigrahavyājena sthito bhīrutvāt svayaṃ yuddhaṃ na kāmayate ityādi 
tatra ye brūyur naitad evam 
svārtha evāyam asmākam atra vadhaḥ śastropajīvibhūtānāṃ saṃgrāmaviśeṣadharmo 'vyayībhāvaḥ svadharmāyāso 'narthahetū rājā sarvaprakārai rakṣaṇīyaḥ 
pariśrāntānāṃ cāsmākam apariśrāntasukham anugrahaṃ kariṣyatīty evamarthaṃ sthitaḥ iti tān viśeṣato gṛhṇīyāt 
jetuḥ prasaṃsituḥ parasaṃvyayaṃ vā kārayeyus tān upagrahaiḥ pariṣvaṅgālaṅkāradānādinā ca vaśīkuryāt 
ceṣṭāṃ caivārīṇām yodhayatāṃ vijānīyāt 
kathaṃ yuddhe ceṣṭante kośā balaṃ vā 
kecid dvidhāhṛdayāḥ kecit tu pakṣānta ityādicintānityatvān manuṣyāṇām upakurvato 'pi svārthavaśād upakurvantīty atra duṣṭān āptabalamadhye vinyased 
yathārir durgāśrito bhavati taddurgalambhopāyam āha 
uparudhyārim āsīta rāṣṭraṃ cāsyopapīḍayet 
dūṣayec cāsya satataṃ yavasānnodakendhanam 
uparodhas tathā kartavyo yathā na kaścin niṣkrāmati kiṃcit praviśati 
rāṣṭraṃ durgād bahir deśaḥ 
tasyopapīḍanaṃ svadeśāpavāhopamarddanādibhiḥ 
yavasādīnāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vināśanam asaddravyamiśraṇādibhiḥ 
bhindyāc caiva taḍāgāni prākāraparikhās tathā 
samavaskandayec cainaṃ rātrau vitrāseyet tathā  
taḍāgagrahaṇaṃ sarvajalāśayadarśanārtham 
tatra taḍāgasya setubandhena prayojanabhedanam 
prākārasya yantrair vidāraṇaṃ suraṅgayā vā bhaṅgaḥ 
parikhāyāḥ pūraṇena pārśvabhaṅgena vā 
chidreṣu pravīrapuruṣair avaskandayet 
durge rātrau ca vitrāsayet 
agnikumbhaśiraskaiḥ śivāvadrutāni kurvadbhir manuṣyaiḥ 
ye narāḥ svayam utpātadarśanād rātrau jāgrati jāgaraṇāvajīrṇo lokaḥ susādhyo bhavati 
tasmiṃś ca kāle bhūyo bhūyaḥ 
upajapyān upajaped buddhyetaiva ca tat kṛtam 
yukte ca daive yudhyeta jayaprepsur apetabhīḥ 
upajapyāḥ kruddhārayaḥ kulīnāḥ svarājyābhilāṣiṇaḥ tān upajaped iti hetuḥ 
kartari kartavyavyapadeśam upajaped ity arthaḥ 
upajaped grāhayed ity arthaḥ 
upajāpa āśrayād viśleṣātmahitānuṣṭhānapratipādanam 
tena ca ariṇā sukṛtam apy abhimataṃ durgasthena vā kiṃcid prārabdhaṃ balāṭavikapārṣṇigrāhādikopanārthaṃ madhyamodāsīnānām anyatareṇa saha saṃdhānam ityādi budhyeta 
yukte ca daive vijigīṣor anukūladaive ity arthaḥ 
nakṣatragrahadaivasumuhūrteṣu sādhakeṣu dṛṣṭasvapnadarśananimitteṣu cānuguṇeṣv anulomavātādiṣu jayam icchan nirgatabhayo durgasthānāni yathā prathamaṃ yoddhuṃ gacchet 
sāmnā dānena bhedena samastair atha vā pṛthak 
vijetuṃ prayatetāriṃ na yuddhena kadācana 
na sahasā yuddheta 
etāvat prathamaṃ viśiṣṭasthāpanopadeśanaṃ sumukhaṃ ca mithaḥ sahāsanakathāsahadāradarśanādi 
dānavidhānaṃ dravyānāṃ hiraṇyādīnāṃ prītyutpādanārthaṃ pratipādanam 
bhedas tatkulīnāder upasaṃgrahaḥ 
tato viśeṣaṇāc ca tatrāvitrāsanamityādyakāraṇam 
anityo vijayo yasmād dṛśyate yudhyamānayoḥ 
parājayaś ca saṃgrāme tasmād yuddhaṃ vivarjayet 
yasmān nāyaṃ niyamo dṛśyate yo jayati so 'tyantabalavān avaśyam tena yaś ca parājīyate so 'tyantaṃ durbalaś cāvaśyam iti anityo vijayaḥ 
trayāṇām apy upāyānāṃ pūrvoktānām asaṃbhave 
tathā yuddhyeta saṃpanno vijayeta ripūn yathā 
sāmādīnām asādhakatve saṃdigdhe 'pi jaye samāne 'pi kiṃ punā rūpeṇa saha tena prakāreṇa yudhyeta yena prakāreṇātmano jayaḥ syāt 
jaye rājyaṃ vadhe 'pi svarga ity ubhayathāpi jayaḥ 
parapratyūhakalpanā kūṭayuddhādiprakāraḥ atyantocchedānusaraṇapīḍanābhyāṃ sahasā niṣkāryaḥ 
tathā ca vyāsa āha
punarāvartamānānām nirāśānāṃ ca jīvinām 
na śakyed agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakreṇāpi dhanaṃjaya 
yadā saṃdigdhaṃ parājayaṃ tadāpakramaṇaṃ yuktam 
nirgato hi jīvo na kāryam āsādayati yena bhadrāni paśyati svargam arjayati mṛta iti 
jitvā saṃpūjayed devān brāhmaṇāṃś caiva dhārmikān 
pradadyāt parihārāṃś ca khyāpayed abhayāni ca 
yena kenacit prakāreṇa jitvāriṃ labdhapraśamanam idam 
ato 'smin pure janapade devabrāhmaṇāṃś ca dhārmikān vihitānuṣṭhāyino yathāsāmarthyāt pratiṣiddhavarjaṃ kāmāt svātantryeṇārīn jitvā sādhyapravṛttādikaṃ gandhadhūpapuṣpadravyaṃ savibhāgāsphoṭanādisaṃskāradvāreṇa yathārham abhyarcayet 
kuṭumbināṃ parihārārthaṃ sthitir yathāpravṛttiviśiṣṭakarabhāraśulkapradeśānāṃ pradānena tathā tayā vā saṃvatsaram eko dvau vā dadyāt 
uccānāṃ ca paurajānapadabalānām ātapādiḍiṇḍimakagadāpātena khyāpayet tair yaiḥ svāmyanurāgād asthānam apacitaṃ teṣām apy ā rakṣāntaṃ yathāsvaṃ svaṃ vyāpāram anutiṣṭhantu iti 
evam anugrahe kriyamāṇe 'pi yadā paurajānapadānām anyeṣāṃ vā svāmyanurāgād ahaṃ vaktṛtaijasabhāvo bahumataḥ syād iti manyeta madīyasya daṇḍo 'vasthātuṃ na śaknuyāt tadā 
sarveṣāṃ tu viditvaiṣāṃ samāsena cikīrṣītam 
sthāpayet tatra tadvaṃśyaṃ kuryāc ca samayakriyām 
eṣa paurādīnām abhiprāya iti saṃkṣepeṇa jñātvā naitad evam icchati tatkulīnaṃ kartum icchati ayam eva tasmin deśe tadvaṃśyaṃ mṛdumalaṃ priyasukhakalatraṃ tena saṃhatatatprakṛtibhiś ca pradhānādibhiḥ samayaṃ kuryāt samakośadānādi parimāṇaṃ ca bhavatā mama daivākāreṇa pāpena bhavitavyam kāryākārye kālena svayam upasthātavyam ubhayato daṇḍena kośena cetyādi 
pramāṇāni ca kurvīta teṣāṃ dharmyān yathoditān 
ratnaiś ca pūjayed enaṃ pradhānapuruṣaiḥ saha 
yatprakārāvasthās teṣām upacitāḥ pūrvapravṛttāḥ brahmadeyāmaravṛttidevasvavyāpārādayas tān anujānīyāt pramāṇāni kuryād evaṃ hy asmiṃs teṣām anurāgo bhavati 
ye ca tatra pradhānāḥ puruṣās tatra pratijñāsvajanabahutvādiguṇais taiḥ saha rājānam enaṃ śastradhanadhānyālaṅkāravāhanachatrapīṭhikādarapaṭṭabandhādibhiḥ pūjayet 
kasmāt punaḥ prakṛtibhyo ratnādidānam ucyate 
ādānam apriyakaraṃ dānaṃ ca priyakārakam 
abhīpsitānām arthānāṃ kālayuktaṃ praśasyate 
ādeyasyāpratipādanaṃ navasya rājño 'nyasya vāpriyakaram aprīteḥ kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ 
dānaṃ ca pratidānaṃ priyakārakam etad ubhayaṃ bahuśa evaṃ prasiddham api kriyamāṇam abhimatānām arthānāṃ sukhāvahaṃ bhaved anyathā ca duḥkhayatīty arthaḥ 
kālayuktaṃ kālopapannaṃ praśasyate 
yasmād api kvacit kāle kiṃcana prītiṃ janayati tadāpi nālpam aśobhanaṃ vā prītim utpādayati 
tasmāt kālam apekṣya dānādāne kārye iti 
yatkiṃcid atikrāntaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ kiṃcana tat 
sarvaṃ karmedam āyattaṃ vidhāne daivamānuṣe

kiṃ ca

āpadarthe

gatvā kakṣāntaraṃ tv anyat samanujñāpya taṃ janam 
praviśed bhojanārthaṃ ca strīvṛto 'ntaḥpuraṃ punaḥ 
tasmād gṛhānte kakṣāntaraṃ gatvā taṃ ca rahasyākhyāyinaṃ visṛjya strībhiḥ paricārikābhiḥ parivṛto 'ntaḥpuraṃ punaḥ praviśet 
tatra bhuktvā punaḥ kiṃcit tūryaghoṣaiḥ praharṣitaḥ 
saṃviśet tu yathākālam uttiṣṭhec ca gataklamaḥ 
kiṃcid ity avyayam 
tūryāṇi veṇuvīṇāpaṇavamṛdaṅgabherīśaṃkhādīni 
teṣāṃ ghoṣair mṛdubhiḥ śrutisukhaiḥ praharṣito yathākālaṃ saṃviśed ya ucitakālas taṃ tan nayed iti 
gataklamaḥ vigatāśeṣaduḥkhaḥ kāryadarśanāyottiṣṭhet 
etad vidhānam ātiṣṭhed arogaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 
asvasthaḥ sarvam etat tu bhṛtyeṣu viniyojayet 
etad iti yad anukrāntaṃ madhaṃdine 'rdharātre vā iti 
tasyāpy evaṃvṛttaṃ vyāpāras tena svayam upatiṣṭhet 
avastho bhṛtyeṣu viniyojayed viyuñjītety arthaḥ 
yāvac chaknuyāt tāvad eva 
evaṃ prativihitasvatantrakṛtātmarakṣāvyāpāraḥ prajām ātmanaś ca kāryaṃ karoti 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ
rājadharmo nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ 
iti śrībhaṭṭavīrasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithikṛte
manubhāṣye saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ 
athāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
vyavahārān didṛkṣus tu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha pārthivaḥ 
mantrajñair mantribhiś caiva vinītaḥ praviśet sabhām 
prajānāṃ pālanaṃ rājño vṛttir vihitā 
sā cātra 
śastrāstrabhṛttvaṃ kṣatrasya vaṇikpaśukṛṣīr viśaḥ 
ājīvanārthaṃ śūdrasya dvijātīnāṃ niṣevaṇam 
evaṃ nṛpo vartamāno lokānān āpnoty anuttamān  iti 
tathā dharmo vardhate loke 
anyeṣām api varṇānāṃ kṣatriyavṛttyā jīvinām asty eva rājyādhikāraḥ 
yaḥ kaścit sarvalokānām pālakaś ca nṛpaḥ smṛtaḥ 
karmaniṣṭhā ca vihitā lokasādhāraṇe hite 
paripālanaṃ ca pīḍāpahāraḥ 
dvayī ca pīḍā dṛṣṭā adṛṣṭā ca 
tatra durbalasya balīyasā dhanaharaṇādinā bādhyamānā dṛṣṭā pīḍā 
itarasya tu vidhyatikramajanitena pratyavāyenāmutrikaduḥkhotpādanam adṛṣṭapīḍā 
prajā hi dveṣamatsarādibhir itaretaram ayathāvad ācaranti kupathena yānti adṛṣṭadoṣeṇa bādhyeran 
ataś ca rājyanāśaḥ 
prajaiśvaryaṃ hi rājyam ucyate 
tāsu vinaśyantīṣu kasya rājyaṃ syāt 
vyavahārādayo 'taḥ śāstradaṇḍena vyavasthāpyamānā na bhayāt pṛthak pracalanti tathā cobhayathāpi rakṣitā bhavanti 
dhanadaṇḍaś ca rājñaḥ karaśulkādi vā 
etadanyā dharmiṣṭhajīvikā na bhavatīti vṛttiparikṣayād api rājyāvasādaḥ 
ato rājyasthityarthaṃ vyavahāradarśanaṃ kartavyam 
tad idānīm ucyate 
vyavahāraś cātra vādiprativādinor itaretarāśanoddhārāya vṛttir ucyate 
atha vā ṛṇādānādayaḥ padārthā eva vipratipattiviṣayāḥ santo vicāragocarasamarthatayā kartavyā iti 
didṛkṣur ity uktvā paśyet karyāṇi iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
punaś ca pratyavamarśaḥ teṣām adyam ṛṇādānam iti 
tān padārthān vicārayed iti saṃbandhaḥ 
vakṣyamāṇādhikṛtapuruṣādhiṣṭhitaḥ pradeśaḥ sabhā 
praveśas tadabhyantarabhāvaḥ 
kim eka eva praviśet 
nety āha brāhmaṇaiḥ saheti 
atha mantrajñair iti kasya viśeṣaṇam 
na tāvan mantriṇaḥ mantritvād eva siddheḥ 
na hi mantram ajānāno mantrīti śakyate vaktum 
nāpi brāhmaṇānām vyavahāradarśane 'dhikṛtānāṃ tatparijñānam adṛṣṭāya syāt 
atrocyate 
brāhmaṇaviśeṣaṇam evaitat 
te hy amantrajñā bhūtvā nirapekṣam avadhārayantaḥ syuḥ 
anyathā rājño 'nartham āvaheyuḥ 
tathā hi mahāmatyāśritaḥ kaścij janapadena vyavaharan sahasā jito yadi na daṇḍyate dhanaṃ vāvaṣṭabhya na dāpyate tadā samatvena vyavahāradarśanaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt pakṣapātam aśaktiṃ vāsya janapadā manyeran 
atha daṇḍyate mahāmātyakṣobhād api prakṛtivikṛtaṃ syāt 
mantrajñās tu santaḥ saṃśayitāro yadi nirṇetavyasya kenacid apadeśena prasaṅgarodhaṃ kṛtvā rahasi rājānaṃ paribodhayanti anayor vivādinor ayaṃ jīyate 'yaṃ jayatīti vyavahāras tv asmābhir na tadānīm eva nirṇīta iti svāmī pramāṇam 
tatra rājaivaṃ viditvā mahāmātyam ādeśayati tvadīyo manuṣyo jīyate mama hanir mā bhūd iti saṃprati nirṇayo 'vadhīritaḥ 
tvam eva tathā kuru yathaiṣa manuṣyaḥ saṃdhīyate bādhāsya vyapanīyate 
te mantriṇo vādeyavākyā manuṣyāṇāṃ sarveṣām anarthyāṃ ca pravṛttiṃ pratibadhnanti 
anye tu kākākṣivad ubhayaviśeṣaṇam arthabedena mantrajñapadaṃ manyante 
yadā mantriṇo viśeṣyante tattaddhātutatparijñānaṃ mantrajñānam 
brāhmaṇapakṣe tu kāryārthasamabhāvaś ca 
mantribrāhmaṇānāṃ na praveśamātram eva kiṃ tarhi nirṇayaṃ paśyet ity uttaratravākyād yathāyogyam itarathā adṛṣṭāya praveśaḥ syāt 
ato naikākī nirṇayaṃ kuryāt kiṃ tarhi taiḥ saha nirūpyeti 
vinītaḥ vākpāṇipādacāpalarahitaḥ 
vepato hy anarthaḥ syāt 
pārthivagrahaṇān na kṣatriyasyaivāyam upadeśaḥ kiṃ tarhy anyasyāpi pṛthivyām adhipater deśeśvarasya na hy anyathā rājyam avicalitaṃ bhavatīti 
tatrāsīnaḥ sthito vāpi pāṇim udyamya dakṣiṇam 
vinītaveṣābharaṇaḥ paśyet kāryāṇi kāryiṇām 
āsīnaḥ dharmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ 
sthitaḥ niṣiddhagatir anupaviṣṭa eva 
sthānāsanayoś ca vyavasthito vikalpaḥ kāryaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ 
garīyasi kārye bahuvaktavya upaviṣṭa āsīnaḥ laghīyasi svalpavaktavye sthitaḥ 
kramamāṇasya sarvathā pratiṣedhaḥ 
sa hi mārgāvalokanaparo nārthipratyarthinor nipuṇato vacanam avadhārayet 
anye tv adṛṣṭārthaṃ tathā manyante 
tapasvibrāhmaṇādiṣu vivādiṣu sthiteṣu sthitaḥ āsīneṣv āsīnaḥ 
pāṇim udyamyeti 
uttarapāṇim uddhṛtyotthānaṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ 
sūtrakṛto 'yaṃ vyatikramaḥ sarvadā vihitatvād vyasanopavyānam etat 
tenāyam arthaḥ hasta utkṣeptavyaḥ na punaḥ samīpavartini saṃlagnaḥ kartavyaḥ 
praśnaniṣedhāvasare ca tenābhinetavyam na tu pravyāṇādinā 
anena vyavahāradarśanena tātparyaṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavati 
prāyeṇa hi puruṣāḥ kāryeṣu prayatnavanto hastam udyacchanti 
yathāsukhopaviṣṭaṃ vrajati kartāraṃ tataś ca parijane tad etad rājā cittaṃ na dadāti sabhyair nirbhayair vayaṃ jitā iti 
pāṇigrahaṇaṃ bāhūpalakṣaṇārtham 
kevalasya hi hastasya yāvad vyavahāradarśanaṃ vyāpāraṇaṃ pīḍākaram 
na cāyam adṛṣṭārtha upadeśaḥ 
vinītaveṣābharaṇa iti 
pūrvaśloke bāhyābhyantarendriyaviṣayāvadhānārtho 'bhihitaḥ 
ayaṃ tāval lokānāṃ śālīnatayā sukhopasarpaṇārthaḥ 
uddhataveṣe hi rajani tathāvidhānām apratipattiḥ syāt 
ata uddhataveṣābharaṇaṃ na kathaṃcit syāt 
veṣaḥ keśavasanavinyāsādiviśeṣaḥ 
ābharaṇaṃ karṇikādi 
tatra uddhataveṣa ūrdhvavastro javanaraktāmbaradhāritetyādi 
uddhatābharaṇo dīptimadbahuratnālaṃkāro bahuhāraś ca 
sa hy āditya iva durnirīkṣyaḥ sāmānyajanānāṃ viśeṣato 'bhiyuktānām 
paśyed iti sabhāpraveśasya prayojanam āha 
paśyed vicakṣaṇaḥ 
ayaṃ ca rājño darśanāpadeśo daṇḍapraṇayane yathāsthānārthapratipādanaparyanto bhaviṣyati 
tātparyaṃ tasyaiva rakṣādhikāraḥ prayuktaḥ syāt 
īdṛśasya ca darśanasyānyeṣām asaṃbhāvanād anadhikāraḥ 
sarveṣāṃ saṃśayacchedamātraphalaṃ tu vyavahāradarśanaṃ prāyaścittopadeśavad viduṣo brāhmaṇasyāsty eva 
uktaṃ hi dharmasaṃkaṭeṣu brūyāt iti 
tathaikavargyāṇāṃ vāṇijyakarṣakapaśupālaprabhṛtīnāṃ svavargasāmayikārthavipratipattāv anyasyāṃ votkṛṣṭanirṇayād bhūtir iti tathāvidhavyavahāradarśane niyogaḥ 
tathā hi paṭhitam 
kulāni śreṇayaś caiva gaṇāś cādhikṛto nṛpaḥ 
pratiṣṭhā vyavahārāṇāṃ gurvebhyas tūttarottaram  iti 
tatra kulāni bandhujanasamūhaḥ 
tair yā vyavasthā kṛtā tato na vicalitavyam 
atha tatra nāśvasyus tavaite 'dhikataraṃ saṃbandhina iti vadantas tataḥ śreṇiṣu niveditavyam 
śreṇayaḥ samānavyavahārajīvino vaṇikprabhṛtayaḥ 
teṣāṃ bandhubhyo 'dhikagurutvam 
bāndhavā hi jñātidharmabhayād vicalitaṃ na niyacchanti 
śreṇayas tu rājagamanena śreṇidharmo rājapuruṣapraveśāt paribhavanīyatvena naśyatīti avicalanārthaṃ pratibhūgrahaṇapūrvakaṃ vicārayanti ya etasmād vicalati 
pariṣadi daṇḍo dātavyaś calituṃ vāpi tvayā na deyam iti 
gaṇāḥ gaṇaśaś cāriṇo gṛhaprāsādādikarā maṭhabrāhmaṇādayaś ca 
te svagaṇināṃ vyavahāraṃ paśyeyuḥ 
tatrāvicalārtham upasadaḥ kartavyāḥ 
pūrve samānakarmajīvina ekākino 'pi ime tu saṃbhūyakāriṇa iti viśeṣaḥ 
śreṇibhyaḥ saṃbhūyakāritayā vivādino bhūmijñatvāt 
anye tu kulānīti madhyasthapuruṣān āhuḥ 
te hi kāryābhyantarā aśreṇikṛtā eva nirṇetāraḥ 
adhikṛtaḥ traividyo vidvāṇ brāhmaṇaḥ 
tasya hi dharmasaṃkaṭeṣu pravaktṛtvaṃ vihitam 
tasya pūrvebhyo gurutvaṃ vaiduṣyāt 
nṛpasyāpi gurutvam atiśayaśaktitvād ataḥ svayaṃ viduṣā nṛpeṇa nirṇīte nāsty etat 
yo manyetājito 'smīti yo nyāyenāpi parājitaḥ 
dviguṇaṃ daṇḍam āsthāya tat kāryaṃ punar uddharet  iti 
anyeṣu karaṇeṣv etad bhavati 
tatra hy asti vacanāvasaro nādhikṛtaiḥ samyak nirṇītaṃ rājñā tu vivecite kiṃ vakṣyatīti 
arthāntaram  nṛpair adhikṛto rājasthānīyabrāhmaṇaḥ 
tathānyasya gṛhiṇaḥ svatantras tu gṛhe gṛhīti svātantryasmaraṇād daṇḍaparyanto 'sty eva vyavahāraḥ suparīkṣito bhavati vāsanāvinayārthaṃ śrutigrāhyaprasaktaśiṣyasutādyāḥ anyatra daṇḍāc chārīrāt patanīyāc ca karmaṇaḥ iti 
svalpe 'parādhe gṛhastha eva rājāyate 
mahati vyatikrame rājanivedanam evocitam ity asyārthaḥ 
ataś ca yat kaiścit paśyed iti parisaṃkhyārthatvam āropya brāhmaṇādīnām adhikāra āśaṅkitaḥ punaś ca kleśena samarthitaḥ tad ayuktam viṣayabhedād adhikārabhedāt 
svaviṣayo hi rājño daṇḍāvadhikaḥ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ nirṇayāvadhiḥ 
adhikāro 'pi bhinnaḥ 
rājño rājyasthitiprayojanam itareṣāṃ saṃsayacchedāder aparopakārakatvam 
ato no vṛttisaṃkarāśaṅkaiva nāsti 
kāryo vipratipattinirāsaḥ 
arthināṃ vipratipannayor hi sāmyaṃ vyavahāradarśane rājñā kartavyam 
no cet saṃvidāne ko rājñaḥ svādhigame nirodhaḥ 
kāyakaśuddhau hi śvānirodhavān iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
pratyahaṃ deśadṛṣṭaiś ca śāstradṛṣṭaiś ca hetubhiḥ 
aṣṭādaśasu mārgeṣu nibaddhāni pṛthak pṛthak 
pūrveṇārdhena nirṇayahetavaḥ kathyante 
uttareṇa vivādapadasaṃkhyānirdeśaḥ 
paśyet iti pūrvaślokād anuṣajyate kāryāṇi iti ca 
pratyahaṃ paśyet kāryāṇi pratidivasagamane vyavahāranirṇayaḥ kartavyaḥ 
hetubhir iti 
hetur nirṇayasādhanam 
sa ca dvividhaḥ 
pramāṇarūpo vyavasthārūpaś ca 
tatra pramāṇarūpo 'rthanirṇayahetuḥ sākṣyādiḥ 
vyavasthārūpo yato 'satye vārthaniścaye vyavahāraḥ saṃtiṣṭhate 
yathā satyaśapatha ubhayānumata ekaḥ sākṣī yady arthipratyarthibhyām abhyupagatapramāṇabhāvaḥ sabhyair aparīkṣito 'pi nirṇayahetutāṃ pratipadyate 
na tv aparīkṣitasya puṃso vacanād asaty āptatvavedane 'rthaniścayaḥ 
prāśnikānām abhyupagame 'pi vyavasthā hetur bhavati 
sā ca vyavasthā dvividhā sādhāraṇy asādhāraṇī ca 
deśabhedāśrayabhedāt sāpi dvividhā aviruddhā viruddhā ca 
aviruddhā  yathā keṣāṃcid dākṣiṇātyānām aputrā strī bhartary uparate sabhāsthāṇum upārohati tam upārūḍhā adhikṛtair parīkṣitā kṛtalakṣaṇā tatkṣaṇāntaraṃ sapiṇḍeṣu ṛkthaṃ labhate 
tathodīcāṃ labhyamānāṃ kanyāṃ yācamānāya bhojanaṃ yadi dīyate tata iyaṃ tubhyaṃ dattā ity anukte 'pi pratiśrutā bhavati 
viruddhā ca  kvacid deśe vasante dhānyaṃ yujyate śaradi dviguṇaṃ pratyādīyate 
tathānujñātabhoga ādhir dviguṇe 'pi tadutthadhane praviṣṭa ā mūlahiraṇyadānād bhujyata eva 
eṣā hi aśītibhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāt kusīdavṛddhir dvaiguṇyaṃ nātyeti iti viruddhā 
tatra bhedāśrayā deśadṛṣṭahetuśabdenābhihitāḥ 
śāstradṛṣṭās tu hetavaḥ śāstre paṭhitāḥ 
te ca kecana śāstrakāraiḥ kalpitavyavasthāḥ kecid yathāvastvavasthitā anūditāḥ 
tatra kalpitavyavasthā yathā lekhyaṃ yathopabhogaḥ sākṣiṇaś ca 
anumānaṃ tu vastuniyataṃ yathā nayaty asṛkpātair mṛgasya mṛgayuḥ padam iti 
yady api sarvaṃ laukikaṃ na śāstrakāravacanāt prāmāṇyaṃ labhate tathāpi laukikam eva tasmin kvacic chāstram āśrayitavyam 
yā ca yadīdṛśe cāparādha idaṃ divyaṃ iyatā ca kālena bhogaḥ pramāṇam iti laukikam api tac chāstradṛṣṭam ity uktam 
tasyāṃ ca vyavasthāyāṃ śāstrakārāṇāṃ mūle saṃbhavati sā pramāṇam 
yā tv asaṃbhavatanmūlā sā nādaraṇīyā 
yathā lekhyakarmapāṭhaḥ
ubhayābhyarthitenaivaṃ mayā hy amukasūnunā 
likhitaṃ hy amukenaiva lekhakas tattvato likhet  iti 
yasyādāv eva lekhakaḥ svanāma niveśayed idaṃ nāmāham amuṣyaputro likhāmīdam iti na kaścid doṣaḥ syat 
sa hy evamarthaṃ nāma niveśayati anenedaṃ likhitam iti lekhaka upalakṣito yathā syād 
yadi hy asau lekhakaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa pratyayito bhavati tatas tallikhitaṃ pramāṇam 
yadi cāsāv ātmānaṃ svagotranāmnā nopalakṣayet tataḥ kasya pratyayitatā pramāṇāntarād anviṣyatām 
atha tu lekhyāntaradarśanenānyena vā hetunā viśiṣṭalekhaka iti pratyabhijñānaṃ syād anupalakṣito 'pi na kaścid doṣaḥ 
tatra yadi lekhako na likhet mayedaṃ likhitam iti bhaved eva tādṛśaṃ lekhyaṃ paripūrṇalakṣaṇam 
eṣā ca lekhakaparīkṣā tatropayujyate 
atra lekhakasya sākṣitvāntarbhāvo 'nyeṣāṃ sākṣiṇām alpatvāt 
yatra tv anye bahavaḥ pratyayitāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ svahastārūḍhāḥ santi tatra lekhakasaṃbandhinī pratyayitatā nopayujyate 
tatheyam aparā vyavasthā 
likhitaṃ likhitenaiva sākṣimac caiva sākṣibhiḥ 
sākṣibhyo likhitaṃ śreyo likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ 
nāsyām api vyavasthāyāṃ kiṃcin nibandhanam asti 
tathā hi dvividhaṃ lekhyam svahastakṛtaṃ parahastakṛtaṃ ca 
parahastakṛtam api dvividham svahastalekhakalikhitam adhikṛtalekhakalikhitam 
tad etat parahastakṛtaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sākṣyātmakam eva tatra sākṣibhyo likhitam iti bhedānupapatteḥ 
idaṃ hi tasya lakṣaṇam
sākṣiṇaḥ svasvahastena pitṛnāmādipūrvakam 
tatrāham amukaḥ sākṣī likheyur iti te samam  iti 
nāpy ekahastalikhitasya prāmāṇyam iṣyate yathaikasya sākṣitve
