devatārūpaṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe 
tāttvikam ātmīyam āntaraṃ rūpaṃ śārīram tathā bāhyam anātmīyam asāram etadupabhogārthaṃ mā duṣkṛtaṃ kārṣīr iti protsāhyate 
ato māvamaṃsthāḥ svam ātmānam māvajñāsīr nṛṇāṃ sākṣiṇam anuttamam 
anyo hi sākṣī asminn eva loke ayaṃ tu mṛtasyāpi sākṣyaṃ dadāti 
tasmād etasmād bhetavyam 
asatyavādī kadācin manyate ātmāntaraṃ pratipannasya kim eṣa me draṣṭāpi kariṣyati iti 
tan na 
gatir ātmā tathātmanaḥ 
ātmānam antareṇānyā gatir nāsti 
na hi dvāv ātmānāv ekasya bhavataḥ 
anye tu manyante paramātmā sākṣī saṃsāryātmāno niyojyā iti bhedaḥ 
ke punas te devā rahasy api pracchannaṃ pāpam ācarantaṃ ye paśyanti ata āha 
dyaur bhūmir āpo hṛdayaṃ candrārkāgniyamānilāḥ 
rātriḥ saṃdhye ca dharmaś ca vṛttajñāḥ sarvadehinām 
hṛdayaśabdena hṛdayāyatano liṅgapuruṣa ucyate 
divādīnāṃ draṣṭṛtvam acetaneṣu caitanyam āropyate 
darśanāntare tu mahābhūtāni devatātmatayā cetanāny eva 
tathā ca pṛthivī bhārāvataraṇāya brahmāṇam upāgamad iti varṇyate 
sarvagatatvāt teṣāṃ na kiṃcid apratyayam astīti sarvaśarīriṇāṃ vṛttaṃ śīlaṃ cātmanaḥ kāyagataṃ śubham aśubhaṃ ca jānate 
devabrāhmaṇasāṃnidhye sākṣyaṃ pṛcched ṛtaṃ dvijān 
udaṅmukhān prāṅmukhān vā pūrvāhṇe vai śuciḥ śucīn 
devā durgāmārtaṇḍādayaḥ pratimākalpitāḥ 
śucīn kṛtasnānācamanādividhīn 
śuciḥ praṣṭā svayam api tathāvidha eva syāt 
ṛtam iti ślokapūraṇārtham eva 
prasiddham anyat 
brūhīti brāhmaṇaṃ pṛcchet satyaṃ brūhīti pārthivam 
gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṃ śūdram ebhis tu pātakaiḥ 
kva punar iyaṃ tṛtīyā gobījakāñcanair iti 
yadi tāvat pṛcched iti kriyāsaṃbandhāt karaṇam ucyate tad anupapannam 
śabdo hi tatra karaṇam nārthaḥ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
yathā gavādīni praśnakaraṇatvaṃ pratipadyante tathā vyākhyeyam 
pātakair ity ubhayaśeṣo vijñeyaḥ gobījakāñcanaiḥ pātakair iti 
tenāyam artho bhavati 
gobījakāñcanaviṣayaiḥ pātakapradarśanaiḥ pṛcched iti 
gāṃ hṛtvā hatvā vā yat pātakaṃ tad bhavati tava mithyā vadataḥ iti praśnavākyaṃ paṭhitavyam 
evaṃ vakṣyamāṇaiḥ pātakaiḥ śūdraṃ pṛcchet 
pātakaśabdas tu pātakapradarśanārtheṣv abhidhāneṣu draṣṭavyo mukhyānāṃ praśnakaraṇatvābhāvād ity uktam 
brahmaghno ye smṛtā lokā ye ca strībālaghātinaḥ 
mitradruhaḥ kṛthaghnasya te te syur bruvato mṛṣā 
brāhmaṇaṃ hatvā ye lokā narakādilakṣaṇāḥ prāpyante tatkāribhis te tava bhavanti mithyāvadatas tasmāt satyaṃ brūhīty anuyogaḥ 
yaś ca mitraṃ druhyati brāhmaṇādīn dārasarvasvāpaharaṇādinā nāśayati  yaś ca kṛtam upakāraṃ vismṛtya tam evopakartāram apakaroti  yat tasya kṛtaghnasya paratra duḥkhaṃ tad avāpnoti 
janmaprabhṛti yat kiṃcit puṇyaṃ bhadra tvayā kṛtam 
tat te sarvaṃ śuno gacched yadi brūyās tvam anyathā 
śuno gacchen niṣphalaṃ syād bhavata ity arthaḥ 
anye tu doṣapradarśanārthaṃ śvagamanavacanam 
yathā kṛcchreṇa mahatā suvarṇādyuttamadravyam arjayitvāśucipravāhe tyajet tādṛk sukṛtaṃ bhavati 
na punar anyakṛtasya sukṛtasyānyatra gamanam astīty asakṛd uktam etat 
eko 'ham asmīty ātmānaṃ yas tvaṃ kalyāṇa manyase 
nityaṃ sthitas te hṛdy eṣa puṇyapāpekṣitā muniḥ 
puṇyapāpayor īkṣitā draṣṭā munis tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ 
kaḥ punar asau muniḥ 
bhayātiśayapradarśanārtham āha 
yamo vaivasvato devo yas tavaiṣa hṛdi sthitaḥ 
tena ced avivādas te mā gaṅgāṃ mā kurūn gamaḥ 
ya eṣa yamaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ dehadhanādyucchedakārī yātanābhiś ca nigṛhṇīteti śrutipatham āgato bhavataḥ so 'yaṃ tava hṛdaye vartate na viprakṛṣṭaḥ 
sa ca kṛtāparādham adhunaiva yamayati 
mā caivaṃ manasi kṛthāḥ eṣa ātmā madīyo mām upekṣiṣyata iti 
na hy etasya kaścid ātmīyaḥ 
tena ced avivādaḥ sa cet prasannaḥ pratyayitaḥ kiṃ gaṅgāgamanena snānārthinaḥ pāpaśuddhaye kiṃ vā kurukṣetragamane 'sti prayojanam 
yatphalaṃ pāpapramocanalakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ prāpyate tad ihaivāvisaṃvādini paramātmani 
na hi pāpakāriṇa ātmā nirviśaṅko bhavati 
kiṃ me 'ntaḥ syād eteneti 
nāstikasyāpi kiṃkathikā kadācit bhavaty eva 
gaṅgānadī pāvayantī 
kurukṣetraṃ tu deśa eva pāvanaḥ 
nagno muṇḍaḥ kapālī ca bhikṣārthī kṣutpipāsitaḥ 
andhaḥ śatrukulaṃ gacched yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet 
kapālaṃ śarāvādipātraikadeśaḥ subodham 
avākśirās tamasy andhe kilbiṣī narakaṃ vrajet 
yaḥ praśnaṃ vitathaṃ brūyāt pṛṣṭaḥ san dharmaniścaye 
nimittaṃ pṛṣṭo yo vitatham asatyaṃ vakti sa tena kilbiṣena pāpena gṛhīta ūrdhvapādo 'dhomukho mahati gāḍhe tamasi narakaṃ yātanāsthānaṃ tatprāpnotīty arthaḥ 
anyasmiṃs tamasi kiṃcid dṛśyate tatra tu na kiṃcid evety andhagrahaṇam 
andho matsyān ivāśnāti sa naraḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ saha 
yo bhāṣate 'rthavaikalyam apratyakṣaṃ sabhāṃ gataḥ 
arthavaikalyaṃ satyād apetaṃ bhāṣate 
yathā kaṇṭakā aśitā bhakṣitā janayanti na tādṛśīṃ matsyāḥ prītiṃ janayanti 
yadā dhanalobhena kācit prītimātrā bhavati tathāpi mahāduḥkhaṃ bhavatīti sakaṇṭakamatyāśanopamā 
yasya vidvān hi vadataḥ kṣetrajño nātiśaṅkate 
tasmin na devāḥ śreyāṃsaṃ loke 'nyaṃ puruṣaṃ viduḥ 
yasya vadataḥ sākṣiṇo vidvān satyānṛte jānānaḥ kṣetrajño 'ntaryāmī puruṣo nātiśaṅkate kim ayaṃ satyaṃ vakṣyaty anṛtaṃ vety evaṃ nāśaṅkate niścitam evaiṣa satyaṃ vaktīti yasyātmā nirviśaṅkaḥ tasmāt puruṣān nānyaṃ śreyāṃsaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ praśastatamaṃ puruṣaṃ devā jānate 
kaḥ punar ayaṃ veditā 
kaś ca tato 'nya āśaṅkitā 
eka eva hy ātmā svaprayatnadvāreṇa vācam īrayan veditā saṃpadyate 
sa eva taddharmeṇa kiṃ kathaṃ syād ity evaṃrūpeṇāśaṅkākhyānena yujyate 
tatra bhedānupapattiḥ 
satyam etat 
kālpanikena bhedenaivam uktam 
yathā hanty ātmānam ātmaneti 
yāvato bāndhavān yasmin hanti sākṣye 'nṛtaṃ vadan 
tāvataḥ saṃkhyayā tasmin śṛṇu saumyānupūrvaśaḥ 
dravyaviśeṣānṛtāśrayāḥ pāpaviśeṣāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇa ity etat pradarśanārthaṃ prakaraṇam ārabhyate 
tatrāyaṃ ślokaḥ saṃbodhanadvāreṇopadiśyamāna ādarārthaḥ saṃpadyate 
yad guhyaṃ mitha upadiśyate tad yathākathaṃcid bhavatīty avadhāritaṃ grahaṇaṃ nātiguru idaṃ tv atimahāprayojanam avahitaiḥ śrotavyam iti 
saumyeti caikavacanam anekaśiṣyasaṃnidhāne bhṛgāv eva vivakṣitam 
yasmin sākṣya iti vyadhikaraṇasaptamī 
yasmin dravyabhedabhinne vyavahāre yat sākṣyaṃ tatra tannimittaṃ yad anṛtam ity eṣā viṣayasaptamī 
aparā yasya ca bhāvena iti 
atha vā dravyabhedāt sākṣyabhedaḥ tatra samānādhikaraṇa eva 
tāvata iti parimāṇe vyutpādyate 
tatra yat prabhūtanimittam api parimāṇaṃ saṃbhāvyate śiśūn striyo vṛddhān ity ato viśinaṣṭi saṃkhyayeti 
anupūrvaśa iti sukhapratipattaye 'nupūrveṇa hy abhidhīyamānaṃ sukhena pratīyate 
ānupūrvī ca saṃkhyāgatātrābhipretā 
tasyā eva vakṣyamāṇatvāt pañca paśu ityādi 
pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte 
śatam aśvānrte hanti sahasraṃ puruṣānṛte 
paśunimittam anṛtam 
śākapārthivavat samāsaḥ 
pañcabāndhavāṃś cānṛtaṃ hanti 
tataś ca teṣāṃ narakapātanam 
mātāpitarau jāyāmithunaṃ cāpatyam iti pañca 
kathaṃ punar anyakṛtenainasānyasya phalam 
anyakṛtena puṇyapāpādinānyasya svarganarakādiprāptiḥ saṃsargād iti brūmaḥ 
tair ayaṃ parityajyata ity uktaṃ bhavati 
atha vā tair hatair yat pāpaṃ tad asya bhavatīty aghnann api hantīty ucyate adṛṣṭakāryatulyatvāt 
arthavādaś cāyaṃ na tatkāryopadeśaḥ 
tatkāryopadeśe hi hiṃsāprāyaścittī syāt 
kauṭasākṣyaprāyaścittam etad bhavati 
uttarottarasaṃkhyādivṛddhiḥ prāyaścittagauravārthā na punar vivakṣitaiva 
tenottarottarasya garīyaḥ prāyaścittam ity uktaṃ bhavati 
ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kasya dāsa ity evaṃ saṃśaye yad anṛtaṃ tat puruṣānṛtam ucyate 
hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'nṛtaṃ vadan 
sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti mā sma bhūmyanṛtaṃ vadīḥ 
kathaṃ punar ajātānām asati saṃsarge parakīyena saṃyogo yenedam ucyate hanti jātān ajātāṃś ceti 
uktam arthavādo 'yam iti 
sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛtaṃ vadan 
mā vādīḥ bhūmisaṃbandhy asatyam 
smottare laṅ ca iti 
mā vādīr ityādarārtham apy etat pratyakṣaṃ saṃbodhanam 
kā punar iyaṃ bhūmir nāma 
yad etat pṛthivīgolakaṃ parvatāvaṣṭaṃbhanaṃ sāgarāvadhi prasiddham 
nanv iyatyāḥ kaḥ svāmī ko vāpahartā 
na hi sārvabhaumaḥ kaścid asti 
tathā ca gāthā bhūmeḥ na mā martyaḥ kaścana dātum arhati 
na kaścit sārvabhaumo 'stīty abhiprāyaḥ 
viśvakarman bhauvana māṃ didāsitha viśvakarman bhaumaneti pitṛvyapadeśena svanāmnā ca rājño āmantraṇaṃ śrutam 
mām asau dātum icchatīti 
upamaiṃṣyati salilasya madhye nimajje 'ham salilasya madhyam 
evaṃ saṃkalpaṃ vṛthā saṃkalpitavati tvayi salile majjāmi 
salilamajjanena naiṣphalyam atra dānasaṃkalpasyāha 
yathā salile nikṣiptaṃ niṣphalam evam etad apīti 
mṛṣaiṣa kaśyapāya saṃgaraḥ 
tavaiṣa saṃgaraḥ pratiśravaḥ pratijñānaṃ kaśyapāya dadāmīti mogho vadhyo 'stu sarvasādāraṇāhaṃ sarvajanopabhogyā 
kevalaṃ rājāno rakṣānirbandhamātrabhāja ity abhiprāyaḥ 
ata etāvatyā bhūmer na dānāpahārasaṃbhava iti kuto vivādaḥ 
satyam 
yathaivāyaṃ bhūmiśabdo 'tra vartate evaṃ kṣetragrāmasthaṇḍilādāv api 
tatra ca saṃbhavaty eva svāmyam 
pratyakṣasyaiva dānāpahārāv iti na kiṃcid anupapannam 
apahāraś cāsyā yādṛśena rūpeṇa apahāraḥ gṛhāder na vīrudvichedaḥ 
ataś ca yaḥ parakīye kṣetre cakramyeta mṛdo vā kaścid ādadyān nāsau bhūmyapahārī syāt 
mīmāṃsakair uktam na bhūmiḥ syāt sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt iti 
ekadeśavacanaṃ ca bhūmiśabdam adhikṛtya bhagavān kṛṣṇadvaipāyano dānadharmeṣu paṭhitavān
parair apy anumantavyo dānadharmo nṛpair bhuvi 
akṣayo hi nidhir brāhmo vihito 'yaṃ mahībhṛtām  iti 
kṛtsnagolakābhiprāyam eva nādeyatvaṃ bhūmer viśvajiti mīmāṃsakar uktam na bhūmiḥ syāt sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt iti 
sarvān puruṣān praticaṃkramanādiyogyatayāviśiṣṭā bhūmiḥ svāmīkartum aśakyā kathaṃ dīyata ity arthaḥ 
asmiṃs tu pakṣe grāmanagarādi viśvajiti dātavyam 
anye tu paṭhanti antareṇa sadaḥ patnīśālaṃ ca dakṣiṇā nayanti iti bhūmau guṇavidher asyāsaṃbhavāt kṣetrāder apy atra dānam 
vadann iti caikavacananirdeśāt śṛṇu saumya iti sākṣiviṣayam evaitat saṃbodhanam na śiṣyaviṣayam 
śūdram ebhis tu pātakaiḥ ity ata ārabhya yāvanto madhamapuruṣanirdeśās te sarveṣāṃ pātakabhūyastvasamānākhyātarūpādyekavākyatvāc chūdrānuyogārthāḥ 
andhaḥ śatrugṛhaṃ gacchet ity ata ārabhya sarve sākṣiviṣayā anuyogāḥ 
ākhyātavairūpyena prakaraṇasya vicchedāt madhyamapuruṣe samānārthakramatvāt kartavyo gacched iti prathamapuruṣanirdeśaḥ pūrvādhikāranivṛttyarthaḥ 
apsu bhūmivad ity āhuḥ strīṇāṃ bhoge ca maithune 
abjeṣu caiva ratneṣu sarveṣv aśmamayeṣu ca 
kūpataḍāgādisthe mahati jale svalpe vā bhūmivad doṣaḥ 
strīṇāṃ bhoge ca maithunākhye keneyaṃ strī bhuktā maithunadharmeṇeti 
abjeṣu ratneṣu manayo ratnāni muktādyāḥ 
aśmamayeṣu vaiḍūryādiṣu 
ratneṣv iti saṃbadhyate 
dvividhāny eva ratnāni jalajāny aśmamayāni ca 
ato ratnagrahaṇa eva kartavye viśeṣaṇadvayopādānaṃ ślokapūraṇārtham 
adbhyo jātāny abjāni 
aśmano vikārā aśmamayāni 
etān doṣān avekṣya tvaṃ sarvān anṛtabhāṣaṇe 
yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ sarvam evāñjasā vada 
ūhāpohau varjayitvā yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutaṃ cādṛṣṭaṃ tatvena brūhi 
gorakṣakān vāṇijakāṃs tathā kārukuśīlavān 
preṣyān vārdhuṣikāṃś caiva viprān śūdravad ācaret 
kāravaḥ śilpinas takṣāyaskārasūpakarādayaḥ 
kuśīlavā nartakagāyanādyāḥ 
preṣyā jīvikārthaṃ parasyājñākārā dāsā iti prasiddhāḥ 
vārdhuṣikā vṛddhyupajīvinaḥ 
ete brāhmaṇā api santaḥ prakaraṇāt sākṣye śapathe ca śūdravad draṣṭavyā na kriyāntare 
yathā śūdro na dānapuṇyādinā pṛcchyante sākṣye śapathe cāgniharaṇādinā śodhyate tadvad eṣo 'pi śapatho yady api pūrvatrāprakṛtaḥ tathāpy uttaratrānantaryād doṣavatvāt prayatatvāt prayatatve 'py ānantaryasya saṃbandhahetutvād vakṣyamāṇasyāpi pratyāsattyā pūrvavad vayosaṃnipātāt śapathe 'pi tulyam 
tad vadan dharmato 'rtheṣu jānann apy anyathā naraḥ 
na svargāc cyavate lokād daivīṃ vācaṃ vadanti tām 
tad anyathāpi jānann anyathā vadan na svargād bhraśyati 
kūṭam api vadan na duṣyatīty arthaḥ 
kiṃ sarvadaiva 
nety āha 
dharmato 'rtheṣu 
dharmeṇa dayādinā nimittenārtheṣu vyavahāreṣu 
dharmasya ca nimittatvam uktam uttaraśloke darśayiṣyati 
etac ca na svamanīṣikayocyate 
kiṃ tarhy etāṃ vācam vadanti asmāt pūrve 'pi smartāraḥ 
kā punar daivī vāk 
yayāsmin nimitte 'nṛtaṃ vaditavyam ity eṣā devānāṃ saṃbandhinī vāk tāṃ manvādayaḥ śrutvā vadantīti viśeṣe 'nṛtapraśaṃsā 
anyais tu pūrvavidhiśeṣatayāyaṃ śloko vyākhyātaḥ 
tad etad gorakṣakādiṣv anuyogavākyeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu bhavitavyam 
anyathā brāḥmaṇeṣu satyaṃ brūhi iti yathā brāhmaṇā ete kathaṃ śūdravad anuyojyā iti tadvidān api na duṣyatīti yato manvādayaḥ evaṃvidhāṃ vācaṃ vadanti yathaite śūdravad ācaraṇīyā iti 
te ca dharmādharmayoḥ pramāṇam 
taiś ca satyaṃ vaditavyam 
tac ca yathāvihitaṃ tatra sa eva dharmo yatra vānṛtaṃ tatrānṛtābhidhānam eva dharma iti 
śūdraviṭkṣatraviprāṇāṃ yatrartoktau bhaved vadhaḥ 
tatra vaktavyam anṛtaṃ tad dhi satyād viśiṣyate 
tatra nānṛtaṃ vaded iti yaḥ pratiṣedhas tasyāśūdrādiviṣayatānenocyate na punar anṛtavadanaṃ vidhīyate 
tathā sati pratiṣedhenaikavākyatā bādhyeta 
kā punar atra nimittaśrutiḥ 
tatreti 
tasya vadhaviśeṣaṇatvān na vadhaḥ tasyāsato nimittatvānupapatteḥ 
ataś ca kṛte vadhe paścāt tadviṣayam atadviṣayaṃ vānṛtaṃ vaktavyam ity artha āpatati 
tattvaniṣṭham 
nanu ca yatreti vyavahāravastu nirdiśyate punar tatreti tad eva pratinirdiśyate 
tataś ca yasmin vyavahāre parājitāḥ santo vadhārhā bhavanti tasya nānupananno nimittabhāvaḥ 
atra vadanti 
na cātra vadharheṣv anṛtam iṣyate 
yato 'nanurūpaṃ pāpīyaso jivanam iti 
yas tv avadharho 'vakāśāt puradāsyādiskhalitād anṛtākhyāpanāya rājānaḥ svalpārādhāt na ghātayitīty upapattiḥ rājatvāt krodhadaṇḍasya cāśāstrīyatvād asthitaparimāṇatayā niścayābhāvo na tasyāpi nimittatvopapattiḥ 
ataḥ pratiṣedhaśeṣataiva nyāyyā 
gautamīye tv anṛtavidhyāśaṅkāpi nāsti 
nānṛtavadane doṣo jivanaṃ cet tadadhīnam ity evamādipratiṣedhe satyānṛtayoḥ kāmacāraprasaṅge satyavacanena vadhe nimittabhāvaḥ pratipadyamāno na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni iti pratiṣedhavyatikarmabhaye cānṛtaṃ pratipadyata iti yuktimat 
tenedaṃ kṛtam na ced asau pṛṣṭa ācaṣṭe na punar hanti aghnaṃś ca kathaṃ himādoṣeṇānuṣajyate 
atha saty api svātantrye tadvacanena rājñā hanyamānatvāt taddhetubhāvāpattyā prayojakakartṛtvam iti cet na sarvo hetuḥ prayojakaḥ dhanena kulaṃ vidyayā yaśa iti 
bhavati vidyāyaśasor hetutā prayoktrī 
na cānya evāyaṃ laukikaphalotpattiyogyatālakṣaṇo hetubhāvaḥ api tu dravyaguṇāḥ 
yatrāpi kriyā śrūyate agninā pāka iti sāpi svarūpeṇa siddharūpābhidhānāt kṛdantair bhāvasya 
anyaś cāyaṃ śāstrīyaḥ kartṛvyāpārasya prayojako hetur na tu tatprayojakatvam evam ity artham 
yadi tāvat preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇe ājñāprārthanārūpe prayojakatvaṃ śoṣayate vrīhīn ātapa ityādāv acetaneṣu ṇijutpattir durlabhā 
nanu ca parihṛtam etadvyākhyātṛbhiḥ mukhyopacaritakriya iti cetanāvad vastūpacāre bhikṣā vāsayati kārīṣo 'dhyāpayati iti 
na hy atra caitanyakṛta upakāraḥ api tu niścitatvāt tadanyasya prayojakasya 
adhyayanaṃ hy ācāryakaraṇavidhiprayuktaṃ kurvāṇasya māṇavakasya śītādilakṣaṇaṃ pratibandhakam anuvadati 
kārīṣe prayojakatvādhyāropaḥ 
prerakatvād dhi prayojakam ucyate 
tac cācaitanyasya vāyujalāder agnikāṣṭhādau sutarāṃ dṛśyate 
tadā vidhiprayojakastutiprayoktṛbhiḥ preṣaṇādyābhāvād gauṇārthāḥ śabdāḥ syuḥ 
athaitatstham arthācaraṇaṃ prayojakatvaṃ tac ca prayojakasya vyāpārānuguṇaṃ preṣaṇādivyatiriktakriyāntarāvaraṇaṃ saṃvidhānākhyam 
saṃvidhāna eva hi kārayatīty ucyate 
yathā bubhukṣamāṇasya kaścit pātram āharaty anyo bhaktam upanayati 
kasyacid vadhapravṛttasya kaścid āyudhm arpayaty anyo vadhyadoṣāviṣkaraṇena manyum upadīpayati 
evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ preṣitrādirūparahitaḥ savyāpāraḥ prayojyaphalasiddhāv ānukūlyaṃ pratipadyamānas tatsamarthācaraṇapakṣe prayojakaḥ 
asmin pakṣe kārīṣopādhyāyau tulyau prāpnutaḥ 
atrāpi yam antareṇa kriyāyā anivṛttir yasya ca kārakaviśeṣasaṃjñā na pravarteta sa mukhyaḥ prayojakaḥ kartā 
adhyāyitāraṃ cāntareṇa kārīṣo na śaknoty adhyayanahetubhāvaṃ pratipattum 
ācāryas tu tam antareṇāpi śakta eveti gauṇaḥ kārīṣaḥ 
yatra ca karaṇādibhāvo niścito hetumatpratyayadarśanāt tatrāpi gauṇārthataiva 
yathā kaścit svalpenāpi prayojanena dūraṃ grāmaṃ punaḥ punar gatavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bravīti aśvo gamayati devadattam iti 
yatra tu na kasyacid āsattiviprakarṣāv antaraṅgabahiraṅgabhāvo vā gamyate tatra yāvantas tadānukūlyaṃ pratipadyante sarve te prayojakāḥ 
nanu ca kārakasaṃjñāyām antaraṅgayogo nāstīti ko viśeṣaḥ kārīṣopādyāyayoḥ 
svaprakriyaiva sā tatrabhavatām 
na vastvāśrayā 
vastvāśrayau ca vidhipratiṣedhau 
idam api tatra paṭhyate vivakṣātaḥ kārakāṇi bhavanti iti 
evaṃ ca sati yatrākartur eva kartṛtvaṃ kaścid vivakṣet tatra kartṛpratyayavidhipratiṣedhāv api syātām 
yathā pātakaparigaṇanāyām anupaṭhati kravikrayī saṃskartā copahartā ca iti 
tasmād anvākhyānasiddhyarthā tāvakī sā vyavasthā na vastvadhiṣṭhānam artham avaskandati 
ata eva vyākhyātṛbhir uktam samarthācaraṇaṃ ced dhetuḥ hetumātre prasaṅgaḥ 
tataś ca yo 'pi kasmaicid bhojanaṃ dadāti sa caudarikatayātisauhityena vyāpadyeta prāptaṃ tatra dātur vadhakartṛtvam iti 
na ca tatprayuktaṃ bhavati 
kriyāntareṇa hy asau niścito bhojanākhyaprayojako na vadho na verṣyādi kathaṃcin nimittaṃ bhavati 
bhavatu vā tannimittam prayojakatvābhāvāt tu kartṛtvaṃ nāstīti brūmaḥ 
yasya tu bhūmisuvarṇāpahārādināparādhyeta sa ca tadapahāramanyunā kathaṃcin mriyeta kiṃ tatrāpahartur apahāradoṣa evota vadhe 'pi nimittibhāva iti cintyam 
kim atra cintyate 
avyabhicārāvagamyatvād dhetuhetumadbhāvasya na khaḍgaprahārabhojanavicchedāder iva bhūmyādiharaṇasya niyatanimittatvopapattiḥ 
ko 'yaṃ niyamo 'bhipretaḥ 
yadi ha vā kecin mriyante kecin nety aniyato niyamo bhavati 
puruṣasvabhāvabhedāt tad evauṣadhaṃ śleṣmikāya hitaṃ viparītam anyasyeti 
sarveṣām eva ca bhāvānādeśakālasvabhāvabhedasahakārisāpekṣaḥ śaktyantaraprādurbhāvaḥ 
tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ puruṣavittasaṃtatisāpekṣaṃ pipāsāhetuprāṇyantarasāpekṣyaṃ tadvicchedahetur iti 
evam atyantāmarṣiṇo manyumataḥ svaharaṇaparibhavādi maraṇāya kalpate 
kiṃ tatra śakyo nimittabhāvo 'pahnotum 
peśalamānasasya tūpekṣaiva tatra 
ye punar manyuparītā anaśanaśvabhrapatanaviṣabhakṣaṇādināparāddhāram uddyiśya mriyeraṃs tatrāpy eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 
nanu cānyasyaiva prasiddhahetubhāvasya viṣabhakṣaṇāder nimittasya tatra darśanān na bhūmyādiharaṇasyāparādho hantṛtvam āpnuyāt 
tenopajanitamanyur maraṇahetoḥ pravartata iti pāraṃparyato nimittatvam iti cet 
evaṃ sati pathyopadeśenāpi kecid udvijamānā ātmānaṃ vyāpādayanti tataś ca tatropadeṣṭāro hantāraḥ syuḥ 
tathā matsariṇaḥ paradravyeṣv īrṣyayā śuṣyantā dhaniṣu doṣam ādadīran 
tathānye mūḍhamanasaḥ priyān putrān svāminaś cānumriyante tatra priyādīnām hantṛtāpattiḥ 
apare ca rūpavatstrīdarśanena pariphalgumanaso 'sūyante bhajyamānahṛdayāś ca vivekaśūnyātmānas tatra śīlavatyaḥ striyo duṣyeyuḥ 
tad evedam āpatitaṃ mṛtasya brahmahatyeti 
satyam evaṃ yadi vidhipratiṣedhaviśeṣo na syāt 
vihito hitopadeśaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ svaharaṇādi 
tathā cāhuḥ 
upakārapravṛttānāṃ kathaṃcid ced viparyayaḥ 
na tatra doṣaḥ keṣāṃcid bheṣajām auṣadhī yathā 
atra na kevalaṃ vaidyāder āturopakārārthinaḥ prayuktauṣadhasya kathaṃcid viparītatayopapattāv adoṣaḥ kiṃ tarhy anyasyāpi gavāder mahati paṅke nimagnasyoddhartṛbhujākarṣaṇāya yathāśrameṇa yadi vyāpattir na tatroddharttā duṣyed iti kathitaṃ bhavati 
evaṃ sarvatra 
yo 'pi kasmiṃścit svavyāpārānuṣṭhānavati dhanarūpātiśayasaṃpadvati dṛśyamāne dandahyate na taṃ prati kasyacic chāstrārthātikramaḥ 
niścito hi nimittabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhasya viṣayo bhavitum arhati 
na ca prāṇyantarāśrayiṣu caitasikeṣu dharmeṣu pratikṣaṇam anyathābhavatsu svabhāvaviśeṣāvasāyaḥ 
na hi śakyam avasāditum ayam asyā rūpasaṃpadā vyāpadyata iti 
na ca niścite pratiṣedhaviṣaye saṃbhavaty aniścitaviṣayatā nyāyyā 
yatra tarhi kathaṃcid varṇaviparyayaśarīraśoṣaṇādinā kutārkikaparītā syād api nimittāvagatis tatra kiṃ bhraṃśayituṃ śīlaṃ saṃyujyatāṃ kāminā bhavatu vā puruṣaghāpinīti 
naitad evam 
na hīdṛśī bhavanty api nimittatā pratiṣedhasya viṣayaḥ vidhyantaravirodhāt 
asti hy atra vyabhicārapratiṣedhavidhiḥ 
na vāpi vidhyantareṇānavaṣṭabdhe viṣaye kṛtāvakāśā vidhayo virodhavidhyantaraṃ viṣayam āskanditum arhanti 
ye 'pi manyante rāgalakṣaṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ śīlasaṃrakṣaṇopadeśo niṣedhati na śāstralakṣaṇām 
tena mahānubhāvatayā māsya tapasvino jīvitam ucchetsīd iti prāṇojjihīrṣayā mumūrṣuṇā saṃprayujyate nāsau vyabhicārapratiṣedham atikrāmet 
yat tu vidhyantaraviṣaye na vidhyantaraṃ pravartata iti naivāyaṃ vidhyantarasya viṣayo rāgalakṣaṇatvāt 
nanu ca pravṛttāv api naiva śāstram asti niyogavidhāv iva vyabhicārānujñānasmṛtyabhāvāt 
athāpravṛttau kāmayeta māraṇam iti pratiṣedhabhayāt pravartate so 'pi pratiṣedho rāgalakṣaṇām eva hiṃsāṃ pratiṣedhayati 
na cāsau rāgato na pravartate 'pi tu pratiṣedhabhayāt 
yā tu paropakārataḥ pravṛttiḥ sāpi pratiṣedhaviṣayaparihāreṇa 
yo 'pi kiṃcid yāced ayam aham ātmānaṃ hanmīti hanyān na tatrāprayacchato ghātakatvaṃ vyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt 
vāgdaivatyaiś ca carubhir yajeraṃs te sarasvatīm 
anṛtasyainasas tasya kurvāṇā niṣkṛtiṃ parām 
vāk cāsau devatā ca sā vāgdevatā 
tadarthaṃ ca caravo vāgdaivatyāḥ 
taṇḍulā nātipakvāś caravaḥ 
tair yajerann iti bahavacananirdeśāt carubhir iti bahuvacanam 
na punar ekaikaśo bahavaś caravo nāpi saṃhatānāṃ vrātyastomavad yāgo devaś ced varṣed bahavo brāhmaṇā yajeran iti tad bahuvacanam 
na tu kapiñjalaiś ca tribhir yajerann itivat 
tad etad brāhmaṇādyanugrahārtham anṛtam uktaṃ bhavati 
anṛtam evainaḥ pāpam asatyābhidhānalakṣaṇā kriyā 
yathā dharmakriyāvata evaṃ samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī 
yeṣāṃ tu kriyājanyau dharmādharmau na kriyaiva tanmate 'nṛtasya yad ena iti vaiyyadhikaraṇye 'nṛtanimittatvād eno 'nṛtam upacārataḥ samānādhikaraṇe eva 
tasya niṣkṛtiḥ śodhanaṃ pāvanaṃ prāyaścittam iti yāvat 
parā prakṛṣṭā 
nanu ca kuto 'tra pāpam yāvatāsmin nimitte nānṛtavacane doṣaḥ ity uktam 
kecid āhuḥ nivṛttis tu mahāphalā iti 
asmāc chāstrāt tu yāvajjīvam anṛtaṃ mayā na vaktavyam iti yena saṃkalpitaṃ tasya mithyāsaṃkalpadoṣo mā bhūd iti prāyaścittam ucyate 
gehadāhavadhapratiṣedhe 'pi naimittikaṃ vidhānam 
enaso niṣkṛtim ity arthavādaḥ 
kathaṃ tarhi vāgdaivatyaiḥ sarasvatīm yajeran 
yadi vāgdevatā sarasvatī katham ijyate 
atha vāksarasvatyor ekatvenaivaṃ devatābhāve śabdāvagamyarūpatvād devatāyā bhinnau cetau vāksarasvatīśabdau 
yathāgnaye juhotīti coditena jvalanāya kṛśānave vā svāheti hūyate vāyave nirūpya juhuyād vāyur vai prāṇa ity ukte 'pi na prāṇāyeti hūyate 
satyam 
vāg eva devatā 
sāmānādhikarṇyād devatārthe taddhitaḥ 
sarasvatīm iti dvitīyānnirdeśāt 
na hi dvitīyānirdeśyā devatā 
karmaṇi hi dvitīyā saṃpradānaṃ ca devatā na karma 
kathaṃ tarhi sarasvatīpadānvayaḥ 
arthavādo 'yam 
agnaye juhoty agnir vai sarvā devatā iti 
vāg eva sarasvatī 
tayeṣṭayā sāpīṣṭā bhavati 
yāgena devatāvagamyate 
katham 
agnir yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatir yaṣṭavyas tathāgniṃ yajati yad agniṃ yajatītyādi kecid āhuḥ 
devatāḥ svatas tatra tatra pūjyante 
daivatapūjāvacano 'tra yajiḥ 
pūjā ca pūjyamānakarmikā 
tatra yuktā dvitīyā 
tathā ca devatā pūjanīyetyādi smaryate 
etac ca na yuktam 
asmin hi pakṣe devatātvam anyato mṛgyam 
tatra yāgasaṃpradānaṃ devateti smaraṇavirodhaḥ 
eṣā ca smṛtir balīyasī nirapekṣatvāt 
pūrvā devatā uddeśyā dhyeyā ca 
yasyai devatāyai havir gṛhītaṃ syāt tāṃ manasā dhyāyed iti tatkriyākarmatvāt karmaṇy eṣā dvitīyā 
kūṣmāṇḍair vāpi juhuyād ghṛtam agnau yathāvidhi 
ud ity ṛcā vā vāruṇyā tṛcenābdaivatena vā 
kūmāṇḍā nāma mantrā yajurvede paṭhyante 
tair ghṛtam agnau juhuyāt 
juhotiś ca devatām uddiśya dravyasya tyāgaḥ 
āghāraviśeṣaṇe tatrehāgnāv ity adhikaraṇanirdeśān mantravarṇikī devatā veditavyā 
yeṣu ca mantreṣu devatāviśeṣaliṅgaṃ na dṛśyate  yathā devakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi ityādiṣu  tatra prajāpatir devateti yājñikāḥ 
atha vā yasyānyatra devatātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ seha saṃbandhīti yāvat 
tathā ca niruktakārāḥ api vā sā kāmadevatā syāt iti 
yady api yānyasya haviṣo devatā sānyasya na kadācit tathāpi yajati śrūyate dravyaṃ mantrāś ca te 'trāsatyāṃ devatāyāṃ juhotīti rūpaṃ tad uttareṇa juhuyād iti vyākhyeyam 
tac cāyuktam 
tathābhikṣārayed iti vaktavyaṃ syāt 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ devakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi ity atra karmaivāvayajanam evāvayājanam ity ucyate 
atas tad devatā 
sarvatra ca mantrābhidheyaṃ vastv astv iti na devatāyāṃ mantravarṇābhāvaḥ 
ud ity ṛcā vā vāruṇyeti 
ud uttamaṃ varuṇapāśam asmat iti eṣā ṛk varuṇadevatā ud iti pratīkena tal lakṣyate 
vāruṇīgrahaṇaṃ cānyasyā u tvā madantu stomā ity ucchabdapratīkāyā nivṛttyartham 
tṛcenābdaivatena ceti 
tad eva devataiva daivatam āpo daivatam asya tryṛcasya tena āpo hi ṣṭā ityādinā 
ataś caikaikayā ekaikāhutiḥ pratyekaśabdavat samastena ca samudāyāhutir eketi 
ghṛtam agnāv iti sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ 
yathāvidhi 
yādṛśaḥ śiṣṭasamācāra ity arthaḥ 
tena ca haviṣaḥ sattvād aprāptāyām itikartavyatāyāṃ parisamūhanaparyukṣaṇāvekṣaṇasruvahomādyetāvanmātram anujānāti 
vāśabdād vaikalpikāḥ sarva eva 
tripakṣād abruvan sākṣyam ṛṇādiṣu naro 'gadaḥ 
tad ṛṇaṃ prāpnuyāt sarvaṃ daśabandhaṃ ca sarvataḥ 
pañcadaśāhorātrāṇi pakṣaḥ 
trayāṇāṃ pakṣāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ tripakṣam 
akārāntottarapado dviguḥ iti strītve prāpte pātrādidarśanāt pratiṣedhaḥ 
yady evaṃ tripakṣīti na prāpnoti 
chāndasas tatra liṅgavyatyayaḥ 
lyablope karmaṇi pañcamī 
trīn pakṣān yāvad atīya yaḥ sākṣyaṃ na dadāti 
agado 'pīḍitaśarīras tad ṛṇaṃ prāpnuyād ity arthaḥ 
daśabandhaṃ ca 
daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ daṇḍanīyas tasmād ṛṇāt 
ṛṇādiṣu ityādigrahaṇena sarvavyavahāropakramaḥ 
dvitīyam ṛṇagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārtham 
yasmin vyavahāre sākṣyam iyantaṃ kālaṃ na bhavati parājīyamānasya sākṣiṇo boḍhāra ity uktaṃ bhavati 
gado rogas tatsamānapratyutthānahetūpalakṣaṇārtham 
tenātra kuṭumbopadravadhanikoparodhādy api parīkṣyam 
bandhaśabdaḥ saṃkhyādiparo daṇḍaviṣaye daśamāṣavacanaḥ 
naragrahaṇaṃ sarvatograhaṇaṃ ca ślokapūraṇārtham 
anye tv āhus tad ṛṇaṃ prāpnuyād ity asyāyam arthaḥ 
ṛṇāpaharaṇalakṣaṇena pāpena yujyeta 
rājñe vā jīyamānasya yo daṇḍas tato daśamam aṃśaṃ dadyād iti daṇḍitaḥ punaḥ daṇḍyate 
yasya dṛśyeta saptāhād uktavākyasya sākṣiṇaḥ 
rogo 'gnir jñātimaraṇam ṛṇaṃ dāpyo damaṃ ca saḥ 
saptāhād iti pañcamīdarśanād arvāg ity adhyāhriyate 
saptānāṃ divasānām anyatamasminn ahani yasya sākṣiṇo rogādi dṛśyate sa mṛṣāvādī daivena vibhāvitaḥ pūrvoktena vidhinā dāpayitavyaḥ 
rogo 'tyantapīḍākaraḥ agnir govāhanadahanaḥ putradārādipratyāsannajñātimaraṇam tasya kūṭasākṣitve liṅgam 
asākṣikeṣu tv artheṣu mitho vivadamānayoḥ 
avindaṃs tattvataḥ satyaṃ śapathenāpi lambhayet 
avidyamānāḥ sākṣiṇo yeṣv artheṣu vyavahāreṣu te 'sākṣikāḥ 
teṣu satyam ajānāno rājā tattvato laukikenānumānenāpīty arthaḥ 
tatra śapathenāpi vakṣyamāṇena daivenānumānena lambhayet jānīyāt 
labhiḥ prāptivacano 'pi sāmarthyāj jānātyarthaḥ 
na hy anyaḥ satyasya lābhaḥ 
na vindan iti pāṭhe 'py evam eva vyākhyeyam 
asākṣikeṣu śapathena lambhayet ity etāvad vidhyuddeśavākyāvasānāt ślokapūraṇārtham 
mithaḥ parasparam 
maharṣibhiś ca devaiś ca kāryārthaṃ sapathāḥ kṛtāḥ 
vasiṣṭhaś cāpi śapathaṃ śepe paijavane nṛpe 
arthavādo 'yaṃ pūrvoktasya śapathavidheḥ 
maharṣibhiḥ saptarṣiprabhṛtibhiḥ kāryārthaṃ saṃdigdhakāryanirṇayārthaṃ śapathāḥ kṛtāḥ 
asminn arthe ca bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanasyākhyānam udāhartavyam 
puṣkareṣu teṣv apahāriteṣv itaretaraṃ saptarṣayaḥ śepire yas te harati puṣkaraṃ sa imāṃ pāpakṛto gatiṃ gacchet ityādi 
devair indraprabhṛtibhiḥ 
indro hy ahilyāṃ pratyabhiśaptaḥ śāpabhayād bahuvidhaṃ śapathaṃ cakāra 
vasiṣṭhaś ceti pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ prādhānyakhyāpanārthaḥ 
śapataṃ kṛtavān ity arthaḥ 
upapadād eva viśeṣāvagateḥ śapatiḥ karotyarthamātre vartate 
yathā yajñaṃ yajata iti svapoṣaṃ puṣṭa iti tathā śapathaṃ sepa iti jñeyam 
śapa upalaṃbhane iti liṭi prathamapuruṣātmanepadaikavacane śepe iti rūpam 
paijavano rājā babhūva 
tasmin kāle viśvāmitreṇākruṣṭo maṇḍalam adhyagataḥ kāmakrodhābhyāṃ saṃkṣubdhācaraṇo 'ghāsuro yātudhāno 'smīti śapathaṃ gṛhītavān 
viśvāmitreṇoktas tasya rājñaḥ samakṣam anenaiva tatputraśatam aśitam eṣa hi rakṣa iti 
tataḥ sa uvāca 
adyaiva mriye yadi rakṣaḥ syām ity ātmany aniṣṭāśaṃsanam atra śapathaḥ 
putradārādiśiraḥsparśane etad aniṣṭāsaṃśanaṃ śapatho mantavyaḥ 
na vṛthā śapathaṃ kuryāt svalpe 'py arthe naro budhaḥ 
vṛthā hi śapathaṃ kurvan pretya ceha ca naśyati 
mithyāśapathe phalākhyānam etat 
vṛthā anyathā asatyam iti yāvat 
tatrāpahriyamāṇasuvarṇādidravyajātyapekṣo 'nṛtaśapathadoṣo 'nyathāśapathe svalpe garīyasi tu kārye gauravād adhikataro doṣo 'sty eva 
pretya nāśo narakam iha mahad ayaśaḥ 
pramāṇāntare tu jñāte rājadaṇḍaḥ 
kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavāṃ bhakṣye tathendhane 
brāḥmaṇābhyupapattau ca śapathe nāsti pātakam 
kāmaḥ prītiviseṣo viśiṣṭendriyasparśajanyaḥ sa yāsu bhavati puruṣasya tāḥ kāminyo bhāryāveśyādayaḥ 
tatra yaḥ śapathaḥ kāmasiddhyartho yathā nāham anyāṃ kāmaye prāṇeśvarī me tvam ityādyaḥ 
yat tu saṃprayujyasva mayā idaṃ tvayā deyam dāsye iti tatra bhavaty eva doṣo vṛthāśapathe 
viṣayasaptamī ceyaṃ na nimittasaptamī 
tena yasyām evaikākinyāṃ yathāpy ete tatroktarūpaśapathe na doṣaḥ 
nimittasaptamyāṃ tu nimitte paradravyāpahāre doṣaḥ syāt 
ataś ca kāmād daśaguṇaṃ pūrvam ityādikaṃ daṇḍavidhānaṃ na yujyate 
tathāpi nimittānantarakṛte vivāde 'sty eva vṛthāśapathadoṣaḥ 
evaṃ sarvatra 
vivāheṣu 
na tvayānyā voḍhavyā na vānyo voḍhavya iti anyasyāpi suhṛdāder vivāhārtham evaṃvidham anṛtam adoṣaḥ 
na punar jātyapahnavādau 
gavāṃ bhakṣye 
gavām yavasasiddhyarthaṃ mayāpahartavyam na mayāpahṛtaṃ parasya cātatsaṃbandhibhir yuktasya vṛthāsākṣye śapamānasya na doṣaḥ 
evam indhane 
brāhmaṇānām abhyupapattir anugrahaḥ 
sarvavarṇānugrahe 'nujñātam eva 
kim iha punarvacanena 
kecid āhuḥ 
śapatho brāhmaṇe 'nujñāyate śūdrādiṣu tv anṛtam eva 
etac ca tad dhi satyād viśiṣyate iti vacanān naitad anṛtam 
ato na tatra pratiṣedhaḥ 
pratiṣedho hy asau vṛthāśapathasya 
pūrveṇa pratiṣiddhasya pratiprasavaśāstram etat 
tasmāt sarvavarṇānugrahe śapamānasya na doṣaḥ 
kim arthaṃ tarhīdam 
ucyate 
tatra vadhāt paritrāṇam uktaṃ sarvavarṇaviṣayam 
abhyupapattis tu brāhmaṇasyaiva 
sā hi dhanalābhādinā saṃbhavati 
sarvataś ca parasaṃbandhiṣu kriyāsv evaṃvidhāsu śapathābhyanujñānam upāyāntareṇa tatsiddhyasaṃbhava eva draṣṭavyam 
satyena śāpayed vipraṃ kṣatriyaṃ vāhanāyudhaiḥ 
gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ 
nanu ca yady aham evaṃkuryāṃ tad idam aniṣṭam āpnuyām iti saṃkīrtanakriyāśapathaṃ taṃ yaḥ kārayet sa śāpayed ity ucyate 
satyena śape satyādinibandhano 'yaṃ dharmo vā me niṣphalaḥ syād iti 
evaṃ cāyudhānām api karaṇatvaṃ vāhanānāṃ ca 
etair ātmānaṃ śapato na vā niṣphalāni syur iti 
gobījakāñcanāni vaiśyo hastena sparśayitvābhiśaped etāni vā me niṣphalānit pūrvavat 
śūdraṃ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ vakṣyamāṇāni pātakāni me syuḥ iti śūdro vācyate 
agniṃ vāhārayed enam apsu cainaṃ nimajjayet 
putradārasya vāpy enaṃ śirāṃsi sparśayet pṛthak 
agnim āhārayed enaṃ hastenāśvatthaparṇavyavahitena tayoḥ pradeśāntaraṃ saptapadasaṃhitam ityādismṛtyantarān nipuṇato 'nveṣyam 
pāraṃparyaprasiddheś caitad evocyate 
apsu jale nimajjayet prāḍvivāka ityarthaḥ 
putradāraśirāṃsi sparśayet 
putrasya dārasya śiraḥ sparśayan hastena śapathādikārād vācāpi śapathasyaivaṃrūpatvād ity uktam 
pṛthag ekaikasya 
yam iddho na dahaty agnir āpo nonmajjayanti ca 
na cārtim ṛcchati kṣipraṃ sa jñeyaḥ śapathe śuciḥ 
taptāyasapiṇḍo 'yam anavadya gṛhīto na dahati 
āpaś ca nordhvaṃ plāvayanti 
satyaśapathe kośādau na nārtim ṛcchati pīḍāṃ na prāpnoti 
rogo 'gniḥ ity atroktāṃ 
sa śuddhaḥ śucir nirdoṣaḥ 
kṣipraṃ caturdaśa vāhāny avadhiḥ smṛtyantarāt 
vatsasya hy abhiśastasya purā bhrātrā yavīyasā 
nāgnir dadāha romāpi satyena jagataḥ spaśaḥ 
kathaṃ punar agnir na dhakṣyati āpo nonmajjayiṣyanti 
na hi mahābhūtāni vipariyanti svabhāvato 'caitanyād iti paryanuyogam āśaṅkyārthavādenoktam arthaṃ dṛḍhīkaroti 
yady apy ayam anvayavyatirekasamadhigamyo 'rthaḥ pratyakaṣavedyo vā tathāpi dhūrtakalpitendrajālavad bhāvitam ugrabibhīṣikāsañjanamātraṃ phalaṃ śapathāgoraṇam iti manyamāno vaidikaṃ nidarśanam upanyaset 
bhavanti pratipattāro 'rthāgamena pūrvavṛttadarśanād dṛḍhatāṃ pratipadyante 
vatso nāma kāṇva ṛṣir abhavat 
sa ca kanīyasā vaimātreṇa bhrātrābhiśasta ākruṣṭaḥ na tvam asi brāhmaṇaḥ śūdrāputraḥ iti 
sa taṃ pratyuvāca satyenāgniṃ praviśāmi yadi na brāhmaṇaḥ iti 
tasyedam uktavataḥ praviṣṭasya nāgnir dadāha romāpi 
katham 
satyena hetunā 
katham agniḥ satyaṃ jānātīti cet ata āha jagataḥ spaśaḥ 
gūḍhātmā parakīyakṛtākṛtajñaḥ spaśa ucyate 
sa ca cāraḥ praṇidhir iti ca prasiddhiḥ 
agnir hi bhagavān sarvabhūtāntaracārī kṛtākṛtānāṃ veditā 
tathā ca chāndogye tāṇḍake prayogaḥ devāsurasenayor abhyantare yo 'gnir iti gautamo 'gnim upetyovāca iha no bhavān spaśaś caratu ityādi 
atha vā viśeṣanidarśane 'pi pañcaviṃśabrāhamaṇam udāhāryam vatsaś ca ha vai medhātithiś ca kāṇvāv āstām 
taṃ vatsaṃ medhātithir ākrośat abrāhmaṇo 'si ityādi tasya loma ca nauṣat ityantam 
nanu ca caurā api na dahyante 
sādhavo 'pi dahyamānā dṛśyante 
tat kathaṃ śapathe āśvāsaḥ 
ucyate 
na dṛśyena vyabhicāreṇa vyavastheyam apanetuṃ śakyate kadācitkatvād vyabhicārasya 
pratyakṣādiṣv api pramāṇeṣu dṛśyata eva tādṛśo vyabhicāraḥ na ca tāni na pramāṇam 
atha vyabhicāravanti naiva pratyakṣādiśabdavācyāni 
yad vyabhicarati na tat pratyakṣam yat pratyakṣaṃ na tad vyabhicaratīti vacanāt 
ihāpi śakyate tad vaktum 
vyabhicaratīty asau na śapathaḥ yaḥ śapathaḥ sa na vyabhicaratīti 
kaḥ punaḥ śapathaḥ 
yaḥ samatetikartavyatāmātrādyapagrahaṇanirūpitakuhakastaṃbhanābhāvaḥ 
viparīto 'śapathaḥ 
na tādṛśasya vyabhicāro 'sti 
athāpi syāt tatrāpi prākkṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko bhavati nimittatvāt 
kṛtāparādho 'pi pūrvakṛtena garīyasāśubhena mucyate 
akṛtāparādho janmāntaradoṣeṇa nigṛhyate 
vicitrā hi karmaṇāṃ phalapākābhivyaktihetavaḥ 
sahasrād eko mithyā gṛhyate 
utsargas tv amithyātvam 
putreṣṭikārīyādiṣv apy etat samānam 
tasmāt sākṣivac chapathe 'pi pratyetavya 
te 'pi hi kadācin mithyāvadanti 
na bhayapradarśanamātram etat 
yathāsthānarūḍhāḥ śapathā uktāḥ satyaṃ pratiṣṭhata iti 
yasmin yasmin vivāhe tu kauṭasākṣyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet 
tat tat kāryaṃ nivarteta kṛtaṃ cāpy akṛtaṃ bhavet 
yasmin vyavahāre kūṭasākṣibhir vyavahāraḥ kṛtaḥ syāt sa nivartayitavyaḥ 
kṛtaṃ cāpy akṛtaṃ bhavet 
gṛhītadhano 'py uttamarṇaḥ pratipādyitavyaḥ itaradaṇḍo gṛhīto 'pi tyājyaḥ 
vāṅmātreṇa jitas tvam asi iti niścite kāryaṃ nivartate ity ucyate 
daṇḍaparyantaṃ kṛtam apīti viśeṣaḥ 
vīpsā ślokapūraṇāyām 
lobhān mohād bhayān maitrāt kāmāt krodhāt tathaiva ca 
ajñānād bālabhāvāc ca sākṣyaṃ vitatham ucyate 
kauṭasākṣyaṃ lobhādinimittam 
viṣayakathanaṃ daṇḍaviśeṣabhāvārtham 
vitatham asatyam 
sarvatra pañcamī hetvarthā 
eṣām anyatame sthāne yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet 
tasya daṇḍaviśeṣāṃs tu pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ 
lobhāt sahasraṃ daṇḍyas tu mohāt pūrvaṃ tu sāhasam 
bhayād dvau madhyamau daṇḍau maitrāt pūrvaṃ caturguṇam 
lobhād yo vitathaṃ vakti sa sahasraṃ daṇḍanīya ity evaṃ yojanā kartavyā 
tatra yaḥ parasmād dhanam upādāya viaparītaṃ vakti tasya lobho hetuḥ 
mohāt vaicittyāt 
yathārthavādī yathadṛṣṭārthavādī ca kenacic cittasaṃkṣobhahetunā praśnakāle vyāmūḍhaḥ samyak praśnārtham anavadhāryāsmṛtatvād vānyathā brūyāt sa mohād ity ucyate 
bhayaṃ trāsaḥ 
yadi madīyena satyavacanenāyaṃ jīyeta tatrāyaṃ kadācit jñātidhanādibādhayā māṃ vyāpādayed ity āśaṅkā 
sahasram iti saṃkhyeyaviśeṣāvagatir vākyāntarāt paṇānām iti 
pūrvaṃ tu sāhasaṃ prathamam paṇānāṃ dve śate sārdham  ityādau 
dvau madhyamau sāhasāv iti vipariṇāmaḥ 
pūrvaṃ caturguṇaṃ sahasram evety arthaḥ 
vṛttānurodhena vicitrayā śabdavṛttyā sa evārthaḥ kathyate   
kāmād daśaguṇaṃ pūrvaṃ krodhāt tu triguṇaṃ param 
ajñānād dve śate pūrṇe bāliśyāc chatam eva tu 
manmathaḥ kāmaḥ 
yatra striyo vivadante tatsaṃbandhyanyatarāṃ kāmayamāno 'nṛtaṃ vadati ardhatṛtīyāni sahasrāṇi daṇḍyate 
krodhāt triguṇaṃ paraṃ prathamasāhasasya prakṛtatvāt tataḥ paro madhyaḥ 
sarvānte lokavijñānād iti vā uttama eva paraḥ 
dveṣaḥ krodhaḥ 
ajñānād iti 
yo viparītaṃ prathamaṃ brūyād bhrāntyā na tu praśnakāle 
dve śate damaḥ 
pradarśanam eva viparītaṃ nābhidhānam 
bāliśyaṃ bālabhāvaḥ aprāptavyavahāratā 
īṣadapakrāntabālabhāvasyāprāptabuddhisthairyasyāyaṃ bāliśyadaṇḍo 'nyasya tv asākṣitaiva 
etān āhuḥ kauṭasākṣye proktān daṇḍān manīṣibhiḥ 
dharmasyāvyabhicārārtham adharmaniyamāya ca 
ubhayaprayojano daṇḍa iti darśayaty avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāya 
śāstrācāranirūḍhā vyavasthā dharmaḥ tasyāvyabhicāro 'nivṛttir ucyate 
kauṭasākṣyaṃ tu kurvāṇāṃs trīn varṇān dhārmiko nṛpaḥ 
pravāsayed daṇḍayitvā brāhmaṇaṃ tu vivāsayet 
sakṛd aparāddhānāṃ pūrvo daṇḍaḥ 
abhyāsāt pravartamānānāṃ daṇḍayitvā pravāsanaṃ rāṣṭrān niṣkāsanam maraṇaṃ vārthaśāstre prayogadarśanāt tadrūpatvāc ca daṇḍavidheḥ 
brāhmaṇaṃ tu vivāsayet 
vāsaso 'paharaṇaṃ vivāsanaṃ gṛhabhaṅgo vā 
vivāsasaṃ vivāsaṃ vā karoti tat karoti iti ṇici ṇāviṣṭavad iti ṭilope rūpam 
trīn varṇān iti kṣatrādayas trayaḥ brāhmaṇasya daṇḍāntaravidhānāt 
daśa sthānāni daṇḍasya manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt 
triṣu varṇeṣu yāni syur akṣato brāhmaṇo vrajet 
sthānaśabdo viṣayaparyāyaḥ 
etaiḥ pradeśaiḥ pīḍayitavyaḥ prayaparādham 
śabdena brāhmaṇasya dhanadaṇḍavidhānād akṣatatvopadeśaḥ śarīrapīḍāparihārārthaḥ kalpate saty api dhanasya daśasaṃkhyānarbhāve 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ samagradhanam akṣatam ity atra dhanapīḍāpi niṣiddhaiva brāhmaṇasya 
tasmād yaḥ sakṛt kathaṃcid aparāddhaḥ śrutaśīlābhijanayuktas tasya dhanadaṇḍo 'pi nāsti 
tathā ca gautamas tādṛśam eva brāhmaṇam adhikṛtya dvau loke dhṛtavratau ity upakramya ṣaḍbhiḥ parihāryaś ca ityādi 
upastham udaraṃ jihvā hastau pādau ca pañcamam 
cakṣur nāsā ca karṇau ca dhanaṃ dehas tathaiva ca 
upasthaṃ prajanadharmaḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ 
uddeśamātram idaṃ viniyogas tūttaratra bhaviṣyati 
yatra ca daṇḍaviśeṣo nāmnātas tatra yo yenaivāṅgenāparāddhaḥ sa tatraiva pīḍayitavyaḥ 
tatrāgamyāgamana upasthanigrahaḥ 
caurya udarata āhāranivṛttyādinā 
vāgdaṇḍapāruṣye jihvāhastayoḥ 
pādabalena vyatikrāman pādayoḥ 
vivṛtya viśrabdhaṃ rājadārān vikṣyamāṇaś cakṣuṣoḥ 
anulepanagandham ājighran nāsikāyām 
rahasi rājānam mantrayamāṇaṃ kuḍyapaṭāntarita upaśṛṇvan karṇayoḥ 
dhane prasiddho daṇḍaḥ 
dehe māraṇaṃ mahāpātakinaḥ 
anubandhaṃ parijñāya deśakālau ca tattvataḥ 
sārāparādhau cālokya daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu pātayet 
uktānuktadaṇḍyeṣv aparādheṣu mātṛkāśloko 'yam 
etadarthānusāraṇena sarvatra daṇḍakḷptiḥ kartavyā 
tatra paunaḥpunyena pravṛttir anubandhaḥ pravṛttikaraṇaṃ vā anubadhyate prayujyate yena tasmin karmaṇi 
taṃ parijñāya 
kim ayam ātmakuṭumbakṣudavasāyena dharmatantraprasaṅgena vā atha madyadyūtādiśauṇḍatayā tathā pramādād buddhipūrvaṃ vā paraprayuktaḥ svecchayā vetyādir anubandhaḥ 
deśo grāmāraṇyagṛhajalajanmaprasavabhūmyādiḥ 
kālo naktaṃ divādiḥ subhikṣadurbhikṣabālyayauvanādir vā 
sāraḥ śaktyaśaktī āḍhyatvadāridrye 
aparādho 'ṣṭādaśānāṃ padānām anyatamaḥ 
etat sarvaṃ paurvāparyeṇa nirūpya tathā daṇḍaṃ pātayet kuryād yathā sthitiḥ sāṃsārikī na bhraśyatīti 
adharmadaṇḍanaṃ loke yaśoghnaṃ kīrtināśanam 
asvargyaṃ ca paratrāpi tasmāt tat parivarjayet 
adharmapradhānadaṇḍanam adharmadaṇḍanam 
pūrvoktam anapekṣyedaṃ śāstrapāṭhamātreṇa rājecchayā rāgadveṣādibhir vā 
tad yaśonāśakaṃ kīrteś ca vicchedakam 
svadeśe guṇakhyātir yaśaḥ deśāntare kīrtiḥ 
jīvato vā puṇyaśabdo yaśaḥ uttarakālikī kīrtiḥ 
nirdoṣaguṇavatī kīrtiyaśasī 
anyo vā bheda unneyaḥ arthavādatvāt 
asvargyaṃ svargaprāptau karmāntarajanyāyāṃ pratibandhakam 
paratrāpīti ślokapūraṇārtham svargasyāmuṣmikatvāt 
adaṇḍyān daṇḍayan rājā daṇḍyāṃś caivāpy adaṇḍayan 
ayaśo mahad āpnoti narakaṃ caiva gacchati 
pūrvaśloke 'nubandhādinirūpaṇavidhiviśeṣaḥ 
anena tv anaparādhānāṃ daṇḍanaṃ pratiṣidhyate sāparādhānāṃ ca vidhīyate 
vṛttyarthatāṃ daṇḍasya manyamāno 'nugraheṇa mā hāsīd iti 
vāgdaṇḍaṃ prathamaṃ kuryād dhigdaṇḍaṃ tadanantaram 
tṛtīyaṃ dhanadaṇḍaṃ tu vadhadaṇḍam ataḥ param 
yo guṇavān īṣatprathamam evāparāddhaḥ sa vācā nirbhartsyate na sādhu kṛtavān asi mā punar evaṃ kārṣīḥ iti 
tathā vinīyamāne yadi na nivartate ko 'tra doṣaḥ iti vā pratijānīyāt tadā dhigdhigādiśabdaiḥ paruṣavacanaiḥ kutsārthaiḥ kṣipyate 
tato 'py anivartamāno yathāśāstraṃ dhanena daṇḍanīyaḥ 
tad apy agaṇayann aiśvaryādinā hantavyaḥ 
vadhadaṇḍaś ca tāḍanāṅgacchedādi na maraṇam eva 
yata āha 
vadhenāpi yadā tv etān nigrahītuṃ na śaknuyāt 
tadaiṣu sarvam apy etat prayuñjīta caturṣṭayam 
māraṇaṃ ced vadhaḥ kiṃ tad anyad yena śakyate 
kathaṃ cainaṃ pāpaṃ nigṛhṇītetyādiparuṣavākyapūrvaṃ durvinīteṣu dhanadaṇḍavadhau samuccetavyau 
kṛte 'pi śarīradaṇḍe yadi nāvatiṣṭhate tato na kṛtanigraha ity utsṛjed api tu sa vadhadaṇḍaḥ kartavyaḥ 
dhanavadhadaṇḍayoś ca punaḥpravṛttyartho 'yam ārambhaḥ 
vāgdaṇḍe mṛdutvāt kaḥ pṛcchati 
dhanena ca nigṛhītasya punar vadho dṛṣṭo aṅgulīr granthibhedasya iti 
lokasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ yāḥ saṃjñāḥ prathitā bhuvi 
tāmrarūpyasuvarṇānāṃ tāḥ pravakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ 
tāmrādīnāṃ likṣādayaḥ saṃjñā bhuvi prasiddhāḥ 
kiṃ śāstraparibhāṣayā 
tatra vṛddhavyavahāro gavādiśabdavad iti 
ata āha lokasaṃvyavahārārtham 
arthaśabdo viṣayavacanaḥ 
tena vyavahāraprasiddhir āśritā bhavati 
tataś ca gavādiśabdatulyatayā vyavahārāt prasiddhaḥ 
kiṃ śāstropadeśena 
ucyate 
niyamārtha upadeśaḥ 
anyeṣām api parimeyānām ayaskāṃsyasuvarṇādīnām etāḥ saṃjñāḥ santi tannivṛttyarthaḥ 
kvacid deśe parimāṇe bhedo 'py asti tannivṛttyarthaś ca 
kvacit saṃbandhatayā niyamyate 
tathā ca kvacid aṣṭācatvāriṃśatā māṣabandhaṃ kvacic catuḥṣaṣṭyā kvacit sāṣṭena śatena 
tad etat sarvaṃ niyamyate 
atha caivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyate 
yāḥ saṃjñā bhuvi prathitās tā lokasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ vakṣyāmi 
sarvasya lokasyābhir eva saṃvyavahāro yathā syād daṇḍādiniyogasyāpy anyathā prasiddhiḥ 
jālāntaragate bhānau yat sūkṣmaṃ dṛśyate rajaḥ 
prathamaṃ tat pramāṇānāṃ trasareṇuṃ pracakṣate 
imaṃ ślokaṃ kecin nādhīyate trasareṇau vipratipattyabhāvāt 
gavākṣakucikāvivarapraviṣṭe sūrye yo reṇur dṛśyate sa trasareṇuḥ 
antaraśabdo vivaraparyāyaḥ 
prathamaṃ tatpramāṇānām iti 
trasareṇavo 'ṣṭau vijñeyā likṣaikā parimāṇataḥ 
tā rājasarṣapas tisras te trayo gaurasarṣapaḥ 
tatropacitaparimāṇāḥ 
na punar ayaṃ likṣāśabdaḥ svedajakṣudrajantuvacanaḥ 
tās tisro likṣā eko rājasarṣapākhyaparimāṇapadārthaḥ 
evaṃ yojanīyam 
tataś ca vyabhicārayanti na yathoktaparimāṇā yavādayo 'rthā iti te nirastā bhavanti 
na hi yavādīnām arthānāṃ parimāṇam 
kathaṃ tarhi yathoktaparimāṇārthaḥ 
yathā copakrāntasaṃjñāḥ pravakṣyāmi parimāṇam iti 
trasareṇuś cārtho niyataparimāṇas tenaitat sarvaṃ niśceyam 
śaknuvanti ca nipuṇās trasareṇūn saṃhantum iti nānārabhyārthopadeśaḥ 
etat svarṇakārābhimānasaṃkhyāsmṛtirūpaṃ nirbādhaṃ bhavati 
tata eva vastu nipuṇato 'śeṣato 'vadhārayitavyam 
sarṣapāḥ ṣaṭ yavo madhyas triyavaṃ tv ekakṛṣṇalam 
pañcakṛṣṇalako māṣas te suvarṇas tu ṣḍaśa 
madhyamaśabdo 'bhrāntihetuḥ parimāṇaparatve nātyantam apicito nātisthūlaḥ sarṣapaparimāṇa iti madhyagrahaṇam arthavat 
saṃjñāparatve tu na kiṃcin madhyaśabdena yavaśabdasaṃjñātvāt 
tad asat 
nāyaṃ saṃdarbho yena pratyavayavaṃ prayojanam ucyate 
padyagrantho 'yam 
tatra saṃgatārtham api vṛttānurodhāt kiṃcid ucyate 
asti cāsyānvayaḥ 
ananvitābhidhānaṃ hi vākyārthavirodhān na pramāṇam 
na cāvagatābhidhānam api 
parimāṇabhedāṃs trasareṇuśatamānādīn ādyantān apekṣya madhyapahitatvān madhyo yavākhyaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣaḥ 
pañcakṛṣṇalā asmin santi pañcakṛṣṇalikaḥ 
ata iti ṭhanau iti ṭan kartavyaḥ 
pañcakṛṣṇalakaḥ iti pāṭhe kabanto bahuvrīhiḥ 
te kṛṣṇalāḥ ṣoḍaśa ekaḥ suvarṇaḥ 
palaṃ suvarṇās catvāraḥ palāni dharaṇaṃ daśa 
dve kṛṣṇale samadhṛte vijñeyo rūpyamāṣakaḥ 
palam iti saṃjñānirdeśaḥ 
suvarṇam iti saṃjñī 
catvāra iti viśeṣaṇam 
dharaṇam iti saṃjñā 
daśa palānīti saṃjñī 
dve kṛṣṇale iti saṃjñā 
rūpyamāṣaka iti samudāyasaṃjñāṃ manyante 
nanu rūpyaviṣayamāṣakanirdeśe dve kṛṣṇale pratipattavye iti pratijānīte 
tataś cāniścayaḥ 
samadhṛte 
tulāsūtrake unmānādihīne yadi dhāryete 
prayojanaṃ madhyaśabdavat yato 'samayād dhāryamāṇatayā parimāṇāniścayaḥ 
te ṣoḍaśa syād dharaṇaṃ purāṇaś caiva rājataḥ 
kārṣāpaṇas tu vijñeyas tāmrikaḥ kārṣikaḥ paṇaḥ 
ṣoḍaśarūpyamāṣakā rūpyasya dharaṇaṃ bhavati 
purāṇa iti saṃjñāntaram 
kārṣāpaṇaḥ paṇa iti ca dve saṃjñe tāmrakarṣasya 
karṣākhyaś ca śabdo lokata eva prasiddhārtha iha gṛhyate vyabhicāradarśanāsattvavacanena na kṛṣṇalādivat paribhāṣyate 
dharaṇāni daśa jñeyaḥ śatamānas tu rājataḥ 
catuḥsauvarṇiko niṣko vijñeyas tu pramāṇataḥ 
śatamāna iti saṃjñā daśānāṃ dharaṇānām 
rajataśabdena suvarṇam apy ucyate 
tena rūpyasuvarṇayor iyaṃ saṃjñā 
suvarṇasya mānaṃ tu śāstrāntarāt parimātavyam 
tathā ca viśeṣayiṣyati śatamānaṃ tu rājatam iti 
paṇānāṃ dve śate sārddhe prathamaḥ sāhasaḥ smṛtaḥ 
madhyamaḥ pañca vijñeyaḥ sahasraṃ tv eva cottamaḥ 
madhayama uttama ity atra sāhasapadānuṣaṅgaḥ kartavyaḥ 
madhamottamaśabdāv atra kevalāv api śāstrāntaradṛṣṭau ābhyāṃ daṇḍa uttamaḥ iti 
tatra śāstrasiddhyā sāhacaryāt sāhasaṃ pratīyate 
avayavāḥ spaṣṭāḥ 
ṛṇe deye pratijñāte pañcakaṃ śatam arhati 
apahnave taddviguṇaṃ tan manor anuśāsanam 
yo rājasabhāyām ānīto dharmeṇa ṛṇaṃ deyatayā pratijānīte satyam asmai dhārayāmi sa pañcakaṃ śatam arhati daṇḍam iti śeṣaḥ 
anena saṃkalpitena viṃśatitamo bhāgo daṇḍyate 
kim iti 
matsakāśam uttamarṇaḥ preṣito bahir eva kasmān na paritoṣitaḥ ity ato 'nena śāstravyatikrameṇa daṇḍam arhati 
yas tu vyatikramāntaraṃ karoty apahnute nāham asmai dhārayāmi iti sa taiḥ pratipāditas taddviguṇaṃ 
tasmāt pañcakād dviguṇaṃ daśakaṃ śatam ity arthaḥ 
tan manoḥ prajāpater anuśāsanaṃ sṛṣṭikālaprabhṛtivyavasthā nītir iti yāvat 
anye tu tacchabdena deyam eva pratyavamṛśanti 
yāvat tasmai deyaṃ taddviguṇam 
tena yāvad ṛṇam ity anenaikavākyaṃ bhavati 
anyathā vākyabhedaḥ 
viṣayaviśeṣānirdeśād ekaviṣayatve vikalpaḥ prāpnoti 
sa ca na yukto dviguṇasyātyantabahutvāt 
asaty api nirdeśe tasya viṣayo darśanīyaḥ tasya pratyāsanne pañcakam iti arthāt tasyaivānupratyavamarśo yuktaḥ 
vasiṣṭhavihitāṃ vṛddhiṃ sṛjed vittavivardhinīm 
aśītibhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyān māsād vārdhuṣikaḥ śate 
aśītīti vidheyanirdeśaḥ 
vasiṣṭhavihitām ityādir arthavādaḥ 
vasiṣṭho bhavavān trikālajño lobhādidoṣarahita iti tāṃ vṛddhiṃ gṛhītavān ata eṣā praśastā 
dhanaṃ tayā vṛddhim upaiti na ca lobhadoṣo 'sti 
sṛjet prayuñjīta 
yadā dhanaṃ tadādharmaṇasya tāṃ vṛddhiṃ dhanaprayogakāle nirdiśet 
sarvadravyeṣu vastradhānyahiraṇyādiṣv etad eva vṛddhiparimāṇam 
saṃkhyeyaparimeyādiṣu rasasyāṣṭaguṇā vṛddhiḥ ityādiṣu dvaiguṇyāpavāda iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
dvikaṃ śataṃ vā gṛhṇīyāt satāṃ dharmam anusmaran 
dvikaṃ śataṃ hi gṛhṇāno na bhavaty arthakilbiṣī 
dvau vṛddhir asmin śate dīyate tad dvikaṃ śatam 
dviśatā pūrvayājivato bahukuṭumbasyāyaṃ dvikaśatavidhiḥ 
māsam anuvartate 
satām ityādir atrāyam arthavādaḥ 
satāṃ dharmam iti eṣāpi vṛddhiḥ sādhūnāṃ dharmaḥ 
naitayā sādhutvaṃ hīyate 
nātyantam arthapara ucyate 
tad darśayati na bhavaty arthakilbiṣī 
anyāyena parasvagrahaṇāt pāpam arthakilbiṣam tad asyāstīty arthakilbiṣī 
dvikaṃ trikaṃ catuṣkaṃ ca pañcakaṃ ca śataṃ samam 
māsasya vṛddhiṃ gṛhṇīyād varṇānām anupūrvaśaḥ 
brāhmaṇādivarṇakrameṇa caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ sakāśād dvikādayaś catvāraḥ kalpā yathāsaṃkhyena grāhyatayānujñāyante 
samam 
na pādena vārdhena vādhikam 
tadādhikye 'pi sapādadvikaṃ sārdhadvikam iti dvikādivyapadeśasyānivṛtter āśaṅkānivāraṇārthaṃ samagrahaṇam yathā mātrānyatve 'pi saṃjñāntaravyapadeśaṃ nivartayati 
idam api pūrveṇājivataḥ kalpāntaram 
yasya vālpaṃ dhanaṃ mahate dharmāya grahītāraś ca nātidhārmikās tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ ye 'sādhubhyo 'rtham ādāya iti nyāyena 
samām iti pāṭhāntaram 
saṃvatsaraṃ yāvad eṣā vṛddhir na parato 'pi mahattvād dvaiguṇyaṃ syāt 
na tv evādhau sopakāre kausīdīṃ vṛddhim āpnuyāt 
na cādheḥ kālasaṃrodhān nisargo 'sti na vikrayaḥ 
bahudhā prayogaḥ gṛhītvādhim anyathā ca 
ādhir api dvividhaḥ gopyo bhogyaś ca 
bhogyo 'pi dvividhaḥ samayād uhyamānabhogaḥ sarūpato vā 
ādhir dogdhrī gauḥ pihitasuvarṇādi 
tatra bhogyam ādhim adhikṛtyedam ucyate 
na tv evādhau sopakāra iti 
vividhaḥ sopakāraḥ kṣīriṇī gauḥ kṣetrārāmādi ca 
tasmin bhujyamāne  kusīde bhavā kausīdī anantaroktā vṛddhis  tām nāpnuyāt 
ādhiṃ tu bhuñjāno nānyāṃ vṛddhiṃ labheta 
gopye 'py ādhau kālasaṃrodhāc ciram avasthānād dviguṇībhūte 'py amokṣamāṇe na nisargo 'sti na vikrayaḥ 
anyatra ca vidhinārpaṇaṃ nisargaḥ 
anyatra saṃkrāmitaṃ dviguṇībhūtam api punar vardhata eva 
tathā a paṭhiṣyati sakṛd āhṛtā iti 
vikrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
so 'pi na kartavyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhy asyām avasthāyāṃ kartavyam 
tāvad ādhiṃ bhuñjīta yāvad dviguṇaṃ dhanaṃ praviṣṭam 
tataḥ
mocya ādhis tadutpanne praviṣṭe dviguṇe dhane 
bhogyas tāvad evam 
bhogyas tv ādhiḥ śāntalabhas tiṣṭhaty eva yāvad ādhātā nāgataḥ 
yas tu kathaṃcid dhaniko daridratām upagatas tāvanmātraśeṣadhanaḥ sa kaṃcit kālaṃ pratīkṣya rājani nivedya vikrīṇīta bandham tato vikrayād utpannaṃ dviguṇam ātmano dhanaṃ gṛhītvā śeṣaṃ madhyasthahaste ṛṇikasātkuryāt 
nanu ca
ādhiḥ praṇaśyed dviguṇe dhane yadi na mokṣayet 
iti paṭhyate 
etad uttaratra vyākhyāsyāmaḥ 
praṇāśyatvān na pūrvasvāminaḥ svāmyahāniḥ prayoktuś ca svattvāpattiḥ 
yadi ca nisargavikrayau na staḥ kīdṛśam asya svāmyam ucyate 
tasmāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyena praṇāśavacanaṃ pratiṣiddhabhogasya bhogānujñānārthaṃ vyākhyāyate 
vastrādiviṣayaṃ vā 
tasya hi bhujyamānasya praṇāśa eva 
na kṣetrāder iva tiṣṭhataḥ svarūpād pracyavamānasya bhogyatā saṃbhavati 
tenaitat smṛtivyavasthāyāṃ vyākhyeyam 
gauṇau cātra praṇāśanisargau 
vikrayapratiṣedhas tu mukhya eva 
na hy asau gauṇatayā pratipattuṃ śakyate 
etad eva prastutya na syātāṃ vikrayādhīne iti smṛtyantarapaṭhitam 
ata iha nisargo 'nyatrādhānam vikrayasāhacaryāt sadṛśau hi tau kenacid aṃśena 
na bhoktavyo balād ādhir bhuñjāno vṛddhim utsṛjet 
mūlyena toṣayec cainam ādhisteno 'nyathā bhavet 
nanu ca prāg apy etad uktam na tv evādhau iti 
satyam 
yatra yāvaty eva vṛddhis tāvān eva bhogaḥ sa pūrvasya viṣayaḥ 
yatra tu mahatī vṛddhiḥ svalpopabhogaś ced balādinā bhuñjānasya sarveṇa sarvavṛddhihāniḥ 
yatra kṣetragavādir bandhas tadbhogaś ca na vṛddhisaṃmitaḥ sa copacitām api vṛddhiṃ na dadāti na ca dhanaṃ dviguṇam tatra kayācid atimatyātyantam uktaiva vṛddhir niścetavyā 
yadi tu vastrādi bhujymānaṃ naśyet tatra mūlyena toṣayed enam ādhātāram 
itaro 'pi vṛddhiṃ labhate 
ato 'nyathādadan mūlyam ādhisteno bhavet 
yajjātīyam ādhiṃ bhuktavāṃs tadapahāre yo daṇḍaḥ sa eva dāpyaḥ 
stenaś cauraḥ 
anye vyācakṣate 
balād bhukte vṛddhihāniḥ 
bhuñjīta tanmūlyata eva vā 
yadṛṇikasya mūlyaṃ mūlyahiraṇyam 
yatra bhuñjāna ucyate mā me bandhaṃ vinīnaśo mā bhuṅkthāḥ katipayair ahobhir mokṣayāmi tathāpy ucyamāno bhuṅka eveti so 'sya viṣayaḥ 
ādhiś copanidhiś cobhau na kālātyayam arhataḥ 
avahāryau bhavetāṃ tau dīrghakālam avasthitau 
ādhir uktārthaḥ 
prītyā bhujyamānaḥ upanidhis tu vastrāntarhito nyāsaḥ 
tau cirakālaṃ na sthāpyau 
kiṃ tarhi prāpte kāle mokṣaṇīyau 
ādher mokṣaṇakālo dviguṇībhūtaṃ dhanam 
tasyātikramas tasminn api kāle 'mokṣaṇam 
upanidhir api yāvatā kālena nāsyāvasaro bhavati madīyam evaitad bhoktāham iti sa pratyāharaṇakālaḥ 
tato 'dhikaḥ kālaḥ kālātyayaḥ 
taṃ nārhataḥ sa na kartavya ity arthaḥ 
hetum āha avahāryau bhavetāṃ tāv iti 
tau hi dīrghakālam avasthitāv apratyāhrīyamāṇāv avyavahāryāv iti sthitam 
tasmād dviguṇībhūtadhane ādhimokṣaṇe prayatitavyam 
suhṛdupadeśo 'yam na tv evādhyupanidhyor bhūyasāpi kālenāpahāraḥ 
yato vakṣyati ādhiḥ sīmā bāladhanam iti 
atas tasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ 
anye tv ādhiviṣayam upadeśam icchanti 
yo dveṣeṇa dviguṇībhūte dhane kālaṃ kṣapati tat trilābhaṃ dhanaṃ nādhikaṃ vardhate na cāsyādhunānyatrādhānavikrayau staḥ iha vṛddhim ayaṃ mā labhatām ity anena mātsaryeṇa tatredam ucyate avahāryau bhavetāṃ tāv iti 
anayā buddhyāmokṣayataḥ svāmyam asya nivartate 
yas tu kathaṃcid asati dhane na mokṣayati tasya nisargavikrayau na sta iti 
atha vāparo 'rtho mukhenopekṣayati parahastagatayā śaṅkayocyate avahāryau bhavetām iti 
saṃprītyā bhujyamānāni na naśyanti kadācana 
dhenur uṣṭro vahann aśvo yaś ca damyaḥ prayujyate 
prītir eva saṃprītiḥ 
tayā hetubhūtayopabhujyante dhenvādayas te na naśyanti 
pūrvasvāmisaṃbandhahānyā bhoktuḥ svatvāpattir nāśaḥ sa dhenvādīnāṃ prītyā bhujyamānānāṃ na bhavati 
nanu ca sarvasyaivopanidher bhogenāpahāro nāsti 
vakṣyati nikṣepopanidhiḥ striyaḥ iti 
ko viśeṣo dhenvādīnām 
ucyate 
yatra daśavarṣo bhogaḥ na ca svarūpanāśaḥ tatra yat kiṃcit iti sāmānyavacanena prāpte 'pahāre upanidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
denvādīnāṃ tūpanidhitvam eva nāsti ataḥ pratiṣedhasya nāyaṃ viṣaya iti syād āśaṅkā 
ādhānanimitto hi dhenuśabdo yadi parasaṃvatsare dhenuḥ syāt parata upasaryā yadi garbham ādadhyād dhenutvam āpadyeta tadā janayed āśaṅkām asyaiveyam na devadattasya 
yataḥ praṣṭhauhī na bhogyā prītisaṃbhogyaś copanidhiḥ 
yena svakair bhogyaṃ paripālya punar bhujyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam 
na punar upanidher etad rūpam 
bhogyo hy upanidhiḥ 
asadbhāvād bhogyasya ca kīdṛśaguṇam upanidhitvam 
upanidheś cāsau pratiṣedhaḥ 
tasmād upanidhirūpātikramād asati tasmin pratiṣedhe yatnāntaram uktam 
uṣṭrādīnām api daśavarṣāṇi bhujyamānānām avasthāntarāpattiḥ 
atas tatrāpi nopanidhitvam 
vahann iti kecid aśvaviśeṣaṇaṃ manyante 
vṛṣasya nāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
apare tu gardabhāśvatarārthaṃ manyante 
damyo balīvardaḥ 
prayujyate vāhanārthaṃ yo dīyate 
anye tu punaḥ pratiṣedhaṃ vikalpārthaṃ manyante 
etad vyatirekeṇānyasyopanidher asti kādācitko 'pahāraḥ 
tena yad vastrādi prītyā bhujyate yac ca parikṣīṇam tatrāsty evāpahāraḥ 
na hi prītyā gṛhīte vastre parikṣīṇe svāminopekṣyate punar avasaro 'sti dehi me vastraṃ vināśitaṃ tvayā tatsamena mūlyena saṃsādhaya iti 
yat kiṃcid daśavarṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī 
bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati 
yat kiṃcid bhujyamānam ity vyavasthitena saṃbandhaḥ 
dhanīti saṃnidhānāt sāmānyanirdeśe 'pi bhujyamānadhanopekṣaṇaṃ pratīyate 
yat kiṃcid iti dāsīdāsāsārabhāṇḍādi sarvaṃ grāhayati 
na hi tal loke 'tyantaṃ dhanam iti prasiddham gobhūhiraṇyādy eva mahārghaṃ dhanam iti prasiddhataram 
tenāyam atra vākyārthaḥ 
yat kiṃcid dravyaṃ pareṇa bhujyamānaṃ dhanī dhanasvāmī daśavarṣāṇi yāvat prekṣate na kiṃcid vakti na rājani vyavaharati na kulasamakṣaṃ bhoktāraṃ vadati madīyam etat kim iti tvayā svayaṃ bhujyate iti sa daśabhyo varṣebhya uttarakālaṃ na tal labdhuṃ svīkartum arhati 
nivartate 'sya svatvam iti yāvat 
prekṣaṇena jñeyatāmātram ucyate na pratyakṣataiva 
saṃnidhāv iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
paraiḥ na jñātisaṃbandhibhiḥ 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram jñātisaṃbandhibhir vinā iti 
saṃbandhibāndhavaiś caiva bhuktaṃ yaj jātibhis tathā 
na tad bhogo nivarteta bhogam anyatra kalpayet 
tad ayuktam 
avyavasthaivaṃ sati syāt 
ke jñātayaḥ ke vā saṃbandhinaḥ iti 
saṃbandhamātragrahaṇe na kiṃcid vyāvartyam 
tasmād yenānyadīyaṃ bhujyate sa evaṃ bhavati 
kiṃ tu tathā sati paraśabdo 'nuvādamātram anarthaḥ kasyāpi na paravyapadeśaḥ 
sa nirasyate yathā bhāryāpatī pitāputrāv iti 
tatra hy ātmany api vyapadeśo 'sti ardho ha vā eṣa ātmano yaj jāyā ātmā vai putra nāmāsi iti 
tena dampatyoḥ pitṛputrayor na bhogābhogau kāraṇam 
teṣām api vibhaktadhanānāṃ bhogakāle prāpte 'bhogo bādhaka eva 
bhāryāyā api strīdhane bhartṛsakāśād gṛhīte bandhena patyur bhoge nāsiddhiḥ 
sā hy ātyantaparavatī 
nobhayor vibhāgo 'sti 
strīdhanam api tenaiva tasyāḥ paripālanīyam 
rājastrīśrotriyadravyād anyatra iti ca paṭḥyate 
evam anena svāmina upekṣamāṇasya svāmyahānir uktā 
kasya tarhi tat saṃbhavatīty evam artham uttaraślokaḥ 
na sa tal labdhum arhati ity asya śeṣaḥ ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍaḥ iti 
ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate 
bhagnaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati 
jaḍaḥ apratipattimān 
pogaṇḍo bālaḥ 
prāk ṣoḍaśād bālaḥ progaṇḍa ity ucyate 
etac ca svadhanasaṃrakṣaṇāsāmarthyakāraṇānām anyeṣām apy upalakṣaṇārtham 
madyadyūtaviśaktatā dīrgharogagṛhītatā tapaḥsvādhyāyaikaparatvam vyavahāreṣv anaipuṇyam vāgindriyābhāvaḥ bādhiryam  yasyaite 'sāmarthyahetavaḥ santi na tadīye dhane bhoktur bahutareṇāpi kālena svatvam āpadyate 
viṣaye cāsya bhujyate 
asyeti dhaninaḥ pratyavamarśaḥ 
viṣayaḥ kāśmīrāṇāṃ kaśmīraḥ pañcālānāṃ ca pañcālaḥ 
yadi bhoktā ca svāmī caikasminn eva deśe vaset tathāpi śaktivihīnasyāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ 
atrāpi vyākhyāne prapañca evāyam ajaḍāpogaṇḍagrahaṇasya pradarśanārthatayā vyākhyātatvāt 
tena yasya jānato yadupekṣākāraṇaṃ na saṃbhāvyate tadīyaṃ dhanaṃ daśa varṣāṇi bhuñjāno bhoktaivārhati tasya tatsvam ity avagantavyam 
nanu ca na bhogāt svatvaṃ yuktam 
svatve sati bhogo yuktaḥ 
bhogād dhi svatve 'vyavasthā syāt 
yaś cāyam avadhir daśa varṣāṇīti sa smṛtyantareṇa na sarvasmin dhana iṣyate 
kiṃ tarhi paśyato 'bruvato bhūmer hānir viṃśativārṣikī iti 
anye tu viṃśativārṣikeṇāpi bhogena na bhūmer apahāram icchanti tripuruṣaiva bhuktiḥ pramāṇam iti vadantaḥ 
anye tu kadācid āgamarahitena bhoge na svāmyam anumanyante 
evaṃ hy āhuḥ
anāgamaṃ ca yo bhuṅkte bahūny abdaśatāny api 
tathā
saṃbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit 
āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na saṃbhoga iti sthitiḥ 
tripuruṣabhuktivādinas tāvad evaṃ paṭhanti 
yad vināgamam atyantaṃ bhuktaṃ pūrvais tribhir bhavet 
na tac chakyam apāhartuṃ kramāt tripuruṣāgatam 
asyāyam arthaḥ āgamo dānādiḥ 
asati tasmin yad bhuktaṃ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahais tac caturthasya sidhyati na tu viṃśatyā varṣaiḥ 
tatrānyatroktam 
ādau tu kāraṇaṃ dānaṃ madhye bhuktis tu sāgamā 
ante tu buktir evaikā pramāṇaṃ sthāvare bhavet 
tṛtīyasya bogāt siddhiḥ na prathamadvitīyayoḥ pitṛpitāmahayoḥ 
asyāpi na viṃśativarṣair bhogaḥ pramāṇam 
anye tv āgamarahitasya vārṣaśatikasyāpi bhogyasyāprāmāṇyam anumanyante 
tathā cāhuḥ 
anāgamaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte bahūny abdaśatāny api 
cauradaṇḍena taṃ pāpaṃ daṇḍayet pṛthivīpatiḥ 
bhogaṃ kevalato yas tu kīrtayen nāgamaṃ kvacit 
āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na saṃbhoga iti sthitiḥ 
yat tu bahūny abdaśatāni iti tad āhartṛviṣayam ātmīyam eva bogam cirakālatve hetum āha tasya pitṛpitāmahabhogena vinā na siddhyatīty arthaḥ 
kathaṃ punar ekasyānekābdaśato bhogaḥ puruṣasya 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
cirakālapratipādanaparā bahutvavacanāḥ śataṃ sahasram ityādayaḥ śabdāḥ 
yathā śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīryaḥ śatendriyaḥ iti 
etad uktaṃ bhavati viṃśativārṣikād bhogād adhikād api na prathamabhoktur bhogāt svatvasiddhiḥ 
arthāt putrasyāpi na siddhyatīti yathāśrutam eva 
na hi bahuṣv abdaśateṣv āgamasmaraṇaṃ saṃbhavati 
tataś ca cirantanadevāyatanabrāhmaṇamaṭhagrāmā rājabhir apahriyeran 
lekhyaśāsanam api rājādhikṛtalekhakalikhitam iti cirantaneṣu naiva pratyabhijñāyeta 
kūṭaśāsanam api saṃbhāvyeta 
tasmāc cirantano bhogaḥ svatvakāryaḥ svatvasya dānādyāgamasaṃbhāvanāyā jñāpako hetuḥ na tu kārakaḥ 
ata eva bhuktiḥ pramāṇamadhye paṭhitā
likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam 
iti 
na tu svatvakāraṇamadhye saptavittāgamāḥ iti śrutaśauryatapaḥkanyā ityādau ca 
atha vā yatra balādi bhogakāraṇaṃ saṃbhāvyate tadviṣayam etat anāgamam ityādi 
atraiva prakaraṇe paṭhitam
anvāhitaṃ hṛtaṃ nyastaṃ balāvaṣṭabdhayācitam 
apratyakṣaṃ ca yad bhuktaṃ ṣaḍ etāny āgamaṃ vinā  iti 
nanu ca ādhi sīmā ity anenaivāyam arthaḥ siddhaḥ 
na uktasya kālasya tripuruṣaṃ yāvad bhuṅkte sa evārthaḥ 
ayaṃ tu tata uttarakālam api nivṛttyartham ārabhate 
tathā ca bahūny abdaśatāni ity atra vacanam 
anvāhitam yat prakaṭam anyathā pradarśyāntarhitam anyad avasthāpyate 
hṛtam rātrau saṃdhibhedachalādinā 
balāvaṣṭabdham prasahyeti śeṣaḥ 
śiṣṭaṃ prasiddham 
yadi tripuruṣā bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ kas tarhi paśyato 'bruvato bhūmer hānir viṃśativārṣikī ity asyārthaḥ 
kecid āhuḥ 
iyantaṃ kālaṃ bhuñjānasya sati lekhyadoṣādau śaktābhiyuktādikṛtatvaṃ kramākṣaravilopād asatyanayābhyām adhamarṇa ucyate 
saṃdigdharūpam api lekhyam iyatā bhogakālena niścīyate 
anye tv āhuḥ 
yatraiva tām eva bhūmim ekasya bandhāyārpayati tām eva cāparasya 
ekasyādyaṃ pramāṇam aparasya pāścātyam 
tatra saty api prāmāṇyasyādyatve pāścātyo viṃśativārṣiko bhogo balavān 
etac cāyuktam yenaiva svīkṛto bandhas tathaiva saḥ ādheḥ svīkaraṇāt siddhiḥ iti vacanāt 
svīkāraś ca bhūmer bhogābhilāṣaiva tenedṛśe viṣaye svalpenāpi kālena bandhasiddhiḥ 
etad evābhipretyoktam
vidyamāne 'pi likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu 
viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram  iti 
viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ gavāśvādāv abhujamāne 'pi nāsiddhiḥ yatas te nāvaśayaṃ bhogyāḥ 
tathā hi bhavet gaur garbhaṃ na gṛhṇāti kīdṛśo 'syā ato bhogaḥ 
bhūmis tu sarvadā phaladeti bhogalābham antareṇa na bandhatvasiddhiḥ 
tatrāpi kathaṃcid upekṣyamāṇasya tu yacchataḥ prathamabhogakāla eva yadi dvitīyenādhigrāhakeṇa saṃnikarṣādinā svīkṛtaḥ syāt itareṇa vādyapramāṇavatā deśaviprakarṣāt kāryavyāsaṅgād vā na svīkṛtas tadā vicāryate neyatā tadasiddhiḥ 
yadā tu gṛhītādhir eva samanantaraṃ rājñā pravrājito mahāntaṃ vyādhim āsasāda na vāsyānyo 'rtharakṣādyadhikṛtaḥ kaścid asti sa cireṇāpy āgataḥ siddhāv api nirupadhipramāṇakāle labhata eva svīkṛtam apy anyena 
anye tu bhrātṝṇāṃ nyūnādhikavibhaktānāṃ punarvibhāgaḥ samīkaraṇārtha uktaḥ 
sa viṃśativarṣebhya ūrdhvaṃ nāstīty evamartham idam āhuḥ 
etāvanmātraphalatve tatraivābhidhānam ucitam 
sāmānyābhidhānaṃ tu prakaraṇotkarṣeṇānyaviṣayatām api jñāpayati 
apare tu khilībhūtā bhūmir yena kṣetrīkṛtā tatra bhūmisthānopabhoga uktaḥ 
sa ced etāvanti varṣāṇi nigṛhītas tathā sūtrakṣetrayantraiś ca svāmī bhūmitvena sa ca viṣayaḥ ity evam āhuḥ 
ihabhavantas tv āhuḥ yau samānadeśau samānasāmarthyau samānasvabhāvau samānadhanau tulyaprayojanāv aparasparasaṃbandhinau tayor anyatarasyetareṇa bhujyamānam iyantam avadhiṃ samakṣam upekṣamāṇasyāsya naiva sthāvareṣu svāmyam 
kiṃ tu tripuruṣabhuktivirodhāt sarveṇa sarvam 
viruddhe hy ete smṛtī 
te na kim api kalpanam arhataḥ yenāsti ca svāmyam nāsti cet kiṃcid yujyate 
tata evaṃ vyavasthā yuktā 
yady api satvāgamakāraṇāni bahūni santi dānavikrayabandhakāraṇādīni tathāpy anupalabhyamānakāraṇaviśeṣe viṃśativārṣikabhoge 'nantarādarśitaviṣaye bandharūpatābhyupagantuṃ yuktā 
cañcalaṃ bhogyaṃ ca svatvam 
vastvapacaye tatpratyāhartuṃ labhyate 
tataś ca tripuruṣā bhuktiḥ sarvasya svatvam āpādayati 
dānavikrayasaṃbhāvanā tu yāvaty eva sā vārṣikī bhaviṣyati 
viṃśativārṣike bhoge na kiṃcid anupapannam 
yatrobhāv apy āgamam antareṇa bhogamātrabalāt pravṛttau tatra pūrvo bhogaś cirantano 'pi viṃśativarṣabhogyena sāṃpratikena nirupādhinā bādhyate 
daṇḍapūrvikayātrāgata iyatkālo bhogaḥ tripuruṣāgatāyā bhukter bhādhaka ity uktaṃ bhavati 
bhagnaṃ tad vyavahāreṇeti 
vyavahāragrahaṇaṃ dharmanivṛttyartham 
tena yadi kathaṃcij jānīte tadā jīyeta 
tadāpi tv anena upanidhibhogajñāpane pramāṇaṃ nāsti tena vyavaharato jīyant taddharmo nāsti tādṛśena bhogenāpi hataḥ iti tiṣṭhatv etat 
ādhiḥ sīmā bāladhanaṃ nikṣepopanidhiḥ striyaḥ 
rājasvaṃ śrotriyasvaṃ ca na bhogena praṇaśyati 
ādhīyata ity ādhir bandhakadravyaṃ gobhūhiraṇyādy ucyate 
yac cottamarṇād dhanam ādīyate 
upanidhiḥ śāstrāntareṇāntarhito nyāsa uktaḥ yad apradarśitarūpaṃ sacihnavastrādinā pihitaṃ nikṣipyate 
prītibhogyaṃ tu yuktam upanidhiśabdavācyam tasya nikṣepagrahaṇenaiva gṛhītatvāt 
sīmā maryādā grāmādīnām 
bahusādhāraṇyād dhi tatropekṣā saṃbhavati 
gṛhādīnāṃ tu prākāraparikhādirūpā dvitrihastaparimāṇarūpā dvayoḥ sādhāraṇī yānyatareṇa kathaṃcid upajīvyamānā 
svalpatvād bhogaś ca kaścit kiyantaṃ kālam upekṣetāpi 
tatrāpi dānādisattvāpagamahetuṃ saṃbhāvayataḥ 
atas tatputrāḥ pautrā vā gūḍhacihnādinā prajñāpitasīmatvād ācchindayaty eva 
bāladhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham pogaṇḍaśabdasya darśitatvād ity uktam 
striyo dāsyaḥ bhāryā vā 
netarasyādhanasyāpahāra uktaḥ dhanasya daśavārṣikī iti 
nanu ca neha dhanam asti 
yatkiṃcit iti vastumātranirdeśo 'yam 
naivam 
dhanī iti saṃbandhena dhanaviṣayataiva yatkiṃcit iti sāmānyaśabdasya pratīyate 
ka evam āha striyo na dhanam iti 
itthaṃ viniyojye dravye dhanaśabdo vartate 
athāsmād eva strīdhanāt svatvamātropalakṣaṇam 
dhanopamānena pumāṃso 'pi bhogena dāsāḥ svīkriyanta eva 
rājasvaṃ 
deśeśvarā rājānaḥ teṣāṃ dhanam 
te hi mahādhanatvād uccatvānvayaṃ dhanam anvicchanto 'dhikṛtair virutabhedādibhir nidhanīkriyante tadūnāpekṣayā 
śrotriyadravyaṃ śrotriyadhanābhiyuktiḥ 
yaḥ svāminānanujñātam ādhiṃ bhuṅkte 'vicakṣaṇaḥ 
tenārdhavṛddhir bhoktavyā tasya bhogasya niṣkṛtiḥ 
uktam na bhoktavyo balād ādhir bhuñjāno vṛddhim utsṛjet iti 
sarvasya hi grahaṇam ucyate 
tatra niṣiddhe bhoge balād ādhiṃ bhuñjanaḥ vṛddhim utsṛjet iti sarvāṃ hārayaty eva vṛddhim 
ananujñāte pratiṣedhanam 
rahasy upabhujyamānabhoge na cādhir naśyati tatra rūpyasuvarṇālaṃkārādāv ardhavṛddhityāgo 'nena ślokenocyate 
yat tu navaṃ mahārgham alaṃkaraṇavastrādi paridhīyamānaṃ nāsitaṃ tatra na kevalaṃ vṛddhihāniḥ yāvad dhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ tat paripīḍya mūlataḥ praviśatīti mahattarair vyākhyātam 
yajvanā tu vyākhyātam yatra svāmī vyavaharati adhyadhīnaś ca tatrādhyadhīnena bandho dattaḥ svāminā ca dṛṣṭaḥ tatra dhāraṇakena kasmiṃścid avasare 'dhyadhīnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ prayojanaṃ mamānena bandhenāsti tatropanidhinyāyena tenānujñātaḥ kālāntare bhuñjānaṃ yadi svāmī paśyaṃs tadanujñātaṃ bandhaṃ kṣapitavān  satīdṛśe viṣaye 'rdhavṛddhityāgaḥ 
tad ayuktam 
yatas tulyo vyavahāraḥ parasparāpekṣaḥ svāmibhṛtyayoḥ 
tatra tatrānyatareṇānujñātenāyam anujñātaḥ prayujyate 'dharmataḥ 
svāmiśabdasyārthe svatvam īdṛśi viṣaye bhavati 
anyathā bandhaṃ yo dadāti so 'vaśyaṃ svāmyena yuktaḥ 
adhyadhīnas tu na svāmī 
yady evaṃ cauras tarhi 
tasmāt svāmitvādhyāropaḥ 
upayoge vādhyadhīne svāmyanujñāvyavahārād brahmadattavat 
ataḥ pūrva evārthaḥ 
svāmigrahaṇaṃ pādapūraṇārtham 
bhuṅkte 'vicakṣaṇa ity akāraḥ saṃhitayā praśliṣṭanirdiṣṭo veditavyaḥ 
yasya hy asti buddhiḥ vṛddhir mamāsty eva adhiko lābho vastubhogaḥ iti so 'vicakṣaṇaḥ 
na hi lokaśāstraviyojanīyā sthitiḥ yad ubhau lābhāś ca bhogaś ca vṛddhiḥ syāt 
tena sā vṛddhir bhoktavyā 
niṣkṛtiḥ paraśuddhiḥ viniyama iti yāvat 
anye tu dviguṇībhūte 'py amokṣyamāṇe pratiṣedham imam icchanti tasya hi svalpo 'parādha iti vadantaḥ 
prathamaṃ tāvad ādāv eva tair yājñavalkyavacanasya viṣayo deyaḥ ādhiḥ praṇaśyet iti 
kusīdavṛddhir dvaiguṇyaṃ nātyeti sakṛd āhitā 
dhānye sade lave vāhye nātikrāmati pañcatām 
lābhārtho dhanaprayogaḥ kusīdam tatra vṛddhiḥ 
atha vā prayujyamānaṃ prayoktṛsaṃbandhidhanam eva kusīdam 
madīyaṃ svalpaṃ dattvādhikaṃ grahīṣyāmi iti dhanaṃ dīyate tat kusīdam 
tatra vṛddhiḥ 
sā dviguṇatvaṃ nātikrāmati 
tāvad uttamarṇena vṛddhyarthaṃ dhanaṃ dattavatādharmarṇād grahītavyaṃ yāvan mūladhanaṃ dviguṇaṃ praviṣṭam 
nanu vṛddher dvaiguṇyaṃ śrūyate 
mūlena saha triguṇaṃ prāpnoti 
naivam 
guṇo 'vayava ucyate 
sa tāvad avayavinam apekṣate 
prakṛtaṃ ca dhanam 
ataḥ prayogaviṣayasya dhanasyānena prakāreṇa dvaiguṇyam uktaṃ bhavati 
tathā ca smṛtyantaram cirasthāne dvaiguṇyaṃ prayogasya mocya ādhis tadutpanne praviṣṭe dviguṇe dhane iti 
vṛddhiś cānekarūpā 
kārṣāpaṇeṣu prayukteṣu kārṣāpaṇa eva vardhate 
kvacit saṃtatiḥ 
strīpaśūnām vā iti saṃtatiḥ 
kvacid ādhibhogaḥ gobhūmyādeḥ 
tatredaṃ dvaiguṇyaṃ sarūpavṛddhiviṣayaṃ kecid āhuḥ 
tatra hi mukhyaṃ vṛddher dvaiguṇyaṃ pratīyate 
saṃtatau na vijñāyate kiṃ saṃkhyāyāsyā dvaiguṇyam uta parimāṇenota mānato veyam 
ato vetyādyaniścayaḥ 
paśūnām mūlyād dhi mahārghatvaṃ hastyaśvādiṣu krayavikrayādau dṛśyata eva 
mahāpramāṇā hi mahārghā bhavanti 
nanu ca saṃtatau sārūpyam asty eva 
goḥ saṃtatir gaur eva 
tatra bhedopanyāso na yukto vṛddhiḥ sarūpā saṃtatiś ceti 
ucyate 
naikajātīyatvamātreṇa sārūpyaṃ bhavati kiṃ tu vayaḥparimāṇādisāmyena 
ato yukto bhedopanyāsaḥ 
bhogalābhe 'pi kuto dvaiguṇyapratītiḥ 
upakārakāṇi janayatuṃ gāvaḥ prayujyante 
gobhūmyādi payoyavasādayo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ bhujyante 
tatra kīdṛśaṃ dvaiguṇyam 
samācāraś ca kvacid dṛśyate 
varṣaśatāni bhūmir ā mūlahiraṇyādānād bhujyate 
paṭhati ca yājñavalkyaḥ ādhiś ca bhujyate tāvad yāvat tan na pradīyate iti 
atrocyate 
vṛddhimātre śrūyamāṇe dvaiguṇyaṃ kathaṃ viseṣe 'vasthāpyate 
na hi śrutyā sāmānyapratipattir bhavantī vinā pramāṇena viśeṣe 'vasthātum arhati 
yat tu saṃtatāv anupapannaṃ dvaiguṇyam iti avagame yatnaḥ kriyatām 
mūlamarṣeṇa pariniścitavatā vṛddhis tatsāmānyā yata eva tajjātānāṃ bhavati 
bhūmibhoge 'pi yavasagodhūmādau tatpacyamānasyārghataḥ śakyata eva samatvaṃ niścetum 
upakāravacano 'pi guṇaśabdo 'sti 
ka evaṃ sati samaguṇo bhavati ka upakārako bhavatīti kathaṃ gamyate 
anena yāvan mūlyaṃ godhānyavinimayād utpadyate tāvad eva cet tata utpannā vṛddhis tadā bhavati samaguṇatvam parimāṇādisāmyābhāve 'pi 
yas tu kvacit samācāraḥ bhavataiva parihṛtaḥ kvacid grahaṇaṃ prayuñjānena 
samācārabhraṃśasaṃbhave smṛtayo niyāmikā arthavatyaḥ 
akṣīṇi me darśanīyāni pādā me sukumāratarāḥ ityvat prayogād bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti śāstram ārabhyate 
asati viprayogadarśane pratyākhyāyate 
upasarjanopasargapaurvāparyaprayogasiddhyartham uktam 
na hi kaścit prapacatīti prayoktavye pacati prete prayuṅkta iti 
vacanam api ādhis tu bhujyate tāvad yāvat tan na pradīyate yāvad dānāt taddviguṇam apraviṣṭam ity api śakyate netum 
smṛtyantaraivākyatvāc caitad eva yuktam adhyavasātum 
upapāditaṃ caitan nipuṇato 'nyatra 
sakṛd āhitā 
sakṛd ity anena vyavasthāpito 'ṅgīkṛtaḥ punaḥ punaḥ proyoga iti yāvat 
ādhānaṃ sthāpanaṃ ucyate 
vacanavyavasthayā ca nirūpaṇaṃ sthāpanam eva 
punaḥ prayogaś ca dviguṇībhūte dhane ādīyamāne bhavati 
yadā dviguṇavṛddhyartham uttamarṇaḥ adhamarṇaś ca tadīyena dhanena mahatkāryaṃ kariṣyan karaṇaparivṛttiṃ karotīti yā prāktanī vṛddhir iyaṃ vādyaprabhṛti vardhata iti tadā dviguṇabhūtam api punar vardhata eva 
puruṣāntarasaṃcāreṇa vā yadi dviguṇībhūtaṃ dhanikasyopayujyate tadādhamarṇa ucyamāno 'nyapuruṣaṃ dadatam arpayati eṣa ta iyadbhir ahobhir dāsyati iti tatra svahastaṃ dīyamānaṃ punar varddhate 
na cāyaṃ dānaṃ prati pratipratibhūḥ kiṃ tu nikṣeptā dātaiva 
etat tu ṛjunā puruṣāntaram asaṃkrāntam iti vyākhyātam 
atha vā prāg api dvaiguṇyād yadā bandham anyasmai pratyarpayati dīnāreṣu salābheṣu dvitve tasya bandhasya mokṣa eva dharmyaḥ 
bandhasya prāgvṛddhau sthitāyāṃ tasmād ahnaḥ prabhṛti punar dvaiguṇyam āpnoti 
yadā tadīyaṃ bandhakaṃ tadanujñayottamarṇenānyatrādhāya svadhanaṃ gṛhyate tadā vardhate 
eṣa puruṣāntarasaṃcāraḥ 
ubhayatra dviguṇībhūte prayoktādhamarṇikena yena kena prakāreṇānyasmād grahaṇam anujñāpyate 
yadi vāsmād anyad gṛhyate grahītā deśāntaraṃ gamiṣyan kāryāntareṇa cānyatra saṃcārayati 
ṛjus tu tasmād evādharmarṇād anavīkṛte prayoge dviguṇādhikāṃ vṛddhiṃ necchati 
ata āha puruṣāntaram asaṃkrānte punaḥkriyā 
prayojanaṃ ca vakṣyāmaḥ 
ye tu vyācakṣate yā vṛddhir upacitā sāṃvatsarī yugapat sarvaivānīyate tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
yā punaḥ prāptadānāpi sarvā na dīyate tatra dvigunād adhikagrahaṇam api teṣāṃ na naśabdo yathārtho nāpy āhita iti 
sāṃvatsarī tāvad upacitā grāhyā dvitīyasaṃvatsare punar ānayanam asty eveti na kvacid dvaiguṇyaniyamaḥ syāt 
atha yo dviguṇībhūtaṃ salābhaṃ dhanam ānayati tatrādhikaniṣedho 'stu 
prāg dvaiguṇyād vṛddhimātradānasamartho vṛddhiṃ dadāti 
mūlaṃ tasyāparimitagrahaṇam iti 
etad api na kiṃcit 
yaḥ saṃvahati tasyānugraho nyāyyo nādhikagrahaṇam 
yas tu rājñā dviguṇībhūtam api kathaṃcid āpyate tasyādhikamokṣa ity etad anyāyyam 
na cāhitetyasya śabdasyāyam arthaḥ 
atha āhṛtā iti pāṭhāntaram 
tathāpi sakṛcchabdo na niścitārtho nyāyas tu parityaktaḥ svakṛtaś ca pāṭhaḥ syān na mānavī smṛtir ity uktaiva vyavasthā nyāyyā 
dhānyādiṣu pañcatāṃ pañcaguṇatām nātyeti 
smṛtyantare dhānye caturguṇoktā hiraṇyavastradhānyānāṃ vṛddhir dvitricaturguṇāḥ iti 
tatra vyavasthā yadi daridrabhūtaḥ prayoktā grahītā ca mahādhanasaṃpannas tena dhānyena mahāntam arthaṃ kṛtavāṃs tadā pañcaguṇānyathā caturgaṇā 
sadaṃ phalaṃ vārṣam dhānyasya pṛthagupādānāt 
lava udīcyeṣūrṇāviṣayaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
vāhyo gardabhoṣṭrabalīvardādiḥ 
kṛtānusārād adhikā vyatiriktā na siddhyati 
kusīdapatham āhus taṃ pañcakaṃ śatam arhati 
anusaranty anudhāvanty anuvartante sarva evārthā etam ity anusāraḥ 
śāstroditaḥ samācāraḥ 
sa ca vividho 'śītibhāgādiḥ pañcakaśataparyantaḥ 
tasmād adhikā vṛddhiḥ kṛtā yāvat tathādhamarṇenottamarṇasya na sidhyati 
kutaḥ vyatiriktā yataḥ śāstrabāhyety arthaḥ 
arthavādāntaram āha 
kusīdapatham āhus tam iti 
kupuruṣā yatra sīdanti kuśīdam 
dharmeṇa tad dhanino lakṣyante 
kuśīdīnām ayaṃ panthā mārgo vyavahāro na sādhūnām iti nindā 
yasyāvaśyam adhikā kartavyā  mahad dhi kāryam ayaṃ madīyena dhanena sādhayatīti buddhyā  tadā varṇavibhāgam anapekṣya pañcakaṃ śataṃ grahītum arhati lipset tadartham idam ucyate 
pāṭhāntaram kṛtā tu sārād adhikā iti 
yasyākiṃcanasya sataḥ svalpā kṛtā tenaiva dhanenānyathā vā mahārthatāṃ prāptas tasya yā puruṣasārād adhikā na sidhyati yaḥ paraṃ pañcakaśatam arhati 
nātisāṃvatsarīṃ vṛddhiṃ na cādṛṣṭāṃ vinirharet 
cakravṛddhiḥ kālavṛddhiḥ kāritā kāyikā ca yā 
saṃvatsare bhavā sāṃvatsarī 
tām atikrāntā sāṃvatsarī 
bhavapratyayārthaḥ sāmarthyād antarbhūtaḥ 
atha vā saṃvatsaram atikrāntā atisaṃvatsareti prāpte vṛddhīkārau chandastulyatvāt kartavyau 
yeṣāṃ vṛddhir anantaprakrāntapañcakaṃ śataṃ sarvavarṇaviṣayā sā saṃvatsaraṃ yāvad grahītavyā nātīte saṃvatsare 
atha vā yāvat saṃvatsaram 
saṃvatsaro varṣaḥ 
tāvad vṛddhir na mārgiṇīyā 
adhamarṇenāpi saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ na vilaṃbitavyam 
vinirhared viniṣkṛṣya svadhanād ārabhyopanayed ity arthaḥ 
arvāg api saṃvatsarād yā dīyate sāpy atikrāntasaṃvatsaraiva 
atha vā māsād ārabhya saṃvatsarasya yāvad vṛddhiḥ parimāṇato nirūpitavyā 
māsena yad varddhate saṃvatsareṇa vety evaṃ prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ na tu saṃvatsaradvayasya lābhārthī kadācic cirakālaṃ grāhayati kiṃ me katipayamāsikena lābhena yadi dve varṣe tato 'dhikaṃ vā gṛhṇāsi tadgrahaṇe eṣā veyatā kālena vṛddhis tatrārvācīnam api dadad adharmarṇe dvisāṃvatsarīṃ yathākālakṛtāṃ tadā dāpyeta 
ekāṃ vṛddhim anādeyāṃ na dadyān nāpi dāpayet iti 
yathā māsikī vṛddhiḥ prathame māsi dvitīya evāhni śodhayan dāpyate tathā yadaivam abhyupaiti saṃvatsareṇa yad vardhata iti tadā tathaiva dāpyate na tu tadadhikakālakṛtā 
na cādṛṣṭāṃ vinirharet 
śāstre yā na dṛṣṭā daśaikādaśikādyā pañcakād adhikā na tāṃ gṛhṇīyāt 
vyatiriktā na sidhyati ity asyaivāyam anuvāda iti kecit 
idaṃ tu yuktam 
adṛṣṭām anupacitām ity arthaḥ 
yāvad bahubhir māsair na saṃhatībhūtā tāvan na grāhyā divasavṛddhir māsavṛddhiḥ 
nanu ca māsasya vṛddhiṃ gṛhṇīyāt ity uktam 
parimāṇaṃ māsikaṃ tadvṛddher na tu grahaṇam 
cakravṛddhiḥ kālavṛddhiḥ kārikā kāyikā ca yā tām api na vinirhared ity anuṣaṅgaḥ 
naivādadyād iti 
yady apy adhamarṇasya pratiṣedhas tathāpi sāmarthyād uttamarṇasyaiva draṣṭavyaḥ 
adhamarṇo hy ārtaḥ kiṃ na karoti 
atha vā vinirhāro grahaṇam eva 
tenottamarṇasyaiva śābdaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
nanu ca dvikādivṛddhividhānāc cakravṛddhyādīnān prāptir eva nāsti 
kiṃ pratiṣedhānuṣaṅgeṇa 
ucyate 
aprāptaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pākṣikīṃ vṛddhim anumāpayati 
yathādhāne na brahmasāmābhigāyed ity avihitaṃ sāmagānaṃ pratiṣedhenāstīti jñāpayati 
tenaitā api pratiṣedhadvāreṇābhyanujñāyante 
keṣāṃcid dūravyavahāriṇāṃ cakravṛddhyādayo 'pi bhavanti 
tena sthalapathavāripathikā vaṇijo yathoktam
kāntāragās tu daśakaṃ sāmudrā viṃśakaṃ śatam 
dadyur vā svakṛtāṃ vṛddhiṃ sarve sarvāsu jātiṣu  iti 
kāntāragādīnām eva svakṛtā sarvajātiviṣayā sādhāraṇī vṛddhir na tv anyeṣām 
tatra cakravṛddhiḥ smṛtyantare paṭhitā vṛddher vṛddhiś cakravṛddhiḥ 
anye tu cakravadyānaṃ gantryādi tadvṛddhiś cakravṛddhiḥ 
teṣāṃ yasminn ahani cakraṃ vartate tatraiva vṛddhiḥ 
yadā tu nadīsaṃtāre durdinādinā aprayāṇaṃ tadā nāsti vṛddhiḥ 
evam anyeṣām api balīvardādivāhyaprayoktṝṇām īdṛśī vṛddhiś cakravṛddir ucyate 
kālavṛddhiḥ pratimāsaṃ tu kālikā 
māsagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārtham 
yānupacitā vṛddhir divase divase gṛhyate māsi māsi vā yasyāḥ kālo na pratīkṣyate atha caitasmin kāle yadi na dadāsi tadā dviguṇībhavati dhanam ity ekarūpā kālavṛddhiḥ 
kāritā 
itthaṃkṛtāṃ yāvatī vā parasparopakārāpekṣayottamarṇādharmarṇau kurutaḥ 
eṣāpi digbhāgavaṇijām eva 
anyeṣāṃ tu vyatiriktā na sidhyati ity uktam pañcakaṃ śatam arhati iti 
atha vā hiraṇye prayukte vāsāṃsi vṛddhyā gṛhyante tatrādhilakṣaṇaṃ dravyam sā kāritā yathābhogalābhe nyāsarūpaviṣaye ca syāt 
kāyikā kāyakarmaṇā saṃśodhyā 
kāyajīvikā ca eṣāṃ krameṇa kramelakādijīvinām 
ṛṇaṃ dātum aśakto yaḥ kartum icchet punaḥ kriyām 
sa dattvā nirjitāṃ vṛddhiṃ karaṇaṃ parivartayet 
vṛddhidviguṇībhūtam ṛṇaṃ dhanaparikṣayād dātum aśakto yaḥ sa punaḥ kriyām kārayitavyaḥ 
karaṇaṃ lekhyasākṣyādi parivartayitavyaḥ 
vṛddhiṃ tu dadyāt nirjitām yāvatī gaṇanayā bhavatīty arthaḥ 
dviguṇād adhikaṃ na grāhyam iti yad uktaṃ tasyāyam apavādaḥ 
navo hy ayaṃ prayoga iti 
kutaḥ punaḥ dvaiguṇyāpavādārthatā 
yāvatā neha kiṃcid īdṛśaṃ vacanam asti vṛddhisahitaṃ dhanaṃ vardhate mūladhanaṃ vā 
kevalaṃ punaḥ kriyā śrūyate 
sā ca karaṇaṃ parivartayed iti vyākhyāntareṇa vyākhyātā 
yadi na vardhate kim arthaṃ tarhi karaṇaparivartanam 
ucyate 
śāntalābhe dhane 'dīyamāne ālasyādisaṃbhāvanā sākṣiṇaś ca dīrghe gacchati kāle vismareyuḥ 
yathoktam 
yatra kārye bhaved yena kṛtopekṣā daśābdikī 
vivādas tatra naiva syāt sāhaseṣu viśeṣataḥ 
tathā daśavarṣopekṣitam ṛṇam asādhyam iti 
tathāca pūrve sma vyācakṣate 
ayaṃ ca rājñaḥ upadeśaḥ pīḍitasyānugrahaḥ 
yadi ca dviguṇasya navīkaraṇena punaḥ prayogo vṛddhisahitasya punar vṛddhir mahāṃś ca pīḍitasyānugrahaḥ 
atha sarvaṃ tadānīm avaṣṭabhya na dāpyate eṣo 'nugraho nirdhanasya 
īdṛśo 'nugraho daivenaiva kṛtaḥ 
tathā ca sarvasmṛtiṣv asyām avasthāyāṃ vihitam 
atha śaktivihīnaḥ syād ṛṇī kālaviparyayāt 
prekṣya śaktim ṛṇaṃ dāpyaḥ kāle deśe yathodayam 
yady adhamarṇo daivadoṣān nirdhanībhūtas tadā na durgāvarodhādinā rājñā pīḍayitavyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi kartavyam 
yadāsya kathaṃcid dhanaṃ bhavet tadā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ śanaiḥ śanair dāpayitavyaḥ 
prekṣya śaktim dhanavattāṃ jñātvety arthaḥ 
dāpyḥ ucitasya 
vakṣyati karmaṇāpi samaṃ kuryāt iti 
tasmāt kāraṇaparivṛttau yad evoktam asmābhis tad eva prayojanam 
adarśayitvā tatraiva hiraṇyaṃ parivartayet 
yāvatī saṃbhaved vṛddhis tāvatīṃ dātum arhati 
adarśayitvā hiraṇyam adatvā nirdhanatvād vṛddhihiraṇyam tatraiva punaḥ karaṇaṃ parivartayet 
sākṣisamakṣam evaṃ brūyāt etāvan mulam asmai dhārayāmi etāvatī ca vṛddhiḥ iti 
patre cāropayet 
yāvatī saṃbhaved vṛddhir iti tāvad vyācakṣate 
punaḥ karaṇe vṛddhisahitamūlībhūte laghīyasī vṛddhiḥ kartavyā yāvatyā vṛddhyā nātipīḍyate 
yā prāg āsīt tato nyūnety arthaḥ 
yajvāsahāyanāradānāṃ tu mate kākiṇīmātram api śaktaḥ karaṇaparivṛttikāle dāpayitavyaḥ 
yena sākṣiṇaḥ na śravaṇamātre sākṣitvam dadāti tatsamakṣam adhamarṇo 'rthasaṃbandho 'pi pratyakṣībhavati 
yataḥ śravaṇāt sravaṇe ca kṛtā bhaviṣyanti tātaś citte tiṣṭhati dhanaṃ daśavarṣopekṣitam ityādi vinaśvaraṃ bhaviṣyati 
cakravṛddhiṃ samārūḍho deśakālavyavasthitaḥ 
atikrāman deśakālau na tatphalam avāpnuyāt 
vārāṇasīṃ yāsyāmi tvadīyā yugyā me bhāṇḍaṃ ca netur eṣā ca te vṛddhiḥ iti 
tatra yadi kāntāranadīsaṃtaraṇarāṣṭropaplavādinā taṃ deśaṃ na gatas tato 'rvāg deśāt kiyatā lābhena pravṛttyā vyāvṛttas tadā yathānirūpitā vṛddihir na dāpyate 
yatas taṃ deśaṃ yāvad vahatāṃ yā vṛddhir aprāptānāṃ sā kathaṃ syāt 
dīrgham adhvānaṃ vahatāṃ yugyānāṃ mahān kleśaḥ svāminaś ca tāvantaṃ kālaṃ kṛtaiva vṛddhir yugyopakāraḥ 
śīghraṃ tu pratinivṛttānāṃ svāminaḥ punar anyatropakāraṇaṃ saṃpadyata eva 
eṣa evātikramaḥ 
evaṃ kālātikramaḥ māsam me vahantu balīvardā iyatī tava vṛddhiḥ iti 
tatra yadi pakṣāt pratyeti tatra cakravṛddhim adhamarṇaḥ samārūḍhaḥ pratipanno 'ṅgīkṛtavān iti yāvat 
tasyāṃ vṛddhau deśakālau vyavasthitau yat tayā pūrvoktena prakāreṇa deśaviśeṣaṃ kālaviśeṣaṃ vā āsthitavān na nirviśeṣaṇam eva kṛtavān sa evaṃvidho 'dhamarṇas tau deśakālau atikraman na prāpnuyāt tatphalaṃ vṛddhyākhyaṃ nāpnuyān na bhajeta na dadyād ity arthaḥ 
kiṃ tatra naivāsti vṛddhir atha vā pañcakaṃ śatam 
nety āha 
samudrayānakuśalā deśakālārthadarśinaḥ 
sthāpayanti tu yāṃ vṛddhiṃ sā tatrādhigamaṃ prati 
samudrayānagrahaṇaṃ yātropalakṣaṇārtham 
sthalapathikā vāripathikāś ca vaṇijo yāṃ vṛddhiṃ sthāpayanti sā tatrādhigamanaṃ prati niścayaṃ prati 
saiva niścetavyety arthaḥ 
deśakālārthadarśino 'smin pradeśa iyān arthalābho 'smin iyān iti ye paśyanti jānate na tu samudrayāna eva ca ye kuśalāḥ karṇadhārādayaḥ 
anye pūrvaślokam evaṃ vyācakṣate yadṛcchādhyāhāreṇa 
adhamarṇena yā deśakālaṃ cāśritā tāṃ ca prāpya taddeśoditaṃ phalaṃ lābhākhyaṃ tasmād deśād yadi nāpnuyāt tadā kīdṛśī tatra vṛddhir ity ākāṅkṣāyām uttaraślokaḥ 
cakravṛddhigrahaṇaṃ kāritāyā api pradarśanārtham 
lobhātiśayabhājāṃ vaṇijāṃ kṣayavyayāyasaṃvidhijñāḥ parasparasya yāṃ vṛddhiṃ sthāpayeyus tāṃ rājā pramāṇīkuryāt 
tatrādhigamaṃ pratīti 
pratiḥ karmapravacanīyo 'dhigamasya lakṣaṇatvāt lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūtākhyāne tadyukte ca dvitīyā 
yo yasya pratibhūs tiṣṭhed darśanāyeha mānavaḥ 
adarśayan sa taṃ tasya yateta svadhanād ṛṇam 
ṛṇaprayoge dvividho viśrambhaḥ pratibhūr ādhir vā 
tatra pratibhūpakṣa idam ucyate 
trividhaś ca pratibhūḥ darśane pratyaye dāne ca 
tatra darśanapratibhuvam adhikṛtyedam āha 
yasya darśanāya pratibhūs tiṣṭhed amuṣmin pradeśe mayaiṣa tava darśanīyaḥ sa tathā kurvan svadhānāt tasya ṛṇaṃ yateta prayatnaṃ kuryād dātum iti śeṣaḥ 
dadyād iti yāvat 
ṛṇagrahaṇaṃ vyavahāravastumātropalakṣaṇārtham 
tena yāvanto 'rthaviṣayā vyavahāre 'nukrāmyante tad vastu dadyād darśanenānyatareṇābhiyuktaḥ 
vākpāruṣyasaṃgrahaṇādau paṇaparibhāṣā kartavyā 
yadi na darśitaṃ cet tanmayā dātavyam 
akṛtāyāṃ tu paribhāṣāyāṃ rājadaṇḍam eva dāpyaḥ 
śarīre tu nigrahe tanniṣkrayaṇaṃ suvarṇam 
prātibhāvyaṃ vṛthādānam ākṣikaṃ saurikaṃ ca yat 
daṇḍaśulkāvaśeṣaṃ ca na putro dātum arhati 
pratibhuvaḥ karma prātibhāvyam 
pratibhuvā yat kartavyaṃ pararṇasaṃśodanādi tat prātibhāvyam 
arhattā yogyatā 
sānena pratiṣidhyate 
tasyāṃ ca pratiṣiddhāyām adhikārapratiṣedhaḥ 
anadhikṛtaś ca na dadātīty evaṃ na dātavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati 
sarvatrārhatau kriyāpade vyākhyāyāte draṣṭavye 
kathaṃ punaḥ putrasya prātibhāvyādiprāptis tarhi tadṛṇasya pitrāgṛhītatvāt 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
yad yena dātavyatayāṅgīkṛtaṃ tad gṛhītatulyaphalatvād gṛhītam eva 
tanniścitasvarūpatvam āpannāḥ ataḥ pratiṣidhyante 
vṛthādānaṃ parihāsādinimittaṃ pratiśravaṇam kuru kāryam idaṃ mama pariniṣpanne idaṃ dāsyāmi iti niṣpādite kārye pitrādatte pratiśrute kathaṃcit putro na dāpyate 
evaṃ pāritoṣikādi bandiparihāsādiviṣayam 
yad vāham amuṣmād vaṇija etasyedyad dāpaye iti tatra tu manuṣye preṣite kathaṃcid dātum aghaṭite 'saṃnidhānād vaṇijo 'nyato 'pi kāraṇād dattāntare pitari mṛte putro na dāpyate 
akṣinimittam ākṣikam sabhikāya yad dhāryate 'nyato vā yat prayojanaṃ tad gṛhītam iti śakyate jñatum 
tasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
yaḥ parityaktabāndhavo 'kṣamālāsv eva śayyāsanavihārī prasiddhaḥ krīḍanakas tadṛṇam ākṣikam iti śakyate niścetum 
surāpānanimittaṃ saurikam 
surāgrahaṇaṃ madyopalakṣaṇārtham 
tena yaḥ pānaśauṇḍo 'tyantamadyapas tadṛṇapratiṣedhaḥ 
daṇḍaśulkayor avaśeṣaḥ
