daṇḍapāruṣyaṃ daṇḍena duḥkhotpādanam yathā kaṇṭakādeḥ puruṣasya sparśaḥ pīḍākara evaṃ pīḍākaratvasāmānyāt pāruṣyaśabdaprayogaḥ 
tatra nirṇayo daṇḍaviśeṣanirṇayaḥ 
pūrvaprakaraṇopasaṃhāropanyāsārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
yena kenacid aṅgena hiṃsyāc cec chreṣṭham antyajaḥ 
chettavyaṃ tat tad evāsya tan manor anuśāsanam 
antyajaḥ śūdraś caṇḍālaparyantaḥ 
śreṣṭhaḥ traivarṇikaḥ 
taṃ ced dhiṃsyād aṅgena kenacit sākṣād daṇḍakaḍgādipraharaṇavyavadhānena vā tad aṅgam asya chettavyam 
hiṃsā ca krodhena praharaṇaṃ tāḍanecchayā hastādy udyamya vegena nipātanam māraṇam eva 
tad tad iti vīpsā aṅgam iti chettavyam iti caikatvavivakṣā mā vijñāyi 
tenānekenāṅgena praharaṇe 'nekasyaiva chedaḥ 
anuśāsanam upadeśaḥ manukṛtaiṣā maryādā 
anuśāsanagrahaṇaṃ kāruṇikasya rājñaḥ pravṛttyarthaḥ 
pāṇim udyamya daṇḍaṃ vā pāṇicchedanam arhati 
pādena praharan kopāt pādacchedanam arhati 
udyamya utkṣipyaiva kopāt tāḍanecchos tadaṅgam anipātayato 'sya pāṇiḥ chetavyaḥ 
daṇḍagrahaṇaṃ samānapīḍākarasya hiṃsāsādhanasyopalakṣaṇārtham 
tena mṛduśaphādāv anyo daṇḍaḥ 
pādena praharann iti 
atrāpy udyamyety apekṣitavyam 
avagurato 'py eṣa eva 
sahāsanam abhiprepsur utkṛṣṭasyāpakṛṣṭajaḥ 
kaṭyāṃ kṛtāṅko nirvāsyaḥ sphicaṃ vāsyāvakartayet 
utkṛṣṭo brāhmaṇo jātito dauḥśīlyād avakṛṣṭo 'pi itare varṇā auttarādharyeṇa parasparāpakṣayotkṛṣṭāś cāvakṛṣṭāś ca 
tatreha avakṛṣṭaja iti janinā janmāvakarṣa upāttaḥ tatsaṃnidhānād utkarṣo 'pi janmanaiva 
janmanā ca nirapekṣotkarṣo brāhmaṇasya nāpakarṣaḥ 
tena śūdrasyāyaṃ brāhmaṇena sahaikam āsanam ārūḍhavato daṇḍaḥ 
kaṭiḥ śroṇī 
tatra kṛtacihnaḥ 
aṅkavidhau ca sudhākuṃkumādinā cihnakaraṇamātram api tu daṇḍakhyāpanārtham 
atikramād vibhiyur iti 
tena deśāntare yad anapāyi tac cihnam āyaso lekhanād upadiśyate 
tathā ca vakṣyati udvejanakarair daṇḍair cihanayitvā iti 
rāṣṭrāc ca niṣkāsyaḥ 
sphik śroṇyekadeśaḥ 
savyo dakṣiṇaś ca 
taṃ cāvakartayet cihnena 
vikalpavidhānāt tāvanmātaracchedo na sarvasya sphijaḥ 
abhiprepsur iti ca necchāmātreṇa 
kiṃ tarhi prāptavata eva 
icchāyā śakyāpahnavatvād daṇḍasya ca mahattvāt 
avaniṣṭhīvato darpād dvāv oṣṭau chedayen nṛpaḥ 
avamūtrayato meḍhram avaśardhayato gudam 
mūtreṇāvasiñcato 'bhimukhaṃ vā tadavamānārthaṃ kṣipato 'saty api saṃsparśe 'vamānayate mūtreṇeti niṣkartavyaḥ 
samānaphalatvād etasyāpi daṇḍo 'yam 
niṣṭīvanaṃ nāsikāsyaśrāvaḥ 
tasya ghrāṇena kṣepe nāsāpuṭacchedaḥ yenāṅgena ity uktatvāt 
śardhanaṃ kutsito gudaśabdaḥ 
darpān na pramādāt 
keśeṣu gṛhṇato hastau chedeyed avicārayan 
pādayor dāḍhikāyāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ vṛṣaṇeṣu ca 
darpād ity anuvartate 
paribhavabuddhyā keśeṣu brāhmaṇaṃ gṛhṇataḥ śūdrasya hastau chedayet 
dvivacam ekenāpi dvābhyāṃ tulyapīḍākaraṇe ubhayacchedo naikasyaiva 
dāḍikā śmaśru 
anyad api yad aṅgaṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ grīvāditulyapīḍākaraṃ tatra sarvathāpy ayam eva daṇḍaḥ 
avicārayan 
pīḍā kiyaty asya gṛhītasya saṃjātā mahatī svalpā veti etad anubandhaślokaprāptaṃ vicāraṇaṃ nivāryate 
grahaṇamātre daṇḍaḥ 
tvagbhedakaḥ śataṃ daṇḍyo lohitasya ca darśakaḥ 
māṃsabhettā tu ṣaṇṇiṣkān pravāsyas tv asthibhedakaḥ 
dvijātīnām ayaṃ parasparāparādhe śūdrasya tu śūdrāparādhe ucyate 
yaḥ kevalām eva tvacaṃ bhindyād vidārayen na lohitaṃ darśayet tasya śataṃ daṇḍaḥ 
tāvad eva lohitadarśane 
yady api tvagbedam antareṇa na lohitaṃ dṛśyate tathāpy adhikāparādhād adhikadaṇḍe prāpte śatavacanaṃ niyamārtham 
anye tu karṇanāsikāder api sravati śoṇitaṃ bahistvagbhede 'pi tadartham ucyata ity āhus 
tad ayuktam 
antarbhede hi mahattvān mahādaṇḍo yuktaḥ 
tasmād yatreṣatsravati śoṇitaṃ tatra śataṃ 
śirobhede tu māṃsavat 
niṣkaśabdaḥ suvarṇaparimāṇavācīty uktam 
pravāsyo 'sthnāṃ bhedakas tatprayojaka iti 
ghañantena samāsaṃ kṛtvā taṃ karotīti paṭhitavyaḥ asthibhedakṛd iti 
pravāsanam arthaśāstrapravṛttyā māraṇam nirvāsanaṃ vā 
daṇḍavidhau hy arthaśāstraśravaṇaṃ dṛśyate 
tathā hi daśabandham iti bārhaspatya auśanasye ca prayogaḥ 
nirvāsanaṃ brāhmaṇasya nānyeṣām 
vanaspatīnāṃ sarveṣām upabhogo yathā yathā 
tathā tathā damaḥ kāryo hiṃsāyām iti dhāraṇā 
vanaspatigrahaṇaṃ sarvasthāvarapradarśanārtham 
phalapuṣpapatracchāyādinā mahopabhogyasya vṛkṣasya hiṃsāyāṃ vināśe daṇḍa uttamasāhasaḥ madhyamasya madhyamaḥ nikṛṣṭasya prathamaḥ 
tathā sthānaviśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ patracchedaḥ phalacchedaḥ śākhādheda iti 
phalānām api viśeṣo mahārghatā duṣprāpatā 
tathā sthānaviśeṣo 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ sīmni catuṣpathe tapovana iti 
manuṣyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ ca duḥkhāya prahṛte sati 
yathā yathā mahad duḥkhaṃ daṇḍaṃ kuryāt tathā tathā 
yad uktaṃ tvagbhedakaḥ iti tasya viśeṣo 'yam 
asati manuṣyagrahaṇe prāṇimātrahiṃsāviṣayatve 'sya ślokasya mahāpaśūnāṃ kṣudrāṇāṃ ca paśupakṣimṛgāṇāṃ tulyadaṇḍatā mā bhūd iti tadartham idam 
yathā yāthā mahad duḥkham iti 
svalpe bhedane śoṇite ca prāṇināṃ mahattvād alpatve prahārasya śatād ūno 'pi daṇḍam arhati mahati śatād abhyadhiko 'pi 
anye tu mahagrahaṇān mahati duḥkhe daṇḍavṛddhyartham nālpe 'pacayārtham yathāśrutam eva 
tatra duḥkhāya prahṛte duḥkhotpattyarthaṃ prahāre 
pramādatas tu na vṛddhiḥ 
anubandhaṃ parijñāya it asyaiva ślokadvayam udāharaṇabhaṅgyā vyākhyeyam 
aṅgāvapīḍanāyāṃ ca prāṇaśoṇitayos tathā 
samutthānavyayaṃ dāpyaḥ sarvadaṇḍam athāpi vā 
aṅgānām avapīḍanā dṛḍharajjvādigrahaṇasaṃdhiviśleṣaṇādinā 
tatra yāvatā dhanena pathyabhiṣagauṣadhādimūlyena pratyāpattim āyāti tāvat pīḍitasya dāpyaḥ 
evaṃ prāṇaśoṇitayor avapīḍanāyām iti samastam api yojyam 
atha vā prāṇaśoṇitayoḥ samutthānavyayaṃ dāpya iti saṃbandhaḥ sāmarthyād apacitayor iti labhyate 
samutthānaṃ prakṛtyāpattiḥ 
prāṇo balam 
prahāreṇāsvasthasya bhojanād ṛte kārśādyupapattau balam apacīyate 
tatrāṅge 'naṣṭe pratyāgate ca yāvad balalābhas tāvat tadupayogi yatkiṃcid ghṛtatailādi dāpanīyaḥ 
evaṃ śoṇitādyutpattau taddurbalībhūtasya vyādhyantaraṃ vā prāptasyāprakṛtaśarīrāvasthāprāpteḥ samutthānavyayaṃ dāpyaḥ 
na cet tad gṛhṇāti tadā tac ca daṇḍaṃ ca paripiṇḍya sarvaṃ rājñe dadyāt 
dravyāṇi hiṃsyād yo yasya jñanato 'jñānato 'pi vā 
sa tasyotpādayet tuṣṭiṃ rājñe dadyāc ca tatsamam 
dravyāṇi gṛhopakaraṇāni śūrpolūkhalaghaṭasthālīpiṭharādīni anyāni vānuktadaṇḍaviśeṣāṇi teṣāṃ hiṃsā prāgrūpanāśaḥ saty api kāryakṣamatve 
jñānato 'jñānata iti pramādakṛte buddhipūrvaṃ cāviśeṣeṇa hiṃsanāt tasya dravyasvāmino janayet paritoṣaṃ tadrūpānyadānena mūlyena praṇayena vā 
rājñe tu dravyamūlyaṃ dravyaṃ vā dadyāt 
asya kvacid apavādaḥ 
carmacārmikabhāṇḍeṣu kāṣṭhaloṣṭhamayeṣu ca 
mūlyāt pañcaguṇo daṇḍaḥ puṣpamūlaphaleṣu ca 
carmacārmikayor dvandvaṃ kṛtvā bhāṇḍapadena viśeṣyeṇa samāsaḥ 
atha vā dhārmikabhāṇḍayor viśeṣaṇasamāsaṃ kṛtvā carmaśabdena dvandvaḥ 
carmavikārāc cārmikāṇi bhāṇḍāni kaṭisūtravaratrādīni 
carmāṇy avikṛtāni gavādīnāṃ 
atha vā carmabhāṇḍāni kevacarmamayāni carmāvanaddhāni cārmikāṇi 
kāṣṭhamayabhāṇḍāny ulūkhalamusalaphalakādīni 
loṣṭho mṛdvikāraḥ pāṣāṇākṛtiḥ piṇḍībhūtā mṛt 
tanmayāni svalpapākādhānādīni 
tannāśane mūlyāt pañcaguṇo daṇḍaḥ 
tuṣṭyutpattiś ca svāminaḥ sthitaiva 
yānasya caiva yātuś ca yānasvāmina eva ca 
daśātivartanāny āhuḥ śeṣe daṇḍo vidhīyate 
satyām api hiṃsāyāṃ kvacid doṣo nāstīty etad anena prakaraṇena pradarśyate 
yānaṃ gantryādi yādāruhya yānti panthānam 
tac ca gantryādi balīvardagardabhamahiṣādivāhyam 
ta eva vā gardabhādayaḥ pṛṣṭārohyā yānāni 
yātā tadārūḍhaḥ sārathyādiḥ 
yānasvāmī yasya tatsvayānam 
tatraiṣāṃ cakravegādibhī rathākarṣaṇayuktair vāśvādibhiḥ kasyacid dravyasya nāśo vā maraṇam 
tatra paśusvāmipālavyatikramanyāye prāpte kadācid yātur doṣaḥ kadācit svāminaḥ kadācid ubhayoḥ kadācin na kasyacid apīti yo viśeṣas tatra nokta ihaiveṣyate sa ucyate 
ativartanāni atikramya hiṃsādaṇḍaṃ vartate nātra daṇḍo 'sti daṇḍanimittāni na bhavantīti yāvat 
śeṣe daṇḍa uktebhyo nimittebhyaḥ 
anyatra tāny api vakṣyante 
yatra nāsti doṣas tāni tāvad āha 
chinnanāsye bhagnayuge tiryakpratimukhāgate 
akṣabhaṅge ca yānasya cakrabhaṅge tathaiva ca 
chedane caiva yantrāṇāṃ yoktraraśmyos tathaiva ca 
ākrande cāpy apaihīti na daṇḍaṃ manur abravīt 
nāsāyāṃ bhavaṃ nāsyam 
śarīrāvayavād yat 
nāsikāpuṭasaṃyoginī balīvardānāṃ rajjur aśvānāṃ khalīnaṃ hastinām aṅkuśaḥ 
tasmin chinne truṭite 
yuge ca bhagne 
rathāṅgakāṣṭhaṃ yugam 
chinnaṃ nāsyam asyeti bahuvṛīhiṇā ratha ucyate paśur vā ubhayor api sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa saṃbandhāt 
tiryakpratimukhāgate yāne tirścīnaṃ vā pratīcīnaṃ vā kathaṃcid bhūvaiṣamyāt paśutrāsād vā yānaṃ gacchat kathaṃcid aparādhyen na duṣyet 
prājako hi saṃmukhīṇāñ chakto rakṣituṃ tiryak pratyagavasthitau tv adṛśyamānasya kathaṃ śakto rakṣitum 
pratimukhāgataṃ pratyagāvṛttiḥ 
anye tu tiryagāgate hiṃsyamāne ṛjugāminy eva yāne na doṣam āhuḥ 
pratimukhaṃ cābhimukhaṃ manyante 
abhimukhāgataḥ kim iti cakriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā panthānaṃ na dadāti 
akṣacakre rathāṅge prasiddhe 
yantrāṇi carmabandhanāni śakaṭakāṣṭhānām 
yoktraṃ paśugrīvākāṣṭham raśmiḥ pragraho hastavadhriḥ yugyānāṃ saṃcaraṇaniyamanārthaḥ 
ākranda uccaiḥ śabdo 'pehīty apasarety arthaḥ 
itikaraṇo bhāṣāprasiddhatadarthaśabdoccāraṇārthaḥ na tv ayam eva śabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ 
avidheyeṣu yugyeṣv apasarāpasareti krośataḥ prājakasya patho nātikrāman yadi hiṃsyān na doṣaḥ   
yatrāpavartate yugyaṃ vaiguṇyāt prājakasya tu 
tatra svāmi bhaved daṇḍyo hiṃsāyāṃ dviśataṃ damam 
prājakaś ced bhaved āptaḥ prājako daṇḍam arhati 
yugyasthāḥ prājake 'nāpte sarve daṇḍyāḥ śataṃ śatam 
prājako yānasārathis tasya vaiguṇyam aśikṣitatvam na tu pramādaḥ 
pramāde hi śikṣitasya svāmino na doṣaḥ 
tasmād dhetor yadi yugyaṃ yānaṃ sahaśāpavartate spaṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ hitvā tiryak paścād vā gacched gataṃ ca kiṃcin nāśayet tatra svāmī daṇḍyaḥ 
aśikṣitaḥ prājakaḥ kim ity āropitaḥ 
manuṣyamāraṇe kṣipram ityādivakṣyamāṇena prāṇibhedena dravyabhedena ca daṇḍāntaravidhānād dviśatam ity avivakṣitam 
daṇḍanimittam etad ity etāvataiva vākyasyārthatvād uttaratra na kaścid anyo 'rthaḥ śrūyate yena vākyaṃ tatra saṃkhyāvidhayakam ity ucyate   
sa cet tu pathi saṃruddhaḥ paśubhir vā rathena vā 
pramāpayet prāṇabhṛtas tatra daṇḍo 'vicāritaḥ 
ukto hiṃsāyāṃ damaḥ 
tatra viśeṣaṃ vaktum idam āha 
sa prājakaḥ pathi saṃruddho 'grajaghanāvasarpiṇā saṃruddho niruddhagatiḥ paścātsthitena asuśikṣitatvāt pramādād vā vegena dhuryāś coditāḥ punaḥ sthirayataś cen nikaṭo rathas tena ca tasya veganirodhe kṛte yadi purorathasthāvegapātāt paśubhī rathayuktair aśvādibhiḥ rathena rathāvayavair vā prāṇino manuṣyādīn mārayet tato daṇḍasya vicāro nāsti 
sthita eva daṇḍaḥ 
atha vā javotpatitā aśvāḥ pathi saṃrodhakasaṃmukhīnarathadarśanena balād vidhāryamāṇās tiryaggatyā gaccheyuḥ pārśvakīyān pratyagavasthitatvāt tathā hanyus tatra daṇḍo vicārito nāsti prājake doṣābhāvāt 
atha vā pathi sthito vartamānaḥ saṃruddho na vidhriyamāṇaḥ vicārito viśeṣeṇa vihito viśeṣita iti yāvat 
manuṣyamāraṇe kṣipraṃ cauravat kilbiṣaṃ bhavet 
prāṇabhṛtsu mahatsv ardhaṃ gogajoṣṭrahayādiṣu 
tādṛśe prājake rathapaśubhir mānuṣyaś cen māryate tadā cauravat tasya kilbiṣaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
yady api caurasya vadhasarvasvaharaṇādayo daṇḍās tathāpīha dhanadaṇḍa eva gṛhyate na vadhaḥ mahatsv ardham iti tatraivārdhasaṃbhavāt 
sa cottamasāhasaḥ kaiścid abhyupagataḥ yataś ca kṣate kṣudrakapaśūnāṃ tṛtīyasthānaprāptānāṃ dviśato damo 'taḥ prathamasthānāṃ mukhyānām uttamo yukta iti 
prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇavanto manuṣyatiryakpakṣyādayaḥ 
mahatsu mahattvaṃ gavāṃ prabhāvato hastyādīnāṃ pramāṇataḥ 
ādigrahaṇād gardabhāśvataravyāghrādayaś ca kathaṃcit parigṛhyante 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ sahasram ity evam avakṣyat 
yady anye cauravad daṇḍā nābhipretā abhaviṣyan 
tasmād ardhagrahaṇād vadho mā bhūd dhanadaṇḍās tu sarvasvaharaṇādayaḥ sarve cauroktāḥ puruṣāpekṣayātidiśyante 
nanu ca manuṣyamāraṇe 'nyasya cauradaṇḍasyātideśo 'yuktaḥ 
sa pratipadaṃ manuṣyahanane vihitaḥ 
sa ca puruṣāṇām kulīnānām iti vadha eva 
tatra kim iti vākyāntaragatārdhaśabdānurodhinaivaṃ vyākhyāyate 
varam ardhasyaiva guṇataḥ kadācid vṛttir āśrīyatām 
satyam yady ardhaśabdo māraṇena saṃbadhyamāno 'nyathopapadyeta 
na ca cauravad ity asyānuṣaṅgāgatasyārthāntaravṛttiḥ pūrvāparavākyayoḥ śakyā 
kṣudrakāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ tu hiṃsāyāṃ dviśato damaḥ 
pañcāśat tu bhaved daṇḍaḥ śubheṣu mṛgapakṣiṣu 
apacitaparimāṇāḥ kṣudrakāḥ 
te ca kecid vayastaḥ vatsakiśorakakalabhādayaḥ 
kecij jātisvabhāvato 'jaiḍakādayaḥ 
tatrājāvikānāṃ pañca māṣān vakṣyati 
pariśeṣāṇāṃ gavādīnām evāyaṃ daṇḍo 'lpaparimāṇānām 
śubhā mṛgāḥ pṛṣṭādayaḥ ākārato lakṣaṇataś ca 
pakṣiṇo haṃsaśukasārikādayaḥ 
aśubhāḥ kakolūkaśṛgālādayaḥ 
paśuśabdaś catuṣpāj jātivacanaḥ 
hiṃsāmātreṇa daṇḍam imam icchanti 
na prakṛtayānavidhihetuṃ bruvate 
tatra daṇḍo vicāritaḥ ity anenaiva yānaprakaraṇaṃ vyavacchinnam 
vicāritaḥ samāptavicāra ity arthaḥ 
idānīm etatprakaraṇanirapekṣam ucyata iti 
evaṃ tu prāṇabhṛtsu mahatsv ardham iti hastādicchedo na māraṇam ity ardhaśabdo neyaḥ smṛtyantarāt 
gardabhājāvikānāṃ tu daṇḍaḥ syāt pāñcamāṣikaḥ 
māṣikas tu bhaved daṇḍaḥ śvasūkaranipātane 
pañca māṣāḥ parimāṇam asyeti pāñcamāṣikaḥ 
māṣasya ca dravyajāter anupapādanān madhyamakalpanāyāś ca nyāyyatvād raupyasya nirdeśo 'yam ity āhuḥ 
hiraṇyaṃ tu yuktam 
evaṃ tatsamam iti na vādhikaṃ bhavati 
anubandhādyapekṣayā tu dravyajātiḥ kalpyeti siddhāntaḥ 
bhāryā putraś ca dāsaś ca preṣyo bhrātā ca sodaraḥ 
prāptāparādhās tāḍyāḥ syū rajjvā veṇudalena vā 
prāptā aparādhaṃ prāptāparādhāḥ 
aparādho vyatikramaḥ nītibhraṃśaḥ 
sa yadā taiḥ kṛto bhavati tadā tāḍayitavyāḥ 
tāḍanam api hiṃsety uktam 
sā ca na hiṃśyād bhūtāni iti pratiṣiddhā aparādhe nimitte bhāryādīnāṃ pratiprasūyate 
saṃbandhiśabdāś caite 
yā yasya bhāryā yaś ca yasya dāsaḥ sa tenānuśāsanīyaḥ 
mārgasthāpanopāyavidhiparaś cāyam na tāḍanavidhir eva 
tena vāgdaṇḍādy api kartavyam 
aparādhānurūpeṇa kadācit tāḍanam 
sodarasthāne kanīyān paṭhitavyaḥ bhrātā tathānujaḥ 
sa hi jyeṣṭhasya putravat tāḍanārhaḥ 
vaimātreyo 'pi ced apitṛko guṇavajjyeṣṭhatantraś ca 
so 'py unmārgagāmī tāḍanādiparyantair upāyair nivāraṇīyaḥ 
veṇudalaṃ vaṃśatvak 
etad apy upalakṣaṇam tathāvidhānāṃ mṛdupīḍāsādhanānāṃ śiphādīnām 
pṛṣṭhatas tu śarīrasya nottamāṅge kathaṃcana 
ato 'nyathā tu praharan prāptaḥ syāc caurakilbiṣam 
uktatāḍanadeśasādhanābhyām anyena prakāreṇa ghnann akṣādiṣu laguḍādibhir vā cauradaṇḍaṃ prāpnoti 
nindaiṣā 
na tv ayam eva daṇḍaḥ 
yo 'nyatra hiṃsāyā daṇḍaḥ so 'tra bhavatīty uktaṃ bhavati 
eṣo 'khilenābhihito daṇḍapāruṣyanirṇayaḥ 
stenasyātaḥ pravakṣyāmi vidhiṃ daṇdavinirṇaye 
eṣa niḥśeṣeṇokto daṇḍapāruṣyanirṇayo nirṇayo daṇḍavyavasthā 
daṇḍaśabdo hi sādhanopalakṣakatayā vivādapade 'nvitārthaḥ 
nāmadheye pūrvapadam 
stenasya caurasya daṇḍabhedān ataḥ paraṃ vakṣyāmīty upasaṃhāropanyāsārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
paramaṃ yatnam ātiṣṭhet stenānāṃ nigrahe nṛpaḥ 
stenānāṃ nigrahād asya yaśo rāṣṭraṃ ca vardhate 
kaścit karuṇāvān krūraṃ hiṃsākarma iti manyamāno na pravartate 
atas tatpravṛttyarthaṃ stenanigrastutyarthavādaḥ prakramyate 
nātra hiṃsādoṣo 'sti pratyuta dṛṣṭopakārahetutvāt stenahiṃsaiva śreyaskarī 
vedatulyatāṃ ca khyāpayitum arthavādā bhūyāṃsaḥ 
tatra hi prāyeṇa sārthavādakā vidhyuddeśā iti 
tatpratītyanusaraṇena vaidiko 'yam artha iti prasiddhiḥ 
bhavanti catra kecit pratipattāro ye stutibhir atitarāṃ pravartante 
paraṃ yatnaṃ prakṛṣṭam atiśayavat tātparyam āśrayet 
caraiś cārayet sākṣāt prakāśaṃ cātiprayatnataḥ 
stenāś caurāḥ 
nigraho niyamanavadhabandhanādiḥ 
evaṃ kṛte yaśaḥ khyātir bhavati 
nirupadravo 'sya rājño deśaḥ stenā nābhibhavanti niṣā divātulyā tatra iti sarvatra sthitaṃ bhavati 
rāṣṭraṃ vardhate 
rāṣṭraṃ janapadas tasmin nivāsinaś ca puruṣāś caurair anupadrūyamāṇā vardhante 
śrībhiḥ pramodamānā bahuparyantadeśāntarasthā api nirupadravaṃ rāṣṭram āśrayante 
tato vardhate 
abhayasya hi yo dātā sa pūjyaḥ satataṃ nṛpaḥ 
sattraṃ hi vardhate tasya sadaivābhayadakṣiṇam 
abhayaṃ caurādibhyo 'dhikṛtebhyaś cāsaddaṇḍanivāraṇena yo dadāti sa sarvadaiva pūjyo bhavati svairakathāsv api rājyāc cyuto vanastho 'pi 
sattraṃ kratuviśeṣo gavāmayanādi 
tad asya vardhate niṣpadyate 
sarvāṅgam utpannam evaṃguṇam ity etad vardhata ity anenāha 
aharahaḥ sattraphalaṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ 
abhayaṃ yatra dakṣiṇā 
anyeṣu sattreṣu dakṣiṇā nāsti 
idaṃ tu sarvebhyo 'pi viśiṣṭaṃ yad dakṣiṇāvat 
sā ca gavāśvādidakṣiṇāvilakṣaṇā ity arthavān satravyatirekaḥ 
sarvato dharmaṣaḍbhāgo rājñ bhavati rakṣataḥ 
adharmād api ṣaḍbhāgo bhavaty asya hy arakṣataḥ 
sarvataḥ prakāśād yajñādeḥ tathā grāmavāsibhiḥ vanavāsibhiś ca kṛtād dharmaṣaḍbhāgaṃ rājā labhate 
evam adharmād api cauraiḥ pracchannakṛtād rājñaḥ ṣaḍbhāgo bhavati 
na kevalaṃ stenair ye mucyante tadarakṣāto rājñām adharmaḥ yāvad ye haranti teṣām api cauryabhāvenādharmodayaḥ tadaṃśenāpi rājānaḥ saṃbadhyante tān anigṛhṇantaḥ 
adṛṣṭadoṣasaṃbandhanivāraṇam api rakṣyāṇāṃ rakṣaiva 
tatrādhikṛtasya rājñas tadakaraṇād yuktaḥ pratyavāyaḥ 
nanu ca bhṛtiparikrītatvād dharmaṣaḍbhāgam ayuktam 
uktaṃ dīnānāthapravrajitādayaḥ santy akarapradāḥ 
paripūrṇasvadharmapālane kānupapattiḥ 
yad adhīte yad yajate yad dadāti yad arcati 
tasya ṣaḍbhāgabhāg rājā samyag bhavati rakṣaṇāt 
yad uktaṃ sarvataḥ iti tasya prapañco 'yam 
adhyayanādayo dharmārthatayānyatra jñāpitāḥ prasiddharūpāś ca 
arcanaṃ devagurūṇāṃ pūjanam 
tasyeti karmaṇo 'dhyayanādeḥ padārthasyeti yojanīyam kriyāyāḥ strīliṅgatvāt 
ṣaḍbhāga iti 
na ca kartuḥ pañcakarmaphalāṃśāt ṣaṣṭho nṛpateḥ samagrakarmaphalabhoktṛtvasyādhikārataḥ kartur avagatatvāt 
api tu samyaggrahaṇāt svakarmānuṣṭhānāt tāvanmātraṃ rājñaḥ phalam utpadyata iti 
nānyakṛtasya śubhasyāśubhasya vā anyatra gamanam 
nākartuḥ phalam astīti sthitam 
rakṣan dharmeṇa bhūtāni rājā vadhyāṃś ca ghātayan 
yajate 'har ahar yajñaiḥ sahasraśatadakṣiṇaiḥ 
bhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāni caurebhyo rakṣan vadhyāṃś ca śāstrato vadhārhās tāṃś ca ghātayan sahasraśatadakṣiṇānāṃ pauṇḍarīkādīnāṃ kratūnāṃ phalam anvahaṃ rājā prāpnotīti stutiḥ 
yo 'rakṣan balim ādatte karaṃ śulkaṃ ca pārthivaḥ 
pratibhāgaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca sa sadyo narakaṃ vrajet 
baliprabhṛtīni rājagrāhyakaranāmāni deśabhede sūpamāṇavakavat prasiddhāni 
tatra balir dhānyādeḥ ṣaṣṭho bhāgaḥ 
karo dravyādānam 
śulkaṃ vaṇikprāpyabhāgaḥ 
pratibhāgaṃ phalabharaṇikādyupāyanam 
rājaitad gṛhṇāti caurebhyaś ca na rakṣati sa sadya āyuḥkṣayān narakaṃ gacchet 
gṛhītvā rājabhāgaṃ rakṣā kartavyā narakāyuḥkṣayabhayād iti ślokatātparyam 
arakṣitāram attāraṃ baliṣaḍbhāgahāriṇam 
tam āhuḥ sarvalokasya samagramalahārakam 
pūrvasya śeṣo 'yaṃ nindārthavādaḥ 
na rakṣati attā upajīvitā prajānāṃ rājabhāgagrahaṇena 
etad eva spaṣṭayati baliṣaḍbhāgahāriṇam 
taṃ tādṛśaṃ rājānam āhuḥ śiṣṭāḥ sarvalokasya sarvasyāḥ prajāyāḥ samagraṃ malaṃ pāpaṃ tasya hārakaṃ svīkartāram 
sarveṇa prajāpāpena dūṣyata ity arthaḥ 
anapekṣitamaryādaṃ nāstikaṃ vipralumpakam 
arakṣitāram attāraṃ nṛpaṃ vidyād adhogatim 
maryādā śāstraśiṣṭasamācāranirūḍhā dharmavyavasthā sā anavekṣitā atikrāntā yena 
nāsti paraloko nāsti dattaṃ nāsti hutam iti nāstikaḥ 
prathamo rāgādinā tyaktadharmaḥ dvitīyo nāsti vastv iti viparītābhiniveśaḥ 
vilumpati harati dhanāny asaddaṇḍaiḥ prajānām 
tattulyo 'rakṣitā 
tam adhogatiṃ vidyān narakapatitam adhogataṃ vidyān narakapatitam evācirāt 
pāṭhāntaram asatyaṃ ca nṛpaṃ tyajet 
anyad uktvānyat karoti yas taṃ tyajet tadviṣaye nāsīta 
adhārmikaṃ tribhir nyāyair nigṛhṇīyāt prayatnataḥ 
nirodhanena bandhena vividhena vadhena ca 
arthavādair dṛḍhīkṛtya nigrahavidhim idānīṃ prastauti 
adhārmikaḥ prakaraṇāc cauraḥ 
taṃ tribhir niyamanaprakārair nigṛhṇīyān niyacchet 
nyāyo niyāmakaḥ 
nirodhanaṃ rājadurge bandhanāgāre dharaṇam 
bandhas tatraiva rajjunigaḍādibhir asvātantryotpādanam 
vividho vadhas tāḍanād ārabhya śarīranāśanāt prāṇatyāgaparyantaḥ 
nirdeśād eva tritve labdhe tribhir iti vacanam anyeṣām api niyamanaprakārāṇāṃ parigrahaṇārtham 
tena taptatailasekādayo 'pi parigṛhītā bhavanti 
nigraheṇa hi pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ saṃgraheṇa ca 
dvijātaya ivejyābhiḥ pūyante satataṃ nṛpāḥ 
pāpayuktāḥ puruṣāḥ pāpāḥ 
teṣāṃ nigrahaḥ pūrvoktaḥ 
yathāśāstravartinaḥ sādhavaḥ 
teṣāṃ saṃgraho 'nugraho yathāśaktyupakāraḥ 
tena pūyante vipāpmāno bhavanti prāyaścittenevety arthavādaḥ 
atha vā pāpānutpattir eva pūtatvam 
brāhmaṇā iva satatam ijyābhiḥ nityair mahāyajñādibhiḥ 
kṣantavyaṃ prabhunā nityaṃ kṣipatāṃ kāryiṇāṃ nṛṇām 
bālavṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca kurvatā hitam ātmanaḥ 
kāryiṇo 'rthipratyarthijñātisuhṛdaḥ 
kasmiṃścid vadhyamāne yadi tatpitā tanmātā vā rājānaṃ kṣipet kutsayet abhśaped vā tadā kṣamā kāryā 
bālādīnāṃ kāryiṇām api 
evam ātmane hitaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati 
kṣantavyam ity etadvidheḥ phalam evātmahitam 
yaḥ kṣipto marṣayaty ārtais tena svarge mahīyate 
yas tv aiśvaryān na kṣamate narakaṃ tena gacchati 
ārtair daṇḍyamanatatsaṃbandhibhir adhikṣipta ākruṣṭo yan marṣayati na krudhyati tena kṣamaṇena svarge mahīyate 
kaṇḍvāditvād yaḥ 
mahattvaṃ prāpnoti svarge 
akopena tarhi kṣamā kartavyā 
akāmino yathākāmī ata āha 
yat tu prabhur aham ity abhimānena na sahate tena narakaṃ prāpnoti 
ārtagrahaṇaṃ bālavṛddhayor api pradarśanārthaṃ pūrvaśeṣatvād asya 
rājā stenena gantavyo muktakeśena dhīmatā 
ācakṣāṇena tat steyam evaṃkarmāsmi śādhi mām 
aviśeṣopādāne suvarṇahārī steno draṣṭavyaḥ tasyaiva śāstrāntare gamanavidhānāt 
na cedam āgamanaparaṃ vidhiśāstram daṇḍavidhitvāt 
uktaṃ hi stenasyātaḥ pravakṣyāmi vidhiṃ daṇḍavinirṇaye iti 
ato 'nuvādao gamanasyātra 
rājasakāśaṃ suvarṇacaureṇa gantavyam 
muktakeśena dhīmatā dairyavatā 
dhāvatā iti pāṭhāntaram 
ācakṣāṇena kathayatā pathi tatpātakam evaṃkarmāsmi brāhmaṇasya mayeyat suvarṇaṃ hṛtam iti kuru nigrahaṃ me 
skandhenādāya musalaṃ laguḍaṃ vāpi khādiram 
śaktiṃ cobhayatas tīkṣṇām āyasaṃ daṇḍam eva vā 
varṇānām anukrameṇa musalādīnām upadeśaṃ manyante 
tad ayuktam 
vāśabdo na samarthitaḥ syāt 
na ca brāhmaṇasyedaṃ prāyaścittam icchanti 
tatprāyaścitteṣu nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ 
khadirajātir laguḍa eva na muśalenānuṣaktavyaḥ 
śāsanād vā vimokṣād vā stenaḥ steyād vimucyate 
aśāsitvā tu taṃ rājā stenasyāpnoti kilbiṣam 
śāsanān muśalādibhiḥ praharaṇāt kṣatriyādiḥ pāpān mucyate 
vimokṣād utsargāt 
gaccha kṣāntam iti brāhmaṇas tapasaiva iti vadhatapasī vihite 
tatra vadhas tāvad brāhmaṇasya nāsti 
tapas tu prāyaścittaṃ 
na ca tapasi icchāto rājābhigamanam asti 
tasmāt kṣatriyādīnām eṣa vimokṣaḥ 
sa ca dhanadaṇḍaṃ gṛhītvā 
yata āha aśāsitvetyādi 
na ca vimokṣaṇasuddhau satyāṃ rājñas tadaśāsanād doṣopapattiḥ 
na ca śāsanam api vihitaṃ mokṣo 'pi vihita tatra yasmin pakṣe śāsanaṃ tadapekṣaṃ doṣavacanam 
pākṣikaṃ hi tathā kalpanam 
na ca nityavac chrutasya pākṣikatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayitum 
tathā ca sāmānyena vasiṣṭhādaya āhuḥ 
eno ṛcchati rājānam utsṛjantaṃ sakilbiṣan 
taṃ ced ghātayed rājā ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣyati 
nāyaṃ vikalpo yuktaḥ 
kvacid iyaṃ hiṃsā pratiṣiddhā na hiṃsyād bhūtāni iti rāgādinā puruṣārthatayā prāptā 
kvacid vihitā kratvarthatvena yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyam iti 
idaṃ tu śāsanavimokṣaṇavacanaṃ na hi nāma pratiṣiddhaṃ sati vidhau 
kathaṃ na pratiṣedho na hiṃsyād bhūtāni iti sāmānyataḥ pratiṣedho vidhiviśeṣam antareṇa na śakyo bādhitum 
athocyate 
naivāyaṃ pratiṣedhasya viṣayaḥ karmārthatvāt 
kathaṃ punar antareṇa vidhiṃ karmārthatā śakyāvagantum 
lokata iti cet laukikī tarhi pravṛttiḥ 
kathaṃ tarhi pratiṣedhas tatrāvataret 
nanu ca pradhāne pravṛttir nirūpyatām 
yadi tāvad vaidikī pravṛttis tatas tadaṅge hiṃsāyām api tata eva 
ekā hi pravṛttir aṅgapradhānayoḥ 
atha lipsāto 'ṅge 'pi tatra pravṛttiḥ sutarāṃ tarhi hiṃseyaṃ laukikī 
jīvikārthino hi prajāpālanādhikāraniyamo na vedhaḥ 
teneyam aṅgasthāpi hiṃsā śyenena tulyatvāt pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ 
na ca laukikam asyā niyatam aṅgatvam 
no hiṃsām antareṇa prajāpālanam aśakyam nirodhādināpi śakyatvāt 
naiṣa niyamaḥ 
ekarūpāṅgapradhānayoḥ pravṛttir iti syān nāgnīṣomīyayor anena na viśeṣaḥ syāt 
ato lipsālakṣaṇe 'pi pradhāne 'ṅge vidhilakṣaṇam abhyupetavyam 
na caiṣāṃ hiṃsā vidhilakṣaṇā śakyābhyupagantuṃ svarūpasya kāryasya ca laukikatvāt pālanasya hiṃsāyāś ca 
atha vidhilakṣaṇā ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavad vikalpitum arhati śāsanavacanena pratiṣiddhā 
anye tu manyante 
dve ete vākye 
śāsanād iti stenasya buddhir ucyate 
pareṇārdhena rājñas tadaśāsane doṣaḥ 
tatra yadi rājāśāsanadoṣam ātmany aṅgīkṛtya muñcen mucyetaivainasaḥ 
evaṃ brāhmaṇasyāpi svayam āgatasya vadhaḥ śuddhihetuḥ lakṣyaṃ śāstrabhṛtām iti vacanāt 
na śārīro brāhmaṇadaṇḍaḥ iti rājā yadi pratiṣedhātikrameṇa hanyād brāhmaṇaḥ śudhyed eva 
aśāsitvā muśalādibhir ahatvā 
stenasya yat pāpaṃ tena yujyate 
annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi patyau bhāryāpacāriṇī 
gurau śiṣyaś ca yājyaś ca steno rājani kilbiṣam 
annam attīty annādaḥ 
bhrūṇahā brahmahā tadīyam annaṃ yo bhuṅkte tasmiṃs tad brahmahatyāpāpaṃ mārṣṭi nirasyati śleṣayati 
yathā malinaṃ vastram udake mṛjyate tanmalaṃ tatra saṃkrāmaty evam 
arthavādaś cāyam 
tasya tatpāpam utpadyate 
na punar brahmaghno naśyati 
patyau bhartari bhāryāpacāriṇī jāriṇī sa cet kṣamate 
atrāpi bhartur utpādyate pāpam na tatra tasyā apaiti 
gurau śiṣyaś ca yājyaś ca śiṣyaḥ sūryābhyuditādibhir aparādhya tu gurau kṣamamāṇe tatpāpaṃ prakṣipati 
evaṃ yājyo yājake 
so 'pi gurur evety ato yājakagrahaṇaṃ na kṛtam 
evaṃ cauro rājani na ced rājñā nigṛhyate 
yājyo 'pi karmaṇi pravṛtte vidhim upakrāmati ced yājakavacane nāvatiṣṭhate tadā tyājyaḥ na punas tasya tāḍanādi śiṣyavat kartavyam 
annādādiṣu sarveṣv anyatra vidhir astīti na buddhiḥ 
ato 'rthavādo 'yam 
rājabhiḥ dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ 
nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā 
yad uktaṃ pāpakāriṇo nigrahaṇe karmakṛto rakṣanta iti tat sphuṭayati 
dhṛto vinipātito daṇḍo yeṣāṃ rājabhis te kṛtvā pāpāni kṛtapāpā rājanigraheṇa nirmalā nirastapāpā bhavanti 
apagate ca pāpe yad eṣāṃ svargārohakaṃ karma tena svargaṃ prāpnuvanti 
mahad dhi pāpaṃ śuddhasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya pratibandhakam 
sukṛtino nityaṃ sukṛtakarmakāriṇaḥ 
yathā santo dhārmikās tadvad 
asatām adharmo naivotpadyate eṣām utpanno nigrahaṇena vināśita iti prākpradhvaṃsābhāvayor viśeṣaḥ 
mānavagrahaṇān na prakaraṇāc caurāṇām eva 
daṇḍaśabdas tu śārīranigrahaviṣayo na hi prakaraṇam atikrāmati 
dhanadaṇḍo hi rājārthaḥ 
vṛttir hi sā rājñaḥ 
śārīre tu daṇḍe daṇḍyamānārthatā na śakyate nihnotum tvaksaṃskāro hi sā 
atheyaṃ buddhiḥ pālanam eva hiṃsām antareṇa na niṣpādyate tac ca rājārtham iti kuto māryamāṇārthatā māraṇasya 
atha kim pālanaṃ na pālyamānārthaṃ dṛṣṭam evāpahnūyate 
na hi tadrāṣṭram upādeyaṃ rājñaiva svarakṣārthaṃ karaśulkādibhṛtyā upādīyante 
ataḥ sutarāṃ rakṣopayogitve hiṃsāyāṃ na hiṃsyamānārthatāsiddhiḥ 
kathaṃ vā hiṃsayā vinā na rakṣānirvṛttir yadi tāvad evamarthaṃ nigṛhyante punar akāryam āvartayiṣyate tannirodhanādināpi śakyate niyantum 
atha tān nigṛhītān dṛṣṭvā bhayād anye na pravartayiṣyanta iti dhanadaṇḍenāpi śakyate duḥkhayitum 
hanyamāneṣv api sahasraśaḥ pravartante 
tasmād iyaṃ hiṃsā rakṣā satī hiṃsyamānasaṃskāra iti mantavyam 
ataś ca karaṇādichedane niyamaḥ 
hastyādividhiś ca daṇḍyeṣvevādṛṣṭam ādhāsyati na rājārtho bhaviṣyati 
tasmāc charīradaṇḍe pāpān muktir na dhanadaṇḍa iti sthitam 
tathā ca mahāpātakināṃ hṛtasarvasvānām apsu praveśitadaṇḍānāṃ saṃvyavahāraparihārārtham aṅkanaṃ vakṣyati 
yadi ca dhanadaṇḍena śudhyeyuḥ punar aṅkanam anarthakaṃ syāt 
atra ca svayam āgatasya nānītasya viśeṣo yaḥ stena eva viśeṣo bhavatu 
idaṃ tu sarvaṃ śārīradaṇḍaviṣayam 
yas tu rajjuṃ ghaṭaṃ kūpād dhared bhindyāc ca yaḥ prapām 
sa daṇḍaṃ prāpnuyān māṣaṃ tac ca tasmin samāharet 
prapibanty asyām iti prapā jalādhārasthānam uddhṛtajalanidhānaṃ vā 
māṣasya jātir na nirdiṣṭā 
sā marujāṅgalānūpabhedā draṣṭavyā 
tac ca rajjvādi samāhared dadyāt tasmin sthāne na rājani 
dhānyaṃ daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyo harato 'bhyadhikaṃ vadhaḥ 
śeṣe 'py ekādaśaguṇaṃ dāpyas tasya ca taddhanam 
kumbhaśabdaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣe vartate na ghaṭamātre 
kvacid viṃśatiprasthān kvacid dvāviṃśatir iti deśabhedād vyavasthā 
daśabhyo 'dhikaṃ harato vadhavidhir uktārtho 'nubandhādinā niyamyate 
śeṣeṣu daśasu prākṛta ekādaśaguṇo daṇḍaḥ 
tat tasya ca tad dhanam iti sarvatra steye yojyam 
dhānyaṃ vrīhiyavādisaptadaśānīti smaryate 
tathā dharimameyānāṃ śatād abhyadhike vadhaḥ 
suvarṇarajatādīnām uttamānām ca vāsasām 
dharaṇaṃ dharimā tulā tena mīyante parichidyante tāni dharmameyāni 
ghṛtādīnāṃ dravāṇāṃ prasthādimeyatāstīti kaṭhinānāṃ parimeyatā bhavatīti tad artham āha suvarṇarajatādīnām 
ādigrahaṇād eva rajate labdhe punar upādānāt tulyagrahaṇārthāt pravālādīni gṛhyante na tu tāmralohādīni 
teṣāṃ śatād ūrdhvaṃ haraṇe vadhaḥ 
kiṃ punar etac chataṃ palānām uta karṣāṇām eva kārṣāpaṇānāṃ vā 
kecid āhuḥ palānām iti 
na tv atra viśeṣe hetur asti 
tasmād yasmin deśe dharmamānakāle yayā saṃkhyayā vyavahāraḥ śatam idaṃ suvarṇasya kvacit tolake kvacit paleṣu yathādeśaṃ vyavasthā 
uttamānāṃ ca vāsasāṃ kauśeyapaṭṭādīnām iti 
śatād abhyadhike vadhaḥ ity anuṣaṅgaḥ 
atrāpi śāṭakayugam ekam iti saṃkhyāyate 
puṣpapaṭādyupabarhaṇaṃ tv ekam eveti 
nanu ca suvarṇarajatādīnām ity eva siddhe parimeyagrahaṇam anarthakam 
nānarthaka karpūrāgurukastūrikādīnāṃ mahārghāṇāṃ grahaṇārtham 
ādigrahaṇād dhi taijasāni gṛhyante niṣkādiparimāṇavyapadeśyāni vā 
na hi karpūrādīnāṃ karṣādivyapadeśo 'sti 
yady api suvarṇavad rajate 'pi śatasaṃkhyā tathāpi prāyaścittabhedavad daṇḍabhedo 'pi yukto viṣamasamīkaraṇasyānyāyyatvāt 
ato yāvat suvarṇagatasya mūlyaṃ tāvati rūpye gṛhīte vadhaḥ 
karpūrādīnāṃ tu palānām eva śatasaṃkhyā 
pañcāśatas tv abhyadhike hastacchedanam iṣyate 
śeṣe tv ekādaśaguṇaṃ mūlyād daṇḍaṃ prakalpayet 
subodho 'yam 
mūlyād iti nāpahṛtam eva dravyaṃ deya kvacit tajjātīyaṃ naiva prāpyate 
ato rūpakair dhānyādinā vā vinimeyam 
puruṣāṇāṃ kulīnānāṃ nārīṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ 
mukhyānāṃ caiva ratnānāṃ haraṇe vadham arhati 
satkule jātā vidyādiguṇayoginaḥ kulīnāḥ 
nārīṇāṃ ca viśeṣato guṇarūpasaubhāgyasaṃpannānām ity arthaḥ 
caśabdāt kulīnānāṃ ity eva 
parasparāpekṣāṇi nārīṇāṃ viśeṣaṇāni 
mukhyāni uttamāni ratnāni vajravaiḍūryamarakataprabhṛtīni 
atrāpi suvarṇaśatatulyānīty apekṣyam 
anyathottamatvam āpekṣikam iti daṇḍo na vyavatiṣṭheta 
vadham arhati 
anubandhādyapekṣayā sarvatrārhatyartho yojanīyaḥ 
akulīnānām avaśiṣṭānām amukhyānāṃ ca śeṣe tv ekādaśaguṇam ity eva 
mahāpaśūnāṃ haraṇe śastrāṇām auṣadhasya ca 
kālam āsādya kāryaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ rājā prakalpayet 
mahāpaśavo hastyaśvādayaḥ 
teṣām haraṇe kālakāryāpekṣā daṇḍaprakḷptiḥ 
nanu ca sarvatraiva kālādyapekṣoktā 
tathā ca kāladeśavayaḥśaktīś cintayed daṇḍakarmāṇi iti 
satyam 
vijñāte daṇḍasvarūpe nyūnādhikabhāvo 'nubandhādyapekṣaḥ 
yathā vadhavidhau tāḍanamāraṇādikalpanāpekṣyā 
ihātyantavilakṣaṇo daṇḍaḥ 
tathā hi viṃśatipaṇo 'pi khaḍgaḥ śatror udyataśastrasya saṃnidhau yadi hriyate tena kāryātiśayena tena ca kālena māraṇaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
anyadā dviguṇa ekādaśaguṇo vā 
tathauṣadham alabhayatvena mahāprayojanaṃ tadupayogavelāyāṃ hriyate lolyamānam api kvāthādyapekṣaṃ kālātikramaṇena mahadāturasya duḥkhaṃ janayatīti tatra mahān daṇḍaḥ 
anyadā tu svalpa iti 
na yatrāntarām antareṇedṛśaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ labhyate 
anyathā sa evaikaḥ śloko daṇḍavidhau paṭhitavyaḥ syāt 
tasmād vaktavyam idam 
vigrahakāle 'śvādīnāṃ rājyāpekṣo daṇḍaḥ 
śastrāṇāṃ rājopayogināṃ kadācit kṣamā kadācin mahān daṇḍaḥ 
gomahīṣyādīnāṃ tu prajāsaṃbandhināṃ na rājñā kṣantavya 
kāryaṃ ca yad aśvādibhiḥ kartavyaṃ tad apy apekṣyam 
vigraho ' pi yadi parvatādau bhavati yatra nātīvāśvaiḥ prayojanaṃ bhavaty eva daṇḍahrāsaḥ 
kālam āsādya jñātvā nirūpya daṇḍaṃ kalpayet 
sa evātra prabhavati na śāstram 
goṣu brāhmaṇasaṃsthāsu kharikāyāś ca bhedane 
paśūnāṃ haraṇe caiva sadyaḥ kāryo 'rdhapādikaḥ 
brāhmaṇasaṃsthā brāhmaṇāśritā brāhmaṇasvāmikāḥ 
tāsāṃ haraṇe 
ṣaṣṭhyarthe saptamī 
paśūnāṃ cājaiḍakādīnām 
bahuvacanaṃ sarvatrāvivakṣitam 
sadyas tatkṣaṇād avicārya 
pādasyārdham ardhapādam tad asyāstīty ardhapādikaḥ 
tac ca saṃbhavati yadi pādārdhaṃ tena chidyate 
tenārdhapādachedanaṃ kartavyam iti vākyārthaḥ 
kharikā yayā gorathakṣetrādau vāhyate balīvardaḥ 
bhedane vāhyamānāyāḥ pratodena pīḍotpādane 
bhedanaṃ vāhānām upalakṣaṇārthaṃ vyācakṣate pūrve 
avaśyaṃ vāhayan duḥkhayati 
pratodena vāhane evāyaṃ daṇḍa ity anye paṭhanti 
anye tu pādasya paścād bhāgaṃ caturthaṃ kharikām āhuḥ 
khariketi yā prasiddhā palāyanaśīlā yāṃ pālo 'ny vā bhindann ardhapādikaḥ kāryaḥ 
anye tv adhikaraṇasaptamīṃ matvā gosaṃsthadadhyādīny adhyāharanti 
tad ayuktam 
śrutapadasaṃbandhasaṃbhave kṛto 'dhyāhāraḥ 
sūtrakārpāsakiṇvānāṃ gomayasya guḍasya ca 
dadhnaḥ kṣīrasya takrasya pānīyasya tṛṇasya ca 
veṇuvaidalabhāṇḍānāṃ lavaṇānāṃ tathaiva ca 
mṛṇmayānāṃ ca haraṇe mṛdo bhasmana eva ca 
matsyānāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ caiva tailasya ca ghṛtasya ca 
māṃsasya madhunaś caiva yac cānyat paśusaṃbhavam 
anyeṣāṃ caivamādīnām adyānām odanasya ca 
pakvānnānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tanmūlyād dviguṇo damaḥ 
sūtram ūrṇāsaṇādi 
lavaṇāni saindhavabiḍalavaṇādīni 
yac cānyat paśusaṃbhavam āmiṣādi 
anyeṣām apūpamodakādīnām 
ādiśabdaḥ prakāre 
prakāraḥ sādṛśyaṃ tulyatā sadṛśakāryakaraṇopayogādirūpā 
tathā ca sarpirmaṇḍekṣukhaṇḍaśarkarākilāṭakūrcikādyā apūpā gṛhyante 
paśusaṃbhavaṃ rāṅkavājinādy apīcchanti kecit 
ādigrahaṇāt prakṛtir vikṛtir api 
yac cobhayopādānaṃ dadhnaḥ kṣīrasya ceti tad udāharaṇārtham 
evaṃ sūtragrahaṇena sūtramayaṃ vāso 'pi gṛhyate 
nalikādīnāṃ saty api sūtramayatve paśusaṃbhavatva uttamatvād uttamānāṃ cety asyāpavādaviṣayaḥ 
prakṛtyantare tailaśabdaḥ snehavācī na tilavikāra eva 
tenātasīpriyaṅgupañcāṅgulatailādayo 'pi gṛhyante   
puṣpeṣu harite dhānye gulmavallīnageṣu ca 
anyeṣv aparipūteṣu daṇḍaḥ syāt pañcakṛṣṇalaḥ 
navamālikādīni puṣpāṇi 
haritaṃ dhānyaṃ kṣetrastham apakvam 
nagā vṛkṣāḥ 
anyeṣv aparipūteṣu 
bahuvacanāt paripavanasya ca dhānyeṣv eva tuṣapalālādivimokṣarūpayasya saṃbhavād uttaraśloke dhānyagrahaṇam evākṛṣyate 
gulmādīnāṃ hi saty api palāśe vyamiśratve puṣpāṇāṃ ca na paripūtavyavahāraḥ 
spatamī haraṇāpekṣā 
tat tu pūrvasmād anuvartate 
atra pañcakṛṣṇalo daṇḍaḥ 
kṛṣṇalā nānādravyajāḥ 
alpatvamahattvaprayojanāpekṣāḥ 
suvarṇasyeti pūrve 
paripūteṣu dhānyeṣu śākamūlaphaleṣu ca 
niranvaye śataṃ daṇḍaḥ sānvaye 'rdhaśataṃ damaḥ 
mūlam ikṣudrākṣādi 
niranvaye dravyaharaṇe 
anvayo 'nunayaḥ svāminaḥ prītyādiprayogaḥ yat tvadīyaṃ tan madīyam evety anayā buddhyāhaṃ pravṛttaḥ na ced evaṃ tad gṛhāṇa ityevamādivacanaṃ tad yatra na kriyate tan niranvayam 
sāhasaprakāratvād adhiko daṇḍaḥ 
anvayena saha sānvayaḥ 
atha vā niranvayo yena saha kaścid api saṃbandho nāsty ekagrāmavāsādiḥ 
tataḥ śataṃ daṇḍyaḥ 
atha vā anārakṣam niranvayam 
sati tu rakṣake ubhayāparādhād alpo daṇḍaḥ 
khalastheṣu dhānyeṣv ayaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
tatra hi paripūyante 
gṛhastheṣu tv ekādaśaguṇaḥ prāg uktaḥ 
syāt sāhasaṃ tv anvayavat prasabhaṃ karma yat kṛtam 
niranvayaṃ bhavet steyaṃ hṛtvāpavyayate ca yat 
paradravyāpaharaṇaṃ steyam ucyate 
dhātvarthaprasiddhyā cāsyaiva kartā stenaḥ 
iha tu viśeṣeṇāyaṃ vyavahāra iṣyate tadartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
na paradravyādānamātraṃ steyam ṛṇādānanikṣepādiṣv api steyadaṇḍaprasaṅgāt 
saṃjñābhedo daṇḍabhedārthaḥ 
karma yat kṛtaṃ parapīḍākaraṃ vastrotpāṭanāgnidāhadravyāpaharṇādi 
agnidāhe yady api dravyāpaharaṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi cauryam eva rahasi karaṇād apahnavāc ca manyante 
caurye hi dravyaviśeṣāśrayo daṇḍaḥ 
so 'tra na syāt 
evamartham eva steyaprakaraṇotkarṣaṇam 
prasabhaṃ karma iti karmagrahaṇād dravyāpahārād anyad apy evaṃkṛtam ayuktaṃ sāhasam eva 
kas tarhy agnidāhādāv aprasabhaṃ kṛte daṇḍaḥ 
kaṇṭakaśuddhau vakṣyāmaḥ 
ata eva saṃdhichede 'saty api dravyāpaharaṇe kaṇṭakaśuddhau daṇḍam āmananti 
anyathā steya evāvakṣyat 
yas tv etāny upakḷptāni dravyāṇi stenayen naraḥ 
taṃ śataṃ daṇḍayed rājā yaś cāgniṃ corayed gṛhāt 
etāni sūtrādīni upakḷptāni pratyāsannadānopabhogādikāryakālāni atha vā saṃskṛtāni kṛtasāmarthyādhānāni 
yathā tad eva sūtraṃ tantuvāyahaste vāyanārthaṃ dattaṃ kiṃcid dviguṇīkriyate kiṃcit parivartyate evaṃ dadhi manthanamaricaśarkarādisaṃskṛtam kṣīraṃ ghṛtam ityādisaṃskāraḥ 
tatra śataṃ daṇḍaḥ 
ādyam iti pāṭhe prathamasāhasaḥ 
agnigṛhāt parigṛhītaṃ śālāgnihotretyādyartham hemante vā sītārditānāṃ daridrāṇām apraṇītam apy agner upakalpanaṃ pākakāle śītādinivṛttyarthaṃ vā tāpanakāle 
aviśeṣeṇāyam agner daṇḍaḥ svalpasya bahor upakḷptasyānupakḷptasya ca 
saty api sūtrādidaṇḍe ādigrahaṇe nāgnes tanmūlyādi saṃbhavati krayavikrayavyavahārāprasiddheḥ 
yāvatā vendhanenāgnir upahṛtaparimāṇa utpadyate yāvatībhir dakṣiṇābhis tanmūlyād dviguṇo daṇḍaḥ saṃbhavati śakyate ca vyapadeṣṭum tuṣṭyutpattiś ca svāminaḥ sthitaiva 
atas tretāgniharaṇe yāvat punar ādhāne gacchati prāyaścitteṣṭau ca tāvad agnimate dātavyaḥ 
ato 'yam agner daṇḍaḥ śālāpraṇītāgniviṣaya eva svalpatvāt 
tretāyāṃ tu tanmūlyād dviguṇa iti 
tathā ca sulabheṣv adhikāranivṛttim akurvatsu yāgāṅgadravyeṣv apahriyamāṇeṣu kuśakarakāgnihotradravyāny apaharato 'ṅgacchedaḥ syāt iti śaṅkhaḥ 
agniṣu tu hṛteṣv adhikāra eva nivartate 
tatra kathaṃ mahān daṇḍo na syāt 
yena yena yathāṅgena steno nṛṣu viceṣṭate 
tat tad eva haret tasya pratyādeśāya pārthivaḥ 
bhūyobhūyaḥ pravṛttasyāyaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
yo dhanena daṇḍito 'pi na mārge 'vatiṣṭhate tasya tricaturdaṇḍitasyānavatiṣṭhamānasya dravyajātiparimāṇānapekṣaḥ saṃdhicchedādyanapekṣacauryakriyāmātrāśrito 'ṅgacchedaḥ 
yasya yasyāṅgasya balam āśrityāvatiṣṭhate stenaś caurye pravartate tat tad asya harec chindyāt 
yasya kaścit pādavalam āśrityāvaṣṭabhya palāyate na mām anugantuṃ kaścid api śaknoti iti tasya pādacchedaḥ 
anyaḥ saṃdhibhedajño 'ham tasya hastacchedaḥ 
pratyādeśāya pratirūpaphaladarśanāya 
svāvaṣṭambhena sābhimānaṃ sakrodhaṃ sāvajñaṃ nyakkaraṇaṃ vā pratyādeśaḥ 
ya evaṃ karoti tasya tasyāham evaṃ kartā iti vyākhyāpanaṃ pratyādeśaḥ 
pitācāryaḥ suhṛn mātā bhāryā putraḥ purohitaḥ 
nādaṇḍyo nāma rājño 'sti yaḥ svadharme na tiṣṭhati 
bhāryā putraḥ svakā tanuḥ ātmīyaṃ śarīram 
kaḥ punar ātmano daṇḍaḥ 
prāyaścittatapodhanadānādivivakṣitam 
vicalito dharmāt svakāt 
yo yaḥ svadharmān nānutiṣṭhati sa sarvo daṇḍyaḥ 
kārṣāpaṇaṃ bhaved daṇḍyo yatrānyaḥ prākṛto janaḥ 
tatra rājā bhaved daṇḍyaḥ sahasram iti dhāraṇā 
prākṛto janaḥ sāmānyapuruṣo yo nātiguṇasaṃyuktaḥ 
tasya yatra yasminn aparādhe yāvān daṇḍas tatsahasraguṇo rājñaḥ kārṣāpaṇagrahaṇasya daṇḍaparimāṇopalakṣaṇārthatvāt dṛṣṭārthatvād daṇḍasya 
tasya cātmānam aniyamya paro niyantuṃ na śakyata iti yuktaṃ pratyaparādhe rājño daṇḍārhatvam 
mahādhanatvād alpaṃ daṇḍaṃ na vigaṇayet 
rājādhikṛtānāṃ mantripurohitādīnām anayaiva kalpanayā nyūnādhikabhāvaḥ 
dhanadaṇḍaś ca brāhmaṇebhyo 'psu praveśanena varuṇāya vā 
yato vakṣyati rājñāṃ daṇḍadharo hi saḥ 
aṣṭāpādyaṃ tu śūdrasya steye bhavati kilbiṣam 
ṣoḍaśaiva tu vaiśyasya dvātriṃśat kṣatriyasya ca 
brāhmaṇasya catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ pūrṇaṃ vāpi śataṃ bhavet 
dviguṇā vā catuḥṣaṣṭis taddoṣaguṇavid dhi saḥ 
taddoṣaguṇavid dhi sa iti hetvabhidhānād viduṣāṃ daṇḍo 'yam 
yatra khalajana ekaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dāpyate tatra vidvān śūdro 'ṣṭaguṇām 
aṣṭabhiḥ āpādyate saṃbadhyate yat kilbiṣaṃ pāpaṃ tad evam ucyate 
aṣṭabhir vāpādyata āhanyate guṇyata iti yāvat ubhayathāpy aṣṭaguṇasya vācako 'ṣṭāpadyaśabdaḥ 
evaṃ tad eva dviguṇaṃ vaiśyasya 
sa hi sākṣād adhyayanajñānayor adhikṛtaḥ 
śūdras tu kathaṃcid brāhmaṇāpāśritatatsaṃgatyā kiyad api jñāsyati 
kṣatriyas tu rakṣādhikāradoṣeṇa samāne vidvattve tato 'pi dviguṇaṃ daṇḍyate 
brāhmaṇe tu daṇḍavidhau na tṛpyati 
catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ śatam aṣṭaviṃśaṃ vā śatam iti 
tasya hi pravacanam upadeṣṭṛtvaṃ vā adhikaṃ ca rakṣā tato bhavet 
prākṛtajanasya tiryakprakhyasya ko 'parādhaḥ 
avidvāṃso guṇadoṣānabhijñā akārye pravartante 
vidvān api tathaiva ced varteta hanta hataṃ jagat tṛtīyasya śikṣitur abhāvāt 
tad uktaṃ dvau loke dhṛtavratau rājā brāhmaṇaś ca bahuśrutaḥ iti 
rājñaḥ pūrveṇa daṇḍādhikyam anena brāhmaṇasya 
ādhikyamātrāvidhiś cāyaṃ na yathāśrutasaṃkhyāvidhiḥ brāhmaṇadaṇḍe 'navasthāśravaṇād ayaṃ vāyaṃ veti 
na ca vikalpo yukto vyavasthāhetutvābhāvāt 
tulyabalasyaiva vikalpasya paraviṣayāśrayānupapatteḥ 
ko hi rājā dvijaguṇam utsṛjya catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ grahīṣyati 
yadi paramadṛṣṭārthe daṇḍe vikalpaḥ upapadyeta 
na cādṛṣṭārtho 'yam ity uktam 
tathā ca gautamaḥ viduṣo 'tikrame daṇḍabhūyastvam ity āha 
tasmād anavasthā vidhitvaṃ vyāharanti 
na ca guṇāpekṣo vikalpo yukto naṣṭādiślokenaiva viddhatvāt 
arthavattvāc cātra vidhyagatiḥ 
sa cādhikyavidhau labdhālaṃbana iti na yathāśrutaparikalpane vikalpane samarthaḥ   
vānaspatyaṃ mūlaphalaṃ dārvagnyarthaṃ tathaiva ca 
tṛṇaṃ ca gobhyo grāsārtham asteyaṃ manur abravīt 
vanaspataya eva vānaspatyaṃ vṛkṣāḥ 
svārthe pratyayaḥ 
grāsārthaṃ gṛhyamāṇam asteyaṃ vaṃśāṅkurādi 
mūlaphalaṃ vanaspatīnām anyad bisasasyādi 
sūtrādigaṇe agrāsārthaṃ mūlaphalāharaṇe daṇḍa uktaḥ 
asteyavacanaṃ grāsārtham mātrārtham akṣīṇavṛtter api kathaṃcij jātalaulyasya smṛtyantaradarśanāt svāparivṛtteś ca daṇḍaḥ 
tathā ca gautamaḥ puṣpāṇi svavad ādadīta phalāni cāparivṛttānām iti 
dārvagnyārtham āhitāgner asaṃnihite vanaspatāv udvāty agnau taddhāraṇārthaṃ kāṣṭham adoṣam pālāśīr vā samidho vyādadhyāt 
apracurapalāśe ca grāme kathaṃ syād iti yadi gṛhyeran na doṣaḥ 
tṛṇaṃ ca gobhyaḥ 
tādarthye caturthī 
gograhaṇāt prastārārthaṃ doṣa eva 
ye tu grāsārthapadena gavām abhisaṃbandham icchanti teṣāṃ gobhya iti nopapadyate 
ṣaṣṭhī hi tatra yuktā 
yo 'dattādāyino hastāl lipseta brāhmaṇo dhanam 
yājanādhyāpanenāpi yathā stenas tathaiva saḥ 
atideśo 'yam 
yo brāhmaṇaś caurān upajīvati sa coravad daṇḍyaḥ 
yājanādhyāpanenāpi 
apiḥ kriyāntarasūcakaḥ 
tena pratigrahaprītyādāyādi gṛhyate 
kṣatriyādīnām anyathaiva vārtādisvakarmaṇā coradhanaṃ gṛhṇatām 
brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ tu mayā kila dharmeṇārjitaṃ yājayatā ity abhimānanivṛttyartham 
adattam ādatte gṛhṇātīty adattādāyī coraḥ 
lipseta labdhum icched agṛhītāsv api dakṣiṇāsu tatsaṃbandhād eva cauranigrahaḥ 
dvijo 'dhvagaḥ kṣīṇavṛttir dvāv ikṣū dve ca mūlake 
ādadānaḥ parakṣetrān na daṇḍaṃ dātum arhati 
dvijagrahaṇaṃ śūdrapratiṣedhārtham 
adhvago naikagrāmavāsī 
tatrāpi kṣīṇavṛttiḥ kṣīṇapathyodanaḥ 
dvāv ikṣū daṇḍau mūlake pradarśanārthaṃ caitat parimitaharītakamudgādiśamīdhānyānām 
tathā ca śamītrapusayugyaghāseṣu ca na pratiṣedhaḥ iti smṛtyantaram 
parakṣetrāt parakīyasthānād ityarthaḥ parivṛtād api 
saṃditānāṃ saṃdātā saṃditānāṃ ca mokṣakaḥ 
dāsāśvarathahartā ca prāptaḥ syāc corakilbiṣam 
pāsvādayo vimuktaśṛṅkhalādibandhanā mustādiyavabhūyiṣṭheṣu vijaneṣu vāryante 
tataś cen nidrāyati svāmini pāle vā kaścit saṃdānavataḥ kuryāt khalīnakabandhādinā nūnaṃ ninīṣaty asāv iti śaṅkayā cauravad daṇḍyaḥ 
yas tu svāmigṛhacyutaṃ yūthabhraṃśāgataṃ vā rakṣitum eva vā badhnīyān na tasya doṣaḥ 
evaṃ gavādīnām api gale dāmādisaṃdāne eṣa eva damaḥ 
ye ca saṃditāḥ pādasthaśṛṅkhalādinā teṣām mokṣakaḥ 
dāmāṃś ca rahasi protsāhya bhaktadāsādīn apaharati ahaṃ te bahu dadāmi kim etaṃ bhajase iti 
kulīnānāṃ haraṇe vadha uktaḥ puruṣāṇām ity atra 
anena dāsānām ucyate 
yathā tatraiva kulīnam uktam evam atrāpi protsāhya nayanaṃ grahaṇaṃ na kartavyam 
tatra prabalādinā cauryeṇa veti 
aśvarathaharteti 
aśvānāṃ rathānāṃ ca 
mahāpaśūnām ity atra rājasaṃbandhino 'śvāḥ ime tu janapadānām 
tatra rājecchayā daṇḍaḥ iha tu niyato vadhaḥ 
yady api bahavaś coradaṇḍās tathāpi smṛtyantare 
bandigrāhāṃs tathā vājikuñjarāṇāṃ ca hāriṇaḥ 
prasahya ghātinaś caiva śūlam āropayen narān  iti 
ihāpi sāmānyato yena yena ity upakramya tat tad eva haret iti 
anye tv aśvayukto ratha iti sāmānyaṃ manyante pradarśanāc cāśvagorathādīnām 
tatra kevalānām aśvānāṃ rathasya ca daṇḍaś cintyaḥ 
smṛtyantare kevalānām aśvānāṃ cauradaṇḍasyoktatvāt rathayuktānām api siddhaḥ 
ye tu protsāhya nayanaṃ haraṇaṃ manyante teṣām aśvarathaśabdena rathakāro lakṣyate rathakarteti 
tac ca sarvaśilpārtham 
śilpināṃ haraṇe cauradaṇḍaḥ 
aśvānām api protsāhanaṃ vaḍavādarśanena 
anena vidhinā rājā kurvāṇaḥ stenanigraham 
yaśo 'smin prāpnuyāl loke pretya cānuttamaṃ sukham 
anenāntaraprakrāntena mārgeṇa cauranigrahaṃ kurvāṇo yaśaḥ sakalajanasādhuvādo asmiṃḷ loke yāvajjīvam pretya mṛtaś cānuttamaṃ svargākhyaṃ sukham aśnuta iti 
prakaraṇopasaṃhāro 'yam 
aindraṃ sthānam abhiprepsur yaśaś cākṣayam avyayam 
nopekṣeta kṣaṇam api rājā sāhasikaṃ naram 
saho balam tena vartate sāhasikaḥ 
dṛṣṭādṛṣṭadoṣān aparigaṇayya balamātram āśritya steyahiṃsāsaṃgrahaṇādiparapīḍākareṣu vartamānaḥ prakāśaṃ puruṣaḥ sāhasikaḥ 
tad uktaṃ syāt sahasam iti 
na steyādibhyaḥ padārthāntaraṃ sāhasam kiṃ tu prasahyakāraṇāt tāny eva sāhasāni bhavanti 
yady apy agnidāhavastrapāṭanādi tad api dravyanāśātmakatvāt siddham eveti tasya nigrahāt nopekṣeta na vilaṃbeta kṣaṇam api yadā gṛhītas tadaiva nigṛhītavyaḥ 
indrasvāmikaṃ sthānaṃ svargākhyam aindraṃ tadābhimukhyena prāptum icchan 
atha vā svam eva rājyapadam aindram ivecchann aviccālitvasāmānyam nigrāhya nigraheṇa hi pratāpānugrahābhyāṃ prajā anupravartante 
tad uktam samudram iva sindhavaḥ iti 
yaśo 'kṣayam avyayaṃ ca 
dve viśeṣye dve viśeṣaṇe sthānam avyayaṃ yaśo 'kṣayam iti 
athobhayenāpi yaśo viśiṣyate kṣayo mātrāpacayaḥ vyayo niranvayavināśaḥ 
ubhayam api tan nāsti 
na malinībhavati yaśo na kadācid vicchidyate 
bhūtārthavādastutir iyam 
vāgduṣṭāt taskarāc caiva daṇḍenaiva ca hiṃsataḥ 
sāhasasya naraḥ kartā vijñeyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ 
ayam aparārthavādo nigrahavidhistutyarthaḥ 
vācā duṣṭo vāgduṣṭas taskaraś cauraḥ 
daṇḍenaiva daṇḍapāruṣyakṛt 
daṇḍaḥ praharaṇopalakṣaṇārthaḥ 
tribhya etebhyo 'nantarātikrāntebhyaḥ pāpakāribhyo 'yam atiśayena pāpakṛttamaḥ 
sāhase vartamānaṃ tu yo marṣayati pārthivaḥ 
sa vināśaṃ vrajaty āśu vidveṣaṃ cādhigacchati 
ayam apy arthavādaḥ 
sāhase sthitaṃ puruṣaṃ yo marṣayati 
prakṛtyarthe 'yaṃ ṇic 
yo mṛṣyati kṣamate sa vināśaṃ prāpnoti dveṣyatāṃ ca prajāsu prāpnoti dveṣyaiś cābhibhūyate 
na mitrakāraṇād rājā vipulād vā dhanāgamāt 
samutsṛjet sāhasikān sarvabhūtabhayāvahān 
ata āha pārśvathasya kasyacit snehahetor amātyādinā prārthyamāno na mṛṣyet 
atha vā sa evātibahudhanaṃ dadātīti nopekṣeta 
sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhayam āvahanti sāhasikāḥ 
ayam apy arthavādaḥ 
śastraṃ dvijātibhir grāhyaṃ dharmo yatroparudhyate 
dvijātīnāṃ ca varṇānāṃ viplave kālakārite 
ātmanaś ca paritrāṇe dakṣiṇānāṃ ca saṅgare 
strīviprābhyupapattau ca ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣati 
vaiṇavīṃ dhārayed yaṣṭim iti vidhānād anumitaśastragrahaṇāḥ śrotriyāḥ 
svabalāviṣṭaṃ bhavati ca sāhasike balātiśayadhāyī śastram 
ataḥ sāhasikatvāśaṅkayā śastragrahaṇam aprāptaṃ vidhīyate śastraṃ dvijātibhir grāhyam iti 
etāvatā vākyaṃ vicchidyate 
avaśiṣṭaṃ tu ghnan dharmeṇa ity anenābhisaṃbadhyata ity ato dve ete vākye 
ye tv eteṣv eva nimitteṣu grahaṇam icchanti nānyadeti teṣām atarkitopanatātatāyīmukhapatitasya aśastrasya kā gatiḥ 
na hi te śastragrahaṇaṃ tasya pratipālayanti 
athaivaṃ vyākhyāyate dharmo yatroparudhyate viplave kālakārite rājani vyatikrānte saṃsthāyāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ śastraṃ grāhyam 
anyadā tu saurājye rājaiva rakṣatīti 
na hi prasārya hastau rājā pratipuruṣam āsituṃ śaknoti 
bhavanti kecid durātmāno ye rājapuruṣān api śūratamābhiyuktān bādhante śastravatas tu bibhyatīti sārvakālikaṃ śastradhāraṇaṃ yuktam 
kiṃ punar grahaṇamātraṃ bibhīṣikājananamātram 
nety āha ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣyatīti 
hiṃsāparyanto 'yam upadeśaḥ 
yat tv āpastambenoktam na brāhmaṇaḥ parīkṣārtham api śastram ādadīta iti asati yathābhihite nimitta ākarṣaṇasya pratiṣedho na grahaṇasya 
vikośā hi parīkṣyante 
dharmasyoparodho yadā yajñādīnāṃ vināśaḥ kaiścit kriyate 
varṇānāṃ viplavo 'vyavasthānaṃ varṇasaṃkarādi 
kālakārite rājamaraṇādau 
tatra svadhanakuṭumbarakṣārthaṃ śastraṃ grāhyam 
anye tu parārtham apy asminn avasare 
tathā ca gautamaḥ durbalahiṃsāyāṃ ca vimocane śaktaś cet iti 
uktaṃ yajñavināśaśaṅkānivṛttyarthaṃ śastragrahaṇam 
nimittāntaram āha ātmanaś ca paritrāṇe 
pariḥ sarvatobhāve 
śarīrabhāryādhanaputrarakṣārthaṃ ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣyati 
dakṣiṇānāṃ ca saṅgaro 'virodhaḥ 
yadi yajñārthaṃ kalpitā dakṣiṇāḥ kaiścid apahriyeraṃs tadā tannimittaṃ yoddhavyam 
anye tv evam abhisaṃbadhnanti 
dakṣiṇānāṃ hetoḥ saṃgare yady uparodhaḥ pravṛtto dharme 'pravṛtte dakṣiṇāsaṃgara iti 
strīviprāṇām abhyavapattiḥ paribhavaḥ 
yatra striyaḥ sādhvyo haṭhāt kenacid upagamyante hanyante vā 
evaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ kenacid dhanyante 
tatra ghnan khaḍgādinā na duṣyati 
hiṃsāpratiṣedhātikramo na kṛto bhavatīty arthaḥ 
asati pratiṣedhe kāmacāraprāptau vidhyantaraparyālocanayā gautamavacanam anudhyāyamānena durbalahiṃsāyāṃ vimocane śaktaś cet ity avaśyaṃ hanane pravartitavyam 
atha pratihāraśaṅkā bhavati tadā sarvata evātmānaṃ gopāyet ity upekṣā   
ātmaparitrāṇārtham avicāreṇa yoddhavyam 
tad anudarśayati 
guruṃ vā bālavṛddhau vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā bahuśrutam 
ātatāyinam āyāntaṃ hanyād evācivārayan 
ātatāyī ucyate yaḥ śarīradhanadāraputranāśe sarvaprakāram udyataḥ 
tam avicārayan hanyāt 
gurvādigrahaṇam arthavādaḥ 
ete 'pi hantavyāḥ kim utānya iti 
eteṣāṃ tv ātatāyitve 'pi vadho nāsti 
ācāryaṃ ca pravaktāram ity anenāpakāriṇām api vadho niṣiddhaḥ 
gurum ātatāyinam iti śakyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ 
tathā saty ātatāyiviśeṣaṇam etat 
tato gurvādivyatiriktasyātatāyinaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kutaḥ syāt 
vākyāntarābhāvāt 
atha nātatāyivadhe doṣaḥ ity etad vākyāntaraṃ sāmānyenābhyanujñāpakam iti 
tad api na vidher aśravaṇāt pūrvaśeṣatayā cārthavādatve prakṛtavacanatvāt 
iha bhavantas tv āhuḥ yady ātatāyinam ity eva vidhiḥ avaśiṣṭo 'rthavādaḥ tathāpi gurvādīnāṃ vadhānujñānam 
yato 'nyad apakāritvam anyad ātatāyitvam 
yo hy anyāṃ kāṃcana pīḍāṃ karoti na sarveṇa śarīrādinā so 'pakārī tatas tv anya ātatāyī 
tathā ca paṭhyate 
udyatāsir viṣāgnibhyāṃ śāpodyatakaras tathā 
ātharvaṇena hantā ca piśunaś cāpi rājataḥ 
bhāryātikramakārī ca randhānveṣaṇatatparaḥ 
evamādyān vijānīyāt sarvān evātatāyinaḥ 
āyāntam iti vacanād āttaśastro hantum abhidhāvan dārān vā jihīrṣan hantavyaḥ 
kṛte tu doṣe kim anyat kariṣyatīty upekṣā iti bruvate 
tad ayuktam 
yataḥ prakāśam aprakāśaṃ vā iti vakṣyati 
samānau hy etau kariṣyan kṛtavāṃś ca 
tasmād āyāntam ity anuvādaḥ kartum āgataṃ kṛtvā vā gatam iti 
ātatāyitvāc cāsau hanyate 
na ca kṛtavacana ātatāyitvam upaiti 
nāsyātmano rakṣārtha eva vadha ātmanaś ca paritrāṇe iti anenoktam 
nātatāyivadhe doṣo hantur bhavati kaścana 
prakāśaṃ vāprakāśaṃ vā manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati 
na kaścana iti nādharmo na daṇḍo na prāyaścittam iti 
prakāśaṃ janasamakṣam aprakāśaṃ viṣādidānena yena kenacid upāyena 
manyuḥ krodhābhimānidevatā asau manyum ṛcchati 
nātra hantṛhantavyabhāvo 'sti 
puruṣayor artha ātatāyikrodha itareṇa hanyata ity arthavādo 'yaṃ 
yathā pratigrahakāmaḥ ko mahyaṃ dadātu nāhaṃ pratigrahītā na tvaṃ dātā tataś ca kutaḥ pratigrahadoṣo māma evam atrāpi 
iha sāhasike daṇḍo nāmnātaḥ 
sa daṇḍapāruṣye draṣṭavyaḥ 
iha tv adhikataraḥ yata uktam vijñeyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ iti 
paradārābhimarśeṣu pravṛttān nṝn mahīpatiḥ 
udvejanakarair daṇḍaiś cihnayitvā pravāsayet 
vivāhasaṃkṛtāyāṃ striyāṃ dāraśabdo vartate 
ātmano 'nyaḥ paraḥ 
abhimarśaḥ saṃbhoga āliṅganād arabhya āliṅganaṃ janadvayasamavāyaḥ bhogajanyāyāḥ prīteḥ pravṛttiḥ prārambhas tannivṛttyarthaṃ dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇādinā protsāhanam 
atha ca saṃgrahaṇam abhimarśanaṃ pracakṣate 
tenāyam arthaḥ parabhāryāgamane pravṛttaṃ puruṣaṃ jñātvodvejanakarais tīkṣṇāgraiḥ śaktiśūlādibhir aṅkayitvā nāsāchedādibhir vivāsayet 
sarvatrātra viśeṣadaṇḍasyoktatvād asya viṣayabhāvo na sāmānyadaṇḍo 'yam 
kiṃ tarhi punaḥ punaḥ pravṛttau 
idaṃ tu yuktam 
alabhamānasya viṣayāntaraṃ pravāsasya dhanadaṇḍasya ca kāryabhedāt samuccayaḥ 
tathā darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
tatsamuttho hi lokasya jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ 
yena mūlaharo 'dharmaḥ sarvanāśāya kalpate 
samutthānam utpattiḥ 
tataḥ paradārāgamanāt saṃkaro 'vāntaravarṇarūpo jāyate 
yena jātenādharmo mūlasya lokasya divaḥ patitā vṛṣṭis tāṃ harat adharmaḥ 
dharme hi sati ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭiḥ 
na ca saṃkare saty api kārīrīyāgo nāpi pātre dānam ato dānayāgahomānāṃ sasyotpattihetubhūtānām abhāvāt sarvajagannāśasamartho bhavati 
tasmāt pāradārikān adharmamūlavarṇasaṃkaraḥ syāt iti sasyādiniṣpattimūlāṃ vā vṛṣṭiṃ rakṣan pravāsayet 
parasya patnyā puruṣaḥ saṃbhāṣāṃ yojayan rahaḥ 
pūrvam ākṣārito doṣaiḥ prāpnuyāt pūrvasāhasam 
saṃbhāṣaḥ saṃbhāṣaṇam tam ālāpaṃ yojayan kurvan saṃgrahaṇādidoṣaiḥ tatstrīprārthanādibhiḥ pūrvam ākṣārito 'bhiśastaḥ ayam enām upajapati ity amutra dṛṣṭadoṣaḥ śaṅkyamānadoṣo vā capalaḥ rahaḥ udvātādau niṣiddhasaṃbhāṣaṇa iti kecit 
kāraṇād apy anyapatnyā saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kurvan prathamasāhasaṃ daṇḍaṃ prāpnuyād dāpayitavya ity arthaḥ 
yas tv anākṣāritaḥ pūrvam abhibhāṣeta kāraṇāt 
na doṣaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃcin na hi tasya vyatikramaḥ 
pūrvasya pratyudāharaṇam etat 
anākṣārito 'py akāraṇāt saṃbhāṣayan miśrayan pūrvadaṇḍabhāk 
parastriyaṃ yo 'bhivadet tīrthe 'raṇye vane 'pi vā 
nadīnāṃ vāpi saṃbhede sa saṃgrahaṇam āpnuyāt 
parasya patnyā iti prakṛte punaḥ parastrīgrahaṇaṃ mātṛbhaginīgurupatnyādīnām apratiṣedhārtham 
na hi tāḥ saty api parasaṃbandhitve parastrīvyapadeśyāḥ 
tīrtham ucyate yena mārgeṇa nadītaḍāgādibhyo jalam ānetum avataranti 
sa hi vijanaprāyo bhavati 
nānudakārthena tatra saṃnidhīyate 
saṅketasthānaṃ tādṛśam atra kalpitāyām avaśyam eva gantavyam aham api saṃnidhīyamāno nāśaṅkyo bhaviṣyāmīti udakārthī divā śaucācāraṃ vā kariṣyan pratipālayann iti janā maṃsyante 
pradeśāntare tu kim atrāyaṃ pratipālayantīti śaṅkā syāt 
atas tīrthe pratiṣedhaḥ 
araṇyaṃ hi grāmād vijano deśo gulmavṛkṣalatādigahanaḥ 
vane vṛkṣasaṃtatau 
nadīnāṃ saṃbhedaḥ samāgamaḥ 
so 'pi hi saṅketasthānam 
sa saṃgrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt 
parastrīkāmatvaṃ saṃgrahaṇam 
ataś ca yas tatra daṇḍaḥ so 'sya syād ity uktaṃ bhavati 
anākṣāritasyapi saty api kāraṇe 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ 
yat tv āpastambenoktam nāsaṃbhāṣya striyam ativrajet iti tad anyeṣu saṃnihiteṣv etacchāstrajñeṣu prakāśe bhaginī namas te ityādyabhivādanam avilambamānena kartavyam 
upakārakriyā keliḥ sparśo bhūṣaṇavāsasām 
saha khaṭvāsanaṃ caiva sarvaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam 
yā na kenacit saṃbandhena saṃbandhinī tasyā vastramālyādidānena upakārakaraṇam 
tathā bhojanapānādinā 
keliḥ parihāso vakrabhaṇitādinā 
sparśo bhūṣaṇavāsasām 
bhūṣaṇaṃ hārakaṭakādi tadaṅgalagnam tadīyam etad veti jñātvā vināprayojanenānyagṛhītam api spṛśyate 
ekasyāṃ khaṭvāyām asaṃsaktāṅgayor api sahāsanam 
sarvam etat tulyadaṇḍam 
striyaṃ spṛśed adese yaḥ spṛṣṭo vā marṣayet tayā 
parasparasyānumate sarvaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam 
adeśasparśas tu yatra vinaiva tatsparśanaṃ gamanāgamanādi saṃsidhyati 
mahājanasaṃkule na doṣaḥ 
tathā śarīrāvayavo 'pi deśaḥ 
tatra hastaskandhadhṛtabhāṇḍāvaropaṇe tatsparśe na doṣaḥ 
oṣṭhacibukastanādiṣu doṣaḥ 
tayā vā stanādisparṣenotpīḍito yadi tat sahate bhavati mā kārṣīḥ ityādinā na pratiṣedhati 
parasparasyānumate matipūrvam etasminn akṛte na doṣo 'yam 
na punaḥ karmādau 
skhalantī puruṣaṃ kaṇṭhe 'valaṃbate puruṣo vā stanāntare striyam taddhastagṛhītadravyādānapravṛttau śuṣke patiṣyāmīti karddame patatītivat tāv api na duṣyetām 
abrāhmaṇaḥ saṃgrahaṇe prāṇāntaṃ daṇḍam arhati 
caturṇām api varṇānāṃ dārā rakṣyatamāḥ sadā 
uktaṃ saṃgrahasvarūpam 
daṇḍa idānīm atrocyate 
abrāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyādiḥ saṃgrahaṇe kṛte caturṇām api varṇānāṃ hīnottamajātibhedam anapekṣya prāṇāntaṃ prāṇatyājane māraṇe paryavasitaṃ daṇḍam arhati 
kathaṃ punar brāhmaṇyām śūdrāyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītasya samo daṇḍaḥ 
atra hetusvarūpam artham āha dārā rakṣyatamāḥ sadā 
sarvasya kasyacid rājñā dārā dhanaśarīrebhyo 'tiśayena rakṣyāḥ 
tulye hi saṅkare śūdrasyāpi kulanāśaḥ 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
vācaniko 'yam artho 'tra hetur vaktavyaḥ ukto 'sau 
atra pūrve vyācakhyuḥ 
na sarvasmin saṃgrahaṇe prāguktadaṇḍo 'yam 
kiṃ tarhi mukhye sparśaviseṣe janyaprītiviśeṣātmake gamane 
kathaṃ hi tīrthādiṣv abhivadanaṃ gamanaṃ ca samadaṇḍāv upapadyeyātām 
tasmād abrāhmaṇaḥ śūdro dvijātimagane prāṇacchedārho nānyaḥ 
na hi viṣamasamīkaraṇaṃ nyāyyam 
ataś ca prāgukteṣu saṃgrahaṇeṣv anubandhādyapekṣayā daṇḍaḥ kalpyaḥ 
yatraivaṃ niścitaṃ gamanārtha evāyam upakārakriyādirūpakramas tatra mukhyadaṇḍa eva yuktaḥ 
na hy atra vaiṣamyam asti 
dṛṣṭaṃ caitad ubhayatrāpīti 
tathedam uktam yady atrāyaṃ daṇḍo mukhye saṃgrahaṇe kiṃ kariṣyati iti 
naivānyan mukhyasaṃgrahaṇam asti 
na hy asya laukikaḥ padārtho 'vadhṛto yena paradāropakārādau prayukta ityevam asyaiva 
yaṃ ca bhavan mukhyaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ manyate tatra mahān daṇḍaḥ 
pratiṣiddhaṃ parastrīgamanaṃ śāstraparyanuyojyam iti cet
upakārādāv api pratiṣedhaṃ viddhi 
pratiṣedhavad dhi prāyaścittam api tulyaṃ prasaktam iti cet
kā nāmeyam aniṣṭāpattiḥ 
kiṃ tu prasajyeta yadā saṃgrahaṇaśabdena tad ucyeta 
sikte hi retasi gamanādyabhidhānam 
yatra yādṛśo daṇḍas tatra tatsamānaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāptam 
ato 'smin viparyaye retaḥsekanimittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ tacchabdenābhidhānāt upakārādau kalpyam 
yadi ca saṃlāpādau svalpo daṇḍaḥ syāt tadā pravarteran 
tataś ca parastrīsaṃlāpādibhūtenānyenābhibhavatā vyādīpitamanmathā smaraśarākṛṣyamāṇāḥ śarīranirapekṣā rājanigrahaṃ na gaṇeyeyuḥ 
ādyāyām eva tu pravṛttau gṛhyamāṇeṣv aprabandhavṛttau rāge śakyaṃ nirākaraṇam 
tasmāt parastrīm upajāpatām eva mahādaṇḍo yuktaḥ 
iha tv antagrahaṇād ādibhūtenānyena daṇḍena bhavitavyam 
na hy asatyavādavanto bhavanti 
prāṇo 'nto yasya prāṇāntas tāvat pātayitavyo yāvat prāṇeṣu patati 
tena sarvasvagrahaṇāṅgachedādy apy uktaṃ bhavati 
ekaikasya ca daṇḍatvam anyatra jñātaṃ na samudāye daṇḍyate iti bahudaṇḍeṣv āmnāteṣu sa mahān yo dvijātistrīsaṃgrahaṇe 'brāhmaṇasya 
ato yuktaiva kalpanā na sarvatra 
tatra kulastrībhir anicchantībhir bhatṛmatībhiḥ saṃgṛhyamāṇasya prāṇāpaharaṇaṃ hīnajātīyābhir api 
bhikṣukā bandinaś caiva dīkṣitāḥ kāravas tathā 
saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ saha strībhiḥ kuryur aprativāritāḥ 
bhikṣukā bhikṣājīvino bhikṣāyācanārūpaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇam avāritāḥ kuryur yadi svāminā na niṣiddhāḥ 
atha vā naite vārayitavyāḥ 
bandinaḥ stāvakāḥ 
dīkṣitā yajñe bhṛtivacanārthaṃ saṃbhāṣeran 
kāravaḥ sūpakārādayaḥ 
ete tīrthādiṣv api na nivāryāḥ 
na saṃbhāṣāṃ parastrībhiḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ samācaret 
niṣiddho bhāṣamāṇas tu suvarṇaṃ daṇḍam arhati 
kecid bhikṣukādīnāṃ nivāritānāṃ saṃbhāṣaṇe daṇḍo 'yam iti manyante 
tad asat 
naiva te nivāryā ity uktam 
kutaś ca bhikṣukāṇāṃ suvarṇo daṇḍaḥ 
tasmāt ko 'pi prakāśam anākṣārito 'pi kathaṃcin niṣiddhaḥ svāminā samācaran suvarṇaṃ daṇḍyaḥ 
naiṣa cāraṇadāreṣu vidhir nātmopajīviṣu 
sajjayanti hi te nārīr nigūḍhāś cārayanti ca 
yaḥ saṃbhāṣaṇapratiṣedha upakārakriyāpratiṣedhaś ca naiṣa cāraṇadāreṣu syāt 
cāraṇā naṭagāyanādyāḥ prekṣaṇakāriṇaḥ 
tathā ātmopajīviṣu veṣeṇa jīvatsu ye dārāḥ 
atha vātmajāyaiva ardho ha vā eṣa ātmā iti tāṃ ya upajīvanti upapatikṣamakāḥ 
sajjayanti saṃśleṣayanti te cāraṇaḥ parapuruṣeṇa 
nigūḍhāḥ prachannam āpaṇabhūmau na tiṣṭhante 
gṛhaveṣatvād eva tāḥ prasiddhaveśyābhyo bhidyante 
cārayanti ca tā maithunaṃ pravartayanti netrabhrūvilāsaparihāsādibhiḥ puruṣān ākarṣayanti 
tadanujñānaṃ sajjanam cāraṇaṃ saṃprayoga eva 
atha vā svā nārīḥ sajjayanti yojayanti anyāś ca strībhiś cārayanti pravartayanti veśyātvaṃ kuṭṭinītvaṃ ca svadhārāṇāṃ kārayantīty arthaḥ 
kiṃcid eva tu dāpyaḥ syāt saṃbhāṣāṃ tābhir ācaran 
praiṣyāsu caikabhaktāsu rahaḥ pravrajitāsu ca 
raho 'prakāśaṃ vijane deśe cāraṇanārībhiḥ saṃbhāṣāṃ kurvan kiṃcit suvarṇād atyantālpaṃ sa triṃśadbhāgādikaṃ jātipratiṣṭhāne apekṣya daṇḍyaḥ 
yato na paripūrṇaṃ tāsu veśyātvam 
bhartṛbhir anujñātā hi tāḥ praṇayante 
tatra bhartṛvijñānārthaṃ dūtīmukhena vyavahartavyam 
na tu sākṣāt tābhir asvatantratvāt 
prakāśaṃ tu nṛtyantīnāṃ gāyantīnāṃ vābhinayatālādinirūpaṇāvasare kīdṛśam etad ityādipraśnadvāraṃ saṃbhāṣaṇam aniṣiddham 
preṣyā dāsyaḥ saptabhir dāsayonibhir upanatāḥ 
ekaṃ bhajante ekabhaktā ekenāvaruddhāḥ 
tatrānyo 'py asti daṇḍaleśaḥ 
kiṃ punar ayaṃ dāsīśabdaḥ saṃbandhiśabdo ya eva yasyāḥ svāmī tasyaiva dāsī uta sūpakārādiśabdavat karmamūlakaḥ 
iha tāvad ādyā eva sthitiḥ viśeṣaṇopādāne 'sāmarthyāt 
yā yasya dāsī veśyāvac cānaiḥ saṃsṛjyate rājadāsīva dāsī vā sā nigṛhyante 
sā cen nāvaruddhā na doṣaḥ saṃgrahaṇe 
avaruddhāyām anena daṇḍa uktaḥ 
rikthavibhāge caitan nipuṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
pravratijāḥ arakṣakāḥ śīlamitrādayaḥ 
tā hi kāmuka iva liṅgapracchannāḥ 
yo 'kāmāṃ dūṣayet kanyāṃ sa sadyo vadham arhati 
sakāmāṃ dūṣayaṃs tulyo na vadhaṃ prāpnuyān naraḥ 
pāsaṅgikam idam 
tulyaḥ samānajātīyaḥ 
so 'nicchantīṃ kumārīṃ dūṣayet kaumāryād apacyāvayet strīpuruṣasaṃbhogena sadyas tasminn evāhany avilaṃbaṃ hantavyaḥ 
sakāmāyā dūṣaṇaṃ nāsti kuto vadhaprāptiḥ 
yac cātra bhaviṣyati tad vakṣyāmaḥ 
yady api tulyavadha ity evātra śrutaṃ vadhe 'pi jātyapekṣāyām avaśyaṃbhāvinyāṃ pratyāsattyā saṃbādhyate 
kanyāṃ bhajantīm utkṛṣṭaṃ na kiṃcid api dāpayet 
jaghanyaṃ sevamānāṃ tu saṃyatāṃ vāsayed gṛhe 
jātidhanaśīlavidyānām anyatamenāpi pitṛkulād utkṛṣṭaṃ bhajantīṃ pravartitamaithunāṃ na kiṃcid daṇḍayet 
kanyāyāḥ svātantryābhāvāt tadrakṣādhikṛtānāṃ pitrādīnāṃ daṇḍe prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ 
jaghanyaṃ jātyādibhir hīnaṃ sevamānāṃ maithunāyotkalayantīṃ saṃyatāṃ nivṛttakrīḍāvihārā kañcukibhir adhiṣṭhitāṃ pitṛgṛha eva vāsayed yāvan nivṛttābhilāṣā saṃjātā 
atha hīnajātīye nirvṛttaprītiviśeṣā tadā ā antyocchvāsāt saṃyataiva tiṣṭhet 
uttamāṃ sevamānas tu jaghanyo vadham arhati 
śulkaṃ dadyāt sevamānaḥ samām icchet pitā yadi 
akāmāyā kanyāyā dūṣaṇe brāhmaṇavarjam aviśeṣeṇa hīnottamānāṃ vadha eva daṇḍa ity uktam 
sakāmāyā dūṣaṇe tv idam āhuḥ 
uttamāṃ rūpayauvanajātibhiḥ 
jaghanyo 'tyantanikṛṣṭaḥ 
nātisāmye 'pi guṇair vadhyaḥ 
samāṃ tu gacchan sakāmāṃ sa śulkam āsuravivāha iva pitre dadyāt 
na ced icchati pitā tadā rājñe daṇḍaṃ tāvantam 
nanu ca gāndharvo 'yaṃ vivāhaḥ icchayānyonyasaṃyogaḥ iti 
tatra na yukto daṇḍaḥ 
kenoktaṃ gāndharve nāsti daṇḍaḥ 
ata eva nāyaṃ satīdharmaḥ na cāyaṃ vivāhaḥ agnisaṃskārābhāvāt 
yad api śākuntale vyāsavacanam amantrakam anagnikam iti tad duṣyantena kāmapīḍitenaivaṃ kṛtam 
na cecchāsaṃyogamātraṃ vivāhaḥ 
svīkaraṇopāyabhedād aṣṭau vivāhāḥ na punar vivāhabhedāt 
vṛttavaraṇaṃ tatra punaḥ kartavyam evam iti 
atha vā ṛtudarśanottarakālaṃ gāndharvaḥ 
prāg ṛtoḥ śulko daṇḍo vā 
atha kanyāyāḥ kā pratipattiḥ 
tasmā eva deyā 
nivṛttābhilāṣā cet kāmam anyatra pratipadyā 
śulkagrahaṇaṃ cātrāpi sakṛd upabhoganiṣkṛtyartham asty eva 
varaś cen nivṛttābhilāṣo haṭhād grāhayitavyaḥ 
abhiṣahya tu yaḥ kanyāṃ kuryād darpeṇa mānavaḥ 
tasyāśu kartye aṅgulyau daṇḍaṃ cārhati ṣaṭśatam 
yady api sakāmā kanyā pitrādayas tu tasyāḥ saṃnihitās tān anicchato 'bhiṣahya abhibhūya darpeṇa balena kaḥ kiṃ kartuṃ me śaktaḥ kanyānurāgamātāśritaḥ kanyāṃ kuryād vikuryād dūṣayet 
anekārthaḥ karotiḥ 
tasyāśu kartyāḥ chettavyā ardhāṅgulayaḥ ṣaṭśatāni vā daṇḍyaḥ 
anye tu yo 'kāmāṃ dūṣayet ity asyaiva vadhyarthasyopasaṃhāro 'yam 
tāḍanāt prabhṛti māraṇaṃ yāvad vadhyarthaḥ 
tatremāṃ nikṛṣṭajātīyāṃ ca dūṣayan na māryate api tv aṅgulī asya chidyeta 
sakāmāṃ dūṣayaṃs tulyo nāṅgulicchedam āpnuyāt 
dviśataṃ tu damaṃ dāpyaḥ prasaṅgavinivṛttaye 
sakāmām ity anuvādaḥ pūrvasyāpi sakāmaviṣayāt 
abhiṣahya karaṇe pūrvaṃ daṇḍaḥ aprakāśaṃ cauryavad dviśato 'ṅgulīcchedavarjitaḥ 
atha kasmiṃścit puruṣe 'nurāgavatī kanyā tena saṃyujyamānā kanyātvanivṛttau sakāmā yena vikṛtīkriyate tasyāyaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
atha vā hastasparśamātram iha dūṣaṇa 
prārthanīyāyāḥ kanyāyā hastasparśaḥ mayā spṛṣṭāṃ jñātvā nānya etām arthaiṣyate 'nyasminn anurāgiṇīṃ manyamānaḥ 
kanyaiva kanyāṃ yā kuryāt tasyāḥ syād dviśato damaḥ 
śulkaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ dadyāc chipāś caivāpnuyād daśa 
bālabhāvād rūpādidveṣād vā kanyaiva kanyāṃ nāśayet sā dviśataṃ dāpyā 
śulkaś ca triguṇaḥ 
kiṃ punaḥ śulkasya parimāṇam 
eṣām anyatamarūpasaundaryādyapekṣaṃ saubhāgyāpekṣaṃ ca 
śiphā rajjulatāprahārāḥ 
yā tu kanyāṃ prakuryāt strī sā sadyo mauṇḍyam arhati 
aṅgulyor eva vā chedaṃ khareṇodvahanaṃ tathā 
striyāṃ kanyānāṃ kanyāliṅgaṃ nāśayantyāṃ mauṇḍyaṃ keśavapanaṃ daṇḍaḥ aṅgulicchedo vā 
khareṇodvahanaṃ keśacchedapakṣe 
kanyājātyādibhedān nigrāhyabhedāt traivarṇikastrīṇāṃ brāhmaṇādikrameṇemaṃ daṇḍam icchanti mudrāś ca kalpayanti 
te pramāṇābhāvād upekṣaṇīyāḥ 
bhartāraṃ laṅghayed yā tu strī jñātiguṇadarpitā 
tāṃ śvabhiḥ khādayed rājā saṃsthāne bahusaṃsthite 
laṅghanaṃ bhartāram atikramyānyatra gamanam 
tac cet strī karoti darpeṇa  bahavo me jñātayo balino draviṇasaṃpannāḥ strīguṇo rūpasaubhāgyātiśayasaṃpat kim anena śīlarūpeṇa  ityevaṃdarpeṇa 
tāṃ śvabhiḥ khādayed yāvan mṛtā 
saṃsthānaṃ deśaḥ 
bahavaḥ saṃsthitā yatra janāś catvarādau 
pumāṃsaṃ dāhayet pāpaṃ śayane tapta āyase 
abhyādadhyuś ca kāṣṭhāni tatra dahyeta pāpakṛt 
yo 'sau patnyā jāraḥ sa āyase lohaśayane tapte 'gnisame kṛte dāhayitavyaḥ 
tatra ca śayanasthitasya kāṣṭhāni vadhyaghātino 'bhyādadhyur upari kṣipeyuḥ 
yāvat kāṣṭhaprahārair agnijvālābhiḥ śayanatāpena ca mṛtaḥ 
saṃvatsarābhiśastasya duṣṭasya dviguṇo damaḥ 
vrātyayā saha saṃvāse cāṇḍālyā tāvad eva tu 
abhiśastas tatpāpakārīty abhiśabditaḥ 
yo yasyāṃ striyāṃ saṃgṛhītaḥ so 'bhiśasto daṇḍitaḥ 
sa cet saṃvatsaraṃ pratipālya atīte saṃvatsare punas tasyām eva saṃgṛhyate tadā tasyaikaṃ vāram abhiśastasya saṃvatsare gate punar duṣṭasya dviguṇo daṇḍaḥ 
saṃvatsarābhiśastasyeti samāsapāṭhe kathaṃcid yojanā 
vrātyayā saha saṃvāse tāvad eva 
kiṃ yāvad eva punar duṣṭasya 
neti brūmaḥ 
tatrāpy uttamādhamamadhyamānām anekavidho daṇḍaḥ 
tatra ko 'sāv iha 
dviguṇa iti na jñāyate 
kiṃ tarhi cāṇḍālyā saṃvāse yāvad eva tāvad eva vrātyayeti sahasraṃ tv antyajasteyam iti 
vrātaḥ pūgaḥ saṃghaḥ tena carantī puṃścalīti kathaṃcid yaḥ kartavyaḥ 
atha vā vrātam arhati vrātyety astu yakāro daṇḍādiḥ 
kā ca vrātam arhati 
yānekapuruṣopabhogyā puṃścalī sā hi puruṣavrātam arhati 
atha vānekapuruṣasvāmikā grāmasya dāsyaś ca vrātyāḥ 
ye tūdvāhahīnāṃ vrātyāṃ manyante teṣāṃ mate na mukhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ 
ayaṃ hi vrātyaśabdaḥ smṛtikāraiḥ sāvitrīpatiteṣu prayuktaḥ 
na ca strīṇāṃ tatsaṃbhavaḥ 
atha strīṇāṃ vivāhasya tadāpattivacanād upanayanam taddhīnapuruṣavad vrātyā gauṇas tarhi na mukhyaḥ 
yadi nāmopanayanaśabdo 'nupanayane vivāhe prayuktas tathāpy upanayanahīno vrātya ity ukte na vivāhahīna iti pratīyate 
tathāsiṃho 'yaṃ deśa ity ukte na siṃhaśabdasya māṇavake prayuktasyāpi deśasyāmāṇavakatvaṃ pratīyate 
asti tatra mukhya ihāsaṃbhava iti cet nāsaṃbhavamātranibandhanā gauṇī pratītiḥ 
kiṃ tarhi saṃbandham aparam upekṣya 
bhaved upanayanaśabdo vivāhe gauṇaḥ 
vrātyaśabdas tu gauṇa iti ko hetuḥ 
gauṇatve 'pi vivāhābhāvanibandhana iti durupapadam 
vrātyajāpi  kākāj jātaḥ kākaḥ śyenāj jātaḥ śyena iti  vrātyeti śaṅkyate 
bahusaṃbandhapratyāsattyā hi tatra rūpātideśapratipattiḥ 
vrātyabhāryā tu saty api saṃbandhe na vrātyaśabdena śakyābhidhātum 
so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhe hi puṃyogād ākhyāyām iti tathā bhavitavyam 
tāvataś cāyaṃ bhedavivakṣāyāṃ taddhiteneti 
tasmād yadi gauṇo vrātyaśabdo gṛhītavyas tajjātā pratyeyā 
atha śabdārthe vrātam arhatīti 
vivāhabhraṣṭā tu na mukhyā na gauṇīti 
na ca vivāhakālaḥ strīṇāṃ niyato yat kālād bhraṣṭā vrātyāḥ syuḥ 
yad api prāg ṛtor vivāhyāḥ tad api svayaṃvarasya ṛtumatyā vinā tat pareṇābhyanujñāta eva kāmam ā maraṇṃ tiṣṭhed gṛhe kanyā 
śūdro guptam aguptaṃ vā dvaijātaṃ varṇam āvasan 
aguptam aṅgasarvasvī guptaṃ sarveṇa hīyate 
śūdra ā cāṇḍālāt guptaṃ varṇaṃ dvaijātaṃ dvijātīnāṃ striya āvasan maithunena gacchan rakṣitā bhartrādibhiḥ sa niyamena daṇḍyaḥ 
ko daṇḍa iti cet aguptāṃ ced gacchaty aṅgasarvasvī hīyate 
aṅgaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ tadvān 
kena hīyate 
prakṛtatvāt tābhyām eva anyasyānirdeśāt viśeṣasyānupādānāt 
aparādhy evāṅgam 
guptaṃ ced gacchati sarveṇa hīyate 
naikenāṅgena yāvac charīreṇāpi 
hānyuddeśenāṅgacchedanasarvasvaharaṇamaraṇāny upadiṣṭāni bhavanti 
hānir asya kartavyety arthaḥ 
tathā ca gautamaḥ āryastryabigamane liṅgoddhāraḥ sarvasvaharaṇaṃ ca 
guptāṃ cet 
vaiśyaḥ sarvasvadaṇḍaḥ syāt saṃvatsaranirodhataḥ 
sahasraṃ kṣatriyo daṇḍyo mauṇḍyaṃ mūtreṇa cārhati 
vaiśyasya sarvasvadaṇḍa uktaḥ 
iha tu sāhacaryāt saty api dvijātitve na vaiśyasya samānajātīyāgame daṇḍo 'yam kiṃ tarhi brāhmaṇakṣatriyayor eva 
evaṃ kṣatriyasya brāhmaṇīgamane sahasraṃ mauṇḍyaṃ ca mūtreṇa 
udakasthāne gardabhamūtraṃ grahītavyam 
anye vyācakṣate 
anyasyānupādānāt samānajātīya eva saṃvatsaranirodhanena daṇḍādhikyam 
yadi saṃvatsaram avaruddhaṃ karoti tato 'yaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
ādyam eva tu vyākyānaṃ nyāyyam 
na ca samahīnottamānāṃ kathaṃ samadaṇḍatvam iti vācyam 
yata uktam sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ dārā rakṣyatamāḥ sadā iti 
brāhmaṇīṃ yady aguptāṃ tu gacchetāṃ vaiśyapārthivau 
vaiśyaṃ pañcaśataṃ kuryāt kṣatriyaṃ tu sahasriṇam 
aguptā vyākhyātā bhraṣṭaśīlā anāthā ca 
tadgamane vaiśyaṃ pañcasataṃ kuryāt 
karotiḥ prakaraṇād daṇḍane vartate 
daṇḍayed ity arthaḥ 
pañca śatāny asyeti pañcaśataḥ bahuvrīhir matvarthīyaḥ 
tathā kartavyaṃ yathā pañca śatāny asya bhavanti 
kiṃ yad adhikaṃ tat tasyāpahartavyam ity arthaḥ 
neti brūmaḥ 
tathā sati yasya pañca vai śatāni dhanaṃ vā nyūnaṃ tasya daṇḍo na kaścid uktaḥ syāt 
kas tarhy arthaḥ pañcaśataṃ kuryāt iti 
daṇḍādhikārād daṇḍaṃ pañcaśatasaṃbandhinaṃ kuryāt 
evaṃ sahasriṇaṃ kṣatriyam iti 
sahasram asyāsti daṇḍaḥ na gṛhe dhanam 
aṅgasarvasvī iti vyākhyeyam tathā kartavyaṃ yathāṅgaṃ sarvasvaṃ ca tasya daṇḍo bhavati 
kṣatriyasyādhiko daṇḍo rakṣādhikṛto rakṣati tat punaḥ sa evāparādhyati 
ubhāv api tu tāv eva brāhmaṇyā guptayā saha 
viplutau śūdravad daṇḍyau dagdhavyau vā kaṭāgninā 
tāv eva kṣatriyavaiśyau guptayā brāhmaṇyā viplutau kṛtamaithunau maithunapravṛttāv eva śūdravad daṇḍyau guptaṃ sarveṇa hīyate iti 
dagdhavyau vā kaṭāgninā 
vāśabdo vadhaprakāravikalpe na vadhavikalpe 
na hi śūdrasya gupte vadhād anyo daṇḍa āmnātaḥ 
sahasraṃ brāhmaṇo daṇḍyo guptāṃ viprāṃ balād vrajan 
śatāni pañca daṇḍyaḥ syād icchantyāḥ saha saṅgataḥ 
guptā bhraṣṭaśīlāpi yadi kenacid rakṣyate pitrā bhrātrā bandhubhir vā tāṃ haṭhād gacchan sahasraṃ brāhmaṇo dāpyaḥ 
guptā śīlavatī cet pravāsanāṅkane 'dhike 
athāpi śīlavaty api guptaśabdenocyate tathāpi sahasramātrād brāhmaṇo mucyate 
aṅkanapravāsane sarvatra mukhīkriyete paradārābhimarśe 
mauṇḍyaṃ prāṇāntiko daṇḍo brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate 
itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ daṇḍaḥ prāṇāntako bhavet 
yatra kṣatriyādīnāṃ vadha uktas tatra brāhmaṇasya mauṇḍyam 
yathā abrāhmaṇaḥ saṃgrahaṇāt prāṇānataṃ daṇḍam arhati tathā tu pumāṃsaṃ dāhayet iti 
prāṇānām antaṃ gacchati prāṇāntaṃ vā karoti prāṇāntakaḥ 
anyeṣv api dṛśyate iti ṇvul 
anye tu prāṇāntika iti pāṭhāntaram 
prāṇānte bhavaḥ prāṇāntikaḥ adhyātmāditvāṭ ṭhañ 
itareṣāṃ brāhmaṇād anyeṣāṃ kṣatriyādīnāṃ varṇānāṃ prāṇāntika eva śrutaṃ māraṇādipūrvam eva 
tadanantaram idam ucyate 
ucyamānaṃ mauṇḍyaṃ taccheṣatayā sahasraṃ daṇḍo vidhīyata iti manyante 
anyathā brāhmaṇasya prāṇāntadaṇḍavidhānāt kaḥ prasaṅgo brāhmaṇasya yenaivam ucyate mauṇḍyaṃ prāṇāntika iti 
pumāṃsaṃ dāhayet iti sāmānyavidhānaprasaktam iti cet tatraiva kartavyaṃ syāt tathā hi sphuṭaṃ tadviṣayatvaṃ pratīyeta 
na jātu brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt sarvapāpeṣv api sthitam 
rāṣṭrād enaṃ bahiḥ kuryāt samagradhanam akṣatam 
sarvapāpeṣv iti prakaraṇavidhau na kevalaṃ saṃgrahaṇe brāhmaṇo na hanyate yāvad anyeṣv apy aparādheṣu 
apiśabdo yugapat sarvapāpakāry api brāhmaṇo na jātu kadācid dhantavyaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi tasya pāpakāriṇaḥ kartavyam 
rāṣṭrād enaṃ viṣayād brāhmaṇaṃ bahiḥ kuryān nirvāsayet 
samagradhanaṃ sarvasvasahitam akṣatam akṣataśarīram 
dhanam apy asya nāpahartavyam 
kathaṃ tarhi daṇḍo brāhmaṇasya 
kecid āhuḥ 
nirvāsane tv ādhīyamānaṃ sadhanaṃ nirvāsya dhanadaṇḍaṃ pratiṣedhati 
anye tu samagradhanaṃ hṛtasarvasvaṃ kṛtvā nirvāsyata iti manyante 
na brāhmaṇavadhād bhūyān adharmo vidyate bhuvi 
tasmād asya vadhaṃ rājā manasāpi na cintayet 
pūrvaśeṣo 'yam arthavādaḥ 
na brāhmaṇavadhād anyo bahutaro 'dharmo duḥkhaphalo 'sti 
anyaśabdādhyāhāreṇa pañcamī 
tasmād dhetor asya brāhmaṇasya rājā māraṇam aṅgachedaṃ vā manasāpi necchet 
vaiśyaś cet kṣatriyāṃ guptāṃ vaiśyāṃ vā kṣatriyo vrajet 
yo brāhmaṇyām aguptāyāṃ tāv ubhau daṇḍam arhataḥ 
aguptāyā brāhmaṇyāṃ gamane vaiśyaṃ pañcaśataṃ kuryāt kṣatriyaṃ sahasriṇam iti 
tatra vaiśyasya pañcaśataḥ 
ya eva paripālayati sa eva cen nāśyati yuktaṃ tasya daṇḍamahattvam 
sahasraṃ brāhmaṇo daṇḍaṃ dāpyo gupte tu te vrajan 
śūdrāyāṃ kṣatriyaviśoḥ sāhasro vai bhaved damaḥ 
gupte kṣatriyāvaiśye gacchan brāhmaṇaḥ sahasraṃ daṇḍyaḥ 
pravāsanāṅkane sthite eva 
śūdrāyāṃ gamane kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ sāhasro daṇḍaḥ 
sahasram eva sāhasram svārthiko 'ṇ 
sahasraṃ vā asyāsti sāhasro daṇḍo 'nyapadārthaḥ 
matvarthīyo 'ṇ 
kṣatriyāyām aguptāyāṃ vaiśye pañcasataṃ damaḥ 
mūtreṇa mauṇḍyam ṛcchet tu kṣatriyo daṇḍam eva vā 
vaiśyasya pañca śatāni daṇḍaḥ aguptāṃ cet kṣatriyāṃ gacchati 
kṣatriyasya sa eva 
yadi vā mauṇḍyaṃ muṇḍanam ṛcchet prāpnuyād gardabhamūtreṇa 
eṣa eva vaiśyāgamana ubhayor daṇḍaḥ 
agupte kṣatriyāvaiśye śūdrāṃ vā brāhmaṇo vrajan 
śatāni pañca daṇḍyaḥ syāt sahasraṃ tv antyajastriyam 
brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyādyaguptāstrīgamana ubhayor daṇḍaḥ 
antyajaś caṇḍālaśvapacādiḥ 
tatra sahasram 
tatrāyaṃ sahasrapraṇadaṇḍasaṃgrahaḥ 
brāhmaṇasya caturṣv api varṇeṣu guptāgamane sahasram 
śrotriyadāreṣu pravāsanāṅkane 
anyatra pravāsānam eva 
śrotriyaḍāreṣu prāyaścittamahattvād eva kalpyate 
aguptāgamane pañcaśatāni pravāsanāṅkane 
yady apy aguptāparadārāvyapadeśyā bhavati vivāhasaṃskāre sati tathāpi svairiṇī bhartṛsvatām atikrāntā abrāhmaṇasya prāṇānto guptāgamane daṇḍo balāt 
sakāmāgamane sāhasro daṇḍaḥ pravāsanāṅkane ca 
guptāgamane vaiśyaṃ pañcaśataṃ kuryāt kṣatriyaṃ sahasriṇām iti 
yasya stenaḥ pure nāsti nānyastrīgo na duṣṭavāk 
na sāhasikadaṇḍaghno sa rājā śakralokabhāk 
yasya rājñaḥ pure deśe rāṣṭre stenaś cauro nāsti sa śakrasyendrasya lokaṃ sthānaṃ bhajate svargaṃ prāpnoti 
nānyastrīgo anyasya yā strī bhāryāvaruddhā punarbhūr vā strīgrahaṇam abhāryāyā apy asaṃbandhinyāḥ pratiṣedhārtham 
duṣṭvāk trividhasyākrośasya kartā 
sāhasika uktaḥ 
daṇḍena hanti daṇḍapāruṣyakṛt 
śakralokabhāg iti sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ 
stenādīnāṃ strīsaṃgrahaśeṣo 'yam arthavādaḥ 
eteṣāṃ nigraho rājñaḥ pañcānāṃ viṣaye svake 
sāmrājyakṛt sajātyeṣu loke caiva yaśaskaraḥ 
sāmrājyaṃ paraprāṇayitā svātantryam 
sajātyeṣu 
samānasparddhino rājānaḥ sajātyā abhipretāḥ 
teṣu mūrddhany adhitiṣṭhati tasyājñākarāḥ saṃbavantītyarthaḥ 
loke ca yaśaskara kīrtim utpādayanti 
ubhayatrāpi nigraha eva kartā hetutvāt 
janamārako 'yaṃ krodhana iti vadanty api tu stuvanti 
ṛtvijaṃ yas tyajed yājyo yājyaṃ cartvik tyajed yadi 
śaktaṃ karmaṇy aduṣṭaṃ ca tayor daṇḍaḥ śataṃ satam 
yajñe karmakara ṛtvik hotodgātrādiḥ 
yady api varaṇottarakālam ā prayogasamāptes tadvyapadeśas tathāpy atra prārabdhakarmaṇor itaretaratyāge na vidhir ayam kiṃ tarhi prāg varaṇāt 
bhūtapūrvagatyā ṛtvigvyavahāraḥ 
yaḥ prayogāntare vṛtaḥ sa eva śaktaḥ prayogāntare 'pi varitavyaḥ 
na kevalaṃ pūrvavṛtasyāyam atyāgaḥ kiṃ tarhi tatpitrādibhir api 
tathāhi pūrvo juṣṭaḥ svayaṃvṛtaḥ iti nāradaḥ 
na cāyam aikapuruṣiko niyamaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi kuladharmo 'yam 
tathā ca mahābhārate saṃvartamaruttīyeṣu prapañcitam 
tena tatkulāḥ pitrādibhir ṛtvijo vṛtās ta eva varītavyāḥ 
yājanakānām apy eṣa eva vidhiḥ 
tair api te yojanīyāḥ 
ṛtvijaṃ kṛtārtvijyaṃ tatkulīnaṃ vānyaṃ yo na vṛṇīta yiyakṣuḥ api tv anyaṃ yājakam arthayet 
śaktaṃ karmaṇi yajñe prayogajñam aduṣṭam abhiśaṃsanāṅgavaikalyādibhir doṣair ayuktam 
evam īdṛśa evartvig arthyamāno yadi nāṅgīkuryād yājakatvam aduṣṭam ebhir eva doṣair anākrāntaṃ yājyaṃ śaktaṃ vidvattayā ca 
tādṛśe tyāge tayoḥ śataṃ daṇḍaḥ 
ṛtvik śataṃ dāpyo yājyaṃ tyajan yājya ṛtvijam 
na kevalam ayam ṛtvigyājakadharmaḥ śiṣyācāryayor api 
tathā ca gautamaḥ athāyājakāv ṛtvigācāryau patanīyasevāyāṃ ca heyau 
anyatra hānāt patati iti 
dātṛsaṃpradānayor api pratigrahe kecid dharmam imam icchanti 
na mātā na pitā na strī na putras tyāgam arhati 
tyajann apatitān etān rājñā daṇḍyaḥ śatāni ṣaṭ 
mātā na tyāgam arhati 
na tyājyā 
tyāgaḥ svagṛhān niṣkāsanāṃ mātṛvṛtteḥ skhalitāyāḥ upakārasyopakriyāyām uditāyām akāraṇe 
evaṃ pitrādīnām api vyākhyeyam 
saṃbandhasāhacaryāt strī bhāryaivābhipretā 
apatitānām eṣāṃ tyāgo nāsti 
mātus tu na mātā putraṃ prati patatīty eke iti śātātapaḥ 
bhāryāyāś cāpi tyāgaḥ asaṃbhogo gṛhakāryaniṣedhaḥ 
bhaktavastrādidānaṃ tu na niṣidhyate 
yoṣitsu patitāsv api 
vastrānnapānaṃ deyaṃ ca vaseyuḥ svagṛhāntike iti paṭhyate 
āśrameṣu dvijātīnāṃ kārye vivadatāṃ mithaḥ 
na vibrūyān nṛpo dharmaṃ cikīrṣan hitam ātmanaḥ 
vānaprasthādīnām araṇyāśramavāsinām āśrameṣu kāryaṃ dharmaṃ saṃkaṭarūpam  ayaṃ śāstrārthaḥ nāyam  iti itaretaraṃ vivadamānānāṃ na dharmavyavasthāṃ sahasā vibrūyāt prabhutayā nirṇayam anyeṣām iva na kuryāt 
kathaṃ tarhi 
vakṣyamāṇena prakāreṇa 
evam ātmane hitaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati 
śāstrārthatyāgo na bhavatīty arthaḥ 
gṛhasthānām cāśramitve 'pi yathokta eva nirṇayaprakāraḥ 
kāryaṃ dhamasaṃśayātmakavivādapadam 
āśramagrahaṇāc ca viśiṣṭaviṣyatā vyākhyāyate 
yathārham etān abhyarcya brāhmaṇaiḥ saha pārthivaḥ 
sāntvena praśamayyādau svadhamaṃ pratipādayet 
yathā tat kartavyaṃ tathedānīm āha 
yo yādṛśī pūjām arhati gunānurūpeṇa taṃ tathaivābhyarcya brāhmaṇair mantripurohitādibhiḥ 
arcāyāṃ sāhityaṃ dharmapravacane vā 
tadā ca brāhmaṇāḥ satyā vijñeyāḥ 
taiḥ saha svadharmaṃ nyāyyam arthaṃ bodhayet 
siddhe mahattve sabhyebhya upadeśaḥ prādhānyārthaḥ 
tān puraskuryāt 
tathā hi 
na rājñaḥ krudhyanti śāstreṇa 
prītistutivacanaiḥ prathamaṃ praśamayya vyapanītakrodhān kṛtvā tato brūyāt 
prativeśyānuveśyau ca kalyāṇe viṃśatidvije 
arhāv abhojayan vipro daṇḍam arhati māṣakam 
viśanty asminn iti veśo nivāsaḥ tatpratigataḥ prativeśaḥ gṛhābhimukhaḥ tatra bhavaḥ prativeśyaḥ 
ādidīrghapāṭhe svārthiko 'ṇ 
evam anuveśyaḥ pṛṣṭhato vasann ucyate 
tau cen na bhojayet 
yadi svagṛham ānīya kalyāṇe vivāhādyutsave viṃśatimātrā yatra dvijā anye bhojyante tadā māṣakaṃ suvarṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dāpyaḥ 
hiraṇyam ity uttaratra viśeṣaṇād ihāpi vijñāyate 
arhau yadi tau prativeśyānuveśyau yogyau bhavataḥ na dviṣantau nātyantanirguṇau 
śrotriyāḥ śrotriyaṃ sādhuṃ bhūtikṛtyeṣv abhojayan 
tadannaṃ dviguṇaṃ dāpyo hiraṇyaṃ caiva māṣakam 
aprātiveśyārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ 
sabrahmacāriṇām ayaṃ niyamaḥ 
śrotriyas tādṛśam eva śrotriyaṃ guṇavantaṃ bhūtikṛtyeṣu  bhūtir vibhavas tannimiteṣu kāryeṣu  vibhave dhanasaṃpattau satyāṃ yāni kriyante goṣṭhībhojanādīni 
atha vā bhūtigrahaṇaṃ kṛtyaviśeṣaṇam 
bhūtimanti yāni kṛtyāni prācuryeṇa prabhūtatayā vivāhādīni kriyante yatra viṃśater adhikanarā bhojyante 
tādṛśeṣūtsaveṣu abhojayaṃs tadartham annaṃ bhūtikṛtyeṣu bhoktavyaṃ tāvaddviguṇaṃ tasmai dāpayet 
rājñe vā ubhayaṃ hiraṇyaṃ māṣakaṃ vā 
andho jaḍaḥ pīṭhasarpī saptatyā sthaviraś ca yaḥ 
śrotriyeṣūpakurvaṃś ca na dāpyāḥ kenacit karam 
saptatyā sthaviraḥ 
prakṛtyā virūpa itivat tṛtīyā 
saptatir varṣāṇi yasya jātasya sa evam ucyate 
śrotriyeṣu vedādhyāyiṣūpakurvan pādaśuśrūṣādinā kārukarmaṇā vā 
ete na kenacit śilpino māsi māsi ityādi dāpyāḥ 
kṣīṇakośenāpi na dāpyā iti kenacidgrahaṇam 
śrotriyaṃ vyādhitārtau ca bālavṛddhāv akiṃcanam 
mahākulīnam āryaṃ ca rājā saṃpūjayet sadā 
saṃpūjanam anugrahaḥ anekārthatvād dhātūnām 
na hi bālādīnām anyā pūjopapadyate 
śrotriyo 'tra brāhmaṇa eveti smaranti 
ārtaḥ priyaviyogādinā 
akiṃcano durgataḥ 
mahākulīnaḥ 
khyātidhanavidyāśauryādiguṇe kule jāto mahākulīnaḥ 
ārya ṛjuprakṛtir avakraḥ 
eteṣāṃ dānamānādibhir anugrahaḥ kartavyaḥ 
kecid akiṃcanaṃ mahākulīnaviśeṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣate 
śālmalīphalake ślakṣṇe nenijyān nejakaḥ śanaiḥ 
na ca vāsāṃsi vasobhir nirharen na ca vāsayet 
śālmalī nāma vṛkṣas tadvikāre phalake 
sa hi prakṛtyaiva śalkṣṇo bhavati 
na ca vāsaso 'pi pātair avayavā asya cyavante 
te hi cyutā vāsaḥ pāṭayeyuḥ 
na cāyaṃ jātiniyamo 'dṛṣṭāya 
tenānyad api yat kāṣṭham evaṃsvabhāvaṃ tatphalake na doṣaḥ 
ślakṣṇe 'paruṣe ca 
vāsāṃsy anyadīyāny anyadīyair vāsobhir na nirharet 
baddhvopariveṣṭya tīrthe prakṣālayituṃ na nayet 
bandhanād vāsasāṃ vināśo mā bhūt 
adhikaṃ hi tāni pīḍitāni bhavanti 
na ca vāsayet 
anyadīyāni vāsāṃsy anyasmai na prayacchet mūlyena vasanārthaṃ na dadyāt 
etad dhi vāsanam vaste 'paraḥ taṃ rajako vāsayati 
aśrutatvād daṇḍasya prakṛtamāṣakayojanā kartavyā 
tantuvāyo daśapalaṃ dadyād ekapalādhikam 
ato 'nyathā vartamāno dāpyo dvādaśakaṃ damam 
tatūn vayati tantuvāyaḥ kuvindaḥ 
śākaṭakādeḥ paṭasya kartā 
sa sūtrapalāni daśa gṛhītvā śāṭakaṃ vayan ekapalādhikaṃ vastraṃ dadyāt 
anayā vṛddhyā sarvaṃ dadyāt 
sthūlasūkṣmādivāsasāṃ romavatāṃ ca kalpanā kartavyā 
anyathā dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ 
vṛddhyadāne 'yaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
mūlacchede tu gaṇoktaḥ 
evaṃ viṃśatipalaṃ yadi na dadāti vṛddhiṃ dviguṇo daṇḍaḥ 
evaṃ kalpanā kāryā triguṇaś caturguṇa ityādi 
anye tu daṇḍaṃ rājabhāgam ity āhuḥ 
śulkasthāneṣu kuśalāḥ sarvapaṇyavicakṣaṇāḥ 
kuryur arghaṃ yathāpaṇyaṃ tato viṃśaṃ nṛpo haret 
yeṣu pradeśeṣu śulkam ādīyate tāni śulkasthānāni rājabhir vaṇigbhiḥ svapratideśaniyatāni kalpitāni 
teṣu sthāneṣu ye kuśalāḥ śaulkikāḥ ye dhūrtair na śakyante vañcayitum tathā sarveṣāṃ paṇyānām āgamakrayavikrayakṣayavyayasārāsārādividhijñā vicakṣaṇāḥ te bhāṇḍasyāgatasya deśāntarāt nīyamānasya vārghaṃ kuryuḥ 
tato viṃśatibhāgaṃ rājā gṛhṇīyāt 
kiṃ punar arghakaraṇena 
etāvad eva vaktavyaṃ paṇyānāṃ viṃśtibhāgam iti 
satyam yadā svarūpeṇa dravyaṃ rājā gṛhṇāti 
svarūpakāny upayujyante śāṭakādīni 
tatra viṃśatibhāgaḥ prāg viṃśater na pāṭanam antareṇopapadyata ity evamartham arghakaraṇam 
avikreyāṇām ātmopayogināṃ nāsti śulka iti jñāpituṃ yathāpaṇyam 
evaṃ kālānurūpyeṇa 
na sarvapaṇyaṃ sarvadā vikriyata ekarūpeṇārgheṇa 
ato deśakālāpekṣayā paṇyānām arghavyavasthā na niyato 'rgha iti 
rājñaḥ prakhyātabhāṇḍāni pratiṣiddhāni yāni ca 
tāni nirharato lobhāt sarvahāraṃ haren nṛpaḥ 
rājñaḥ saṃbandhitayā prakhyātāni yāni bhāṇḍāni rājopayogitayā  yathā hastinaḥ kāśmīreṣu kuṃkumam prācyeṣu paṭṭorṇādīni pratīcyeṣv aśvāḥ dākṣiṇātyeṣu maṇimuktādīni  yad yasya rājño viṣaye sulabham anyatra durlabhaṃ tatra tasya prakhyāpanaṃ bhavati 
tena hi rājāna itaretaraṃ saṃdadhate 
pratiṣiddhāni yāni rājñā madīyād deśān naitad anyatra neyam atraiva vā vikreyaṃ yathā durbhikṣe dhānyam ity evamādīni 
lobhān nirharato deśāntaraṃ nayato vikrīṇānasya vā sarvahāraṃ haret sarvaharaṇaṃ sarvahāraḥ 
ayaṃ dhanalobhān nayato daṇḍaḥ 
rājāntaropāyanārthaṃ tv adhikataraḥ śārīro 'pi durgāvarodhādiḥ 
śulkasthānaṃ pariharann akāle krayavikrayī 
mithyāvādī ca saṃkhyāne dāpyo 'ṣṭaguṇam atyayam 
krayavikrayī vāṇijaka ucyate 
śulkasthānaṃ pariharan utpathena gacchan akāle vā rātrau śulkādhyakṣeṣu gateṣu 
saṃkhyāne mithāvādī nyūnaṃ kathayati gaṇanāyām 
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat saṃkhyānam 
tena pracchādane 'py eṣa eva vidhiḥ 
dāpyo 'ṣṭaguṇam atyayaṃ danḍaḥ 
yāvad apahnute tāvadaṣṭaguṇam yāvān vā tasyāpahnutasyocitaḥ śulkas tadaṣṭaguṇaṃ dāpyaḥ 
ādyam eva yuktam 
atyayaśabdo hi tatra samañjasaḥ taddhetutvād dravye
