anye tv akāle krayavikrayī iti saṃbandhaṃ kurvanti 
akālaś cāgṛhīte śulke rahasi vā pratiṣedho 'yam 
āgamaṃ nirgamaṃ sthānaṃ tathā vṛddhikṣayāv ubhau 
vicārya sarvapaṇyānāṃ kārayet krayavikrayau 
āpaṇabhūmau ye vikretāras te na svecchayā mūlyaṃ kartuṃ labheran nāpi rājā krīṇīyāt svarucikṛtena mūlyena 
kathaṃ tarhi 
idam idaṃ nirūpyam 
āgamam  kiṃ pratyāgacchati deśāntarād uta na tatheyato dūrād āgacchati 
evaṃ nirgamasthāne  kiṃ saṃpraty eva vikriyate uta tiṣṭhati 
saṃprati niṣkrāmato dravyasya svalpo 'pi lābho mahāphalaḥ tadutthitena mūlyena dravyāntarāviṣayeṇa krayavikrayeṇa punar lābhaḥ 
sthānāt vṛddhikṣayau kiyaty asya vṛddhis tiṣṭhati kīdṛśo vā kṣayaḥ 
ity etat sarvaṃ parīkṣya svadeśe krayavikrayau kārayet 
yathā na vaṇijāṃ pīḍā bhavati nāpi kretṝṇām tathārghaṃ vyavasthāpayet 
pañcarātre pañcarātre pakṣe pakṣe 'tha vā gate 
kurvīta caiṣāṃ pratyakṣam arghasaṃsthāpanaṃ nṛpaḥ 
āgamanirgamanāder dravyasyānityatvād upacayāpacayāv arghasyānekarūpau 
tato 'rghasaṃsthāpanaṃ pañcarātre pañcarātre pratyakṣīkāryam na sakṛt kṛtaṃ mantavyam nāpi vaṇijo viśvasitavyāḥ 
kiṃ tarhi svayaṃ pratijāgaraṇīyam 
yad dravyaṃ cireṇa niṣkrāmati tatra pakṣe 'rghagaveṣaṇam anyatra pāñcarātrikam 
tulā mānaṃ pratīmānaṃ sarvaṃ ca syāt sulakṣitam 
ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu ca māseṣu punar eva parīkṣayet 
tulā prasiddhā 
mānaṃ prastho droṇa ityādi 
pratīmānaṃ suvarṇādīnāṃ paricchedārthaṃ yat kriyate 
sarvatobhāge tat sulakṣitaṃ rājacihnair aṅkitaṃ kāryam 
svayaṃ pratyakṣeṇa paricchidya svamudrayā 
parīkṣayet ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣu punaḥ parīkṣāṃ kārayed āptair adhikāribhir yathā na vicālayanti kecit 
paṇaṃ yānaṃ tare dāpyaṃ pauruṣo 'rdhapaṇaṃ tare 
pādaṃ paśuś ca yoṣic ca pādārdhaṃ riktakaḥ pumān 
nadītīre yānaṃ gantrīśakaṭādi tare paṇaṃ dāpyam 
bhāṇḍapūrṇānām uttaratropadeśād rikthabhāṇḍānāṃ yānānāṃ yānadravyānayanārtham uttarāryamāṇānām ayaṃ rājabhāgaḥ 
pauruṣavāhyo bhāro dravyānayanārtham ānīyamāno 'rdhapaṇaṃ dāpyaḥ 
paśur gomahiṣyādiḥ pādam strī ca 
riktako na kiṃcit 
yo gṛhītavān bāraṃ sa pumān pādārdhaṃ dāpyaḥ 
riktasya puṃso nadīlaṅghanasāmarthyasaṃbhāvanayā lāghavād alpam ādānam 
strī aśaktatvāt svayaṃ taraṇe bahu dāpyate 
tare taranimittam 
bhāṇḍapūrṇāni yānāni tāryaṃ dāpyāni sārataḥ 
riktabhāṇḍāni yat kiṃcit pumāṃsaś cāparicchadāḥ 
bhāṇḍaṃ dravyaṃ vastravrīhyādi 
tena pūrṇāni yānāni sāratas tāryaṃ tārārthaṃ dāpyāni 
yadi mahārghaṃ vastrādi tatra bahvāropitaṃ tadā bahu dāpyāni atha vrīhyādinā nātibhāreṇa tadālpam 
evaṃ nadyāḥ sutaradustaratvena kalpanā kartavyā 
riktabhāṇḍāni yānāni yat kiṃcit paṇapādāni 
bhāṇḍaśabdo 'tra dhanavacanaḥ 
ye cāparicchadās te na pādārdham api tu yat kiṃcit tato 'dhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vā 
atra na śakyo niyamaḥ ataḥ kalpanaiva śāstrārthaḥ 
dīrghādhvani yathādeśaṃ yathākālaṃ taro bhavet 
nadītīreṣu tad vidyāt samudre nāsti lakṣaṇam 
pārāvārottāraṇe pūrvaṃ dānam 
ayaṃ nāvā grāmāntaragamane 
dīrghādhvani yojanādiparimāṇena gantavye 
yathādeśam 
yasmin deśe yat taridānaṃ nāvikaiḥ sthāpitaṃ tad eva 
yathākālam 
kālo varṣādiḥ bahūdakaḥ tatrānyan mūlyam 
svalpodakāyāṃ sariti cireṇa grāmaprāptau nāvikānām adhikatarāyāsavatām adhikamūlyam 
taramūlye kāraṇe kāryaśabdas taro bhaved iti 
yāvad yāvad dīrgho deśas tāvat tāvat tarapaṇo vardhate 
etac ca nadītīreṣu vidyāt 
samudre sāgare nāsti taralakṣaṇam 
na śakyate lakṣayituṃ kati yojanāni naur vyūḍhā yena tadanusāreṇa mūlyaṃ kalpyate 
nadanadīṣu śakyate jñātum ayaṃ panthā yojanamātro dviyojana iti 
tatra hi tatra grāmāḥ parimāṇacihnam 
tatraikayojane 'dhvani yan mūlyaṃ dviguṇaṃ tad dviyojane 
samudre tu bahuvāhyā nauḥ na ca suṣṭu śakyate yojanādiparicchedaḥ kartum 
ata evoktaṃ samudre nāsti lakṣaṇam iti 
garbhiṇī tu dvimāsādis tathā pravrajito muniḥ 
brāhmaṇā liṅginaś caiva na dāpyās tārikaṃ tare 
dvābhyāṃ māsābhyām ṛtudarśanasya vyaktagarbhā strī bhavati 
tasyā anugrāhyatvāt tarapaṇo na grāhyaḥ 
pravrajitaś caturthāśramī 
munis tāpasaḥ 
brāhmaṇā liṅgino brahmacāriṇaḥ 
brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam 
tena bāhyapravrajyāliṅgadhariṇāṃ naiṣa vidhiḥ 
taraprayojanaṃ tārikaṃ paṇādi taranimittaṃ na dāpyāḥ 
vṛttānurodhāt tārikam iti siddhe taragrahaṇam 
yan nāvi kiṃcid dāśānāṃ viśīryetāparādhataḥ 
tad dāśair eva dātavyaṃ samāgamya svato 'ṃśataḥ 
nāvyāropitabhāṇḍaṃ taraṇikāyāṃ yad dāśānāṃ nāvikānām aparādhād āvartamānajalena pradeśena nayatāṃ vā tatsthānaṃ jñātvā dṛḍhabandhanena jalapraveśam akurvatāṃ vadhryādinahanībhir ayomayībhiś carmabandhaiḥ sūtrabandhair vā śithilīkṛtavātāṃ yadi bhāṇḍaṃ viśīryeta vināśyeta tadā tair eva dātvyaṃ svato 'ṃśataḥ svabhāgād bhāṇḍasvāmine samāgamya yāvanto nāvyārūḍhā dāśāḥ 
eṣa nauyāyinām ukto vyavahārasya nirṇayaḥ 
dāśāparādhatas toye daivike nāsti nigrahaḥ 
naubhir yānti tacchīlā nauyāninaḥ teṣām eṣa vidhir ukto yathā dāśāparādhād yad bhraṣṭam udake tad dadyuḥ 
daivike doṣa utpāte vātādinā naubhaṅge nāsti nāvikānāṃ dravyanāśe nigrahaḥ 
eṣa sthale bhāṇḍavāhakānāṃ bhārikāṇāṃ vā nyāyaḥ 
yady apramādena prakrāmati bhāriko gṛhītadaṇḍāvalaṃbano dṛḍhabandhoparibhāgo 'kasmād dṛṣṭyā pathi kardamīkṛte patitasya bhāṇḍaṃ naśyen na bhārikasya doṣaḥ syāt 
vāṇijyaṃ kārayed vaiśyaṃ kusīdaṃ kṛṣim eva ca 
paśūnāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ caiva dāsyaṃ śūdraṃ dvijanmanām 
iha kecid vyācakṣate 
anicchantāv api vaiśyaśūdrau balād eva tāni karmāṇi kārayitavyau yata etayoḥ svadharmo 'yam 
saty api dṛṣṭārthatve 'dṛṣṭārthatā vidyate niyamavidhitvāt 
evaṃ ca sati brāhmaṇo 'pi haṭhāt pratigrāhayitavya ity āpatati 
pakṣa eva doṣatvenāyam ukta iti ced atrāpy eṣa eva pakṣaḥ 
tad ayuktam 
satyāṃ dhanārthitāyāṃ śāstrato niyamaḥ 
na tu vidhinibandhanaiva pravṛttiḥ 
yatra svayaṃ prayojakam asti tatra na vidhiḥ prayoktṛtvam 
niyamāṃśe tu vidher vyāpāraḥ 
sa cedṛśo niyamaḥ 
vaiśyam eva kārayed vāṇijyam anyaṃ kurvāṇam asatyām āpadi daṇḍayet 
evaṃ brāhmaṇam eva pratigraham 
tathā ca pratigrahasamartho 'pi saṃtoṣaparaś ca syād ity āpadyate 
yad api śrūyate anicchataḥ apīti so 'rthavādaḥ 
śūdram eva dāsyam ity evaṃ sarvatra niyamarūpatā draṣṭavyā 
kṣatriyaṃ caiva vaiśyaṃ ca brāhmaṇo vṛttikarśitau 
bibhṛyād ānṛśaṃsyena svāni karmāṇi kārayan 
vṛttyā karśitau brāhmaṇo bibhṛyād bhaktadānādinā kṣatriyavaiśyayor bharaṇaṃ kuryāt 
ānṛśaṃsyena anukampayā svāni karmāṇi kārayet brāhmaṇasya yāni svāni samitkuśodakuṃbhāharaṇādīni 
atha vā kṣatriyavaiśayor yāni svāni 
kṣatriyo grāmarakṣādau niyoktavyo vaiśyaḥ svakṛṣipasupālyādau 
mahādhano yo brāhmaṇo mahāparicchadaś ca sāmarthyāt tasyaiṣa vidhiḥ 
svāni karmāṇīti vacanāt dāsyaṃ na kārayitavyau garhitocchiṣṭamārjanādi 
dāsyaṃ tu kārayaṃl lobhād brāhmaṇaḥ saṃskṛtān dvijān 
anicchataḥ prābhavatyād rājñā daṇḍyaḥ śatāni ṣaṭ 
saṃskṛtā upanītāḥ 
yady api dvijagrahaṇād evaital labhyate tathāpi traivarṇikajātyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ na vijñāyīti 
yo brāhmaṇaḥ samānajātīyān dāsyaṃ pādadhāvanocchiṣṭāvakaraṇasaṃmārjanādirūpam anicchataḥ 
prabhavato bhāvaḥ prābhavatyaṃ prabhutvam 
śakyātiśayayogato balādinā yaḥ kārayati sa ṣaṭśatāni daṇḍyaḥ 
lobhād etat 
dveṣādibhis tv adhiko daṇḍyaḥ 
śatrantasya bhavater bhāvapratyaye prābhavatyād iti rūpam 
prabhutveneti vacanād guror na doṣaḥ 
anicchata iti vacanād icchatām anyo daṇḍaḥ 
śūdraṃ tu kārayed dāsyaṃ krītam akrītam eva vā 
dāsyāyaiva hi sṛṣṭo 'sau brāhmaṇasya svayaṃbhuvā 
krītam akrītaṃ bhaktādyupanatam 
vakṣyamāṇasya vidher anuvādo 'yam 
dāsyāyaivety arthavādaḥ 
na svāminā nisṛṣṭo 'pi śūdro dāsyād vimucyate 
nisargajaṃ hi tat tasya kas tasmāt tad apohati 
yam āśritaḥ saptabhir dāsayonibhis tena nisṛṣṭo 'pi tanmukto 'pi 
kiṃ tu nisargajaṃ sahajaṃ jatisahabhāvi kaḥ tasmāc chūdrāt tad dāsyam apohati apanayati 
yathā śūdrajātir na tasyāpanetuṃ śakyā evaṃ dāsyam api 
arthavādo 'yam 
yato vakṣyati nimittaviśeṣe śūdrasya dāsyān mokṣaḥ 
dhvajāhṛto bhaktadāso gṛhajaḥ krītadatrimau 
paitriko daṇḍadāsaś ca saptaite dāsayonayaḥ 
dhvajagrahaṇaṃ vāhanopalakṣaṇārtham 
dhvajinī senocyate 
tata āhṛtaḥ 
saṃgrāme jitaḥ san dāsīkṛtaḥ 
kiṃ punar idaṃ kṣatriyasya vacanam yuddhe jitaḥ kṣatriyo dāsībhavati 
neti brūmaḥ śūdrasyaiva prakṛtatvāt dāsyāyaiva sṛṣṭo 'sau iti 
svāminaṃ jitvā tadīyo dāsa āhṛtaḥ 
āhartur dāsyaṃ pratipadyate 
nanu śūdrasya viśeṣeṇaiva dāsyam uktam nisargajaṃ tat tasya iti 
naivam 
tathā saty avyavasthā syāt kasyāsau dāsa iti na vijñāyate 
sarve hi traivarṇikās tasya dāsyāḥ 
svadharmam anuvṛttasya cāniyamo 'vidhitvāt 
anye tu sarve cottarottaraṃ paricareyuḥ iti kṣatriyādīnām api dāsyam asti 
tad asat 
anyad dāsyam anyā paricaryā 
nikṛṣṭakarmakāritvam apy ajñātasya dāsyam 
sarvasya preṣitasyāpratibandhaḥ 
paricaryā tu śarīrasaṃvāhanam arthadārādirakṣādhikāraḥ 
nāradena caitat prapañcitam 
bhaktalābhārthaṃ dāsyaṃ pratipanno bhaktadāsaḥ 
gṛhe jāto gṛhajaḥ 
dāsyām utpanno garbhadāsaḥ 
krīto būlyena svāminaḥ sakāśāt 
datrimaḥ prītyādṛṣṭārthaṃ vā dattaḥ 
kramāgataḥ paitrikaḥ 
atha gṛhajasyāsya ca ko viśeṣaḥ 
gṛhajas tadīyāyām eva dāsyāṃ jāta itaras tu kramāgataḥ 
daṇḍadāso rājñe daṇḍaṃ dātum aśakto dāsīkriyate 
karmaṇāpi samaṃ kuryāt ity avarṇasyāpi dāsyam icchanti 
tad ayuktam 
anyad dāsyam anyac ca tatkarmakāritvam 
na cāyaṃ daṇḍo yenāntarbhavet 
na ca dāsayonipuruṣadhāraṇam uktam kevalaṃ karmaṇāpīti 
tathā dāsakarmāpy asti 
nanu ca dharmopanato 'pi śūdro dāsa iṣyate 
tatra kathaṃ sapta dāsayonayaḥ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
na tasyotpattikaṃ dāsatvam 
icchādhīnatvād dharmārthinaḥ 
na hi tasya dānādhānakriyā yujyante krītagṛhajādidāsavat 
evaṃ hy uktam yathā yathā hi sadvṛttam iti 
tenaivaṃ bruvataitat pradarśitaṃ bhavati na tasya nityaṃ dāsyaṃ kiṃ tarhi phalaviśeṣārthinaḥ 
tataś cānicchato na dāsyam asti 
ato yadi śūdro vidyamānadhanaḥ svātantryeṇa jīved brāhmaṇādyanapāśrito na jātu duṣyet 
bhāryā putraś ca dāsaś ca traya evādhanāḥ smṛtāḥ 
yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tad dhanam 
ete trayo 'rjitadhanā apy adhanāḥ 
svāmino dhanam 
yat kiṃcit te dhanam arjayanti tad dhanaṃ tasya svaṃ yasya te svatvam āpannāḥ 
bhāryādhanaṃ bhartuḥ pituḥ putrasya svāmino dāsasya 
nanu ca yady ete nirdhanāḥ katham eṣāṃ karmabhir adhikāraḥ 
tatredaṃ nopapadyate putrau ced āhitāgnī syātāṃ yebhyaḥ pitā dadyāt tebhyaḥ putraḥ iti 
dampatyor api sahajadharmaś caritavyaḥ dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nāticaritavyā tvayā iti 
yadi ca nirdhanā ko 'nyo 'rthe 'naticāraḥ 
śūdrasyāpi pākayajñaiḥ svayaṃ yajeta iti nirdhanatve virudhyate 
svacchandaśūdraviṣayatvena virodho na bhavet 
asti tāvad dāsānāṃ svadhane svāmyam yadā svadhanam iti vyapadiśyate 
na hy asati saṃbandhe vyapadeśaḥ 
arjanaṃ ca svatvaṃ nāpādayatīti vipratiṣiddham 
tasmād viruddham idaṃ yat te samadhigacchanti na tat teṣāṃ svam iti 
yathā kaścid brūyāt yasyā ahaṃ putraḥ sā na mama jananī iti tādṛg etat 
asati vā strīṇāṃ svāmye patnyaiva ratam anumataṃ kriyate patnī vai pāriṇahyasyeśe ityādi śrutayo nirālambanāḥ syuḥ 
atrocyate 
pāratantryavidhānam etat 
asatyāṃ bhartur anujñāyāṃ na strībhiḥ svātantryeṇa yatra kvacid dhanaṃ viniyoktavyam 
evaṃ putradāsyor api draṣṭavyam 
anye tu manyante bhāryāputragrahaṇaṃ dāsārtham 
tasya caitad vacanam uttarārtham 
āpadi tāsāṃ dhanagrahaṇe na vicikitsitavyam bhartur eva hi tat svam 
visrabdhaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śūdrād dravyopādānam ācaret 
na hi tasyāsti kiṃcit svaṃ bhartṛhāryadhano hi saḥ 
tathā ca kaścid āha dharmopagataśūdraviṣayam idam 
tad uktam viśeṣe pramāṇābhāvāt 
tasmāt sarvasya dāsaḥ śūdras tasyaiva pratigrāhyatvam ucyate 
visrabdhaṃ niḥśaṅkam 
śūdradhanaṃ kathaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt pratiṣiddhaṃ hi tat ity eṣā śaṅkā na kartavyā 
yato na tasya kiṃcid artho yasya nicayaḥ syād ity uktaṃ bhavati 
bhartrā svāminā hriyate dhanam asya etad evārjane tasya prayojanam svāmī gṛhṇāti 
ato visrabdhaṃ dravyopādānaṃ dravyagrahaṇaṃ kuryāt 
tenānupanīyamānam api svagṛhastham iva viniyuñjīta 
sati prayojana etad yuktaṃ bhavati 
avidyamānadhanasya dāsāc chūdrāt pratigṛhṇato na doṣaḥ 
vaiśyaśūdrau prayatnena svāni karmāṇi kārayet 
tau hi cyutau svakarmabhyaḥ kṣobhayetām idaṃ jagat 
karma vyatikrāmantaḥ kṣobhayeyur ākulīkuryur jagadat 
atas te prayatnena svakarmabhyaś cyāvayituṃ na labheran 
analpa evātikrāme bhūyasā daṇḍena yojanīyā vaiśyā api 
bandhanaṃ nāsti 
api dhanaśakyaḥ svadharmaḥ 
ahany ahany avekṣeta karmāntān vāhanāni ca 
āyavyayau ca niyatāv ākarān kośam eva ca 
rājadharmāṇām anusaṃdhānārtham 
karmāntāḥ kṛṣiśulkasthānādayaḥ 
vāhanam hastyādi 
āyavyayam idam asya praviṣṭam idaṃ niryātam ity eva satataṃ gaveṣaṇīyam 
ākarāḥ dhātavaḥ suvarṇādyutpāde bhavanti bhūmayaḥ 
kośaḥ dravyanicayasthānam 
evaṃ sarvān imān rājā vyavahārān samāpayan 
vyapohya kilbiṣaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim 
uktena prakāreṇa vyavahārān ṛṇādīn samāpayan nirṇayāvasānaṃ kurvan yat kiṃcit tat sarvam avijñātadoṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ vyapohya apanudya pāpaṃ paramāṃ gatim abhipretāṃ svargāpavargabhūmiṃ prāpnoti labhate 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ
rājadharme vyavahāranirṇaye sāmānyavyavahāro nāma aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ 
iti śrībhaṭṭavīrasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithikṛte
manubhāṣye 'ṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ 
atha navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
puruṣasya striyāś caiva dharmye vartmani tiṣṭhatoḥ 
saṃyoge viprayoge ca dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān 
strīsaṃgrahaṇānantaraṃ vivādapadanirdeśaḥ strīpuṃdharmo vibhāgaś ca iti 
tad idānīm ucyate 
atyanta dyupasṛṣṭena bhartrā kathaṃcid api bādhyamānayā tena saha rājani vivaditavyam iti vidha eva nyāyānuvartini na dveṣamatsarādimatibhāryāyāṃ tathā ca viśīla ti tathāvidhasya patyur upacaryoktā 
na bhāryāṃ prati prabhutvam 
upacāraś ca bhṛtyavac chuśrūṣā pādasaṃvāhanādi 
strīpuruṣaśabdau ca yady api liṅgaviśeṣāvacchinnamanuṣyajātivacanau tathāpīha saṃbandhini jāyāpatyā asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ kāryāḥ puruṣaiḥ svair divāniśam iti svagrahaṇena saṃbandhitāṃ lakṣayati 
vartamānapratijñāvacana prayojana bhartuḥ striyāś ca jāyāyāḥ saṃyoga ekatra saṃnidhāne tathā viprayoge pravāsapryāṇe dharme yā vṛttiḥ prasādhanaṃ śarīrarakṣā hi tān vakṣyāmi 
śāśvatagrahaṇaṃ stutiḥ 
dharmye vartmani tiṣṭhatoḥ 
anuvādo 'yam 
nyāyyo dharmaśāstrācāranirūḍho mārgaḥ 
asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ kāryāḥ puruṣaiḥ svair divāniśam 
viṣayeṣu ca sajjantyaḥ saṃsthāpyā ātmano vaśe 
svecchayā strīṇāṃ dharmārthakāmeṣu vyavahartuṃ na deyam 
yat kiṃcana dhanaṃ dharmādau viniyujyate tatra yathāvayaḥ svapuruṣāḥ patyādayo 'nujñāpanīyāḥ 
svapuruṣāḥ rakṣādhikṛtāḥ pitā rakṣati ityādinirdiṣṭāḥ 
viṣayeṣu hi gītādiṣu sajjantyaḥ prasaṅgaṃ kurvantya ātmano vaśe sthāpyās tato nivāraṇīyāḥ 
yady apy asvatantrā ity anenaiva sarvakriyāviṣayā svātantryanivṛttir upadiṣṭā bhavati tathāpi punar viṣayavyāvṛttivacanaṃ yatnataḥ parihārārtham 
mā vijñāyi yat tebhya eva parapuruṣasaṃparkādibhyo nivāraṇīyāḥ gṛhāvasthitās tu madyapānādisaktā na duṣyanti 
caśabdena tāvad ayaṃ dharmaḥ puruṣāṇām uktaḥ 
svātantryaṃ strīṇāṃ tāvan na deyam arthāt tu tābhir api svatantrābhir na bhavitavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati 
evaṃ ca puruṣasya stryāś caiva iti caśabdena itaretaraviṣayor ye strīpuṃsayor dharmās ta evocyante 
na tu yāgādaya iti samanvayo bhavati 
pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane 
rakṣanti sthavire putrā na strī svātantryam arhati 
rakṣā nāmānarthapratīghātaḥ 
anarthas tv anācaravṛttātikrameṇāpravṛttipareṇa cānyāyato dhanaharaṇādinā paribhavaḥ 
tasya pratīghāto nivāraṇam 
tatpitrādibhiḥ kartavyam 
rakṣatīti bhavantir liṅarthe chāndasatvāt 
tato rakṣed iti vidheyapratyayaḥ 
vayovibhāgaśravaṇaṃ cādhikataradoṣārtham 
sarva eva tu sarvadā rakṣārtham adhikriyante 
kaumāragrahaṇaṃ dānāt pūrvakālopalakṣaṇārtham 
evaṃ yauvanaṃ jīvadbhartṛkāyāḥ pradarśanam 
ataś ca nityānuvāda evāyam 
yadā yadā yadadhīnā tadā tadā tenāvaśyaṃ rakṣitavyā 
tathā ca jīvaty api bhartari pituḥ putrasya cādhikāraḥ 
tathādarśitaṃ mānave 
sarva ete sarvadā tatsaṃrakṣaṇam kuryuḥ 
kathyamānaṃ tu granthagauravaṃ karoti 
nanu ca bālayā vā yuvatyā vā ity anenoktam evaitat 
maivam 
anyad evāsvātantryam anyā ca rakṣā 
tatra cāsvātantryam upadiṣṭam iha tu rakṣocyate 
anyatantrāyā api śakyo 'narthaḥ pratihantum 
nanu cehāpi paṭhyate na strī svātantryam arhatīti 
ucyate 
nānena sarvakriyāviṣayam asvātantryaṃ vidhīyate 
kiṃ tarhi nāsvatantrānyamanaskā svātmasaṃrakṣaṇāya prabhavati śaktivikalatvāt svataḥ 
pañcame tu vacanam asvātantryārtham arthāntarasya tatroktatvāt 
kāle 'dātā pitā vācyo vācyaś cānupayan patiḥ 
mṛte bhartari putras tu vācyo mātur arakṣitā 
dānakāle prāpte yadi pitā na dadāti yaḥ 
kaḥ punaḥ kanyāyā dānakālaḥ 
aṣṭamād varṣāt prabhṛti prāg ṛtoḥ iti smaryate 
ihāpi liṅgam asti tiḥ 
anupayann anupagacchann aramayan bhāryābhir nighnaḥ 
upagamane kālaś ṛtuḥ parvavarjyam ity uktaḥ 
sūkṣmebhyo 'pi prasaṅgebhyaḥ striyā rakṣyā viśeṣataḥ 
dvayor hi kulayoḥ śokam āvaheyur arakṣitāḥ 
prasaṅgaḥ kusaṃparkaḥ 
yayā kadācid avijñānaśīlayā ṇa bālena vā gṛhadvārāvasthānadinojvalaveṣapuruṣadarśanaśīlayety evamādaya uccyante 
arthāc cittacalane kṣyatvaṃ caiṣām 
naite kila sākṣād doṣarūpāḥ 
na hi sākṣāt strīsaṃparkaḥ striyo doṣarūpāḥ sūkṣmād ity ucyate 
tato rakṣyāḥ nivāraṇīyāh 
viśeṣataḥ prayatnena nivāraṇe dāradaḥ taś ca 
sarvais tatkulīnair bhrātṛpitṛvyadevarādyai rakṣitavyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati 
na tatrā 
imaṃ hi sarvavarṇānāṃ paśyanto dharmam uttamam 
yatante rakṣituṃ bhāryāṃ bhartāro durbalā api 
cāturvarṇyasya eṣa uttamo paśyanto jānānāḥ durbalā api bhartāro bhāryāṃ rakṣituṃ yateran prayatnaṃ kuryuḥ 
liṅarthe bhavantī yata vastvanijaguptītamatareyat tatra maṇāparivṛtaṃ bahir āvirodbhijātaṃ vadhūvapurahorataye 'tirāgāt 
a kṣābhāya kiyaṃcin niyamenavatidyumānārājakulam āśrayādinā rakṣitavyā 
svāṃ prasūtiṃ caritraṃ ca kulam ātmānam eva ca 
svaṃ ca dharmaṃ prayatnena jāyāṃ rakṣan hi rakṣati 
na kevalaṃ śāstropadeśād eva strīrakṣā kartavyā 
yāvad imāni bahūni prayojanāni 
prasūtir apatyaṃ putraduhitṛlakṣaṇam 
saṃkaro na bhavatīty arthaḥ 
caritraṃ śiṣṭasamācāraḥ 
kulaṃ pūrvoktam 
kasyāpi satkulasya bhraṣṭaśīlāyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ doṣaḥ sarvaṃ kulam upatiṣṭhatīti na sādhvyaḥ striya eteṣām iti 
atha vā pitṛpitāmahādīnāṃ saṃtatiśuddhyabhāvād aurdhvadaihikasyānivṛtte rakṣā syāt 
ātmānam 
prasiddham upapatināvaśyaṃ hanyate bhāryayaiva vā viṣādinā 
svaṃ ca dharmam 
vyabhicāriṇyā dharmānadhikārāt 
ato jāyāṃ rakṣitā sarvam etad rakṣati 
patir bhāryāṃ saṃpraviśya garbho bhūtveha jāyate 
jāyāyās tad dhi jāyātvaṃ yad asyāṃ jāyate punaḥ 
arthavādo 'yam 
na ca patyuḥ patnyā udare praveśadarśanam 
ataḥ śarīrasārabhūtaśukradvāreṇa guṇavādataḥ praveśo 'yam ucyate 
ātmā vai putranāmāsi iti etad eva jāyāśabdasya bhāryāvacanatve pravṛttinimittam 
yato 'syāṃ patir jāyate 
apatyajanmanimitte jāyāśabde jārasyāpi jāyocyate 
yādṛśaṃ bhajate hi strī sutaṃ sūte tathāvidham 
tasmāt prajāviśuddhyarthaṃ striyaṃ rakṣet prayatnataḥ 
svāṃ prasūtim iti yad uktaṃ tad darśayati 
na caivaṃ mantavyam yādṛśaṃ dvitīyaṃ puruṣaṃ seveta sutaṃ sūte putraṃ janayati tathāvidhajātīyam 
nāpi guṇasādṛśyam abhipreta 
yataḥ śūdrādijātasya caṇḍālādijātitvam 
samānajātīyajātasyāpi naiva tajjātīyatva patnīṣv akṣatayoniṣu iti vacanāt 
guṇasādṛśye 'pi viśīladaridrapatikāyā utkṛṣṭapuruṣagamanam anujñātaṃ syāt 
yadā tv ayam arthavādas tadā yādṛśaṃ tathāvidham ity akulānurūpam iti nīyate 
na kaścid yoṣitaḥ śaktaḥ prasahya parirakṣitum 
etair upāyayogais tu śakyās tāḥ parirakṣitum 
vakṣyamāṇopāyapraśaṃsārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
prasahya balenāvaṣṭabhya śuddhāntāvarodhādinā parapuruṣādiniṣkāsanādinā na śakyā rakṣitum 
kiṃ tv etair upāyayogaiḥ śakyāḥ 
yogāḥ prayogāḥ 
upāyaiḥ prayujyamānair ity arthaḥ 
arthasya saṃgrahe cainām vyaye caiva niyojayet 
śauce dharme 'nnapaktyāṃ ca pāriṇāhyasya vekṣaṇe 
artho dhanam 
tasya saṃgrahaḥ saṃkhyādinā paricchidya rakṣārtham veśmani nidhānaṃ rajjvāyasabandhādinā saṃyamya sthāpanaṃ mudrāṅkam ityevamādi 
vyayo visargas tasyaiva idam etāvad bhaktārtham idaṃ ca sūpārtham etāvac chākārtham iti 
śaucaṃ darvipiṭharādiśuddhir bhūmilepanādiś ca 
dharma ācamanodakatarpaṇādidānaṃ strīvāsagṛhakādau balikusumavikārair devārcanam 
annapaktiḥ prasiddhā 
pāriṇāhyaṃ yat syād āsandīkhaṭvādi 
tatpratyavekṣaṇe niyoktavyā 
arakṣitā gṛhe ruddhāḥ puruṣair āptakāribhiḥ 
ātmānam ātmanā yās tu rakṣeyus tāḥ surakṣitāḥ 
āptaṃ prāptaṃ kāle taṃ kurvanty āptakāriṇo 'vadhānavanta ucyante śuddhāntādhikāriṇaḥ kañcukinaḥ 
taiḥ sve gṛhe ruddhāś cāsvatantrīkṛtā yatheṣṭavihāraniṣedhena rakṣyamāṇā na rakṣitā bhavanti 
kiṃ tv ātmanātmānaṃ rakṣanti 
tāḥ kathaṃ rakṣanti 
yady eteṣu karyeṣu niyujyante 
uktopāyapraśaṃsā nopāyāntaraniṣedhaḥ 
pānaṃ durjanasaṃsargaḥ patyā ca viraho 'ṭanam 
svapno 'nyagehavāsaś ca nārīsaṃdūṣaṇāni ṣaṭ 
aṭanam āpaṇabhūmiṣu annaśākādikrayārtham devatāyataneṣu ca 
jñātikule bahūni dināny apy avasthānam anyagehavāsaḥ 
nārīsaṃdūṣaṇāni 
strīṇām ete cittasaṃkṣobhahetavaḥ 
ete hi śvaśurādibhayaṃ janāpavādabhayaṃ ca tyajanti 
naitā rūpaṃ parīkṣante nāsāṃ vayasi saṃsthitiḥ 
surūpaṃ vā virūpaṃ vā pumān ity eva bhuñjate 
nāyam abhimāno voḍhavyaḥ subhagaḥ svākṛtis taruṇo 'haṃ mām hitvā katham anyaṃ kāmayiṣyate 
yato naitā darśanīyo 'yaṃ śūrākṛtir ayam ity eva vicārayanti 
pumān ayam ity etāvataiva buñjate saṃyujyante tena 
pauṃścalyāc calacittāc ca naisnehyāc ca svabhāvataḥ 
rakṣitā yatnato 'pīha bhartṛṣv etā vikurvate 
yasmin kasmiṃś ca puṃsi dṛṣṭe dhairyāc calanam  katham etena saṃprayujyeyeti  cetaso vikāraḥ strīṇāṃ tat pauṃścalyam 
anyatrāpi dharmādau kārye 'sthiratā calacittatvāt 
ya eva dveṣyaḥ sa eva spṛhyata iti bhrātṛputrādir yo dṛṣṭas tasmā eva kāmukatvena spṛhayanti 
sneho rāgas tṛṣṇā ca bhartari putrādau mānavibaddhahṛdayā bhavanti 
etair doṣair yogād vikurvate vikriyāṃ bhartṛṣu gacchanti 
tasmāt 
evaṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātvāsāṃ prajāpatinisargajam 
paramaṃ yatnam ātiṣṭhet puruṣo rakṣaṇaṃ prati 
prajāpatir hiraṇyagarbhaḥ 
tadīye nisarge sṛṣṭikāle jātam 
śiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭam 
śayyāsanam alaṃkāraṃ kāmaṃ krodham anāryatām 
drogdhṛbhāvaṃ kucaryāṃ ca strībhyo manur akalpayat 
śayyā śayanaṃ svapnaśīlatvam 
āsanam anabhyutthānaśīlatā 
alaṃkāraḥ śarīramaṇḍanam 
kāmaṃ puruṣopabhogaspṛhā 
krodho dveṣaḥ 
anāryatā snigdhe 'pi dveṣo dviṣṭe 'pi snehaḥ ākārasaṃvaraṇaṃ nirddharmatā 
drogdhṛbhāvaḥ 
drogdhṛtvaṃ bhartṛpitrādeḥ puruṣavyasanīyatayādharmātmakatvaṃ bhartrādīnām 
druheḥ kartari tṛcā bhāvaśabdena samāsaḥ 
kucaryā nīcapuruṣasevanam 
eṣa svabhāvaḥ strīṇāṃ manunā sargādau kalpitaḥ 
śayyāsaṇālaṃkārā drohakucaryayor dṛṣṭāntatvenopadīyante 
yathaite padārthāḥ svabhāvabhūtā avicālitā evaṃ kucaryādayo 'pi 
nāsti strīṇāṃ kriyā mantrair iti dharme vyavasthitiḥ 
nirindriyā hy amantrāś ca striyo 'nṛtam iti sthitiḥ 
kecid evaṃ nanyante 
saty api pramadāvyabhicāre vaidikena jāpena rahasyaprāyaścittādinā śuddhim āpsyanti tato nāsti doṣa iti 
tan na 
na hi strīṇāṃ mantraiḥ kriyā japo 'py asti 
yena vṛttavyatikrame 'prakhyātau svata eva vaiduṣāc chuddhim āpnuvanti 
tasmād yatnato rakṣyā ity etaccheṣam evaitat 
ato ye kecid aviśeṣeṇa mantrapratiṣedho 'yam iti varṇayanti tataś ca pratiṣedhaṃ manyamānā yat kiṃcit srīsaṃbandhi karma yena kena cit kriyate  yatra striyaḥ kartṛtayā saṃbadhyante sāyaṃbaliharaṇādau tathā saṃskāryatayā cūḍādiṣu saṃpradānatayā śrāddhādau  tatra sarvatra mantrapratiṣedhād amantrakaṃ strīṇāṃ śrāddhādi karyam iti 
te 'yuktavādino 'nyaparatvād asya 
arthavādatayā yad asti tadālambananyāyena vihitapratiṣedhamantrasaṃbandhamantracūḍāsaṃskārāpekṣaṃ vyākhyeyam etat 
adhyayanābhāvāc ca prāyaścittamantrajapābhāvaḥ prekṣayā 
nirindiryāḥ 
indriyaṃ vīryaṃ dharyaprajñābalādi tāsāṃ nāsty ato 'nicchantyo 'pi kadācit pāpācārair balenākramyante 
tato rakṣituṃ yuktāḥ 
striyo 'nṛtam iti śīlasnehayor asthiratvād anṛtavacanena nindyate 
tathā ca śrutayo bahvyo nigītā nigameṣv api 
svālakṣaṇyaparīkṣārthaṃ tāsāṃ śṛṇuta niṣkṛtīḥ 
svabhāvato 'śuddhahṛdayāḥ striya ity asminn arthe vaidikāni mantrārthavādarūpāṇi vākyāni sākṣitvenopanyasyati 
tathā ca 
yathā mayoktam striyo 'nṛtam iti tathaiva nigameṣu vedeṣu śrutayaḥ santi 
nigamaśabdo vedaparyāyo dṛṣṭaprayogaś ca 
babhūthātatantha ityādi nigame 
vedārthavyākhyānāṅgavacano 'py asti 
nigamaniruktavyākaraṇāny aṅgānīti 
nirukte hi prayogaḥ nigamā ime bhavanti iti 
tasyeha śrutigrahaṇād vā vakṣyamāṇodāharaṇāc cāsaṃbhavaḥ 
ato vedavacano nigamaśabda iha gṛhyate 
samudāyāvayavabhedāc cādhārādheyabhāvaḥ 
teṣu nigameṣu śrutaya ekadeśabhūtā vākyāni nigītā adhītāḥ saṃśabditāḥ paṭhyanta iti yāvat 
nityapravṛtte ca kālāvibhāgādi niruktam 
pāṭhāntaraṃ nigadā iti 
nigadā mantraviśeṣāḥ 
śrutayo brāhmaṇavākyāni 
mantreṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāyam artho darśito yad anṛtā striya iti 
bahvyas tāḥ santīty asmin pakṣe 'dhyāhāraḥ 
tāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ yā yā niṣkṛtirūpā vyabhicāraprāyaścittabhūtās tāḥ śṛṇuta 
kim artham udāhriyanta iti cet svālakṣaṇyaparīkṣārtham 
svalakṣaṇaṃ nityasaṃnihitasvabhāvas tatpratipādanārtham 
aṅgadakuṇḍalādi yal lakṣaṇaṃ tatparibhūtam idaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ svabhāva ity arthaḥ 
etad āsāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ yad vyabhicārātmakam 
yan me mātā pralulubhe vicaranty apativratā 
tan me retaḥ pitā vṛṅktām ity asyaitan nidarśanam 
itikāraṇāntena pādatrayeṇa mantraikadeśo 'nukṛtaḥ 
yan me mātā apativratā patyur anyapuruṣe na kāmaś cetasāpīti yasyā vrataṃ niyamaḥ sā pativratā 
tadviparītā apativratā 
vicarantī paragṛhān gacchantī 
tatrojvalaveṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā pralulubhe 
lobhaṃ spṛhām anyapuruṣaṃ prati kṛtavatī 
tat pāpaṃ mamotpattyā matpituḥ saṃbandhi yad retaḥ śukraṃ tad vṛṅktām apanudatu 
tadretasā sa doṣo 'pamṛjyatām 
piteti ṣaṣṭhīsthāne prathamā vyatyayena 
atha vā reta eva pitṛtvena parikalpyate 
aparityaktasvaliṅga eva retasā sāmānādhikaraṇyam anubhavati 
dyaur me pitā iti yathā 
atha vā mātṛbījam apy ucyate retaḥ 
tad retaḥ pitā janako vṛṅktāṃ śodhayatām 
pitṛjabījaprabhāvena mātṛdoṣo 'panudyatām ity arthaḥ 
asya vyabhicārātmakasyaitan nidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
sarve japamānā etaṃ mantram uccārayanti 
yadi ca sarvāḥ striyo duṣṭasvabhāvās tato mantrasya nityavat prayogopapattir itarathā pākṣikaḥ syāt 
cāturmāsyeṣv ayaṃ mantro viniyuktaḥ pādyānumantraṇe ca śrāddhe 
dhyāyaty aniṣṭaṃ yat kiṃcit pāṇigrāhasya cetasā 
tasyaiṣa vyabhicarasya nihnavaḥ samyag ucyate 
pāṇigrāho bhartā 
tasya cetasā yad aniṣṭam apriyaṃ parapuruṣasaṃparkādikaṃ strī cintayati tasya mānasasya vyabhicārasya nihnavaḥ śuddhir anena mantreṇa karmaṇi niyuktenocyate 
prasaṅgān mantraprayojanaṃ darśitam 
yady api karmaguṇataiva karmāṅgamantraprayojanaṃ tathāpi japādau viniyogān mānasavyabhicāranivṛttyarthatāpy ucyate 
yādṛgguṇena bhartrā strī saṃyujyeta yathāvidhi 
tādṛgguṇā sā bhavati samudreṇeva nimnagā 
bhāryāsaṃrakṣaṇakāmena dauḥśīlyād ātmā rakṣitavyaḥ 
nāpy etayaiva kevalayā 
yato duḥśīlasya bhāryāpi tathāvidhair bhavati guṇavataḥ śīlavatī 
yathā samudreṇa nimnagā nadī saṃyujyamānā kṣārodakā bhavati madhurarasāpi satī 
akṣamālā vasiṣṭhena saṃyuktādhamayonijā 
śāraṅgī mandapālena jagāmābhyarhaṇīyatām 
hīnajātīyāpy akṣamālā vasiṣṭhabhāryā tatsaṃyogād abhyarhaṇīyatāṃ prāptā 
śāraṅgī tiryagjātiḥ caṭakā mandapālena muninā saṃyuktā tathaiva pūjyā 
ato hīnajātīyāḥ kanīyasyo 'pi bhūyo bhartṛvat pūjyāḥ 
tathā coktam vayasi striyaḥ iti 
etāś cānyāś ca loke 'sminn avakṛṣṭaprasūtayaḥ 
utkarṣaṃ yoṣitaḥ prāptāḥ svaiḥ svair bhartṛguṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ 
avakṛṣṭā nikṛṣṭā prasūtir utpattir yāsāṃ tā avakṛṣṭaprasūtayaḥ 
anyāś ca gaṅgākālīprabhṛtayaḥ 
dvayoḥ prakṛtatvād etā iti bahuvacanaṃ caśabdena tṛtīyām ākṣipya 
dvirvacanaṃ vā ete ca 
eṣoditā lokayātrā nityaṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ śubhā 
pretyeha ca sukhodarkān prajādharmān nibodhata 
lokayātrā lokavṛttaṃ lokācāraḥ 
lokasiddham etat 
nāyaṃ vidhilakṣaṇo 'rtho yad evaṃ śakyate rakṣituṃ nānyatheti 
aparirakṣitābhiś ca tābhiḥ prasūtyādidoṣo bhavatīti 
idānīṃ prajādharmān nibodhata 
kasya prajā bījino vā kṣetriṇo veti 
udarka āgāmīkālaḥ sa sukho yeṣām 
sarve hi vastvavasāne viramante 
te tu naivam iti praśaṃsā 
nanu ca kā sukhodarkatā prajādharmasya 
yā ca prajāsyādhīnā striyaś ca bahubhir doṣair āvṛtatvāt tyāgārhāḥ 
ko hi gṛhe sarvān bibhṛyāt ity etannivṛttyartham āha 
prajanārthaṃ mahābhāgāḥ pūjārhā gṛhadīptayaḥ 
striyaḥ śriyaś ca geheṣu na viśeṣo 'sti kaścana 
śakyapratividhānatvād doṣāṇāṃ pūjārhāḥ 
yad etad doṣaprapañcanaṃ tan nāvajñānārthaṃ parivarjanārthaṃ vābhiśastapatitādivat 
kiṃ tarhi rakṣārthaṃ doṣebhyaḥ 
na hi bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālī nādhiśriyate 
na ca mṛgāḥ santīti yavā nopyanta iti 
prajanaṃ garbhagrahaṇāt prabhṛty apatyaparipoṣaṇaparyanto vyāpāro 'bhipretaḥ 
tathā ca vakṣyati utpādanam apatyasya jātasya paripālanam iti 
gṛhe dīptaya iva 
na hi gṛhe sevā strībhir vinā kācid astīti suprasiddham etat 
saty api śrīvibhave bhāryāyām asatyāṃ suhṛtsvajanādiṣv āgateṣu na gṛhasthāḥ pratipuruṣaṃ bhojanādibhir āvarjayituṃ samarthāḥ 
yathā daridre na bhavati śaktir ataḥ striyāḥ śriyaś ca na viśeṣo gṛheṣv iti 
utpādanam apatyasya jātasya paripālanam 
pratyarthaṃ lokayātrāyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ strī nibandhanam 
strī nibandhanaṃ nimittam 
apatyotpādanādau pratyakṣam etat 
lokayātrā gṛhāgatānām annādidānenāvarjanam āmantraṇanimantraṇādi 
asya pratyarthaṃ sarvasminn arthe strī nibandhanam 
pratyaham iti pāṭhaḥ 
pratyakṣaśabdo 'ntaraṅgavacanaḥ 
antaraṅgam ity arthaḥ 
apatyaṃ dharmakāryāṇi śuśrūṣā ratir uttamā 
dārādhīnas tathā svargaḥ pitṝṇām ātmanaś ca ha 
prāgdarśitārtho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
patiṃ yā nābhicarati manovāgdehasaṃyatā 
sā bhartṛlokān āpnoti sadbhiḥ sādhvīti cocyate 
vyabhicārāt tu bhartuḥ strī loke prāpnoti nindyatām 
sṛgālayoniṃ cāpnoti pāparogaiś ca pīḍyate 
pañcame ślokāv ubhau vyākhyātau   
putraṃ praty uditaṃ sadbhiḥ pūrvajaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ 
viśvajanyam imaṃ puṇyam upanyāsaṃ nibodhata 
upanyāso vicāryavastuprakṣepaḥ vicāro vā 
taṃ nibodhata 
putraṃ prati putram adhikṛtya uditam uktaṃ sadbhir vidvadbhir maharṣibhiś ca 
viśvajanyaṃ sarvebhyo janebhyo hitam 
puṇyaṃ kalyāṇakaram 
strīstutyā vyavadhānāt prajādharmaṃ nibodhata ity asyārthasyāpi punar ādarārtham upanyāsaḥ upanyāsaṃ nibodhateti 
bhartuḥ putraṃ vijānanti śrutidvaidhaṃ tu kartari 
āhur utpādakaṃ kecid apare kṣetriṇaṃ viduḥ 
bhartā udvoḍhā 
vivāhasaṃskāreṇa saṃskṛtā yena yā nārī tasyām yas tasmād eva jātas taṃ putraṃ tasya vijānanty abhyupagacchanti sarva eva vidvāṃsaḥ 
nātra vipratipattiḥ 
siddhānto 'yam 
śrutidvaidhaṃ tu kartari 
yaḥ kartaiva kevalam utpādayitānyadīyakṣetre na tūdvoḍḥā tatra śrutidvaidhaṃ matabhedaḥ 
taṃ darsayati 
āhur utpādakam apatyavantaṃ kecit 
apare kṣetriṇaṃ yasya sā bhāryā tasyām anutpādakam api 
evam ācāryavipratipatteḥ saṃśayam upanyasya kāraṇakathanena tam eva samarthayate 
kṣetrabhūtā smṛtā nārī bījabhūtaḥ smṛtaḥ pumān 
kṣetrabījasamāyogāt saṃbhavaḥ sarvadehinām 
kṣetram iva kṣetrabhūtā nārī 
vrīhyāder utpattisthānaṃ bhūmibhāgaḥ kṣetram tattulyā nārī 
yathā kṣetre bījam uptaṃ tatra vidhriyamāṇaṃ jāyate evaṃ nāryām api niṣiktaṃ retaḥ 
bījabhūta eva pumān 
atrāpi bhūtaśabda upamāyām 
tadīyaṃ reto bījam na sākṣāt pumān tadadhikaranatvāt tu tathāvad vyapadiśyate 
samāyogaḥ saṃbandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ 
tataḥ saṃbhava utpattiḥ sarvadehināṃ śarīriṇām caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya 
svedajānām apy ākāśaḥ kṣetra bījaṃ svedaḥ 
ato yuktaḥ saṃśayaḥ ubhayam antareṇa saṃbhavānupapatteḥ 
apatyotpattau ubhayor vyāpāraḥ 
vinigamanāyāṃ hetvabhāvāt kasya tat ubhayoḥ atha anyatarasyeti saṃdehaḥ 
sarvasya ca prakaraṇasyāyam arthaḥ nānumānaparicchedyo 'patyāpatyavadbhāvaḥ 
tathā ca vibhāgaśloke vakṣyāmaḥ 
viśiṣṭaṃ kutracid bījaṃ strīyonis tv eva kutracit 
ubhayaṃ tu samaṃ yatra sā prasūtiḥ praśasyate 
bījasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ vyāsaṛṣyaśṛṅgādīnāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ dṛṣṭam 
strīyoniṣv eva kṣetrajādiputreṣu dhṛtarāṣṭrādiṣu 
brāḥmaṇāj jātā api mātṛjātayaḥ kṣatriyās te 
ubhayaṃ tu samaṃ ekasvāmikam ekajātīyaṃ samam 
sā prasūtiḥ praśasyate vipratipattyabhāvāt 
tad uktam eva bhartuḥ putraṃ vijānanti iti 
bījasya caiva yonyāś ca bījam utkṛṣṭam ucyate 
sarvabhūtaprasūtir hi bījalakṣaṇalakṣitā 
evam upapādite saṃśaye bījaprādhānyapakṣaṃ pūrvaṃ parigṛhṇāti 
tatprādhānyād yasya bījaṃ tasyāpatyam 
tasya ca prādhānyaṃ vrīhyāder dravyasya kṣityādyanekakāraṇatve 'pi taddharmānuvidhānadarśanāt 
ataś ca sphuṭam adṛṣṭabījānuvidhānasyāpatyasya kāryatvād vrīhyādīnām iva taddharmānuvidhāyitvaṃ yuktam abhyapagantum 
tathā hi sarvatra kārya aikyarūpyaṃ na tyaktaṃ bhavati 
tathā ca bīje prādhānyaṃ tad darśayati sarvabhūtaprasūtir hi 
sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prasūtir utpattir bījalakṣaṇalakṣitā 
bījasya yal lakṣaṇaṃ rūpavarṇasaṃsthānādi tena lakṣitā cihnitā tadrūpānuvidhāyinīti yāvat 
yādṛśaṃ tūpyate bījaṃ kṣetre kālopapādite 
tādṛg rohati tat tasmin bījaṃ svair vyañjitaṃ guṇaiḥ 
anantarasyaivārthavistaratvena śloko 'yaṃ vaktrānvayapradarśanena 
yādṛśaśabdasyārthaṃ vyākhyāsyati vrīhayaḥ śālayaḥ ityādinā 
kālopapādite kāle varṣādau vapanakāla upapādite kṛṣṭasamīkṣaraṇādinā saṃskṛte 
tādṛg rohati jāyate 
svair guṇair varṇasaṃsthānarasavīryādibhir guṇair vyañjitaṃ paridṛśyarūpam 
iyaṃ bhūmir hi bhūtānāṃ śāśvatī yonir ucyate 
na ca yoniguṇān kāṃścid bījaṃ puṣyati puṣṭiṣu 
bījaguṇānuvṛttiḥ pūrveṇoktā 
anena kṣetraguṇānām abhāvam āha 
eṣā bhūmir bhūtānāṃ sthāvarāṇām oṣadhītṛṇagulmalatānāṃ yoniḥ kṣetram ucyate 
na ca tadguṇās teṣu bhūteṣu kecana dṛśyante 
na mṛdaḥ pāṃsavo vā tatropalabhyante 
bījaṃ puṣyati puṣṭiṣu 
bījaśabdo 'trāṅkuranirgatavrīhyādivacano na mūlavacanaḥ tad api hi punar upabhuktaśeṣam upyamānam aparasmin vatsare bhavaty eva bījam 
tan na puṣyati nānuvartate 
puṣṭyaṅgabhūtāyām anuvṛtau puṣyatir vartamānaḥ 
sakarmakatvaṃ dvitīyānimittam 
yoniguṇān prāpnoti vā bhajate 
puṣṭiṣu tadavayaveṣu nimittaṃ na puṣyati nānuvartate 
yadi puṣyaṅgānuvṛttir ākhyātenocyate puṣṭiṣv ity anyārthakam 
tasmād anekārthatvād dhātūnām anyavacanamātra evākhyātenānuvyākhyeyaḥ 
ślokapūraṇārthaṃ vā puṣṭiṣv iti 
kathaṃcit paunaruktyaṃ parihāryam 
sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena vānvayo vaktavyaḥ 
svapoṣaṃ puṣṭa iti yathā 
bhūmāv apy ekakedāre kāloptāni kṛṣīvalaiḥ 
nānārūpāni jāyante bījānīh svabhāvataḥ 
anantarokto 'rtha udāharaṇena vyākriyate 
ekakedāre apir atra yojanīyaḥ 
ekasminn api kṣetre bhūmeḥ kāle yasya bījasya yo vaikaḥ kālas tasminn uptani karṣakair bhinnarūpāṇi jāyante bījāni svabhāvānuvidhānād ity arthaḥ 
yadi ca kṣetre prādhānyaṃ syāt kṣetrasyaikatvāt sarvāṇy ekarūpāṇi syuḥ 
vrīhayaḥ śālayo mudgās tilā māṣās tathā yavāḥ 
yathābījaṃ prarohanti laśunānīkṣavas tathā 
tāni nānārūpatvena bījāni darśayati 
yathābijaṃ bījasvabhāvābhipatyā 
sarvatra jātyākhyāyāṃ bahuvacanam 
anyad uptaṃ jātam anyad ity etan nopapadyate 
upyate yad dhi yad bījaṃ tat tad eva prarohati 
eṣa evārthaḥ śabdāntareṇa nigamyate 
mudgeṣūpteṣu vrīhayo jāyanta ity etan nāsti 
pratiṣedhamukhenoktasya vidhimukhena punaḥ pratipādanam ucyate yad dhi yad bījam 
tat prājñena vinītena jñānavijñānavedinā 
āyuṣkāmena vaptavyaṃ na jātu parayoṣiti 
evaṃ pūrvapakṣe siddhāntam āha 
kṣetraprādhānyam anenocyate 
nanu ca nātra kṣetraprādhānyābhidhāyakaṃ kiṃcit padam asti kevalaṃ parakṣetropagamananiṣedhaḥ śrūyate vaptavyaṃ na jātu parayoṣitīti 
paradāreṣu bījaniṣeko na kartavya ity asyārthaḥ 
na punar yasya kṣetraṃ tasyāpatyam ity anenoktaṃ bhavati 
satyam 
tathā naśyati vai kṣiptaṃ bījaṃ paraparigrahe ity anenaikavākyatvāt dṛṣṭāpatyāpahāralakṣaṇadoṣanimitto 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ nādṛṣṭārtha upagamanapratiṣedhaḥ 
sa hi caturthe vihata eva na hīdṛśam anāyuṣyam ityādinā 
tasmād anyaśeṣatayā pratiṣedhaśruter anantareṇaikavākyatvād asati svātantrye yuktā kṣetraprādhānyapratipādanaparatā 
prājñena sahajayā prajñayā 
vinītena pitrādibhir anuśiṣṭena 
jñānavijñānavedinā karaṇasādhanau jñānavijñānaśabdau 
jñānaṃ vedāṅgaśāstrāṇi 
vijñānaṃ tarkakalādiviṣayam 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yasya kācid buddhir vidyate tenaivaṃ na kartavyaṃ yataḥ sarvaśāstreṣv eṣā sthitiḥ 
yas tu mūrkhas tiryakprakhyaḥ so 'tra nādhikṛta evety anuvādo 'yam 
āyuṣkāmeneti cāturthikasya pratiṣedhasya pratyabhijñānārtham etat 
tataś ca pṛthak pratiṣedhaśaṅkā nirastā bhavati 
atra gāthā vāyugītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ 
yathā bījaṃ na vaptavyaṃ puṃsā paraparigrahe 
gāthāśabdo vṛttaviśeṣavacanaḥ 
yathoktaṃ piṅgalena atrāsiddhaṃ gāthā iti 
avigītāḥ paraṃparāgatāḥ ślokā apy ucyante tad eṣābhi yajñagāthā gīyate ity uktvā gāthāḥ ślokā uttaratra vede paṭhyante yad asya pūrvam aparaṃ tad asya iti 
vāyunā gītāḥ paṭhitā vāyuproktāḥ 
purāvidaḥ purāṇakalpāntaravedinaḥ 
paraparigrahe parakṣetre 
naśyatīṣur yathā viddhaḥ khe viddham anuvidhyataḥ 
tathā naśyati vai kṣipraṃ bījaṃ paraparigrahe 
tā idānīṃ gāthā darśayati 
iṣuḥ śaraḥ 
sa naśyati khe chidre anyeneṣvāsena viddhaṃ mṛgam anuvidhyataḥ pūrvasya vedhakasyātra svāmyam 
atha vākāśe khe śaraḥ kṣipto lakṣyam antareṇa naśyati niṣphalo bhavati viddhaṃ cānuvidhyataḥ 
evaṃ parastriyāṃ tejo niḥkṣiptaṃ tasya bījinaḥ 
kṣetrasvāmino 'patyaṃ bhavati 
pṛthor apīmāṃ pṛthivīṃ bhāryāṃ pūrvavido viduḥ 
sthāṇucchedasya kedāram āhuḥ śalyavato mṛgam 
īdṛśo 'yaṃ purāṇakṛto jāyāpatilakṣaṇasaṃbandho yad bhinnāv api tāv ekīkṛtāv iva darśayati 
tathā hi anekavarṣasahasrātitapṛthusaṃbandhā mahī tenaiva vyapadiśyate pṛthivīti 
tasmād anyāpi strī yasya bhāryā tasya putro 'nyenāpi jātaḥ 
sthāṇucchedasya kedāraṃ svam āhuḥ saṃbandhāntarasyābhāvāt 
svasvāmisaṃbandhaṃ ṣaṣṭhī pratipādayati 
sthāṇur gucchagulmalatādiprarūḍho yatra bhavati tac chinatti yaḥ sa sthāṇucchedaḥ 
tasya tat kṣetraṃ yena prarūḍhagulmalatāvīrudhaḥ chittvā bhūmiḥ kṣetrīkṛtā 
tatra karṣaṇavapanajātaṃ phalaṃ tasyaiva 
śalyavato mṛgam āhur ity anuṣajyate 
bahūnāṃ mṛgam anudhāvatām ākheṭakāryaṃ yasyaiva saṃbandhi śaraśalyaṃ mṛge dṛśyate tasya tam āhuḥ 
yat prathamaveddhuś ca sa bhavatīty uktam naśyatīṣuḥ ity atra 
etāvān eva puruṣo yaj jāyātmā prajeti ha 
viprāḥ prāhus tathā caitad yo bhartā sā smṛtāṅganā 
yuktaṃ ca yasya bhāryā tasyāpatyaṃ yasmād bhāryāyā bhartuś caikatvam eva prajāpy ātmabhūtaiva 
kathaṃ vānyasyātmā so 'nyasya bhavet 
evaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭam etalloke 
śastrajñā apy evam eva viprāḥ prāhur iti 
na niṣkrayavisargābhyāṃ bhartur bhāryā vimucyate 
evaṃ dharmaṃ vijānīmaḥ prāk prajāpatinirmitam 
atha manyeta dhanādidānena krītvā svīyāḥ kariṣyante parabhāryāḥ tato vinivṛtte parasvāmye tajjāto janayituḥ putro bhavatīty 
etan na 
yato na śakyā bhāryātvena niṣkasahasrair apy anyadīyāḥ svatvam ānetum 
nāpi bhartrā tyaktā prahīṇadravyatayā pratigrahītuḥ svatvam āpadyate 
yata udvaheta iti kartrabhiprāyakriyāphalaviṣayād ātmanepadāl liṅgān nānyena saṃskṛtānyasya bhāryā bhavati 
yathā nāhavanīyādaya ādhātur anyasya kriyādināhavanīyādivyapadeśyāḥ 
niṣkrayo vikrayo vinimayaś ca 
visargas tyāgaḥ 
tābhyāṃ na mucyate na bhāryātvam asyā apaiti 
sakṛd aṃśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate 
sakṛd āha dadāmīti trīṇy etāni satāṃ sakṛt 
ayam anuśayavidhāv aṣṭame vyākhyātaḥ 
vibhāgakāle hi samaviṣamāṃśabhāgbhiḥ samaviṣamāṃśabhāgeṣu parikalpya vibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ 
tatra kṛte yo vipratipadyeta tasya pratiṣedhārtham idam 
tatrāpi yady ayam ādāv ayathārthatāṃ kasyacid aṃśasya prajñāpayet tadā syād eva punar vibhāgaḥ 
atha bahunā kālenāyathākṛtatāṃ brūyād yāvad itaraiḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhāgeṣv anyaniveśaśīrṇapratisaṃskārādi kṛtaṃ bhavet vastrahiraṇyādi copayuktaṃ syāt tadā samatāmātrakaraṇe prabhavati na punaḥ sarvaṃ samavāyavibhāgam 
anye tu klībādīnām anarhitavibhāgakānāṃ paścād abhāgaharatvanimittaklībatvādiparijñānān nāsti bhāgopahāra iti sakṛn nipātaprayojanaṃ vadanti 
evaṃ dvitricaturbhāgaharāṇāṃ yadṛcchayā ye samatāṃ prakalpayeyuḥ paścād anuśayānāḥ prāktanaṃ vyavasthānam atikramyāpahartuṃ na labheran 
patitasya tu labdhabhāgasyāpy apahāraṃ vakṣyāmi 
sakṛt kanyā pradīyate 
yady api cānena vāgdānottarakālaṃ prāg api vivāhād bhartuḥ svatocyate tathāpi dattām api haret kanyām  teṣāṃ tu niṣṭhā vijñeyā vidvadbhiḥ saptame pade ityādiparyālocanayā viśiṣṭaviṣayataiva 
sā ca vyākhyātā 
sakṛd āha dadāmīti 
gavādayo hi yenaiva rūpeṇātmanaḥ svaṃ tenaivānyasmā āpadyante 
kanyā tu duhitṛtvena svaṃ satī bhāryātvenānivṛttasvasaṃbandhā dīyata iti pṛthag upanyāsaḥ 
nanu cānivartamāne pituḥ svasaṃbandhe kathaṃ kanyādānaṃ nirvartate 
etad dhi dānasya rūpaṃ yad ekasya saṃbandho nivartate 'nyasyopajāyata iti 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
dvāv atra saṃbandhau apatyāpatyavadbhāvaḥ svasvāmisaṃbandhaś ca 
tatrāpatyāpatyavadbhāvo na nivartate itaras tu nivartate 
tathā ca bālye putur vaśe tiṣṭhet iti pituś cātra svāmyanivṛttim āha pāṇigrāhasya iti bhartus tad utpattim 
yathā go'śvoṣṭradāsīṣu mahiṣyajāvikāsu ca 
notpādakaḥ prajābhāgī tathaivānyāṅganāsv api 
ye 'kṣetriṇo bījavantaḥ parakṣetrapravāpiṇaḥ 
te vai sasyasya jātasya na labhante phalaṃ kvacit 
prasiddham evaitat 
akṣetriṇo bījavanto vrīhyādibījasvāminaḥ sasyasya mudgamāṣāder jātasya na labhante phalaṃ parakṣetre ced utpattiḥ   
yad anyagoṣu vṛṣabho vatsānām janayec chatam 
gominām eva te vatsā moghaṃ skanditam ārṣabham 
pūrveṇa sthāvareṣu dharmaḥ prasiddhavad udito jñāpito vā 
anena tiryakṣu parigṛhīteṣu gavādiṣu nidarśyate 
anyadīyo vṛṣabho yady apy anyagavīṣu vatsān bahūn api janayen na vṛṣabhasvāmy ekam api vatsaṃ labheta sarva eva te vatsā gomināṃ gosvāminām 
ārṣabham ṛṣabhasaṃbandhi skanditaṃ bījaniṣeko moghaṃ vṛthā niṣphalam 
tathaivākṣetriṇo bījaṃ parakṣetrapravāpiṇaḥ 
kurvanti kṣetriṇām arthaṃ na bījī labhate phalam 
pūrvasya nideśo 'yam 
yathā gavādiṣu sthāvareṣu caivaṃ manuṣyeṣv api kurvanti 
kṣetrasvāminām arthaṃ prayojanaṃ bījakāryaṃ saṃpādayanti 
phalaṃ tv anabhisaṃdhāya kṣetriṇāṃ bījināṃ tathā 
pratyakṣaṃ kṣetriṇām artho bījād yonir balīyasī 
aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ kṣetriṇāṃ phalaṃ na bījinaḥ 
tasyāvaśiṣṭaviṣayatvam āha anabhisaṃdhāyeti 
abhisaṃdhānaṃ bījakṣetriṇor itaretarasaṃvidvyavasthāpanam naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat 
ubhayor āvayoḥ phalam astu iti yatra vacanavyavasthā na bhavati tatra kṣetriṇa eva pratyakṣo 'rtho niścitaṃ phalam 
pratyakṣaśabdena niḥsaṃdigdhatām āha 
yato bījād yonir balīyasī 
kṣetram adhikabalam 
satyāṃ tu saṃvidi 
kriyābhyupagamāt tv etad bījārthaṃ yat pradīyate 
tasyeha bhāginau dṛṣṭau bījī kṣetrika eva ca 
anabhisaṃdhāya kṣetriṇaḥ phalam uktam 
abhisaṃdhāne kiṃ bījina utobhayor iti saṃśayaḥ 
ubhayor ity āha 
kriyāyā abhyupagamo 'ṅgīkaraṇam evam evaitad iti saṃvillakṣaṇaḥ yo niścayaḥ sā kriyābhipretā tām abhyupagamayya bījārthaṃ bījakāryaphalaniṣpattyarthaṃ yat pradīyate sāmarthyād bījam iti gamyate 
tasyeha dvāv api bhāginau 
oghavātāhṛtaṃ bījaṃ yasya kṣetre prarohati 
kṣetrikasyaiva tad bījaṃ na bījī labhate phalam 
parakṣetre vaptur bījanāśa uktaḥ 
tatra manyeta puruṣāparādhāt tasya yuktopahāro nūnam asau kṣetraṃ jihīrṣati 
no cet kim iti parakṣetre vapatīti 
yena tu svakṣetre vyuptam oghavātābhyām anyatrānītaṃ tasya ko 'parādho yadi svaṃ dravyaṃ hārayati 
tadartham āha 
oghavātāhṛtaṃ bījam 
ogho jalaniṣekaḥ tena vāyunā cāhṛtaṃ nītaṃ yasya kṣetre prarohati tasyaiva tad bhavati 
etenaiva siddhe vispaṣṭārthaṃ na bījī labhate phalam iti 
sarvatra kṣetraprādhānyam ity arthaḥ 
eṣa dharmo gavāśvasya dāsyuṣṭrājāvikasya ca 
vihaṅgamahiṣīṇāṃ ca vijñeyaḥ prasavaṃ prati 
apatyādhikārāt tadviṣayataiva mā vijñāyīti gavāśvādigrahaṇam 
yadi vā bījaphalavyavahāraḥ sasyādiviṣayatayā prasiddhataras tannivṛttyartham āha 
dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca sarvatraiṣa dharmaḥ 
eṣa iti dvayaṃ pratyavamṛśyate 
anabhisaṃdhāne yasya kṣetraṃ tasya phalam abhisaṃdhāne cobhayoḥ 
udāharaṇārthatvāc ca gavāśvādigrahaṇasya śvamārjārādiṣv apy ayam eva nyāyaḥ 
tarhi kim artham yady anyagoṣu iti 
prāyeṇa gāvaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ bhavanti na tathā vihaṅgmādaya iti prasiddher anuvādo 'sau 
dāsyaḥ saptabhir dāsayonibhir upagatāḥ 
prasavaḥ kāyajanma 
taṃ prati tatrety arthaḥ 
etad vaḥ sāraphalgutvaṃ bījayonyoḥ prakīrtitam 
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yoṣitāṃ dharmam āpadi 
sāraṃ pradhānam phalgv asāram 
upasaṃharaḥ pūrvaprakaraṇasya 
uttarārdhena vakṣyamāṇasūcanam 
āpat jīvanasthitihetubhūtabhojanācchādanābhāvaḥ saṃtānavicchedaś ca 
bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya bhāryā yā gurupatny anujasya sā 
yavīyasas tu yā bhāryā snuṣā jyeṣṭasya sā smṛtā 
ślokadvayena prākṛtavyavasthām anuvadaty āpadi niyogaṃ vidhātum 
jyeṣṭho 'gre jātaḥ anujaḥ paścājjātaḥ kanīyān yavīyān anuja eva 
jyeṣṭho yavīyaso bhāryāṃ yavīyān vāgrajastriyam 
patitau bhavato gatvā niyuktāv apy anāpadi 
itaretarabhāryāgamane jyeṣṭhānujayoḥ pātityam anāpadi saty api niyoge 
devarād vā sapiṇḍād vā striyā samyaṅ niyuktayā 
prajepsitādhigantavyā saṃtānasya parikṣaye 
sarvaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭo 'nena niyogo vidhīyate 
saṃtānasya parikṣaye niyuktayā devarādibhyaḥ samyak prajotpādayitavyeti 
yad uktam yoṣitāṃ dharmam āpadi iti seyam āpat saṃtānasya parikṣayaḥ 
saṃtānaśabdena putra ucyate duhitā ca putrikā 
sā hi pitṛvaṃśaṃ saṃtanoti nānyā 
tasya parikṣayo 'nutpattir utpannanāśo vā putrikāyāś cākaraṇam 
na hi striyāḥ kevalāyāḥ putrikāyām anyasmin vā putrapratinidhāv adhikāra iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
niyuktotpādayed anujñātā gurubhiḥ 
kutaḥ punaḥ gurubhir iti 
smṛtyantaranidarśanāt 
atha vā niyogaśabdād eva 
niyogo hi gurusaṃbandhī loko 'py ucyate 
na hi śiṣyeṇa niyukto 'dhyāpayatīty ucyate 
ācāryeṇa niyuktaḥ karoty anuvadati 
guravaś ca śvaśrūśvaśuradevarādayo bhartṛsagotrā draṣṭavyāḥ na pitrādayaḥ 
etenāpatyenāpatyavantas te ucyante yeṣāṃ copakāras tatkṛta aurdhvadehiko bhavati 
yady evaṃ mātāmahasyāpi dauhitropakāro 'sti 
tataḥ pitrā duhitā niyoktavyety āpannam 
uktam yenāpatyavanta ucyante 
devarasapiṇḍagrahaṇena tadgotrā eva hṛdayam āgacchanti 
mahābhārate ca tatra tatra niyoktṛbhāvo bhartṛpakṣiṇām eva darśitaḥ 
ata eva bhrātṛputre sati na niyogaḥ kartavyaḥ 
ye hi niyuktās teṣām eva saṃtānopakāraḥ 
putrajanite snehe 'patyopakāram arthayamānā adhikriyante 
na mṛtasyādhikāro 'sti 
kathaṃ tarhi tasyāpatyam iti vyapadiśyate 
kathaṃcit piṇḍadāne sa upakaroti 
vacanād iti ca brūmaḥ 
na hy apatyam utpādayitavyam ity eṣa vidhis tenānuṣṭhita iti tathāpi tadīye kṣetre niyogavidhijātena piṇḍadānādi kartavyam iti śāstrārthaḥ 
tataś ca tasyopakārakam avagatam 
yathā caitat tathā purastān nipuṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
devaraḥ patibhrātā 
sapiṇḍaḥ patyanvayaḥ 
sa eva striyāḥ 
smṛtyantare jātimātrāc cety uktaṃ bhavati 
samyag iti ghṛtāktādiniyamaṃ vakṣyamāṇam anuvadati 
prajepsitādhigantavyā vidhau kṛtye 
īpsitaśabdena kāryakṣamatām āha 
tato duhitary andhabadhirādau ca jāte punar niyogo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ 
vidhavāyāṃ niyuktas tu ghṛtākto vāgyato niśi 
ekam utpādayet putraṃ na dvitīyaṃ kathaṃcana 
vidhavāgrahaṇam atantram 
klībādirūpe patyau jīvaty apy eṣa eva vidhiḥ 
yato vakṣyati niyuktau yau vidhiṃ hitvā iti 
etad eva tasya prayojanam 
niyamo 'tra viṣayāṇām na niyamānām anyathā vijñāte aprakṛtatvād vidhavāyā eva syuḥ 
niśi pradīpādyālokanivṛttyartham etat vacanāntareṇa divopagamanapratiṣedhāt 
anye tv āhuḥ puruṣārtho 'sau pratiṣedhaḥ karmārthas tv ayam 
tenāhni gamanena kṣetrajam utpādayet 
ekam utpādayet putraṃ na dvitīyam 
asya pratiprasavaḥ 
dvitīyam eke prajanaṃ manyante strīṣu tadvidaḥ 
anirvṛttaṃ niyogārthaṃ paśyanto dharmatas tayoḥ 
dvitīyaḥ putra ity ekeṣāṃ matam 
tadvidaḥ kṣetrajotpattividhijñāḥ 
anirvṛttaṃ niyogārthaṃ paśyantaḥ 
niyuktayā prajotpādayitavyety asya vidher ekasyotpādanenāsaṃpattiṃ manyante 
ekavacanam avivakṣitaṃ manyante 
kas teṣām abhiprāyaḥ 
ekavacanam avivakṣitaṃ manyante 
dravyapradhānatvāt karmaṇo guṇabhāvād avivakṣā grahaikatvavat 
nanu cānupāttopadeśe saty api dvitīyayā dravyaprādhānyāvagame saṃkhyādiviśeṣeṇa vivakṣā sthitaiva 
udvaheta dvijo bhāryām iti liṅgād apatyavidhāv ekatvasaṃkhyātikramo daśāsyāṃ putrān ādhehi iti 
yady evaṃ na dvitva evāvasthānam 
asyām evāśaṅkāyāṃ dvitīyam iti vacanam anyanivṛttyartham 
arthavattā tasyāpy ayam abhiprāyaḥ 
aurase liṅgaṃ vivāhaprakaraṇe tu mantrapāṭhāt 
iha tv ekatvātikramaḥ aputra ekaputraḥ iti śiṣṭapravādāt 
atha vāsyā eva smṛter dvitīyaputrastutikalpanāt 
dharmataḥ śiṣṭācārataḥ 
vidhavāyāṃ niyogārthe nivṛtte tu yathāvidhi 
guruvac ca snuṣāvac ca varteyātāṃ parasparam 
iha tu niyogaviṣayo yatra niyujyate 
sa ca saṃprayogābhimardaparyavasāna upagamanalakṣaṇas tasmin nivṛtte pūrvaiva vṛttiḥ 
guruvat snuṣāvat 
jyeṣṭhasya bhāryāyāṃ guruvad yavīyasaḥ snuṣāvat 
parasparagrahaṇāt snuṣāvad varteta strī puruṣe jyeṣṭhe devare guruvat 
niyuktau yau vidhiṃ hitvā varteyātāṃ tu kāmataḥ 
tāv ubhau patitau syātāṃ snuṣāgagurutalpagau 
vidhim ghṛtāktaḥ ityādiḥ 
tadatikrame pātityam 
niyukto jyeṣṭhaḥ snuṣāgaḥ pumān gurutalpagaḥ kanīyān 
nānyasmin vidhavā nārī niyoktavyā dvijātibhiḥ 
anyasmin hi niyuñjānā dharmaṃ hanyuḥ sanātanam 
pūrveṇa vihitasya niyogasya pratiṣedho 'yam 
tatra kecid vidhavāgrahaṇān mṛtabhartṛkāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ klībena tu patyā niyoktavyeti vidhipratiṣedhau vibhaktaviṣayāv iti pratipannāḥ 
anye tu vidhivākye saṃtānavicchedasya nimittaśravaṇāt tasya ca klībavyādhitayor mṛtasyāpy upapattiḥ 
tathā ca vidhivat pratiṣedho 'py aviśiṣṭa eva 
apetadhavasaṃbandhā vidhavety ucyate 
tat tulyam ubhayatrāpi 
avaśyaṃ caitad evaṃ vijñeyam 
itarathā ghṛtābhyaktādiniyamo 'pi klībena niyujyamānāyā na syāt 
tatrāpi hy āmananti vidhavāyāṃ niyuktaś ca ghṛtāktaḥ iti 
tasmād vihitasyāviśeṣeṇa pratiṣedho 'py aviśiṣṭaḥ 
ataś ca viṣayasamatve vidhiniṣedhayor vikalpaḥ 
ayaṃ ca nityo 'patyotpādanavidhir vikalpa eva kalpate grahaṇāgrahaṇavat 
yadā tu putreṇa jayati ityevamādiphalotpādanavidhis tadāsaty apatye tatkāryasyaurdhvadehikasyopakārasyābhāvād bhinnaphalayoḥ kuto vikalpaḥ 
samānaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhāv ekarthe vikalpyete 
ṣoḍaśīgrahaṇāgrahaṇayor iti kecit 
uktam aṅgabhūyastve phalabhūyastvam 
pradhānakāryasiddhau tv aviśeṣaḥ 
tasmād asmin pakṣe putropakārābhāvam āha 
upakāraviśeṣārthenāsya pravṛttau pratiṣedhātikrameṇa śyenatulyatā 
idaṃ tv atra nirūpyam 
yo 'sau niyujyate sa kim iti pravartate 
na hi tasya vidhir asti niyuktena gantavyam iti 
striyāḥ punar vidyate samyak striyā niyuktayā iti 
na ca devarādiṣu pravartamāneṣu striyā niyogasiddhir ity arthaḥ 
teṣāṃ api pravṛttis tadvidhinā kṣetraja īpsitaḥ iti vācyam 
yato rāgataḥ pravṛttir upapadyate 
ghṛtāktādiniyamavidhānam anarthakam iti cen nānarthakam 
tathāniyamair utpanne kṣetrajavyapadeśo nānya iti 
yad api guruvacanaṃ kartavyam iti kecit pravṛttinibandhanam āhuḥ 
evaṃ sati surāpānādiṣv api gurvicchayā pravṛttiḥ prāpnoti 
na cāsau gurur akārye yaḥ pravartayati
guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥ 
utpathapratipannasya parityāgo vidhīyate 
iti smaraṇāt 
parityāgaś ca gurukāryān nivṛttiḥ 
etenaitad api pratyuktam yan niyamātikramapātityavacanaṃ niyamapūrvikāṃ vṛttim anujānāti tāv ubhau patitau syātām iti 
itarathā sarvaprakāraṃ gacchataḥ pātityam iti viśeṣapātityam anupapannam 
yatas tan na kevalasya puṃsaḥ śrūyate kiṃ tarhi striyā iti 
tasyāś ca putrārthinyā niyogo vihitaḥ 
tadapekṣaṃ hi vyatikrame patitavacanam tāv ubhau patitau syāyām iti 
asati vyatikrama ekaḥ patitaḥ pumān eva atikrame tu dvāv apīty evam api liṅgān nirgacchaty eva 
tasmād devarādividhilakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ katham iti vaktavyam 
ucyate 
vyāsādidarśanenāpatyapiṇḍadāna iva kṣetrajotpattyarthaṃ sapiṇḍānāṃ guruniyogāpekṣā 
tadā nopagamane cyutir astīty anumantavyam 
na hi mahātmanāṃ rāgalakṣaṇapravṛttir abhyupagantuṃ nyāyyā 
yac coktaṃ niyamātikrame patitatvavacanaṃ liṅgam iti tad ayuktam 
yataḥ puṃsaḥ patitatve patitotpannasyādhikārābhāvād utpādanam anarthakam 
tasmād asti devarādividher ābhāso 'yam 
nodvāhikeṣu mantreṣu niyogaḥ kīrtyate kvacit 
na vivāhavidhāv uktaṃ vidhavāvedanaṃ punaḥ 
udvāhanaṃ karma tatra ye mantrāḥ prayujyante aryamaṇaṃ nu devaṃ kanyā agnim ayakṣata ityādayaḥ tathānye 'pi tatsaṃbandhāḥ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiḥ iti mayā patyā prajāvatī iti  tatra sarvatra voḍhur varayituḥ svāpatyaṃ bhavatīty āhuḥ 
na tatra śrūyate mayā yatra niyujyase tato janaya iti 
mantragrahaṇenaitad darśayati 
mantrārthavādā api naivaṃvidhāḥ santi 
dūrata eva tad darśayati na vivāhavidhāv uktaṃ vidhavāvedanaṃ punaḥ 
āvedanaṃ gamanam abhipretam atra 
atha vivāha eveyaṃ vā saṃyujyate vivāhayiṣyati devaro bhrātṛjāyām tato 'yaṃ niyogo vivāhavihita eva 
na tv atra vivāhavidhir iti 
pūrvaśeṣo 'yam arthavādaḥ 
ayaṃ dvijair avidvadbhiḥ paśudharmo vigarhitaḥ 
manuṣyāṇām api prokto vene rājyaṃ praśāsati 
ayam apy arthavāda eva niyogapratiṣedhaśeṣaḥ 
ye 'vidvāṃsaḥ samyak śāstraṃ na jānate tatra vyavahāriṇo liṅgādyanyaparatvaṃ ca na jānate tair yaṃ paśudharmaḥ sa cātyantagarhito manuṣyāṇām api proktaḥ pravartitaḥ 
sa cedānīṃtano nānādiḥ vene rājñi praśāsati rāṣṭraṃ pālayati 
nanu ca liṅgāni naiva santīty uktam 
naivam udvāhakeṣu mantreṣu na santīty uktam 
anyatra tu dṛśyate 
ko vāṃ śayutrā vidhaveva devaraṃ maryaṃ na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhastha ā ityādi 
yathā vidhavā strī devarapatiṃ manuṣyaṃ kurute samānaśayana eva ko vā manasvinau kurute yena nāgacchataḥ ko viśeṣo vivāhamantreṣu sa kilāpatyotpattividhyanukramarūpa ity abhiprāyaḥ 
anyair vidvadbhir iti paṭhitam 
garhito manuṣyāṇāṃ proktaḥ 
paśūnām eṣa dharmo bhrātṛstrīgamanaṃ nāma 
sa ca pravṛtto venasya rājye 
sa mahīm akhilāṃ bhuñjan rājarṣipravaraḥ purā 
varṇānāṃ saṃkaraṃ cakre kāmopahatacetanaḥ 
bhuñjan pālayan 
kathaṃ punar varṇasaṃkaraṃ pravartayan rājarṣīṇāṃ pravaraḥ 
uktaṃ mahīm akhilāṃ bhunakti yaḥ mahārājatvāt 
kāmena rāgādilakṣaṇenopahatā nāśitā cetanā cittasthairyaṃ yasya saḥ 
tataḥ prabhṛti yo mohāt pramītapatikāṃ striyam 
niyojayaty apatyārthaṃ taṃ vigarhanti sādhavaḥ 
spaṣṭārtho 'rthavādaḥ 
yasyā mriyeta kanyāyā vācā satye kṛte patiḥ 
tām anena vidhānena nijo vindeta devaraḥ 
niyogarūpatvāt kanyāgato 'yaṃ dharma ucyate 
vācā satye kṛte vāgdāne nivṛtte ekena dattāpareṇa pratigṛhītā 
tām anena vakṣyamāṇena vidhānena nijaḥ sodaro devaro vindeta vivāhayet 
yathāvidhy adhigamyaināṃ śuklavastrāṃ śucivratām 
mitho bhajetāprasavāt sakṛt sakṛd ṛtāv ṛtau 
yathāvidhi yathāśāstram 
adhigamainām yathā vaivāhyo vidhis tathā vivāhya 
vācaniko 'yaṃ vivāhaḥ 
punarbhūś ca tathocyate 
na vā vyūḍhāpi satī bhāryā bhavati 
kevalaṃ parārtho 'syā vācaniko vivāhaḥ 
tathā ca darśayati na datvā kasyacit kanyāṃ punar anyasya dīyate iti 
nāsau devarāya dīyata ity arthaḥ 
adattā cāsvabhūtā katham iva bhāryā bhavet śuklavastrām 
niyamo gamane anyasminn api niyoge dharmo 'yam iṣyate 
na datvā kasyacit kanyāṃ punar dadyād vicakṣaṇaḥ 
datvā punaḥ prayacchan hi prāpnoti puruṣānṛtam 
teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu vijñeyā vidvadbhiḥ saptame pade iti prāgvivāhān mṛte vare dattāyām api punar dānāśaṅkāyāṃ pratiṣedho 'yam 
viśiṣṭe tu punar vacanam tathāvidhā punarbhūr uktā 
nānyasmai datvā tasmin mṛte 'nyasmai dadyāt 
tathā kurvan prāpnoti puruṣānṛtam manuṣyaharaṇe yat pāpaṃ tat tasya bhavati 
vidhivat pratigṛhyāpi tyajet kanyāṃ vigarhitām 
vyādhitāṃ vipraduṣṭāṃ vā chadmanā copapāditām 
vidhiḥ śāstram tad arhatīti vidhivat 
yādṛśaḥ śāstreṇa vidhir uktaḥ adbhir eva dvijāgryāṇām iti 
sa ca kaiścid udakādhikāraḥ kanyāviṣaye smaryate 
tena pratigṛhyāpi tyajet kanyāṃ prāg vivāhāt 
vigarhitāṃ durlakṣaṇāṃ pūrvaṃ pratigṛhītāṃ akṣatayonim api tathā nirlajjāṃ bahupuruṣabhāṣiṇīm vyādhitāṃ kṣayavyādhigṛhītām vipraduṣṭāṃ rogiṇyādiśabditām anyagatabhāvāṃ ca tyajet 
anye kṣatayoniṃ vipraduṣṭāṃ vyācakṣate 
na te samyaṅ manyante 
yadi tāvat puruṣānupabhuktā strī kanyā avikṛtā tadā naiva duṣyati 
atha puruṣasaṃyuktā tadā kanyaiva na bhavati 
tatra tyajet kanyām iti sāmānādhikāraṇyānupapattiḥ 
uktaś ca tasyās tyāgaḥ 
chadmanā copapāditā nyūnādhikāṅgī yā hetuniyuktā 
akathiteṣu svalpeṣv api doṣeṣu kṛtavaraṇāpi tyājyaiva 
yas tu doṣavatīṃ kanyām anākhyāyopapādayet 
tasya tad vitathaṃ kuryāt kanyādātur durātmanaḥ 
kanyādoṣā uktāḥ 
tān anākhyāya anuktvā prayacchati dadāti tasya tad dānaṃ vitathaṃ niṣphalaṃ kuryāt pratyarpaṇena 
ukta evāyam arthaḥ pūrvaślokenātispaṣṭīkṛtaḥ 
vidhāya vṛttiṃ bhāryāyāḥ pravaset kāryavān naraḥ 
avṛttikarśitā hi strī praduṣyet sthitimaty api 
yadā pravaset tadā bhāryāyā vṛttiṃ vidhāya pravased iti vidhiṃ vidhāyety evam arthaṃ draṣṭavyam pravasan bhāryāyā vṛttiṃ vidadhīta iti 
tathā kuryād yathāsyā yāvat pravāsaṃ vṛttir bhavati 
śarīrasthitihetubhojanācchādanagṛhyopakaraṇādi 
tāṃ vidhāya pravaset svadeśād deśāntaraṃ gacchet 
kāryavān kāryaṃ puruṣārtho dṛṣṭo 'dṛṣṭaś ca 
adṛṣṭo dharmo dṛṣṭāv arthakāmau 
tathā vakṣyati proṣito dharmakāryārtham ityādinā 
antareṇaitāni nimittāni bhāryāṃ hitvā pravāso niṣidhyate 
avṛttikarśitā hi 
dṛṣṭadoṣapradarśanam arthavādaḥ 
avṛttyā daridreṇa karśitā pīḍitā praduṣyet puruṣāntarasaṃparkādinā 
sthitimaty api 
sthitiḥ kulācāras tatsaṃpannā kṣudhāvasare dīnā doṣam avāpnuyād anyaṃ bhartāram āśritya jīvatīti bhāvyata etat 
saṃbhāvanāyāṃ liṅ 
vidhāya proṣite vṛttiṃ jīven niyamam āsthitā 
proṣite tv avidhāyaiva jīvec chilpair agarhitaiḥ 
niyamo yathā saṃnihite bhartari parigṛhaprayāṇādiniṣedha evaṃ proṣite 'pi āsthitā āśritā gṛhītavatī 
akṛtvā tu vṛttiṃ proṣite śilpair jīved iti kartanajālikākaraṇādinā 
garhitāni vastūni vyajanādīni 
eṣa eva vidhavādīnāṃ nijaśramajanyo vṛttyupāyaḥ 
proṣito dharmkāryārthaṃ pratīkṣyo 'ṣṭau naraḥ samāḥ 
vidyārthaṃ ṣaḍ yaśo'rthaṃ vā kāmārthaṃ trīṃs tu vatsarān 
yad uktaṃ kāryavān pravaset iti tāni kāryāṇi darśayati 
tadviśeṣeṇa pratīkṣākālabhedaḥ 
paratas tv idaṃ tayā kartavyam iti noktam 
tatra kecid āhuḥ prakaraṇād agarhitair jīvet iti 
tad ayuktam 
prāg asmāt kālād agarhitair itīyaṃ kiṃ mriyatām 
na hy asyā atmatyāga iṣyate puṃsa iva pratiṣiddhatvāt 
tasmāt prāg apy asmāt pratīkṣaṇavidher agarhitaiḥ śilpair ajīvantī garhitair jīvet 
anye vyabhicāram icchanti 
tathā ca smṛtyantare
naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe ca patite patau 
pañcasv āpatsu nārīṇāṃ patir anyo vidhīyate 
anye 'py āhuḥ 
nāsyā jātu brahmacaryam apanetuṃ śakyate 
strīdharmeṣu hi tad asyā vihitaṃ manunāpi na tu nāmāpi gṛhṇīyāt patyau prete parasya tu iti 
mṛte bhartari nāsti vyabhicāraḥ kim aṅga proṣite 
patiśabdo hi pālanakriyānimittakaḥ grāmapatiḥ senāyāḥ patir iti 
ataś cāsmād vacanād naiṣā bhartṛparatantrā syāt 
api tv ātmano jīvanārthaṃ sairandhrīkaraṇādikarmabhir anyam āśrayeta 
tac ca yadā ṣaṇmasabhṛtyā saṃvatsarabhṛtyā vā kasmiṃścid āśrite bhartā yady āgacchet tadānīṃ tāṃ ced vaśīkartuṃ śaknuyāt tyaja tvaṃ bhāryām iti yāvad bhavati kālo na pūrṇaḥ prāk patyur eva sā pañcame carvitam anyat 
anye 'py artham imam āhuḥ 
pūrve tu punarbhūvṛttam icchanti 
yā patyā vā parityaktā bhavati yasyāḥ kila patir iyantaṃ kālaṃ nihitavṛttiko nāgacchati sā tena tyaktaiva bhavati 
tataś ca yadi sā punarbhūdharmeṇānyenoḍhā bhavet tadā bhartābhyāgato na kiṃcid brūyāt 
punar bhavasyeyaṃ bhāryeti 
tad ayuktam 
na niṣkrayavisargābhyām iti tasya ślokasyārthavattvaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
dharmaś ca tatkāryaṃ ca dharmakāryaṃ 
so 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ pravāsasyeti dharmakāryārtham 
kutaḥ 
na gṛhasthasya dharmārtho dīrghakālaḥ pravāsaḥ 
avaśyaṃ hy agnayas tena paricaraṇīyāḥ 
pāñcayajñikam anuṣṭheyam 
kuto gantavyam vasante vasante jyotiṣā yaṣṭavyam iti 
tīrthasnānādīny api smārthāni ca śrautāvirodhīny anuṣṭheyāni 
na ca saṃvidhāya proṣitasya vā bavantīti yenocyate saṃvidhāyāpi pravāsa āparvaṇaḥ svayaṃ parvaṇi juhuyād ṛtvijām ekatarakālam iti hy uktam 
anāhitāgnes tīrthayātrāyāṃ pāñcayajñikasya tulyatve 'pi smārtatve bhāryāsahitasyopapatteḥ na tattyāge tīrthagamanaṃ yuktam 
ucyate 
guruvacanena yaṃ guravo dharmārjane rājopasevāyāṃ vā svakāryāya preṣayanti sa dharmārthaṃ pravāsaḥ 
prāyaścittaṃ vā tapovanadeśabhramaṇena 
atha vārthārjanārtham eva dharmakāryārtham abhipretam daridro 'haṃ kutaścid dhanam arjayiṣye 
vidyārtham 
nanu snātasya ca bhāryādhigamaḥ 
kṛtavidyasya ca snānam 
tatra kutaḥ kṛtavivāhasya vidyārthitā 
darśitam etat 
īṣadavagatavedārtho vivāhe 'dhikriyate niścite snānādau 
naitad yuktam 
kṛtāyāṃ dharmajijñāsāyāṃ snānaṃ jijñāsā ca vicārapūrvakasaṃśayacchedena niścitārthā 
satyam 
nāyaṃ vidhir vidyārthitāyāḥ 
tathā ca sati dharmakāryārtham ity anenaivāvagatā syāt 
utpanne 'py adhikāropayoginy avagame 'bhyāsātiśayārthaṃ viśeṣārthaṃ cānyāsu vidyāsu 
kṣipraṃ śauryayaśaḥkhyāpanārthaṃ bahiḥ saviseṣavidvatvakhyāpanārtham 
deśāntarapravasane yaśohetuḥ pravāsaḥ 
kāmārthaṃ rūpājīvānugamo 'bhipretatarāṃ bhāryām udvoḍhum 
smṛtyantare prasūtābhedena ca kālabhedaḥ smaryate 
tathā ca viṣṇuḥ aṣṭau viprasūtāḥ ṣaṭ rājanyāḥ caturo vaiśyā dviguṇaṃ prasūteti 
na śūdrāyāḥ kālaniyamaḥ syāt 
saṃvatsaram ity eke iti 
saṃvatsaraṃ pratīkṣeta dviṣāṇāṃ yoṣitaṃ patiḥ 
ūrdhvaṃ saṃvatsarāt tv enāṃ dāyaṃ hṛtvā na saṃvaset 
dveṣyaḥ patir yasyās tāṃ dviṣāṇām 
etena tu na niṣkāsanaṃ kuryāt 
saṃpūrvasya vaser enām iti ca dvitīyānupapatteḥ vāsayed iti nirbhartsayet 
pātake 'pi tasyā niṣkāsanaṃ nāsti nirundhyād ekaveśmani iti vacanāt 
prāyaścitte 'py asmin nimitte vinayādhānārtho 'pahāra iṣyate 
na sarveṇa sarva ātyantika ācchedaḥ 
atikrāmet pramattaṃ yā mattaṃ rogārtam eva vā 
sā trīn māsān parityājyā vibhūṣaṇaparicchadā 
atikramas tadupacaryāvajñānaṃ pathyauṣadhādiṣv atatparatā na puruṣāntarasaṃcāraḥ 
māsatrayaṃ parityāgaś ca saṃbhogasyaiva pūrvasmād eva hetoḥ 
hārakaṭakādibhūṣaṇair viyuktā kartavyā 
paricchadaparigraheṇa bhāṇḍakuṇḍādinā dāsīdāsena vā 
unmattaṃ patitaṃ klībam abījaṃ pāparogiṇam 
na tyāgo 'sti dviṣantyāś ca na dāyāpavartanam 
klībābījaśabdau napuṃsakam āhatuḥ 
bhedas tu eko vātaretā apravṛttendriyo 'paraḥ 
tādṛśaṃ yā dveṣṭi tasyā nāsti nigrahaḥ pūrvoktaḥ 
apavartanam apahāraḥ proṣitapratiṣiddhānnādayaḥ smṛtyantaraniṣiddhāḥ 
madyapāsāsatyavṛttā ca pratikūlā ca yā bhavet 
vyādhitā vādhivettavyā hiṃsrārthaghnī ca sarvadā 
madyapāsau madyapānaratā 
paktisaṃskāragṛhakāryānuṣṭhānāsamarthā tatparijāgarayā sā parivedanāyām arhati 
yā tu gurubhiḥ pratiṣiddhamadyapānā tasyā daṇḍaṃ vakṣyati pratiṣedhe pibet iti 
svayaṃ niyamasya tv anyaniyamavyatikramavat prāyaścittena pratyāpattir yuktā punar adhivedanaṃ ca 
tathā ca dharmānuṣṭhānaprajotpattigṛhakāryopaghātanimittāny adhivedananimittāni paṭhyante pratikūlā vyādhitārthaghnī iti 
brāhmaṇyās tu śāstreṇa pratiṣiddhamadyāyās tatpānaprāyaścittam eva bhūyo 'pravṛttau pātityaṃ tu bhrūṇahani hīnasevāyāṃ strī patati iti parisaṃkhyānān na madyapāne pātityam iti 
tad ekādaśe vakṣyāmaḥ 
uktaṃ ca pañcame 
asatyavṛttā asādhvācārā bhṛtyeṣv asatparuṣavāk balikarmaṇāṃ prāg eva bhuṅkte daivapitryayor brāhmaṇabhojanādau na śraddhāvatī 
arthaghnī ativyayaśīlā bhāṇḍopaskaraṇaṃ na parirakṣati analpamūlyena krīṇāti 
hiṃsrā nākulaśaṅkayā bhṛtyādyatitāḍaṇaśīlā 
anvāhikasya vyayasyāpahantrī 
adhivedanaṃ tasyā upary anyāvivāhaḥ 
anyasām apy adhivedanam āha 
vandhyāṣṭame 'dhivedyābde daśame tu mṛtaprajā 
ekādase strījananī sadyas tv apriyavādinī 
tatra vandhyāṣṭame 'bde 'dhivedyā daśame tu mṛtaprajā 
nādhivedane 'patyotpattyabhāvād dhi vandhyāyā anuṣṭhānaparipātanaṃ syāt apatyotpattividher ādhānavidheś ca 
nāputre hy ādhānaṃ śrūyate 
evaṃ mṛtaprajāyāḥ strījananyāḥ 
apriyavādinyās tu doṣābhāvena nādhivedanaṃ na satyāṃ kṣamāyām ayaṃ niyamaḥ 
yā rogiṇī syāt tu hitā saṃpannā caiva śīlataḥ 
sānujñāpyādhivettavyā nāvamānyā ca karhicit 
bhartre hitā paricaryāparā 
anujñāpanāvamānayor iha vidhānayam pūrvāsām etadbhāvāt 
rogiṇīgrahaṇaṃ vandhyāstrijananyāv api lakṣayati 
prakṛtatvāviśeṣād avamānanimittābhāvāc ca karhicit kadācid avamānanaṃ śiṣṭyarthaṃ paribhāṣaṇādi 
adhivinnā tu yā nārī nirgacched ruṣitā gṛhāt 
sā sadyaḥ saṃniroddhavyā tyājyā vā kulasaṃnidhau 
krodhenādhivedanahetunā nirgatāyās tyāgasaṃnirodhau vikalpato vidhīyete 
na tu yathopapannahetunā bhojanācchādanādinā tatra prītyā krodhāvamārjanaṃ śvaśrūbhiḥ śvaśurādibhir vā paribhāṣaṇam 
saṃnirodho rakṣipuruṣādhiṣṭhānam 
tyāgo vyākhyātaḥ asaṃbhogaḥ sahaśayyāvarjanam 
kulaṃ jñātayaḥ tatpitṛpakṣāḥ svapakṣāś ca 
pratiṣedhe pibed yā tu madyam abhyudayeṣv api 
prekṣāsamājaṃ gacched vā sā daṇḍyā kṛṣṇalāni ṣaṭ 
pratiṣedhe gurusaṃbandhibhiḥ 
ayaṃ daṇḍaḥ kṣatriyādistrīṇām 
na śāstrīyo brāhmaṇīnām 
na hi tatra daṇḍamātreṇa mokṣaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi mahatā 
na ca tatrābhyudayeṣu pānāśaṅkā 
apratiṣiddhamadyānāṃ tu niyamenotsavasamāgatānām ādaravatī pravṛttir dṛśyate 
yāṃ samyaṅ niṣedhaty abhyudayeṣv apīti 
daṇḍaś cāyaṃ bhartrā dīyate 
saty api rājavṛttitve strīṇāṃ bhartā prabhuḥ iti vijñāyate 
anyeṣām api parigrahavatāṃ bhṛtyādiviṣaye kiyati daṇḍe svātantryam 
abhyudayaḥ putrajanmavivāhādaya utsavāḥ 
prekṣā naṭādidarśanam 
samājo nitāntam api janasamūhaḥ 
tatra kutūhalinyā ayaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
yadi svāś cāparāś caiva vinderan yoṣito dvijāḥ 
tāsāṃ varṇakrameṇa syāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ pūjā ca veśma ca 
kāmataḥ pravṛttā yadi samānajātīyā asamānajātīyāś ca vinderan vivāhayeyus tāsāṃ varṇakrameṇa jātyanurūpaṃ jyaiṣṭhyam na vayasto na ca vivāhakramataḥ 
phalādidānanimitte pūjā prathamaṃ brāhmaṇyās tataḥ kṣatriyāvaiśyayor ity eṣa varṇakramaḥ 
veśma pradhānaṃ gṛhaṃ tad brāhmaṇyāḥ 
savarṇānāṃ vivāhakramo niścāyakaḥ smṛtaḥ 
bhartuḥ śarīraśruśrūṣāṃ dharmakāryaṃ ca naityakam 
svā svaiva kuryāt sarveṣāṃ nāsvajātiḥ kathaṃcana 
śarīraśuśrūṣā bhartur upayogipākādilakṣaṇā dānabhojanapratijāgaraṇaṃ svā svaiva kuryāt 
pṛṣṭhapādasaṃvāhananirṇejanādau tv aniyamaḥ 
yugapatsaṃnidhau tu śarīrāvayavakramo varṇakrameṇa 
naityakaṃ dharmakāryam sāyaṃ tv annasya ityādi agniśaraṇopalepanācamanodakatarpaṇadānādi 
asyā nindārthavādaḥ 
yas tu tat kārayen mohāt sajātyā sthitayānyayā 
yathā brāhmaṇacāṇḍālaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭas tathaiva saḥ 
yas tv etat karma anyayā asamānajātīyayā kārayet sajātīyāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ brāhmaṇa eva sa caṇḍālaḥ pūrvasmād dṛṣṭaḥ 
utkṛṣṭāyābhirūpāya varāya sadṛśāya ca 
aprāptām api tāṃ tasmai kanyāṃ dadyād yathāvidhi 
utkṛṭṣāyābhirūpāyeti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ 
utkṛṣṭāyābhirūpatarāya ity arthaḥ 
atha votkṛṣṭāya jātyādibhir abhirūpāyeti pṛthag viśeṣaṇam 
rūpam ākṛtim ābhimukhyena prāpto 'bhirūpaḥ 
svabhāvavacano vā susvabhāvo vidvān apy abhirūpa ucyate 
sadṛśāya jātyādibhiḥ 
varo voḍhā jāmātā 
aprāptām apy ayogyām api kāmāvaśatvena bālām aprāptaṃ kaumāraṃ vayaḥ smṛtyantare nagnikā ity ucyate 
kāmaḥ spṛhā yasyā notpannā sā cāṣṭavarṣā ṣaḍvarṣā vā na tv atyantabālaiva 
tathā hi liṅgam aṣṭavarṣām iti 
idam eva liṅgaṃ dharmaprayuktāyām api vivāhasyeti 
anyathā rāgasyaiva prayojakatve kuto 'prāptāyā vivāha ity āhuḥ 
tad ayuktam 
dhanārthino 'pi bālāṃ vivāhayanti 
na śastrīyaiva sarvā prayuktis tṛtīye nirūpitā 
kāmam ā maraṇāt tiṣṭhed gṛhe kanyartumaty api 
na caivaināṃ prayacchet tu guṇahīnāya karhicit 
prāg ṛtoḥ kanyāyā dānam 
ṛtudarśane 'pi na dadyād yāvad guṇavān varo na prāptaḥ 
guṇo vidyāśauryātiśayaḥ śobhanākṛtir vayomahatvopetatā lokaśāstraniṣiddhaparivarjanaṃ kanyāyām anurāga ityādiḥ 
trīṇi varṣāṇy udīkṣeta kumāry ṛtumatī satī 
ūrdhvaṃ tu kālad etasmād vindeta sadṛśaṃ patim 
reto ṛtukālam tadvaty api trīṇi varṣāṇi tadgṛhe āsīta 
ataḥ paramam utkṛṣṭābhāve sadṛśaṃ samānajātīyaṃ svayaṃ vṛṇuyāt 
adīyamānā bhartāram adhigacched yadi svayam 
nainaḥ kiṃcid avāpnoti na ca yaṃ sādhigacchati 
varṣatrayād ūrdhvam adīyamānā yaṃ bhartāraṃ vṛṇute tasya doṣo na 
kanyāyāḥ pūrveṇaiva doṣābhāva ukte vriyamāṇasya doṣārtham idam 
ṛtudarsanaṃ ca dvādasavarṣāṇām iti smaryate 
alaṃkāraṃ nādadīta pitryaṃ kanyā svayaṃvarā 
mātṛkaṃ bhrātṛdattaṃ vā stenā syād yadi tam haret 
bhrātrādibhir yad ādau dattaṃ svayaṃvaraṇābhiprāyaṃ tasyā ajānadbhis tad alaṃkaraṇaṃ teṣām eva pratyarpayet 
yadi tu tathāvidhāyā eva dadāti tadā na tyāgaḥ 
tenāsmai na vayam enāṃ dāsyāma ity evamabhiprāyaṃ yadbhūṣaṇaṃ na tasminn anyathātvam āpanne yuktam 
stenaḥ syād iti puṃliṅgena pāṭḥāntaram 
varasya cauratvam āhuḥ 
tasmāt tenālaṅkaras tyājayitavyaḥ 
pitre na dadyāc chulkaṃ tu kanyām ṛtumatīṃ haran 
sa ca svāmyād atikrāmed ṛtūnāṃ pratirodhanāt 
śulkadeyāyā ṛtumatyāḥ śulkanirodho 'yam 
sa ca svāmyād atikrāmet 
bālye pitur vaśe tiṣṭhet ity uktam 
vayontaraprāptau cādadataḥ pituḥ svāmyaṃ nāsti 
śulkādeyāyā api hetoḥ samānatvāt pituḥ svāmyanivṛttiḥ 
apakramaṇaṃ nivṛttiḥ 
pratirodhanaṃ pratirodho 'patyotpattikārye 
kecid āhuḥ amānavo'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
triṃśadvarṣo vahet kanyāṃ hṛdyāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīṃ 
tryaṣṭavarṣo 'ṣṭavarṣāṃ vā dharme sīdati satvaraḥ 
iyatā kālena yavīyasī kanyā voḍhavyā na punar etāvadvayasa eva vivāha ity upadeśārthaḥ 
athāpi na yathāśrutavarṣasaṃkhyaiva 
kiṃ tarhi bahunā kālena yavīyasī voḍhavyā 
na hy etad vivāhaprakaraṇe śrutam 
yena saṃskāryaviśeṣaṇatvena tadaṅgaṃ kālo daśādivarṣāṃ pañcaviṃśatyādivarṣaṃ ca nivartayet 
nanu ca vākyāntarasthasyāpy aṅgavidhir bhavaty eva 
satyam iha prakaraṇotkarṣeṇa pāṭhād ācāryasyābhiprāyāntaram anumīyate 
tathā śiṣṭasamācāraḥ 
sutasya ca punar dārakriyāyāṃ naiṣa kālaḥ saṃbhavatīti punardārakriyāṃ kuryāt iti nopapdyate 
devadattāṃ patir bhāryāṃ vindate necchayātmanaḥ 
tāṃ sādhvīṃ bibhṛyān nityaṃ devānāṃ priyam ācaran 
sādhvī bhāryā prātikūlyāpriyavādādidoṣayuktāpi bhartrā na tyājyeti ślokārthaḥ 
avaśiṣṭā praśaṃsā 
yāṃ tu nirundhyād ekaveśmani ity asādhvyā api vihitaṃ tat sakṛdvyabhicare 
abhyāse tu tyāga eva 
nānyathā tāṃ sādhvīṃ bibhṛyād ity anena kiṃcit kṛtaṃ syāt 
yad api
hṛtādhikārāṃ malināṃ piṇḍamātropajīvinīm 
paribhūtām adhaḥśayyāṃ vāsayed vyabhicāriṇīm 
tac ca satyāṃ śaktau patyur icchā sā 
anicchāyāṃ tu tyāga eva 
yac cedaṃ patitāsv api vastrānnapānaṃ deyaṃ ca ityādi vakṣyati tadbrahmahatyādiṣu prāyaścitteṣu bhaikṣyabhojanārambhe nivāsaprāptau pratiṣedhavacanam iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
sarvathā tu punar vyabhicāriṇyā bharaṇaṃ nāsti 
na cātra tyāgaḥ śruto yena saṃbhogaviṣayatayā kalpyeta 
somo 'dadat ityādimantrārthavadebhyo devatānāṃ datṛtvaṃ pratīyate 
atha vā vivāhe devatāyā bhāryā bhavaty ata ucyate devadattām iti 
vindeta nātmana icchayā 
yathānyad gohiraṇyādyāpaṇabhūmau labhyate tathā neyaṃ bhāryā 
ata ucyate necchayātmana iti 
devānāṃ priyam devebhyo hitam  tyaktāyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ vaiśvadevādikriyānimitte nāsti devahitam 
atas tāṃ dviṣatīm api bibhṛyāt 
pātitye tām adhikāraprāptāṃ patir adhivindeta 
prajanārthaṃ striyaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ saṃtānārthaṃ ca mānavāḥ 
tasmāt sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ śrutau patnyā sahoditaḥ 
prajanaṃ garbhagrahaṇam 
saṃtāno garbhādhānam 
tasmād dhetor apatyotpatter ubhayādhīnatvād vede strīpuṃsayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ patnyā saha puṃsa uktaḥ 
ataḥ kevasyādhikarābhāvat striyo dveṣyā api na tyājyāḥ 
kanyāyāṃ dattaśulkāyāṃ mriyeta yadi śulkadaḥ 
devarāya pradātavyā yadi kanyānumanyate 
yasyāḥ pitrādibhir gṛhītaṃ śulka na ca dattā kevalavacanena deyatvena vyavasthitā atrāntare sa cen mriyeta tadā  anyaddravyavad devareṣu prāptā sarveṣu vā yudhiṣṭhirādivat tadabhāve sapiṇḍeṣu  ato viśeṣārtham idam ucyate devarāya pradātavyeti na sarvebhyo bhartṛbhrātṛbhyo nāpi sapiṇḍebhyaḥ kiṃ tarhy ekasmai devarāyaiva 
tatrāpi kanyāyā anumatau satyāṃ 
athāsatyāṃ kanyāyāḥ śulkasya ca kā pratipattiḥ 
yadi kanyāyai rocate brahmacaryaṃ tadā śulkaṃ kanyāpitṛpakṣāṇām eva 
atha patyantaram arthayate tadā prāggṛhītaṃ śulkaṃ tyaktvānyasmād ādāya dīyate 
nādadīta na śūdro 'pi śulkaṃ duhitaraṃ dadan 
śulkaṃ hi gṛhṇan kurute channaṃ duhitṛvikrayam 
icchātaḥ śulkagrahaṇe pūrveṇa vidhir uktaḥ 
kasyacit tata evāśaṅkā syāt  adoṣaṃ śulkagrahaṇaṃ śāstre gṛhītaśulkāyā viśeṣa ukto yataḥ  ata imām āśaṅkām apanetum āha nādadīta na śūdro 'pi śulkam iti 
icchātaḥ pravṛttau śāstrīyo niyamo na tu śāstreṇa padārthasyaiva kartavyatoktā 
yathā madyapītasya prāyaścittavidhānena na madyapānaṃ śāstreṇānujñātaṃ bhavati 
śulkasaṃjñena yad evoktam gṛhṇan hi śulkaṃ lobhena iti 
yena tu viśeṣeṇa punaḥ pāṭho 'sau pradarśita eva 
etat tu na pare cakrur nāpare jātu sādhavaḥ 
yad anyasya pratijñāya punar anyasya dīyate 
yad uktaṃ gṛhīte śulke kanyecchāyāṃ satyāṃ mṛte tu śulkade 'syā anyatra dānam iti tan niṣedhati 
yad anyasya śulkadasya pratijñāya punar anyasmai dīyate punaḥ śulkaṃ gṛhītveti varaṃ svayaṃvaraṃ tu kārayet kanyā 
eṣa evārthaḥ 
nānuśuśruma jātv etat pūrveṣv api hi janmasu 
śulkasaṃjñena mūlyena channaṃ duhitṛvikrayam 
na kutaścid asmābhiḥ śrutaṃ pūrveṣu janmasu kalpāntareṣv ity arthaḥ 
anyonyasyāvyabhīcāro bhaved āmaraṇāntikaḥ 
eṣa dharmaḥ samāsena jñeyaḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ paraḥ 
aviśeṣeṇa vacanavittyā sarvakriyāsv avyabhicāraḥ 
tathā cāpastambaḥ dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nābhicaritavyā iti 
etāvac ca śreyo dharmo 'rthaḥ kāmaḥ 
tathā coktam trivarga iti tu sthitiḥ iti 
yac cāhuḥ aparityāgo 'trāvyabhicāraḥ itarathā strīvat puruṣasyānekābhāryāpariṇayanaṃ na syāt 
tad ayuktam 
asti puruṣe vacanam kāmatas tu pravṛttānām tathā vandhyāṣṭame 'dhivettavyā iti 
na tu striyāḥ 
tathā ca liṅgāntaraṃ syāt ekasya bahvyo jāyā bhavanti naikasyai bahavaḥ saha patayaḥ iti 
āmaraṇānte bhava āmaraṇāntikaḥ 
anyataramaraṇe 'pi tasyānto 'stīty arthaḥ 
eṣa saṃkṣepeṇa strīpuṃsayoḥ prakṛṣṭo dharmo veditavyaḥ 
tathā nityaṃ yateyātāṃ strīpuṃsau tu kṛtakriyau 
yathā nāticaretāṃ tau viyuktāv itaretaram 
yateyātāṃ prayatnavantau tathā syātāṃ yathetaretaraṃ parasparaṃ nāticaretām 
aticāro 'tikramaḥ dharmārthakāmeṣv asahabhāvaḥ 
kṛtakriyau kṛtavivāhādisaṃskārau aviyuktau tataḥ param 
upasaṃhāraśloko 'yaṃ nānuktārthopadeśakaḥ 
pūrvottaraprakaraṇayoḥ saṃbandhaśloko 'yam 
eṣa strīpuṃsayor ukto dharmo vo ratisaṃhitaḥ 
āpady apatyaprāptiś ca dāyadharmaṃ nibodhata 
ukteṣu strīpuṃsayoś cāpatyotpattau ca dāyadharmasya vibhāgasyāvasaraḥ 
ūrdhvaṃ pituś ca mātuś ca sametya bhrātaraḥ samam 
bhajeran paitṛkaṃ riktham anīśās te hi jīvatoḥ 
bhajerann iti prāptakālatāyām liṅ 
tathā pañcame prapañcitam 
atha vā yasmin samaye saṃkrāmitam iti 
jyeṣṭha eva tu gṛhṇīyāt pitryaṃ dhanam aśeṣataḥ 
śeṣās tam upajīveyur yathaiva pitaraṃ tathā 
jyeṣṭhena jātamātreṇa putrī bhavati mānavaḥ 
pitṝṇām anṛṇaś caiva sa tasmāt sarvam arhati 
yasminn ṛṇaṃ saṃnayati yena cānantyam aśnute 
sa eva dharmajaḥ putraḥ kāmajān itarān viduḥ 
itarān ity arthavādo 'yam 
yathāśrutatātparyagrahaṇād dhi kanīyasām abhāgārhataiva syāt 
tataś ca vakṣyamāṇavirodhaḥ 
piteva pālayet putrān jyeṣṭho bhrātṝn yavīyasaḥ 
putravac cāpi varteran jyeṣṭhe bhrātari dharmataḥ 
putravat pālanīyā na tu bālā iti dhanādinā garhaṇīyāḥ 
tair apy ayaṃ piteti bhāvanīyam 
tad āha putravac cāpi varterann iti 
aparā praśaṃsā 
jyeṣṭhaḥ kulaṃ vardhayati vināśayati vā punaḥ 
jyeṣṭhaḥ pūjyatamo loke jyeṣṭhaḥ sadbhir agarhitaḥ 
ya eva guṇajyeṣṭhaḥ sa vardhayati kulam 
ayam eva nirguṇas tatkulaṃ vināśyati 
śīlavati jyeṣṭhe kanīyāṃso 'pi tathā vartante 
te 'pi guṇahīnena vivadante 
yo jyeṣṭho jyeṣṭhavṛttiḥ syān māteva sa piteva saḥ 
ajyeṣṭhavṛttir yas tu syāt sa saṃpūjyas tu bandhuvat 
jyeṣṭhasya vṛttiḥ putre iva snehaḥ pālanam śarīradhaneṣu tadīyeṣu svavad anupekṣā akāryebhyo nivartanam 
yas tv anyathā vartate tatre bandhuvat pratyutthānābhivādanaiḥ mātulapitṛvyavat saṃpūjā kartavyā 
anyathākaraṇe vidheyatānivṛttiḥ 
evaṃ saha vaseyur vā pṛthag vā dharmakāmyayā 
pṛthag vivardhate dharmas tasmād dharmyā pṛthakkriyā 
svecchāniyojyatvābhāvān nirapekṣyasvadravyasādhyeṣu jyotiṣṭomādiṣv asaṃbhavāt tatsiddhyartho 'yaṃ nyāyaprāpto vibhāga ucyate pṛthag vā dharmakāmyayeti 
na punar avibhāgād adharmaḥ vibhāga evāgnihotrādivad dharmaḥ 
nanu ca dharmānuṣṭhānapratibandhahetutvād adharmataivāvibhāgasya 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
adhikṛtasyānanuṣṭhāne pratyavāyaḥ 
na cāvibhaktadhanasyādhikāro 'gnimatvābhāvāt vibhāgakāla evāgniparigrahasya vihitatvāt 
yas tu jīvaty eva pitari kṛtavivāhas tadaiva ca parigṛhītāgnis tasyādhikṛtatvān naivāvibhāgaḥ 
so 'pi yadi vicyutaḥ parigrahād anyato vā vihitānuṣṭhānaparyāptadhanas tadā naiva saha vasan pratyaveyāt 
na hi vibhāgāvibhāgayor dharmādharmatvaṃ svarūpeṇāstīty uktam 
nanu ca bhrātṝṇām avibhaktānām eko dharmaḥ pravartate iti vacanāt dampatyor iva sahānuṣṭhāne prāgvibhāgād asty eva dharmavyaktiḥ 
sādhāraṇyād dravyasya sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya kartavyam iti 
naitad agnihotrādau 
āhavanīyādiṣu hy agnihotrādayaḥ 
saṃskāranimittāś cāhavanīyādaya ātmanepadadarśanād anyatarasya saṃbandhitāṃ na pratipadyante 
parakīye vāgnau juhvataḥ pratiṣedhadarśanam asti nānyasyāgniṣu yajata iti 
na smārte hy api gṛhye 'gnau vidhānam 
gṛhaśabdasya viśiṣṭopādānād agnivacanatvād eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 
atithyādibhojanadāne mahāyajñamadhye pāṭhāt 
vaivāhike 'gnau kurvīta gṛhyaṃ karma yathāvidhi 
pañcayajñavidhānaṃ ca 
iti gṛhyata evādhikāraḥ 
tenaitad vacanam eko dharmaḥ iti śrāddhapūrtānnādimātraṃ vijñeyam 
jyeṣṭhasya viṃśa uddhāraḥ sarvadravyāc ca yad varam 
tato 'rdhaṃ madhyamasya syāt turīyaṃ tu yavīyasaḥ 
iyam uddhāraniyogasmṛtir atikrāntakālaviṣayā 
na tv adyatve 'nuṣṭheyā niyatakālatvāt smṛtīnām iti kecit 
anuṣṭheyatvavyapadeśo dīrghasatravaj jñānād abhyudayo yathā syād iti 
na hi dīrghasatram adyatve kecid āharamāṇā dṛśyante 
adhīyate tu tadupadeśaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ 
tathā ca anye kṛtayuge dharmāḥ ity uktam 
tena deśaniyamavat kālaniyamo 'pi dharmāṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ 
na hy upadiṣṭo dharmaḥ sarvatra deśe 'nuṣṭhīyate 
tathā hi deśadharmā niyatadeśavyavasthitā ucyante 
anyathā sarvānuṣṭhāne na deśavyapadeśyatā dharmāṇām 
tathā ca paṭhati ayaṃ dvijair hi vidvadbhiḥ ityādi 
tasmād uddhāraniyogagovadhasmṛtaya upadiṣṭā nānuṣṭheyāḥ 
tad etad apeśalam 
na hy evaṃvidhaḥ kālaniyamaḥ kvacid api śrūyate sāyaṃprātaḥparvādiniyamād anyatra 
yac ca anye kṛtayuge dharmāḥ iti tat prathama eva vyākhyātam 
na hīdaṃ yugabhedena dharmavyavasthāhetuḥ 
deśaniyamo 'pi prācīnapravaṇādivyatirekeṇa madhyadeśapūrvadeśakṛto naivāstīty uktam jātijānapadān dharmān sadbhir ācaritam ity atra 
dīrghasatreṣv adyatve 'py anuṣṭhānasaṃbhavaḥ 
saṃvatsaraśabdas tv ahaḥsu prathama eva darśitaḥ 
yat tu nādyatve kecid anutiṣṭhanto dṛśyanta iti upadiṣṭārthasya nityavad āmnātasyāpi bahubhiḥ prakārair anuṣṭhānasādhanāśaktyā phalānicchayā vā nāstikatayā vā 
yat tu vene rājyaṃ praśāsati tadāprabhṛtikaṃ mahāpaurvakālikam anuṣṭhānaṃ darśayatīty arthavādo 'sau na kālopadeśaḥ 
jyeṣṭhasya viṃśaḥ 
jyeṣṭhasya sarvadravyād viṃśatitamo bhāga uddhṛtya dātavya eva 
madhyamasya tadardhaṃ catvāriṃśattamo bhāgaḥ 
evaṃ kaniṣṭhasya turīyo jyeṣṭhāpekṣayāśītitamo bhāgaḥ 
evam uddhṛte pariśiṣṭaṃ tridhā kartavyam 
tatra sarvebhyo dravyebhyo yad varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ taj jyeṣṭhasyaiva 
atha vā dravyeṣv api paraṃ varam iti pāṭhaḥ 
uttamādhamamadhyāni yāni dravyādīni santi tatas tasmād yad ekaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat tasyaiva tad uktaṃ bhavati 
yatra gāvo 'śvā vā santi ekaḥ śreṣṭho jyeṣṭhasya dātavyo na dravyāntareṇa mūlyena vā svīkartavyaḥ 
trayāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ guṇinām ayam uddhāravidhiḥ guṇavatām uddhāradarśanāt 
jyeṣṭhaś caiva kaniṣṭhaś ca saṃharetāṃ yathoditam 
ye 'nye jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭḥābhyāṃ teṣāṃ syān madhyamaṃ dhanam 
tribhyo 'dhikaputrasya jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhayor guṇavator yathoktam uddhṛtya bahūnām api madhyamānāṃ guṇavato madhamasya yaś catvāriṃśattamo bhāga ukto 'nantaraśloke bahubhir api madhyamaiḥ saṃvibhajanīyaḥ 
samaguṇānāṃ tu madhyamānāṃ sarveṣām ekaikasya pūrvavacanāc catvāriṃśattamo bhāga ukta uddhāryaḥ 
teṣāṃ syān madhyamaṃ dhanam iti ubhayathā vacanaṃ vyajyate 
madhaymadhanaṃ yad anantaraśloke nirdiṣṭaṃ tat sarveṣāṃ samavāyena datavyam 
yadi vā pratyekam eva jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhatām apekṣya 
tatra prathamapakṣo nirguṇeṣu yuktaḥ 
te na bahudhanārhāḥ 
dvitīyo guṇavatsv eva 
sarveṣāṃ dhanajātānām ādadītāgryam agrajaḥ 
yac ca sātiśayaṃ kiṃcid daśataś cāpnuyād varam 
ādyenārdhaślokena sarvadravyāc ca yad varam ityuktam anuvadati 
jātaśabdo jātiparyāyaḥ prakāravacano vā 
agrajo jyeṣṭhaḥ 
agryaṃ śraṣṭham 
yac ca sātiśayam ekam api vastram alaṃkāraṃ vā 
daśato daśāvayavād vā varam ekam ādadīta 
yadi daśa gāvo 'śvā vā santi tadā ekaṃ śreṣṭham ādadīta 
arvāg daśāvayavād vā na labhate 
varge daśaśabdaḥ 
anye tu svārthe tasiṃ cācakṣyate 
daśaiva daśato varān iti bahuvacanaṃ paṭhanti 
daśa varān ādadīta 
anyas tadviśiṣṭān smaratidaśataḥ paśūnām ekaśaphadvipadānām iti 
uddhāro na daśasv asti saṃpannānāṃ svakarmasu 
yat kiṃcid eva deyaṃ tu jyāyase mānavardhanam 
daśasu paśuṣu yaḥ pūrvatroddhāra uktaḥ sa nāsti 
ye bhrātaraḥ svakarmasu śrutādhyayanādiṣu saṃpannā viśeṣavantaḥ 
daśasv iti copalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyānayanti 
daśasu yatra śloka uddhāra uktaḥ sa sarva eva nāsti karmasaṃbandhāt 
kiṃ tu tair api yat kiṃcid evādhikam upāyavidhiṃ mānavardhanaṃ pūjākaraṃ jyatṣṭhāya deyam 
evaṃ samuddhṛtoddhāre samān aṃśān prakalpayet 
uddhāre 'nuddhṛte tv eṣām iyaṃ syād aṃśakalpanā 
samuddhṛte pṛthakkṛta uddhāre 'dhike bhāge 'vaśiṣṭe dhane samān aṃśān prakalpayet 
anuddhṛte vakṣyamāṇā bhāgakalpanā 
ekādhikaṃ harej jyeṣṭhaḥ putro 'dhyardhaṃ tato 'nujaḥ 
aṃśam aṃśaṃ yavīyāṃsa iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ 
ekenāṃśenādhikaṃ svāṃśaṃ haret svīkuryāt dvāv aṃśau pratipadyetety arthaḥ 
tato 'nujas tadanantaram adhyardham ardhadvitīyam 
yavīyāṃsas tasmād arvāg jātāḥ sarve samam aṃśaṃ nādhikaṃ kiṃcin nālpam ity arthaḥ 
svābhyaḥ svābhyas tu kanyābhyaḥ pradadyur bhrātaraḥ pṛthak 
svāt svād aṃśāc caturbhāgaṃ patitāḥ syur aditsavaḥ 
kanyāśabdaḥ prāyo 'nūḍhāsu prayujyate 
kānīnaputraḥ smṛtyantare ca aprattānām iti paṭhyate 
ato 'nūḍhāyām ayaṃ bhāga ucyate 
svābhyaḥ svajātyapekṣayā svābhyo bhrātaraḥ kanyābhyaś caturbhāgam aṃśaṃ dadyuḥ svād aṃśāt 
yatra bahvyaḥ kanyāḥ santi tatra samānajātīyabhrātrapekṣayā caturthāṃśakalpanā kartavyā 
tathā cāyam arthaḥ 
trīn aṃśān putra ādadīta caturthaṃ kanyeti 
yad api kaiścid uktam mahān upakāraḥ pitṛkaraṇaṃ kanyānām adattānām yena jīvati pitari tadicchayā mūlyenāpi dhanena saṃskriyante mṛte tv aṃśaharā iti 
tatputre 'pi tulyam vācanike cārthe keyaṃ nodanā 
athābhiprāyaḥ samācāra udvāhamātraprayojanaṃ dānam iti ācāro durbalaḥ smṛter iti 
na caikāntikaḥ 
anaikāntikatve ca smṛtito 'yaṃ niyamo yuktaḥ 
yad apīdaṃ kenacid uktam udvāhamātraprayojanaṃ deyam na ca cāturtho bhāgo yathāśrutam iti 
sa idaṃ vācyaḥ 
nodvāhe parimitadhanadānam asti 
tasya dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇetivat kevalam ācchādyālaṃkṛtāṃ vivāhayet 
saudāyikaṃ vāsyā dadyāt iti śrūyate 
alaṃkāras tu suvarṇamaṇimuktāpravālādir anekadhā bhinna iti 
tatra na jñāyate kiyad dātavyaṃ dhanaṃ kīdṛśo vālaṃkāra ity ataś ca parmāṇārtham evedaṃ yuktaṃ svād aṃśāc caturbhāgam iti 
na cāsminn arthe śāstravirodho yuktivirodho vā 
smṛtyantarāṇy evam eva pakṣam upodbalayanti 
asaṃskṛtās tu saṃskāryā bhrātṛbhiḥ pūrvasaṃskṛtaiḥ 
bhaginyaś ca nijād aṃśād datvāṃśaṃ tu turīyakam  iti 
tathā
ā saṃskārād dhared bhāgaṃ parato bibhṛyāt patiḥ  iti 
asyāyam arthaḥ 
yatra svalpaṃ dhanam asti bhrātur bhaginyāś ca na caturbhāge kanyāyā bharaṇaṃ bhavati tatra samabhāgaṃ kanyā hared ā saṃskārāt 
paratas tu smṛtyantarāc caturbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāt svalpam api 
kathaṃ tarhi bharaṇamātraṃ kuryāt ata utktam parato bibhṛyāt patiḥ iti 
bhrātṛgrahaṇam sodaryārthaṃ vyācakṣate 
ko 'bhiprāyaḥ 
bhrātṛśabdo nirupapadaḥ sodarya eva mukhyayā vṛttyā vartate 
pṛthakvacanaṃ ca liṅgam 
yasyās tu hi sodaryo nāsti tasyā dāyaḥ saudāyikaṃ vā na prāpnoti 
vaimātreyo dāsyatīti cen nāsati vacanāntare dadāty ayam 
bhrātṛśabdā ekapitṛkānekātmamātṛkāś ca gṛhyante 
paitṛṣvasreyādiṣu tūpacārād vartata iti yuktam 
evam ekaśabdasyānekārthatvaṃ nābhyupagataṃ bhavati 
smṛtyantarasamācāraś cetaḥ śreyān
