dakṣiṇāśabdo yady api karmakarasaṃyukte saṃtyāge vartate tathāpi gobhūmihiraṇyādibhājanād anyad deyaṃ dravyam ucyate 
tathā hi laukikī prasiddhir iti itarebhya etad vyatiriktā ye bhikṣukās tebhyaḥ 
kṛtānnaṃ siddham annaṃ bhojanārthaṃ dātavyam 
bahir vedi yajñād anyatrātithibhyo dānaṃ gṛhasthadharmeṣu yad etat tad evānūdyate 
sarvaratnāni rājā tu yathārhaṃ pratipādayet 
brāhmaṇān vedaviduṣo yajñārthaṃ caiva dakṣiṇām 
sarvavarṇānāṃ svargādiphalāya puruṣārthopayogi dānaṃ vihitam 
ayaṃ tu rājño niyamārtham upadeśaḥ 
bahudhanena rājñā sarvaratnāni maṇimuktādīni yathārhaṃ vidyākarmānurūpeṇa brāhmaṇebhyo dātvyāni 
yajñārthaṃ ca dakṣiṇā 
kāmyakarmasiddhaye 'pīti punar upadeśaḥ 
pratipādayet svīkārayed grāhayed iti yāvat 
kṛtadāro 'parān dārān bhikṣitvā yo 'dhigacchati 
ratimātraṃ phalaṃ tasya dravyadatus tu saṃtatiḥ 
kāmato dvitīyādivivāhapravṛttau bhikṣamāṇasya niṣedho 'yam 
ratimātraṃ phalam ityādir arthavādaḥ na yathāśrutam eva pratipattavyam 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
dharmārthaṃ sāṃtānikāya dātavyaṃ na kāmapravṛttāyeti 
sa evāyam arthaḥ punar anyathocyate 
sāntānikāya dātavyam ayaṃ tu ratikāmo na sāntānika ity arthaḥ 
dravyadātur hi sā saṃtatir na tasyeti 
dhanāni tu yathāśakti vipreṣu pratipādayet 
vedavitsu vivikteṣu pretya svargaṃ samaśnute 
yasya traivāriṣikaṃ bhaktaṃ paryāptaṃ bhṛtyavṛttaye 
adhikaṃ vāpi vidyeta sa somaṃ pātum arhati 
trīṇi varṣāṇi yasya paryāptaṃ bhṛtyabharaṇāya dhanaṃ tat traivārṣikam tato 'dhikaṃ vā yasyāsti sa somaṃ pātum arhati 
śrutau nityasya somasyāvaśyakartavyatayā uktatvāt bhṛtyoparodhe 'pi naiṣa niṣedhaḥ pravartate balīyastvāc chruteḥ 
ata icchāsomaviṣayo 'yaṃ niṣedhaḥ 
nanu ca some dhanaṃ parikrayārtham upayujyate tasya dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇā iti 
tatra vṛttir vardhate 'taś ca some tatra dhanam upayujyate 
nocyate yasya traivārṣikam iti 
nanu ca vṛttidhanam asati dhane nityavad astīti vidyamānadhanenāpi tatkartavyam eveṣyate 
prāśastyakaradānaśabdo bhaktamātre yadi hiraṇyadānaṃ somakrayārtham evamādinivṛttiḥ 
ataḥ svalpīyasi dravye yaḥ somaṃ pibati dvijaḥ 
sa pītasomapūrvo 'pi na tasyāpnoti tatphalam 
pratiṣedhātikrameṇānadhikāriṇaḥ kurvato nyāyasiddhaphalābhāvo 'nenānūdyate 
phalagrahaṇāc ca kāmyaviṣayatā sphuṭatarā pratīyate 
sa pītasomapūrvo 'pi 
anena prathamayajñasyāvaśyakartavyatāṃ darśayati 
sa pītatvāādyarthavādo 'yam na punar apītasomasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
śaktaḥ parajane dātā svajane duḥkhajīvini 
madhvāpāto viṣāsvādaḥ sa dharmapratirūpakaḥ 
yaḥ svajano bhṛtyāmātyamātṛpitṛputradārādis tasmin duḥkhajīvini 
yaḥ parajane yaśorthaṃ dadāti tasyāsau viṣāsvādaḥ 
āpāte saṃnipāte madhuraḥ 
yathā viṣasyāsvādaḥ saṃnipātamadhuro vipākaviraso maraṇaphalatvāt evaṃ tādṛśaṃ dānam 
yady api saṃprati yaśaḥ sukhaṃ janayaty amutra pratyavāyotpatyā viṣāsvādasamaṃ saṃpadyate 
tad evāha dharmapratirūpako 'sau sadṛśo na dharmaḥ śuktir iva rajatajñānasya 
bhṛtyānām uparodhena yat karoty aurdhvadehikam 
tad bhavaty asukhodarkaṃ jīvataś ca mṛtasya ca 
pūrvasya nindārthavādo 'yam 
bhṛtyā vyākhyātāḥ 
uparodho bhaktavastrādinā yathopayogam āharaṇam 
aurdhvadehikaṃ paralokaprayojanam 
asukhodarkam udarkaḥ āgāmīkālaḥ so 'sya dānasyāsukhodarkaṃ bhavatīti prayojanaṃ siddham eva 
yajñaś cet pratiruddhaḥ syād ekenāṅgena yajvanaḥ 
brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa dhārmike sati rājani 
yo vaiśyaḥ syād bahupaśur hīnakratur asomapaḥ 
kuṭumbāt tasya tad dravyam āhared yajñasiddhaye 
atra aṅgagrahaṇān na kevalaṃ sarvāsāṃ dakṣiṇānām asaṃpattau hiraṇyānām idam āharaṇaṃ vidhīyate api ca tasminn api paśvādau 
āhared iti tatsvīkārotpattimātram ucyate nopāyaviśeṣaḥ 
ataś ca yācñayā vinimayena cauryeṇaivāpahartavyam 
nanu ca cauryeṇa svāmyaṃ notpadyata ity uktam 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
iha svaśabdenaivoktaṃ hartavyam iti 
evaṃ hy āha hartavyaṃ hīnakarmaṇaḥ iti 
ayaṃ cāpahāraḥ prāgārabdhayāgasya sarvāṅgopetasyaikāṅgāsaṃpattau prāripsyamānasya veti na viśeṣahetur asti 
brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇeti vacanāt kṣatriyavaiśyayor apy asti tad ekāṅgagrahaṇam asmin nimitte 
nanu kaḥ kṣatriyo yāced iti kṣatriyasya yācñā pratiṣiddhā 
atyalpam idam ucyate 
brāhmaṇasyāpi cauryaṃ niṣiddham 
tasmāt tasmin nimitte nāsty arjanopāyaniyamaḥ 
dhārmike satity anuvādo 'yam 
yo hi dharmajño rājā tasmin nimitte cauryaṃ vihitam iti 
anyasya tu nigṛhītatvāt kutaḥ pravṛttiḥ 
bahupaśugrahaṇaṃ dhanamātropalakṣaṇārtham 
hīnakratuḥ karma yagād anyad api dānādi na karoti 
saty apy asomape 
kutumbād gṛhād ity arthaḥ 
gṛhād dhi cauryaṃ doṣavattaram atas tad anujñāyate 
na punar apy evam eva niyamaḥ 
anyato 'pi yat khalādeḥ saṃpadyate tat kartavyam eva 
vakṣyati ca khalāt kṣetrād agārād vā iti   
āharet trīṇi vā dve vā kāmaṃ śūdrasya veśmanaḥ 
na hi śūdrasya yajñeṣu kaścid asti parigrahaḥ 
vaiśyāsaṃbhave śūdrād apy āhartavyam 
trīṇi vā dve vety aṅgaprakaraṇād aṅgāni veditavyāni 
atrārthavādo na hi śūdrasyeti 
yady api pūrvam anekopāyakṛtam āharaṇaṃ vihitaṃ tathāpi bhikṣaṇam atra nāsti na yajñārthaṃ dhanaṃ śūdrād vipro bhikṣeta iti 
nanu ca smṛtyantare 'viśeṣeṇa śūdradhanena yāgaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ 
asyopadeśasya sāmarthyāc chūdrāt pratigṛhṇīteti draṣṭavyam 
anye tv āhuḥ 
brāhmaṇena svīkṛtatvān naiva tac chūdradhanam iti 
yas tu pratiṣedhaḥ sa śūdrasya śāntikapauṣṭikādi yena dhanena karoti ṛtvigvat tatra draṣṭavyaḥ 
iha tu bhūtapūrvagatyā śūdradhanavyapadeśo 'sya syāt sāṃpratikatvābhāve ca śāstrād yā caivati cety ayam eva 
yo 'nāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahasraguḥ 
tayor api kuṭumbābhyām āhared avicārayan 
brāhmaṇakṣatriyābhyām apy evaṃvidhābhyām āhartavyam iti ślokārthaḥ 
gograhaṇaṃ tāvat parimāṇadhanopalakṣaṇārtham 
ayajvā asomayājī 
ādānanityāc cādātur āhared aprayacchataḥ 
tathā yaśo 'sya prathate dharmaś caiva pravardhate 
ayaṃ sarvavarṇaviṣayaḥ ślokaḥ 
ādānanityo yaḥ sarvakālaṃ kṛṣipratigrahakusīdādibhir dhanam arjayati na ca dadāti tata upāyāntarāṇy āśrayaṇīyāni 
adātur ity ayāgaśīlasyāpi draṣṭavyam 
tathaiva saptame bhakte bhaktāni ṣaḍ anaśnatā 
aśvastanavidhānena hartavyaṃ hīnakarmaṇaḥ 
ātmakuṭumbāvasāde 'pi pūrvavat parādānaṃ kartavyam 
aśvastanagrahaṇād ekadinavṛttyartham evānujānāti nādhikam 
hīnakarmaṇa iti karmārtham 
smṛtyantare
hīnād ādeyam ādau syāt tadalābhe samād api 
asaṃbhave tv ādadīta viśiṣṭād api dhārmikāt 
saptame bhakte 
tryahaṃ yena na bhuktaṃ caturthe 'hani prātar bhojanārthaṃ parādāne pravarteta 
sāyaṃprātar bhuñjīta ity ahany ahani bhaktadvayaṃ vihitam 
khalāt kṣetrād agārād vā yato vāpy upalabhyate 
ākhyātavyaṃ tu tat tasmai pṛcchate yadi pṛcchati 
yato vāpīti ārāmāder api 
ākhyātavyaṃ pṛcchata ity eva 
yadi pṛcchatīti vacanaṃ na haṭhāt punaḥ preṣaṇādinā praśnam asau kārayitavyaḥ 
atha vā pṛcchate dhanasvāmine yadi pṛcchati rājeti 
rājapuraṃ nītvaiva viṣayabhedo darśayitavyaḥ 
tathā ca gautamaḥ ācakṣīta rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ iti 
bhaktacchede yajñapratibandhataḥ prakaraṇaviśeṣād ubhayatrāyaṃ vidhir jñeyaḥ 
brāhmaṇasvaṃ na hartavyaṃ kṣatriyeṇa kadācana 
dasyuniṣkriyayos tu svam ajīvan hartum arhati 
kṣatriyeṇeti 
kṣatriyagrahaṇaṃ vaiśyaśūdrayor api pradarśanārtham 
kadācaneti mahatyām āpadīty arthaḥ 
dasyuniṣkriyayor brāhmaṇayor eva 
dasyus taskaro niṣkriyas tv akarmānāśarmī 
yo 'sādhubhyo 'rtham ādāya sādhubhyaḥ saṃprayacchati 
sa kṛtvā plavam ātmānaṃ saṃtārayati tāv ubhau 
plavaḥ samudrataraṇaḥ 
ubhau yasyāpaharati yasmai ca prayacchati 
seṣo 'rthavādaḥ 
yad dhanaṃ yajñaśīlānāṃ devasvaṃ tad vidur budhāḥ 
ayajvanāṃ tu yad vittam āsurasvaṃ tad ucyate 
ayam asyārthavāda eva 
guṇavadbhyo nāpahartavyam nirguṇebhyas tu na doṣaḥ 
na tasmin dhārayed daṇḍaṃ dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 
kṣatriyasya hi bāliśyād brāhmaṇaḥ sīdati kṣudhā 
asmin nimitte cauratvenānītebhyo rājñā daṇḍo na kartavyaḥ 
yatas tasyaiva bāliśyān maurkhyāt kṣudhāvasīdanti 
kṣudhety avivakṣitam ubhayoḥ prakaraṇād arthavādatvāc ca 
tasya bhṛtyajanaṃ jñātvā svakuṭumbān mahīpatiḥ 
śrutaśīle ca vijñāya vṛttiṃ dharmyāṃ prakalpayet 
dharmyā vṛttir yayā nityakarmāṇy api saṃpadyante 
kṣīṇakośenāpi mahiṣīrājaputrādikalpitād dāyād vihitāc ca dhanāc ca kiṃcid avakṛṣya dātavyam iti 
svakuṭumbād ityādinā mahādhanasyaiva rājño 'yaṃ vidhiḥ sarvaratnāni iti vacanāt 
kalpayitvāsya vṛttiṃ ca rakṣed enaṃ samantataḥ 
rājā hi dharmaṣaḍbhāgaṃ tasmāt prāpnoti rakṣitāt 
spaṣṭārtho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
na yajñārthaṃ dhanaṃ śūdrad vipro bhikṣeta karhicit 
yajamāno hi bhikṣitvā caṇḍālaḥ pretya jāyate 
bhikṣaṇam atra niṣidhyate 
ayācitopapannaṃ tu na duṣyati 
tathā coktam
ayācitopapannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ yaḥ pratigrahaḥ 
viśiṣṭalokaśāstrābhyāṃ taṃ vidyād apratigraham  iti 
ayajñārtho 'yaṃ pratiṣedho na tu bhṛtyabharaṇe 
kecit pūrvaśeṣam eva manyante 
bhikṣaṇe doṣadarśanād upāyāntareṇoktam ādānam 
yajñārtham arthaṃ bhikṣitvā yo na sarvaṃ prayacchati 
sa yāti bhāsatāṃ vipraḥ kākatāṃ vā sataṃ samāḥ 
bhikṣitasya yajñārthapariśeṣitasya kāryāntarāya phalaṃ kākatābhāsatāprāptiḥ 
devasvaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ vā lobhenopahinasti yaḥ 
sa pāpātmā pare loke gṛdhrocchiṣṭena jīvati 
yāgaśīlānāṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ yad vittaṃ tad devasvam 
brāhmaṇasyāyāgaśīlasyāpi yat svaṃ tad brāhmaṇasvam iti 
evam api śloko gacchaty eva 
kiṃ tu arthavādaśloko 'sau 
yad dhanaṃ yajñaśīlānām iti na cauryādiśabdavac chabdārthaparibhāṣāparaḥ 
ato 'nyathā vyākhyāyate 
devān uddiśya yāgādikriyārthaṃ dhanaṃ yad utsṛṣṭaṃ tad devasvam mukhyasya svasvāmisaṃbandhasya devānām asaṃbhavāt 
na hi devatā icchayā dhanaṃ niyuñjate 
na ca paripālanavyāpāras tāsāṃ dṛśyate 
svaṃ ca loke tādṛśam ucyate 
tasmād devoddeśena yad uktam nedaṃ mama devatāyā idam iti tad devasvam 
tac ca darśapūrṇamāsādiyāgeṣv agnyādidevatābhyaś coditam 
śiṣṭasamācāraprasiddhyaiva gauṇopāyadurgāyāgādiṣu 
nanu caturbhujādipratimāsaṃbandhi loke devasvam ucyate 
lokaprasiddhaś ca śabdārthaḥ śāstre grahītuṃ nyāyyaḥ 
syād evaṃ yadi devasvaśabdo nirbhāgaḥ prasiddhim upeyāt 
devānāṃ svaṃ devasvam ity avayavaprasiddhyā samudāyārthaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ 
na ca vākyāntaraprakalpanā pramāṇenāpy asti 
mukhyaṃ caturbhujādīnāṃ devatvaṃ pratimāvyavahāreṇaivāpahṛtam 
na ca vyayokūlalakṣaṇam asti 
atha samācārato devasvaṃ bhavatu svasvāmibhāvas tāvan nāsti 
yathoktena ca prakāreṇa svavyavahāropapattir iti śiṣṭaṃ dvitīye 
iṣṭiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ nityaṃ nirvaped abdaparyaye 
kḷptānāṃ paśusomānām niṣkṛtyartham asaṃbhave 
vaiśvānaryā iṣṭer gṛhyasmṛtibhyaḥ svarūpam avasātavyam 
samāpte varṣe dvitīyavarṣasya pravṛttir abdaparyayaḥ 
kḷptānāṃ vihitānāṃ paśusomānāṃ nityānāṃ ṣāṇmāsasya sāṃvatsaraḥ paśur nityaṃ vasante somaḥ 
teṣām asaṃbhave dhanābhāvādidoṣeṇa 
niṣkṛtyarthaṃ nityasyākaraṇe yo doṣas tannivṛttyartham 
śrute 'smin nimitte 'nyakarma samāmananti 
tatra kecit samuccayaṃ manyante saty apy ekakāryatve pramāṇabhedena vidhinātra 
tad ayuktam 
tathā ca brahmahatyāprāyaścitte śraute smārte ca svaśabdena vikalpaṃ vakṣyati abhijidviśvajidbhyāṃ ca iti 
āpatkalpena yo dharmaṃ kurute 'nāpadi dvijaḥ 
sa nāpnoti phalaṃ tasya paratreti vicāritam 
āpatkalpapratinidhiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ vā vidyamānadhano yo gauṇapakṣam āśrayati tasya na so 'rthaḥ sidhyati 
viśvaiś ca devaiḥ sādhyaiś ca brāhmaṇaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ 
āpatsu maraṇād bhītair vidheḥ pratinidhiḥ kṛtaḥ 
eṣa evārthaḥ āpadi pratinidhir āśrayitavyo na saṃpadi 
prabhuḥ prathamakalpasya yo 'nukalpena vartate 
na sāmparāyikaṃ tasya durmater vidyate phalam 
ayam api pūrvaśeṣo 'rthavādaḥ 
sāmparāyikaṃ pāralaukikam 
na brāhmaṇo vedayeta kiṃcid rājani dharmavit 
svavīryeṇaiva tān śiṣyān mānavān apakāriṇaḥ 
nimitte 'bhicāro na doṣāyeti ślokārthaḥ 
na tv abhicāro vidhīyate 
na ca rājani vedanaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
kevale sati nimitte 'bhicarituṃ pravṛtto rājñā na kiṃcid vaktavyaḥ 
tathā vakṣyati vidhātā śāsitā vaktā iti tasmai nākuśalaṃ brūyāt iti 
rājeti prītaye 
śiṣyād iti 
saty api vidhau rājani nivedayet na ca pratiṣedha upasaṃhāraślokaparyālocanayā tatparam avatiṣṭhate 
nimittāni coktāni bhāryātikramakārī ca ityādīni 
kiṃcit pīḍānimittam anena me kṛtam iti rājñe nivedayet 
dharmavid abhicāravidhijñaḥ 
svavīryeṇa mantrābhiśāpābhyām 
tatraivottaraślokarthaḥ 
svavīryād rājavīryāc ca svavīryaṃ balavattaram 
tasmāt svenaiva vīryeṇa nigṛhṇīyād arīn dvijaḥ 
rājā kadācid anipuṇatayā na nigraheṇa pravarteta svatas tu na kadācid upekṣeti svavīryaṃ balīyaḥ 
śrutīr atharvāṅgirasīḥ kuryād ity avicārayan 
vākśastraṃ vai brāhmaṇasya tena hanyād arīn dvijaḥ 
kiṃ tat svavīryam iti śaṅkānivṛttyartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
śrūyanta iti śrutayaḥ 
atharvaṇavede ye 'bhicāraprakārāḥ śrutās te kartavyā ity arthaḥ 
bāhulyena tatrābhicārāṇāṃ vidhānāt atharvāṅgirasagrahaṇam na punar anyeṣu vedeṣv ananujñātam 
atha vābhicāraśrutayaḥ atharvāṅgirasaśabdenocyante 
atha vātharvaṇaśabdā evaṃvidha evārthe prayujyante yajño 'tharvaṇavit kāmyaḥ iti 
kṣatriyo bāhuvīryeṇa tared āpadam ātmanaḥ 
dhanena vaiśyaśūdrau tu japahomair dvijottamaḥ 
pūrvaśeṣa eva 
vidhātā śāsitā vaktā maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate 
tasmai nākuśalaṃ brūyān na śuṣkāṃ giram īrayet 
prāgvyākhyāto 'yam 
tasmai brāhmaṇāyābhicarate nigṛhyatām ayam ity akuśalaṃ na brūyāt 
na śuṣkāṃ giram īrayet 
vāgdaṇḍadhigdaṇḍayor api pratiṣedhaḥ 
atha vā sarveṣām varṇānāṃ na brāhmaṇaḥ kṣobhayitavyo yas trayīvidyāprabhāveṇa śaktaḥ svayaṃ nigrahītum 
vidhātā sraṣṭā 
anyasya rājñaḥ śāsitā nigrahītā 
vaktā hitān 
ato maitraḥ 
tasmāt sarvaśaktiyuktatvān na durbalo 'yam ity avamantavyaḥ 
na vai kanyā na yuvatir nālpavidyo na bāliśaḥ 
hotā syād agnihotrasya nārto nāsaṃskṛtas tathā 
agnihotre ṛtvigvaraṇasya samāmnānāt juhuyād dhāvayed vā iti strīpuṃsayor aviseṣeṇa kṣīrahotṛtāprāptau kanyāyuvatyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
evam āhutidvayamātravidhijñasya alpavidyasya bāliśasya vā prāptiḥ pratiṣidhyate 
ārto vyādhinā 
asaṃskṛto 'nupanītaḥ 
etac cāyuktam 
śraute hy agnihotre svayaṃ parvaṇi juhuyāt ṛtvijām eka itaraṃ kālam iti samācaranti 
na ca strīṇām ārtvijyasaṃbhavo 'to gṛhyāgniviṣaye kanyāyuvatyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jātaputrāyāḥ prāptyartha iti varṇayanti 
tathā cānye 'pi sūtrakārāḥ kāmaṃ gṛhye 'gnau patnī juhuyāt sāyaṃ prātar homau iti 
anye tu vaitānakuśalaḥ iti vacanāt tretāgniviṣayam evedaṃ manyante 
vitāno vihāraḥ 
sa ca śrauteṣv agniṣu saṃbhavati 
na ca tatra stryādīnāṃ prāptiḥ na tv aviduṣām viśiṣṭānām eva puṃsām ārtvijyavidhānāt 
ato 'gnihotragrahaṇaṃ sarvakarmaṇām hotṛgrahaṇaṃ ca sarvartvijāṃ pradarśanārtham 
ataḥ śrutyarthānuvādamātram eṣā smṛtiḥ 
narake hi patanty ete juhvataḥ sa ca yasya tat 
tasmād vaitānakuśalo hotā syād vedapāragaḥ 
ete kanyādayo juhvato narakaṃ gacchanti 
sa ca yajamāno hāvayitā 
prājāpatyam adatvāśvam agnyādheyasya dakṣiṇām 
anāhitāgnir bhavati brāhmaṇo vibhave sati 
agnyādheye 'śvo dakṣiṇā dātavyā 
prājāpatyagrahaṇaṃ stutyartham 
atha vā nātyutkṛṣṭo nātinikṛṣṭaḥ prājāpatyaḥ 
atha ca laukikā īdṛśe vastuni prajāpatiśabdam udāharanti 
vibhave satīti vacanād asaṃpattāv adadad bhavaty evāhitāgniḥ 
puṇyāny anyāni kurvīta śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ 
na tv alpadakṣiṇair yajñair yajeteha kathaṃcana 
yāvatī dakṣiṇā vihitā tato nyūnā dīyate yatra so 'lpadakṣiṇo yajñaḥ 
parikrayaḥ kila dakṣiṇā 
svalpena cet parikrayeṇa karmakaro labhyate kim iti bahu dīyate loka iva vāhādīnām 
paṇalabhyaṃ hi kaḥ prājñaḥ krīṇāti daśabhiḥ paṇaiḥ 
dvādaśaśatadānaṃ tatphalabhūyastvāya  iti manyamānasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
ye tu svalpadakṣiṇā utpattyaiva ca some dakṣiṇeti kratumanto na tan niṣidhyate 
indriyāṇi yaśaḥ svargam āyuḥ kīrtiṃ prajāḥ paśūn 
hanty alpadakṣiṇo yajñas tasmān nāpladhano yajet 
pūrvavidhyatikrame phalakathanam 
agnihotry apavidhyāgnīn brāhmaṇaḥ kāmakārataḥ 
cāndrāyaṇaṃ caren māsaṃ vīrahatyāsamaṃ hi tat 
apavidhya tyaktvā 
tyāgaś ca nityānām agnihotrādīnām akaraṇam udvāpanaṃ ca 
prasaṅgād atra prakaraṇāt prāyaścittopadeśaḥ 
agnīn iti bahuvacananirdeśāt gṛhyāgnityāge kalpanā kāryā 
vīrahatyāsamam iti śrutiḥ vīrahā vā eṣa devānam iti 
kāmakāravacanād akāmatyāge kalpanaiva 
ye śūdrād adhigamyārtham agnihotram upāsate 
ṛtvijas te hi śūdrāṇāṃ brahmavādiṣu garhitāḥ 
śūdrād adhigatenārthena prītyādināgnyādheyaṃ na kartavyam iti vyācakṣate 
na tu pravṛttakarmaṇo nityakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ pratiṣidhyate 
tathā coktam na śūdrād bhikṣitvānuṣṭhānaṃ karaṇīyam 
ayācitalābhe tu nāsti doṣaḥ pravṛttakarmaṇas tadartham 
tathā cāsatpratigrahād ātmavṛttir ekā pratiṣiddhā 
nityāni karmāṇy abhyanujñātāni 
ataḥ śūdradhanena prārthitalabdhena vāviśeṣābhidhānasāmarthyād agnyādheyasyaikasya pratiṣedho 'yaṃ vijñāyate 
yadi sarvakarmārtho 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ syād anenaiva siddhatvān na bhikṣaṇaṃ pratiṣidhyeta na yajñārthaṃ dhanaṃ śūdrāt iti 
teṣāṃ satatam ajñānāṃ vṛṣalāgnyupasevinām 
padā mastakam ākramya dātā durgāṇi saṃtaret 
agnīnāṃ vṛṣalāgnitvavacanaṃ liṅgāt pūrvavidhyatikrame doṣābhidhāne nikhilaprakaraṇam etat 
akurvan vihitaṃ karma ninditaṃ ca samācaran 
prasañjan indriyārtheṣu prāyaścittīyate naraḥ 
idānīṃ prakṛtāny eva prāyaścittāni kathyante 
prathamaṃ tāvat teṣv adhikāraṃ nirūpayati 
ko 'trādhikāraḥ 
vihitaṃ nityatayā saṃdhyopāsanāgnihotrādi yāvajjīvam agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityādibhiḥ padair jñāpitanityabhāvāt 
yad apy aniyatanimitte 'śucisparśanādau snānādi tadvihitam 
akurvan pramādālasyādinā 
tathā ninditaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ surāpānādi 
tad api śāstram atikramya sevamānaḥ 
prāyaścittīyate 
tad etad uktaṃ bhavati 
naimittiko 'yam adhikāro vihitākaraṇāt pratiṣiddhasevanāc ca prāyaścittam 
nanu ca grāmakāmasya sāṃgrahaṇī vihitā 
tato grāmārthinaḥ kathaṃcid akaraṇe vihitātikramaḥ syāt 
yadi nāma grāmārthī pratyaveyāt tatas tatkāmo 'sya 
yadā tu grāmaṃ kāmayate tadā tasya tadvihitaṃ bhavati 
na cet pravartate vihitam atikrāmet 
ataś ca prāyaścittī prāptaḥ 
ucyate 
grāmasya svāmī syām iti phalalipsayā tasya yatra pravṛttir na vidhilakṣaṇā 
śāstraṃ tu yāgagrāmayoḥ sādyasādhanasaṃbandhāvedakam eva 
vastuto yady api tatrāpi kartavyatāpradhānaprasādhano vākyārthaḥ tathāpi phalasiddhyartham eva kartavyatāṃ vidhir avagamayati 
ataś ca yāgam kurvataḥ phalaṃ na niṣpadyate na punaḥ pratyavāyaḥ 
yatra pratyavāyas tatra ca prāyaścittam 
nanu ca nityānām akaraṇe pratyavāyo bhavatīti kuta iyam avagatiḥ 
na hy evam agnihotrādau śrūyate yo na kuryat sa pratyaveyāt 
śrūyate vākyaśeṣeṣu vedibhyaḥ paramā bhavati iti 
sarvatrārthavādāḥ pratyavāyapradarśanārthāḥ santi 
avaśyaṃ ca teṣām ālambanaṃ vācyaṃ nānyathā vidhinaikavākyatāṃ bhajanti 
yatrāpi na śrūyante tatrāpi vidhyanugrahārthā arthavādāḥ prakalpyante 
kiṃ cārthavādair vidher eva pravartakatvam anyathā nopapadyate yāvad apravṛttau pratyavāyaparihāro na kalpitaḥ 
evaṃvidha evārthe vṛddhavyavahāre vidhiḥ pravartate 
bādyate tu puruṣapravartanārūḍho 'sau 
na ca puruṣā apuruṣārthe pravartayituṃ śakyante 
ataḥ pravartakatvavihatavidhir mā bhūd iti śrutisiddhyarthā kalpanaiṣā 
yady api svargādikalpanāyām api tathārthalābhas tathāpi yāvajjīvādipadavirodhāt prayavāyaparihārārthatāpi syāt 
uktam
bhayād dhi yādṛśī puṃsāṃ pravṛttir upajāyate 
na tadṛśī bhaved atra vidhikoṭiśatair api 
tasmād akurvan vihitam iti nityaṃ karmeti draṣṭavyam 
nanu cāśucisparśanadau na nityāvedi kiṃcit padam asti yāvajjīvam ityādivat 
kim atrānyena padena nimittaviśeṣe yat śrutaṃ tasya ca tannimittena kartavyatā nāma pratīyate 
nādhikārāntaraṃ pratyapekṣāyā jāyate 
yadā nimittasaṃvidhānaṃ tadā kartavyam ity upagamair nityatasiddhiḥ 
agnihotrādāv api na nityaśabdo 'sti nimittanityatvāt 
prasañjann aviditatveṣu viṣayeṣu saṃskṛtānnabhojanacandanānulepanadiṣu tātparyata āsevāprasaṅgo viṣayābhilāṣaparateti yāvat 
nanu caitad api pratiṣiddham indriyārtheṣu sarveṣu na prasajyeta kāmataḥ iti 
snātakavratādhikārān nāyaṃ pratiṣedha iti manyate 
vrataśabdādhikare hi tatra pratiṣedhakaḥ 
saṃkalpaviśeṣo hi mānasas tatropadiśyate idaṃ mayā na kartavyam iti 
atha vā kaścid alpapratiṣedhe na tulyatāṃ manyeta padārthas tāvad ayaṃ na niṣidhyate iti manyamānaḥ ataḥ samānīkriyate 
atha vā sāmānye tadbhūtasyāpi viśeṣasya pṛthag upadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ prādhānyakhyapanārtham 
yathā brāhmaṇā āyātā vasiṣṭho 'py āyātaḥ iti 
prāyaścittīyate 
prāyaścittaśabdo rūḍhirūpeṇa viśiṣṭe naimittke vartate 
tadetīcchati veti vinimayaḥ kartavyaḥ vyatyayo bahulam iti 
nara iti vacanaṃ cāturvarṇyādhikārārtham 
akāmataḥ kṛte pāpe prāyaścittaṃ vidur budhāḥ 
kāmakārakṛte 'py āhur eke śrutinidarśanāt 
kāmakārakṛte 'py atikrame prāyaścittagauravārtham idam ucyate 
akāmataḥ kṛta iti pramādakṛte pāpe śāstravyatikrame prāyaścittam āhuḥ 
kasya punar hetoḥ 
vidhiḥ pratiśāstram atikramyākārye pravartate sa prāyaścittam ācariṣyate iti 
ko 'tra viśiṣṭahetuḥ yasmāt kāmakṛte doṣe prāyaścittaṃ śāstrānarthakyam iti manyante 
evaṃ pūrvapakṣabhaṅgyopanyasyati 
kāmakārakṛte 'pīti śabdāt kāmato 'kāmataś ca kṛte vyatikrame prāyaścittaṃ kartavyam iti śāstrārthaḥ 
śrutinidarśanād iti vaidikaliṅganidarśanam upahavyabrāhmaṇam udāhartavyam 
indro yatīn śālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat 
na ca śvabhyo dānaṃ yatīnām akāmataḥ saṃbhavati 
upahavyaṃ prāyaścittārthaṃ prajāpatir indrāya prāyacchad iti spaṣṭārthaḥ 
akāmataḥ kṛtāṃ pāpaṃ vedābhyāsena śuddhyati 
kāmatas tu kṛtaṃ mohāt prāyaścittaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ 
kiṃ punar etāni prāyaścittāni nimittamātraparyavasāyīni saṃdhyopāsanādivat uta kāryaparyantāni śārīraśaucavad utpannadoṣanirghātārthāni 
tatra kecid āhuḥ 
na hi karma kṣīyate 
kāryavirāmitvam eva dharmādharmyoḥ 
na hi karmāṇi svaphalam adatvā pralīyante 
tad uktam na hi karma kṣīyate iti 
tasmād yo 'tikramakārī sa tato narakaphalaṃ bhuṅkta eva 
prāyaścittāni yadi na karoti tatas tadatikramāt pratyavāyāntarotpattiḥ 
tad etad ayuktam na hi karma 
caritavyam ato nityaṃ prāyaścittaṃ viśuddhaye iti svaśabdenaiva śuddhyarthatā vihitā 
tathā ca taiḥ kṛtair apoheta pāpam svayaṃ kṛtatvāt 
tad apy ucyate pratiṣedhavidhinā pratiṣidhyamānakriyākartuḥ pratyavāyabhāgitvam avagamitam 
na tasya prāyaścittair mithyātvaṃ śakyate kartum 
tad apy ayuktam yatas tena duḥkhahetutā tasyāvagamitā 
prāyaścitteṣv api tapodānādi duḥkham asty eva 
alpena tādātmikena duḥkhenāgāminaḥ saṃbhāvyamānasya mahato duḥkhasya nivṛttir yuktaiva yathā vyādhes tiktakaṭukauṣadhadānalaghvāhārādinā 
yathā vyatikramaṃ kṛtvā kaścit svayam āgatya rājani vedanaṃ karoti ity evaṃ karmāsmi iti so 'rdhadaṇḍabhāg bhavati 
yas tu rājapuruṣair haṭhād ānīyeta sa bhūyo daṇḍyate 
evam upadeśānām arthavatvasiddhiḥ 
ataḥ svayaṃ kāryavirodhitvam asya vihitatvāt 
niṣkṛtiḥ prāyaścittam iti samākhyātam api sat tad eva kṛtadoṣasya niryātanam api 
akāraṇaṃ niryāto niṣkṛtir iti ucyate 
evaṃ prāyaścittam api nāsyādhikārapratiprasavārtham 
pañcānām eva pātakānām adhikāropagamavihitatvād dvijātikarmabhyo hāniḥ patanam iti 
na cātra vedābhyāso 'kāmataḥ kāmatas tapaḥ iti viṣayavibhāgo boddhavyaḥ 
ubhayārthobhayatropadarśanārthatvāt nimittopadeśakaraṇe paṭhitatvāt brahmahā dvādaśa ityādiprāyaścittānām upakramyamāṇatvāt 
tasmād akāmato laghuprāyaścittaṃ kāmato garīya iti ślokasya tātparyam 
nanu cākāmato naiva tasya kartṛtvam buddhipūrvaṃ kurvan kartety ucyate 
yathā ca laukikaḥ daivena kāryate kim ayaṃ karoti iti 
kiṃ ca lipsayā yatra pravṛttis tatra pratiṣedhaḥ 
yo hi madyāya spṛhayati sa pipāsuṃ na kadarthayati mā pāsīḥ surām iti 
yas tu jalārthī jalabuddhyā surāṃ pītavāṃs tasyājānato nāparādho na hi tasya surālipsayā pravṛttiḥ 
athocyate vidhilakṣaṇapravṛttir na niṣidhyate 
satyaṃ 
bhavaty arthalakṣaṇānāṃ tu madhye tarhy udakena ca sarvasyā arthalakṣaṇāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
kecid āhuḥ 
pratyavāyaparyanto vidhir viṣabhakṣaṇavan niṣedhaśāstrārthaḥ 
teṣām acodyam etat 
viṣam aviśeṣeṇopāttaṃ jñānato 'jñānataś ca maraṇāya kalpata eva 
evaṃ brahmahatyādayo 'pīti 
yeṣām api kartavyam iti vacanāt kriyate na kartavyam iti na kriyate teṣām api laukikakriyayā pravartamānasya niṣedhaḥ pravartamānaś cocyate pravṛttaḥ kartā 
kartṛtvam abuddhipūrvakam apy asti kūle patatīti 
na cāyaṃ gauṇaḥ kartṛtābhāvaḥ 
svatantraḥ kartā iti hi smaryate na icchayā pravartate yaḥ sa kartā iti 
kiṃ cāsmād eva vacanāt pramādakṛto doṣo 'sti prāyaścittam iti kim apareṇa vikalpitena 
prāyaścittīyatāṃ prāpya daivāt pūrvakṛtena vā 
na saṃsargaṃ vrajet sadbhiḥ prāyaścitte 'kṛte dvijaḥ 
daivāt svīkṛtāt pramādād ity arthaḥ 
anye tu daivaśabdasthāne mohāt iti paṭhanti 
mohād evākāryaṃ kriyate 
ko hy amūrkhaḥ śāstraṃ vyatikramiṣyati 
pūrvakṛtena janmāntarakṛtena copabhuktaphalena karmaṇā viseṣeṇa kaunakhyādiliṅgādyanumitena 
etad uktaṃ bhavati iha janmakṛte vyatikrame buddhipūrvam abuddhipūrvaṃ vā tathā janmāntarakṛte 'pi liṅgānumeye kartavyam 
kiṃ punaḥ kunakhyādīnām prāyaścittam 
kṛcchrātikṛcchau cāndrāyaṇam iti sarvaprāyaścittāni 
vasiṣṭhena tu yasya yal liṅgaṃ tena tad eva prāyaścittaṃ kenacid aṃśena kartavyam iti paṭhitam 
ataś caiva te sarve 'kṛtaprāyaścittāḥ saṃsargaṃ sadbhir varjayeyuḥ adhyayanādikriyayaikasthānādirūpatayā 
saṃsargo yady apy ubhayāśrayatvād anyatarapratiṣedhenobhayor api siddhaḥ pratiṣedhas tathāpi sadbhis taiḥ saṃsargo na kartavyaḥ iti punaḥ pratiṣidhyate uttaratra kartṛbhedāt 
ekasya hi pratiṣedhe sa eva prāyaścittī syān na dvitīyaḥ saty api saṃsarge 
ata ubhayoḥ prāyaścittārtham ubhayatra pratiṣedhaḥ 
satām asatāṃ cātaḥ śyāvadantiprabhṛtibhir akṛtaprāyaścittaiḥ saha saṃsargo na kartavyaḥ 
iha duścaritaiḥ kecit kecit pūrvakṛtais tathā 
prāpnuvanti durātmāno narā rūpaviparyayam 
etad evāha 
iha duścaritaiḥ kecid asmin janmani pratiṣiddhācaraṇaiḥ 
tathā pūrvakṛtaiḥ karmabhis tathoktaṃ prāk 
sa idānīṃ rūpaviparyayaprapañco duṣkṛtaśeṣacihnarūpato 'nukramyate 
suvarṇacauraḥ kaunakhyaṃ surāpaḥ śyāvadantatām 
brahmahā kṣayarogitvaṃ dauścarmyaṃ gurutalpagaḥ 
piśunaḥ pautināsikyaṃ sūcakaḥ pūtivaktratām 
dhānyacauro 'ṅgahīnatvam ātiraikyaṃ tu miśrakaḥ 
annahartāmayāvitvaṃ maukyaṃ vāgapaharakaḥ 
vastrāpahārakaḥ śvaitryaṃ paṅgutām aśvahārakaḥ 
evaṃ karmaviśeṣeṇa jayante sadvigarhitāḥ 
jaḍamūkāndhabadhirā vikṛtākṛtayas tathā 
kṣayo nāma rogo rājayakṣmeti vaidyānāṃ prasiddhas tena tadvān bhavati brahmahatyāviśeṣeṇa 
gurustrīgāmi duścarmā 
kvathitagandhavāhinyā nāsikayā yuktaḥ piśunaḥ 
evaṃ sūcako durgandhavāhāsyaḥ 
nanu ca sūcakaḥ piśuna eva 
satyam 
ekaḥ kalpayitvā paradoṣān prakāśayati 
anyas tu satyān evāviditān iti bhedaḥ 
ātiraikyam adhikāṅgātā 
miśrako yo dravyāṇy adravyais tadābhāsaiḥ saṃmardayati 
yathā kuṃkumaṃ kusumbhenānyair anyāni 
āmayāvī yasya bhuktam annaṃ na samyak jīryate 
maukyaṃ vāgvaikalyaṃ yatrāpratipattimān apasmārī 
śiṣṭaṃ prasiddham 
vikṛtākṛtayaḥ 
ākṛtiḥ saṃsthānaṃ vikṛtāmanoramā ninditaiṣāṃ karmaviśeṣeṇeti 
eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kumbhīpākayamayātanāsthāneṣu phalaṃ tad anubhūtavata īṣaccheṣe tasmin karmaṇy udrikte ca sukṛte 'dattaphale phaladānonmukhe duṣkṛtasyāsadbhāvo 'taḥ karmāvaśeṣopapattiḥ   
caritavyam ato nityaṃ prāyaścittaṃ viśuddhaye 
nindyair hi lakṣaṇair yuktā jāyante 'niṣkṛtainasaḥ 
nindyair hi lakṣaṇaiḥ kunakhaśyāvadantādibhir aniṣkṛtainasaḥ 
brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamaḥ 
mahānti pātakāny āhuḥ saṃsargaś cāpi taiḥ saha 
gurvaṅganāgamaḥ steyaṃ patitasaṃprayogaḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ mahāpātakāni 
surāpānaṃ brāhmaṇasyaiva 
steyaṃ brāhmaṇasuvarṇaharaṇam smṛtyantarāt brāhmaṇasuvarṇāpaharaṇe mahāpātakam iti 
pātakaśabdaḥ pātayatīti vyutpattyā sarvavyatikrameṣu vartate mahāpatakeṣūpapātakeṣu ca 
mahacchabdo gurutvapradarśanārthaḥ 
taiś ca saṃyogam ekaikenāpi 
sa ca vakṣyati saṃvatsareṇa patati ityādinā 
anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣe rājagāmi ca paiśunam 
guroś cālīkanirbandhaḥ samāni brahmahatyayā 
samutkarṣa iti nimittasaptamī carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti itivat 
samutkarṣaṃ prāpsyāmīti yad anṛtaṃ abhidhīyate tad brahmahatyayā samam 
yatra pūjātiśayo dhanātiśayo brāhmaṇatvena śrotriyatvena mahākulīnatayā vā prāpyate tatrātadrūpam ātmānam āvedayati 
yo vā pātrātiśayena puṇyaskandhotkarṣaṃ prāptum icchati tasyāpātraṃ pātram ity ucyate 
evaṃvidhe samutkarṣe 'nṛtam 
na punaḥ svalpavastuni apekṣāyām saty api samutkarṣavyapadeśe 
piśunam alīkavad iti paracchidraprakāśanam 
guroś cālīkanirbandho 'satyābhidhānena cittasaṃkṣobhaḥ 
kanyā te garbhiṇī ity evamādinā niṣprayojano dveṣaḥ 
rājakulāt tena saha vivādo nirbandho 'nṛtādiśaṃsanaṃ vā 
tathā ca gautamaḥ gurāv anṛtābhiśaṃsanam pātakasamāni iti 
brahmojjhatā vedanindā kauṭasākṣyaṃ suhṛdvadhaḥ 
garhitānādyayor jagdhiḥ surāpānasamāni ṣaṭ 
adhītasvavedasyānābhyāsena vismaraṇaṃ brahmojjhatā 
nityasvādhyāyavidheḥ tyāgo vā 
kūṭasākṣyaṃ samutkarṣād anyatrāpi 
suhṛdvadho mitramāraṇam 
garhitānādyayoḥ 
garhitaṃ śāstrapratiṣiddhaṃ laśunādyanādyam amanastuṣṭikaraṃ na bhokṣya iti kalpya yad bhujyate 
nikṣepasyāpaharaṇaṃ narāśvarajatasya ca 
bhūmivajramaṇīnāṃ ca rukmasteyasamaṃ smṛtam 
nikṣepasyāsāradravyasyāpi 
narāśvaśabdo jātiśabdaḥ nārīharaṇe 'py etad eva 
yo hi duhitaraṃ datvāsati naradoṣe 'nyasmai punar dadāti tasyāpy etad eva 
tad uktam prāpnoti puruṣānṛtam iti 
retaḥsekaḥ svayonīṣu kumārīṣv antyajāsu ca 
sakhyuḥ putrasya ca strīṣu gurutalpasamaṃ viduḥ 
svayonayo bhaginya ekodarasaṃbhūtāḥ 
kumāryo 'nūḍhāḥ 
antyajā barbaracaṇḍālastriyaḥ 
sakhyuḥ 
sakhā mitram tasya striyaḥ 
strīgrahaṇaṃ na jāyāyām eva pratiṣedhartham 
evaṃ putrasyānyāpi yā avaruddhā maithunadharmeṇa 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ 
saty api strīgrahaṇena ūḍhānūḍhayor viṣamasamīkaraṇasyānyāyatvāt samatvavacanam 
etan na prāyaścittanirdeśārtham kiṃ tarhi gurutvakhyāpanaparam 
ataś ca gurutaraṃ prāyaścittaṃ bhavati 
tathā coktam enaḥsu gurūṇi gurūṇi laghuni laghūni 
yadi hy etat prāyaścittanirdeśārtham abhaviṣyat prāyaścittanideśaprakaraṇa eva vāvakṣyat 
kauṭasākṣyasuhṛdvadhayoś ceha surāpānasamīkṛtayor brahmahatyāprāyaścittātideśam upariṣṭān na kuryāt 
guroś cālīkanirbandhaḥ ity etasya ceha brahmahatyāsamīkṛtasya punar upariṣṭāt brahmahatyāprāyaścittābhidhānāt 
tathā kumāryām iti retaḥsekasya gurutalpasamīkṛtasyeha punas tatra gurutalpaprāyaścittavidhānād gamyate nedaṃ prāyaścittārthaṃ samīkaraṇam iti 
anye tu manyante bhedena samīkaraṇaṃ gurutvabhāve 'pi vakṣyate nānyayyam 
ataḥ prāyaścittārtham eva surāpānasya samīkṛtayoś ca kauṭasākṣyasuhṛdvadhyor brahmahatyāprāyaścittanirdeśo vikalpārtham surāpānaprāyaścittena 
asya cātideśa eva śrūyate 
samīkaraṇe tu vikalpo nāsti 
yathā hatvā garbham avijñātam iti 
idānīm upapātakāny āha 
govadho 'yājyasaṃyājyaṃ pāradāryātmavikrayāḥ 
gurumātṛpitṛtyāgaḥ svādhyāyāgnyoḥ sutasya ca 
ayājyā aviruddhāpātakiśūdrādayas teṣāṃ saṃyājyaṃ saṃyājanam 
bhāve ṇyac chādasaḥ 
ātmavikrayaṃ gavādidravyavad ātmanaḥ paravidheyakaraṇaṃ dāsyena 
anye tu pāradāryam avikrayam iti paṭhanti 
anutsāho nirāhāraḥ svalpa evopaghāte 'vasādāśrayaṇam 
guros tyāgo yathāvad ananuvṛttiḥ 
adhyāpanasamarthe 'dhyāpayitary upādhyāpakāntarāśrayaḥ 
evaṃ mātāpitroḥ 
apatitānāṃ caiteṣāṃ tyāgo doṣāya 
patitānāṃ tv iṣṭa eva 
svādhyāyāgnyos tyāga iti saṃbadhyate 
svādhyāyasya tyāgaś ca ahar ahaḥ svādhyāyam adhīyīta ity asya vidher ananuṣṭhānam 
kim aikāhike māsasāṃvatsarike vā tyāge vyatikramo 'yam 
aviśeṣād aihike prāpnoti 
tad ayuktam etasya vidher nityatvāt 
nityānāṃ ca vyatikrame prāyaścittāntaraṃ vakṣyati 
tasmād vismaraṇaparyantas tyāgo 'bhipretaḥ 
sa brahmojjhatāpadena surāpānena samīkṛtaḥ 
tatra vikalpanārtham etat 
asya ca laghutvāt tasya gurutvād vyavasthāyāṃ vikalpo yojyaḥ 
tatra yo vaidika evānyasmin karmaṇi yuktatayā svādhyāyaṃ jahāti tasyopapātakatvam 
yas tu bhogasevayārthaparatayā kalahaśīlatayā jahāti tasya surāpānasamatvam 
agnes tv ekatvaviśiṣṭasyehopādānād gṛhyasyeti draṣṭavyam 
prāg agnīn iti bahuvacanāt śrautānāṃ grahaṇam 
nanu ca tatrāpi cāndrāyaṇam uktam ihāpy upapātakatvāt tad evātra vācyaṃ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
upapātakeṣv apy anyāny api prāyaścittāni santi 
śaktyapekṣayā gurulaghubhāvo nyūnādhikabhāvaḥ 
ato niyamārthaṃ tatra cāndrāyaṇagrahaṇam 
sutasya tyāgo 'bharaṇaṃ gṛhān niṣkāśanam aśiśoḥ prāptasya ca guṇavataḥ pātakinas tu na doṣaḥ 
parivittitānuje 'nūḍhe parivedanam eva ca 
tayor dānaṃ ca kanyāyās tayor eva ca yājanam 
anujaḥ kanīyān bhrātā 
tayor yājanaṃ vivāhe darśapūrṇamāsādau vārtvijyam 
kanyāyā dūṣaṇaṃ caiva vārdhuṣyaṃ vratalopanam 
taḍāgārāmadārāṇām aptayasya ca vikrayaḥ 
kanyāyā dūṣaṇam neyaṃ kanyā puruṣeṇopabhukā ity adhyavasāyena pratipādanam 
aṅguṣṭhādinā vā prajananaṃ dharmabhedo maithunadharmavarjam 
tatra hi gurutalpasāmyam uktam 
vārdhuṣitvaṃ anāpadi dhanaprayogena vṛttigrahaṇam 
vāsiṣṭhe tu vṛddhes tu prayoktā dhānyānāṃ vārdhiṣitvaṃ tad ucyate 
sā ca śāstraparibhāṣā 
na laukike vā padārthe 
vratacyutiḥ śiṣṭapratiṣiddhe 'muṣyagṛhe na boktavyam upavastavyam evaṃrūpaḥ saṃkalpo vratam 
tato yaḥ saṃkalpāc calati sā tasya vratacyutiḥ 
nanu ca vratam iti icchākṛto niyama ucyate 
yadi cecchākṛtaḥ saṃkalpas tato nivṛttau kaḥ śāstrātikramaḥ vihitam akurvan prāyaścittīyate ity uktam 
na caitad vihitam 
ucyate 
satyam icchālakṣaṇa ārambhaḥ 
samāptis tu śāstrīyā 
yathā sauryādīnāṃ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ lipsātaḥ pravṛttiḥ samāptis tu śāstrīyā 
atitāyāṃ phalecchāyām avāpte vā phale yathoktaṃ tadartha evāvaśiṣṭaṃ varjayeyuḥ prākramiko 'yaṃ kāpuruṣa iti vadantaḥ 
snātakavratānāṃ tv atyantalaghīyaḥ prāyaścittaṃ pravakṣyate 
tenedaṃ vikalpitum arhati 
ārāma udyānopavanādi 
smṛtyantare sarvabhūmr avikreyā 
vrātyatā bāndhavatyāgo bhṛtyādhyāpanam eva ca 
bhṛtāc cādhyayanādānam apaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayaḥ 
bāndhavā jñātayaḥ sodarādibhyo 'nye 'pi mātulamātṛṣvasreyādayaḥ 
sati vibhave te 'py ajīvanto bhartavyāḥ 
tad uktam svajane duḥkhajīvini iti 
yady evaṃ sutasya ityādy anarthakam 
na anyārthaṃ vacanam jālapādapratiṣedhe haṃsapratiṣedhavat 
tena mātrādityāga upapātakam eva 
iha tu laghīya iti 
bhṛtyādhyāpanam 
bhṛtakasya sato 'dhyāpakatvāt yaś ca bhṛtakād adhīte 
apaṇyāni daśame uktāni 
sarvākareṣv adhīkāro mahāyantrapravartanam 
hiṃsauṣadhīnāṃ stryājīvo 'bhicāro mūlakarma ca 
ākarāḥ suvarṇādibhūmayaḥ tatrādhikāro rājaniyogenādhipatitvam 
sarvagrahaṇād anyad apy arthotpattisthānam gṛhyate 
tena grāmanāgaraniyogo vyavahāradarśanadaṇḍagrahaṇādiniyogaḥ 
evam eva yantrāṇi setubandhādīni jalapravāhaniyamārthāni teṣāṃ mahatāṃ pravartanam 
auṣadhīnām aśuṣkāṇāṃ hiṃsācchedaḥ 
strīṇām ājīvaḥ 
striyam upajīvyate strīdhanena śarīrakuṭumbadhāraṇaṃ kriyate bhāryāpaṇyabhāvo veśastrīprayojanaṃ vā 
bhicāro vaidikena śāpādinā mantraprayogeṇa śyenādiyāgena vā śatrumāraṇam 
mūlakarma vaśīkaraṇaṃ mantrādikriyayaiva 
indhanārtham aśuṣkāṇāṃ drumāṇām avapātanam 
ātmārthaṃ ca kriyārambho nindatānnādanaṃ tathā 
indhanādyarthaṃ tu na doṣaḥ agniśuddhatvāc chuṣkasarvasaṃbhave 
kriyārambhaḥ pākārambhaḥ āturatvād evātmārthaṃ na bhavet iti pratiṣedhāt 
kriyārambha evaṃ vyākhyāyate 
kriyārambhe hi prāyaścittopadeśād eva pratiṣedhaḥ kalpyeta 
na hy apratiṣiddhaprāyaścittaṃ yuktam ninditaṃ ca samācaran iti vacanāt 
adya punar yat prabhāṣitaṃ tathā siddhe pratiṣedhe prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate 
na kalpanāgauravaṃ bhavati tena 
ninditānnādanam 
nanu garhitānnādyayoḥ iti kuta etat 
vikalpārtham 
abhyāse tat prāyaścittam idaṃ tu sakṛd eva 
pratyayabhedo vā 
anāhitāginitā steyam ṛṇānām anapakriyā 
asacchāstrādhigamanaṃ kauśīlavyasya ca kriyā 
kṛtavivāhasya viduṣo dravyasaṃpattau jātaputrasya vā anāhitāgnitā 
sādhikārāviśeṣān nityaśrutayo nityādhānasya prayojikā iti smṛtikāro manyate 
kathaṃ punaḥ śrutiprayuktam ādhānaṃ vihitam 
kasyacit prakaraṇe kathyate yenāgamo 'py ucchidyeta 
svataś ca pratīyamānādhikāratvād agniniṣpattyarthatayā kuto 'dhikārāntaraprayuktiḥ 
agnayas tāvad viniyuktāḥ yad āhavanīye juhoti ityādinā 
na cādhānena vinā teṣāṃ niṣpattir ity ato 'gniṣu prayukteṣu tad api prayuktam ity ucyate 
yady evam agniniṣpattyarthaṃ tad āhitāgniṣv adhikāraḥ asatsv agniṣu nādhikriyate 
na cādhānaṃ nityaṃ yāvajjīvādividhivat 
ataḥ katham anāhitāgnitādoṣaḥ 
akurvan vihitaṃ karma iti vihitākaraṇe prāyaścittaṃ vihitam agnīn ādadhīta iti 
satyaṃ vihitam 
na svargāya nādhikārāntarasaṃpattaye 
kiṃ tarhi agniniṣpattaye 
agneś ca jñātaprayojanā yasya taiḥ prayojanaṃ sa tenopāyenārjayati anyas tu neti 
kā tatra vihitākaraṇāśaṅkā yena prāyaścittī syāt 
yo hi suvarṇaṃ nārjayati katham asau duṣyeta 
ucyate 
asmād eva vacanāt saty adhikāre 'gnayo 'vaśyam arjanīyā iti gamyate 
steyam uktebhyo dravyebhyo 'nyasya 
ṛṇānāṃ caturbhir ṛṇaiḥ ity etacchruter anuṣṭhānam 
asacchāstrāṇi cārvākanirgranthāḥ yatra na pramāṇaṃ na vedakarma phalasaṃbaddham āpadyate 
kauśīlavatvaṃ cāraṇatvaṃ nartanatvaṃ gāyanatvam 
dhānyakupyapaśusteyaṃ madyapastrīniṣevaṇam 
strīśūdraviṭkṣatravadho nāstikyaṃ copapātakam 
śaṇasaptadaśāni dhānyāni 
kupyaṃ lohatāmrādimayaṃ kuṇḍakaṭāhādi 
nanu cāviśeṣeṇa pūrvaśloke steyam uktam 
parihṛtam etat haṃsapratiṣedhavat iti 
atha vā steyaṃ yad anyasmād uddhṛte gṛhīte saṃbhavenāśodhyate na hi jātu steyam iti lokaprasiddhaṃ yathā dhairyādinā apakaraṇam 
madyapeti 
brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyādistrīniṣevanaṃ sahaśayanaṃ saṃprayogaṃ vā 
striyā vadho brāhmaṇyā api 
nāstikyam nāsti paraloko nāsti dattam ityādyabhiniveśaḥ 
brāhmaṇasya rujaḥkṛtyaṃ ghrātir aghreyamadyayoḥ 
jaihmyaṃ ca maithunaṃ puṃsi jātibhraṃśakaraṃ smṛtam 
daṇḍahastādinā śarīrapīḍājananaṃ rujaḥkṛtyam 
kiṃ punar aghreyam 
na hi bhakṣaṇapratiṣedhavat ghrāṇapratiṣedhaḥ kvacid asti 
na tu śakyaṃ vijñātuṃ yad abhakṣyaṃ tad aghreyam iti 
ghṛtāder yāgārtham upāttasyābhakṣyatvaṃ na cāghreyatvam 
ucyate 
pūtidurgandhatayā ghrāṇaṃ vikarati laśunapalāṇḍupuruṣapurīṣādi tad gṛhyate 
madyasāhacaryāc ca yad abhakṣyaṃ tad eva vijñāyate 
na pūtidārvādi 
jaihmyaṃ kuṭilatā aprasannahṛdayatvam anyad ucyate 'nyat kriyate hṛdaye cānyat 
kharāśvoṣṭramṛgebhānām ajāvikavadhas tathā 
saṃkarīkaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ mīnāhimahiṣasya ca 
mṛgā rurupṛṣatādaya āraṇyāḥ 
ibho hastī 
saty api mṛgatve bāhulyena grāmavāsitvād grahaṇam 
mīno matsyaḥ 
ahiḥ sarpaḥ 
ninditebhyo dhanādānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ śūdrasevanam 
apātrīkaraṇaṃ jñeyam asatyasya ca bhāṣaṇam 
ninditā apratigrāhyāḥ śūdrā ye pāpakarmāṇas tebhyo dhanādānaṃ pratigraheṇa punaḥ punaḥ pratyādiṣṭapratigrahasya pratiṣiddhatvāt 
kṛmikīṭavayohatyā madyānugatabhojanam 
phalaidhaḥkusumasteyam adhairyaṃ ca malāvaham 
kṛmayo bhūmiśaraṇāḥ kṣudrajantavaḥ 
kīṭās tathāvidhā eva kiṃcidupacitamūrtayo 'pakṣāḥ sapakṣāś ca makṣikāśalabhādayaḥ 
vayāṃsi pakṣiṇaḥ śukasārikādayaḥ 
madyānugataṃ madyena saṃspṛṣṭaṃ tadgandhācitaṃ ca 
adhairyaṃ cetaso 'sthiratvaṃ svalpe 'py upaghāte 'padhvaṃsaḥ 
etāny enāṃsi sarvāṇi yathoktāni pṛthak pṛthak 
yair yair vratair apohyante tāni samyaṅ nibodhata 
prāyaścittanimittāny uktāni 
saṃjñābhedaś ca prāyaścittabhedārthaḥ 
vakṣyamāṇasya saṃkṣepavacanam 
brahmahā dvādaśa samāḥ kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset 
bhaikṣāśy ātmaviśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā śavaśirodhvajam 
tṛṇaparṇādikṛto niketo varṣātapaśītatrāṇādihetur gṛhaṃ kuṭīti kathyate 
samā varṣāṇi 
bhaikṣāśī iti 
smṛtyantare saptāgāram anabhisaṃhitaṃ ca bhaikṣyam uktam 
śavaśiro hatasyānyasya vā 
dhvaje kāṣṭhādimayīṃ śiraḥpratikṛtim udyatāṃ dhārayed it manyate 
naivaṃ śabdārthavidaḥ 
na hi tacchavaśira ity ucyate 
anyo 'py atra vidhir bhaviṣyati kṛtavāpano nivaset ityādi 
lakṣyaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ vā syād viduṣām icchayātmanaḥ 
prāsyed ātmānam agnau vā samiddhe trir avākśirāḥ 
dhānuṣkā yatra yuddhaṃ kartuṃ lakṣaṃ vidhyanti tatra tadbhūtena bhavitavyam 
atha vā saṃgrāme 'nyatra yudhyamānānāṃ śastraprahārāḥ pratīpsitavyāḥ 
ātmana icchayeti 
pramādāt tadantargatasya saty api svavadhe na śuddhiḥ 
viduṣām ity eva jānate prāyaścittopadeśo 'yam iti 
atha vā dhanurvedajñānam 
agnau vātmānaṃ kṣipet samiddhe trir utthāya punaḥ patet 
yajeta vāśvamedhena svarjitā gosavena vā 
abhijidviśvajidbhyāṃ vā trivṛtāgniṣṭutāpi vā 
janapadeśvarasyāśvamedhe 'dhikāraḥ 
tatra hiraṇādiprācyādigamyaḥ āhṛtaṃ dravyaṃ dakṣiṇā vihitā 
ye cānāhitāgnayas te na yāgeṣv adhikriyante 
na punas tadartham evādhānaṃ kartavyam 
karmāṇi hi prayaścittārthāni sāṅgāni 
na cāṅgam ādhānam 
japan vānyatamaṃ vedaṃ yojanānāṃ sataṃ vrajet 
brahmahatyāpanodāya mitabhuṅ niyatendriyaḥ 
mitabhug yāvatā na tṛpyati 
niyatendriyo brahmacārī viṣayeṣv agṛdhnuḥ 
sarvasvaṃ vedaviduṣe brāhmaṇāyopapādayet 
dhanaṃ hi jīvanāyālaṃ gṛhaṃ vāsaḥ paricchadam 
yāvat kiṃcid gohiraṇyādikaṃ tat sarvaṃ dātavyam 
atrārthavādo dhanaṃ hi jīvanāyālam iti 
tāvatā dhanena dattenānyasmai jīvitaṃ dattaṃ bhavatīty eva sāmyam 
gṛhaṃ vāsaḥ paricchadam 
paricchadaśabdena yāvat kiṃcid gṛhopakaraṇaṃ sarpistailadhānyādi kuṇḍakaṭāhādi kupyaśayanāsanādi tat sarvaṃ gṛhyate 
haviṣyabhug vānusaret pratisrotaḥ sarasvatīm 
japed vā niyatāhāras trir vai vedasya saṃhitām 
haviṣyaṃ munyannaṃ nīvārādi grāmyam ap payoghṛtādi 
pratisrotaḥ srotaḥsrotaḥ prati yāvanti sarasvatyāḥ srotāṃsi tāvanty anusaret 
niyatāhāra āhāranivṛttiṃ kṛtvā 
vedasaṃhitāṃ samantrabrāhmaṇakām trir āvarteta 
eteṣāṃ prāyaścittānām iyam atra vyavasthā 
buddhipūrveṇa brāhmaṇamātravadhe dvādaśavārṣikaṃ lakṣyaṃ śastrabhṛtām anena vikalpyate 
yady api dvādaśavārṣike na maraṇāntam tathāpi daivopapattipatite 'ntarāmaraṇe sāmikṛte prāyaścitte śuddhyabhāvat pratyavāyo na nivartate 
dvitīye tu tadānīm eva nirmuktapāpaḥ 
śastrahato vā kadācin na mriyeta 
ata eva ādyopāttaprāyaścittam iccayā vikalpena dātavyam 
agnau pravesas tu śrotriyatvādiguṇayukte 
tatrāpi savanaguṇe 'gnau 
santi brahmaghnas triravasthās tasyāvasānaṃ śastreṇa gātrāṇāṃ khaṇḍaso vidāraṇam savanagata iti paṭhanti 
na ca prāṇāntikeṣu dvaiguṇyasaṃbhavaḥ 
na hy ekasmin janmani dvir maraṇopapattiḥ 
tattulyapīḍānubhavāt tasya dvaiguṇyam 
na ca dvādaśavārṣikaṃ dviguṇaṃ yuktam 
ko hi devasamaś caturviṃśativarṣāṇi prāyaścittaṃ caret 
saṃvatsaraśeṣe hi mṛtasya sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ syāt 
aśvamedhayāgas tu traivarṇikānāṃ sati saṃbhave pūrvoktair vikalpyate 
gosavādayas tv abuddhipūrvaṃ mahāguṇavati hantari syuḥ 
yojanaśataṃ buddhyā ca brāhmaṇajātīyamātravadhe 
evam uttarāny api 
trivṛtāgniṣṭutā iti samānādhikaraṇe 
evaṃ svarjitā gosavena iti abhijidviśvajitau dve prāyaścitte 
kṛtavāpano nivased grāmānte govraje 'pi vā 
āśrame vṛkṣamūle vā gobrāḥmaṇahite rataḥ 
dvādaśavārṣikasyāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ kaścid vaikalpikadharma upadiśyate 
vapanam apūrvam 
āśramavṛkṣamūle vaikalpikam eva vā kuṭī syāt 
kim arthaṃ punas tatraiva noktam 
prakrāntadvādaśavārṣikasya vakṣyamāṇaṃ yathā syāt pṛthak prāyaścittam mā bhūd iti pūrvair vyākhyātam 
svatantraṃ hy anyasmin prakrānte 'nyatra prāpnoti prakrāntāsamāptau doṣaśravaṇāt 
pṛthagadhikārāt pṛthakprayogatā 
anyasyānyataraprayogaḥ 
brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇān parityajet 
mucyate brahmahatyāyā goptā gor brāhmaṇasya ca 
aparitrāyāpi samyak prāṇaparityāgena mucyate 
paritrāyāprāṇatyāgenāpi 
tryavaraṃ pratiroddhā vā sarvasvam avajitya vā 
viprasya tannimitte vā prāṇālābhe 'pi mucyate 
pratiroddhā pravṛttaḥ śastreṇa kṣato vā yuddhakaraṇe 
tryavaram 
yadi nyūnaṃ tadā tisra āvṛttayaḥ 
kṛte yuddhe 'sau mucyate aparitrāya mṛto 'pi 
sarvasvam avajityeti brāhmaṇādīnāṃ caurāpahṛtaṃ yadi pratyānayati tadā mucyate 
brāhmaṇasya vā tannimitte prāṇadāne 
nanu coktam goptā gor brāhmaṇasya iti 
satyam 
yuddenānyena vā śarīravyāpāreṇa gāṃ paṅkalagnāṃ dasyubhir vāhyamānāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śatrubhiś caurair nadyā vāpahriyamāṇaṃ yadi mokṣayati tataḥ śudhyatīty uktam 
iha tu tannimittagrahaṇād yadi dhane 'pahriyamāṇe brāhmaṇo vyāmūḍhatayātmānaṃ hanti nirapekṣaṃ vā corair yudhyate tatra tatsamadhanadānena mā mṛthā ahaṃ ta iyad dhanaṃ dadami iti tam āśvāsya datvā mucyate 
evaṃ dṛḍhavrato nityaṃ brahmacārī samāhitaḥ 
samāpte dvādaśe varṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati 
asmād vacanād ādyaśeṣam utkrāntaṃ vijñāyate 
dṛḍhavrata iti samāhita iti ca pādapūraṇe pade 
upasaṃhāro 'yaṃ pūrvasya 
śiṣṭvā vā bhūmidevānāṃ naradevasamāgame 
svam eno 'vabhṛthasnāto hayamedhe vimucyate 
caramapakṣa ucyate 
śiṣṭvā svam ena ātmīyaṃ doṣam 
bhūmidevatānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ naradevaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ samāgame 
ṛtvijo brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyo yajamāna evaṃ kṛtāśvamedhe 'vabhṛtasnāto vimucyate 
dvādaśavārṣikasyopasaṃhṛtatvāt svatantram idaṃ vaikalpikam icchati 
anye tu vaikalpikānāṃ madhya upadeśāt prakrāntadvādaśavārṣikasyaiva gobrāhmaṇaparitrāṇavat samāptyavadhim āhuḥ 
yathā sārasvatena pakṣaṃ vā prasravaṇaṃ prāpyotthānam iti 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ 
upasaṃhṛtatvād ādyasya vaikalpikamadhe vā pāṭhād ubhayarūpatāsya prakrānte 'pakrānte ca sati saṃbhave 
dharmasya brāhmaṇo mūlam agraṃ rājanya ucyate 
tasmāt samāgame teṣām eno vikhyāpya śudhyati 
yajamānartvijāṃ brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇām asvamedhasamāgama eno vikhyāpanīyam ity atrārthavādaḥ 
brāhmaṇaḥ saṃbhavenaiva devānām api daivatam 
pramāṇaṃ caiva lokasya brahmātraiva hi kāraṇam 
prāyaścittinā pariṣadgamanaṃ kartavyam 
pariṣatpūjyas tu vidhir anuṣṭheyaḥ 
sā caivaṃrūpā pariṣad evamarthaśloko 'yam uttaraś ca 
utpattyaiva brāhmaṇo devānām api devo lokasya pramāṇaṃ pratyayitaḥ pratyakṣadarśanavat 
na tadīyaṃ vacanam api śaṅkate kaścit 
atra kāraṇaṃ brahma vedas tadarthajño hy adṛṣṭam upadarśayan pramāṇīkriyate 
teṣāṃ vedavido brūyus trayo 'py enaḥ suniṣkṛtim 
sā teṣāṃ pāvanāya syāt pavitraṃ viduṣāṃ hi vāk 
pariṣadgamanaṃ prāyaścittino 'nena kathyate 
tasyāś ca lakṣaṇaṃ brāhmaṇā vedavidas trayaḥ pariṣad iti 
nanu ca daśāvarā vā pariṣat iti vakṣyati 
tathā eko 'pi vedavid dharmam iti 
na daśasaṃkhyā puruṣāṇām upadiśyate kiṃ tarhi guṇānām 
tathā ca traividyo haitukas tarkī iti guṇānām eva nirdeśaḥ 
eko 'pi vedavit ity anena caitat prakaṭīkaroti haitukatvādiguṇāntarābhāve 'pi kevalenaiva vedena vedavitpariṣattvaṃ labhyate 
ity upāttaṃ haitukatvādayo 'pi guṇā gṛhyante na hy anyathā vedavittvaṃ śiṣṭapariṣallakṣaṇam 
ayaṃ tu ślokaḥ saṃkhyānirdeśārthaḥ 
atra yady api vedavida ity upāttam haitukatvādayo 'pi guṇā gṛhyante 
na hy anyathā vedavittvaṃ śiṣṭapariṣallakṣaṇam 
tatraiva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ 
yadi vedavittvaṃ na haitukatvādinā vinā bhavati kathaṃ tarhīdam uktam eko 'pi vedavit iti 
guṇāntarābhāve 'pi vedavitparigrahārtham ity etad api tatraiva vakṣyāmaḥ 
ataḥ prāyaścittinā trayaḥ samuditāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ 
ekasya kadācit pramādo 'navadhānaṃ syāt 
tathaitat pariṣadgamanaṃ viduṣāpy adṛṣṭarthaṃ kartavyam iti 
tathā ca pavitraṃ viduṣāṃ hi vāk 
na ca rahasyaprāyaścittābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ 
yatra kasyāpy aviditaṃ tadrahasyam 
vidite tu pariṣadgamanam 
tathā coktam khyāpanenānutāpena iti 
tad etad ayuktam kalpanāviṣayatvād asya 
śaktiṃ cāvekṣya pāpaṃ ca prāyaścittaṃ vikalpayet iti anuktaniṣkṛtīnāṃ prāyaścittaṃ kalpayet 
tatra tribhir vā kalpanā kṛtā sā pramāṇayitavyā 
ato 'nyatamam āsthāya vidhiṃ vipraḥ samāhitaḥ 
brahmahatyākṛtaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohaty ātmavattayā 
sarveṣāṃ brahmahatyāprāyaścittānām upasaṃhārārthaḥ śloko 'yam 
vipragrahaṇaṃ cātra sarvavarṇapradarśanārtham 
vyapohaty apaharati 
ātmavattayā ātmajñānatayā 
śāstrārthakṛtābhiniveśa ātmavān ity ucyate 
tasyāyam adhyavasāyo na śāstrārtham anyathā vartate 
hatvā garbham avijñātam etad eva vrataṃ caret 
rājanyavaiśyau cejānāv ātreyīm eva ca striyam 
garbho brāhmaṇajātīya eva 
kena garbhasya pātanaṃ kārayet 
avijñātam ajñātastrīpuruṣaviśeṣavyañjanam 
upajñāte yathāyathaṃ strīpuṃsanimittam eva 
kathaṃ punaḥ striyām ahatāyāṃ garbhasya vadho bhavati 
auṣadhādiyogena garbhasya pātanam 
etad evety ekavacanāt pratyāsannadvādaśavārṣikam evātidiśyata ityāhuḥ 
anye etad iti śuddhikāraṇaṃ sāmānyāpekṣāyām ataḥ sarvaprāyaścittātideśaḥ 
kṣatriyavaiśyau cejānau yajamānau 
bhūtakālatā na vivakṣitā 
smṛtyantre savanagatau rājanyavaiśyau iti 
ataś ca prārabdhasomapānayor eṣa vidhir na darśapūrṇamāsādiyajamānayoḥ 
liṅgadarśanaṃ tu yajamānamātrayor bhāvayatīti 
brāhmaṇībhūyaiva yajata iti 
ātreyīṃ striyam atrigorajātām 
jāter aviśeṣāt strīpuṃsayor brāhmaṇīnām api prāptāv ātreyyā vacanam anyagotranivṛttyartham 
ato brāhmaṇyā apy anyasyā vadha upapātakam eva 
strīśūdraviṭkṣatravadhaḥ iti 
yat tu strīsuhṛt iti tac cāturvarṇyastrīmātre 
adhamastrīṇām upapātakamahāpātakaprāyaścitte vikalpyete 
bhartṛsvaguṇāpekṣo vikalpo buddhipūrvābuddhipūrvakṛtaś ca saḥ 
stanapabālāpatyayos tadabhāve bālānāṃ duḥśake jīvite vijātiyāyā api brāhmaṇabhāryāyā bhartṛdveṣād anaparādhinyā nimittāntarato vopajāpyamānāyāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣantyā asaṃprayujyamānāyā vadhaḥ 
evam apy utprekṣayā strīsuhṛdvadham ityādeśāt 
anyatra tu strīśudreti 
ātreyyāṃ tv avikalpaḥ 
anye tv ātreyīṃ garbhasāhacaryād ṛtumatīm āhuḥ 
patyate bhrūṇahātreyāś ca hanteti 
bhrūṇahā brāhmaṇavadhakārī sā 
sā ca brāhmaṇy eva 
atra kukṣyāv avaśyaṃ garbha uhyata ity ātreyī 
yady apīdṛśyāṃ vṛttau taddhito na smaryate prayogānusāreṇa tu bhavatīti 
uktvā caivānṛtaṃ sākṣye pratirabhya guruṃ tathā 
apahṛtya ca niḥkṣepaṃ kṛtvā ca strīsuhṛdvadham 
hiraṇyabhūmyādisākṣye tu vadhādisaṃśaye vānṛtābhidhāne prāyaścittam etat 
atra hi doṣātiśayaḥ śrūyate bhañjatām ityādi 
anyatra gurulaghubhāvena kalpanā kāryā 
pratirabhyeti 
yad uktam alīkanirbandhaḥ iti tad evedaṃ pratiraṃbhaḥ saṃrambhapūrvako guror upadravārambhaḥ 
nikṣepaḥ 
atrāpi daridrasya mahato dhanavato 'dhamasyotānyasya brāhmaṇajātīyasyetyādikalpanā 
yatra tv ekam eva śrūyate tatra yathāśrutyaiva bhavitum arhati 
kaḥ kalpanāyā avasaraḥ na ceha kauṭasākṣinikṣepayor laghuprāyaścittam asti 
yad api surāpāne tad api tulyam anena garīyaḥ śrutāśrutaviṣayatvaṃ śaktiṃ cāvekṣya iti yat saty api anuktaniṣkṛtīnām iti śravaṇe 
iyaṃ viśuddhir uditā pramāpyākāmato dvijam 
kāmato brāhmaṇavadhe niṣkṛtir na vidhīyate 
pramāpya hatvā 
niṣkṛtir iti 
prāg ayaṃ vyākhyātārthaḥ prāyaścittagauravopadeśaparaḥ 
surāṃ pītvā dvijo mohād agnivarṇāṃ surāṃ pibet 
tayā sa kāye nirdagdhe mucyate kilbiṣāt tataḥ 
dvijaśrutir brāhmaṇārthaiva 
āha ca smṛtyantare brāhmaṇasya uṣṇāṃ vā pibeyuḥ surām iti 
mohād ity aḥ 
agnivarṇāṃ varṇaśrutigrahaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇārtham 
ata evāha kāye nirdagdhe mucyata iti 
gomūtram agnivarṇaṃ vā pibed udakam eva vā 
payo ghṛtaṃ vāmaraṇād gośakṛdrasam eva vā 
anyataraprāyaścittam agnivarṇaṃ bhavaty eva 
gomūtrādayo dravyaviśeṣā anyaprakāramaraṇanivṛttyarthāḥ 
surā ca paiṣṭīti vijñeyā 
tāṃ mukhyety upacaranti 
anyatra tu prayogo gauṇaḥ 
kāmataḥ pāne caitat 
tathā ca vakṣyati 
ajñānād vāruṇīṃ pītvā saṃskareṇaiva śudhyati 
agnivarṇam ity agnisparśam iti jñātavyam 
tathā cāha ā maraṇāt iti 
surā ca strīṇām api pratiṣiddhā 
uktaṃ hi vāsiṣṭhe tathā brāhmaṇī surāpī bhavati 
na tāṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayati 
ihaiva sā bhramati kṣīṇapuṇyā loke pretyāvāpsu ca jalabhug bhavati 
kaṇān vā bhakṣayed abdaṃ piṇyākaṃ vā sakṛn niśi 
surāpānāpanuttyarthaṃ vālavāsā jaṭī dhvajī 
idaṃ prāṇātyaya auṣadhārtham 
anyena vihitasyāpi tasya 
ajñānāt tu taptakṛcchrasahitaḥ punaḥsaṃskāro darsayiṣyate 
anye tu gauḍīmādhvyor upacaritasurābhāvayor icchanti

sakṛd iti kaṇapiṇyākayor ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ 
niśāyām 
vālamayaṃ golomājālomādikrtaṃ vāsaḥ 
jaṭī śikhayānyair vā keśaiḥ 
dhvajī madyaghaṭikādineti 
surā vai malam annānāṃ pāpmā ca malam ucyate 
tasmād brāhmaṇarājanyau vaiśyaś ca na surāṃ pibet 
annaśabdo yady apy adanakriyākarmaṇi vyutpādyate tathāpi vrīhyādiprabhṛtāv eva bhaktasaktvapūpādau prasiddhataraprayogaḥ 
tathā ca annena vyañjanam iti bhedopapattiḥ 
ataḥ piṣṭavikāratvāt surāyā annavyapadeśe labdhe annānāṃ malam iti nivāraṇopapattau paiṣṭyāḥ surāyāḥ pratiṣedhe liṅgam idam 
liṅgaṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ saṃpadyate 
brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyair api varṇaiḥ peṣṭī na pātavyā 
kiṃ ca saiva surā mukhyā gauḍīmādhvyoḥ 
evaṃ yathā sīdhumādhvīkayor guru prāyaścittaṃ na tathānyeṣām ariṣṭādīnām madyānām 
malaśabdaḥ pāpmeti vyākhyāto nindātiśayadarśanārthaḥ 
saty api prāyaścittaprakaraṇe vākyāt surāpānaniṣedho 'yam 
bhinnavākyatvāc ca nārthavādaḥ 
gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā 
yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijottamaiḥ 
guḍavikāro gauḍī 
yeṣām apīkṣurasam eva madyatām āpadyate teṣām api kāraṇe kāryopacāreṇa gauḍīvyapadeśo na viruddhaḥ 
madhuno vikāro mādhvī 
madhu mādhvīkaṃ vikāravṛttyā 
na sado jātasya mṛdvīvikārasya pratiṣedho yāvan madyāvasthām aprāptasyeti darśayati 
avikṛtaṃ hi madhumādhvīkam icchantīti smarati 
yatrāpi madyaśabdena pratiṣedhas tatrāpy anāsāditamadyapānaśaktiyogasya naiva pratiṣedhaḥ tasya madyaśabdenānabhidhānāt 
yathā śuktaśabdo 'vasthāviśeṣavati pravartate nāviśeṣeṇa 
na hi tad evāmlatām anāpannaṃ śuktam ity ucyate 
yathā sa eva gauḥ vatsāvasthāyāṃ na balīvardaḥ 
evaṃ ca piṣṭodakādisaṃghātasaṃmṛṣṭyā na surā yāvat kālaparivāsena na madaśaktim āpannā 
evam ikṣurasamṛdvīvikārayor draṣṭavyam 
alpāyās tarhi pānaṃ prāpnoti yāvatyā mātrayā pītā na madayati 
pratibandhakadravyayogena ca 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
nāyaṃ madotpattipratiṣedhaḥ tathā kartavyaṃ yathā mattaḥ kṣībo na bhavati iti 
kiṃ tarhi yan madajananasamarthaśaktiyuktaṃ tan na pātavyam iti 
alpāyā api sā śaktir vidyate 
yāvatā rūkṣam alpaprāṇaṃ svalpam api madyaṃ madayati snigdhaṃ mahāprāṇaṃ bahv api neti 
naitāvatā madaśaktyabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktum 
kāryābhāvena kāraṇabhāvān madyānām api naiva niścīyate 
na hi mahatkāṣṭhaṃ dagdhum asamarthasyāgner adāhakatvam anumīyate śuṣkatṛṇe tādṛśasyaiva dāhakatvopalambhāt 
yad apy uktaṃ dravyāntareṇa śaktipratibandhakatve pānaprāptir iti 
tad apy acodyam 
na hi tṛṇena tādṛśasyaiva dāhe dadānīṃ sā tasya śaktir nāsti kiṃ tu vidyamānāpi kāryārambhaṃ praty asamarthā 
śaktisaṃbhavaś ca pratihetur na te nityakāryam 
na ca dravyāntarāṇi śaktiṃ vināśayanti api tu kāryārambhaṃ pratibadhnanti 
tathā ca tatparimāṇārambhakadravyayoge 'pi paittiko mādyati na ślaiṣmiko 'to 'numīyate na tasya vināśaḥ 
tasmān na bhāvimadyāvasthasya pratiṣedho nāpi prāptāvasthāviśeṣasya pratibandhakābhāvādivat tatpratiṣedhaḥ 
yathā cauraḥ sa varjanīya iti 
nodaśvito 'prāptāmlabhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ 
mādhvīti kathaṃ yāvatā guṇena mādhavīti bhavitavyam 
saṃjñāpūrvako vidhir anityaḥ iti parihāraḥ 
jñāpakaṃ cāsyāḥ paribhāṣāyā ārod iti vaktavye or guṇa iti guṇagrahaṇam 
atra dvijottamagrahaṇaṃ ca kṣatriyavaiśyayor madyānujñānārtham 
tathā ca mahābhārate bhāratānāṃ yādavānāṃ madyapānaṃ tu varṇyate ubhau madhvāsavakṣībau dṛṣṭau me keśavārjunau ity uttaraślokād arthavāda eva 
nanu ca tathā sarvā iti bahuvacanaṃ katham 
yāvatā ekam upamānaṃ dve upameye 
annamalatvaṃ cātra hetuman nigado 'rthavado malaṃ hetur yathā śūrpeṇa juhoti tena hy annaṃ kriyata iti 
yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācānnaṃ madyaṃ māṃsaṃ surāsavam 
tad brāhmaṇena nāttavyaṃ devānām aśnatā haviḥ 
yakṣādayo nindyāḥ prāṇino bhakṣyābhakṣyavivekaśūnyā māṃsam abhakṣayan 
surā cāsavaś ca surāsavam 
jātir aprāṇinām ity ekavad bhāvaḥ 
āsavo 'tra madyaviseṣa eva īṣanmadyād bhinnaṃ gobalīvardavad ihopādānam 
devānām aśnatā devadeyāni havīṃṣi carupuroḍāśādīni darśapūrṇamāsoditāni brāhmaṇasyāśituṃ yuktāni na piśācādyannaṃ madyamāṃsādīni 
amedhye vā paten matto vaidikaṃ vāpy udāharet 
akāryam anyat kuryād vā brāhmaṇo madamohitaḥ 
amedhye patanaṃ devānnāśanavad arthavādaḥ 
nanu ca vaidikodāharaṇaṃ katham akāryam 
atrocyate 
tadapekṣayānyad akāryaṃ kuryād iti 
katham akāryam aśucer vedākṣaroccāraṇapratiṣedhāt  
yasya kāyagataṃ brahma madyenāplāvyate sakṛt 
tasya vyapaiti brāhmaṇyaṃ śūdratvaṃ ca sa gacchati 
adhīte vede saṃskārarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ hṛdayaṃ brahmaśabdenocyate 
ato hṛdaye madyenāplāvite sa śūdratāṃ gacchati 
brāhmaṇyavacanaṃ sarvaprakāramadyaniṣedhārthaṃ brāhmaṇasya 
kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ paiṣṭyā eva niṣedha iti darsayati 
eṣā vicitrābhihitā surāpānasya niṣkṛtiḥ 
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi suvarṇasteyaniṣkṛtim 
uktaprayojanau pūrvottaraślokau 
suvarṇasteyakṛd vipro rājānam abhigamya tu 
svakarma khyāpayan brūyān māṃ bhavān anuśāstv iti 
brāhmaṇasuvarṇasteya etat prāyaścittam 
vipragrahaṇaṃ sarvavarṇapradarśanārtham kṣatriyādīnām anyasya prāyaścittasyāsamāmnānāt 
mām anuśāstu nigrahaṃ karotu 
rājā gatvā ca vaktavyaḥ 
atra ca rājaśabdo deśeśvaravacana eva na kṣatriyajātyapekṣaḥ 
gṛhītvā musalaṃ rājā sakṛd dhanyāt tu taṃ svayam 
vadhena śudhyati steno brāhmaṇas tapasaiva tu 
muśalaṃ daṇḍaviśeṣa āyaso dārumayo vā 
sakṛt svayam iti vivakṣitam 
vadhena śudhyati 
sakṛt prahāreṇa vadho maraṇaphalo vā bhavatu mā vāstu 
tādṛśena muśalaprahāreṇa śuddho bhavati 
brāhmaṇas tu tapasā vakṣyamāṇena 
atrāpi brāhmaṇagrahaṇam avivakṣitam 
tathā cottaratra dvijagrahaṇam 
yady api ca kṛṣṇalagrahaṇe mahāpātakaṃ tathāpi maraṇāntaṃ prāyaścittaṃ suvarṇaśataharaṇe draṣṭavyam 
uktaṃ daṇḍaprāyaścittaṃ tulyarūpeṇa 
atra coktam śatād abyadhike vadhaḥ ity ato 'rvāk kalpanā kāryā 
yas tu maraṇāt pūto bhavati iti prāyaścittāntaram tasmin rājā śastram udumbaram ādadyāt tasmāt taṃ pramāpayen maraṇāt pūto bhavatīti vijñāyate 
yadā kṣatriyādir hantā svāmī ca guṇavāṃs tatraitad vijñāyate 
yadā tu maraṇodyatas tadā syād iti prayojane prayojanopahāras tadā vā śiṣṭaṃ niṣkālako ghṛtākto gomayādinā pātaprabhṛtiḥ 
tapasāpanunutsus tu suvarṇasteyajaṃ malam 
cīravāsā dvijo 'raṇye cared brahmahaṇo vratam

brahmahaṇi yadvratam uktaṃ tac cared iti yojanā 
apanunutsur apanetum icchuḥ 
suddhiṃ cikīrṣatīti yāvat

gurustrīgamanīyaṃ tu vratair ebhir apānudet

gurutalpagaḥ

gurur ācāryaḥ pitā ceti 
talpaśabdo dāravacanaḥ

sūrmiḥ taptā strīprakṛtir ayomayī tām āśliṣyed āliṅgyet

utkartanena kalpena śodhanam

pratyagdakṣiṇā nairṛtī dik 
ajihmago 'kuṭilagaḥ 
śvabhrakūpādi na parihared ity arthaḥ 
kuḍyādiṣu pratiyātanaṃ hi tadāpātād gacched eva 
khaṭvaṅgī cīravāsā vā śmaśrulo vijane vane

cīraṃ vastrakhaṇḍam 
śmaśrulo rūḍhaśmaśruḥ 
samānajātīyāyā api vyabhicāriṇyā gamane laghv eva prāyaścittam 
cāndrāyaṇaṃ vā trīn māsān abhyasen niyatendriyaḥ 
haviṣyeṇa yavāgvā vā gurutalpāpanuttaye 
atidiṣṭagurubhāvānāṃ mātulapitṛvyādīnāṃ yā bhāryās tadgamana idaṃ prāyaścittam

upapātakinas tv evam ebhir nānāvidhair vrataiḥ

goṣṭhe yatra gāva āsate 
carmaṇā tena 
yā na gaur hatā api tv anyasyā api 
caturthakālam aśnīyād akṣāralavaṇaṃ mitam 
gomūtreṇācaret snānaṃ dvau māsau niyatendriyaḥ 
dvau māsāv ekaikam āhāraṃ bhuktvā dvitīye 'hani sāyam aśnīyāt

svatantraḥ kṣārapratiṣedho hi dvandve sati syāt 
tatra vacanapravṛttiḥ padadvayasya ca lakṣaṇārthā 
yugapadadhikaraṇatāyāṃ dvandvaḥ 
sthite viśeṣaṇasamāse viśiṣṭasvyārthasya nānujñāsaṃbandhaḥ 
na samāsādilāghavam 
mitaṃ svalpam ity arthaḥ 
na yāvatā tṛptir bhavati śarīrasthitiś ca jāyate 
gomūtrasnānaṃ triṣv api kāleṣu 
caturthakālaṃ dvau māsāv iti saṃbandhaḥ 
evaṃ smṛtyantare
kṛtavapano vased goṣṭhe carmaṇā tena saṃvṛtaḥ

pādaśaucakriyākāryam adbhiḥ kurvīta kevalam 
na cāsya dvau māsāv ity anena saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati 
snānagrahaṇaṃ pādapūraṇārtham

anyadā mṛdā śuddhiḥ

divānugacched gās tās tu tiṣṭann ūrdhvaṃ rajaḥ pibet

tacchabdena pratyavamarśād yāsāṃ gṛhe sthitas tāsām

āsīnāsu tathāsīno niyato vītamatsaraḥ

pradarśanārthaṃ caitat

śaktau catvāri vratāni

yataḥ

pratinidhinaivaṃ prayogasamāptiḥ

atroktam gautamīye ca gāṃ vaiśyavat iti 
tatra śrotriyasya yajñaviduṣo 'gnyāhitasya dogdhrīṃ bahukṣīrāṃ bālavatsāṃ nirdhanasya gāṃ hatvā gautamīyam kṣetrārāmādau vrīhyādiṣu ca praviśya tannivāraṇārthaṃ pradrute mā mārayāmy enām ity anayā buddhyā kathaṃcin mṛtāyām idaṃ māsikam 
tathāśrotriyasya jaratyā akṣīrāyāś ca buddhipūrvavadhe traimāsikam 
sarvato nirguṇāyā nirguṇasvāmikāyā abuddhipūrvavadhe prājāpatyam 
tasyā eva buddhipūrvamṛtāyāṃ traimāsikam iti   
etad eva vrataṃ kuryur upapātakino dvijāḥ

avakīrṇī tu kāṇena gardabhena catuṣpathe 
pākayajñavidhānena yajeta nirṛtiṃ niśi 
avakāro 'vakīrṇo brahmacāriṇo vratāni tasyātikramaḥ strīsaṃprayogalakṣaṇaḥ so 'syāstīty avakīrṇī 
vakṣyati kāmato retasaḥ sekam iti

pākayajñavidhāneneti itikartavyatāvidhānam 
nanu ca paśuyāgā agniṣṭomīyapaśusādhyā agniṣomīyapaśuprakṛtayaḥ

sa eva pākayajñaprakṛtiḥ 
saty adhikāre hi saḥ

ity etayā juhuyāt

kāmataḥ seke vidhir ayam

vasitvā āchādya 
svakarma avakīrṇo 'smi ity evam 
tebhyo labdhena bhaikṣeṇa vartayann ekakālikam 
upaspṛśaṃs triṣavaṇam abdena sa viśudhyati 
prātarmadhyāhnāparāhṇeṣu upaspṛsan snātaṃ kurvan saṃvatsareṇa pūto bhavati 
jātibhraṃśakaraṃ karma kṛtvānyatamam icchayā 
caret sāntapanaṃ kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyam anicchayā 
samāptāny upapātakāni 
anyatamam ity anuvādaḥ 
na hi nimittānāṃ samāharasaṃbhavaḥ 
samudāyavivakṣāyāṃ na ca kasyacit prāyaścittam upadiśati

eka eva śabdaḥ prāyaścittānudeśo 'śāstratāprasaṅgaḥ 
na ca sāhityavivakṣāpy uktā lakṣaṇatvena śravaṇāt puruṣaṃ prati nimittānām 
ataḥ pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptiḥ yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pibet ity anyatarasya pituḥ pitāmahasya vā somam apītavato bhavaty eva paśuḥ 
yathā saty apy ubhayaśravaṇe yady ubhayaṃ havir ārtim iyād ity anyatarahavirvināśe 'pi bhavaty eva pañcaśarāvaḥ evaṃ sarvaprāyaścitteṣu draṣṭavyam 
icchayeti vivakṣitam anicchayeti ca 
prājāpatyasāntapanayoḥ svarūpaṃ vakṣyati 
saṃkarāpātrakṛtyāsu māsaṃ śodhanam aindavaḥ 
malinīkaraṇīyeṣu taptaḥ syād yavakas tryaham 
saṃkarīkaraṇam apātrīkaraṇaṃ pūrvam ukteneti 
evaṃ saṃkarāpātrakṛtyāsv iti saṃjñibhedād bahuvacanam 
kṛtyāśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate 
kṛtyaṃ kāraṇam 
aindavo māsaḥ cāndrāyaṇḥ 
yāvako yavavikāraḥ peyalehyādiḥ 
atrāviśeṣaśravaṇe 'pīcchānicchayor gurulaghubhāvo vijñeyaḥ 
turīyo brahmahatyāyāḥ kṣatriyasya vadhe smṛtaḥ 
vaiśye 'ṣṭamāṃśo vṛttasthe śūdre jñeyas tu ṣoḍaśaḥ 
savanagatayo rājavaiśyayor brāhmaṇasamam uktam 
iha tu tato 'nyatra 
svadharmānuṣṭhānayoś caturthāṣṭamavibhāgavidhiḥ 
tathā ca vṛttasya grahaṇaṃ sarvakriyārtham 
trīṇi varṣāṇi kṣatriyasya sārdhavarṣaṃ vaiśyasya nava māsān śūdrasya 
yat tu strīśūdraviṭkṣatravadhaḥ iti tat parityaktasvakarmaṇor adharmasthitayoḥ 
śūdrasya vṛttaṃ dvijaśuśrūṣādi na mahāyajñānuṣṭhānaṃ ca 
vṛttaṃ śīlaṃ vaiśyavṛttau vaiśyasya vṛttāv eva vā tiṣṭhati 
gahane yathā samaye svadharmaparāṇāṃ vidhivat prāyaścittam 
akāmatas tu rājanyaṃ vinipātya dvijottamaḥ 
vṛṣabhaikasahasrā gā dadyāt sucaritavrataḥ 
idam aparaṃ dānaprāyaścittam 
saṃbhavadvittasya tapo nāstīti vakṣyati dānena vadhanirṇekam ityādi 
akāmata iti na vivakṣitam mahattvāt prāyaścittasya 
yadi vā savanagatayor evākamata iti kalpanīyam 
vṛṣabha eko yāsāṃ sahasre tā vṛṣabhaikasahasrāḥ 
tryabdaṃ cared vā niyato jaṭī brahmahaṇo vratam 
vasan dūratare grāmād vṛkṣamūlaniketanaḥ 
ādyo 'rdhaḥ ślokas turīyaḥ itarasyānuvādaḥ 
jaṭīti cīrakhaṭvāṅgadhāraṇādinivṛttyartham iti kecit 
tad ayuktam 
tatraiva te dharmās tadīyaturīyabhagatideśo nānyeṣāṃ saty api saṃbhave sarasvatīparisarpaṇādīnām iva prayojanasattvopapattau 
dūrata iti grāmān nivṛttiḥ 
vṛkṣamūle kuṭīṃ kṛtveti 
etad eva cared abdaṃ prāyaścittaṃ dvijottamaḥ 
pramāpya vaiśyaṃ vṛttasthaṃ dadyād vaikaśataṃ gavām 
pūrvatrāṣṭamo 'ṃśaḥ anena dvādaśo vidhīyate 
alpatvād abdaṃ nyūnaguṇasya vidhir ayam iti vijñāyate 
nanu vṛttastham iti śrutam 
satyam 
saṃprati vṛttastho vadhakāle prāṅ nirguṇa iti 
yas tu sarvadaiva vṛttasthas tasya pūrvavad iti jñeyam 
etad eva vrataṃ kṛtsnaṃ ṣaṇmāsān śūdrahā caret 
vṛṣabhaikādaśā vāpi dadyad viprāya gāḥ sitāḥ 
atrāpi māsaṣaṭkaṃ navakaṃ ca vṛttasthetarabhedena yojyam 
yathāśrutasaṃkhyaṃ ca godānaṃ sarvatra vaikalpikam 
dvijottamagrahaṇaṃ ca pradarśanārtham 
sitā na varṇataḥ 
kiṃ tarhi śuddhisāmānyād yā bahukṣīrās tryapatyā anaṣṭaprajāś ca 
mārjāranakulau hatvā cāṣaṃ maṇḍūkam eva ca 
śvagodholūkakākāṃś ca śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret 
atimahatvāt prāyaścittasya samudāyavadhe prāyaścittam etat 
tears
nanu cātra sāhityaṃ na vivakṣitam ity uktaṃ yato jātibhraṃśakarādiṣu 
kathaṃ caite sarve caikasya hantavyatayā upanayeyuḥ 
atiriktasadbhāve na tannimittaṃ syāt 
arthāntaram evaitad vaśenaiva tac chakyate vaktum 
tenāvṛttena hantā 
adhikavadhe tv anyad bhaviṣyati 
naitac chrūyate nyūne vadhe ca na syāt 
payaḥ pibet ityādi pratyekavidhena saṃbadhyate 
na samudāye pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptiḥ samudāye vā arthāntare tu sthātuṃ labhyante 
yat tāvad ucyate sāhityaṃ na vivakṣitam iti tatra na vivakṣyate yatra pratyekaṃ saṃbandhivācyam arthavat 
yathā yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pibet iti 
yatra punar avivakṣyamāṇe vācyam evānarthakaṃ tatra tatparihārārthaṃ yuktā vivakṣā 
yathā vakṣyati sahasrasya pramāpaṇe pūrṇe vānasi iti 
atrāvivakṣāyāṃ sahasrasyeti vyarthaṃ syāt 
evaṃ hi śāstrāntaravirodhād atimahatve yuktaiva vivakṣā 
nanu ca padopādānatāyām api lakṣaṇāgatasya viśeṣaṇasyāvivakṣaiva 
yathā yasyobhayaṃ havir ity ubhayaśabdārthaṃ tatra tulyam 
atra havir ubhayam iti ca padadvaye vakṣyamāṇe vākyabhedaḥ 
havir atrobhayaṃ ceti 
yatrāvasthābhedas tatra vākyabhedaparihārārtham avaśyaṃ bhedaḥ 
anyatarasmin vyavahito guṇo vā hātavyo bhavati 
tathobhyaśabde sarvam asti 
ārcched iti haviḥśabdena vyavahito bhavati saṃkhyānurūpatvāt 
guṇānuvādakatvaṃ vāsya saṃbhavati 
avivakṣite ca tasmin pariśiṣṭaṃ vākyam arthavāda eva 
iha punaḥ samudāyavivakṣāyāṃ sahasraśabdavivakṣāyāṃ vā kṛtsnam eva vākyam arthakam 
tathā hy etāvad vācyaṃ syāt 
sthānatāṃ pramāṇatāṃ tathāsyāṃ śūdrahatyāvratam ity etāvad vaktavyaṃ syāt 
pramāṇe śūdrahatyeti 
etāvatām eva hiṃsā saṃbhavati 
tathānyad apy evaṃ jātīyakaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na vivakṣyeta samānanyāyatvāt phaladānāṃ tu vṛkṣāṇām iti 
tataś ca sarvam asamañjasaṃ syāt 
pauruṣeyaṃ cedaṃ vākyaṃ naiva vaidikam 
vede ca kasya puruṣasya prayogaḥ kimartham anarthakaṃ prayuktam iti 
iha tu buddhipūrve prayoge mātrāyām apy ayuktam ānarthakyam 
tatsāhityavivakṣāviseṣaṇavivakṣā vāyuktaiva 
yac coktaṃ kathaṃ caite sarve ca iti tatrāpy ākheṭakārthamṛgayāyāṃ dāvadāhino vā upapādyatayaiva 
yad apy uktam atiriktasadbhāve na tannimittam iti tad apy ayuktam 
na tv ādhikye pūrveṣāṃ nāśo nyūneṣu ca tathaiva kalpaṇā kāryā 
payaḥ pibet trirātraṃ vā yojanaṃ vādhvano vrajet 
upaspṛset sravantyāṃ vā sūktaṃ vābdaivataṃ japet 
pratyekaṃ vadhe prāyaścittāntaram ucyate 
payaḥ kṣīraṃ prasiddhataratvāt prayogasya nāpaḥ satyām apy ubhayārthatāyām yathā payasā juhoti iti 
yathaiva varāhaśabdo meghe parvate sūkare vartate 
prasiddhataraḥ sūkare 
parvatādipravṛttau sāmānādhikaraṇyam apekṣyate varāho himavān varāhaḥ pāriyātraḥ iti 
prākṛte ca bhojane bhaktādau śarīrasthityarthaṃ prāpte tatsthāne payo vidhīyamānam anyad annaṃ nivartayati 
taporūpatvāc caitad eva pratipattuṃ yuktam 
tāpayati duḥkhayatīti tapaḥ 
ato yathā prāṇāyāme ghṛtaprāśanam iti nātra paurasya bhojanaṃ nivartyate evam iha nācamanaṃ nivartayati 
yo ghṛtaprāśanaṃ bhojanāntaranimittaṃ bhādhata iti 
nāpaḥ payaḥpānena vikalpitāḥ 
kiṃ tarhi upaspṛśet sravantyām iti

sravantivacanāt taḍāgasarasor nivṛttiḥ 
abdaivatam āpo hi ṣṭhā ityādi ṛksamudāyoktaṃ pavamānasūktam 
smṛtyantareṣu kṛśarabhojanam ekārthaṃ lohadaṇḍaṃ ca dakṣiṇā iti 
vrajen na deśāntaraprāptir ity eva kiṃ tarhi pādābhyāṃ gamanam 
abhriṃ kārṣṇāyasīṃ dadyāt sarpaṃ hatvā dvijottamaḥ 
palālabhārakaṃ ṣaṇḍhe saisakaṃ caikamāṣakam 
dvijottamagrahaṇam atantram 
tīkṣṇām āyasīm abhrīm kārṣṇāyasīgrahaṇaṃ kāṣṭhādinivṛttyartham 
ṣaṇḍhe napuṃsake 
tac caturvidham areto vātareto vāpravṛttendriyam ubhayavyañjanaṃ vā

sparśayed dadyāt

anavasthitāḥ

nirṇekaḥ śuddhiḥ

rasajānām iti guḍodaśvidādibhyaḥ 
udumbaramaśakādīni phalapuṣpodbhavāni

praśabda ādikarmaṇi

tadapekṣayopavāso 'timahān

phālakuddālādinā yāḥ kṛṣṭe jāyante yāś ca svayaṃ vane tāsāṃ vṛthālambhe gavādiprayojanena vinā chedanam 
gavānugamanam

ajñānād vāruṇīṃ pītvā saṃskāreṇaiva śudhyati 
matipūrvam anirdeśyaṃ prāṇāntikam iti sthitiḥ 
mekhalādīnāṃ niṣedhād upanayanaṃ vijñāyate 
tac ca smṛtyantarāt taptakṛcchrasahitam 
evaṃ hi gautamaḥ amatyā madyapāne payoghṛtam udakaṃ vāyuṃ prati tryahaṃ taptāni sakṛcchrās tato 'sya saṃskāraḥ 
surā cātra na paiṣṭī kiṃ tarhi gauḍī mādhvī vā 
kuta etat 
smṛtyantaradarśanāt
pramādān madyam asurāṃ sakṛt pītvā dvijottamaḥ 
gomūtrayāvakāhāro daśarātreṇa śudhyati 
paiṣṭyāś ca pramādapāne pratyavāyaprāyaścittāt 
vrataṃ vidhito vijñāya saṃvatsaraṃ kaṇabhakṣaś cāndrāyaṇābhyāso vā 
matipūrvaṃ tayor api pāna etad anirdeśyam 
kiṃ tarhi yena prāṇānām anto bhavati 
kiṃ tat 
yat mukhyāyāḥ surāyā uktam 
abhyāse caitad draṣṭavyam 
sakṛtpāne asurāmadyapāne cāndrāyaṇam abhyaset iti 
iyam atra vyavasthā 
buddhipūrvaṃ paiṣṭyāḥ pāne prāṇāntam eva 
tasyā evābuddhipūrvaṃ sakṛtpāne kaṇabhakṣaṇacāndrāyaṇābhyāsaḥ 
abuddhipūrve 'py asakṛtpāne buddhipūrvavat 
anyeṣāṃ tu madyānāṃ buddhipūrvatve cāndrāyaṇam abhyased iti 
abuddhipūrvaṃ sakṛtpāne taptakṛcchrasaṃskāragomūtrayāvakadravyāṇi 
abuddhipūrvam asakṛtpāne paiṣṭīvat 
apaḥ surābhājanasthā madyabhāṇḍasthitās tathā 
pañcarātraṃ pibet pītvā śaṅkhapuṣpīśṛtaṃ payaḥ 
yatra surāraso 'nubhūyate tatra tadbhājanasthānām apāṃ pāne prāyaścittam etat 
nanu ca madyaśabdasya sāmānyaśabdatvān madyabhāṇḍasthitā ity eva siddhe apaḥ suretyādi na vaktavyam 
satyam yadi surāmadyayor madyapāne 'tyantaprāyaścittabhedo na syāt 
sati tasmin kalpanāyāś cānujñātatvātsurābhājanasthānām adhikataraṇ syād ataḥ kalpanānivṛttyarthaṃ samaprāyaścittavacanam 
pañcarātraṃ saṅkhapuṣpīśṛtaṃ payaḥ 
śṛtagrahaṇāt payaḥ kṣīram eva 
kṣīrahaviṣor eva śṛtaśabdaḥ sādhuḥ 
saṅkhapuṣpīnām auṣadhiḥ 
tayā piṣṭaṃ kvathitaṃ pañcāhāni payaḥ pātavyam 
spṛṣṭvā datvā ca madirāṃ vidhivat pratigṛhya ca 
śūdrocchiṣṭāś ca pītvāpaḥ kuśavāri pibet tryaham 
vidhivat pratigṛhya svastivācanikena 
evaṃ datvety api 
vrīhyādau na doṣaḥ 
kuśo darbhaḥ 
brāhmaṇas tu surāpasya gandham āghrāya somapaḥ 
prāṇān apsu trir āyamya ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati 
surāpasya gandham iti surāyā eva jāṭhareṇāginā dhātubhiś ca saṃyogena gandhaghrāṇe laghīyaḥ 
bhāṇḍāntarasthitāyāḥ prāptir aghrāyaiva 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
surāpasya brāhmaṇasya āghrāṇe 'py etad eva 
somapa iti vacanād darśapūrṇamāsayājinaḥ kalpe na 
ghṛtaṃ prāśyeti 
atrāpi na bhojanāntaranivṛttiḥ 
surāgrahaṇān na madyasya 
ajñānāt prāśya viṇmūtraṃ surāsaṃspṛṣṭam eva ca 
punaḥ saṃskāram arhanti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ 
viṇmūtragrahaṇaṃ retasa upalakṣaṇārtham 
smṛtyantare purīṣakuṇaparetasāṃ prāśane caivam iti 
kiṃjātīyaviṇmūtrapāśana etat 
manuṣyāṇām eva 
anyeṣāṃ tu vakṣyāmaḥ 
atrāpi taptakṛcchraṃ samuccīyate 
darśitaś ca hetuḥ 
dvijātaya iti vivakṣitaṃ 
śūdrasyānyad vakṣyāmaḥ 
ajñānād ity anuvādaḥ 
ko hi jñātvā viṇmūtram aśnīyāt 
yathā madyapāna etad evoktam madyaṃ bhuktvā caret kṛcchram iti yadi tu saṃskaro bhavati tadā vacanāt tulyam eva 
vapanaṃ mekhalā daṇḍo bhaikṣyacaryā vratāni ca 
nivartante dvijātīnāṃ punaḥsaṃskārakarmaṇi 
vratāni vedavratāni 
tad ayuktam 
grahaṇārthatvāt teṣāṃ kutaḥ prāptiḥ 
tasmād yāny upanayanakāle mā divā svāpsīḥ sāyaṃ prātaḥ samidham ādadhyā ācāryādhīno bhava ity evamādīni ca vratāni 
tāni nivartante 
abhojyānāṃ tu bhuktvānnaṃ strīśrūdrocchiṣṭam eva ca 
jagdhvā māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ ca saptarātraṃ yavān pibet 
yeṣām annaṃ na bhujyate te 'bhojyāḥ puruṣā aśrotiyastrīsaṃgrāmajīvyayājyayājakādayaḥ 
śūdrajātigrahaṇād eva jātinirdeśāt strīgrahaṇe labdhe savarṇārthaṃ strīgrahaṇaṃ vijñeyam 
ucchiṣṭaṃ tadāsyaspṛṣṭam 
yac ca nityam āsyaṃ śuci strīṇām iti tasya viṣayo darśitaḥ 
śūdrocchiṣṭānām apāṃ pāne pūrvatra kuśavāry uktam 
iha tu saptarātraṃ yavān iti 
āgāmikatvād asyārthasyobhayatra bhaktādyucchiṣṭabhojane idaṃ draṣṭavyam 
abhakṣyaṃ māṃsaṃ plavahaṃsacakravākādīnām 
idaṃ tu buddhipūrvakam abhyāsabhakṣaṇe draṣṭavyam 
anyatra śeṣeṣūpavased ahaḥ iti 
etad eva payaḥ pītvā sūkaroṣṭrādibhyo anyatra tatra pratipadaṃ prāyaścittāntarāmnānāt 
saktupānaṃ yāvakapānaṃ bhavaty eva 
śuktāni ca kaṣāyāṃś ca pītvā medhyāny api dvijaḥ 
tāvad bhavaty aprayato yāvat tan na vrajaty adhaḥ 
amedhyāni śuktāni dadhi bhakṣyaṃ ca śukteṣu ityādyanujñātāni 
dadhnas tu saty api śuktatve bhakṣyatāyā vihitatvān naiṣa vidhiḥ 
pavitraṃ hi tad iti smaranti 
kāṣāyā vaidyakaprasiddhā anekauṣadhisaṃyogena ye kvāthyante 
aprayato 'śuciḥ 
yāvad vrajaty adhaḥ 
adhogamanaṃ jīrṇānāṃ mūtrapurīṣabhāgena niṣkramaṇam 
yadi vā pakṣāśayaprāptiḥ 
viḍvarāhakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ gomāyoḥ kapikākayoḥ 
prāsya mūtrapurīṣāṇi dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret 
viśeṣānupadeśād amatyā vā tulyam eva ca yuktam amatyā lāghavakalpanāt 
śuṣkāṇi bhuktvā māṃsāni bhaumāni kavakāni ca 
ajñātaṃ caiva sūnāstham etad eva vrataṃ caret 
śuṣkāṇi vallūrādīni 
bhaumānīti koṭarajātānām aniṣedhārtham 
ajñātaṃ meṣasya mahiṣasyeti prakṛter ajñānāt 
sūnā ghātasthānam 
yatra vikrayārthaṃ paśavo hanyante 
ato 'nyatra sthitasya laghuprāyaścittam 
nanu sūnāstha iti vacanād anyatra sthitasya prāyaścittābhāva eva yuktaḥ 
naitad evam 
saunam ity aviśeṣeṇa pratiṣedhāt 
prāyaścitte tu sthagrahaṇāt tadutthitasya gurulaghubhāvo yuktataraḥ 
tad eva cāndrāyaṇam 
jñāte tu jātiviśeṣe 'bhyāse saptarātraṃ yāvakapānam 
seṣeṣūpavased ahaḥ iti 
kravyādasūkaroṣṭrāṇāṃ kukkuṭānāṃ ca bhakṣaṇe 
narakākakharāṇāṃ ca taptakṛcchraṃ viśodhanam 
ceti pūrvaśloko 'trākṛṣyate 
tena viḍvarāhādīnāṃ bhakṣaṇa etad eva 
dvitīyena caśabdena kravyādādīnāṃ viṇmūtraprāśane yad eva viḍvarāhādīnām 
smṛtyantare ca naramātrādhikāreṇeha dvijagrahaṇam avivakṣitam dvijaś cāndrāyaṇam iti 
evam iyaṃ dviślokī biḍālakāketi atrāpekṣate 
ataś caiteṣām apy ucchiṣṭaprāśane bidālādivat 
tato 'syāṃ triślokyāṃ samuddiṣṭam 
mūtrapurīṣaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pratiṣiddham 
ataś ca yat kravydānāṃ mūtrapurīṣaprāśane tad biḍālādīnām api 
māsikānnaṃ tu yo 'śnīyād asaṃāvartako dvijaḥ 
sa trīṇy ahāny upavased ekāhaṃ codake vaset 
māsikam ekoddiṣṭaśrāddham akṛte sapiṇḍīkaraṇe pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram iti 
āmāvāsyasya tu māsikavyapadeśe 'py anujñātatvāt kāmam abhyarthito 'śnīyāt iti kutaḥ prāyaścittam 
anye tv abhyarthitasyānujñānād anabhyarthyamānasyoktam evety āhuḥ 
asamāvartako gurukule tiṣṭhann arthād brahmacāry ucyate 
tryahād anyatarasminn ahany udake vaset 
tryahasyaiva buddhau sthitatvāt tarhi caturtham ahas tad divasaḥ 
vratacārī tu yo 'śnīyān madhu māṃsaṃ kathaṃcana 
sa kṛtvā prākṛtaṃ kṛcchraṃ vrataśeṣaṃ samāpayet 
vratacārī prayukto brahmacaryāśramastha eva 
kathaṃcana āpady apīty arthaḥ 
prāṇānām eva cātyaye ity āpadi vidhānāt asati doṣe na tanirghātārtham etat prāyaścittam 
kiṃ tarhi nimittamātraparyavasāyi vacanāt kriyate 
prākṛtaṃ prājāpatyam prakṛtau bhavaṃ prākṛtam 
sarvakṛcchrāṇāṃ prakṛtitvād evam ucyate 
vrataśeṣaṃ samāpayet 
akṛtaprāyaścittasyāvaśiṣṭavratasamāptāv anadhikāram āha 
biḍālakākākhūcchiṣṭaṃ jagdhvā śvanakulasya ca 
keśakīṭāvapannaṃ ca pibed brahmasuvarcalām 
ākhur mūṣakaḥ 
avapannam etatsaṃparkadūṣitam 
brahmasuvarcalāṃ piṣṭvodakena saha pibed ekāham aviśeṣāt tenaiva śāstrārthasya kṛtatvāt 
abhojyam annaṃ nāttavyam ātmanaḥ śuddhim icchatā 
ajñānabhuktaṃ tūttāryaṃ śodhyaṃ vāpy āśu śodhanaiḥ 
ādyo 'rdhaḥ śloko 'nuvādaḥ 
ajñātabhuktaśuddhyartham ity etad vidhīyate 
samantaraṃ tūttāryaṃ vamitavyam ity arthaḥ 
kṣipraṃ vā śodhanaiḥ prāyaścittaiḥ sodhyam 
anye tu śodhanāni harītakyādīni recanāny āhuḥ gautamīyaṃ cedam udāharanti abhojyabhojane niṣpurīṣībhāvaḥ iti 
tad etad asādhakam 
upavāsenāpi niṣpurīṣatvopapatteḥ 
tasmād avāntau yathāśrutaprāyaścittam eva veditavyam 
eṣo 'nādyādanasyokto vratānāṃ vividho vidhiḥ 
steyadoṣāpahartṝṇāṃ vratānāṃ śrūyatāṃ vidhiḥ 
vratānām anādyādanasya abhakṣyabhakṣaṇasya 
steyaṃ taddoṣasamastam apaharanti yāni vratāni teṣām idānīṃ vidhir ucyate 
dhānyānnadhanacauryāṇi kṛtvā kāmād dvijottamaḥ 
svajātīyagṛhād eva kṛcchrābdena viśudhyati 
dvijottamagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārthaṃ kṣatriyādīnām api 
dvijottamaśabdasaṃnipātāc ca svajātīyagṛhād iti brāhmaṇagṛhād vijñāyate 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
sarva eva varṇā brāhmaṇagṛhāt dhanaṃ hṛtvā kṛcchrābdena śudhyeyuḥ 
dhanagrahaṇāt sarvasmin dhane siddhe dhānyānnagrahaṇaṃ saddhānyārtham 
alpasārāṇām anyaṃ vidhiṃ vakṣyati 
ataḥ sārabhūtapradhānadravyāpaharaṇa idaṃ vijñāyate 
teṣāṃ hi parasparadravyāpaharaṇe brāhmaṇasya tadīyadhanāpahāre katarat prāyaścittam 
ucyate 
hiṃsāprāyaścittavat turyāṣṭamādibhāgakalpanā kartavyā 
kṣatriyasya dhane trīn vaiśyasya sārdham śūdrasya dvāviṃśatirātraṃ vā 
kiyatparimāṇe dhānye 'pahṛte 
daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyaḥ kiṃcidūne mahattvāt prāyaścittasya 
dhanam āpy evaṃ kālaṃ na kalpaneti vijñeyam 
kāmād iti ślokapūraṇam 
na hy akāmasya paradhanaharaṇasaṃbhavaḥ 
dhānyaṃ vrīhyādi tad evāpahṛtam 
annaṃ siddham 
dhānyādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ haraṇe tryabdaṃ kṛcchram 
kecic ca samudāyaharaṇe prāyaścittam icchanti garīyo hy etat 
manuṣyāṇāṃ tu haraṇe strīṇāṃ kṣetragṛhasya ca 
kūpavāpījalānāṃ ca śuddhiś cāndrāyaṇaṃ smṛtam 
manuṣyāṇāṃ dāsānām 
strīṇāṃ dāsīnām 
kṣetraṃ bhūbhāgo vrīhyādidhānyotpattisthānam 
kūpavāpyor jalaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate 
uddhṛtodakasyeraṇādisthasyāpaharaṇe etad bhavati 
jalagrahaṇāc chuṣkayoḥ kūpavāpyor vidhyantaram 
vāpī khāte taḍāge ca 
dravyāṇām alpasārāṇāṃ steyaṃ kṛtvānyaveśmani 
caret sāntapanaṃ kṛcchraṃ tan niryātyātmaśuddhaye 
alpasārāṇi na ciram avatiṣṭhante svalpamūlyāni ca mṛnmayāni sthālīpiṭharādīni dārumayāni droṇāḍhakādīni ayomayāni lepanīkuddālakādīni 
veśmanīti gṛhasthitāpahāre bhūyān doṣaḥ 
na tathā khalakṣetrādigate 
niryātya datvā 
sarvaśeṣaś cāyaṃ viśeṣābhāvāt 
yatra tv apahṛtaṃ dātum aśakyaṃ tatra dviguṇaṃ prāyaścittam 
bhakṣyabhojyāpaharaṇe yānaśayyāsanasya ca 
puṣpamūlaphalānāṃ ca pañcagavyaṃ viśodhanam 
yānaṃ gantryādi 
śayyā khaṭvādi 
āsanaṃ bṛsyāsaṃdīpaṭṭādi 
bhakṣyabhojyayoḥ kharaviśadatadvaiparītyena bhedo vijñeyaḥ 
bhakṣyaṃ modakaśaṣkulyādi 
bhojyaṃ yāvakādi 
pañcagavyaṃ prasiddham 
atrāpy ekāham eva 
tṛṇakāṣṭhadrumāṇāṃ ca śuṣkānnasya guḍasya ca 
celacarmāmiṣāṇāṃ ca trirātraṃ syād abhojanam 
tṛṇādīnāṃ pūrvasmāt yānāder adhikaharaṇe prāyaścittam etat 
kāṣṭham aghaṭitaṃ vaṃśastambhādi drumasāhacaryāt 
veśmataḥvṛkṣaḥ 
śuṣkānnaṃ taṇḍulādi bhraṣṭayavā vā 
guḍagrahaṇaṃ svavikarārtham 
tena khaṇḍamatsyaṇḍikāder grahaṇam 
cailaṃ vastraṃ bahūnām uttamānāṃ ca vāsasām 
prāguktena dhanagrahaṇena kṛcchrādeḥ 
carma kavacam 
māṃsam āmiṣam 
maṇimuktāpravālānāṃ tāmrasya rajatasya ca 
ayaḥkāṃsyopalānāṃ ca dvādaśāhaṃ kaṇānnatā 
svalpabahutvāpekṣayā ca kālahrāsaḥ sakṛdāvṛttau ca 
kārpāsakīṭajorṇānāṃ dviśaphaikakhurasya ca 
pakṣigandhauṣadhīnāṃ ca rajjvyāś caiva tryahaṃ payaḥ 
kīṭajāḥ paṭṭāḥ 
dviśaphā gavādayaḥ 
ekakhurā aśvādayaḥ 
pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśyenādayaḥ 
rajjuḥ kūpāder udakodaṃcanī 
etair vratair apoheta pāpaṃ steyakṛtaṃ dvijaḥ 
agamyāgamanīyaṃ tu vratair ebhir apānudet 
uktārthaḥ ślokaḥ 
gurutalpavrataṃ kuryād retaḥ siktvā svayoniṣu 
sakhyuḥ putrasya ca strīṣu kumārīṣv antyajāsu ca 
gurutalpavratam ity aviśeṣavacane 'pi na tena svapyāt ityevamādy atidiśyate api tu prājāpatyaṃ cared abdam iti mahāpātakatvāt 
na hi mahāpātakebhyo 'nyatra maraṇāntaṃ prāyaścittam asti 
abhyāse tu syād iti 
svayonayo bhaginyaḥ sodarāḥ 
sakhyuḥ strīṣu suhṛdbhāryāsu 
suhṛttvam evātra kāraṇam na yaunādiviśeṣaḥ nāpi śrotriyatvādiguṇaḥ 
evaṃ putrasya strīṣu snuṣāsu 
asamānajātīyāsv api kumārīṣu pitrādibhir adattāsu 
svayaṃ saṃprītyānupanatāsv etad eva balād gamane 
atrāpi na saty apekṣā 
yady apy atideśe viśeṣo nāsti tathāpi prāyaścittadvayaṃ syād iti dṛṣṭatvāt 
tathā ca gurulaghubhāvād dhīnajātīyāsu kṛcchrābdāc cāndrāyaṇaṃ māsatrayaṃ laghīya ādeśyam 
antyajāś cāṇḍālamlecchādistriyaḥ 
caṇḍālādistrīṣu ca smṛtyantare jñānājñānakṛto viśeṣa uktaḥ antyāvasāyāgamane kṛcchrārdham anyāsu dvādaśarātram 
paitṛṣvaseyīṃ bhaginīṃ svasrīyāṃ matur eva ca 
matuś ca bhrātur āptasya gatvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret 
pitṛṣvasur duhitā paitṛṣvasreyī bhaginī 
mātṛṣvasrīyā mātṛṣvasur duhitā 
mātuś ca bhrātur mātuladuhitā 
āptasya sodaryasyety arthaḥ 
etās tisras tu bhāryārthe nopayaccheta buddhimān 
jñātitvenānupeyās tāḥ patati hy upayann adhaḥ 
nanu ca asapiṇḍā ca ity anenaivaitāsām avivāhyatve siddhe kimartham idaṃ nopayaccheta iti 
kecid āhuḥ 
anyāsāṃ pakṣe 'bhyanujñānārthaṃ sapiṇdaśloke pratiṣiddhānām 
tad ayuktam patati hy upayann adhaḥ iti prāyaścittāviseṣāt 
etasmiṃś ca prayojane saṃbhavati sapiṇḍaślokasya pākṣiko bādho 'yukto 'gatyā hi vikalpa āśrīyate 
jñātitvena bandhutvenety arthaḥ 
anupeyā avivāhyā agamyāś ca 
upayan vivāhayan 
adhaḥ patati narakaṃ prāpnotīti yāvat 
atha vā jātito bhrāsyati hīnajātīyaḥ saṃpadyate 
yady api jāter jīvatpiṇḍānapāyaḥ tathāpi tatkarmānadhikārād evam ucyate 
amānuṣīṣu puruṣa udakyāyām ayoniṣu 
retaḥ siktvā jale caiva kṛcchraṃ sāntapanaṃ caret 
amānuṣyo vaḍavādyāḥ 
gor amānuṣītve 'pi sakhīsayonisagotrāśiṣyabhāryāsu snuṣāyāṃ gavi ca talpasamaḥ 
avakaraḥ iti viśeṣavihitam eva 
anayor gurutalpāvakīrṇaprāyaścittayor abuddhipūrvabuddhipūrvabhedena vyavasthā 
talpaśabdena prasiddhasambandhād atra śāstre gurutalpam evocyate 
avakaro 'vakīrṇīnimittaṃ 
nimitte cātidiṣṭe tatkāryātideśaḥ 
sakhī cātra yā puruṣavan maitrīm āgatā na tu yā sakhyuḥ strī 
na hy atra puṃyogāt pravṛttiḥ 
na ca bhāryāsaṃbandhena saṃbandho 'sti sayonipadena vyavadhānāt 
tathā ca vasiṣṭho gurvī sakhī na ca pātrāṅgatvāt kṛcchrābdapātraṃ na ca pātrakumārī anayos tūpasthād anyatra 
udakyāyāṃ ca māsikena rajasābhiplutodakyā 
pāṭhāntaram pītvādharaṃ puruṣaḥ iti udakyāyām ayoniṣu 
eka evārthaḥ ayoniḥ strīliṅgād anyatra sthāne 
tathānye jale khe ca iti paṭhanti 
nanu ca ayonigrahaṇād eva siddhaṃ khe iti na paṭhitavyam 
ākāśaḥ khaśabdenocyate 
yoner anyaś ca saḥ 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
yoniśabdena sāhacaryāt anyad aṅgam evocyata iti manyante 
jale sākṣāt 
maithunaṃ tu samāsevya puṃsi yoṣiti vā dvijaḥ 
goyāne 'psu divā caiva savāsāḥ snānam ācaret 
maithuneṣu samanantaraṃ savāsasaḥ snānam 
goyāne gantryādāv apsu cāpi 
caṇḍālāntyastriyo gatvā bhuktvā ca pratigṛhya ca 
pataty ajñānato vipro jñānāt sāmyaṃ tu gacchati 
caṇḍālā mlecchā digantavāsinaḥ 
tatstrīgamane prāyaścittaṃ tadannabhojane pratigrahe ca 
patatīti vacanāt kṛcchrābdād adhikaṃ prāyaścittam na punaḥ pātityam eva bhojane 
abhojyānāṃ tu bhuktvānnam iti prāpte vacanam idaṃ kṛcchrābdaprāyaścittārtham 
evaṃ pratigrahe 'pi māsaṃ goṣṭhe payaḥ iti prāpte tadartham eva 
jñānāt sāmyam iti 
kāmakārakṛte 'pi prāyaścittavidhānārthe 'rthavādo 'yam 
yat smṛtyantare 'bdaśabdena jñātājñātayoḥ prāyaścittam uktaṃ tac ca darśitam 
ataḥ kuto 'dhikaprāyaścittārthatā 
bhuktvā ceti kena saṃbadhyate 
cāṇḍālāntyety anena 
nanu ca guṇībhūtam etat 
guṇībhūtasyāpy apekṣāyāṃ saṃbandho darśitaḥ 
bhuktvā kasyety ākāṃkṣāyāṃ anyasyāśrutatvāt sāmyavacanāc ca cāṇḍālāntyānām eva saṃbandhaḥ 
ato 'yam artho bhavati 
cāṇḍālastrīmlecchānām annam aśitvā tebhyaḥ pratigṛhya ca striyaṃ gatvā sakṛdgamanāt prāyaścittam 
abhyāse tu sāmyam eva yuktam anadhikāraprāyaścittena 
yataḥ pratinimittaṃ naimittikena bhavitavyaṃ na ca tāny ekena janmanā śakyante 'nuṣṭhātum 
vipraduṣṭāṃ striyaṃ bharttā nirundhyād ekaveśmani 
yat puṃsaḥ paradāreṣu tac caināṃ cārayed vratam 
viśeṣeṇa praduṣṭāṃ nirundhyāt patnīkāryebhyo nirvartayet arthasya saṃgrahe cainām ityādibhyaḥ 
ekaveśmanīti nigaḍabandhe kartavyā 
na svairaṃ bhartṛgṛhe vihartuṃ labheta 
tatra niruddhāṃ prāyaścittaṃ kārayet 
kiṃ punaḥ 
yat puṃsaḥ paradāreṣu prāyaścittam upapātakaṃ brāhmaṇasya tatsamānahīnajātīyāsu pāradāryam iti 
varṇāntarāṇāṃ tad eva 
uttamāgamane tu dviguṇaṃ vaiśyasya triguṇaṃ brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyasya 
tathāyaṃ viśeṣo dve paradāre trīṇi śrotriyasyeti 
śūdrasya brāhmaṇīgamane mahāpātakaprāyaścittam 
vaiśyasya kṣatriyāgamana upapātakaṃ dviguṇaṃ triguṇam 
kecit tūttamāgamane śūdrasya brāhmaṇīvad icchanti 
prātilomye vadhaḥ puṃsām iti liṅgadarśanāt etad uktam
