daṇḍeṣv api viśeṣo darśitaḥ 
yathaivottamāgamane puṃsāṃ vyavasthā tathaiva strīṇāṃ hīnajātīyapuruṣasaṃparke ceti 
doṣe 'pi strīṇām ardhaṃ prāyaścittam 
prāyaścittārdham arhanti striyo rogiṇa eva ca 
bālaś cā ṣoḍaśād varṣād aśītiparataḥ pumān 
tathā dṛṣṭavyabhicārāyāṃ gamane laghīyaḥ 
svairiṇyāṃ vṛṣalyām avakīrṇaḥ sacailasnānād udakumbhaṃ dadyād brāhmaṇāya 
vaiśyāyāṃ caturthakālāhāro brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayet 
kṣatriyāyāṃ trirātropoṣaṇaṃ yavāḍhakaṃ dadyāt 
vaiśyavad ity api smaryate 
tadvac chūdram āryāyāṃ draṣṭavyam 
ṛtau vā gacchato garbham ādadhato vā 
brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ striyaḥ śūdreṇa saṃgatāḥ 
aprajātā viśudhyeyuḥ prāyaścitteta netarā 
atha vā yā etā na kenacid ūhyante vaiśyena caranti tadgamane 'sti prāyaścittaṃ neti saṃdehaḥ 
kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ 
dāraśabdasya saṃskāraśabdatvāt 
asati vivāhe na tā asya dārā iti vyapadeśam arhanti 
pāradārye ca prāyaścittam 
ato nāstīty avagacchāmaḥ 
yatas tu svadāranirataḥ iti niyamo vihito 'to bhavatīti manyāmahe 
kiṃ punar atra yuktam 
astīti 
kutaḥ 
niyamasya vihitatvāt 
akurvan vihitam ityādi tadatikrame prāyaścittasmaraṇāt 
mā bhūn nāmopapātakam 
na tāvatā prāyaścittābhāvaḥ prāyaścittārtham upapātakajātibhraṃśakarādi parigaṇitam 
sāmānyaṃ tu nimittaṃ sarvatrākurvan vihitam ityādi 
uktaṃ ca prāk svairiṇītyādi 
nanu mṛtabhartṛpakṣeṇa pitṛpakṣeṇa vā saṃbaddhaiva paradāravyapadeśyā 
adhikām avihāritvāt svairiṇyaḥ 
satyam 
veśyāsv api svātantryāvalaṃbanaḥ svairiśabdo na virudhyate 
ataś ca tāsāṃ sacailasnānodakumbhādidānam 
tatra kecid āhuḥ 
vratam etat 
tasya vratam ity upakramya vratānīmāni dhārayet iti ca yāni vihitāni tāni snātakavratāni na sarvapuruṣadharmaḥ 
sā cet punaḥ praduṣyet tu sadṛśenopayantritā 
kṛcchraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caiva tad asyāḥ pāvanaṃ smṛtam 
prārthitā samānajātīyena punaḥ saṃsarge cāndrāyaṇam upapātakatvāt siddham 
goghnanivṛttyarthaṃ punaś cāndrāyaṇavidhānaṃ sākalyavidhānārtham 
yāvac caivam uktam 
mātā mātṛśvasā śvaśrūr mātulānī pitṛṣvasā 
pitṛvyasakhiśiṣyastrī bhaginī tatsakhī snuṣā 
duhitācāryabhāryā ca sagotrā śaraṇāgatā 
rājñī pravrajitā sadhvī dhātrī varṇottamā ca yā 
atra saty apy atideśe na tulyaprayaścittatā daṇḍaviśeṣadarśanāt 
tatra mātary uktam eva 
mātṛṣvasṛprabhṛtīnāṃ duhitrantānāṃ kṛcchrābdaḥ 
avaśiṣṭānāṃ cāndrāyaṇābhyāsaḥ 
tatra yā uktās tāḥ sagotrā ucyante yajjātīyās tena vyapadiśyante uta yasmai dattās tadgotrā iti 
ubhayenety āha ubhayathāliṅgadarśanāt 
gotraṃ vaṃśaḥ pitrādir abhijanaḥ tatsaṃbandhāc ca pitṛṣvasṛgrahaṇam anarthakam asagotrā hi sā 
atha yenaikatāṃ gatās tadbhāvam anubhavanti tadā bhartṛgotravyapadeśārhāḥ tasmin pakṣe pitṛvyastrīgrahaṇam anarthakam bhavati hi sā sagotrā 
nanv iyaṃ kasyeti liṅkābhāvād ubhyor api yuktā 
sarveṣāṃ tu darśanaṃ bhartṛgotrāḥ sagotrāḥ 
yat tu kaiścid ucyate śrāddhavidhau kurvan tu paitrikaṃ gotram iti tat tatraivāsti 
atha vāpy asti vacanāt tathā kriyate 
yat karoty ekarātreṇa vṛṣalīsevanād dvijaḥ 
tad bhaikṣabhug japan nityaṃ tribhir varṣair vyapohati 
vṛṣaly atra caṇḍāly abhipretā mahatvāt dvirabhyāse ced buddhipūrve draṣṭavyam 
anyathā kṛcchraśabda evaṃ vā 
ekarātragrahaṇāt sarvāṃ rātriṃ śayanasya tayā saha gacchataś caitad vijñeyam 
sevanaṃ saṃbhogaḥ 
vṛṣalīśabdo nindayā prayukto na jātiśabde 
yat karoti yat pāpaṃ janayati tat tribhir varṣair vyapohati vināsayati 
bhaikṣāhāro japann iti aviśeṣacodanāyāṃ bhāvī āsu paraṃ ca nāstīty āhuḥ 
anye tu yathāśraddham anyāni mantrabrāhmaṇavācyāni na tu laukikaṃ vākyam 
aviśeṣeṇa mantrajapasya śuddhyarthaṃ vihitatvād ṛksaṃhitām ityādi 
yat tu tribhir māsaiḥ sevitvā vṛṣalīṃ śūdrām evācakṣate
tad apy ayuktam śūdrāvivāhasyāvihitatvāt 
svairiṇyāś ca laghuprāyaścittasyopadeśād anyasyāś copapātakatvād gurutaram idam ayuktam 
eṣāṃ pāpakṛtām uktā caturṇām api niṣkṛtiḥ 
patitaiḥ saṃprayuktānām imāḥ śṛṇuta niṣkṛtīḥ 
ṛjvarthaḥ ślokaḥ 
saṃvatsareṇa patati patitena sahācaran 
yājanādhyāpanād yaunān na tu yānāsanāśanāt 
dvijātikarmabhyo hāni patatyarthaḥ 
patati bhraśyati hīyate 'dhikārāt 
patitāś catvāro brāhmaṇādayaḥ 
taiḥ sahācaran saṃvatsareṇa patito bhavati tattulyo bhavatīty arthaḥ 
kim ācaran 
yānāsanāśanāt saṃlāpagātrasparśādinā saha gamanam 
yānam āsanaṃ tādṛśam eva 
ekasyāṃ śayyāyām ekasminn āsane ekasmin āsane ekapātre bhojanam 
yājanādhyāpanād yaunān na tv ativicchedaḥ 
kiṃ yājanādibhir naiva pātityam athārvāk saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ vety etad vaktavyam 
smṛtyantaradarśanādibhiḥ sadyaḥ 
yājanādhyāpanam iti dvitīyāntaḥ pāṭho yuktaḥ ācarann iti śatrā hetvarthasya gamitatvāt 
yo yena patitenaiṣāṃ saṃsargaṃ yāti mānavaḥ 
sa tasyaiva vrataṃ kuryāt tatsaṃsargavisuddhaye 
yasya patitasya yad vihitaṃ tat prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt tatsaṃsargasya śuddhaye 
eṣām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī 
eṣāṃ patitānāṃ yena patitena yaḥ saṃsargaṃ yāti pūrvoktasaṃsargaṃ gacchati sa tasyaiva patitasya yad vihitaṃ prāyaścittaṃ tat kuryāt 
tatsaṃsargād yo doṣa utpannas tadviśuddhaye tadvināśāya 
anuvādo 'yaṃ ślokapūraṇaḥ 
atha yad idam ucyate patitātyāgyapatitātyāgītyādininditakarmābhyāsena patanam tatra yad etat patitatvavacanaṃ tat kim upadiśyata āhosvid atidiśyate 
yadi tāvad upadiśyate pañca pātakānīti prasiddher mūlaṃ vācyam 
atha pañcānugamaupadeśikam anyeṣām ātideśikair vyavahāre bhede na kaścid arthaḥ 
tāny eva prāyaścittāni ta eva dharmā yasmā upadiśyante atideśena vyavahāreṇa ko 'rthaḥ 
atrocyate 
na vyavahārāḥ prayojana eva bhidyante 
api tv anyato 'pi nimittāt iha cāsti pramāṇato bhedaḥ 
yatra patitatvam abhidhāya dvijātikarmabhyo hāniḥ patitasyodakaṃ kāryam ityādy abhidhīyate sakṛt svadharmābhidhānād upadeśaḥ 
yatra tu tatsaṃbandhavacanān nāmnā liṅgasaṃyogād vā taddharmaprāptiḥ so 'tideśaḥ 
sūryāgnipadayor na hi saurye kaścid dharmaḥ śruto yenātideśe saty ayaṃ viśeṣo labhya iti niścīyate 
tad asat 
yataḥ sūryādiśabdasyaiva prabhutā akṛtatvād vedasya 
ayaṃ pauruṣeyo granthaḥ 
puruṣaś cāsati bhede kimiti vyavahāraṃ navaṃ pravartayati 
yā tu pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ bādhakābhāvāt siddhiḥ sātra kadācid upalabhyate 
yo 'py abhyāsaḥ so 'pi dvirāvṛttis tatra tataḥ pravṛttiḥ āvṛttiśateṣv abhyāsarūpatayaika eveti 
loke tāvad āvṛttimātram abhyāsaḥ 
tatra yo 'pi dvir apavādaḥ yo 'pi śatakṛtvaḥ tau dvāv api prāyaścitte samau syātām 
ninditaṃ ca karma pratiṣiddham 
tatra yo 'pi dvir divā supyād yo 'pi gā asakṛd dhanyāt tatra ninditakarmābhyāse 'viśeṣeṇa patanaprāptiḥ 
tasmād vicintyam etat 
kim atra cintyate 
pañcānāṃ tāvat pātakitvaṃ sarvasmṛtikārair ucyate anyeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit tatsamatvam 
tad ubhayam api bādhituṃ tatra viśeṣo nāstīti saṃkalpayiṣyate śaktiṃ cāvekṣya pāpaṃ ca iti 
na hi tasya tatsadṛśasyeti vā ekatvaṃ yuktam gārgavasyeva 
atha keṣāṃcid dharmāṇāṃ bhedaḥ keṣāṃcid ekatve sādṛśyaṃ bhavati 
tasmāt tatsamānāṃ patitvaṃ bhavati 
ataḥ kiṃcidūnaṃ tatsamānāṃ patitaprāyaścittam 
adhikārāpagame kecid viśeṣam āhuḥ 
śrauteṣv adhikāro nivartate sākṣāt na smārteṣu 
yad apy uktam dvir āvṛttau śatakṛtvaś cābhedo na syāt iti tatrāpy abhyāsānāṃ bhedaḥ 
kathaṃ tulyapratyavāyatā 
yad api divāsvapnagovadhayor ninditatvāviśeṣāt tadabhyāse tulyaṃ patitatvam iti katham aviśeṣo nindāyāḥ yatrārthavādeṣu pratyavāyaviśeṣaḥ śrūyate prāyaścittabahutvaṃ bāhulye 'pi pratiṣedhe 
tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
ninditakarmābhyāse patanam iti na pratiṣiddhamātre tathā ca pūrṇe cānasi iti 
saty api ninditakarmābhyāse naiva pātityam asti 
patitasyodakaṃ kāryaṃ sapiṇḍair bāndhavair bahiḥ 
nindite 'hani sāyāhne jñatyṛtviggurusaṃnidhau 
jīvata eva patitasya prāyaścittam anicchato ghaṭodakadānaṃ mṛtasyeva kartavyam ucyate 
sapiṇḍāḥ saptamapuruṣāvadhayaḥ ekavaṃśyāḥ 
tato 'nye bāndhavāḥ sagotrāś ca 
nindite 'hani caturdaśyādau 
sāyāhne 'stam ite ravau 
jñātyṛtvik 
jñātyādayaḥ kartṝṇāṃ tathā patitasya 
dāsī ghaṭam apāṃ pūrṇaṃ paryasyet pretavat padā 
ahorātram upāsīrann aśaucaṃ bāndhavaiḥ saha 
pretavad iti 
kartavyatopadeśo 'yam 
dāsī preṣyodakumbham padā pādena paryasyet kṣipet idam amuṣmai iti 
kṣipte tasminn ahorātram āśaucaṃ yuktam 
bāndhavaiḥ saha tathāsīrann ekatra sthāne nivaseyus tad ahaḥ 
dāsīgrahaṇāt svayaṃkaraṇaṃ niṣedhati 
yady evaṃ jñātyṛtviggurusaṃnidhau ity asvayaṃkaraṇapakṣe jñātīnāṃ sapiṇḍānāṃ ca ko viśeṣo yenocyata eteṣāṃ saṃnidhāna etena kartavyam iti 
yāvatā sarva eva saṃnidhānamātreṇopakurvanti tasyāsaṃnipātyopakāratvāt 
naitad evam 
sapiṇḍādayaḥ prayojakatvena kartāraḥ 
jñātyādayas tu saṃnidhāpyante kevalam adṛṣṭāyeti 
nivarteraṃś ca tasmāt tu saṃbhāṣaṇasahāsane 
dāyādyasya pradānaṃ ca yātrā caiva hi laukikī 
kṛtodake yathā vartitavyaṃ tathedānīm ucyate 
saṃbhāṣaṇam itaretaram uktipratyuktirūpo vyavahāraḥ 
dāyādyaṃ dhanaṃ tad api tasmai na dātavyam 
laukikī yātrā saṃgatayoḥ kuśalapraśnādikā vivāhādau naimitte gṛhānayanaṃ bhojanaṃ cety evamādi 
nanu ca saṃbhāṣaṇapratiṣedhād evaiṣu nivṛttiḥ siddhaiva 
abhyutthānāsanatyāgasyāpi nivṛttirūpasya saṃbhavāt 
saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ tu śabdātmakam eva 
jyeṣṭhatā ca nivarteta jyeṣṭhāvāpyaṃ ca yad vasu 
jyeṣṭhāṃśaṃ prāpnuyāc cāsya yavīyān guṇato 'dhikaḥ 
jyeṣṭhāvāpyaṃ ca yad vasu 
atrāpi codyate 
dāyādyadānaniṣedhāj jyeṣṭaprāpyavasuno dhanasya siddha eva niṣedhaḥ 
kecid āhur guṇato 'dhikasya yavīyasas tadaṃśaprāptyartham anūdyate 
anye tu manyante 
dāyādyaśabdena dhanamātram ucyate nānvayāgatam eva 
tathā cābhidhānakośe dāyādyaṃ dhanam iṣyate iti smaryate 
ato yat tasmāt kenacid ṛṇatvena gṛhītaṃ tenāpi tan na dātavyam 
kiṃ tarhi kartavyam 
putrabhrātrādirikthahāriṇām arpaṇīyam 
anye tu manyante 
avibhaktadhanānāṃ dāyādyadhananiṣedhaḥ kṛte tu vibhāga uddhārasyaiva jyeṣṭhāṃśasyaivocchedaḥ 
satsv api putreṣūddhāraṃ varjayitvānyasya putrā eveśate 
prāyaścitte tu carite pūrṇakumbham apāṃ navam 
tenaiva sārdhaṃ prāsyeyuḥ snātvā puṇye jalāśaye 
kṛtaprāyaścittasyedanīm udakakriyocyate 
tenaiva sārdhaṃ snātvā jalāśaye puṇye sravantyāṃ mahāhrade vā prabhāsamānasādau vā tīrthaviśeṣe kṛtasnāno 'pāṃ kumbhaṃ navaṃ svayaṃ prāsyeyuḥ 
navakumbhagrahaṇād dāsīgrahaṇāc cātra pūrvatropayuktasya kriyāsu kumbhasya grahaṇam 
udakena pūrayitvā haraṇam uktam 
punar asau ghaṭaḥ prakṣeptavya ity āha 
sa tv apsu taṃ ghaṭaṃ prāsya praviśya bhavanaṃ svakam 
sarvāṇi jñātikāryāṇi yathāpūrvaṃ samācaret 
yāsv apsu snātās tāsv eva ghaṭaḥ prakṣeptavyaḥ 
tatas taṃ puraskṛtya tadīyaṃ bhavanaṃ praviśeyuḥ 
tato yathāpūrvaṃ saṃbhojanādīni jñātikāryāṇi pravartayeyuḥ 
anye tu sa kṛte prāyaścitte iti saṃbadhnanti 
ghaṭaprāsanaṃ tenaiva kartavyam 
eṣā cāsya patitodakakriyā nānyasya tyājyasya tyajec cet pitaraṃ rājaghātakaṃ ca śūdrayājakam ityādeḥ 
etam eva vidhiṃ kuryād yoṣitsu patitāsv api 
vastrānnapānaṃ deyaṃ tu vaseyuś ca gṛhāntike 
yoṣitsu strīṣv api patitāsv eṣa eva vidhiḥ 
patitāsv akṛtaprāyaścittāsu ca 
tābhyas tu kṛtodakābhyo 'pi vastrānnaṃ dātavyam 
dānagrahaṇāt vastrānne śarīrasthitimātrasaṃpādinī dātavye na bhogādayaḥ 
pānam aucityād udakam 
tac ca prācuryād adattam api labhyate 
vacanaṃ tu parānurodhāt prītyā tad api svātantryeṇa tāsāṃ na deyam 
yādṛśaṃ ca pānaṃ tādṛśe eva vastrānne 'to nikṛṣṭaṃ vastraṃ cānnaṃ dātavyam 
tathoktam 
hṛtādhikārāṃ malināṃ piṇḍamātropajīvinīm 
paribhūtām adhaḥśayyāṃ vāsayed vyabhicāriṇīm 
pātityahetavaś ca strīṇāṃ ya eva manuṣyasya 
yat tu bhrūṇahani hīnavarṇasevāyām na ca strīṇām adhikaṃ bhrūṇahani iti tat tulyatārthaṃ na tu parisaṃkhyārtham 
tathā ca yājñavalkyaḥ 
nīcābhigamanaṃ garbhapātanaṃ bhartṛhiṃsanam 
viśeṣapatanīyāni strīṇām etāny api dhruvam 
vaseyuḥ svagṛhāntike pradhānagṛhān niṣkāsya kuṭīgṛhe vāsayitavyety antikagrahaṇam 
kecid āhuḥ prāyaścittaṃ tu kurvatīnām etad deyaṃ na tv anyathā 
tad ayuktam vastrānnadānavyavahārasya tatra yogatvāt 
prāyaścitte bhikṣāhāratā payovrataṃ cāndrāyaṇavidhiś cetyādi 
na ca bhaikṣāhāratā cānena vivartayituṃ śakyā vṛttividhānena caritārthatvāt 
tasmād yasyāḥ prāyaścitteṣv anadhikāraḥ aśaktatayātipuṣṭatayā vā tasyā api vastrādidānaṃ kartavyam iti ślokarthaḥ 
enasvibhir anirṇiktair nārthaṃ kiṃcit sahācaret 
kṛtanirṇejanāṃś caitān na jugupseta karhicit 
enasvinaḥ prakṛtatvāt pātakinaḥ 
tair anirṇiktair aśuddhair akṛtaprāyaścittair nārthaṃ kiṃcid ṛṇadānakrayavikrayayājanādyuktam 
nirṇejanaṃ śodhanaṃ pāpāpanodanam 
tasmin kṛte 
naināṃ jugupseta kṛtaprāyaścittān na kutsayet 
bālaghnāṃś ca kṛtaghnāṃś ca viśuddhān api dharmataḥ 
śaraṇāgatahantṝṃś ca strīhantṝṃś ca na saṃvaset 
śaraṇāgataḥ 
yaḥ śatrubhir abhihanyamāno balavatānyena vopadūyamānaḥ paritrāṇārthaṃ kaṃcid anyam abhidhāvet trāyasva mām iti 
evaṃ kṛtadoṣo vidvān samupadhāvet uddhara māṃ dehi prāyaścittam iti śaraṇāgataḥ 
kṛtaghnaḥ kṛtam upakāraṃ vismṛtya yo 'pakārāya yatate yo vā kṛtopakāraṃ punar vināśayati tasyaivopakṛtasyāpakārya udyacchati 
yady apy eṣā śabdavyutpattis tathāpi lokaprasiddher yatropakartur apakāre vartate sa kṛtaghnaḥ 
atra jātir nāpekṣate bālādisvarūpam eva kāraṇam 
striyo vyabhicāriṇyo 'pi 
yady api tāsāṃ svalpaṃ prāyaścittaṃ tathāpi vācanikaḥ saṃvāsapratiṣedhaḥ 
saṃvāsaḥ saṃgatis tadgṛhanivāsaś ca 
yeṣāṃ dvijānāṃ sāvitrī nānūcyeta yathāvidhi 
tāṃś cārayitvā trīn kṛcchrān yathāvidhy upanāyayet 
ā ṣoḍaśād brāhmaṇasya ityādinopanayanakālaniyamaḥ kṛtaḥ 
tadatikrame prāyaścittam idam 
garbhāṣṭamāt prabhṛti yāvat ṣoḍaśavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇasya sāvitrī nānūcyeta 
sāvitryanuvacanenopanayanākhyasaṃskāro lakṣyate 
asmin kāle yady upanayanaṃ na kriyeta 
evaṃ ā dvāviṃśāt kṣatriyasya ā caturviṃśater viśaḥ 
ata ūrdhvaṃ trīn kṛcchāṃś cārayitavyaḥ 
nirupapadakṛcchraśravaṇe prājāpatyapratyaya iti smṛtitantrasiddhiḥ 
anye tu kṛcchrātikṛcchrān āhuḥ 
kṛcchreṣu kṛteṣūpanetavyā 
yathāvidhīty anuvādaḥ 
prāyaścittaṃ cikīrṣanti vikarmasthās tu ye dvijāḥ 
brahmaṇā ca parityaktās teṣām apy etad ādiśet 
vikarmasthā yathā brāhmaṇāḥ śūdrasevādyabhiratāḥ 
yasya yat karma jīvikāhetus tayā tat tasya vihitaṃ karma 
yasya yan na vihitaṃ tasya tad vikarma 
dvijātīyasya vihitaṃ vijātīyasya vikarma 
brahmaṇā parityaktā upanītā apy asvīkṛtavedā adhītya vā vedam upavismareyus teṣām apy etat kṛcchratrayam 
prāyaścittaṃ cikīrṣantīty anuvāda evāyam 
icchann eva yataḥ pravartate 
yad garhitenārjayanti karmaṇā brāhmaṇā dhanam 
tasyotsargeṇa śudhyanti japyena tapasaiva ca 
garhitenety aviśeṣe 'py asatpratigrahaṇeti draṣṭavyam uttaratra viśeṣavidhes taṃ praty evopadiśyamānatvāt mucyate 'satpratigrahāt iti 
utsargaḥ tyāgo mamatānivṛttir dānena vā 
anapekṣya dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ rājarathyādiṣu tyāgena deyam mama yo gṛhṇāti sa gṛhṇātu ityādy abhidhāya kṣipet śvabhre garte nadyādiṣu vā 
japatapasī vakṣaty upadiṣṭaśloke 
anye tu brāhmaṇaśabdasthāne varṇaśabdaṃ paṭhitvaivaṃ vyācakṣate 
yasya varṇasya dvijāteḥ śūdrasya vā dhanārjanopāyatayā yat pratiṣiddhaṃ tat tasya garhitam 
yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vṛddhiṃ naiva prayojayet ityādi 
tena ye 'rjayanti dhanaṃ karmaṇā tasyotsargajapatapāṃsi trīṇi samuccitāni prāyaścittāni 
brāhmaṇasyāsatpratigraha uttaro viśeṣavidhiḥ 
japitvā trīṇi sāvitryāḥ sahasrāṇi samāhitaḥ 
māsaṃ goṣṭhe payaḥ pītvā mucyate 'satpratigrahāt 
trīṇi sāvitrīsahasrāṇi 
pratyaham iti kecid āhuḥ 
anye tu māsaṃ trīny abhisaṃbadhnanti 
ataś ca pratyaham ekaikaṃ śatam 
goṣṭha iti vāsasthānam 
upavāsakṛśaṃ taṃ tu govrajāt punar āgatam 
praṇataṃ pratipṛccheyuḥ sāmyaṃ saumyecchasīti kim 
kārśyavacanāt svalpaṃ payaḥpānam āha 
praṇataṃ jānubhyāṃ sthitaṃ bhuvi 
te vidvāṃso brāhmaṇāḥ pṛccheyus taṃ he saumyecchasi sāmyam iti 
atha punar api śāstram avagaṇayya na pravartitavyam asatpratigrahalobhena iti 
satyam uktvā tu vipreṣu vikired yavasaṃ gavām 
gobhiḥ pravartite tīrthe kuryus tasya parigraham 
pṛṣṭena vā tena vaktavyam satyam iti 
yena mārgeṇa gāvo vicaranti nadīprasravaṇādijalaṃ pātuṃ tasmiṃs tīrthe taranapradese 
te brāhmaṇāḥ parigraham asya kuryus te hi hastāropaṇenātmaikadeśam ānayeyuḥ 
vrātyānāṃ yājanaṃ kṛtvā pareṣām antyakarma ca 
abhicāram ahīnaṃ ca tribhiḥ kṛcchrair vyapohati 
vrātyāḥ sāvitrīpatitāḥ 
teṣāṃ vrātyānāṃ vrātyastomaḥ kratur vihitaḥ 
tena ye yājayanti ārtvijyenopadeṣṭṛtvena ca 
pareṣāṃ mātāpitṛguruvarjam antyakarma śmaśānādi 
abhicāraṃ śeyanacidādi 
ahīnaṃ ca dvirātrādikam 
kṛcchrair viśudhyati 
anye tv āhuḥ 
nāyam abhicārāhīnayor yajamānasya vidhiḥ 
kasya tarhi ṛtvijām 
tathā ca vrātyānāṃ yājanam itīdṛśa evādhikāraḥ 
yajamānasya tu vidhilakṣaṇāpravṛttis tasyāḥ pratiṣedhābhāve kutaḥ prāyaścittam 
bhavatv ahīne śāstrataḥ pravṛttiḥ 
śyenādau tu katham 
na hi śatrūn mārayed iti nodanāsti 
kiṃ tarhi yaḥ śatror māraṇaṃ kāmayate tena tatsiddhyarthaṃ śyenādi kartavyam 
śatrumāraṇe ca hiṃsālakṣaṇāpravṛttiḥ 
sā ca niṣiddhā na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti 
ahīneṣv api lipsāta eva pravṛttiḥ 
phalakāmasya hi tatrādhikāro bhavati 
na tu phalakāmanā tatra niṣiddhā nāpi kāmyamānārthaniṣpādako vyāpāraḥ 
iha tūbhayaṃ niṣiddham na hiṃsyāt iti maraṇaphalavyāpāreṇa na pravartitavyam 
tatphalaṃ ca śyenāder eva 
iha tu nāsti niṣedhaḥ svargādiphalakarma na kartavyam iti 
kecid āhuḥ 
vākśastraṃ vai brāḥmaṇasya ity abhicāriṇīyābhicāro 'py anujñāyāmnāta eva 
tulyāv ahīnābhicārau 
tatra ṛtvijām eva prāyaścittaṃ yuktam 
nanu ca kāmyāny api niṣiddhāni kāmātmatā na praśastā iti 
yas tasya viṣayaḥ sa tatraiva vyākhyātaḥ 
śrutiś cāhīnatayā yājanaṃ kāryam iti 
abhicaraṇīyābhicāre ca yajamānasyāyuktam 
katham 
āmnātaṃ yaj jyotiṣo 'bhicāryante 
tadvat prāyaścittāny uktāny eva asya abhicarartvigviṣaye 'bhicaraṇīyābhicare saviṣayatvāt 
vaidikena japahomādinā śatror māraṇam abhicāraḥ 
śaraṇāgataṃ parityajya vedaṃ viplāvya ca dvijaḥ 
saṃvatsaraṃ yavāhāras tatpāpam apasedhati 
dvividhaḥ śaraṇāgataḥ prāguktaḥ 
tasya parityāgaḥ pratyākhyānam satyāṃ śaktau prāk caitadvicaritam 
vedaṃ viplāvya nadhyāyādhyayanaṃ kṛtvā 
adhikāreṇādhīyanasyānuyogadānam kiṃ paṭhasi nāśitaṃ tvayā iti 
atha vā dhanahetoḥ parīkṣāsthāneṣv aniyuktena paṭhyate 
smṛtiś ca datvā niyogaṃ dhanahetoḥ patitān munir abravīt 
śvasṛgālakharair daṣṭo grāmyaiḥ kravyādbhir eva ca 
narāśvoṣṭravarāhaiś ca prāṇāyāmena śudhyati 
daṣṭo dantair daṃṣṭrābhiḥ 
grāmyaiḥ kravyādbhir mārjāranakulādibhiḥ 
ṣaṣṭhānnakālatā māsaṃ saṃhitājapa eva vā 
homāś ca sālakā nityam apāṅktyānāṃ viśodhanam 
apāṅktyās tṛtīyādhāya uktāḥ  yeṣāṃ pratipadaṃ prāyaścittam anyatrāmnātam 
teṣāṃ māsaṃ saṃhitājapaḥ 
śākalahomaḥ ṣaṣṭhānnakālatā ceti samuccayaḥ 
kāṣṭhaśalākādi devakṛtasya ityādibhir mantrair hūyate sa śākalahomaḥ 
nityagrahaṇaṃ samāpte 'pi saṃhitājape punaḥ punar āvṛttyartham yāvan māsaḥ pūrṇaḥ 
uṣṭrayānaṃ samāruhya kharayānaṃ tu kāmataḥ 
snātvā tu vipro digvāsāḥ prāṇāyāmena śudhyati 
uṣṭrair yuktaṃ yānaṃ gantryādi 
sākṣād uṣṭrādāv ārohaṇam avyavadhānena cādhikataram prāṇāyāmānām āvṛttiḥ 
digvāsā nagnaḥ 
nagnadoṣanirharaṇārthaṃ punaḥ savāsāḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā prāṇāyāmaḥ kartavyaḥ 
vinādbhir apsu vāpy ārttaḥ śārīraṃ saṃniveśya ca 
sacailo bahir āplutya gām ālabhya viśudhyati 
vinādbhir asaṃnihitāsv apsu adṛṣṭagocarasthāsv apsu 
ārto viṣṭhayā stabdhaḥ 
śārīraṃ mūtrapurīṣotsargam saṃniveṣya sacailo yat prāvṛtaṃ vastraṃ tena sahitaḥ 
bahir grāmān nadyādāv āplutya nimajya tato gām ālabhya spṛṣṭvā śudhyati 
vedoditānāṃ nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samatikrame 
snātakavratalope ca prāyaścittam abhojanam 
vedoditānāṃ darsapaurṇamāsādīnāṃ śrautānām smārtānāṃ ca saṃdhyopāsanādīnām 
tāny api vedoditāni tanmūlatvāt smṛtīnām 
snātakavratāni na jīrṇamalavadvāsā ityādīni 
teṣāṃ lopa ekāham upavāsaḥ 
śrautakarmātikrame yā iṣṭaya uktās tā anena samuccīyante 
huṅkāraṃ brāhmaṇasyoktvā tvaṅkaraṃ ca garīyasaḥ 
snātvānaśnann ahaḥ seṣam abhivādya prasādayet 
sakrodhākṣepe huṅkāreṇa huṅkāreṇa kuṅkurute tūṣṇīm āsva huṃ mā evaṃ vādīḥ ity evamādiṣv arthakriyāsu tanniṣedhārthaṃ huṅkārakaraṇam 
brāhmaṇasya jyeṣṭhasya samasya kanīyaso vā śiṣyasya putrasya vā 
tathā garīyasas tvaṅkāram uktvā tvam evam āttha tvayedaṃ kṛtam 
ekavacanāntayuṣmacchabdoccāraṇe prāyaścittam etat 
prathamādivibhaktir na vivakṣitā 
tathā ca samācāro gurau yuṣmāsu ityādibahuvacanaṃ prayoktavyam iti 
snātvānaśnan prātar bhaktatyāgaḥ 
abhivādya upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā 
prasādayet krodhaṃ tyājayitvā sāyam aśnīyāt 
tāḍayitvā tṛṇenāpi kaṇṭhe vābadhya vāsasā 
vivāde vā vinirjitya praṇipatya prasādayet 
tṛṇena pīḍākareṇāpi tāḍayitvā prahṛtya 
vāsasāpi kaṇṭhe mṛdusparśena badhvā 
vivāde laukike kalahe vinirjitya 
praṇipatya namreṇa bhūtvā prasādayitavyaḥ 
vādajalpayos tu nāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
avagūrya tv abdaśataṃ sahasram abhihatya ca 
jighāṃsayā brāhmaṇasya narakaṃ pratipadyate 
avagūraṇapratiṣedho 'yam 
pariśiṣṭo 'rthavādaḥ 
jighāṃsayā hantum icchayā daṇḍādikam udyamya 
saṃvatsaraśataṃ narakeṣv āste 
abhihatya prahāraṃ datvā sahasraṃ saṃvatsarāṇām 
jighāṃsayā na parihāsataḥ 
śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūn saṃgṛhṇāti mahītale 
tāvanty abdasahasrāṇi tatkartā narake vrajet 
brāhmaṇasya rudhiraṃ daṇdādiprahāreṇa bhūmau patitaṃ yāvat pāṃśūn rajo'vayavān saṃgṛhṇāti tāvanti saṃvatsarasahasrāṇi tasya janayitā narake vrajed vaset 
ayam apy arthavādaḥ 
avagūrya caret kṛcchram atikṛcchraṃ nipātane 
kṛcchrātikṛcchrau kurvīta viprasyotpādya śoṇitam 
pūrvasya prāyaścittam etat 
brāhmaṇarujaḥ kṛtvā iti śoṇitotpādanād anyatraitat 
yadi vā tenedaṃ vikalpyate 
anuktaniṣkṛtīnāṃ tu pāpānām apanuttaye 
śaktiṃ cāvekṣya pāpaṃ ca prāyaścittaṃ prakalpayet 
anuktā niṣkṛtayaḥ prāyaścittāni yeṣāṃ vikarmaṇām yathā cāṇḍālādipratilomavadhe 
tatra kalpayet 
nanu cātrāpy uktam kiṃcid eva tu viprāya dadyād asthimatāṃ vadhe iti 
anasthisāhacaryāt kṣudrajantuprāyās tatrāsthimanto gṛhyante 
mahākāyānāṃ tu naiṣa vidhiḥ 
nanu catvāro varṇāḥ nāsti pañcamaḥ iti śūdraprabhedā eva pratilomāḥ 
yadi nāma pañcamo varṇo na jāto naitāvatā śūdrais tair bhavitavyam 
teṣām api lakṣaṇasya niyatatvāt samānajātyām ūḍhāyāṃ jātaḥ śūdraḥ iti varṇasaṃkarajāś caite 
tasmān na śūdrahatyāprāyaścittam 
nāpi kiṃcid eva tu viprāya ity anyas tatra kalpanāyā anavasaraḥ 
śaktiḥ prāyaścittinas tapasi 
tathā kim ayaṃ tapasi samartha uta dāne 
pāpaṃ ca 
hiṃsāyā vihitaprāyaścittam eva 
abhakṣyabhakṣaṇe tad eva 
atha pāpasya gurulaghubhāvopekṣaṇīyaḥ 
nanu ca gurulaghubhāvaḥ pāpasya kathaṃ jñāyate 
prāyaścittamahatvād iti cet anuktaprāyaścittaviṣayeyaṃ kalpanā 
satyam 
arthavāde doṣātiśayaśravaṇad gurutvāt 
tathā buddhipūrvānukṛte ca 
kiṃ ca nedam anuktaniṣkṛtiviṣayam eva prakalpayet ukte 'pi kalpanā kāryā 
kuta etat 
daṇḍaprāyaścittayos tulyatvāt 
daṇḍena coktānuktaviṣayam anujñāyate 
kiṃ caitasmin vyatikrame gurulaghūnām upadeśāt tatrāvaśyabhāvanīyā kalpanā 
ata uddiṣṭānuddiṣṭasarvaśeṣo 'yam 
yair abhyupāyair enāṃsi mānavo vyapakarṣati 
tān vo 'bhyupāyān vakṣyāmi devarṣipitṛsevitān 
nanu coktā evābhyupāyāḥ iha cāndrāyaṇam iha prājāptyam iha dvādaśavārṣikam iti 
satyam 
saṃjñāmātreṇa nirdiṣṭā 
iha tu svarūpaṃ setikartavyatākam ucyate 
upāya evābhyupāyaḥ 
vyapakarṣati apamārṣṭi 
devarṣītyādiḥ stutiḥ 
mānavagrahanaṃ sarvavarṇārtham 
tryahaṃ prātas tryahaṃ sāyaṃ tryaham adyād ayācitam 
tryahaṃ paraṃ ca nāśnīyād prājāpatyaṃ caran dvijaḥ 
yady apy aharmukhaṃ prātas tathāpi pūrvāhṇakālo lakṣyate 
dvitīyāhnakālapratiṣedhād asya 
prātaḥkālavidhau hi yadṛcchayā bhojanaṃ prāptaṃ vartate 
kevalam atyarthaṃ hi yat pūrvāhne vā madhyaṃdine vā manuṣyāṇām ity ayācitatvāt prāptam arthitvād bhojanam 
tad eva cet prātaḥkāle vidhīyate tadā mādhyaṃdinaṃ nivarteta na sāyaṃtanam 
adya punar yad eva paurastyaṃ pūrvāhṇamadhaṃdinakālayor vikalpitayoḥ prāptaṃ bhojanaṃ tad eva punar ucyamānaṃ kālāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ saṃpadyate 
vratatvāc caitad eva yuktam 
ekāhāratā hi vrataparigaṇanāyāṃ saṃkhyāyate 
tapaś cedaṃ tāpayati duḥkhayatīti 
yadi ca dvitīyaṃ bhojanaṃ nivartate tatra sāyaṃtanaṃ nivarteta 
anye tu haviṣyān prātarāśān iti svaplaparimāṇatā bhojanasya lakṣyata ity āhuḥ 
prātarāśe hi svalpaṃ bhuñjate 
tacchīlāḥ prākṛtapuruṣāḥ 
tathā siddhe pāke bhojanāt prākṛtabhokteti vyapadiśanti 
sāyam iti vāparasmin tryahe 
tato 'nataraṃ tryaho haviṣyaṃ vaidikaṃ yāvad bhujyate tāvad anujñāyate 
uktaṃ ca smṛtikāraiḥ īṣat bhuktvārthaṃ saṃviśet 
ayācite 'pi haviṣyabhojanam ekakālikaṃ ca 
svagṛhe 'pi dīyatāṃ me bhojanam iti yat bhṛtyādaya ājñāyante tad api yācitam eva 
prārthanāmātraṃ yāñcā preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇayoḥ sādhāraṇam 
ataḥ svagṛhe 'pi yad bhāryādayo 'nanujñātā upaharanti tathā bhoktavyam na tv anyatheti 
gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam 
ekarātropavāsaś ca kṛcchraṃ sāntapanaṃ smṛtam 
gomūtrādīnāṃ kuśodakānāṃ samāhāram āhur ekasminn ahany 
ekarātropavāsaś ca 
tato dvyahaṃ sāntapanam 
anye tu pratyaham ekaikaṃ bhakṣayitavyam saṃhatasyāśrutatvāt 
ataḥ saptāhāni sāntapanam 
dvāv apy etau pakṣau smṛtyantare parigṛhītau 
ekaikaṃ grāsam aśnīyāt tryahāṇi trīṇi pūrvavat 
tryahaṃ copavased antyam atikṛcchraṃ caran dvijaḥ 
pūrvavad iti prājāpatyavidhim atidiśati 
eṣv eva kāleṣv ekaikaṃ grāsam aśnīyāt 
taptakṛcchraṃ caran vipro jalakṣīraghṛtānilān 
pratitryahaṃ pibed uṣṇān sakṛt snāyī samāhitaḥ 
teṣv eva kāleṣu jalādīni yāvatā nātitṛptir bhavati 
kvacit parimāṇaṃ paṭhyate 
apāṃ pibet tu tripalaṃ palam ekaṃ tu sarpiṣaḥ 
payaḥ pibet tu dvipalaṃ tripalaṃ coṣṇamārutam 
sakṛtsnāyīti trir ahnaḥ trir niśāyām ity asyāpavādaḥ 
yatātmano 'pramattasya dvādaśāham abhojanam 
parāko nāma kṛcchro 'yaṃ sarvapāpāpanodanaḥ 
yatātmā saṃyatendriyo gītādiśabdaśravaṇeṣv anabhilāṣī 
apramattas tatparaḥ 
arthavādo 'yam sarvakṛcchreṣv asya dharmasya vihitatvāt 
ekaikaṃ hrāsayet piṇḍaṃ kṛṣṇe śukle ca vardhayet 
upaspṛśaṃ triṣavaṇam etac cāndrāyaṇaṃ smṛtam 
caturdaśyām upoṣya śvobhūtāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśa grāsān aśnīyāt 
grāsapramāṇaṃ cāsyādhikāreṇa grāsānumantraṇe ca āpyāyasva saṃ te payāṃsi iti smṛtyantarokto vidhir apekṣitavyaḥ 
ekaśāstratvāt sarvasmṛtīnām asati virodhe samagraṃ yojyam 
virodhe tu vikalpaḥ 
pratipadam ārabhya ekaikaṃ grāsaṃ divase divase hrāsayet 
pratipadi caturdaśa dvitīyāyāṃ trayodaśetyādi yāvac caturdaśyām eko grāso bhavati 
tato 'māvāsyāyām upoṣya pratipady ekaṃ grāsam aśnīyāt 
dvitīyasyāṃ dvāv evam ekaikaṃ vardhayed yāvat paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśa bhavanti 
upaspṛśan snānaṃ kurvan 
triṣavaṇaṃ prātarmadhaṃdināparāhṇeṣu 
trir niśāyām iti nivartate viśeṣavihitatvāt 
etam eva vidhiṃ kṛtsnam ācared yavamadhyame 
śuklapakṣādiniyataś caraṃś cāndrāyaṇaṃ vratam 
yavamadhame 'māvāsyāyām upoṣya pratipady eko grāsaḥ 
dvitīyasyāṃ dvau yāvat paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśa 
punaḥ pratipadam ārabhya kṛṣṇapakṣa ekaikagrāsāpacayo yāvad amāvāsyām upavāsaḥ 
aṣṭāv aṣṭau samaśnīyāt piṇḍān madhaṃdine sthite 
niyatātmā haviṣyāśī yaticāndrāyaṇaṃ caran 
pratyahaṃ māsam aṣṭau grāsān kṛṣṇapakṣād vārabhya śuklapakṣād vā yaticāndrāyaṇaṃ bhavati 
madhyaṃdine sthite pravṛtte 
pūrvāhṇāparāhṇau varjayitvety arthaḥ 
śiṣṭaṃ prasiddham 
caturaḥ prātar aśnīyāt piṇḍān vipraḥ samāhitaḥ 
caturo 'stam ite sūrye śiśucāndrāyaṇaṃ smṛtam 
atra prātaḥśabdo 'stamayasāhacaryāt sūryodayapratyāsannaṃ kālaṃ lakṣayati 
astam ite sūrye pradoṣa ity arthaḥ 
yathākathaṃcit piṇḍānāṃ tisro 'śītīḥ samāhitaḥ 
māsenāśnan haviṣyasya candrasyaiti salokatām 
kasmiṃścid divase caturo grāsān kasmiṃścid dvādaśa kasmiṃścin nāśnāti yathā kathaṃcit triṃśadrātrau pravṛttiḥ 
yadi kasmiṃścit ṣoḍaśa 
ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ tisrośītīr māseneti dve śate catcāriṃśad adhike 
candralokaṃ prāpnoti 
etad rudrās tathādityā vasavaś cācaran vratam 
sarvākuśalamokṣāya marutaś ca maharṣibhiḥ 
etac cāndrāyaṇaṃ vrataṃ sarve devāḥ samāceruḥ sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ vimokṣāya 
na kevalaṃ yatraivoktam anuktetṣv api draṣṭavyam 
tad uktam kṛcchrātikṛcchrau cāndrāyaṇam iti sarvaprāyaścittam sarvaprāyaścittam 
atredaṃ saṃdihyate 
yad etat sarvaprāyaścittavacanaṃ kiṃ tantreṇa sarveṣāṃ śodhanam uta yogasiddhinyāyena pratinimittam āvartata iti 
ucyate 
yady apy etan nyāyyaṃ nimittāvṛttau naimittikāvṛttir iti tathāpīdam anāmnātapratipadaprāyaścittanimitteṣv asaṃviditeṣu kṛtasaṃbhāvanāyām āmnāyate 
tatra yeṣāṃ tāvat saṃbhāvanāmātreṇa śuddhiḥ kriyate yathā saṃvatsarasyaikam api iti tatra nimittasyāniścitatvād upapatteḥ kuta āvṛttisaṃbhavaḥ 
yathā suptasya parivartanaiḥ śayyāgatasūkṣmaprāṇivadhas tathā nagarasya rathyāsu bhrāmyataḥ parastrīmukhasaṃdarśanam ā gṛhaprāpter asakṛt saṃbhavati 
tādṛgviṣaye tantrabhāva eva yuktaḥ 
darśitaṃ caitat asthanvatām ityādau samudāyavadha ekaṃ prāyaścittam iti 
yāni ca garīyāṃsi pāpāni tatra sarvatra prāyaścittāny āmnātāni 
idaṃ ca yathāpradarśita eva viṣaye bhavitum arhati 
mahattvāc cānāvṛttau nyāyyam 
tasmāt saṃśiteṣv api kathaṃcit prāyaścitteṣu na nimittāntarotpattau yukta eva tantrabhāvaḥ 
tathā ca tantradharma eva nyāyya iti darśayati yad divā ca naktaṃ cainaś cakṛma tasyāvayajanam asi svāhā 
yat svapantaś ca jāgrataś cainaś cakṛma tasyāvayajanam asi svāhā 
yad vidvāṃsaḥ ityādi 
yad iti ca vīpsāyāṃ yugapad aśeṣapāpavarjanam 
atra vadanti 
mahāvyāhṛtibhir homaḥ kartavyaḥ svayam anvaham 
ahiṃsā satyam akrodham ārjavaṃ ca samācaret 
sarveṣv eteṣv itikartavyateyam ucyate 
sarvahomeṣv ājyadravyam anupātte dravyaviseṣe darśitam 
svayaṃgrahaṇāt parakartṛkatā nivarteta 
kiṃ punar ayaṃ homo laukike 'gnāv anāvasathyasya bhavati neti vicāryate 
idam eva tāvad vicāryaṃ kuto 'gnau homaḥ 
prakṣepāvadhikas tyāgo juhoter arthaḥ 
tatra yasmin kasmiṃścid ādhāre prakṣepeṇa sidhyaty eva homaḥ 
tataś ca sthale jale vāgnau vā kriyatāṃ homo gṛhyāgnimatas tu na laukike 'gnau homaḥ grāmyāgnau tasya taddhomapratiṣedhāt 
samācārād agnisiddhir iti cet samācāra eva tarhy anviṣyatām 
gṛhyakārais tatpraṇītāgnyadhikāraiḥ kṛcchravidhiṣu homa āmnātaḥ 
taddarśanenānāvasathasya prāyaścitte nāhomakāḥ kṛcchrāḥ 
abhyudayārthinas tu naivānagikasya santi sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa phalasiddheḥ 
ahiṃsā 
śiṣyabhṛtyādy api tāḍyaṃ na taḍanīyaṃ 
satyaṃ narmaṇāpi nānṛtam 
yadi vā puruṣārthatayā prāptayor aṅgatvāya vidhānam 
ārjavam akrūratā 
trir ahnas trir niśāyāṃ ca savāsā jalam āviset 
strīśūdrapatitāṃś caiva nābhibhāṣeta karhicit 
trir ahna iti savaneṣv anusavanam udakopasparśanam iti gautamaḥ 
niśāyām api triṣu yāmeṣu mahāniśāṃ varjayitvā tadavadhi na hi asti snānakālaḥ 
yad eva vāsoyugam ācchādanārtham aucityaprāptaṃ tenaiva saha jalaṃ praviśet 
āviśed iti noddhṛtodakenety arthaḥ 
striyo brāhmaṇīr api nābhibhāṣeta anyatra mātṛjyeṣṭhabhaginyādibhyaḥ 
bhāryayā saha karmopayogī saṃlāpo na viṣidhyate 
anyas tu na kartavya eva 
sthānāsanābhyāṃ vihared aśakto 'dhaḥ śayīta vā 
brahmacārī vratī ca syād gurudevadvijārcakaḥ 
utthita āsīna upaviṣṭo 'tha vā 
na kvacin niṣīdet 
aśaktāv adhaḥ śayīta na paryaṅke 
brahmacārī maithunanivṛttaḥ 
vratī śiṣṭapratiṣiddheṣu niyamaṃ gṛhṇīyāt idaṃ mayā na kartavyam iti 
gurvādīnām arcā praṇatena sraganulepanādy upahartavyam 
sāvitrīṃ ca japen nityaṃ pavitrāṇi ca śaktitaḥ 
sarveṣv eva vrateṣv evaṃ prāyaścittārtham ādṛtaḥ 
sāvitrī tat savituḥ iti gāyatrī 
savitṛdevatvāj japacodanāsu sāvitrīśabdena tasyāḥ sarvatrādhikāraḥ 
pavitrāṇy aghamarṣaṇapāvamānīpuruṣasūktādīni śukriyādhyāyājanarauhiṇeyādīni sāmāni 
sarveṣu sarvakṛcchreṣu 
ādṛto yatnavān 
sarveṣv ityādiślokapūraṇas tathāvidhasyaivādhikārāt 
etair dvijātayaḥ śodhyā vratair āviṣkṛtainasaḥ 
anāviṣkṛtapāpāṃs tu mantrair homaiś ca śodhayet 
āviṣkṛtaṃ prakāśaṃ lokaviditam enaḥ pāpaṃ yeṣām 
etaiḥ kṛcchraiḥ śodhyāḥ 
ye tu rahasyapāpās teṣāṃ na kṛcchratapāṃsi 
kiṃ tarhi mantrair homaiś ca śodhayet 
yadi tāvat pariṣadaḥ 
nanu rahasyeṣu nāsti pariṣadgamanam āviṣkṛtaṃ na syāt 
viduṣāṃ hi tatrādhikāraḥ 
ucyate 
na prāyaścittam anāgataṃ śodhayed ity ucyate 
api tu śāstravyākhyānakāle śiṣyāṇām upadeśād idaṃ rahasyeṣu śodhanaṃ boddhavyam iti 
khyāpanenānutāpena tapasādhyayanena ca 
pāpakṛn mucyate pāpāt tathā dānena cāpadi 
viprāṇāṃ vidite 'nyeṣām api evaṃkarmāsmi iti prakāśayet 
etat khyāpanam 
anutāpaḥ 
tasmāt tāpena dhiṅ māṃ mahad akāryam akaravam anartho me duṣkṛtakāriṇo janma ity evamādiḥ cittaparikhedaḥ 
adhyayanaṃ sāvitryā japo vedapāṭho vāhiṃsāyām 
anyatra asamarthasya tapasi dānam 
etad āha dānena cāpadīti 
prakrāntatapasaḥ āpadi pīḍāyām anigrahaṇe dānam 
yathā yathā naro 'dharmaṃ svayaṃ kṛtvānubhāṣate 
tathā tathā tvacevāhis tenādharmeṇa mucyate 
khyāpanavidher arthavādaḥ 
naro 'dharmam iti nañaḥ praśleṣaḥ 
dharmasya svayaṃ khyāpanaṃ niṣiddham na guṇāḥ svayaṃ vācyāḥ iti 
prakṛtaś cādharma eva tenādharmeṇeti śrūyata eva 
yathā yathā manas tasya duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhati 
tathā tathā sarīraṃ tat tenādharmeṇa mucyate 
śarīram antarātmaiva na bhūtātmā puṇyapāpayos tadāśrayāt 
upacārād dhi ātmanaḥ śarīraśabdo 'yaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ 
anutāpārthavādo 'yam 
garhā khyātā 
kṛtvā pāpaṃ hi saṃtapya tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate 
naivaṃ kuryāṃ punar iti nivṛttyā pūyate tu saḥ 
nivṛttiparyantam ity āhuḥ 
tad ayuktam 
saṃtāpo manaḥparikhedaḥ pramādyaitan mayā kṛtam ityevaṃrūpaḥ 
nivṛttis tu saṃkalpo na kartavyaḥ punaḥ iti 
kriyābhedaṃ ca darśayati 
ktvāpratyayena saṃtapya nivṛtya iti 
ataḥ prāyaścittavat khyāpanānutāpanivṛttayaḥ prāyaścittinā kartavyāḥ 
pūyate siddhim āpnoti 
evaṃ saṃcintya manasā pretya karmaphalodayam 
manovāṅmūrttibhir nityaṃ śubhaṃ karma samācaret 
evam iti kṛtsnasya vidhiniṣedhasamūhasya pratyavamarśaḥ 
pretya karmaphalodayaṃ śubhasya karmaṇaḥ svargādiphalāvāptir aśubhasya narakopapattir akṛte prāyaścitte prāyaścittaṃ cātiduḥkharūpam 
etan manasi saṃcintya śubhaṃ karma samācaret 
vihitaṃ śubham 
tathā saṃkalpamūlaḥ kāmo vai vācy arthā niyatāḥ iti ca 
tasmād yady api na hiṃsyāt ity udyamananipātane na daṇḍādeḥ paraduḥkhotpādane ucyete tathāpy evamādiśāstraparyālocanayādhyavasāyādiniṣedhaḥ 
evam abhakṣyabhakṣaṇādāv api draṣṭavyam 
yady api bhakaṇam annādinigaraṇaparyantaṃ tathāpi mānaso 'dhyavasāyo niṣiddha eva 
evam agamyāgamane 'pi 
yady api hīndriyasamāpattir gamanaṃ tathāpi tadarthādhyavasāyo vyāpāra evamādiśāstrāntarair niṣidhyate 
yady evaṃ hananabhakṣaṇāgamyāgamaneṣu yat prāyaścittaṃ tad adhyavasāye 'pi prāpnoti 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
brāhmaṇavadhe tāvad iṣṭam eva ahatvāpi iti vacanāt 
anyatra tu mukhyasyaiva śabdārthasya parigraho nyāyyaḥ 
pratiṣedhe tūktaśāstraparyālocanayā sa manovyāpārāt prabhṛti kāyavyāpāraparyantaviṣayo 'vatiṣṭhate 
yady evaṃ ninditaṃ samācaran iti prāyaścittanimittopadeśāt pratiṣedhānusāriprāyaścittaṃ prāpnoti 
ka evam āha nāsti prāyacittam iti 
kiṃ ca tacchabdacoditān na bhavaty anyasya laghu kalpyam 
tathā ca sarvaprāyaścittānām evamādir api viṣayo nyāyyaḥ 
kutaḥ punar ayaṃ viseṣo labhyate 
pratiṣedhādhyavasāyād iti 
prāyaścittāni tu śabdārtheṣv eva vratāni yamadharmāś ca sarve saṃkalpajāḥ ity anena vidhipratiṣedhāv evocyete 
vratāni vidhirūpāṇi niyamāḥ pratiṣedhalakṣaṇāḥ tatraiva ca kṛtārthatvān naimittikeṣu yāvat pravartitum arhanti 
asti ca pratiṣedhasāmānyanimittam ato bhavati prāyaścittam 
na ca tad eva 
paradravyeṣv abhidhyānam iti cātraivānte darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
ajñānād yadi vā jñānāt kṛtvā karma vigarhitam 
tasmād vimuktim anvicchan dvitīyaṃ na samācaret 
kṛtaprāyaścittasyāpi punar akāryapravṛttāv adhikataraṃ prāyaścittam iti evamarthaṃ dvitīyaṃ na samācared iti 
atha vā nivṛtter anantaropadiṣṭāyā arthavādo dvitīyaṃ na samācaritavyam iti 
vrataṃ na hātvyam 
tasmād ādyakṛtād vyatikramād vimuktim icchan mokṣam icchan punar na kuryāt 
tataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati 
kṛte 'pi prāyaścitte na vimucyate yadi punaḥ samācarati 
na ca niṣkṛtau kṛtāyām akṛtāyām api mokṣo yukto 'to muktasya muktim anviccann iti nopapadyate 
tasmād ādhikyāya punar vacanam 
yasmin karmaṇy asya kṛte manasaḥ syād alāghavam 
tasmiṃs tāvat tapaḥ kuryād yāvat tuṣṭikaraṃ bhavet 
asatyāṃ cittaśuddhau vihitātirekakaraṇārtham idam 
duṣkṛte karmaṇy alāghavaṃ kāpi vicikitsā yadi bhavati 
tataḥ kṛte 'pi prāyaścitta ā manaḥprasādotpatter āvartayitavyam 
tapograhaṇaṃ dānādīnām api yathāvihitadarśanārtham 
tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ daivamānuṣakaṃ sukham 
tapomadhyaṃ budhaiḥ proktaṃ tapontaṃ vedadarśibhiḥ 
manuṣyaloke yat sukham ābhimānīkaṃ janapadaiśvaryādi yac caihikam arogitvādi yac ca sāmsargikaṃ dhanaputrādi saṃpat yathābhimatakāntādiviṣayopabhogalakṣaṇam aindriyakam yac ca vedeṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ śatam ānandāḥ sa eka ājānadeveṣu ityādi tasya sarvasya tapomūlaṃ utpattikāraṇam 
tapomadhyam utpannasya sthitir madhyāvasthā 
anto 'vasānam 
tadapekṣayeti vedavidāṃ darśanam 
yathaiva karmaṇi svargagrāmādyabhipretaphalasādhanāny evaṃ tapo vijñeyam 
brāhmaṇasya tapo jñānaṃ tapaḥ kṣatrasya rakṣaṇam 
vaiśyasya tu tapo vārtā tapaḥ śūdrasya sevanam 
naivaṃ mantavyam tapasi sāmarthyāt tapasā sarvaphalasiddhīr avāpsyāmi vidhyatiśayayogāc ca vihitākaraṇe 'pi na dravyeṇa kathaṃ me 'nuṣṭheyo dharmaḥ iti 
yato brāhmaṇasya tapo jñānam 
jñānaṃ vedārthāvabodhaḥ 
tasminn asati na tatphalasādanam 
ato jñānam eva tapa ucyate 
mahatīṣv āpattiṣu tena svadharmo na hātavya ity evamartho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
jñānagrahaṇaṃ svādhyāyagrahaṇādhyayanāt prabhṛti sarvasvadharmāṇāṃ pradarśanārtham 
evaṃ tapaḥ kṣatriysyeti 
śūdrasya sevanaṃ dvijātīnām iti śeṣaḥ tatsevāyā vihitatvāt 
asya cānuvādatvāt 
ṛṣayaḥ saṃyatātmānaḥ phalamūlānilāśanāḥ 
tapasaiva prapaśyanti trailokyaṃ sacarācaram 
atīndriyajñānātiśayāsādanam api munīnāṃ tapobalenaivety arthaḥ 
vāṅmanaḥkāyaniyamāt saṃyatātmānaḥ 
phalamūlety āhāraniyamaḥ 
īdṛśena tapasā trailokyaṃ pratyakṣavat paśyanti 
auṣadhāny agadā vidyā daivī ca vividhā sthitiḥ 
tapasaiva prasidhyanti tapas teṣāṃ hi sādhanam 
auṣadhāni rasāyanāni 
agadā vyādhyupaśamabheṣajāni 
vidyā bhūtaviśeṣādiviṣayā 
daivī sthitir aṇimādiśaktiyogo 'nekaprakāraḥ 
yad dustaraṃ yad durāpaṃ yad durgaṃ yac ca duṣkaram 
sarvaṃ tu tapasā sādhyaṃ tapo hi duratikramam 
duḥkhena yat tīryate tad dustaram 
vyādhinimittā mahaty āpat 
atibalena śatrūṇāṃ yad uparodhaḥ 
etad api tapasvināṃ susādhyam 
kṛcchreṇa yat prāpyate tad durāpam ākāśagamanādi 
durgaṃ meghapṛṣṭhārohaṇādi 
duṣkaram abhiśāpavaradānādi anyathā tv akaraṇam 
yathā saṃvartasyānyadevatāsṛṣṭiḥ 
sarvam eva tapasā sidhyati 
ślokatrayeṇa saṃyogapṛthaktvād abhyudayārthatā kṛcchrāṇām ucyate 
nanu ca prāyaścittānāṃ prakṛtatvāt kṛcchrastutis taccheṣatayaiva nyāyyā nābhyudayārthino vidheyatayā 
na ca dustarādayo 'rthavādatayā na saṃbhavanti 
evaṃvidhāḥ mahāntaḥ kṛcchrā yad dustaram api samudrādi tīryate 
kiṃ punar pāpaṃ nāpanotsyate 
ucyate 
gṛhyasmṛtiṣu sāmavidhau cānanukramyaiva prāyaścittāni kṛcchravidhiḥ samāmnātaḥ 
tatra cānārabhyādhītatvād yuktaiva abhyudayārthatā 
āha ca athaitān kṛcchrāṃś caritvā sarveṣu vedeṣu snāto bhavati sarvair devair jñāto bhavati iti 
vedeṣu snātaḥ ity anena niyamapūrvakaṃ vedādhyayanānuṣṭhānād yat phalaṃ tat siddham āha 
yas tu niṣphalo grahaṇārtho 'dhyayanavidhiḥ sa ekavedādhyayanenātrāpi saṃpadyate 
evam anekavedādhyayanaṃ tu dharmāyaivety uktam 
devair jñātaḥ ity anenāśeṣayāgaphalāvāptim āha 
yajamāno hi vedair jñāyate 
yo hy arthavādatayā saṃbhavati na prāyaścittair dānabhāvaṃ gacchadbhiḥ 
ihāpi svadharmanivṛttim āśaṅkamānena brāhmaṇasya tapo jñānam iti yad uktaṃ tad abhyudayārthatve saṃbhavati 
na prāyaścittāni pāpapramocanārthāni kāmyāni phalasādhanāni tatra bhinnaviṣayatvāt kutaḥ prāyaścittair nivṛttir āśaṅkyate 
abhyudayārthatve tu kṛcchrāṇām anyeṣāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ tulyatvād yuktā nivṛttyāśaṅkā 
tathā mahāpatakinaś ca iti pāpapramocanārthe 'pi codyate yad dustaram ityādinā abhyudayārthateti bhinne eva te vākye 
tena ca prakaraṇasya bādho yukta eva 
tathā ca dvaipāyanamuniprabhṛtayaḥ tapaḥprabhāvād buddhīr vicitrās tā vakṣyante 
tasmāt sarvaphalāni tapāṃsi 
na ca yathā sarvārthāny api vaidikāni karmāṇi niyataphalāni sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭomaḥ ityadhikārāt tatra sarvatra yāny eva vede svargādīni phalāni śrutāni tadapekṣayaiva sarvārthatā na tu ṛdhyatiśayātibhogenaivam iti 
kiṃ tarhi yad dustaram ityādi yathā nidarśitam 
mahāpātakinaś caiva śeṣāś cākāryakāriṇaḥ 
tapasaiva sutaptena mucyante kilbiṣāt tataḥ 
uktārtham etat 
kīṭāś cāhipataṅgāś ca paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca 
sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni divaṃ yānti tapobalāt 
tapastutir iyam 
yena tapasā sarvatra gamanāt sarve svargam āsata iti 
yathānadhikṛtā api kīṭādayas tapobalād divaṃ gacchanti kiṃ punar vidvāṃso brāhmaṇāḥ 
ālambanaṃ kīṭādīnāṃ jātisahajaṃ duḥkhaṃ tad eva tapaḥ 
tena ca kṣīṇakalmaṣādhikārijanmāntarakṛtena sukṛtena divaṃ yānti 
yat kiṃcid enaḥ kurvanti manovāṅmūrtibhir janāḥ 
tat sarvaṃ nirdahanty āśu tapasaiva tapodhanāḥ 
vāṅmanaḥkāyakṛtasya japahomābhyāṃ śuddhiḥ smaryate 
tatra tapasā nivṛttiḥ syāt 
ata idam ārabhyate tad api tapasānūdyate 
tapasaiva visuddhasya brāhmaṇasya divaukasaḥ 
ijyāś ca pratigṛhṇanti kāmān saṃvardhayanti ca 
kāmyakarmārambhe pūrvaṃ tapaḥ kartavyam 
tad api tāvad anūdyate 
tathā coktam prathamaṃ caritvā śuciḥ pūtaḥ karmaṇyo bhavati 
yatra tāvad dīkṣopanayanādy aṅgaṃ tatra tad eva tapaḥ 
ekas tapo vratam upaity asaṃgatānāṃ vihitaṃ ceti tapa eva 
yatrāpi śāntikapauṣṭikādau gṛhyādiviṣaye tatrāpi pūvaṃ tapaḥ kartavyam iti ślokārthaḥ 
brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ yāgādhikṛtakāmimātrapradarśanārtham 
uktaṃ ca 
nātaptatapasaḥ puṃso havir gṛhṇanti devatāḥ 
nāgṛhītahaviṣyasya kāmaḥ saṃpadyate kvacit 
yady api na devatā tatphalaṃ dadāti tathāpi yāgasya devatayā vināniṣpatter devatāḥ saṃvardhayantīty ucyate 
havirgrahītṛtvaṃ ca na punar devatānāṃ ca svīkāraḥ 
kiṃ tarhi saṃpradānatayoddeśe 'nirākaraṇam 
prajāpatir idaṃ śāstraṃ tapasaivāsṛjat prabhuḥ 
tathaiva vedān ṛṣayas tapasā pratipedire 
manor yeyaṃ pratiṣṭhā granthasya sā tapaḥsāmarthyajaiva 
anyo 'pi yo granthapratiṣṭhākāmas tenāpi tapaḥpūrvaṃ kṛtvā granthaḥ praṇetavyaḥ 
ṛṣīṇām api yat tādṛktvaṃ vedāḥ prādur bhavanti tat tapasaiva 
yad etat tapaso devā mahābhāgyaṃ pracakṣate 
sarvasyāsya prapaśyantas tapasaḥ puṇyam uttamam 
tapaḥstutyupasaṃharaḥ 
yad etat tapaso mahābhāgyaṃ mahāphalatvam uktaṃ tad devāḥ pracakṣate na kevalaṃ manuṣyā eva 
sarvasyāsyeti jagannidarśayati 
kṛtsnasya jagataḥ puṇyam udbhavaṃ śubhajanma tapasaḥ sakāśāt paśyantaḥ 
vedābhyāso 'nvahaṃ śaktyā mahāyajñakriyākṣamā 
nāśayanty āśu pāpāni mahāpātakajāny api 
vedābhyāsādīnāṃ nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pāpapraṇodanārthatādhikārāntaratvenocyate 
anirdiṣṭaprāyaścittānām apratyayakṛtānāṃ pratibhūtānāṃ caitad vijñāyate 
anye tv āhur yad evoktam brāhmaṇasya tapo jñānam iti tapovidhānena karmāntaranivṛttim āśaṅkamānasya vacanam idam api tathaiva vijñeyam 
anusaṃdhānārthaṃ kṣamāgrahaṇam sarvātmaguṇapradarśanārtham 
mahāpātakāny apīti 
apiśabdāt stutiḥ pratīyate na mahāpātakanivṛttyarthatā na cākasmāt sa pravartita iti tathā pradarśitair viṣayair vijñāyate 
yathaidas tejasā vahniḥ prāptaṃ nirdahati kṣaṇāt 
tathā jñānāgninā pāpaṃ sarvaṃ dahati vedavit 
jñānapraśaṃseyam 
viduṣaḥ svalpena prayaścittena śuddhir ity asmin prakaraṇa ājñāyate 
jñānaṃ ca sarahasyaṃ vedārthaviṣayaṃ jñeyam 
na prāyaścittavidhijñānaṃ kevalaṃ śuddhaye prayogārthatvāt tat 
na hy anyathā prayogopapattiḥ 
yas tu devādisattāvijñānaṃ rahasyādhikārajñānaṃ ca tasyākāmārthatvād yuktam tad dhi tāḥ pāpaniṣkriyāḥ 
āha ca yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanti evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyati iti 
edho dārvindhanam 
yathā śuṣkadāru cāgnau kṣiptaṃ kṣipraṃ dahyate evaṃ jñānam agnir iva pāpasya dāhakatvād vināśasāmānyād evam ucyate 
vedavid iti jñānaṃ viśiṣyate 
tena tarkakalākāvyādijñānam apāstaṃ bhavati 
ity etad enasām uktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ yathāvidhi 
ata ūrdhvaṃ rahasyānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ nibodhata 
pūrvottaraprakaraṇābhisaṃbandhārthaḥ 
savyāhṛtipraṇavakāḥ prāṇāyāmās tu ṣoḍaśa 
ap bhrūṇahaṇaṃ māsāt punanty ahar ahaḥ kṛtāḥ 
mukhanāsikāsaṃcārī vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ tasyāyāmo nirodhaḥ 
sa cobhayapathā prāṇapravṛtter bahiḥ kramato 'pānapravṛtter vā yad recakākhyaṃ prasiddham 
vyāhṛtayaḥ sapta 
praṇava oṃkāraḥ 
vyāhṛtibhiḥ praṇavena ca saha prāṇāyāṃāḥ kartavyā iti 
ṣoḍaśety āvṛttisaṃkhyānam 
kīdṛśaḥ sahabhāvaḥ 
kecid āhuḥ 
prāṇāyāmaṃ kṛtvā vyāhṛtiḥ praṇavajapaḥ pratyāvṛttiṃ kartavyaḥ 
anye tv āhuḥ 
śvāsanirodhakālena dhyātavyāḥ 
kiṃparimāṇaḥ prāṇāyāmānāṃ kālaḥ 
yāvatā nātimahatī śvāsanirodhanapīḍā jāyate 
kumbharecakapūrakāś ca prāṇāyāmāḥ smaryante na śvāsanirodhamātram 
yathāpramāṇaṃ nāsiddher iti asādhyatayaiva parimāṇānām 
api bhrūṇahanam 
apiśabdāt tatsameṣu 
kautsaṃ japtvāpa ity etad vāsiṣṭhaṃ ca pratīty ṛcam 
māhitraṃ śuddhavatyaś ca surāpo 'pi viśudhyati 
kutsena ṛṣiṇā dṛṣṭaṃ proktaṃ kautsam 
apa naḥ śośucad agham ity aṣṭarcaṃ bahvṛce paṭhyate 
vāsiṣṭhaṃ ca partīty ṛcam 
tisra ṛcaḥ samāhṛtāstyṛcam pratītisūktādipratīkārthaṃ ceti pratistomebhir uṣasaṃ vasiṣṭhāḥ ity etat 
māhitram mahi trīṇām iti tṛcam eva 
mahitṛsabdo 'smin sūkte 'stīti vimuktādiprakṣepāt 
ye tu māhendram iti paṭhanti teṣām mahāṃ indro ya ojasā ity aṣṭacatvāriṃśataṃ payaḥsūktam āhuḥ 
śuddhavatyaś ca eto nv indraṃ stavāṃa śuddhaṃ śuddhena iti 
atra apiśabdas tatsamānārthaḥ 
sakṛj japtvāsya vāmīyaṃ śivasaṃkalpam eva ca 
apahṛtya suvarṇaṃ tu kṣaṇād bhavati nirmalaḥ 
atra sakṛtgrahaṇāt pūrvatra pāṭhāvṛttiḥ pratīyate 
sā ca samācārād anyatra darśanāc ca 
trir japitvāghamarṣaṇam ity atrāpekṣāyām adhikṛtena saṃbandhaḥ 
asyavāmaśabdo 'smin sūkte 'stīti matau chaḥ sūktanāmnoḥ iti śabdavyutpattiḥ 
asya vāmasya palitasya hotuḥ iti dvāpañcaśadṛcaṃ sūktam 
śivasaṃkalpam api yaj jāgrato dūram udaiti iti vājasaneyaṣaḍṛcam 
haviṣpāntīyam abhyasya na tamaṃ ha itīti ca 
japitvā pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ mucyate gurutalpagaḥ 
pratīkārtho dvitīya itikaraṇaḥ padārthaviparyāsakṛt 
tato mantrasvarūpagrahaṇam iti vety atra labhyate 
pauruṣam sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ iti ṣoḍaśarcaṃ sūktam 
enasāṃ sthūlasūkṣmāṇāṃ cikīrṣann apanodanam 
avety ṛcaṃ japed abdaṃ yat kiṃcedam itīti vā 
arvāṅ mahāpātakebhya enāṃsi sthūlasūkṣmāṇy ucyante upapātakādīni 
teṣām apanodanaṃ cikīrṣan avety ṛcaṃ japed abdam 
avety avaśabdena pratīkena ava te heḷo varuṇa namobhiḥ iti lakṣyate pāpapramocanaliṅgatvāt 
na tv atatsaṃduheṇāyata iti yat kiṃcedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane iti eṣām 
pratigṛhyāpratigrāhyaṃ bhuktvā cānnaṃ vigarhitam 
japaṃs tarat sa mandīyaṃ pūyate mānavas tryahāt 
apratigrāhyaṃ madyādi yad apy apratigrāhyaṃ pāpakarmaṇaḥ suvarṇādi tad agrāhyam eva 
vigarhitam annaṃ caturvidhaṃ svabhāvakālaparigrahasaṃsargaduṣṭam 
tarat sa mandī dhāvati pāvamānīṣu catuṣṭayam 
somāraudraṃ tu bahvenāḥ samām abhyasya śudhyati 
sravantyām ācaran snānam aryamṇām iti ca tṛcam 
somā rudrā dhārayethām astram iti catasro yajñaṃ ca bharaṇānīdriyaṃ ceti ṛk 
samā saṃvatsaram 
cāhvānaḥ 
idaṃ liṅgaṃ yad uktaṃ kvacit tantreṇāpi prāyaścittam astīti 
sravantyām iti taḍāgasarasī nivartete 
abdārdham indram ity etad enasvī saptakaṃ japet 
apraśastaṃ tu kṛtvāpsu māsam āsīta bhaikṣabhuk 
indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim ity etat saptakam 
abdārdhaṃ ṣaṇmāsān 
japed enasvī ity aviśeṣāt sarvainasām 
apraśastaṃ maithunaṃ tatra purīṣotsargo vā 
tad apsu kṛtvā māsaṃ bhaikṣāhāro bhavet 
mantraiḥ śākalahomīyair abdaṃ hutvā ghṛtaṃ dvijaḥ 
sugurv apy apahanty eno japtvā vā nama ity ṛcam 
devakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi ity evamādayo 'ṣṭau mantrāḥ śākalahomīyāḥ 
tair ghṛtam abdaṃ hutvā gurv apy apahanty enaḥ 
sarvamahāpātakāny apīty arthaḥ 
japitvā namo rudrāya tavase kapardinaḥ ity evaṃ mantraṃ saṃvatsaram evam etāṃ siddhim āpnuyāt antareṇāpi śākalahomam 
tad idaṃ vaikalpikaṃ japakarmapūrveṇa śākalamantrahomena prāyaścittam 
anyena vā japitvā vāmana ity ṛcam 
sā tu śiṣṭebhyaḥ sugamayitavyā 
mahāpātakasaṃyukto 'nugacched gāḥ samāhitaḥ 
abhyasyābdaṃ pāvamānīr bhaikṣahāro viśudhyati 
mahāpātakasaṃyukta iti pūrvapadārthasaṃkhyāviśeṣapratipattir anenāpīti gamyate 
ekaikasya laghunaḥ prāyaścittavidhānam anekenāpi yuktam 
pāvamānyaḥ kṛtsnam eva maṇḍalaṃ dāśatayam svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā ity ārabya yat te rājañ chṛtaṃ haviḥ ityantam 
gavām anugamanam nānuvrajyāmātram 
kiṃ tarhi paricaryā 
sā ca goghnaprāyaścittād anusaṃdheyā 
araṇye vā trir abhyasya prayato vedasaṃhitām 
mucyate pātakaiḥ sarvaiḥ parākaiḥ śodhitas tribhiḥ 
mahāpātakasaṃyuktasyaiva prāyaścittāntaram etat 
vedasaṃhitāṃ mantrabrāhmaṇam 
ṣaṭtriṃśad rātram upoṣya iti saṃhitām araṇye japan pramucyate 
tryahaṃ tūpavased yuktas trir ahno 'bhyupayann apaḥ 
mucyate pātakaiḥ sarvais trir japitvāghamarṣaṇam 
apo 'bhyupayan japitvāghamarṣaṇam iti saṃbandhaḥ 
ataś cāntarjalaṃ japasiddhiḥ 
evaṃ smṛtyantarānugrahaḥ 
aghamarṣaṇamantraviseṣas tṛca uktaḥ 
yathāśvamedhaḥ kraturāṭ sarvapāpāpanodanaḥ 
tathāghamarṣaṇaṃ sūktaṃ sarvapāpāpanodanam 
stutyarthaḥ ślokaḥ 
hatvā lokān apīmāṃs trīn aśnann api yatas tataḥ 
ṛgvedaṃ dhārayan vipro nainaḥ prāpnoti kiṃcana 
iyam api stutiḥ 
ṛgvedadhāriṇo rahasyaprāyaścittārthā 
anye tu mahāpātakasaṃyuktaḥ ity ārabhya rahasyārtham apīcchanti 
ṛksaṃhitāṃ trir abhyasya yajuṣāṃ vā samāhitaḥ
sāmnāṃ vā sarahasyānāṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate 
ṛgādiviśeṣaṇāt brāhmaṇanivṛttiḥ 
rahasyāni sāmāny āraṇyakādhītāni 
yathā mahāhradaṃ prāpya kṣiptaṃ loṣṭaṃ vinaśyati 
tathā duścaritaṃ sarvaṃ vede trivṛti majjati 
tryavayavas trivṛt 
ekakāryatvād avayavavyavahārād vedo vedāntarasyāvayavaḥ 
ṛco yajūṃṣi cādyāni sāmāni vividhāni ca 
eṣa jñeyas trivṛdvedo yo vedainaṃ sa vedavit 
tat tryavayavaṃ darśayati 
ādyāni mukhyānīty arthaḥ 
anyāni brāhmaṇādhyeyāni ca paṭhitāni 
atha vā padakramitāni 
vividhāni sāmāni grāmyāraṇyavibhāgena 
ādyaṃ yat tryakṣaraṃ brahma trayī yasmin pratiṣṭhitā 
sa guhyo 'nyas trivṛdvedo yas taṃ veda sa vedavit 
tryakṣaram akṣaratrayasamāhāra oṃkāraḥ 
ādyaṃ brahma guhyam 
rahasyādhikāre yathāvad updiṣṭatvāc chabdabrahmarūpatayopāsanakarmatvena vihitaḥ 
paramātmavācakatayā vā guhyo na tu jñātākṣaratvena 
sa hi lokaprasiddha om ity abhyupagamaḥ 
trayī yasminn eṣā saṃkucitā 
sarvāṇi varṇānīty evamādi 
tasyopāsanā purastād ukteti evam om ity etad akṣaram upāsīta iti 
pūrvaśloke mantrārthavedanena vedatvam uktam anena vedāntajñānam 
karmavedanaṃ tv adhyayanavidhyākṣiptam eveti prasiddham 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyām
ekādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ 
mānyā kāpi manusmṛtis taducitā vyākhyā hi medhātitheḥ
sā luptaiva vidher vaśāt kvacid api prāpyaṃ na yat pustakam 
kṣoṇīndro madanaḥ sahāraṇasuto deśāntarād āhṛtaṃ
jīrṇoddhāram acīkarat tata itas tatpustakair lekhitaiḥ 
iti bhaṭṭavīrasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithikṛtau
manubhāṣye ekādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ 
atha dvādaśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
cāturvarṇyasya kṛtsno 'yam uto dharmas tvayānagha 
karmaṇāṃ phalanirvṛttiṃ śaṃsa nas tattvataḥ parām 
ādyo 'rdhaḥ ślokaḥ śāstrārthaparisamāptidarśanenādhikākāṅkṣānivṛttyarthaḥ 
kṛtsnagrahaṇaṃ saṃmānārtham 
etāvantaḥ smārtā dharmā yasmin śāstre rahasyaparyanta upadiṣṭāś ca 
śiṣyamukhenācāryasyaiva kṛtsnakāritā śāstrasya pratipādyate na vivakṣitā 
nātra śiṣyācāryaṃ vastutaḥ pratipattavyam 
granthakāra evemaṃ grantham evaṃ vibhajati 
dharmaśabdaś ca kartavyatāvacano vidhipratiṣedhasamūham anuvadati 
tena karmaphalasaṃbandho 'nukta iti ita ūrdhvaṃ pratipādyate 
kṛtsno dharma uktas tvayā 
vidhipratiṣedhāpekṣayā vacanam upapannaṃ bhavati 
kasya punaḥ karmaṇaḥ phalasaṃbandho jijñāsyate yenocyate karmaṇāṃ phalanirvṛttiṃ śaṃseti 
yāvatā yāvanti tāvan nityāni śāstranoditatvād eva kriyante na teṣāṃ phalam abhisaṃdheyam 
na hi tāni phalārthāni 
yāny anityāni tatrāpi pratikarma prāyaśaḥ phalāny uktāny eva vāridas tṛptim āpnoti svargam āyuś ca ityādīni ca 
yatrāpi noktam iva manyeta tatrāpi svargādi sādhitam eva 
yāni jātakarmādīni saṃskārakarmāṇi tāni saṃskāryaviśeṣoktasya kriyāphalenaiva phalavanti nādṛṣṭam ākāṃkṣanti 
yāny api naimittikāni dravyaśuddhyādīni cāṇḍālasparśanasnānādīni tāny api dṛṣṭaprayojanāny eva 
śuddhaye hi tāni kriyante aśuddhair vyavahārapratiṣedhāt 
prāyaścittāni cānantaram uktaprayojanāny eva 
ato na vidmaḥ kasya vāsya karmaṇaḥ phalam abhijijñāsyate 
pratiṣedhānām 
śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣaiḥ ityādinā teṣām eva vakṣyamāṇatvāt 
tathāpratiṣedhānuṣṭhānam api śāstracoditam eva 
nanu tatra phalārthitve hi na sarvaviṣayo 'dhikāraḥ syāt 
arthitā vādhikriyeta 
ucyate 
naivātra tādṛśaṃ phalam abhidhīyate yat kāmyate 
aniṣṭaphaladarśanam atra kriyate 
naiva tat kāmyate 
naiva ca kaścid aniṣṭaprāptim icchati 
ataḥ sarvaviṣayatāsiddhiḥ 
yad apy ucyate śāstraṃ coditaṃ pratiṣedhānuṣṭhānaṃ kriyate atyalpam idam ucyate 
evaṃ tatrānuṣṭhānam iti 
sarvam eva śāstranoditaṃ kriyate 
kiṃ tu tac chāstraṃ phalārthinaḥ kasyacit kartavyatāṃ sthāpayati 
kasyacid antareṇa phalaṃ naimittikatvena 
iha tu yāvajjīvam iva nimittaśruter abhāvāt kimarthaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ na kriyata iti 
upekṣāyāṃ pratyavāyaś ca dṛśyate jighāṃsayā brāhmaṇasya narakaṃ pratipadyate iti 
nanu ca yat pratiṣiddhaṃ brāhmaṇavadhādi na tac chāstracoditam 
śāstranoditasya hi śāstrīyeṇa phalena saṃbandho yuktaḥ yathā svargakāmo yajeta iti 
śāstrato hi yāgasya kartavyatāpratipattir nānyataḥ 
iha tu dveṣādinā laukikī pravṛttir aśāstrīyā 
na cāśāstrīyasya śāstrīyeṇa phalena saṃbandho nyāyyaḥ 
yad apy uktam upekṣāyāṃ pratyavāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ iti kimity atrākāṃkṣā 
yāvatā dviṣantaṃ prati vartamānasya na kartavyam iti śāstrato 'vagatir jāyate tāvatā vākyārthasamāptiḥ 
kim atra padam asti yadākāṃkṣīta 
etad vivicyamānaṃ mahāntaṃ granthavistāram ākṣipati 
saṃkṣepas tv ayam 
na hiṃsyād bhūtāni iti pratiṣedhavidheḥ pratiṣedho bhāvārthaḥ 
kartṛkaraṇa iti ca śrūyate 
tatra vidhes tāvan niyojyaviṣayākāṃkṣā 
tatra niyojyasyeyam avagatir bhavati na mayaitat kartavyam 
nārthas tatra niyuktaḥ puruṣaniyogarūpatvād vidheḥ 
sa cātra niyojyo laukikyā dveṣalakṣaṇayā pravṛttyārthena pravartamānahiṃsāsvabhāvopadeśena samarpitaḥ 
yaḥ svecchayā hanane pravartate sa hanyād iti 
na caitena yujyate sa hy atra vidher viṣayaḥ 
na ceti śūnyeṣu bhāvārthasyānyataḥ prāptatvāt puruṣopalakṣaṇatvāt svena viṣayatvena vidheḥ saṃbandhaḥ 
yaś cāsau niyojyaḥ sa na tīrthatvena niyojyabhāvam ātmanaḥ pratipadyate 
yāvat tadviṣayasya pratiṣidhyamānasya nāniṣṭaphalatām adhyavasyati 
tathā hi loke vyutpattiḥ 
sabhyāyāṅgulir deyā iti vadan pratiṣiddhe tadatikramaṇe tadanuṣṭhīyamānam anarthahetutayā pratipannam 
na ca laukikīṃ vyutpattim avamṛjya hetvantaram upanyāsam arhati 
tatrāśrutāpy aniṣṭaphalatā pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt kalpayituṃ yuktā kiṃ punar yatra śrūyata eva 
na hi śrutasyotsargo nyāyyaḥ 
na cātra vādamātropalakṣakatvaṃ narakādiphalaṃ śrutiyuktam uktena nyāyena phalāpekṣānvayaḥ sakāśāt 
kiṃ cārthavādā vidhiviśeṣā bhavanti 
na ceha kaścid vidhiḥ śrutaḥ prakṛto vā karmaphalasaṃbandhasyaiva prādhānyena pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt 
na hy atra karmāṇi vidhīyante 
ataś ca teṣāṃ phalasaṃbandha ucyate 
na caitāvatā bhavanti vākyaśatāny anarthakāni 
bhavantu arhantu smṛtikāraṇaṃ tāvad etad darśanam 
na hy anyathaitāni vākyāni vyākhyātuṃ śakyante 
avidhiśeṣa iha nāsti 
guṇavādenaitad vyākhyānaṃ śāstrakārāṇām api bhrāntir iti cet 
na 
naivaṃvādina ātmanaḥ prakarṣato maharṣīn avajānate 
aghaṃ pāpam 
anagheti saṃbodhanam niṣkalmaṣatayā stutyartham 
śaṃseti vāgyato vartate 
sa tān uvāca dharmātmā maharṣīn mānavo bhṛguḥ 
asya sarvasya śṛṇuta karmayogasya nirṇayam 
pṛṣṭaprativacanam etat 
yad ahaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śṛṇu tat 
karmaṇo yogam iti saṃbandhaḥ 
sa ca prakṛtatvāt phalenaiva vijñeyaḥ 
śubhāśubhaphalaṃ karma manovāgdehasaṃbhavam 
karmajā gatayo nṝṇām uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ 
śubhasya nirdeśo dṛṣṭāntatayā manovāgvyāpāravidhyartho vā manaso vāco dehāc ca saṃbhavati karma 
karmaśabdo na cejyāyām eva kāyaparispande vartate 
kiṃ tarhi kriyāmātre yogadhyānavacanātmake 'pi 
phalaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate 
śubhaphalam aśubhaphalaṃ ca 
naivaṃ vijñeyaṃ kāyavyāpārasādhanād eva karmānuṣṭhānāc chubhāśubhaphalaprāptiḥ 
api tu manovākkāyasaṃbhavād apy evam eva 
tasmād api trividhāt karmaṇas tu vidhīyate phalaprāptiḥ 
tasyeha trividhasyāpi tryadhiṣṭhānasya dehinaḥ 
daśalakṣaṇayuktasya mano vidyāt pravartakam 
nanu ca daṇḍyān yajeta na hiṃsyāt iti śubham aśubhaṃ ca 
te sarve kāyavyāpārasādhye 
dānenātmanaḥ svatvanivṛttiḥ parasya ca svatvasaṃpādanaṃ tac ca pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇena hastena ityādi vihitim 
yāgo 'pi prayogarūpo 'vabhṛthāntaḥ kāyavyāpāranirvartyo bhavati 
evaṃ saṃghātadaṇḍyādyavidyā tu kāyikatayā prasiddhaiva 
tatra kiṃ tat karma yan manasaḥ saṃbhavati 
ata āha arthasyāsya mano vidyāt pravartakam 
manaso hi vyāpārāḥ sarve darśanādayaḥ 
na ca triṣv asatsu bhautiko vyāpāraḥ 
tathā hi prathamaṃ tāvan manasāyam arthaṃ saṃpaśyaty ayam īdṛśa eva tasya vastunaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāsya kāraṇaṃ tata āyatte katham etan manaḥ saṃpadyate 
tato 'dhyavasyati saṃpādayāmy ato nedam iti 
tatra udare kriyāpradhāne kāyaparispandarūpavāgvyavahāraś ca 
ataḥ sarvasya manaḥ pravartakaṃ preṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ
abuddhipūrvaṃ tu nāvaśyaṃ saddarśanādayaḥ pūrvabhāvirūpasya tādrūpyeṇa grahaṇam  yathā madye varṇasādṛśyāt pānakabuddhyā pravṛttiḥ saṃtamāsaṃbhavāt tayā parastrīṣu anyat tu daivopanipatitam yathā suptasya hastasaṃcārapārśvaparivartanādinā maśakādiprāṇivadhaḥ  tatrāpi kartṛtvam upapāditaṃ prāyaścitteṣu pravṛttihetuḥ 
trividhasya vāṅmanaḥkāyasādhanabhedena 
tryadhiṣṭhānasya uttamādhamamadhyamagatibhedena 
daśalakṣaṇayuktasya manaḥ kāyakarmaṇoḥ pratyekaṃ traividhyaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caturvidham 
etāni daśalakṣaṇāni 
tāny upariṣṭād vakṣyati 
paradravyeṣv abhidhyānaṃ manasāniṣṭacintanam 
vitathābhiniveśaś ca trividhaṃ karma mānasam 
abhidhyānaṃ nāma paradravyaviṣayerṣyābuddhyā paradravyābhibhavānucintanam kiyad aśvagodhanaṃ kiyad vājāvikam iti ca vibhavo 'śvāḥ dhigdaivaṃ kasmād asyeyatī samṛddhiḥ atha ca kathaṃ nāmaitasyāpahareyam atha vā sādhur bhavati yady etasyaitan na bhavati 
anye tv āhur etad dhanaṃ samabhibhavati 
aniṣṭacintanaṃ parasyety abhisaṃbadhnanti 
paravadhopāyacintanam yadi mriyate tan mamāstu iti vā 
nanu ca paradravyābhidhyānam evoktam 
anenaiva siddhe tad anarthakam 
sāmānyaśabdo hy ayam 
yad aniṣṭham anabhipretaṃ parasya tan na cintanīyam 
dhananāśo 'pi parasya naiveṣṭaḥ 
etadbhayāc ca kiṃcana parasyety etan na vyāharanti 
aniṣṭaṃ ca yat pratiṣiddhaṃ tad vyācakṣate 
asminn api pakṣe paradravyābhidhyānaṃ prādhānyārtham eva 
evaṃ vitathābhiniveśo 'pi 
pūrvapakṣārthasya siddhāntatvena grahaṇam vijñānavādaḥ vedāprāmāṇyam anātmatāgraha ityevamādi 
anye tu nityanirāmiṣadveṣam āhuḥ 
iyaṃ ca trividhākuśalā mānasī pravṛttiḥ 
ato 'nyā kuśalā 
aspṛhā paradravyeṣu dayā sarvasattveṣu śraddhā dharmādyastitvādiṣu 
tathā ca bhagavān vyāsaḥ 
anabhidhyā parasveṣu sarvasattveṣu sauhṛdam 
dharmiṇāṃ phalam astīti trividhaṃ manasā smaret 
pāruṣyam anṛtaṃ caiva paiśunyaṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ 
asaṃbaddhapralāpaś ca vāṅmayaṃ syāc caturvidham 
adattānām upādānaṃ hiṃsā caivāvidhānataḥ 
paradāropasevā ca śārīraṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam 
śāstrīyāprādhānyatayāsyādattānām asadbhya upādānaṃ duṣṭaṃ caiva 
tathā kumāryādiparadārādāv api 
viparītadharmādānaṃ paritrāṇam indriyasaṃyamaś ca 
idaṃ manovāgdehabhedena daśavidham 
pravṛttikuśalākuśalavibhāgena viṃśatiprakārāḥ 
mānasaṃ manasaivāyam upabhuṅkte śubhāśubham 
vācā vācā kṛtaṃ karma kāyenaiva ca kāyikam 
parasya manastāpo yena janyate karmaṇā tato mānasaṃ duḥkham āpnotīti kecit 
vayaṃ tu brūmo yat trividhaṃ mānasam uktaṃ tato manoduḥkhāptiḥ 
evam uttarayor api 
śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣair yāti sthāvaratāṃ naraḥ 
vācikaiḥ pakṣimṛgatāṃ mānasair antyajātitām 
bhūyastvābhiprāyam etat 
prāyeṇaitāsāṃ jātīnām etāni yathāvibhāgaṃ nimittāni 
na tv ayaṃ niyamaḥ 
tathā mahāpātakināṃ tiryak paryaṭantīti vakṣyatīti 
pakṣimṛgagrahaṇaṃ tiryagjātimātrapradarśanārtham 
manovākkāyakarmaṇām uttarottarasya gurutvapradarśanārthaparam 
vāgdaṇḍo 'tha manodaṇḍaḥ kāyadaṇḍas tathaiva ca 
yasyaite nihitā buddhau tridaṇḍīti sa ucyate 
damanaṃ daṇḍaḥ 
vāco daṇḍaḥ pāruṣyāpravṛttiḥ 
evam uttarayor api 
yasyaite daṇḍā buddhau nihitā naitan mayā kartavyam iti yo na skhalati sa tridaṇḍīty ucyate 
na tv anāryo gurukāṣṭhadaṇḍaṃ dhārayati 
tridaṇḍam etan nikṣipya sarvabhūteṣu mānavaḥ 
kāmakrodhau susaṃyamya tataḥ siddhiṃ nigacchati 
trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ samāhāras tridaṇḍam 
pātrādidarśanād astriyāṃ bhāṣaṇāt 
buddhau nikṣipya buddhau kṛtvā 
sarvabhūteṣv aghātakatvaṃ cāvasthitaṃ tridaṇḍaṃ vā nihitam 
kāmakrodhayoḥ saṃyamaḥ su sādhuḥ 
tataḥ siddhiṃ mokṣākhyāṃ gacchati prāpnoti 
ādhyātmikatvopanyāsa upakramo 'yam 
kasya punar eṣā siddhiḥ kasya vāmutra vikārakarmaphalānāṃ bhoktṛtvam 
bhasmāntaṃ śarīram 
na ca tato 'yam upalabhāmahe 
tena sarveṣu dharmādharmeṣv adhikāripuruṣaṃ pradarśayitukāmaḥ prārabhate 
yo 'syātmanaḥ kārayitā taṃ kṣetrajñaṃ pracakṣate 
yaḥ karoti tu karmāṇi sa bhūtātmocyate budhaiḥ 
asya śarīrasya kriyāparispandātmikāṃ kriyāṃ svayaṃ pravartayitā 
prayatnavaśenāsya kartṛtvam 
sa kṣetrajñaḥ 
asyātmana iti samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī 
ātmaśabdasya śarīre vṛttiḥ tasyāpi ātmārthatvāt 
yaḥ karoti pānādilakṣaṇaṃ tajjanyo yaḥ śarīrākhyaḥ kartā sa bhūtātmocyate pṛthivyādibhūtasaṃghātaḥ jaghanyatvāt 
bhūtavikāra ātmā bhūtātmā 
tathā coktam dvāv ātmānāv antarātmanā śarīrātmanā 
jīvasaṃjño 'ntarātmānyaḥ sahajaḥ sarvadehinām 
yena vedayate sarvaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca janmasu 
kiṃ punar ayaṃ jīvo nāma yāvatā kṣetrajñam eva jīvaṃ manyante 
dvau cātropalabhyete śarīram ahaṃpratyayavijñeyaś cāntarātmā 
tato 'nyaḥ kaścij jīvo nāma 
kecit tāvad āhuḥ mahadādibhūtasūkṣmapariveṣṭitaṃ liṅgaṃ yat paṭhyate saṃsarati nirupabhogaṃ bhāvair adhivāsitaṃ liṅgam iti 
yenetikaraṇatvaṃ ca vedanaṃ prati tasyopapadyate 
tad dhi sthūlabhūtānām āśrayaḥ tasyaiva śarīrākhyabāhyabhūtāśrayatvāt 
śarīre ca saty ātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhabhoktṛtvam 
ato yeneti karaṇavibhaktyocyate 
anye tu manyante antaḥkaraṇaṃ manobuddhyahaṃkārarūpaṃ jīvaḥ 
tasya cāntaḥkaraṇasaṃjñatvād yukta eva karaṇavibhaktyā nirdeśaḥ 
antarātmaśabdaś ca tādarthyād yukta eva 
sahajaśabdaś ca ā mokṣaprāpter ā pralayāc ca tadaviyogena 
tāv ubhau bhūtasaṃpṛktau mahān kṣetrajña eva ca 
uccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu sthitaṃ taṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhataḥ 
uccāvaceṣu bahuvidheṣu nānārūpeṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣu yaḥ sthito vyāpya tāni bhūtāni 
tiṣṭhataḥ saṃśrayataḥ 
ataś ca sarvakarmakartṛtvam tiṣṭhater anekārthatvāt 
ko 'sāv uccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu vyāpya sthitaḥ 
paramātmā cetanācetanajagatparityaktaḥ paramānandarūpaḥ parastāc ca pratipādayiṣyate 
bhūtasaṃpṛktau bhūtāni pañca 
mahān iti 
yena vedayata ity uktaḥ 
kṣetrajñaḥ asyātmanaḥ iti 
yathāvyāptyāpakṣe 'pi dvitīyasthitaṃ tam iti 
saṃśrayaṇaṃ ca tatkāraṇatvāt sarvasyāsya jagataḥ 
kāryaṃ ca kāraṇam āśrayaty ato 'pekṣaiva saṃśrayaṇam 
tathā ca bhavān vyāsaḥ
dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca 
kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate 
kṣaraśabdena sarvaṃ caitad ucyate cārācaraprapañcarūpam 
akṣaraṃ prakṛtikāraṇam kūṭasthaśabdena kāraṇarūpatayā pralaye 'py avināśāt 
atha vā kṣaraṃ śarīram akṣaraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ 
kūṭasthatvaṃ tu tasyāmokṣaprāpteḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvānivṛttyā
uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ 
yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ   
asaṃkhyā mūrtayas tasya niṣpatanti śarīrataḥ 
uccāvacāni bhūtāni satataṃ ceṣṭayanti yāḥ 
mūrtiśabdena yāvat kiṃcid bhautikaṃ kāryakāraṇam iti śaktiś ca tad ucyate 
tad etat sarvaṃ tasya paramātmanaḥ śarīrāt prādur bhavati 
svabhāva eva tasya śarīram 
śilāputrakasya śarīram itivad bhedena vyapadeśaḥ 
asaṃkhyā anantāḥ 
samudrād ivormayaḥ 
niṣpatanti prādur bhavantīty uktam 
tābhiḥ prādurbhūtābhir idaṃ jagac ceṣṭate sakriyaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ 
śarīrendriyavijñānair vinā ceṣṭāyā abhāvāc ceṣṭayantīty ucyate 
anye tu śarīrataḥ pradhānaṃ ca paramātmanaḥ śarīraṃ tadadhīnapravṛttitvāt nātra bhūtāni 
pañcabhya eva bhūtebhyaḥ pretya duṣkṛtināṃ nṛṇām 
śarīraṃ yātanārthīyam anyad utpadyate dhruvam 
pañcabhyo bhūtebhyo 'nyac charīraṃ pretyotpadyate 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
śukraśoṇitam antareṇaiva pāñcabhautikaṃ śarīram utpadyate 
duṣkṛtīnāṃ ca pāñcabhautikaṃ śarīraṃ puṇyakrtām tu taijasākāśamātrāṇi bhavanti 
yathoktam vāyubhūtaḥ khamūrtimān iti 
yātanā pīḍātiśayaḥ 
tadarthīyam yad atidṛḍham alaukikaduḥkhasahiṣṇuḥ 
tenānubhūya tā yāmīḥ śarīreṇeha yātanāḥ 
tāsv eva bhūtamātrāsu pralīyante vibhāgaśaḥ 
yamo nāma devatāviśeṣo duṣkṛtināṃ nigrahādikṛt 
taddṛṣṭā yātanā asya 
tā anubhūya tena pāñcabhautikena śarīreṇa 
tāni śarīrāṇi punaḥ pralīyante tāsu sūkṣmāsu bhūtamātrāsu 
so 'nubhūyāsukhodarkān doṣān viṣayasaṅgajān 
vyapetakalmaṣo 'bhyeti tāv evobhau mahaujasau 
viṣayasaṅgāt pratiṣiddhaviṣayopasevanāt pratiṣiddhān tataḥ saṅgāc ca ye jātā doṣāḥ pāpanirmitāḥ 
narakād duḥkhāny anubhūya tena ca duḥkhopabhogena vyapetakalmaṣo 'pahatapāpmā ceti 
tāv evobhau mahaujasau 
kāv ubhau 
mahān kṣetrajñaś ca tau prakṛtau 
anantaraślokena ca kṣetrajña evānubhāvitā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ 
sa iti ca tasyaiva parāmarśo 'taḥ kṣetrajñam abhyetīti prāptam 
tac ca viruddham 
sa eva prāpyaḥ prāpakaś ca 
satyam aupacāriko bhedo 'bhipretaḥ 
abhyetīty ayam arthaḥ etāvanmātraśeṣo bhavati 
yad uta kṣetrajñatayā prāṇādisaṃghātātmakena mahān iti vyapadiṣṭena phaleṣu tāvanmātraḥ pariśiṣyate 
liṅgajīvaś ca kṣetrajñaḥ 
anye tu mahatparamātmānāv iti vyācakṣate 
sukhodarkān kṣīṇe pāpa uttarakālaṃ sukham anubhūyate 
pratipanthini pāpe svalpe 'pi na sukhotpattiḥ 
yathā svalpe 'py ajīrṇe na bhojanaṃ sukhāya  
tau dharmaṃ paśyatas tasya pāpaṃ cātandritau saha 
yāmyāṃ prāpnoti saṃpṛktaḥ pretyeha ca sukhāsukham 
nanu ca yadi tau mahān kṣetrajñaś ca saṃbadhyete tatas tasya paśyata iti tasyeti kaḥ saṃbadhyate 
jīva iti kecit 
uktaṃ ca sa eva kṣetrajñaḥ sa eva jīvaḥ iti 
atha liṅgam 
nanu ca mahacchabdena tad evoktam 
athāntaḥkaraṇaṃ mahadbuddhyādi
tatrāpi kaḥ saṃbandho liṅgasya dharmādharmābhyām 
tad dhi sūkṣmaṃ bhūtarūpam eva 
yathoktam teṣām idaṃ tu saptānām ity atrāntare 
ato manyāmahe yad evānyair vyākhyātam asti pūrvaśloke tāv evobhau iti mahatparamātmānau budhyete iti tad eva yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ 
tayor hi dṛṣṭānta upapadyate 
mahataḥ karaṇasya sataḥ kartṛtvopacārāt kāṣṭhāni pacantīti yathā 
tasyeti ca kṣetrajñasya parāmarśabhedopapattiḥ 
paramātmanaś ca kṣetrajñāśrayayor dharmādharmayor dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ sarvasya sukhaduḥkhopabogasya tadadhīnatākhyāpanārtham 
yathoktam
īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśvarabhram eva vā 
preraṇā ca dharmādharmaniyamitecchaiva 
nanu ca dharmādharmayor icchāṃ prati niyantṛtva aiśvaryaṃ hīyate 
tathā śārīrake darśitam yatheha rājā sevānurūpaṃ dadāti na ca tasyeśvaratvam apaiti 
ato mahatparamātmānau paśyata iti vyapadiśyate 
tasyeti kṣetrajñajñānam 
tad apy ayuktam uttaragranthavirodhāt 
yāmyāṃ prāpnoti saṃpṛkta iti 
na hi paramātmanā kasyacit saṃparkaḥ saṃbandha ucyate 
na ca paramātmanā kaścit saṃbandho 'pi 
evaṃ tarhy atra yābhyām iti naivaṃ mahatparamātmānau saṃbadhyete 
kiṃ tarhi dharmaḥ pāpaṃ ca tayor api prakṛtatvāt 
tau dharmaṃ paśyatas tasya pāpaṃ ceti 
yadi mahacchabdenāntaḥkaraṇam ucyate sutarām anupapattiḥ 
na hi paramātmano draṣṭṛtve karaṇāpekṣā 
adhikaraṇam eva hi bodhiparamātmasvarūpam abhyeti tāv eva cobhau iti 
kīdṛśam etad abhigamanam 
yadi tadbhāvāpattiḥ sā naiva kalmaṣavyapāyamātrasādhyā 
atha tatprāptipravaṇatā sāpi naiva pralīneṣu bhūteṣv aśarīrasya bhavati 
tasmāt tau dharmaṃ paśyatas tasya tasyaivātmana iti pūrvavan neyam 
yady ācarati dharmaṃ sa prāyaśo 'dharmam alpaśaḥ 
tair eva cāvṛto bhūtaiḥ svarge sukham upāśnute 
prāyaśo bāhulyena tair eva bhūtair mahadādibhir mahābhūtaparyantaiḥ svarge sukham āpnoti 
yadi tu prāyaśo 'dharmaṃ sevate dharmam alpaśaḥ
tair bhūtaiḥ sa parityakto yāmīḥ prāpnoti yātanāḥ 
nanu ca pañcabhya eva bhūtebhyaḥ śarīraṃ duṣkṛtinām ity uktam kim idānīm ucyate tair bhūtaiḥ parityakta iti 
ucyate 
na bhautikaṃ sarīraṃ nāpy aśarīrasya yātanāḥ 
kiṃ tarhi atyantavilakṣaṇe te mānuṣasarīre 'to 'nyāny etāni mṛdusnigdhasukumāraśarīrārambhakāṇy atyantavilakṣaṇāni 
duḥkhābhighātaniṣkṛtyā parityakta ucyate 
yāni śarīrāṇi svargabhogyāni taiḥ parityaktaḥ 
yāmīs tā yātanāḥ prāpya sa jīvo vītakalmaṣaḥ 
tāny eva pañcabhūtāni punar apy eti bhāgaśaḥ 
prāgvyākhyāto 'yam 
etac cāsyaślokacatuṣṭayasya tātparyam 
yadi bhūyān adharmas tadā yāmyo yātanāḥ na tu svalpe 'dharme asminn eva loke 'sukhānubhavena svargāvāptiḥ 
etā dṛṣṭvāsya jīvasya gatīḥ svenaiva cetasā 
dharmato 'dharmataś caiva dharme dadhyāt sadā manaḥ 
svalpārtho 'yam 
dharmato 'dharmata iti nañaḥ praśleṣaḥ dharmādharmanimittāt 
jīvasya kṣetrajñasyātmanaḥ 
svenaiva cetasā śāstraprāmānyāt tadanubhavet 
kṛtsnaśāstrārthaphalopasaṃhāraḥ 
sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva trīn vidyād ātmano guṇān 
yair vyāpyemān sthito bhāvān mahān sarvān aśeṣataḥ 
dharmādharmyoḥ karmakāṇḍopayogi yat tad uktam 
idānīṃ vidyākāṇḍam āripsate 
tatra dvaitāśrayam iva tāvad aṅgārthaṃ prakriyate 
satvādayas trayo guṇā ātmanaḥ 
nātrātmā jīvaḥ 
kiṃ tarhi mahān eva 
ātmaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacano na pratyaktvavacanaḥ 
nirguṇo hi puruṣaḥ 
atha vā bhogyatayā bhoktur evātmanaḥ saṃbandhitvena vyapadiśyate 
mahān iti ca pradhānam evocyate pratyāsatteḥ 
ādyā hi vikriyodbhūtiḥ pradhānasya mahadākhyā 
yathā jīvantyau jīvatau pramāvasthāvāpyabhavān vikārān avasthitaḥ prakṛtitvāt sarvavikārāṇām idam ucyate 
yo yadaiṣāṃ guṇo dehe sākalyenātiricyate 
sa tadā tadguṇaprāyaṃ taṃ karoti śarīriṇam 
yady api sarvaṃ triguṇaṃ tathāpi yo yadā guṇaḥ sākalyena kārtsnyena atiricyate ādhikyaṃ prāpnoti pūrvakarmātiśayavaśāt sa tadā puruṣasya guṇāntaram abhibhavati 
ataḥ śarīrī tadguṇaprāyo bhavati 
tadīyam eva dharmam ādarśayati guṇāntaraṃ jahātīva 
sattvaṃ jñānaṃ tamo 'jñānaṃ rāgadveṣau rajaḥ smṛtam 
etad vyāptimad eteṣāṃ sarvabhūtāśritaṃ vapuḥ 
sāmānyam etad eṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyāpi sarvaprāṇiṣu 
jñānaṃ vedakam 
ajñānaṃ mohaḥ na yathā madamūrcchādyavasthāsv acaitanyam eva 
ubhayarūpatā rajaḥ 
rāgadveṣaśabdenobhayadharmayoga ucyate 
nāpi samyagjñānavaśānām atiśayena krodho na cātipramādaḥ 
tat tad rajaḥ 
vapuḥ svabhāvaḥ 
anucchedād bījavāsanāyā ā brahmaprāptisthitatvāt 
tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃcid ātmani lakṣayet 
praśāntam iva śuddhābhaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayet 
prītisaṃyuktaṃ saṃvedanaṃ śuddhābhaṃ śuddham ivābhāti rajastamobhyām akaluṣitaṃ madamānarāgadveṣalobhamohabhayaśokamātsaryadoṣarahitam 
evaṃ sarvam 
eṣā cāvasthā svasaṃvedyaikasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhavet 
yat tu duḥkhasamāyuktam aprītikaram ātmanaḥ 
tad rajopratipaṃ vidyāt satataṃ hartṛ dehinām 
duḥkhena samāyuktaṃ saṃbhinnaṃ śuddhaṃ prītirūpaṃ na bhavaty ata ucyate aprītikaraṃ duḥkhānuviddhatayā prītyā na yuktam 
apratipam apratyakṣaṃ pāramārthikam 
etad rajaso rūpaṃ hartṛviṣayeṣu pravartakaṃ spṛhājanakam ity arthaḥ 
yat tu syān mohasaṃyuktam avyaktaṃ viṣayātmakam 
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet 
moho vaicityaṃ yuktāyuktavivekābhāvaḥ 
viṣaya ātmā svabhāvo yasya 
nanu cāyam aviṣayo 'ntarātmatvād eva 
tat kathaṃ viṣayasvabhāvḥ 
mohaviṣayānurāgāt buddhir iva evam ucyate 
viṣayād vātīva buddhis tadātmikā saṃpadyata iti saṃkhyātraiguṇyaṃ na tv antarbahiḥsattvānām aviśabdam 
apratarkyaṃ tadanumānagocaram 
avijñeyam antarbahiḥkaraṇānām agocara ity arthaḥ 
trayāṇām api caiteṣāṃ guṇānāṃ yaḥ phalodayaḥ 
agryo madhyo jaghanyaś ca taṃ pravakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ 
trayāṇām eṣām āsevyamānānāṃ yat phalam utpadyata uttamādhamamadhyamaṃ tadvaktavyatayā pratijñāyate 
yasmin guṇa udrikte yaḥ puruṣasya svabhāvo bhavati sa ucyata iti pratijñā 
vedābhyāsas tapo jñānaṃ śaucam indriyanigrahaḥ 
dharmakriyātmacintā ca sātvikaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam 
tatsaṃbandhaguṇalakṣaṇam ity evaṃ vaktavyatayā pratijñāyate 
sātvikam iti kathaṃcid yojayitavyam 
guṇo lakṣyate yena tad guṇalakṣaṇam 
tat kasyeti 
sātvikam iti saṃbandhaḥ 
prayojanaṃ samudāyasaṃbandhyavayavā api dṛśyante 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
sattvasya guṇasyaital lakṣaṇam 
yathā devadattasya gurukulam 
gurur upasarjanībhūto 'pi devadattapadena saṃbadhyate tadvad etat draṣṭavyam 
padārthā vyākhyātāḥ 
ārambharucitādhairyam asatkāryaparigrahaḥ
viṣayopasevā cājasraṃ rājasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam 
karmaṇāṃ kāmyānāṃ dṛṣṭārthānām adṛṣṭārthānāṃ cārambhe ratir vṛthārambhaś ca 
etat rājasaṃ lakṣaṇam 
adhairyam alpe 'py upaghātahetau cetaso 'samāśvāsaḥ 
dainyagrahaṇam utsāhatyāgaḥ 
asatkāryaṃ lokaśāstraviruddham tasya parigraha ācaraṇam 
viṣaye saṅgo 'jasraṃ punaḥ punaḥ pravṛttiḥ 
lobhaḥ svapno 'dhṛtiḥ krauryaṃ nāstikyaṃ bhinnavṛttitā 
yāciṣṇutā pramādaś ca tāmasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam 
dhanādiṣu rāgo lobhaḥ 
krauryaṃ svalpe 'parādhe vairānubandhaḥ 
nāstikyaṃ pramādatā 
bhinnavṛttitā śīlabhraṃśaḥ 
cagrahaṇena śiṣṭavigarhaṇā 
yāciṣṇutā yācakatvaṃ tacchīlatā 
pramādo 'navadhānaṃ dharmādiṣv apāyaparihāreṣv anādaraḥ 
svapno 'dhṛtir iti nañpraśleṣaḥ 
trayāṇām api caiteṣāṃ guṇānāṃ triṣu tiṣṭhatām 
idaṃ sāmāsikaṃ jñeyaṃ kramaśo guṇalakṣaṇam 
triṣu kāleṣu sāmyopacayāpacayeṣu vottamādhamamadhyameṣu ca phalodayeṣu 
idam iti vakṣyamāṇasya nirdeśaḥ 
yat karma kṛtvā kurvaṃś ca kariṣyaṃś caiva lajjati 
taj jñeyaṃ viduṣā sarvaṃ tāmasaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam 
yad uktaṃ triṣu iti kālanirdeśas tad darśayati kṛtvā kurvan kariṣyann iti ca 
kadācit triṣv api kāleṣu kadācid anyatarasmin 
kim artham aham evam akaravaṃ kathaṃ śiṣṭānām agrato bhavāmi iti lajjā cetasi parikhedaḥ 
yenāsmin karmaṇā loke khyātim icchati puṣkalām 
na ca śocaty asaṃpattau tad vijñeyaṃ tu rājasam 
loke sādhuvādo mamaivaṃ syāt iti buddhyā yad yāgatapodharmāṇām ācaraṇaṃ tac ca khyāpanārtham 
yathā tīrthakākebhyo dānaṃ rājani spardhayā jalpaḥ śūdrebhyaḥ śāstravyākhyānam 
puṣkalām ity anenānuṣaṅgitvāt khyāteḥ sahāyatām āha 
dharmārthaṃ pravartamānasya yadi janāḥ prakāśayanti tādṛśo dharmo na doṣāya 
tad uktaṃ yathekṣuhetoḥ iti 
yathā mahābhāratākhyāne kṛṣṇadvaipāyanenoktam
yathekṣusakto yudhi karṣako 'sti tṛṇāni vallīr api saṃcinoti 
tathā naro dharmapathena saṃcaran yaśaś ca kāmāṃś ca vasūni cāśnute 
asampattau ca karmaphalānām 
na śocati na duḥkham asti 
atha vā karmaṇām asaṃpattau 
yat sarveṇecchati jñātuṃ yan na lajjati cācaran 
tena tuṣyati cātmāsya tat sattvaguṇalakṣaṇam 
vispaṣṭo 'yam 
tamaso lakṣaṇaṃ kāmo rajasas tv artha ucyate 
sattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ dharmaḥ śraiṣṭhyam eṣāṃ yathottaram 
nanu ca kāme 'pi sukham asti 
tatra yat prītisaṃyuktam tat sattvalakṣaṇam iti prāptam 
kathaṃ tamaso lakṣaṇam 
ucyate 
moharūpaṃ tamo 'tra saṃvedanam asti 
tad api sattvasyaiva lakṣaṇam satyaṃ jñānam ity uktatvāt 
ucyate 
nātra bhoktṛbhogyabhāvāvasthābhipretā 
kiṃ tarhi viṣayagataspṛhātiśayaḥ 
na ca tasyām avasthāyāṃ sukhotpattiḥ 
avyaktaviṣayatvaṃ ca vidyate 
kāmapradhānasya yuktāyuktavivekaśūnyatvād asty eva moharūpatā 
īdṛśaś cātra kāmo 'bhipretaḥ 
na yad ṛtau śāstrārthatayā svadāreṣu gamanautsukyam 
yena yāṃs tu guṇenaiṣāṃ saṃsārān pratipadyate 
tān samāsena vakṣyāmi sarvasyāsya yathākramam 
eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ madhye yena guṇena yān saṃsārān puruṣaḥ pratipadyate 
saṃsāraśabdo gativacanaḥ 
yāni janmāni prāpnotīty arthaḥ 
tad uttaratra vakṣyata iti pratijñāślokaḥ 
devatvaṃ sāttvikā yāni manuṣyatvaṃ ca rājasāḥ 
tiryaktvaṃ tāmasā nityam ity eṣā trividhā gatiḥ 
sāmānyena gatinirdeśo guṇanimitto 'yam 
trividhā trividhaiṣā tu vijñeyā gauṇikī gatiḥ 
adhamā madhyamāgryā ca karmavidyāviśeṣataḥ 
eṣā trividhā gauṇikī sattvādiguṇaprayuktā pratyekaṃ punaḥ trividhottamādhamamadhyamabhedena ato navadhā saṃpadyate 
karmavidyāviśeṣāc cānantāḥ kuśalākuśalakarmavaśāt 
buddhipūrvābuddhipūrvaprayogāc ca karmaṇāṃ bahubhedatvāt 
tad idam āha karmavidyāviśeṣata iti 
sthāvarāḥ kṛmikīṭāś ca matsyāḥ sarpāḥ sakacchapāḥ 
paśavaś ca mṛgāś caiva jaghanyā tāmasī gatiḥ 
hastinaś ca turaṅgāś ca śūdrā mlecchāś ca garhitāḥ 
siṃhā vyāghrā varāhāś ca madhyamā tāmasī gatiḥ 
cāraṇāś ca suparṇāś ca puruṣāś caiva dāmbhikāḥ 
rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca tāmasīṣūttamā gatiḥ 
cāraṇāh kathakagāyakastrīsaṃyojakādayaḥ 
suparṇāḥ pakṣiviśeṣāḥ 
śūdrā garhitā iti saṃbandhaḥ 
ye brāhmaṇān avajānate ye ca tadbhṛtyupajīvino ye ca madamānādiyuktāḥ 
hiṃsrāś caurā ity evamādayo vigarhitāḥ   
jhallā mallā naṭāś caiva puruṣāḥ śastravṛttayaḥ 
dyūtapānaprasaktāś ca jaghnyā rājasī gatiḥ 
jhallā mallā iti raṅgāvatārakāḥ 
tatra mallā bāhuyodhinaḥ 
jhallā yaṣṭiprahāriṇaḥ parihāsajīvino vā 
rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś caiva rājñāṃ caiva purohitāḥ 
vādayuddhapradhānāś ca madhyamā rājasī gatiḥ 
rājāno janapadeśvarāḥ 
kṣatriyās tadanujīvinaḥ sāmantāḥ 
vādapradhānāḥ śāstrārthagahaneṣv itaretaraṃ jalpanti 
yuddhapradhānā yodhakāḥ 
gandharvā guhyakā yakṣā vibudhānucarāś ca ye 
tathaivāpsarasaḥ sarvā rājasīṣūttamā gatiḥ 
gandharvādayo devās teṣām arthavādetihāsebhyo bhedo vijñeyaḥ 
vibudhā devās teṣām anucarāḥ siddhavidhādharādayaḥ 
tāpasā yatayo viprā ye ca vaimānikā gaṇāḥ 
nakṣatrāṇi ca daityāś ca prathamā sāttvikī gatiḥ
tāpasās tapaḥpradhānā vānaprasthādayaḥ 
yatayaḥ parivrājakādayaḥ 
anena ca jñāpayati na kevalaṃ janmopapattir gatijātasya karmācaraṇād api 
yato na tāpasādayaḥ katicijjātiviśeṣāḥ kiṃ tarhi karmanimittā ete vyapadeśāḥ 
anye tu manyante 
santi merunivāsinaḥ kecij janapadā yatayo nāma 
śrūyante indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat iti 
vimānāni yānaviśeṣāḥ puṣpakādayas taiś caranti vaimānikāḥ antarikṣacarāḥ kecid devayonayaḥ 
prathamā nikṛṣṭāḥ 
yajvāna ṛṣayo devā vedā jyotīṃṣi vatsarāḥ 
pitaraś caiva sādhyāś ca dvitīyā sāttvikī gatiḥ 
ānupūrvīviśiṣṭaḥ śabdo vedaḥ 
nanu ca gatyadhikāre kaḥ prasaṅgo 'cetanānām 
acetanāś ca śabdādayaḥ 
atyalpam idam ucyate śabdādayo 'cetanā iti 
sarva evaite devādayaḥ sthāvarāntāḥ śarīrātmānaḥ 
tatra sarvaśarīrāṇām acetanatvam tacchaktiḥ kevalaṃ puruṣādicaitanyarūpiṇī prāpyate 
nirguṇaś ca puruṣas tadadhiṣṭhitāni śarīrāṇy acetanāny api cetanāny ucyante 
ata etad uktaṃ bhavati 
sattvapradhāno vedas tadabhyāsāt sāttvikī gatiḥ prāpyate 
na punaḥ sattvapradhānasya vedatvaprāptiḥ sāttvikī gatir ucyate 
anyeṣāṃ tu pradarśanaṃ sarvakṣetrajñāḥ santy adhiṣṭhātāro vedapuruṣā vāruṇe loke śrūyante 
brahmā viśvasṛjo dharmo mahān avyaktam eva ca 
uttamāṃ sāttvikīm etāṃ gatim āhur manīṣiṇaḥ 
viśvasṛjo marīcyādayaḥ prajāpatayaḥ 
dharmo vedārthaḥ 
pūrvaṃ vedasvarūpam uktam idānīṃ tadarthaḥ 
svarūpārthaḥ pradhānatara ity uktaṃ bhavati 
atha vā dharmāḥ satyādayaś ca 
vigrahavattvaṃ pūrvavad draṣṭavyam 
mahān iti saṃjñāntaram 
avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ prakṛtir ity eko 'rthaḥ 
nanu ca sattvādhikye pradhānasya tadvikāratvāj jagataḥ sarveṣāṃ vikārāṇāṃ sattvādhikyaṃ prāptam 
tataś ca rajastamaso kuto 'tirekaḥ 
ato yad uktam yo yad eṣāṃ guṇo dehe sākalyenātiricyate iti tad anupapannam 
ucyate 
naitad evaṃparaṃ pradhānarūpatā prāpyā 
kiṃ tarhi trayaḥ prakārāḥ saṃbhavanti 
yadi vā prāpyo 'vyaktibhāvaḥ yadi vādṛṣṭavidhiḥ yadi vā naivāyaṃ saṃkhye yaḥ pradhāne 'vyaktaśabdo vartate 
kriyānimitto hy ayam 
nāsya vyaktir vidyata iti asphuṭaprakāśatvād avyaktam 
tathā ca paramātmani vṛttir bhavati 
mahattvaṃ ca tasya vibhutvād upapadyata eva 
nanu ca naivāsya sāttvikī gatiḥ 
aguṇatyāgāc cāpy evam 
yadā hi nāhaṃ na mama kiṃcit iti muktāhaṃkāramamakāro bhavati tadā brahmatā bhavatīti vijñāyate 
nididhyāsanayaiva brahmaprāptiḥ 
kiṃ tu sattvapradhānā eva jñānāditatparā bhavanti 
na tāmasī rājasī veti 
evaṃ kṛtvocyate uttamā sattvikī gatiḥ 
anyau pakṣāv anupapannau 
na hi pradhānabhāvaṃ prāpya kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ 
acetanaṃ hi tad vyapadiśanti 
acaitanyaṃ sthāvarebhyo 'pi nikṛṣṭataraṃ yadadhīnā hi madamūrcchāvasthāḥ kecid arthayante 
dṛṣṭavidhis tu naiva saṃbhavaty aśrutatvāt ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaḥ iti śrutitaḥ na pradhānaṃ draṣṭavyam iti 
tasmāt paramātmaviṣayāv eva mahān avyakta ity etau śabdau 
eṣa sarvaḥ samuddiṣṭas triḥprakārasya karmaṇaḥ 
trividhas trividhaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃsāraḥ sārvabhautikaḥ 
triḥprakārasya vāṅmanaḥkāyasādhanasya 
trividhaḥ sattvādiguṇabhedena 
punas trividhaḥ uttamādiviśeṣataḥ 
yā py atra gatayo viśeṣato 'nuktās tā apy uktasādṛśyād antarbhāvanīyāḥ 
guṇaprakaraṇopasaṃhāraḥ 
uttaro 'pi śloko vakṣyamāṇasūcakaḥ 
indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena dharmasyāsevanena ca 
pāpān saṃyānti saṃsārān avidvāṃso narādhamāḥ 
indriyaprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣiddhasevanapradarśanārthaḥ 
asevanaṃ dharmasya śiṣṭākaraṇam 
etac cāviduṣāṃ bhavaty ata āha avidvāṃsaḥ 
ta eva narādhamāḥ 
ataś ca pāpān saṃsārān kutsitāni janmasthānāni 
saṃyānti prāpnuvanti 
atra prasiddha eva tāvat karmavipākaḥ pracakṣyate 
yāṃ yāṃ yoniṃ tu jīvo 'yaṃ yena yeneha karmaṇā
kramaśo yāti loke 'smiṃs tat tat sarvaṃ nibodhata 
bahūn varṣagaṇān ghorān narakān prāpya tatkṣayāt 
saṃsārān pratipadyante mahāpātakinas tv imān 
ghorān narakān 
duḥkhaprasahanavyathayā ghorān 
yātanāsthānāni nārakān 
tatkṣaṇād udbhūtarūpasya karmaṇaḥ phalopabhogena kṣayaḥ 
tata īṣadavaśiṣṭe karmaṇi saṃsārapratipattiḥ 
kathaṃ punaḥ sarvakarma tatraiva na bhujyate 
uktam 
indriyasya karmaṇo narakaṃ phalam nopaśāntasya 
kāryavirodhitvāc ca karmaṇāṃ phalenopaśamaḥ 
tatra yathaiva ca jvalitasyāgner udarciṣo dāho viniyogas tapaś cādaṃbha eva sthitasyaivaṃ narakeṣv api draṣṭavyam 
agnes tu dve avasthe bhavataḥ praśāntatā jvālā ca 
narakas tu ekarūpa eva sarvadā 
udarciṣa ivāgnayaḥ karmāṇi copacayāpacayavanti 
ata upacitasya karmaṇo narako 'pacīyamānasya tato 'nyatropabhuktiḥ 
tatra yuktaṃ tataḥ seṣeṇeti   
śvasūkarakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ go'jāvimṛgapakṣiṇām 
caṇḍālapukkasānāṃ ca brahmahā yonim ṛcchati 
kṛmikīṭapataṅgānāṃ viḍbhujāṃ caiva pakṣiṇām 
hiṃsrāṇāṃ caiva sattvānāṃ surāpo brāḥmaṇo vrajet 
viḍbhujā vāyasādayaḥ 
hiṃsrāṇāṃ vyāghrādīnām 
lūtāhisaraṭānāṃ ca tiraścāṃ cāmbucāriṇām 
hiṃsrāṇāṃ ca piśācānāṃ steno vipraḥ sahasraśaḥ 
tṛṇagulmalatānāṃ ca kravyādāṃ daṃṣṭriṇām api 
krūrakarmakṛtāṃ caiva śataśo gurutalpagaḥ 
krūrakarmakṛtāḥ paravadhaśīlāḥ 
hiṃsrā bhavanti kravyādāḥ kṛmayo 'medhyabhakṣiṇaḥ 
parasparādinaḥ stenāḥ pretāntyastrīniṣeviṇaḥ 
kravyādā gṛdhrādayaḥ 
amedhyabhakṣiṇaḥ kṛmayaḥ 
parasparam adanti yathā mahāmārjāro mārjāram mahāmatsyaḥ sūkṣmaṃ matsyam nekabhedam iva 
antyastrīniṣeviṇo 'ntyāḥ barbarādayaḥ 
saṃyogaṃ patitair gatvā parasyaiva ca yoṣitam 
apahṛtya ca viprasvaṃ bhavati brahmarākṣasaḥ 
maṇimuktāpravālāni hṛtvā lobhena mānavaḥ 
vividhāni ca ratnāni jāyate hemakartṛṣu 
hemakartāraḥ pakṣiṇaḥ 
dhānyaṃ hṛtvā bhavaty ākhuḥ kāṃsyaṃ haṃso jalaṃ plavaḥ 
madhu daṃśaḥ payaḥ kāko rasaṃ śvā nakulo ghṛtam 
ākhuḥ mūṣakaḥ 
māṃsaṃ gṛdhro vapāṃ madgus tailaṃ tailapakaḥ khagaḥ 
cīrīvākas tu lavaṇaṃ balākāśakunir dadhi 
kauśeyaṃ tittirir hṛtvā kṣaumaṃ hṛtvā tu darduraḥ 
kārpāsatāntavaṃ krauñco godhā gāṃ vāggudho guḍam 
darduraḥ maṇḍūkastokaḥ 
chuchundarīḥ śubhān gandhān patraśākaṃ tu barhiṇaḥ 
śvāvit kṛtānnaṃ vividham akṛtānnaṃ tu śalyakaḥ 
barhiṇo mayūrāḥ 
bako bhavati hṛtvāgniṃ gṛhakārī hy upaskaram 
raktāni hṛtvā vāsāṃsi jāyati jīvajīvakaḥ 
vṛko mṛgebhaṃ vyāghro 'śvaṃ phalamūlaṃ tu markaṭaḥ 
strīm ṛkṣaḥ stokako vāri yānāny uṣṭraḥ paśūn ajaḥ 
jalaṃ plavaḥ ity atra pānārtham udakaṃ jñeyam 
stokako vārīty atra dhānyasekādyartham 
rasaś cādyaṃ rasam āhur yadi vātirikauṣadhādi draṣṭavyam 
yad vā tad vā paradravyam apahṛtya balān naraḥ 
avaśyaṃ yāti tiryaktvaṃ jagdhvā caivāhutaṃ haviḥ 
nātra tirohitam iva kiṃcid asti 
striyo 'py etena kalpena hṛtvā doṣam avāpnuyuḥ 
eteṣām eva jantūnāṃ bhāryātvam upayānti tāḥ 
svebhyaḥ svebhyas tu karmabhyaś cyutā varṇā hy anāpadi 
pāpān saṃsṛtya saṃsārān preṣyatāṃ yānti dasyuṣu
