brāhmaṇo 'dhyāpanādijīvikākarmatyāgena yadi kṣatriyādivṛttim upajīvet evaṃ kṣatriyādayaḥ svakarmacyutāḥ pāpān saṃsārān tiryagyonīr anubhūya manuṣyatve jātā dasyuṣu caurādihiṃsrādiṣu bhṛtyabhāvaṃ prāpnuvanti 
anāpatīty anuvādaḥ 
āpadi vihitatvād doṣābhāvaḥ 
vāntāśy ulkāmukhaḥ preto vipro dharmāt svakāc cyutaḥ 
amedhyakuṇapāśī ca kṣatriyaḥ kūṭapūtanaḥ 
svakarmacyutānāṃ pāpagatayaḥ pradarśyante 
vāntam aśnāti 
ulkayā cāsya mukhaṃ dahyate 
kuṇapaḥ śavaśarīram 
kūṭapūtanaḥ kutsitagandhā nāsikāsya bhavati 
kaṭapūtanaḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ 
kaṭapūtano nāma piśācādiḥ sa tu kaścid adṛśyo bhūtaviśeṣaḥ śmaśānikabhūmisevī 
maitrākṣijyotikaḥ preto vaiśyo bhavati pūyabhuk 
cailāśakaś ca bhavati śūdro dharmāt svakāc cyutaḥ 
maitrākṣijyotika iti śabdāntaraṃ piśācavacanaṃ pūrvavat 
atha vā maitrākhye jyotir dṛṣṭāv apīti 
maitram aṅgaṃ pāyuḥ tadakṣivivaraṃ chidram 
anye tūlūkam āhuḥ 
maitram ādityālokaḥ 
akṣaṃ jyotiḥ aindiryakaṃ darśanam 
sa hy ādityāloke na paśyati 
yathā yathā niṣevante viṣayān viṣayātmakāḥ 
tathā tathā kuśalatā teṣāṃ teṣūpajāyate  
bhedagrahagṛhītānāṃ putradārābhiṣvaṅgadhanādilobhe viṣayasukhagandham ātmaikatvaparipanthividyāpratipakṣabhūtaṃ nivartayituṃ saṃsārasvarūpaṃ mānuṣyakaṃ janma yathāsthitam anūdyate sarvasya prasiddham 
yathā yathā viṣayeṣv abhyāsena pravartante 
viṣayātmakā viṣayalālasāḥ 
ātmaśabdena pravṛttasya tatsvabhāvataiva bhavatīty āhuḥ 
yas tu kathaṃcit sahitaṃ bhuṅkte tasya bhogādinā na tatsmṛtyupapattāv abhilāṣo jāyate 
yas tv atyantam evādharaḥ sa tadbhāvanayā tadātmatvena saṃpadyate 
tad idam āha tathā tathā kuśalateti 
kuśalatāpadaṃ caikarasībhāvaḥ 
ataś ca sa na śaknoti viṣayān parihartum 
īdṛśy eva pravṛttiḥ 
aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddheṣv api svadāragamanādiṣv āgamārjitadravyopapādakena bhojyāviśeṣeṣv api pratiṣiddhā 
te 'bhyāsāt karmaṇāṃ teṣāṃ pāpānām alpabuddhayaḥ 
saṃprāpnuvanti duḥkhāni tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu 
tataś ca teṣāṃ pāpānāṃ pratiṣiddhānāṃ karmaṇām abhyāsāt 
ninditakarmābhyāse patanam iti tad bhavatu 
duḥkhāni paśyanti tāsu tāsu kṛmikīṭādiyoniṣu 
tāmisrādiṣu cogreṣu narakeṣu vivartanam 
asipatravanādīni bandhanacchedanāni ca 
tāmisram andhatāmisram ityādyāḥ prāguktā narakāḥ 
tatra vivartanam ekena pārśvenāsitvā pārśvāntareṇāvartanam abaddhasyottānasya vā khaḍgadhārāniśitapatrair vṛkṣair bandhanam 
bhūmiṣṭhair vā patrair eva kadalīdalakhaṇḍavat tathāvidhair maitrī duṣkṛtinām aṅgacchedaprāptiḥ 
vividhāś caiva saṃpīḍāḥ kākolūkaiś ca bhakṣaṇam 
karambhavālukātāpān kumbhīpākāṃś ca dāruṇān 
karambhaḥ kardamaḥ 
kumbhīṣu prakṣiptās te hi tāpenāgneyenānnādivat pacyante 
saṃbhavāṃś ca viyonīṣu duḥkhaprāyāsu nityaśaḥ 
śītātapābhighātāṃś ca vividhāni bhayāni ca 
viyonayaḥ tiryakpretapiśācādayaḥ 
tatra saṃbhavo janma duḥkhabahulāsu 
asakṛdgarbhavāseṣu vāsaṃ janma ca dāruṇam 
bandhanāni ca kāṣṭhāni parapreṣyatvam eva ca 
spaṣṭārthaḥ 
bandhupriyaviyogāṃś ca saṃvāsaṃ caiva durjanaiḥ 
dravyārjanaṃ ca nāśaṃ ca mitrāmitrasya cārjanam 
jarāṃ caivāpratīkārāṃ vyādhibhiś copapīḍanam 
kleśāṃś ca vividhāṃś tāṃs tān mṛtyum eva ca durjayam 
etāv apy uktārthau   
yādṛśena tu bhāvena yad yat karma niṣevate 
tādṛśena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute 
sāttvikena rājasena tāmasena vā bhāvena yad yat karma niṣevate sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ vā 
śarīreṇa tādṛśena sattvabahulena rajobahulena tamobahulena vā tat tat phalam upāśnute sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ vā 
yataś caitad evaṃ rajastamobahulāt karmaṇo 'kuśalasaṃkalpahetor aniṣṭaphalaprāptiḥ 
atas tatparivarjanena kuśalasaṃkalpakarmaṇā bhavitavyam 
eṣa sarvaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ karmaṇāṃ vaḥ phalodayaḥ 
naiḥśreyasakaraṃ karma viprasyedaṃ nibodhata 
vihitānāṃ pratiṣiddhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ yāvatphalotpattis tāni samupadiṣṭāni 
tato nivartitavyam 
yato duḥkhānubandhī viṣayasukhopabhogo 'tas tato nivartante 
naiḥśreyase karmavidhau mokṣopāye vakṣyamāṇavidyākāṇḍa upadiṣṭe sthātavyam 
tad idānīṃ vakṣyāmaḥ 
vedābhyāsas tapo jñānam indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ 
ahiṃsā gurusevā ca niḥśreyasakaraṃ param 
niḥśreyasaśabdena na punaḥ puruṣārthasiddhir ucyate api tu niścitasukhaduḥkhānubandhaḥ prītiviśeṣo 'pi 
vedābhyāsādīnāṃ tatra tatroktānāṃ punarvacanam ātmajñānastutyartham 
jñānaṃ vedārthaviṣayam 
uktārthāny anyāni padāni 
sarveṣām api caiteṣāṃ śubhānām iha karmaṇām 
kiṃcic chreyaskarataraṃ karmoktaṃ puruṣaṃ prati 
sarveṣām api caiteṣām ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ smṛtam 
tad dhy agryaṃ sarvavidyānāṃ prāpyate hy amṛtaṃ tataḥ 
dvividham ātmajñānam dehendriyabuddhyādivyatiriktasya kartṛbhoktṛtvopapattirūpasya ahaṃpratyayaprameyatayātmani viṣayapratītyantargatasya jīvakṣetrajñavijñānātmādiparyāyasya śarīranāśe 'py anaṣṭānāṃ karmaphalānām aurdhvadehikānāṃ bhoktṛtvajñānam 
aparaṃ sarvasya jagato janmādīnāṃ paramātmaikakāraṇatvena nityasya sata ekasyāvidyāvāsanopahitanānārūpasya tiryaṅmanuṣyādiṣv ekatvadarśanam ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ ityevamādiśrutibhir upadarśitasvarūpasya jñānam 
tatra kṣetrajñaparijñānaṃ karmavidhiṣūpayujyate 
asati hi dehādivyatirikte 'sminn aurdhvadehikānāṃ bhoktari phalānāṃ svargakāmādicodanā anarthikāḥ syuḥ atas tatra na kaścit pravarteta 
atas tat karmānuṣṭhānopayogi 
yat tu paramātmaikatvajñānaṃ tirodhānopasevanābhyāsasāmarthyenopapadyamānaṃ śuddhabuddhamuktānandanityāvinaśvarasvabhāvasyātmanaḥ prakāśanaṃ tatredam upapadyate tad agryaṃ sarvavidyānāṃ prāpyate hy amṛtaṃ tata iti 
amṛtaṃ tataḥ gater vyāpattim 
tata iti vidyānirdeśa ātmavidyāyāḥ 
kṣetrajñajñānaṃ tu karmopakārakatvād amṛtatvāya na kalpate 
ato vedāntopadiṣṭasya samastasya dvaitādvaitaviṣayasya sadātmano darśanaṃ tad ātmajñānam abhipretam 
ṣaṇṇām eṣāṃ tu pūrveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ pretya ceha ca 
śreyaskarataraṃ jñeyaṃ sarvadā karma vaidikam 
vedābhyāsādīni ṣaṭkarmāṇi śreyaskarāṇi 
tebhyo niḥśreyasakaratvaṃ vaidikasya jyotiṣṭomādeḥ karmaṇaḥ 
teṣu mokṣatvaṃ pratipadyate 
nanu ca yadi tāvat pūrveṣām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī tad anupapannam 
nirdhāraṇaṃ hi samudāyabhūtaviśeṣasya kenacid dharmeṇa tadaikaviṣayeṇa copapadyamānasyāvāntareṇāsaṃbhavinā 
kṣatriyo manuṣyāṇāṃ śūratamaḥ iti manuṣyajātau kṣatriyo 'py antarbhūtaḥ sa śūratamatvena nirdhāryate 
anupadiṣṭasyānantaritasya kuto nirdhāraṇam 
na ceha prāg vaidikaṃ karmādiṣṭam 
athocyate 
antarvedābhyāsādīni vaidikāny eva katham anuddiṣṭaṃ vaidikaṃ karma 
yady evam sāmānyasya sāmānyāt sutarām anirdhāraṇam 
na hi bhavati gavāṃ gaur utpannakṣīratamā iti 
yadi hy avaidikāni coddiṣṭārthāny abhaviṣyaṃs tata evaitad apekṣeta vaidikaṃ śreyaskarataram iti 
kiṃ ca kāni tāvad atra vaidikāni karmāṇy abhipretāni 
yadi tāvat jyotiṣṭomādīni viśeṣagrahaṇe pramāṇaṃ vaktavyam vedābhyāsādīnām api vaidikatvāt 
atha smārtatvān na tāni vaidikāni yāny eva pratyakṣaśrutivihitāni tāny eva vaidikāni iti 
na hi sarveṣu vaidikeṣu karmasu vedābhyāsādīnām agatvenāntarbhāvaḥ 
etac ca yad vakṣyati antarbhavanti kramaśas tasmin kriyāvidhau iti tad dhi tasya neti tarhy agnihotrādau tapo guru saṃpādyaṃ syāt 
anena tenoktena na kaścid arthaḥ 
vedābhyāsādīny apy anuṣṭheyāny agnihotrādīny api 
tatra na vidmaḥ kīdṛśam amīṣāṃ śreyaskaratvam 
nāpi samāni phalāni yena phalasyotkarṣavattayaivam ucyate 
yathā godānāt svargasya jyotiṣṭomāc ca dīrghakālādyanuvṛttatā 
yathoktam lokavat parimāṇataḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ syātiti 
atrocyate 
yad uktaṃ naitenoktena kaścid artha iti tatra kecid āhuḥ 
virodhe smārte śraute bādhakatvajñāpanārthaṃ vaidikānāṃ śreyaskarataratvavacanam 
yathoktam tulyabalavirodhe vikalpaḥ 
atulyabalāyāḥ smṛteḥ śrutyā bādhaḥ iti 
śrutidvaidhaṃ tu yatra syāt tatra dharmāv ubhau smṛtau 
śrutismṛtidvaidhe anuvādaḥ smṛtir ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati 
amunaivāvagatatvād avācyam etat 
vispaṣṭīkaraṇārtham eva punar ucyata ity adoṣaḥ 
atha vā anyo 'pi tathārthaḥ saṃbhāvyate 
śuddhe ca vikalpavacanam 
smṛtidvaidhe na tadvikalpārtham 
tenāyam arthaḥ 
smārtebhyo vaidikāni balīyāṃsi 
vedābhyāsādigrahaṇaṃ sarvasmārtapradarśanārtham 
vṛttānurodhād evaṃ paṭhitam 
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ nyāyasiddho 'yam arthaḥ nyāyasiddhasyāpi sauhārdenābhidhānam anārabhya yuktam 
ihātmano jñānaṃ pratipadaṃ paṭhyate 
tatra kaḥ prasaṅgo bādhāt tasya 
smṛtikārā na ca svavākyāni svavākyair eva pramāṇayitum arhanti 
athocyate yājñavalkīyāyāḥ smṛter vidhir ucyate nātmīyāyāḥ samānatā 
yat tāvad ātmīyāyām apy uktaṃ bhavati 
ataḥ prakaraṇānurodhād vedābhyāsādi padaṃ pṛthak 
nehātmānaṃ pratijñāyedaṃ paṭhyate 
kathaṃ ca ātmajñānaṃ śrutiparatvena tair vyākhyātam iti 
vedābhyāsādibhyo vaidikaṃ yāgādi karma śreṣṭham iti tato 'dhyātmajñānam 
itarathānyatra prajāyā anyad ucyamānam anyatrāstam anyatra patitaṃ syāt 
atha vā vaidikam atra ātmajñānam eva vedasya tatpratipādanaparatvāt 
agnihotrādyupadeśa auṣadhapāne vṛddhyupadeśavad bālādipravṛttyarthaḥ 
yadi vā karmakāṇḍena śiṣṭāḥ svābhāvikīm enām anādyavidyāṃ vāsanāviṣayāsaṅgahetubhūtām avadhūya śāstrābhyāsavāsanāsāmarthyavaśāt krameṇopajātavairāgyaśithilībhūtadṛḍhatṛṣṇārāgagrahaṇe uttamādhikārānuśāsane niyojyatāṃ pratipattuṃ samastam api śrutyādiṣṭatvam adhikāropakārakatvaṃ karmakāṇḍasya vijñāyata iti brahmavādinaḥ 
ato vakṣyamāṇanivṛttyākhyakarmābhiprāyam etat śreyaskarataraṃ jñeyaṃ sarvathā karma vaidikam iti 
atha vā bhedo yadi sarveṣām api svapnavad asatyadarśanadvaye 'py ātmaikatvajñāne śreya ity arthaḥ 
vedābhyāsādīnāṃ bhedopadeśādinodyaṃ tat kartavyam 
ṣaṣṭhīnodyaṃ tu tair eva samāhitaṃ buddhyāropitāntareṇa pṛthaktvopapatteḥ 
yathā mathurāḥ pāṭalīputrakebhya āḍhyatarāḥ iti 
tathā satīyaṃ pañcamī syād iti cet atrāpi prativihitaṃ dharmāviśeṣāt 
vaidike karmayoge tu sarvāṇy etāny aśeṣataḥ 
antarbhavanti kramaśas tasmiṃs tasmin kriyāvidhau 
etāvad vaidikaṃ karma jyotiṣṭomādy ācakṣate 
teṣām eva ślokayojanā 
kriyāvidhiḥ karmavidhir vaidikaḥ 
karmayoge karmaprayoge bahiḥ saṃpādyāvasthāḥ 
etāny upaniṣadvedābhyāsādīny antarbhavanti 
tasminn iti vyāpyatayā kvacit kasyacit samam eṣām antarbhāvam āha 
karmayoga ity ukte kriyāvidhigrahaṇaṃ ślokapūraṇārtham 
kratuyajñebhyaś ca iti tadvad vā somayāgabhedena bhedo vyākhyeyaḥ 
tatra vedābhyāsas tāvat satre 'ntarbhavati yajamānamantreṣu sarvatropayogataḥ 
tapodīkṣopasadasomayāgeṣu payo 'mṛtaṃ brāhmaṇasya ityādi 
jñānaṃ sarvatra viduṣām anadhikārāt 
evam indriyasaṃyamaḥ pratiyāgagāmī na striyam upeyān na māṃsam aśnīyāt iti 
ahiṃsāpi etāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyād api kṛkalāsasya iti 
gurusevāder ittham apravṛttiḥ 
ye tu nivṛttam eva karmāhus teṣāṃ vedābhyāsādīnāṃ anuvṛttyarthaḥ ślokaḥ 
antarbhavanty upāsanāparasyāpi teṣām anuṣṭhānād antarbhāvaḥ 
tathā copaniṣadbhya upāsakasya prāyaścittanirdeśaḥ pāpakṣapaṇārthaḥ na punaḥ pratividhānavikāra evokto bhavati 
ato vihitākaraṇe pratiṣiddhasevane sati pratyavāyaḥ 
evaṃ tarhi kuto mokṣaḥ 
phalopabhogena janmāntaropattaduritakṣayāt akaraṇāt svabuddhipūrvam anyasya pramādakṛtasya prāṇāyāmavidyāviśeṣābhyāsātiśayena kṛtaniṣkṛtitvāt nirupādhyātmasvarūpasākṣātkaraṇāc ca 
prathamaṃ taṃ vedayet tadbhāvāpattir mokṣaḥ 
ataś ca brahmaniṣṭhāpareṇāpi vedābhyāsādīny anuṣṭheyāni 
yasya yasya karmanyāsaḥ śrūtate sa ṣaṣṭhe vyākhyātaḥ 
kriyāvidhir upāsanavidhir eva draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ ityādinoditaḥ 
bahutvāc copāsanāprakārāṇāṃ tasmiṃs tasminn iti vīpsā yujyata eva 
ataḥ brāhmety upāsīta ya eṣa āditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ iti sa ca eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā ityādi kvacid upāttabuddhyādhyāropitaś codyate kvacid dhiraṇyamaya ityādau lakṣaṇayā tasyaivopāsanā kvacit sarvopāsanādhipatyena niṣkalaṃkam ivātmanaḥ sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt iti codanābahutvād vīpsopapattiḥ 
sukhābhyudayikaṃ caiva naiḥśreyasikam eva ca 
pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam 
nanu ca pravṛttam eva vaidikaṃ karma vyākhyātam 
kim idam ucyate dvividham iti 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
prādhānyaṃ tatra pravṛttaṃ vaidikaṃ vyākhyātam 
vaidikaṃ tu sarvatrāviśiṣṭam 
sukham upaityopapadyate 
yad api sukhābhyudayikaṃ sukhābhyudayaḥ prayojanam asyeti vānvartho vā kartavyaḥ 
niḥśreyasaṃ prayojanam asyeti ca kecana 
pravṛttanivṛttapade yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pūrvavat saṃbandhanīye 
iha cāmutra vā kāmyaṃ pravṛttaṃ karma kīrtyate 
niṣkāmaṃ jñānapūrvaṃ tu nivṛttam upadiśyate 
iha kārīrīvaiśvānaryādi amutra jyotiṣṭomādi kāmyasaṃpādakaṃ karma 
kāmyata iti kāmyam 
phalasya kāmyatvāt tatsādhanam api karma kāmyam eva 
niṣkāmaṃ nityam 
jñānapūrvam ubhayatra śeṣam aviduṣo 'nādhikārāt 
athāpi rahasyādhikārijñānam upadiśyate 
tadā nobhayaśeṣaḥ 
pūrvaśabdaś cādyarthaṃ lakṣayati 
jñānam ādyaṃ mukhyaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ 
yo 'bhimukhyaḥ sa lokaḥ pūrvaṃ kriyāṃ pratilabhate 
ataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati 
jñānaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhānato 'nuṣṭheyam 
vedābhyāsādi tu śāstramātrayā 
pravṛttaṃ karma saṃsevya devānām eti sāmyatām 
nivṛttaṃ sevamānas tu bhūtāny atyeti pañca vai 
nanu ca kāmyaṃ karma pravṛttam ity uktam 
kāmyāni ca kānicit svargaphalāni kānicid dṛṣṭaphalāni 
na ca devasāmyatāphalaṃ kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ karma 
ataḥ kim idam ucyate devānām eti sāmyatām iti 
yāny aśrutaphalāni viśvajidādīni tāny api niṣkāmasvargaphalāni 
ato na vidmaḥ karmaṇā devasāmyatāprāptiḥ phalam 
na ca śakyaṃ vaktuṃ yāni phalavanti śrutāni tāni niṣkāmeṇānuṣṭheyāni tathā cānuṣṭhitāni vai devatvaphalāni saṃpadyante 
śrutahānir aśrutaparikalpanā ca tathā syāt 
kāmyamānaṃ ca vede phalam grāmakāmaḥ svargakāmaḥ iti na vastusvābhāvyena viṣabhakṣaṇavat 
atho devatvādiprāptir bhavati na ca kāmyam iti viruddham iti 
pratiṣedhādhikāreṣv akāmitaṃ katham iti cet tathābhūtasyaiva tatra phalatvenānvayaḥ 
na hy aniṣṭaṃ kāmyaṃ bhavati 
atha nityānāṃ phalam itaḥ kathyate nityatāhaniḥ 
yāvajjīvādipadaiś ca tatra nityaphalatvam avagamitam 
athāvaśyaṃ kalpyate pratyavāyaparihāraḥ kalpyatām 
tad dhi kalpyamānaṃ nityatve na virudhyate 
yo 'py uttaraḥ ślokaḥ bhūtāny atyeti pañca vai iti tatra atyeti vimucyata iti na vidmaḥ 
anyatrātyayo laya ucyate 
na ceha bhūteṣu jīvasya laya iṣyate api tu brahmarūpāpattiḥ 
anye 'pi vyācakṣate  sa cātikrāmati pañcabhūtāni 
na pāñcabhautikaṃ tasya śarīraṃ bhavati api tu tejomūrtir evānveti 
tad api na kiṃcit 
śarīrāgrahaṇaṃ hi mokṣaḥ 
tac ca śarīram ekabhautikaṃ vā bhavatu pāñcabhautikaṃ vā ko viśeṣaḥ saṃsaritve 
ato vyākhyeyo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ 
ucyate 
yat tāvad uktam kasya karmaṇo devasāmyatā phalam iti nityānām aphalatvāt kāmyānāṃ ca phalāntarayogāt iti tatra brūmaḥ nānena sarveṣāṃ vaidikānāṃ karmaṇām etat phalam ucyate 
kiṃ tarhi nivṛttasya karmaṇo yat phalaṃ yatra pravṛttiḥ 
kiṃ ca karma vidyate yena tatphalam āpyata iti praśaṃsā 
santi ca kānicit devatvaprāptiphalāni karmāṇi 
tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati 
karmakāṇḍe yat kartavyatayā veditaṃ sāsya parā gatir devatvaprāptiḥ na tu mokṣaḥ 
yat tu rahasyādhikāroktaṃ karma tad anāvṛttihetuḥ 
tatra kāmayamānasya phalasaṃkalpopahatatvāt karma bandhahetuḥ 
karmaṇāṃ hy eṣa svabhāvo yat svaphaladānārtham adhikāriṇaḥ kāryakāraṇam ārabhante 
tathaiva nityāny apy akriyamāṇāni pratyavāyahetavo bhavanti 
tāny api śarīram āraṃbhanta eva 
yady evam nityāni kariṣyati kāmyāni pratiṣiddhāni na kariṣyati tasya śarīrārambhakakarmābhāvād dhetvabhāvena mokṣam avāpsyati ātmajñānasya kvopabhogaḥ 
yathoktam
nityanaimittike kuryāt pratyavāyajihāsayā 
mokṣahīnaḥ pravarteta tatra kāmyaniṣiddhayoḥ 
ity uktaṃ bhagavadbhiḥ 
na vidyām anabhyasyamānasyāvidayā kṣayo 'sti 
na jñānānucchinnāyām avidyāyāṃ brahmarūpāpattiḥ 
etad evābhipretyoktam niṣkāmaṃ jñānapūrvam iti tathā kāmātmatā na praśastā 
samānakriyasya sāmārṣṭis tasya bhāvaḥ sāmyatā 
devaiḥ samānagatir bhavatīty arthaḥ 
yac ca bhūtāny atyeti ity apy amuṃ prati vyāmohaḥ so 'pi na yuktaḥ 
vipralāpanam apy atyaya ucyate 
tuṣāranikhilaprapañco bhavīty arthaḥ 
abhyeti ity api pāṭhe 'śarīratvam uktaṃ bhavati 
kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcaḥ kartavya ity ata āha 
sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani 
samaṃ paśyann ātmayājī svārājyam adhigacchati 
bhūtaśabdena yat kiṃcit sthāvarajaṅgamaṃ prāṇyaprāṇi tat sarvam ucyate 
tatra cātmānaṃ paśyet aham ivaitaj jagat iti 
tathā ca śrutiḥ ahaṃ vṛkṣasya rerivā iti 
svaparavyavahāraṃ jahyāt 
ayam aham etan mama nedaṃ mama iti saṃpadyate bandhaḥ 
tyaktātmātmīyābhiniveśasyojjhitasvaparabhedasya kevalātmaikatvaṃ bhāti 
eṣa eva svārājyapadārthaḥ 
sarvabhūtāni cātmanīti 
yad eva vikāraprapañcarūpaṃ jagat tad eva tan mayi sthitam aham ekaḥ sraṣṭā kartā dhyātā dyeyaś ceti saṃpadyate 
ātmayājī 
ātmānam eva sarvadevatāmayatvena yo yajate manyate nāgnir ādityo vā devatā aham eva devatā ity evaṃ paśyann ātmayājī saṃpadyate 
na punar ātmoddeśena yāgaḥ kartavyatayā codyate 
kecid āhuḥ 
nāgneyādiṣv agnyādayo devatā ātmatvenāpi na vaktavyāḥ 
svārājyam 
sve rājye bhavaḥ svārājyaḥ 
paramātmavat svatantraḥ saṃpadyate svaprakāśaś ca bhavati 
na candrādityādyālokam apekṣate nendriyāṇi cakṣurādīni nāntaḥkaraṇaṃ mana ādi 
ataḥ paśyann iti ca 
bhāvayed ity ucyate 
na darśanamātraṃ sakalabāhyābhyantaravyāpāratiraskaraṇe tadbhāvanāparāḥ smṛtāḥ 
yathoktāny api karmāṇi parihāya dvijottamaḥ 
ātmajñāne śame ca syād vedābhyāse ca yatnavān 
yathoktāny api karmāṇīti 
nānenāgnihotrādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ parihānir vidhīyate api tv ātmajñāne yatnavān syād ity ātmajñānābhyāso vidhīyate 
karmāṇi parihāyety asyālaṃbanaṃ praśastadevatāyatanapradakṣiṇamantragurugamanādīni muktvā 'py ātmajñānam abhyasyet 
na hi nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ svecchayā parityāgo 'sti puruṣadharmādiṣu vihite nāsti tyāgena vinā 
etad dhi janmasāphalyaṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ 
prāpyaitat kṛtakṛtyo hi dvijo bhavati nānyathā 
dvijo bhavati kṣatriyavaiśyayor apy ātmajñāne 'dhikāraṃ darśayati 
yathā cāraṇyakakaśrutiḥ 
brāḥmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ iti 
vedābhyāse iti saṃbandhanīyam 
ātmajñena samatvenābhyāsāsitenaiva saṃbhavataḥ 
yad ātmajñānaṃ prāpya kṛtakṛtyo dvijo bhavati puruṣārtha etāvatā samāpyate 
na hi mokṣād aparaḥ puruṣārtho 'stīti 
nanu ca yad uktaṃ sarvātmaikatvenāyaṃ paśyet tat pratyakṣaviruddham iva pratyakṣeṇa hi bhinno bhāvaḥ pratibhāti 
tena katham ekatvena grāhyaḥ 
anārabhya svārtha upadiṣṭaḥ syāt 
kathaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ draṣṭuṃ śakyam 
na hi kharo gaur iva buddhyā grahītuṃ śakyaḥ 
indriyadoṣeṇānyatrāvabhāsarūpayā pratīyate śuktikādau rajatākāratayā na tūpadeśataḥ 
yo hy upadiśet taṃ hastinaṃ pratipadyate 
nāsau vacanaphalam añjasāśnuvīta 
ata āha 
pitṛdevamanuṣyāṇāṃ vedaś cakṣuḥ sanātanam 
aśakyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vedaśāstram iti sthitiḥ 
ayam arthaḥ 
vedo 'tra vaktuḥ pramāṇam 
cakṣur iva cakṣuḥ darśanahetutvasāmānyāt 
yathā cakṣuḥparicchinneṣv aneṣṭitaḥ rūpapratyayo bhavaty evaṃ vedād iti cakṣur ity uktam 
sanātanaṃ śāśvataṃ nityam 
anenāpuruṣakṛtatvam āha 
puruṣakṛtatve hi tatprāmāṇyāt pramādo 'pīty atra na pramāṇam asti ataḥ puruṣagataguṇadoṣasadbhāvaniśvayāt 
tadabhāvād apauruṣeyatvena vedaḥ pramāṇam 
ato vedaprāmāṇyāt dṛśyārthasya na kaścana virodhaḥ 
nanu ca yady evam upadiśet agninā siñced udakena ca dīpayet kiṃ na bhaved virodhaḥ 
viṣama upanyāsaḥ 
tatra hi dṛṣṭayā padārthaśaktyā dṛṣṭa evārthaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate 
tatra pramāṇāntaragocaratvaṃ tasyārthasya 
tadviparyayād yuktaṃ tad etad uktam 
iha tu vidhiparatvāt vācyānāṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ ca vidhiviṣayatvābhāvāt siddhasvarūpavastugocaratvenāsaty ekaviṣayatve kuto virodhaḥ 
iha hy anātmabhūtānāṃ ābhāsato bhāvānām ātmatvena darśanaṃ vidhīyate svārājyaphalāya 
tatra yatrādhikaṃ bhedadarśanaṃ tasyābhyāsataḥ śakyam anyathākartum 
tathā hi rāgādayaś cittadharmā bhāvanātiśayayogāṅgābhyāsena śakyante niyantum 
dveṣyam api maitrādinā dveṣyatābuddhir nivartata iti sarvasyaitat svasaṃvedyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca 
bhāvanāyā avidyamānavastusvābhāvyam avabhāsate sāmarthyāt 
yathā vipralaṃbhe kāminaḥ sarvatra kāminīvat paśyanti kim aṅga yatra tāttvikam ekatvam asti 
tat kathaṃ bhedena viruddhatvād avabhāsate 
tadrūpā hi sarvabhāvanā sā bhinnā vidyate 
īdṛśaṃ cātra darśanaṃ samatvena vidhīyate yatra mametat nedaṃ mama iti buddher anupapattiḥ 
yathokam
mameti dvyakṣaro mṛtyur na mameti ca śāśvatam 
iti 
tasmān nāsti virodhaḥ 
pitṛdevamanuṣyāṇām ityādīni śrutipadāni 
devādayo 'pi ridhyanti saṃyuktā na cedṛk te 'tīndriyam arthaṃ paśyanti śrutim antareṇa jñātum aśakyatvāt 
apremeyaṃ cāparimāṇam anantatvād vedaśākhānām 
atha ca pramātuṃ aśakyam arthataḥ 
vedaśāstraṃ vedāḥ 
yā vedabāhyāḥ śrutayo yāś ca kāś ca kudṛṣṭayaḥ 
sarvās tā niṣphalāḥ pretya tamoniṣṭhā hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ 
pūrvaṃ tv apauruṣeyatvena vedasya prāmāṇyam uktvā idānīṃ pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vedānām aprāmāṇyam 
atha vedabāhyā vedaviruddhā avedamūlāḥ śrutayo granthasaṃdṛbdheṣu nodanāś caityavandena svargo bhavati ityādyā nirgranthaśobhādisiddhāntāḥ prasiddhāḥ 
kudṛṣṭayaḥ asattarkadarśanāni 
vedakartuḥ sādhanam apūrvadevatādinirākaraṇam evamādyāḥ kudṛṣṭayaḥ 
sarvās tā niṣphalāḥ pretya prakarṣaṃ prāpya 
saṃnirūpitahetudṛṣṭāntāḥ antato niṣphalā uktāḥ tatra yuktīnām ābhāsarūpatvāt 
tāś ca yuktayo 'nyavati vartmani rātrīyanti mahāgranthavistārā bhavanti saṃkṣeparūpāḥ 
tathā pauruṣeyāṇām upadeśe na prāmāṇyam puruṣāṇām atīndriyārthadarśanaśaktyabhāvāt satyām api śaktau upadeśikasya pramāṇābhāvāt 
ayaṃ sarvajñaḥ tenāyam āgamaḥ praṇītaḥ iti na kiṃcid atra pramāṇaṃ kramate 
vidyamāne 'pi kartṛpūrvatve dṛṣṭārthādṛṣṭakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ tatpramāṇatve devatātvasiddhiḥ 
atas tā yuktayo vyāmohamūlā ity arthaḥ 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
pretya mṛtyasya tā niṣphalāḥ 
tamoniṣṭās tāmasayonihetutvāt 
asmin pakṣe 'samānakartṛkatvāt pretyeti durlabhatvam 
niṣṭhāntād vā saptamī paṭhitavyā prete iti 
utpadyante vinaśyanti yāny ato 'nyāni kānicit 
tāny arvākkālikatayā niṣphalāny anṛtāni ca 
ato vedād yāny anyāni śāsanāni tāny utpadyante vinaśyanti ca 
utpādavināśitvād anityāni 
vedas tu tadviparyayān nityaḥ 
arvākkālikatayā idānīṃtanena puruṣeṇa kenacit kṛtatvād ato niṣphalāni adṛṣṭasya phalasyābhāvāt 
yāni kānicid vipralambhamūlakādilakṣaṇāni 
cāturvarṇyaṃ trayo lokāś catvāraś cāśramāḥ pṛthak 
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarvaṃ vedāt prasidhyati 
iyam api stutir eva 
cāturvarṇyaṃ vedāt prasidhyati adhikāritvenāvatiṣṭhate vasante brāhmaṇo grīṣme rājanyaḥ ityādi 
svarūpaṃ tu vyavahārāvagamyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu tulyatvād anyatra darśitam 
trayo lokāḥ itaḥ pradānaṃ devā upajīvanti 
anena trailokyasthitihetutvaṃ vedasya siddham eva vedamūlatvāt smṛtīnāṃ ca 
āśramo 'pi vedād eva 
bhūtam atītaṃ janmasukhaduḥkhādi 
yac ca bhavad vartamānaṃ yac ca bhaviṣyaṃ tat sarvasya veda eva śaraṇīyam 
śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ 
vedād eva prasidhyanti prasūtir guṇakarmataḥ 
śabdādīnāṃ bhogyatvena sukhasādhanānāṃ vedād eva prasiddhiḥ 
vaidikakarmānuṣṭhānād gītādiśabdopapattiḥ 
tatparityāgāc chrutikaṭuśabdaśravaṇam 
ataḥ śarīrārambhakāḥ śabdādayas tābhyāṃ svaviṣayatvenopatiṣṭhamānā vedāt prasidhantīty etad abhiprāyam etan na punar veda upādānakaraṇam 
ataḥ śarīrārambhakāḥ śabdādayas tābhyām 
etad evāha prasūtir guṇakarmataḥ 
prasūtiḥ śabdādīnām utpattiḥ 
tadarthaṃ guṇakarma 
phalārthatvāt pradhānakarma ca citrādi guṇadharma ity uktam 
pāṭhāntaram prasūtir guṇadharmataḥ iti 
guṇāḥ sattvādayaḥ teṣām dharmo vipariṇāmaḥ tasya yā prasūtiḥ sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutis tadudreko viṣvagbhāvaś ca tatra veda eva hetur adṛṣṭanimittatvāt 
vaicitryapāṭhāntarāṇi niṣprayojanatvān na likhyante 
bibharti sarvabhūtāni vedaśāstraṃ sanātanam 
tasmād etat paraṃ manye yaj jantor asya sādhanam 
sarvabhūtabharaṇaṃ ca vedaśāstrasya darśitaṃ brāhmaṇe 
tathā ca havir agnau hūyate so 'gnir ādityam udvayati tat sūryo raśmibhir vakṣyati tenārttir bhavati tato ha vainām utpattisthitir veti havir jñāyate iti 
ihāpy uktam agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityam upatiṣṭhate ityevamādi 
tasmād etat paraṃ manye puruṣārthakāraṇam 
yady evaṃ kāraṇena jantor asya dharmānuśāsanam etasmāt karaṇāt teṣu yathā darśitopapattiḥ 
nanu ca yady aupādānikam arthaṃ kiṃ tad bhedam uktaṃ laukikam artham iti 
ucyate 
anuṣṭhānam asya vaidikam kāryaṃ tu dṛṣṭatvāl laukikam eva 
saināpatyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca daṇḍanetṛtvam eva ca 
sarvalokādhipatyaṃ ca vedaśāstravid arhati 
atistutir iyam 
daṇḍanetāraḥ daṇḍanāyakā grāmanagarayoḥ kṛtākṛtaprekṣaṇaniyuktāḥ 
senā hastyaśvarathapādātam tasyāḥ patiḥ 
rājyaṃ maṇḍaleśvaratvam 
sarvalokādhipatyaṃ sārvabhaumatvam 
yathā jātabalo vahnir dahaty ārdrān api drumān 
tathā dahati vedajñaḥ karmajaṃ doṣam ātmanaḥ 
iyam api pūrvavat 
spaṣṭā padayojanā prasiddhāś ca padārthāḥ 
vedaśāstrārthatattvajño yatra tatrāśrame vasan 
ihaiva loke tiṣṭhan sa brahmabhūyāya kalpate 
brahmabhūyāya brahmabhāvāya brahmatvaprāptaye iti yāvat 
yatra tatreti vyutthāya vyutkrameṇāpi 
yathoktam vidveṣaṇāc cāpy utthāya brāhmaṇā bhikṣācaryam anuvedya vrajanti iti 
ajñebhyo granthinaḥ sreṣṭhā granthibhyo dhāriṇo varāḥ 
dhāribhyo jñāninaḥ śreṣṭhā jñānibhyo vyavasāyinaḥ 
ajñā mūrkhā anadhīyānāḥ 
granthinaḥ vidvāṃso granthamātrābhidhāyinaḥ 
tebhyo dhāriṇa ity etad yatnena paṭhantaḥ 
pūrve tu nātiprayatnataḥ 
granthasyeti tatrāpi saṃbadhyate granthasya dhāriṇaḥ iti 
śreṣṭhatvam eteṣāṃ japapratigrahādiṣv adhikārāt 
jñāninas tu sarvatrādhikṛtā iti śreṣṭhatarāḥ 
jñānapūrvaṃ japādayo 'nuṣṭhīyamānāḥ phalātiśayadāyino bhavanti 
tad uktam yad eva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tad eva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati iti 
vyavasāyinaḥ anuṣṭhātāro nirviciktsāḥ 
yeṣām etad anyatheti na śakyate 
etad api stutyartham 
adhyayanamātreṇa vedāḥ puruṣārthāya prabhavanti kiṃ punas tadarthajñānam 
tapo vidyā ca viprasya niḥśreyasakaraṃ param 
tapasā kilbiṣaṃ hanti vidyayāmṛtam aśnute 
anenaitad darsayati 
satyāṃ api vidyāyāṃ nākṣīṇapāpasya mokṣaḥ saty api karmakṣaye nāsatyām ātmavidyāyām 
ato yad uktam te svabhāvena mucyante iti tad asat 
amṛtam apunarāvṛttir yeyaṃ kevalānandarūpatā 
pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam 
trayaṃ suviditaṃ kāryaṃ dharmaśuddhim abhīpsatā 
suhṛd bhūtvopadiśati laukikam artham 
dharmo vedārthaḥ tasya śuddhir vivaraṇaṃ pūrvapakṣanirākaraṇena niścitasiddhāntavyavasthāpanam 
etat pratyakṣādipramāṇaniścaye sati bhavati 
suvidite hi pratyakṣe jvālādivaiṣamyeṇa pratyabhijñāyate 
śabdanityatvādisiddhiḥ 
yasya tu samyak nāsti vivekaḥ tasyobhayor aviśeṣeṇa pratyakṣam adhyavasāyaḥ syāt 
jvālādiṣu ca pratyakṣeṇa kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śabde 'pi tathā saṃbhāvayet tathānityaśabdasamudāyātmako vedaḥ syāt 
yasya tu vihitāni kuśalapramāṇeṣu praśabdo 'tadgrahaṇanibandhano nāsty abhijñāno manyamāno jvālāviduṣo bhedagrahaṇanibandhanam iva sitaviśitaṃ viśeṣo na jvālābādhena śabde bādhaṃ saṃbhāvayati 
evam anumānam api suvivecitaṃ na bhāratādigranthapramāṇopalakṣaṇatvāc ca 
tena śauryādiśāstrānte karmaṇyatāsiddhiḥ 
yena na vivecitaṃ hy anumānaṃ sa pakṣavipakṣayor darśanādarśanamātreṇānumānapravṛttiṃ manvāno vede 'pi kartāraṃ kalpayet 
yadā tu nipuṇamatir bhavati tat tat prayojakasya snātavyalakṣaṇayā tasya kartṛtvasvakaraṇasyābhāvād apauruṣeyatvam adhyavasyati 
śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam 
śāstre vividhavidhipratiṣedhāt tasya vividho 'nekaprakāra āgamaḥ 
yatrāgamyate sa āgamaḥ 
bahuśākhatvād vedasya śrutismṛtibhedena ca vividhatvam uktam 
sa cāyam arthaḥ svādhyāyavidhyākṣiptaḥ suhṛdbhāvenopadiṣṭaḥ na ca dvayam api praśaṃseva 
ārṣaṃ dharmopadeśaṃ ca vedaśāstrāvirodhinā 
yas tarkeṇānusaṃdhatte sa dharmaṃ veda netaraḥ 
ṛṣir vedaḥ tatra bhavaḥ ārṣaḥ dharmopadeśo yo vaidikaḥ 
yas tarkeṇa anumānāntareṇa yuktyā nirūpayati sa dharmaṃ vedeti padayojanā 
tarka ūhāpohāntaryasiddhiḥ idam atra yuktam ūhitum idam apohitam 
yadā saurye karmaṇi nirvāpamantre devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi iti prakṛtitaḥ prāpte mantre 'gnipadasyārthāsamavāyād apohaḥ sūryapadasya ca kṣepaḥ 
ayaṃ tarko na virudhyate vedena 
yo 'py evaṃ manyate saurye karmaṇy agner devatāyāḥ abhāvāt arthena ca mantrāṇāṃ prayojyatvāt ekadeśopaśame ca mantratvābhāvāt kṛtsnasya vai mantrasya lopaḥ eṣa vedārthavirodhī tarkaḥ 
yad uccāraṇaṃ mantrāṇāṃ prayojyatvaṃ manyate ataś cāvikṛta eva mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti so 'pi śāstravirodhī tarkaḥ 
na cāyaṃ vidhiḥ 
ayam arthavādaḥ 
asyātra tātparyam īdṛśy upekṣā yad atraitac ca mīmāṃsāto jñāyate 'to dharmaśuddhyarthaṃ mīmāṃsāvedanam etena coditam 
anye tu vyācakṣate 
tarkeṇeti tarkapradhānā granthā laukikapramāṇanirūpaṇaparā nyāyavaiśeṣikalokāyatikā ucyante 
tatra vedaviruddhāni bauddhalokāyatikanairgranthādīni paryudasyante 
tāni vedaviruddhāni 
na tatra pramāṇaṃ vedaḥ 
kapilakaṇādakriyām avirathatānigrahāntādiṣu hi śabdaḥ pramāṇam 
tathā cākṣapādasūtram pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ pramāṇāni 
vaiśeṣikā api tadvacanād āmnāyasya prāmāṇyam ity āhuḥ 
atas tāni śāstrāṇi śrotavyānīti ca 
tathā ca mahābhārate bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena darśitam
śrotriyasyaiva te rājan mandakasyālpabuddhayaḥ 
anuvākahatā buddhir naiṣā sūkṣmārthadarśinī 
anuvākahateti tarkakṛtām apy upapattim āha kevalatvād asattayā 
tathedam aparam uta 
kaścin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇān smārtaḥ sevate 
anarthakuśalā hy ete mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ 
iti 
anenāsattarkaśravaṇaṃ prasiddham pūrveṇa sattarkānujñānaṃ tad eva tad iti 
kecit prāmāṇyaṃ vedasyāhur īśvarapraṇetṛkatayā 
na ca tasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ 
na ca tasmin pakṣe vedaḥ pramāṇam tasya hy asāv īśvaraḥ samayopasthāpakaḥ 
eteṣu śrūyamāṇeṣu aprāmāṇiko viparīto 'bhiniveśo jāyate 
ato 'sattarkā eva te 
na ca vaidikasya vākyāvabodhe kasyacid apy upayujyante 
tathā ca sāṃkhyāḥ sa hy aviśuddhikṣayātiśayayuktaḥ ity āhuḥ 
akṣapādair api tadaprāmāṇyaṃ manyate 
tathā ca yājñikapūrvapakṣe nirdhāritaṃ yad api kenacit paṭhitam 
karmamīmāṃsāvedāntabhāṣyam evam abhidhānaṃ yathāśruti vijñāyate devā asmāl lokād amuṃ lokam āyaṃs tān ṛṣayo 'nvīyus tān manuṣyā abruvan katham atho bhaviṣyāmaḥ ebhyaḥ sarvakarma ṛṣayaḥ prāyacchat 
tasmād yat brāhmaṇottamās tarkayanty ārṣam eva tad bhavati iti śruteḥ 
eṣā yathoktatarkapadārthānuvādinī 
naiḥśreyasam idaṃ karma yathoditam aśeṣataḥ 
mānavasyāsya śāstrasya rahasyam upadiśyate 
vakṣyamāṇārthādārātiśayotpattyarthaḥ śloko 'yaṃ śrotriyasaṃbodhanārthaḥ 
rahasyaṃ guhyam 
ataś ca na sarvasya prakāśayitavyam 
yo na śuśrūṣāparo na ca paramāṃ bhaktim upeto yaś ca na sthiraprakṛtir na tasmai prakāśyam 
anāmnāteṣu dharmeṣu kathaṃ syād iti ced bhavet 
yaṃ śiṣṭā brāhmaṇā brūyuḥ sa dharmaḥ syād aśaṅkitaḥ 
nanu ca anāmnāteṣu kaḥ saṃdehaḥ 
no jāne neha kathaṃ syād iti cet yato naiva teṣāṃ tad 
ucyate 
nehedṛśam anāmnātam abhipretam 
kiṃ tarhi yat sāmānyata āmnātaṃ viseṣatas tu na jñāyate 
nanu ca tatrāpi kaḥ saṃdehaḥ 
sāmānyasya viśeṣamātrāpekṣād yena kenacit siddhaṃ śāstrārtham yathā adbhir ācamet iti kūpyasthāvaranādeyādibhedena bhinnāsv apsu tāḥ kāścid upādīyamānāḥ saṃpādayanti śāstrārtham 
satyam 
yatra pratiṣedhaśrutiḥ na ca vaiśeṣikaṃ prāyaścittam upadiṣṭam tatredam upadiśyate 
yadā śūdrocchiṣṭaṃ kiṃcit pātraṃ tad aśuddhaṃ tat saṃparkād aśuci tasminn akṛte suddhe yadi kenacid bhuktaṃ syāt tadā kiṃ prāyaścittam iti saṃdehaḥ 
sa hi jijñāsā ca niścayāvasānena ca pratyakṣādiṣu samyaṅ nidhiḥ strīśūdrocchiṣṭam evety adattaṃ bhavitum arhati 
na hi tac chūdrasyocchiṣṭam iti śakyaṃ vaktum 
kiṃ tena tad ucchiṣṭam iti 
evamādau saṃdehe tu śiṣṭavacanaṃ pramāṇīkartavyam 
yathā ye śūdrādayo viprāṃśās teṣām ayaṃ dharmasaṃdehaḥ 
śiṣṭopadiṣṭam eva yuktaṃ kartum 
tataś ca nyūnādhikabhāvena yā kṛtā kalpanā sa eva tatra dharmaḥ 
teṣām api tathopadiśatāṃ na doṣaḥ 
yata āha sa dharmaḥ syād aśaṅkitaḥ iti 
adharmaṃ bruvato doṣaḥ dharme tu kā vicikitsā 
tathā gotrapravarasaṃdehe kathaṃcit smṛtivicchede brāhmaṇavacanād gotrapravarasiddhiḥ 
tatra ca pravarasaṃdehe sarveṣāṃ mānaveti saṃśaye ity uktam 
gotrasaṃśaye tarhi bhaviṣyati 
tatra ca gotrasaṃśayābhāve kutaḥ pravarasaṃśayaḥ pratigotraṃ pravarāṇāṃ bhedena paṭhitatvāt 
upapadyata evam etad gotranāmadheyam 
pravarāś ca bhinnā nānā gotrāṇi 
tatra saty api pravaraniścaye gotrasaṃdeha utpadyate 
dharmeṇādhigato yais tu vedaḥ saparibṛṃhaṇaḥ 
te śiṣṭā brāhmaṇā jñeyāḥ śrutipratyakṣahetavaḥ 
śiṣṭalakṣaṇam anena kathyate 
nanu ca arthakāmeṣv asaktānām ity atroktam eva śiṣṭalakṣaṇam 
anyo 'pi tasya tatrārtha āśaṅkitaḥ ato na tasya lakṣaṇaparataiva yac ca vasiṣṭenoktam śiṣṭaḥ punar akāmātmā iti tatra vidvattāyā aśrutatvāt 
yatra paripūrṇatvād adhigato 'rthataś ca viditaḥ sa saparibṛṃhaṇaḥ 
tathā ca bhavān vyāsaḥ
itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedārtham upabṛṃhayet 
iti 
smṛtayo 'py evaṃ gṛhītārthā bhavanti 
brāḥmaṇagrahaṇam anuvādaḥ teṣām eva dharmapravacanādhikārāt 
śrutipratyakṣahetavaḥ 
pratyakṣaṃ hetavaś ca pratyakṣahetavaḥ 
hetuśabdena pratyakṣād anyapramāṇāny ucyante 
śrutiḥ pratyakṣo hetuś ca yeṣāṃ te śrutipratyakṣahetavaḥ 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yathā pratyakṣaṃ nirvivādaṃ prāmāṇyam eva tādṛśīṃ śrutiṃ manyante yāny api hetūtthāni pramāṇāni teṣu viśvasanti śrutim eva tarkaṃ manyante hetuśāstrāśrayaṇena cedaṃ na pramāṇīkurvanti 
atha vā śrutiḥ pratyakṣaśrutiḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ śraute pratyaye prayakṣatulyatvāt prayuktaḥ 
sa ca hetur dharmādharmaparijñāne kāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ ta evam ucyante 
daśāvarā vā pariṣad yaṃ dharmaṃ parikalpayet 
tryavarā vāpi vṛttasthā taṃ dharmaṃ na vicālayet 
daśa avare yasyā daśāvarā 
yadi bahavo na saṃnidhīyante daśāvaśyaṃ saṃnidhātavyāḥ 
tadabhāve tryavarā 
vṛttatheti 
yad uktam arthakāmeṣv asaktānām iti tasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ 
na caiṣā puruṣasaṃkhyā api tu guṇasaṃkhyā 
tathā ca vakṣyati eko 'pi vedavit iti 
ekasya yato guṇasamūhasya bāhulyenāsaṃbhavāt puruṣapradhānatayā saṃkhyāyā nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ 
tānīdānīṃ pariṣattvahetuguṇān darśayati 
traividyo hetukas tarkī nairukto dharmapāṭhakaḥ 
trayaś cāśramiṇaḥ pūrve pariṣat syād daśāvarā 
puruṣapradhāne 'pi nirdeśe guṇaparataiva vijñeyā 
yas traividyaḥ vedatrayasyādhyetā tadarthasya ca veditā 
anumānādikuśalaḥ 
tarkī ayam ūhāpohabuddhiyuktaḥ 
nanu ca naivaṃvido vedārthavittvam eva saṃbhavatīty uktam 
satyam 
paropadeśād api kasyacid yācanāvatī vedārthamātrā saṃbhavaty api 
ataś ca pratyayena vinā vedārthagrahaṇārthahetukena bhātīty uktam 
etena nairukto vyākhyātaḥ 
dharmapāṭhako manvādismṛtiśāstrāṇām adhyetā 
trayaś cāśramiṇo hy ete hy anuṣṭhānaparāḥ kuśalatarā dharmeṣu bhavanti 
pūrve 
brahmacārī gṛhasto bhikṣur ity eke 
tasya hi grāmapraveśo na niṣiddhaḥ gautamena ceyam ānupūrvī paṭhitā brahmacārī gṛhastho bhikṣur vaikhānasaḥ iti 
anye tv āhuḥ hiṃsānujñā nāstīti katham asau dharmam āśrayet 
tasmāt tāpasasakāśam anyaiḥ saha gantavyam 
ṛgvedavid yajurvic ca sāmavedavid eva ca 
tryavarā pariṣaj jñeyā dharmasaṃśayanirṇaye 
niruktavyākaraṇamīmāṃsābhir vedārtho jñāyate 
te ca sarve sādhāraṇāḥ 
na hi tatraikasya vedasyārtho jñāyate nānyasya nityam ayaṃ prakāro 'sti 
atha ṛgvedādītyādi kathaṃ bhedopapattiḥ 
tathā tatra gṛhyasūtrabhedena cedam uktam 
eko 'pi vedavid dharmaṃ yaṃ vyavasyed dvijottamaḥ 
sa vijñeyaḥ paro dharmo nājñānām udito 'yutaiḥ 
vyavasyet niścitya kathayed ity arthaḥ 
nājñānāṃ mūrkhāṇām ayutair apy uditaḥ 
uttaraḥ prāg eva vyākhyāyate 
avratānām amantrāṇāṃ jātimātropajīvinām 
sahasraśaḥ sametānāṃ pariṣattvaṃ na vidyate 
avratānām iti prāg ukta evārtho vyatirekadvāreṇa kathyate 
vratino vedādhyāyinaḥ yaṃ niścayaṃ bruvate tatra na viciktsitavyaṃ vidvadbhir avidvadbhir vā 
ata eva na laghuparikalpo guṇatulyavad vikalpyate 
yaṃ vadanti tamobhūtā mūrkhā dharmam atadvidaḥ 
tat pāpaṃ śatadhā bhūtvā tadvaktṝn anugacchati 
vaktṝṇām aviduṣāṃ doṣakathanam 
etad vo 'bhihitaṃ sarvaṃ niḥśreyasakaraṃ param 
asmād apracyuto vipraḥ prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim 
pratijñātadharmopasaṃhāraḥ śloko 'yam 
dharmān no vaktum arhasi iti yat pṛṣṭam maharṣīn śrūyatām iti yad vaktavyatayā pratijñātaṃ tat sarvaṃ kathitam iti śāstraparisamāptim āha 
nanu ca parastād apy asti śāstraṃ hantavyādiśāstram sā ca vidhitaḥ śrūyate 
tatra vidhiviṣaye kaścid iti katham ucyate śāstram upasaṃhriyata iti 
vaktur na karoti prāya upasaṃhāraḥ 
parastāc ca karmaśeṣāt svapradhānā śuddhaiva vidyopadiśyata iti na virodhaḥ 
sarvatra śreyasī śāstrārthadharmalakṣaṇā vidyety upasaṃhṛtyābhidhāne prayojanam 
evaṃ sa bhagavān devo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 
dharmasya paramaṃ guhyaṃ mamedaṃ sarvam uktavān 
sa bhagavān manur idaṃ śāstraṃ sarvaṃ lokahitāya proktavān iti bhṛguḥ śiṣyān āha 
anenādhikārākāṃkṣā nivartate 
guhyaṃ yad adhyātmaṃ tad api manur mām upadiśya prakāśayāṃ cakre 
mayāpi yathāgamaṃ bhavatāṃ prakaṭīkṛtam iti na kāryādhikākāṃkṣā 
sarvam ātmani saṃpaśyet sac cāsac ca samāhitaḥ 
sarvaṃ hy ātmani saṃpaśyan nādharme kurute manaḥ 
sarvaṃ jagat sadasadrūpam utpattivināśadharmakam 
atha asat śaśaviṣāṇādivat sac ca nityam ākāśādivat sarvam ātmani saṃpaśyed ātmani vyavasthitam upāsīta 
saṃdarśanārthasya spaṣṭārthasya sākṣātkaraṇaparyantayopāsanayā vijñāyate 
na hi sakṛddarśanena sākṣātkāraḥ saṃbhavati 
tathopadiśyate rahasyaśāstram 
tatrātmadhyānāyaitad uktaṃ bhavati śrotavyo mantavyo nidihyāsitavyaḥ iti dhyānaparyantatā saddarśanasya 
ātmadhyānaṃ yathopadiṣṭajñānābhyāso vijātīyapratyayāntaritam ucyate 
atha vā sāmarthyād abhyāsākṣepaḥ 
yataḥ saṃskārakarmāṇi ca saṃskārye viśeṣādhānena saṃpannasvārthāni bhavanti 
yathā vrīhīn avahanti iti aśrutopanyāsaḥ tuṣakaṇavipramokaphalebhyas tatsaṃdarśanena hy adṛṣṭārthatā syāt 
tathā ca karmavidhitvāt ṣaṣṭhisaṃskārakarmatāhāniś ca 
ataḥ saṃpaśed iti jñeyāntaraviṣayajñānanirākaraṇena tad ekajñeyaniṣṭhām anubrūyāt 
atrātmanīti vivadante 
ko 'yam ātmā nāma 
yadi tāvad ayaṃ dehādhikaraṇaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ tata uttaraṃ virudhyeta praśāsitāraṃ rukmābham iti 
na hi karmatvaśarīrasya mṛtyor utpattiḥ śrūyate etasya vākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dvyāvāpṛthivyau vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥ iti 
tasmān nāhaṃpratyaypremeye ātmany api saṃsāravidhiḥ 
ato 'nyā kācit tasya svarūpasiddhir vaktavyā 
kiṃcaivaṃ sati paśyed ityādinā bāhyātmanām apy ādhibhūtādhidaivabhāvena vyavasthitānām ādhyātmam upasaṃhāraḥ 
śiṣyate ca śrautam atostarāgaḥ sādhanatayā kāraṇātmanārjitasya saṃbandhitāṃ pratipadyate 
nanu yaḥ sarvaṃ jagatkāraṇapuruṣāvacchedam uktaṃ sadā pratyātmani saṃpaśyed iti tatra kīdṛśam ātmano darśanam ātmanīti vaktavyam 
anye tu manyante 
śarīrātmana evaitat saṃniveśanaṃ yuktam 
tasya hi śrotṛsaṃniveśena tadvattā yuktā 
tatrocyate 
ātmaśabdas tāvat paramātmaviṣayatayā darśitavākyāntarasamanvayapramāṇaḥ 
yat tu svarūpasiddhir vaktavyeti tatra kim anyac chakyaṃ na vaktum anyad ataḥ śrotṛtvajñānavidheḥ 
tāni ca vākyāni pratiśākhaṃ sarvopaniṣadbhyo 'vagantavyāni 
pramāṇāntarāṇām apy ekatvapratipādanaparatvād eva grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya miśraiḥ kṛta eva kleśaḥ 
uktaṃ ca vākyapadīye na tad asti ca tan nāmni ityādi 
vidhyavagamyatā ca śarīrāvarakād avasātavyā 
yad apy uktam asat kathaṃ dṛśyata iti sac cāsac cety ayam arthaḥ syāt 
sad iti vikāragrāmasya nirdeśaḥ 
asad ity apratyakṣataiva sūkṣmatayāśakyāvadhāratvāt 
yad apy uktaṃ nāsti paramātmanaḥ śrotrasaṃbandha iti 
kim atra saṃbandhi sarvasya jagatsthityutpattivināśānāṃ tatkāraṇatayopapāditvāt 
yaś cāyaṃ saṃniveśavidhis tasyāyam arthaḥ 
yāvad yat kiṃcid bhedavad avabhāsate tat sarvam advaitikatve pravilāpayet 
sarvam ātmastham ity etat paramātmano viratisāmānye hetur vidyata iti 
samāhitaḥ 
samādhir nāma cittavṛttinirodhopāyo yogaśāstrād āgamayitavya ity arthaḥ 
nādharme kurute matiṃ buddhicetasor niścalatābhāvaḥ 
tāvad abhyased yāvad vādibhiś ceto nāpahriyeta 
ataś ca yāvat kaścid bhedakatve prativilāpayet 
ātmāiva devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvam ātmany avasthitam 
ātmā hi janayaty eṣāṃ karmayogaṃ śarīriṇām 
sarvatra yāgādikriyāḥ svargādayo devatā ātmatvena draṣṭavyāḥ 
yo 'yam agnir devatā agner iyam anyātmaivāsau nānyo 'gnir devatāstīti 
tad apy uktam eka ātmā bahudhā śrūyate iti 
yatra yukta eka evāham ātmā devatā iti 
tathā indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhuḥ ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadanti bahurūpaparamātmano 'nyāṃ devatāṃ paśyanti satāṃ parādāt ity anena karmāṅgadevatānām ātmadṛṣṭir vidhīyate 
kiṃ tarhi na tasya devatādikṛtyam asti 
ātmatayaiva sarvasiddhiḥ 
katham 
nārthātmani janayaty eṣām iti 
karmayoge karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ 
sa ātmā teṣāṃ niṣpādayati 
nānyā devatā na tadguṇakam iti 
khaṃ saṃniveśayet kheṣu ceṣṭanasparśane 'nilam 
paktidṛṣṭyoḥ paraṃ tejaḥ snehe 'po gāṃ ca mūrtiṣu 
yāny etāni navacchidrāṇi teṣu bāhyam ākāśaṃ niyacchet 
bāhyam ākāśaṃ tad eva tan na bāhyaṃ kiṃcid astīti 
anilo vāyuḥ 
taṃ saṃniveśayet 
ceṣṭate spandate tatra kācic charīrāvasthā hastapādādyuktaviharaṇalakṣaṇāyāś cāyam 
sparśo bāhyādilakṣaṇaḥ 
tatra vāyuṃ saṃniveśayet 
paktir jaṭhirāgnikṛtā 
dṛṣṭiś ca 
tayoḥ niveśayet 
tejaḥ paraṃ kṛṣṇam ādityātmanāvasthitam 
snehe medomajjādirūpe saṃniveśayed iti vartate 
gāṃ pṛthivīṃ mūrtiṣu śarīrabhāgeṣu 
evaṃ mahābhūtānām upasaṃhāraḥ 
idānīṃ devatānām ādhānam upasaṃhariṣyate 
manasīnduṃ diśaḥ śrotre krānte viṣṇuṃ bale haram 
vācy agniṃ mitram utsarge prajane ca prajāpatim 
yo 'yam induś candramās taṃ manasi saṃniveśayet 
naiṣa candro gaganasaṃcārī 
kiṃ tarhi mama manasi vyavasthitaḥ 
yāś ca diśaḥ śrotrendriyaśaktau 
krānte viṣṇuṃ yo yatrālpam api krāmati viṣṇur eva krāntikarmaṇā saṃniviṣṭaḥ 
evaṃ bale haram 
hanureto drāg apy utthānaṃ sa cendriyāvakāśaḥ kālākṛtir indriyakarmaiva tat 
yam evaṃ vāgagner evāyam utsargo vāyvādyair mantraiḥ paśyet 
evam adhyātmam upasaṃhṛtya sarvaṃ paramātmani paśyet 
evamātmako hetuḥ paramātmani vyavasthitaḥ nāhaṃ kaścit tato bhinnaḥ iti 
evam eṣā sarvopāsanā kartavyā 
praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇor api 
rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāt taṃ puruṣaṃ param 
evam evāha 
praśāsitāraṃ niyantāram 
sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇādiśūdraparyantānām 
yo 'yam agnyādīnām auṣṇyādisvabhāvaniyamo yac cādityādīnām aniśam antaḥparam ojaḥ jagadbhramaṇaprakāśanādiṣu vyāpāro yaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ pratiniyamaḥ sa sarvas tasmin niyantari sati 
yad uktam etasyaivākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi ityādinā tathā
tat sūryas tapati ca yāvad varṣati candramā 
bhayād agniś ca vāyuś ca mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ  iti
aṇīyāṃsam aṇor api iti yaḥ kaścid dārāniratiśayavālāgraśatabhāgādis tat te tṛtīyāṃśaparimāṇakatvam asatpratipādyate asthūlam anaṇu ityādisarvadharmapariṣedhāt 
kiṃ tarhi kuśāgrīyāyā bhuddher gamyatvāt 
etad uktaṃ bhavati 
yo nātyantaṃ kuśalo na ca tadabhyāse pariṣvaktaḥ 
etam eke vadanty agniṃ manum anye prajāpatim 
indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam 
eṣa sarvāṇi bhūtāni pañcabhir vyāpya mūrtibhiḥ 
janmavṛddhikṣayair nityaṃ saṃsārayati cakravat 
evaṃ yaḥ sarvabhūteṣu paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā 
sa sarvasamatām etya brahmābhyeti paraṃ padam 
brahmābhyeti brahmabhāvam āpadyate 
maitrādyavabhāsena rāgadveṣakṣayam anuvadati 
anena cāvijātīyapratyayāntaritātmaikatvajñānam anuṣṭheyam āha 
na hi vijātīyapratyayotpattau sarvasaṃmatatā bhavati 
ataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati 
ahaṃ mameti tyaktāhaṃkāramamakārasya tad ekajñānaniyatatayā niratiśayaparamānandarūpaṃ brahma prāpnoti 
aniṣṭanivṛttiḥ śāstrapradarśitābhipretaniyamasya prāptiś ca phalasiddhir bhavati ity arthaḥ   
ity etan mānavaṃ śāstraṃ bhṛguproktaṃ paṭhan dvijaḥ 
bhavaty ācāravān nityaṃ yatheṣṭāṃ prāpnuyād gatim 
itiḥ śāstrasamāptim āha 
paṭhan bhavaty ācāravān 
anyo adhyāhārya ācāraḥ 
yathā paṭhitaśāstrāt śāstrānuṣṭhānam 
evaṃvidhaś ced bhavati yatheṣṭāṃ devatādilakṣaṇāṃ gatim 
iti mānave dharmaśāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ
dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ 
mānyā kāpi manusmṛtis taducitā vyākhyā hi medhātitheḥ
sā luptaiva vidher vaśāt kvacid api prāpyaṃ na yat pustakam 
kṣoṇīndro madanaḥ sahāraṇasuto deśāntarād āhṛtaṃ
jīrṇoddhāram acīkarat tata itas tatpustakair lekhitaiḥ 
iti bhaṭṭavīrasvāmisūnor bhaṭṭamedhātithikṛtau
manubhāṣye dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
